Otu Republican Party, nke a na-akpọkwa GOP ('Grand Old Party'), bụ otu n'ime otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị abụọ bụ isi na United States E hiwere GOP na 1854 site n'aka ndị na-emegide ịgba ohu bụ ndị megidere iwu Kansas–Nebraska, nke nyere ohere maka mgbasawanye nke ịgba ohu chatel n'ime mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ Kemgbe etiti afọ 1850, ọ bụla onye isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Democratic Party Kemgbe Ronald Reagan nọ n'ọchịchị n'afọ ndị 1980, nchegharị bụ isi echiche nke GOP
Reserve Bank of Malawi bụ ụlọ akụ etiti nke Malawi nke e guzobere n'afọ 1964 nke dị na Lilongwe
Gọvanọ ugbu a bụ Wilson Banda
Ụlọ akụ ahụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ịkwalite amụma nsonye ego ma bụrụ onye isi na Alliance for Financial nsonye
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa 17 mbụ iji mee nkwekọrịta mba kpọmkwem maka ntinye ego n'okpuru nkwupụta Maya n'oge 2011 Global Policy Forum mere na Mexico
Reserve Bank of Malawi bụ naanị ụlọ ọrụ e nyere ikike ịnye kwacha Malawi, nke dochiri pound Malawi n'afọ 1971
Resty Nanteza bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe ngosi redio na redio NBS na obodo Jinja nke onye bụbu onye omeiwu Hon Igeme Nathan Nabeta
N'afọ 2021, ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye nnọchi anya nwanyị na nzuko omeiwu maka mpaghara Buikwe na ntuli aka zuru oke nke Uganda n'afọ 2021, mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka onyeisi oche nke Nyenga Division
O jisiri ike nweta vootu 41,561, a kọkwara na ọ meriri na ụfọdụ ndepụta mbụ nke nsonaazụ
Otú ọ dị, Diana Mutasingwa (NRM) meriri ya bụ onye meriri ntuli aka ahụ na 43,215 vootu
Nanteza gbara nsonaazụ ahụ aka n'ụlọ ikpe
Ọ bụ onye otu Forum for Democratic Change
Retief bụ aha nke nna nke ndi Afrikaans
Ọ nwere ike izo aka na
Franki bụ ego Réunion ruo 1999
Tupu 1975, Réunion nwere franc nke ya, dị iche na nke France
Mgbe 1975, franc French gbasara
Réunion na-eji euro eme ihe ugbu a
E kewara franc Réunion n'ime 100 cents
Franki French na-agagharị na Réunion naanị (ma e wezụga maka otu mkpụrụ ego) ruo 1874, mgbe mbipụta ego dị iche iche malitere
Na mbido, ihe ndekọ nke Banque de la Réunion na Colonial Treasury na-agagharị n'akụkụ ego French
N'afọ 1896, e wepụtara mkpụrụ ego, na-esote akara ụlọ akụ na 1920

N'afọ 1945, e mepụtara franc CFA ma nabata ya na Réunion, na mkpụrụ ego dị iche iche e webatara na 1948Ọ bụ ezie na e ji 1960 dekọọ ego akwụkwọ Réunion na ọnụ ahịa ya na franc ọhụrụ site na 1960, franc ọhụrụ ahụ anọchighị franc Réunion ruo 1975, mgbe ego French nọchiri Réunion na ọnụego 1 French (ọhụrụ) franc = 50 Réunion (CFA) francs
E wepụtara okpukpe niile ruo n'afọ 1975
Banque de la Réunion webatara ndetu maka 5, 10, 25, 100 na 500 francs n'etiti 1873 na 1876
N'etiti 1884 na 1886, Colonial Treasury (Trésor Colonial) nyere ndetu maka 50 francs na 32 centimes, 1
N'afọ 1917, Banque de la Réunion wepụtara obere akwụkwọ mgbanwe mberede maka 5 na 10 cents
Ụlọ akụ ahụ wepụtara akwụkwọ ego 1000 francs na 1937 na 5000 francs na 1940
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ụlọ akụ ahụ wepụtara 50 cents, 1 na 2 francs, nke mbụ n'okpuru nkwado nke Vichy France, mgbe ahụ nke Free French
Banque de la Réunion kwụsịrị ibipụta akwụkwọ ozi na 1944
N'afọ 1943, Caisse Centrale de la France Libre (Central Cashier of Free France) wepụtara akwụkwọ ozi 5, 100 na 1000 nke otu ụdị ahụ e nyere na French Equatorial Africa maka iji ya na Réunion
N'afọ 1944, Caisse Centrale de la France d'Outre Mer (Central Cashier of Overseas France) wepụtara 100 na 1000 francs n'otu ụzọ ahụ
N'afọ 1947, Caisse Centrale de la France d'Outre-Mer wepụtara akwụkwọ ozi French Equatorial African maka 5, 10, 20, 50, 100, 500, 1000 na 5000 francs nke e dere 'La Réunion'

Na 1962, Institut d'Émission des Départements d'Outre-Mer weghaara mbipụta ego akwụkwọ, nke nwere ndetu maka 100, 500, 1000 na franc 500, nke ejiri 'La Réunion' ma ọ bụ 'Département de la Réunion' ebipụta
N'afọ 1960, 500 1000 na 5000 francs ka ebipụtara n'ofe franc ọhụrụ (10, 20 na 100 nouveaux francs)
Revel Fox (ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba 1924 rụo ụbọchị irí na àtó n'ọnwa Disemba 2004) bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na South Africa
Ónyé guzobere Revel Fox na Partners
A mụrụ Revel Fox na Durban na 1924, n'ezinụlọ Albert John Charles Fox, ónyé ọrụ mbubata, na Ivy Priscilla Ellis
Ka ọ na-erule ógè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Durban Boys' High School Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ amalitela ma ọ chọrọ isonyere ndị agha
Mgbè ọnwa iri na asatọ nke ịmụ ihe owuwu gasịrị, ọ debanyere aha ma zigara ya Ịtali dị ka akụkụ nke Special Service Battalion
Mgbè Agha ahụ gasịrị, Revel Fox laghachiri na Mahadum Cape Town na-enweta nzere na B Arch na 1948 (Honoris Causa) nke mahadum abụọ nyèrè ya, Mahadum Natal (1993) na Mahadim Cape Town (2001)
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Rhodesia (Zimbabwe) na n'ọfịs Anders Tengbom na Stockholm, Sweden
N'afọ 1952, ọ laghachiri South Africa, wee guzobe ọrụ na Worcester na Western Cape, mepee ọrụ na Cape n'afọ 1953
Na Worcester, o tinyere aka n'ọtụtụ ọrụ mweghachi
Site na 1960 ruo 1963 edepụtara ya dị ka ónyé enyemaka ónyé nkuzi na ndekọ ndị ọrụ nke Mahadum Cape Town
O nwetara nzere masta nke Urban and Regional Planning na Mahadum Cape Town n'afọ 1969
Site na 1973 ruo 1975 Fox bụ ónyé ísí óchè nke Cape Provincial Institute of Architects, 1998 na 1999 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Ónyé ísí óchè nke Kansụl nke Mahadum Cape Town
Revel Fox bụ ónyé otu Advisory Board nke Faculty of Engineering and the Built Environment na Mahadum Cape Town
A maara Fox màkà imegide ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma kpọọ ya ka ọ sonye na ndị nnọchi anya gárá Dakar na 1987 iji zute ndị nnọchianya nke African National Congress nke a chụgara n'oge ahụ

Okwu banyere nsọpụrụ maka ndụ bụ nsụgharị nke ahịrịokwu German 'Ehrfurcht vor dem Leben' Okwu ndị a rutere Albert Schweitzer na njem ụgbọ mmiri na Osimiri Ogooué na French Equatorial Africa (nke ana akpo Gabon ugbu a), mgbe ọ na-achọ echiche zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ụkpụrụ omume maka oge anyị
Na Mmepeanya na Ụkpụrụ Omume, Schweitzer dere, sị 'Ethics abụghị ihe ọzọ karịa nsọpụrụ maka ndụ
Nsọpụrụ maka Ndụ na-enye m ụkpụrụ m bụ isi nke omume ọma, ya bụ, na ezi ihe dị n'ịnọgide, inye aka na ịkwalite ndụ, na ibibi, imerụ ma ọ bụ igbochi ndụ bụ ihe ọjọọ
Schweitzer mere nsọpụrụ maka ndụ ka ọ bụrụ ụkpụrụ bụ isi nke nkà ihe ọmụma ziri ezi, nke o mepụtara ma tinye n'omume

O gosipụtara mmepe ya n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na mbipụta n'oge ndụ ya nakwa n'ihe odide nke e bipụtara n'oge na-adịbeghị anya; ọrụ bụ isi bụ akụkụ anọ ya na-agwụ agwụ Nkà ihe ọmụma nke Omenala (German ) nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Ụwa-ele nke nsọpụrụ maka ndụ'
O jikwa ụlọ ọgwụ ya dị na Lambaréné, Gabon gosipụta nkà ihe ọmụma a n'omume
Albert Schweitzer kwenyere na ụkpụrụ omume nke nwere ike ịkwado ihe échichè nke ezi mmepeanya kwesịrị inwe ntọala ha na echiche miri emi ma bụrụ ihe na-akwado ụwa na ndụ
Nkeá mèrè kà omalite ịchọ ụkpụrụ omume n'okpukpe dị iche iche dị mkpa na echiche ụwa nke ọ nwere ike ịnweta, mana ọ hụghị nke ọ bụla nwere ike, n'ụzọ doro anya, ijikọta ụkpụrụ omume na nkwenye ndụ
Ọ bụ ruo afọ abụọ mgbe ọ kwagara Gabon iji guzobe ụlọ ọgwụ Albert Schweitzer ka o mechara chọta nkwupụta dị mfe nke zara ọchịchọ ya
N'agbanyeghị, e kwesịghị ileghara ya anya na mgbe ọ bụ nwata, Schweitzer nwere mmetụta miri emi maka nhụjuanya nke ihe niile e kere eke gbara ya gburugburu
O dere, sị, 'N'oge gara aga ka m nwere ike icheta, oke nhụsianya m hụrụ n'ụwa gbara m gburugburu wutere m

Obi ụtọ nke ndị ntorobịa na-erughị eru amaghị m n'ezieOtu ihe wutere m karịsịa bụ na ụmụ anụmanụ ndị ahụ na-enweghị ihe mgbu na nhụsianya dị ukwuuỌ bụ ihe a na-apụghị ịghọta aghọta nye m - nke a bụ tupu m amalite ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ - ihe mere n'ekpere mgbede m ga-eji kpee ekpere maka ụmụ mmadụ naanị
Ya mere, mgbe nne m kpere m ekpere ma susuo m ọnụ abalị ọma, ana m agbakwunye ekpere nkịtị nke m dere onwe m maka ihe niile dị ndụ
O kwuru otú a “O Nna nke eluigwe, chekwaba ma gọzie ihe niile nwere ume ndụ chekwaa ha n’ihe ọjọọ niile, ma mée ka ha hie ụra n’udo'
Schweitzer jigidere echiche'a n'afọ 1920 na ndị mmadụ enwekwaghị aka na uche ha, ebe ha meriri ya n'aka ndị ọchịchị n'èzí ma chụọ ya n'àjà maka ọnọdụ ndị dị n'èzí
Ya mere, ọ rụtụrụ aka n'ihe ndị dị mkpa n'ime onwe anyị nke nwere ike imetụ uche anyị ma nwee ike iji ya mee ihe maka ọdịmma mmadụ niile

Ébé ona achọ azịza banyere nsogbu ndị ihe bụ ọdịda doro anya nke mmepeanya ọdịda anyanwụ kpatara ya, Albert Schweitzer adịghị njikere ịhapụ nkwenkwe na ọganihu nke ndị sitere na Europe na-ewere dị ka ihe efu
Kama nke ahụ, ọ chọrọ ịchọpụta ihe mere 'ọchịchọ ịga n'ihu' a ji yie ka ọ na-apụ n'okporo ụzọ ma na-akpata nkewa nke mmepeanya Europe

Reverend Billy na Ụka ​​Kwụsị Ịzụ ahịa bụ obodo na-arụ ọrụ siri ike dabere na New York City Ndị Choir Stop Shopping so onye nkwusa na-atọ ọchị, Reverend Billy, nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri William (Billy) Talen gosipụtara Nkà ihe ọmụma nke Ụka Kwụsị Ịzụ ahịa gbara gburugburu 'Shopocalypse' dị nso, nke na-eche na njedebe nke mmadụ ga-abịa site na ịzụ ahịa manic

Reverend Bizarre bụ igwe egwu mbibi si Finland Emebere ya na 1995, ha ji ụda olu dị egwu were egwu egwu ọdịnala na-adị nwayọ ma dị arọ, na-agbaso nzọụkwụ nke ndị egwu dịka Saint Vitus, Pentagram na Black Sabbath Ndị otu ahụ bụ otu n'ime aha kachasị na 2000s omenala mbibi ọla
Reverend Gary Davis, bụkwa kpuru ìsì Gary Davis (amụrụ Gary D

Davis, Eprel 30, 1896 – Mee 5, 1972), bụ onye na-agụ blues na onye na-agụ ozi ọma bụ onye nwekwara nkà na banjo, guitar na harmonica Amụrụ na Laurens, South Carolina na kpuru ìsì kemgbe ọ bụ nwata, Davis buru ụzọ rụọ ọrụ aka na Piedmont blues scene nke Durham, North Carolina na 1930s, tupu ọ ghọọ Onye Kraịst ma ghọọ onye ozi Mgbe ọ kwagara New York na 1940s, Davis nwetara nlọghachi ọrụ dịka akụkụ nke ntugharị egwu ndị America nke ruru n'oge 1960 Ihe ndekọ kachasị ama nke Davis gụnyere 'Samson na Delaịla' na 'Ọnwụ adịghị enwe Obi ebere'

Reverend na ndị na-eme ihe bụ otu egwu egwu Bekee sitere na Sheffield, South Yorkshire Ndị otu ahụ nọ n'ihu Jon McClure, nke akpọrọ 'The Reverend' Ndekọ mpụta mbụ ha, The State of Things (2007), nyeere ha aka inweta ihe ịga nke ọma na Britain wee kpalite UK top 10 otu 'Asọmpi Asọ nke Ụwa' Ndị otu ahụ wepụtara ọba egwu nke abụọ ha, A French Kiss in the Chaos (2009), nke mere ka a kpọọ ha ka ha kwado Oasis na njem ikpeazụ ha, na-egwu ebe egwuregwu dị ka Wembley Stadium A tọhapụrụ album studio nke atọ nke otu ahụ, @Reverend_Makers, na 2012, na album studio nke anọ ha, ThirtyTwo, ka ewepụtara na 2014
Revolving Art Incubator (RAI) bụ ebe nka nke oge a na nke ọzọ nke ọ dị na Lagos, Nigeria
Ọ dị na Silverbird Galleria na Victoria Island, Lagos

A tọrọ ntọala Revolving Art Incubator (RAI) n'afọ 2016 site n'aka onye Naijiria na-ese foto na onye na-ese ihe Jumoke Sanwo, dị ka oghere nka ọzọ maka itinye aka na ọtụtụ ihe okike na okwu nka nke oge a
RAI gosipụtara ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na mba Naijiria nke gụnyere Aderemi Adegbite, Babatunde Ogunlade, Akinwande, Chris Ogunlowo, na ndị ọzọ na-ese egwu n'oge a
RAI na ndị na-ese ihe emeela ihe ngosiputa dị iche iche ma rụkwaa ọrụ na mgbasa ozi dị iche iche
Ndị a gụnyere
Revolving Art Incubator na-achikọbakwa outSPOKEN, akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-ede kwa izu nke oge a site na uri, okwu a na-ekwu, na egwu

Rex Distin Martienssen ARIBA CIAM (ubochí irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Febụwarị 1905, Queenstown, Cape Colony rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na àtó n'ọnwa Ọgọst 1942, Pretoria) bụ ónyé South Africa na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke Le Corbusier nwéré mmetụta dị ukwuu ma na-eduga otu ihe owuwu nke ógè a na South Africa

N'ihi ọnwụ ya n'oge ọ na-enweta ọzụzụ dị ka ónyé ísí na South African Air Force na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, Martienssen enweghị ike itinye ọtụtụ n'ime echiche ya n'ọrụ, mànà ọ hapụrụ ihe nketa bara ụba nke ihe odide nye ndị ga-abịa n'ọdịnihu
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Witwatersrand wee nweta BArch
na 1930, MArch na 1940 na DLitt
Ọ ghọkwara ónyé mmekọ nke Royal Institute of British Architects na 1930 na 1939 a họpụtara ya dịka ónyé isi óchè nke Transvaal Institute of Architects
Ọ ghọrọ ónyé nkuzi dị elu na ihe owuwu na Mahadum Witwatersrand ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka ónyé isi nwa oge nke ngalaba ahụ
Ọ ghọrọ ónyé otu Faculty nke Injinia na 1937 na nke Faculty of Architecture na 1940
Ọ gàrà Europe ugboro ugboro iji mara mgbanwe na echiche ọhụrụ
N'otu n'ime njem ya na mbà ọzọ na 1934 ọ zutere Le Corbusier, nke ga-abụ mmalite nke ọbụbụenyi na-adịgide adịgide
N'otu afọ ahụ, Martienssen guzobere ọrụ na Johannesburg, ma mepụta ụlọ nke ya Martienssen na Greenside, ụlọ dị ịrịba ama ọbụna site na ụkpụrụ dị ugbu a
Ọ ghọrọ ónyé nchịkọta akụkọ nke South African Architectural Record na 1932 ma bipụta ihe dị ka isiokwu irí ànó na Greek, Renaissance na ụlọ nke ógè a
E bipụtara akwụkwọ edemede ya, The Idea of Space in Greek Architecture, mgbè ọ nwụsịrị na 1956
N'afọ 1937, Le Corbusier họpụtara ya wee bụrụ ónyé otu Congrès International d'Architecture Moderne
Rex Martienssen lụrụ ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na ọkọ akụkọ ihe méré eme Prọfesọ Heather Martienssen nke Ngalaba Fine Arts nke Mahadum Witwatersrand bụ nwanyị mbụ prọfesọ na mahadum ahụ
Rex Garner bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi a mụrụ na Britain
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1921 na Wolverhampton, England
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị 17 ọnwa Mee afọ 2015 mgbe ọ dị afọ 94
Ụmụ asaa hapụrụ Garner Nicolas Garner, Lindsay Garner, Christopher Garner, Geraldine Raper (onye a mụrụ Garner) Sally Garner-Gibbons, Kerry Garner, na Kim Garner, yana nwunye mbụ ya Tammy Garner
N'etiti ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ya na British TV, ọ sonyeere na My Wife and I
N'afọ 1968 ọ gara South Africa iji sonye na Academy Theatre, wee biri ebe ahụ n'afọ 1974
N'afọ 1979, ọ sonyeere Pieter Toerien na-eme ihe nkiri ma na-eduzi ihe nkiri ruo n'afọ 1999
N'afọ 1981 ọ bụ onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri Tommie Meyer 'Birds of Paradise'
Ọ laghachiri na UK na mbido afọ 2000
A kpọrọ ya onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma n'afọ 1983 na Fleur du Cap Theatre Awards maka ọrụ ya dịka Nna Tim na Mass Appeal

Ezeh Chisom Faith (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 10 n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1994), onye a maara dịka Rexxie A makwaara ya maka akara (Yo! Rexxie Pon This One), bụ onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, DJ na onye na-ede egwu na Naijiria
Ọ na-ewu ewu maka ịmepụta ụda Zanku, na imepụta Naira Marley's Soapy, Tesumole na anụ ọhịa ahụ kụrụ KPK na Mohbad
A mụrụ Rexxie na Anambra Steeti, Naịjirịa
Rexxie gụrụ akwụkwọ na Abuja na Legos ebe a zụlitere ya, ọ gara Yaba koleji nká na uzu, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Tai Solarin
Rexxie mepụtara egwu dị ka Comma na Bebo na abọm mmeri Grammy Twice As Tall nke Burna Boy
Rexxie emepụtala egwu Naịjirịa maka ndị dị ka Zlatan Ibile, Naira Marley, Davido, na Burna Boy
Rexxie wepụtara abọm studio A True Champion na Jun 28, nke gosipụtara ndị na-ese ihe dịka Zlatan, Davido, Naira Marley, Zinoleesky, Mohbad, Sarkodie, Peruzzi
AfroStreet The EP (2020)
Ezi Onye mmeri (2021)
Nataraja (2021)
Reynold Dash Ruffins (August 5, 1930 na July 11, 2021) bụ onye America na-ese ihe, onye na-ese foto, na onye na-emepụta ihe osise
Ya na Milton Glaser, Edward Sorel, na Seymour Chwast, Ruffins guzobere Push Pin Studios na 1954
Ọ bú onye na-ese ihe osise nke ihe karịrị akwụkwọ ụmụaka iri abụọ, a makwara Ruffins maka 'ọdịdị ya dị iche iche, ụcha dị egwu, na mmasị maka ihe e kere eke
' O nweela ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onwe ya ma bụrụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi otu na Paris 'Musée du Louvre, na Milan, Bologna, na Tokyo
Ruffins gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke egwu na nka na New York City na Cooper Union
Mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Cooper Union, ya, Seymour Chwast, Milton Glaser, na Edward Sorel, guzobere Design Plus, ụlọ ọrụ egwu na-adịteghi aka
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, mmekọrịta ahụ gbanwere ma na 1954, ya na ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Cooper bu Glaser, Sorel, na Chwast guzobere Push Pin Studios
N'afọ 1963, mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Push Pin, Ruffins guzobere ụlọ ọrụ imewe ọzọ na Simms Taback, mmekọrịta nke were ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ
Ndị chọtara ya n'ihi ahịa ya gụnyere IBM, AT&T, Coca-Cola, CBS, Pfizer, New York Times, Time Life, Fortune, Gourmet Magazine, na US Post Office
Ruffins banyere n'ọrụ nke ihe osise akwụkwọ ụmụaka na 1969, na n'ime afọ 1970 na mmalite afọ 1980 ya na onye edemede Jane Sarnoff na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro
N'afọ 1991, Ruffins sonyeere Whoopi Goldberg na Herbie Hancock iji mepụta 'Koi na Kola Nuts,' vidiyo a na-eto nke ọma maka ụmụaka nke bụ akụkụ nke usoro We All Have Tales nke Rabbit Ears Productions
Ruffins nwụrụ n'udo n'ụlọ na Sunday July 11, 2021, ndị ezinụlọ gbara ya gburugburu
Ọ biri na Sag Harbor, New York; nwunye ya Joan nwụrụ na 2013
Prọfesọ emeritus na CUNY's Queens College, Ruffins akụzikwaara na School of Visual Arts, Parsons The New School for Design, ma bụrụkwa prọfesọ nleta na Mahadum Syracuse
Ruffins bụ onye natara onyinye Augustus St
Gaudens (nke Cooper Union gosipụtara) maka ihe ịga nke ọma nakwa maka ịbụ ọkachamara na nka
E nyekwara Ruffins Cooper Union Presidential Citation maka ọrụ ya na ọkwá ya dị elu n'ọrụ ya
Ọrụ Ruffins dugara na onyinye sitere na New York Art Directors Club na Silver Medal site na Society of Illustrators
Ruffins meriri Coretta Scott King Illustrator Honor Award na 1997 maka akwụkwọ Running the Road to ABC (nke Denize Lauture dere)
Ihe osise ya maka onye edemede Haiti nwetara Maazị Ruffins nsọpụrụ mba ụwa
Dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise, ọ gwụla ma edepụtara ya
Reza Alinejad (amụrụ n'ọnwa Septemba 21, n'afọ 1985) bụ nwoke Iran dị afọ Asaa ebubo na o gburu nwoke ọzọ iji chebe onwe ya wee maa ya ikpe ọnwụ site n'ịkwụgbu
Na Disemba 2002, ka ha na-eri nri n'ọma ahịa dị na Fasa Iran, Reza na enyi ya nwere ndị otu ndị okenye bụ́ ndị ji ọnụ tie ndị ntorobịa abụọ ahụ ọgụ
Esemokwu ọnụ ahụ dara, otu onye so n'òtù ahụ butere ọgụ ya na Reza na enyi ya wepụtara ngwá agha ma malite iti ndị ntorobịa ahụ ihe

N'ịgbalị ịgbachitere onwe ya na enyi ya megide mwakpo ahụ, Reza wepụtara mma akpa, ma mgbe ọ na-ekpuchi ihu ya na anya ya site n'aka ekpe ya, ọ gbalịrị iji mma ahụ dị n'aka nri ya chụọ ndị agha ya Ka Reza na ndị na-awakpo ya na-alụ ọgụ n'ụzọ dị otu a, o were mma were were maa otu n'ime ha Mgbu ahụ n'ikpeazụ butere ọnwụ onye mwakpo ahụ, e jidekwara Reza maka ebubo igbu ọchụ ma maa ya ikpe ọnwụ site n'ịkwụgbu
N'oge ana eme nyocha izizi nke ikpe a, e malitere ọtụtụ eziokwu na-enweghị isi maka ndekọ ahụ, gụnyere akaebe nke enyi onye nwụrụ anwụ, onye nọ mgbe esemokwu ahụ mere
Onye akaebe ahụ kwetara na ya na enyi ya bụ ndị malitere esemokwu ahụ, na n'enweghị mkpasu iwe site n'aka Reza na enyi ya, ha ji ngwá agha ha wakpo ndị ntorobịa abụọ ahụ
Onye ji anya ya hụ gbara akaebe na ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma ahụ enweghị ụzọ ọ bụla ha ga-esi gbanahụ esemokwu ahụ ka a gbara ha gburugburu ma merie ha
E tiri ha ihe nke ukwuu, na-eme ka ha nwee nnukwu mmerụ ahụ nke chọrọ ka ha nọrọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ
N'ihi nke a, onye ji anya ya hụ ihe mere kwetara na mwakpo ahụ ya na enyi ya nwụrụ anwụ mere bụ ihe ike nke na ọ nwere ike ịghọta ihe mere Reza na enyi ya ji mee ihe ha ga-agbachitere ndụ ha
Onye akaebe ọzọ - onye na-esoghị na esemokwu ahụ - kwadoro ihe eziokwu ndị a

Ihe akaebe ya, tinyere ihe akaebe ndị ọzọ na ikpe ahụ, hapụrụ obere obi abụọ na Reza etinyela aka na-agbachitere onwe ya, nakwa na ọ nweghị nhọrọ ọ ga-eme ma ọ bụghị iji ike dị mkpa iji zọpụta ndụ ya yana nke enyi ya na-eto eto

N'agbanyeghị ihe akaebe na-akwado nkwupụta Reza na ọ mara nwoke ahụ mma iji chebe onwe ya, yana eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọ bụ nwata n'oge ihe ahụ mere, a mara Reza Alinejad ikpe qesas- ntaramahụhụ - maka igbu ọchụ site na Nkebi nke 6 nke Ụlọikpe Criminal na Fasa na ọnwa Ọktoba ụbọchị anọ n'ime afọ 2003
Mgbe ikpe ahụ ruru ụlọ ikpe kachasị elu nke Iran maka nyocha n'ime ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2004, onye ọka ikpe jụrụ ikpe ọnwụ a, onye nabatara na onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma ahụ mere ihe iji chebe onwe ya
Onye ọka ikpe ahụ kwetara na ndị kpalitere esemokwu ahụ bụ onye nwụrụ anwụ na enyi ya, na ha wakporo Reza Alinejad na enyi ya na nunchaku ma merụọ ha ahụ, nakwa na ịpịa Reza Alinejad abụghị n'uche
Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu kpọghachiri ikpe ahụ n'ụlọ ikpe ọzọ dị ala maka nyocha
A nụrụ ikpe ahụ nke ugboro abụọ site na alaka otu narị na otu nke Fasa Criminal Court
N'ọnwa June ụbọchị iri na ise, n'afọ 2005, ụlọ ikpe dị ala mara Reza ikpe ọnwụ ọzọ, na-ekwubi na ọ gaara agbapụ ebe ahụ wee mee ihe n'ụzọ na-enweghị isi
Na Mee 9, 2006, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Iran kwadoro ikpe ọnwụ ahụ

Dị ka Lily Mazahery si kwuo, onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ nke Iran na America na onye na-akwado ikike mmadụ nke rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ikpe ndị yiri ya, mkpebi ikpe Reza mebiri iwu na ụkpụrụ mba ụwa
Nke a bụ n'ihi na n'oge ihe a mere, Reza bụ nwata

Nkeji edemede nke iri atọ na asaa nke nkwekọrịta banyere ikike nke nwatakịrị, nke Islamic Republic of Iran bụ onye bịanyere aka na ya, machibidoro igbu ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu maka omume ma ọ bụ mpụ ndị e mere tupu afọ ole
Ikpe ọnwụ Reza mere ka ọtụtụ ndị otu na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ na ndị na-akwado ya gburugburu ụwa katọọ ya, tinyere ịnye ngwa ngwa nke Amnesty International iji kwụsị igbu ya
E bufere ókwú ikpe Reza n'aka onye isi ikpe nke Iran bụ Mahmoud Hashemi Shahroudi maka nyocha
Nwanne Reza, Meghada Alinejad, ya na ndị ezinụlọ Reza ndị ọzọ, arịọla maka enyemaka mba ụwa

N'ime ọnwa Disemba afọ 2007, n'akwụkwọ ozi o degaara Nazanin Afshin-Jam, nwanne Reza, Ali Alinejad zigara akwụkwọ nke iwu ogbugbo nke onye isi ikpe nke Iran nke kwuru, sị 'N'iburu n'uche afọ nke onye a mara ikpe na ọnọdụ na-amaghị ama nke o chere ihu, e nyere iwu ka e weghachi faịlụ ahụ n'ụlọ ikpe dị na (obodo) Fasa
Site na Mediation council ma ọ bụ site n'ụzọ ọ bụla ọzọ; a ghaghị ime mgbalị na mgbalị ndị ọzọ iji weta mkpebi n'etiti ndị nne na nna nke onye ahụ e gburu egbu na onye ikpe igbu ọchụ
A tọhapụrụ Reza n'ọnwa Disemba ụbọchị àtó, n'afọ 2008 mgbe ezinụlọ onye ahụ (Dooroodi) chọrọ ma nabata ụgwọ ego (diyeh, ego ọbara)
Ezinụlọ Alinejad gwara onye isi oche SCE (Stop Child Executions) Nazanin Afshin-Jam okwu obere oge a tọhapụrụ ya iji kelee ndị otu ahụ maka mbọ niile iji nyere aka zọpụta Reza
Reza na-ekwusi ike na aka ya dị ọcha ma kwuo na ọnwụ Esmail Dooroodi bụ n'ihi ịgbachitere onwe ya megide ya na onye ọzọ wakporo Mohammad Firouzi
Rezki Zerarti (amụrụ na Taourga na 24 Julaị 1938) bụ onye Algeria na-ese ihe

A mụrụ Rezki Zerarti na 1938 na Taourga n'ime ala Kabylia n'oge French Algeria, ọ hapụrụ n'oge Agha Algeria na 1959 gaa n'obodo Aix-en-Provence na France ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-edozi ihe, tupu ọ malite ịgbaso nkuzi ise ihe ole na ole
Ọ malitere ise ihe n'otu afọ ahụ

Ọ laghachiri Algeria mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị n'ọgọst afọ 1962, wee biri na mpaghara Pointe-Pescade (Raïs Hamidou) na Algiers, wee mepee ụlọ ọrụ ya na-ese ihe n'akụkụ ebe obibi nke onye na-ede uri Jean Sénac onye zutere ya na 1963
Reski Zérarti na-ekere òkè n'ihe ngosi abụọ nke Algeria a haziri na Algiers maka nke 1 Nọvemba 1963 mgbe ahụ na Paris na 1964
E gosipụtara ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na Galerie 54 n'afọ 1964, Sénac bu ụzọ

Ọ ghọrọ onye otu UNAP, o sonyere na salons ya ma site na 1967 ruo 1971 na ihe omume nke otu 'Aouchem' (Tattoo) nke kpọkọtara ndị omenkà iri na abụọ, ndị na-ede uri na ndị na-ese ihe, ọkachasị Baya, Denis Martinez na Choukri Mesli
N'afọ 1972, ọ natara ihe nrite mbụ maka ncheta nke iri nke nnwere onwe na n'afọ 1979, ihe nrite nke abụọ maka ncheta afọ iri abụọ na ise nke Nọvemba 1, 1954
N'afọ 2003, ọ nwetara ihe nrite nke mbụ na asọmpi nke ntọala Asselah haziri
Mgbe ogologo oge ọ na-anọghị n'ihe nkiri nka ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri abụọ, Zerarti maliteghachiri igosi ihe osise ya na 1999
Rhianna Ryan (a mụrụ 5 Eprel, 1990) bụ Amerikạ akpali agụụ mmekọahụ omee
Enye ama odụk okenye ịse ụlọ ọrụ na 2009 na afọ na 19
Rhizlane Siba (amụrụ na 29 Febụwarị, na afọ 1996) bụ onye Morocco na-eme egwuregwu track and field nke na-asọ mpi na ịwụli elu
Ọ bụ onye mmeri Afrịka na ndị ntorobịa, obere na ndị okenye, na-emeri isi kọntinent na afọ 2014 African Championships in Athletics
Ọ bụkwa onye nwetara ọla edo ugboro abụọ na Arab Athletics Championships (na-emeri nke mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise) ma bụrụkwa onye mmeri Pan Arab Games nke afọ 2011
Ihe kacha mma ya nke 183 m (6 in) bụ ihe ndekọ Moroccan
Nwa nwanyị nke Ahmed na Aicha Siba, ya na ụmụnne ya abụọ, Zineb na Amin tolitere
O nwetara agụmakwụkwọ iji gaa Mahadum steeti Kansas ma mụọ gbasara nchịkwa azụmahịa
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, ọ gbara ọsọ maka Kansas State Wildcats wee banye n'elu isii na Big 12 Conference Championships
Rhoda Nakibuuka Nsibirwa Kalema (amụrụ na Mee 1929) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwanyị Uganda lara ezumike nká nke a maara dị ka 'Nne nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu' nke mba ahụ
Rhoda Kalema bụ otu n'ime ụmụ 24 nke Martin Luther Nsibirwa, onye a họpụtara Katikkiro (Prime Minista) ugboro abụọ nke Alaeze Buganda na Uganda
A mụrụ ya na Mee 1929 na Butikkiro, ebe obibi Katikkiro, na mpaghara Mengo nke Kampala
Kalema gara Gayaza Junior School maka otu afọ, wee gaa King's College Budo maka ihe fọdụrụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị ya
Ọ debanyere aha maka ọmụmụ azụmahịa na ọzụzụ odeakwụkwọ, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ na bursar na Gayaza High School ruo 1949
N'afọ 1950, ọ lụrụ William Kalema, onye nkuzi na King's College Budo onye mechara bụrụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a ma ama na Minista Azụmaahịa nke Gọọmentị

N'afọ 1955, ọ malitere otu afọ na Social Work and Social Administration na Newbattle Abbey, ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ ndị okenye na United Kingdom, sochiri diplọma na Social Studies na Mahadum Edinburgh
N'afọ 1961, Grace Ibingira na Adoko Nyekon malitere Rhoda Kalema n'ime Uganda People's Congress
Ọ bụ obere minista nke Ọdịbendị na Mmepe Obodo na ọchịchị Binaisa

Otú ọ dị, mgbe ọnwụ di ya na 1972 a tọọrọ ya ma gbuo ya n'oge ọchịchị Idi Amin ọ kwụsịrị itinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ruo afọ 1979 mgbe, mgbe Idi Amin dara, ọ sonyeere National Consultative Council (NCC) nke Uganda National Liberation Front guzobere n'okpuru Edward Rugumayo, dị ka otu n'ime ndị nnọchi anya nwanyị abụọ
N'afọ 1980 ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Uganda Patriotic Movement (UPM)

Ụlọ ọrụ State Research Bureau jidere ya ugboro atọ na onwa Jenụwarị 23, na afọ 1979; na onwa Febụwarị 21, na afọ1981 (mgbe e jidere ya na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị ọzọ mgbe ọtụtụ mwakpo na ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii gasịrị) na na onwa Febụwaị 4, na afọ 1983
Ọ ghọrọ osote minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ọha na eze site na afọ 1989 ruo na afọ 1991 n'okpuru Onye isi ala Yoweri Museveni
N'afọ 1994, ọ guzoro maka ntuli aka nke Constituent Assembly dị ka onye nnọchi anya Kiboga, ma merie ndị mmegide nwoke asatọ mgbe ọ nwetasịrị ụzọ abụọ n'ụzọ atọ nke votu niile
O mechara laa ezumike nká [?] site na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ zụchara ọtụtụ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ama ama dịka Ruth Nankabirwa, Chief Whip na Cabinet nke Uganda
Rhoda Kalema nwetara nsọpụrụ na 1996 site na Forum for Women in Democracy nke Uganda 'dị ka onye ndu mgbanwe'
Na onwa Machị 13, na afọ 2018, ọ natara Sudreau Global Justice Lifetime Achievement Award site na Pepperdine University School of Law na Ugandan Judiciary
Rhoda Njobvu (amụrụ na 29 Jenụwarị na afọ 1994) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu na Zambia bụ ọkachamara na sprinting
Njobvu nwetara ahụmịhe mba ụwa mbụ ya na afọ 2014 Commonwealth Games na Glasgow, ebe e wepụrụ ya na 400m na 5747 sekọnd na agba nke mbụ
N'afọ 2016, ọ gara na ọkara ikpeazụ na African Championships na Durban na 200m
Na afọ 2018 African Championships na Asaba, Delta ọ bịakwara ọzọ na semi finals n'oge a na 100m, na mgbakwunye, ọ meriri ọla nchara na 4x400m relay na-etinye ihe ndekọ mba na usoro ahụ na 33818s
Na ọnwa Mee, na afọ 2021, ọ gara asọmpi na World Athletics Relays na Chorzów, Poland
Ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya hapụrụ asọmpi ikpeazụ mgbe ha gbasịrị 4481 s na agba nke mbụ na ọnwa Mee na afọ 2021
N'afọ 2021, o weputara ihe kacha mma n'onwe ya na 100m nke na 1112 bụ oge kachasị n'ụwa na Tiana Wilson, tupu Nzubechi Grace Nwokocha emeri ya
O nwetakwara ebe ọ nọ na 2020 Tokyo Olympics na-egbu oge

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ mụbara ndekọ ya karịa 200m ruo 22 69 na-emeziwanye ndekọ mba Kabange Mupopo gara aga site na 2017 site na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọkara nke abụọ, ma ruo eru maka 200m na afọ 2020 Summer Olympics
Rhode Island bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
Rhodocene, nke ha ma na mgbe mbu kà bis(η5-cyclopentadienyl)rhodium(II), bu ọgwù àlà jikọtárá ya na ihe he kèrè bụ [Rh(C5H5)2]
Mkpuru ya bụrụ molecule nke otuotu, nwèrè atom nke rhodium nke fabènyè ímé etemete planar abụo nke atom carbon ise nke ha ma kà gbùrù gbúrù cyclopentadienyl na ndózi nfábànyé
Rhona Brown (Septemba 23, 1922 - Maachị 14, 2014), bụ onye South Afrịka na-ese ihe na onye na-elekọta ụlọ
Brown gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Natal na Pietermaritzburg na UNISA gụsịrị akwụkwọ na BA(Hons) na Fine Arts na National Art Teachers Certificate
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Botanical Research Institute na Pretoria maka oge abụọ - 1944-46 na 1965 - 69 ma kụzie ihe n'oge ruo afọ asatọ
O dechara ihe dị ka otu narị efere maka Flowering Plants of Africa na ihe osise ojii na-acha ọcha maka Bothalia na Flora of Southern Africa
O nyere ihe dị ka ọkara nke ihe osise niile maka Palmer & Pitman's Trees of Southern Africa na ihe osise niile maka Eve Palmer's Field Guide to the Trees of Southern Africa
Ọ lụrụ Comdt
Collett na 2 Maachị 1946
Rhonda Vetere bụ odee, ọkachamara ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ, isi okwu, na onye na-ekwu okwu
Ọ bụbu onye isi oche onye isi oche, onye isi mgbasa ozi, yana onye isi oche nke Herbalife Nutrition
Ọ bụbu onye isi oche mbụ nke data na nyocha na nThrive na Chief Technology Officer na ụlọ ọrụ Estée Lauder
Vetere enweela ọkwa nchịkwa na Santander Bank, Pamplona Capital Management, AIG, HP Enterprise Services, Barclays, Bank One / JPMorgan Chase, na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi
A mụrụ Vetere na Fairfax, Virginia wee tolite na mpaghara Washington, DC
Ọ gụrụ Business, Communications, na Spanish na Mahadum George Mason, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1992 na nzere bachelọ nke Arts
Vetere rụrụ ọrụ afọ iri na abụọ n'ọkwa dị iche iche site na njikọta na CompuServe, UUNET, AOL, Worldcom, na MCI Inc

Ọ ghọrọ onye isi njikwa nke Global Infrastructure Operations Center na Bank One Corporation, mechara JPMorgan Chase, site na 2002 ruo 2007, nke gụnyere ọrụ afọ 2 na Mumbai, India na njem buru ibu na Hong Kong na Asia n'oge JPMorgan Chase na Bank
Otu njikọ na 2004
Site na 2007 ruo 2010, Vetere bụ onye isi njikwa teknụzụ & ọrụ na Barclays, na-arụ ọrụ afọ abụọ n'ụlọ ọrụ London ha
Vetere rụrụ ọrụ afọ abụọ na Hewlett Packard Enterprise Services dị ka SVP nke teknụzụ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ zuru ụwa ọnụ na arụmọrụ ruo 2012
Malite na 2012, Vetere ghọrọ SVP maka teknụzụ zuru ụwa ọnụ & akụrụngwa na AIG
Site na Disemba 2013 ruo Jenụwarị 2018, Vetere bụ onye isi ọrụ teknụzụ na ụlọ ọrụ Estée Lauder
Na Jenụwarị 2018, Vetere sonyeere nThrive's Executive Team dị ka Onye isi oche nke data na nyocha

Vetere na-eje ozi ugbu a na World BPO / ITO Forum Board Executive Advisory Council, ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ ụlọ ọrụ maka Mahadum Longwood, na ndị isi oche maka Ụlọ Akwụkwọ nke Business na Mahadum George Mason
Rhonda na-elekwasị anya na ọgbọ na-esote ndị isi, ndị agha agha na mkparịta ụka nke Africa yana inyere ndị ọzọ aka na ịgbanwe ndụ
Ọ bụ nkwenye ya na ụmụ agbọghọ nwere oke n'ihi enweghị ihe nlereanya nwanyị nke mere Rhonda ji agba mbọ na STEAM yana kpọmkwem na otu ndị inyom nyere ikike
Ọ na-etinye aka na mmemme zuru ụwa ọnụ dị ka Nzukọ Ọmụmụ Ọchịchị Ndị Ọchịchị Girls nke na-akwado ụmụ agbọghọ nkà na ntụkwasị obi ịchọ ọrụ iduzi, nwee mmetụta dị n'ime olu ha, ma mepụta mgbanwe dị mma

N'ime afọ atọ na-agba ọsọ, Vetere esonyela na Serengeti Girls Run for Female Empowerment na Tanzania nke bụ nkwado ego na ịdị mma yana ego niile a na-enweta na-aga na otu ndị na-enye ike ụmụ agbọghọ na nchekwa maka safari nke a na-akwado
Site na Singita Grumeti Fund na BRAVE
Ihe omume ahụ gụnyere ịgba ọsọ kilomita 55 gafere na mbara ọzara Africa nke ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị sonyeere na ọ nọ ebe ahụ ịkwado
Na mgbakwunye, ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Africa Community & Conservation Foundation zuru ụwa ọnụ
Agbakwunyela ya na Board of Trustees Boys na Girls Club ma na-elekọta kọmitii teknụzụ ha
Ọ na-adụ ọdụ onye bụbu onye otu Seal Team 6 na onye otu Board nke VETTOCEO yana kwado ọtụtụ mmemme/mmemme obodo na-erite uru na otu ndị a niile
Rhonda sonye na 2021 Navy SEAL Swim na Osimiri Hudson na GI Go Fund - n'akụkụ 150 na-arụ ọrụ na ndị agha mmiri agha mmiri
Rhonda bụ nwanyị nke abụọ mezuru igwu mmiri zuru oke, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị mbụ na mmiri
Ihe omume ahụ na-asọpụrụ 'ndị agha anyị agha, ezinụlọ ha, na ndị niile nwụrụ na 9/11 na agha ndị sochiri ụbọchị ahụ dị egwu
N'akụkụ ụzọ ahụ, ndị SEAL na-akwụsị na Statue of Liberty na Ellis Island iji mee 100 push-ups iji sọpụrụ nnwere onwe America, na 22 ịdọrọ maka nkwanye ùgwù nke ndị agha 22 na-egbu onwe ha kwa ụbọchị
Ihe omume a mechiri na Manhattan dị ala iji sọpụrụ ndị nwụrụ na 9/11 na ndị niile kwụrụ ụgwọ kacha maka obodo anyị na agha ndị sochiri '
Vetere anatala ọtụtụ ihe nrite ụlọ ọrụ, gụnyere
Rhythm 937 FM Lagos bụ ụlọ ọrụ redio na-asụ Bekee nke dị na Victoria Island, Lagos mgbe a kwapụrụ ya na Lekki, Lagos Steeti
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-agbasa usoro redio nke oge a, na-akpọ ụdị egwu dịgasị iche iche gụnyere R&B, hip hop, yana ngwakọta ọdịbendị na ụdị
Ọ bụ Silverbird Communications nwe ya ma na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru Silverbird Group ma bụrụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ redio kachasị ewu ewu na Naịjirịa
Riaad Moosa (Urdu; a mụrụ na 18 June 1977) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe ọchị, onye na-eme egwuregwu na dọkịta
Moosa tolitere na Grassy Park ma nwee ụmụnne atọ
Ọ gara South Peninsula High School ruo n'afọ 1994
Nwanne ya nwanyị bụ durùahụike, nna ya a mụrụ n'India bụ dọkọ na-awa ahụ ọkpụkpụ, nne ya a mụrụ na Cape Town bụ onye Malay bụ GP
Kemgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị, ọ chọrọ ime ọgwụ
Moosa nọrọ afọ atọ na-azụ onwe ya na anwansi wee bụrụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji nke anwansi na Cape Town
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na-atọ ọchị dịka onye na-eme anwansi ma nye ya onyinye Comedy Magic na Center for the Magical Arts na Cape Town
Ọdịnihu ya na anwansi kwụsịrị mgbe onye na-ese foto flash na-enwu ọkụ na waya gafee ebe anwansi ya na-ese n'elu mmiri
Moosa wee nọrọ afọ isii na-azụ ọgwụ na Mahadum nke Cape Town Medical School ma rụọ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị nso na Thokoza na Gauteng, na Groote Schuur na Khayelitsha na Cape Town
N'afọ 2001, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na UCT Medical School
Ọ bụ durùahụike ruru eru na GP
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ atọ dị ka dọkịta
Moosa malitere ime ihe na-eme kwụ ọtọ na campus n'oge afọ nke anọ ya na Mahadum Cape Town

Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri na Cape Comedy Collective's free Comedy Lab workshops, naanị ọnwa abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ bụ onye mmeri nke 'One City, Many Comics Talent Competition' nke emere dịka akụkụ nke One City Festival na Septemba 1999
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi ihe na-atọ ọchị n'oge afọ mbụ ya, ebe a kpọkwara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Pieter-Dirk Uys's Evita Live and Dangerous etv comedy show
N'afọ 2000, ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na mpaghara klọb na-atọ ọchị na Cape Town
Moosa emeela ihe nkiri na Alex Jay 5FM Comedy Jams na Real Concert's Winston King Size Comedy Show, na-eme ka Sprite Soul Comedy Jamas na Cape Town, Johannesburg na Durban
N'afọ 2001, ọ kwadoro Marc Curry nke Hanging na Maazị Cooper na Durban Playhouse
N'afọ 2002, ọ kwadoro Russell Peters na ihe ngosi ya nke e mere na India na Luxurama theatre
N'afọ 2003, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Edinburgh Festival Fringe, na-eme ihe nkiri na Cape Comedy Collective The new South Africa Stands Up production
Moosa bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi mgbe niile nke akụkụ akpọrọ The Second Opinion na Dr Riaad Moosa na mmemme akụkọ satirical nke E-News Late Nite News na Loyiso Gola
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri TV na ihe nkiri dị iche iche

N'afọ 2002, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Laugh Out Loud, ihe ngosi telivishọn na-atọ ọchị kachasị na South Africa, ebe ọ sonyeere itoolu n'ime ndị na-atọ ụtọ na South Africa iji nweta ọkara nde Rand maka Reach for a Dream foundation
N'afọ 2004, ọ bụkwa onye edemede na onye na-eme ihe nkiri maka SABC 1's Pure Monate Show
Na Febụwarị 2013, Moosa kwadoro Comedy Central Presents Riaad Moosa Live na Parker na Comedy Central
N'ọnwa June afọ 2013, ọ nọchiri Michael Mol na nnabata SABC 3's The Dr Mol Show (nke akpọrọ Hello Doctor)
A gbanwere aha ihe ngosi ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Doctor's Orders
N'afọ 2005, Moosa pụtara na Crazy Monkey Straight Outta Benoni N'afọ 2007, ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri Footskating 101
N'afọ 2012, Moosa pụtara na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị Material, na-eme ka nwa okorobịa chọrọ ịbụ onye na-eme ihe ọchị mana nna ya anabataghị ya

N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2012, ọ gara Busan International Film Festival na Seoul, South Korea ebe egosiri ihe onwunwe, N'ọnwarị n'afọ2, Moosa gara London, England iji kwalite ihe nkiri ahụ na BFI London Film Festival
N'afọ 2013, ọ ga-aga emume ihe nkiri Eshia na Goa

N'afọ 2013, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye mkpọrọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Ahmed Kathrada na Mandela Long Walk to Freedom, nke sitere na akụkọ ndụ onwe onye nke Nelson Mandela Long Walk to Free
Moosa na-eji ihe ọchị eme ihe iji dozie nsogbu ndị dị nro dịka echiche ndị Alakụba, Islamophobia, ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na ọbara ọgbụgba
Ihe ndị ọzọ ọ na-ekwu na ha sitere na Bollywood ruo na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ugbu a ruo ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Moosa họọrọ ịghara iji okwu mkparị na okwu doro anya
Na Machị 2011, e nyere Moosa Comics Choice Award na South African Comic's Choice Awards nke mbụ kwa afọ
N'afọ 2012, a họpụtara ya maka Comic's Choice Awards
O meriri onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na The South African Film and Television Awards (SAFTA's) n'afọ 2013 maka ọrụ ya na Material nke merikwara ihe nkiri kachasị kyau
Na 12 Jenụwarị 2003, Moosa lụrụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego Farzanah Bemat
Ha bi na Johannesburg, Gauteng na ụmụ ha abụọ, Zameer (a mụrụ 2007) na Hanaa (a mụrụ 2009)
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ọchị Moosa sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ezinụlọ ya
Riadh Nahdi (Arabic) bụ onye mba Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Riana Scheepers (amuru ya na Disemba 9, 1957) bu onye odee Afrikaans
Ọ nwetara PhD na Mahadum Cape Town
Ọ na-ede akwụkwọ ụmụaka, obere akụkọ ifo na uri
Ikechukwu Eric Ahiauzu nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Ric Hassani (amụrụ na 6 Jenụwarị 1989, na Port Harcourt) bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-eti egwu na Naijiria
Hassani gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ọgbụgba ndụ na Naịjirịa
Ọ gara Mahadum Surrey, ebe ọ nwetara nzere masta na akụ na ụba ike
Hassani wepụtara abọm izizi ya Onye isi ala Afrikana 2016
A na-ekwu na o nwere ụdị ejiji nke na-emetụta ọnọdụ ya dị ka nwoke
A họpụtara Hassani n'ụdị atọ na 2016 All Africa Music Awards Onye nka kacha mma na African R&B na Soul, Vidiyo nke Afọ, na Onye nka kacha ekwe nkwa
Ọ nwetakwara nhọpụta abụọ na The Headies 2016, gụnyere Abụ Nhọrọ Kachasị Mma maka 'Nwa amadị'
Na Disemba 2018, Falz na Olamide-enyere aka 'Believe' meriri Mmekọrịta kacha mma na Galaxy Ihe nrite egwu
Osikàpà bu mkpúrù osisí Oryza sativa
Bu ihe órirí mkpuru, ọ bụ nri nké di mkpà na obodo ndi madu di ịche iche di ka nke ndi owuwa, Nleda Asia na ndi Etítì Owuwa, Latin America na Indies nke Odida
Osikapa bu mkpuru nrí bu nke gbárá abuoo na nke uwa méfutàrà, nke bu íshí bu ókà
Richard Christopher Harrison (amụrụ n'afọ 1979) bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye na-ede egwu si Washington, DC, ọkachamara na R&B na egwu hip hop
Onye mmeri nke Grammy Award, a maara Harrison nke ọma màkà ịmepụta egwu dịka 'Get Right' (nke Jennifer Lopez mere), '1 Thing' (nke Amerie mere) na 'Crazy in Love' (nke Beyoncé na Jay-Z mere)
Harrison bụ ónyé guzobere Richcraft Entertainment, akara nke nwere ndị na-ese ihe dịka ónyé na-agụ egwu Amerie, otu R&B ụmụ agbọghọ RichGirl, na onye na-eti egwu Young Steff

Ónyé na-akpọ piano na onye na-afụ opi, site na nwata Harrison gosipụtara ikike ịkpọ egwu ọ nụrụ na redio, mgbè e mesịrị ọ gara Mahadum Howard na Washington, DC, na-agụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe méré eme na egwu hip-hop
Nnukwu nkwekọrịta egwu mbụ nke Harrison bịara na 1999 mgbè Harrison na Mary J
Blige rụkọrọ ọrụ na 'Beautiful Ones' maka abọm ya Mary
N'afọ 2001, o mepụtara ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya, Richcraft Inc, ma dee ma mepụta abọm mbụ Amerie, All I Have ozugbo
N'afọ 2004, o ritere Grammy Award màkà Beyoncé's 'Crazy in Love', na nhọpụta màkà ọrụ ya na album Usher's Confessions

Richard Yende Abongy Balengola, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Richacha 'Chacha' Balengola, bụ onye reggae, Hip Hop, RnB, soukous na onye na-agba egwu ụwa si Democratic Republic of the Congo, nke dị na Reims, France, kemgbe afọ 1987

A mụrụ ya n'ọnwa Disemba 22, n'afọ 1964 na Mbandaka (obodo dị na Osimiri Congo na Democratic Republic of Congo nke dị nso na njikọta nke Congo na Ruki Rivers), Balengola malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agba egwu na otu egwu ụwa a na-akpọ Ndoki Machine

Otu onye na-akpọ ngwa egwu Bass a na-akpọ Johon Pepito Tshimanga (Otu nwa okorobịa bi n'otu agbata obi dị ka Papa Wemba; ya mere ha maara ibe ha) so na ndị otu ahụ mgbe ọ laghachiri Congo (DRC) site na Paris, France ebe ọ nọrọ ịmụ ihe
Ụdị egwu Ndoki Machine na ụdị egwu Johon Pepito Tshimanga na-akpọ bass enweghị ihe jikọrọ ya na soukous
Ụdị egwu ha yiri egwu nke otu egwu si DRC Congo na-akpọ 'Bobongo Stars'
Shakara Mutela, onye ama ama na-akpọ ngwa egwu bass si DRC Congo, so na ndị isi Bobongo Stars
N'afọ 1980 Richacha sonyeere 'Les Frères Fataki' na otu egwu a na-akpọ Touche pas dị ka onye na-agba egwu
Onye na-agụ egwu a ma ama site na otu a bụ Jose Fataki Ndoko onye mechara bụrụ akụkụ nke Viva La Musica na La Nouvelle Génération

N'afọ 1982, ọtụtụ n'ime ndị otu Viva La Musica hapụrụ Papa Wemba iji mepụta Victoria Eleison Ndị na-abụ abụ ndị hapụrụ ndị otu ahụ bụ King Kester Emeneya, Pepe Bipoli, Joly Mubiala, Debaba El Shabab, onye na-agba egwu sokwa na ndị kwụsịrị na Viva La Musica iji mepụta Victoria Eleison Band

Johon Pepito Tshimanga onye mechara bụrụ onye na-egwu bass nke Papa Wemba mgbe e mepụtara Victoria Eleison, Papa Wemba jụrụ ya ma ọ nwere ike ịkpọta onye na-agba egwu Ndoki Machine ka ọ sonye n'òtù ya
Papa Wemba chọrọ ihe ọhụrụ na ụdị egwu Viva La Musica; onye a na-akụ egwu bụ Richacha
A maara ya dị ka onye ọkachamara na-agba egwu n'afọ 1980, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii mgbe ọ sonyeere Touche pas
N'agbanyeghị eziokwu nke ịbụ onye Congo, Richacha enwebeghị ohere igwu egwu na Soukous na Rumba band na-adịgide adịgide ruo mgbe ọ sonyeere Touche Pas
Oge ndekọ ikpeazụ ya na Viva La Musica bụ n'afọ 1996

Ya na ọtụtụ ndị isi egwu ụwa, ndị na-abụ reggae na ndị otu gụnyere The Hooligans, Pierpoljak, Tonton David, Princess Erika, Nèg 'Marrons, Ijahman Levi, Bisso Na Bisso, Secteur Ä, The Wailers1, Alpha Blondy, Barrington Levy, RMI (Reggae Music International), Queen Ifrica, Tony Rebel, wdg
Onye ndụmọdụ Richacha bụ Mando (onye bụbu Rochereau Tabu Ley na Afrisa drummer) ma mesịa bụrụ onye Carlton Barrett (Bob Marley's drummer) mechara kpalie ya
Ọ bụ ya mere ụfọdụ egwu ndị Viva La Musica dekọrọ na ngwụsị afọ 1980 nakwa na mmalite afọ 1990 ji nwee ụda Reggae Root Snare
Richacha edeghị egwu na Afrisa ya na Rochereau Tabu Ley mana ọ rụrụ dị ka onye na-agba egwu n'oge ụfọdụ egwu egwu n'afọ 1979; ọ nọ na Drums ụbọchị Mbilia Bel na-apụta na Afrisa
Richacha so na ndị egwu Viva la Musica na-apụta na ihe nkiri La Vie est Belle nke onye isi ihe nkiri bụ Papa Wemba
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-egbuke egbuke akpụkpọ ụkwụ, dịkwa ka onye na-egwu egwu n'oge mmegharị Papa Wemba
E wepụtara ihe nkiri a n'afọ 1987
N'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri anọ dị ka onye ọkachamara na-agba egwu, Richacha ka na-achọ dị ka onye na-eti egwu na arụmọrụ na Europe
Ihe okike, ọtụtụ ihe na ọsọ bụ atọ n'ime nkà ya kachasị mkpa na onyinye ya dị ka Drummer
Tinyere Junior MacLier (onye bụbu Jimmy Cliff bass player) ha mepụtara otu egwu nkwado a na-akpọ Reggae Music International (RMI); nke dịkwa na Paris
Ha akwadola ndị egwu Reggae dị iche iche
Dị ka onye nkuzi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nwere ahụmahụ, Richacha na-enye ndị na-amalite ịgba egwu nke onwe ya ma na-egosi ụfọdụ usoro ịgba egwu nye ndị Drummers nwere ahụmahụ
E wezụga ịgba, Richacha na-akpọ egwu niile na bass
Ụda ọnyà ya pụrụ iche na-eme ka njirimara ya

Richard Akuson (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na isii nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1993) bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria, onye na-akwado ikike LGBT, odee, onye nchịkọta akụkọ, na onye guzobere magazin A Nasty Boy, mbipụta LGBTQ + mbụ nke Naịjirịa

N'afọ 2019, a kpọrọ Akuson otu n'ime 'Forbes Africas 30 Under 30 change-makers maka ịma aka echiche siri ike nke nwoke, nwoke na nwanyị, na mmekọahụ na Nigeria ebe enwere ike ịta ndị mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị ahụhụ afọ iri na anọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ya maka The Future Awards Africa's New Media Innovation Award
Akuson bụkwa onye Abryanz Style & Fashion Award Best Fashion Writer nominee ugboro abụọ
Mgbe a malitere akwụkwọ akụkọ A Nasty Boy n'afọ 2017, YNaija kpọrọ ya otu n'ime ndị Naịjirịa iri anọ kachasị ike n'okpuru afọ iri anọ
A mụrụ Richard Akuson na Akwanga, Nasarawa State, Nigeria
Nwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ nwoke atọ, a zụlitere ya n'ezinụlọ nọ n'ọkwá dị elu; nna ya, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na nne ya, onye nkuzi kọleji
Ọ gara Shepherd's International College, ụlọ akwụkwọ nzuzo, nke ndị otu christ, tupu ọ gawa Mahadum Nasarawa State, Keffi, maka nzere ọkachamara mbụ ya na iwu
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria dị ka onye ọka iwu na onye ọka iwu nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naijiria n'afọ 2017, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu Naijeria, Lagos
Akuson malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụdị ejiji mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ
N'afọ 2014, o guzobere ILLUDED, ebe a na-ekerịta foto n'ịntanetị
N'afọ 2016, e nyere ya ọkwa ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ngalaba nke BellaNaija's fashion and style ọnọdụ nke malitere ọrụ ya site n'elu ụlọ
Ọrụ ya na BellaNaija mere ka ọ nweta Abryanz Style & na nhọpụta nke Fashion Award maka Fashion Writer of the Year na 2016
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ọ hapụrụ BellaNaija iji malite The PR Boy, ụlọ ọrụ PR nke na-elekọta ndị mbido Naijiria
N'afọ 2017, mgbe ọ nọ na Nigerian Law School, ọ malitere A Nasty Boy, akwụkwọ LGTBQ+ na-agbanye ókèala nke toro n'oge na-adịghị anya na ogo na otuto mba ụwa
N'ọnwa Eprel 2019, Akuson dere edemede na-akpali mmụọ maka CNN na-akọwapụta ọnọdụ ndị mere ka ọ gbapụ na Naịjirịa ije maka nchekwa na America
N'ọnwa Julaị 2019, o dere edemede na-emetụ n'obi maka 'Sunday Review' nke The New York Times
E bipụtara edemede ahụ, 'This is quite Gay,' n'ụzọ pụtara ìhè na peeji ihu weebụ Times ma gosipụta n'ọnọdụ a ma ama n'otu ụzọ ahụ na mbipụta, n'echi ya
Akuson gbajere ọsọ ndụ na America n'afọ 2018 mgbe ọ gbapụrụ Naijiria mgbe ọ lanarịrị mwakpo obi ọjọọ nke homophobic
Na US, ọ na-aga n'ihu na-ekwu okwu n'ihu ọha banyere mwakpo na omenala nzuzo nke homophobia na Naịjirịa
O nyere OkayAfrica, ohere ịgba ya ajụjụ ọnụ,Very Good Light, na The Black Youth Project, ebe o nyere nkọwa zuru ezu gbasara ihe omume ahụ
Akuson na-aga n'ihu na-ekwu okwu n'ezoghị ọnụ maka LGBTQ + na obodo ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na America

Richard Ali (amụrụ na 3 Septemba 1984) bụ onye edemede Naijiria, onye ọka iwu na onye nchoputa Parrésia Publishers, ụlọ obibi akwụkwọ Africa nke dị na Lagos, ebe Helon Habila, Onyeka Nwelue, Chika Unigwe na Abubakar Adam Ibrahim, ndị ọzọ na-ekwu okwu na kọntinent
A mụrụ Richard na Kano, Nigeria, ma kwaga Jos, Nigeria, na 1988, bụ ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ruo na ngwụcha akwụkwọ sekọndrị
A nabatara ya na LLB (Civil Law) mmemme na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria, na 2001 ma kpọọ ya n'ụlọ ikpe na 2010 dị ka onye ọka iwu na onye ọka iwu n'Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2003, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Sardauna Magazine, akwụkwọ ọdịmma ọha na eze nke Kaduna, mgbe ọ ka na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka odeakwụkwọ nke National Association of Nigerian Students Committee na Inter-Religious Harmony na Campus Peace site na 2003 ruo 2004
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke Sentinel Nigeria, e-zine kwa nkeji iri na ise, maka mbipụta iri na anọ site na 2008 ruo 2013
Na mgbakọ mba ụwa nke 2011 nke Association of Nigerian Authors, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ mgbasa ozi (North) ma rụọ ọrụ afọ abụọ
N'afọ 2011, ya na Azafi Omoluabi-Ogosi guzobere Parrésia Publishers, iji mepụta usoro mbipụta ọhụrụ maka olu ndị Afrịka, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kemgbe ahụ

Ọ bụ onye guzobere otu Jalada Writers Cooperative nke dabeere na Nairobi, onye otu bọọdụ Babishai Niwe Poetry Foundation nke Uganda wee gaa ọtụtụ ihe omume agụmagụ n'ofe ụwa, gụnyere ihe ngosi akwụkwọ akụkọ Frankfurt, ihe ngosi akwụkwọ Abu Dhabi, Ememe Writivism na Aké Arts and Book Festival na ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka ikpe maka asọmpi 2014 na 2015 BN Poetry Award na asọmpi akụkọ akụkọ mkpirisi akụkọ akụkọ Rwanda nke Huza na 2015
E bipụtara uri ya na akụkọ mkpirikpi ya n'ọtụtụ ebe, gụnyere na Jalada, Enkare Review, Saraba Magazine na Okike Journal
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na asọmpi akụkọ mkpirikpi John la Rose nke afọ 2008
Ali jere ozi dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ ANA Review, akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Association of Nigerian Authors, site na 2013 ruo 2016

Mbiputa

Richard Burnside (1944 - 2020) bụ ónyé America na-akụzi onwe ya na-ese ihe osise ọdịnala nke a maara màkà ụdị ihe osise ya pụrụ iche na iji ụkpụrụ
Ọ biri na Pendleton, South Carolina, mana ọ nọrọ afọ ole na ole ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya na Georgia
A mụrụ Burnside na úbọchị irí abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Novemba, 1944, na Baltimore, Maryland, mana ọ kwagara South Carolina mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Sterling na Greenville, South Carolina
Ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ n'oge ndụ ya niile gụnyere afọ asaa na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ahịa S&H Green Stamp na Greenville, afọ asaá na ndị agha US, ma mesịa bụrụ ónyé isi nri na Charlotte, North Carolina
Ọ lụrụ di ugboro abụọ, nke mbụ na 1966 na Maggie Holiday (gba alụkwaghịm na 1969) na nke abụọ na Mary Givens na 1974 (gba alụmdi na nwunye 1976)
O nwèrè ụmụ nwanyị abụọ site na Holiday na otu nwa nwoke na otu nwa nwanyị site na Givens
Ọ nwụrụ na Georgia na ọnwa Ọktoba n'ubochí irí na atọ, 2020, mgbè ọ dị afọ irí asaá na isé
Ọ bụ ezie na Burnside nwèrè ọtụtụ ọrụ n'oge ndụ ya niile, eserese nọgidere na-elekwasị anya na ya
Ụfọdụ ndị na-akọ akụkọ ihe méré eme na ndị na-ahụ maka nka kwenyere na isiokwu Burnside bụ 'akụkọ ifo ndị Afrịka sitere na akụkọ Bible, akụkọ ọdịnala, na ọbụna abụ ụmụaka'
'Ọ na-achọta ihe osise ya na ọrụ nka ndị ọzọ na ihe ndị a na-ahụ kwa ụbọchị, site na akara ndị agha ruo iko biya na osisi ekwentị, ma mepụta akara nke onwe ya nke ọ na-akpọ 'Aphabet Rom' ya

Ihe nnọchianya ndị a gụnyere ududo, agwọ na ihe ndị ọzọ e kere eke na-ejikarị ihe ngosi ya nke ihu dị larịị, gburugburu, dị ka ihe nkpuchi, nke ọ hụrụ na nrọ na 'ịpụ na mgbidi' Ọ na-akpọ ndị eze, ndị eze nwanyị, na ndị ụkọchukwu n'ihu ya
A maara Burnside ka ọ na-ese ihe na ihe ndị a chọtara dị ka gourds, katọn, osisi na ihe mkpofu ígwè, mana ihe kachasị ya bụ plywood dị nro
O jiri enamel mee ihe dị ka isi ihe, jiri mkpịsị akwụkwọ felt na-ese ihe osise ya, wee jupụta na ihe osise ahụ na ágbá mara mma
Mgbè ahụ, ọ hapụrụ ihe osise ahụ e dechara na tebụl dị n'èzí maka ihe dị ka otu ụbọchị iji kwe ka ihu igwe nwee ihu igwe
Ọnụ ọgụgụ nke iberibe Burnside bụ 30' x 30' ma ọ bụ obere
Ọrụ Burnside dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Minneapolis Institute of Art, Smithsonian American Art Museum, Milwaukee Art Museum, na Ackland Art Museum
O nwere ihe ngosi ncheta na McKissick Museum na Columbia, South Carolina na 2016
Richard Chiwasa (b
June, 1947) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
A mụrụ ya na Harare
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na mpaghara ruo Standard Six
Ọ malitere ịkpụ soapstone na 1967, Canon Edward George Paterson mechara kụziere ya ịrụ ọrụ siri ike na Nyarutsetso Art Centre
N'afọ 1970, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gaa rụọ ọrụ na Victoria Falls, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ iri na 'Craft Village'
Chiwasa na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na nkume siri ike dị ka verdite, springstone, na butter jade
Ya na Sylvester Mubayi, Nicholas Mukomberanwa, na Moses Masaya rụkọrọ ọrụ n'etiti ndị ọzọ na-akpụ ihe

Richard 'Dick' Clapp bụ ọkà mmụta ọrịa na-efe efe nke America bụ Prọfesọ Adjunct na Mahadum Massachusetts Lowell na Prọfesọ Emeritus nke Ahụike Gburugburu Ebe Obibi na Boston University School of Public Health
Clapp bụ onye isi na ndekọ ndekọ ọrịa kansa Massachusetts site na 1980 ruo 1989 na onye isi oche nke ndị dibia bekee nke Boston maka Ọrụ Ọha

Clapp nwetara nzere bachelọ na bayoloji na Dartmouth College (1967) MPH, na ọrụ ahụike na Harvard School of Public Health (1974), ma nata DSc, Epidemiology, na Boston University School of Public Health (BUSPH) na 1989
Ọ malitere nkuzi na BUSPH na 1992 dịka onye enyemaka Prọfesọ nke ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi

N'afọ'afọ 2004, Clapp ghọrọ 'onye ọkà mmụta sayensị ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi na Lowell Center for Sustainable Production na Mahadum Massachusetts-Lowell, ebe ọ na-eduzi ma na-elekọta nyocha data gbasara ọrịa, nyocha akwụkwọ, na enyemaka teknụzụ na ọmụmụ ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi
Ihe nrite ya gụnyere ịkpọ aha 2001 'Onye ọkà mmụta sayensị ọha nke afọ' nke Association for Science in the Public Interest, , na 2018 Alumni Award of Merit sitere na Harvard TH
Chan School of Public Health's Alumni Association
Ihe nrite ya gụnyere ịkpọ aha 2001 'Onye ọkà mmụta sayensị ọha nke afọ' nke Association for Science in the Public Interest, na 2018 Alumni Award of Merit site na Harvard TH
Chan School of Public Health's Alumni Association
Richard Ferber bụ dọkịta na onye nduzi nke Ebe a na-ahụ maka nsogbu ihi ụra ụmụaka,, na Children's Hospital Boston
Ọ nọwo na-eme nchọpụta banyere nsogbu ụra na nsogbu ụra n'ime ụmụaka ihe karịrị afọ 30

A maara ya nke ọma maka usoro ya - nke a na-akpọkarị ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mere n'oge gara maka nsogbụ ndị Ferberization - nke na-ezube ịkụziri ụmụ ọhụrụ otú ha ga-esi na-ehi ụra n'onwe ha, nke akọwapụtara n'akwụkwọ ya Solve Your Child's Sleep Problems (mbipụta mbụ 1985)

Richard Phillips Feynman (/ˈfaɪnmən/; 11 Ọnwaìse 1918 – 15 Ọnwaàbụọ 1988) bụ̀rụ̀ onye Amẹrika ǹkè ọ̀mụ̀ntụdị ǹrùrò kà ha mà màkà ọrụ ya nà ụzọ mbaramkpà ǹkè mpịamara ǹkè òrèjè ụ̀hàmà, ịhẹ ǹrùò ndụọkụntụmụ̀nyo ụ̀hàmà, nà ọ̀mụ̀ntụdị ǹkè okeǹrùrù ǹkè okenjuchaoyi èrù umeanyaanwụ, nàkwà nà ọ̀mụ̀ntụdị nkịrịnkịrị ǹkè o tụ̀nyèrè uchè màkà àtụ̀ nkịrịtụ
Màkà ọrụ ya nà mmepụ̀ta ǹkè ndụọkụntụmụ̀nyo ụ̀hàmà, Feynman, nà Julian Schwinger mà Shin'ichirō Tomonaga, gonwètàrà ngo Nobel nà ọ̀mụ̀ntụdị nà afọ̀ 1965
Feynman mepụ̀tàrà ọrụzù òsìse nnọ̀chie ịhẹ ọ̀tụtụ madụ̀ nà è ji màkà mmepụ̀ta agụ̀mà katara àgwà akụmmìmì nkịrịnkịrị, ǹke mechara nweta ahà bụrụ akàmì Feynman
N'ogè â nà ndụ̀, Feynman à bụzie otù diamụ̀mà ọ̀kàka ha mà n'ụ̀wà

Nà njutụ̀ama ǹkè afọ̀ 1999 ǹkè 130 ndi odudu bụrụ diọ̀mụ̀ntụdị nà ụ̀wà gbùrù gburù si nà aka ịhẹ ndeda British Physics World, ha dòrò ya n'isi kà otù onye nà madụ̀ ìri kara ị me ọrụ diọ̀mụ̀ntụdị nà ogè níle
O nyèrè aka nà nrụpụ̀ta nkpọ akụm n'ogè agha ụ̀wà II nà ahà ya è wuzi nà afọ̀ìri 1980, 1980 kà onye òtù ndị ìzùnrụpụ̀ta Rogers, ndị ìzùọkwa ǹke nyòchàrà m̀bèrède ọ̀kwọga m̀bara Challenger
Soro ọrụ ya nà ime ọ̀mụ̀ntụdị ǹrùrò, ha tụrụ Feynman aka kà onye nwaraụzọ̀ nà ọ̀gbọ ǹkè ọ̀màzù ụ̀hàmà nà idubàtà ịhẹ uchepụ̀ta bụrụ ọ̀kàkị̀rị̀
O jìrì ọkammụ̀ta ǹkè Richard C
Tolman nà ọ̀mụmụ ọ̀mụ̀ntụdị ǹrùrò nà ùzùmụ̀tà California ǹkè ǹkàpụ̀tà

Ọ tụ̀rụ̀ Feynman nà àhụ ị gbasàa ọmata ọ̀mụ̀ntụdị si nà mgbasàa akwụkwọ mà ǹzùkụ̀zi ǹke soro nkọrọ okwu nà 1959 gbasara ọ̀kàkị̀rị̀ elunààlà a kpọ̀rọ̀ There's Plenty of Room at the Bottom nà ìkpoàtọ mbìpụ̀ta of his ǹzùkụ̀zi òkpurùmmụ̀chata, The Feynman Lectures on Physics
Feynman a bụkwa onya ha mà màkà akwụkwọ edeònwentitụndụ̀ Surely You're Joking, Mr
Feynman! nà What Do You Care What Other People Think? nà akwụkwọ h'e dèrè màkà ya dị kà Tuva or Bust! si aka Ralph Leighton nà Genius The Life and Science of Richard Feynman si aka James Gleick

Richard Gordon Kendall (nke a na-akpọkwa Kendell; ubochí irí na asaá n'ọnwa Nọvemba 1933 Paris, Texas rụọ úbọchị irí atọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2008 Paris, Texas) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe n'onwe ya nke, malite n'ihe dị ka afọ 1995, a malitere ịkọ akụkọ dị ka ónyé na-ese egwu n'èzí na onye na-eme ihe nkiri ọdịnala
Jay Wehnert, ónyé nlekọta na onye na-anakọta ihe osise ndị ọzọ, chọpụtara Kendall n'ihe dị ka afọ 1995, ónyé ghọrọ ónyé na-akwado ọrụ Kendall

Dị ka Wehnert na ndị ọzọ na-akatọ nka si kwuo, ọrụ Kendall na-egosipụta ojiji pụrụ iche nke ndị na-ajụ ase, ebe ọ bụ na, site n'ihe dị ka 1995 ruo ihe dị ka 1998, ọ bi n'ụlọ mgbaba na-enweghị isi n'okporo ámá Houston
Otu n'ime ebumnuche Wehnert bụ inye Kendall nkwanye ùgwù dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe nke Kendall gbapụrụ
Wehnert hapụrụ Kendall na 1998 ma Kendall nwụrụ na 2008
Ka ọ na-adịbeghị anya dị ka 2019, Dutton Gallery nke New York gosipụtara ọrụ Kendall
Mgbè Wehnert 'chọtara' Kendall, ha abụọ malitere ikwekọ ruo n'ihe dị ka afọ 1998
Kendall bi n'okporo ámá Houston
Kendall gwara Wehnert na o sere ihe osise nke ụlọ ọbọdọ ahụ iji mee ka onwé ya 'dị nkọ'
A mụrụ Richard Gordon Kendall na úbọchị irí nà asaá n'ọnwa Nọvemba, 1933, na Paris, Texas, n'ezinụlọ Lenious Kendall (aka Linnius 'Bud' Kindell; 18868) na Myrl Reynolds (1895-1973)
Akwụkwọ ikike ọmụmụ mbụ ya nyèrè aha ya dị ka Charles Gordon Kendall
Mana nne ya tinyere akwụkwọ asambodo ọmụmụ a gbaziri agbazi, ṅụọ iyi ma debanye aha n'ubochí irí na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1944, na-ekwughachi aha ọmụmụ ya dị ka Richard Gordon Kendall
Kendall gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1954 na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Gibbons bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọrịtandrị nke ndị Africa America na Paris, Texas, nke mechiri na 1966
Kendall nọ na bọọlụ bọọlụ nkè 1953-1954 nke meriri Prairie View Conference AA State Championship
N'afọ ndị 1990, Kendall biri na 769 Ash Street na Paris

Richard nwere nwanne nwoke, Lindsey Kendell (ónyé a mụrụ Lenius Kendell; 1926 rụo 1952) onye, dị ka ónyé na-arụ ọrụ na 55th Ordnance Ammunition Company nke 8th Army na North Korea n'oge Agha Korea nwụrụ site na ihe ndị na-abụghị agha mgbè ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ na 55nd Ordnance Emmunition Company of the 8th Army in South Korea n'afọ Agha Korea

Richard Lewis Brown Sr, nke a maara dị ka R
Brown (1854 ruo 1948), bụ onye na-ewu ụlọ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị steeti bi na Jacksonville, Florida
Onye Afrịka Amerịka, a mụrụ Brown na South Carolina ma soro ezinụlọ ya kwaga Florida mgbe Agha Obodo America gasịrị, nke mbụ gaa Lake City na Jacksonville
Ọ lụrụ di n'afọ 1875 ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka ọkwá nkà, onye ọrụ ugbo, na onye ozi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugboro abụọ na Florida House of Representatives site na 1881 ruo 1884
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ iwu ụlọ maka ụlọ akwụkwọ Duval County ma nwee ụlọ akwụkwọ aha ya
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ ngo maka Centennial Hall na Edward Waters College
Brown bụkwa onye otu Omega Psi Phi fraternity na onye otu charter maka isi Jacksonville
Richard M
Brett (September 3, 1903 na September 7, 1989) bụ onye America na-echekwa ihe na onye edemede
A mụrụ Brett na Darien, Connecticut ma nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya na Woodstock, Vermont, na Fairfield, Connecticut
Brett bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Taft, Williams College, na Yale School of Forestry
Brett jere ozi dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ (nke a họpụtara na 1926) na onye isi njikwa nke Macmillan Publishing
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, Brett bụ onye njikwa azụmahịa nke Ọbá Akwụkwọ Ọha New York site n'afọ 1947 ruo 1953
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 1953, Brett kwagara Vermont, ebe o hibere ugbo osisi nwere ebe obibi maka anụ ọhịa na Hawk's Hill na East Barnard
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta nke Kansụl Natural Resources Vermont
Brett mechara nye ọrụ ugbo osisi Hawk's Hill nye New England Foretry Foundation
Brett jere ozi na Army Air Corps n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Richard Mayhew (amụrụ n'April 3, 1924) bụ onye Afro-Native American landscape painter, Ónyé na-ese ihe osise, na ónyé nkuzi nka
Ọ bụ ahụmahụ ya dị ka onye Africa America / Native American na mmasị ya na Jazz na nka na-eme ihe nkírí na-akọwa ihe osise ya na-enweghị atụ, nke na-acha anụnụ anụnụ
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Soquel na Santa Cruz, California
A mụrụ Richard Mayhew na Eprel 3, 1924, na Amityville, New York, nné na nnà ya bụ ndị American Indian na ndị African American
Nna ya Alvin Mayhew, sitere n'agbụrụ ndị Africa America na Shinnecock na nné ya, Lillian Goldman Mayhew sitere n'African American na Cherokee-Lumbee
Nne ya ga-akpọrọ ya gaa New York City iji hụ ihe osise, ihe osise George Inness kpaliri ya mgbè ọ dị obérè
Dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, ya na ónyé na-ese ihe osise ahụike James Willson mụrụ

A na-egosipụta ọrụ Mayhew na nchịkọta dị ichè ichè na-adịgide adịgide gụnyere San Francisco Museum of Modern Art (SFMoMA), De Young (museum), Metropolitan Museum of Art, Whitney Museum of American Art, na Smithsonian Institution, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọ lụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe Dorothy Zuccarini ma ha nwere ụmụ abụọ, Ina Mayhew na Scott Mayhew
Alụmdi na nwunye nké abụọ ya bụ Rosemary Gibbons
Richard Eyimofe Evans Mofe-Damijo (amuru 6 Julaị 1961), onye amara dika RMD, bu onye n'eme ihe nkiri, odee, onye na-emeputa ihe na onye oka iwu Naijiria
Ọ bụkwa kọmishọna na-ahụ maka omenala na njem nlegharị anya na Delta steeti
N'afọ 2005, o meriri ihe nrite bu ihe nkiri Africa Movie Academy Award maka onye na- eme ihe nkiri kacha mma n'ọrụ ndu
Ọ nwetara ihe nrite na 12th Africa Movie Academy Awards na 2016
A mụrụ Mofe-Damijo na obodo Aladja nke obodo Udu Kingdom, Delta Steeti
Ọ gara Midwest College, Warri na Anglican Grammar School ma bụrụ onye otu Drama Club
Ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum Benin ka ọ gaa n'ihu gụọ akwụkwọ wee gụọ akwụkwọ Theater
N'afọ 1997 Mofe-Damijo laghachiri na mahadum ka ọ mụọ iwu na mahadum Lagos wee gụchaa na 2004
Mgbe Mofe-Damijo gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, o sonye na ihe nkiri onyonyo na njedebe 80 nke a na-akpọ Ripples
Tupu mgbe ahụ, o nwere akwụkwọ akụkọ Concord na Magazin Metro dị ka onye nta akụkọ
Out of Bound bụ ihe nkiri izizi nke ọ nwetara otuto onye ode akwụkwọ / onye nrụpụta
N'afọ 2005 na mbipụta mbụ nke Afrika Movie Academy Awards Mofe-Damijo nwetara ihe nrite maka onye na- eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ọrụ ndu
Na 5 Januwari 2017, ọ kwadoro 2016 ihe nrite GLO-CAF tinyere onye nta akụkọ Naijiria Mimi Fawaz

A họpụtara Mofe-Damijo ka ọ bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche nke omenala na njem nlegharị anya nye Gọvanọ Emmanuel Uduaghan n'oge ahụ n'afọ 2008, wee bụrụ kọmishọna na-ahụ maka omenala na njem nlegharị anya nke Delta State, Nigeria na 2009
Oge ọrụ ya kwụsịrị na 2015
Mofe-Damijo lụrụ onye ntaakụkọ/onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria, May Ellen-Ezekiel (MEE)
Ka ọ nwụsịrị na 1996, Richard Mofe-Damijo lụgharịrị onye TV, Jumobi Adegbesan, onye mechara hapụ TV gawa ụlọ ọrụ
Mofe-Damijo nwere ụmụ anọ abụọ na nwunye ya ugbu a na abụọ sitere na alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya
of the King
Richard Nii Armah Quaye bụ onye ọchụnta ego nke Ghana, onye nchoputa, onye isi ọrụ na onye isi oche nke Quick Angels Limited yana kredit ngwa ngwa na itinye ego obere ego
A na-azọrọ na ọ bụ mmụọ ozi mbụ na-etinye ego na Ghana
A mụrụ Quaye na 21 Maachị 1984 wee si Jamestown na mpaghara Accra Kasị Ukwuu na Ghana
Quaye malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye ọchụnta ego ma na 8 Mee 2019, o guzobere Quick Angels Limited nke na-elekwasị anya n'ịkwalite mmalite na azụmaahịa na Ghana

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ akwadowo azụmaahịa dịka Pizzaman Chicken man, Ridge Medical Centre, Doughman Foods, CoLi Network, Goldcoast Food, Herbs and Spices, ndị na-emepụta Sankofa Natural Spices, Addicent Foods, ndị na'emepụta Benjie na Duke rice, Zaconut, na Burger King, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2019, o kwuru okwu na mbipụta nke atọ nke Entrepreneurs Forum site na Ghana Investment Promotion Council
N'ọnwa Disemba 2019, Entrepreneurship Through Acquisition, otu klọb azụmaahịa na Harvard Business School kpọrọ ya ka ọ kwuo okwu na nnọkọ nke ise ha na-eme kwa afọ
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019, Quaye meriri na ngalaba Investment Award
Na Septemba 2020, Quaye pụtara dị ka onye mmeri n'ozuzu na 2020 40 n'okpuru 40 awards na Kempinski Hotel na Accra O kwuru ọzọ na ọ bụ ụdị onyinye itinye ego
O nwetakwara ihe nrite European CEO Entrepreneur of the year 2020
N'ọnwa Mee 2021, ọ natakwara onye ọchụnta ego na-ahụ maka ọrụ ego na onye isi oche pụtara ìhè na 2021 11th Ghana Entrepreneur and Corporate Executive Awards
N'ọnwa Julaị na Ọgọstụ 2021, ọ natara onyinye Outstanding Business Investor Awards na Outstanding Business Leader na 2021 Ghana Business Standards Awards
Richard Pakleppa (amụrụ n'afọ 1961) bụ onye ọcha Namibia na-ede ihe nkiri, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Pakleppa gụrụ nkà ihe ọmụma na ihe nkiri na Munich, mba Germany ma nweta nzere nsọpụrụ na ọmụmụ Afrịka na Mahadum Cape Town
Kemgbe afọ 1990, ọ na-eduzi ma na-emepụta ihe nkiri na akụkọ ifo na Southern Africa
Ọ bi na South Africa ugbu a
Richard Nathaniel Wright (Amụrụ nonway Septemba 4, 1908 - Nọvemba 28, 1960) bụ onye Amerịka na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, obere akụkọ, uri, na akụkọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo
Ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ ya metụtara isiokwu agbụrụ, ọkachasị metụtara ọnọdụ nke ndị Afrịka Amerịka n'oge ngwụcha narị afọ nke 19 ruo etiti narị afọ nke 20 na-ata ahụhụ ịkpa ókè na ime ihe ike
Ndị nkatọ edemede kwenyere na ọrụ ya nyere aka gbanwee mmekọrịta agbụrụ na United States n'etiti narị afọ nke iri abụọ
Ihe ncheta Richard Wright, Black Boy, na-ekpuchi oge ndụ ya site na 1912 ruo Mee 1936
A mụrụ Richard Nathaniel Wright n'ọnwa Septemba 4, nke afọ 1908 na Rucker's Plantation, n'etiti obodo ụgbọ okporo ígwè nke Roxie na nnukwu obodo osimiri nke Natchez, Mississippi
Ọ bụ nwa Nathan Wright (c
1940) onye bụ onye ọrụ ugbo na Ella (Wilson) (b
1884 Mississippi – d
Jenụwarị 13, 1959 Chicago, Illinois) onye bụ onye nkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ
A mụrụ nne na nna ya n'efu mgbe agha obodo gasịrị; a mụrụ nne na nna ya ochie abụọ n'ohu ma tọhapụ ha n'ihi agha ahụ

Onye ọ bụla n'ime nna nna ya ochie sonyere na agha obodo United States ma nweta nnwere onwe site na ọrụ nna nna ya Nathan Wright (1842–1904) jere ozi na 28th United States Colored Troops; nna nna ya Richard Wilson (1847–1921) gbapụrụ n'ohu na Ndida iji jee ozi na US Navy dị ka Landsman na Eprel 1865
Nna Richard hapụrụ ezinụlọ ahụ mgbe Richard dị afọ isii, ọ hụghịkwa Richard ruo afọ iri abụọ na ise
Na 1911 ma ọ bụ 1912 Ella kwagara Natchez, Mississippi ka ya na nne na nna ya nọrọ
Mgbe ọ bi n'ụlọ nne na nna ya ochie, ọ gbara ụlọ ahụ ọkụ na mberede
Nne Wright na-ewe iwe nke na ọ tiri ya ihe ruo mgbe ọ na-amaghịzi ihe na'eme
Na 1915 Ella tinyere ụmụ ya na Settlement House, ụlọ ụmụ mgbei Methodist, maka obere oge
E debara aha ya na Howe Institute na Memphis site na 1915 ruo 1916
N'afọ 1916, nne ya na Richard na nwanne ya nwoke nke nta kwagara biri na nwanne ya nwanyị Maggie (Wilson) na di Maggie bụ Silas Hoskins (a mụrụ n'afọ 1882) na Elaine, Arkansas
Akụkụ a nke Arkansas dị na Mississippi Delta ebe a na-akọbu ugbo ogho
A manyere ndị Wright ịgbapụ mgbe Silas Hoskins 'apụ n'anya,' a kọrọ na otu onye ọcha gburu ya nke na-achọ azụmahịa saloon ya na-aga nke ọma
Mgbe ọrịa strok mere ka nne ya ghara inwe ike, e kewapụrụ Richard na nwanne ya nwoke nke nta ma soro nwanne nna ya Clark Wilson na nwanne nne ya Jodie biri obere oge na Greenwood, Mississippi
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ọ gụbeghị otu afọ zuru ezu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'oge na-adịghị anya, Richard na nwanne ya nwoke na nne ya laghachiri n'ụlọ nne nne ya, nke dị ugbu a na isi obodo steeti, Jackson, Mississippi, ebe ọ bi site na mbido 1920 ruo ngwụsị 1925
Nne na nna ya ochie, ka na-ewesa ya iwe maka ibibi ụlọ ha, tiri Wright na nwanne ya nwoke ihe ugboro ugboro
Ma mgbe ọ bi n'ebe ahụ, o mechara nwee ike ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe niile
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Seventh-day Adventist site na 1920 ruo 1921, ya na nwanne nne ya bụ Addie dị ka onye nkụzi ya
Mgbe otu afọ gasịrị, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, ọ banyere ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze Jim Hill na 1921, ebe a kwalitere ya na ọkwa nke isii mgbe naanị izu abụọ gasịrị
N'ụlọ nne na nna ya ochie nke Seventh-day Adventist, Richard nọ n'ahụhụ, n'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'ihi na nwanne nne ya na nne nne ya na-achịkwa gbalịrị ịmanye ya ikpe ekpere ka ya na Chineke nwee mmekọrịta
Wright mechara yie egwu ịkwapụ n'ụlọ nne nne ya mgbe ọ na-agaghị ekwe ka ọ rụọ ọrụ n'ụbọchị izu ike Adventist, Satọdee
Mgbalị siri ike nke nwanne nne ya na nne na nna ya ochie iji chịkwaa ya mere ka ọ buru ibu iro n'ebe ozizi Bible na nke Ndị Kraịst nọ iji dozie nsogbu ndụ
Isiokwu a sitere n'ihe odide ya n'oge ndụ ya niile
Richard Wyatt Jr
(amụrụ n'afọ 1955) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'oge a nke a maara nke ọma màkà nka ọha ya na gburugburu ọbọdọ Los Angeles
Enwere ike ịchọta ihe osise ya na Watts Towers, Capitol Records Building, White Memorial Hospital, Ontario Airport, Wilshire na Western Metro station, Union Station East Portal, na ọtụtụ ebe ndị ọzọ
A mụrụ Wyatt na Lynwood, California ma too na Compton tupu ọ kwaga Crenshaw, Los Angeles
Wyatt gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Fairfax High School
Ọ gàrà n'ihu na-aga Chouinard Art Institute site na 1966 ruo 1968 ma gụọkwa na mmemme ntorobịa Tutor Art Saturday na Otis Art Institute

Ọ bụ na Otis ka Wyatt zutere ma mụọ Charles White, ónyé ọrụ ya nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ebe ọ nọ, yana John Riddle, ónyé nyeere ya aka imeziwanye usoro ya ma gbaa ya ume ka ọ kwurịta okwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na nka ya
Wyatt nwetara BFA
ya na UCLA na 1978, ma site n'oge ahụ, o guzoberela kọntaktị na Los Angeles' mural movement
Wyatt gosipụtara nkwa nka site na nwata
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ọ meriri $ 200 na Watts Chalk-In mbụ, asọmpi nka n'okporo ụzọ nke Studio Watts Workshop kwadoro
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, o sonyere na ihe ngosi nka na Los Angeles Bahááí Center, ebe o gosipụtara ya na John Outterbridge, ónyé ghọrọ ónyé nduzi na ónyé nkwado
Ndị nduzi ndị ọzọ nwèrè mmetụta gụnyere Cecil Fergerson na Claude Booker, ndị ọ zutere site na ntinye aka ya na Watts Summer Festival

Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, a họọrọ Wyatt ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi 'Panorama of Black Artists' nke 1972 nke Los Angeles County Museum of Art, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama ma malite ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé otu ndị ọrụ nka African American nke obodo ahụ

Wyatt arụwo ọrụ dị ka ónyé nkuzi na onye nkụzi, na-enyere John Outterbridge aka na Watts Tower Arts Center site na 1974 na 1978, ma na-eme oge, na-akụzi ihe mgbe ụfọdụ na Mahadum California, Irvine na Otis Art Institute
Mana kemgbe afọ 1989, ọ nwèrè ike itinye onwe ya ógè niile na nka ya
Richard Yarde (1939-2011) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na prọfesọ, ónyé ọkachamara na eserese mmiri
Nné na nnà Richard Yarde bụ ndị mbịarambịa
Nna ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-arụzi ígwè na nné ya bụ ónyé na-akwa akwa
Ọ chetara nke a dị ka isi iyi nke mkpali, na-ekwu na e nwere ụkpụrụ n'ebe niile
Ọgwụgwọ bụ isiokwu a na-ahụkarị n'ọrụ ya ma o si na ihe oyiyi sitere na nyocha X-ray nke ya

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe osise mmanụ, wee gbanwee na mmiri na 1977 ma nweta otuto ozugbo màkà ọrụ ya nke sitere na isiokwu nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Africa na America, akụkọ ezinụlọ Yarde, na ọgụ ya na nkụchi akụrụ na ọrịa strok
Yarde kụziri nka na Mahadum Boston, Wellesley College, Amherst College, Massachusetts College of Art, Mount Holyoke College, Mahadum Massachusetts na Boston
Site na 1999-2011, ọ bụ prọfesọ nkè nka na Mahadum Massachusetts na Amherst
Richard Yarde rụrụ ọrụ na ihe na-enweghị mgbaghara - watercolor
Ọ na-ekwu na 'Mmiri na-acha ma ọ bụ na-aga nke ọma ma ọ bụ ọ naghị aga, dịka ịwa ahụ'
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya, ọ ga-etinye onwe ya n'ihe ize ndụ na ọ nwèrè ike ọ gaghị enwe ihe ịga nke ọma na agba nke mbụ
Yarde na-emekarị ihe, mgbè ụfọdụ mgbé ọ na-ege egwu jazz
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya buru oke ibu maka onye na-ese ihe na mmiri, irí site na irí ụkwụ ma ọ bụ karịa
Ọrụ ya na-agbagha eziokwu ahụ bụ na ihe osise mmiri kwesịrị ịbụ obéré, nsụgharị márá mma nke ala ma ọ bụ okooko osisi
Ihe osise Yarde dị oke egwu nke na-egosipụta isiokwu onwé ónyé na-emetụ n'ahụ, o gosipụtara isiokwu ndị a site na iji ihe a na-akọwa dị ka translucent na temporal
Yarde sikwa n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ihe ndị dabeere na ọdịbendị dị iche iche, nke na-akpụzi ọrụ ya n'otú o si aghọta ụwa
Yarde nwere gallery na-egosi dabere na isiokwu a
Rico Gatson bụ ónyé na-ese ihe dị iche iche na-arụ ọrụ na Brooklyn, New York, ónyé ọrụ ya sitere na nzụlite ya na Africa America
Site na nka ya, ọ na-enye nkọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'oge ndị dị mkpa n'akụkọ ihe méré eme Black
Ọrụ ya na-ejikọta ụkpụrụ ndị a na-adịghị ahụ anya na agba dị egwu, nke na-emepụta ọrụ esemokwu nke na-ezo aka na omenala na akụkọ ihe méré eme nke ndị Africa America
A mụrụ Rico Gatson na Augusta, Georgia na 1966 mana o tolitere na Riverside, California
Nné na nnà ya, ónyé nọọsụ na ónyé na-arụ ọrụ n'ọhịa, kwagara n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ n'oge Nnukwu Migration wee sonye na ndị Black nke dị n'etiti ọhụrụ
N'afọ 1980, ọ gara Betel College na Minnesota dị ka ónyé na-agụ akwụkwọ
Ọ gbanwere akara ugo mmụta ya site na eserese eserese gaa na nka ihe osise, na-enweta nzere Bachelor nke Fine Arts na 1989
Màkà nzere Master of Fine Arts ya, ọ gàrà Yale School of Art na 1991
N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ mụrụ ihe ọkpụkpụ n'okpuru onye na-ese ihe David von Schlegell
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Franconia Sculpture Park, Taylor Falls na 1998 ma bụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe na-ebi na Wright Museum of Art nke Beloit College
Mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị, Gatson gara n'ihu n'ọrụ nka ya na Bushwick, mpaghara Brooklyn na New York City
Ọrụ nka Gatson na-enyocha isiokwu nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na njirimara ndị isi ojii

Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya na-akatọ ikpe na-ezighị ezi n'akụkọ ihe méré eme nkè ndị Africa na America na-ezo áká na ọdịbendị ndị isi ojii site n'iji ihe oyiyi nke ndị ama ama, ọgba aghara, na imewe akwa Africa
N'ụzọ ejiji, ọrụ ya na-ejikarị usoro geometric doro anya, na-arụ ọrụ na echiche na abstraction, iji tinye ọchịchọ ịmata ihe omimi n'ime ónyé na-ekiri ya
Akụkụ ya na-ekwusi ike na-adọrọ mmasị ndị na-ekiri ya na ihe ndị a na-ahụ ányà iji mesie ọnọdụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ha ike mgbe e mesịrị
Richard Preston Butler Jr
(amụrụ na Disemba 3, 1982), nke a maara nkè ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Rico Love, bụ onye America na-eti egwu, ónyé na-agụ egwu, onye édémédé egwu, na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
A mụrụ ya na New Orleans, Louisiana, mana o kewara oge nwata ya n'etiti Milwaukee, Wisconsin na mpaghara Harlem nke New York City
Ọ gara Florida A&M ma, mgbè ọ na-eleta Atlanta, Georgia, rụọ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ egwu site na njikọ ya na Usher, ónyé ga-aghọ otu n'ime ndị na-arụkọ ọrụ na Love
Egwú mbụ Love dere n'ọrụ ya bụ 'Throwback' nke mechara na album Usher nke afọ 2004 Confessions

Ihe ịga nke ọma nke ịhụnanya gàrà n'ihu na-ede ma na-emepụta ihe ndekọ dị ka Usher's 'There Goes My Baby' na 'Hey Daddy (Daddy's Home)', Nelly's 'Just a Dream' na 'Gone', yana Beyoncé's 'Sweet Dreams'
ma nyé áká na ọrụ ndị gara n'iyi iji merie Grammys dị ka Beyoncé'afọ 2009 Best Contemporary R&B I Am
Sasha Obi Ike, Usher's 2010 Best Contemporary R&B album Raymond v
Raymond, na Usher's 2010 Best Male R&B Vocal Performance 'There Goes My Baby'
Na mgbakwunye, Ịhụnanya edeela ma mepụta ndekọ màkà Kelly Rowland, Diddy Dirty Money, Chris Brown, Alexandra Burke, Keri Hilson, Fergie, na Fantasia
A mụrụ Love na New Orleans, Louisiana, nne na nna ya gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe ha dị obere
N'ihi ịgba alụkwaghịm ahụ, Love nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na-etolite n'obodo abụọ dị iche iche, na Milwaukee, Wisconsin na nne ya na Harlem, NY na nna ya
Nné ịhụnanya gbara ya ume mgbè ọ bụ nwata ide uri
Ịhụnanya dere uri nke ya wee gaa n'ihu sonye na African American Children's Theater ebe ọ kwughachiri Langston Hughes ma mee ihe
Ịhụnanya anọworị na-ede uri nke ya tupu a mata ya na rap n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Love ekpebiela ịchụso ọrụ rap mana ọ ga-aga kọleji n'otu ógè ahụ, 'M [na-aga] ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ kama ịnọdụ ala na blọk
Ọ bụrụ na agụghị m kọleji agaraghị m abụ onye na-ere ọgwụ ọjọọ
Mgbè ọ nọ na kọleji na Mahadum Florida A&M, Ịhụnanya nọgidere na-etinye aka na egwu ya site na mmeri ọtụtụ agha rap na ngosipụta nkà
Na ngwụsị izu, Ịhụnanya ga-aga Atlanta, Georgia màkà uru nke ụlọ ọrụ ya na egwu egwu a ma ama
Mgbe ọ na-eleta Atlanta, Love zutere ndị otu Jagged Edge bụ ndị nwere mmetụta na mmepe ederede egwu nke Love
Ịhụnanya mechara hapụ kọleji n'ihi njehie ọrụ akwụkwọ nke ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa kọleji mere
Ịhụnanya gara soro ụfọdụ ndị na-emepụta ihe na Atlanta bụ Corna Boyz biri
Mmekọrịta a nyere Ịhụnanya ohere rap na remix ndị na-emepụta na-emepụta màkà Usher
Usher nwere mmasị n'ọrụ Love na remix ma mesịa bịanye aka na US Records / J Records
Usher rịọrọ Love ka o dee okwu maka abụ nke Just Blaze dere
Egwú a mechara bụrụ 'Throwback' ma gosipụta ya na Usher's Diamond-selling (10× Platinum) Confessions album
Ịhụnanya gàrà njem ọzọ na Usher ebe ọ zutere ma jikọọ ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-egwu egwu
Usher gbara Love ume ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ede egwu ma arịrịọ maka ihe ndị Love dere malitere ịpụta site n'aka ndị na-ese ihe Chris Brown, Omarion, na Marques Houston
Ịhụnanya bi na Miami ugbu a na ónyé na-ese foto Robin Thompson nke a maara dị ka Robin V
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ, nwa nwoke, Carys Preston, na nwa nwanyị, Believe Beyond
Riele Downs (amuru July 8, 2001 ) bu nwatakiri Canada na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya dị ka Charlotte na usoro telivishọn nke Nickelodeon a kpọrọHenry Danger, na maka ọrụ ya dị ka Faith Sullivan na ihe nkiri afọ 2013 The Best Man Holiday
A mụrụ Downs na Julaị 8, 2001
O gosila na ya nwere 'ahụmahụ ụfọdụ gbasara ịgba egwu'
Downs malitere ime ihe mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ, wee nweta ọrụ mbụ ya n'ihe nkiri Four Brothers ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dika Amelia Mercer
Ọ pụtara na A Russell Peters Christmas Special na 2013
Na 2014, a etinyere Downs na ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya pụrụ iche, na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn Nickelodeon Henry Danger, na-arụ ọrụ nke Charlotte bụ ezigbo enyi Henry
Na 2017, ya na Lizzy Greene jikọrọ aka na ihe nkiri telivishọn Nickelodeon Tiny Christmas
Tmazight ma ọ bụ Tarifit Berber, makwaara dị ka Riffian (Tarifit Tmaziɣt [θmæzɪχt]) bụ asụsụ Zenati Berber a na-asụ na mpaghara Rif na ugwu Morocco
Ihe dị ka ndị Rifi 1,271,000 na-asụ ya nke ọma na mpaghara Rif nke Al Hoceima, Nador, Driouch, yana asụsụ pere mpe na Oujda, Tetouan na Berkane]
Na Rif, aha ala nke asụsụ a bụ 'Tmazi Brandon' (nke a na-akpọ Tmazixt n'ọtụtụ olumba)
Ndị na-ekwu okwu nwere ike ịkọwapụta site na ịkpọ ya 'Tarifiyt' (nke a na-akpọ Tarifect na asụsụ etiti)

Riffian bụ asụsụ Zenati Berber nke nwere asụsụ dị iche iche dị iche iche maka agbụrụ ọ bụla na nke a na-asụ ọtụtụ n'ime ha na mpaghara Rif, nnukwu ugwu ugwu nke Northern Morocco, na ndị ka nta na-asụrụ n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke Algeria dị nso
Rifkatu Adamu Chidawa (amuru 18 Febrụwarị 1956) bu Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka njem nlegharị anya na omenala, Naija Steeti, Naijiria
A mụrụ Chidawa na 18 Febrụwarị 1956 na Diko na Gọọmentị Ime Obodo nke Gurara di na Naija Steeti
Chidawa malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị n'ọnwa Jenụarị n'afọ 1962, wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ Gọọmenti Ụmụ nwanyị nke Sekọndrị, Minna
O mechara nweta Asambodo Mmụta Mba n'afọ 1981
E zigara Chidawa na Ulo Akwụkwọ Sekọndrị Gọọmentị Nke Ụtụtụ dI na Suleja, Naija Steeti maka otu afọ Ọrụ Ntorobịa nke Mba na 1981 Ọ nwetara asambodo mbụ ya na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello
O mechara gaa mahadum Abuja n'afọ 1999 maka ogo masta na nchịkwa agụmakwụkwọ na nhazi
Chidawa malitere ọrụ ya dịka onye nkuzi
Ọ dubere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị iche iche na Abuja na Niger steeti
Mgbe e mesịrị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka njem nlegharị anya na omenala
Chidawa bidoro mmemme iji nyochaa ọrịa kansa na Gọọmenti Ime Obodo nke Gurara dị na steeti Niger
Ọ lụọla di, ma nweekwa ụmụ

Ikike nke nchebe onwe (nke a na-akpọkwa, mgbe ọ na-emetụta ịgbachitere onye ọzọ, nchebe alter ego n'asụsụ bekee, ịgbachitere ndị ọzọ, ịgbachitere onye nke atọ) bụ ikike maka ndị mmadụ iji ike ezi uche dị na ya ma ọ bụ nchebe, maka ebumnuche nke ịgbachitere ndụ onwe onye (ịgbachitere onwe onye) ma ọ bụ ndụ ndị ọzọ, gụnyere - n'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ - iji ike na-egbu egbu

Ọ bụrụ na onye a na-ebo ebubo na-eji ike nchebe n'ihi iyi egwu nke mmerụ ahụ na-egbu egbu ma ọ bụ nke ọjọọ site n'aka onye nke ọzọ, ma ọ bụ echiche ezi uche dị na mmerụ ahụ dị otú ahụ, a na-ekwu na onye a na-ebo ebubo nwere 'nchebe onwe zuru oke'

Ọ bụrụ na onye a na-ebo ebubo na-eji ike nchebe n'ihi echiche dị otú ahụ, na echiche ahụ abụghị ihe ezi uche dị na ya, onye a na-ebo ebubo nwere ike inwe 'nchebe onwe onye na-ezughị okè' dị ka ihe ngọpụ
Echiche ndị mbụ adịghị eme ka ọdịiche dị n'etiti ịgbachitere mmadụ na ịgbachitere ihe onwunwe

Ma ọ bụ n'uche ma ọ bụ na ọ bụghị, nke a naewuli elu na ụkpụrụ Iwu nke mba Rom nke a kpọrọ dominium n'asụsụ Latin ebe mwakpo ọ bụla a wakporo ndị òtù ezinụlọ ma ọ bụ ihe onwunwe o nwere bụ mwakpo onwe onye na pater familias - onye isi nwoke nke ezinụlọ, naanị onye nwe ihe onwunwe niile nke ezinụlọ, ma nye iwu ikike ịchị ụmụ ya niile site n'usoro nwoke n'agbanyeghị afọ ha
