Ọ bụkwa onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndụmọdụ mba ụwa nke Academic University College for Nonviolence and Human Rights na Beirut, Lebanon
Salah nọkwa na ndị isi na Women for Women International, netwoku zuru uwa onu maka ndi iyom na-ewu udo na Cure Violence Global
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Secretary-General High-Level Panel on Peace Operations
Salah bụ onye mba Jọdan ma na-asụ asụsụ atọ, Arabic, English, na French
O nwere PhD
na anthropology ọdịbendị site na SUNY-Binghamton

N'oge mmemme doctoral ya, Salah nọrọ otu afọ na Baqa’a Palestinian Refugee Camp dị nso na Amman, Jọdan mgbe ọ na-eme nnyocha maka edemede PhD ya nke nyochara ọnọdụ na-agbanwe agbanwe nke ọgbọ atọ nke ụmụ nwanyị Palestine nọ n'ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ metụtara agụmakwụkwọ na òkè ọha na eze / obodo

Salah nwekwara nzere masta na agụmakwụkwọ na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọdịbendị anthropology site na SUNY-Fredonia, na nzere bachelọ na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya site na Beirut College for Women-Lebanon (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Mahadum Lebanon American)
Tupu ọrụ nkwado mba ụwa maka ikike nke ụmụaka na ụmụ nwanyị, Salah malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkụzi na usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị Jọdan na 1965

[nkọwa dị mkpa] Mgbe ọ hapụrụ ọrụ nkuzi, Salah rụrụ ọrụ enyemaka Katọlik Relief Services na Jerusalem dị ka onye nlekọta nke ndị ọrụ ebere maka mmemme enyemaka nke nzukọ ahụ maka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ site na 1967 ruo 1975
[nkọwa dị mkpa]

Site na 1972 ruo 1987, Salah nọrọ oge na-akụzi ọtụtụ isiokwu, dị ka, ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, akparamàgwà mmadụ, na Arabic n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na òtù, gụnyere School of Social work na Dar al-Tifl al-Arabi na Jerusalem, Swedish Organization of Individual Relief na Jerusalem, State University of New York na Binghamton, na Binghamton Community College na Binghamton, New York
Salah enweela ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri atọ nke ọrụ ọkachamara na United Nations
Ọ sonyeere UNICEF n'afọ 1987 dị ka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na Baluchistan, Pakistan

Mgbe afọ ise gachara na Pakistan, Salah ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya UNICEF na Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso site n'afọ 1992 ruo afọ 1995 na onye nnọchi anya UNICEF na Hanoi, Vietnam, site n'afọ 1995 ruo n'afọ 1999
Site na 1999 ruo 2004 ọ bụ onye nduzi mpaghara UNICEF maka West na Central Africa, na-ahụ maka ọrụ UNICEF na mba 23 nke Africa
N'agbata afọ 2004 na afọ 2007, ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke UNICEF, nke dị na New York City

Ọ bụ osote onye nnọchi anya pụrụ iche nke odeakwụkwọ ukwu na United Nations Mission na Central African Republic na Chad site na 2008 ruo 2010Salah laghachiri n'isi ụlọ ọrụ UNICEF New York site na 2011 ruo 2012 dị ka osote onye isi nchịkwa, onye ọrụ na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mpụga
N'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2014, Salah, ya na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ndị ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara iwulite udo, ikike ụmụaka na ikike ụmụ nwanyị, Dr
Marie-Louise Baricak na Dr
Radhika Coomaraswamy, bụ ndị odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations Ban Ki-moon họpụtara ka ha sonye na mmadụ iri na anọ nke United Nations High-Level Independent Panel on Peace Operations

Odeakwụkwọ ukwu Ban Ki-moon kpọrọ ndị otu a ka ha 'ka ha nyochaa nke ọma ọrụ udo nke United Nations taa na mkpa ndị na-apụta n'ọdịnihu' ma 'le anya nke ọma otú ọrụ udo nke United Nations nwere ike isi gaa n'ihu na-enye aka na mgbochi na idozi esemokwu ma bụrụ nke a haziri nke ọma ma kwadebere iji dozie ihe ịma aka nke echi

Òtù Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu maka Ịdị n'Otu maka Ịdị n'Otu na Ike nke Ụmụ nwanyị, nke a makwaara dị ka UN Women, toro mmụba nke panel ahụ, na-ekwu na “Ndị otu atọ a ga-eweta ahụmịhe mpaghara na isiokwu dị mkpa, ma ga-agbakwunye ọrụ nke ndị otu Panel ndị ọzọ ma 'hụ na-eme ka ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na ụmụ nwanyị, udo na nchekwa pụta ìhè n'ime nyocha nke panel ahụ
Rimin Gado (ma ọ bụ Rafin Gado ) bụ ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Kano Steeti, Naijeria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Rimin Gado ihe dịka 20 km ọdịda anyanwụ nke isi obodo steeti Kano
Ọ nwere mpaghara 225 km2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ abụọ na ngụkọ nke afọ 2006
Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ narị asaa na otu
Rimini Haraya Makama, bụ onye ọkàiwu na onye nduzi nke mmekọrịta ọha na gọọmentị na Microsoft Naijiria
Amụrụ ya na Jos, Plateau steetị Naijiria
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ọkàiwu na Mahadum Jos, ma nweta nzere mastas na Mahadum Reading
Rimini Haraya Makama bụ Onye Nchịkwa ihe gbasara gọọmentị na Microsoft MEA
Ọ bu onye ọkachamara n'ihe metụtara gọọmentị na ịhaziri ndị ọha ihe teknụzụ na otu ojiji ya na-emetụta ndi oha
Ọ na-ahụ maka ijikwa mmepe na mmejuputa atumatu ndị Microsoft na ngalaba obodo niile ebe ha metụtara mmekọrịta nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ọ na-eme ka mmekọrịta nke ụlọ ọrụ ya dịkwuo omimi na ndị isi gọọmentị, ndị na-achịkwa usoro iwu, ndị ome iwu, nzukọ mba na ndị agụmakwụkwọ

Tupu ọ banye na Microsoft, ọ bụ onye isi maka okwu mkparịta ụka, Africa Practice ebe ọ webatara ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ mba buru ibu na EMEA bata n'ahịa Naijiria ma na-enyere aka ịhazi ha dịka ndị mmekọ dị mkpa na ahia ọrụ ha ma gbaa ndị mba ọzọ ume itinye ego na n'ahia ahụ
Ọ bụbụ onye isi na-enyere aka maka iwu na Office nke Iwu na International Criminal Police Organization - ICPO - INTERPOL na Lyon, France
Rimini nwere LLB na Mahadum Jos, Nigeria, BL na ụlọ akwukwo ọkọaiwu nke Naijiria, LLM na International Law & World Order si Mahadum Reading, UK, yana CIM Diploma na London School of Marketing
Na 2014, Forbes matara ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ agbọghọ iri abụọ na-erubeghi afọ iri anọ ma si ike na mba Afrika
Ọ bụ onye isi hụrụ maka ihe nkiri 2016 Green White Green nke pụtara n'ọtụtụ memme nkiri mba dị iche iche gụnyere Toronto International Film Festival
Mmasị ya gụnyere mmepụta ihe nkiri na ụlọ ahịa ejiji
Na ọnwa Disemba 2014, Forbes dere na Rimini Makama bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ kachasị ike n'Africa
Rina Chunga-Kutama bụ onye South Africa na-emepụta ejiji na nwanyị na-azụ ahịa
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Rich Factory, ụdị ejiji Pan-Africa
E depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndepụta Forbes Africa nke ndị nọ n'okpuru afọ iri atọ nke afọ 2018
A mụrụ Chungu-Kumata na Zambia, o tolitere na Botswana ma biri ugbu a na South Africa
O nwetara ọzụzụ ya na ejiji na London International School of Fashion (LISOF) na Pretoria
N'afọ 2007, dị ka ụzọ isi nweta ego iji kwado agụmakwụkwọ ya, Chungu-Kumata malitere ịrụ ọrụ na azụmahịa ya mgbe ọ nọ na kọleji, na-eji akwụkwọ Zambia
A maara ya na ọ haziri uwe maka ndị ama ama nke gụnyere Nomzamo Mbatha na Nomuzi Mabena
Ọ na-arụkọkwa ọrụ ya na ụdị ndị a ma ama gụnyere Dove, ụdị ịchọ mma na Nestlé
E gosipụtara nchịkọta ya na Nestlé mepụtara na 2017, n'oge South African Fashion Week (SAFW)
Ọ lụrụ di
A maara ya na ọ lụrụ enyi ya ogologo oge ma ugbu a onye mmekọ azụmahịa na mmemme ihe nketa, Zambia-meets-South-Africa-via-Venda
A kpọrọ emume ahụ #KutamaFest
Elizabeth 'Rina' Venter (amụrụ na 9 Disemba, na afọ 1938) bụ Minista nke Ahụike Mba na Mmepe Population nke South Africa, site na afo 1989 ruo n'afọ 1994
Venter gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Pretoria ma bụrụ onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ruo afọ 20
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na gọọmentị National Party nke F
de Klerk, ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke South Africa iji nwee ọkwa kansụl
Ọ lara ezumike nká na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na afọ 1994
Na 17 Mee, na afọ 1990, Venter kwupụtara na usoro ahụike nke South Africa ga-amalite nkewa
Ụlọ ọgwụ steeti 240 nke South Africa ghọrọ nke agbụrụ niile, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-erughị mmejuputa nke ọma
N'okpuru nrụgide sitere n'aka ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emegide ya, Dr
Venter kwupụtara n'ihu ọha na afọ 1991 iji nyochaa iwu ụtaba

Gọọmentị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nwere mmasị na ụlọ ọrụ ụtaba, ya mere ọ ga-ala azụ iwebata ihe mgbochi, ya mere o nwetara enyemaka nke ndị otu Tobacco Action Group, iji wusie mgbasa ozi na nkwado ọha na eze maka mbọ mgbochi ịṅụ sịga

Mgbe ọ gakwuuru ndị na-akwado na ndị na-emegide ụtaba, Venter kpebiri iwebata Iwu Nchịkwa nke Ịṅụ sịga na Mgbasa Ozi nke Ngwaahịa ụtaba, nke ga-enye ya ike igbochi ịṅụ sịga n'ebe ụfọdụ ọha na eze, ga-eme ka ọ bụrụ mmejọ ire sịga nye ndị na-erubeghị afọ 16, ọ ga-etakwa ihe mgbochi dịka ịdọ aka ná ntị ahụike na mgbasa ozi maka ngwaahịa ụtaba
Iwu ahụ pụtara ọzọ na 1992 dị ka Iwu Nchịkwa Ngwaahịa Ọṅụ, gọọmentị wee gbuo oge ruo 1993
Nzukọ omeiwu mechara kwado ya na 17 Juun, na afọ 1993
Venter nwetara nkwado maka ọrụ ya iji gbochie ojiji nke ụtaba na onyinye nke American Cancer Society
Ngalaba ya chepụtara atụmatụ zuru oke na nke zuru ezu maka imeghachi omume na ọrịa AIDS na-amalite amalite, nke enweghị ego gbochiri
Ọ katọrọ ndị nọchiri ya maka ịhapụ atụmatụ a
Rio de Janeiro bu ama ukwu no na South Amerika ala ana-kpo Brazil
Ụsọ Oké Osimiri East
Atụmatụ Nguzo nke etiti China ( simplified Chinese ) bụ amụma nke ndị Mba nke China nabatara iji mee ka mmepe mpaghara etiti ya dị ngwa
Premier Wen Jiabao kwupụtara ya n'ụbọchị ise nke ọnwa Machị afọ 2004
Ọ na-ekpuchi mpaghara isii Shanxi, Henan, Anhui, Hubei, Hunan, na Jiangxi
Rita Akarekor (amụrụ na 13 Febuwarị 2001) bụ onye ọgba bọọlụ na-agbaara ndi Delta Queens na asompi bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwaanyi di na Naijiria
Ọ na-agba dika onye na-eche nche bọl
N'afo 2016, ha kwuru na Rita bụ ọgba bọl kachasi mma na asompi bọọlụ ụmụ nwaanyị
N'oge 2017 asompi ụmụnwaayị, Akarekor nyere goolu abụọ nke meriri Adamawa Queens
Ọ kọwara na ọ teela ọchọrọ inye goolu na udịrị asọmpi ahụ
N’ọnwa Eprel 2017, Akarekor sonyeere ndị meriri Saadatu Amazons, 2-1
Otu goolu ndi Amazons nyere na asompi ahu mebiri ndeko ya
N'onwa Julaị 2017, na-egwuregwu tupu nke ikpeazu, Akarekor mere ndekọ bọọlụ ọhụrụ n'aka ndi Adamawa Queens
O nweghi goolu obula banyere na nke ya
Akarekor gbaara na egwuregwu bọl mba Afrịka nke ụmụnwaanyị n'afo 2016nke ha meriri
Rita Akosua Dickson (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1970) bụ onye Ghana na-ahụ maka ọgwụ ahịhịa na nwanyị mbụ bụ osote onye isi nke Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah
Ọ gara St
Monica's Secondary School na Mampong-Ashanti ebe ọ gụrụ maka ule GCE Ordinary Level ya na mgbe e mesịrị Wesley Girls Tian High School na Cape-Coast, maka ule G CE Advanced Level ya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah na nzere bachelọ na ọgwụ na 1994 wee nweta MPharm n'otu mahadum ahụ na pharmacognosy na 1999
Ọ natara PhD ya na pharmacology na King's College London na 2007
Dickson malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi na Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah n'afọ 2000
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ ịga gụọ akwụkwọ na UK, ọ laghachiri Ghana na 2007 wee gaa n'ihu na-akụzi na Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah
N'afọ 2009, e buliri ya n'ọkwa ka ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi dị elu ma gaa n'ihu bụrụ osote prọfesọ n'afọ 2014
Na Septemba 2018, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi nke Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ
Tupu nhọpụta ya dị ka osote onye isi ala, ọ bụ onye isi nke ngalaba nke ọgwụ na sayensị ọgwụ
Dickson na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye otu ụlọọrụ nke Pharmacy Council na Pharmaceutical Society of Ghana
Na ọnwa nke ise n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise afọ 2020 Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah kwupụtara nhọpụta ya dị ka nwanyị mbụ osote onye isi nke mahadum ahụ malite na 1 August 2020
Ọ ga-eje ozi afọ anọ
Ọrụ ya dịka phytochemist na-ekpuchi mpaghara nke ngwaahịa sitere n'okike na-arụ ọrụ na njikwa ọrịa na-efe efe na nke na-adịghị ebute

Nnyocha na Nchọpụta Dickson bụ maka ngwaahịa ndị sitere na osisi Ghana, na-ekwusi ike na ndị nwere mgbochi ọrịa, ọgwụgwọ ọnyá, mgbochi ọzịza, mgbochi pyretic na mgbochi shuga, dabere na ojiji ethnopharmacological ha
Ọ lụrụ Nana Dickson ma nwee ụmụ anọ
Ọ bụ Onye Kraịst ma na-arụkọ ọrụ na Grace Baptist Church, Amakom na Kumasi
E nyere Dickson Commonwealth Scholarship iji nweta PhD na Kings College, Mahadum London, UK na 2003

Rita Akpan (amụrụ ya n'afọ irí abụọ na asatọ Septemba 1944) bụ onye nkuzi Naijiria bụ onye bụ Minista Federal nke Women Affairs na kọmitii nke Onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo n'etiti July 2003 na June 2005
A mụrụ Rita Akpan n'afo iri abụo na asatọ Septemba 1944 na Akwa-Ibom Steeti
O nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts Degree na Languages na Master of Art na Education na Mahadum Oregon, Eugene, USA
Site na 1968 ruo na 1986, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na American International School, Victoria Island, Lagos na Federal Ministry of Education

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi nke Ngalaba French, Federal Government Girls' College, Calabar, Federal Inspector of French Language na mgbe e mesịrị dị ka osote onye isi, Federal Government Girl College, Calaber
Akpan bụbu odeakwụkwọ nke Gọọmentị Akwa Ibom Steeti n'oge ọchịchị mbụ nke Gọvanọ Victor Attah
Ọ bụkwa onye otu kansụl n'oge ọchịchị Obong Akpan Isemin
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche na ozi na ọdịbendị na Gọvanọ Akwa-Ibom Steeti n'afọ 1992
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Kọmishọna Steeti maka Mmụta na 1993 na odeakwụkwọ nke Gọọmentị Steeti, Akwa-Ibom Steeti, n'etiti 1999 na 2000

N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2004, n'oge ọmụmụ ihe gbasara mmetụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na akụ na ụba nke ịzụ ahịa mmadụ na ọrụ ụmụaka, Akpan kwuru na Naịjirịa bụ mba mbụ na naanị mba dị na West Africa iji mee iwu megide ịzụ ahịa mmadụ
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2005, Akpan wepụtara akụkọ nke abụọ gbasara Naịjirịa na Kọmitii Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Nwatakịrị
O kwuru na Naịjirịa emeela ihe doro anya maka Nzukọ nke Ụmụaka kemgbe ọ gosipụtara akụkọ mbụ ya
A kọrọ na Onye isi ala Obasanjo enweghị ihu ọma ya dịka onye mmekọ nke Gọvanọ Akwa Ibom Victor Attah, onye Obasanjo na ya enweghị nkwekọrịta
A chụpụrụ ya n'ọchịchị n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2005
Rita Atukwasa bụ onye omebe iwu nke Uganda na Nzukọ nke iri na otu, onye nyocha iwu ọha na eze, ọkachamara gbasara nwoke na nwanyị na onye nkuzi maka mmefu ego gbasara nwoke na nwoke
Ọ bụkwa onye bụbu onye isi nchịkwa na The Institute for Social Transformation (IST) Uganda
Ọ bụ nwanyị omebe iwu nke Mbarara district ebe ọ meriri na Jenụwarị, na afọ 2021 dị ka onye na-azọ onwe ya
Rita bụkwa onye otu Gender Based Violence Prevention Network
Rita Atukwasa nwere akara ugo mmụta na Social Administration na Political Science na Mahadum Makerere n'afọ 2001
O nwetakwara Post Graduate Diploma site na Institute for Training for Transformation South Africa
O mechara nweta nzere masta na Public Policy and Governance site na Uganda Management Institute n'afọ 2016
Rita Atukwasa jere ozi dị ka onye njikwa mmemme Advocacy Human Rights maka Kamwokya Christian Caring Community site n'Ogost, na afọ 2004 ruo na afọ 2011
Rita jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Uganda Women's Parliamentary Association of the Parliament Of Uganda ruo Julai, na afọ 2012
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha iwu maka Institute for Social Transformation site n'Ogostu, na afọ 2012 ruo na afọ 2016 tupu ọ bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa ya na afọ 2016 iji nye ya
Rita Atukwasa bụ nwanyị so na ndị omeiwu maka obodo Mbarara na ndị omebe iwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Rita Chikwelu (amụrụ na 6 March 1988) bụ one ọrụ egwuregwu bọọlụ na Naijiria
Ọ gbaara ndi klọb Madrid CFF
Tupu, ọ gbaara na klọb Umeå IK na Kristianstads DFF
O bụkwa onye otu ndi na-anọchitere anya Naijiria na asọmpi egwuregwu bọọlụ bu Super Falcons
Site na 2006 rue 2009 Chikwelu gbaara na Finlandna nke ndi FC United
Ọ bụ onye kachasị nweta goolu na egwuregwu bọọlụ ndị nwanyị Naisten Liigana 2009
Chikwelu nyere goolu iri abụọ na abụọ
Chikwelu nọrọ oge asaa na Umeå IK site na 2010 rue 2016, mana ọ hapụrụ haa wee sonye Kristianstads DFF na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ
Chikwelu sonyere na egwuregwu bọọlụ nke FIFA site na 2004 ruo 2008 mana na 2017 ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị FIFA
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị otu egwuregwu Olimpik nke Nigeria nke sonyere na asọmpi Olympic nke 2008na China na onye otu ndị otu Naịjirịa na 2011 asọmpi mba uwa FIFA
Rita Uchenna Nkem Dominic Watụrụọcha bụ ome ihe nkiri nke Naijiria
N'afo 2012, enyere ya awọdụ nke Africa Movie Academy Award dị ka Nwanyị n'eme ihe nkiri kacha mma ọrụ ndu
Rita Dominic bụ onye amụrụ n'ezinụlọ Eze Watụrụọcha nke Aboh Mbaise di n'Imo State
ọ bu nwa ikpeazu n'ime ụmụ anọ Nne ya na Nna ya nwụrụ anwụ bụ ndị dibia bekee

Dominic gụrụ akwụkwo na-otu ụlọ-akwụkwọ ama-ama nke aha ya bụ Federal Government College Ikot Ekpene di na Steeti Akwa Ibom, Naijiria, tupu ọ gawa Mahadum na University of Port Harcourt, ebe ọgụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere BA (Honours) na Theatre Arts n'afọ 1999
Dominic bidoro omume ihe nkiri oge
ọ bụ nwanta,

Na 1998, ọ gbara ama na ihe nkiri mbụ ya, A Time to Kill

Nne na nna ya nwụrụ anwụ bụ ndị ọrụ nlekọta ahụike, nna ya bụ dọkịta ahụike yana nne ya bụ onye ọrụ nọọsụDominic gara prestigious Federal Government College, Ikot Ekpene, Akwa Ibom State, Nigeria, tupu ọ gawa Mahadum Port Harcourt, ebe ọ gụchara nzere BA (Honours) na Theater Arts na 1999
Rita Margaret Donaghy, Baroness Donaghy (amụrụ n'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1944) bụ onye nchịkwa mahadum nke Britain, onye otu ọrụ na onye ọrụ ibe ya na House of Lords

Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Durham, Donaghy rụrụ ọrụ na Institute of Education, Mahadum London, dị ka onye enyemaka onye na-edeba aha ma mesịa bụrụ onye odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide na Students' Union
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na otu ọrụ aka NALGO, na-aghọ onye otu National Executive ya na 1973 ma na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi ala na 1989/90
Ọ bụ onye otu General Council of the Trades Union Congress site na 1989 - na-anọchite anya NALGO, nke jikọtara ọnụ wee ghọọ UNISON na 1993 - ma mee ya onye isi oche TUC na 2000
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2000, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ya mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke ọrụ nkwekọrịta ụlọ ọrụ ACAS, ọrụ ọ rụrụ ruo n'afọ 2007
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kọmitii na Standards in Public Life (Nolan Committee) site na 2001 ruo 2007, n'oge dị mkpirikpi dị ka Onye isi oche mgbe afọ atọ nke Sir Alistair Graham kwụsịrị

Ọ bụ onye otu Low Pay Commission na Employment Tribunal Taskforce N'afọ 2009, a kpọrọ Donaghy ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke nyocha banyere ọnwụ metụtara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ iwu ihe, nke akụkọ ya bipụtara na 2010 nwere ọtụtụ aro maka imeziwanye nchekwa na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Nlekọta Mesothelioma na onye otu Birmingham University Business Advisory Group
E nyere Donaghy OBE na 1998 maka ọrụ na mmekọrịta ụlọ ọrụ, na CBE na 2005 maka ọrụ na njikọ ọrụ
O nwere Honorary Doctorates site na Open University (2003), Keele University (2004) na Mahadum Greenwich (2005)
N'afọ 2003, e nyere ya Fellowship nke Chartered Institute of Personnel and Development, nke Fellowsship nke Royal Society of Arts (FRSA) sochiri na 2004
A mara ọkwa ndụ ya na 2010 Dissolution Honours List
E kere ya Baroness Donaghy, nke Peckham na London Borough nke Southwark, na 26 June 2010
Ga hụ buRita Edochie bụ onye ama ama na -eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa onye bidoro ime ihe nkiri ogologo oge tupu e guzobe otu ahaziri ahazi bụNollywood
Na 2016, ndị Universal Peace Federation jiri onyinye awọd nnochite anya maka udo chọọ ya mma
Amụrụ Edochie na steeti Anambra, nke bụ mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa nke ndị Igbo bi na Naịjirịa bi
Edochie nwere ụmụ anọ ma bụrụ nne nne
Ọ bụ nwunye nwanne Pete Edochie na nwanne Yul Edochie na Muna Obiekwe
Edochie lụrụ Tony Edochie onye bụ nwanne Pete Edochie nke obere
Ọ bụ nne nwere ụmụ anọ, ma bụrụkwa nne nne
Akwasara Edochie iko n'ụzọ mmekọahụ mgbe ọ dị obere nke mere ka ọ tụọ ime erughi eru n'oge
Edochie kwadoro Donald Trump n'oge ntuli aka onye isi ala US 2020
Nkwado ya maka Trump mere ka ọ bụrụ onye na -enweghị mmasị n'etiti ndị Naịjirịa na -asọpụrụ ya

N’afọ 2020, eboro Edochie ebubo isonye onye ụkọchukwu Naịjirịa aha ya bụ Odumeje na -eme wayo, nke asi na Edochie manyere ma ọ bụ kwụọ ndị mmadụ ụgwọ ka ha mee ka ndị ọrịa ji ma mee ka ụkọchukwu kpee ekpere ma ha wee ọgwụgwọ ha, ebe n’ezie ha anaghị arịa ọrịa
Rita Nwadike (amuru ubochi nke ato na onwa Nọvemba 1974) bu onye Naijiria bu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ n'egwuregwu bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa gbara na asọmpi Summer 2004
Na ọkwa klọb, ọ gbara maka Rivers Angels
Ọ gbara ọkpụ goolu mbụ Naịjirịa nwetara n'asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke FIFA megide Canada n'asọmpi 1995 na Sweden
Rita Orji bụ onye sayensị kọmputa Naijiria-Canada bụ onye isi oche Canada Research na Persuasive Technology na onye nduzi nke Persuasives Computing Lab na Mahadum Dalhousie
Ọrụ ya dị na mpaghara mmekọrịta mmadụ na kọmputa na-elekwasị anya n'ịmepụta usoro mmekọrịta iji nweta ebumnuche ahụike na ọdịmma
O nwetala ihe karịrị onyinye ịrị asaa na nkwanye ugwu site na ụlọ ọrụ mba na nke mba ụwa
Ọ gwara otu kọmitii United Nations okwu banyere ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Canada
Orji tolitere na Enugu Steeti Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye Igbo site n'agbụrụ
Ọ bụ nne na nna ya, Maria na Okonkwo Orji, bụ ndị na-agaghị akwụkwọ, zụlitere ya n'obodo dịpụrụ adịpụ a na-akpọ Owelli na-enweghị ọkụ eletrik na mmiri na-ebute paịpụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụnne itoolu na nne na nna ya kwadoro ezinụlọ ahụ site na ọrụ ugbo
Orji enweghị ike ịnweta kọmputa mgbe ọ na-etolite, a nabatara ya ka ọ mụọ Computer Science na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe n'ejighị kọmputa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'elu klas ya na First Class Honours
N'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ banyere n'òtù Naijiria maka International Mathematical Olympiad
N'afọ 2002, ọ malitere 'Education for Women and the Less Privileged in Nigeria', otu na-enweghị uru nke na-enye ntụziaka na agụmakwụkwọ maka ụmụ nwanyị na agụmakọta
Orji sonyeere mmemme masta na Middle East Technical University, ebe ọ bụ naanị nwa akwụkwọ Afrịka nọ na klas
Ọ gụsịrị nzere masta ya na afọ 2009 wee kwaga Canada dị ka nwa akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
N'afọ 2012, Orji gosipụtara na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Canada, ebe o kwuru maka ịkwalite ahụike na mgbochi ọrịa
E nyere ya Vanier scholarship site na Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council
Orji nwetara PhD ya na Mahadum Saskatchewan n'afọ 2014
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ si n'obodo ya nke mmadụ 50,000 nwetara okwa PhD
Ọ sonyere Mahadum McGill dị ka onye postdoctoral fellow, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ntinye aka teknụzụ nke nwere ike ime ka mgbanwe omume
Orji sonyeere Games Institute na Mahadum Waterloo dị ka Banting Fellow na afọ 2016
O nwere mmasị na teknụzụ na-eme ka mmadụ kwenye na otu esi emepụta teknụzụ nke nwere ike ịkwalite ahụike na ahụike na teknụgbọ na teknụsa maka ịkwalite ngwaahịa mmekọrịta na ọha na eze
Orji sonyeere Faculty of Computer Science na Mahadum Dalhousie dị ka osote prọfesọ na afọ 2017
Ọ na-emepụta usoro mmekọrịta na teknụzụ na-eme ka mmadụ kwenye, ọkachasị iji baara ndị na-enweghị ọrụ uru
Ọ mụọla otú omenala na afọ si emetụta ịdị irè nke teknụzụ na-eme ka mmadụ kwenye

Ọ nyochara otú ụgwọ ọrụ, asọmpi, ntụnyere mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na mmụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ụba si dị iche n'etiti ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị na ọdịbendị mkpokọta na nke onye ọ bụla, na-achọpụta na na ọdịbendụ mkpokọta, ụmụ nwoke nwere ike ịnata ụgwọ ọrụ na asọmupi
Orji bụ onye nnọchi anya sayensị, teknụzụ, injinia, na mgbakọ na mwepụ (STEM), na-arụ ọrụ maka itinye aka nke ụmụ nwanyị na ndị ka nta na kọmpụta, gụnyere iji onwe ya dị ka ihe atụ bara uru
Ọ na-enwe mmasị n'ịkwalite ndị ntorobịa na ohere ụmụ nwanyị nwere agụmakwụkwọ
HEr VOLUTION kwanyeere ya ugwu dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị sayensị 150 kachasị elu na Canada
Ọ gara Kọmitii UN na Ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị na New York City
O kwuru okwu na afọ 2018 na emume United Nations Commission on the Status of Women (CSW62) Panel Ọ dị n'aka m

Rita Paulsen, onye amụrụ n’abali iri abuo na isii na onwa Febụwarị na afo 1977 na obodo Karagwe, nke di na mpaghara Kagera, bụ onye ihe nkiri onyonyo obodo Tanzania, onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka, onye ọchụnta ego na Onye nchoputa na onye guzobere na isi ọrụ nke Mmeputa benchmark ,ụlọ ọrụ na-akwadebe ma na-akwado ihe ngosi onyonyo nke ndi obodo Tanzania a na akpo Bongo Star Search
A mụrụ Rita Paulsen na distrikti karagwe na mpaghara Kagera n’abali iri abuo na isii na onwa Febụwarị na afo 1977
Nna ya bụ onye Jemani nke nwụrụ mgbe ọ ka dị obere
Na mbụ ọ chọrọ ịghọ onye ọka iwu, mana n'ihi afọ ime n'oge ọ ka dị obere mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, nke a emezughị
Mgbe oge ahụ gasịrị, ọ nwetara nkewa n'etiti obodo ya
Mgbe o mechara nweta ọganihu ya ma pụta dị ka onye ama ama, o bu n'obi iji ahụmịhe ya gbaa ụmụ agbọghọ na-eche otu ọnọdụ nke ime ime n'oge ume ka ha ghara ịda mbà

Paulsen bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta Ihe onyonyo Ulo oru a na akpo mmeputa benchmarkỤlọ ọrụ ahụ na-emepụta ihe ngosi onyonyo Ochucho kpakpando bongo, nke Paulsen bụ onye isi ikpe
Paulsen, mgbe ọ na-amalite ihe ngosi ahụ, sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ihe ngosi Arusi amerika
Dị ka ọ dị na mbụ nke Amerika, ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke ihe ngosi ahụ bụ ịchọta ma kwalite nkà ịbụ abụ, ọkachasị ndị na-eto eto
Isiokwu nke ochucho kpakpando bongo bụ inyere ndị Tanzania na-eto eto nwere nkà egwu aka inwe nkà ịbụ abụ kwesịrị ekwesị site na asọmpi ịbụ abụ
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe ngosi onyonyo nkeji iri anọ na ise nke aha ya bụ ihe ngosi Rita Paulsen
Ihe ngosi ahụ nwere akụkụ atọ, aha ya bụ 'ịgbanwe ndụ', 'akụkụ ndị ama ama' na 'emefefe'

Rita Sinon (1943-8 Mee 1989) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Seychelles a mụrụ na Kenya nke ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ Minista nke Seychelles mgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ihe ndị dị n'ime obodo n'ụbọchị 19 Septemba 1986
Di ya Guy Sinon na nwa ya nwoke Peter Sinon rụkwara ọrụ na Cabinet nke Seychelles
Sinon bụ ezigbo onye nzuzo nke France-Albert René, ma soro Sylvette Frichot rụọ ọrụ n'oge afọ ndị mbụ nke mba ahụ
Ritah Namayanja Kivumbi (amụrụ na Mee 1, 1980) nke a makwaara dị ka Ritah Wise, bụ nwanyị kpụrụ ịsị, onye na-ese ihe nkiri na ọkà okwu na-akpali akpali
Ọ bụ onye guzobere, na onye nduzi nka nke Magezi Arts Exhibition Centre nke dị ugbu a na Namirembe Guest House na Kampala
N'afọ 2016, Onye isi ala Museveni nyere Namayanja ihe nrite ọla edo nke onye isi ala na-asọpụrụ mbọ ọ na-agba iji nye ndị ntorobịa na ụmụ nwanyị ike
Namayanja gara Uganda Martyrs Senior School Namugongo (O-level) na Uganda Martyrs High School, Rubaga (A-level)
Ọ sonyeere Mahadum Makerere ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ we nweta nzere bachelọ na Development Studies ma mesịa nweta nzere masta na Ethics and Public Management
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2008, Namayanja nwere isi ọwụwa siri ike ugboro ugboro ma bụrụ onye kpuru ìsì otu ọnwa ka e mesịrị, nke mere ka ọ daa n'ịda mbà n'obi na ọmịiko onwe ruo afọ asaa
Tupu Namayanja ekpuo ìsì, ọ bụ onye nchịkwa nke Makerere University Art Gallery ma bụrụ onye haziri Magezi Art Exhibition na Septemba 2008
N'afọ 2008, obere oge tupu Namayinja ekpuo ìsì, o guzobere Magezi Arts Gallery, mana ọ dara n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị n'ihi na ọ dara n'ịda mbà n'obi na ọmịiko onwe mgbe ọ kpuru ìsì
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2015, ọ maliteghachiri ụlọ ngosi nka Magezi, nke na-arụ ọrụ nka dị iche iche ma na-azụkwa ụmụ akwụkwọ si n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche
N'afọ 2016, n'ụbọchị ụmụ nwanyị, Onye isi ala Museveni nyere Namayanja ihe nrite ọla edo nke onye isi ala Museveni na-asọpụrụ mbọ ọ na-agba iji nye ndị ntorobịa na ụmụ nwanyị ike
Peter Ritchie Calder, Baron Ritchie-Calder, CBE (1906 na 1982) bụ onye edemede Scottish nke ọha, onye nta akụkọ na agụmakwụkwọ
A mụrụ Peter Ritchie Calder na 1 Julaị n'afọ 1906 na Forfar, Angus, Scotland

Calder rụrụ ọrụ mbụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ na Dundee na Glasgow, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama dị ka onye na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na onye na-ahụ maka udo; dị ka onye nchịkọta sayensị nke News Chronicle, o dere n'okpuru aha 'Ritchie Calder'
Mgbe ọ kwagara London tupu Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ nabatara nhọpụta dị ka onye nduzi nke atụmatụ na mkpọsa na ngalaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Gọọmentị, nke na-ahụ maka mbọ mgbasa ozi agha
O dere akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi na akwụkwọ nta na okwu maka ndị isi jikọrọ aka
Ọ bụ onye otu Kọmitii nke afọ 1941, otu ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwere nnwere onwe, ndị edemede na ndị ọzọ nwere mmetụta na United Kingdom
N'afọ 1941, ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama n'akwụkwọ ya bụ Carry on London, nke kọwara mmetụta nke bọmbụ ndị Germany na London, Coventry na obodo ndị ọzọ dị na Great Britain
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, Calder laghachiri n'ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka onye edemede ma bụrụ ọkachamara na mba ụwa, usoro udo na nghọta ọha na eze banyere sayensị
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na United Nations ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke National Peace Council na nke Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ News Chronicle dị ka onye nchịkọta sayensị
A mara ọkwa mbụ nke Sir Lawrence Bragg banyere nchọpụta nke usoro DNA na nzukọ Solvay na protein na Belgium n'ụbọchị 8 Eprel n'afọ 1953 mana ndị nta akụkọ UK kọrọ ya

O wee kwuo okwu na Guy's Hospital Medical School na London n'ụbọchị Tọọzde 14 Mee n'afọ 1953, nke dugara na edemede Ritchie Calder na News Chronicle na Fraịde 15 Mee n'afọ 1953, nke akpọrọ 'Gịnị mere ị ji bụrụ gị
Ihe Nzuzo nke Ndụ'
Calder bụ onye na-ahụ maka udo na onye na-akwado mmadụ
N'afọ 1955, Calder dekọrọ ma wepụta otu abọm na Folkways Records nke akpọrọ, Science in Our Lives

N'afọ 1980 ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị bịanyere aka na A Secular Humanist Declaration, nkwupụta nke nkwenye na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, nke Council for Democratic and Secular Humanism ('CODESH'), nke ugbu a bụ Council for Secular Humanisme ('CSH')
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị bịanyere aka na Humanist Manifesto
Ọ kụzikwaara mmekọrịta mba ụwa na Mahadum Edinburgh, site n'afọ 1961 ruo 1967
E kere ya dị ka onye ọgbọ ndụ dị ka Baron Ritchie-Calder, nke Balmashanner na Royal Burgh nke Forfar n'ụbọchị 5 Julaị n'afọ 1966, ma nata onyinye Kalinga nke afọ 1960

Lord Ritchie-Calder na nwunye ya Mabel Jane Forbes McKail mụrụ ụmụ ise onye edemede sayensị Nigel Calder (1931-2014); onye edemede na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Angus Calder (1942-2008); onye mgbakọ na mwepụ Allan Calder; onye nkuzi Isla Calder (1946-2000) na onye nkuzi Fiona Rudd (née Calder)
Ọ bụkwa nna nna nke onye na-ede akwụkwọ njem Simon Calder na onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede na onye na'eme ihe ọchị Gowan Calder
Calder nwụrụ na 31 Jenụwarị afọ 1982, na Edinburgh, Scotland

Hamblin (amụrụ n'afọ 1969) bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na South Africa, na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa na foto na eserese na akwụkwọ
Ọrụ ahụ na-ekwu maka esemokwu gbasara okike na mmekọahụ nke ọnọdụ mmadụ nke oge a
InterseXion, ihe ngosi dị iche iche na mmekọrịta afọ asaa na Sistaaz Hood, otu ndị ọrụ mmekọahụ transgender nke South Africa, mere na Iziko South African National Gallery na 2017
E bipụtara akụkọ ndụ ya na June afọ 2021
A mụrụ Robert A
Hamblin na Hillbrow, Johannesburg n'afọ 1969, ma nye ya otú nwanyị mgbe a mụrụ ya
Enweghị ahụ iru ala na nwoke na nwanyị jupụtara n'ọrụ nka ya dị mma site na nwata wee bụrụ isiokwu dị mkpa site n'oge ọ gbanwere site na nwanyị gaa na nwoke n'afọ iri atọ ya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Alberton, Gauteng Province (Johannesburg region) na 1986, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-enyere aka na onye na-ese foto maka afọ abụọ ikpeazụ nke agụmakwụkwọ ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto azụmahịa na ọrụ ihe nkiri
Ihe ndị a na-emetụta ka ụdị ọrụ nke ọrụ nka ya mara mma, ma gosipụta n'ụzọ doro anya na ọrụ mbụ ya gosipụtara n'ihu ọha, Millennium Man na 1998
A na-eji ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na setịpụ ihe iji gosipụta akụkọ ebe a na-enyocha njirimara nwoke na nwanyị wee ghọọ akụkọ ebe Hamblin nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ n'ime afọ iri abụọ sochirinụ
N'afọ 2006, n'etiti afọ iri atọ ya, Hamblin malitere mgbanwe nwoke na nwanyị site na nwanyị gaa na nwoke

N'ikpeazụ, n'afọ 2007, o nyere aka wee tọọ ntọala otu Afrịka Gender DynamiX, otu na-ahụ maka ikike nke ndị trans, na-ejide ọkwa nke osote onye nduzi na-ahụ anya maka Advocacy na mgbasa ozi njikọ site na 2009 - 2011
Taa ọ na-aga n'ihu na ọrụ nka ya na ime ihe nke dugara na ntọhapụ nke akụkọ ndụ ya na June 2021
N'oge mkpọchi mbụ nke ọrịa COVID-19, Hamblin malitere ise foto onwe onye nke egosiri na Cape Town na Johannesburg
Hamblin bụ onye na-ese foto site na nwata
Ọ zụrụ igwefoto mbụ ya na ngwá ọrụ ọchịchịrị site na ise foto ndị na-eme egwuregwu nwoke n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ma resị ndị na-akwado ha na-eto eto foto ndị ahụ
Ọ malitere ọrụ azụmahịa ya dị ka onye na-ese foto na akwụkwọ akụkọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ South Africa Beeld, Die Transvaler na Rapport site n'afọ 1987 ruo 1991
Na mbido afọ iri abụọ ya, ọ malitere ọrụ onwe ya dị ka onye na-ese foto na ihe nkiri, telivishọn na mgbasa ozi nchịkọta akụkọ ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ site na 1991 na 2009
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ mepụtara ọtụtụ ọrụ nka dị mma nke ọrụ foto nke egosiri na mba ụwa na n'ụlọ ngosi nka na ememe nka nke South Africa
Millennium Man bụ ihe ngosi ihu ọha mbụ ya n'emume nka, nke na-eleba anya nke ọma na ụmụ nwoke na echiche nke nwoke n'ime ụwa na-arịwanye elu

Afọ iri abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọrụ foto ikpeazụ ya, interseXion, bụ mmekorita ya na ndị ọrụ mmekọahụ transgender ojii nke were afọ asaa iji mepụta, na-agwụcha na ngosi onwe ya na Iziko South African National Gallery na Cape Town
Ihe ngosi ọhụrụ ya bụ
Hamblin enweghị ọzụzụ nka ma ọ bụ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu ma e wezụga afọ iri abụọ nke ntụziaka na 1953 Académie Ranson abstract painter Nel Erasmus
Ọrụ nka ya na-elekwasị anya n'ihe gbasara nwoke na nwoke dị ka onye transgender ma o gosipụtara ma na South Africa ma na mba ụwa
Hamblin bipụtara akụkọ ndụ ya Robert A Queer and Crooked Memoir for the Not So Straight and Narrow na June 2021, site na NB Publishers na Melinda Ferguson Books
Ihe ngosi ọhụrụ ya bụ I Just Told the Stars Who I Am na 99 Loop Gallery

Nkà na ndụ Hamblin dị ka onye trans anọgidewo na-emeghachi omume na njirimara nwoke na nwanyị Site na 2007 ruo 2009 o nyere aka na ntọala nke otu Afrịka Gender DynamiX na-ejide ọkwa nke osote onye nduzi na-ahụ maka ikwuru mmadụ ọnụ ya na mgbasa ozi njikọ site na 2009 ruo 2011
Ọ bụ onye na-agbachitere, onye na-eme ihe na onye na-akwado ikike nke ndị transgender, na-eji ahụmịhe nke ya eme ka ọgụ ahụ pụta ìhè
Ọ bụrụ na ị ghọtara okike, ị ga-aghọta na nnọchiaha bụ ụzọ isi nye mmadụ ịbụ mmadụ ya
Mgbe ị akpọghari nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị, ị na-ewepụ mmadụ ha
Ịmụta ihe abụghị ihe dị mma
Ọ na-egbu mgbu, n'ihi na ị na-eduga ụzọ akwara gị
Ọ bụ maka ịrụ ọrụ maka obiọma
Mgbe ọrụ ya na Gender DynamiX gasịrị, ọ bụ onye guzobere otu nkwado maka ndị ọrụ mmekọahụ na-agbanwe nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị na otu ụlọ ọrụ na-enweghị uru na Cape Town SWEAT
N'oge a, ọ zụlitere mmasị ya na echiche okike n'ime ihe gbasara ikike ndị ọrụ mmekọahụ

Robert Abbott Sengstacke (ọnwa mee afọ 1943 - rụọ ọnwa Maachị 7, afọ 2017), nke a makwaara dị ka Bobby Sengstacke, bụ onye Afrịka-Amerị́ka na-ese foto n'oge Civil Rights Movement for the Chicago Defender na Chicago, Illinois
A maara Sengstacke nke ọma maka foto ya a ma ama nke Martin Luther King Jr
na ndị isi ndị ọzọ a ma ama na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ
Sengstacke ketara ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ezinụlọ Sengstacke
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ mgbasa ozi n'afọ 2015, Sengstacke kwagara Hammond, Indiana ebe o biri ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa iku ume n'afọ 2017 mgbe ọ dị afọ 73
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1943, Robert A
Sengstacke bụ ngwaahịa nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ezinụlọ Sengstacke na Chicago
Ọ bụ nwa John H
Sengstacke na Myrtle Sengstacke
Sengstacke biri na Chicago oge
ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya
Maka agụmakwụkwọ elementrị, Sengstacke gara Mahadum nke Chicago Lab School, Manumit School na Bristol, Pennsylvania na Howalton Day School na Chicago
Sengstacke gara Hyde Park High School (nke bụzi Hyde Park Academy High School) ma mesịa gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Central YMCA High Schoon'afọna 1962
Sengstacke weghaara azụmahịa ezinụlọ ya mgbe e mesịrị na ndụ ya
Sengstacke malitere ịrụ ọrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii na azụmaahịa akwụkwọ akụkọ ezinụlọ ya, na-arụ obere ọrụ
Sengstacke wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ na Los Angeles, California, wee malite ise foto Black sororities na fraternities
Ọ laghachiri Chicago iji sonye na idepụta Black Arts Movement na Civil Rights Movement
Sengstacke gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ maka akwụkwọ Muhammad Speaks, Chicago's Mayor Richard J
Daley, na dị ka onye na-ese foto maka Oscar Brown Jr
Productions
Ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye na-ebipụta Memphis Tri-State Defender site n'afọ 1974 ruo afọ 1989
N'oge na-adịghị anya, Sengstacke ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Sengstacke Newspaper na Chicago Defender
The Chicago Defender bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ maka ndị Afrịka Amerịka nke e guzobere n'afọ 1905
Ọ bụ Robert Sengstacke Abbott guzobere akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ
Nwa nwanne Abbott, John, bụ nna Sengstacke, ọ bụkwa onye nwe ya tupu ọ nwụọ na ngwụcha afọ iri itoolu
Robert A
Sengstacke ketara akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ mgbe nna ya nwụrụ
Sengstacke weere akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ site na akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa izu gaa na akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-ebipụta kwa ụbọchị na United States
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ bụ olu maka ndị Afrịka Americia gburugburu ebe niile
Ọ gara n'ihu na-achịkwa akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ruo afọ iri isii
Ọ zụkwara akwụkwọ akụkọ dịka, Michigan Chronicle, Tri-State Defender, na New Pittsburgh Couriers
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ịkwalite Black Culture na ịkwado ikike obodo na akwụkwọ ya
A na-echeta ya maka mmesapụ aka ya nye ndị na-ese foto na-eto eto na mkpebi ya na Ogige obodo ndị Afrịka-Amerịka
N'ime afọ niile ọ na-eduzi akwụkwọ akụkọ ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwalite onye na-agbachitere na onye na-ahụ maka ahịa, ihe omume pụrụ iche na onye na'akpata ego maka Bud Billiken Parade ma ghọọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye na - bipụta Memphis Tri-State Defender

Sengstacke bụ onye nta akụkọ foto
A maara ya nke ọma maka foto ya nke Dr
Martin Luther King Jr, Malcolm X, na Muhammad Ali
O sere Sengstacke Eye Mural na mpaghara dị na Chicago a na-akpọ Bronzeville
Ya na ndị Ojiị ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe na Wall of Respect rụkọkwara ọrụ, na-enye aka na ngalaba okpukpe nke mural ma na-edekọ ihe okike ya site na foto ya
O were nnukwu foto nke ndị Afrịka Amerịka na-eme ngagharị iwe n'oge Black Arts Movement na mmegharị ikike obodo
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ọrụ ndị a ma ama dị ka Summer in The City na Opportunity Please Knock
Akwukwo ya apụtala n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, gụnyere Ebony, Jet, Essence, Life, na Washington Post
A hụkwara ọrụ ya na TV na ụlọ ihe nkiri
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri Spike Lee gosipụtara ụfọdụ foto ya na ihe nkiri ya School Daze, Patti Labelle gosipụtara ihe ngosi ya a ma ama nke Dr
Martin Luther King Jr
na ihe nkiri TV ya Out All Night
Ọrụ ya pụtakwara n'akwụkwọ ndị dị ka The Dream Lives On Martin Luther King Jr, African American Art, na The Photography of Martin Luther King Jr

Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya ndị egosiri na e nwere ihe dịka, The Wall of Respect Vestigies, Snards na The Legacy of Black Power
Mgbidi nke nkwanye ùgwù bụ ihe dị ịrịba ama nke ihe ngosi a n'ihi na ọ kpughere foto nke ndị ama ama Afrịka-Amerịka
E gosikwara ọrụ ya na Statue of Liberty, Smithsonian Institution, na Museum of Science and Industry na Chicago

Sengstacke mechara lụọ Jacquelyn Spencer ma ha nwere ụmụ abụọ, Domenic na Jasmine Sengstacke

Robert Angus Smith FRS (ụbọchị iri na ise n'onwa Febụwarị 1817 ruo ụbọchị iri na abuo n'ọnwa Mee 1884) bụ onye na-emepụta kemịkal na Scotland, ónyé nyochara ọtụtụ nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi
A maara ya màkà nyocha ya gbasara mmetọ ikuku n'afọ 1852, n'ogè ọ chọpụtara ihe a bịara márá dị ka mmiri ozuzo acid
A na-akpọ ya mgbé ụfọdụ 'Nna nke Mmiri Acid'
A mụrụ ya na Pollokshaws, Glasgow, Smith gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Glasgow na nkwadebe màkà ozi na Chọọchị Scotland mànà ọ hapụrụ tupu ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi onwé ónyé ma, soro ezinụlọ gaa Gießen n'afọ 1839, ọ nọrọ na Germany iji mụọ kemịkalụ nke Justus von Liebig lekọtara, nweta PhD n'afọ 1841
Mgbè ọ laghachiri England n'otu afọ ahụ, ọ tụgharịrị uche na Holy Orders mana kama ọ dọtara mmasị ya na Manchester ka ọ sonye na ụlọ nyocha kemịkal nke Lyon Playfair na Royal Manchester Institution
N'ébé a, ọ banyéré na ụfọdụ n'ime nsogbu gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi nke obodo mmepụta ihe mbụ n'ụwa (lee History of Manchester)
Playfair hapụrụ màkà ébé ịta nri na 1845 ma Smith rụrụ ọrụ na-ebi ndụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka nyocha nke onwe ya
Mgbè ụfọdụ ahụmahụ ndị na-atụ egwu na mbụ gasịrị, Smith jụrụ ịrụ ọrụ akaebe ọkachamara nke bụ isi ihe nke ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na-ajụ ndị ọkà mmụta n'oge ahụ na nke ọ hụrụ dị ka nrụrụ aka
N'ihi ya, mgbè e guzobere Alkali Inspectorate site na Alkali Act 1863, iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe Smith mèrè ka ọ bụrụ ónyé na-achọ
Dị ka Queen Victoria's Inspector of Alkali Works, ọ bụ prototype nke Ónyé ọrụ gọọmentị sayensị
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ ruo mgbè ọ nwụrụ
E liri ya na ili nke St Paul's Church na Kersal Moor, Salford
N'afọ 1872, Smith bipụtara akwụkwọ Air and Rain The Beginnings of a Chemical Climatology, nke gosipụtara ọmụmụ ya banyere kemịkalụ nke mmiri ozuzo ikuku
Nnyocha ndị a gụnyere nchọpụta, n'afọ 1852, nke mmiri ozuzo acid n'obodo ndị dị N'ébé ugwu Britain, nsonaazụ nke ọkụ coal nke jupụtara na sulfur
E nyere ya ónyé otu nsọpụrụ nke Institution of Engineers and Shipbuilders na Scotland n'afọ 1884
Mgbè ọ nwụsịrị, ọbá akwụkwọ nke Owens College, Manchester nwetara ihe dị ka akwụkwọ puku anọ ya
Ha nọ ugbu a na Ọbá Akwụkwọ Mahadum John Rylands, ónyé nọchiri ọbá akwụkwọ kọleji
Smith na enyi ya William Crookes, gara nnọkọ n'ubochi irí abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Eprel 1870 na London
O zigara Crookes akwụkwọ ozi iri na ise banyéré ime mmụọ n'etiti ọnwa Eprel 1869 na 1871
Smith ahọrọghị ide ọtụtụ ihe banyéré ime mmụọ n'ihi na o kwenyere na ọ nwèrè ike imebi aha sayensị ya
Ọ bụ ónyé otu Society for Psychical Research site na 1882 ruo 1884
Mgbè ọ nwụsịrị, a chọtara akwụkwọ 89 gbasara anwansi n'ọbá akwụkwọ ya
A họpụtara Smith ka ọ bụrụ Fellow nkè Royal Society (FRS) n'afọ 1857
Robert Bain (1911-1973) bụ onye na-ese ihe nakwa prọfesọ nke nka na South Africa
A mụrụ Bain na Edinburgh, Scotland, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya na ọmụmụ nka ya
Ọ lụrụ Mary Lochiel na 1932; ha nwere otu nwa, Robert (b

N'afọ 1937, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara South Africa, ebe ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi dị elu na Port Elizabeth School of Art, ọ hapụrụ ije ozi dika onye agha na North Africa na Ịtali site n'afọ 1939 ruo 1944
N'afọ 1948, ọ gara Florence ebe ọ gara Accademia di Belle Arti Firenze, ebe ọ natara ihe nrite ọla edo nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ maka ihe ọkpụkpụ ya nke David nke oge a
Bain gara n'ihu ịbụ onye isi nke Johannesburg School of Art, ụlọ akwụkwọ nka a ma ama na South Africa, na-ejide ọkwa ahụ ruo afọ iri na ise
N'oge ọrụ ya, Bain mere ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na Johannesburg, Port Elizabeth na Cape Town ebe a na-ere ọtụtụ ọrụ ya nye ndị na-anakọta ihe; o mekwara ọtụtụ ọrụ
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya ndị bụ isi bụ
Robert Guy Bathurst (a mụrụ na 22 Febụwarị 1957) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Bekee
A mụrụ Bathurst na Gold Coast (nke bụ Ghana ugbu a) n'afọ 1957, ebe nna ya na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye ndụmọdụ nchịkwa
N'afọ 1959, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Ballybrack, Dublin, Ireland ma Bathurst gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Killiney ma mesịa debanye aha na Headfort, ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi Irish
N'afọ 1966, ezinụlọ ahụ laghachiri England ma Bathurst gafere na Worth School na Sussex, ebe ọ malitere ihe nkiri amateur
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, ọ gụrụ iwu na Pembroke College, Cambridge, wee sonye na otu Footlights
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri oge niile ma mee ihe nkiri izizi ya n'afọ 1983, na-egwu Tim Allgood na Michael Frayn's Noises Off, nke gbara otu afọ na Savoy Theatre
Iji gbasaa ihe ọmụma ya banyere ịrụ ọrụ na ogbo, ọ sonyeere National Theatre
Ọ gbakwunyere ọrụ ya n'afọ ndi 1980s na ọrụ telivishọn, na-apụta na ihe nkiri dịka ihe omume pilot nke Blackadder, Chelmsford 123, The Lenny Henry Show na ihe omume mbụ nke Red Dwarf
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ naanị ihe omume iri na atọ ka e mere (n'etiti afọ 991 na 1995), ọrụ ahụ ka bụ ọkacha mmasị Bathurst n'ọrụ ya niile

Mgbe Joking Apart kwusịrị, a họpụtara ya dịka onye ndụmọdụ nchịkwa David Marsden na ihe nkiri ITV na-atọ ọchị Cold Feet, nke zọrọ maka usoro ise site n'afọ 1998 ruo afọ 2003 na ọzọ maka usoro anọ ọzọ site nafọ 2016 ruo 2020

Ọ laghachikwara ọrụ ihe nkiri, na-egwu Vershinin na The Three Sisters (2003), Adrien na abụọ-hander Members Only (2006), ọchịchị whip Alistair na Whipping it Up (2006–07), na ọrụ aha na Alex (2007, 2008)
N'afọ ndị sochirinụ, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri telivishọn The Pillars of the Earth (2010), Downton Abbey (2010), Hattie (2011) wee sonye na ndị otu Wild at Heart n'afọ 2012
Bathurst pụtara na egwuregwu Noël Coward mbụ ya, Present Laughter n'afọ 2010 wee soro ya na ọrụ na Blithe Spirit n'otu afọ ahụ na ọzọ n'afọ 2011
Ọ lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ anọ

A mụrụ Robert Guy Bathurst na Accra, Gold Coast (Ghana nke oge a), na 22 Febụwarị 1957 nye Philip Charles Metcalfe Bathurst, onye sitere na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Charles Bathurst nakwa onye ikwu nke Earls Bathurst na Viscounts Bledisloe, na nwunye ya Gillian (née Debenham)
Nna ya bụ onye isi na Royal Engineers n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ ma na-arụ ọrụ na West Africa dịka onye ndụmọdụ nchịkwa
Nne ya bụ onye na-agwọ ọrịa
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ ọzọ, Nicholas na Charlotte
Ezinụlọ ahụ biri na Ghana ruo afọ 1959, mgbe ha kwagara Ballybrack, Dublin, Ireland
Bathurst na nwanne ya nwoke gara ụlọ akwụkwọ abụọ na Dublin - Holy Child School na Killiney na ụlọ akwụkwọ na Ballsbridge - tupu e ziga ha Headfort, ụlọ akwụkwọ nkwadebe na Kells, County Meath

O jiri oge ya na nwanne ya nwoke, bụ ndị Katọlik, nọrọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi ndị Anglịkan tụnyere Lord of the Flies; 'a tụrụ anyị mkpọrọ n'otu nnukwu ụlọ na-esi ísì ụtọ, nke Georgia, ebe a na-emeso anyị n'ụzọ obi ọjọọ'
N'afọ 1966, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara England ma ziga Bathurst ka ọ banye na Worth School na Sussex

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri na obere ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ma gụọ akwụkwọ ochie nke magazin Plays and Players, 'na-amụ atụmatụ ala nke ụlọ ihe nkiri ma na-agụ banyere ụlọ ihe nkiri ọhụrụ a na-ewu'
O bu ụzọ nwee mmasị n'ime ihe nkiri mgbe ezinụlọ ya hụrụ ihe nkiri na Gaiety Theatre na Dublin ma ọ na-ele ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-eche ihe ngosi ha na nku
Bathurst hapụrụ Worth mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ iji gụọ iwu na Pembroke College, Cambridge
Ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ya n'ebe ahụ na-eme ihe nkiri na Cambridge Footlights n'akụkụ Hugh Laurie, Rory McGrath na Emma Thompson
Site n'afọ 1977 ruo afọ 1978, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke otu ahụ, site n'afọ1978 ruo afọ 1979, ọ bụ onye isi ala
N'ime Footlights Revues nke o sonyere na ya bụ Stage Fright n'afọ 1978, nke o dekwara na Nightcap n'afọ 1979
Ọ duziri ma pụta na Footlights pantomime Aladdin dịka nwanyị di ya nwụrụ Twankey n'oge 1978-79
Ọ gara Bar Vocational Course na Mahadum nke Iwu, na London, nke nyere ya ohere ịga n'ihu ịghọ onye ọka iwu na-arụ ọrụ, mana ọ rapara na ime ihe nkiri kama

Mgbe ọ hapụrụ Cambridge, Bathurst nọrọ otu afọ na-eme njem nleta Australia na Footlights Revue Botham, The Musical, nke ọ kọwara dịka 'ụyọkọ ndị ntorobịa na-efe efe na-eme nzukọ ndị nta akụkọ na ihe ngosi mkparịta ụka'

Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ ya na Footlights masịrị ya, ọ nọgideghị na-eme ihe nkiri na otu ahụ, na-echegbu onwe ya na a ga-asa ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na ise na-enwe ihe ịga nke ọma ha site na mmalite nke ọrụ [ya]'
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ, ọ chọpụtara na a na-ewere ya dịka onye dilettante, nke mere ka ọ were ya ogologo oge karịa ka a tụrụ anya ka a nabata ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọrụ mbụ ya maka telivishọn bịara n'afọ 1982, mgbe ọ pụtara dịka Prince Henry na ihe omume pilot nke Blackadder
Ọ pụtaworị na vidiyo ọzụzụ nke onye nduzi Geoff Posner ma nweta ọrụ nke Henry site na ekele
E megharịrị agwa ahụ ma belata ya mgbe e nyere usoro ahụ ọrụ dịka The Black Adder
Bathurst bụ onye ọkachamara n'afọ sochirinụ mgbe ọ sonyeere ndị nke abụọ nke Michael Frayn's Noises Off na Savoy Theatre
Ọ nọchiri Roger Lloyd-Pack dịka Tim Allgood ma nọrọ na Savoy otu afọ
Mgbe ọ jụrụ onyinye ịbụ onye na-egosi That's Life! ọ sonyeere National Theatre n'afọ 1984, ebe ọ pụtara dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Saint Joan
Ọ na-ele ya anya dịka 'ọrụ kachasị daa mbà' ọ nwetụrụla mana o nwere ekele maka ahụmịhe ihe nkiri o nyere ya
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ pụtara na The Man in the Moon, ụlọ ihe nkiri pub na Chelsea, na Judgement, okwu awa abụọ banyere iri mmadụ
Ndị na-ege ntị n'abalị mmeghe bụ mmadụ atọ mana mgbe ha nyochachara nke ọma na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi mba, ndị na-ege ntị toro ruo nkezi iri na ise
Bathurst zutere onye na-ese ihe bụ Victoria Threlfall site n'aka ndị enyi ha wee lụọ n'afọ 1985
Ha mụtara ụmụ nwanyị anọ Matilda, Clemency, Oriel na HonorỌ na-akwado Brighton na Hove Albion FC
Robert Berold (amụrụ n'afọ 1948) bụ onye na-ede abụ, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye edemede South Africa
A mụrụ Berold na Johannesburg, mana ọ bi na Eastern Cape ugbu a
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Hilton College mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, wee gaa n'ihu na-amụ kemicals injinirin na mmụta agụmagụ bekee na Mahadum Witwatersrand, ma mesịa na Mahadim Cambridge
Berold rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na onye na-eme ihe na NGO dị iche iche n'ime afọ 1970 na 1980, nke gụnyere ọkwa nkuzi na Morris Isaacson High School n'oge nnupụisi Soweto n'afọ 1976

Ọ bụ onye dere akwụkwọ anọ nke abụ The Door to the River (Bateleur Press, 1984), The Fires of the Dead (Carrefour, 1989), Rain Across a Paper Field (Gecko Poetry, 1999) na All the Days (Deep South, 2008) na ọrụ ya apụtala n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ South Africa
Onye edemede nke South Afrika bụ Denis Hirson dere banyere ọrụ ya

Otu n'ime ndị na-ede abụ kachasị emetụta na South Africa , Berold rụrụ ọrụ site n'afọ 1989 na 1999 dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke New Coin, akwụkwọ akụkọ uri nke bipụtara ọtụtụ n'ime uri ndị e dere na South Africa na 1990

E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ na 2002 dị ka' It All Begins poems from post-liberation South Africa', ma soro ya n'afọ 2003 site na nchịkọta nke ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ndị na-ede abụ akpọrọ South African Poets on Poetry
Berold kụziri Bekee na Mahadum Zhejiang, People's Republic of China, site n'afọ 2005 ruo 2006
Ọ gara n'ihu na-ahazi nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe dị iche iche na ụlọ akwụkwọ niile gbasara Bekee n'oge a
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ncheta ya banyere ahụmịhe ya, Meanwhile Don't Push and Squeeze, n'afọ 2007 nke(Jacana Media)
Berold na-ebi ndụ ya ugbu a dị ka onye edemede na onye nchịkọta akụkọ, ọ bụkwa onye nchịkọta nke MA na edemede okike na Mahadum Rhodes
Ọ na-elekọta obere ụlọ obibi akwụkwọ uri Deep South, ya na nwunye ya Mindy Stanford bi n'ugbo dị nso na gburugburu Grahamstown, South Africa
Robert Bilott (amụrụ n'August 2, 1965) bụ onye ọka iwu gburugburu ebe obibi nke America si Cincinnati, Ohio
A maara Bilott maka ikpe ikpe megide DuPont n'aha ndị gbara akwụkwọ merụrụ ahụ site n'ihe mkpofu juru n'ime ime obodo na West Virginia
Bilott ejirila ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ na-agba akwụkwọ maka mkpofu kemịkalụ perfluorooctanoic acid (PFOA) na perfluorooctanesulfonic acid (PFOS)
Okwu ikpe Bilott bụ ntọala maka ihe ndekọ aha ya bụ Exposure Water Poisoned, Cororate Graed, and One Lawyer's Twenty-Year Battle Against DuPont

Ọ bịara na-abawanye nlebara anya mgbasa ozi na njedebe 2010 wee pụta ìhè karịa site na ihe nkiri 2019 Ọchịchịrị Ọchịchị (ihe nkiri 2019) na akwụkwọ akụkọ 2018 Ekwensu Anyị Maara nke dekọtara agha iwu ya na Dupont
Nlebara anya ọhaneze a butere ọtụtụ ihe nrite, gụnyere onyinye mba ụwa Right Livelihood Award
A mụrụ Bilott na August 2, 1965, na Albany, New York
Nna Bilot jere ozi na United States Air Force, na Bilot nọrọ oge ọ bụ nwata na ọtụtụ ọdụ ụgbọ elu
N'ihi na ezinụlọ na-akwaga ugboro ugboro, Bilott gara ụlọ akwụkwọ asatọ dị iche iche tupu ya agụchaa akwụkwọ na Fairborn High School na Fairborn, Ohio
O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Arts na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọmụmụ obodo site na New College of Florida
O nwetara Juris Dọkịta na Mahadum Ohio State Moritz College of Law na 1990

A nabatara Bilott n'ụlọikpe n'afọ 1990 wee malite ọrụ iwu ya na Taft Stettinius & Hollister LLP na Cincinnati, Ohio Ruo afọ asatọ ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka ndị ahịa nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na nka ya na-agbachitere ụlọ ọrụ kemịkal
Ọ ghọrọ onye mmekọ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1998
Bilott nọchitere anya Wilbur Tennant nke Parkersburg, West Virginia nke ehi ya na-anwụ
Ugbo ahụ dị n'okpuru mmiri site na ebe a na-ekpofu ahịhịa ebe DuPont na-atụfu ọtụtụ narị tọn perfluorooctanoic acid
N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1999, Bilott tinyere akwụkwọ megide DuPont na United States District Court maka Southern District nke West Virginia

Na nzaghachi, DuPont dụrụ ọdụ na DuPont na United States Environmental Protection Agency ga-enye iwu nyocha nke ihe onwunwe onye ọrụ ugbo ahụ, nke ndị dọkịta anụmanụ atọ DuPont họọrọ na atọ ndị Environmental Protection Institute họọrọ
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ akụkọ ahụ, ọ boro ndị Tennants ụta maka ehi na-anwụ anwụ na-azọrọ na ọ bụ ọrụ ugbo na-adịghị mma kpatara ya 'ihe na-edozi ahụ, nlekọta anụmanụ ezughi oke na enweghị njikwa nnụnụ'

Mgbe Bilott chọpụtara na ọtụtụ puku tọn nke PFOA DuPont tụbara n'ebe a na-ekpofu ahịhịa dị n'akụkụ ala Tennants nakwa na PFOA nke DuPont na-emetọ mmiri ndị gbara obodo ahụ gburugburu, DuPont doziri ikpe Tennants

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2001, Bilott gbara akwụkwọ megide DuPont n'aha ihe dị ka mmadụ pụkụ ịrị asaa nọ na West Virginia na Ohio nwere mmiri ọṅụṅụ PFOA metọrọ nke e doziri na Septemba afọ 2004, yana uru klas ruru ihe karịrị nde dọla narị atọ, gụnyere DuPont kwetara ịwụnye ụlọ ọrụ nzacha na mpaghara mmiri isii metụtara na ọtụtụ olulu mmiri onwe onye metụtara, onyinye ego nde dọla ịrị asaa, na ndokwa maka nlekota ahụike nke DuPont ga-akwụ ụgwọ ruo nde dọla narị abụọ na ịrị atọ na ise ma ọ bụrụ na njikọ sayensị nwere onwe ya n'etiti ọrịa PFO

Mgbe kọmitii sayensị nwere onwe ya nke ndị otu ahụ họọrọ (ma achọrọ n'okpuru nkwekọrịta ahụ ka DuPont kwụọ ụgwọ) chọpụtara na enwere njikọ dị n'etiti ịṅụ PFOA na ọrịa kansa akụrụ, ọrịa testicular, ọrịa thyroid, cholesterol dị elu, pre-eclampsia, na ulcerative colitis, Bilott malitere imeghe ikpe maka mmerụ ahụ onwe onye megide DuPont n'aha ndị ọrụ mmiri Ohio na West Virginia metụtara, nke site na 2015 ruru ihe karịrị pụkụ atọ na narị ịse
Mgbe ọ tụfuru atọ mbụ maka $ 197 nde, na 2017 DuPont kwetara idozi ihe ndị fọdụrụ n'ime ikpe ndị na-echere mgbe ahụ maka $ 6717 nde

Ọtụtụ ikpe ndị ọzọ e tinyere mgbe nkwekọrịta 2017 gasịrị ka e doziri na 2021 maka nde $ 83 ọzọ (nke a mara ọkwa na nkwekọrịta ijeri $ 4 n'etiti DuPont na spin-off ya, Chemours, maka ụgwọ PFAS), na-eweta ngụkọta ọnụ ahịa nkwekọrịta na ikpe mmerụ ahụ onwe onye maka ndị kpughere PFOA na mmiri ọṅụṅụ ha karịa nde $ 753

N'afọ 2018, Bilott tinyere akwụkwọ ikpe ọhụrụ na-achọ ọmụmụ ihe ọhụrụ na nnwale nke nnukwu ìgwè nke kemịkal PFAS n'aha otu klas mba niile nke onye ọ bụla nọ na United States nwere kemịkalị PFAS n'ọbara ha, megide ọtụtụ ndị na-emepụta PFAS, gụnyere 3M, DuPont, na Chemours
Ikpe ọhụrụ a na-aga n'ihu site na Mee 2020[update]
N'ọnwa Machị 2022, ụlọ ikpe gọọmentị etiti na-ahụ maka ikpe ahụ kwadoro ikpe ahụ ka ọ gaa n'ihu dị ka ihe omume klas maka ọtụtụ nde mmadụ nwere PFAS n'ọbara ha
N'afọ 2016, akụkọ Bilott bụ ihe a na-elekwasị anya n'akụkọ mkpuchi nke Nathaniel Rich gosipụtara na New York Times Magazine, nke akpọrọ, 'The Lawyer Who Became DuPont's Worst Nightmare'
E mechara bipụta akụkọ Rich n'akwụkwọ ya, Second Nature (2021)
E gosipụtakwara ọrụ Bilott n'isiokwu dị ukwuu na The Huffington Post ('Welcome to Beautiful Parkersburg') na The Intercept (ọtụtụ akụkụ The Teflon Toxin series)

Robert Bilott bụ onye dere akwụkwọ ncheta a ma ama Exposure Poisoned Water, Corporate Greed, and One Lawyer's Twenty-Year Battle Against DuPont, nke mbụ Atria Books bipụtara n'asụsụ Bekee na 2019, ma mesịa sụgharịa ya n'asụsụ Chinese (2022) na Japanese (2023)
Jeremy Bobb na-akọ akụkọ akwụkwọ ọdịyo ahụ na isi nke mbụ nke Mark Ruffalo kọrọ
Smith; bụ isiokwu 'Toxic Waters' nke ihe ngosi ọtụtụ akụkụ, Parched, nke gosipụtara na ọwa National Geographic TV na 2017
Ọ bụkwa isiokwu maka abụ na vidiyo 'Deep in the Water' nke The Gary Douglas Band, na abụ 'Blank' / 'Worker' nke emo revival band The World Is a Beautiful Place & I Am No Longer Afraid to Die
Ọ pụtakwara na Devil Put The Coal In The Ground, ihe ngosi 2022 banyere nhụjuanya na mbibi nke ụlọ ọrụ coal na ọdịda ya kpatara
Bilott dekwara okwu mbido nke akwụkwọ Forever Chemicals Environmental, Economic, and Social Equity Concerns with PFAS in the Environment, nke CRC Press bipụtara na 2021
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri e wepụtara na 2023 nke akpọrọ, Burned Protecting the Protectors, nke na-elekwasị anya na ngosipụta PFAS n'etiti ndị ọrụ mgbanyụ ọkụ

N'afọ 2017, Bilott nwetara onyinye nrite nri nri mba ụwa, nke a makwaara dị ka 'Nrite Nobel Nhọrọ,' maka ọtụtụ iri afọ ọrụ ya na nsogbu mmetọ kemịkalụ PFAS, ma gosipụta ya na stampụ enyere na Austria, na-echeta onyinye ahụ

N'afọ 2020, Bilott so na mgbasa ozi 'Fight Forever Chemicals' na mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi nke bụ onye mmeri na ntụrụndụ na onye ikpeazụ na Global Campaign, Media Partnership maka mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta Shorty Awards
'Fight Forever Chemicals' nwetakwara ihe nrite ọla edo na gburugburu ebe obibi nakwa nchebe
Bilott na-eje ozi na bọọdụ ndị nduzi maka Less Cancer, bọọdụ ndị nlekọta maka Green Umbrella, ma rụọ ọrụ na bọọdụ alumni maka New College of Florida site na 2018-2021
N'afọ 2021, Bilott natara nzere Doctor of Laws Degree site na New College of Florida na nzere Doctor of Science Degree site n'usoro mmụta sayensị gburugburu ebe obibi nke Mahadum Ohio State

Ọ bụkwa onye otu na Right Livelihood College, Prọfesọ Honorary na National University of Cordoba na Argentina, na onye nkuzi na Yale School of Public Health, Department of Environmental Health Sciences
N'afọ 1996, Bilott lụrụ Sarah Barlage
Ha nwere ụmụ atọ, Teddy, Charlie na Tony
Robert Butler (September 25, 1943 March 19, 2014) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nke a maara nke ọma màkà ihe osise ya nke ọhịa na azụ mmiri gbụrụ-gbúrụ Florida's Everglades
Ọ bụ ónyé otu ndị omenkà Africa-America a ma ama, The Highwaymen
A mụrụ Butler na obéré ọbọdọ osisi na ọrụ ugbo nke Baxley, Georgia, na Septemba 25, 1943
N'ịbụ ónyé nne ya, Annie Talifer Butler, zụlitere, ónyé na-ewe ógè mgbè niile iji kụnye ụkpụrụ nke okwukwe na ọmịiko n'ezinụlọ ya, Butler na-ewere ọzụzụ ya dị ka 'nke America'
N'afọ 1947, Butler kwagara Okeechobee, Florida, ébé o mechara mara osisi na mmiri nkè Florida Everglades, ọkachasị Lake Okeechobe, nke pụtara ìhè na ihe osise ya
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ Robert Butler na ihe osise ya bụ ichekwa ọdịdị gbara ya gbụrụ-gbúrụ nke dị mfe ịnweta n'ihi ọnọdụ ya
Ihe kpaliri ihe dị n'ihe osise ya sitere na ọdịdị ala dị iche iche
Ọrụ ọkachamara ya malitere n'afọ 1968
N'oge mbụ, ọ na-erekarị ihe osise ya site n'ọnụ ụzọ ruo n'ọnụ ụlọ ma ọ bụ n'akụkụ ụzọ
E nyèrè okwu 'Highwayman' nke Butler nyèrè aka mepụta màkà ụdị onye na-ese ihe ya n'ihi usoro ha si emepụta ihe osise wee gaa n'okporo ụzọ awara awara nke Florida iji ree ihe osise ahụ maka ndụ
Ọ nụchara nkà ya site n'ịmepụta ihe karịrị otu narị kwa afọ
[citation needed] N'agbanyeghị enweghị ọzụzụ, Robert mepụtara ụdị nke ya, nke gosipụtara site na ihe ngosi dị egwu nke ala
Ónyé so n'ezinụlọ eze nke Etiopia, ya bụ Prince Ermias Sahle Selassie, kpọrọ Butler Knight
E mepụtara Imperial Order of the Star of Honor of the Ethiopian Empire, iwu nke e webatara Butler, iji sọpụrụ ma ndị ọbọdọ ma ndị mba ọzọ nyèrè ọrụ nlereanya nye Alaeze Ukwu Etiopia
N'oge ọ dị afọ 40 Butler chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa shuga; ọrịa nke mesịrị mee ka ọ nwụọ mgbè ọ bi n'ụlọ ndị agadi na Lakeland, Florida
Butler nwụrụ na Machị 19, 2014 mgbè ọ dị afọ 70
Sir Robert Clarkson Tredgold, KCMG (2 June 1899 – 8 April 1977), bụ onye ọka iwu Rhodesian, onye ọka ikpe na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A mụrụ ya na Bulawayo nye Clarkson Henry Tredgold, Attorney-General nke Southern Rhodesia, na Emily Ruth (née Moffat), ọ bụkwa nwa nwa nke onye ozi ala ọzọ John Moffat
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Prince Edward School na South African College Schools na Cape Town, South Africa
Ọ bụ Rhodes Scholar ma gụọ gbasara iwu na Hertford College
N'afọ 1923, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa bụrụ ọkàiwu na Inner Temple wee laghachi Rhodesia ka ọ rụọ ọrụ iwu
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 1934, a họpụtara Tredgold ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Southern Rhodesian Legislative Assembly nke Insiza maka United Rhodesia Party nke Godfrey Huggins

Ọ bilitere ngwa ngwa, bụrụ Minista nke Ikpe Ziri Ezi na Nchebe na 1936, Minista nke ikpe ziri ezi, Nchebe (1940-1943), Minista nke Mmanụ na Ọrụ Ọha (1938), na Minista nke ihe gbasara ụmụ amaala (1942-1943)
Tredgold gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọfịs ya na oche nzukọ ndị omeiwu na 1943, iji were nhọpụta dị ka onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Southern Rhodesia
N'afọ 1950, mgbe Chief Justice Sir Robert Hudson lara ezumike nká, a họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchie ya dị ka onye isi ikpe nke ụlọ ikpe
Ọ jere ozi ruo 1955, n'ọnọdụ a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Gọvanọ na-anọchite anya Southern Rhodesia site na 21 Nọvemba 1953 ruo 26 Nọvember 1954
N'afọ 1953, Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, Johannesburg, nyere Tredgold nzere nsọpụrụ nke Doctor of Laws (Hon LLD)
A họpụtara Tredgold ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ikpe mbụ nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Federation of Rhodesia and Nyasaland na 1955

N'ọrụ a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Gọvanọ na-anọchite anya mpaghara Southern Rhodesia site na 21 Nọvemba 1953 ruo 26 Nọvember 1954, nakwa dị ka Gọvanọ na-anọchi anya Federation of Rhodesia and Nyasaland site na 24 Jenụwarị 1957 ruo Febụwarị 1957

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1960, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm iji mee mkpesa site n'ọnọdụ ya nke Central African Federation, na-akatọ omume ndị Sir Edgar Whitehead nyere ikike iji gbochie mmegide ndị isi ojii na-emegide Federation na Nyasaland na Northern Rhodesia, site na iwebata Iwu njikwa
Tredgold kwuru na iwu ahụ 'na-emebi ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ikike mmadụ ọ bụla ma bụrụ, na mgbakwunye, mwakpo na-enweghị isi site n'aka ndị isi nke ụlọ ikpe
Ndị a bụ ndị na-elekọta ikike mmadụ n'otu n'otu ma bụrụ ọrụ m pụrụ iche
A họpụtara Sir Robert Tredgold dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nzuzo n'afọ 1957
Ọ lara ezumike nká na Marandellas ya na nwunye ya nke abụọ, Lady Margaret Tredgold
O bipụtara akwụkwọ The Rhodesia That Was My Life n'afọ 1968
Mgbe nwunye ya nwụrụ na 1974, Tredgold lụrụ nwunye ya nke abụọ, Mrs
Margaret Helen Phear (née Baines; 1910-2012), nwanyị di ya nwụrụ na nne nke ụmụ atọ, sitere na Aliwal North, South Africa
Di na nwunye ahụ jikọrọ aka nyochaa akụkọ ọdịnala nke Rhodesia (nke bụbu Southern Rhodesia) ma bipụta akwụkwọ ụmụaka dabere na ha
Ha mekwara nnyocha banyere osisi ndị a na-eri eri, nke ruru na Food Plants of Zimbabwe, nke ọ dechara mgbe ọ nwụsịrị ma bipụta ya na 1986
Onye Roman Katọlik na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, Lady Tredgold nwụrụ na 2012 mgbe ọ dị afọ otu narị na abụọ na England, ebe ọ kwagara na 2004 n'ihi iwu gọọmentị Mugabe
Otu nwa ya nwoke nwụrụ tupu ọ nwụọ, wee hapụrụ ya nwa nwoke nke abụọ na nwa ya nwanyị, onye ya na ya biri na England
A họpụtara Robert Clarkson Tredgold ka ọ bụrụ onye ibe nke usoro nke St Michael na St George na 1943 New Year Honours
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Knight Bachelor na 1951 New Year Honours
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye KCMG n'afọ 1955
Robert H
Colescott (ubochí irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1925 rụo ụbọchị anọ n'ọnwa Juun, 2009) bụ onye America na-ese ihe
A maara ya màkà ụdị satirical na isiokwu ìgwè mmadụ, na-ekwukarị echiche ya dị egwu, na-atọ ọchị, ma ọ bụ na-egbu mgbu banyéré ịbụ ónyé Africa America
Ọ mụụrụ Fernand Léger na Paris

Ọrụ Colescott dị n'ọtụtụ nnukwu nchịkọta ọha na eze, gụnyere (na mgbakwunye na Albright-Knox) ndị nke Museum of Modern Art na New York, Corcoran Gallery of Art, San Francisco Museum of Modern Arts, Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, Hirshhorn Museum and Sculpture Garden, na Baltimore Museum of Art
Colescott zụlitere ịhụnanya miri emi màkà egwu n'oge ọ bụ nwata
Nné ya bụ onye na-akpọ piano na nnà ya bụ onye nwéré nkà na ụzụ na jazz violin
Ha si New Orleans kwaga Oakland, California, ebe a mụrụ Colescott na 1925
Ọ malitere ịgbà mgbè ọ dị obéré ma chee echiche nke ọma ịchụso ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-agụ egwú tupu ọ malite na nka
Onye na-ese ihe Sargent Claude Johnson bụ enyi ezinụlọ bụ ónyé bụ ihe nlereanya màkà Colescott na-etolite, ọ bụkwa njikọ na Harlem Renaissance na ọrụ nka na-emetụta ahụmịhe ndị Africa na America
N'afọ 1940, Colescott lere anya ka onye na-ese ihe na Mexico bụ Diego Rivera sere ihe osise na Golden Gate International Exposition na Treasure Island dị nso na San Francisco
Colescott gara n'ihu na-amụta akụkọ ihe méré eme nke Western art na ịchọpụta nka nke Africa na New Guinea
Ọ ga-ama mgbè niile ihe na-eme n'ụwa nka nke oge a
Ka o sina dị, ahụmịhe ndị mbụ a nọgidere na-abụ ihe na-emetụta
Dị ka onye na-ese ihe, e debara aha Colescott na ndị agha US na 1942 ma jee ozi na Europe ruo mgbè Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ biri
Njem ọrụ ya kpọgara ya na Paris, mgbe ahụ isi ọbọdọ nke ụwa nka na ọbọdọ nke nabatara ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka America
Mgbè ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ, ọ debanyere aha na UC Berkeley, nke nyéré ya nzere bachelọ na eserese na eserese n'afọ 1949
Ọ nọrọ n'afọ sochirinụ na Paris, na-amụ ihe na ónyé France na-ese ihe Fernand Léger, wee laghachi UC Berkeley, nweta nzèrè masta na 1952

Ọ bụ na Portland ka e guzobere ọrụ ọkachamara Colescott dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe, ekele dị ukwuu màkà onye na-akwado nka na onye ọrụ ebere Arlene Schnitzer, ónyé nwe na ónyé nduzi nke Fountain Gallery, nke ọ meghere iji kwalite ndị na-ese egwu nke ógè a site na mpaghara ahụ
E tinyere ọrụ Colescott na ngosi ngosi nke gallery na 1961, e nyekwara ya ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya n'ebe ahụ na 1963
N'ihe dị egwu mere n'afọ 1977, ọkụ gbara ụlọ ngosi ahụ, ọtụtụ ọrụ Colescott gbara ọkụ yana ọrụ nke ọtụtụ ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ na-anọchite anya ụlọ ngosi ahụ
Ụlọ ngosi ahụ, nke meghere ọzọ mgbe ọkụ ahụ gasịrị n'ebe ọhụrụ, nọgidere na-anọchite anya ọrụ Colescott ruo mgbè ọ mechiri ọnụ ụzọ ya na 1986
Robert Colescott nwụrụ na úbọchị anọ n'ọnwa Juun, 2009, na Tucson AZ
Robert Colescott nwèrè nwanne nwoke Warrington Colescott Jr
nke Hollandale, Wis; na ụmụ nwoke ise Alex Colescott, Nick Colescott
Robert Colescott nwèrè ụmụ atọ Colescott Rubin si Dennett Colescott
Hutton Colescott na Holly Colescott si Cooper Colescott
Robert Douglass Jr
(1809 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1887) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe na ónyé isi na-eme ihe iké na Philadelphia
A mụrụ ya na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, na 1809, Robert Douglass Jr
bụ nwá nke ónyé abolitionist na ndị isi ọbọdọ Robert Douglass Sr, si n'àgwàetiti Caribbean nke St Kitts, na Grace Bustill Douglass, nwa nwanyị Cyrus Bustill
Nwanne ya nwanyị bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé abolitionist Sarah Mapps Douglass; o nwekwara ụmụnne anọ ndị ọzọ
Douglass Jr
rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpà na National Colored Conventions ma jee ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ na 1855 Convention
Ọ zụrụ na Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts, nkè na-anabataghị ụmụ akwụkwọ ojii, ma zụọkwa na Royal Academy of Arts mgbè ọ na-eleta London
Nwa akwụkwọ Thomas Sully, ọ gàrà n'ihu na-eduzi nwa nwanne ya na ónyé na-ese ihe, David Bustill Bowser
Douglass kụziri na Institute for Colored Youth
Otu édémédé sitere na 1890 ghọtara ya dị ka 'ónyé na-ese foto nke nwéré uru ụfọdụ'
Ọ na-ese ihe osise ala ma a na-ewere ya dị ka ónyé na-ese foto Africa-America mbụ na Philadelphia
Ọrụ ndị a ma ama gụnyere foto nke ndị abolitionist gụnyere William Lloyd Garrison na James Forten na 1834
Azụmaahịa ya gụnyere ihe osise na ihe ịchọ mma ime ụlọ
Obere ọrụ ya ka dị
Douglass kwagara Haiti na 1824, site na nkwado nke Haitian Emigration Society nke Philadelphia, nzukọ nke Richard Allen na Forten guzobere
Douglass kwagara Jamaica na ngwụcha afọ 1840 mana o mechara laghachi Philadelphia

Ọ nwụrụ n'ebe ahụ n'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1887 ma lie ya ugbu a n'ebe a na-eli ozu Eden Cemetery, Collingdale, ebe a na-ili ọtụtụ ndị Africa America a ma ama na Philadelphia bụ ndị biri ma nwụọ na ngwụcha narị afọ nkè iri na itoolu na mmalite narị afọ nke irí abụọ
Robert John Downey Jr
(born April 4, 1965) The Mita na United States
Robert Fumulani (1948 na Zomba, Malawi - 1998) bụ onye egwu, onye nwe ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ abalị, na onye ọchụnta ego na Malawi
Ọ bụ onye isi nke Likhubula River Dance Band, nke a maara maka Afroma ('Afro-Malawi') funk rock reggae fusion
A kọwawo Fumulani dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị isi egwu kachasị ewu ewu na Malawi na ngwụcha afọ 1980 na 1990', yana 'nna a gọziri agọzi nke egwu mba anyị'
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọgbọ nke ndị na-agụ egwú nwoke ndị okwu ha bụ maka ndụ, mana enweghị ọdịnaya ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'afọ ndị 1980 ọ bụ onye mmeri ugboro atọ nke 'Entertainer of the Year' nke Malawi
Ego ọ na-enweta site na egwu gara ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa, gụnyere Chileka nightclub, Likhubula Entertainment Centre
Robert E
Shore-Goss bụ ọkà mmụta okpukpe na odee
A zụlitere Goss n'ezinụlọ Roman Katọlik nke na-anụ ọkụ n'obi ma chee na a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ụkọchukwu, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye Jesuit na 1976
Ọ hapụrụ ndị Jesuit na 1978 na-aga n'ihu ịnata ThD
na Comparative Religion na Mahadum Harvard
Goss kụziri na Ngalaba Mmụta Okpukpe nke Mahadum Webster (1994 - 2004), ma jee ozi dị ka onyeisi oche nke ngalaba ahụ
Ọjụjụ ọ jụrụ ịbụ onye mahadum ahụ bụ ihe arụmụka na ebubo Goss na nke a bụ n'ihi echiche ya doro anya banyere mmekọahụ
Webster Pride, òtù ụmụ akwụkwọ maka ikike nwoke na nwoke, nwanyị na nwanyị, nwoke na nwanyị na nwanyị na nwoke, emeghị ihe ọ bụla
E kwụrụ maka onye isi oche Webster Pride na akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụ akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-emegide mkpebi ahụ 'n'ihi na o kwenyeghị na mkpebi ahụ nwere ihe ọ bụla metụtara homophobia'
Ọ na-etinye aka n'otu ndị na-eme enyi nwoke dịka ACT UP, Queer Nation, na otu ndị Roman Katọlik na-eme nwoke na nwoke DignityUSA

Goss jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Gay Men's Issues in Religion Group nke American Academy of Religion Ọ na-eje ozi na National Advisory Board nke Center for Lesbian and Gay Studies in Religion and Ministry of the Pacific School of Religion
Ọ lụrụ nwanyị nke ugboro abụọ n'afọ 2009
Ọrụ ya ndị ebipụtara gụnyere
Shore-Goss bụ onye otu ngalaba na Claremont School of Theology ugbu a
Robert H
McNeill (Ọnwa Desemba 19, afọ 1917 - rụọ ọnwa Mee 27, afọ 2005) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto nke na-edekọ ndụ ndị Afrịka na Amerịka
'N'afọ 1930 na 40, oge ọ bụla enwere ihe omume ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, okpukpe ma ọ bụ obodo na obodo ndị isi ojii nke Washington, Robert H
McNeill nọ ebe ahụ iji see ya foto
A mụrụ McNeill na Washington, DC nna ya William C
McNeill bụ dọkịta na onye nkuzi ahụike, nne ya Mary A
McNeil bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ DC na onye otu Board of Education
Ọ chọpụtara mmasị ya na foto dị ka nwa akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Dunbar High School, nke mepụtara otu ndị isi ojii na-ese na ndị ụbụrụ na-aghọ nkọ n'oge ọkara mbụ nke narị afọ nke 20
Dị ka onye dị afọ iri na asatọ na Mahadum Howard nke Washington, McNeill sere foto onye dike Olimpik nke afọ 1936 bụ Jesse Owens n'oge ọ gara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ mgbe egwuregwu Olimpik gachara
Ọ resịrị foto ahụ akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ ndị Afrịka-Amerịka na akwụkwọ akụkọ DC anọ niile kwa ụbọchị, ndị na-akọwa obodo ndị Afrịka-Amerịka n'ozuzu ha pere mpe
Nke ahụ bụ oge dị mkpa n'ọrụ ya
Mgbe ọ gachara Mahadum Howard afọ abụọ dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na-amụ ọgwụ, ọ banyere na New York Institute of Photography ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1938
New York City bụ mpaghara na-amị mkpụrụ maka ihe foto na ihe mkpali maka McNeill
Ọ na-ese foto ndị na-agba egwú na Savoy Ballroom, onye na-ese ihe nkiri E
Simms Campbell na Lionel Hampton na Benny Goodman (na-emegharị maka Carnegie Hall Concert nke 1938) na ndị ọzọ

Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, McNeill chọpụtara na magazin Fortune na-achọ foto nke 'ndị ọrụ ụlọ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị isi ojii, ndị na-ezukọta na nkuku okporo ámá a họpụtara kwa ụbọchị iji ree ọrụ ha nye onye kacha elu
' McNeill nọ na-emepụta ụdị foto nke ya ka ọ na-ejikọta foto nke ndị ọrụ ojii na gburugburu ha; dịka ọmụmaatụ, ụmụ nwanyị atọ na nwoke guzo n'okpuru ihe nkiri nke na-agụ, 'Make a Wish'

Dị ka akụkụ nke ọrụ ahụ, McNeill nwere ike iso Bessie Windstown ka ọ na-eche n'otu akụkụ maka ọrụ ọ ga-arụ, site na mkparịta ụka ya na onye isi ụlọ ọcha si Bronx maka ụgwọ ọnwa ya kwa awa n'ụlọ onye were ya n'ọrụ, ebe o nwere ike ise foto ya ka ọ na na-asa ala n'aka na ikpere ya
N'ikpeazụ, Fortune ejighị foto McNeill mee ihe; akụkọ ikpeazụ ha, 'Nsogbu Ohu', gosipụtara akụkọ ahụ site n'echiche ndị were ya n'ọrụ
McNeill nwere ike bipụta edemede 'The Bronx Slave Market' na Flash!, magazin na-edezi oji na Washington na NYC
Ọ laghachiri Washington n'afọ 1938 wee guzobe onwe ya dị ka onye na-ese foto n'efu

N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, [mgbe?A na-egosipụta foto McNeill n'ọtụtụ ebe n'ihi mgbalị nke onye meriri MacArthur Fellowship Award Deborah Willis, onye, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Smithsonian's African-American Museum Project, ghọtara nka na ọhụụ McNeill
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'afọ 1983 na 1984 na A Century of Black Photographers, ihe ngosi njem mba nke Rhode Island Institute of Design kwadoro
N'afọ 1985, egosiri foto ya na Chicago na Los Angeles dị ka akụkụ nke ihe ngosi The Black Photographer An American View
Na Washington, DC, e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Sumner School n'afọ 1989 na Smithsonian Institution's Anacostia Museum n'afọ 1991
Ọrụ ya bụkwa akụkụ nke ihe ngosi afọ 1992 To Achieve These Rights, edemede foto banyere desegregation na Washington
N'afọ 1994 na 1995, e gosipụtara foto ya na ihe ngosi Free Within Ourselves, na National Museum of American Art
N'afọ 1996, e gosipụtara nnukwu ọrụ ya na Visual Journal, nnukwu ihe ngosi nke Smithsonian's Center for African American History and Culture
N'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 1997, foto McNeill nke agbata obi nwata ya bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke ọrụ nka okporo ámá nke Washington Historical Society's Remembering iao Uzin Street
Robert H
McNeill nwụrụ n'ọnwa Mee 25, afọ 2005, n'ihi nsogbu nke ọrịa shuga
McNeill lụrụ di ugboro atọ
Alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya biri na ịgba alụkwaghịm ma bụrụ onye di ya nwụrụ ugboro abụọ
O nwere ụmụ abụọ, Robert McNeill Jr
na Susan McNeill

Mtn Robert Hausmann (13 Ọgọstụ 1852 18 Jenụwarị 1909) bụ onye ama ama na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu nke Germany nke gosipụtara ọrụ dị mkpa nke Johannes Brahms (gụnyere Double Concerto) na Max Bruch (gụnyere )
Ọ bụ onye na-eme violin maka Joachim Quartet ma kụzie na Berlin Königliche Hochschule für Müsik
A mụrụ Robert Hausmann na Rottleberode, Harz, na Saxony-Anhalt, Germany
Nna nna ya, Friedrich Ludwig Hausmann (1782-1859) bụ Prọfesọ nke Mineralogy na Mahadum Göttingen, nna ya Friedrich Ludolf Hausmann (1810-1880) sokwa na-egwu ala na ugwu Harz
Ezinụlọ Hausmann keere òkè dị mkpa na ndụ obodo na ọdịbendị nke obodo Hanover kemgbe narị afọ nke iri na asatọ

Nwanne nna Robert Bernhard (1784-1873) bụ onye nchịkọta nka dị mkpa na onye na-eme violin nke akụkọ ihe mere eme ya, Erinnerungen aus dem 80 jährigen Leben eines hannoverschen Burgers Hannover (1873) nyere nkọwa zuru ezu banyere ọtụtụ ọrụ ya n'oge ihe omume na akụkọ ihe mere anya nke Hanover

Robert banyere na Gymnasium dị na Brunswick mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ na 1861, ebe ọmụmụ cello ya gara n'ihu n'okpuru Theodor Müller, onye na-eme cello nke Müller Quartet, otu n'ime ndị ọkachamara mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri na Germany
N'afọ 1869 ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ mbụ nke Berlin Hochschule für Musik, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru nwa nwanne Müller Wilhelm Müller, n'okpuru nduzi nke onye na-eme violin Joseph Joachim
Joachim mere ka ọ mata nnukwu onye Ịtali na-eme violin na onye nkuzi Carlo Alfredo Piatti (1822-1901), onye kụziiri ya na London na 1871 nakwa na ala ya na Cadenabbia na Lake Como, Ịtali
He then joined the string quartet of count Hochberg in silesia site n'afo 1871 ruo na 1876 mgbe ahoputara ya dika instructor nke cello at the Berlin hochschule

He became principal instructor on the retirement of Wilhelm Muller na 1879 and was name onye okachamara n'afo 1884Site na 1879 ruo ọnwụ Joseph Joachim na 1907 ọ bụ onye na-eme violin nke Joachim Quartet, n'akụkụ Joachim n'onwe ya (1st violin), Heinrich de Ahna (ruo ọnwụ ya na 1892), nke Karel Halíř (2nd violin) na Emanuel Wirth (viola) nọchiri
Ọ bụ onye na-egwu egwu ụlọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike, onye a ma ama na Germany, na Europe n'ozuzu ya, na London
Hausmann rụrụ ọrụ na Britain ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ ọ bụla, malite na 1876, ruo otu ọnwa tupu ọnwụ ya
N'afọ 1879-80, Charles Villiers Stanford dere Cello Concerto na D obere maka Robert Hausmann
Nke a sochiri mmalite Hausmann na England Stanford's Cello Sonata, Op
Ọ bụ nke mbụ dị ịrịba ama British cello sonata
N'afọ 1881, Hausmann wepụtara Max Bruch's , Op
47, nke a raara nye ya
Bruch dere nke a na nzaghachi maka arịrịọ ogologo oge sitere n'aka Hausmann ka o dee otu egwu maka cello na orchestra iji kwekọọ na ndị o dere maka violin na orchestra
Bruch gakwara Hausmann maka bowings na akụkụ teknụzụ ndị ọzọ
Bruch's Canzone in B-flat, Op
55, na Vier Stücke, Op
70, raara nye Hausmann
Mmekọrịta kachasị mkpa Hausmann bụ na Johannes Brahms
Mgbe ha gụsịrị egwu na 1883, ọ bụ onye ọbịa na-agakarị n'etiti ndị enyi Brahms bụ ndị na-eme ihe ngosi onwe ha n'ụlọ ha
Cello Sonata No
2 na F major, Op
99, bụ nke a raara nye ma gosipụta na Vienna, ya na onye dere ya na piano (14 Nọvemba 1886)
O mekwara ka Cello Sonata No
1 na E obere, Op
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1891, o sonyere na mmemme nke mbụ, na Meiningen, nke Clarinet Trio na A minor, Op
114, ya na Richard Mühlfeld na clarinet na Brahms na piano
N'ọnwa na-esote, ha nwere mmeri na mmeghe ọha na eze na Berlin
Ọzọkwa, Hausmann so na Berlin premieres nke Brahms's Piano Trio in C minor Op
101, Quintet in G Major, Op
111, na Clarinet Quintet, Op
Nke kachasị mkpa, Hausmann na Joseph Joachim bụ ndị soloist abụọ Brahms dere Double Concerto in A minor, Op
102, ọrụ egwu ikpeazụ ya
Brahms so ha abụọ rụọ ọrụ n'ihe nkiri ahụ tupu emume izizi ya na Wiesbaden na 18 Ọktoba 1887
Onye nkatọ Eduard Hanslick dere na Hausmann 'dị ala karịa Joachim'
Dị ka akụkụ nke Joachim Quartet, Hausmann kwadoro egwu ụlọ niile nke Brahms maka eriri, nke a na-egosipụta mgbe niile na usoro egwu egwu nke Quartet na Berlin ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ

E wezụga Quartet, Hausmann bụ onye guzobere otu piano trio, nke ndị ọrụ ibe ya na Hochschule, Heinrich de Ahna (ya na Emanuel Wirth nọchiri de Ahna mgbe ọ nwụsịrị na 1892) na onye na-akpọ piano Heinrich Barth
Ha malitere usoro ịgba egwu na Berlin nke were site na 1878 ruo 1907
Oge egwu ha yiri nke Quartet, malite n'ọnwa Ọktoba ma kwụsị na Machị
Afọ mbụ ha na-egwu egwu bụ na Singakademie
Otú ọ dị, n'afọ 1889, ha malitere ịkpọ 'mgbede egwu ụlọ a ma ama' na Philharmonie buru ibu, ebe ha na-ejikarị oche 2000-plus
N'afọ 1894, Hausmann lụrụ Helene von Maybach, nwa nwanyị nke Minista Azụmaahịa Prussian Albert von Maybach
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ Luise (b
1895) na Friedrich Georg (b
1900), onye ghọkwara onye egwu
Hausmann bipụtara mbipụta nke Bach Cello Suites na Mendelssohn Cello Sonatas and Variations Concertantes na D major, Op
17; o mekwara cello na piano nhazi nke Schumann's Märchenbilder, Op
113 (nke mbụ maka viola na piano), na Cello Concerto nke Bernhard Molique

Ụmụ akwụkwọ ya gụnyere Friedrich Koch (onye nkuzi nke Boris Blacher na Paul Kletzki), Wallingford Riegger, Philipp Roth, Percy Such, Hugo Dechert, Otto Lüdemann, Agustín Rubio, Lucy Campbell, Arthur Williams, na ndị ọzọ
Lee Ndepụta nke ụmụ akwụkwọ egwu site na onye nkuzi G ruo J#Robert Hausmann
Ọ na-akpọ ezigbo Stradivarius cello site na 1724, nke a ka maara dị ka 'Hausmann' Strad
Ọ nwetara ya n'aka nwa nwanne nna ya, onye cello virtuoso na ọkachamara n'egwú chamber nke biri na Great Britain George Hausmann (1814-1860)
Ọ mechara bụrụ nke onye Russia bụ Edmund Kurtz (onye isi cello nke Chicago Symphony Orchestra)
Robert Hausmann nwuru na vienna na jenuwari 1909 ogbara afo iri ise na abuo after playing a recital of Beethovens cello sonatas with marie Baumeyer na Graz na uhuru uchi
Donald Tovey had played chamber music with Joachim and Hausmann during their last year's and his Elegiac variations for cello and piano op 10 edere ya na ncheta Hausmann
Robert Hayden (August 4, 1913 February 25, 1980) bụ onye America na-ede abụ, onye edemede, na onye nkuzi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na uri na Library of Congress site n'afọ 1976 ruo afọ 1978, ọrụ a maara taa dị ka US Poet Laureate Ọ bụ onye edemede Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ nọ n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
A mụrụ Robert Hayden Asa Bundy Sheffey na Detroit, Michigan, nke Ruth na Asa Sheffey, bụ ndị kewara tupu a mụọ ya
Otu ezinụlọ na-elekọta ya n'akụkụ ụlọ, Sue Ellen Westerfield na William Hayden, kpọọrọ ya, ma tolite na ghetto Detroit nke a na-akpọ 'Paradise Valley'
Alụmdi na nwunye Haydens na-ese okwu mgbe niile, tinyere asọmpi Ruth Sheffey maka ịhụnanya nwa ya nwoke, mere ka ọ bụrụ nwata dị egwu
N'ịhụ ọgụ na mmekpa ahụ, Hayden biri n'ụlọ jupụtara na 'iwe na-adịghị ala ala', nke mmetụta ya ga-anọnyere ya n'oge ndụ ya niile
N'elu nke ahụ, nnukwu nsogbu anya ya gbochiri ya isonye na ihe omume dịka egwuregwu nke ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ onye ọ bụla ọzọ tinyere aka na ya
Ihe mgbu ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata kpatara ịda mbà n'obi nke o mechara kpọọ 'abalị m gbara ọchịchịrị nke mkpụrụ obi'
