N'ihi na ọ na-ahụ anya nke ọma ma dị obere ogo, ndị ọgbọ ya na-achụpụkarị ya
Na nzaghachi, Hayden gụrụ akwụkwọ nke ọma, na-azụlite ma ntị ma anya maka àgwà mgbanwe na akwụkwọ

Ọ gara Detroit City College nke e mechara kpọọ Wayne State University na isi na Spanish na obere na Bekee, wee pụọ n'afọ 1936 n'oge nnukwu ịda mbà n'obi, otu kredit na-erughị ya, ịga rụọ ọrụ maka Nlekọta Ọganihu Ọrụ Fn Federal Writers 'Project, ebe ọ nyochara akụkọ ihe mere eme ojii na omenala ndị mmadụ
N'ịhapụ Federal Writers' Project n'afọ 1938, Hayden lụrụ Erma Morris n'afọ 1940 wee bipụta mpịakọta mbụ ya, Heart-Shape in the Dust (1940)
Ọ debara aha na Mahadum Michigan n'afọ 1941 wee nweta onyinye Hopwood n'ebe ahụ
N'ịbụ onye a zụlitere dị ka onye Baptist, ọ sooro nwunye ya banye n'okwukwe Bahá'í n'oge mmalite afọ 1940, ma zụlite nwa nwanyị, Maia, n'okpukpe ahụ
Hayden ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị Bahá'í a ma ama na-ede uri
Erma Hayden bụ onye na-eti egwu na onye na-ede egwu ma jee ozi dị ka onye nlekọta egwu maka ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze Nashville
N'ịchụso nzere masta, Hayden gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru W
Auden, onye duziri uche ya na nsogbu nke ụdị uri, usoro, na ịdọ aka ná ntị nka
Enwere ike ịhụ mmetụta Auden na 'nkà na ụzụ nke amaokwu Hayden'
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1942, mgbe ahụ ọ na-akụzi ọtụtụ afọ na Michigan, Hayden gara Mahadum Fisk n'afọ 1946, ebe ọ nọrọ afọ iri abụọ na atọ, laghachi Michigan n'afọ 1969 iji rụchaa ọrụ nkuzi ya

N'ikwekọ na ọrụ nkuzi ya na Fisk, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede uri na Mahadum Indiana State n'afọ 1967 ma na-eleta onye na-ede uri na Mahadum Washington n'afọ 1969, Mahadum Connecticut n'afọ 1971, Mahadum Dennison n'afọ 1972, na Connecticut College n'afọ 1974
Dị ka onye na-akwado nkuzi okpukpe ya banyere ịdị n'otu nke mmadụ, Hayden enweghị ike ịnabata nkewa ndị ojii
N'ihi ya, abụ aha nke Words in the Mourning Time na-ejedebe na arịrịọ na-akpali akpali n'aha mmadụ niile
Weghachite ugbu a, ugbu a megharịa ọhụụ nke
ụwa mmadụ ebe nsọpụrụ Chineke ga-ekwe omume na mmadụ abụghị gook nigger honkey wop ma ọ bụ kike kama ọ bụ mmadụ
kwere ka ọ bụrụ nwoke
Ọ nwụrụ na Ann Arbor, Michigan, na February 25, 1980, ọ dị afọ iri isii na isii
N'afọ 2012, ụlọ ọrụ nzipu ozi nke United States nyere mpempe akwụkwọ stampụ nke gosipụtara nnukwu ndị na-ede uri iri nke narị afọ iri abụọ nke Amerika, gụnyere Hayden

Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1960 na ịrị elu nke Black Arts Movement, mgbe oge ntorobịa nke ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka na Amerịka dere abụ mkpesa na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmetụta uche na-eme mkpesa nke ọma nye ndị oji na-ege ntị, nkà ihe ọmụma Hayden banyere ọrụ abụ na ụzọ o si gosipụta onwe ya dị ka onye edemede
Ọjụjụ ọ jụrụ ịmegharị onwe ya dị ka foto nke afọ 1960 gosipụtara mere ka ọ nweta nzaghachi site n'aka ndị ọkà mmụta na ndị nyocha ole na ole

Hayden nọgidere na-agbaso echiche ya banyere uri dị ka usoro nka kama ngosipụta esemokwu na nkwenye ya na uri kwesịrị, na mgbakwunye na ihe ndị ọzọ, na-edozi àgwà ndị a kpọrọ mmadụ, gụnyere ikpe na-ezighị ezi ọha na eze
Nkwenkwe Hayden banyere mmekọrịta nke onye na-ese ihe na uri ya n'otu aka ahụ nwere mmetụta na ịjụ ya ide sonnets mkpesa nke nwere mmetụta uche
Omume Hayden bụ ime ka nkewa dị n'etiti ọkà okwu na mmegharị nke Abụ
Ọrụ ya na-ekwukarị banyere nsogbu nke ndị Africa America, na-ejikarị ebe obibi ya mbụ nke Paradise Valley slum dị ka azụ, dị ka ọ na-eme na abụ 'Heart-Shape in the Dust'
O ji asụsụ obodo ojii na okwu ọdịnala mee ihe n'ụzọ dị njikere, o dekwara abụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, gụnyere usoro banyere Agha Vietnam
Na uri mbụ nke usoro ahụ, o kwuru, sị 'Ana m agbalị igosipụta echiche na ihe egwu nke agha ahụ ghọrọ ụdị ọnụnọ, ha na gị na-arụkwa ọrụ onwe gị na nke chiri anya, na-eri nri gị na ihe ndị ọzọ
Egwu na obi ọjọọ na mpụ nke agha metụrụ ihe niile aka
Echere m na nke ahụ bụ otu n'ime abụ ndị kachasị mma

Mmetụta nke ihe ọhụrụ Euro-American na abụ Hayden na nkwupụta ya na-aga n'ihu na ọ dị mkpa ka e lee ya anya dị ka 'onye na-ede abụ America' na-emegide 'onye na-ede uri ojii' kpaliri ọtụtụ nzaghachi banyere abụ dị ka 'Uncle Tom' site n'aka ndị nkatọ Africa na America n'oge afọ 1960s

Otú ọ dị, akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị Afrịka na Amerịka, ndị isi ojii nke oge a, dịka ọmụmaatụ, Malcolm X, na obodo ndị Afrịka na Amerịka, ọkachasị Hayden's native Paradise Valley, bụ isiokwu nke ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke abụ ya
Na Eprel 7, 1966, e nyere Hayden's Ballad of Remembrance, site na otu olu, Nnukwu ihe nrite maka abụ na ihe mmemme mba ụwa na nka niile gbasara ndị ojii na Dakar, Senegal
Emume ahụ nwere ihe karịrị puku mmadụ iri sitere na mba iri atọ na asaa bịara

Otú ọ dị, na Eprel 22, 1966, otu ndị na-eto eto na-ede uri na-eme ngagharị iwe nke Melvin Tolson duziri katọrọ Hayden na nzukọ Mahadum Fisk nke ndị edemede ojii maka ịjụ ịkọwa onwe ya dị ka onye oji na-ede abụ
A makwaara Hayden dị ka onye na-ede uri ma tinye ya na anthology 'Black Nature Four Centuries of African American Nature Poetry'
Abụ ya, 'A Plague of Starlings', bụ otu n'ime uri ya a ma ama
abụ ahụ, “Night-Blooming Cereus,” bụ ihe atụ ọzọ nke Hayden gosipụtara ụwa okike
Abụ a na-egosi dị ka usoro nke haiku-dị ka stanzas
Hayden kwuru na njem ya na Duluth, Minnesota n'oge ịkụ azụ na-agbaze
Ọ na-akọwa otú uri ahụ si ghọọ haiku, ebe ị na-enweta ya niile site na aro na nkọwa
A na-etokarị Robert Hayden maka ọrụ ya nke abụ, echiche pụrụ iche na ọrụ ya, asụsụ ya kpọmkwem, na iwu ya zuru oke nke usoro uri ọdịnala na usoro
Mmetụta Hayden gụnyere Elinor Wylie, Countee Cullen, Paul Laurence Dunbar, Langston Hughes, Arna Bontemps, John Keats, W
Auden na W
Yeats
A hoputara Hayden na American Academy of Poets n'afọ 1975
Abụ ya a ma ama bụ 'Those Winter Sunday', nke na-ekwu maka ncheta nke ịhụnanya nna na owu ọmụma
Ọ nọ n'etiti abụ ndị America kachasị abụ na narị afọ nke iri abụọ
Ọ jụrụ ọkwa ahụ ka e mechara kpọọ United States Poet Laureate na mbụ, nakweere nhọpụta maka 1976–1977 n'oge Bicentennial nke America, na ọzọ na 1977–1978 ọ bụ ezie na ahụ ike ya na-ada ada mgbe ahụ
Mahadum Brown (1976) na Fisk (1978) nyere ya akara ugo mmụta nsọpụrụ
N'afọ 1977, a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ maka telivishọn na Los Angeles na At One With nke Keith Berwick
Na Jenụwarị 1980 Hayden so na ndị gbakọtara ka onye isi ala Jimmy Carter na nwunye ya kwanyere ya ùgwù na nnabata White House na-eme ememe abụ America
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ iri dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Bahá'í World Order

Abụ ndị ọzọ a ma ama gụnyere 'The Whipping' (nke bụ banyere obere nwata nwoke a na-ata ahụhụ siri ike maka ụfọdụ mmejọ a na-amaghị ama), 'Middle Passage' (nke sitere na ihe omume ndị gbara United States v
Ihe gbasara Amistad), 'Runagate, Runagate', na 'Frederick Douglass'
Àtụ LOC Poets Laureate

Robert Lee Washington III (29 Nọvemba, 1964 7 Juun, 2012) bụ onye America na-ede akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị, nke a maara maka ịmepụta Static (nke e mechara gbanwee maka usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn na-aga nke ọma) na Shadow Cabinet, ma maka Milestone Media
A mụrụ Washington ma zụlite ya na Detroit, Michigan
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Roeper High School
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndri, ọ gara Mahadum New York obere oge, ọ bụ ezie na ọ gụsịghị akwụkwọ
Ná mmalite afọ ndị 1990, ya na Dwayne McDuffie na John Paul Leon, kere Static, onye dike Africa America na-eto eto, akụkụ nke Milestone imprint nke DC Comics bipụtara
Mbipụta mbụ ya nke iri na asatọ na-ede usoro ahụ nwetara otuto dị egwu maka njirimara ya nke onye isi

Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o nyere aka n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ na-atọ ọchị (nke DC bipụtara), nke gụnyere ịmepụta Shadow Cabinet na ide maka Extreme Justice, The Batman Chronicles, JLA Secret Files, na (maka Acclaim Comics) Ninjak
N'ịgbaso mbelata nke ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị n'etiti afọ 1990, Washington nwere ihe isi ike ịchọta ọrụ dị ka onye edemede
A na-ewe ya n'ọrụ mgbe ụfọdụ na ọrụ ndị na-enweghị njikọ
Ọ bukwara onye na-enweghị ebe obibi ọtụtụ ugboro
N'oge a, Washington natara enyemaka ego site na Hero Initiative, ụlọ ọrụ na-abaghị uru nke na-enye enyemaka ego maka ndị na-emepụta akwụkwọ ọchị
Na June 6, 2012, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka onye na-ere ahịa n'ịntanetị na Long Island City, New York, Washington nwere ọrịa nkụchi obi
E bugara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ Mount Sinai dị na Queens, n'echi ya, ọ nwetara nkuchi obi abụọ ọzọ wee nwụọ
Dị ka Washington dara ogbenye n'oge ọnwụ ya, ọzọ The Hero Initiative mepụtara arịrịọ nchịkọta ego iji kwụọ ụgwọ maka olili ozu na akwamozu Washington
Robert Fowler Paul (12 Maachị 1906 -September 1980) bụ onye na-ese ihe n'ala Rhodesia
A mụrụ Paul na Sutton, Surrey, England
Ọ sonyeere ndị uwe ojii Rhodesia, ndị uwe ojii British South Africa, na 1927, n'oge ọ na-agagharị n'afọ ndị mbụ ya, ọ hụrụ ala dị n'ógbè ahụ n'anya
N'ịbụ onye nkuzi onwe ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe, ọ na-ewekarị akwụkwọ eserese ya na njem ya, na-edekọ ime obodo na-agafe agafe
John Piper na Ivon Hitchens gbara ya ume ise ihe, bụ ndị mere ka ọ mara ọrụ Georges Braque na ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe
Paul lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 1951 iji see ihe n'oge niile
A na-ewere ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe kachasị na Rhodesia ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1979; enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ ya na National Gallery nke Zimbabwe
Robert Robinson Taylor (Jụn 8, 1868 ruo Disemba 13, 1942) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na onye nkuzi
Taylor bụ nwa akwụkwọ Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ debanyere aha na Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), na onye mbụ Afrịka-Amerịka architect mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1892
Ọ bụ onye mbụ na onye nwere mmetụta na ngalaba Tuskegee Institute
A mụrụ ya na Wilmington, North Carolina, Taylor nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ n'ihe owuwu na South America ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ
Ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ n'ime ụlọ mbụ nke Tuskegee Institute, na ọtụtụ kọleji na mahadum ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri
Dị ka onye nke abụọ na Booker T
Washington, onye guzobere Tuskegee Institute, Taylor nyere aka na atụmatụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na ịmepụta usoro agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
A mụrụ Robert Robinson Taylor na Jụn 8, 1868, na Wilmington, North Carolina
Nna ya, Henry Taylor, rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọkwá nkà na onye ọchụnta ego, a mụrụ ya n'ohu mana nna ya na onye nwe ya bụ Angus Taylor tọhapụrụ ya na 1847
Nne ya, Emily Still, bụ nwa nwanyị nke ndị nweere onwe ha ọbụna tupu Agha Obodo
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ya gaa MIT na 1888, ebe ọ gụrụ ihe owuwu
Na Jụn 1890 na ọzọ na Septemba 1891, a tụrụ aro ka ọ bụrụ Loring Scholarship, nke o nwere afọ agụmakwụkwọ abụọ n'usoro 1890 ruo 1891 na 1892 ruo 1893
N'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na MIT, ya na Booker T
Washington kwurịtara okwu n'onwe ya ihe karịrị otu oge
Ihe Washington bu n'uche bụ maka Taylor iji mepụta usoro mmepụta ihe na Tuskegee na ịhazi ma duzie iwu ụlọ ọhụrụ maka ogige ahụ
Na nzukọ ngalaba MIT na Mee 26, 1892, Taylor bụ otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ iri na abụọ na Course IV, usoro ihe owuwu, nke a tụrụ aro maka nzere
Klas nke 1892 bụ nke kachasị ukwuu na ndekọ kemgbe ntọala MIT
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Taylor agaghị Tuskegee ozugbo
O mechara nabata onyinye Tuskegee n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ oge oyi nke 1892
Ihe owuwu mbụ Taylor rụrụ na Mahadum Tuskegee bụ Ụlọ Nzukọ Sayensị (Thrasher Hall) nke e wuchara na 1893
Ọ bụ ụmụ akwụkwọ wuru Ụlọ Nzukọ Sayensị ọhụrụ ahụ kpamkpam, na-eji brik ndị ụmụ akwụkwọ mere n'okpuru nlekọta Taylor

Ọrụ ahụ gosipụtara nkà ihe ọmụma Washington nke ịkụnye ụmụ akwụkwọ Tuskegee, ụmụ nke ndị Afrịka bụbu ndị ohu, uru na ùgwù nke ọrụ aka ma nye ụwa ihe atụ nke ikike nke ndị Afrịkan Amerịka na azụmaahịa ụlọ, ọ gosikwara ikike ka ukwuu nke usoro ọzụzụ aka na-emepe na Tuskegee
Ọtụtụ ụlọ ndị ọzọ sochiri, gụnyere Tuskegee Chapel mbụ, nke e wuru n'etiti 1895 na 1898
Mgbe Chapel bịara The Oaks, nke e wuru na 1899, ụlọ onye isi oche nke Mahadum Tuskegee
Site na 1899 ruo 1902, ọ laghachiri Cleveland, Ohio, ịrụ ọrụ n'onwe ya na maka ụlọ ọrụ Charles W
Hopkinson
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Tuskegee site na Cleveland na 1902, ọ bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na onye nduzi nke 'ụlọ ọrụ igwe' ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'etiti afọ 1930
Iji mepụta usoro mmụta dị mma na Tuskegee, ma Washington na Taylor si na MIT nweta ihe nlereanya
E gosipụtara mmasị Taylor nwere maka MIT dị ka ihe nlereanya maka mmepe Tuskegee n'okwu o kwuru na MIT na 1911

Taylor depụtara ihe atụ na 1911 US Congress na akwụkwọ iji gosipụta ụdị echiche siri ike, ụzọ, na usoro nke Tuskegee nabatara site na MIT ma jiri ya mee ihe n'ụzọ gara nke ọma n'ime ihe gbasara ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ ojii
Taylor rụkwara ụlọ ndị na-adịghị na Tuskegee
Ndị a gụnyere ọbá akwụkwọ Carnegie na Wiley College na Marshall, Texas, na Livingstone College na Salisbury, North Carolina
Ya na onye mmekọ ya mechara, onye isi ojii Louis H
Persley, rụrụ nnukwu ụlọ na Mahadum Selma na Selma, Alabama, na Ụlọ Nsọ Masonic Colored, nke bụkwa ụlọ ọrụ na ebe ntụrụndụ, na Birmingham, Alabama
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo oge ụfọdụ dị ka osote onyeisi nke Tuskegee, malite na 1925

N'afọ 1929, n'okpuru nkwado nke Phelps-Stokes Fund, gọọmentị Liberia, na Firestone Rubber, ọ gara Kakata, Liberia iji setịpụ atụmatụ ụlọ ma chepụta mmemme na ọzụzụ ụlọ ọrụ maka Booker Washington Institute 'the Tuskegee Africa'
Robert Taylor jere ozi na Mississippi Valley Flood Relief Commission, nke Onye isi ala Herbert Hoover họpụtara, ọ bụkwa onyeisi oche nke Tuskegee chapter nke American Red Cross
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na obodo ya Wilmington, North Carolina, na 1935, gọvanọ nke North Carolina họpụtara Taylor ka ọ bụrụ onye nlekọta nke ihe bụzi Mahadum Fayetteville State

Ọzọkwa, na 1942, ihe na-erughị afọ iri mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na Tuskegee, o degaara odeakwụkwọ nke klas MIT ya akwụkwọ na-egosi na a tọhapụrụ ya na ọgwụgwọ maka ọrịa a na-akọwaghị akọwa na Mayo Clinic na Rochester, Minnesota
'N'ihi ezi omume Providence na ndị dọkịta nwere nkà,' ka o kwuru, 'M ka mma ugbu a'
N'afọ 1898, ọ lụrụ Beatrice Rochon Taylor
Ha nwere ụmụ anọ, otu n'ime ha, Robert Rochon Taylor, ghọrọ onye a ma ama na-akwado ụlọ na Chicago
Nwanne Beatrice nke obere bụ onye nkuzi na onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụ Etnah Rochon Boutte
Mgbe Beatrice nwụsịrị na 1906, Robert lụrụ Nellie Chestnutt ọzọ na 1912; ha nwere otu nwa
Ọ nwụrụ na Disemba 13, 1942, mgbe ọ na-aga ozi na Tuskegee Chapel, ụlọ ọ weere dị ka ihe kachasị mma ọ rụzuru dị ka onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
E liri ya na Pine Forest Cemetery na Wilmington, North Carolina
A na-akpọ Taylor School of Architecture and Construction Science na Mahadum Tuskegee aha Taylor
A na-akpọ ọrụ ụlọ ahụ na Chicago, Robert Taylor Homes, aha nwa ya nwoke, Robert Rochon Taylor, onye isi obodo na onye bụbu onyeisi oche nke Chicago Housing Authority
US Postal Service nwere stampụ post nke nwere onyinyo ya
Nwa nwa ya nwanyị, Valerie Jarrett, bụ onye ndụmọdụ ukwu nke onye isi ala Barack Obama
Robert Traynham Coles, FAIA, (24 Ọgọọst 1929 ruo 16 Mee 2020, m
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu) bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, onye nkuzi, na onye na-ahụ maka ikpe ziri ezi

Coles bụ onyAfrịkacAmerịkaca mbụ meriri Rotch Traveling Scholarship nke Boston Society of Architects nyere, onye isAfrịkacAmerịkaca mbụ nke American Institute of Architects (AIA), onye isi oche mbụ nke AIA maka Minority Affairs, na onye guzobere National Organization of Minority Architects (NOMA)
N'afọ 1963, Coles meghere ụlọ ọrụ ya Robert Traynham Coles, Architect na Buffalo, New York, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ mbụ ndị Afrịka Amerịka nwere na New York State na Northeast
Coles gara Mahadum Hampton na 1947 tupu ọ gaa Mahadum Minnesota na 1949, ebe ọ nwetara Bachelor of Arts na 1951 na Bachelor of Architecture na 1953
Coles nwetara nzere masta nke Architecture na Massachusetts Institute of Technology n'afọ 1955
Mgbe ọ nọ na MIT, Coles dere thesis ya banyere imezigharị obodo n'obodo ya bụ Buffalo, New York, ebe o mechara mepee ọrụ ya
Robert T
Coles chere ọtụtụ ihe mgbochi ihu n'ịmalite ọrụ ya

N'agbanyeghị na ndị nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya kụdara ya obi ịtụle ọrụ ahụ na n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ naanị onye Africa America na klas ya na Mahadum Minnesota, a kwụsịghị Coles ma gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ nke ọma

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na MIT ma laghachi na njem ya na Europe, Coles rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị ka Shepley, Bulfinch, Richardson, Carl Koch na Associates na Techbuilt, tupu ọ mepee ụlọ ọrụ nke ya na 1963
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ ọrụ nke ọrụ edemede ya, Ellicott District Recreation Center, nke a maara taa dị ka John F
Kennedy Recreation Centre site na obodo Buffalo
Coles weere ọrụ mbụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ya dịka ọrụ nkwado mbụ ya, na-apụta site na mkparịta ụka ya na obodo na-eche egwu nke imezigharị obodo ihu
Mmekọrịta obodo ghọrọ ihe dị mkpa nke ọrụ Coles, ọ nọgidekwara na-achụso ịdị iche iche, itinye aka, na ikpe ziri ezi n'ọrụ ya
Coles bụkwa onye na-akatọ ihe owuwu n'ezoghị ọnụ, na-akwado ikpe ziri ezi, ohere, na ohere maka ụmụ nwanyị na ndị na-arụ ọrụ ole na ole

Coles bụ Langston Hughes Prọfesọ nke Architecture na Urban Design na Mahadum Kansas n'afọ 1989, ebe o kwuru okwu 'Black Architects, An Endangered Species' nke e mechara bipụta na Progressive Architecture Magazine
N'afọ 1990-1995, Coles bụ osote prọfesọ nke Architecture na Mahadum Carnegie Mellon
Architecture + Advocacy, Buffalo Arts Publishing (2016)

Robert Freeman (amụrụ n'afọ 1946) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé nkụzi nke a maara màkà nnukwu ihe osise mmanụ ya nke akpọrọ Black Tie, na-enye nkọwa banyere esemokwu onwe ónyé Freeman nwèrè ka ndị Africa-Amerịka bírí na ndụ dị n'etiti na-esote esemokwu agbụrụ nke 1960s na 1970s
N'afọ 1997, e nyere Freeman onyinye Boston University Distinguished Alumni Award site na School of Visual Arts na 2020, a kpọrọ Freeman onye ọhụrụ nke Boston Arts Commission
A mụrụ Freeman na Brooklyn, New York ma nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ntorobịa ya n'etiti Accra, Ghana na United States
Ọ gàrà afọ abụọ na Mahadum Howard iji mụọ nka n'okpuru Lois Jones tupu ọ gaa na Mahadụ Boston School of Visual Arts, ebe ọ nwetara BFA
na 1971 na MF
A na 1981

A maara ya màkà akara ahịa ya, iji agba dị iche iche, mmegharị na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe ndị a na-adịghị ahụkebe, ihe osise Freeman na-egosi isiokwu ndị Africa America, ma bụrụ nke ahụmahụ nwata ya na Ghana na Washington, DC
kpaliri
Na usoro ya nke afọ 1981, Black Tie, Freeman nyochara ma mee emume 'ịma mma, ịma mma na amara nke ndị isi ojii nọ n'etiti' site na ahụmịhe onwe ya
Nhọrọ sitere na Black Tie gosipụtara na okpukpu nkè ise nke Mayor's Gallery na Boston City Hall

N'isiokwu ahụ, 'Kpọọ naanị Ihe osise Robert Freemanz na-akọwa ụwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya site na Celina Colby na The Bay State Banner, a na-akọwakọta Freemanz New Works dị ka usoro ihe osise mmanụ na mmegharị na ike nke egwu jazz
N'agbanyeghị ọrụ ndị na-enweghị obi ụtọ egosiri, ihe osise ahụ nwèrè akụkụ gbárá ọchịchịrị karịa ha
A ka na-enyo enyo na a ka na-ekwu na a ga-etinye ndị mmadụ n'ime ọbọdọ anyị, ka Freeman kwuru n'isiokwu ahụ
Anyị ka bi n'ụwa nke kewara ekewa

Ndị India Mardi Gras, usoro jikọrọ aka na 2018 na onye na-ese foto Max Stern, mepụtara ala ọhụrụ màkà Freeman site na iji akwụkwọ ọla edo na ábụ́bà iji weghara uwe ndị India Mardi gras na-eyi ka ha na-eme emume n'etiti
Ugbu a, Freeman bi na Jamaica Plain, MA ma na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ya na Waltham, MA

N'afọ 2008, e gosipụtara ihe osise Freeman na ihe ngosi Five American Voices n'etiti ọrụ Romare Bearden, Benny Andrews, Alma Woodsey Thomas, na Richard Yarde na Meridian International Center na Washington, DC
Black Tie, nke bụzi akụkụ nke Museum of Fine Arts, Boston na-adịgide adịgide, so n'ọtụtụ ọrụ nka nke Freeman gosipụtara na mba ahụ ihe karịrị afọ 40
Enwere ike ịchọta ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise ya na nchịkọta na National Center for African American Artists, Boston Public Library, DeCordova Museum, na Mahadum Brown n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ

Na mgbakwunye na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi gallery, e gosipụtara ihe osise Freeman na ngosi na Rose Art Museum na Mahadum Brandeis, Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, na Williams College Museum of Art, Williamstown, MA
N'afọ 1997, e nyere Freeman onyinye Boston University Distinguished Alumni Award site na School of Visual Arts
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, na 2020, a kpọrọ Freeman onye ọhụrụ nke Boston Arts Commission, ebe ọ ga-enye ọhụụ ya maka ngosi nka ọha na eze gafee obodo Boston
Roberta Annan (amụrụ 2 Disemba 1982) bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego Ghana na onye guzobere African Fashion Foundation
Ọ bụkwa onye ọchụnta ego, onye na-ahụ maka ọdịmma mmadụ na onye nnọchi anya mmemme gburugburu ebe obibi nke United Nations
Annan bụ onye Afrịka kachasị nta ewebatara n'ime Ụlọ Nzukọ Ọchịchị nke Africa
Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Carleton na Mahadum Georgetown, Annan malitere ọrụ ya na nkuzi n'isi ụlọ ọrụ UN dị na New York City
Annan bụ onye nwe Annan Capital Partners, ụlọ ọrụ itinye ego na Sub-Saharan Africa, yana ALDG, Pọtụfoliyo nke akụ na ile ọbịa na-adigide, azụmahịa agribusiness na okomoko na-adigide na Africa
Annan guru akwụkwọ n'ụlọakwụkwọ SOS-Hermann Gmeiner International College
O gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Summa Cum Laude, o gụrụ Biochemistry site na mahadum Carleton University na Ottawa, Canada, ma nweta nzere masters na Biotechnology site na mahadum Georgetown University
Annan, onye na-asụ Bekee na olumba Akan, rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye ọkammụta nke nyocha na Mahadum Giessen yana ụlọọrụ dị n'ọtụtụ mba dị ka Athgo International na MAP International n'etiti 2005 na 2007
Na 2008, Annan sonyeere United Nations dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ ma mesịa ghọọ onye ndụmọdụ maka UN, onye na-achịkọta ego na ihe onwunwe maka ọrụ nke UN n'ụwa nile
N'afọ 2012, o hiwere Roberta Annan Consulting, nke emeghariri ka ọ bụrụ Annan Capital Partners na 2016 ka ya na LJ Africa Advisors nọchara afọ abụọ
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara Annan ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke ndị ozi ahịa Senior maka Fieldstone Africa ebe o duru ma hazie ihe gbasara atụmatụ azụmahịa na ire ahịa
Ọ jeela ozi na bọọdụ gụnyere Frallain Group, Industrie Africa, Empowerment and Investment Group, na Ghana France Business Club

Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ The Rose nke Sharon Foundation, nke onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria, Oriakụ Folorunsho Alakija na European Commission Devco steering Committee maka International Colloquium for the Creative Economy
N'afọ 2011, Annan tọrọ ntọala Africa Fashion Foundation (AFF) iji kwado ụlọ ọrụ ejiji na-eto eto n'Africa
Ọ bụ onye soro wee tọọ ntọala nke Impact Fund for African Creatives (IFFAC), usoro ntinye ego mmetụta nde euro otu nari iji kwado ụlọ ọrụ okike na ụdị ndụ Africa
Roberta Annan Consulting bụkwa onye nwe Miss Universe Pageant site na 2011 ruo 2015, mana o nyefere nke a n'aka ndị njikwa ọhụrụ mgbe e boro ebubo na asọmpi ahụ agachaghị nke ọma
A mara Annan maka ọrụ ịnakọta ego gụnyere ego nde euro otu narị maka ihe okike Africa na mmekorita ya na UN-ITC Ethical Fashion Initiative
Annan Capital chụrụ nta ego site n'inwe mmekọ ya na ndị nwere ọnụ ahịa dị elu, ụlọ ọrụ na ntọala maka mmemme anaghị akwụ ụgwọ yana maka ọrụ nwere uru sitere na nde dọla isii ruo nde dọla otu nari

N'okpuru African Foundation Kayayei Initiative, Annan na ndị inyom Ghana ndị ọzọ gụnyere Ophelia Crossland, Torlowei na Velma Owusu-Bempah zụrụ ndị isi ụgbọ mmiri a maara dị ka Kaayei na ejiji na igwe ihe

N'oge nke oke ntiwapụ nke COVID-19 na Ghana, WEIG na mmekorita ya na Annan Capital Partners na GUBA, malitere COVID-19 Stimulus Fund, na-enye onyinye ego iji kwado na itinye ego na ụlọ ọrụ ndị inyom na-eduga na Ghana

Annan bụ onye so n'otu Young President Organisation (YPO), ugbu a ọ bụ UNEP Goodwill Ambassador for the Creative Economy, '20 under 40 Influential Business Leaders na Ghana', ndị '40 under 40 Influential Business Leaders in Consulting' na '100 Young Influential Africans, nakwa ' onye Afrika kacha nta nke a nabatara n'ime ụlọ nzukọ ọchịchị nke Africa'

Annan kwuru okwu na Ọgbakọ United Nations Conference on Trade and Development mgbe ha nwere mkparịta ụka gburugburu tebụl ya na Isabelle Durant, osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke UNCTAD; Mahendra Siregar, osote onye isi ala nke ihe gbasara mba ofesi na mba Republic of Indonesia na Marisa Henderson, onye isi UNCTAD Creative Economy
Roberta Annan bụ onye otu kansụl ndị ndụmọdụ nke Condé Nast College of Fashion and Design a ma ama
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ya na Edward Enninful, Victoria Beckham, Naomi Campbell, Suzy Menkes na Sarah Mower
Annan na nne ya na nwa ya nwoke bụ Allain bi na Accra, Ghana
Roberta Johnson Dunbar (nwụrụ na Nọvemba 1, 1956) bụ onye America, na-eme egwuregwu na onye na-ahụ maka udo nke bi na Rhode Island
A na-ede aha mbụ ya mgbe ụfọdụ 'Reberta' na isi mmalite
A mụrụ Roberta Johnson Dunbar na Narragansett Pier, Rhode Island, nwa nwanyị Daniel na Louisa (Cartwright) Dunbar
Site na afọ, 1902 ruo 1905, na ọzọ na 1931, Roberta J
Dunbar bụ onye isi oche nke Northeastern Federation of Colored Women's Clubs, otu nke National Association of Colored women (NACW)
N'afọ 1913, a họpụtara Dunbar dị ka onye guzobere Providence, alaka Rhode Island, nke National Association for the Advancement of Colored People
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Working Girls Club na Providence
Na afọ 1928
Dunbar na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Rhode Island Federation of Colored Women's Clubs
Dunbar bụ onye isi oche nke Ngalaba Udo nke NACW n'afọ ndị 1930

Ọ gwara nzukọ ahụ okwu na 1937 National Convention na Fort Worth, Texas na isiokwu ahụ, na-ekwu 'Anyị ụmụ nwanyị chọrọ udo, ọ dịghịkwa nwanyị si mba ọ bụla nọ n'ọnọdụ ka mma iji weta Oge a karịa ụmụ nwanyị America'
N'afọ 1950, Women's Newport League họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ha na mgbakọ mba NACW na Atlantic City
Dunbar nwụrụ n'afọ 1956, n'ụlọ ndị agadi na Providence
Roberta Washington bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ ma bụrụkwa onye otu American Institute of Architects kemgbe afọ 2006
O guzobere Roberta Washington Architects na 1983, nke, n'oge ahụ, bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ole na ole na United States nke nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka duziri
Ọ bụ Kọmishọna nke New York City Landmarks Preservation Commission site na 2007 ruo 2015
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke National Organization of Minority Architects (1997) ma bụrụkwa onye nduzi na Treasurer nke National Organization for Minority Architectes (NOMA) Foundation
Washington nwetara nzere Bachelor of Architecture na 1970 na Mahadum Howard Ọ gụsịrị nzere Master of Architecture na Mahadum Columbia n'afọ 1971
Ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ zuru oke na Mahadum Columbia ya na ụmụ akwụkwọ iri abụọ na ise ndị ọzọ si Afrịka Amerịka dị ka nzaghachi maka ọgba aghara ụlọ akwụkwọ ya na 1968
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nzere masta ya, ọ nọrọ afọ anọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ na ụlọ na Mozambique
N'oge agụmakwụkwọ ya, ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'òtù gụnyere Women's Caucus na American Institute of Architects na Alliance of Women in Architecture
Ịmekọrịta ya na ndị na-ewu ụlọ ibe ya nyere aka kpalie Washington ịrụ ọrụ iji hụ na ihe nketa nke ndị isi ojii na ụmụ nwanyị efunahụghị
Ọ na-eme nchọpụta ma na-ede banyere ndị na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Beverly Loraine Green na Georgia Louise Harris Brown kemgbe afọ 1997
A họpụtara Washington ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nke Society of Architectural Historians na 2021
Ọ bụ onye otu Board of Directors nke Save Harlem Now
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Community Board 10 na Central Harlem ebe ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Ụlọ na onye isi oche ya nke Kọmiti Ojiji Ala
Robin Amelia Arzón bụ onye nkuzi mmega ahụ nke America na onye edemede, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka onye nkuzi na Peloton, nke ọ bụkwa osote onye isi oche nke mmemme ahụike
A mụrụ Robin Arzón na Philadelphia n'aka nne onye Cuban gbara ọsọ ndụ na nna Puerto Rican
Nne ya bụ dọkịta nke kụziiri onwe ya Bekee site na ikiri PBS
Nna ya bụ onye ọka iwu na onye bụbu prọfesọ iwu
Dị ka nwatakịrị, a gbara ya ume ilekwasị anya na agụmakwụkwọ na ezinụlọ
Arzón attended New York University, where she graduated magna cum laude
Afterwards, she went on to attend Villanova University School of Law
Arzón gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum nke Villanova nke na ahụ maka iwu na 2007 ma nọrọ afọ asaa dị ka onye na-ekpe ikpe na Paul, Hastings, Janofsky & Walker, LLP
Nna ya, onye bụkwa onye ọka iwu, kpaliri ya ma gbaa ya ume ka ọ gaa n'ihu n'ọrụ iwu
N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2002, mgbe ọ nọ na klas dị ala, e jidere Arzón na ndị ọzọ 40 n'ụlọ mmanya dị na East Village nke Manhattan
'Otu nwoke, nke ji égbè atọ na mma agha samurai, gbagburu mmadụ atọ, jiri kerosene mee ka ìgwè ahụ dị nro ma yie ha egwu na ọkụ barbecue
O jidere Arzon na ntutu ma jide égbè ahụ na ọkụ ya n'isi ya ka ọ na-eji ya dị ka ọta mmadụ iji soro ndị uwe ojii kwurịta okwu
Ndị ahịa abụọ mechara jide nwoke ahụ, na-enye ndị uwe ojii ohere ịbanye n'ụlọ mmanya ma merie ya
Mmetụta a kpaliri Arzon ịmalite ịgba ọsọ na nke mbụ ya na ndụ ya
Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, n'afọ 2003, ọ hụrụ mpempe akwụkwọ maka ọsọ puku irir n'otu ụlọ akụ n'ehihie Fraịdee wee kpebie isonye na ọsọ ahụ n'ụtụtụ echi ya
10K a ga-abụ asọmpi mbụ nke Arzon na mbọ mbụ ya na ndụ ya
O kwuru banyere ọchịchọ ahụ, 'Amaghị m ebe 10km dị na kilomita'
Mgbe asọmpi ahụ gasịrị, ọ malitere ịgba ọsọ 2-3 kilomita n'otu oge n'etiti klas ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu ya
N'ime afọ iri sochirinụ, mgbe ọ na-agbaso iwu, ọ hụrụ ịgba ọsọ, ahụike, na ahụike n'anya wee malite ịkwadebe maka mgbanwe ọrụ
Arzon agbaala ihe karịrị agbụrụ 50, gụnyere oso 25, ultramarathons atọ dị kilomita 50, na otu agbụrụ dị kilomita 100
Ọ gbara ọsọ ukwu mbụ ya na oso mba new york, n'afọ 2010

O nwere oge ọ gbara ọsọ ise n'ime ụbọchị ise maka MS Run the US iji sọpụrụ nne ya, nke edere na ihe ngosi Run It Out Ọ gwụchara ọsọ 100 kilomita mbụ ya na Keys100 - ọsọ nke malitere na Key Largo ma kwụsị na Key West, Florida - n'ihe na-erughị awa 30 na 2016
N'afọ 2012, Arzon malitere ọrụ na ahụike na ahụike mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọka iwu
Ọ malitere n'oge a dị ka onye nta akụkọ egwuregwu n'efu, na-ede maka akwụkwọ dị ka Newsweek na New York Magazine
O mere akụkọ egwuregwu site na ihe ịma aka nke london2012
Arzon chọrọ ịbịaru ndị na-eme egwuregwu nso ma chọọ igosi ndị ọzọ na enwere ụzọ ọzọ ị ga-esi bụrụ onye na-eme ihe
Ọ gakwuuru John Foley, onye isi oche nke Peloton, na 2014 ọ sonyeere Peloton na New York City dị ka onye nkuzi
N'afọ 2016, e buliri ya n'ọkwa osote onye isi oche nke Fitness and Programming nke Peloton
N'afọ 2013, Arzon jikọrọ aka guzobe òtù ahụike, na ihu ihe gbasara mmezi ihe pụrụ iche na akwụkwọ obibi akwụkwọ nke
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị America 20 a ma ama na-aga Serengeti na National Geographic Channel, MYGRATIONS, na 2015
Usoro ahụ, nke gosipụtara na 2016, gosipụtara mmadụ 20 na-agagharị na njem nke mbata wildebeest kwa afọ nke na-eme n'oge opupu ihe ubi ọ bụla site na Serengeti Plains gaa Maasai Mara na Kenya
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, ndị sitere na ndị na-eme egwuregwu na ndị na'egwuregwu, enyeghị ha map ma ọ bụ ngwá agha ma buru naanị nri na mmiri
Arzon bụ onye nnọchi anya Adidas zuru ụwa ọnụ
Ọ pụtara na mkpọsa mkpọsa ha abiala mimeputa na 2016
Ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi na-agba ọsọ ụzọ isi nke ndị òtù Amirika

A chọpụtara Arzon dị ka onye na-arịa ọrịa shuga nke Type 1 na 2014 ma ugbu a ọ nọ na oche ọchịchị nke gáfèrè ndị mbu otu na-enweghị uru nke lekwasịrị anya n'ịkwalite mmata banyere ọrịa shuga nke ụdị 1 nke Nick Jonas guzobere
GoN'afọ 2019, Arzon lụrụ onye njikwa itinye ego Drew Butler na Tulum, Mexico
Ya na Butler zutere n'ụlọ mmanya dị na odida anyanwu nke villae nke Manhattan na 2016
Ahụmahụ agbamakwụkwọ ha nke ụbọchị anọ sitere n'ịhụnanya ha nwere maka Burning Man
Arzon na Butler kwupụtara ọmụmụ nwa mbụ ha, nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Athena Amelia Arzón-Butler, na Machị 2, 2021
Arzon bụ onye na-eri nri
Robin Holder (amụrụ n'afọ 1952) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nkírí na ónyé na-eme ihe ike n'oge a
A maara Holder màkà ihe osise na ihe osise ya nke mgbasa ozi na ihe osisa nke na-elekwasị anya na isiokwu nke mmụọ na agbụrụ, ọkwa, ikpe ziri ezi, na ahụmịhe onwé ónyé
E nyere Robin Holder ọrụ ịmepụta ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nka ọha na eze na North-Eastern United States, gụnyere New York City na New Jersey
Enwere ike ịchọta ọtụtụ ọrụ ya abụọ n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta, gụnyere Library of Congress, Washington State Arts Commission, na Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture
Robin etinyela aka na agụmakwụkwọ nka ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ
Robin Holder, amụrụ na Chicago na 1952 ma zụlite na New York City, bụ nwa nwanyị nke nna African American Episcopalian na nne Caucasian Russian American Jewish

Ezinụlọ ya na ọbọdọ ndị ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ site na nwata lekwasịrị anya na nsogbụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na-eme ka ọ mara banyéré ọdịiche dị n'etiti nwoke na nwanyị, agbụrụ, okpukpe na mmekọrịta mmadụ na eze gbụrụ-gbúrụ ya

Robin gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na New York City, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1969 na LaGuardia High School Of Music and Arts Holder natara agụmakwụkwọ na The Art Students League of New York (1969−71) ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Marshall Glasier, Vaclav Vytlacil, Morris Kantor, na Rudolf Baranik
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na The Art Students League nke New York, Holder kwagara Mexico ma jiri oge mepụta nka
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ otu afọ na Amsterdam Grafisch Atelier na-amụ lithography (1976-1977) ma mesịa bụrụ osote ónyé nduzi màkà Robert Blackburn's Printmaking Workshop na New York City ruo 1986

Mgbè ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ ya na Bob Blackburn's Printmaking Workshop, Holder gara n'ihu bụrụ ónyé nkụzi na-akụzi ihe na The Studio in a School na onye nkụzi ónyé na-ese ihe na The Children's Museum of Manhattan ruo 1989, mgbè ọ natara onyinye site na Manhattan Graphics Center
Ọ bụ New York State Council on the Arts kwadoro ya na mmemme óbíbí ya na El Museo Del Barrio
Site na 2004-2006 Holder zụrụ ndị nkuzi nka banyéré otu esi eji Blueprint màkà nkuzi na mmụta na mmemme nka

Holder natara Onyinye Ónyé Ọkpụkpọ Visual Artist site na Brooklyn Arts Council na 1999, mgbè ahụ na 2001, ọ bụ ónyé omenkà ahọpụtara maka mmemme Mid Atlantic Arts Foundation's Artist As Catalyst na 2005 na onye omenkọta ọbịa na Temple Visual Arts Festival
Na mgbakwunye, Holder bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Experimental Printmaking Institute na Lafayette College na 2011
Robina Gureme Rwakoojo bụ onye ọka iwu Ugandan, onye omeiwu nke na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye nnọchi anya onye omeiwu maka Gomba West County na Gomba District na omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Ọ nwere njikọ na National Resistance Movement (NRM)
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri nke Uganda
Ọ sonyekwara n'asọmpi maka onye nnọchi anya onye isi okwu na nke 11th parliament nke Uganda
A mụrụ Robina Gureme Rwakoojo na 17 Julaị 1964 n'ezinụlọ Anglican
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Primary Leaving Examinations 1976 na Nakasero Primary School
Ọ gara Nabumali High School ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Uganda Certificate of Education na 1980
Ma site na Kings College Budo na 1984, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education
Rwakoojo Gureme Rwakoojo gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ na Law na Mahadum Makerere na 1990

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Postgraduate Diploma na Legal Practice site na Law Development Centre na 1990 na Postgr graduate Diploma na Public Administration and Management site na Uganda Management Institute na afo puku na asaa

Robina Gureme Rwakoojo bụ onye ọka iwu steeti maka Ngalaba Ọchịchị Ọchịchị n'okpuru Ministry of Justice and Constitutional Affairs site na 1990 - 1992 ma n'ime otu nzukọ ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye ọka iwu obodo site na 1992 - 1995
Ọ ghọrọ Onye Ọkaiwu Steeti maka Ngalaba Ọchịchị Ọchịchị n'okpuru Ministry of Justice and Constitutional Affairs site na 1995 - 1996
Maka Directorate of Legal Advisory Services n'okpuru Ministry of Justice and Constitutional Affairs, ọ bụ (onye ọka iwu ukwu steeti site na 1996 - 1999 ma mesịa ghọọ onye ọka iwu steeti 1999 - 2003)
Ọ ghọrọ onye ọka iwu steeti maka Directorate of Civil Litigation n'okpuru Ministry of Justice and Constitutional Affairs site na 2003 - 2007
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi na-anọchite anya, maka Directorate of Civil Litigation n'okpuru Ministry of Justice and Constitutional Affairs site na 2007 - 2008
Rwakoojo ghọrọ onye na-anọchite anya onye nduzi Civil Litigation maka Ministry of Justice and Constitutional Affairs site na 2008 - 2013
Ọ ghọrọ Kọmishọna Line Ministries maka Directorate of Civil Litigation n'okpuru Ministry of Justice and Constitutional Affairs site na 2010 - 2015
N'afọ 2016, ọ meriri oche maka ịbụ onye nnọchi anya ndị omeiwu maka Gomba West County na Gomba District na nke iri nke Uganda
A họpụtara ya ọzọ maka otu oche ahụ na puku abụọ na iri abụọ na abụọ
Ọ na-anọdụ na kọmitii maka nhọpụta, ọ bụkwa Onye isi oche nke Iwu na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu na nzuko omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Ohere Ịha nhata na ndị omeiwu nke iri

A họpụtakwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi kọmitii ahọpụtara site na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu na ntụziaka nke Onye isi oche Rebecca Kadaga nke nyochara ebubo nke ime ihe ike mmekọahụ na iyi egwu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, mahadum na ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu

ụfọdụ n'ime Robina Gureme Rwakoojo ọrụ ndị ọzọ na onyinye gụnyere ịkwado ndị otu bọọlụ na mpaghara ahụ, ịkwado ụmụ nwanyị SACCOS, mmezu nke Borehole Project na Mpanda, Kyegonza, Kanoni TC maka ndị ya na Gomba West County
O sonyekwara na nyocha nke ime ihe ike mmekọahụ na iyi egwu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, mahadum na ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu
O sonyekwara na ọgụgụ nke abụọ nke Iwu Ndezigharị Iwu ma vootu Ee na ya
O sonyekwara n'ọtụtụ ikpe ụlọ ikpe
Hope Robina Mukisa (amụrụ na 4 Septemba 1991) bụ onye omeiwu nwanyị na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda

Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti maka Namayingo District na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda Ọ sonyeere ndị omeiwu na 2016 na tiketi National Resistance Movement party (NRM), otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Uganda n'okpuru onye isi oche nke Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, onye isi ala nke Republic of Uganda
Mukisa gara St
Michael High School Mukono ebe ọ nọrọ na Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education (UACE) n'afọ 2010
O mechara gaa Mahadum Makerere ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ na azụmahịa (BCOM) n'afọ 2016
Mukisa bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Uganda na-anọchite anya ndị obodo Namayingo dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya kemgbe 2016
Na ndị omeiwu, ọ na-eje ozi na Kọmitii na-ahụ maka Azụmaahịa na Ụlọ Ọrụ Njem
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA), ebe ọ na-eje ozi na kọmitii tebụl gburugburu 'usoro usoro'
Robinah Nabbanja (amụrụ na 17 Disemba 1969) bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, onye bụ praịm minista nke Uganda, mgbe a họpụtara ya n'ọfịs na 8 June 2021
Nzukọ omebe iwu kwadoro ya n'ụzọ doro anya na 21 June 2021
Ọ nọchiri Ruhakana Rugunda, onye a kpọrọ aha n'ọkwa onye nnọchi anya maka ọrụ pụrụ iche n'ọfịs onye isi ala nke Uganda
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ praịm minista nke Uganda
N'oge gara aga, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Ahụike nke Steeti maka Ọrụ Nchịkọta na kansụl Ugandan, n'etiti 14 Disemba 2019 ruo 3 Mee 2021
Ọ na-eje ozi n'otu oge ahụ dị ka onye omeiwu a họpụtara maka mpaghara ụmụ nwanyị nke Kakumiro na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri na otu (20212026), ọrụ ọ rụkwara na Nzukọ nke iri (20162021)
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara Kakumiro nke oge a, na 17 Disemba 1969
Ọ gara Nkooko Primary School
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na St
Edward's Secondary School Bukuumi, maka ma ọmụmụ O-Level na A-Level, na-enweta ma Uganda Certificate of Education na Uganda Advanced Certificate of education site n'ebe ahụ

N'etiti 1990 na 2000, Nabbanja nwetara asambodo na diplọma na idu ndú, njikwa na ọmụmụ mmepe, site na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche, gụnyere Mahadum Uganda Martyrs, Uganda Management Institute, Mahadum Islamic na Uganda na National Leadership Institute Kyankwanzi
Ọ bụ Mahadum Uganda Martyrs nyere ya nzere bachelọ nke Democracy na Development Studies na Master of Arts na Development Studies
Site na 1993 ruo 1996, Nabbanja bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ na Uganda Martyrs Secondary School Kakumiro
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ distrikti, na-anọchite anya Nkooko Sub-County, n'ihe bụ Kibaale District n'oge ahụ, site na 1998 ruo 2001
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'otu oge ahụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ maka ahụike, Mmekọahụ na Ọrụ Obodo maka distrikti n'oge ahụ
Ọ nọrọ afọ iri sochirinụ (2001-2010) na-eje ozi dị ka Kọmishọna Mpaghara na mpaghara Pallisa, Busia na Budaka
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu, ọ sonyeere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ntuli aka nke Uganda site n'ịgba ọsọ maka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke mpaghara Kibaale na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke itoolu (2011X2016)
Mgbe Kakumiro District dị ka e kere ya na afo puku abụọ na iri na isii, ọ gbara ọsọ maka Women Constituency na mpaghara ọhụrụ wee merie ọzọ
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu nọ n'ọkwa
N'ime mgbanwe nke ndị kansụl na 14 Disemba 2019, a họpụtara Nabbanja ka ọ bụrụ Minista Ahụike nke Steeti (General Duties), na-anọchi Sarah Achieng Opendi onye a kpọrọ Minista Steeti maka akụ na ụba
N'ịgbaso nkwado ndị omeiwu, a ṅụrụ ya iyi n'ọkwa na 13 Jenụwarị 2020
N'ime ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ a kpọrọ aha na 8 June 2021, a kpọrọ Nabbanja Praịm Minista nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọkụ azụ 82 (2021 ruo 2026)
N'ọnwa Disemba 2021, n'oge ntuli aka nke LC5 na Kayunga, Robinah Nabbanja gara mkpọsa ụbọchị 5 ma bo ya ebubo na ọ na-enye 4000 UGX iri ngo iji vootu onye NRM Muwonge
Robyn Kimberly Moodaly (amụrụ na 16 Junu1994) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ South Afrika nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti maka otu ụmụ nwanyị South Afrika
Ọ gara 2012 na 2016 Summer Olympics
A mụrụ Robyn Moodaly na East London, Eastern Cape, South Afrika
Ọ malitere ịgba bọọlụ, ka ọ na-etolite, na-akọwa ya dị ka 'ịnọ na mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa m'
Moodaly na-egwuri egwu na ndị otu ụmụ nwoke, ebe ọ bụ na enweghị ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị dị nso ma mesịa kwaga Johannesburg iji gaa n'ihu na-egwu egwuregwu ahụ
N'afọ 2013, Moodaly sonyeere AIB College of Business na Des Moines, Iowa
Ọ zụrụ na ndị otu bọọlụ kọleji mana enweghị ike igwu egwu na egwuregwu ọ bụla na 2013 n'ihi red tape
Moodaly gbara egwuregwu abụọ maka otu W-League Colorado Rush Women na 2013
Mgbe ọ na-aga Mahadum Pretoria's High Performance Centre, Moodaly dọtara uche ndị na-ahọrọ ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba South Afrika bụ ndị debara aha ya n'ime ndị otu mba Under17
Moodaly bụ akụkụ nke nhọpụta South Afrika na 2010 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
O mere nke mbụ ya maka ndị otu mba dị elu mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii na Jenụwarị afọ 2011
Ọ pụtara naanị maka ndị otu na-erubeghị afọ iri abụọ na otu mgbe ọ gbachara bọọlụ maka ndị okenye, na-agbanwe azụ na azụ n'etiti akụkụ abụọ ahụ n'ọtụtụ oge
O kwuru na nke a bụ n'ihi enweghị ụmụ nwanyị na-egwu egwuregwu
A họpụtara ya maka ndị otu South Afrika na 2012 Summer Olympics na London, United Kingdom
N'ime afọ ndị sochirinụ, mmerụ ahụ gbochiri ya, ma lụọ ọgụ iji ruo eruo n'oge maka 2016 Summer Olympics na Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
A họpụtara ya maka egwuregwu na-ekpo ọkụ ozugbo tupu asọmpi ahụ, megide ndị mmeri ụwa United States
A họpụtara ya maka ndị otu ahụ
Robyn Nesbitt (amụrụ n'afọ 1984) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg ugbu a
Nesbitt gụrụ na Mahadum Witwatersrand, ma Johannesburg
N'afọ 2007 ọ natara ihe nrite Spier Contemporary
Ọrụ Nesbitt dị iche site na nyocha ya nke ọma nke ihe ndị na-eme kwa ụbọchị site na usoro ndụ anyị na usoro eluigwe gbara anyị gburugburu
Oge na-atọ ọchị, nke na-ede uri, na nke na-adịghị mkpa na-aghọ ihe eji eme ihe na mgbasa ozi nke gụnyere nyocha, usoro, akwụkwọ, eserese, vidiyo, na foto
Ọ na-esokarị Nina Barnett emepụta ihe
Rahkeim Calief Meyer (amụrụ na Febụwarị 11, 1978), nkè a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Roc Marciano, bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu, onye na-ede egwu, na onye na-emepụta ihe
Roc Marciano sonyeere ndị ọrụ Busta Rhymes, Flipmode Squad, na-aghọ onye nke isii mgbè ọpụpụ nke Lord Have Mercy

Roc Marciano hapụrụ n'afọ 2001 iji guzobe UN, otu hip hop siri ike nke nwéré MC atọ ndị ọzọ (Dino Brave, Laku & Mic Raw) bụ ndị ya na ha wepụtara otu abọm na Carson Daly's 456 Entertainment n'afọ 2004
Roc Marciano pụtara na 2005 Wu-Tang Clan compilation album, Wu-Tag Meets the Indie Culture, na na 2008 Pete Rock's album, NY's Finest, na-enweta otuto màkà ụdị arụmọrụ dị otú ahụ
Kemgbe afọ 2008, Roc Marciano anọwo na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya, ma na-eto eto n'ịntanetị, wepụtara abọm izizi ya, Marcberg na 2010
Na Febụwarị 21, 2017, Roc Marciano wepụtara Rosebudd's Revenge site na ébé nrụọrụ weebụ ya RocMarcicom
Abọm ahụ gosipụtara Ka na Knowledge the Pirate, ndị na-arụkọ ọrụ Roc Marciano ugboro ugboro, na mmepụta sitere ná Arch Druids, Mushroom Jesus, Modus Op, Knxwledge, na Roc Marciano n'onwe ya
Owelle Rochas Anayo Okorocha (amụrụ 22 Septemba 1962) bụ onye ọchụnta ego nke ndị Naijirịa ọtụtụ ijeri, onye na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke sitere na steeti Imo

Okorocha bụ onye bụbu gọvanọ na onye omebe iwu na-anọchite anya Imo West Senatorial district na itenani Senate nke United States, onye meriri ntuli aka nke 6 May 2011 na Imo State ma họpụta ya maka oge nke abụọ ya na Eprel 11, 2015
onye bụbu gọvanọ ga-anọchi anya Imo West Senatorial District n'ụlọ ndozi uhie
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Rochas Foundation, ọrụ ebere nwere ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ pụrụ iche na-agbasa na Naịjirịa niile nke na-enye ụmụ akwụkwọ na-enweghị ohere na Nigeria ihe mmụta
N’ozi mbụ ọ gara, ọ gbara ọsọ n’elu All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA) wee gbara n’elu ikpo okwu All Progressives Congress maka oge nke abụọ ya
Amụrụ Rochas na 22 Septemba na afo 1962 na Ogboko, Ideato South, Imo State
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke Juladaco, Jos (1976-1981)
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Jos (1990-1991), nwetara diplọma na Ọchịchị
Ọ laghachiri Mahadum Jos (1993-1994) iji nweta diplọma dị elu na Ọchịchị

Ọnọdụ ndị ọrụ gụnyere Onye isi ala, Nigeria Red Cross Society, Onye isi ala / Onye guzobere, Rochas Foundation Inc, Onye isi ala, Rochas Group of Company Limited, Pro Chancellor, African Business School na Onye isi oche mbụ, Board of Nigeria Airspace Management Agency
Okorocha bụ onye Kọmịshọna na Federal Character Commission na onye otu Mgbakọ Naịjirịa Maka Iwu Ọchịchị
Mgbe e weghachiri ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na 1999, Rochas Okorocha soro na ntuli aka nke ịbụ onye People's Democratic Party (PDP) maka onye gọvanọ nke steeti Imo, mana Achike Udenwa meriri
Ọ banyere na All Nigeria People's Party (ANPP), bụrụkwa onye na-emeghi eme nke ọma maka Onye isi ala na ikpo okwu ANPP na 2003
Ọ laghachiri na PDP, Onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo họpụtara ya dị ka onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche na Inter-Party
Rochas Okorocha guzobere otu
pati Action Alliance (AA) na 2005, na-ezube ịzọ onye isi ala maka AA na ntuli aka 2007
Ọ laghachiri na PDP ọzọ, na Septemba 2007 gosipụtara na ọ nwere mmasị ịghọ Onye isi oche nke PDP

Mgbe Gọvanọ Ikedi Ohakim kwụsịrị site na Progressive Peoples Alliance (PPA) gaa PDP na July 2009, Okorocha gọrọ agọ na Ohakim weghaara PDP na steeti ahụ, na-ekwu na akpọrọ ya dị ka onye isi ebe ọ bụ gọvanọ, mana nke kwesịrị ekwesị
Ekwesịrị ịme nnọkọ PDP iji kpebie iwu
Okorocha si na PDP banye na All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA) ka ọ wee bụrụ onye ga-abụ APGA maka gọvanọ Imo Steeti na ntuli aka ọchịchị Eprel 2011
Ka izu ole na ole gachara, na Disemba afọ 2010, APGA kwụsịtụrụ Okorocha na pati ahụ ihe ọ kọwara dị ka ihe ndị ọzọ na-emegide ndị ọzọ na-echere nyocha nke omume ya
Okorocha na ndi ya na ha yukwara egwu Onye isi ochichi Imo State na ode akwukwo APGA
Ka osi di, Okorocha gara n'ihu na dika onye ochichi APGA ma merie na-esote
Rochas na 2013 degharịrị na All Progressive Congress
Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC na aha ichafu) kwupụtara na ntuli aka gọvanọ Imo Steeti emere na 26 Eprel 2011 bụ nke nwere mgbagha n'ihi na o enweghị usoro
INEC nyere iwu ka a na-emegharị n'ime mpaghara ọchịchị obodo anọ na otu ngalaba, ka aga eme na 6 Mee 2011
Na mmemme ahụ, emeghị ntuli aka na mpaghara gọọmentị Oguta n'ihi ihe egwu egwu
Nsonaazụ ikpeazụ mere Okorocha nke APGA kwupụtara mmeri na ntuli aka 336,859
Onye na-esote gọvanọ bụ Ikedi Ohakim nke PDP jiri ntuli aka 290,490 sochiri ya
Onye bụbu Senator Ifeanyi Araraume nke Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN) bụ onye nke atọ na ntuli aka 107,068
Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan kelere Okorocha na nhoputa ya, na-ekwu na ndị Imo State kwuru okwu site na igbe vootu
Na nkwadebe maka ntuli aka nke 2015, onye bụbu osote onye isi oche, ulo ndị nnọchiteanya, Hon
Emeka Ihedioha, tụbara ya okpu maka nsogbu ọchịchị
Mgbe o nwesịrị iwepu kaadị tiketi ndị PDP na ndị ọzọ na-asọ mpi, o jiri onye isi ala, Okorocha bibie ya
Ntuli aka ahụ mechara mee n’Eprel 11, 2015 mgbe ụbọchị isii gachara n’izu isii gbanwere mgbe ndị gọọmentị etiti kwuru maka nsogbu nchekwa
Dịka o mere na ntuli aka izizi nke Okorocha, nke abụọ a kwupụtara na-enweghị mgbagha
INEC kwupụtara nhoputa ndi ochichi nke Eprel 11 na Imo enweghi ntukwasiobi, mmepe nke mere ka akagbuo ntuli aka na ntuli aka ntuli aka iri abuo na ano n'ime ogbe iri ato na ato nke ochichi
Kọmishọna ndị na-ahụ maka ime obodo (REC), Maazị Gabriel Ada, edepụtara mpaghara steeti metụtara na ntinye aka ịgụnye; Ikeduru, Isiala Mbano, Isu, Oguta, Owerri West, na Oru East
Ọ kọwara na ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ntụli aka nyere iwu ka eweghachi azụ maka ntuli aka gọvanọ n'ihi ọdịiche dị 79,000 n'etiti ntuli aka ndị isi na ndị nke abụọ nwetara
Okorocha meriri na ntuli aka nke abụọ emere n'ọnwa Eprel 25, 2015
N’oge ọ dị ka gọvanọ, n’otu n’ime ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya na telivishọn na Channels Television , o jiri okwu ahụ bụ “iberiberism” mgbe ọ na-achọ ịkọwa ọrụ ya dịka gọvanọ
Iberiberism sitere na okwu igbo 'iberibe' nke pụtara nzuzu ma ọ bụ nzuzu
Nke a mere ka ya nwee nnukwu mgbasa ozi na ọwa mgbasa ozi
Ọ nọ ya na ụbọchị ndị 2019 nke afọ nke na Owerri, ihe omume ụbọchị abụọ ahụ malitere site na ntinye abalị nke gọọmentị Imo steeti 'Gọvanọ Rochas Okorocha
On 2 March 2013 Rochas ada otu APGA òtù na-etolite na All Progressives Congress
Ndị ọrụ ibe ya mechara họpụta ya na ndị mmegide dịka Onye isi oche ndị ọchịchị Progressive Governors Forum

Mgbe ngwụcha nke ọchịchị ya, Okorocha họpụtara ọgọ ya nwoke bụ Uche Nwosu, onye bụ onye isi ndị ọrụ, dịka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ya maka ịzọ ọkwa gọvanọ n'okpuru APC, mana Sineto Hope Uzodinma meriri Uche Nwosu na-ndọrọ ndọrọ maka oche gọvanọ nke primarį
Uche Nwosu gbaghaa ndị otu pati Alliance Alliance (AA) mgbe ahu, e mechara ọ ghọrọ onye eburu ọkọlọtọ gọvanọ ha
na Machị 1, 2019 APC kwụsịtụrụ Okorocha ya na Amosun maka mmegide mmemme nkevotu ahu

Ọ soro zọọ ndọrọ ndọrọ omeiwu tiketi maka Sineti nke iteghete na-anọchite anya Imo ọdịda anyanwụ Orlu omeiwu mpaghara n'oge 2019 National Assembly ntuli aka otú ọ dị, ndị INEC enwebeghi mkpebi banyere ya
Na agbanyeghị na ekwuputere ya na ọ bụ onye meriri oche ọdịda anyanwụ Imo, INEC wepụrụ aha ya na ndepụta nke ikpeazụ na-ekwu na ekwuputara nsonaazụ ahụ n'okpuru ọchịchị
EClọ INEC nyere ya satifiketi ịlaghachi na June 11th, 2019 mgbe e guzobere ọgbakọ nke ọgbakọ itenani nke ndị omebe iwu na-ekwupụta na ọ bụ onye meriri na ntuli aka nke ndị ọdịda anyanwụ Imo
Onye isi ala Senate Ahmed Ahmed Lawanụrụ iyi Okorocha na June 13, 2019
N'ọnwa Mee 2022, Rochas Okorocha ka enwetala nsogbu n'iwu ya
Ebe a na-enyo enyo maka nrụrụaka dị ya n'obi, e jidere ya n'Abuja
Dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka nrụrụ aka na-ahụ maka nrụrụ aka siri kwuo, mmejọ ndị a eboro ebubo mere n'oge ọ na-achị dịka gọvanọ steeti Imo nke dị na ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ nke mba ahụ n'etiti 2011 na 2019
Ọnụ ego ndị a na-apụnara ihe ga-abụ 29
ijeri naira (ihe dị ka nde dọla asaa)
Rodney Roy Jerkins (amụrụ na Julaị 29, 1977), nke a makwaara site na aha egwu ya bụ Darkchild, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé na-eti egwu, na ónyé na-ede egwu
Ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe a ma ama na-arụkọ ọrụ
Jerkins enwetala ọtụtụ Grammy Awards
Otu n'ime ihe ndị ọ rụzuru nkè ọma bụ 'The Boy Is Mine' na 'What About Us?' nke Brandy, 'I Can Love You' na 'Enough Cryin' nke Mary J

Blige, 'Daydreamin nke Tatyana Ali, 'Angel of Mine' nke' Monica, 'It's Not Right but It's Okay' nké Whitney Houston, 'Say My Name' na 'Cater 2 U' nke Destiny's Justin's Child Bieberphone, 'You Had My Love' nke Jennifer Lopez, 'He Wasn't Lady, Love' nké Beyon Jton, My World' nke Toni Braxton, 'He Love, 'He World' nke Beyon 'As You' nke Michael'
Rodney McMillian (amụrụ na 1969, na Columbia, South Carolina) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Los Angeles
McMillian bụ Prọfesọ nkè ihe osise na UCLA School of Arts and Architecture na Mahadum California, Los Angeles
McMillian nwèrè BA na Foreign Affairs na Mahadum Virginia
Ọ gụrụ nka na School of the Art Institute of Chicago na Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture, ma nweta nzèrè Master of Fine Arts na California Institute of the Arts na 2002

AsE gosipụtara ọrụ McMillian na UCLA Hammer Museum na Museum of Contemporary Art, Los Angeles, Studio Museum na Harlem New York, Herning Art Museum na Denmark, Royal Academy na London, Boston's Institute of Contemporary Arts na Whitney
Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta gụnyere Harald Falckenberg Collection na Saatchi Gallery
E gosipụtara ihe ngosi onwé ya nkè afọ 2012 Prospect Ave na Maccarone na New York ma gosipụta ihe ọkpụkpụ a chọtara, ntinye pụrụ iche, vidiyo, na ihe osise
Rafiat Folakemi Sule (amụrụ n'Ubọsi atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2000), bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu na klọb maka ASD
Pink Sport Time nke dị na Bari, na Serie A
Ọ na-eyi agba nke Rivers Angels, ọ bụkwa onye kacha gbaa bọọlụ na league maka oge abụọ n'usoro
A kọwawo ya dị ka 'onye nwere nkà na ụzụ' nke nwere anya dị nkọ maka ihe mgbaru ọsọ site n'ebe niile
N'ọnwa Meẹ afọ 2015, Sule kwughachiri nkwenye ya zuru oke na ikike nke ndị otu ya na onye njikwa ya na oge na-aga n'ihu
O kwuru na o kwenyesiri ike na Bayelsa Queens ga-emechi oge ahụ n'ọnọdụ dị mma
N'oge afọ 2015, Sule gbara goolu iri na otu na league na goolu abụọ na Federations Cup
Ọ raara buutu ọla edo ya nye nna ya nwụrụ anwụ na ndị otu ya maka mkpali ahụ, na-akọwa onyinye ahụ dị ka ihe bịara na mberede na dị ka ihe ịrịba ama na ọ nọ n'ụzọ ziri ezi iji mezuo nrọ ya
Sule weere ya dị ka ihe na-egosi mbọ ndị otu ya na-agba
N'afọ 2016, arụmọrụ ya maka Bayelsa Queens mere ka a họpụta ya maka onye ọkpụkpọ nke ọnwa May 2016
Na Machị 2017, Rivers Angels bịanyere aka na Sule n'akụkụ, Cecilia Nku, Halimatu Ayinde na Tochukwu Oluehi
Na 2017 Ladies in Sports conference, a na-asọpụrụ Sule maka arụmọrụ ya dị ịrịba ama n'oge oge gara aga
Ọ sonyeere ndị otu Italian Serie ASD
Pink Sport Time nke dị na Bari n'ọnwa Ọgọst 2020
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2018, a kpọrọ Sule ka ọ bịa n'ogige ndị otu mba Naịjịria n'ihu iko WAFU na Côte d'Ivoire, mana ọ banyeghị na ndepụta ndị otu ikpeazụ
Roger Graham Barry (ụbọchị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1935 rụọ ụbọchị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2018) bụ onye America a mụrụ na Britain na-ahụ màkà ọdịdị ala na ihu igwe
Ọ nwetara nzèrè doctorate na Mahadum Southampton n'afọ 1965 wee bídó ịkụzi na Mahadim Colorado afọ atọ ka e mesịrị

Mgbè ọ na-eduzi National Snow and Ice Data Center site n'afo 1976 ruo 2008, Barry natara Guggenheim Fellowship na 1982, e nyère ya fellowship nkè American Geophysical Union na 1999, ma kụzie na Mahadum Moscow State dị ka Fulbright Scholar na 2001
Tupu ọ hapụ Russia, a kpọrọ Barry ónyé mba ọzọ so na Russian Academy of Natural Sciences
N'afọ 2007, e nyère Barry ihe nrite onye guzobere ya site na Royal Geographical Society
Ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 2010, ma nwụọ n'ubochi irí na itoolu n'ọnwa Machị 2018, mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ abụọ
Roger Gnoan M'Bala (amụrụ n'afọ 1943) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri si Ivory Coast
A mụrụ ya na Grand-Bassam, Ivory Coast, ọ gụrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na Paris nakwa ihe nkiri na Conservatoire libre du cinéma français (CLCF) ma mesịa na Sweden
Site na 1968 ruo 1978, ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka Radiodiffusion Télévision ivoirienne (RTI)
tupu o mepụta ihe ngosi ojii na ọcha nke 1970 na ịgba egwu ọdịnala Koundoum
N'afọ 1972 ọ meriri Silver Tanit na Carthage Film Festival na obere Amanie na ọtụtụ onyinye ndị ọzọ gụnyere FIFEF
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o mepụtara ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi, Valisy na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị, Le Chapeau
N'afọ 1984, o duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Ablakon
A maara ya n'ihi ihe nkiri ya bụ Au nom du Christ, meriri na 1993 a premio giovani na Locarno International Film Festival na Étalon de Yennenga na FESPACO
A mụrụ ya na 1943 na Grand Bassam isi obodo mbụ nke Côte d'Ivoire
Roger Margerum (1931 ruo Jụn 21, 2016) bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ Afrịka-Amerịka architect
Ọ biri na mpaghara Lafayette Park nke Detroit, Michigan
Margerum gara Mahadum DePaul na agụmakwụkwọ, wee mụọ ihe owuwu na Mahadum Illinois na Urbanaz Champaign
A zụlitere Margerum n'akụkụ ndịda Chicago, ya na nne ya
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, e debara aha ya na Art Institute of Chicago maka ịde ihe na Saturday
Margerum gbasoro aro nne ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ wee nweta akara ugo mmụta na ihe owuwu na 1955 na Mahadum Illinois
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ, o mere atụmatụ ịkọ nkọ na Skidmore, Owings & Merrill, bụ ndị were ya n'ọrụ
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Skidmore, Owings & Merrill, ebe ọ bụ onye otu ndị na-emepụta ihe nke mepụtara ụlọ nke oge a maka ụlọ akwụkwọ Air Force Academy na Colorado Springs
N'afọ 2000, mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ oge niile, nwunye ya Fran, gwara ya ka ọ chepụta ụlọ maka ha
N'ịbụ onye e dechara na 2006, Margerum kwuru, 'naanị ụzọ iji mee ka onwe m nwee afọ ojuju bụ ịmepụta ihe dị ịrịba ama
Ekwenyere m na m mere nke ahụ
Na ihe ọmụma m, ọ dịghị onye jirila polygon iri anọ na ise dị ka modulu siri ike
Margerum nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na ise na 21 Jụn 2016, na nso Detroit, n'ihi nsogbu sitere na ọrịa strok
N'afọ 1984, Margerum ghọrọ American Institute of Architects College of Fellows, nsọpụrụ kachasị elu nke ndị otu AIA, maka ọrụ ya pụrụ iche na onyinye ya maka ihe owuwu na ọha mmadụ
Roger Nash Baldwin (January 21, 1884 -August 26, 1981) bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke ACLU ruo afọ 1950
Ọtụtụ n'ime ikpe ndị mbụ nke ACLU mere n'okpuru nduzi ya, gụnyere ikpe Scopes, ikpe Sacco na Vanzetti, na ihe ịma aka ya maka mmachibido iwu James Joyce's Ulysses
Baldwin bụ onye a ma ama na-ahụ maka udo na onye edemede
A mụrụ Baldwin na Wellesley, Massachusetts, nwa Lucy Cushing (Nash) na Frank Fenno Baldwin
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na masta na Mahadum Harvard; mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ kwagara St
Louis na ndụmọdụ Louis D
Brandeis
N'ebe ahụ, ọ kụziri nkà mmụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Mahadum Washington, rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na eze ma ghọọ onye isi nnwale nke St
Louis Juvenile Court
Ya na Bernard Flexner dekwara Juvenile Courts and Probation n'oge a; akwụkwọ a ghọrọ ihe nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'oge ya, ọ bụkwa, n'akụkụ ụfọdụ, ntọala nke aha mba Baldwin
Baldwin bụ onye otu American Union Against Militarism (AUAM), nke megidere itinye aka America na Agha Ụwa Mbụ
Mgbe a gafere Selective Service Act nke afọ 1917, Baldwin kpọrọ oku ka AUAM mepụta nkewa iwu iji chebe ikike nke ndị jụrụ n'ihi akọ na uche
N'ọnwa Julaị 1, 1917, AUAM mepụtara Civil Liberties Bureau (CLB), nke Baldwin duziri
CLB kewapụrụ onwe ya na AUAM n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1, 1917, na-akpọ onwe ya National Civil Liberties Bureau, na Baldwin dị ka onye nduzi
N'afọ 1920, a gbanwere aha NCLB ka ọ bụrụ American Civil Liberties Union
na Baldwin na-aga n'ihu dị ka onye isi nchịkwa mbụ nke ACLU

Ka ọ dị ugbu a, na 30 Ọktoba n'afọ 1918, dị ka onye jụrụ n'ihi akọ na uche n'onwe ya, na-ajụ ọbụna idebanye aha maka draft, ịga nyocha ahụike, ma ọ bụ nabata ọrụ ọ bụla ọzọ dị ka ọrụ ugbo, a mara ya ikpe na Federal Court na New York City otu afọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ

Dị ka onye nduzi nke ACLU, Baldwin bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke ọdịdị nke njirimara mbụ nke njikọ ahụ; ọ bụ n'okpuru nduzi Baldwin ka ACLU mere ụfọdụ n'ime ikpe ya a ma ama, gụnyere ikpe Scopes, ikpe Sacco na Vanzetti, na ihe ịma aka ya maka mmachibido iwu James Joyce's Ulysses
Baldwin lara ezumike nká n'ọchịchị ACLU n'afọ 1950

Ọ nọgidere na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'oge ndụ ya niile; dịka ọmụmaatụ, o guzobere International League for the Rights of Man, nke a maara ugbu a dị ka International League for Human Rights
Na St
Louis, Baldwin enweela mmetụta dị ukwuu site na mmegharị mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke onye anarchist Emma Goldman
Ọ sonyeere ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ nke ụwa
Roger Baldwin lekọtara, dekọọ ma nye ego maka ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ikpe nchekwa maka ndị otu IWW
na nyocha na United States
Ihe ndekọ zuru oke nke akwụkwọ ozi ya na alaka IWW, ndị nyocha na ndị ọka iwu ka Princeton's Mudd Manuscript Library bipụtara
N'afọ 1927, ọ gara Soviet Union wee dee akwụkwọ, Liberty Under the Soviets

Otú ọ dị, ka e mesịrị, ka ọtụtụ ozi na-apụta banyere ọchịchị Joseph Stalin na Soviet Union, Baldwin bịara na-enwe nkụda mmụọ na ọchịchị Kọmunist ma na 1953 kpọrọ ya 'A NEW SLAVERY' (nke a na-akpọ na mbụ)
Ọ katọrọ 'ndị uwe ojii ọchịchị Kọmunist na-enweghị mmadụ, ọrụ mmanye'
N'afọ 1940, Baldwin duziri mkpọsa iji kpochapụ ndị otu ACLU nke ndị otu Communist Party
N'afọ 1947, General Douglas MacArthur kpọrọ ya ka ọ gaa Japan iji kwalite uto nke nnwere onwe obodo na mba ahụ
Na Japan, o guzobere Japan Civil Liberties Union, gọọmentị Japan nyekwara ya Order of the Rising Sun
N'afọ 1948, Germany na Austria kpọrọ ya maka ebumnuche yiri nke ahụ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Fellow nke American Academy of Arts and Sciences n'afọ 1951
N'afọ 1968, Mahadum Washington dị na St
Louis nyere Baldwin nzere doctorate nke iwu
Onye isi ala Jimmy Carter nyere Baldwin ihe nrite nke nnwere onwe na Jenụwarị 16, afọ 1981
Onye bi na Oakland, New Jersey, Baldwin nwụrụ n'ihi nkụchi obi na August 26, 1981, na The Valley Hospital na Ridgewood, New Jersey
Ọ bụ isiokwu nke John G
Avildsen's 1982 documentary Traveling Hopefully
George Roger Waters (a mụrụ na 6 Septemba 1943) bụ onye egwu Bekee, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu
N'afọ 1965, o guzobere otu egwu rock na-aga n'ihu Pink Floyd

Waters jere ozi na mbụ dịka onye na-akụ egwu, mana mgbe onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu Syd Barrett hapụrụ n'afọ 1968, ọ ghọkwara onye na-ekwu okwu ha, onye na-eduzi olu na onye ndu echiche ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ n'afọ 1983
Pink Floyd nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma n'ụwa niile site na abọm echiche The Dark Side of the Moon (1973), Wish You Were Here (1975), Animals (1977), The Wall (1979), na The Final Cut (1983)
Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ 1980, ha aghọwo otu n'ime ndị a na-akatọkarị na ndị na-aga nke ọma na egwu na-ewu ewu
N'etiti esemokwu okike, Waters hapụrụ n'afọ 1985 wee malite esemokwu iwu banyere ojiji nke aha na ihe onwunwe
Ha kwekọrịtara n'ụlọ ikpe n'afọ 1987
A mụrụ Waters na 6 Septemba 1943, nwa nwoke abụọ, nke Mary (née Whyte; 1913 1910-2009) na Eric Fletcher Waters (1914-1944) nọ na Great Bookham, Surrey
Nna ya, nwa nke onye na-egwupụta coal na onye na-arụ ọrụ na Labour Party, bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ, Onye Kraịst na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, na onye otu Communist Party
N'afọ ndị mbụ nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, nna Waters bụ onye jụrụ n'ihi akọ na uche nke na-anya ụgbọ ala ambulance n'oge Blitz
O mechara gbanwee echiche ya banyere pacifism, sonye na Territorial Army ma nye ya ọrụ n'ime 8th Battalion, Royal Fusiliers dịka onye isi nke abụọ na 11 Septemba 1943
E gburu ya ọnwa ise ka e mesịrị na 18 February 1944 na Aprilia, n'oge Agha nke Anzio, mgbe Roger dị ọnwa ise
A na-echeta ya na Aprilia na Cassino War Cemetery
Na 18 Febụwarị 2014, Waters kpughere ihe ncheta maka nna ya na ndị ọzọ nwụrụ n'agha na Aprilia, Ịtali ma mee ya nwa amaala Anzio
Mgbe di ya nwụsịrị, Mary Waters, onye bụkwa onye nkuzi, kpọọrọ ụmụ ya nwoke abụọ kwaga Cambridge ma zụlite ha n'ebe ahụ
Ihe ncheta mbụ Waters bụ nke ememe V-J Day

Waters gara Morley Memorial Junior School na Cambridge wee gaa Cambridgeshire High School for Boys (nke bụzi Hills Road Sixth Form College) na Syd Barrett, ebe onye ga-abụ onye na-akụ ọkpọ Pink Floyd David Gilmour bi nso na Mill Road ma gaa Perse School
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, Waters bụ onyeisi oche nke Cambridge Youth Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament (YCND), ebe o mepụtara ihe ngosi mgbasa ozi ya ma sonye na nzukọ ya
Ọ bụ onye egwuregwu na onye a na-akwanyere ùgwù nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị cricket na rugby niile
Ọchịchị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ bụ nke na-emegbu mmadụ nke ukwuu
otu ụmụaka ndị ụmụaka ndị ọzọ nwere ike imegbu ha nwekwara ike imegbu ndị nkuzi
Waters zutere ndị otu Pink Floyd n'ọdịnihu Nick Mason na Richard Wright na London na Regent Street Polytechnic (mgbe e mesịrị Mahadum Westminster) ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Waters debanyere aha n'ebe ahụ n'afọ 1962, mgbe usoro nnwale ikike gosipụtara na ọ dabara adaba n'ọhịa ahụ
Ọ tụlere ọrụ na injinia igwe

N'afọ 1969, Waters lụrụ nwanyị ọ hụrụ n'anya n'oge ọ bụ nwata Judith Trim, onye na-akpụ ite ite; e gosipụtara ya na mpempe akwụkwọ mpempe akwụkwọ nke ntọhapụ mbụ nke Ummagumma, mana e wepụrụ ya na mbipụta CD
Ha enweghị ụmụ ma gbaa alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1975
Trim nwụrụ n'afọ 2001
N'afọ 1976, Waters lụrụ Lady Carolyne Christie, nwa nwanne nwanyị nke 3rd Marquess of Zetland
Ha nwere nwa nwoke, Harry Waters, onye na-eti egwu nke na-akpọ keyboard na ndị otu nna ya kemgbe afọ 2002, na nwa nwanyị, India Waters, nke rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ihe nlereanya
Christie na Waters gbara alụkwaghịm na 1992
Na 1993, Waters lụrụ Priscilla Phillips; ha nwere otu nwa nwoke, Jack Fletcher
Alụmdi na nwunye ha kwụsịrị na 2001
N'afọ 2004, Waters kwere onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri Laurie Durning (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) nkwa ọlụlụ; ha abụọ lụrụ na 14 Jenụwarị 2012 wee gbaa alụkwaghịm na Septemba 2015
Waters lụrụ nwunye ya nke ise, onye bụbu onye ọkwọ ụgbọala ya bụ Kamilah Chavis, n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2021; ọ kọwara ya dị ka 'n'ikpeazụ onye na-elekọta ya'
Rogo bụ ógbè Gọọmentị Obodo na Steeti Kano, Naịjirịa
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Rogo

O nwere mpaghara nke km² narị asatọ na iri abụọ na ndị bi na 227,742 (ọnụ ọgụgụ afọ 2006) ma ọ na-ejikọta gọọmenti obodo Karaye na Kiru site n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ, gọọmenti obodo Makarfi na steeti Kaduna dị na South, gọọmenti obodo Danja na Kafur na Steeti Katsina dị na West na North n'otu n'otu
Gọọmentị Obodo Rogo nwere ngalaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị iri, nke gụnyere Beli, Falgore, Fulatan, Gwangwan, Jajaye, Rogo-Ruma, Rogo -Sabon-Gari, Ruwan Bago, Zarewa na Zoza Ward
Koodu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ narị asaa na anọ
Rogombé o bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Robert Joseph Mettle-Nunoo nke a makwaara dị ka Rojo Mettle Nunoo bụ onye na-ese ihe ugbu a na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Ghana
Ọ bụ onye otu National Democratic Congress ma jee ozi dị ka osote minista ahụike n'oge ọchịchị John Evans Atta Mills
Mettle-Nunoo nwere nzere Bachelor of Arts na nka (ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ) site na Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah
Na Jenụwarị 2009, Onye isi ala John Evans Atta Mills họpụtara Mettle-Nunoo dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka okporo ụzọ na okporo ụzọ
Mgbe mgbanwe nke ndị minista gasịrị, a kpọgara ya ije ozi dị ka osote minista ahụike
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye njikwa mkpọsa nke John Atta Mills na Disemba 2008
Rok Studios bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Naijiria
Ụlọ mmepụta ya dị na Anthony Village, Lagos
Mary Remmy Njoku guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2013
Na mgbakwunye na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ya, Rok Studios emepụtala ihe karịrị usoro TV iri na abụọ
Ihe ndị a ma ama sitere na Rok Studios gụnyere Hazeezat (2014), Thy Will Be Done (ihe nkiri), Festac Town, - TV Series (2014), na A Northern Affair (2014) (nke Mary Remmy Njoku mepụtara)
Mary Njoku malitere ROK na Sky, netwọk na-agbasa na UK na Naịjirịa High Commission na UK na afọ 2016
N'ọnwa Julaị na afọ 2019, Canal+ Group nwetara ROK
Mary Njoku nọgidere dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke ROK n'okpuru nnweta Canal +
Rokhaya Niang, bụ onye Senegal na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya a na-aja mma na fim Le prix du pardon, L'Extraordinaire destin de Madame Brouette na Teranga Blues
N'afọ 2001, Niang malitere ime ihe nkiri izizi ya na ihe nkiri Le prix du pardon nke Mansour Sora Wade duziri
Site na ihe ịga nke ọma nke ihe nkiri ahụ, a họpụtara ya maka ihe nkiri L'Extraordinaire destin de Madame Brouette n'afọ 2002
A họọrọ ihe nkiri abụọ ahụ maka Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou (FESPACO) n'afọ 2003
Otú ọ dị, ihe nkiri sinima ya na-ewu ewu bịara site na ihe nkiri Teranga Blues nke afọ 2007 nke Moussa Sène Absa duziri mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ 'Rokhaya'
Rokia Doumbia (amụrụ na 5 ọnwa Mee, na afọ 1999) bụ onye Mali na-egwu basketball maka Purdue Boilermakers na ndị otu mba Mali
Ọ nọchitere anya Mali na afọ 2019 Women's Afrobasket
Roland Agambire (born 19 April 1976)is a Ghanaian officer of Agams Holdings and Chairman and chief executive officer of the information and communication technology company RIg communications
O guzobere Roagam Links na Machị 2001, mgbe ahụ dị ka ụlọ ọrụ nrụzi ekwentị mkpanaaka nke mechara gbasaa iji ghọọ ụlọ ọrụ mbụ na-emepụta ozi na nkwukọrịta, na-achịkọta ma na-enye ọzụzụ na Ghana
A na-ekwu na Rlg Group nwere ọnụnọ na China, Dubai, UAE, Angola, Nigeria, Kenya na Gambia, South Africa, Ghana, na Rwanda
A mụrụ Agambire na Sirigu n'ebe ugwu Ghana
Ọ zụrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ma mesịa gụọ akwụkwọ na Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration, ebe ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Science na nchịkwa azụmahịa

Rlg Communications na-ewe ihe ndị ọrụ 500 na-adịgide adịgide, 1,000 ndị ọzọ ma mepụta ọrụ maka ihe karịrị ndị ntorobịa 30,000 [dị ka onye si kwuo?] n'ime afọ iri gara aga site na imekọ ihe ọnụ na ndị isi dị iche iche na gọọmentị
Ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ya, Rlg Institute of Technology na-etinye atụmatụ yiri nke ahụ na Naijiria na Gambia, na-arụkọ ọrụ na gọọmentị dị iche iche
Agambire bụkwa onye isi oche nke AGAMS Holdings Limited ma bụrụkwa onye na-ahụ maka atụmatụ atụmatụ na njikwa nke ụlọ ọrụ iri na otu jikọtara ọnụ na-eme Holdings
O nwetala ọtụtụ mmata na onyinye maka ọhụrụ, ọchụnta ego, mkpebi maka uto na ọrụ ebere
Na Septemba 2012, ọ ghọrọ onye ọdụdụ ka enyere ya Chartered Institute of Marketing Ghana (CIMG) Marketing Man of the year for 2011
I Otu n'ime ngwaahịa ya, RIg phone, bụkwa nke a kwadoro ngwaahịa nke afọ 2011
Na ọkwa nke afọ 2012 nke Ghana Club 100, ụlọ ọrụ Ghana Investment Promotion Centre họpụtara Rlg dị ka ụlọ ọrụ nke abụọ kachasị mma na Ghana
A na-ekpekwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ikpe dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-eto ngwa ngwa na Ghana, onye ndú na ngalaba ICT nke Ghana na onye kacha banye na Klọb 100

The South Africa-based African Leadership Network kpọrọ Roland n'etiti ndị ikpeazụ 12 na 2012 Africa Awards for Entrepreneurship otu Ernst na Young West Africa bụ ndị kpọrọ ya n'etiti Ndị ikpeazụ na 2011 Entrepreneur of the Year Awards

Na Jenụwarị 2013, Pan African Television Network, E-TV họpụtara ya dị ka onye Ghana kachasị emetụta n'afọ 2012 na ntuli aka ọ mere n'etiti ndị na-ekiri ya, ma mesịa pụta dị ka onye ọchụnta ego nke Afọ 2012 na asọmpi nke Entrepreneur Foundation nke Ghana haziri
O meriri onye isi ọchụnta ego nke afọ 2013 na City People Awards for Excellence
Agambire ekwuola ọtụtụ ihe omume mba ụwa na mpaghara dị elu gụnyere ọgbakọ mahadum, nzukọ azụmahịa, emume onyinye na nzukọ

Ọ bụ onye ọbịa nke World Bank Group dị ka onye enyemaka maka ogbako mpaghara na Ọrụ Ndị Ntorobịa na West Africa na isi obodo Naịjirịa, Abuja yana US Embassy na Ghana na Entrepreneurial Mentorship Program na Northern Ghana
Ọ gara n'ihu kwuo okwu na 1st Africa Entrepreneurship Conference na Mahadum Robert Gordon na Scotland, United Kingdom yana Africa Global Business Forum na Dubai
Rlg nwere Global Office ya ugbu a na Dubai, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ole na ole n'Afrịka iji tinye ebe obibi ya zuru ụwa ọnụ n'akụkụ ụwa ahụ
N'afọ 2013 ọ mara ọkwa na ọ na-etinye ego na Hope City, ọrụ US $ 10bn maka ụlọ IT dị nso na Accra, nke e bu n'obi ịnwe ụlọ kachasị elu n'Africa
Mgbe mgbasa ozi niile na mgbasa ozi, Hope City ka bụ atụmatụ na akwụkwọ ma ugbu a anaghị eme atụmatụ

N'afọ 2014, RLG malitere ikpokọta ekwentị ndị dị na Naịjirịa A kọrọ na ha butere ekwentị 50,000 ndị Nigeria gbakọrọ ọnụ na 2015Ụlọ ọrụ na-agbakọta RLG, nke a maara dị ka RLG na Adulawo Tech City, bụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze na nke onwe n'etiti ọchịchị steeti Sound na RLG Communication
Roland Ayers (1932-2014) bụ ónyé Africa America na-ese ihe na mmiri na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ
A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe osise ya dị mgbagwoju anya nke ndị mmadụ na okike na-ejikọta n'ọnọdụ dị ka nrọ na ọnọdụ na-anọpụ iche
Ónyé na-ede uri na ónyé hụrụ jazz na akwụkwọ n'anya, ọ na-ekwupụta uri ya site na ihe oyiyi karịa okwu, ọ na'ekwukarị, ma na-ewere ọrụ nka ya dị ka uri
A mụrụ Ayers na úbọchị abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị, 1932, na Philadelphia, naanị nwa nke na-ese foto mgbè ọ dị afọ anọ na peeji ndị na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla nke akwụkwọ ndị mụrụ ya
Alice na Lorenzo Ayers nyere nwa ha nwoke ụfọdụ akwụkwọ na ihe ndị ọzọ, ma ọ na-anọdụ ala ruo ọtụtụ awa ma na-ese ihe
Ọ na-ese ụgbọelu agha na ụgbọelu, ma depụtaghachi ihe nkírí
Nna ya, Ayers kwuru na akwụkwọ ngosi nke afọ 1978, gosiri ya ịma mma nke okwu ma kpalie mmasị ya na uri

N'afọ 1944, mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na otu, a họpụtara ya n'otu akwụkwọ akụkọ dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ Hill Elementary School nke a gụnyere ọrụ ya na ngosi nka mbụ kwa afọ na Rittenhouse Street YMCA na Philadelphia
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Germantown High School, sonyeere ndị agha ma nọrọ afọ abụọ na Germany dị ka ónyé na-esi nri
Mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ debanyere aha na Philadelphia College of Art (nke bụzi Mahadum nke Arts), ebe o mepụtara ihe osise pen-and-ink, collages, gouaches na watercolors
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1954
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ngalaba Ntụrụndụ Philadelphia dị ka ónyé nlekọta egwuregwu ma na-emepụta màkà ngalaba ahụ mgbè ụfọdụ
Ọ na-ere ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya mgbè ụfọdụ mana ọ pụghị ịkpata ihe ọ ga-eri na ya
Ayers kọwaara onwé ya otu ónyé édémédé dị ka onye na-ese ihe nke na-ekwu màkà eziokwu nke nrọ
A kọwaala akwụkwọ édémédé na ink ya, karịsịa, dị ka ihe omimi na ihe dị adị
Ihe oyiyi ndị ahụ gụnyere ọbọdọ ukwu, ndị mmadụ, ihe ọkpụkpụ Afrịka na okike
Ụda, ahụ na-agagharị, osisi na-aga n'ikuku, ụda oké osimiri
Ndị a bụ ihe m chọrọ ime ka ndị mmadụ mara ka ha na-ele ọrụ m, ka o kwuru
Ọ bụ ezie na ihe osise ya na ink dị n'ụwa nrọ na-abụghị eziokwu, ihe osise ọ na-ese bụ ihe atụ
N'etiti afọ 1960, Ayers chọtara ụzọ ya gaa Europe, na-aga Holland na Gris
Dị ka ónyé Black na-ese ihe, ọ dị ya ka a na-eleghị ya anya na United States ma nweta nnabata na Europe
N'afọ 1960, Ayers meghere ụlọ ngosi nka a na-akpọ Waverly Gallery na Workshop nà Philadelphia na ndị Black abụọ ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe
N'oge ahụ, ọ na-arụkwa ihe ọkpụkpụ
Asọmpi mbụ ya bụ ihe ngosi nke Philadelphia Art Alliance na 1958
N'afọ 1963, ọ natara onyinye 'Best of the Year' site na njikọ ahụ
Ayers bụ ónyé na-anọkarị na gallery nke Socrates Perakis nwéré na 1963
O nwèrè ihe ngosi otu ónyé na Towne Gallery na MachịN'ọnwa Eprel na June, ọ ka na-egosi na Towne - na-enye ihe osise 'On Sunny Fields' na 'The Colony' maka ire ere n'ọnwa Aprel
A matara Ayers dị ka otu n'ime ndị otu iri na isii nke gallery ahụ, nke a gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Socrates Perakis Gallery
Ọ laghachiri na Towne n'ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ
N'afọ 1980, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ahazi Philadelphia Chapter nke National Conference of Artists
E guzobere nzukọ mbà ahụ na 1959 na Atlanta iji kpọkọta ndị Black na-ese ihe
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ngosi 2015 We Speak Black Artists na Philadelphia, 1920s rụo 1970s na Woodmere Art Museum

Roland Charles (ọnwa Ọgọọst 31, afọ 1938 rụọ ọnwa Mee 26, afọ 2000) bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na-ese foto na onye na-ese ihe, nke a maara nke ọma maka ịtọ ntọala The Black Photographers of California na oghere ngosi ya, Black Gallery, na Los Angeles, n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ mbụ site na maka ndị na-ese onyinyo ojii
A mụrụ Roland Charles na Louisiana n'afọ 1938
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Air Force, wee kwaga California na mbido afọ 1960, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ aerospace
Mgbe enyi ya nyere ya igwefoto dị ka onyinye, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese foto oge niile n'afọ 1971, na-arụ ọrụ na mkpuchi egwu na onye nta akụkọ asịrị Rona Barrett
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1983, Charles haziri ihe ngosi na California Museum of Afro-American History and Culture na Exposition Park, nke a na-akpọ The Tradition Continues California Black Photographers
Ọ bụ nnukwu ihe ngosi nke gosipụtara ndị na-ese foto California asaa na ndị 40 nke oge a, gụnyere Frank Herman Cloud, Vera Jackson, Harry Adams, Jack Davis, Fred Cooper, na Howard Morehead

Dị ka onye na-ese ihe na onye na-edebe foto, Charles nwere ekele maka ngwakọta nke foto ejiji na nke mara mma nke ọtụtụ ndị na-ese foto ojii nke oge ya mepụtara, dị ka foto akwụkwọ akụkọ nke onye na-ewe foto ojii Harry Adams, onye Charles maara
Charles gosikwara ekele maka ọrụ dị mkpa nke foto na-atụle foto abụọ nke nwa ya nwanyị na-agba egwú na Los Angeles Times, o kwuru, mgbe m na-eche banyere foto a, m na-echere uri na-agagharị
Ihe ịga nke ọma nke ihe ngosi ahụ mere ka Charles nyere aka chọta ndị Ojiị na-ese foto nke California, ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ na-enweghị uru maka ndị na-ese foto Afrịka-Amerịka na-apụta ma guzosie ike
N'ịbụ ndị nzukọ ahụ kwadoro, Charles na ndị guzobere Calvin Hicks, Donald Bernard, na Gil Garner malitere Black Galari na Santa Barbara Plaza, ugbu a Marlton Square
N'ịbụ ndị enyemaka na onyinye kwadoro, ụlọ ngosi ahụ haziri ma gbaa ndị na-ese foto ojii ume
Charles mechara kwuo, ọ bara ọgaranya n'anya, mana ọtụtụ ihe oyiyi ndị kwesiri ịnọchite anya ya abụghị ndị obodo na-eme
Hicks kwuru na Black Gallery bụ gallery mbụ n'ime obodo ndị isi ojii raara onwe ha nye foto ojii
Roland L
Freeman (amụrụ n'ọnwa Julaị 27, afọ 1936) bụ onye na-ese foto na onye na-enweta ihe nrite nke ọdịbendị ọdịnala ndịda na ndị Afrịka-Amerịka
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke The Group for Cultural Documentation nke dị na Washington, DC
A mụrụ Roland Freeman na Baltimore, Maryland

Dị ka onye ntorobịa, ọrụ ndụ ya n'ọdịnihu sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ mgbe ọ chọpụtara foto nke Gordon Parks na Roy DeCarava, nke lekwasịrị anya n'ịkwalite nghọta ọha na eze, yana ọrụ nke ndị na-ese foto Farm Security Administration
Mgbe Freeman dị afọ iri na anọ, ọ zutere onye edemede na onye na-akọ akụkọ ọdịnala Zora Neale Hurston, onye ga-abụkwa nnukwu mmetụta na ọrụ ya na-esote
Freeman jere ozi na US Air Force site n'afọ 1954 ruo afọ 1958
Ọ malitere ise foto na mpaghara Washington, DC
n'afọ 1963, nke March on Washington kpaliri
N'afọ 1968, ọ bụghị naanị na o sonyere na kamakwa o dere na Campaign of Poor People na njem Mule Train site na Marks, Mississippi, gaa n'isi obodo mba ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto maka Time na Magnum Photos, gụnyere mkpuchi dị ka onye foto White House
N'afọ 1997, a kpọrọ Freeman Eudora Welty Visiting Professor of Southern Studies na Millsaps College na Jackson, Mississippi
N'afọ 1970, ọ duziri ọrụ Mississippi FolkLife Project maka Smithsonian Institution's Center for Folklife and Cultural Heritage
N'afọ 1972, ọ ghọrọ onye na-eme nchọpụta n'ebe ahụ
N'ọrụ ahụ, Freeman sere ndị ọrụ na White House foto, gụnyere Mrs
Lillian Rogers Parks, onye rụrụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ afọ iri atọ
Ọtụtụ n'ime foto Freeman nke ndị Afrịka-Amerịka na White House gụnyere na webụsaịtị White House na ihe ngosi Smithsonian Institution
Freeman anọwo na-arụ ọrụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ na ọrụ onwe ya 'Mgbe Oge ka dị,' ọmụmụ nke ọdịbendị ndị isi ojii n'ebe niile dị n'Afrịka
Ọ na-eji igwefoto dị ka ngwá ọrụ iji mee nchọpụta, dee ma kọwaa ịga n'ihu nke omenala ọdịnala ndị Afrịka na Amerịka

A na-arụ ọrụ a na njikọ aka nke ọma na ndị na-akọ akụkọ ọdịnala, ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, ndị na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndị na'ahụ maka obodo, mgbe mgbe n'ụzọ ọhụrụ nke usoro ndị bụ akụkụ nke onyinye ya na ọrụ nke ndị na-ese foto nke ọgbọ ya
Roland Mqwebu (16 Jenụwarị 1941 na 28 Ọgọst 2015) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa nke ama ama maka ọrụ ya dịka James Mkhize, InDuna na mantshingelani (onye nche) na sitcom Emzini Wezinsizwa
A mụrụ Mqwebu na Jenụwarị 16, 1941, na Inanda dịka nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụ 13
O tolitere n'ezinụlọ Ndị Kraịst nwere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na-agụ egwu
Ọ mụtara otú e si akpọ piano wee malite idekọ egwu nke ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-agụ egwu maka Phuzekhemisi
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri mbụ a ma ama nke Mqwebu bụ Diamante sir Gefahrlich (1965), uDeliwe (1976) na Shaka Zulu (1986)
Maka Shaka Zulu, ọ bụ osote onye nduzi ma rụọ ọrụ nke Ngomane kaMqoboli, enyi Shaka na onye isi nke ezinụlọ Mthethwa

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka Mkhize, onye induna na onye nche na-ebi na Ụlọ 8 nke ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na Jerry Phele (Thabang Mofokeng), Jabulani Nkosi (Benson Chirwali), Vusi Thanda (Moses Tshawe) na Shadrack Ngema (inyanga uMagubane)
Mqwebu biri na Belleview Gardens na Durban, South Africa
Ọ lụrụ Pinky Mqwebu, onye bụbu onye nkuzi, ha nwekwara ụmụ anọ
Otu, Lawrencia, na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye na-emepụta ọdịnaya na Ukhozi FM
Mqwebu nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa akụrụ na 28 Ọgọstụ 2015, mgbe ọ dị afọ 74 na Ethekwini Heart Hospital and Heart Centre
Houane Rolande Tokpoledo (amụrụ na 15 Disemba 1992), nke a maara dị ka Rolande Tok poledo, bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na Ivorian nke na-agba dịka onye na-echebe etiti
Ọ bụ onye otu ụmụ nwanyị mba Ivory Coast
