Rosalia Vila Tobella (amụrụ na abalị iri abụọ na ise n'onwa Septemba n'afọ 1992), nke a maara dị ka Rosalía (Spanish [rosaˈlia], Catalan [ruzəˈliə]), bụ onye na-agụ egwu, na-ede egwu, onye mmepụta egwu, onye n'eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eti egwu na mba Spain
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na mpụga Barcelona, a kọwawo ya dị ka 'onye na-ewu ewu' n'ihi ụdị egwu ya

Mgbe egwú ọdịnala Spain masịrị ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, ọ gụrụ ihe gbasara egwu na Kọleeji a na-amụ maka egwu dị na Catalonia, ma na-emekwa ihe nkiri na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na agbamakwụkwọ di iche iche
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya nweta nzere dị iche iche n'ihi ótù usoro egwu ya na Raül Refree, Los Ángeles mere n'afọ 2017, na ọrụ baccalaureate El Mal Querer (2018)

N'ichepụtagharị flamenco site na ịgwakọta ya na egwu pop na hip hop, ọ mụrụ egwu 'Malamente' ya na 'Pienso en tu Mirá', nke dọtara anya ọha na eze mba Spain, ewee wepụta ya ka ọ bụrụ egwu a ma ama na-etokwa ètò n'ụwa niile

Onye natara ihe nrita Latin Grammy Award maka Album of the Year ma debakwa aha egwu a na usoro egwu narị ise nke mbụ bụ ọkasịakasị kemgbe ụwa, nke Rolling Stone haziri ma deputaEl Mal Querer mere ka Rosalía rigoo n'ógó egwu mba ụwa
Rosalía nyochara egwu obodo na 2019 ya 'Con Altura' na 'Yo x Ti, Tú x Mí', na-enweta Oganiru nke ọ chọrọ mere ya O ji gazuo ụwa ọnụ
O nyeturu egwu reggaeton obere ọdịdị ọzọ na usoro egwu ya nke atọ nke O weputara, nke ụda ya n'adịghị ka nke new flamengo (2022) obuuru ụzọ weputa
Abọm ahụ dọtara uche mba ụwa na egwu ya 'La Fama', 'Saoko' na 'Despechá' wee bụrụ abọm kachasị mma nke afọ ahụ na Metacritic
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, Rosalía enwetala mkpụrụ egwu dị iri na otu n'ọnụ ọgụ n'ala ya, nke bụ ọnụọgụgụ kachasị nke onye obula bu onye obodo ahu n'eti egwu nwetegoro

O nwetakwala ihe nrite Grammy Awards abụọ, Latin Grammy Awards (gụnyere mmeri abụọ nke Album of the Year), MTV Video Music Awards anọ, MTV Europe Music Award, UK Music Video Awards atọ na Premio Ruido abụọ, n'etiti ndị ọzọ

N'afọ 2019, Billboard nyere ya Rising Star Award maka 'ịgbanwe ụda nke egwu kachasị mma nke taa na pop ọhụrụ ya na-emetụta flamenco', wee bụrụ onye mbụ na-abụ abụ Spanish n'akụkọ ihe mere eme ka a họpụta ya maka Best New Artist na Grammys
A na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-agụ egwú Spanish kachasị nwee ọganihu na mmetụta n'oge niile
Rosalia Annette Nghidinwa (26 Ọktoba na afọ 1952 na 14 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2018) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Namibia
A mụrụ ya na Nkurenkuru, Kavango Region, Nghidinwa sonyeere SWAPO na afọ 1974 mgbe ọ dị afọ 22
Onye ọrụ ahụike site na ọrụ, Nghidinwa na-elekọta ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụike obodo na mpaghara Okavango maka Chọọchị Evangelical Lutheran na Namibia (ELCIN)
Ọ nọchitere anya ELCIN na Nzukọ Lutheran World na afọ 1987 ma jee ozi na kansụl na-achịkwa Chọọchị site na afo 1991 ruo afọ 1996
Ọ bụ onye otu National Assembly of Namibia kemgbe afọ 2000
Ọ batakwara na kansụl nke Namibia mgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ na ọdịmma ọha na eze site n'afọ 2000 ruo afọ 2005

N'afọ 2005, e buliri ya n'ọkwa ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ihe ndị dị n'ime ụlọ na mbata, na Disemba, na afọ 2012 a kpọgara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke Ministrị na-ahụ Maka Ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na ọdịmma ọha na eze (Namibia)
E nyere Nghidinwa ihe nrite kacha mma nke ugo n'afọ 2003
Ọ lụrụ Sam Nghidinwa onye nwụrụ na Febụwarị n'afọ 2009
Ha nwere ụmụ isii
Nghidinwa nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ Windhoek na 14 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2018 mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa kansa
Rosalia Pipitone (amụrụ n'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye Ịtali na-eche goolu
Ọ na-agba egwuregwu bọọlụ nye otu ụmụ nwanyi Roma na Serie A
N'afọ 2018 ọ gbara bọọlụ nke AS
Roma Women
N'afọ 2018, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ sonye na agbam bọọlụ nke otu mba
Ọ lara ezumike nká na bọọlụ mba ụwa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2019
Rosaline Patricia Irorefe Bozimo (amụrụ na 1 Jenụwari 1946) bụ onye ọkaiwu Naịjirịa nke ahọpụtara dịka onye isi ọka-ikpe nke Delta Steeti malite na Machị 23, 2003
Ọ lara ezumike nká na 1 Jenụwarị 2011 ma Honorable Justice Abiodun Smith nọchiri ya
Amụrụ Rosaline Bozimo na mpaghara Warri South nke Delta State
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na St
Maria Goretti Grammar, Benin City maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, gakwara Urhobo College, Effurun
N’ọnwa Septemba 1970, a nabatara ya na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria, ebe ọ nweta nzere Iwu na 1973
O mechara gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu nke Naịjirịa a wee kpọọ ya na-afọ 1974
Mgbe ọ mechara National Youth Service (NYSC) na Enugu na Onitsha, ọ ghọrọ onye ọka iwu na-afọ 1975
Ya na di ya Alaowei Broderick Bozimo bụ ndị rụpụtara Broderick Bozimo & Co
Ọ bụ onye otu ikpe na Bendel Steetị nke ochie dị ka onye ọka-ikpe, tupu ọ laghachite na usoro iwu nke otu onye (1978-1983)
Na December 1983, a họpụtara ya ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ Ọkaikpe nke Bendel Steeti, mechara bụrụ onye isi ndị ọkaikpe na August 1988
Mgbe e kere Delta Steeti site na Bendel ochie na 1991, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche mbụ nke Tenders Board nke ụlọ ikpe Delta Steetị, na Chief Registrar nke otu ụlọikpe ahụ na Septemba nke otu afọ ahụ
Na Disemba, ọ ghọrọ onye ọka ikpe ụlọ ikpe ukwu
Onye isi nchịkwa ndị Delta State mgbe ndị agha na-achị, Colonel Bassey Asuquo, họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Armed Robbery and Firearms Tribunal, Effurun, Delta Steetị
O burukwa onye isi oche, Failed Banks Tribunal , Enugu Zone
Mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta na-ahụ maka nchịkwa ikpe na mpaghara Ikpe atọ, a họpụtara ya dị ka Onyeikpe Kasị Elu nke Delta steeti malite na 23 Mach 2003
Na Disemba 2003 iji dozie mkpọchi na ụlọ mkpọrọ, Rosaline Bozimo tọhapụrụ ndị mkpọrọ iri ise na-itoolu na-eche ikpe
Ọ dọrọ ndị uwe ojii aka na ntị ka ha ghara ịtụba ndị a na-enyo enyo na ha dara iwu n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na-enweghị ezigbo mbọ iji gbaa ha akwụkwọ
Na Septemba 2007 Bozimo chụrụ Ọkaikpe nke Agbor, Mazị Charles Maidoh n'ọrụ n'ihi na ebubo na ọ na-anakọta N5,000 maka akwụkwọ mgbapụta ọ bụla maka ọ nyere
N’ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2007, na Nzukọ Ndị Ikpe Naịjirịa niile, o kwuru maka Ngalaba Ikpe Na-ahụ Maka Ikpe n’Ọchịchị (NJC), nke e boro ilebara anya na inyocha ndị ọka ikpe
Mgbe o nyechara obere akụkọ banyere NJC ma kwurịtakwa banyere ọrụ ya, o nyere nyocha dị oke mma, na-ekwupụta na ụkpụrụ ikpe ugbu a na Naijiria di ezigbo mma
N'ọnwa Ọktọba 2007 Bozimo kwụrụ okwu siri ike maka ngalaba na-ahụ maka ikpe na Delta Steeti i nọọrọ onwe ha ma rịọ maka ọnọdụ ọrụ dị mma maka ndị otu ya bụ ndị ọka ikpe nke steeti
Na Nọvemba 2008, Bozimo na Gọvanọ Delta Steeti, Emmanuel Uduaghan kwadoro ka e hiwe ụlọ ikpe mkpanaka iji kwado ndị megidere idebe obodo ha ọcha
N'ihi mkpesa maka nrụrụ aka na mmeme ntuli aka, Bozimo họpụtara ndị ikpe na-ahụ maka ntuli aka nke gọọmentị mpaghara maka mpaghara atọ nke steeti, ọ mere ha anọ na August 2009
Rosaline Elbay bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na odee

A maara ya maka ọrụ ya dị ka 'Amani' na usoro ihe nkiri Hulu na A24 na dị ka 'Sara' na usoro MBC Masr Qabeel Na Septemba 2021, a mara ọkwa ya dị ka onye isi na-eme ihe nkiri nke usoro Netflix na-abịanụ Jigsaw
A mụrụ Elbay ma zụlite ya na Cairo n'aks ndị nne na nna Ijipt
Ọ gụrụ Classics na Mahadum Oxford wee gụchaa nweta nzere masta na Colonial History
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Actors Studio New York City na Elizabeth Kemp wee nweta MFA ya na Acting site na LAMDA
Ọrụ ya malitere na UK ihe nkiri na-elekwasị anya na Shakespeare

N'afọ 2018 Elbay pụtara na Diamond Dust, ihe nkiri nke Ahmed Mourad kacha ere ahịa, na Fork & Knife, nke gosipụtara na 2018 El Gouna Film Festival Ọ bụkwa isiokwu nke vidiyo egwu maka 'Fakra' nke Massar Egbari, otu egwu Ijipt nke ghọrọ onye ama ama n'oge 2011 Egyptian Revolution, dị ka mmasị ịhụnanya nke onye na-agụ egwu aha ya bụ Hany Dakkak

Kemgbe afọ 2019, Elbay emeela ihe nkiri dị ka Amani n'usoro ihe nkiri Hulu / A24 Ramy, ihe ngosi nke Ramy Youssef nke aha ya bụ Golden Globe na Peabody Award nke na-esote ọgbọ mbụ nke ndị Alakụba America na njem ime mmụọ na mpaghara New Jersey nke kewara na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Usoro a malitere na 2019 South by Southwest Film Festival ma nwee nkwado nke 97% na Rotten Tomatoes
Oge nke abụọ, nke Mahershala Ali so na ya, malitere na Mee 2020

Ọzọkwa na 2019, Elbay nwetara otuto dị egwu maka mmalite telivishọn ya na mpaghara MENA dị ka Sara, onye mmekọ nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Tarek (Mohamed Mamdouh), na MBC Masr's Qabeel, wee merie ihe nrite Al-Wafd Critics Chine Choice Awards maka Best Supporting Actress na Best New Face
Elbay kwadoro emume mmeghe nke 2019 El Gouna Film Festival, n'oge ọ na-eyi uwe eji plastik e megharịrị arụ ọrụ nke ụmụ nwanyị gbara ọsọ ndụ ji aka rụọ nke UNHCR kwadoro
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ gara n'ihu na-akwado nzukọ ahụ, na-ekere òkè na tebụl gburugburu mbụ nke MENA na The Role of Art and Culture in Addressing Displacement
Cairo International Film Festival họpụtara Elbay dị ka ihu ya maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-eto eto n'oge 40th na 41st Editions
E mepụtara ihe nkiri ya, 'Garlic', na Festivalás TV Development Workshop
Elbay na-eme ihe nkiri na MBC Masrīs 2020 Luebat Al-Nesyan, nke Hani Khalifa duziri
Otú ọ dị, ọ hapụrụ ihe ngosi ahụ n'etiti ihe nkiri n'ihi ihe gbasara ahụike ma soro Asmaa Galal gbaa ọrụ ya fọdụrụnụ

Na Septemba 2021, a mara ọkwa Elbay dị ka onye isi na-eme ihe nkiri nke usoro Netflix ọhụrụ Jigsaw n'akụkụ Giancarlo Esposito, Paz Vega, Rufus Sewell, Tati Gabrielle, Peter Mark Kendall na Jai Courtney
A na-akọwa àgwà ya Judy Goodwin dị ka ọkachamara n'ịkwatu, onye isi ike na onye nweere onwe ya
Usoro a amalitela ịgbapụ na New York
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2021, Elbay kpughekwara na ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na onye isi na-emepụta ọrụ a na-akpọghị aha, ha abụọ ekwuputala
E nyere Elbay ihe nrite 2019 Al-Wafd Critics' Choice Awards maka Best Supporting Actress na Best New Face maka ọrụ ya na Qabeel
Rosaline Ufuoma Meurer (amuru 15 Febụwarị 1992), bu onye omee ihe nkiri Naijiria-amuru na Gambia ma onye na-emeputa ihe
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ 2014 ya dị ka Kaylah na usoro TV Oasis na ọrụ 2018 dị ka Kemi Alesinloye na Ayo Makun 's Merry Men The Real Yoruba Demons
Meurer toro na Gambia ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ oge o bu nwata
O nwere diplọma na njikwa azụmahịa ma mụọ ise foto
Mgbe ọ na-etolite, Meurer hụrụ ụgbọ elu na-ife efe na anya ma na-acho ighọ onye nnabata ụgbọ elu ma ọ bụ onye na-anya ụgbọ elu
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nlereanya na Gambia, tupu ọ kwaga Nigeria na 2009
Achọpụtara ya na Gambia na 2009 site n'aka onye omee ihe nkiri na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Desmond Elliot onye Naijiria nyere ya ndụmọdụ ka ọ gbalịa ime ihe nkiri na Nigeria
Ọ kwagara Lagos, Nigeria wee malite ọrụ ihe nkiri ya, na-egosi na obere ọrụ na ihe nkiri 2009 Emem Isong Spellbound na ihe nkiri 2011 In the Cupboard
Na 25 Mee 2017, Meurer mezigharịrị ma mepee Udu Main Market Water Project na Udu, Delta State
Dị ka onye nnọchianya nke Big Church Foundation on Women and Child, o nyere ego nye ụmụ nwanyị dị ime na 3-H Clinic and Maternity na Warri, Delta State
Meurer bụ onye nnọchi anya Multisheen Ebony
Na 2015, ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchianya nke Big Church Foundation on Women and Child
Ọ pụtara na mkpuchi nke Eprel 2017 House Of Maliq Magazine
N'April 2019, ọ bịanyere aka na DoctorCare247 nkwekọrịta nkwado
Ọnwa anọ ka e mesịrị, ọ bịanyere aka na Glo nkwekọrịta nkwado
A mụrụ Meurer na Gambia site na nna Dutch na nne Naijiria si Delta State
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ezinụlọ mmadụ atọ
Rosalyn Fatima Gold-Onwude (amụrụ n' ọnwa nke anọ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ n'afọ 1987) bụ onye mgbasa ozi egwuregwu America na Naijiria
Ọ bụ nwa afọ New York City, Gold-Onwude gbara bọọlụ basketball na Stanford ma gbaa bọọlụ na otu mba Naịjirịa
Gold-Onwude na-ekpuchi NBA basketball na ESPN's TV, dijitalụ, na redio ma bụrụ onye na-akwado First Take na Stephen A
Smith kwa izu
Kemgbe afọ 2012 Gold-Onwude ekpuchiela March Madness, asọmpi NCAA na Pac-12 Men's and Women's college hoops na ọrụ nyocha na onye nta akụkọ maka Pac-12 Networks
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Gold-Onwude esonyela Kevin Durant na Rich Kleiman's 35 Ventures dị ka otu n'ime ihu nke 'The Boardroom'
Gold-Onwude bụkwa onye na-ahụ maka ihe ngosi arụmụka egwuregwu a na-akpọ 'Don't at Me' nke The Players' Tribune gosipụtara ma na-agbasa ozi Twitter
A mụrụ Gold-Onwude na Queens, New York City, nne ya bụ onye Russia na onye Juu bụ Pat Gold na nna ya bụ onye Naijiria bụ Austin Onwude
Ọ gbara bọọlụ basketball n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Archbishop Molloy High School na Briarwood, New York
Ndị otu ahụ meriri aha steeti abụọ na 2003 na 2004, mana mmerụ ahụ n'ikpere mere ka oge ya dị elu n'oge

N'agbanyeghị mmerụ ahụ, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Molloy dị ka onye egwuregwu a na-achọ mma nke ukwuu ma bụrụ nwanyị mbụ na-eme egwuregwu na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke usoro ihe omume ahụ iji kpọọ Division I basketball mgbe ọ nabatara agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Stanford
Gold-Onwude ghọrọ onye nke abụọ Molloy na-ebute ụzọ oge niile na onye ndu oge niile na izu ohi na enyemaka n'agbanyeghị mmerụ ahụ ikpere ọzọ
N'afọ 2011, Gold-Onwude ghọrọ nwa akwụkwọ Molloy mbụ a kpọbatara na GCHSAA Hall of Fame
Gold-Onwude gbara bọọlụ basketball mgbe ọ na-enweta nzere bachelọ ya na nkwukọrịta na nzere masta na sociology na Mahadum Stanford

Dị ka onye otu egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị Stanford site na 2005-2010, Gold-Onwude gbara egwuregwu Final Fours atọ na egwuregwu asọmpi mba abụọ na-enyere Kadịnal aka imeri utu aha ogbako anọ, dị ka onye nche mmalite
N'oge ikpeazụ ya, a kpọrọ ya 2010 Pac-10 Co-Defensive Player of the Year, na-akwụsị ọrụ Stanford ya dị ka onye ndu oge niile nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na egwuregwu ndị a na-egwu
Gold-Onwude nọchitere anya otu ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na 2011 FIBA Africa Championship for Women ebe ọ nwetara akara 81, 21 rebounds na enyemaka 2
Site na 2017 ruo 2019, Gold-Onwude rụrụ ọrụ maka Turner Sports na ọrụ mba mbụ ya, na-ekpuchi oge NBA, egwuregwu, All Star Weekend na NBA Summer League egwuregwu maka TNT na NBATV

Tupu ọ banye na Turner Sports, Gold-Onwude jere ozi dị ka onye nta akụkọ n'akụkụ maka Golden State Warriors na NBC Sports Bay Area, na-ekpuchi ọsọ ndị Warriors na NBA Finals atọ na asọmpi abụọ site na 2014 ruo 2017
Gold-Onwude bụ onye na-akọwa agba maka WNBA's NY Liberty site na 2011 ruo 2017 maka MSG Networks
Ọzọkwa, ọ sonyeere mgbasa ozi NBC nke 2016 Rio Olympics dị ka onye nta akụkọ n'akụkụ maka Basketball Men
Gold-Onwude ekwuola okwu banyere mmasị ya maka inye ụmụ agbọghọ na-eto eto ndụmọdụ, ịkwalite mmata maka nsogbu ahụike uche na inye ụmụ nwanyị ike na azụmahịa
O sonyere na NBA's Basketball Without Borders Program na NBA Africa Game
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2018, ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa iji rụọ ọrụ na Hope 4 Girls Camp, ogige basketball naanị ụmụ agbọghọ
Rose Aboaje (amụrụ n'afọ 1977) bụ onye Naijirịa bụbu onye na-agba ọsọ nke gbara ọsọ maka Naijirịa na asọmpi egwuregwu nke mba na nke mba ụwa
O meriri ọla nchara na ọlaọcha na 100 mita na 200 mita na 1998 African Championships in Athletics
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na 1989 dị ka onye enyemaka onye na-ahụ maka ego na Uganda Export Promotions Council, na-eje ozi n'ọkwa ahụ ruo 1990
Site na 1990 ruo 1993, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego na Karamoja Development Agency
Site na 1994 ruo 2000, ọ bụ onye isi nyocha nke ụlọ ọrụ Uganda Airlines Corporation
Site na 2003 ruo 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nyocha nke n'ime ụlọ na Joint Clinical Research Centre
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'otu oge ahụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego na East African Airlines
N'afọ 2006, ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị omeiwu site n'inweta oche onye nnọchi anya nwanyị nke Bukedea District
A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'afọ puku abụọ iri na otu
Rose Akol lụrụ di
Ọ bụ onye okpukpe Roman Katọlik
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement

Rose Atima Ayaka (amụrụ na 17 Septemba na afo 1975) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, onye na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti maka Maracha District, na 10th Ugandan Parliament (2016 - 2021)
A mụrụ Ayaka na 17 Septemba na afo 1975
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị n'ógbè ahụ
Ọ gara Mvara Secondary School na obodo Arua, maka ọmụmụ O-Level ya, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afo 1989
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ A-Level ya na Muni Girls' Secondary School, kwa na Arua, na-enweta diplọma ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya n'ebe ahụ na afo 1993
A nabatara ya na Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ochie na nke kachasị ukwuu na Uganda, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afo 1996 na nzere Bachelor of Arts na Social Sciences
N'afọ 1999, ọ gara ọmụmụ ihe Officer Cadet na Uganda Military Academy, na Kabamba, Mubende District, ma nye ya asambodo nke ịga
O nwekwara asambodo na Effective Supervisory Management, nke Eastern and Southern African Management Institute nyere

E nwetara diplọma postgraduate ya na Human Resource Management site na Uganda Management Institute (UMI) na Kampala, isi obodo Uganda Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2016, Ayaka na-amụ ihe iji nweta nzere Master of Management Studies, kwa na UMI
Ayaka nọrọ ihe karịrị afọ iri na ise tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na-arụ ọrụ maka Independent Electoral Commission of Uganda
Site na afo 1999 ruo na afo 2000, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka District Registrar
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-edeba aha distrikti site n'afọ 2000 ruo n'afọ 2011
Site n'afọ 2012 ruo n'afọ 2015, ọ bụ onye isi ntuli aka mpaghara na Electoral Commission nke Uganda
N'oge ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2016, Rose Atima Ayaka meriri mmadụ abụọ ọzọ iji merie oche ụmụ nwanyị nke Maracha District na 10th Parliament
Ọ gbara ọsọ dị ka onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement na-achị
Na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri, ọ na-anọdụ na kọmitii ndị omeiwu na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na kọmiti ndị omeiwu gbasara ahụike
Ọ bụ onye otu Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA)
O nwere mmasị ịkwalite agụmakwụkwọ, ahụike ọha na eze na ike akụ na ụba na obodo ya

Rose Christiane Ossouka Raponda (amụrụ na ubochi nke 30 na onwa June n'afo 1963) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Gabon nke jere ozi dị ka osote onye isi ala nke Gabon kemgbe Jenụwarị 2023, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ osote onyeisiala nwanyị mbụ nke mba ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka praịm minista nke Gabon site na Julaị 2020 ruo Jenụwarị 2023, ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ bụ praịm praịm dinara na mba ahụ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi obodo Libreville ma mesịa bụrụ minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa mba ahụ site na Febụwarị n'afo 2019 wee ruo Julaị 2020
A mụrụ Raponda na ubochi 30 na onwa June n'afo 1963 na Franceville
Raponda bụ onye otu Mpongwe
Raponda nwetara akara ugo mmụta na akụ na ụba na ego ọha na eze site na Gabonese Institute of Economy and Finance
Raponda rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke akụ na ụba na osote onye isi nchịk nke ụlọ akụ nke Gabon
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka minista na-ahụ maka mmefu ego na ego ọha na eze site na onwa Febụwarị n'afo 2012 ruo Jenụwarị na afo 2014
A họpụtara Raponda ka ọ bụrụ onye isi obodo Libreville na ubochi nke iri abuo na isii na onwa Jenụwarị na afo 2014, na-anọchite anya ndị na-achị Gabonese Democratic Party
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ nwere ọkwá ahụ kemgbe 1956 ma jee ozi ruo 2019
Ọ ghọkwara onye isi oche nke United Cities na Local Governments Africa
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2019, onye isi ala Ali Bongo Ondimba họpụtara Raponda ka ọ bụrụ Minista Nchebe nke Gabon mgbe nnupụisi ahụ dara na Jenụwarị n'afọ 2019
Raponda nọchiri Etienne Massard Kabinda Makaga, onye so na ezinụlọ Bongo, onye gi dere ọkwa ahụ kemgbe afo 2016
N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Julaị na afọ 2020, a họpụtara Raponda dị ka praịm minista nke Gabon, mgbe onye bu ya ụzọ bụ Julien Nkoghe Bekale kwụsịrị
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ nwere ọnọdụ ahụ
Nhọpụta ya bụ nke anọ Ondimba mere kemgbe nnupụisi ahụ dara
Nhọpụta ya na-abịa n'oge nsogbu ahụike abụọ na akụ na ụba n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19 na ọdịda nke ọnụahịa mmanụ, otu n'ime isi akụ na ụba nke mba ahụ
Rose emma Cherukut bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye omeiwu Uganda
Ọ na-anọchite anya ndị obodo Kween dị ka nwanyị omeiwu distrikti na ndị omeiwu nke Uganda
Ọ bụ onye otu National Resistance Movement (NRM) otu pati n'okpuru onye isi oche nke Yoweri Kaguta Museveni onye isi ala nke mba Uganda
Cherukut bụ onye bụbu Resident District Commissioner (RDC) maka mpaghara Kapchorwa
Ọ bịara na nzuko omeiwu mgbe o meriri oche MP na 19,479 vootu megide Chekwel Lydia onye nwetara 13,550 vootu
Cherukut bụ nwa nwanne Lydia Chekwel onye ọ meriri
Chekwel lụrụ nwanne nna Cherut
Na nzuko omeiwu nke Uganda, Cherukut bụ onye otu na kọmitii na-ahụ maka iwu na okwu ndị omeiwu
Ọ bụkwa onye otu na Kọmitii na-ahụ maka ego oha na eze (Gọọmentị Obodo)
E boro Cherukut ebubo na ọ na-eme ihe n'ụzọ dị elu mgbe otu n'ime ndị nche ya mgbe ọ ka nọ na RDC na Kapchorwa gburu otu nwanyị dị afọ iri na anọ mgbe ọ na-anwa ịgbasa ndị aṅụrụma mebiri Iwu COVID-19
Rose Finkelstein Norwood (September 10, 1890 - September 25, 1980) bụ onye nhazi ọrụ ndị America

N'ime ogologo oge ọrụ ya, o duuru mkpọsa ọrụ maka ndị na-ahụ maka ekwentị, ndị na-arụ ọrụ uwe na ọla, ndị na-eme ọkụ ọkụ, ndị ọrụ ọbá akwụkwọ, ndị nkuzi, ndị ode akwụkwọ na-ere ahịa na ndị na-asa ákwà Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ọtụtụ òtù ọrụ na ikike obodo, gụnyere Boston Women's Trade Union League, Women's International League for Peace and Freedom, na National Association for the Advancement of Colored People Ọ bụ onye mmegide na-emegide ndị na-emegide ndị Juu, ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, na ndị fasizim, onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị na agụmakwụkwọ ndị ọrụ, na onye na-akwado ndị agadi

A mụrụ Rose Finkelstein na Septemba 10, 1890, na Kiev, Russia, nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ asatọ nke Henry Finkelstein, onye na-arụ ọrụ distillery Juu, na Fanny Schafferman Ezinụlọ ya kwagara United States mgbe ọ dị otu afọ[note 1] Ezinụlọ ahụ biri na mbụ na East Cambridge, Massachusetts, tupu ha akwaga na mpaghara Jamaica Plain nke Boston  Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Jamaica Plain ruo afọ ọkaibe, mgbe ọ kwụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ekwentị maka ekwentị New England

Mgbe Rose bụ nwata na East Cambridge, ndị ntorobịa Irish-American na-akparị Rose bụ ndị tiri 'Christ Killer' ma tụbara ya brik ka ọ na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ N'otu oge mwakpo dị otú ahụ, ọ merụrụ ezigbo ahụ́ n'isi, e mesịakwa kpọga otu n'ime ndị wakporo ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ A manyere ezinụlọ ahụ ịkwaga n'ógbè ndị na-enwechaghị mmegide Ahụmahụ ahụ nwere mmetụta na-adịgide adịgide na Rose, na-eme ka ọ na-enwe mmetụta na mmegbu na-eme ka ọ mara ndị na-emegide fascist, nkwenkwe Zionist
Ọ ghọrọ onye ọrụ ikike nke Boston Telephone Operators Union na 1912
N'afọ 1919, o nyere aka duo ndị ọrụ ekwentị 8,000 n'ọrụ ụbọchị isii nke mere ka ọrụ ekwentị kpọnwụrụ akpọnwụ na New England
N'agbanyeghị enweghị nkwado sitere n'aka ndị isi otu nwoke nke TOU, ndị ọrụ nwanyị meriri nnukwu nkwenye a mụbara ụgwọ ọrụ ha, wepụrụ ọrụ nkewa, ma mee ka ikike ha ha ha hazie
N'afọ 1921, ọ gara Bryn Mawr Summer School for Women Workers in Industry

Na 1921 ọ gara Bryn Mawr Summer School maka Women Workers in Industry, usoro mmụta ọzọ maka ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọrụ Mgbe ọ nọ na Bryn Mawr, ọ sonyeere ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ na-achọ ka kọleji ahụ mezuo ụkpụrụ otu ndị ọrụ na-emeso ndị ọrụ ojii Na 1928 na 1935, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ okpomọkụ na Brookwood Labour College na New York, bụ ebe ọ gụrụ usoro nhazi na 'otu esi azụ ụmụaka ndị ahịa' Usoro nke ikpeazụ kpaliri ya ịchọta isiakwụkwọ Boston nke Òtù Mmụta Ụmụaka Ọ gụkwara klaasị na Boston Trade Union College

N'ime 1920s ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Women's Trade Union League (WTUL), Women's International League for Peace and Freedom, na otu dị iche iche na-agbachitere ndị anarchists Italian-American Sacco na Vanzetti Dị ka onye otu WTUL ọ gbara akwụkwọ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị, gụnyere ikike ịga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ mgbe alụmdi na nwunye gasịrị N'afọ 1924, ọ kwadoro otu nnọkọ nke Jennie Loitman Barron, bụ onye ọka iwu na-eto eto, kwuru banyere mkpa ọ dị itinye ụmụ nwanyị na ndị juri (E kweghị ka ụmụ nwanyị jee ozi na juri Massachusetts ruo 1949)

N'ime 1930s na 40s, Norwood bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ahazi ụmụ nwanyị ama ama na mmegharị ọrụ ndị America Na 1937, mgbe o duchara ọtụtụ mkpọsa na-aga nke ọma maka ndị na-ese telegraph, ọ duru ọtụtụ ọgụ ọgụ maka otu ndị ọrụ na-asa ákwà na Boston Na Lewandos Laundry na Watertown, Massachusetts, mgbe ọ na-alụ ọgụ maka nha anya ụgwọ maka ndị ọrụ ojii, ejidere ya n'ọgba aghara ahịrị Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka Union Ladies' Garment Workers' Union, International Jewelry Workers' Union, American Federation of State, County na Municipal Employees, Retail Clerks International Union, na Service Employees International Union, na-eduga mkpọsa na New England na Pennsylvania ka ọ na-eche nkịta ndị uwe ojii ihu, gas anya mmiri na ihu igwe oyi siri ike Ọ haziri ndị odeakwụkwọ na ụlọ ahịa ngalaba Jordan Marsh na Boston, yana ndị ọrụ na ọbá akwụkwọ ọha na eze Boston Ntinye aka ya na ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ kpaliri ya ịmalite mmemme akwụkwọ maka ndị ọrụ, nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ọhaneze
Norwood ghọrọ onye isi na Boston WTUL n'oge 1930s, wee jee ozi dị ka onye isi oche ya site na 1941 ruo 1950

Na 1942, n'ihi ahụmịhe ya na nhazi ọrụ mmekọrịta agbụrụ, a họpụtara ya na kọmitii ndụmọdụ nke isi Boston nke National Association for Ọganihu Ndị Agba N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ gbara akwụkwọ maka nlekọta ụbọchị nke ndị na-akwụ ụtụ isi na-akwado maka ụmụaka ndị nne na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ agha Dị ka onye otu Boston Herald Rumor Clinic, nke Gordon Allport na-eduzi, ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji luso antisemitism, ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na mgbasa ozi Nazi ọgụ Dịka onye so na kọmitii ụmụ amaala Massachusetts maka nghọta agbụrụ, ọ haziri mmegide maka mmụba nke ime ihe ike na-emegide ndị Juu Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, ọ gbara ndị ọrụ a haziri ahazi ka ha chebe ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị; kpọsara ọkwa maka nha anya ụgwọ maka ndị nkuzi ụmụ nwanyị Boston; nwere mmasị maka iwu inye ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ, gụnyere ndị lanarịrị Oké Mgbukpọ, ịkwaga United States; jere ozi dị ka onye so na kọmitii Massachusetts maka Ma…
Na 1970s ọ kwadoro maka ikike nke ndị agadi, ma Mayor Kevin White họpụtara ya na Boston's Advisory Commission on Elderly Affairs

Na Disemba 25, 1921, Finkelstein lụrụ onye Juu ibe ya bụ Hyman Norwood, onye nwere ụlọ ahịa taya na batrị na Roxbury Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ abụọ, Bernard na Barbara Mgbe nne ha siri ọnwụ, a zụlitere ụmụaka na Mattapan, bụ́ agbata obi ndị Juu n'oge ahụ Rose Norwood nwụrụ n'ihi nkụchi obi na Septemba 25, 1980, n'ụlọ ya na Hotel Vendome na Boston's Back Bay wee lie ya na Sharon Memorial Park na Sharon, Massachusetts Nwa nwa ya, Stephen H
Norwood, bụ onye ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na onye edemede ama ama
A na-echeta Rose Norwood site na njikọ ya na WTUL na kwazi Boston Women's Heritage Trail
Kpọpụta njehie tag was found
Rose Hart (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 9, na afọ 1942) bụ nwanyị na-eme egwuregwu track and field na Ghana
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na ihe mgbochi, sprints na ihe omume ịtụba discus n'oge ọrụ ya
Hart nọchitere anya Ghana na afọ 1964 Olympic Games
O nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo ugboro abụọ maka obodo ya dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka na All-Africa Games afọ 1965 na afọ 1973
Namubiru Rose Kirumira (amụrụ n'ubọchị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1962)

bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye nkuzi dị elu na Margaret Trowell School of Industrial and Fine Arts (MTSIFA), Department of Visual Arts, College of Engineering Design Art and Technology, na Mahadum Makerere
Ọ bụ ọkachamara n'ụdị mmadụ, osisi a tụrụ atụ, ụrọ na ihe ndị a tụrụ atụ
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ihe oyiyi Eze Ronald Mwenda Mutebi na onye na-ese ihe na prọfesọ Francis Nnaggenda na Bulange Mengo, na Ezinụlọ na Mulago Hospital na Kampala
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Makerere ebe ọ nwetara nzere PhD
A kpọrọ akwụkwọ edemede ya The Formation of Contemporary Visual Arts in Africa; Revisiting Residency Programmes
Rose Kirumira na 2010 mere ọrụ nyocha, Visual Art Skills and Activities Towards Enhancing Teaching How to Begin Reading and Writing of Early Childhood Education na Uganda na Mahadum Nkumba
Ọ bụkwa akụkụ nke ọrụ nyocha / akwụkwọ ntuziaka ndị nkuzi Write a Story maka Rockefeller Foundation na Makerere Institute of Social Research

N'afọ 2005, o sonyere na ọrụ nyocha 8 Teachers Booklets An Approach to Teaching Beginners of Reading and Writing at Lower Primary School in Uganda, a Makerere Institute of Social Research project for the Rockefeller Foundation
35 illustrated Children's Stories bụkwa ọrụ nyocha nke 2005 maka Makerere University / Rockefellers Foundation maka ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị narị anọ na ịrị ise na Uganda nke ọ bụ akụkụ ya
Rose Kirumira mere A Model for an Indigenous Ceramic Ware Cottage Industry, ọrụ nyocha nke 2003 na ụlọ akwụkwọ Margaret Trowell nke Industrial and Fine Arts, ọrụ Makerere University / Japan AICAD
Rose Kirumira kpụrụ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Buganda, na ihe a kpụrụ akpụ Familyat Mulago Hospital Kampala na 1994< Ọ kpụrụ nne na isi ụlọ ọrụ UNDP
Ọ gara n'ihu mepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ The Page na Winnipeg, Canada na 1995, Ambassador na United States na 1999 na Omumbejja, ihe ọkpụkpụ na Denmark, n'etiti afọ 1997 na 2010
O sere 'Friendship' na Changchun China n'afọ 2000
N'afọ 1997, o mere ihe ọkpụkpụ maka Don Bosco Vocational Chapel na Kamuli District
Kirumira Namubiru dere otu isi akwụkwọ na An Artist's Notes on the Triangular Workshops O dekwara Identity Gender and Representation Reflecting on the Sculpture 'Mother Uganda'
E bipụtara ọrụ ya Reconfiguring the Omweso board game na-eme akụkọ banyere ọdịbendị Buganda na 2019

Rose Lilly Akello (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 23 Disemba 1971) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na-anọchite anya Karenga District dị ka nwanyị distrikti so na ndị omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda Na nke itoolu na nke iri, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka nwanyị distrikti so na ndị omeiwu na-anọchite anya Kaabong District
Rose họọrọ ịnọchite anya Karenga District kama ịbụ Kaabong district n'ihi na e wepụrụ Karenga na Kaabong n'ụbọchị 1 Julaị 2019
Ọ ghọrọ Kaabong District Woman MP mgbe ọ meriri na ntuli aka n'afọ 2017 megide Ms Christine Tubo Nakwang
Ọ nwere njikọ na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-achị, NRM
N'afọ 1986, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Primary Leaving Examinations na Kotido Mixed Primary School
O nwetara asambodo agụmakwụkwọ Uganda ya na Kangole Girls SS
N'afọ 1990
O mechara sonye na Moroto High School wee gụchaa Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education na 1993
O nwetara diplọma na Hotel Management Studies n'afọ 1996 site na National College of Business Studies, Nakawa
N'afọ 2004, ọ gụchara diplọma na Social Work and Social Administration site na Nsamizi Institute of Social Development
N'afọ 2013, ọ nwetara Bachelor of Democracy and Development Studies na Mahadum Uganda Martyrs
A nabatara Rose maka asambodo na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nchịkwa na China ma mechaa ya na 2014
N'agbata afọ 1993 na afọ 1994, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi Komukuny Girls Primary School
Site na 2000 ruo 2010, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu Kaabong District Service Commission
Site na 1995 ruo 2002, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Karamoja Development Agency, Office of the President dị ka Senior Stores Assistant
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye otu na Kotido District Tender Board n'etiti afọ 2002 na 2005
Site na 2003 ruo taa, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye nduzi nke Mowoin Women's Group, Kaabong District
N'afọ 2007, e were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka ọrụ nke Oxfam GB, Kotido Field Office
Rose Mukankomeje bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịch na Rwanda, ọnye gụrụ maka ihe gbasara ihe ndị dị ndụ, nakwa onye ihe gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi, onye ọrụ ya na-ekwu maka nchekwa nke oké ọhịa Rwanda
Mukankomeje rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu Rwanda site n'afọ 1995 ruo afọ 2001
Mukankomeje rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwaụlọ ọrụ nke Rwandan akpọrọ Environment Management Authority (REMA)
Ọrụ ya wetara n;afọ 2011 ihe nrita akporọ Future Policy Award maka National Forest Policy nke Rwanda, nke kwuru na Rwanda nwere 'nnukwu mgbanwe n'ụzọ na-ebelata oke ọhịa'
N'afọ 2013, Mukankomeje natara onyinye akpọrọ Forest Hero Award site na mba United Nations Forum n'ihe gbasara nchekwa oke ọhịa
Ihe nrite ahụ gbadoro ụkwụ na ọrụ ya banyere ikụ osisi kwa ọnwa n'ime obodo , nkwalite ọrụ ugbo nke akpọrọ sustainable agriculture, nakwa ọrụ ya maka national plastic bag ban
N'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2016, a chụpụrụ Mukankomeje n'ọrụ REMA site na nyocha e mere, n;imeebubo mpụ na aghụghọ

E boro ya ebubo na ọ mebiri ihe eji n;aka agba akaebe, ihe nzuzo nke ndị ọkachamara, na imebi ugwu nke ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị, Aka kpaara ya ka ọnwa Machị dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ, ma kpụpụ ya ụlọ ikpe maka ima ikpe, ma emechara hapụ ikpe a mara ya n'ọnwa September n'afọ 2016
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara Mukankomeje dịka onye isi nchịkwa nke Kansụl Mmụta dị elu (HEC) na Rwanda
Mukankomeje nọ na mba ofesi agụ akwụkwọ mgbe egbukpọ agbụrụ na Rwanda, nke metụtara nne na nna ya na ụmụnne ya
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Rwanda, ọ ghọrọ nne na nna ndị na enweghi nne na nna maọbụ ezinulọ di iri abụọ na abụọ

na Biology n'afọ 1992
Rose Mukantabana (amụrụ n'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1961) bụ onye ọka iwu na onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bụ onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Chamber of Deputies nke Rwanda ma bụrụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara n'ọkwa ahụ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke African Parliamentary Union site na afo 2013-2015
A mụrụ Rose Mukantabana na 31 Ọgọst na afọ 1961 na mpaghara Nyanza District, Southern Province, Rwanda
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na ọrụ gọọmentị na afọ 1980, nke mbụ na Rwanda Society for Insurance ma mesịa na Ministry of Public Services
N'afọ 1992, ọ banyere na Mahadum Mba nke Rwanda ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere iwu n'afọ 1996
N'afọ ahụ, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka Haguruka Association, otu NGO nke na-ele anya na ikike mmadụ na ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
N'ịbụ onye nọrọ afọ itoolu na nzukọ ahụ, ọ malitere dị ka onye enyemaka iwu ma rụọ ọrụ ruo onye nhazi nke okwu iwu
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka National Executive Secretary, Mukantabana laghachiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'ịmụ akwụkwọ na Belgium, ọ nwetara diplọma 'ndị pụrụ iche na ikike mmadụ' na Mahadum Saint-Louis Bruxelles
N'afọ 2002, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Pro-Femmes, otu òtù na-ahụ maka udo nke na-ahazi mbọ nke 43 NGO maka mmepe na ikike ụmụ nwanyị

N'afọ 2005, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi mba nke Women's Legal Rights Initiative nke USAID kwadoro ma na afọ 2007, ọ kwagara ActionAid International na Rwanda, nke mbụ na-eje ozi dị ka onye nchịkwa ikike ụmụ nwanyị ma mesịa bụrụ onye njikwa mmepe mmemme
N'afọ 2008, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya mpaghara Kigali City
N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2008, ndị omeiwu ibe ya họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Chamber of Deputies nke Rwanda ruo n'afọ 2013 site na 70 maka na 10 megide
Nhọrọ ya mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ na-eduzi ndị omeiwu
N'afọ 2012, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke African Parliamentary Union (APU) ruo n'afọ 2015
Rose Mutonyi Masaaba nke a makwaara dị ka Rose Mutonyi bụ onye nkuzi Ugandan, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị Manafwa District Bubulo County West, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya kemgbe 2016
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1949
Rose Mutonyi Masaaba gara Nyondo Junior Secondary School maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na 1964
N'afọ 1968 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka onye nkuzi nwere onye nkuzi Grade II nwere asambodo na 1974 gụsịrị akwụkwọ dịka onye nkuzi nke Grade III na asambodo ndị nkuzi Grate III na 1979

Rose nwetara diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ ma mesịa na 1986, ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke nka ma mesịa n'afọ 1997 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Master of Education na Mahadum Makerere ma nweta nzere ndị a niile na Mahadim Makerere n'oge dị iche iche
Mutonyi jere ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na onye na-ahụ maka ndekọ ego na ọrụ mba ọzọ nke Uganda na New Delhi na Dar es Salaam
Ọfịs ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dị na Sibanga Sub County na Sibanga Trading Center
E wezụga ọrụ ya dị ka ọkà okwu nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu Ugandan, ọ na-anọdụ na kọmitii ndị omeiwu ndị a
Ọ bụ onye Katọlik site n'okwukwe
Mwebaza bụ onye nkuzi na Mahadum Makerere, ebe ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye isi ngalaba na-ahụ maka iwu azụmahịa, na osote onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu, Mahadum Makerere n'etiti 1997 na 2008
Mwebaza rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ọka iwu ukwu na nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Maka Ọmụmụ Nchekwa (ISS) dabere na Nairobi, Kenya

Ọ jere ozi dịka onye ndụmọdụ gbasara amụma mpaghara maka Eastern na South Africa maka mgbanwe ihu igwe na gburugburu gburugburu na ike ike, na United Nations Development Programme Bureau for Development Policy na Johannesburg, South Africa
Ọ jere ozi dị ka onye njikwa mmemme maka ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara UNDP maka Africa na Addis Ababa, Etiopia na-ekpuchi mba 47
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ onye isi oche nke African Union, bụ ebe ọ na-enye ndụmọdụ gbasara amụma gbasara mmepe nke African Union Development Agenda na UNDP's Development Support to Africa
Dọkịnta Mwebaza sonyeere ngalaba ụlọ akụ wee jee ozi dịka onye isi ọrụ akụ na ụba na African Development Bank na Abidjan, Ivory Coast

Ọ bụ onye isi nke Climate Technology Center & Network (CTCN), ogwe aka mmejuputa nke UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) Technology Mechanism, nke United Nations Industrial Development Organisation (UNIDO) na UN na-elekọta ma na-elekọta ya
Mmemme gburugburu ebe obibi nọchiri Jukka Uosukainen nke Finland onye jere ozi dịka onye isi CTCN site na 2014-2019
N'afọ 2021, aha ya bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị 100 kacha nwee mmetụta na Africa
Namayanja Rose Nsereko (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1975) bụ onye ọka iwu Uganda, onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye edemede, onye njikwa ngalaba nchekwa na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba nke otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, The National Resistance Movement (NRM)
Namayanja bụ onye bụbu Minista nke Ozi na Ntuziaka Mba na Cabinet nke Uganda, ọkwá o nwere site na 23 Mee 2013, ruo 1 Machị 2015
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Steeti maka Luwero Triangle n'ọfịs Praịm Minista, site na 27 Mee 2011 ruo 24 Mee 2013
Ọ nọchiri Thembo Nyombi, onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Teknụzụ Ozi
Namayanja jere ozi dị ka onye omeiwu a họpụtara maka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Nakaseke District site na 2006 ruo 2016
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Uganda Young Democrats (UYD), ngalaba ndị ntorobịa nke Uganda's Democratic Party (DP) nke a maara maka ime ihe ike ya n'etiti afọ ndị 1990
A mụrụ Namayanja na Kalagi, obodo nta dị na Nakaseke District (otu n'ime Luwero Triangle districts) na 18 August 1975 nye Jackson Ssebowa na Catherine Namirembe Ssebowe
Onye Muganda site n'agbụrụ, a mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ Anglican
Ọ gbanwere na Seventh-day Adventist Church mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ gara Kabowa Church of Uganda Primary School, maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Light College Katikamu maka agụmakọta ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na nke sekọndere
O nwere nzere Bachelor of Arts (1998) na Bachelor of Laws (2011), ma site na Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ochie na nke kachasị ukwuu na Uganda
O nwekwara nzere Master of Science (2010), na Security Sector Management, nke ọ nwetara na Mahadum Cranfield, Defence Academy nke United Kingdom
Tupu ọ gaa n'ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, Namayanja rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-edeba aha agụmakwụkwọ maka Light Bureau of Accountancy na 1998
N'agbata afọ 1999 na afọ pụkụ abụọ na otụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na State House Kampala
Ọ malitere ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na onye ndu ndị ntorobịa na Mahadum Makerere na 1995
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Uganda Young Democrats (UYD), ngalaba ndị ntorobịa nke Uganda's Democratic Party (DP)

Dị ka o si kwuo, o sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ ya n'aka ndị na-eto eto nọ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka Nobel Mayombo nwụrụ anwụ na ụmụ nwanyị dị ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dịka onye bụbu osote onye isi ala nke Uganda, Specioza Naigaga Wandira Kazibwe, Winnie Byanyima, Janat Mukwaya na Cecilia Ogwal
Ọchịchọ inye aka n'ịrụzigharị Luwero Triangle, ala nna ya na ihe nkiri nke agha nnwere onwe Yoweri Museveni mere ka ebumnuche ya bụrụ ọkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwere mmetụta
N'afọ puku abụọ na otu, mgbe ọ dị afọ 25, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye omeiwu (MP) na-anọchite anya ndị ntorobịa maka mpaghara etiti Uganda, nke gụnyere Luwero Triangle, maka afọ ise

N'afọ 2006, ebe ọ gafere na NRM mgbe eweputara Multi-Party Politics na okike nke Nakaseke District n'afọ gara aga, Namayanja guzoro n'enweghị mmegide maka ọnọdụ nke nwanyị MP maka Nakaseke district ma họpụta ya ọzọ na 2011 maka afọ ise
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya maka ọkwa minista mbụ ya dị ka Minista nke Steeti maka Luwero Triangle na Ọfịs Praịm Minista (OPM)

Ọ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke ozi na National Guidance na 23 Mee 2013, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya ruo 1 Mee 2015, mgbe a chụpụrụ ya na Cabinet n'ihi eziokwu ahụ bụ na a họpụtara ọ bụ National Treasurer nke National Resistance Movement na Jenụwarị 2015

Rose Okoji Oko (27 Septemba 1956 - 23 Maachị 2020) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye omebe iwu Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye otu ụlọ omebe iwu sitere na People's Democratic Party (PDP), na-anọchite anya ya Yala/Ogoja Federal Constituency na ọgbakọ omebe iwu nke asaa nke Naijiria
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị mbụ sitere na mpaghara ya na June 2011 wee nọrọ ọdụ dị ka osote onye isi oche Kọmitii Houselọ na Mmụta
Ọ bụ Sinetọ na-anọchite anya ndị Cross River North Senatorial District
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị mbụ sitere na Senatorial District na June 2015
Amụrụ na 27 Septemba 1956 ka Agbo Ojeka si Opkoma, Yala LGA, Cross River State, na nna Thomas Ojeka si Opkoma
Ọ tolitere onye nke mbụ n'ime ụmụ abụọ site na nne ya na nke asaa n'ime iri na ise site na nna ya

Ọ natara asambodo nke mbu ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ n'afọ 1977 na WTC Primary School Enugu mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị na 1975 ọ gara Federal School of Arts & Science Ogoja dị na Cross River State iji nweta asambodo Higher School (Nigeria) N'afọ 1981 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na klas elu nke abụọ BA(Hons) n'ihe gbasara asụsụ na mahadum Calabar, Cross River steeti
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Linguistics na Mahadum Wisconsin, Madison, USA
Ọkammụta mmụta ọrụ, Okoji Oko laghachiri na Mahadum Calabar wee gụchaa MA na Linguistics na 1984
N'afọ 1990 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Port Harcourt dị na Rivers State ebe ọ nwetara akara mmụta doctorate na linguistics
Ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị na 2007, ọ debanyere aha na gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Management Institute of Canada, ebe ọ nwetara MBA E ji ụmụ isii gọzie ya
Okoji Oko malitere ọrụ ya na Nigerian Youth Service Corps dịka onye nkuzi na Edgerly Memorial Girls Secondary School, Calabar na 1981
N'agbata 1982 na 1983 ọ kuziri na St
Patricks College, Calabar ma n'otu afọ ahụ ọ kwagara ịghọ onye nkuzi na Cross River School of Basic Studies Akampka

Ọ nọrọ n'ọkwa a ruo n'afọ 1984 mgbe ọ kwagara Mahadum Calabar ka ọ bụrụ onye enyemaka nkuzi na ngalaba asụsụ na mmụta asụsụ ruo n'afọ 1986 mgbe e buliri ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi na ngalaba ahụ n'afo 1989 mgbe ọ dị afọ 33, a matara ya maka afọ ọrụ ya wee malite ọrụ ya dị ka onye ọrụ ọha mgbe a họpụtara ya ka Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ, Cross River State ; Ọkwa ọ nọrọ ruo 1991
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka Chairperson Better Life Programme, Cross River Chapter site na 1990–1991
Na 1993 a họpụtara ya Director General, National Defense & Security Council, Cabinet Secretariat n'okpuru ndị isi ndị agha
O ji ọkwa a n'otu oge ya na Commissioner National Electoral Commission (NEC) nke a na-akpọ Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC)
N'agbata 1993 na 1994 a họpụtara ya onye isi ụlọ ọrụ, Kansụl na-achị oge ọzọ n'okpuru ndị isi ala ndị agha mgbe ahụ
Na 1995 a họpụtara ya na (NCFR) nke a maara ugbu a dị ka National Commission for Refugees Migrants and Innally Displaced Persons
Na 2002 ọ lara ezumike nká
N'afọ 1999 Rose debanyere aha ma kpụrụ akụkụ nke otu ahụ iji webata People's Democratic Party (PDP) na steeti Cross River dịka onye anaghị arụ ọrụ na pati ahụ

N'agbata 2002 na 2004 ka ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ ọha, ọ debanyere aha ma webata National Democratic Party (NDP) na steeti Cross River wee rụọ ọrụ dịka osote onyeisi oche South, Board of Trustees, NDP

N'afọ 2003 mgbe Naijiria mere ntuliaka onye kwuo uche ya nke mbụ kemgbe e nyefere ọchịchị n'aka ndị agha na ọchịchị ndị nkịtị, Okoji Oko zọọrọ dịka onye ga-azọ ọkwa sinetị, Cross River State North Senatorial District n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ NDP, asọmpi furu efu n'aka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị PDP n'oge ahụ

Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ onye isi oche ndị isi oche ndị otu pati NDP ruo n'afọ 2007, mgbe ọ zọọrọ na ntuliaka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke abụọ n'ala anyị dịka onye ga-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ na steeti Cross River, asọmpi furu efu n'aka onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị PDP
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ debanyere aha ọzọ dị ka onye otu na PDP na 2011 ochichi onye kwuo uche na ntuli aka onye nnọchiteanya National Assembly, Federal House na nnọchiteanya

Rose Theodora Piper (ubochí asaá n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1917 rụo ụbọchị irí na otu n'ọnwa Mee, 2005) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nkè a maara nkè ọma màkà ihe osise ya na-enweghị atụ, nke na-acha anụnụ anụnụ nke afọ 1940
N'afọ 1950, n'ihi mkpa ego, ọ ghọrọ onye na-emepụta akwa
Ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri atọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Rose Ransier, na-emepụta ákwà a na-akpa akpa
Ndị America chọpụtara ọrụ ya n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 1947 mgbè o nyèrè ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya nke akpọrọ Blues and Negro Folk Songs na Roko Gallery na New York
Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara ihe osise iri na anọ dabere na abụ ọdịnala na egwu blues
Ihe ngosi ahụ nwèrè ihe ịga nke ọma ma ndị na-akatọ nka toro ya; n'ihi ihe ịga nke a na-eme nke ọma, e mere ihe ngosi ahụ màkà otu izu ọzọ, a na-erekwa ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ahụ
N'oge ahụ, Piper bụ otu n'ime naanị ndị na-ese ihe anọ na-ese onyinyo n'Africa na America nwéré ihe ngosi onwe ha na New York
Mgbè ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ imepụta ákwà, ọ maliteghachiri ise ihe na igosi ihe na afọ 1980
A mụrụ Rose Piper dị ka Rose Theodora Sams na New York n'ubochí asaá n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1917
Ọ tolitere na Bronx, ebe nna ya bụ ónyé nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze nke na-akụzi Latin na Grik
Piper gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Evander Childs ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na nka nke méré ka ọ nweta agụmakwụkwọ afọ anọ na Pratt Institute n'ihi inweta GPA kachasị elu na nka
Ọ ghaghị ịda mbà n'ihi nrụgide ezinụlọ
Mgbè e mesịrị, ọ gara Hunter College, na-amụ ihe gbasara nka na obere na geometry, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1940
Site na 1943 ruo 1946, ọ gàrà Art Students League nke New York, ebe ọ mụụrụ Vaclav Vytlacil na Yasuo Kuniyoshi
Ọ bụ n'oge a ka ónyé na-ede uri Myron O'Higgins mèrè ka ọ mata Sterling Brown, ónyé gbara ya ume inwe mmasị na egwu blues
Brown bụ onye dere 'Ma Rainey' (1932), nke a na-ekwu na ọ bụ uri blues; O'Huggins, nwa akwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Howard, dekwara uri na isiokwu blues, dị ka 'Blues for Bessie' (1945)
N'afọ 1946, ọ natara Julius Rosenwald fellowship ma nọrọ n'oge ọkọchị na-eme njem na South America, 'na-etinye' ikuku, ka ọ na-ekwu ya, ma na-amụ egwu blues
Dị ka ónyé New Yorker, ọ tolighị na-ege ntị na blues; o kwuru n'ajụjụ ọnụ ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị, 'M gbara ọsọ wee nweta ụdị ndekọ niile wee gee ha ntị
Anọ m na ya'
Nnyocha ya kpaliri usoro ihe osise na-abawanye na-enweghị atụ, nke nwéré isiokwu na-acha anụnụ anụnụ
Back Water (1946), nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke Bessie Smith's 'Backwater Blues', bụ ihe atụ na ihe nkịtị na ụzọ ya karịa ihe osise ndị sochirinụ
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1947, Piper anabatala ụdị Picasso, nke dị larịị, nke geometric nke a hụrụ na Slow Down, Freight Train na The Death of Bessie Smith (nke e sere n'aka nri)
N'afọ 1980, Piper laghachiri na eserese

N'oge a, ọ nakweere ụdị ọhụrụ, nke afọ ya na imepụta ákwà metụtara kama ọkara-abstraction na obéré, melancholy palette, ihe osise ndị ọzọ jikọtara nlebara anya zuru oke na nkọwa na acrylics na-egbuke egbuke
Dị ka mmetụta, o hotara ndị na-ese ihe na Flemish School Hans Memling na Jan van Eyck, na ọdịnala Book of Hours nkè ógè ochie
Ọ ka na-enweta mkpali site na egwu ndị Africa na America, na echiche ya banyere ebumnuche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị agbanwebeghị
N'afọ 1989, o nwèrè ihe ngosi onwé ya na New York, nke Phelps Stokes Fund kwadoro
Ihe dị n'etiti, nke akpọrọ Slave Song Series, bụ usoro iri 12 x 9 inch miniatures dabere na ahịrị sitere na mmụọ
E debere ọkara n'ime obodo ndị dị n'oge a; dịka ọmụmaatụ, Go Down Neath, Easy Anī Bring My Servant Home (nke e sere n'aka nri) na ọdụ ụgbọ oloko nke 96th Street
N'ịkọwa ebumnuche ya màkà usoro ahụ, o dere na 'ọnọdụ dị ugbu a nke ọtụtụ ndị isi ojii nọ n'ime ọbọdọ adịghị ka ọnọdụ obi nkoropụ nke ndị nna nna ohu'
Piper nwụrụ site na ọrịa strok n'ubochí irí na otu n'ọnwa Mee, 2005 n'ụlọ ndị agadi Connecticut, Mgbè ọ dị afọ irí asatọ na asaá
Piper nwere ụmụ abụọ, nwa nwoke na nwa nwanyị, ọ bụkwa nwanne nne nke onye na-ese ihe Adrian Piper
Rose Rappoport Moss (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1937)
Ọ bụ onye odee America amuru na South Africa
Ọ kwagara America na 1961
O bipụtala akwụkwọ akụkọ, mkpirisi akụkọ, okwu maka egwu na akụkọ ifo
Na mgbakwunye, ọ bụ onye nkuzi na kọleji WellesleyYa na Barney Simon na Rose Zwi, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị a na-akpọ Johannesburg otu ndị odee
A tụlere ọrụ ya maka iji asụsụ eme ihe dị ike

Rose Reilly MBE (amụrụ n'abali abụọ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1955), onye aha ya bụ Rose Peralta, bụ onye Scotland bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị, onye na-anọchite anya ndị otu bọọlụ ndị inyom Scotland na ndị otu bọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Ịtali

A mụrụ Rose na Kilmarnock ma zụlite ya na Stewarton na East Ayrshire, Scotland, Reilly malitere ọrụ bọọlụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa na klọb ụmụ nwoke Stewarton United ma n'otu oge dọtara mmasị nke ndị scouts si n'akụkụ Glasgow Celtic
A hapụrụ ya ka ọ gbaa bọọlụ na klọb ahụ ma ọ bụrụhaala na ọ na ọ ga akpụ ntutu isi ya ma kpọọ onwe ya 'Ross'
O gbara bọọlụ nke mbụ ya nke ụmụ nwanyị Stewarton Thistle Ladies na afo 1965 megide Johnston Red & White Rockets

O sonyekwara asọmpi na Hughie Green's Women's Football Tournament ruo na ngwụcha mpaghara, ọ bụkwa onye nsonye nke Stewarton nke weliri iko Scotland mbụ na afọ 1971 wee ruo na ngwụsị nke mbụ nke iko WFA n'otu afọ ahụ
N'afọ 1972 ọ kwagara Westthorn Utd ebe ọ meriri okpukpu atọ nke iko asọmpi Scottish,iko League na asọmpi League mbụ
Westthorn rụkwara na ngwụcha nke asọmpi iko WFA na mmeri ọkpụ abụọ ha asataghị̀ otu nke ndi Southampton meriri ya
Mmasi igba bọọlụ nke ọma mere ka Reilly kwaga n'akụkụ ụmụ nwanyị French bụ Reims n'afọ 1974
Scottish Women's FA gosiri nwunye ha site na omume na nkatọ sitere n'aka Reilly na ndị egwuregwu abụọ ndị ọzọ, Edna Neillis na Elsie Cook, site n'ịmachibido ha iwu ruo mgbe ebighị ebi
Mgbe ọnwa isii gachara na Reims, ACF Milan zụrụ Reilly ma kpọọ maka otu ụmụ nwanyị ọkachamara ruo afọ anọ, na-emeri aha league abụọ na usoro ahụ (nke asatọ ọ ga-emeri n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke Ịtali)
N'ịgbaso oge mbụ ya na Milan, Reilly gara n'ihu na-agba bọọlụ Ịtali ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri anọ gụnyere oge ya na ụmụ nwanyị nke Catania na Lecce
Reilly meriri akpụkpọ ụkwụ bọọlụ ọla edo nke Serie A nke ugboro abụọ n'oge afọ 1978 na 1981, ma nye goolu irí anọ na ato na iri anọ na ise (gụnyere Iko Ịtali)
N'afọ 1978, ọ meriri n'asọmpi n'Ịtali na France, na-agba egwuregwu nke Lecce n'abalị Satọdee wee gaa France iji gbaa egwuregwu nke Reims n'ehihie Sọnde
O mechara laa ezumike nká mgbe ọ dị afọ iri anọ, ebe ọ meriri nrite Serie A asatọ, otu nke French na iko anọ nke Ịtali

N'agbanyeghi na o mere egwuregwu ugboro iri nye obodo ya Scotland ma ghara inwe njikọ ọ bụla na Ịtali tupu ọ kwaga ACF Milan, a họpụtara Reilly maka otu ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ịtali ma họpụta ya dịka onye egwuregwu kachasị mma na otu Ịtali nke meriri Mundialito n'afọ 1984, onye na-abụghị onye isi na iko ụwa ụmụ nwanyị
A kọrọ na onye isi ndị otu Reilly gbara na mmeri ikpeazụ nke 3 Xia1 megide West Germany na obodo Caorle nke dị n'ebe ugwu Ịtali
Na mbipụta 1985 nke Mundialito, Reilly gosipụtara na mmeri Italy meriri otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba United States, na-anọchi Viviana Bontacchio na nkeji iri isii na atọ
Ọ bụ nke mbụ ndị otu America pụtara na mba ụwa
Reilly nwetara onyinye pụrụ iche nke PFA Scotland Merit Award na 2011 wee bụrụ nwanyị mbụ natara ya
Ihe osise nke Rose Reilly nọ n'etiti etiti n'ihe ngosi ọhụrụ nke Scottish Football Museum na-eme emume afọ otu narị na iri atọ nke bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị na Scotland na July 2012
E nyere Rose nzere dọkịta nsọpụrụ site na Mahadum Glasgow Caledonian (GCU) n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2019
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Order of the British Empire (MBE) na 2020 New Year Honours maka ọrụ na bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 2001, Reilly biri na Stewarton na di ya onye Argentina Norberto Peralta na nwa ya nwanyị bụ, Valentina
Rosina Smith (10 Mee 1891 - 23 Julaị 1985) bụ onye na-eme ihe ike na Britain, onye nkuzi na onye na-ahazi otu
A mụrụ Rosina Ellis na Putney na London, Smith bu ụzọ bu ụzọ gaa Clay Cross na Chesterfield na Derbyshire, ebe ọ meriri akwụkwọ mmụta ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi ụmụ akwụkwọ na, na 1909, tozuru oke dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ ọhụrụ
Smith sonyeere Social Democratic Federation (SDF) n'ihe dị ka 1910 na, n'afọ sochirinụ, gara ọmụmụ ihe gbasara sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Òtù Ndị Ọrụ Educational Association (WEA) na-agba
Enyere ya ebe na Lady Margaret Hall ka ọ zụọ dịka onye nkuzi WEA, mana ọ jụrụ ya, n'ihi na ọ na-eche na WEA ga-egbochi ya ikwupụta echiche Marxist ya
Agbanyeghị, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọkọchị WEA na kọleji Balliol na Oxford
Ọ nọgidere bụrụ onye so na SDF ma mesịa ghọọ British Socialist Party
Na 1916, ọ lụrụ Alfred Smith, wee si otú a manyere ịhapụ ọrụ nkuzi ya
Kama nke ahụ, n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ebe a na-emepụta ngwá agha, bụ́ ebe ọ ghọrọ onye isi n'òtù ndị ọrụ na, mgbe e mesịrị, onye ọrụ oge nile
N'oge a, Smith kwagara Mansfield na Nottinghamshire dị nso, ebe ọ sonyeere Socialist Labour Party, ngalaba mpaghara nke John Lavin na Owen Ford duziri
Na 1922, alaka ahụ dum sonyeere òtù Kọmunist ọhụrụ nke Great Britain (CPGB), ọ bụ ezie na ka ọ lụrụ nwanyị ma mụta ụmụ ejima, ndị CPGB kpebiri itinye ya n'òtù pụrụ iche nke nnwale

N'agbanyeghị nke a, Smith ghọrọ onye otu na-arụsi ọrụ ike nke ukwuu, odeakwụkwọ nke Mansfield Labour College, onye nnọchiteanya na Mansfield Trades Council, na onye a ma ama na National Minority Movement
Na 1928, Smith ghọrọ CPGB's National Women's Officer, na n'afọ sochirinụ, ọ ghọrọ onye nhazi oge niile maka CPGB
O guzoro dị ka onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi na Mansfield na ntuli aka izugbe nke 1929, na-ewere naanị 533 votes
Smith na di ya akpafuola iche, ma ha abụọ kewapụrụ na 1930; ya na ụmụaka kwagara Burnley na Lancashire, na-atụ anya ịhazi ụmụ nwanyị ndị na-arụ ọrụ akwa akwa obodo ka ha sonye na Minority Movement
A họpụtara ya ka ọ kwụ maka pati ahụ na mpaghara Burnley na ntuli aka izugbe nke 1931, mana ejidere ya ka ọ kwadochara pickets n'oge ọrụ a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ọnwa atọ
Na ntọhapụ ya, Smith kwagara Bolton dị nso, ebe o guzoro na ntuli aka kansụl 1932
N'afọ ahụ, ọ na-edu ndị inyom na-agụ agụụ March, na a họpụtara na CPGB's Central Committee, na-eje ozi ruo 1938
Ọ bụ ezie na n'ozuzu na-eguzosi ike n'ihe nye pati ahịrị, ọ megidere mgbasa nke National Minority Movement, na lobbie ka pati na-akwado ọmụmụ
njikwa
Site na 1942 ruo 1955, Smith rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nta akụkọ na Daily Worker; ọ lara ezumike nká na Chesterfield ma tinye ihe fọdụrụ n'ime afọ iri ahụ na Mgbasa Ozi maka Nkwụsị Ngwá Agha Nuklia
Ka ọ na-erule 1960, nke a agwụla ya ike, wee kpebie ịkwaga Australia ka ya na nwa ya nwoke biri, mana ọ chere na ọ bụ ibu arọ ebe ahụ
Ya na Ted Hill kwurịtara okwu wee kpebie ibido ọkwa na China, na-arụ ọrụ maka ndị nta akụkọ asụsụ mba ọzọ
Mgbe ya na Zhou Enlai kwuchara okwu, o kpebiri ịkwado Maoism na-esochi nkewa nke Sino-Soviet; nke a mere ka ya na ọtụtụ ndị enyi ya na CPGB kwụsị ịkpakọrịta
Smith mechara rụọ ọrụ na China Reconstructs, akwụkwọ akụkọ ọkara nke gosipụtara China nye ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ si mba ọzọ, wee rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Xinhua
Ọ hapụrụ China n'oge mgbanwe omenala, laghachi na Chesterfield, bụ ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe a na-elekọta ndị agadi, ma mesịa laghachi China, na arịrịọ onwe onye nke Zhou Enlai
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ 90, wee gaa n'ihu na-apụta na mmemme gọọmentị na Beijing ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1985

Rose Tata-Muya (amụrụ na 12 June n'afọ 1960) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ lara ezumike nká si Kenya bụ onye ọkachamara na 400m hurdles
O ritere ihe nrite na mpaghara kọntinent ma sọrọ soo mpi na Olimpik, World Championships na Commonwealth Games

Tata-Muya dị naanị afọ iri na anọ mgbe ọ sonyere na asọmupi mba ụwa mbụ ya, 1974 Commonwealth Games, ebe o nwetara ọkwa nke asatọ abụọ na ọsọ mita 800 na dịka akụkụ nke ndị otu Kenya 4 × 400 mita relay team
Afọ anọ ka e mesịrị, ọ sonyere ọzọ na Commonwealth Games na-eru 800 mita semifinals
Tata-Muya nwetara ihe nrite ọlaọcha abụọ site na 1979 African Championshionships (400 m hurdles na 800 m)
Ọ bụkwa onye nwetara ọla nchara 400m hurdles site na 1982 African Championships
N'afọ 1980, o mere ihe omume dị iche iche na Commonwealth Games, nsonaazụ kachasị mma bụ nke asaa na ndị otu Kenya 4 × 400 m relay

Ihe omume mbụ ya zuru ụwa ọnụ bụ asọmupi mbụ nke ụwa na 1983, ebe ọ na-agafeghị 400 mita mgbochi okpomọkụ Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị Kenya na-eme egwuregwu na Helsinki, ya mere ọ bụ nwanyị Kenya mbụ na-asọmupi na asọmupi ụwa
Na 1987 All-Africa Games na Nairobi, ọ meriri ọlaọcha karịa 400 m hurdles
N'otu afọ ahụ, o sonyere na asọmupi ụwa nke afọ 1987, ebe ọ ruru ọkara ikpeazụ nke 400 mita
O sonyere na 1988 Summer Olympics, mana ọ gafere mita 400
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, o mere egwuregwu Commonwealth ikpeazụ ya, na-emecha nke 9 na 400m hurdles
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi maka ndị otu Kenya
Ọ ka na-eme egwuregwu ochie, ka ọ na-asọmupi na 2007 World Masters Championships na Riccione, Ịtali
Ya na di ya Rod Moody bi na UK, onye bụ onye isi nke ndị otu Kenya na 2002 Commonwealth Games, ebe ọ bụ onye nkuzi
E nyela ya Order of the Grand Warrior of Kenya na Order of the Golden Heart of Kenya
Ọ ka nwere ihe ndekọ 400 mita nke Kenya (dị ka nke 2007)
Rose Zwi ( 8 Mee 1928 - 22 Ọktoba 2018) bụ onye Mexico amụrụ South Africa–Australian odee na onye na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ kacha mara maka ọrụ ya gbasara ndị kwabatara na South Africa
A mụrụ Zwi na Oaxaca, Mexico, nye ndị Juu gbara ọsọ ndụ si Lithuania bụ́ ndị si na Žagarė bịarutere n'afọ 1926, ezinụlọ ya kwagakwara South Africa mgbe ọ bụ nwa agbọghọ
N'afọ 1967 Zwi gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Witwatersrand (Johannesburg) na BA (Hons) na akwụkwọ Bekee
Mgbe ọ bi na South Africa, ọ bụ akụkụ nke òtù ndị ọcha na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ Black Sash
Zwi biri nwa oge na Israel, mana ọ laghachiri South Africa ruo 1988 mgbe ọ kwagara Australia
Ọ ghọrọ nwa amaala Australia n'afọ 1992 wee biri na Sydney, New South Wales
Ọ gara n'obodo nna ya, Žagarė, n'afọ 2006
Afọ ọzọ n'Africa ka edobere na obodo akụkọ ifo nke Mayfontein, na nso Johannesburg na ngwụcha afọ 1930 na mmalite 1940s
Akwụkwọ akụkọ a bụ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, nkewapụ na mbịakọta nke gbadoro ụkwụ na obodo ndị Juu sitere na ndị Lithuania
Zwi nwụrụ na 2018 na Sydney, mgbe ọ dị afọ 90
Rosebell Kagumire gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ụmụ nwanyị Bwerayangi maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gụrụ Mass Communication na Mahadum Makerere wee gụchaa na 2005
O nwetara asambodo na Global Leadership and Public Policy for 21st Century na Harvard Kennedy School na asambodo na Nonviolent Conflict na Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy, Tufts University
Rosebell jigidere Masters na Media, Peace and Conflict ọmụmụ sitere na Mahadum Udo nke United Nations nyere ikike na Costa Rica
Rosebud Violet Kurwijila, nke Tanzania, bụ Kọmishọna African Union maka akụ na ụba na ọrụ ugbo
Ọ bụbu onye nhazi mmepe mmemme maka ACTIONAID na Tanzania
Rosebud Kurwijila, Kọmishọna maka akụ na ụba ime obodo na ọrụ ugbo, bụ nwa amaala Tanzania

O nwere nzere bachelọ na ọrụ ugbo na Mahadum Ọrụ Ugbo nke Sokoine, Tanzania (1976), nzere masta na akụ na ụba ugbo na Маhadum London (1983) yana nzere masta nke nkà ihe ọmụma na akụ na akụ na ụzụ mmepe na Mahadim East Anglia (UK) (1994)
N'oge ọrụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọtụtụ oge dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na mpaghara dị iche iche metụtara ọrụ ugbo, akụ na ụba ime obodo na nchekwa nri
Site n'afọ 1995 rụọ afọ 1997, ọ bụ onye isi ndụmọdụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ ebe ọ na-ahụ maka nnweta ọrụ na mmezu ọrụ
O bipụtara ọtụtụ isiokwu na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ụwa gbasara nchekwa nri, akụ na ụba ime obodo, teknụzụ ọrụ ugbo na nsogbu ndị ọzọ metụtara ya
Mpaghara ikike ya gụnyere njikwa mmemme, nhazi iwu na njikwa ndị ọrụ
Ọ lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ nwoke anọ
Di ya, Prọfesọ Lusato Kurwijila, nwụrụ na Morogoro, Tanzania n'ụbọchị 8 Ọgọst 2021
Roselinda Soipan Tuiya bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kenya na-eje ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ Cabinet maka gburugburu ebe obibi na ịdị ọcha kemgbe 2022
Ọ bụ nwanyị Masaai mbụ nọ na Cabinet nke Kenya
Tuiya gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Washington na Mahadum Nairobi
Tuiya jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka Narok County site n'afọ 2013 ruo afọ 2022
Tuiya bụ ada onye omeiwu Narok South South Samson Ole Tuiya
Roseline Adebimpe Adewuyi bụ onye nkuzi mmekọrịta ọha na eze na Naịjịria, onye na-akwado okike na onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị

N'afọ 2020, ọ so n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri isii na-eme ihe dị egwu nke BusinessDay Women's Hub gosipụtara na ememe nnwere onwe nke iri isii nke Naịjirịa na onye otu 2018 nke Dalai Lama Fellowship n'ihi ọrụ ya na mmepe nke nwa agbọghọ ahụ
Adewuyi si Ogbomosho, steeti Oyo gụsịrị akwụkwọ na klas mbụ na French na-enweta nzere Bachelor of Arts na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo na Masters in Art with Distinction na Mahadim Ibadan
Ebumnuche Adewuyi bụ iwulite nwa agbọghọ zuru ọke, nke na-adabere n'onwe ya ma na-enyere nwa agbọghọ ahụ aka imebi ụdị echiche nwoke na nwanyị niile

N'afọ 2018, Adewuyi malitere ide ihe na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ya kwa izu n'eme ka nsogbu gbasara ụmụ agbọghọ Afrịka pụta ìhè ma na-ahazi mgbasa ozi ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ụmụ agbọghọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, na-akụziri ha nkà ha chọrọ dị ka ndị isi nwere ike
Ndị National Youth Service rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ntọala nke ọrụ ya ka ọ na-enweta onyinye dị ka onye otu pụrụ iche na Kwara State n'ihi onyinye mmepe obodo ya n'oge afọ ọrụ ya
Kemgbe ahụ, a họpụtara ya maka mkpakọrịta na mmemme na mba ndị dị ka France, Rwanda, Ethiopia, Ghana, na United States

N'agbata afọ 2019 na 2020, ọ nọ n'ọrụ nke African Union, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ntụgharị French ma nata nkwanye ùgwù gụnyere ịbụ onye otu Commonwealth Youth Gender Equality Network, ONE Champion, MCW fellow, Dalai Lama Fellow, Award for Under 25 years Outstanding Social Innovator in Education by Ideation Hub Africa ma nọchite anya Nigeria na France maka mmemme LabCitoyen Human Rights nke French Embassy kwadoro na Nigeria
Iji mee emume ụbọchị nnwere onwe nke iri isii nke Naịjịria, edepụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri isii na-eme ihe dị ịrịba ama site na Business Day Women's Hub
O nwere akwụkwọ iri n'aha ya
Roseline Emma Rasolovoahangy bụ onye isi maara ofụma ihe ekwe n'akụ n'azụmaahịa, onye ọrụ gọọmentị dị uchu n'ọrụ ya, bụrụkwa onye zọrọ ọkwa onye isi ala mba Madagascar n'afọ 2013 na 2018
Emma bụ onye ọchụnta ego lekwasịrị anya n'inye aka wuo Madagascar ọhụrụ site n'imeghe ọdịike nke mba ya kachasị ukwuu - ndị mba ahụ

Ọ na-elekwasị anya n'imeziwanye nchekwa ọha na eze, ịkepụta ọrụ, ịwulite ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ga-anọ na mbido ma agúwa ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị kasị mma n'ụwa, nakwa iwu ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze ga na-arụ ọrụ maka ọdịmma nke nwa amaala ọ bụla

Nke n'aga n'ihu ugbua bụ na Emma Rasolovoahangy na-arụsi ike bụ imelite nnukwu ala na oké osimiri iji weghachite usoro Gburugburu ebe obibi dị mma ma kepụtakwa ọrụ, mekwaa ka nri dịrị na-aga na Madagascar
Mgbalị ndị a ga-enyere aka ịlụ ọgụ megide mgbanwe ihu igwe
Emma Rasolovoahangy bu ụzọ zọọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Madagascar na ntuli aka emere n'afọ 2013

N'oge ahụ, isiokwu achụmnta vootu ya gụnyere idu ndú, ọganihu, na ezi nnwere onwe na Madagascar ọhụrụ, ma lekwasị anya kpọmkwem na ibelata ụbịam, ịwụlitekwu ihe ndị eji ebi ndụ n'obodo, ịdọta itinye ego nke ndị si na mba ofesi, na ịmekwu ka dị
Rasolovoahangy gagharịrị akụkụ niile dị na Madagascar, na-ezute ndị nọ n'ime obodo n'oge achụmnta vootu nke ọ kpọrọ Emma Listening Tour Program
Ọ zọkwara ọkwa a nke ugboro abụọ ya n'afọ 2018, ma nweta nkwado site n'ọtụtụ òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị iche iche, òtù, na njikọ ha dị iche iche

Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye isi oche nke òtù ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Ezaka Mampandroso Antsika (EMA) bụrụkwa onye isi oche na onye guzobere Ezaka Marina Mampandroso Antsika (EMMM) njikọ, nwere ebe ụlọ ọrụ dị narị anọ na iri abụọ n'ọnụ ọgụ na ndị otu di puku otu narị na iri na asaa na Madagascar dum
Emma bụkwa onye isi oche na onye guzobere Mivoatra ny Tanjona (MMT), otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị nwe nke na-elekwasị anya n'ibelata ụbịam na iwelite ọnọdụ obibi ndụ nke ezinụlọ Madagascar niile

Emma Rasolovoahangy bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke ASE PPP sarl, nke na-ejikọta gọọmentị na ndị nọọrọ onwe ha ịbịa na mmekọrịta, siri òtù ahụ kepụta Oghere iji Weghachi akụ na ụba site n'ịzụ azụ, mmepụta simenti eji ewu ụlọ, arụm ụlọ, na ịrụ ọrụ mmiri na Madagascar

Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke MinMad SRAL, ụlọ ọrụ na-elekwasị anya na igwuputa ihe ọnatarachi ndị dị n'ala, inye ọkụ na ihe ndị gbasara ya, ọrụ ubi na azụmahịa ihe ndị si n'ubi na ọrụ akụrụngwa na Madagascar
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Petromad (Mauritius) Limited
Petromad nwere ikike maka nchọpụta mmanụ ọnatarachi Bezaha nke dị na Morondava Oil Basin, na mpaghara South West nke Madagascar
Ọ bụ nwa amaala Madagascar mbụ chọrọ ma nweta ikike ịchọ mmanụ ọnatarachi na Madagascar
Kemgbe e guzobere Petromad n'afọ 2005, e mepụtala ihe karịrị ọrụ narị atọ maka ndị Madagascar

Emma arụọla ọrụ ihe gbasara mmanụ ihe dịka afọ iri abụo na ise site n'ọrụ ọ rụrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche n'eme na mmanụ dịka Shell International E&P, Anadarko Petroleum, VRMT International, dị na Houston, Texas, mba Amerika
A mụrụ Emma Rasolovoahangy n'obodo Fianarantsoa, Madagascar n'afọ 1967
Ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ asatọ; ebe nne na nna ya bụcha ndị nkuzi
Ọ lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
Agụmakwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ na Antananarivo
N'afọ 1984, ọ bụ ya bụ osote onyeisi ndị otu egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị nke mba ahụ
N'iganihu, ọnwa atọ nke ọzụzụ ịlụ agha ya dugara ya n'ọrụ nkuzi sekọndrị n'ime ime obodo dịpụrụ adịpụ
N'afọ 1991, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ịmụ Natural Gas Engineering ma wéré nzere MSc n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Algeria Institute of Petroleum dị na Algeria
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara Mahadum Texas A&M dị na mba Amerika, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ were nzere MSc na Petroleum Engineering and Environmental Engineering n'afọ 1994
Ọnụnụ ọkụ n'obi O nwere ịgụru akwụkwọ ya n'isi na ịgbasawanye na nkà ya, mere O ji nweta nzere MSc (2000) na PhD na Geophysics (2002) na Mahadum Stanford
Roseline Fonkwa- Moundjongui a mụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, 1975) bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri Cameroon na nwanyị ọchụnta ego nwere mmepụta 3R

N'afọ 2017, a matara ya maka ọrụ ya dịka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri Breach of Trust N'afọ 2015, ọ meriri Cameroon Career Women Awards (2015) na azụmaahịa na Saker Baptist College pride award nke a họpụtara maka ndị bụbu ụmụ akwụkwọ na nkà ha, Fonkwa ka meriri na azụmaọ
Mmebi nke ntụkwasị obi (2017) N'akụkụ Epule Jeffrey
Roseline Sonayee Konya bụ onye agụmakwụkwọ Naịjịrịa na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị si Khana, Rivers State

Ọ bụ prọfesọ nke Toxicology na Pharmacology na Mahadum Port Harcourt Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na kọmitii nke Gọvanọ Peter Odili ma họpụta ya ọzọ n'otu ọfịs ahụ na kọmọd nke Gọvọn Ezenwo Nyesom Wike
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Civil Service Commission na 1997
A mụrụ ya na Buan, Khana Local Government Area nke Rivers Steetị Naịjịrịa
Prọfesọ Konya gara St Arthur Azures Anglican Primary School, Buan site n'ebe ahụ ọ gara Mercy Secondary School, Okigwe (n'oge a Imo State, Nigeria) maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Agha obodo Naijiria, nke malitere na ngwụcha afọ 1967, mebiri nke a
N'afọ 1968, mgbe agha ahụ ka na-aga n'ihu, ọ debara aha ya na Holy Rosary Secondary School, Port Harcourt ebe ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya ruo n'afọ 1969
Site na 1970 ruo 1971, ọ gara akwụkwọ maka ọkwa A ya na St
Anneʹs School, Ibadan, ebe ọ gara Council for National Academic Awards (CNAA), UK, ebe ọ nwetara BSc
na sayensị na 1976 na 1977 nwetara nzere masta na Mahadum Loughborough
N'afọ 1984, Konya mechiri mmemme Doctorate Degree ya na Mahadum Brunel, London
Konya malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi na Mahadum Port Harcourt na 1979, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ gara Mahadum Brunel, UK ebe ọ nwetara PhD ya
Ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa na 1984 wee gaa n'ihu dị ka onye nkuzi na Mahadum Port Harcourt
Tupu a họpụta ya dị ka Kọmishọna Na-ahụ Maka Gburugburu Ebe Obibị nke Rivers Steetị, o nwere ọtụtụ ọkwa na ndị a gụnyere
N'afọ 2003, e buliri Konya n'ọkwa Prọfesọ nke Animal and Environmental Biology
Roseline Konya lụrụ onye nwụgọrọ anwụ Barido Konya, onyé ya na ya mụrụ ụmụ atọ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Methodist Knights Council São Port Harcourt Archdiocese; na nwanyị mbụ nke Methodist Knight na Rivers na Bayelsa States
Olori Roseline Omolara Osipitan bụ onye isi ọchụnta ego Naijiria na adaeze Yoruba
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dịka onye isi nakwa onye isi oche otu Independent Petroleum Marketers Association of Nigeria's Women Association ma bụrụ onye guzobere First Royal Oil and Gas
Ọ na-ejidekwa ọkwa ọchịchị nke Yeye Oba nke ala eze Itori
A mụrụ Olori Roseline Osipitan na Ondo State, Nigeria
Osipitan na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye isi azụmaahịa n'ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ala Nigeria, ebe ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi ụmụ nwanyị mbụ
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dịka onye isi na onye isi oche otu IPMAN Women Association, bụ otu nwanyị nke otu Independent Petroleum Marketers Association of Nigeria
Ospitian bụ onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mbụ Royal Oil and Gas
Ọ lụrụ Omoba Bola Osipitan ma bụrụ Yeye Oba nke ala eze Itori
Roseline ma ọ bụ Rose Nonyem Ukeje (amụrụ na ubochi isé n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1943) bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria nke jere ozi dị ka nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naijiria
A mụrụ Rose Nonyem Ukeje n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'ubochi isé, afọ 1943
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu na 1986 ma jee ozi dị ka Onye isi ọka ikpe site n'afo 2001 ruo 2008
Ukeje lụrụ ónyé na-anya ụgbọelu Naịjirịa Captain Sunday Elendu-Ukeje ruo mgbè ọ nwụrụ ma ha nwèrè ọ dịkarịa ala ụmụ abụọ
Nwa ha nwanyị, Nnenna Elendu Ukeje, bụ ónyé otu National Assembly kemgbe afọ 2007
Rosella Ayane (Arabic, amụrụ na 16 Machị 1996) bụ onye na agba bọọlụ nke na agbachitere Tottenham Hotspur
Na mba ụwa, Ayane nọchitere anya England n'okpuru afọ 17 na nokpuru ala afọ 19 tupu Morocco ekpuchi ya na ọkwa dị elu
A mụrụ ya na Ogugu na nna Moroccan na nne Scottish, Ayane gara Maiden Erlegh School
Ayane malitere ọrụ ya na Chelsea mgbe ọ gachara na Etiti nke oke nke klọb ahụ
Ọ malitere na usoro ndị ntorobịa, na 2012 ọ bụ akụkụ nke Chelsea U17 nke meriri league na iko okpukpu abụọ
O mere egwuregwu mbụ ya nọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2013 megide Doncaster Rovers Belles; Chelsea meriri
N'abalị iri atọ nọnwa Ọgọstụ, Ayane gbara goolu anọ megide London Bees na FA WSL Iko na mmeri 8o0

Mgbe ọ pụtara ugboro anọ na asọmpi niile maka Chelsea na 2014, a gbazinyere Ayane na 2015 na Millwall; otu ọ gbara Chelsea ugboro abụọ na 2015 na FA WSL Iko Mgbe ọnwa ole na ole na Millwall gasịrị, ọ laghachiri na klọb nne na nna ya

2016 hụrụ mgbazinye ego na Bristol City, onye ya na ya pụtara ugboro itoolu ma gbaa goolu atọ na asọmpi niile tupu ọ laghachi Chelsea mgbe onye njikwa Bristol Willie Kirk kpebiri na ọ gaghị agbatị mgbazinye ya
Izu ole na ole mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Bristol, a gbazinyere ya ka Everton ghọrọ klọb ọrụ ya nke anọ
Ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya na Everton na 17 Julaị na mmeri 3-0 na Yeovil Town
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2017, Ayane sonyeere Apollon Limassol nke Cypriot Nkewa mbu
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na nke mbụ ya maka klọb ahụ, na enweta goolu mmeghe na mmeri 4-0 na egwuregwu mbụ nke Group 5 na 201718UEFA Ụmụ nwanyị na agbachitere megide NSA Sofia
N'ụbọchị egwuregwu nke abụọ, megide Noroc Nimoreni nke Moldova, o nyere hat-trick na mmeri 5-0
Ayane sochiri nke ahụ site na goolu n'egwuregwu ikpeazụ nke asọmpi megide Sturm Graz iji nyere aka mee ka Apollon banye n'ọkwa knockout
Ọ gbara bọọlụ mbụ ya na Apollon na 5 Nọvemba, na-agba goolu mmeghe na mmeri 16-0 na Champions Ypsona
Nozuzu, ọ gbara goolu iri na itoolu na egwuregwu iri na itoolo na asọmpi niile na oge izizi ya
Nọnwa Eprel afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya n'ime ndị otu egwuregwu nke oge
Nabalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2018, Ayane mechara njem ịlaghachi na klọb ịgbazinye ego mbụ bụ Bristol City
Otu goolu n'ime egwuregwu iri na asatọ sochiri n'afọ 2018-19
N'ọnwa Julaị 2019, Ayane kwagara gafee FA WSL gaa Tottenham Hotspur nke e buliri elu
Ayane agbaala bọọlụ maka England n'okpuru afọ iri na asaa na n'okpuru iri na itoolu
N'agbata afọ 2011 na afọ 2012 ọ meriri ugboro asaa ma gbaa otu goolu (vs
Finland, na 2012 UEFA Women's Under-17 Championship qualifier)
N'afọ 2014, Ayane mere nke mbụ ya maka England U19s wee gbaa goolu nke abụọ na mmeri 2o
Otu afọ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gbara goolu nke abụọ ya maka England U19s na 2-2 ise megide Norway na 2015 UEFA Umu nwanyi di na nwunye, egwuregwu nke emere n'ọnọdụ pụrụ iche mgbe njehie ikpe
N'ozuzu, Ayane pụtara ugboro iri na asaa ma gbaa goolu atọ maka U17s na U19s
Nihi nna ya bụ onye Morocco, o ruru eru ịnọchite anya Morocco ma mee nke mbụ ya na June 2021, na agba bọọlụ nime otu nkeji mgbe ọ banyere n'ọgbọ egwuregwu na mmeri 310 meriri Mali
Na mbụ, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ họrọ Scotland, notu akụkụ n'ihi ọchịchọ nne ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndị Scotland
Ayane sonyere na 2022 Ụmụ nwanyị nke Afrika nke Mba nke e mere na Morocco
Ọ malitere na egwuregwu isii niile wee gbaa goolu abụọ, gụnyere otu na nke ikpeazụ
Morocco mechara nke abụọ ka e meriri ha n'asọmpi ikpeazụ megide South Afrika
