Rosemary Ampem (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1992)Ọ bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbachitere otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na 2014 African Women's Championship
Na klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Immigration Accra na Ghana
Rosemary Chukwuma (amuru na ọnwa 5 Disemba nke afọ 2001) bu onye oso oso Naijiria
O nwetara ihe nrite ọla n'asọmpi mita na asọmpi Commonwealth 2018 yana nrite ọla edo na mgbagharị mita na egwuregwu Africa 2019
N'afọ 2018, ọ meriri ihe nrite ọla edo na 100 mita na asọmpi ndị ntorobịa Summer, na-emechi sekọnd 1117

Rosemary Chukwuma nwetara ahụmahụ mbụ ya na mba ụwa na 2018 Commonwealth Games na Gold Coast, Australia ebe o nwetara ihe nrite ọla n'azụ ndị otu si England na Jamaica na ndị Nigeriarelay team na 4275 seconds
N'oge ọkọchị, ọ meriri ihe nrite ọla edo ya na ndị otu relay na asọmpi 2018 nke Africa na Asaba mana ọ maliteghị n'afọ 200 m omume
Na mbụ, ọ meriri ọla edo okpukpu abụọ na egwuregwu ntorobịa Africa 2018 na Algiers karịa 100 m na 200 m wee ruo eruo maka asọmpi ndị ntorobịa Summer na Buenos Aires, ebe ọ meriri 100m ọla edo
N'afọ 2019, o jiri sekọnd 1162 na sekọn 2381 gụchara ihe karịrị otu narị ọla edo na asọmpi Junior Africa na Abidjan m na 200 m n'otu n'otu, na n'ime sekọnd 4556 ya na ndị otu relay Nigeria 4 × 100 m
Na mbido May, ọ gbara ọsọ na 4 × 100 m maka Nigeria na IAAF World Relays na Yokohama jiri 4507 sekọnd na agba nke mbụ
Mgbe ahụ, ọ sonyere na egwuregwu Africa nke mbụ na Rabat wee ruo na njedebe nke 200 m, ebe ọ na-amaliteghị
O sokwa ndị otu egwuregwu relay Nigeria nweta ọla edo n'ime nkeji 4416
Rosemary Esehagu (amuru na abalị iri na ise nke onwa Novemba n'afọ 1981) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na-ede akwụkwọ
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Lagos, Nigeria, n'ime n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ isii
N’afọ 1997, ọ gara na ala Amerịka iji ga n'ihu na-agụmakwụkwọ ya
Ọ gara Williams College bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ nka nke ama ama na Williamstown, Massachusetts, ebe o nwetara akara ugo mmụta ya na Psychology
Akwụkwọ mbụ odere bụ , The Looming Fog, ka e bipụtara n'afọ 2006
O bi na District of Columbia ma na-ede akwụkwọ nke abụọ ya
Rosemary Inyama (amuru 11 Novemba 1913, ubochi onwu amaghi ya) bu onye nkuzi, onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, onye ọchụnta ego na onye mmepe obodo
A mụrụ Inyama Rosemary Ike na 11 November 1913 nye Mazi Okoronkwo Ike na Madam Otonahu Ike na Arochukwu, Igboland, Nigeria
Ọ gara Mary Slessor Memorial School ebe ọ mechara bụrụ onye nkuzi
Mgbe ọ lụrụ na 1934, ọ kwụsịrị izi ihe
Otú ọ dị, Inyama tinyere aka nke ukwuu na obodo
Ọ malitere Ụlọ Ọrụ Ọzụzụ Azụmaahịa Sayensị Sayensị nke ime ụlọ na 1935 nke ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ na-erite uru ma kuziere ụmụ nwanyị nka ha nwere ike iji rụọ ọrụ ma ọ bụ n'ụlọ
N'afọ 1942, Inyama nwetara ikike ịzụta ọlaedo wee malite azụmahịa na-ebubata ọlaedo site na Ghana ma na-emepụta ọla site na ya
Ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ nọ n'ógbè ahụ nwere akaụntụ ụlọ akụ, na African Continental Bank na Aba
Inyama tinyere aka na mmekọrịta azụmaahịa na-azụ ma na-ere nri ruo mgbe Agha Obodo Naịjirịa (1967-70) kwụsịrị azụmahịa ahụ
O guzobere Girl Guides na distrikti ahụ, ma nyere aka chọta ụlọ ụmụ na-enweghị nne na 1965
N'oge agha obodo Naijiria, ọ kpọkọtara ìgwè dị iche iche nke Ututu, Ihechiowa, Isu, Ewe na Arochukwu n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ nke Association of Arochukwu women
Inyama bụ onye otu National Council of Nigeria and the Cameroons (NCNC) ma hazie ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị
Nwanyị ọchụnta ego na-aga nke ọma na-enweta nnukwu akụ na ụba, Inyama kụziiri ụmụ ya niile na mahadum ma na-etinye onwe ya n'imeziwanye ndụ ụmụ nwanyị na obodo ya n'ozuzu
E nyere ya ọtụtụ onyinye maka ọrụ ya
Inyama lụrụ onye nkuzi ibe ya PK
Inyama na otu n'ime ụmụ ha, Hycientha Inyama Nwauba ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Naịjirịa na NY
Ụmụ ha ndị ọzọ bụ Nnenna Inyama, Jennifer Inyama na Okoro Inyama
Rosemary Namuli Karuga (19 June 1928 - 9 February 2021) bụ onye Kenya na-ese ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2017, National Museums of Kenya kpọrọ ya Artist of the Month
A maara ya dị ka nwanyị mbụ na-ese ihe gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere

A mụrụ Karuga na June 19, 1928 na Meru, Kenya nye nna Uganda na nne Kenya Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Margaret Trowell School of Industrial and Fine Arts, Mahadum Makerere na Kampala n'etiti 1950 na 1952 ebe ọ gụrụ gbasara mmewe, eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ na onye nkuzi nka n'ime ime obodo Kenya ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká (1989), mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe na Nairobi Paa ya Paa Arts Centre
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị nọ n'ihe ngosi Studio Museum Harlemīs Contemporary African Artists Changing Tradition (1990), ma nata onyinye nke ndụ site na akwụkwọ akụkọ African Voice
Ọrụ ya na-aga n'ihu n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta, nke gụnyere Red Hill Gallery, National Museums of Kenya, Murumbi Trust, na Watatu Foundation
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu na atọ na Amberley Nursing Home na Dublin, Ireland ebe ya na nwa ya nwanyị bi
N'afọ 2006, ọ kwagara ka ya na ezinụlọ ya biri ma nweta nlekọta ahụike na IrelandỌ biri ebe ahụ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 9 Febụwarị 2021
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere dị na Kampala, ọ laghachiri Kenya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi
Ọ lara ezumike nká na nkuzi n'afọ ndị 1980 iji chụsoo ọrụ nka
N'afọ 1987, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe na-ebi na Paa ya Paa Arts Centre na Nairobi
Ọ na-emekarị ihe osise collage site na iji nkwakọ ngwaahịa akwụkwọ sitere na ncha Rexona na ntụ ọka Unga
N'afọ ndị 1990 e nyere ya ọrụ iji gosipụta akwụkwọ anwansi Amos Tutuolaʹa, The Palm Wine Drinkard
N'ikpeazụ, e gosipụtara ihe osise ya na Paris, London na na Studio Museum na Harlem, USA
Ọ lụrụ di na 1953 ma kemgbe ahụ, ọ mụọla ụmụ atọ ma nwee ụmụ ụmụ
Àtụ Infobox cyclistRosemary Marcus bụ nwanyị Naịjiria na-agba ịnyịnya ígwè

O ritere ihe nrite ọla edo mgbe ọ na-anọchite anya Naịjiria na ihe omume ịgba ịnyịnya ígwè nke ụmụ nwanyị n'akụkụ Happiness Okafor, Glory Odiase, na Gripa Tombrapa na 2015 All-Africa Games na Congo Brazzaville
Rosmary Mbabazi, bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Rwanda, onye jere ozi dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ndị ntorobịa na kansụl Rwanda, kemgbe ụbọchị 31 Ọgọst 2017
Mbabazi nwere nzere bachelọ na agụmakwụkwọ, nke ọ nwetara na Mahadum Makerere, na Kampala, Uganda
O nwekwara Master of Business Administration, site na ụlọ ọrụ dị na United Kingdom
Site n'afọ 2009 ruo afọ 2011 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi nke ngalaba nkwalite itinye ego na Rwanda Development Board
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara Rosemary Mbabazi ka ọ bụrụ onye nlekọta nke Ụlọ nkwari akụ nke Umubano na onye isi oche nke Soprotel, ụlọ ọrụ jikọtara aka n'etiti gọọmentị Rwanda na Libya

N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2012, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide na Ministry of Youth and ICT, na-eje ozi n'ọnọdụ ahụ ruo n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2017, mgbe a kpọfere ya na Ministry of Trade, Industry and East African Community Affairs (MINEACOM), dị ka odeakwụkwọ na'adịgide adị ndụ

Rosemary Museminali (amụrụ n'afọ 1962) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nnọchi anya mba Rwanda, na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a maka Joint United Nations Programme on HIV / AIDS (UNAIDS), dịka onye nnọchianya ya na African Union na United Nations Economic Commission for Africa
A maara Museminali nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi na imekọ ihe ọnụ na Rwanda site na afo 2005 ruo n'afọ 2009
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Mba maka imekọ ihe ọnụ mba ụwa na dị ka onye nnọchi anya na United Kingdom

A mụrụ Rosemary Museminali na afọ 1962 na Uganda, nne na nna ya bụ ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ a mụrụ na Rwanda, bụ ndị gbapụrụ na mba ahụ na afọ 1959 Rwandan Revolution gasịrị, nke hụrụ ka e mepụtara mba nke ọtụtụ ndị Hutu na-achịkwa, na mkpagbu nke ndị Tutsi pere mpe
Museminali tolitere ma gụchaa agụmakwụkwọ ya na Uganda, nweta nzere na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na nchịkwa na Mahadum Makerere na afọ 1986
Mgbe ọ ka nọ na Uganda, Museminali rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa nchịkwa maka Nyanza Textile Industries Limited

N'afọ ndị 1990, ndị agha nnupụisi nke Paul Kagame duziri, onye bụkwa onye gbara ọsọ ndụ na Uganda, malitere agha obodo afọ anọ nke rụzuru na afọ 1994 Rwandan genocide, nke ndị Hutu na-emebiga ihe ókè gburu n'etiti 500,000 na 1,000,000 Tutsi na ndị Hutu nwere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Agha ahụ kwụsịrị mgbe ndị agha Kagame weghaara mba ahụ dum, na-eme ka ọtụtụ puku ndị Tutsi a chụgara, gụnyere Museminali, laghachi n'ala nna ha
Mgbe ọ bịarutere na Rwanda, Museminali malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Ministry of Social Welfare, na-enyere ndị ọzọ gbara ọsọ ndụ aka na-anwa ịlaghachi na mba ahụ ma na-anwa ijikọ ezinụlọ ndị agbụrụ ahụ kewara
Ọ nọgidere na ozi ahụ ruo afọ ise, tupu ọ gaa rụọ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Red Cross nke Rwanda, ọrụ ọ rụrụ naanị obere oge
N'afọ 2000, a họpụtara Museminali ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Rwanda na United Kingdom, gụnyere ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị ka onye nnọchianya na Republic of Ireland na mba Scandinavia
Ọ nọgidere n'ọkwa a, nke dị na London, ruo afọ ise
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Rwanda n'afọ 2005, Onye isi ala Paul Kagame họpụtara Museminali ka ọ bụrụ obere minista na Ministry of Foreign Affairs (MINAFFET), nke na-ahụ maka imekọ ihe ọnụ mba ụwa
A kwalitere ya n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2008 ka ọ bụrụ minista na-ahụ maka mba ofesi, onye na-ahụ maka ozi ahụ
N'oge ọ bụ minista na-ahụ maka mba ofesi, o butere ụzọ idebe udo na nchekwa na Rwanda, yana ịmanye iwulite udo na mba ụwa
Dị ka akụkụ nke ebumnauche nke ikpeazụ, ọ lèkọtàrà itinye aka Rwanda na United Nations African Union Mission na Darfur
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na mba ụwa iji zụlite akụ na ụba Rwanda
N'ọnwa Disemba, na afọ 2009, Onye isi ala Kagame chụpụrụ Museminali, jiri Minista nke Ozi Louise Mushikiwabo dochie ya
E nyeghị Museminali ọkwa ọzọ na gọọmentị

Oge ụfọdụ mgbe ọ hapụsịrị gọọmentị, Museminali kwagara Addis Ababa ịrụ ọrụ maka Joint United Nations Programme on HIV / AIDS (UNAIDS), dị ka onye nnọchiteanya ya na African Union na United Nations Economic Commission for Africa
Ọ nọgidere na ọrụ a site na afo 2016
Rosemary Nauwat (born 14 November 1968) is a Ugandan educator and legislator
As of April 2020, she is currently serving as the elected woman representative for Amudat District in Uganda's tenth parliament
She represented the same constituency in Uganda's ninth parliament as a member of the National Resistance Movement
She then contested the 2016 general elections as an independent candidate
Nauwat did her Primary Leaving Examinations at Kalas Girls Primary in 1980 before achieving her O Levels (Uganda Certificate of Education) at Kangole Girls Secondary School in 1984

She later attended Kyebambe Girls Secondary School for her A Levels (Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education) in 1998 and then enrolled at Kaliro National Teachers College for a diploma in Secondary education obtained in 1993
Subsequently, she attained a Bachelor of Arts degree in Education from Makerere University in 2001[Tinye edensibịa]
N'etiti afọ 1994 na 2003, Nauwat rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Moroto High School
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gbara ọsọ maka oche onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka Amudat District na 2011 na tiketi National Resistance Movement
O guzoro dị ka onye na-azọ onwe ya na ntuli aka 2016 iji nọgide na oche ahụ
Dị ka onye omeiwu nwanyị na ndị omeiwu nke iri nke Uganda, ọ bụ onye otu Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA) ma nọrọ na kọmitii ndị omeiwu maka akụ na ụba mba
Ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda
Rosemary Nyakikongoro (amụrụ c1965) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nwere onwe ya maka Sheema District na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke itoolu nke Uganda (2011-2016)
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya ọzọ dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka Sheema District, n'oge a na-eguzo na tiketi National Resistance Movement
Rosemary Nyakikongoro nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na nzere masta na demography na Mahadum Makerere
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ na Forum for Women in Democracy (FOWODE)
N'afọ 2010 ọ nwara ịnọchite anya National Resistance Movement maka Sheema District, otu n'ime mpaghara ise nke Bushenyi District ochie nke e nyere ọkwa distrikti ọhụrụ

Mgbe mkpebi ụlọ ikpe dị elu tụgharịrị nnọchite anya ya maka National Resistance Movement, Nyakikongoro guzoro ma họpụta ya, mgbe ọ dị afọ 46, dị ka onye na-azọ onwe ya maka Sheema District na ntuli aka 2011

N'ime nzukọ nke ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2011 nke nwanyị mbụ, Janet Museveni, onye isi oche ya, ụmụ nwanyị NRM họpụtara Nyakikongoro karịa onye isi oche nke ụmụ nwanyị Ibanda District Margaret Kiboijana ka ọ bụrụ onye NRM kwadoro maka ọrụ nke Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA)
Ndị omebe iwu na-emegide ya boro Museveni ebubo na ọ na-anwa ịkewa ụmụ nwanyị n'akụkụ òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma tụọrọ Betty Amongi maka ọnọdụ ahụ
Dị ka akụkọ ụfọdụ si kwuo, Onye isi ala Museveni na nwunye ya chọrọ Kobijiana karịa Nyakikongoro dị ka onyeisi oche UWOPA, ya mere ụfọdụ ndị na-akwado URM họọrọ ịtụ vootu maka Amongi
N'afọ 2015, Jacklet Atuhaire meriri Nyakikongoro na ntuli aka nke NRM
N'ịbụ onye na-azọ onwe ya, Atuhaire merikwara ya na ntuli aka 2016 nke Uganda
Ọ nwetara ọrụ dị ka onye otu Judicial Service Commission (JSC)
Nyakikongoro meriri nhọpụta NRM ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka Sheema District na Septemba 2020, na-eme ntuli aka 41,134 (417%) iji merie Atuhaire, onye nwetara 37,865 (384%)
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke iri na otu

Rosemary Okafor (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ nke onwa Mee n'afọ 1981) bụ sprinter na Naijiria
O sọrọ mpi na women's 4 × 400 metres relay na egwuregwu 2000 Summer Olympics
Rosemary Nansubuga Seninde, nke a na-akpọkwa Rosemary nansubuga Sseninde (née Rosemary Noansubuga) (amụrụ na 7 Jenụwarị 1965), bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ Minista Steeti maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị na Cabinet nke Uganda
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 6 June 2016, na-anọchi John Chrysostom Muyingo onye ghọrọ Minista Steeti maka agụmakwụkwọ dị elu
Ọ na-eje ozi n'otu oge ahụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Wakiso District na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda
A mụrụ Rosemary Nansubuga na Wakiso District na 7 Jenụwarị 1965
Ọ gara St
Agnes Boarding Primary School na Naggalama maka agụmakwụkwọ elementrị mbụ ya
Ọ gara St
Joseph's Senior Secondary School na Nsambya maka ọmụmụ O-Level ya, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1982
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Trinity College Nabbingo maka agụmakwụkwọ A-Level ya, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1985
N'afọ 1997, ọ nwetara asambodo nkuzi na Lady Irene College, na Ndejje, nke bụzi akụkụ nke Mahadum Ndejje
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ gara ọmụmụ izu iri na National Institute of Small Industries Extension Training (NISIET), na Hyderabad, India, na-agụsị akwụkwọ na asambodo
N'afọ 2001, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Diploma na Education, nke Institute of Teacher Education (ITEK) nyere ya, nke bụzi akụkụ nke Mahadum Kyambogo
N'afọ 2005, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Arts na Human Resource Management, nke Mahadum Makerere nyere
Ka e mesịrị na afo puku abụọ na itoolu , e nyere ya Master of Arts na ụkpụrụ omume na njikwa ọha na eze
Ọ malitere ọrụ nkuzi ya n'afọ 1987, dị ka onye nkuzi / onye nkuzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo n'afọ 1994
Ọ gara Wampeewo Senior Secondary School dị ka onye nkuzi, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo n'afọ 2000
N'afọ 2001, maka oge na-erughị otu afọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi / onye nkuzi na Shimoni Teacher Training College
N'afọ 2001, ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Uganda ka ọ nọchite anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Wakiso District
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na 2006, 2011 na 2016, ọ bụkwa onye nọ n'ọkwa
N'ime kansụl a họpụtara na 6 June 2016, a kpọrọ ya Minista Steeti maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị
Rosemary Nansubuga Sseninde lụrụ Zephaniah Kizza Kikoba Walube Sseninde kemgbe 12 Ọktoba 1985
Ọ bụ nne ụmụ asaa
Nwa ya nwanyị, Jean Sseninde, bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ prọfesọ, na otu ụmụ nwanyị London Phoenix, na Njikọ nke Abụọ nke England
Rosette bụ obere okwu French nke rose
Ọ nwere ike zaa áhà
Rosie Lee Tompkins (1936-2006) bụ aha nka nke Effie Mae Martin Howard, ónyé na-eme akwa akwa na ónyé na-ese ihe na Richmond, California
The New York Times kpọrọ ya 'otu n'ime nnukwu ndị America na-ese ihe,' na ọrụ ya 'otu na narị afọ ndị isi nka rụzuru'
Ihe karịrị ọrụ narị ise nke Tompkins bi na Berkeley Art Museum
A mụrụ Effie Mae Martin, a mụrụ ya na Septemba úbọchị isii, 1936 n'ezinụlọ na-ekere òkè na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Arkansas
Tompkins, ónyé nyeere nné ya áká ime akwa dị ka nwatakịrị, malitere ime akwa dị egwu n'ihe dị ka afọ 1980, mgbè ọ na-ebi ndụ dị ka ónyé nọọsụ
O kwuru na ya kwenyere na Chineke duziri aka ya na nka ya
Ihe odide ya na-enweghị atụ, nke na-enweghị isi na-enwekarị ihe ọ pụtara otu n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama, 'Three Sixes,' na-agụnye ndị ikwu atọ nke ụbọchị ọmụmụ ha gụnyere nọmba isii
N'agbanyeghị eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọ bụ ónyé nzuzo nke ukwuu ma na-ere uwe elu ya, Eli Leon, ónyé na-anakọta ihe na Oakland nke na-ahụ màkà uwe elu ndị Africa America, chọpụtara ọrụ ya na 1985

Leon gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ihu akwụkwọ màkà ihe ngosi ọ haziri, Who'd A Thought It Improvisation in African-American Quiltmaking, nké malitere na San Francisco Craft and Folk Art Museum na 1987 wee gaa ọtụtụ afọ
E gosipụtara uwe Tompkins n'ihe ngosi onwé ónyé na Berkeley Art Museum na Pacific Film Archive (BAMPFA) na 1997, na Peter Blum Gallery na New York City na 2003, na Shelburne Museum na Vermont na 2007
A gụnyekwara ha na 2002 Biennial nke Whitney Museum of American Art ma gosipụta ha na National Museum of Women in the Arts na Washington, DC; otu onyinyo dị na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ha
N'afọ 2016, e gosipụtara uwe elu ya n'ihe ngosi nke ndị na-ese ihe ise na Oakland Museum nke California
Ọrụ ndị Tompkins dere gụnyere Tents of Armageddon Four Patch (1986), Three Sixes (1987), Half-Squares Put-Together (1988), Half-squares Medallion (1986), Half-esquares Four-patch (1986)
Ọ lụrụ di ma gbaa alụkwaghịm ugboro abụọ
'Howard' bụ aha di na nwunye
Ọ na-anọ naanị ya ma na-echebe nzuzo ya na ikike nzuzo nke ezinụlọ
Ezinụlọ gụnyere nne ya; ọtụtụ ụmụ na ụmụ di; na ọtụtụ ụmụnne, ụmụ ụmụ na ụmụ ụmụ ụmụ ndị nwụrụ anwụ
A hụrụ Tompkins nwụrụ anwụ n'ụlọ ya na Richmond, California na Fraịde Disemba 1, 2006
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa
Rosina Amenebede (amụrụ na 24 Disemba 1985) bụ onye Ghana na-eme egwuregwu na-ahụ maka ihe mgbochi 100 mita
A mụrụ Amenebede n'afọ 1985
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Middle Tennessee State University na Community and Public Health, tupu ọ bụrụ osote onye nkuzi na UALR na 2013
Ọ gbara ọsọ dị mkpirikpi maka Blue Raiders site na 2011 ruo 2013
Amenebede agbaala ọsọ na Commonwealth Games, World Championships, African Championships, All-Africa Games na World Junior Championships niile maka Ghana
Ihe omume ndị a akpọrọla ya n'ụwa niile, gụnyere njem gaa Eshia, Australia, Africa na Hungary
Rosina Ntshetsana Komane bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye bụ onye omeiwu (MP) na National Assembly of South Africa kemgbe Mee, na afọ 2019
Komane bụ onye otu Economic Freedom Fighters
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Nkwado
Ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Kọmitii Portfolio na Public Enterprises na 6 Mee, na afọ 2020
A họpụtara Komane na Kọmitii Portfolio na Public Service and Administration, Performance Monitoring & Evaluation na 4 Septemba, na afọ 2020
A mụrụ Rosina Budd Harvey na Northwest Washington, DC, na Nọvemba 4, 1881
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ itoolu nke Lee Roy na Henrietta Harvey, ha abụọ bụbu ndị ohu si Virginia
Nna ya, onye na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme akpụkpọ ụkwụ, kụziiri onwe ya ịgụ na ide ma zụlite ịhụnanya maka akwụkwọ n'ime ụmụ ya
N'afọ 1897, Rosina Harvey nọ na-eleta nwanne nne ya na Yonkers, New York, mgbe ọ zutere onye na-ede uri James D
Corrothers, onye bụ onye ozi ọbịa n'ebe ahụ
Ọ lụrụ Corrothers na Disemba 2, 1899
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere nwa nwoke, Henry Harvey Corrothers, ma zụlite nwa nwoke ọzọ nke Corrothers site na alụmdi na nwunye gara aga
Mgbe di ya nwụsịrị na 1917, ọ laghachiri Washington, DC, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka gọọmentị etiti dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ
Ọ lụrụ di ya nke abụọ Berthea 'BJ' Tucker, onye Porter Pullman, na Nọvemba 27, 1918
M lere ya anya n'anya wee kụọ ya aka na tebụl ya wee gwa ya na ụlọ ọrụ Pullman anaghị m arụ ọrụ nakwa na di m enweghị ihe jikọrọ ya na ọrụ ọ bụla m na-arụ
Agwara m, 'Achọrọ m ka ị lekọta ọnọdụ a ma ọ bụghị ya ka m ga-alaghachi' Ọ ga-abụrịrị na ọ tụrụ egwu
n'ihi na nwanyị ojii agwaghị nwoke ọcha okwu n'ụzọ a
A chụpụrụ di m n'ọrụ
N'afọ 1925, Rosina Tucker ghọrọ onye isi oche nke The Ladies' Auxiliary nke a makwaara dị ka Women's Economic Councils
Ọ bụ ụzọ gọọmentị ga-esi gaa n'ihu n'ọrụ unionist kamakwa iji zụlite nguzo onwe ya banyere ihe ịha nhata agbụrụ na okike kwesịrị ịpụta na America n'afọ ndị 1930

N'ime ọrụ ya na-arụkarị nke ịhazi ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ, Tucker kwalite na ọrụ ha abụghị naanị iji nwee ọnọdụ nne ụlọ, na-adabere na ụgwọ ọnwa di kamakwa iji sonye na ya site na itinye ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ na-arụkọ ọrụ na ịgbasa echiche nke ọrụ dị mkpa ụmụ nwanyị na ọgụ maka ikike obodo
Nduzi na nraranye nke Tucker nyere ndị Kọmitii akụ na ụba ụmụ nwanyị ohere ijikọ njikọ chiri anya na njikọ ndị ọzọ - ma nke ụmụ nwanyị ma ọ bụ nke ụmụ nwoke, nke ojii ma ọ bụ na-acha ọcha

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, mgbe Washington Women's Trade Union League tinyere National Negro Alliance kpọrọ oku ka a gbakọọ aka megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na azụmahịa ndị na-ere nri, Tucker batara site n'inyere aka na boycott

Ntinye aka ya gara n'ihu mere ka ọ kwado WTUL nke na-alụ ọgụ maka ikike obodo na nha nhata na ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị ka ịsa ákwà, ụlọ, ụlọ nkwari akụ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Africa America na-arụ ọrụ
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1936, Rosina Tucker natara akpa mara mma dị ka 'ihe ngosi ekele maka ọrụ ya'
Na-arụ ọrụ maka Women's Economic Councils, Tucker kwenyere mgbe niile na ọrụ abụghị ihe ntụrụndụ kama 'ngwá ọrụ nke ọgụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị'
Ya mere, akpa ahụ yiri ka ọ bụ ụgwọ ọrụ dị ịrịba ama na ihe nnọchianya maka nraranye ya na nka ya maka ihe kpatara ya
Tucker kọrọ ihe nkiri ihe nkiri nke afọ 1982 banyere njikọ ahụ, Miles of Smiles, Years of Struggle
Jack Santino na Paul Wagner mere, ihe nkiri ahụ enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite, gụnyere Emmys mpaghara anọ na CINE Golden Eagle
””N'ụbọchị olili ozu ya (na 3rd nke Maachị 1987) e chetara ya dị ka 'Nne Tucker' Ememe a mere na 15th Street Presbyterian Church na Washington ebe ọ batara afọ 65 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Ọtụtụ ndị enyi na ndị ọrụ ibe bịara ịtụ ụtụ ikpeazụ nye otu n'ime ndị America kacha ukwuu na-akwado ikike mmadụ

Ya mere, Norma McDaniel, otu n'ime ezigbo ndị enyi Tucker, kwuru, sị 'Ọ bụ nwanyị nwere nkwenye siri ike, ma, ọ dị nro dịka ọ siri ike' N'igosi oke mwute na mmasị ahụ, otu n'ime ndị na-eru uju kwuru 'O nwere ọgụgụ isi na-ahụ n'anya, obi zuru oke na ọnụ ọchị dị njikere' N’ihota okwu Tucker n’onwe ya site n’akụkọ akụkọ ndụ ya a na-ebipụtabeghị, ọ gaara ekwu n’ụbọchị ahụ, sị “Ya mere, mgbe m dị ndụ, ka ndụ m ghara ịbụ ihe efu, ma mgbe m ga-apụ, ka e nwee ncheta nke m na ndụ m dị ka m si bie ya

' Na e nwere mpako na mmetụta siri ike nke nraranye Tucker nke kpebiri ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 70 nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ụmụ amaala America America maka ikike ha ga-emesị nabata na nhata
Rosina Umelo (amuru Rosina Martin, 1930) bu onye odee akwụkwọ na Naijiria
A maara ya maka akụkọ mkpirisi ya, akwụkwọ ụmụaka na akụkọ ifo ndị ntorobịa ya
O bipụtakwala aha pen n' okpuru Adaeze Madu
A mụrụ Rosina 'Rose' Martin na Cheshire, England, ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Bedford College, Mahadum London
Ọ lụrụ onye Naijiria John Umelo na 1961, ebe ọ zutere ya na London Underground
Na 1965, ha abụọ kwagara Nigeria
Ọ kuziri Latịn na ụlọ akwụkwọ Queens, Enugu, ruo mgbe agha obodo Naijiria malitere (1967–70)
Ọ ghọrọ nwaafọ Naijiria na 1971 site na alụmdi na nwunye
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ wee mepụta ihe ọmụmụ asụsụ Bekee
Ka emechara, Umelo ghọrọ onye nlekọta ụlọ akwụkwọ
Umelo nwere opekata mpe ụmụ anọ
Umelo chịkọtara akụkọ mkpirisi iri na abụọ maka ndị okenye n'ime Nwoke ahụ riri ego (1978), nke ise n'ime ha nwetara ihe nrite
Nancy J

Schmidt, na-ede maka Africa Today, na-akpọ Umelo ederede na Nwoke Na-eri Ego 'ọhụrụ,' ọ bụ ezie na isiokwu ya na-ekwu banyere isiokwu ndị na-emekarị na akụkọ ifo Afrịka Umelo dekwara akwụkwọ maka usoro ndị ntorobịa na-ewu ewu nke Macmillan bipụtara, nke a na-akpọ Pacesetters Series
Umelo mepụtakwara ọrụ maka ndị na-eto eto maka usoro 'Heart Beats', nke Chelsea House Publishers bipụtara na 1990s
N'afọ 1967, mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naijiria nke isi obodo ya bụ Enugwu, kewapụrụ dịka mba Biafra ewepụtara ọhụrụ
Ezinụlọ Umelo si n'ụlọ ha dị n'Enugwu gbaga n'obodo John Umelo dị na etiti Biafra
N'oge agha ahụ, Rosina debere ihe ndị ọ chọpụtara, bụ́ nke o depụtara dị ka akụkọ ozugbo agha ahụ gasịrị, bụ́ nke biri na 1970 ma ọ dịkarịa ala otu nde ndị nkịtị nwụrụ

Ihe ndekọ a, nke a na-akpọ 'Ụwa nke Anyị,' ka ebipụtaghị ya ruo n'afọ 2018, mgbe ọ malitere isi akwụkwọ, 'Surviving Biafra A Nigerwife's Story,' (Hurst Publishers, London), nke ya na ọkà mmụta gbasara mmadụ bụ S
Elizabeth dere ya
Nnụnụ
Mgbe e mesịrị na ndụ ya, Umelo rụrụ ọrụ na International Institute of Tropical Agriculture, Ibadan
N'afọ 2018, o bi nso na London nke United Kingdom
Rosine Siewe Yamaleu (onye amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1991) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke na-agba dịka onye na-agbachiteremaka onyinye goolu
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Cameroon
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na mbipụta afọ̀ 2010 na afo 2012 nke African Women's Championship
Ọ pụtara otu ugboro na asọmpi afọ 2010 megide Ghana dị ka onye nọchiri Jeannette Yango na nkeji nke iri asatọ na ise
Na klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ nye otu klob Franck Rohliceck SA na mba Cameroon
Rosine Streeter bụ onye ọrụ otu ndị ahịa si New Caledonia
A mụrụ Streeter n'àgwàetiti Lifou
Na 1979, a họpụtara ya odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Union des Syndicats des Ouvriers et Employés de Nouvelle-Calédonie (USOENC), otu ndị ọrụ na ndị ọrụ
N'afọ 1995, mgbe afọ iri na isii gachara, ọ hapụrụ iji malite otu ọrụ nke ya (Syndicat Libre Unité Action - SLUA)
Streeter abụrụla onye otu Council Economic and Social Council nke New Caledonia ma bụrụ onye isi oche kọmitii na ahụike na ọdịmma
Rosine Honorine Vieyra Soglo (amụrụ dịka Rose-Marie Honorine Vieyr; na abalị asaa n'ọnwa Maachị afọ 1934 ọ nwụọ na ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2021) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba Benin Republic
Soglo jere ozi dị ka nwunye onye isi ala mba Benin site na afọ 1991 ruo n'afọ 1996 n'oge di ya, Nicéphore Soglo bụ onye isi ala
A na-ewere ya dị ka nwunye onye isi ala nke mbụ nke mba ahụ, ka ha batara n'oge ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya meziri ka mba Benin Republic nwee ọtụtụ òtù ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị
N'afọ 1992, Soglo guzobere òtù ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchịBenin Rebirth Party(RB), mere ya ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị Benin mbụ guzobere otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọhụrụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu Nzukọ Omeiwu Benin, na-anọchite anya mpaghara Cotonou nke iri na isii, wee nọọ oge ọchịchị ugboro isii site n'afọ 1999 ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na Febụwarị 2019
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye otu Omeiwu Pan-Africa site n'afọ 2004 ruo n'afọ 2009
Ndị ọrụ ibe ya na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Benin ji ịhụnanya nye ya aha otutu 'Mama'

A mụrụ Soglo, onye ezigbo aha ya bụ Rose-Marie Honorine Vieyra, na abalị asaa n'ọnwa Machị afọ 1934 na Ouidah, French Dahomey, n'ime ezinụlọ ótù onye bu onye Afrika nke ọzọ bụrụ onye Brazil bara ọgaranya sitere n'obodo ahụ
Nna ya bụ onye isi n'ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ oloko, bụrụkwa onye nwe ala, nke mere o ji nwee ike iziga ụmụ ya anọ - Rosine na ụmụnne ya atọ ndị ọzọ na France maka agụmakwụkwọ ha
N'afọ 1946, ọ kwagara France ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Lycée de Jeunes Filles de Caen Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ịbụ ọkàikpe na kọleji
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Soglo banyere n'ọrụ ikpe ikpe, bido ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu site na 1965 ruo 1968 na tupu ọ bụrụ onye ọkàikpe
Vieyra Soglo sụrụ ọtụtụ asụsụ nke ọma nke gụnyere Bekee, Fon, French, na Mina (nke a makwaara dị ka asụsụ ọha na mba ahụ)
Vieyra zutere Nicéphore Soglo na France n'afọ 1947 mgbe ha abụọ bụ ụmụ akwụkwọ
Di na nwunye ahụ lụrụ na abalị abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1958, ma mụta ụmụ nwoke abụọ

Nwa ha nwoke nke ọkpara, Léhady Soglo (amụrụ n'afọ 1960), bụbu osote onye nnọchi anya mba na onye isi obodo Cotonou site na abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst afọ 2015, ruo mgbe a chụpụrụ ya na abalị abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst afọ 2017 maka ebubo nrụrụ aka
Ọ gbara ọsọ ga zoo na mba France n'afọ 2017 ma ụlọ ikpe Criet mara ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ iri n'gbanyeghi n'ọnọghị ya

Nwa ha nwoke nke abụọ, Ganiou Soglo (amụrụ n'afọ 1961), onye bụbu minista gọọmentị na onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala, ka a gbagburu ya ma merụọ ya ahụ n'ọgba aghara enwere na abalị ise n'onwa Febụwarị afọ 2021
Mgbe Nicéphore Soglo na-agụ akwụkwọ na École nationale d'administration (ENA), Rosine Vieyra Soglo họọrọ ịchụso ọmụmụ nke ya na ikpe ikpe na France
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọkàiwu site na afo 1965 ruo 1968 n'oge mmalite ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị di ya
Kaosinadị, a họpụtara Nicéphore Soglo ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba n'oge ọchịchị dị mkpirikpi nke onye isi ala mgbe ahụ bụ General Christophe Soglo na mbido afọ 1960
N'afọ 1972, Major Mathieu Kérékou kwaturu ọchịchị mba ahụ n'oge nnapụ ọchịchị n'ike nke Dahomey nọ n'isi ya nke afọ 1972
A manyere Nicéphore na Rosine Soglo ịgba ọsọ ozuzo gaa na mba ọzọ mgbe nnapu ọchịchị n'ike a gasịrị ma nọrọ na mba ọzọ ahụ ruo afọ iri na asatọ
Di na nwunye ahụ biri na Washington DC
n'agbata afọ 1980 na afo 1989, ebe Nicéphore Soglo rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi na ọbá ego mba ụwa
E mechara kwe ka ha laghachi Benin iji gaa nzukọ mba na Cotonou na Febụwarị 1990, nke gosipụtara mgbanwe nke mba ahụ baa na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Soglo ghọrọ nwunye onye isi ala mbụ nke Benin n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1991 mgbe a họpụtara Nicéphore Soglo dị ka onye isi ala ka mba Benin gbanwechara baa n'ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
N'afọ 1992, nwunye onye isi ala Soglo guzobere otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Benin Rebirth Party (RB), nke mere ka ọ ghọọ nwanyị Benin mbụ guzobere otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Rosine Vieyra Soglo guzobere Benin Rebirth Party iji nweta nkwado ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka di ya, onye na-enweghị nkwado zuru oke site na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke mba ahụ

N'afọ sochirinụ, otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị La Renouveau wepụtara nkwupụta nke Soglo bịanyere aka nye ndi ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi na-agba ndị na-akwado di ya ume isonyere òtù ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Benin Rebirth Party
Òtù ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ọhụrụ a Rosine Vieyra Soglo hiwere meriri oche iri abụo n'ime oche iri asatọ na atọ e nwere na ụlọ nzukọ Omeiwu ha, na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Benin emere n'afo 1995
Otú ọ dị, onye isi ala Nicéphore Soglo, onye na-achọ ka ahọpụtagharia ya ọzọ ịbụ onye isi ala dara
Onye isi ala mbụ nke ala ahụ,Mathieu Kérékou meriri ya na ntuli aka onye isi ala Benin n'afọ 1996
N'afọ 1999, a họpụtara Rosine Vieyra Soglo ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba Benin, na-anọchite anya mpaghara nke iri na isii nke Cotonou
O nọọrọ n'oche nzukọ ya site na afo 1999 ruo n'afọ 2019, na-emeri ntuli aka niile emere ugboro anọ n'usoro
N'oge ọ bụ osote ya, Rosine Soglo ghọrọ onye na-akatọ ụfọdụ iwu ndị onye isi ala Mathieu Kérékou, Thomas Boni Yayi, na Patrice Talon na-enye
Na nso nso a, Soglo katọrọ onye isi ala Patrice Talon n'ebe ọ dị egwu
Tụkwasị na nke a, Soglo jere ozi n'otu oge ahụ dị ka onye otu Benin nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu Pan-Africa site na 2004 ruo 2009
N'afọ 2007, Soglo sonyeere Alliance for a Dynamic Democracy, ya na Antoine Idji Kolawolé na Bruno Amoussou
ADD so zọọ oche ọchịchị n'oge ntuli aka ndị omeiwu emere na Maachị 2007 wee nweta oche iri abụọ
Ka abiawara nsonso na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu emere n'Eprel 2011, Soglo bụ ya bụ onye isi ADD
Otú ọ dị, n'oge ntuli aka nke afọ 2011, ọ sonyeere otu ndọrọndọrọ Union Makes the Nation Coalition wee kwe nkwa imeziwanye ogo gọọmentị Benin na ọnọdụ obibi ndụ ndị Benin
Na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke Eprel 2015, a họpụtara Soglo ọzọ na Nzukọ Omeiwu Benin nke si na òtù ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Benin Renaissance ịnọchite anya mpaghara nke iri na isii

Malite na abalị iri na itoolu nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2015, Soglo malitere ino n'isi n'arụmụka ndị a na-eme n'ụlọ Omeiwu n'ọkwa Dean ụlọ nzukọ omeiwu ọkwa a na-enye onye kachasị okenye maọbu onye kachasị nọtee aka n'ụlọ omeiwu

Dị ka onye kachasị okenye, bụrụ Dean ụlọ nzukọ Omeiwu (doyenne d'âge), ọ nọọro n'isi nhazi usoro izizi niile nke emere n'ụlọ nzukọ ka ha malitere nzukọ na abalị iri na itoolu nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2015, tupu nhọpụta nke Onye isi oche nke ụlọ nzukọ Omeiwu ahụ

N'okwu ikpeazụ ya nke o nyere na ụlọ nzukọ Omeiwu na abalị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2019, Rosine Soglo kwupụtara ịgba arụkwaghịm ya na ila ezumike nká ya n'ihi na odighizi ahụ ụzọ, na-ekwu ihe ikpa ọchị n'okwu ya sị 'Onye agadi nwanyị ahụ na-apụ ma gwa gị ka ị gaa nke ọma'
Ewezuga ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, Rosine Vieyra Soglo guzobere Òtù Vidolé (Òtù Vidolé), nke na-enye nkwado nye ụmụ nwanyị na ezinụlọ nwere ejima, ụmụ atọ, na ụmụ anọ ndị amụkọtara ọnụ
N'afọ 2019, Célestine Zanou, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye bụbu onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala, toro Soglo dịka 'nne mba anyị' ma kpọọ ya 'ide nke ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Benin'
Na ngwụcha Julaị 2021, a kpọgara Rosine Soglo n'ụlọ ọgwụ ebe ọ nọrọ ụbọchị atọ na Mahouena Clinic di na Cotonou maka ọgwụgwọ ọrịa obi

Ọnọdụ ya na mbụ katụwara mma site na ọgwụgwọ ọ na-anata, mana ahụike ya bịara kawanye njọ ngwa ngwa n'ụtụtụ Sunday, abalị iri abụọ na ise n'onwa Julaị Ọ rịọrọ ka ọ laghachi n'ụlọ ya na la Haie Vive na Cotonou, ebe ọ nwụrụ n'ihe dị ka elekere anọ nke ehihie n'ụbọchị ahụ, ebe ọ gbara afọ iri asatọ na asaa
Di ya, onye bụbu onye isi ala Benin bụ Nicéphore Soglo, onye nọ ná mba ọzọ bụ Paris maka ịnata ọgwụgwọ n'oge ọnwụ ya, na ụmụ ha nwoke abụọ bụ ndị ọ hapụrụ na-eru uju ọnwụ ya
Na ihe o dere, Soglo kwanyere nwunye ya nwụrụ anwụ ùgwù, dee na-asị, 'Ọ bụ nwanyị a nyere m ohere ịdị ike'

Nwa ya nwoke nke ọkpara, onye bụbu onye isi obodo Cotonou Léhady Soglo, mara ọkwa na ọ ga-alọta nlọta nke mbụ ya site na mba ọzọ bụ France nke ọ gbara ọsọ ga zoo kemgbe afọ 2017 iji gaa olili ozu nne ya
Nwa ya nwoke nke abụọ, Ganiou Soglo, onye lanarịrị ọnwụ site n'égbè agbara ya na Febụwarị afọ 2021 sokwa na ndị ọ hapụrụ na-eru uju ọnwụ ya
Onye bụbu minista na onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru ụmụ nwanyị bụ Vicentia Boco haziri olili ozu Soglo

E nyere akụkọ otuto site n'ọnụ ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ n'ofe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Benin, gụnyere Onye isi ala Benin Patrice Talon, onye egwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ya bụ imegide ndị mmadụ ugboro ugboro, onye kowara Soglo na ihe O dere na oghere mgbasa ozi Facebook dịka 'nwanyi nwere obi ike ma pụkwaa iche'

Ndị ọzọ kọkwara akụkọ ọma gbasara Soglo gụnyere onye bụbu onye isi ala Thomas Boni Yayi na onye omeiwu Benin, Louis Vlavonou, onye kpọrọ ya, 'nwanyi ọpụrụ iche onye nsonye ya na nzukọ ndị omeiwu isii na-ewepụghị aka na-ahapụ ihe a na-apụghị izere ezere n'ụlọ ọrụ ndị omeiwu nakwa na mba ahụ n'ozuzu ya'

Onye isi ndị òtù ndọrọndọrọ chọrọ iwere oche ọchịchị bụ Paul Hounkpè kwukwara, 'ọnwụ Rosine Soglo, onye a ma ama na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Benin kemgbe nzukọ mba nke Febụwarị 1990, bụ nnukwu mfu nye mba anyị nyekwa ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya anyị
Ọ bụ onye na-alụ ọgụ ọnwụ na ndụ maka udo, nnwere onwe na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Benin
Rossouw bụ aha nke nna Afrikaans, nke sitere na French Rousseau
Ọ nwere ike izo aka na ndia
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ Rotek na 2009 site na ọrụ na nrụzi nke igwe ịcha laser na ihe osise
Ụlọ ọrụ Rotec malitere ọrụ ya na 2019 na na 2013 weputara ngwaọrụ laser nwere ihe ọhụrụ n'okpuru akara ROTEC
Na 2013, ọ na-enwe ike ịrụ ọrụ na CO2 lasers na mgbanwe ndị bụ isi, ọ nwetara ọrụ n'ime afọ ole na ole

Chibuike Rotimi Amaechi (amụrụ na ụgbọchị iri abụọ n'asaa ọnwa Mee n'afọ1965) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, ọ jere ozi dị ka Minista Federal nke Transportation nke Naijiria site n'afọ2015 ruo afọ 2022 n'okpuru ụlọ ọrụ nke Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm iji zọọ mpi maka ọkwa onye isi ala Naịjirịa n'okpuru ọchịchị All Progressive Congress (APC)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka gọvanọ nke Rivers Steeti nke jupụtara na mmanụ site n'afọ 2007 ruo afọ 2015 na Onye ọkà okwu nke ụlọ nzuko Rivers steeti site n'afọ 1999 ruo afọ 2007

N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022, Amaechi kwupụtara mmasị ya ịzọ ọkwa onye isi ala n'afọ 2023, ọ bịara onye nke abụọ na ntuliaka onye isi ala nke APC nke e mere n'ọnwa June afọ 2022 n'azụ Bola Tinubu na votu narị atọ na iri na isii site n'aka ndị nnọchiteanya
A mụrụ Amaechi na Ubima, nke dị n'ọchịchị ime obodo Ikwerre na Rivers Steeti n'ezinụlọ Elder Fidelis Amaechi lagoru ala mmụọ na Mary Amaechi
Aha mbụ ya na nke ikpeazụ ya bụ aha Igbo nke pụtara 'Chineke bụ ike' na 'Onye ma echi' n'otu n'otu
A zụlitere ya na Diobu, mpaghara nwere ọtụtụ mmadụ nke dị na Port Harcourt
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na St Theresa's Primari sukulu site n'afọ 1970 ruo n'afọ 1976
Ọ nwetara asambodo nke West Afrikan Senior Sukulu n'afọ 1982 mgbe ọ gachara ụlọ akwụkwọ Gọọmentị Sekondiri Sukulu Okolobiri
Amaechi nwetara nzere Bachelor nke Arts (Nsọpụrụ) na English Stọọdịs na Literature na Mahadum Port Harcourt n'afọ1987, ebe ọ bụ onye isi oche nke National Union of Rivers States Students (NURSS)
Ọ gụchara ụlọ ọrụ ndị ntorobịa bụ́ National Youth Service n'afọ 1988, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ sonyeere Pamo Clinics and Hospitals Limited nke Peter Odili nwere, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo n'afọ 1992
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ, gụnyere West Africa Glass Industry Limited na Risonpalm Naijiria Limited
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2022, Amaechi kwupụtara na Twitter ya na ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Law n'akụkụ foto nke nnọkọ ya
N'oge mgbanwe gaa na Republic nke Atọ nke Naịjirịa, Amaechi bụ odeakwụkwọ nke National Republican Convention na ọchịchị ime obodo Ikwere nke Rivers Steeti

N'agbata afọ 1992 na afọ 1994, ọ bụ onye enyemaka pụrụ iche nye osote gọvanọ nke Rivers Steeti, Peter Odili onye isi ya kwenyere na Amaechi dị ka nwa okorobịa nwere ikike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ma kpọbata ya n'okpuru nku ya
N'afọ 1996, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ Rivers Steeti nke kọmitii nlekọta Democratic Party of Nigeria (DPN) n'oge mmemme mgbanwe nke General Sani Abacha
N'afọ 1999, o zọrọ ma merie oche iji bụrụ onye otu Ụlọ Nzukọ nke Rivers Steeti iji nọchite anya mpaghara ya
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọkà okwu ndi ụlọ nzukọ
A họpụtarakwara Amaechi ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Nzukọ Ndị Ọkà okwu nke Nzukọ Steeti nke Naịjirịa
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2003, a họpụtara ya ọzọ dị ka onye ọkà okwu
N'afọ 2003, mgbe Nzukọ nke Mba gara were ọrụ iwu nke Ụlọ Nzukọ nke Steeti dị ka edepụtara na iwu, ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya wegara okwu ahụ na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu

Dị ka ọkà okwu, Amaechi jiri mmekọrịta ya na Gọvanọ Peter Odili rụọ ọrụ iji mee ka mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ndị isi na ndị omeiwu nke gọọmentị na Rivers Steeti, ruo mgbe Rotimi Amaechi malitere mkpọsa megide Gọọmentị Steeti, ma jiri ọnụ wakpo onyinyo nke Gọvanọ Steeti, na mgbalị iji nọchie Peter Odili dị ka gọvanọ na 2007
N'afọ 2007, Amaechi sonyere ma merie na People's Democratic Party (PDP) maka Gọvanọ Rivers Steeti n'afọ 2007
Ndị otu ahụ nọchiri aha ya, ihe ọ gbara n'ụlọ ikpe
Ikpe ahụ mechara rute n'Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu

Ọ ghọrọ gọvanọ na abalị iri abụọ n'isii, ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2007, mgbe Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu kpebiri na ọ bụ onye ruru eru nke PDP na onye mmeri nke ntuli aka Gọvanọ nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 2007 na Rivers Steeti
Ọchịchị ya tinyere ego na mmepe akụrụngwa, iwu okporo ụzọ na àkwà mmiri, na-agbaso ọhụụ nke ijikọ akụkụ niile nke steeti site n'okporo ụzọ
Gọvanọ ahụ raara onwe ya nye imezigharị obodo na imeziwanye ọrụ njem
Ọchịchị ya malitere iwu otu ụgbọ okporo ígwè iji nye njem ọha n'ime obodo Port Harcourt
E wuru ụfọdụ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik (Afam, Trans Amadi, Onne) iji melite ike eletrik na steeti ahụ
A họpụtara ya ọzọ maka oge nke abụọ na abalị iri abụọ na isii ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2013, Amaechi so n'ime ndị gọvanọ asaa na-eje ozi bụ ndị guzobere otu G-7 n'ime PDP
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2013, Amaechi na ndị otu G-7 ise gbagara n'òtù mmegide ọhụrụ bụ All Progressives Congress (APC) wee ghọọ onye isi nchịkwa nke mkpọsa onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari
N'afọ 2015, mgbe nhọpụta Muhammadu Buhari gasịrị, a họpụtara Amaechi na kọmitii ya dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka njem nke gọọmentị etiti
N'ọnwa Julaị 2019, Onye isi ala Buhari họpụtara ya ọzọ maka nhọpụta minista
Ndi Senate gwara Amaechi ka ọ kpọọ isi ala ma gawa n'oge nyocha ya
Kemgbe ọ hapụrụ ọrụ n'afọ 2015, Amaechi bụrụ onye a na ebo ebubo nrụrụ aka site n'aka onye nọchiri ya bụ Gọvanọ Ezenwo Wike

Wike boro ya ebubo na ọ na-eji ego steeti eme ihe iji kwado mkpọsa onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari n'oge ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 2015 site na ire mmanụ na gaasị nke Rivers, yana iji aghụghọ mebie ego nke ire ya ruru US $ nde 309
Amaechi anọgidewo na-agọnahụ ebubo ndị e boro ya
N'afọ 2018, o kwetara na n'agbanyeghị agha nrụrụ aka nke Buhari na-emegide, nrụrụ aka dị n'ime ọchịchị
Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naijiria n'ọnwa Mee, 2022 nyere ndị na-ahụ maka nyocha Rivers steeti ohere ka ha nyochaa Amaechi maka ebubo aghụghọ dị ijeri naira iri itoolu na isii
Ọ lụrụ Judith Amaechi ma ha nwere ụmụ nwoke atọ
Ọ bụ onye Katọlik bụrụkwa onye otu ndị Knight of Saint John (KSJ)
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2021, Minista Naịjirịa na-ahụ maka njem, Rt
Hon
Rotimi Amaechi, ghọrọ onye na-agụ egwu ma wepụta egwu izizi ya akpọrọ 'Blessed The People The Lord Has Chosen As His Heritage' na mmekorita ya na nwunye ya, Judith na ncheta ọmụmụ ya nke afọ 56
Amaechi nwere nsọpụrụ mba nke Commander of Order of Niger (CON)
[citation needed]
Àtụ RiversStateGovernors
Àtụ Rivers State People's Democratic Party
Oluwarotimi Adebiyi Wahab Fani-Kayode (20 Eprel 1955 - 21 Disemba 1989) bụ onye na-ese foto amụrụ na Naijiria, onye kwagara England mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ iji gbanahụ agha obodo Naijiria
E mepụtara isi ọrụ ya n'etiti 1982 na 1989
Ọ nyochara esemokwu nke ịbụ nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyi, agbụrụ na ọdịbendị nke o mepụtara site na ihe osise na nhazi
A mụrụ Rotimi Fani-Kayode na Lagos, Nigeria, n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1955, dị ka nwa nke abụọ nke ezinụlọ Yoruba a ma ama (Chief Babaremilekun Adetokunboh Fani-Kayode na Chief Mrs
Adia Adunni Fani-Kayode) nke kwagara Brighton, England, n'afọ 1966, mgbe ọchịchị ndị agha na agha obodo sochirinụ
Rotimi gara ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị Britain maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, nke gụnyere Brighton College, Seabright College, na Millfield, o wee kwaga USA na 1976
Ọ gụrụ Fine Arts na Economics na Mahadum Georgetown, Washington, DC, maka BA ya, ọ gara n'ihu maka MFA ya na Fine Arts & Photography na Pratt Institute, New York City
Mgbe ọ nọ na New York, ya na Robert Mapplethorpe ghọrọ enyi, onye o kwuru na ọ na-emetụta ọrụ ya nke ụkwụụ

Fani-Kayode laghachiri UK na 1983 ebe ọ ghọrọ onye otu Brixton Artists Collective, na-egosi na mbụ na ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ngosi ndị otu ahụ emere na Brixton Art Gallery tupu ọ gaa n'ihu igosi na ebe ngosi ndị ọzọ dị iche iche na London
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ n'ihi ọrịa nkụchi obi mgbe ọ na-agbake n'ọrịa metụtara ọrịa AIDS na 21 Disemba 1989
N'oge ọnwụ ya, ya na onye ya na-arụkọ ọrụ Alex Hirst bi na Brixton, London

Fani-Kayode kwetara na ọrụ mbụ nke Mapplethorpe na-emetụta ya mana ọ gbasiri mbọ ike na nka ya, na-enyocha ọnọdụ ịbụ nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị, ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, colonialism na esemokwu dị n'etiti nwoke idina nwoke ya na nkuzi Yoruba ya site na usoro ihe oyiyi na agba na oji na ọcha
Ọ bụ ezie na Rotimi Fani-Kayode kwuru na Robert Mapplethorpe dị ka mmetụta na ọrụ ya, Fani-Kayode na-arụ ọrụ na isiokwu Baroque ebe Mapplethorpe na-arụ ọrụ na Classical
Mmekọrịta ya na okpukpe Yoruba malitere mgbe ya na nne na nna ya nọ
Fani-Kayode kwuru na nne na nna ya bụ ndị na-efe Ifa, orisha, na ndị na-elekọta ụlọ arụsị ndị Yoruba, ahụmahụ mbụ nke metụtara ọrụ ya
Site na ihe nketa a, ọ malitere ịchọ ijikọta ọchịchọ, emume, na ahụ nwoke ojii
Ahụmahụ okpukpe ya gbara ya ume iṅomi usoro Yoruba nke inwe, nke ndị ụkọchukwu Yoruba na-ekwurịta okwu na chi ma nwee obi ụtọ
E gosipụtara ihe atụ nke mmekọrịta dị otú ahụ n'etiti foto Fani-Kayode na usoro obi añuri ndị Yoruba na ọrụ ya, Bronze Head (1987)
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ ya bụ ikwurịta okwu na uche ndị na-ege ntị na-amaghị ihe na ijikọta echiche Yoruba na nke ọdịda anyanwụ (karịsịa Iso Ụzọ Kraịst)
Omume a nke ijikọta ihe ịchọ mma na agụụ mmekọahụ okpukpe na-amanye onye na-ekiri ya ịhụ anya na n'ụzọ na-akpali akpali
Enwere ike ịhụ nke a na ọrụ mbụ ya, 'Sonponnoi' (1987)
Sonponnoi bụ otu n'ime orishas kachasị ike na Yoruba pantheon; ọ bụ chi nke kịtịkpa
N'ihi nnukwu ike ya, ọ na-akpata egwu ruo n'ókè ebe ndị mmadụ na-atụ egwu ikwu aha ya, ọ na-aghọkwa onye na-anọghị n'èzí, na-ebi n'ime ime obodo kama ịnọ n'ime ala
N'ihe oyiyi ahụ, e nwere onye ojii na-enweghị isi, nke e ji ntụpọ ọcha na oji chọọ mma, na-ejide kandụl atọ na-ere ọkụ na nkwonkwo ya
Fani-Kayode ji ntụpọ chọọ ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ mma iji gosipụta kịtịkpa Sonponnoi na akara agbụrụ Yoruba
Kandụl atọ ahụ na-ere ere n'ahụ ya na-akpali echiche na mmekọahụ na-aga n'ihu ọbụna n'ọrịa / ọzọ
Ọ na-anọchite anya otú okwukwe Ndị Kraịst si dochie ọdịnala Yoruba ebe ọ na-ewetakwa ọrịa na ya n'oge ọchịchị

N'ụzọ ụfọdụ, Fani-Kayode chọpụtara na orisha a bụ onye na-abụghị onye ọzọ, mana ọ gbatịkwuru ozi ihe atụ nke onyinyo ahụ, na-agwa ya okwu na ọ katọrọ mmekọahụ mgbe ọ na-ebi na mba ọdịda anyanwụ nke na-emegide okpukpe nna nna ya
Ọ na-ezo aka karịsịa na Esu, onye ozi na chi nke a na-egosipụtakarị dika amụ kwụ ọtọ, ugboro ugboro na ihe oyiyi ya
Ọ ga-edepụta amụ kwụ ọtọ n'ọtụtụ ihe oyiyi ya iji kọwaa ahụmịhe mmiri ya na mmekọahụ
Ọrụ Fani-Kayode a kpọrọ 'Black Male, White Male' na-ejikọta isiokwu agbụrụ ya na nke mmekọahụ na ngosipụta aghụghọ nke mmekọrịta ofufe na chi
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ahụ na-egosipụta mgbagwoju anya nke enwere ike ijikọ ya na Esu, onye na-egosipụta ike na-emegide onwe ya

Mgbe ọ na-ekwu okwu banyere Esu, ọ na-ekwusi ike, 'Eshu na-elekọta ebe aỌ bụ onye aghụghọ Onyenwe nke Crossroads (onye ogbugbo n'etiti nwoke na nwanyị), mgbe ụfọdụ na-agbanwe akara ngosi iji duhie anyị [O nwere ike ịbụ site na ọmụmụ ọzọ ga-eme
' Esu pụtakwara na foto Fani-Kayode, nke a kpọrọ Nothing to Lose IX
A na-aghọta ọnụnọ Esu na agba nke ihe mkpuchi ahụ; site na iji akara ọcha, uhie, na oji, ihe mkpuchi ahụ na-eguzo dị ka ihe nnọchianya nke chi Esu

Ọ bụ ezie na agba ndị a na-anọchi anya Esu, ihe mkpuchi ahụ n'onwe ya enweghị ihe ọ bụla na-ebute ụzọ na ịme ihe mkpuchi ọdịnala Afrịka; isiokwu a dị aghụghọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ọ na-eme ka ihe mkpuchi ahụ dị larịị iji gosipụta 'ọnọdụ ịbụ onye Africa' (nkatọ nke echiche nke ndị na-ege ntị na Europe gbanyere n'ọtụtụ ebe)
Enwere ike inyocha echiche Fani-Kayode nke ịbụ onye a na 1987 'Bronze Head'
Na foto ahụ, ọ na-akụpụta ahụ ojii nke onye ahụ iji kpughee ụkwụ ya na ike ya ka ọ na-aga ịnọdụ n'elu ihe ọkpụkpụ Ife eji ọla nchara wee mee
A na-etinye ihe ọkpụkpụ Ife n'elu efere gbara gburugburu, oche, ma ọ bụ ntọala, ma tinye ya n'ụzọ dị mma n'etiti foto ahụ
Dịka, isi ọla nchara dị na foto ahụ bụ iji sọpụrụ eze Ife
Otú ọ dị, n'ihe gbasara foto Fani-Kayode, ọ na-akatọ ụlọ ọrụ eze Yoruba
Foto a na-anọchite anya ma ndọrọ n'agha ya na nwoke idina nwoke, akụkụ abụọ dị mkpa nke ụwa ya
Ahụ a na-egbutu egbutu na-anọchi anya njirimara ya, ọnọdụ ahụ na-ezo aka na mmekọahụ ya na ihe ọkpụkpụ ahụ na-anọchi anya ụkpụrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya oge ochie na ndụ ya nke ọ na-anwa ịrụ
Ọrụ ikpeazụ ya, nke akpọrọ 'Communion' (1995), gosipụtara mmekọrịta ya na okpukpe Yoruba
O yiri ka ọ na-ewepụta echiche ndị Yoruba nke ịdị jụụ na ike

Ọ na-egosipụta na ọ bụ 'udo nke mmekọrịta ya na ụwa ime mmụọ' Otu n'ime ihe oyiyi dị na usoro ahụ, 'The Golden Phallus,' bụ nke nwoke nwere ihe mkpuchi dị ka nnụnụ na-ele onye na-ekiri ya anya, ya na amụ ya akwụgidere na eriri
A kọwara onyinyo ahụ dị ka ihe nnọchianya na-enweghị isi nke otú ndị isi ojii si buru ibu arọ site n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ

N'ihe oyiyi a (The Golden Phallus), dị ka ọ dị na Fani-Kayode's Bronze Head, a na-elekwasị anya na liminality, ime mmụọ, ike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na akụkọ ọdịbendị - na-ewere echiche ndị a hụrụ dị ka 'oge ochie' (na ngosipụta nke 'classical' African art) ma weghachite ha dị ka archetype nke oge a
Fani-Kayode na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ weere ya dị ka onye na-anọghị n'èzí na ihe ngosi nke ndị mba ọzọ
Otú ọ dị, Fani-Kayode kwenyere na n'ihi ngosipụta a nke onwe ya, o nyere aka mepụta ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese foto
N'ajụjụ ọnụ, o kwuru okwu banyere ahụmịhe ya nke ịbụ onye mba ọzọ n'ihe gbasara mba ofesi, mana ọ dịkwa mkpa iburu n'uche na ọ bụ mbugharị mmanye
Ịchụpụ ya na Naịjirịa mgbe ọ dị obere metụtara echiche ya nke ịdị n'otu
Ọ na-enwe mmetụta dị ka onwere 'obere ihe ọ ga-efu'
Ma e mepụtara njirimara ya site n'echiche ya nke ịdị ọzọ ma mee ya

N'ọrụ ya, ndị Fani-Kayode na-achị bụ kpọmkwem ndị isi ojii, mana ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ọ na-ekwupụta onwe ya dị ka onye isi ojii n'ọtụtụ ọrụ ya, nke a pụrụ ịkọwa dị ka ihe ngosi na ọhụ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme ya
N'ịkọwa nka ya dị ka 'Black, African, homosexual photography' N'iji ahụ dị ka isi ihe dị na foto ya, o nwere ike ịchọpụta mmekọrịta dị n'etiti echiche agụụ mmekọahụ na ụkpụrụ ime mmụọ nna nna ya
Ahụmahụ ya dị mgbagwoju anya nke ọgba aghara, nkewa, ịjụ, na nkewa niile mepụtara ọrụ ya
Fani-Kayode gbara aka na a ghara ịhụ anya nke 'African queerness', ma ọ bụ ịgọnahụ mmekọahụ ndị ọzọ nke Africa, na ha abụọ
Ụwa ọdịda anyanwụ na nke Afrịka

N'ozuzu ya, ọ chọrọ ịmegharị echiche nke mmekọahụ na nwoke na nwanyị na foto ya, na-egosi na mmekọahụ na nwoke na nwanyị na-apụta ihe siri ike na nke a na-apughị ịwepụ n'ihi omenala na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya mana ọ bụ ihe na-agbanwe agbanwe

Otú ọ dị, ọ chọsiri ike ịzụlite queerness na nka Afrịka nke oge a, nke chọrọ ka ọ lebara anya na ihe nketa ndị ọchịchị na nke Ndị Kraịst anya nke na-egbochi queerness ma wuo echiche na-emerụ ahụ nke nwoke ojii
N'oge a na-anọghị na-anọchite anya ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka, o ji iwe bịakwute okwu ahụ site n'ikwu okwu ma na-ajụ ajụjụ banyere mmegide nke ahụ ojii
(charlotte) Mmetụta homoerotic ya n'iji ahụ nwoke ojii nwere ike ịkọwa dị ka ngosipụta nke echiche, nke ọchịchọ na ọchịchọ, na ịma onwe onye na nzaghachi maka ahụ ojii na-ebelata ka ọ bụrụ ihe ngosi
O nwere ike igosi ụwa na ndị nọ n'ụwa nka otú olu ojii si dị mkpa
Ịkọ akụkụ ha nke akụkọ ahụ na ọ bụghị naanị ịbụ isiokwu nke onye ọzọ na-egosi ha

Ọ bụghị naanị na a na-eto Fani-Kayode maka echiche ya nke Africanness na queerness (na African queerness), a na-etokwa ya maka ikike ya ijikọta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị agbụrụ na mmekọahụ na agụụ mmekọahụ okpukpe na ịma mma
Otu onye nkatọ kọwakwara ọrụ ya dị ka 'neo-romantic', nakwa na echiche ihe oyiyi ya na-akpali echiche nke ịma mma na-agafe agafe
Ọrụ ya jupụtara na aghụghọ, ihe ọchị, na nkọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
O nyekwara aka na arụmụka nka gbasara nje HIV / AIDS
Ọ malitere igosi ihe ngosi na 1984 ma sonye n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1989
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na United Kingdom, France, Austria, Italy, Nigeria, Sweden, Germany, South Africa, na US
Fani-Kayode bu ụzọ gosipụta na nnukwu ụlọ ngosi nke Brixton Artists Collective na-elekọta
O gosipụtara na ihe ngosi atọ na Gallery No Comment, December 1984; Seeing Diversity, February 1985 na Annual Members Show, November 1985

N'afọ 1988, Fani-Kayode na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-ese foto (ndị ọtụtụ n'ime ha gbakọtara maka Reflections of the Black Experience, Brixton Artists Collective) gụnyere Sunil Gupta, Monika Baker, Merle Van den Bosch, Pratibha Parmar, Ingrid Pollard, Roshini Kempadoo na Armet Francisco guzobere Association of Black Photographers (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Autograph ABP) wee bụrụ onye isi mbụ ha
Ọ bụkwa onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Black Audio Film Collective Ọ bụ onye nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ebe ndị ojii na-eto eto na-ese foto nọ na ngwụsị afọ 1980 na afọ 1990
Mgbe Alex Hirst nwụrụ n'afọ 1992, ụfọdụ esemokwu anọgidewo banyere ọrụ ndị Fani-Kayode
'E wuru njirimara m site n'echiche nke m gbasara onye ọzọ, ma ọ bụ ọdịbendị, agbụrụ, ma ọ bụ mmekọahụ
Akụkụ atọ ahụ adịghị iche n'ime m
Foto bụ ngwá ọrụ nke m nwere obi ike iji gosipụta onwe m
Ya mere, ọ bụ foto - ojii, Afrịka - nke m ga-eji ọ bụghị naanị dị ka ngwá ọrụ, kama dị ka ngwá agha ma ọ bụrụ na m ga-eguzogide mwakpo na iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe m na, n'ezie, ịdị adị m n'ụzọ nke m

'N'ihe atọ, abụ m onye na-anọ n'èzí n'ihe gbasara mmekọahụ; n'ihe gbasara mpaghara na ọdịbendị; na n'echiche nke ịghara ịghọ ụdị ọkachamara lụrụ nwanyị a na-akwanyere ùgwù nne na nna m nwere ike ịtụ anya ya
'M na-eme foto m nwoke idina nwoke n'inwe ebumnuche
Ndị isi ojii si n'ụwa nke atọ ekpughebeghị ma ọ bụ ndị nke ha ma ọ bụ n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ otu eziokwu na-awụ akpata oyi n'ahụ ha nwere ike ịchọ ibe ha
'Ana m agbalị iwepụta akụkụ ime mmụọ na foto m ka echiche nke eziokwu wee bụrụ ihe mgbagwoju anya ma na-emeghe ka a kọwaa ya
Nke a chọrọ ihe ndị ụkọchukwu Yoruba na-akpọ usoro nke obi añuri'
Rotimi Williams bụ onye ọrụ ugbo na onye bụbu onye nta akụkọ
O nwere ugbo osikapa Kereksuk na steeti Nassarawa nke bụ ugbo osika nke abụọ kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa site na oke ala
Ugbo ya, nke dị na steeti Nasarawa n'ebe ugwu Naịjirịa, dị ugbu a na hekta 45,000 ma were ihe karịrị ụmụ amaala Nasarawa 600 n'ọrụ
Ọ gara king's college Lagos
Ọ gụrụ Economics na mahamudu Aberdeen, Scotland ma nwee nzere masta na Economics site n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ọ gara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Oriental and African Studies (SOAS), ebe ọ nwetara nzere masta na Finance and Development Studies
Ọ bụ onye nyocha na European Economics and Financial Centre na London na 2007
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ onye Africa na-enye aka na Euromoney Magazine na 2008
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na First City Monument Bank na 2008 ebe o kwuru na nchegbu ya maka ngalaba ọrụ ugbo malitere itolite ebe ụlọ akụ ahụ agaghị anabata iwu ma banye n'ụlọ ọrụ ugbo
Ọ hapụrụ n'afọ 2010 iji malite ugbo osikapa dị hekta 45,000 nke Kereksuk n'afọ 2012
Roubaix (asụsụ Dọọch Robaais) bụ ama ukwu no na ógbè Hauts-de-France ime ke edem edere France, nso n’ebe ọdịda anyanwụ ókè Belgium ahụ
Na afọr 2013, Roubaix bụ obodo nke mmadụ 95,866 bi na ya
Deko Barbara-Jessica Wedi (amụrụ n'abalị iri na atọ nke ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1992), nke a maara dị ka Rouge, bụ onye South Africa na-eti egwu, onye edemede, na onye na-eme ngosi telivishọn
Abọm mbụ ya bụ The New Era Sessions, ya na obere ihe nkiri, natara onyinye South African Film and Television Award maka Best Micro Budget Film
A mụrụ Deko Barbara-Jessica Wedi n'abalị iri na atọ nke ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1992, na Pretoria, Gauteng
Ọ bụ onye agbụrụ DR Congo dịka a mụrụ nne na nna ya na Congo
Ọ malitere ide egwu mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, nke mere ka o sonye na ime ihe nkiri, ikwu okwu n'ihu ọha na ide uri
Ọ malitere ịkụ egwu rap mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, mgbe enyi ya cheputara ya ka ọ rapụọ egwu R&B nke ya ọ dere
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014, Rouge wepụtara egwu ya nke abụọ 'Mi Corazon' nke gosipụtara onye egwu BigStar Johnson, na-esote egwu mbụ ya, 'Party'
N'afọ sochirinụ, onye egwu rap bụ AKA gosipụtara Rouge tinyere ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ na-eti egwu na remix nke egwu ya 'Baddest'
N'afọ 2016, Rouge weputara egwu 'Mbongo Zaka' nke gosipụtara Moozlie
Egwu a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama dịka ọ bụ egwu mbụ ya kachasị elu na ụlọ ọrụ redio niile dị na South Africa

E depụtara Rouge dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị isii kachasị mma na Africa site na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ hip hop Creative-hiphop n'afọ 2017, ya na onye South Africa ibe ya bụ Nadia Nakai na onye Ghana bụ Eno Barony
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2016, Rouge bụ otu n'ime ndị ndụmọdụ na Vuzu reality game show The Coalition, nke gụnyere ndị na-arụ ọrụ na-enwe ihe ịma aka site n'enyemaka nke ndị ndụmọdụ
O sonyekwara na MTV Base Cyphers na 'New Skool' (2017)
E wepụtara New Era Sessions N'abalị asatọ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 2017, nke malitere dị ka nke abụọ na chaatị iTunes
N'abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 2017, ọ malitere obere ihe nkiri maka abọm ahụ dị ka ihe nkiri vidio na ihe nkiri ejije
Obere ihe nkiri ka egosipụtara na MTV Base nke Atandwa Kani, Fikile Kani, Denise Zimba na ya onwe ya bụ ndị mere ya
O wepụtara egwu ise site na abọm ahụ, gụnyere 'Mbongo Zaka' na 'Dololo'
Abọm ọhụụ ahụ meriri ọtụtụ ihe nrite, gụnyere South African Film and Television Award maka Best Micro Budget Film Award, na South African Music Award maka Best Music Video of the Year
N'afọ 2018, Rouge bụ onye na-egosi ihe ngosi egwu SABC 1 Remix SA
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị na-ekpebi ndị mmeri nke asọmpi hashtag nke ụlọ ọrụ swiiti Halls SA HallsOMFCC N'abalị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Machị afọ 2019, Rouge kwupụtara ịbanye na Sony Music South Africa
Nwepụta Otu

Ahmed Ayad (Arabic) nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya dịka Rouiched; bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe ọchị na onye na-agụ egwu, a mụrụ n'ọnwa Eprel 28, 1921 na Algiers wee nwụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 28, 1999 na El Biar (Algiers)
Rouiched si Kabylie (Obodo Azeffoun, Aarch Ait Djennad, Wilaya nke Tizi-Ouzou)
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, o nwere ọtụtụ ọrụ iji dịrị ndụ
N'ịbụ onye gụrụ akwụkwọ n'onwe ya, ọ banyere n'ọkwa na nke mbụ ya n'ihe nkiri nke Abdelhamid Ababsa nke a na-akpọ 意 Estardjâ Ya Assiya
Nkọwa ya dị ịrịba ama
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o tinyere onwe ya na oge ya na nka, wee bụrụ onye ndú nke ndị na-ese ihe
Ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke oge ahụ rụkọrọ ọrụ Rachid Ksentini, Mustapha Badie, Nadjat Tounsi, Sid-Ali Fernandel, Mohamed Touri, Mustapha Kateb
Mgbe nnwere onwe nke Algeria n'afọ 1962, ọ bụ onye otu Algeria National Theater
Mana ihe ịga nke ọma ya kachasị ukwuu bụ ihe nkiri nke Mohamed Lakhdar-Hamina
Ọ gara n'ihu n'ọrụ ya na telivishọn Algeria ma rụọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na telivikọn ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu nke ndị na-agụ egwú na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na Algeria, Achour Cheurfi, ANEP Ed
Alger 1997
Roukaya Moussa Mahamane (amụrụ ya na 13 Jenụwarị 1997 na Niamey) bụ onye Naijiria na-egwu mmiri
O sonyere na asọmpi mita nke iri ise nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2016 Summer Olympics, ebe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke onye nke mmadụ iri asatọ na atọ na oge nke 3650 sekọnd, ihe ndekọ mba
Ọ gakwaghị n'ihu na ọkara ikpeazụ
N'afọ 2019, ọ nọchitere anya Niger na World Aquatics Championships nke e mere na Gwangju, South Korea
O sonyere na asọmpi mita iri is nke ụmụ nwanyị na otu narị nke ụmụ nwanyị
N'ihe omume abụọ ahụ, ọ gara n'ihu ịsọ mpi na ọkara ikpeazụ
O sonyere na asọmpi mita 50 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2020 Summer Olympics
Ọ nọchitere anya Niger na 2022 World Aquatics Championships nke e mere na Budapest, Hungary
O sonyere na asọmpi mita 50 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 100 nke ụmụ nwanyị

Rosemary Rowena Cooper (a mụrụ n'afọ 1935) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Britain
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1956, sonye na Radio Drama Company site na mmeri Carlton Hobbs Bursary
N'afọ 1959, ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ Dundee Repertory Theatre Company ma gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ukwuu, ọkachasị na telivishọn Britain, ruo ihe karịrị afọ 50
Cooper pụtara na The Rag Trade dịka Mrs Fenner
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Terrence Hardiman n'afọ 1964
Roxane Hayward (onye a mụrụ Roxane Josephine Hayward, 7 Mee 1991) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
N'ihe nkiri, Hayward arụwo ọrụ dị mkpa maka ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri ndị a na-akwanyere ùgwù na South Africa gụnyere Shakespeare In Love na Eric Abraham's Fugard Theatre
N'afọ 2015, Hayward rụrụ ọrụ Susanna White na ihe nkiri Nat Geo nke nwere akụkụ abụọ Saints and Strangers, nke Sony Pictures Television mepụtara, nke gosipụtara n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2015
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2015, Roxane mechara ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri / ihe egwu Accident, nke ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa, Caroline
Hayward bụ onye na-ekwuchitere ikike mmadụ na ichebe onwe onye ebe ọ kwadoro nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe gburugburu South Africa na-elekwasị anya n'inye ndị mmadụ ike site na nkà ichebe onwe ha
N'afọ 2017, Hayward mere nke mbụ ya dịka onye nduzi maka ọkwa ọrụ ọha na eze nke akpọrọ Open Your Eyes HeardPSA, nke ebumnuche ya bụ ịmepụta mmata banyere ịzụ ahịa mmadụ na ịgba ohu nke oge a
A mụrụ Hayward na Johannesburg, South Africa, nne na nna kwadoro mkpebi ya ime ihe nkiri dịka ọrụ
Ọ malitere ọzụzụ ihe nkiri ya mgbe ọ dị afọ isii tinyere ịgba egwu, ịbụ abụ na nkuzi piano
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ mbụ ya na-eme ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ isii wee debanye aha ya na mgbasa ozi telivishọn mbụ ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Hayward malitere ịmụ ihe nkiri, ịgba egwú na ihe nkiri egwu
N'afọ 2002 mgbe Hayward dị afọ iri na otu, a tụbara ya na mgbasa ozi telivishọn mbụ ya

Hayward wee malite ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn CBC Jozi-H ebe ọ na-eme nwa okorobịa na-eto eto, nke nwere nsogbu aha ya bụ Daphne bụ onye a nabatara n'ụlọ ọgwụ Johannesburg General Hospital maka ịṅụbiga ọgwụ ókè
Hayward nwere ọrụ ọbịa na ihe omume nke 9 nke usoro Smile, nke malitere na 2006 ma gbaa ọsọ maka otu oge
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe e mechara Jozi-H, Hayward pụtara na Isidingo nke SABC dị ka nwa okorobịa a na-emegbu nke aha ya bụ Chloe

N'afọ 2011, Hayward pụtara nke mbụ ya na telivishọn Britain na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye ndụmọdụ ogige oge okpomọkụ na usoro ihe nkiri Channel 4 Beaver Falls A tụziri Hayward dịka onye nkwado na ihe nkiri mbụ ya Death Race 3 Inferno, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'akụkụ Dougray Scott, Ving Rhames na Danny Trejo
Death Race 3 Inferno bụ nke Universal Pictures mepụtara ma wepụta ya n'afọ 2012

Roxanne Kimberly “Roxy” Barker (amụrụ mkpụrụ Ụbọchị isii nke ọnwa Mee n'afo 1991) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke mba South Afirika nke na-egwu egwu dị ka onye na- eche nche maka klọb Dutch SC Heerenveen na otu mba ụmụ nwanyị South Afrịka
Barker azụrụ na ọkwa mahadum dị na United States na-egwu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị kọleji Pepperdine
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Portland Thorns FC họpụtara Barker n'afọ 2013 NWSL College Draft
Portland Thorns họrọAdelaide Gay dị ka mmụta ahụmahụ ha nwere nyere onye nche Karina LeBlanc
Barker gbara bọọlụ W-League Pali Blues n'oge ezumike mahadum ya
Ọ laghachiri na South Afrịka wee kpọọ egwuregwu iri maka Maties FC, tupu ọ nweta nkwekọrịta ọkachamara na Iceland
Na mbụ n'ọrụ ya, Barker na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ maka Durban Ladies FC ya na n'ọnọdụ onye na-eche nche
Barker debanyere aha na klọb Úrvalsdeild Icelandic Þór/KA maka oge nke 2014 na 2015
Roxy nwetara mmeri kacha baa uru maka oge egwuregwu Icelandic Úrvalsdeild Þór/KA 2015
Ọ bịanyere aka na SC Heerenveen vrouwen na Njikọ Dutch maka oge nke 2016 – 2017
Barker metere South Afrịka mpụta mbụ ya na 'ọkpụ isii asataghị otu mmeri nye mbaTanzania na ọnwa Julaị n'afọ2010
Ọ nọchitere anya otu ndị otu mba ukwu (nke a makwaara dị ka 'Banyana Banyana') na asọmpi London nke afọ 2012
Barker nọchitere Anya mba South Afrịka na egwuregwu iri abụọ na asatọ mgbe akpọrọ ya n'òtù egwuregwu Rio n'afọ 2016
Roy Blumenthal (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1968 na Johannesburg, South Africa) bụ ode abụ kemgbe mmalite afọ 1990
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ebe mbipụta bu Barefoot Press, nke malitere ibipụta akwụkwọ mpịakọta n'efu
E bipụtara mbipụta ise, na mbipụta nke puku iri abụo nke ọ bụla
Roy Blumenthal so Graeme Friedman, A Writer in Stone, dezie ụtụ nye onye edemede South Africa, Lionel Abrahams
Blumenthal bụkwa onye na-ede ihe nkiri, onye na-edekọ akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye n'eme ihe nkiri, na onye na-ese ihe nkiri

Onye bụ onye onyinye otu oge na MoneywebLIFE, Blumenthal bụ onye na-akọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na onye na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị nke na-eji ngwakọta nke anya, ederede, na ndị na-agbakọta iji mee nkwupụta siri ike na nke siri doro anya banyere ọnọdụ akụ na ụba nke South Africa
Blumenthal na-ebi ndụ ya dị ka onye na-ahụ anya (aka, sketchnoter, ma ọ bụ onye na-ewe ihe osise), na-agbanwe ihe ọ na-anụ na nzukọ, ọrụ, na ụlọ ọrụ ka ọ bụrụ foto

Ignatius Royston Dunnachie Campbell, onye a mara nke ọma dị ka Roy Campbell (2 Ọktoba n'afọ 1901 wee rụọ 23 Eprel afọ 1957), bụ onye na-ede uri na obodo South Africa, onye na-enyocha akwụkwọ, onye ntụgharị akwụkwọ, onye na'ede uri agha, na onye na-eme ihe ọchị
A mụrụ ya na ezinụlọ White South Africa nke sitere na obodo Scotland na Durban, Colony of Natal, e zigara Campbell England ịga Mahadum Oxford
Kama , Campbell banyere n'akwụkwọ akụkọ nke London
Mgbe ọ lụsịrị Mary Garman, Campbell dere uri a nabatara nke ọma The Flaming Terrapin nke mere ka Campbells banye n'ọkwa kachasị elu nke akwụkwọ ndị Britain
Mgbe ọ kwadoro ịha nhata agbụrụ n'oge ọ nọrọ na South Africa dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Voorslag, Campbell laghachiri England wee sonye na Bloomsbury Group
Campbell mechara kpebie na Bloomsbury Group bụ ndị na-eme mpako, ndị na-adịghị akwụwa aka ọtọ, ndị na'enweghị ihe ọ bụla, na ndị na-emegide Ndị Kraịst
Campbell kwutọrọ ha n'abụ uri a na-akpọ The Georgiad, nke mebiri aha na ọdịmma Campbell n'etiti ndị edemede

Mgbanwe Campbell na-esote gaa na Roman Katọlik na Spain na nkwado olu maka Francisco Franco na ndị Nationalists mere ka ndị na-ede akwụkwọ nwere mmetụta dị n'aka ekpe kpọọ ya onye Fascist, na-emebi aha ya dị ka onye na-ede uri
Campbell jere ozi na ndị agha Britain n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Ọ gara nzukọ nke The Inklings n'oge a ma bụrụ enyi C
Lewis na J
Tolkien
N'oge agha gachara, Campbell gara n'ihu na-ede ma na-asụgharị uri na nkuzi
Ọ sonyekwara ndị edemede na ndị ụbụrụ na-aghọ nkọ na White South Africa, gụnyere Laurens van der Post, Alan Paton, na Uys Krige, na-akatọ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa
Campbell nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọala na obodo Portugal na Mọnde Ista, n'afọ 1957
Mana Campbell by onye etinyere n'uche byT

Eliot, Dylan Thomas, and Edith Sitwell e bụ ezigbo onye nde egwu site na first Second World Wars, the accusation that he was a fascist, which was first promulgated during the 1930s, continues to seriously damage his reception, though some critics have attempted to rehabilitate his reputation
Roy Rudolph DeCarava (Ọnwa Desemba 9, afọ 1919 - rụọ ọnwa Ọctoba 27, afọ 2009) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ihe
DeCarava nwetara otuto dị egwu n'oge na-adịghị anya maka foto ya, na mbụ na-etinye aka ma na-ese onyinyo ndụ ndị Afrịka Amerịka na ndị egwu jazz na obodo ebe ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ

N'ime ọrụ nke were ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri isii, a maara DeCarava dị ka onye guzobere n'ọhịa foto mara mma nke ojii na ọcha, na-akwado ụzọ isi na-aga n'ihu na-adabere na uru isi nke onye ọ bụla, ọgụgụ isi, nke dị iche ma dị iche na ụdị 'akwụkwọ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya' nke ọtụtụ ndị bu ya ụzọ
A mụrụ Roy DeCarava na Harlem, New York n'ọnwa Disemba 9, afọ 1919
DeCarava toro n'oge Harlem Renaissance, mgbe ọrụ nka na ihe ịga nke ọma n'etiti ndị Afrịka Amerịka na-aga n'ihu n'ime akwụkwọ, egwu, ihe nkiri, na nka anya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Textile High School na New York City n'afọ 1938, DeCarava malitere ịrụ ọrụ n'onwe ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Cooper Union (afọ 1938- rụọ afọ 1940), ebe ọ gụrụ ihe osise, ihe owuwu, na ihe ọkpụkpụ
DeCarava gbasaa ọzụzụ mbụ a na Harlem Art Center (1940-1942) yana George Washington Carver Art School, ebe na mgbakwunye na eserese ọ malitere ịnwale obibi akwụkwọ

DeCarava malitere iji foto mee ihe dị ka ụzọ idekọ na ihe atụ maka ihe osise ya, mana onye na-ahụ maka ya masịrị ya nke ukwuu nke na ọ malitere itinye oge ya niile na ya ma kwado foto ojii na ọcha dị ka ụdị nka nke ya
O jiri igwefoto ya mepụta ọmụmụ ihe dị ịrịba ama banyere ndụ ndị isi ojii kwa ụbọchị na Harlem, na-ejide ọdịdị dịgasị iche iche nke agbata obi na ihe okike nke Harlem Renaissance
N'iguzogide ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị doro anya, DeCarava jiri foto mee ihe iji gbochie ihe ọ kọwara dị ka ndị ojii
a naghị egosi ya n'ụzọ siri ike na nke nka
E debara aha DeCavara na ndị agha n'afọ 1942, ebe a ga-ebu ụzọ zigara ya Virginia, wee ziga ya na Fort Claiborne, Louisiana, na Jim Crow South
N'ebe ahụ, DeCarava nwere ịkpa ókè agbụrụ siri ike nke na ọ dara
N'akwụkwọ akụkọ ndụ Peter Galassi maka ihe ngosi MoMA, onye na-ese ihe chetara, sị 'Nanị ebe a na-ekewaghị ndị agha bụ ngalaba ndị isi mgbaka nke ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ
Anọ m ebe ahụ ihe dị ka otu ọnwa
Anọ m n'ọrụ agha ihe dị ka ọnwa isii ma ọ bụ asaa n'ozuzu ya, mana enwere m nrọ ọjọọ banyere ya ruo afọ iri abụọ
' DeCarava lụrụ onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe nka mere eme Sherry Turner DeCaravа afọ iri anọ
Ha abụọ jikọrọ aka na ihe ngosi na mbipụta mgbe DeCarava dị ndụ ma ọ gara n'ihu na-akwalite ọrụ ya mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Dị ka akwụkwọ eli'm ozu ya si kwuo, ha abụọ zutere mgbe Turner DeCarava gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ maka mmemme ọha na eze na Brooklyn Museum
DeCarava mepụtara akwụkwọ nka ise e bipụtara, gụnyere The Sound I Saw na The Sweet Flypaper of Life, yana akwụkwọ ngosi nka na nyocha site na ọtú ndi enyi nke foto na Museum of Modern Art na New York

Isiokwu nke ọ dịkarịa ala ihe ngosi nka onwe ya 15, DeCarava bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ na-ese foto iji merie Guggenheim Fellowship ma n'ihi mkpakọrịta ahụ, nwere ike ise foto obodo ya na New York City maka otu afọ; na-egosipụta echiche okike mbụ site na usoro gelatin ojii na ọcha
Ihe ngosi foto mbụ ya bụ n'afọ 1950, na Forty-Fourth Street Gallery na New York City, n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ chọtara onye nduzi na Edward Steichen, onye nduzi foto na Museum of Modern Art
Nke nta nke nta, DeCarava ghọrọ onye a ma ama maka nraranye ya n'ọhịa nke nka anya na maka ọrụ nke ya n'ime ya, gụnyere ọtụtụ foto ojii na ọcha, ọlaọcha nke nnukwu ndị egwu Amerịka
Ọrụ ya pụtakwara n'ọtụtụ mkpuchi album, dị ka Porgy na Bess, nke Miles Davis, Bless this House, nke Mahalia Jackson, Flamenco Fire nke Carlos Montoya, na Big Bill's Blues, nke Big Bill Broonzy

DeCarava natara nzere nsọpụrụ site na Rhode Island School of Design, Maryland Institute of Art, Mahadum Wesleyan, The New School for Social Research, The Parsons School of Design na Art Institute of Boston maka onyinye maka nka Amerịka
N'afọ 2006, e nyere ya National Medal of Arts site na National Endowment for the Arts, ihe nrite kachasị elu nke Gọọmentị United States nyere ndị na-ese ihe

Ka ọ na-etolite n'afọ 1940, DeCarava na-egosi ihe ọ bụla na-abụghị nke iconoclastic n'ụzọ ọ na-esi ese foto, ihe na-ejikọta ya na eziokwu nke ihe akaebe, yana n'ọchịchọ ya mara mma, dịka o kwuru, iji ụdị ihe nkịtị, na-egosipụta ihe ụfọdụ m chere
N'ịnọgide na-achọ ịmepụta ihe osise na-ese onyinyo nke agba, DeCarava tachiri obi ọtụtụ iri afọ nke nghọtahie na-ewe iwe
Ọ na-ekwukarị na nke ahụ n'agbanyeghị aha ya dị ka onye na-ese foto,
Enwetụbeghị m n'ezie ma kwughachi nchegbu ya siri ike nke oge a iji nweta nkwupụta okike, karịa nkwupụta akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

Ọ bụ ezie na DeCarava arụtụbeghị ọrụ na ihe nkiri sinima n'onwe ya, ọ tolitere n'oge ihe nkiri ojii na-acha ọcha ma, n'ajụjụ ọnụ ka oge na-aga n'ọrụ ya, kwuru, echere m na m na-amịkọrọ ihe nkiri ojii, nke mere na mgbe m malitere ise foto, ọ bụ ihe okike

Roy Feinson bụ onye injinia ngwanrọ a mụrụ na South Africa, odee, na onye na-ese ihe bụ onye mepụtara usoro ederede amụma mbụ zuru oke nke gụnyere disambiguation na nchekwa akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu mpaghara

Onye guzobere na Onye isi oche nke EmergeXAI, Doubletake Images LLC, na Orb Reality LLC; ụlọ ọrụ ngwanrọ dabeere na DC, Feinson nwere ọtụtụ ikike kọmputa na ngwa sayensị ya na-ahụ maka ndụ, ọgụgụ isi aka na nnyocha onyinyo nke forensic na ihe nlereanya ya nke ọhụ anụmanụ ka e gosipụtara ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na NIST

Otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ mbụ n'ọhịa nke foto mosaics, a na-eto ya maka ịmepụta ụdị a maara dị ka impressionist mosaics nke a na-ahazi ezughị oke nke ihe okike dị ka turquoise ma ọ bụ marble ethereal iji mepụta
Feinson bụ onye dere akwụkwọ atọ nke lekwasịrị anya na ntọala evolushọn nke omume mmadụ
A sụgharịrị akwụkwọ ya n'asụsụ iri dị iche iche nke gụnyere Mandarin, Japanese, Czech, Hebrew na French, ma gosipụta ya na CNN, The Dr
Phil Show na CBS The Talk

E gosipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya banyere ọhụ anụmanụ, The Zebra's Stripes, nye ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na National Institute for Standards and Technology n'afọ 2013 ma na-ekwu maka ọtụtụ ajụjụ a na-azaghị na mpaghara omume anụmanụ na camouflage
2000 Onye mmeri nke C-Span Presidential Art Contest

N'afọ 2006, Feinson bụ onye na-ese ihe maka 49th Anniversary nke Disneyland, ebe o mepụtara ihe osise kachasị ukwuu e mere, nke gafere ihe karịrị square feet pụkụ ịrị ma gosipụta ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-ebu foto nke onwe ha na ndị ọzọ na-eme
N'afọ 2007, e nyere Feinson ọrụ ịmepụta usoro ọrụ mosaic ịrị atọ na asatọ buru ibu maka ememe ncheta afọ iri ise nke Disney, Happiest Homecoming on Earth

Otu ihe pụrụ iche, nke arụnyere n'akụkụ ụlọ nzukọ obodo nke ogige ahụ, bụ mosaic mbụ e nwere okpukpu atọ n'ụwa; nnukwu mosaic nke Mickey Mouse na Steamboat Willie nwere foto otu puku nke ndị Disney na-eme ihe nkiri, nke n'aka nke ya bụ mosaics nwere foto pụkụ narị isii nke ndị ọbịa ogige ahụ nyere
N'afọ 2008, a họpụtara Feinson dị ka onye na-ese ihe maka ncheta afọ iri ise nke Grammy Awards
Quincy Jones, Joss Stone na Onye isi oche nke Recording Academy Neil Portnow kpughere ihe osise ahụ bụ ndị kpọrọ Feinson 'ezi onye na-emepụta ihe osise, na
nwoke Renaissance'
Ihe osise Grammy bụ akụkụ nke nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie Grammy na Los Angeles
2009 Onye mmeri New York Times nke gwam gwam gwam sayensị mbụ
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara Feinson dị ka onye na-ese ihe maka ncheta afọ iri na ise nke Latin Grammys

Roy Gulwak bụ onye na-edebe goolu maka FC Kator
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu mba South Sudan
N'oge gara aga, ọ gbara Sudan boolu na afọ 2010 FIFA World Cup qualification matches
Roy LaGrone (amụrụ n'afọ 1966) bụ onye America na-ese ihe na mgbasa ozi dijitalụ
Ọrụ ya, nké sitere na nnukwu foto, ihe nkiri na ntinye vidiyo, na-agụnyekarị echiche efu dị mgbagwoju anya nkè oghere atọ nkè e ji ihe ndị a chọtara rụọ
LaGrone gụrụ akwụkwọ na Atlanta College of Art (BFA, 1989), na Savannah College of Art and Design (MFA, kọmputa arts, 2000)
E gosipụtara ọrụ LaGronez n'ọtụtụ ebe gụnyere Smithsonian Institution Ancostia Museum; SIGGRAPH; na Lyndon Baines Johnson Presidential Library and Museum

Roy Michael Harrison (amụrụ n'afọ 1948) OBE FRS FRSC FRMetS bụ ónyé nkuzi Britain bụ Queen Elizabeth II Birmingham Centenary Professor of Environmental Health na Mahadum Birmingham na UK na ónyé nkuzi pụrụ íchè na Mahadim Eze Abdulaziz na Jeddah, Saudi Arabia

Harrison gụrụ akwụkwọ na Henley Grammar School na Mahadum Birmingham ébé e nyèrè ya nzèrè Bachelor of Science na Chemistry na 1969, ya na PhD na Organic chemistry na 1972 na Doctor of Science na Environmental chemistry n'afọ 1989
Nnyocha PhD ya nyochara mmeghachi omume sigmatropic nke tropolone ethers
Harrison bụ ọkachamara na mmetọ ikuku, na-ahụ màkà mpaghara nke ikuku, gụnyere nanoparticles
Mmasị ya na-agbasa site na isi iyi, site na mgbanwe kemịkal na nke anụ ahụ, na ikpughe mmadụ na mmetụta na ahụike
Ọrụ ya kachasị mkpa bụ n'ọhịa nke ihe ndị na-emepụta ụgbọ ala, gụnyere ihe ndị mejupụtara ha na nhazi ikuku
Nké a bụ ihe ndabere nke nghọta dị ugbu a banyéré mmekọrịta nké ikuku na oke n'akụkụ ụzọ na nkesa nha
Na mgbakwunye na iduzi nnukwu ọrụ na diesel exhaust particles, ọ na-etinye ákà na nnukwu ọmụmụ ihe jikọrọ áká nké usoro na-ekpebi ogo ikuku na Beijing na Delhi
Ọrụ Harrison amatala site na ònyìnyé nkè John Jeyes Medal and Environment Prize nke Royal Society of Chemistry na Fitzroy Prize nke Royal Meteorological Society
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọtụtụ afọ dị ka onyeisi oche na / ma ọ bụ ónyé otu kọmitii ndụmọdụ nke Ngalaba Na-ahụ Màkà Gbụrụ-gbúrụ Ébé Obibi, Nri na Ihe Ndị Dị n'Ime (Defra) na Ngalaba Ahụike
