Obí Eze nke Oba nke Benin bụ ebe a ma ama dị ka ebe obibi nke Oba nke Benin na ndị eze ndị ọzọ na steeti Edo
Obí eze ahụ, nke Oba Ewedo (1255AD 1280AD) wuru, dị n'etiti obodo Benin oge ochie
Ọ bụ Oba Eweka nke Abụọ wughachiri ya (1914 Xing 1932) mgbe e bibiri ụlọ mbụ ahụ n'oge agha 1897 ya na ndị Britain
E kwupụtara obí eze ahụ dị ka UNESCO Listed Heritage Site na 1999
Obí Eze nke Oba nke Benin bụ ememe na nchekwa nke ọdịbendị Benin bara ọgaranya
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-eleta obí eze ahụ bụ ndị nlekọta, ndị ọkà mmụta ihe ochie ma ọ bụ ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme
Ihe mgbochi a na- adịghị egbu egbu bụ nke kacha nta n'ime python Africa, na-eto ogologo ruo 182 kacha elu
Aha 'bọọlụ python' na-ezo aka n'ọchịchọ ọ na-agbanye n'ime bọọlụ mgbe nrụgide ma ọ bụ ụjọ
Boa regia bụ aha sayensị nke George Shaw tụpụtara na 1802 maka ahịhịa na-acha uhie uhie nke si n'ebe a na-amaghị ama na Africa
François Marie Daudin chepụtara aha Python na 1803 maka agwọ na-efe efe na-adịghị egbu egbu
N'agbata 1830 na 1849, ọtụtụ aha aha ka akwadoro maka otu ụdị anụmanụ nke Shaw kọwara, gụnyere Enygrus nke Johann Georg Wagler, Cenchris na Hertulia nke John Edward Gray dere
Grey kọwakwara ihe atụ anọ a chịkọtara na Gambia ma chekwaa ya na mmụọ na mmiri
Eriri bọọlụ ahụ bụ oji ma ọ bụ aja aja gbara ọchịchịrị nwere ntụpọ aja aja dị n'azụ na n'akụkụ
A na-eji akara ojii gbasasịa afọ ọcha ya ma ọ bụ ude
Ọ bụ agwọ tọgbọrọ chakoo nke nwere isi dị ntakịrị ma nwee akpịrịkpa
Ọ ruru ogo okenye kachasị nke 182 cm (60 ft)
Ụmụ nwoke na-atụkarị ihe akpịrịkpa asatọ ruo iri, na ụmụ nwanyị na-atụkarị akpịrịkpa abụọ ruo anọ
Ụmụ nwanyị na-eru ogologo 1162 cm (457 na), 443 mm (174 na) ogologo agba, 87 cm (34 na) ogologo ọdụ na oke kacha nke 1635 n'arọ (360 lb)
Ụmụ nwoke dị obere na nkezi ogologo imi ruo 1113 cm (438 na), 436 mm (172 na) ogologo agba, 86 cm (34 na) ogologo ọdụ na oke kachasị nke 1561 n'arọ (344 lb)
Abụọ nwoke na nwanyị nwere spurs pelvic n'akụkụ abụọ nke oghere
N'oge ọmụmụ nwa, ụmụ nwoke na-eji mkpali ndị a na-ejide ụmụ nwanyị
Ụmụ nwoke na-enwekarị mkpali buru ibu, a na-ekpebikwa mmekọahụ nke ọma site na nhụsianya nke hemipene nwoke ma ọ bụ itinye nyocha n'ime cloaca iji lelee ọnụnọ nke hemipenis gbagharịrị
Ọ na-amasị ala ahịhịa, savannas, na ebe osisi na-adịkarịghị
Amara ụdị a maka atụmatụ nchekwa ya nke gụnyere ịgbanye n'ime bọọlụ siri ike mgbe egwu, na-ewepụ isi na olu ya n'etiti
A na-ejikarị omume nchekwa a na-arụ ọrụ n'ọnọdụ ịta ahụhụ, nke na-eme ka ụdị a dị mfe maka ụmụ mmadụ ijikwa ma nye aka na ewu ewu ha dị ka anụ ụlọ
N'ime ọhịa, python bọọlụ na-akwado olulu anụ mamma na ebe nzuzo ndị ọzọ dị n'okpuru ala, ebe ha na- achọkwa
Ụmụnwoke na-egosiputa omume ọkara-arboreal karịa, ebe ụmụ nwanyị na-enwe mmasị n'àgwà ụwa
Ihe oriri nke python bọọlụ n'ime ọhịa na-enwekarị obere anụ mammals na nnụnụ
Ụmụ nwoke na-eri anụ ọtụtụ ugboro na nnụnụ, na ụmụ nwanyị na-emekarị anụ mamma
Òké na-emejupụta pasentị buru ibu nke nri; Oke akpa akpa Gambian, oke ojii, oke imi nwere imi, oke chara acha, na oke ahihia nwere akara so n'ụdị a na-eri
Ụmụ nwanyị na- ama akwa ma dina atọ ruo 11 nnukwu akwa akpụkpọ anụ
Nsen na-apụta mgbe ụbọchị 55 ruo 60 gachara
Ụmụ nwoke na-eto eto na-eru ntozu okè mmekọahụ na ọnwa 11-18, na ụmụ nwanyị na ọnwa 20-36
Afọ bụ nanị otu ihe na-ekpebi ntozu okè mmekọahụ na ikike ịmụ nwa; ibu bụ ihe nke abụọ

Ụmụ nwoke na-amụba 600 g (21 oz) ma ọ bụ karịa, mana n'ịbụ ndị a dọọrọ n'agha anaghị etolite ruo mgbe ha 800 g (28 oz), n'agbanyeghị na a dọọrọ n'agha, ụfọdụ ụmụ nwoke amatala ịmalite ịmụ nwa na 300–400

Ụmụ nwanyị na-amụba n'ime ọhịa n'ịdị arọ dị obere ka 800 g (28 oz) n'agbanyeghị 1,200 g (42 oz) ma ọ bụ karịa na arọ na-adịkarị; N'ịbụ ndị a dọọrọ n'agha, ndị na-azụ anụ na-echekarị ruo mgbe ha na-erughị 1,500 g (53 oz)
Nlekọta ndị nne na nna na akwa akwa na-agwụ mgbe ha pụtara, nwanyị na-ahapụkwa ụmụ ahụ ka ha na-elekọta onwe ha
A na-eyi egwu egwu egwu bọọlụ site na ịchụ nta anụ maka ịzụ ahịa anụ ụlọ mba ụwa
A na-achụkwa ya maka akpụkpọ ahụ, anụ ya na iji ya na ọgwụ ọdịnala
Ihe iyi egwu ndị ọzọ gụnyere mfu ebe obibi n'ihi mmụba siri ike nke ọrụ ugbo na iji ọgwụ nje eme ihe
Ndị na-achụ nta n’ime obodo na Togo na-achịkọta ụmụ nwanyị na-agba agba na akwa akwa, bụ́ ndị ha na-eresị ndị agwọ
Na 2019 naanị, ndị dinta 58 gbara ajụjụ ọnụ achịkọtala python bọọlụ ndụ 3,000 na akwa 5,000
Edepụtara python bọọlụ ahụ dị ka Egwu dị nso na Ndepụta Red IUCN ka ọ na-enweta oke nrigbu nke mere na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ agbadala n'ọtụtụ ọdịda anyanwụ Africa
Ụdị ụdị anụ ọhịa ejidere na-enwe ihe isi ike ka ukwuu ime mgbanwe na gburugburu ebe a dọọrọ n'agha, nke nwere ike ime ka ọ ghara inye nri, na ha na-ebukarị nje nje ndị dị n'ime ma ọ bụ n'èzí
Ihe atụ dị ndụ ruo afọ 60 na ndọrọ n'agha, ebe a na-edebe python bọọlụ kacha ochie edere na ndọrọ n'agha 62 afọ, 59 nke ndị nọ na Saint Louis Zoo
Ọtụtụ ndị na-agba bọọlụ a dọọrọ n'agha na-anabata oke na ụmụ oke, ụfọdụ na-erikwa nnụnụ, dị ka ọkụkọ na quail
Ụfọdụ ndị na-eche nche na-azụ ụmụ oke python ha, bụ nke python bọọlụ ga-eri nri n'ọhịa
A na-erekarị anụmanụ ndị na-eri nri na oyi kpọnwụrụ ma gbazee site n'aka ndị nwe ka ha rie nri na python ha
Nhọrọ ọzọ maka ịzụ python bọọlụ bụ nri dị ndụ, ebe a na-azụta anụ ahụ dị ndụ ma onye nwe ya gbuo ya ma nyefee agwọ ozugbo, ma ọ bụ tọhapụ ya ma kwe ka agwọ ahụ 'chụọrọ ya'

A naghị ejikarị nri ndụ eme ihe na mpaghara ụfọdụ, dị ka United Kingdom, ebe, n'agbanyeghị na amachibidoro ya, a na-ewere ya dị ka mpaghara isi awọ iwu kwadoro n'ihi iwu ọdịmma anụmanụ nke na-amachibido nhụjuanya nke vertebrates
A naghị atụ aro ka agwọ ahụ 'ịchụ nta' nri ya n'ihi na ebumnobi nchebe nke anụ anụ nwere nwere ike ime ka anụ ahụ lụso ọgụ ọgụ, na-akpata mmerụ ahụ, na ọbụna igbu agwọ ahụ
Ndị na-eto eto bọọlụ nwere ike iri nri dị ka ụbọchị ise ọ bụla, mana ka ha na-etolite, python bọọlụ na-echere ogologo oge n'etiti nri, sitere na ụbọchị 7 ruo 14 dị ka ndị toro eto
Eriri bọọlụ agaghị ericha nri mgbe ọ na- awụfu
Akpụkpọ anụ bọọlụ bụ otu n'ime anụ ufe a na-akpụ akpụ a na-emekarị na ndọkpụ n'agha
Ha na-enwekarị ike ịmịpụta nsen isii na nkezi, mana nha njigide na-esitekwa na otu ruo iri na otu
Agwọ ndị a na-edinakarị otu ipigide kwa afọ ma nsen na-apụta ihe dị ka ụbọchị iri isii gachara
Ọtụtụ mgbe, a na-etinye akwa ndị a n'ụzọ artificial na gburugburu ebe a dọọrọ n'agha na okpomọkụ n'etiti 88-90 degrees Fahrenheit
Ụfọdụ ndị na-azụ ụmụ a dọọrọ n'agha na-eji teknụzụ na-ada ụda iji chọpụta ọganihu nke mmepe ọmụmụ
Nke a nwere ike inye aka ịbawanye ohere nke spam nwoke na nwanyị na-aga nke ọma n'ihi na ụda ultra-ụda nwere ike inye aka ịkọ oge kacha mma ịmebata nwoke na nwanyị n'oge oge ọmụmụ
N'ịbụ ndị a dọọrọ n'agha, a na-azụkarị python bọọlụ maka ụkpụrụ, ma ọ bụ morphs
Ọ bụ ezie na ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ nanị ịchọ mma, ụfọdụ abanyela n'esemokwu n'ihi ntụpọ anụ ahụ e ketara eketa ma ọ bụ nke nghọta jikọtara ya na ụkpụrụ e ketara eketa
Egosikwara na mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa morph na ududo jikọtara ya na ihe gbasara akwara ozi, nke metụtara kpọmkwem nhụta nguzozi nke agwọ
International Herpetological Society amachibidoro ire ụdị morphs na mmemme ha

Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị a na-ahụkarị bụ pastel, albino, mojave, banana, obere, na axanthic
Ndị na-azụ anụ na-aga n'ihu na-emepụta morphs ọhụrụ, yana ihe karịrị 7,500 morphs dị ugbu a

Ọbụna ndị Igbo Ndị Kraịst na-akpachapụ anya nke ọma mgbe ọ bụla ha hụrụ otu n'ime obodo ma ọ bụ n'ihe onwunwe mmadụ; ha na-ahapụ ha ka ha na-agagharị ma ọ bụ bulite ha nwayọọ ma laghachi n'oké ọhịa ma ọ bụ n'ubi dịpụrụ adịpụ n'ụlọ
Ọ bụrụ na e gbuo mmadụ na mberede, ọtụtụ obodo n’ala Igbo ka na-arụ igbe ozu agwọ ma nye ya obere oge olili
N'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Ghana, e nwere a taboo n'ebe python dị ka ndị mmadụ na-ewere ha dị ka onye nzọpụta na-enweghị ike imerụ ha ma ọ bụ iri ha
Dị ka akụkọ ifo si kwuo, otu mgbe, python nyeere ha aka ịgbanahụ ndị iro ha site n'ịgbanwe ghọọ osisi iji kwe ka ha gafee osimiri
Royal Robertson (ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1930 rụo ụbọchị ịse n'ọnwa Julaị 1997), nke a makwaara dị ka ónyé amụma Royal Robertson, bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A mụrụ ya na St
Mary Parish, Louisiana, n'ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1930, Robertson nọrọ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ndụ ya niile na Baldwin, Louisiana
Robertson hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ gụsịrị klas nke asatọ
N'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, ọ mụtara ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe ịrịba ama ma gaa n'ụsọ oké osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ n'oge ọ malitere afọ iri abụọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka aka na ónyé na-ede ihe ịrịbaanya
Ọ laghachiri Louisiana n'afọ 1950 iji lekọta nne ya ebe ọ gàrà n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe ịrịba ama
Ọ lụrụ Adell Bren (ma ọ bụ Lockett) na 1955 ma ha nwèrè ụmụ iri na otu
Alụmdi na nwunye ha kwụsịrị mgbe afọ iri na itoolu gasịrị mgbe Adell hapụrụ ya maka nwoke ọzọ, kwaga Texas na-akpọrọ ụmụ ha, wee ghọọ onye ozi
Robertson nọgidere na Louisiana mgbè alụmdi na nwunye ya kwụsịrị wee ghọọ ónyé na-anọpụ iche
Ndị agbata obi ya na-eleda ya ányà nke ukwuu ma nwee iwe iwe iwe megide nwunye mbụ ya na ụmụ nwanyị n'ozuzu ya
Robertson nwèrè paranoid schizophrenia ma kwuo na o nwere ọhụụ mbụ ya, ọhụụ ọdịnihu nke ụgbọ elu na Chineke dị ka onye ọkwọ ụgbọala, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
Mgbe alụmdi na nwunye ya kwụsịrị, ọ malitere idekọ ọhụụ ya na ihe oyiyi na ihe odide ya

Ọtụtụ ọhụụ ọhụụ nke njem mbara igwe ebe ndị ọbịa buru amụma na Ọgwụgwụ nke Ụbọchị site na usoro ọnụọgụ dị mgbagwoju anya ma dọọ ya aka ná ntị banyéré ihe ize ndụ nke ịkwa iko na ịkwa iko mere ka Robertson kwere na ọ bụ ónyé nkata aghụghọ nwanyị zuru ụwa ọnụ metụtara
O kwenyere na aghụghọ nke nwunye mbụ ya ga-abụ ihe kpatara mbibi nke ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ, nakwa na nkà ya bụ nke Chineke kwadoro
Dị ka ónyé na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya bụ Frédéric Allamel si kwuo, Robertson hụrụ onwe ya dị ka nna ochie na-achọ Zaịọn ọhụrụ na ónyé amụma nke ihe nketa ya ga-agụnye ọrụ apocryphal ya
Ọ kọwara onwe ya dị ka 'Libra Patriarch Prophet Lord Archbishop Apostle Visionary Mystic Psychic Saint Royal Robertson'

E gosipụtara ọrụ Robertson n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ma nwee ọtụtụ ọrụ na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide gụnyere Smithsonian American Art Museum, Minneapolis Institute of Art, Mississippi Museum of Art, University Art Museum, Lafayette, The Brogan Museum, American Visionary Art Museum na Art Museum of Southeast Texas
Nwa ya nwanyị Dinah hụrụ Robertson ka ọ na-amaghị onwé ya n'azụ ụlọ ya ebe ọ nwụrụ na mberede site na nkụchi obi na 1997 na Louisiana, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na isii
N'afọ 2009, Scott Ogden na Malcolm Hearn mepụtara ihe ngosi Make nke nyochara ndụ na usoro nka nke Robertson, Hawkins Bolden, Judith Scott na Ike Morgan
Aha album nke 2010 The Age of Adz nke onye America na-ese ihe Sufjan Stevens na-ezo aka n'ọrụ Robertson
A na-eji ọrụ Robertson eme ihe maka mkpuchi na ime ime ime nke abọm ahụ, yana maka njem nkwado, ebe a na-eme ihe oyiyi ya na egwu dị ndụ

Ihe dị n'ime abọm ahụ na-egosipụta ma na-azaghachi ọrụ na ọnọdụ Robertson, gụnyere isiokwu dị ka 'mkpughe chi, oracles, ịhụnanya, cosmos, Apocalypse,' dịka ihe nkwalite maka abọm site na Asthmatic Kitty Records

Royal Science and Technology Park (RSTP) bụ ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze na ogige sayensị nke e mepụtara iji kwalite echiche nke ihe ndị e mepụtara ma mee ka ha nwee ike ịnweta ikike ma nyere aka jikọta ihe dị iche iche nke R&D

Ezubere ya iji nye isi ihe maka nyocha, na-eme ka njikọ dị n'etiti nyocha na obodo mmepụta ihe ma na-akpali mmepe nke azụmahịa ndị dabeere na ihe ọmụma site na ntinye nke teknụzụ-preneurship na ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ dị elu

Nke a bụ ebumnuche nke Onye Ọchịchị ya bụ Eze Mswati III iji dọta itinye ego na mba ofesi n'ime Alaeze Eswatini, kwalite mbupụ- uto gbakwasara agbawa, na-ebute ọrụ na ebumnuche iji hụ na mbufe teknụzụ gaa na ndị Eswatini, mechaa kwalite uto akụ na ụba
Ngalaba nlekọta ndị na-achụ ego na-ahụ maka ịrụ ọrụ na njikwa nke RSTP's SEZ Industrial Plot na One Stop Shop Service Center (OSSSC)
Masterplan Ebe na mmepe akụrụngwa

RSTP SEZ, na-ejikwa 3177ha nke ala, nke nnukwu atụmatụ nwere 159 ha maka mmepe ụlọ ọrụ nke dị na nso nso ụzọ mbubata na mbupụ; site n'okporo ụzọ awara awara a ga-esi na Republic of South Africa na Republic of Mozambique, okporo ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè akọrọ na-eduga na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Maputo (Republic of Mozambique) na Richards Bay Sea Port (Republic of South Africa)
Ugbu a 80ha nke ala mmepe ụlọ ọrụ dị na Nokwane na-arụ ọrụ ma dịkwa ngwa ngwa maka itinye ego ezubere iche ga-adị
Atụmatụ Master dị maka mmepe nke akụrụngwa bụ isi maka 79ha fọdụrụnụ nke ala mmepe ụlọ ọrụ n'akụkụ Phocweni nke RSTP
Na-aga n'ihu bụ mmecha nke otu ụlọ ahịa/ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ nke e bu n'obi mee ka ọ dị mfe ma mee ka usoro nhazi na usoro nke ịzụ ahịa na SEZ dị ngwa ngwa
Otu Ụlọ Ahịa Na-arụ Ọrụ
OSSSC bụ akụrụngwa nke bụ ilekọta ndị niile metụtara ya na-enye ọrụ niile onye na-etinye ego nwere ike ịchọ mgbe ọ na-achọta ego ha na SEZ
Ihe Ndị Na-akpata Obibi
Ịga Ahịa
Ịga ahịa site na Alaeze nke Eswatini Free Trade and Preferential Agreements
Ụtụ isi na ụtụ isi
Enweghị ụtụ isi
Royal Science & Technology Park Ecosystem
Ndị na-akwado ọrụ azụmaahịa nwere ike inye ọrụ ndị nwere ike ịpụ apụ nke ga-enye ndị na-etinye ego ohere ilekwasị anya na azụmaahịa ha na ibelata akụrụngwa na ụgwọ ọrụ
Ihe Ndị Eze
Ntinye ego izizi maka onye naanị ya bụ E30, 000,000 na E70, 000, 000 maka mmekọ ọnụ
Otu Enterprise ma ọ bụ onye na-etinye ego ga-egosipụta ikpe azụmahịa ha, ikike ego nke itinye ego ha, yana uru akụ na ụba nke ego a chọrọ
Ihe mgbochi na-egbu egbu
Rozena Maart (amụrụ afo 1962 ) bụ onye odee South Afrika, na prọfesọ, bi ugbu a na Durban
Ọ bụ onye isi maka Center for Critical Research on Race and Identity
A matara ya maka ihe odide ya, na maka ọrụ ya na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị
O meela nkuzi na Canada, United States na ọtụtụ akụkụ ụwa
A mụrụ ya na distrikti isii, Cape Town, South Africa, ebe ochie ohu nke Cape Town
Ewepụrụ ezinụlọ ya n'ike na District nke isii na afo 1973 n'ihi Iwu Mwepụ nke gọọmentị

Na 1987 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abuo na ano, a họpụtara Maart maka ihe nrite 'Woman of the Year' nke a kwadoro na Johannesburg, maka ọrụ ya na-emegide ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị na ịmalite, ya na ụmụ nwanyị anọ, otu òtù nwanyị nwanyị ojii mbụ na Cape Town, Women Against Repression
(AKWỤKWỌ)
Ọ kwagara Canada na afo 1989 ma bipụta akwụkwọ uri mbụ ya na afo 1990, Talk About It!

Ọ meriri ihe nrite Njem na afo 1992 maka obere akụkọ ya 'Enweghị Rosa, Enweghị Mpaghara isii', nke mechara pụta na nchịkọta akụkọ mpụta mbụ ya bụ 'Rosa's District Six' Ọ bụ onye edemede nke ọtụtụ akwụkwọ uri, obere akụkọ ifo, ndị na-abụghị akụkọ ifo na akwụkwọ akụkọ, na nso nso a akwụkwọ akụkọ The Writing Circle, nke e bipụtara na afo 2007 ( TSAR Publications ), bụ nke a na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri nkiri
Rosa's District isii mere ndepụta ndị ahịa kacha mma kwa izu na Canada na 2006 yana ndepụta HOMEBRU 2006 na South Africa
O nwere PhD na Mahadum Birmingham, UK (1993-1996) Center for Cultural Studies

Ọrụ ya na-enyocha mmekọrịta n'etiti na n'etiti ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Philosophy, Black Consciousness, Derrida na Deconstruction, Psychoanalysis, Feminist Theory, na Critical Theories nke agbụrụ na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ

Maart jere ozi n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na Kọmitii Sayensị UNESCO maka mkparịta ụka nkà ihe ọmụma South-South, bụ nke mepụtara akwụkwọ ọgụgụ nkà ihe ọmụma na-ekpuchi mpaghara anọ-Africa, Asia, South na Central America na mpaghara Arab-n'asụsụ anọ (Bekee, French, Spanish na Arabic)

Na afo 2010 The Writing Circle bụ otu n'ime akwụkwọ iri kacha elu na akwụkwọ South Africa n'ala nna ya, South Africa ma bụrụ ndị otu African Studies Association for the Aidoo-Snyder Book Prize họpụtara ya
Rozzell Sykes (ubochí irí abụọ na isé n'ọnwa Disemba, 1931 rụo ụbọchị irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 1994) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, nke bi na Los Angeles, California
A maara ya nkè ọma dị ka onye guzobere St
Elmo Village, ọrụ mmezigharị ọbọdọ

A mụrụ Rozzell Sykes na Aberdeen, Mississippi, nwa Anna Bell Clay na Cleveland Sykes, ọ bụ ezie na o nyèrè akụkọ dị ichè ichè banyéré mmalite ya kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, na-ekwukarị banyéré nwata na West Indies
Ọ biri na St
Louis, Missouri na San Diego, California tupu ọ kwaga Los Angeles na 1961

N'etiti afọ 1960, Rozzell Sykes bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ, nke a maara màkà usoro gosipụtara na magazin Life N'afọ 1969, ya na nwa nwanne ya nwoke Roderick Sykes nwetara obéré ìgwè bungalows n'etiti ọbọdọ Los Angeles, na block puku anọ na narị asatọ nke St
Elmo Drive ebe ha bi, iji chekwaa ebe obibi ma melite agbata obi dị ka nnwale okike
E debanyere aha ọbọdọ St
Elmo na 1971, ma gosipụta ọhụụ Sykes nke ebe ọdịbendị mara mma, nke nwere ọtụtụ agbụrụ
Rozzell Sykes mere ọtụtụ nnukwu mgbidi màkà Ọbọdọ ahụ, ma nweta ego site n'enyemaka nke Tom Bradley, onye kansụl ọbọdọ n'oge ahụ
'Echeghị m na o kwere ka ihe ọ bụla ghara ịbụ ihe e sere ese', ka Bradley kwuru n'afọ 1995
'Ọ bụ nwoke nwere ọhụụ pụrụ iche
Ọ na-ekwukarị na ọ dịghị mkpa ma ị bi na igbe akpụkpọ ụkwụ ma ọ bụ nnukwu ụlọ, ị nwere ike ịbụ ihe niile ị chọrọ ịbụ
' Mpaghara ahụ ghọrọ ebe a na-eme emume St
Elmo kwa afọ, nke Rozzell Sykes haziri iji mee ka a mara ọrụ ahụ ma mee emume nka
Roderick na Rozzell Sykes natara onyinye Human Rights Award site n'aka ndị Baha'is nke Los Angeles County na 1971, n'ịgbaso Ụbọchị Ikike Mmadụ nke United Nations, màkà ọrụ ha na St
Elmo Village
Ọ lụrụ Erma Sykes, ónyé nọọsụ, di na nwunye ahụ zụlitere ụmụ ise ọnụ, n'etiti ha bụ ónyé na-emepụta egwu Benny Medina
Ọ nwụrụ na ngwụcha afọ 1994, mgbè ọ dị afọ iri isii na atọ
E mere emume olili ozu ya na First African Methodist Episcopal Church nke Los Angeles
Ọbọdọ́ St
Elmo ka na-arụsi ọrụ ike dị ka oghere nka, n'okpuru ónyé nduzi Roderick Sykes
Ruann Coleman bụ onye South Africa na-akpụ ihe
E gosipụtala ọrụ ya, nke nwere ihe ndị e nwetara site na junkyards ma ọ bụ sitere na gburugburu ebe obibi, na Cape Town, Johannesburg na Rome, Milan na Torino, Italy
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ijikwa ma ihe ndị dị ndụ na ihe ndị na-adịghị ahụkebe dị ka osisi, ígwè na iko iji gbanwee ọnọdụ ha
Coleman gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị elu na Mahadum Stellenbosch, ebe ọ nwetara Master of Fine Arts n'afọ 2014
O gosipụtala ihe ngosi onwe ya na South Africa na Italy ma gosipụta ọrụ ya na-adịgide adịgide n'ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe n'oge mgbe ochie
Stellenbosch Outdoor Sculpture Trust makwaara ya nke nyere ya ọrụ ịmepụta ọrụ maka ihe banyere Hiervandaan/ Site ebe a/ Ndisuka Public Sculpture Initiative
Rubanda-Mayonza, nke a makwaara dị ka Rutabatiina Mwene Busingye Emanzi Etahunga, bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji nke Uganda, onye ọchụnta ego nakwa onyeisi na ihe gbasara ichurutu nta ego
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ejiji Rubanda Mayonza, akara ejiji e-commerce nke Africa na Uganda
Rubanda Mayonza gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Ntare na Mbarara maka agụmakwụkwọ sekondiri nke nta nakwa nke ukwuu
N'afọ 2013 ọ sonyeere Mahadum Makerere ma n'afọ 2018 gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na nri na-edozi ahụ
Ọ bụ mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum makerere ka mmasị ya maka ejiji na ime ihe ngosi malitere ịmalite ka ọ malitere isonye na ihe ngosi ejiji gburugburu ụlọ akwụkwọ
Na Makerere, ọ bụ onye isi otu ndị ntorobịa na-eto eto na mpaghara Afrịka nke a maara dị ka Waharakati Africa
o na-egosipụta nguzo Pan African ya n'ụzọ ọ na-esi eme ejiji
Ka ọ na-erukwa ngwụcha ụbọchị Mahadum ya, ọ malitere iweta ejiji ndị ọzọ n'ime uwe ejiji nke Afrịka bụ(Bitenge) site n'ịmepụta uwe ejiji Pan African

Rubanda mayonzà malitere ọrụ ejiji ya site na iweputa ebe ndị Africa ga enwe ike na zukota na interneti ,ebe ndị ana azu ahia ihe ndi eji eme ejiji na akara e commerce sites no na Kampala Uganda na afọ 2015

na afọ 2017 obidoro Mmepụta ba uwe elu nke ina emepụta Kwa maka umu nwoke na ime interneti jumia shop uzo Mmepụta ejiji ya bidoro banyewa nke na obidoro mmeputawa uwe umunwanyi nakwa ihe ndi ọzọ dika okpu, nnukwu akwa eji ekpuchi oyi, nakwazi jakeetiÀtụ CnaÀtụ Cn
Nchịkọta Rubanda-Mayonza na-enwekarị mmetụta nke ejiji nke Pan Africanists na subcultures nke Uganda ma na-ere ahịa na njikọ ya na pan Africanism
Ọ bụ onye nwe ya na onye isi na-emepụta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, na-eduga ndị otu ha na emepụta ejiji ma na-elekọta usoro okike niile

Rania Hussein Mohammed Tawfik (Arabic رانيا حسين محمد توفيق [ˈɾɑnjɑ ħeˈseːn mæˈħæmmæd tæwˈfiːʔ]; amụrụ n'October 8, 1981), nke a maara dị ka Ruby nke a na-akpọ Ruby (Arabian روبی , mgbe ụfọdụ a na-asụgharị ya dị ka Roubi), bụ onye na-agụ egwú, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ese ihe nlereanya oge ụfọdụ nke ghọrọ onye ama na egwu mbụ ya 'Enta Aref Leih' ('Ị maara ihe kpatara ya?') na 2003
Vidiyo egwu mbụ nke egwu izizi ya 'Enta Aref Leih' (2003), bụ nke Sherif Sabri duziri ma bụrụ ihe a ma ama na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ egwu satellite na mpaghara Middle East n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2003
Ndị mgbasa ozi katọrọ Ruby maka ịpụta na ejiji na-akpali akpali nke onye na-agba egwu afọ na vidiyo egwu ahụ
N'agbanyeghị nkatọ a, egwu ahụ na-aga nke ọma mere ka Ruby bụrụ onye a ma ama
E wepụtara vidiyo nke abụọ nke Ruby na mbido afọ 2004
A kpọrọ vidio ahụ 'Leih Beydary Kedah' (Gịnị mere na ọ na-ezochi mmetụta ya dị ka nke a?) ma bụrụ nke Sherif Sabri duziri; vidiyo ahụ gosipụtakwara ihe nkiri na-akpali akpali
Vidiyo egwu ya nke atọ 'El Gharaam (Koll Amma A'ollo Ah) ' so na vidiyo sitere na ihe nkiri Ruby, 'Saba' Wara'aat Kotcheena' (7 Playing Cards)
Gọọmentị nke ụfọdụ mba Arab machibidoro ihe nkiri ahụ n'ihi ojiji ọ na-eji isiokwu ndị na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ
A jụrụ Ruby ajụjụ n'ọtụtụ ajụjụ ọnụ banyere ụdị ya na-akpali akpali na mmegharị na-akwalite, nke ọ zaghachiri na ọ naghị ele onwe ya anya dị ka ihe nnọchianya mmekọahụ
A nụkwara na ọ lụrụ onye njikwa ya, Sherif Sabri, mana ha abụọ agọnahụla asịrị ahụ
N'afọ 2008, o wepụtara egwu Yal Ramoush (Wonderful Eyelashes)
Ọ bụkwa onye bụrụ abụ isiokwu nke Al Wa3d Movie Awwel Marra
Oge izizi Ruby na ihe nkiri Egypt bụ na 2000 na ihe nkiri Egyptian Film Saqafi (Cultural Film)
N'afọ 2019, o sonyere na ihe nkiri Egypt abụọ nke gụnyere Hamlet Pheroun na The Treasure 2
Ọrụ nka ikpeazụ Ruby bụ The Treasure 2 (Al Kanz 2)
Ezinụlọ ya si n'ọchịchị na-agba akwụkwọ Ruby nwere ọrụ dị mkpa na mgbasa ozi na-efe efe nke 2020 maka Edita's Molto croissants
Ruby Dhalla (amuru Febụwarị 18, 1974) bụ onye Canada chiropractor na onye bụbu onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ jere ozi dị ka onye otu nzuko omeiwu maka Brampton—Springdale na House of Commons nke Canada site na 2004 ruo 2011 dị ka onye otu Liberal Party
Dhalla na British Columbia MP Conservative Nina Grewal bụ ụmụ nwanyị Sikh mbụ jere ozi na House of Commons nke Canada
Ndị Conservative Parm Gill meriri ya na ntuli aka gọọmenti etiti afọ 2011
A mụrụ Dhalla na Winnipeg, Manitoba, sitere na ezinụlọ ndị si Punjab, India kwabatara
Ọ dọtara mmasị mba ụwa na mbụ na 1984, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ma biri na Winnipeg's north end
Mgbe ndị agha India keere òkè na agha na Temple Golden Punjab, Dhalla degaara Prime Minister India Indira Gandhi akwụkwọ ozi, na-akwado maka udo na ikpe ziri ezi

Gandhi n'onwe ya zara akwụkwọ ozi Dhalla wee zoo aka na ya na nnọkọ ndị nta akụkọ nwere ọnwa ole na ole tupu e gbuo ya, na-akpọ Dhalla ka ọ gaa India; otu o sila dị, e gburu Gandhi tupu Dhalla bịarute
Ọ gara Mahadum McMaster maka afọ mbụ ya na mahadum na agụmakwụkwọ zuru oke

Dhalla maliteghachiri akwụkwọ ọmụmụ ya fọdụrụ na Mahadum Winnipeg wee nweta nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na biochemistry na obere nwa na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Winnipeg na 1995 ma bụrụkwa nkenke edepụtara dị ka onye nominee Rhodes Scholarship si Manitoba
Ọ kwagara Toronto n'otu afọ ahụ, wee gụchaa ya na Dọkịta nke Chiropractic site na Canadian Memorial Chiropractic College na 1999
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ malitere ọtụtụ ụlọọgwụ nlekọta ahụike multidisciplinary na Greater Toronto Mpaghara

Dhalla agbasowokwa ọrụ na-eme ihe nkiri, na-arụ ọrụ na India ruo ọnwa isii ma na-arụ ọrụ na-eduga na Kyon? Kis Liye? (nke a sụgharịrị dị ka Gịnị kpatara? na maka Ònye? ), ihe nkiri Hindi sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke Bollywood gbara na Hamilton, Ontario

Dhalla bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site na nwata wee wepụta onwe ya maka onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi Winnipeg Liberal David Walker na ntuli aka gọọmenti etiti 1988, ma mechaa bụrụ onye ama ama na MANITOBA Young Liberal

Dhalla rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ mkpọsa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-achịkọta kọmitii ntuli aka dị iche iche na ọrụ afọ ofufo n'ọtụtụ mkpọsa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mpaghara na gọọmentị etiti na 1998, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ndị ntorobịa akụkụ na-emesapụ aka nke kọmitii kwụ ọtọ Canada na ọtụtụ omenala na mgbakọ amụma afọ
A họpụtara Dhalla ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya na 1990 Liberal Leadership Convention na Calgary ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-eto eto liberals mbụ na Manitoba iji kwado Paul Martin
Dhalla kwadoro nkwado Paul Martin ka ọ bụrụ onye ndu Liberal Party na 2003
Na Mee 2004, Prime Minista Paul Martin họpụtara Dhalla ka ọ bụrụ onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi Liberal maka Brampton-Springdale na ntuli aka gọọmenti etiti 2004
Mkpebi a megidere onye isi ndị na-agba ịnyịnya Liberal Party, bụ onye kwadoro Andrew Kania maka nhọpụta ahụ
Onye osote onye isi mgbasa ozi maka Liberal Party gbachitere nhọrọ Dhalla, na-akọwa ya dị ka onye na- eme kpakpando nke ga-aba uru na pati ahụ

N'agbanyeghị na ndị Liberal Party belatara na obere ọchịchị Dhalla dị ka a họpụtara site na oke ala dị mma na June 28, 2004 wee mee akụkọ ihe mere eme dịka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ sitere na India ka a họpụtara na Canada dị ka onye nnọchiteanya
Mmeri ya bụkwa akụkọ ihe mere eme n'ihi na ọ bụ nwanyị India ka ahọpụtara ya na mba ụwa na mpụga India
Nyere nzere nlekọta ahụike ya na ahụmịhe azụmaahịa a họpụtara Dhalla na Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ahụ Ike
Na nzuko omeiwu Dhalla bịara mara dị ka onye na-ekwu okwu na onye na-eme ihe ike n'okwu metụtara ndị mebere ya, ndị nta na ụmụ nwanyị
Dhalla bụ onye nhazi a ma ama nke ihe nkiri uru 'Canada maka Asia' na Jenụwarị 2005, yana Senator Jerry Grafstein na onye ọbụ abụ Tom Cochrane
Ihe omume a welitere ego maka ndị ọdachi mbufịt mbufịt mere n'ọnwa gara aga na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Eshia
Ya na Prime Minister mere njem na Sri Lanka na India na 2005 na njem njem azụmahịa iji kwalite azụmahịa n'etiti mba abụọ ahụ
N'October 2005, Dhalla haziri ihe enyemaka maka ndị ala ọma jijiji mere na Pakistan
Na nzuko omeiwu Dhalla webatara iwu ndị otu ya nke mbụ iji mepụta odeakwụkwọ maka nnabata nzere mba ofesi
Edefere ụgwọ a na House of Commons si otú a na-enyere ndị Canada kwabatara nso nso a aka inweta ọrụ ọkachamara
Dhalla kwadoro iwu alụmdi na nwunye nwoke na nwanyị na Canada na 2005, n'ihi na Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedom ga-enyerịrị otu dị iche iche na ọha mmadụ nhata
N'ọgwụgwụ 2005, ọchịchị Liberal meriri site na mkpesa enweghị ntụkwasị obi, a kpọkwara ntuli aka ọhụrụ maka mmalite 2006
Dhalla weputara ọkwa ntuli aka ya na mbido December, ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Bollywood Arjun Rampal dị ka onye bịara kpakpando
Onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi Conservative Sam Hundal nwara iji alụmdi na nwunye nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị ibe ya dị ka okwu mkparị n'etiti ndị mbịarambịa na nso nso a, mana o nweghi ihe ịga nke ọma
A na-ahọpụta Dhalla n'ụzọ dị mfe, ebe ndị Conservatives meriri obere ọchịchị na ọkwa mba
Mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, a họpụtara Dhalla dị ka onye nkatọ ahụike Liberal na mmegide gọọmentị
Na June 2006, ọ katọrọ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ahụike Tony Clement maka ọgbaghara-mmasị nwere ike metụtara nwe oke oke na Prudential Chem Inc
N'ọnwa na-eso ya, ọ kọwara ọjụjụ Prime Minister Stephen Harper jụrụ ịga ogbako AIDS mba ụwa na Toronto dị ka 'ihe ihere nye Canada na ọkwa ụwa'
Na June 2006, Ọ bịara pụta ìhè na Conservatives gbalịrị ime ka Dhalla gafere n'ala ma sonye na pati ahụ, dịka akụkụ nke mkpọsa iji nweta nkwado nke ndị ntorobịa, ndị inyom na ndị ntuli aka agbụrụ
Ọ jụrụ onyinye ahụ, na-ekwu na ndị Conservatives anaghị anọchi anya ụkpụrụ ya
O mechara katọọ Wajid Khan maka isi na Liberal gafere na Conservatives
(E meriri Khan na ntuli aka gọọmenti etiti 2008
Paul Martin gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye ndu Liberal ka ndị otu ya meriri na ntuli aka 2006
Nyere Dhalla ikike ikwu okwu, atụmatụ mgbasa ozi na ntozu ntorobịa ya, ọtụtụ ndị otu pati gbara Dhalla ume ka ọ buru ụzọ chee echiche ịbanye n'asọmpi iji nọchie ya
Dhalla malitere ikpo okwu iji gbaa ndị ntorobịa na ụmụ nwanyị ume isonye na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na usoro idu ndú na voicesca
N'ikpeazụ Dhalla nyere Michael Ignatieff nkwado ya
A mara ọkwa ya dị ka onye isi oche mba nke Mgbasa Ozi Ọchịchị Ignatieff, n'akụkụ Senator David Smith na onye otu nzuko omeiwu Denis Coderre
Dion kwuputara ụlọ ọrụ ndò ọhụrụ ya na Jenụwarị 2007, ma nyefee Dhalla site na Health gaa na mmepe mmekọrịta
Ọ katọrọ ndị Conservatives maka ịkagbu atụmatụ nlekọta ụbọchị gọọmentị Martin nke mba, ma kwuo okwu megide atụmanya nke nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ mba ọzọ na-enweta uru na-eweghara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
O dekwara mpempe echiche maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Toronto Star na mbido 2008, na-akpọ maka mba ndị mepere emepe ka ha tinye ego ndị dị mkpa iji lekwasị anya na ụkwara nta na ndịda ụwa
Na nzuko omeiwu Dhalla tọrọ ntọala okpu (HIV, AIDS, ụkwara nta) caucus maka ndị omeiwu nke niile ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-eme ka ukwuu mmata na okwu

Dhalla megidere mgbanwe gọọmentị Conservative mere na iwu mbata na ọpụpụ Canada na mbido 2008, bụ ebe gọọmentị debere oke kwa afọ maka ọnụọgụ ikpe a ga-anụ wee nye Minista mbata na ọpụpụ ikike iji ngwa ngwa ngwa ụfọdụ ndị na-achọ akwụkwọ
Dhalla tụrụ aro na ndị Conservatives ga-egosi mmasị n'ebe ndị si obodo ụfọdụ kwabatara

E hotara ya ka ọ na-ekwu, 'Echere m na ha na-ahọrọ ma na-ahọrọ maka ebumnuche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke obodo ha chọrọ ka ha na ya na-arụkọ ọrụ, ọ bụkwa ya mere ụjọ ji dị n'etiti obodo ndị a na iwu mbata na-ebupụta ugbu a ga-enwe
mmetụta na ha' Dhalla nwekwara ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịkwado gọọmentị ka o kwe ka ndị Sikh nke aha nna ha bụ Singh ma ọ bụ Kaur ghara itinye aha ikpeazụ iji kwaga Canada
Dhalla nyere iwu onye otu onwe n'April 2008, na-akpọku gọọmentị etiti ka ọ rịọ mgbaghara maka ihe omume 1914 Komagata Maru, nke ụgbọ mmiri nwere 376 na-abụkarị ndị Sikh kwabatara na Canada
Ekefere ụgwọ ahụ n'otu ọnụ n'ọnwa na-esote

Na 2008 Dhalla chere nhoputa ndi ochichi siri ike ihu na 2008, ma mechaa merie onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi Conservative Parm Gill site na obere oke n'etiti mpaghara swing site na Liberal na Conservatives
Asọmpi a bụ nke a na-ebo nwanne ndị mmegide (Parm Gills) ebubo igbubi akara Dhalla
Na ntuli aka nke 2008 a họpụtara ndị Conservatives ka ha bụrụ ọchịchị nke abụọ pere mpe na ọkwa mba
N'oge na-adịghị anya ka ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, a boro otu nwoke Toronto ebubo iyi egwu ọnwụ na ịchụ Dhalla
Na nzuko omeiwu Dhalla gara n'ihu na-ebuli okwu metụtara ụmụ nwanyị, ndị pere mpe na ndị ntorobịa wee rụọ ọrụ iji kwalite azụmaahịa n'etiti Canada na akụ na ụba na-apụta
Dhalla gara njem na steeti India nke Punjab na Jenụwarị 2008
Mgbe ọ na-aga nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe ndị India na-abụghị ndị bi (NRI), ọ kpọkuru gọọmentị steeti ka ha webata iwu ndị siri ike iji gbochie mmeso ụmụ nwanyị lụrụ di na nwunye
O mechara gaa n'obodo Mullanpur nke nne na nna ya
N'ime njem a, otu onye ọrụ Dhalla nwere obere akpa ụmụaka abụọ zuru
Ebubo mechara pụta na ndị uwe ojii tiri ụmụaka ahụ ihe mgbe ejidechara ha, ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn dị n'obodo ahụ wepụrụ okwu na-abụghị nke sitere na Dhalla nke yiri ka ọ kwadoro ime ihe ike ahụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mechara wepụta nkwụghachi azụ zuru oke ma kweta na e wepụtala ihe Dhalla kwuru na-esiteghị na ya
Dhalla kọwara na ọ katọrọ ụdị ime ihe ike ọ bụla a na-eme ụmụaka ma kpọọ oku ka enyochaa ihe merenụ
Stéphane Dion rituru dị ka onye ndu Liberal mgbe ngosipụta dara ogbenye na ntuli aka gọọmentị 2008, a kpọtụrụ Dhalla dị ka onye ga-abụ onye ga-anọchi ya
Toronto Star depụtara ya dị ka onye na-asọ mpi n'èzí, na-achọpụta na profaịlụ mba ya esichaghị ike
Tupu ya enwee ike ime mkpebi ya, ndị ọzọ a ma ama si na asọmpi ahụ ma nye nkwado ha Michael Ignatieff
N'ọnwa Disemba, Dhalla kwupụtara na ọ gaghị abụ onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi
A nabatara Ignatieff nke ọma dị ka onye ndu nwa oge na Jenụwarị 2009, wee kwado ya dịka onye isi otu pati n'ime afọ

Onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ Globe na Mail bụ Margaret Wente akọwala Dhalla dị ka onye na-adịghị amasị ya n'etiti ndị ọrụ ibe ya na ndị omeiwu Liberal, ebe a na-ele ya anya dị ka onye na-akwalite onwe ya 'dị elu'

N'ime nyocha nke ndị ọrụ omeiwu sitere na Hill Times, a họpụtara Dhalla ka ọ bụrụ MP kacha njọ na-arụ ọrụ, ndị na-eme ntuli aka na-atụ aro na ọ nwere 'mgbanwe ndị ọrụ [ndị ọrụ] karịa onye ọ bụla nọ n'ugwu ahụ'
A sịkwara na ọ nwere mmasị na aha ya karịa ịrụ ọrụ nzuko omeiwu, onye otu onye ọrụ ibe ya na-ekwu, 'Ọ bụ ihe niile na-amalite site n'ịhụ na ọ nọ na foto ọ bụla na onye ndu
M na-anụkarị ihe omume ebe ọ na-akpọ ndị nhazi wee kwuo 'Achọrọ m ikwu okwu,' n'agbanyeghị na a kpọghị ya ', ọ pụtara na mgbakọ Liberal 2009 na limo na-acha ọcha
Mgbe esemokwu ndị nlekọta ahụ malitere, e hotara otu MP ka ọ na-ekwu 'Aghọtaghị m na ọtụtụ mmadụ na-enwe ọmịiko n'ebe ọ nọ'
Dhalla nwara igbochi mwepụta DVD nke ihe nkiri Bollywood o mere tupu a họpụta ya na nzuko omeiwu
Dhalla ekwuola na onyonyo o ji akwalite ihe nkiri ahụ bụ nke dọkịta depụtara - ihe ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri ahụ gọnarịrị
Dhalla gọnarị ndị na-emepụta ihe na-ekwu na ọ bịanyere aka na nkwụghachi ụgwọ nkesa, kwụọ ya $2,000, ma ọ bụ gbaa ajụjụ ọnụ TV na-akwado na mbụ na sinima nke na-enyocha ihe nkiri ndị India mere
Ndị na-emepụta ihe na-ekwu na ha nwere onye akaebe hụrụ Dhalla bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ nkwado ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na ha na-ekwu na nkwụsị ahụ n'onwe ya bụ 'e bibiri n'ime ọkụ'
Na Mee 5, 2009, akwụkwọ akụkọ Toronto Star mere akụkọ n'ihu ihu na ebubo na ndị nlekọta abụọ goro ilekọta nne Dhalla ejirila n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị wee megbuo ya

N'oge nnọkọ ọha na eze ya na ndị minista Liberal Ontario Peter Fonseca na Kathleen Wynne nọ, ndị na-elekọta ahụ kwuru na ejidere paspọtụ ha, na-arụ ọrụ oge akwụghị ụgwọ, na a manyere ha ịrụ ọrụ na-abụghị onye nlekọta

Fonseca na Wynne chere ebubo ebubo na ndị omebe iwu Ontario na ha kpuchiri ihe ahụ merenụ, onye isi NDP Ontario Andrea Horwath na-akọwa ya dị ka 'ihe na-awụ akpata oyi n'ahụ' na ndị ozi emeghị ihe ọ bụla iji nyochaa ebubo ndị a
Onye isi ala Dalton McGuinty gbachitere ndị ozi ya, ebe ọ na-ekwenye na ha abụọ “gosipụtara ntakịrị ntakịrị ntị
Onye nlekọta nke atọ mechara wepụta ebubo ndị yiri ya
Dhalla zara na ya 'eju ya anya na iju ya anya' maka ebubo ndị ahụ na ndị na-elekọta ndị na-elekọta ya enwebeghị mmegbu
O mechara wepụta nkwupụta na-egosi na o nweghị ihe ọ na-etinye n'ọrụ n'ewe ma ọ bụ na-elekọta ụmụ nwanyị ahụ
Dhalla gbadara dị ka ndị ntorobịa Liberal na Multiculturalism Critic na Mee 6 wee kpọọ oku maka nyocha ụkpụrụ omume gọọmentị etiti iji kpochapụ aha ya
O mere ọgbakọ ndị nta akụkọ ụbọchị abụọ ka e mesịrị nke ọ kọwara ebubo eboro ya dị ka mkpọkọ ọnụ megide aha ya

Akwụkwọ akụkọ Globe na Mail na -esote tụrụ aro na ọ nwere ndị na-akwado ole na ole n'ime ọgbakọ Liberal Liberal, yana ndị omeiwu ndị ọzọ lere ya anya dị ka onye na-akwalite onwe ya 'dị elu', na-achọ ndị ọrụ ya na ọ chọghị itinye aka na nkọwa nke ndụ ndị omeiwu
Ụfọdụ ndị omeiwu Liberal agbachitere ya n'ihu ọha, agbanyeghị, gụnyere Judy Sgro
Ọkaiwu Dhalla tụrụ aro na esemokwu ahụ bụ akụkụ nke mgbasa ozi mkparị nke ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị haziri
Ọkàiwu ya mesịrị gwa ndị mgbasa ozi na otu n'ime ndị nlekọta ahụ boro onye ọrụ ọzọ ebubo na-enweghị isi n'oge gara aga

N'echi nke Dhalla pụtachara, Agathe Mason, onye isi otu onye isi otu nkwado Toronto maka ụmụ nwanyị mbata mbata nke a na-akpọ Intercede, gbara akaebe n'ihu kọmitii Commons na ọ kpọrọ Dhalla (kama nwanne ya nwoke) mgbe otu n'ime ndị nlekọta mere mkpesa banyere paspọtụ ya ịbụ
ejidere
Mason kwuru na ya gwara Dhalla na ya na-emebi iwu ma nwee awa 24 iji weghachi paspọtụ ahụ, na n'icheta na e weghachiri ya paspọtụ ahụ n'echi ya
Dhalla ajụbuola ebubo Mason, na-ekwu na ọ dịghị mgbe ya na onye ọ bụla kparịtara ụka na Intercede
Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mbata na ọpụpụ Jason Kenney gọnarịrị aro nke nnyonye anya ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na-ekwu na ya enweghị ihe ọmụma onwe ya banyere okwu ahụ ruo mgbe mgbasa ozi kọrọ ya
E mechara hụ onye enyemaka minista ya Alykhan Velshi ka ọ na-enyefe akwụkwọ na nzukọ nke Kọmitii mbata na ọpụpụ iji mebie Dhalla
Ụfọdụ kwenyere na omume Velshi butere mmetụta na-akụda mmụọ n'etiti ndị ọrụ obodo na ngalaba Kenney, na-egbochi ha inyocha okwu ahụ n'ụzọ ziri ezi na nke ghe oghe
N'ikpeazụ, ọ nweghị ebubo e gbara
Dhalla rịọrọ ndị ọha na ndị mgbasa ozi ka ha 'jide ikpe wee nye nzuzo ezinụlọ ya'
Conservative Parm Gill meriri Dhalla na ntuli aka gọọmenti etiti afọ 2011

Dhalla haziri nzukọ ndị nta akụkọ na October 5, 2014, n'ebumnobi nke ikwupụta ọkwa ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchiteanya Liberal na Brampton-Springdale maka ntuli aka gọọmenti etiti 2015 mana o kwuputara na, 'Mgbe ọtụtụ echiche na echiche dị ukwuu, agaghị m adị
na-agba ọsọ na ntuli aka gọọmenti etiti ọzọ' Na ọkwa ya gbara ya gburugburu site na akara ntuli aka nke mechiri aha Liberal Party

O mechara gwa CTV News na ka o dozichara ogbako ndị nta akụkọ ya, ndị ọrụ Liberal kpọtụụrụ ya bụ ndị nwara ime ka ọ kwenye ka ọ ghara ịgba ọsọ mana ọ mechara gọnarị nke a, na-ekwu na otu Liberal Party chọrọ ka ọ gbaa ọsọ, mana na o kpebiri na nkeji ikpeazụ
na ọ nweghị ike itinye aka na-eje ozi dịka MP ọzọ
E nwetara ozi ntuli aka niile site na ntuli aka Canada
Mmefu akwụrụ n'aka na-ezo aka na mkpokọta ndị etinyere, na ewepụtara ya mgbe mkpokọta nyochachara ikpeazụ adịghị
Ruby Lee Grant Martin (February 18, 1933 - Mee 8, 2003) bụ onye ọka iwu America na onye ọrụ gọọmentị
Ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị etiti maka ikike obodo, nke Lyndon B
Johnson họpụtara
Ọ meriri ihe nrite Federal Women's Award na 1968 maka ọrụ ya na mwepu ụlọ akwụkwọ
A mụrụ Ruby Lee Grant na Gaines Landing, Arkansas ma zụlite ya na Cleveland, Ohio, ada Ben F
Grant
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Glenville High School na afọ 1952 ma pụta na Fisk University na 1956, wee gụchaa na klaasị ya na Howard University School of Law na 1959
Martin bụ onye ọka iwu gbasara ikike obodo na Cleveland
A họpụtara ya onye isi ngalaba nke Operations Division na Federal Office for Civil Rights (OCR) na 1967, na 1968 ghọrọ onye isi OCR n'onwe ya, n'oge onye isi ala Lyndon B
Johnson
Ọ meriri ihe nrite Federal Woman's Award na 1968, 'maka njikwa obi ike ya na nke ọma nke mmemme nnabata ikike obodo yana ntinye aka ya pụrụ iche maka ikpe ziri ezi agbụrụ na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ'
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 34, ọ bụ ya bụ onye kasị nta nwetara ihe nrite ahụ ruo taa

Martin kwadoro ma duzie Washington Research Project Action Council (ugbu a Fund Defence Children's Defence Fund ) na 1969, ya na Marian Wright Edelman, na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ahụ gbaara akaebe na Ụlọ Nzukọ Ụlọ na Iwu Enyemaka Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Emergency na 1971, na n'ụlọ ikpe Senate maka ohere agụmakwụkwọ nha anya na 1972
Mgbe e mesịrị na 1970s, ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ izugbe nye Kọmitii Ụlọ na District nke Columbia
Martin kwagara Richmond, Virginia na 1978, wee gbaa ọsọ maka kansụl obodo na 1986
Na 1990 Ọ sonyeere na kọbọd nke nwa akwụkwọ ibe ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu, Gọvanọ Virginia Douglas Wilder, dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke nchịkwa
Ọ jere ozi na ọrụ azụmahịa steeti na Africa maka Wilder na maka gọvanọ North Carolina James B
Hunt
Ọ bụ onye isi oche ọrụ Port of Richmond, na onye otu Council Council for Higher Education na Virginia
Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke Women Executives na State Government
Martin jere ozi na bọọdụ mba nke Girl Scouts nke USA, ma kwadoo mbọ iji mepụta ebe ngosi nka ịgba ohu nke mba na United States
Ọ bụ onye otu Alpha Kappa Alpha
Ruby Grant lụrụ onye dọkịta ezé, Henry S
Martin
Ha mụrụ ụmụ atọ
Martin nwụrụ na 2003, ọ dị afọ 70, na Richmond
Ndị omebe iwu Virginia wefere mkpebi nkwonkwo nke iru újú na nkwanye ùgwù maka ya, na February 2004
Ruby Onyinyechi Amanze (amụrụ n'afọ 1982) bụ onye na-ese ihe bị na Brooklyn
Ọ bụ onye Naijiria na Britain amaara maka eserese na ọrụ ya na mpempe akwụkwọ nke na-elekwasị anya na ọdịbendị ma ọ bụ 'post-colonial non-nationalism'
Na mgbakwunye na ịbụ onye na-ese ihe, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na onye nlekọta
A mụrụ Amanze na Naịjirịa n'afọ 1982
A zụlitere ya na United Kingdom, o biri ebe ahụ afọ iri na atọ tupu ọ bịa United States na 2004 mgbe ọ kwagara Philadelphia
O nwetara BFA
summa cum laude na Tyler School of Art na Philadelphia's Temple University n'afọ 2004
Ọ natara MFA ya na Cranbrook Academy of Art, na Bloomfield Hills, Michigan
Amanze bi ugbu a na Brooklyn, New York
Eserese Ruby Onyinyechi Amanze, ink na pigmenti, nke na-ejikọta ya na mbufe foto, bụ nke ihe okike ngwakọ dị na mbara ala dị iche iche bi na ya, na-ese n'elu oghere ọcha nke mpempe akwụkwọ ha
Ndị na-ese ihe na Naijiria na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke eserese metụtara ya nke ukwuu
Ihe osise ya na mgbasa ozi na-adabere n'echiche nke mbugharị na ọdịbendị
Ihe osise aghọwo ihe mbụ ya, Amanze na-akọwa ya dị ka 'nke na-emegharị onwe ya mgbe niile'
N'agbanyeghị na ọ na-arụ ọrụ ya na ndị na-ahụ maka ihe dị iche iche, ihe ndị ọ na-eme ugbu a na-adabere na eserese, ihe kachasị amasị ya kemgbe ọ bụ nwata
Ọ bụ naanị na kọleji ka ọ hapụrụ eserese, kama ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na nka nke foto na akwa
N'ịbụ onye imewe ákwà, foto, ibipụta akwụkwọ na ụlọ na-emetụta, ọrụ ya na-egosi mbugharị ọdịbendị, nchekasị, na njirimara, nke sitere na mkpali ya 'ncheta ya nke Naịjirịa
Ọrụ ndị a na-enyocha echiche nke mbugharị na ịdị adị n'etiti ebe, na-akpali mmetụta nke agụụ ụlọ na agụụ
Ruby Oinyinyechi Amanze nwetara Fulbright Fellowship na 2012, ma bụrụ onye natara Fulbright Scholars Award for Teaching / Research na Mahadum Nigeria, Nsukka (2013)
Site na 2015 ruo 2016 Amanze bụ onye sonyere na Opens Sessions na Drawing Center, New York

Amanze bụ onye na-ese ihe na Cooper Union School of Art na New York, NY na 2011, Lower Manhattan Cultural Council site na 2014 ruo 2015, Fountainhead Residency na Miami, Florida na 2015, na Queens Museum na Queens, New York, site na 2016 ruo 2017
Amanze egosipụtala na mba ụwa
Ihe ngosi ya gụnyere
A na-arụ ọrụ ruby onyinyechi amanze na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide gụnyere
Official website
Ruchira Gupta bụ onye nta akụkọ na onye na-eme ihe ike
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Apne Aap, otu nke na-abụghị nke gọọmentị nke na-arụ ọrụ maka ịnweta ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ikpochapụ ịzụ ahịa mmekọahụ
N'oge ọrụ mgbasa ozi ya, ọ na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị, ọgụ ndị agha na ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke India, esemokwu, na nsogbu ndị nta
Ọ na-aga n'ihu na-ede ọtụtụ ihe banyere ịzụ ahịa mmekọahụ na ihe gbasara ikike ụmụ nwanyị maka Open Democracy, Pass Blue, CNN, Times of India, The Hindu, The Guardian, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọ gara United Nations, ebe ya na gọọmentị Iran, Nepal, Thailand, Cambodia, Laos, Vietnam, Myanmar, Indonesia, Kosovo, na Philippines rụkọrọ ọrụ
Ọ kwadoro ụfọdụ n'ime mba ndị a iji mepụta National Action Plans na iwu megide ịzụ ahịa mmadụ
O deela akwụkwọ ntuziaka abụọ banyere ịlụso ịzụ ahịa ọgụ maka ndị mmanye iwu na ndị ọkàiwu, nke otu UNODC na UNIFEM kwadoro
Gupta rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-akpọtụrụ UNICEF n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2000 maka nzukọ mbụ nke ndị ozi udo (Goodwill Ambassadors)
Akwụkwọ ya banyere ịzụ ahịa gụnyere
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ihe nkiri ya, 'The Selling of Innocents', Ruchira hiwere Apne Aap Women Worldwide, ebe ọ jere ozi dị ka Onye isi ala kemgbe 2002

Site n'ọrụ ya na Apne Aap, Gupta enyewo ndị na-enweghị olu olu site n'ịhazi ndị metụtara na ndị lanarịrị site n'ebo ndị a na-akọwa aha (ndị Britain kpọrọ ebo ndị omempụ), ndị tọrọ atọ na ịgba akwụna n'etiti ọgbọ, n'ime ndị otu ikike onwe onye
Site n'òtù ndị a, ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ na-enweta agụmakwụkwọ, ọzụzụ ndụ, nchedo iwu na ụlọ dị mma; ma na-emekwa mkpọsa maka mgbanwe nke iwu India
Nduzi Gupta n'ịhazi ụmụ nwanyị iji mee mkpọsa maka mgbanwe iwu mere ka ịzụ ahịa bụrụ ntaramahụhụ na nke mbụ ya na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke India, site na Iwu Ndezigharị iwu omempụ

Ọrụ ya n'ịhazi ebo ndị ekwuputara emeela ka mpaghara abụọ na-acha uhie uhie na Forbesgunge, Bihar belata site na ụlọ akwụna ịrị asaá na abụọ ruo ụlọ akwụna ịrị na ise, site kwa na ịrị na asaa ruo naanị otu
Gupta na-aga n'ihu ịhụ na ụmụ nwanyị nwere ike ịgbanwe ebe a na-emegbu ha ka ọ bụrụ ebe nchekwa maka agụmakwụkwọ, ọzụzụ ọrụ, ohere ịgbazinye ego na nchedo iwu
Tinyere ndị ọrụ si Apne Aap, Gupta rịọrọ arịrịọ n'aha ndị lanarịrị ịzụ ahịa n'ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke Patna ka ha mee ihe megide ndị na-azụ ahịa ma chebe ndị o metụtara
Na 10 Machị 2013, ụlọ ikpe nyere ọkwa nye gọọmentị Bihar ka ha kọọ akụkọ banyere ihe ndị e mere megide ịzụ ahịa
Apne Aap amaala nrụrụ aka ndị uwe ojii aka ma na-eme mkpọsa maka mgbanwe ndị uwe ojii mgbe e jidere otu onye ọrụ si Nat Denotified Tribe n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi mgbe o kpughere mgbaaka ịzụ ahịa
Apne Aap na-aga n'ihu na-eme mkpọsa maka mgbanwe ndị uwe ojii n'ofe India
Ha rịọkwara National Human Rights Commission of India ka ha maa arụrụala ndị uwe ojii aka megide ndị ọrụ Apne Aap bụ ndị sitere n'ebo ndị a ma ama
Dị ka akụkụ nke ọrụ Gupta na-eme ihe ike, ọ na-ahazi ọgbakọ Survivor Conferences ma na-emepụta Redlight Dispatch, akwụkwọ akụkọ nke ndị metụtara na ndị lanarịrị ịgba akwụna dere
O kwurula okwu na UN General Assembly ugboro abụọ, UN Security Council otu ugboro, na UN Human Rights Council otu ugboro iji kwado iwu na usoro iji kwado ndị na-azụ ahịa mmadu
Onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị, Catharine MacKinnon, zoro aka na ndu ya na mpaghara a n'okwu ya Ịzụ ahịa, Ịgba akwụna na ahaghị nhata

Gupta agbaala akaebe n'ihu ndị omeiwu nke United States, na-akwado maka ngafe nke Iwu Nchedo Ndị Na-ahụ Maka Ịzụ ahịa na ime ihe ike nke afọ 2000 ma soro ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe ike na United Nations maka Protocol UN iji gbochie, mgbochi na Ịhụ Ịzụ ahịa mmadụ
Nke a rụpụtara mgbalị mbụ nke UN iji dozie ọchịchọ maka ịzụ ahịa
Ruchira Gupta enyerela ihe karịrị ụmụ agbọghọ pụkụ ịrị abụọ, ụmụ nwanyị na ndị ezinụlọ ha aka na mpaghara ọkụ na-acha uhie uhie na ime obodo nke India n'ime afọ iri na abụọ gara aga
Nick Kristof gosipụtara ọrụ ya na 21st Century Slavery na New York Times, n'akwụkwọ ya Half the Sky
Lucy Liu eduziela ihe nkiri Meena na Ruchira na-anapụta otu nwa agbọghọ na Bihar dabere na akụkọ Kristof
Gloria Steinem nwere blọọgụ banyere Ọrụ Ruchira na agha megide ire ahụ na bihar na New York Times
Ị nwere ike ikiri mkparịta ụka n'etiti Gloria Steinem na Ruchira na Jaipur Literature Festival na Jenụwarị afọ a

Na mbụ, Ruchira na Hillary Clinton na ndị enyemaka ya rụkọrọ ọrụ maka ngafe nke Iwu Nchedo Ndị Na-azụ ahịa site n'ịgba akaebe na Senate US ma na-atụ aro asụsụ a ga-enyere ndị metụtara na ndị lanarịrị aka n'ụzọ dị mma na n'ezie
Ọ bụ onye otu Global Advisory Council of Vital Voices nke Oriakụ Clinton guzobere

Mgbe e mesịrị, o nyere aka mepụta nkwekọrịta UN nke mbụ iji kwụsị ịzụ ahịa mmekọahụ yana ego ịzụ ahịa maka ndị lanarịrị na United Nations site n'ịgwa nzukọ UN General Assembly n'aha ndị lanarịrị ma were otu ndị lanarịrịnụ kwuo okwu na mgbakọ ukwu UN na New York n'akụkụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu Ban Ki-moon na kọmishọna ukwu maka Ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, Navi Pillai

O mepere ụzọ dị egwu n'ime India maka ndị lanarịrị iji kwupụta echiche ha site n'ịchịkọta olu ha maka ngafe nke ọma nke nkebi nke narị atọ na ịrị asaaIPC India nyere iwu mbụ banyere ịzụ ahịa mgbe e dinara bọs n'ike n'ike na Dec, 2012

Apne Aap amalitela mmekọrịta na-akpali akpali na South-South na-emegide ịzụ ahịa ya na otu NGO na South Africa, USA, France na Nepal site na mbupụ ihe nlereanya ya nke nhazi obodo na maka nwa agbọghọ ikpeazụ'
O kwuola okwu n'ihu ndị omeiwu South Africa, Iceland na French iji tinye usoro siri ike iji gbochie ịzụ ahịa ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ

Ted Talk ya na ihe nkiri PBS, Adventure Divas, na-akọwa otú na ihe mere o ji rute nwa agbọghọ 'nke ikpeazụ' nke dara ogbenye, nwanyị, onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na onye nwere agbụrụ dị ala, agbụrụ a na-eleghara anya nke na-enweghị ike ime mkpebi ọ bụla maka onwe ya - ịlụ di ma ọ bụ ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ, igwu egwu ma ọ bụ inye aka n'ọrụ ụlọ, ịgba akwụna ma ọ bụ ịbụ onye ọrụ ụlọ, ịmụ nwa ma ọ bụ na ọ bụghị
Gupta na-agbasi mbọ ike ịkụziri ọgbọ ọzọ nke ndị na-eme ihe ike banyere omume kachasị mma n'ịlụso ịzụ ahịa ọgụ
N'akụkụ a, o meela modulu banyere nghọta, na idozi, ịzụ ahịa mmadụ maka Indira Gandhi National Open University, New Delhi
Kemgbe afọ 2012, ọ haziri ma kụziere ihe ọmụmụ na New York University's Center for Global Affairs na 'Movement Building around Sex Trafficking'
PRuchira na-akụzikwara ihe ọmụmụ banyere ịgba ohu nke oge a na Mahadum Seton Hall
N'afọ 2009, Gupta bụ onye natara Clinton Global Citizen Award for Commitment to Leadership in Civil Society site na Clinton Foundation, nke Bill Clinton, onye bụbu onye isi ala United States guzobere
N'afọ 2010, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu mmemme ndu nke nzukọ ahụ, nke a maara dị ka CGI Lead
Onye isi ala Clinton mepụtara usoro ihe omume ahụ iji mata ma kụziere ọgbọ ọzọ nke ndị isi ụwa ma kwadebe ha iji dozie ma mee ihe n'ụzọ dị irè n'okwu ndị kachasị mkpa n'ụwa
Ndị isi na-eto eto ahọpụtara site n'ụwa niile gụnyere ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ, ndị ọrụ ọhaneze, ndị ọchụnta ego, na ndị njikwa NGO sitere n'etiti ọha na eze, nkeonwe, na mpaghara obodo
N'afọ 2007, ụlọ ndị nwe ụlọ, nke bụ ụlọ elu nke nzuko omeiwu nke United Kingdom, kwanyere Gupta ugwu nke Abolitionist Award

Gupta nọ ọdụ na Kọmitii Nchịkwa maka Kọmitii Atụmatụ nke Gọọmentị India maka atụmatụ afọ ise nke iri na otu na nke iri na abụọ, otu ugboro maka ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka na otu ugboro maka ọdịmma ọha na eze
Ọ nọkwa na otu na-arụ ọrụ nke Ministry of Women and Children
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na bọọdụ ndụmọdụ nke Asia Society, New York, Cents for Relief, US, Nomi Network, US, Ricky Martin Foundation, na Vital Voices, Washington DC
A na-asọpụrụ Gupta na White House maka ọrụ ya iji lụso ịzụ ahịa mmekọahụ ọgụ

N'afọ 2011, Lucy Liu wepụtara nduzi nke nkeji iri abụọ maka ihe nkiri izizi na ịzụ ahịa mmadụ, Meena, nke na-akọ akụkọ banyere ọrụ nnapụta iji nyere otu nwa agbọghọ aka ịzọpụta nwa ya nwanyị site na usoro ahia mmekọahụ

Nwanne nna ya rere Meena Haseena ka ọ na-azụ ahịa mmekọahụ mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, ihe nkiri a na-egosi njikọ aka ya na Ruchira Gupta na mbọ ha inapụta nwa ya nwanyị n'ụlọ akwụna ọ gbapụrụ onwe ya n'oge na-adịbeghị anya

Ọgụ ya iji zọpụta nwa ya nwanyị Naina, onye a kpọpụrụ n'aka ya mgbe a mụrụ ya, ma manyere ya ịgba akwụna bụ obi nke ihe nkiri a ma dabere na isi nke mbụ nke akwụkwọ Half the Sky, nke Nicholas Kristof na Sheryl WuDunn dere
N'afọ 2012, e gosipụtara Ruchira Gupta na ihe nkiri Half the Sky Turning Oppression into Opportunity for Women Worldwide nke malitere na PBS October 1 na 2
Usoro a na-egosipụta ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ bi na mmegbu ndị ji obi ike na-alụ ọgụ iji maa ya aka
The Half the Sky PBS TV series is produced by Show of Force along with Fugitive Films
Na 25 Septemba 2014, ndị All Ladies League (ALL) na Delhi kwanyeere Ruchira Gupta ùgwù n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị iri atọ na ịse ndị ọzọ na Delhi maka ihe dị iche iche ha rụzuru
ALL bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ nke mba ahụ nke nwere onyinye Grassroots Women of the Decade Achievers Awards
Na 8 Machị 2015, Gupta kwuru okwu isi okwu na Kọmitii NGO na Ọnọdụ Ụmụ nwanyị New York (NGOCSW / NY) Forum na Apollo, iji malite mmalite nke UN CSW 59 Consultation Day

N'echi ya, e nyere ya onyinye NGOCSW / NY Woman of Distinction Award nke afọ 2015 maka mbọ ya na-adịghị agwụ ike iji kwụsị ịzụ ahịa mmekọahụ site n'ime ka njikọ dị n'etiti ịzụ ahịa na iwu ịgba akwụna na-eme ka ndị na-eme iwu gbanwee ụta site n'aka ndị metụtara ya gaa n'aka ndị omekome
O nyekwara aka na ihe nkiri Meena Based On A True Story, Lucy Liu, Colin K
Gray, na Megan Raney, 2011
Paul Okoye (amụrụ na 18 Nọvemba 1981), onye a maara nke ọma dị ka Rudeboy, bụ onye Naịjirịa na-agụ egwu
Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama na 2000s dị ka onye otu P-Square duo ya na ejima ya nwoke bụ Peter Okoye
Paul gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị St
Murumba na Jos, ya na nwanne ya nwoke, Peter nke a makwaara dị ka Mr P
Paul sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ egwu na ihe nkiri ebe ọ malitere ịgba egwu ma na-eme egwu mkpuchi nke MC Hammer, Bobby Brown na Michael Jackson na nwanne ya nwoke Peter mepụtara
Mgbe a gbasasịrị P-Square na 2017, ndị otu egwu abụọ ahụ chọrọ ọrụ egwu dị iche iche
Rudeboy wepụtara egwu izizi ya nke akpọrọ 'Fire Fire' na 'Nkenji Keke' n'afọ 2017
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Fire Department Inc, akara ndekọ ọ guzobere na 2019
Na 22 Machị 2014 Okoye lụrụ Anita Isama, onye ọ zutere na 2004 n'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Abuja
N'afọ 2013, a mụrụ nwa ha nwoke Andre na Atlanta, Georgia, United States
Di na nwunye a nwekwara ụmụ ejima ndị a mụrụ na Atlanta, USA
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2021, nwunye ya gbara akwụkwọ maka ịgba alụkwaghịm n'ihi esemokwu na-enweghị nkwekọrịta ya na ya
Rudnaya Pristan (Russian) Ore Wharf) bụ obodo (selo) dị n'ọnụ Osimiri Rudnaya, n'ụsọ oké osimiri Pacific nke Primorsky Krai
Ọ dị kilomita iri atọ na ise n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Dalnegorsk (nakwa na Primorsky Krai) na ihe dịka kilomita narị ịse na iri na anọ n'ebe ugwu Vladivostok
Ndị bi na ya bụ Puku abụọ na narị na asaa n'afọ 2010, Puku abụọ na narị abụọ na iri asatọ na itoolu n'afọ 2002, na Puku abụọ na narị itoolu na iri anọ na asaa n'afọ 1989
Ịgbaze anwụrụ bụ ụlọ ọrụ bụ isi n'obodo ahụ kemgbe e wuru ụlọ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ n'afọ 1930
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ enyewo ọrụ na-aga n'ihu maka ọtụtụ ezinụlọ ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ kemgbe oge ahụ, mana ọ na-efu nnukwu ego ma maka ahụike nke ndị bi na gburugburu ebe obibi
Ndị bi ebe ahụ na-arịa ọtụtụ nsogbu ahụike, gụnyere oke ọrịa kansa, ala ahụ emetọwokwa nke ukwuu na ihe ndị metụtara isi

N'ihi ya, ụlọ ọrụ Blacksmith kwupụtara Rudnaya Pristan, tinyere Dalnegorsk, otu n'ime ebe iri kachasị emetọ n'ụwa,ọ bụ ezie na Anatoly Lebedev, onye ndú nke ecological NGO BROK, na-arụ ụka na nsonye aka a

N'agbanyeghị ọnọdụ ya dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri, ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Rudnaya Pristan anọgidewo na-emepebeghị emepe, ihu igwe ya dịkwa njọ, nke nnukwu usoro nrụgide Siberia na-achịkwa n'oge oyi na ihe ndị fọdụrụ n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia
Nchikota a na-ebute oke oyi, oyi kpọrọ nkụ nke na-enwekarị oke ifufe, na oge okpomọkụ nke na-enye ọnọdụ dị mma maka ọmụmụ anwụnta
Ruff 'n' Tumble bụ akara ejiji Naijiria nke na-ahụ maka uwe ụmụaka
E guzobere Ruff 'n' Tumble n'afọ 1996 mgbe Adenike Ogunlesi chọrọ pyjama maka ụmụ ya
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ na-eme uwe maka ụmụ nwanyị, o kpebiri ime uwe site n'enyemaka nke nne ya, onye na-emepụta ejiji
Na mbụ, o jiri ihe ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ gụnyere Ankara na Adire
Mmepụta malitere ma mesịa gbasaa ọrụ na ezinụlọ ndị ọzọ Naijiria nwere ụmụaka
Mmepụta uwe (maka ụmụaka site na afọ efu ruo afọ iri na isii), jiri nwayọọ nwayọọ na-aga n'ihu site n'ụlọ ya (na-ere site na buutu nke ụgbọ ala ya) gaa n'ebe dị na Victoria Island, Lagos Steeti
Ruff 'n' Tumble na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ nkwakọba ihe, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, nkesa ma nwee ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ iri ise
Ọ gbatịkwara alaka ya na Surulere na Lagos, na Ikeja, yana, obodo ndị ọzọ dị na Naijiria, gụnyere, Ibadan, Kano na Port Harcourt
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ihe dị ka alaka ụlọ ọrụ iri na ise gafee mba ahụ
Ruff 'n' Tumble nwekwara akara 'Trendsetters' na 'NaijaBoysz' - uwe maka ụmụ okorobịa dị afọ asatọ ruo afọ iri na isii
Ruff 'n' Tumble jikọtara aka na Nigerian Employers Consultative Association (NECA) na Industrial Training Fund (ITF) iji nyere aka belata enweghị ọrụ na mba ahụ

Ruffine Tsiranana (amụrụ na abali iri na ato, na onwa abuo na afo 1939, na Ambohimarina, Mandritsara nwua na ubochi iri abuo na ato nke onwa abuo na ago 2019, na Paris) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Madagascar
Ọ bụ onye otu omebe iwu nke Madagascar maka mpaghara Sofia
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye isi ala Madagascar nwụrụ anwụ, Philibert Tsiranana, na onye bụbu nwanyị mbụ nke Madagascar, Justine Tsiranana

Michael Adebayo Olayinka (amụrụ na 23 Septemba 1999), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Ruger, bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu Afrobeat nke Naijiria
Ruger batara n'ìhè n'afọ 2021 mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ nke D'Prince 'Jonzing world records' na nkwekọ mbipụta na nkesa na Columbia Records, na Sony Music Entertainment, ngalaba UK
Na 4 Machị 2021, ọ wepụtara EP mbụ ya Pandemic
'Bounce', ghọrọ nnukwu egwu sitere na Pandemic EP, wee malite na nọmba nke ịrị atọ na itoolu na chaatị Top 50
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ malitere na ọnụọgụ ịrị abụọ na chaatị TurnTable End of the Year

Na 19 Nọvemba 2021, ọ wepụtara EP nke abụọ ya, nke akpọrọ The Second Wave, ọ bụkwa 'Dior' si na EP ahụ duziri ya, nke ruru ọnụọgụ ịrị atọ na abụọ na chaatị Top 50, na ọnụọgụ ịrị na ise na UK Afrobeats Singles Chart
Michael malitere egwu mgbe ọ dị obere, ọ bụkwa onye otu egwu ụlọ akwụkwọ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma ma bụrụkwa onye otu ukwe chọọchị ya
Ọ malitere ide egwu ma rụọ ọrụ na ihe ngosi na mmemme ụlọ akwụkwọ
Mgbe D'Prince chọpụtara ya, D'Princes n'onwe ya kpọrọ ya 'Ruger'
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2021, D'Prince kwuputara mbinye aka nke Ruger na Jonzing World na Sony Music Entertainment UK, na mmekorita ya na Columbia Records
D'Prince mere ka ọha na eze mara ya, mgbe a tọhapụrụ 'One Shirt', ya na Rema
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2021, ọ wepụtara Ruger, otu aha ya bụ onwe ya na ọrụ EP mbụ ya, nke akpọrọ PANDEMIC
O nwetara nkwado dị ukwuu site na ntọhapụ nke egwuregwu mbụ ya na egwu ya bu 'Bounce', nke ghọrọ nnukwu egwu ya, ma ruo n'ọkwa nke mbụ na Apple Music na Naịjirịa, na mba ndị ọzọ dị n'Afrịka
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2021, ọ wepụtara abụọ egwu nke abụọ ya nke akpọrọ The Second Wave, nke Kukbeats mepụtara
Rui Paes bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-emepụta ihe osise nke amụrụ na Mozambique, bi na UK
Rui Paes bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye na-eme ihe osise nke amụrụ na Pemba, Mozambique, n'afọ 1957
Paes gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta akara ugo mmụta na Painting na 1981 na Escola de Belas Artes do Porto ma nye ya Newcomers Prize na Arús National Exhibition of Modern Art na 1982

Ọ gụsịrị wee nweta Master of Arts na Painting na Royal College of Art, London, na 1988, n'okpuru ohere agụmakwụkwọ n'efu nke sitere n'aka The Gulbenkian Foundation, Lisbon (Portugal) na onyinye sitere na Beal Foundation, Boston (USA)
N'akụkụ ọrụ studio ya, Rui Paes sere ihe osise na mba dị iche iche gburugburu ụwa, nke gụnyere Egypt, Germany, Portugal, Norway, France na United Kingdom
Paes gosipụtara akwụkwọ asatọ, nke gụnyere akwụkwọ ụmụaka Lotsa de Casha nke Madonna bipụtara n'asụsụ ịrị anọ n'ihe karịrị mba otú nari ma rute na Top 10 New York Times Best Seller List

N'agbata afọ 1985 na 1990, afọ ndị onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya na-akpọ oge Brutalist ya, pallet ya ghọrọ ihe a machibidoro iwu, nke a na-ebelata gaa n'ihe na-acha uhie uhie nke mechara too n'ime ihe na-acha Caput Mortuum
Na Britain na US, obere ihe osise ndị a buru ibu na arịa ha dị ka ihe owuwu na ihe mara mma nwetara nkwado nke ndị na-enyere aka na ndị na-anakọta ihe Bruce A
Beal (Boston, Mass), John Studzinski (CBE) na Peter na Maria Kellner
Na Portugal, ndị na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ abụọ gosipụtara nkwado pụrụ iche na nke dị irè Fernando Távora na Eduardo Souto de Moura

N'afọ 2008, Rui Paes bụ Onye Okike, na onye nhazi nke ihe ngosi 'Looking at Picasso - Picasso and Portuguese Art of the 20th Century' nke mere na Portimão na Portugal ma gụnye ihe ngosi nke foto Lee Miller nke akpọrọ 'Lee Miller & Picasso'

'Looking at Picasso - Picasso and Portuguese Art of the 20th Century' ghọrọ ụkpụrụ maka ihe ngosi 'Picasso & Modern British Art' nke mere na Tate Britain na Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art, na 2012
Paes enweela ihe ngosi ịrị na ato n'onwe ya ma sonye n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu
A na-anọchite anya ọrụ ya na Japan, Middle East, Africa, Europe na United States
Rukayya Umar Dawaiya (amụrụ 17 Ọktoba 1985) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Kannywood nke si Kano State Nigeria
Rukayya Umar Dawayya bụ onye amụrụ na 17 October 1985 na Kano
Nna ya bụ onye azumahia si Matazu, Katsina steeti ebe nne ya bụ onye Borno steeti
Dawayya gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na Kano, ebe ọ nwetere asambodo n'asụsụ Arabik na Saudi Arabia
Dawayya nwetakwara diploma na Mass Communication site na Bayero University Kano
Rukayya Umar Dawaiya mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 2000 nke bụ 'Dawayya' nke nwetara ya aha Dawayya
Dika webụsaịtị ya siri kwuo, o metara onwe ya aha site na ihe nkiri Dawayya nke kpalitere ya ka ọ gaba n'ihu n'ime ihe nkiri
Dawayya emela ihe nkiri karịrị otu narị na iri ise na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Hausa
Dawayya bụ onye nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ ụfọdụ n'ime na na mpụga Naijiria
Ọ bụkwa onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nwanyị na-azụ ahịa
Dawayya lụrụ di na 2012 wee gbakwa ya alụkwaghịm na 2014
O nwere nwa nwoke amuru na Mecca Saudi Arabia
Rukiya Kulany Chekamondo (amụrụ na 7 Ọktoba na afo 1965), mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya Rukia Kulany Chenamondo, bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ Minista Steeti maka Privatization na Ministry of Finance, site na June na afo 2006 ruo May na afo 2011
Na ntuli aka nke 27 Mee 2011, e wepụrụ ya na kansụl ma jiri Aston Kajara dochie ya
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu a họpụtara (MP), maka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Kapchorwa District, site na afo 2006 ruo na afo 2011
N'oge ntuli aka mba nke afọ 2011, onye omeiwu nọ ugbu a, Phyllis Chemutai, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwere onwe ya meriri ya
Rukiya Kulany Chekamondo nwetara asambodo Grade III na agụmakwụkwọ, na afo1986, site na Institute of Teacher Education (ITEK), otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ndị jikọtara ọnụ ghọọ Mahadum Kyambogo
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị, na afo 1993, site na ITEK
O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke agụmakwụkwọ na asụsụ Bekee na akwụkwọ Bekee na afo 1999, na Mahadum Makerere, mahadum kachasị ochie na Uganda, nke e guzobere na afo 1922
O nwekwara diplọma postgraduate na Education Planning & Management (1999), na Guidance & Counseling (2001), ma site na ITEK
O nwetara nzere Master of Education na Language Education na English Literature na 2004 na Mahadum Makerere
She has been a teacher since she obtained her first teaching certificate in 1986
Between 1993 and 1995, she served a Matron, at Bilal Islamic Institute, a school in Kampala, Uganda's capital city
She joined politics in 2006, contesting for the Kapchorwa District, Women's Representative Constituency on the National Resistance Movement (NRM), political party ticket
She won, and on 1 June 2006, she was appointed Minister of State for Privatization
During March 2011, she lost her parliamentary seat and during May 2011, she was dropped from the cabinet in a reshuffle
Rukiya Chekamondo lụrụ di
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement
Mmasị ya gụnyere ịgụ, nyocha na nsogbu okike
Rukky Sanda bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
Amụrụ ya Rukayat Akinsanya, na 23 August 1984 na Lagos Steeti
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na 2004 mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Lagos State University wee gaa n'ihu mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2007
Sanda bụ nwa nwanne nna onye n'eme ma na-emepụta ihe nkiri nke aha ya bụ Bolanle Ninalowo
Ọchịchị nke Iwu na Ọrụ Esemokwu Ndị Agha (RULAC Project) bụ ụzọ atụmatụ nke Geneva Academy of International Humanitarian Law and Human Rights iji kwado itinye na mmejuputa iwu mba ụwa nke agha
Site na nchekwa data zuru ụwa ọnụ na nyocha, RULAC Ihe oru ngo nwere ebumnuche ya nyocha nke mmejuputa iwu nke iwu na-emetụta agha agha
Ọrụ ahụ ga-emesị kpuchie mba niile so na United Nations na ndị sonyere na Mgbakọ Geneva yana okirikiri ébé ndị a na-asọmpi, ma ha nọ n'ọnọdụ agha ma ọ bụ na ha anọghị
N'ezie, a ghaghị itinye ụfọdụ iwu mba ụwa n'ọrụ n'oge udo ma ọ bụ dị mkpa n'ọnọdụ esemokwu, ọkachasị ndị metụtara mmegbu nke mpụ mba ụwa
Ná ntinye, iwu gbasara ọgụ megide iyi ọha egwu, nke ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ahụ ga-ekpuchikwa, na-emetụta steeti ndị na-anọghị n'ọnọdụ agha
E kewara ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ahụ ụzọ atọ

Ebe obibi ahụ na-enye obere nkọwa nke iwu kwesịrị ekwesị ma na-edozi isi okwu iwu na mpaghara ahụ, dịka ọmụmaatụ iru eru iwu nke esemokwu ma ọ bụ itinye iwu mba ụwa n'ọrụ na ndị agha na-abụghị nke steeti
Ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ahụ na-enyezi maka mba ọ bụla ederede na akwụkwọ ndị dị mkpa na-ahụ maka usoro iwu mba na mba ụwa (iwu mba na iwu ikpe, mkpebi nke òtù gọọmentị, nkwekọrịta, wdg)
N'ikpeazụ, ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ahụ na-enye nyocha iwu nke, n'otu aka, na-eme ka esemokwu ahụ ruo eruo n'okpuru iwu enyemaka mba ụwa ma n'aka nke ọzọ, na-ekpebi iwu kwesịrị ekwesị
Akụkụ a nke ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ahụ, n'ezie nke kachasị dị nro n'okwu ikpe na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, bụ kpọmkwem na Ihe oru ngo RULAC
Ọrụ RULAC kwesịrị igosiputa na ọ bụ isi iyi dị oké ọnụ ahịa nke ozi banyere ndị ọrụ gọọmentị, ndị nta akụkọ na ọtụtụ ebe maka onye ọ bụla nwere mmasị na nkwanye ùgwù nke iwu n'agha
E degharịrị Mgbakọ Geneva atọ edeburu nà mbụ, gbasaa, ma dochie ya, tinyekwara nke anọ, n'ime afọ 1949
Rumanatu Tahiru (amụrụ na abalị anọ, na afọ1984) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na 2007 FIFA Women's World Cup
Na klọb ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Athleta Ladies na Ghana
Rumbi Katedza bụ onye Zimbabwe na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye nduzi nke amụrụ na 17 Jenụwarị 1974
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na Harare, Zimbabwe
Katedza gụsịrị akwụkwọ wee nwetaa nzere Bachelor of Arts na Bekee na Mahadum McGill, Canada na 1995
N'afọ 2008, Katedza natara Chevening Scholarship nke mere ka ọ nwee ike ịga n'ihu na ọmụmụ ihe nkiri
O nwekwara MA na Filmmaking na Goldsmiths College, London University
Katedza nwere ahụmịhe na Mmepụta ihe nkiri na TV, iduzi, ide yana imepụta na igosi ihe ngosi redio
Site na 1994 ruo 2000, O mepụtara ma gosipụta ihe ngosi redio na nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị, Arts na Culture, Hip Hop na Acid Jazz maka CKUT (Montreal) na ZBC Radio 3 (Zimbabwe)
Site n'afọ 2004 ruo n'afọ 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ihe nkiri nke Zimbabwe International Film Festival
Mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ, ọ mepụtara Postcards from Zimbabwe Series N'afọ 2008, Katedza hiwere Mai Jai Films ma mepụta ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri telivishọn n'okpuru akara nke bụ
Ọrụ mbụ ya gụnyere
Rumbi Katedza bụ onye nkuzi oge ụfọdụ na Mahadum nke Zimbabwe, na ngalaba nke Theatre Arts
Ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe na onye nlekota na National Arts Merit Awards, na-ahụ maka nlekota ihe nkiri ọhụrụ na ihe nkiri TV n'afọ niile na nnọchite nke National Arts Council of Zimbabwe
Ọ gbakwara gọọmentị Zimbabwe ume ka ha kwado ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri
Rumelyana Boncheva Stefanova (Bulgarian Румеляна Бончева; amụrụ na 25 Eprel 1957 na Varna) bụ onye Bulgaria bụbu onye na akwọ ụgbọ mmiri nke sonyere na 1980 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Rumuodara bụ obodo dị na mpaghara nke Steeti Rivers, Nigeria
Mpaghara obodo ya mepere emepe na ebe ndị dị nso na Rumuodara gụnyere Umudara, Mgbuesilara, Mpakurche na Alionahi
A na-akpọkwa Rumuodara otu obere obodo
Ọ bụ otu n'ime obodo ndị dị na Obio Akpor Local Government Area dị na Steeti Rivers
Rumuodara nwere ebe etiti nke a na-akpọ uzo mkpi Rumuodaro
Njikọ a bụ ebe dị nso na ọtụtụ ebe ndị ọzọ gbara gburugburu ebe ahụ nke Rumuodara
Njikọ a nwere ike iduga n'ebe ndị dị ka Artillery Road, Eliozu, eliowhani, Eneka, Tank, Eleme na ndị ọzọ
Rumuola bụ obodo dị na mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo Obio-Akpor, nke Steeti Rivers, Nigeria
Ọ bụ otu n'ime obodo ndị na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Port Harcourt, na-anabata azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche
Ọ bụ na Rumuola ka ogige ntụrụndụ Port Harcourt Pleasure, nke bụ oghere ntụgharị ọha na eze na ebe ndị njem nleta na Port Harcourt dị
Rumyana Kostova (Bulgarian; amụrụ na 26 Machị 1962) bụ onye Bulgaria na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị asatọ na 1980 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Rumyana Neykova (Bulgarian; amụrụ na 6 Eprel 1973 na Sofia) bụ onye Bulgaria na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri

Neykova sonyere na 1992 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ 1996 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ, 2000 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ ebe ọ meriri ọlaọcha na Single Sculls, 2004 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ ebe ọ meriri bronze na 2008 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ, mgbe ọ meriri gold n'otu ọzụzụ ahụ
Onye nkuzi ya ugbu a bụ di ya Svilen Neykov
N'afọ 2002, o setịpụrụ oge kachasị mma n'ụwa nke 7 07 41 na 21 Septemba na Seville ESP ma kpọọ ya onye egwuregwu Bulgarian nke Afọ, yana FISA Nwanyị na-akwọ ụgbọ nke afọ
Neykova etinyela aka n'ịkwọ ụgbọ mmiri kemgbe 1985, mgbe ọ malitere ọzụzụ na CSKA Sofia zụrụ Verka Aleksieva
N'afọ 1989, ọ bụ onye na esote onye mmeri ụwa, merie aha ahụ n'afọ 1990
Mgbe ọtụtụ mgbalị na enweghị isi na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na anọ, ọ gbanwere Otu ihe ọkpụkpụ wee merie nrite mbụ ya na 1999 Asọmpi mba ụwa na Canada
O nwere utu aha ụwa abụọ na ọzụzụ ahụ, na Sevilla 2002 na Milan 2003, yana ịbụ onye nke abụọ n'ụwa na 2007 na Gifu
Na 2000 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ na Sydney, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka Ekaterina Karsten nke Belarus merie ya n'ọkwa Olimpik site na foto, n'ihe a hụrụ na Bulgaria dị ka mkpebi ndị ọkàikpe na ese okwu
Mgbe egwuregwu Olimpik gasịrị, ọ lara ezumike otu afọ, na amụ nwa ya nwoke Emil onye gbasoro nzọụkwụ nne na nna ya wee ghọọ onye na akwọ ụgbọ mmiri na aga nke ọma
Na Athens Olimpik na 2004, ọ mechara nke atọ na Otu ihe ọkpụkpụ n'azụ Katrin Rutschow-Stomporowski nke Germany na Karsten
Na asọmpi ụwa nke afọ 2005, ọ gbakwara asọmpi na Ụkwụ abụọ, na abịa nke abụọ ya na Miglena Markova

Neykova mechara merie n'asọmpi Olimpik mbụ ya na 2008 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ na Beijing, na eti Michelle Guerette nke United States yana onye mmegide ya ruo otu afọ Karsten iji nweta ihe nrite ọla edo na 16 Ọgọst
Site na aha ya na Beijing, Neykova nwere nchịkọta zuru ezu nke ihe nrite Olimpik ọlaọcha, ọla nchara na ọla edo

Rungiah aka Rungia ma ọ bụ Rungia Raju bụ onye na-ese ihe osise botanical nke India na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, nke a maara maka ịmepụta ọtụtụ ihe oyiyi maka akwụkwọ Robert Wight banyere osisi India
Ezinụlọ Raju bụ ndị na-ese ihe nke Kshatriya nke Tanjore, ma sitere na mpaghara Telugu na steeti Andhra Pradesh
Robert Wight malitere ọrụ na India na 1819 dị ka osote dọkịta na-awa ahụ mbụ ma mesịa bụrụ dọkịta zuru oke nke 33rd Regiment of Bengal Native Infantry na ọrụ East India Ụlọ ọrụ
Mmasị ya na botany pụtara ìhè nke mere na a kpọfere ya na Madras ma tinye ya n'ọrụ nlekọta nke Botanic Ubi n'ebe ahụ, mgbe e mesịrị were ọnọdụ nke onye na-ahụ maka okike na East India Ụlọ ọrụ
Ibu nyere onye na-ese ihe Rungiah ọrụ site n'ihe dị ka 1826 ruo n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 1845, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị o jiri onye ọzọ na-ese onyinyo, Govindoo, ma eleghị anya site n'otu agbụrụ ahụ

Ibu ji nkà ndị na-ese ihe kpọrọ ihe nke ukwuu, ma, n'ụzọ a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'oge ahụ, nyere ha otuto n'akwụkwọ nke ọrụ ha, nke gụnyere mpịakọta isii 'Icones Plantarum Indiae Orientalis' (1838ī53), ọrụ abụọ na-acha aka, mpịakọ abụọ, 'Illustrations of Indian Botany' (1838ː50) na 'Spicilegium Neilgherrense' (1845ī51)
N'ụzọ dị ịrịba ama, 711 n'ime efere mbụ ha ka dị n'ọbá akwụkwọ nke Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh

Nathaniel Wallich bipụtakwara ihe osise nke Rungiah (lee Gardneria ovata na ibe a) (na 1832, ọ kpọrọ ụdị Rungia na Acanthaceae, nke na-abụghị na nsọpụrụ Rungiah, mana mgbe Friedlieb Ferdinand Runge (1794-1867), prọfesọ German nke kemịkalụ nyocha na Mahadum Breslau)

Douglas Jack Agu (amụrụ ya na 19 Ọgụstụ 1989), nke amara aha ya dịka Runtown, bụ onye Naịjirịa na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe
Amụrụ Runtown na abalị iri-na iteghete nke ọnwa itolu nke 1989 n’Enugwu mana o tolitere na abuja na Legọọsụ, ebe ya guru praịmarị
Mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị, ya na nne ya kwagara Abuja, onye na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ozi ahuike
Na 2014 o weputara ' Gallardo ', egwu nke gosiputara olu Davido ma puta dika egwu mbụ na abọm Ghetto University nke izizi ya
Gallardo gara n'ihu merie 'Mmekọrịta Kacha Mma nke Afọ' na mbipụta 2014 nke Nigeria Entertainment Awards
Na 23 November 2015, Runtown wepụtara studiyo abọm izizi ya akpọrọ University Ghetto site na MTN Music Plus ya na Eric Many Entertainment
Abọm a nwetara ihe karịrị nde iri atọ na ise na ọnụ ụzọ egwu wee si otú a nweta ya na ndepụta nke 'Top 5 Most Streamed Artist'
Na 4 Nọvemba 2016, Runtown wepụtara 'Mad Over You', nke edepụtara na nọmba 38 na chaatị Twitter nke egwu ọkaibe
Joey Akan si Pulse Nigeria kọwara egwu a dịka 'egwu emere onwe ya nke na - adọta ihe sitere na ụda ndị Ghana bụ kay Alkayida'
Runtown gwara The Fader magazine na egwu a sitere na mma nke Afrịka
Na 2014, e nwere akụkọ na mgbasa ozi na Runtown dere ' Aye '
Na mkparịta ụka ya na Nigerian Tribune, Runtown kwuru, 'Ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-ajụ m ajụjụ a
Davido enweela ọtụtụ ajụjụ ọnụ ebe o kwuru etu egwu a siri bido
Yabụ ọ bụrụ n'ịchọrọ ịmatakwu gbasara Aye jụọ David ma ọ bụ gụọ ajụjụ ọnụ ya '
N’ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 2020, O wepụtara egwu nke abụọ ya kemgbe ọrịa na-efe efe nke “Kini Issue”
Egwu a sitere na ọba egwu ya na-abịanụ akpọghị aha ugbu a
Nkwekorita Runtown na Eric Manny Entertainment gwụchara na Juunu 2018
O mechara malite lebeelụ ya bụ, 'Soundgod Music Group'
Ngagharị iwe #EndSars
N'ọnwa Ọktọba 2020, Runtown na otu ndị ọzọ ama ama bu ụzọ na ngagharị iwe #Endsars na Legọọsụ, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa, ka gọọmentị kwụsị njedebe obi ọjọọ ndị uwe ojii
Rupee bụ ego nke Seychelles
A na-ekewa ya na 100 cents
N'asụsụ Seychellois Creole (Seselwa), a na-akpọ ya roupi na roupie na French
Koodu ISO bụ SCR
A na-eji mkpirisi SR eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ maka ọdịiche
Site na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ, Seychelles bụ mba kachasị nta nwere iwu ego onwe ya
A na-akpọkwa ọtụtụ ego ndị ọzọ rupee
Kansụl Iwu Britain nyere ikike iguzobe Board of Commissioners of Currency site na Paper Currency Ordinance nke 1914, nke C
O'Brien, Gọvanọ nke Colony nke Seychelles, wepụtara na 10 Ọgọst 1914
N'afọ 1914, gọọmentị wepụtara mbipụta mberede nke ihe ndekọ maka 50c, Re
5/- na Rs
A malitere ịnye akwụkwọ ndekọ ọkọlọtọ na 1918, na akwụkwọ ndekọ maka 50c na Re
1/-, sochiri Rs
10/- na Rs
E wepụtara akwụkwọ 50c na Re
1/- ruo 1951 ma wepụ ya maka mkpụrụ ego
A malitere iwebata mkpụrụ ego Rs
20/- na Rs
100/- na 1968, ebe e ji mkpụrụ ego dochie mkpụrụ ego Rs 5/- na 1972
N'afọ 1976, ndị Seychelles Monetary Authority weghaara mmepụta nke ego akwụkwọ, na-enye akwụkwọ maka Rs
Usoro a gosipụtara Onye isi ala mbụ nke Seychelles, Sir James Mancham ma dochie akwụkwọ ozi niile e nyere tupu nnwere onwe
N'afọ 1979, e nwere redesign, na-egosipụta isiokwu nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na nke ọgbara ọhụrụ nke na-echetara ọchịchị René
Central Bank of Seychelles weputara usoro a mgbe ọ weghaara ọrụ zuru oke n'otu afọ ahụ
N'afọ 1989, e webatara usoro ọhụrụ nwere atụmatụ nchebe na agba ka mma
N'afọ 1998, e webatara usoro nkà na ụzụ ọzọ dị elu nke nwere ihe bara uru karị, nke ergonomic
Na June 7, 2011, Central Bank of Seychelles wepụtara ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ Rs
100/- na Rs
500/- nwere atụmatụ nchebe ka mma
Nke ọ bụla n'ime akwụkwọ ego atọ ahụ nwere patch holographic kama ịbụ azụ mmiri foil nke na-apụta ugbu a na ndetu
Nkwado nchebe ndị ọzọ gụnyere eriri nchebe fluorescent 25-mm n'obosara na ihe edeturu Rs
50/- , eriri nchebe na-agbanwe agbanwe na 25-mm na ihe ededetu Rs
100/- , na eriri nchebe 3-mm n'ogologo na-agbanwere agba na ihe edete Rs
Teknụzụ Gemini pụrụ iche nke De La Rue na-echebekwa ndetu ndị ahụ nke na-enwu n'okpuru ọkụ ultraviolet mana ọ na-apụta nke ọma n'ehihie
E degharịala atụmatụ agba nke ndetu ndị ahụ, na ndetu na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, ọbara ọbara na oroma, n'otu n'otu, karịa ndetu a na-ekesa ugbu a
Ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ ahụ na-enwekwa afọ obibi akwụkwọ, yana mbinye aka nke Pierre Laporte, gọvanọ ụlọ akụ ahụ ugbu a
Ihe edeturu dị ugbu a ka bụ ego iwu kwadoro ma wepụ ya na mgbasa ozi ka ha na-agwụ ike
Na Disemba 2016, Central Bank of Seychelles wepụtara usoro akwụkwọ ego ọhụrụ iji mee ncheta afọ 40 nke nnwere onwe SeychellesÀtụ Exchange Rate

Ruqayyah Ahmed Rufa'i (amụrụ na 1958) bụ onye ahọpụtara dika Minista nke agụmakwụkwọ n'afọ 2010 mgbe deputị onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathankwupụtara ndị ya na ha ga-arụkọ ọrụ
A mụrụ Rufai na Ringim na Jigawa Steetị, Ọ nwetara digịri na nzere mastas ya na mmụta ihe mere eme na Mahadum Bayero, Kano na 1981 na 1987
PhD na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum West Virginia, US, na 1991
Ọ bụ Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka Ahụike n'ọchịchị Gen
Sani Abacha site na 1993 ruo 1996
A bulitere ya na prọfesọ na 2003, ma jee ozi dịka kọmishọna nke agụmakwụkwọ na sayensị na teknụzụ na Jigawa Steetị

O kwuru na ihere na-eme ya mgbe ọ bụla o chere maka ihe gbasara agụmakwụkwọ nke ụmụazi nwanyị na Jigawa Steetị, ọ na-esiri ya ike ịkọwa ihe kpatara ndị gọọmentị steeti ya enweghị ike idebanye aha ụmụazi ahụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ mere iwu na ụmụaka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị agahi eji ekwentị mkpanaaka n'ihi ọ na-adọpụ ha uche

N’etiti nsogbu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na pati na-achị bụ People Democratic Party (PDP) ebe ndị gọvanọ asaa, gụnyere Sule Lamido nke Jigawa Steeti, na ọtụtụ ndị sinetọ na ndị otu nnochite anya ndị omeiwu kewasịrị New PDP, onye isi ala bụ Goodluck Ebele Jonathan wepụrụ ndị minista itoolu n’ọkwa ha

Ruqayyat so na ndị minista nsogbu ahụ metụtara

Rushdy Said Bughdady Abaza (Arabic) (3 August 1926 - 27 July 1980) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn
A na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Ijipt
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa ụbụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 53
A mụrụ Rushdy Abaza na Sharqia, Egypt, nna onye Ijipt, Said Abaza, nke sitere n'otu n'ime ezinụlọ ndị a ma ama n'Ijipt, ezinụlọ Abaza
Rushdy gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Collège Saint Marc na Alexandria
Site n'akụkụ nna ya, o nwere ụmụnne nwanyị atọ, Ragaa, Mounira, Zeinab na otu nwanne nwoke, Fekri (onye na-eme ihe nkiri)
Site n'akụkụ nne ya, o nwere otu nwanne nne, Hamed
Naanị nwa ya bụ nwa nwanyị, Qismat (Eismat)
Ọ pụtara na ihe karịrị 100 ihe nkiri site n'afọ 1948 ruo 1980; afọ ọ nwụrụ
Rushern 'Rush' Baker IV (amụrụ na Septemba 10, 1987) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé gàrà aga màkà Maryland House of Delegates iji nọchite anya District 22 na Prince George's County
A mụrụ Baker na Washington, DC na Septemba 10, 1987 na Prince George's County Executive Rushern L
Baker, III na ónyé bụbu Christa Beverly
Mgbè ọ dị afọ anọ, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Cheverly, Maryland
Baker gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze Prince George's County ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Suitland High School na Forestville, Maryland

O nwetara nzere Bachelor of Fine Arts site na Cooper Union na 2009 na Master of Fine Arts na itinye uche na eserese / óbìbì akwụkwọ site na Mahadum Yale na 2012, ebe enyere ya Elizabeth Canfield Hicks Award maka ihe ịga nke ọma dị ịrịba ama na eserese ma ọ bụ eserese site na okike
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Yale, Baker laghachiri na Prince George's County
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya nke ọrụ ya nwèrè mmetụta dị ukwuu na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, a kọwakwara ya dị ka 'onye edemede Octavia Butlerz Afrofuturist, ọkachasị Parable of the Sower'
N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya n'afọ 2013, o kwuru na ihe osise m chọrọ ka okwu gbasara iwu, ọkachasị iwu mba ọzọ
Ọrụ Baker apụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na Maryland, DC, New York, Connecticut, California, North Carolina, Dubai, na Japan, ọ bụkwa ónyé nkụzi na Mahadum Maryland ugbu a na eserese na imewe abụọ
Baker na-ahazi mmemme nka mkpanaka maka ndị ntorobịa na-akwado n'oge gara aga
Ọ bụbu ónyé na-ese ihe na 39th Street Gallery, akụkụ nke The Gateway Arts Center na Brentwood, Maryland

N'ịtụle ihe ngosi ya kachasị ọhụrụ na 2019 na Washington, DC's Hemphill Fine Arts, ónyé na-enyocha nka kwusiri ike na 'Bakerńs ike na nke na-enweghị isi na-akpali nchegbu dịgasị iche iche, site na ihe ize ndụ nke ibi ndụ mgbè ónyé ojii na ohere na-agbasawanye ego na mgbasa nke eziokwu ndị ọzọ na teknụzụ ngwá ọrụ'
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2022, Baker weghaara ọkwa ónyé njikwa mkpọsa nke nna ya dịka gọvanọ mgbè ónyé njikwa mgbasa ozi ya gàrà aga, Andrew Mallinoff, kwụsịrị
