Rusk bụ biskit siri ike, kpọrọ nkụ ma ọ bụ achịcha e siri esi ugboro abụọ
A na-eji ya eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka ihe na-eme ka ụmụ ọhụrụ
Na ụfọdụ, a na-eji achicha eme rusk, kama achịcha a na-akpọ nke a mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka achicha rusk
Na UK, aha ahụ na-ezo aka na ihe mgbakwunye nri sitere na ọka wit
A na-akpọ Rusk sukhary (Azerbaijani - okwu mgbazinye site na Russian site na Persian) na Azerbaijani
A na-ejikarị achịcha na achịcha eme ya (ma ọ bụghị mgbe niile)
Na Baku, ụfọdụ ebe a na-eme achịcha na-eji achịcha na achịcha ha eme rusks
Ọnụahịa rusk na ụlọ achịcha ndị ahụ na-adịkarị ala, ebe ụlọ achịcha na-eme nke a iji zere ịla achịcha na achịcha fọdụrụ
Sponge rusk yiri biscotti mana a na-eme ya site na achịcha na-acha odo odo a na-akpọ ugboro abụọ
A na-eme achịcha na-acha odo odo n'ime achịcha dị larịị, nke nwere akụkụ anọ
Mgbe emechara ya ma mee ka ọ jụọ oyi, a na-etinye ya n'ime eriri ma sie ya ọzọ ma ọ bụ sie ya ka ọ bụrụ achịcha
A na-eri karị ya na kọfị na mba Cuban (Cuban espresso) ma ọ bụ dị ka ihe na-eso ice cream, custard, ma ọ bụ nri ndị ọzọ
Tvebak sitere na Dutch tweebak (nke pụtara n'ụzọ nkịtị 'ọkụ abụọ'), otu okwu ochie nke enwere ike okpo beschuit
Biscotte bụ ụdị rusk na asụsụ French
A na-ere ha n'ime nnukwu ụlọ ahịa
A na-akpọ ụdị rusk nke Finnish korppu, ọ na-abụkarị achịcha a mịrị amị, nke e ji sinamọn na shuga mee ka ọ dị ụtọ
Korppu bụ achịcha kọfị a na-ahụkarị, nke a na-eri mgbe etinye ya na kọfị
Ụdị ilu, nke a na-akpọ hapankorppu, bụ ihe dị larịị nke e ji ntụ ọka rye na nnu mee, e nwèrè ike iri ya dị ka achịcha siri ike
Zwieback (nke pụtara 'e mere ugboro abụọ') bụ ụdị rusk na Germany
Dị ka okwu Danish na French, aha ahụ na-ezo aka n'ịkpọ ma ọ bụ sie ya ugboro abụọ
Okwu paximadi (Grik παξιμάδι) na-ekpuchi ụdị dị iche iche nke rusk Grik, nke a na-ejikarị ọka bali ma ọ bụ ntụ ọka chickpea eme, ma jiri mmanya, mmiri, ma mmanụ mee ka ọ dị nro tupu iri nri
Paximadi bụ ntọala nke Cretan snack dakos (Grik )
Na India rusk (ma ọ bụ biskit a na-akpọ toast) bụ achịcha ma ọ bụ achịcha a mịrị amị
A makwara ya dị ka papay, rattan, khasta (Hindi), russ ma ọ bụ 'cake rusk' na Hindi, Punjabi ma ọ bụ 'porai' n'asụsụ Tamil na Urdu ma ọ bụ kathi biskut na Bengali
A na-erikarị ya n'oge tii na tii mmiri ara ehi nke na-eme ka rusk dị nro
A na-eji achịcha na-atọ ụtọ 'cake rusk' eme ihe nke ihe ndị mejupụtara ya gụnyere ntụ ọka ọka wit, ihe uto, abụba, ihe na-eko achịcha, na, nhọrọ, àkwá
A na-akpọ achịcha a na-eme achịcha ugboro abụọ na Indonesia 'bagelen', nke a kwenyere na ọ sitere na Bagelen, obodo dị na Central Java
Tupu achịcha nke abụọ, a na-etinye shuga na buttercream na achịcha ahụ
A na-erikarị ya dị ka nri na-atọ ụtọ
Na Iran, a na-akpọ rusk nān-e sokhāri (Persian نان سوخاری)
A na-eme ya site na ntụ ọka ọka wit, ihe ụtọ, ntụ mmiri ara ehi, mmanụ akwụkwọ nri, gluten, ihe na-ewepụta malt, ntụ ọka soy, nnu, yist, na mmiri
A na-eri ya dị ka biskit na-agba mmiri, ọkachasị na chai (tea) nke ndị Peshia
Ụdị naan sukhaari a na-ahụkarị bụ Vitana
Na Ịtali, a na-akpọ ụdị a fette biscottate
E kwesịghị ịgbagwoju ya anya na biscotti (mkịkọ ma ọ bụ biskit a na-eme ugboro abụọ)
Ndị Ịtali nwere cantucci, biskit dị ka biskit almọnd a na-eme ugboro abụọ
Ihe ọzọ, ọ bụ ezie na cantucci siri ike ma sie ike dị ka nsụgharị South Africa, ndị Ịtali na-ekwusi ike na a na-etinye ha n'ime mmiri ma ghara itinye ha n'ụba dị ka rusks
Ha na-eme ka ọ dị mma na cappuccino, mmanya na-atọ ụtọ ma ọ bụ grappa
Na Japan, rusk na-abụkarị nri dị ụtọ nke e ji baguette, achicha ma ọ bụ croissant mee
Ọ na-atọkarị ụtọ
Na Levant a na-akpọ ụdị a boksum (Arabic بقصم) na Iraq na Siria ma ọ bụ qurshalla (Arabic) na Jọdan na mpaghara Palestine
A na-eme ya site na ntụ ọka, àkwá, mmanụ ma ọ bụ bọta, shuga, yist ma ọ bụ ntụ ntụ, na mgbe ụfọdụ obere cardamon
A na-etinye mkpụrụ sesame e siri esi, mkpụrụ caraway ojii, ma ọ bụ anise n'elu ya, ma rie ya dị ka biskit, ọkachasị na tii ahịhịa
A na-eme Beschuiten site na ibu ụzọ sie achịcha dị larịị (beschuitbol), belata ya n'etiti, wee sie ọkara ọ bụla ọzọ, na-emekarị na okpomọkụ dị ala
Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mgbe niile ka a na-ere ya na mpịakọta; mpịakọ nwere 13 rusks (otu onye na-eme achịcha iri na abụọ)

Site na etymologically, biscotto (narị afọ nke iri na isii nke Italian), biscuit (narị narị afọ nke iri n'afọ nke iri na itoolu, site na narị afọ nke isii nke bisket) na beschuit sitere na okwu Latin (panis) bis-coctus, (achịcha, esi ugboro abụọ)
Na Norway, a na-akpọ rusk kavring, ọ dịkwa ka skorpor nke Sweden
A na-eji kavring a kụrisịrị akụrisị, nke a na-akpọ strøkavring, n'etiti ihe ndị ọzọ, eme ihe maka ime kjøttkaker na n'ihe oriri oriri ọdịnala tilsl adịghị anogide bondepiker
A na-agbukwa Kavring ma nwee ike iji mmiri ara ehi, nke na-esi ísì ụtọ ma ọ bụ nke a kụrụ akụ na ụba
Na Pakistan, a na-akpọ Rusk Russ (Urdu رس)

Ọ bụ nri ụtụtụ a ma ama ma na-erikarị ya na tii mmiri ara ehi
A na-akpọ ya papay (Shahmukhi) na Punjabi
A na-akpọ nsụgharị Philippine nke rusk biscocho
A na-akpọ achịcha achịcha mamon tostado
A na-akpọ nsụgharị Portuguese nke rusk tosta

A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe ma jiri ya mee ihe dị ka iberibe achịcha
A na-akpọ nsụgharị Russian sukhar' (Cyrillic сухарь) site na 'dry' - 'dry'

A na-eme ha nke ugboro abụọ site na achịcha dị ụtọ dị ka challah, nke a na-ebipụ n'ụdị biscotti ma ọ bụ jiri achịcha ochie fọdụrụ mee ya, bepụ ya n'ime obere cubes ma kpọọ ya ma ọ bụ sie ya na okpomọkụ dị ala
Nke mbụ dị ka kuki, nke enwere ike iji mmiri ara ehi, kefir, tii, kọfị ma ọ bụ koko
A na-agbakwunye nke abụọ na ofe, ma ọ bụ n'ụzọ ọzọ, na-eme ka ọ dị nro site na mmiri na-amị ma soro ya kama achịcha
Ọ ghọrọ omenala izere ịla achịcha fọdụrụnụ n'iyi nke bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na nri ndị Russia
E nwere ọtụtụ akụkọ ọdịnala banyere achịcha n'asụsụ Russian, na-akwanyere nri ọka a ùgwù nke bụ otu n'ime isi nkuku nke ndụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mba Slavic
Rye bread rusks bụ isi ihe na-eme Russian Kvass, ihe ọṅụṅụ ọdịnala a na-agbanye agbanye
Rusks bụ okwu anglicized maka beskuit ma bụrụ nri ụtụtụ omenala Afrikaner ma ọ bụ snack
A mịrị ha na South Africa kemgbe ngwụcha afọ 1690 dị ka ụzọ isi chekwaa achịcha, ọkachasị mgbe ị na-aga ogologo oge na-enweghị friji
Ojiji ha gara n'ihu site na Great Trek na Boer Wars ruo n'oge a
A na-etinye rusks na kọfị ma ọ bụ tii tupu a rie ya
Rusks bụ ọka achịcha a na-eme achịcha ugboro abụọ
A na-etinye ntụ ọka gburugburu n'ime pans ma sie ya dị ka achịcha, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a na-ebibi ma ọ bụ kụwaa ogologo ma jiri nwayọọ nwayọọ sie ya ka ọ bụrụ ihe kpọrọ nkụ
Ọtụtụ nsụgharị nke oge a, nke a na-emepụta n'ìgwè dị, akara a ma ama bụ Ouma Rusks
Ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na-eme achịcha, delis, na ụlọ ọrụ na'ụlọ na-ere rusks azụmahịa, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-eme ya site na ihe ndị na-abụghị omenala, dị ka ntụ ntụ kama ịbụ sourdough
Na mgbakwunye na ụtọ mmiri ara ehi dị mfe na buttermilk, aniseed, wholewheat, mmiri ara ehi, muesli, na ụdị mkpụrụ osisi lemon poppy dịkwa
N'ụlọ ndị ọzọ dị na South Africa, a na-enye ọbụna rusks dị ka nri ndị ọbịa
Mgbe ndị ọbịa gachara, a na-enye ha efere Rusks, ọ bụ ezie na n'ụlọ ụfọdụ karịsịa Ndebele, ha ekwenyeghị n'inye ndị ọbịa ha nri, ha na-enye naanị efere, ma ọ bụrụ na enweghị scones gburugburu
Nke a bụ omenala n'ọtụtụ ụlọ
A na-ejikarị iko tii ma ọ bụ kọfị na-ejikọta rusks
Ndị Afrikaners na-enwekwa nri ụtụtụ, ọtụtụ ndị South Africa na-enwe ha n'ihe dịka oge ọ bụla n'ụbọchị dị ka nri
A na-enwekwa obi ụtọ na Rusks n'ụzọ dị iche iche
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, n'ihi na ha bụ biskit siri ike, omenala bụ ịtinye rusks na tii / kọfị ha tupu ịta ha, ọ bụ ezie na nke ahụ nwere nsonaazụ ụfọdụ, dị ka iberibe na ala iko ahụ
Rusks bụ omenala dị n'anya nye ọtụtụ ndị South Africa
A mara Rusks na Sweden ọ dịkarịa ala kemgbe narị afọ nke iri na isii
Rusks bụ ihe oriri na ndị agha na ụgbọ mmiri
N'oge ahụ, a pụrụ iji hama kụrisịa ha ma tinye ihe ndị ahụ na svagdricka, biya na ofe
N'asụsụ Turkish, a na-akpọ rusk peksimet
'Pek' na-anọchite anya ihe siri ike, siri ike, ma ọ bụ na-adịgide adịgide na Turkish na 'simet/simit' bụ okwu Arabic [سميد] nke pụtara achịcha, ma ọ dị ka ntụ ọka
Aha ọzọ bụ galeta, okwu mgbazinye sitere na Catalan

Nye ndị Britain, butcher rusk bụ biskit kpọrọ nkụ nke e kewara n'ime ụmụ irighiri ihe, nke a na-ahazi site na nha ụmụ irighari ma ree ndị butchers na ndị ọzọ maka iji ya mee ihe dị ka ihe mgbakwunye nri na mmepụta sausage
Ọ bụ ezie na e ji achịcha ochie mee ya, nke a na-akpọ ugbu a 'bread-rusk', a na-ejikarị ụdị ihe iko achịcha na-enweghị ihe iko achịchụ a na-eme ya ugbu a
A na-eji ụdị dị iche iche eme ihe na ụlọ ọrụ nri, ebe ojiji gụnyere
Na mba UK, Farley's Rusks bụ biskit kpọrọ nkụ nke malitere na afọ 1880 ha, mana Heinz mepụtara ya kemgbe afọ 1994
A na-enyekarị ụmụ ọhụrụ ha, ma ọ bụ tinye ha na mmiri ara ehi ma sie ha ma ọ bụ n'ụdị siri ike mbụ ha dị ka ihe enyemaka ezé
N'afọ 2006, a tụrụ egwu nke na-adịte aka mgbe a chọpụtara na ụfọdụ Farley's Rusks nwere akara nke weedkiller chlorpropham
A chetara ngwaahịa ndị ahụ metụtara ma chọta mmetọ ahụ na ụyọkọ ntụ ọka eji eme ihe n'oge usoro nrụpụta
Ọnọdụ mmetu ahụ erughị oke iji were ya dịka ihe ize ndụ ahụike
Na US, ụdị rusk a na-ahụkarị na-agụnye melba toast na croutons, nke a na-ere n'ụlọ ahịa nri, na biscotti, nke a hụrụ na ụlọ ahịa nri na ụlọ ahịa kọfị
Àtụ South African cuisine
Ruspolia bụ ụdị osisi na-agbasa okooko nke ezinụlọ Acanthaceae
Ụdị ahịhịa ma ọ bụ ahịhịhịa
A na-ahazi akwụkwọ ndị ahụ n'ụzọ megidere, ha nwere cystoliths a na-ahụ anya
Okooko osisi ndị ahụ dị na spikes ma ọ bụ panicles, ma ọ bụ na 3-7-fifuru, cymules gbakọtara n'ime ogologo raceme-dị ka cymes
Okooko osisi ahụ nwere bracts na bracteoles (obere bracts) nke dị warara ma ghara ịhụ anya
Calyx nke okooko osisi nwere lobes ise nke miri emi, nwere oghere, ma ọ bụ linear-lanceolate ma ọ bụ filiform (dị ka eriri) lobes
Mgbe ụfọdụ na ntụziaka yiri eriri
Corolla-tube bụ nke dị warara, na ogologo ma dị n'ahịrị
A na-ekewa ya na 5 subequal lobes, nke na-agbasa ma ọ bụ na-egosipụta
Corolla (petals nke okooko osisi) na-adịkarị uhie, mana ọ nwere ike ịbụ salmon-pink, scarlet ma ọ bụ oroma-red
Ha nwekwara ntutu na mgbe ụfọdụ glandular, n'èzí
Ọ nwere 2 stamens nke a na-eme ka ọ dị elu (nke a na-atụle karịa corolla-tube)
Ha nwere anthers nke nwere 1-cell
Ovary nwere mkpụrụ ndụ abụọ na mkpụrụ ndụ abụọ n'ime mkpụrụ ndụ ọ bụla ma ọ bụ loculus
Nke pụtara na ọ nwere mkpụrụ 2-4
Ọ nwere ụdị filiform (dị ka eriri)
Mkpụrụ osisi ma ọ bụ mkpụrụ osisi capsule dị ka osisi, nwere akụkụ siri ike dị ka ogwe osisi
N'ime capsule, mkpụrụ ahụ dị nro ma na-acha ọcha ma ọ bụ chọọ ya mma n'ụzọ dị iche iche
Ha dị na retinaculas dị ka nko (fiber dị arọ), na-enweghị ntutu hygroscopic
Ọ nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ chromosome nke 2n=21
Ebe a mụrụ ya bụ Tropical Afrika, ndịda Afrika na Madagascar

A na-ahụ ya na Angola, Botswana, Cameroon, Central African Republic, Chad, Ethiopia, Ghana, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Kenya, Malawi, Mali, Mozambique, Nigeria, Senegal, Sierra Leone, Somalia, South Afrika (na KwaZulu-Natal na Northern Provinces) Sudan, Tanzania, Togo, Uganda, Zambia, Zaire na Zimbabwe
Ala dị ala na ala dị n'etiti, ọhịa na oké ọhịa kpọrọ nkụ
Aha ụdị nke Ruspolia bụ iji sọpụrụ Eugenio Ruspoli (1866[]), onye nchọpụta na onye na-ahụ maka ihe okike n'Itali
A kọwara ya na mbụ ma bipụta ya na HGAEngler & KAEPrantl, Nat
Pflanzenfam Mpịakọta nke 4 (Mbipụta nke 3b) na peeji nke 354 na 1895
Ngalaba Ọrụ Ugbo nke United States na Ọrụ Nnyocha Ọrụ Ugbo nabatara ụdị ahụ na 23 Jenụwarị 2009, mana ha edeghị ụdị ọ bụla a maara
Dị ka Kew si kwuo Àtụ Linked species listGRIN na-anabata naanị Ruspolia hypocrateriformis (Vahl) Milne-Redh
na Ruspolia seticalyx (C
Clarke) Milne -Redh
Ebe ndị ọzọ na-ekwu na e nwere ihe ruru ụdị 6 Flora nke Zimbabwe na-ekwu ụdị 5 na Africa na Madagascar, (3 n'ime Zimbabwe Ruspolia australis, Ruspolia decurrens na Ruspolia seticalyx)
A na-eji Ruspolia hypocrateriformis (ma ọ bụ 'Red Ruspolia'), eme ihe dị ka osisi dị n'ubi na South Afrika na Namibia
Russell T
Gordon (ubochí ato n'ọnwa Julaị 1936 rụo ọnwa Nọvemba 2013) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ
Ọ kwagara Montreal n'afọ 1973 ebe ọ bụ prọfesọ nleta mgbè ahụ ónyé otu ngalaba na Mahadum Concordia rụo mgbè ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 1998
A mụrụ Gordon na Philadelphia n'afọ 1936
Ọ natara BFA na Mahadum Temple na 1962, MS na Mahadụ Wisconsin na 1966 na MFA na Machị Wisconsin na 1967
Ka Gordon malitere ọrụ kọleji ya, o mèrè atụmatụ ịmụ mgbakọ na mwepụ mgbe ọ na-egwu basketball na agụmakwụkwọ, mana o mechara gbanwee isi ya na nka tupu ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ
Gordon gbara bọọlụ bọọlụ n'ụzọ ọkachamara n'oge dị mkpirikpi tupu ọ lekwasị ányá n'ọrụ nka ya

Gordon nwèrè ọtụtụ ọkwa na agụmakwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ gụnyere dị ka ónyé enyemaka Prọfesọ na Mahadum California-Berkeley (1969), osote Prọfesor na Mills College na Oakland, CA (197475), osote prọfesọ n' Mahadum Concordia, Montreal, Canada (1975), ónyé nkụzi nleta na San Francisco Art Institute (1969), na ọkwa na Mahadụ Saskatchewan, Saskatoon Canada (1984), Lakeside Studio, Michigan (1986, 1988) Mahadum East Carolina, North Carolina (1989)
A na-anọchite ányá ọrụ Gordon n'ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie na nchịkọta onwé ónyé
O nwere ihe na Smithsonian American Art Museum, Fine Arts Museum nke San Francisco, Musée national des beaux-arts du Québec na Block Museum of Art na Mahadum Northwestern

Pobeda (asụ̀sụ̀ Russia Победа, pụrụ kà 'Mmeri') bụ̀ otù nà àtọ ǹke ikpeàzụ bụrụ okeụgbọagha ùdì-Peresvet b'ụzọ̀-dreadnought ǹkè ha rụ̀rụ̀ màkà òtùaghammiri nchịezèdi Russia nà m̀bìbì nnarịafọ̀ ìrin'ìtoolu
H'e dòrò ụgbọ ahụ̀ nà ibeụ̀sụ̀agha àbàdị Èke m̀gbè ha rụfụ̀tàrà ya, nà ọ bìtọ̀rọ̀ nà otu Arthur si nà afọ̀ 1903
M̀gbè agha Russia nà Japan ǹkè 1904–1905, ọ mètàrà je agha â, nà ọ̀gụ̀ otu Arthur nà Ehèrè Ògùrù
M̀gbe o mèrè zọpụ̀ tà nà oke mgbaji si ọ̀gụ̀ ndị â, ha ji ọkụegbè lukpù Pobeda nà mbaraọ̀gụ̀ otu Arthur, ya ème ndị Japan à zọpụ̀tà ya tinye ya nà umere òkpurù ahà Suwo (周防)
Ndị Japan mazị ya okpì, tikwazị ya ọsụ, ya ème òtùaghammiri nchịezèdi Japan (IJN) è doròwaria Suwo kà ụgbọ nchedo ìkperemmiri nà afọ̀ 1908 ya à gbara kà ụgbọ nzụzụ nà ọ̀tụ́tụ́ ógè
Ọ bụ̀rụ̀ ụgbọisi ibeụ̀sụ̀agha Japan ǹke gárá ọ̀gụ̀ ǹkè Tsingtao nà mbido Agha Ụ̀wà I, ya à gazie òtù ahụ̀ rùo m̀gbè ọ pụ̀rụ̀ kà ụgbọ nzụzụ egbè nà afọ̀ 1917
Ụgbọ â bìrì ị ji okpì nà afọ̀ 1922 kà ya nà ndiri edemkpezu òtùaghammiri Washington kwere, nà ọ dị kà h'e tikàrà ya n'ibè ogè ahụ̀
Àtụ Campaignbox Post-Soviet conflictsAgha Russo-Ukrainian[lower-alpha 4] na-aga n'ihu n'etiti Russia (n'akụkụ ndị nkewa Russia na Ukraine) na Ukraine kemgbe February 2014
E lekwasịrị anya na ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Crimea na Donbas, bụ ndị a na-amata na mba ụwa dịka akụkụ nke Ukraine

Mbanye n'ime mpaghara Ukraine kwụsịrị na Russia na-achịkọta Crimea, obere oge ka nke ahụ gasịrị site na mmalite nke agha Donbas n'etiti ndị agha Russia na-akwado Russia na ndị agha steeti Ukraine; ọgụ maka afọ asatọ mbụ nke ọgụ ahụ gụnyekwara ihe ndị mere n'ụgbọ mmiri, agha cyber, na esemokwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ka njọ
N'ime afọ 2021, esemokwu abụọ bilitere n'ihi mkpọlite ​​ndị agha Russia gbara gburugburu ókèala Ukraine, na na 24 February 2022, esemokwu ahụ hụrụ nnukwu mmụba ka Russia wakporo Ukraine ọzọ
Ruth Achieng bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
A họpụtara ya, mana ọ dịghị mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka, Minista Steeti maka Azụmaahịa na Cabinet nke Uganda n'afọ 6 June 2016, na-anọchi Zerubabel Nyiira
Ruth Achieng jere ozi na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke 9 (2011 ruo afọ 2016) dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị nke Kole District tupu e merie ya na ntuli aka nke afọ 2016
E wepụrụ aha ya na nkeji ikpeazụ ma kọmitii nhọpụta ndị omeiwu enyochaghị ya, nke mere ka a ghara iyi ya n'ụbọchị 22 June 2016
Ruth Margaret Adler née Oppenheimer (1 Ọktoba 1944 - 18 Febụwarị 1994) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị, onye na-eme mkpọsa maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na onye na-akwado ọdịmma ụmụaka
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Amnesty International na Scotland dịka onye ọrụ mbụ ha na Scotland n'afọ 1991
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Scottish Women's Aid n'afọ 1974, onye otu Lothian Region Children's Panel ma nyere aka guzobe Scottish Child Law Centre
Nne na nna Ruth bụ Charlotte na Rudolf Oppenheimer si Germany bịa Britain dịka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ n'afọ ndị 1930
A mụrụ Ruth na Devon, ebe nna ya nọ n'oge agha
Ọ gụrụ nkà ihe ọmụma, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na akụ na ụba na Somerville College, Oxford na MA na nkà ihe ọmụma na Mahadum London

Ya na di ya na ụmụ ya kwagara Scotland n'afọ ndị 1960 wee bụrụ onye nkuzi oge na Ngalaba Nkà Ihe Ọmụma nke Mahadum Edinburgh ruo ọtụtụ afọ tupu ya enweta PhD ọzọ na Iwu na-eweta thesis 'Rights, interests and reasoning in juvenile justice'
Onye nlekọta ya bụ Neil MacCormick nwere mmetụta n'ebe ọ nọ

Adler na-asụ asụsụ abụọ na Bekee na German ma, mgbe ọ nwetasịrị PhD ya, ya na MacCormck jikọrọ aka n'ịsụgharị ọtụtụ akwụkwọ site n'aka ndị ọkà ọmụma Czech (Ota Weinberger) na German (Robert Alexy, Guenter Teubner) site na German gaa na Bekee
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na The Scottish Child Law Centre, o nyere aka mepụta nchekwa data zuru oke mbụ nke iwu ụmụaka na Scotland
Ọ bụ onye majie na onye ọka ikpe nke udo
Site n'afọ 1987 ruo 1991 ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka nyocha mkpesa megide ndị ọka iwu dị ka onye enyemaka Lay Observer maka Scotland
Dịka onye ama ama n'obodo ndị Juu nke Edinburgh ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Edinburgh Star
na odeakwụkwọ na onye isi oche (1998) nke Edinburgh Jewish Literary Society
Ruth Bosibori Nyangau (nke a na-akpọkwa Ruth Bisibori; amụrụ na ọnwa Jenụwarị 2, na afọ 1988 na Bosiango) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ n'etiti etiti nke bụ ọkachamara na 3000 mita steeplechase
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2007 ọ ghọrọ onye mmeri mbụ nke All-Africa Games na ihe omume ahụ, dịka emere ya na nke mbụ ya
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'otu afọ ahụ, ọ mechara nke anọ na World Championships na oge ndekọ ụwa nke 9 2525 nkeji
Ihe ndekọ ochie ahụ bụ 9 3070 ma bụrụ nke Melissa Rollison
Na afo 2008 African Championships in Athletics ọ mechara nke atọ
A mụrụ Bosibori n'obodo Bosiango dị nso na Kisii
Ọ malitere ịgba ọsọ na afọ 2003 mgbe ọ nọ na Kebirichi Secondary School
Ndị uwe ojii Kenya kpọrọ ya mgbe ọ meriri asọmpi mpaghara n'afọ 2007
A na-eji ya eme asọmpi ụkwụ ọtọ
O meriri na Most Promising Sportswoman of the Year category na afọ 2007 Kenyan Sports Personality of the Year awards
Dan Muchoki zụrụ ya ruo n'afọ 2007, mgbe onye nkuzi Ịtali Renato Canova malitere iso ya, mgbe ọ gara n'okpuru nlekọta Gianni Demadonna
N'afọ 2009, ọ meziwanyere ihe kachasị mma ya ruo 9 1316, na-emeri na 2009 IAAF World Athletics Final site na sekọnd asaa
N'afọ 2010, ọ mụrụ nwa ya nwanyị Glory (na Septemba)
Ọ chọrọ ịlaghachi na ngwụcha afọ 2011, na-ele anya na Olympic Games na afọ 2012 na London
Ruth Chepng'etich, nke a na-akpọkarị Ruth ChepNgetich, (amụrụ n'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1994) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ, onye na-asọ mpi na marathon na ihe omume ndị ọzọ dị anya
Ọ bụ onye mmeri Marathon World nke 2019
Chepng'etitch kacha mma bụ nke anọ n'oge niile n'ụwa
O nwere akara nke atọ kachasị ọsọ n'oge niile maka ọkara marathon
N'afọ 2018, Ruth Chepng'etich meriri naanị asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị n'okporo ụzọ na 40th Istanbul Marathon (World Athletics Label Road Race)

Ọ gbara ọsọ 2 18 35 (31 59 10 km, 48 15 15 km, 1 08 22 Half marathon, 1 37 42 30 km), ihe ndekọ ọsọ, arụmọrụ kachasị mma n'ala Turkey, na oge nke asaa kachasị mma n'akụkọ ihe mere eme, na-aghọ onye na-eme egwuregwu nke iri n'oge niile ịga n'okpuru 2 19 na nke iri atọ n'okpuru 2 20
Na 20th Dubai Marathon, Chepng'etich mere emume mmeri n'oge a na-emebi ihe ndekọ nke awa 2, nkeji 17 na sekọnd 8
Ọ gbara ọsọ nke iri abụọ kachasị ọsọ nke oge niile na Bahrain Night Half Marathon na oge nke 66m 9s
Chepng'etich nwetara oge ahụ nke iri na abụọ kachasị ọsọ Half marathon nke oge niile na Vodafone Istanbul Half Marathon na 65m 30s clocking
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Septemba, ọ meriri n'asọmpi World Athletics nke 2019 na Doha, Qatar, na-agba 2 3243 mgbe ọ malitere n'etiti abalị
Ihe nrite ọlaọcha ahụ gara Rose Chelimo na-anọchite anya Bahrain na 2 33 46 na ọla nchara nye Helalia Johannes dị afọ 39 nke Namibia na 2 34 15
Oge Chepng'etich bụ oge mmeri nke mmeri nke ụwa kachasị nwayọ ruo ugbu a
Nke abụọ kachasị nwayọ mere na 2007 mgbe Catherine Ndereba meriri na 2 3037 na Osaka
Naanị mmadụ iri anọ n'ime mmadụ iri isii na asatọ bidoro asọmpi ahụ na Doha
N'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, ọ mechara nke atọ na London Marathon
Na 4 Eprel 2021, Chepng'etich setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ ụwa nke 1 04 02 na Istanbul Half Marathon na Turkey, na-ewe 29 sekọnd site na nke kachasị mma nke Ababel Yeshaneh setịpụrụ na 2020
N'abalị iri n'ọnwa Ọktoba, ọ meriri Chicago Marathon na oge nke 2 22 31
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Machị, Chepng'etich weputara oge nke abụọ kachasị ọsọ nke ụmụ nwanyị iji merie Nagoya Women's Marathon na Japan (World Athletics Elite Platinum Label)
Ọ gbara ọsọ nkewa 2 17 18 (69 03/68 15), nke bụkwa oge nke asaa kachasị ọsọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme, na n'ụzọ doro anya, ihe ndekọ, nyere ya 87 sekọnd nke mmeri
O meriri $ 250,000, nke bụ nnukwu ihe nrite gọọmentị na ọkachamara na-agba ọsọ ruo n'oge ahụ
Ruth Clement Bond (May 22, 1904 - October 24, 2005) bụ ónyé nkụzi Africa-America, onye ndú ọbọdọ na ónyé na-ese ihe
Dị ka onye nkuzi, Bond kụziri na mahadum dị na Haiti, Liberia na Malawi
Ọ bụ onye isi African-American Women's Association ma n'oge ọrụ ya na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka na USA, Afghanistan, Ivory Coast, Senegal, Sierra Leone, Togo na Tunisia
Dị ka onye na-ese ihe, Ruth bụ onye a ma ama maka ibuli ihe eji eme ihe n'ime ọrụ avant-garde nke nkọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Atọ dị otú ahụ na-anọgide site n'oge okike a na 1930s
E gosipụtara akwa ndị ahụ na Museum of Arts and Design na New York na Michigan State University Museum
A mụrụ Ruth Elizabeth Clement na Louisville, Kentucky na Mée 22, 1904, nye George Clinton Clement, bishọp na African Methodist Episcopal Zion Church, na Emma Clarissa Williams Clement
Ọ bụ nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụ asaá
N'afọ 1931, Clement lụrụ Dr
Max Bond Sr ónyé ya na ya mụrụ ụmụ atọ ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Jane Bond Howard, onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ J
Max bond Jr, na ónyé na-ahụ maka ụmụ mmadụ George Clement Bond
Nwa nwanne ha bụ Julian Bond, ónyé nhazi nke SNCC
Bonds kwagara Los Angeles obéré ógè ka ha lụchara
Ka ọ na-erule 1934, ha bi ma na-arụ ọrụ n'ime ime obodo Alabama
Mgbè di ya sonyeere ndị ọrụ mba ọzọ na 1944 ruo ọgwụgwụ nke ndụ ya, Ruth gara ọtụtụ mba, ọkachasị mba ndị dị n'Africa ma ọ bụ ndị nwere ihe nketa Africa
Bond gara Livingstone College (nke nne na nna ya abụọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ), mana ọ nwetara nzèrè bachelors na masters na Bekee na Mahadum Northwestern
Ruth malitere mmemme doctoral na Los Angeles nke ọ hapụrụ mgbè amuchara nwa mbụ ya
O bu n'obi imecha ọmụmụ doctorate ya mgbe ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara n'ime ime Obodo Alabama, mana enweghị mahadum dị n'ógbè ahụ iji debanye aha
Site na 1930 ruo 1932, Bond bụ onyeisi óche nke ngalaba Bekee na Kentucky State College
N'oge ọrụ ya, Bond kụziri na mahadum dị na Haiti, Liberia na Malawi
Mgbe ọ bi na Alabama maka ọrụ di ya, Bond nyeere ndị bụbu ndị na-ekere òkè aka n'ime ọbọdọ ndị kewara ekewa na akụ na ụba ụlọ na mmezi
N'afọ 1944, Max nabatara ọrụ na United States Department of State, Bonds wee gaa Haiti, ébé Ruth jere ozi na ngalaba nke L'Ecole Normale de Martissant
N'afọ 1950, e zigara ha na Liberia, ebe Max ga-eje ozi dị ka ónyé isi óche nke Mahadum Liberia, Ruth wee bụrụ onye isi ngalaba Bekee nke Mahadụ ahụ
N'afọ 1950 na mmalite afọ 1960, e zigara ha Afghanistan, Tunisia, Sierra Leone, na Nyasaland
Mgbè Max lara ezumike nká na 1966, Bonds laghachiri na United States wee biri na Washington, DC, ebe ha abụọ malitere itinye aka na nsogbu obodo
N'ime afọ 1960, Ruth jere ozi dị ka ónyé isi oche nke African-American Women's Association
N'afọ 1978, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ọrụ nchọpụta eziokwu nke National Council of Negro Women duziri iji mụọ ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị na Senegal, Togo, na Ivory Coast
Ha abụọ sonyere na Africa-America Institute, nke nwanne Max bụ Horace Mann Bond guzobere
Na DC, Ruth nọ na bọọdụ nke Boys and Girls Club nke Washington, YMCA, na Red Cross, ọ bụkwa ónyé otu na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Foreign Service Women's Association
Ruth E
Edwards, ónyé a na-akpọ Ruth·ology, bụ ónyé na-ese akwụkwọ, onye nkụzi na ónyé guzobere Books in Black, otu ndị na-eme akwụkwọ n'Afrịka
A mụrụ Ruth E
Edwards na New York
Ọ nwetara ákàrá ugo mmụta na azụmaahịa na Mahadum Pace
N'afọ 1998, mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka ónyé nchịkwa maka nnukwu ụlọ akụ New York, a matara Edwards na nka akwụkwọ aka
Ọ gàrà ọmụmụ ịgba chaa chaa dị iche iche na Center for Book Arts na New York City iji mụta ọrụ ahụ
Edwards ga-emesị rụọ ọrụ na Center for Book Arts Board of Directors site na 2001 ruo 2004

Edwards na-emepụta ma na-ebipụta akwụkwọ ndị omenkà pụrụ iche na nke a kpaara ókè nke ihe dị ichè ichè dị ka accordion, obere, otu mpempe akwụkwọ dị peeji asatọ, pop-up, akwụkwọ mpịakọta, na kpakpando ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ carousel n'okpuru aha Ruth·ology
Ọrụ Edwards, Black Rodeo, gụnyere na ihe ngosi Minnesota Center for Book Arts 2007 nke Amos Paul Kennedy haziri

Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara akwụkwọ pụrụ ichè site n'aka ndị omenkà irí abụọ na atọ gụnyere Ben Blout, Dindga McCannon, Clarissa Sligh, Danny Tisdale, Trenton Doyle Hancock, Kara Walker, na Bisa Washington
Ihe ngosi ahụ bụ ihe ngosi mbụ bụrụ ibu nke akwụkwọ ndị Africa na America
Ruth G
Waddy (January 7, 1909 May 24, 2003) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ, ónyé na'eme ihe, na onye nchịkọta akụkọ, nke bi na Los Angeles
A mụrụ Willanna Ruth Gilliam na Lincoln, Nebraska na 1909, ma zụlite ya na Minneapolis, Minnesota, nwa nwanyị nke John Moses Gilliam na Willie Anna Choran Gilliam
Ọ bìrì nso na Minneapolis Musem of Art, nke bụ mmeghe mbụ ya na ụwa nka
Nna ya rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere nri n'ụgbọ okporo ígwè; ọ nwụrụ mgbe Ruth dị afọ iri na atọ
Ọ gàrà Mahadum Minnesota iji zụọ màkà nkụzi, mana ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ na Chicago, iji nyere aka kwado ezinụlọ ya n'oge Nsogbụ
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ya na nwa ya nwanyị kwagara Los Angeles, California ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-arụ ọrụ na Douglas Aircraft Corporation
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ obodo, ebe otu n'ime ndị ọrụ ibe ya bụ onye na-ese ihe Noah Purifoy
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ maka Los Angeles County, a chọpụtara na Waddy nwere epilepsy
Nke a kpaliri ya ịla ezumike nká n'oge
Otú ọ dị, ọ ghọtara na ọ ga-enwe ógè ugbu a iji mezuo ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ọ tụrụ anya ime otu ụbọchị
Otu n'ime ihe ndị ahụ bụ ebumnuche ịmụta nka
Ọrụdy nọ n'afọ iri ise mgbè ọ tụgharịrị gaa n'ọrụ nka, ọkachasị dị ka ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ linocut
N'afọ 1962, Waddy guzobere Art West Associated, iji chịkọta ma kwado ọbọdọ ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka na Los Angeles
Njikọ ahụ kwadoro ọrụ ọbọdọ na ndị ntorobịa nke mere ka a mara màkà nka ojii n'ógbè ahụ ma kwado maka ndị na-ese ihe ojii na-enweghị ike inweta ihe ngosi nka
Ụfọdụ ndị ama ama sonyere gụnyere Raymond Lark, Samella Lewis, John Riddle, na Alonzo Davis

Waddy gụrụ akwụkwọ nwa ógè na Otis Art Institute, nke a na-akpọzi Otis College of Art and Design na 1965, n'afọ sochirinụ ọ gara Soviet Union maka ihe ngosi nke nka Africa-America, nke enyi Chicago, Margaret Burroughs haziri
Ọzọkwa na 1966, ọrụ ya bụ akụkụ nke 'The Negro in American Art,' ihe ngosi na-agagharị agagharị nke California Arts Commission kwadoro
Ruth Gilliam lụrụ ma gbaa William H
Waddy alụkwaghịm na 1930s; ha nwere otu nwa nwanyị, Marianna (Mgbè e mesịrị Maryom Ana Al-Wadi)
Ruth G
Waddy nwụrụ na 2003, mgbè ọ dị afọ 94, na San Francisco, California
Akwụkwọ ya dị na Amistad Research Center, Mahadum Tulane
E gosipụtara akwụkwọ eserese nke bụbu nke Waddy na 2013 ezinụlọ nka nka na-akwado site na Los Angeles County Museum of Art na Los Angeles Public Library
Ruth Gilliam lụrụ ma gbaa William H
Waddy alụkwaghịm na 1930s; ha nwèrè otu nwá nwanyị, Marianna (mgbè e mesịrị Maryom Ana Al-Wadi)
Ruth G
Waddy nwụrụ na 2003, mgbè ọ dị afọ 94, na San Francisco, California
Akwụkwọ ya dị na Amistad Research Center, Mahadum Tulane
E gosipụtara akwụkwọ eserese nke bụbu nke Waddy na 2013 ezinụlọ nka nka na-akwado site na Los Angeles County Museum of Art na Los Angeles Public Library
Ruth Gilliam lụrụ ma gbaa William H
Waddy alụkwaghịm na 1930s; ha nwere otu nwa nwanyị, Marianna (mgbè e mesịrị Maryom Ana Al-Wadi)
Ruth G
Waddy nwụrụ na 2003, mgbè ọ dị afọ 94, na San Francisco, California
Akwụkwọ ya dị na Amistad Research Center, Mahadum Tulane
E gosipụtara akwụkwọ eserese nke bụbu nke Waddy na 2013 ezinụlọ nka nka na-akwado site na Los Angeles County Museum of Art na Los Angeles Public Library
Waddy kwuru n'otu ógè 'Ma eleghị anya ọ bụrụ na m malitere dị ka ndị ọgbọ m mere, m ga-enwe mmasị karịa na mmata
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ọ dị m mkpa ikwu ihe m na-eche n'olu dara ụda, n'agbanyeghị ma ónyé ọ bụla ọzọ nụrụ m
' Nke ahụ bụ kpọmkwem ihe o mèrè
A nụrụ olu ya, na-akpali ndị ọzọ ime mgbanwe n'agbanyeghị afọ ha
Enyemaka Waddy nyere na nka ndị Africa America na nkwado màkà ndị na-ese ihe ndị Africa America ahapụla akara ọ bụghị naanị na America, kamakwa n'ụwa niile

Ruth Inge Hardison (February 3, 1914 March 23, 2016) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ese foto, nke a maara karịsịa màkà bust ya nke afọ 1960 (ma ọ bụ ihe osise) nke akpọrọ 'Negro Giants in History'
Nchịkọta ya nke afọ 1983 nke akpọrọ 'Our Folks', nke gosipụtara ihe osise nke ndị mmadụ kwa ụbọchị, bụkwa ihe ama ama
Ihe osise Hardison na-emepụta na-agba gbụrụ-gbúrụ ihe osise ojii nke akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọ na-enwekwa mmasị karịsịa n'ịmepụta olu ndị a na-ekwughị okwu nke oge ndị Africa America gara aga
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị nọ na Black Academy of Arts and Letters (BAAL), otu na-agba ume ka a mara ihe ndị isi ojii rụzuru, mgbè e guzobere nzukọ a na 1969
A mụrụ ya na Portsmouth, Virginia na 1914
Ezinụlọ ya mechara kwaga Brooklyn, New York
Tupu ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ ya, Hardison rụrụ ọrụ na Broadway Productions nke George Abbott's 'Sweet River' na 'Country Wife', n'ihu Ruth Gordon
N'oge obérè ọrụ ya na ihe nkírí, ọ malitere ịkpụ ihe dị ka ihe ntụrụndụ
Mgbè o sonyere na mmepụta 'What a Life' nke afọ, o mepụtara ihe ọkpụkpụ nke ndị na-eme ya, nke e mesịrị gosipụta na Mansfield Theatre
Dị ka nwa agbọghọ, ọ gụrụ egwu na édémédé okike na Vassar College
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Art Students League nke New York na Mahadum Tennessee State
Matthew Henson
Norbert Rillieux
Lewis Latimer
Granville Woods
Garrett Morgan
Frederick McKinley Jones
Daniel Hale Williams
Charles Richard Drew
N'ahịa, ihe ọkpụkpụ ya enwetawo ihe karịrị $ 1300 nke ọ bụla
N'afọ 1990, Gọvanọ New York Mario Cuomo nyèrè Nelson Mandela ihe osise Hardison nke 1990 nke Sojourner Truth n'aha ndị New York State

N'ịtụgharị uche n'ọrụ ya, Hardison kwuru n'otu oge, sị 'N'oge ogologo ndụ m, enwere m obi ụtọ iji ụzọ dị iche iche mee ka ihe dị mkpà nke ahụmịhe m wee nwee ike ịkekọrịta màkà ihe ọma ha nwèrè ike ime na ndụ ndị ọzọ'
Ruth Kadiri bụ Nigerian actress, screenwriter nakwa film producer
A mụrụ Ruth Kadiri n'ụbọchị ọnwa Machị dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchi iri abụọ na anọ n'afọ , na Benin City, Edo State, Nigeria
O gụrụ maka mass communication na University of Lagos ma gụkwa maka business administrationna Yaba College of Technology
Kadiri sonyere otu Nollywood mgbe o mere ihe nkiri akpọrọ Boys Cot kemgbe ahụ o meela ihe fim karịrị iri ise
Dika onye edere ederede,ihe nkiri o deela ma gbakọ aka so dee nkiri ndị a Matt Arising, Heart of a Fighter, Ladies Men, Trueness, First Class nakwa over the Edge
Ruth jikwa ego ya kwado ihe nkiri akpọrọ Matters Arising, Over the Edge, Somebody Lied na Memory Lane, nke metụtara okwu ụgha na deceit
Ruth Modupe Lawanson (amụrụ Septemba 27, 1963 na Naijiria) bụ onye isi koochi otu egwuregwu volleybọl nke Mahadum Nevada
Ọ gbara maka Fresno State na ndị otu egwurewgu mba United States, nweta otu ọla nchara na 1992
Lawanson gbaara otu egwuregwu nke Fresno State, akpọọrọ ya aha MVP n'afo 1982, 1983,na 1984
N'afo 1984, ọ duru ndị Bulldogs gaa ebe nke ise na asọmpi NCAA, akpọrọ ya aha NorPac onye na-agba bọl kacha mma
A kpọkwara ya 1984-85 nwaanyị ọgba volleybọl kacha mma na Fresno state maka afọ 1984 na '85
Lawanson bụ nwaanyị egwuregwu mbụ lara akara zumike nká mgbe ọ ka nọ na-ụlo akwukwo
Ọ sonye na-otu ndị egwurewgu Fresno state na asopụrụ
Lawanson gbaara ndị otu mba US afọ anọ
O meriri nrite ọla nchara na asọmpi mba ụwa nke 1990, na 1991, na olimpik nke1992
Lawanson gbara nnụkwu klọb Volleybọl nke Dallas Belles na Minnesota Monarchs site na 1987 ruo 1989
A kpọrọ ya aha MVP nke njikọ volleybọl ahụ na 1988
O mechara gbaa na Italy ma na France site na 1992 ruo 1995

Lawanson rụrụ ọrụ dika koochi na-enyere aka na Mahadum Purdue maka afọ anọ, ma na Fresno Steetị maka afọ isii, ma na-ụlọ mmuta ndị United States Air Force maka afọ abụọ ma na Mahadum Nevada maka otu afọ
Ọ bubụ onye isi koochi na Angelo State maka afọ egwurewgu atọ ebe o kere ọtụtụ ndeko dị iche ịche
Mechara bụrụ onye isi koochi ndi Nevada na 2011
N’ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2014, ọ hapụrụ ọkwa ahụ
A mụrụ Lawanson na Septemba 27, 1963, na Ibadan, Oyo, Naijiria, ọ dị sentimita 5’8 n’ogologo
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Fresno State nweta digiri na nchịkwa azụmahịa na 1987
Ọ rụọla ọrụ dịka onye otu ndị isi oche nzukọ ndị koochi volleybọl na America
Lawanson lụrụ Shawn Kenan na 2002
Mana ha mere nkewa na 2015
Nwanne ya bụ Foluke Akinradewo, gbakwara egwuregwu volleybọl nke mba US
Ruth Marchant (Eprel 1961 - Disemba 2018) bụ onye ogbugbo na onye na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ, na onye guzobere nzukọ Triangle
Triangle bụ nzukọ mba lekwasịrị anya n'ịgwa ụmụaka na ndị na-eto eto nwere ọtụtụ mkpa
Marchant gụrụ màkà akparamaagwa mmepe na Mahadum Sussex
Ọ mèchàrà gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ebere na òtù na-arụ ọrụ na ụmụaka, dị ka Save the Children na Chailey Heritage School, tupu ya na ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ Mary Jones guzobe Triangle
Áká Marchant di na ọtụtụ mgbanwe na usoro iwu Bekee, na-eme ka ọ dịkwuo mfe ịrụ ọrụ na ụmụaka na-etinye aka na ikpe ikpe
Ọ bụ onye mbụ jiri ụlọikwuu maka nwatakịrị ịnọdụ ala mgbe ọ na-enye ihe akaebe n'ụlọ ikpe, ọ bụkwa ya na-akwado omume maka ndị ọka iwu ịkwaga n'ime ụlọ njikọ ndụ maka nyocha nke ụmụaka

O deela édémédé maka ịzaghachi ụmụaka dị obere mgbe ha nwere ike ịnọ n'ihe ize ndụ, nkwurịta okwu na-abụghị okwu na ụmụaka na-enye ihe akaebe, ichebe ụmụaka nwere nkwarụ, na ikwurịta okwu na ụmụaka dị obere na-enye ihe akaebe na usoro ikpe
Osiri na nzukọ ya, Triangle, o nyekwara nkwado maka ụmụaka na-etinye aka na ikpe ikpe
Ọrụ ebere Triangle
Ruth Miller (1919–1969) bụ onye odee mba South Africa
Amụrụ n'afọ 1919 na Uitenhage, South Africa, o tolitere na ugwu Transvaal ma nọrọ ndụ okenye ya na Johannesburg
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ma mechaa bụrụ onye nkuzi Bekee
Ọ nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa cancer na 1969
Odere mkpirisi akụkọ na ejije, mana amara ya nke ọma maka uri ya, bụ ndị a na-edekarị n'agụmagụ
Ọ meriri Ingrid Jonker Prize maka mpịakọta mbụ ya nke uri, Floating Islands (1965)
Nchịkọta nke abụọ ahọpụtara abụ pụtara na 1968 na usoro Phoenix Living Poets
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, nhọrọ nke ọrụ ya ebipụtara na nke a na-ebipụtabeghị, Poems, Prose, Plays pụtara, nke Lionel Abrahams deziri
Ruth Miller (March 19, na afo 1903 - June 13, na afo 1981) bụ onye omere America, mara maka The Sheik (1921), The Affairs of Anatol (1921), na King of Kings (1927)
Ruth Segomotsi Mompati (14 Septemba, na afọ 1925, 12 Mee, na afọ 2015) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye guzobere Federation of South African Women (FEDSAW) na afọ 1954
Mompati bụ otu n'ime ndị isi nke Women's March na 9 Ọgọst, na afọ 1956
A mụrụ Ruth Segomotsi Mompati n'ebe ugwu nke Cape Province (North West Province taa)
Mompati tolitere na Ganyesa, obodo nta dị na mpaghara North West
Nne na nna ya, Oriakụ Seli Babe Seichoko na Maazị Gaonyatse Seichoko, bụ ndị isi ụka na London Missionary Society Church (LMSC), Vryburg

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị Standard 6, ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka ezinụlọ ndị ọcha dị ka onye na-elekọta ụmụaka ma mesịa gaa Tigerkloof Teachers Training College ebe ọ nwetara diplọma onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na afọ 1944
N'afọ 1944, Mompati malitere ịkụzi na Dithakwaneng Primary School dị nso na Vryburg
O mechara kwaga Vryburg Higher Primary School, ebe ọ bụ onye nkuzi ruo na afọ 1952
A kwụsịrị Mompati n'ọrụ nkuzi ya na afọ 1952 mgbe ọ lụrụ di n'ihi na iwu ịkpa ókè agbụrụ machibidoro ndị nkuzi nwanyị ojii ịlụ di
Mompati kwagara Johannesburg na afọ 1952, obere oge mgbe mkpọsa Defiance malitere
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe onye iji mụọ mkpirisi na ịpị mkpụrụ akwụkwọ
Site na afo 1953 ruo na afọ 1961 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ maka Nelson Mandela na Oliver Tambo na ọrụ iwu ha na Johannesburg
Ọ sonyeere African National Congress na afọ 1954, a họpụtakwara ya na National Executive Committee nke Women's League

N'afọ 1990, a họpụtara Mompati ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị nnọchi anya ANC nke sooro gọọmentị South Africa kwurịta maka mgbanwe udo na ọnọdụ ndị a ga-ezute iji kwụsị esemokwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na South Africa na Groote Schuur
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye omeiwu na ntuli aka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya mbụ nke South Africa na afọ 1994, ebe ọ jere ozi na National Assembly ruo 1996
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya na Switzerland site na afo 1996 ruo afọ 2000
Mgbe o si Switzerland lọta, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi obodo Vryburg, North West
Mompati jere ozi dị ka onye isi nke Umkhonto we Sizwe Veteran's Association
Mompati nwụrụ na 12 Mee 2015 mgbe ọ rịara ọrịa n'ụlọ ọgwụ Cape Town

Ruth Mumbi (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke isii n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1980), amụrụ na Kiamaiko, mba Nairobi bụ onye Kenya Onye na-agbachitere ikike mmadụ nke nwere ndekọ na-agbachitere ụmụ nwanyị na-adịghị ike nọ n'ihe ize ndụ
N'afọ 2010, ọ tọrọ ntọala ma duzie 'Warembo Ni Yes' nke bụ otu ụmụ agbọghọ na-achọsi ike ịhụ na iwu Kenya dị ugbu a gafere
Ọ bụ onye ndu nke Bunge la Wamama mashinani, ikpo okwu nke mere ka a mata ya na ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agbachitere ikike mmadụ
N'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 2014, o sonyere na mmemme mmekọrịta ruuru mmadụ na Mahadum nke York na mba United Kingdom
Mumbi enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite banyere ọrụ ya
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya na onye ikpeazụ nke Onyinye ihu ihu maka ndị na-agbachitere ikike mmadụ nọ n'ihe ize ndụ
Ruth Nankabirwa Ssentamu bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, onye na-eje ozi dị ka Minista nke Energy na Mineral Development na Cabinet nke Uganda, malite na 8 June 2021
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ gwara ndị na-akwado ya 'Ọ bụrụ na ehi na-atụ vootu, ka ha tie vootu, achọrọ m inweta 120%' ọ tụfuru oche ya dị ka Women MP maka Kiboga District na Jenụwarị 2021
Tupu nke ahụ, site na 1 Machị 2015 ruo 3 Mee 2021, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Chief Government Whip, ọkwa ọkwa nke Cabinet na Uganda
na-anọchi Justine Lumumba Kasule, onye e nyere ọkwa odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement na-achị na Uganda na 23 Disemba 2014
Tupu nke ahụ, site na 27 Mee 2011 ruo 1 Machị 2015, Nankabirwa jere ozi dị ka Minista Steeti maka Azụmaahịa na Cabinet nke Uganda na-anọchi Fred Mukisa, onye a chụpụrụ na cabinet
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Steeti maka Microfinance, site na 16 Febụwarị 2009 ruo 27 Mee 2011
A mụrụ Ruth Nankabirwa na 28 Nọvemba 1965
Ọ si Kiboga District na Central Uganda
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Bamusuuta maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarịa ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Nabisunsa Girls' Secondary School, maka agụmakwụkwọ O-Level na A-Level
O nwere nzere Bachelor of Arts na Fine Art na Mahadum Makerere
O nwekwara nzere Master of Arts in Conflict Studies, nke sikwa na Makerere
Site na 1994 ruo 1995, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya na Nzukọ Iwu
N'afọ 1996, a họpụtara Ruth Nankabirwa ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndị omeiwu maka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị maka mpaghara Kiboga
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ site na 1996 ruo 2021
Site na 1998 ruo 2001, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Steeti maka Luweero Triangle na Ọfịs nke Praịm Minista
N'agbata afọ 2001 na afọ 2009, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa, ọfịs ọ rụrụ ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na Minista na mpaghara ego
Na ntuli aka nke 27 Mee 2011, a kpọgara ya na Ministri Azụmaahịa dị ka Minista Steeti, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya ruo mgbe a kpọrọ ya Chief Government Whip
Ruth Ndulu Maingi (a mụrụ na 22 Mee 1983), bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri 18 Hours, The Distant Boat na Midlife Crisis
A mụrụ Ruth na 22 Mee afọ 1983 na Machakos, Kenya dịka nwa nke anọ n'ime ezinụlọ nke ụmụnne isii
Ọ gara Kathiani High School na Township Muslim Primary School na Machakos maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị na praịmarị n'otu n'otu
Ọ gụsịrị diplọma na mkpuchi mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ruth malitere ọrụ ya dịka onye na-agba egwu mgbe ahụ, o mechara gbanwee gaa na nka iji rụọ ọrụ ma sonye na Kenya National Theatre Performing Arts School ruo afọ abụọ
N'afọ 2007, ọ sonyeere Kigezi Ndoto Musical Theatre Performances
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2008, ọ kwagara India ma mee ihe nkiri maka Sauti Kimya na Githaa
N'afọ 2011, o mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na ihe nkiri The Marshal of Finland ma n'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya maka ọrụ ndu na usoro telivishọn Lies that Bind, nke mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na telivishọn
N'ime usoro a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Salome', nwunye nke atọ na ezi ịhụnanya Richard Juma, na nwunye nke atọ
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2013, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Swahili a ma ama Mama Duka na ọrụ aha ya
Maka ọrụ ya, e mechara kwanyere ya ùgwù na 2014 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ukwuu dịka onye nkuzi na usoro telivishọn The Team, ya na Media Focus on Africa nke Dreamcatcher mepụtara
N'afọ 2014, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri abụọ The Next East African Film Maker na Orphan N'afọ 2018, o mere Nollywood nke mbụ na ihe nkiri Family First nke Lancelot Imasuen duziri
Ruth Obih bụ ónyé ọka iwu, ónyé na-akwado nkwado na ónyé guzobere na onye isi oche nke 3Invest, ụlọ ọrụ na-etinye ego na Naịjirịa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na LLB na Mahadum Imo State wee gaa na Naịjirịa Law School, n'afọ 2004, ebe a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ ọkàiwu
Mgbè ọ kpọrọ ọkàiwu na Naịjirịa, ọ gara BPP Law School, London, UK

O nwèrè asambodo na njikwa azụmaahịa site na Mahadum Pan-Atlantic, njikwa ụlọ site na mmemme sitere na Harvard Business School na nyocha ụlọ ahịa na itinye ego site na MIT School of Architecture and planning, Boston
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ajumogobia na Okeke na-arụ ọrụ iwu na Lagos
Ọ malitere 3Invest na 2007
Na ebumnuche nke ịmepụta ngalaba ụlọ na-aga nke ọma, o tinyere ego na nkwado ụlọ

N'afọ 2011, ọ duziri ijikọ ụwa ọnụ na digitization nke ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ na mwepụta nke 3investz na ntanetị ozi n'ịntanetị na ihe ngosi redio ụlọ mbụ, Real Estate On-Air, yana ụlọ ọrụ ya na Classic 973 FM na Beat 999 FM, ma na Lagos
N'afọ 2012, ọ duuru ndị otu ya malite Real Estate Unite, nnukwu nnọkọ kwa afọ nke ndị isi ala na Africa nke a kwadoro na Lagos
N'ịgbaso mmasị ya màkà proptech, na 2013 ọ malitere Real Estate Investor Network (REIN) ma mesịa n'afọ 2015 malite oghere ọrụ oge mbụ na Africa nke a na-akpọ Lagos CoWork
Ruth Ogbeifo (amụrụ 18 Eprel 1972) bụ onye Naịjirịa ejiri egwuregwu ibu arọ mara
Na Asọmpi Mba Uwa nke afọ 1999 na katigory 75kg, o meriri ọla nchara na snatch, clean and jerk, na overall
O sonyere na-izọọ mpị nke 75kg n’egwuregwu Olimpik n'afọ 2000 wee rite nrite ọla ọcha
Ruth Lade Okediji (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ Prọfesọ mmuta Iwu na Mahadum ọkaiwu nke Harvard ma bụrụ onye nduzi na Berkman Klein Center
Prọfesọ Okediji bụ ọkachamara ama ama n’ụwa niile ma bụrụkwa ọkà mmụta n’ihe gbasara ọgụgụ isi, azụmahịa na mmepe
N’afọ 2017 ka ahọpụtara ya dika onye otu Creative Commons
Okediji nwetara LLM
na SJD
site na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọkaiwu nke Harvard
Tupu mgbe ahụ, ọ nwetara LLB
site na Mahadum Jos
Okediji rụrụ ọrụ nkuzi ogologo oge tupu ya bịa na Harvard Law na 2017
Site na 2003 ruo 2017, ọ kuziri ihe na Mahadum ọkaiwu nke Minnesota ebe ọ bụ William L
Prosser Prọfesọ mmuta iwu
Ahọpụtara ya dịka Prọfesọ nke McKnight
Tupu ọ bịa Minnesota, ọ bụbụ Edith Gaylord Prọfesọ mmuta iwu na Mahadum okaiwu nke Oklahoma
Ọ na gara ọtụtụ ndi Mahadum ọkaiwu ọrụ dika Mahadum Duke, Mahadum Haifa, Mahadum St
Thomas, Mahadum Tilburg

Ruth Khasaya Oniang'o (amụrụ na Nọvemba 9, 1946) bụ onye Kenya Prọfesọ nke Nutrition na onye bụbu onye omeiwu O kere Rural Outreach Africa iji mee ka ndị na-eto eto nwee ike ileba anya na erighị ihe na-edozi ahụ, ọ na-ahụ maka amụma nri obodo ya na ọ nọ na bọọdụ Center for Agriculture na Bioscience International
A mụrụ Oniang n'afọ 1946
Ọ gara Mahadum Washington ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na nzere masta n'etiti afọ 1969 n'afọ 1974
Ọ malitere ịkụzi na mahadum n'afọ 1978
Oniang'o nwetara nzere bachelọ na nzere masta na Mahadum Washington State, tupu ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ na Mahadim Nairobi
N'afọ 1983, Mahadum Nairobi nyere ya PhD
na Sayensị Nri na uru Nri
Ọ bụ onye isi na-ahụ maka nri nri wee bụrụ Prọfesọ na Mahadum Jomo Kenyatta Nnyocha ya lekwasịrị anya na isiokwu ndị dị ka nchekwa nri, nri nri na ime ime, nri ụmụaka na nhazi ọrụ ugbo
O guzobere Rural Outreach Program na 1992 iji nye ndị ọrụ ugbo obere ule ala na ihe ndị ọzọ dị mkpa iji mepụta ihe
Oniang'o guzobere African Journal of Food, Agriculture, Nutrition and Development na 2001 iji mee ka nyocha agụmakwụkwọ dị mkpa pụta ìhè n'ọhịa ahụ
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ugbu a
N'afọ 2002, ọ hapụrụ agụmakwụkwọ iji bụrụ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kenya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu Kenya site na 2003 ruo 2007
Mgbe ọ na-eje ozi, Oniang'o nyere aka gafee Kenya Biosafety Bill na Nutritionists and Dietetics Bills
N'afọ 2005, Oniang'o guzobere Diana Elukhambi Health Centre na Kakamega
N'afọ 2018 ọ nọ na bọọdụ nke UK dabeere NGO Centre for Agriculture and Bioscience International
Oniang'o na-edu ndị ọrụ nchekwa nri na nri nri nke obodo ya bụ ndị eboro ebubo ilekọta nnyefe nke Iwu Nri na Nutrition Mba
Oniang'o na-edukwa Rural Outreach Program, otu na-enweghị uru nke na-akwado ndị ọrụ ugbo na mmepụta nri na nhazi ọrụ ugbo
The Rural Outreach Program na-arụ ọrụ na ndị ọrụ ugbo Kenya iji kwalite uto nke ihe ọkụkụ dị ka sorghum, cassava, arrowroot, na jute mallow dị ka ihe ngwọta iji hụ na nri dị nchebe

Oniang'o emeriela ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka ọrụ ọ na-arụ n'ọrụ ugbo na amụma nri, gụnyere ihe nrite Ọrụ Distinguished na Silver Star Na 2014, e nyere ya International Food and Agribusiness Management Association (IFAMA) Award Lifetime
O nwetakwara ihe nrite Africa Food Prize na 2017 maka ọrụ ya na Rural Outreach Program
Na June 22, 2018, e nyere Oniang'o nzere Doctor of Science site na Mahadum Aberdeen iji kwado onyinye ya n'ọhịa ya
A kpọtụrụ Oniang'o aha dị ka otu n'ime ndị Afrịka 100 kachasị nwee mmetụta site na magazin New African n'afọ 2017
Ruth Osime (amụrụ n'abalị asaa n'onwa Febrụwarị 1964) bu onye odeakụkọ Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke THISDAY Style Magazine, akwụkwọ akụkọ ejiji na ụdị ejiji nke akwụkwọ akụkọ THISDAY
Osime bụ ada Chief Grace Osime ma nwee ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ, Grace Osime na Omome Osime-Oloyede
Ọrụ Osime na THISDAY malitere site na ya dị ka onye njikwa ọrụ, wee bụrụ onye ode akwụkwọ na onye nhazi ụdị na 2003
O nyekwara aka na mbipụta nke ụbọchị ụka nke akwụkwọ akụkọ na kọlụm a maara dị ka Eziokwu site n'aka Ruth, tupu ọ ghọọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke THISDAY Style na 2005, mgbe e wepụtara magazin ahụ
Ọ bụ onye so na-emepụta ihe na ARISE Fashion Week kwa afọ wee bụrụ onye isi otu ndị ikpe maka mbipụta 2020 nke ihe ngosi ejiji
N'afọ 2021, ọ nọọ dịka onye ọka ikpe maka asọmpi agụmakwụkwọ mba nke Lafarge Africa kwa afọ maka ndị nkuzi na ụmụ akwụkwọ
Osime ruru na ndepụta ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ na ise kachasị ike na akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria na 2020, ma gbaa onye nke iri na abụọ na ndepụta ụmụ nwanyị na nta akụkọ nke Africa chịkọtara
Osime bụ onye nnata nke 2021 nabata ihe ngosi akara ngosi ụda niile nke ụmụ nwanyị bụ Embracing All Tone of Women(EATOW), iji kwado ntinye aka ya na ụlọ ọrụ ejiji na ụdị
Ruth Sacks (amụrụ n'afọ 1977) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg
Ọ bụ ónyé nchọpụta postdoctoral Ugbú a na South African Research Chair Initiative (SARChI) màkà Social Change na Mahadum Fort Hare
Sacks nwèrè PhD (Arts) site na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand ebe ọ bụ ónyé otu na Wits Institute for Social and Economic Research (WiSER)
E wepụtara akwụkwọ ya nke atọ, Twenty Thousand Leagues Under Seas, n'afọ 2013
Ọ bụ ónyé nwetara HISK na Ghent
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-akwado oghere ọrụ na-ese ihe na Parking Gallery, nkè Visual Arts Network of South Africa (VANSA) kwadoro na Johannesburg
E gosipụtara ọrụ Ruth Sacks na mbà ụwa na ebe ndị dị ka African Pavilion na 52nd Venice Biennalein 2007, ZKM Centre for Art and Media, Karlsruhe na 2011 na National Museums of Kenya, Nairobi na 2017
O nwetara MFA na Mahadum Cape Town na 2007
Sacks bụ ónyé nwetara ihe nrite nke Higher Institute for Fine Art (HISK) na Ghent, Belgium
Ọ nwetara BFA, Michaelis School of Fine Art, Mahadum Cape Town nà 1999, MFA, Michalis School of Fine Arts, Mahadim Cape Town nà 2007 nà PhD (Arts), Mahadum Witwatersrand, Johannesburg nà 2017
Ọrụ Sacks na-enyocha ógè akụkọ ihe méré eme' nà nka, ihe owuwu na nka eji eme ihe iji kwuo màkà gburugburu ebe óbíbí nkè ógè a
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na akụkọ ifo dị ka ngwá ọrụ màkà ịgba ume ọtụtụ nkọwa nke echiche ndị dị mkpà
Sacks na-emepụta akụkọ ifo ọhụrụ site na ịtụgharị na imezi ederede na ihe ndị dị ugbu a, ya na ịmepụta ndị ọhụrụ
N'oge niile ọ na-eme, a na-ekwusi ike na ojiji nke typography, imewe na usoro asụsụ

Sacks egosila n'ọtụtụ ebe, na ihe ngosi otu gụnyere The Global Contemporary Art Worlds mgbe 1989 gasịrị na ZKM HaloCentre for Art and Media (Germany, 2011), Performa 09, nké Museum for African Art New York (USA, 2009), Luanda_Pop Checklist kwadoro na 52nd Venice Biennale (Italy, 2007) nà 1st Architecture, Art and Landscape Biennial of the Canaries (Spain, 2006)

Ihe ngosi nke Sacks gụnyere Matterings na TPO (Johannesburg, 2017), Open Endings na TTTT (Ghent, 2015), 2,000 Meters Above the Sea na CHR (Johannesburg، 2012), Double-Sided Accumulated na Extraspazio (Rome, 2010), False Friends na Kunstverein (Amsterdam, 2010) na Open Studio na Cortex Athletico (Bourdeaux, 2007)

Ihe ngosi mbà ụwa gụnyere Future Africa Visions in Time na National Museums of Kenya (Nairobi, 2017) na Iwalewa-Haus (Bayreuth, 2015), The Global Contemporary Art Worlds mgbe 1989 gasịrị na ZKM 2008Centre for Art and Media (Karlsruhe, 2011), Performa 09, nké Museum for African Art (New York, 2009), African Pavilion na 52nd Venice Biennale (Venice, 2007) na 1st Architecture, Art and Landscape Biennale nke Canaries, 2006)
E méré ndokwa ka a malite akwụkwọ ya nke atọ, Twenty Thousand Leagues Under Seas, na Musee Jules Verne na Amiens, France
Akwụkwọ ndị gàrà aga bụ False Friends, nke Kunstverein Press, Amsterdam (Netherlands, 2010) bipụtara na An Extended Alphabet, nke Expodium, Utrecht (Netherlands), bipụtara
Ruth Seopedi Motau (amụrụ n'afọ 1968) bụ onye South Africa na-ese foto nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Johannesburg dị na South Africa
Motau bụ nwanyị ojii izizi na-ese foto nke akwụkwọ akụkọ South Africa were n'ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta foto
Foto ya na-elekwasị anya na akụkọ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke foto journalism na mwepụ nke ndị isi ojii na obodo dị iche iche metụtara
A mụrụ Motau na mpaghara abụọ na Meadowlands, Soweto
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ itoolu
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Tswelelang, ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Thutolore sochiri ya na Meadowlands, Soweto na Turret College nke South African Committee for Higher Education Trust (SACHED) guzobere
Ógè nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara George Tabor College (nke bụzi George Tabor Campus nke South West Gauteng TVET College) na Soweto iji mụta ịhazi na ịtụgharị nke ọ na-agbasoghị
Motau chọtara mmasị ya n'afọ 1990 ógè ọ bịdọrọ ịmụ foto na Market Photo Workshop na Johannesburg

Ógè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ afọ atọ na Market Photo Workshop, Motau rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ Mail & Guardian (afọ 1993 rụọ afọ 1995), ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị Ka onye na-ese foto na onye nchịkọta foto site n'afọ 1995 rụọ afọ 2002
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta foto maka akwụkwọ akụkọ South Africa The Sowetan (2004-2008) na maka City Press (2008-2010)
O mechaala ọtụtụ edemede foto na usoro, n'etiti ndị ọzọ Shebeens, Sonnyboy's Story, ma ọ bụ Women and Municipal Service Delivery

E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na mba ụwa ma nweta ọtụtụ onyinye, mmetụta ya na ihe nketa ya na foto akwụkwọ akụkọ sitere na South Africa na-amata site na nyiwe dịka Photography Legacy Project (nke Goodman Gallery, David Goldblatt Legacy Trust na Wits Historical Papers malitere)
Paris Foto foto mba ụwa foto nka ngosi, nke Goodman Gallery na-anọchite anya ya, Johannesburg
Yithi Laba Ihe ngosi otu nke Lindeka Qampi, Neo Ntsoma, Zanele Muholi, Ruth Motau na Berni Searle na Market Photo Workshop, Johannesburg
Ranjith Kally, Senzeni Marasela na Ruth Motau na Goodman Gallery
IZIKO South African National Gallery, Cape Town; KIT Tropenmuseum, Amsterdam
Black Looks, White Myths ngosi na Johannesburg Biennale, nke Octavio Zaya, Danielle Tilkin na Tumelo Mosaka haziri
Ihe ngosi abụọ nke São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil

Ruth Tuma (nwụrụ n'afọ 2016) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nkuzi nke Uganda nke jere ozi na nke asaa (2001 - 2006) na nke asatọ (2006 - 2011) Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda na-anọchite anya Jinja District
Tuna nwetara nzere Bachelors of Arts na Education na Masters' Degree of Education na Planning and Administration na Ugandan Christian University, Mukono
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Kyambogo National na Bishop Willis Teacher's Colleges
A maara Tuna maka ịkwado agụmakwụkwọ maka ụmụ agbọghọ na Busoga
Ọ nyekwara ụmụ nwanyị ime obodo aka site n'inye ha mkpụrụ kọfị na unere
Tuma jere ozi dị ka onye omeiwu nke Jinja District site na 2001 ruo 2006
N'oge Tuma nọ na nzuko omeiwu, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Uganda Parliamentary Forum for Children na onye otu kọmitii ego na mmefu ego maka ndị omeiwu Uganda maka Global Action
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ikike ndị ọzọ gụnyere ịbụ onye otu ndị nduzi, osote onye nnọchiteanya maka udo na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na onye isi oche nke Federation of University Women of Africa
N'afọ 2007, ọ rịọrọ maka nchebe ụmụaka pụọ na ndị na-emebi iwu mmekọahụ ma chọọ ka ndị omeiwu rụọ ọrụ dị ukwuu n'ichebe ikike mmadụ na ịlụso ịda ogbenye ọgụ
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na isii , Agnes Nabirye meriri Tuma na ntuli aka nke National Resistance Movement
N'afọ 2016, ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa n'ụbọchị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'ụlọ ọgwụ Kampala International Hospital mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa kansa ọtụtụ ọnwa
Tupu ọnwụ ya, e bugara ya South Africa maka nlekọta ahụike
E liri Tuma n'ụlọ nna nna ya na mpaghara Namutumba
Ruth Tunstall Grant (1945-2017) bụ ónyé Africa America na-ese ihe, ónyé nkụzi na ónyé na-eme ihe ike na San Francisco Bay Area nke a maara màkà ihe osise ya, ọrụ ọbọdọ, na nkwado nka

E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ndị a kpọrọ òkù yana ihe ngosi onwe ónyé na mba na mba ụwa dị ka Dallas Museum of Fine Art, Dallas, Texas; Rath Museum, Geneva, Switzerland; Triton Museum of Art, Santa Clara, California; San Jose Museum of Art
O lekwasịrị anya n'ọrụ obodo na nkwado maka ikike ụmụaka na ikpe ziri ezi na Santa Clara County na karịa
O guzobere ọtụtụ mmemme nka na-aga n'ihu ma kpalie ndị na-emepụta ihe, dị ka Marita Dingus
A mụrụ Ruth Tunstall Grant na Dr
Lucille Hawkins Tunstall na E
Tunstall n'afọ 1945 na Boulder, Colorado
Nné ya bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ojii mbụ na-eduzi virology na CDC
Nná ya bụ ónyé Tuskegee Airman
Otu n'ime ihe ndị Grant na-echeta na mbụ gụnyere nleta na Detroit Institute of Art
'Nné ya, ónyé agụmakwụkwọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike, na-arụkarị ọrụ na ngwụsị izu ma hapụ Tunstall Grant na nwanne ya nwanyị na Detroit Institute of Art n'ụzọ ọ na-aga ọrụ
Ụmụ agbọghọ ahụ na-agagharị n'ime nchịkọta ruo ọtụtụ awa, nke ndị na-eche ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na-elekọta bụ ndị matara ha site na nleta ha na-abịa na ngwụsị izu
Ahụmahụ ihe ngosi nka ndị a mere ka Tunstall Grant na-achụso nka na kọleji
Ọhụụ na ụdị nka Tunstall Grantz malitere site na ọchịchọ ịmata ihe na nyocha nke ọdịnaya nke oge a na mgbasa ozi ọhụrụ
Ónyé na-ahụ maka ihe n'onwe ya na onye edemede Lizzetta LeFalle-Collins achọpụtala mmepe nke ónyé na-ese ihe site na eserese acrylic, watercolor, collage na nka ọha
N'ịtụle ihe osise Tunstall Grant, LeFalle-Collins kwuru na ihe osise cosmic na ihe osisa naturescapes na-egosi ya na ụlọ ọrụ nwanyị gosipụtara oge
Ihe ngosi mbụ gụnyere ihe ngosi na katalọgụ, Eight Afro-American Artists, 1971, Musée Rath, Geneva, Switzerland na Four Moderns, 1972, Brooklyn Museum, New York, nyochara na New York Times
N'afọ 1976, ónyé nlekọta New York Henri Ghent nyochara ya

Ihe osise ya dị na nchịkọta nke de Saisset Museum, Mahadum Santa Clara, Santa Clara, California; San Jose Museum of Art; Triton Museum, Santa Clara (California); Mahadum Dallas; na African American Museum of Dallas
Ebe ngosi nka na ọbá akwụkwọ African American na Oakland (AAMLO) nwere akwụkwọ Tunstall Grant na ihe ndekọ elektrọnik
Ọrụ natara onyinye Santa Clara County nke 1987 nke nwanyị nke Achievement Award na nka
E nyere ya Alain Locke Award for Excellence in the Arts na 1999 site na Detroit Institute of Arts, Detroit, Michigan

The Children's Shelter of Santa Clara County, mmemme nke nyere ntụziaka nka dị mma maka ụmụaka a na-emegbu na ndị a gbahapụrụ agbahapụ nke Tunstall Grant bụ onye guzobere na onye nduzi ya, natara EA Taller Award maka mmemme agụmakwụkwọ nka

Ihe osise ya apụtala na mbipụta ndị a Art International Magazine, The Bay City Times, The New York Times, The Sacramento Bee, New York Amsterdam News, The San Jose Mercury News, Metro, na Afro-American Artist
A gụnyere Tunstall Grant na Who es Who n'etiti ndị isi ojii America, 197778, 1980-81, 81-82, 83-84, 8586
Ruth Usoro (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 8 Ọktoba 1997)
Ọ bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu Naijiria na-asọ mpi ogologo jump na okpukpu atọ
Nwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Texas Tech, na 26 Febrụwarị, 2021 Usoro wụliri 682m n'ogo ogologo iji zute ọkọlọtọ ntozu maka egwuregwu Olympic 2020 na-egbu oge na Tokyo
Ọ bụ nke abụọ kasị mma na-awụlikwa elu n'ụwa maka oge n'oge na nke atọ kasị mma na Nigeria oge niile ndepụta n'akụkụ Ese Brume
N'ụbọchị 12 n'ọnwa Jun, 2021, ọ wụliri 1419m iji merie mwụli elu atọ na 2021 NCAA Division I Outdoor Track and Field Championship na Hayward Field, Eugene, Oregon
Ọ meriri aha ime ụlọ NCAA na 2021
Mwụ elu okpukpu atọ kachasị mma nke 1450 na Texas zutere ụkpụrụ ntozu maka asọmpi Tokyo 2020 na-egbu oge na mwụ elu atọ wee tinye ya na 10 kacha elu n'ụwa maka afọ

N'agbanyeghị na ọ bịarutere Tokyo ịsọ mpi n'egwuregwu Olympic, a chụpụrụ Usoro mgbe aha ya gụnyere aha ya na ndepụta ndị egwuregwu iri sitere na obodo ya bụ ndị na-erughị eru isonye n'ihi na anabataghị usoro nyocha ọgwụ na-agaghị asọmpi n'ọsọ
Na nkwupụta otu Athletics Federation of Nigeria (AFN) weghaara ọrụ maka mmejọ na maka itinyeghị 'usoro kwesịrị ekwesị iji kwado iwu nke 15 nke iwu mgbochi ọgwụ mgbochi nke World Athletics'
Ruth Waithera Nganga (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1958) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ lara ezumike nká na Kenya
Waithera meriri ọla nchara karịa mita 200 na egwuregwu All-Africa nke 1978 na 1979 African Championships
Waithera meriri ugboro abụọ na asọmpi sprint atọ (100, 200 na 400 mita) na East na Central African Championships; na 1977 na 1979
O sonyere na 1984 Summer Olympics, na-emecha nke 8 na 400 mita ọsọ wee ruo 200 mita semifinals
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị Afrịka mbụ ruru mita 400 nke ikpeazụ n'egwuregwu Olympic
N'oge ahụ ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Arizona ma merie NCAA Division I Women's Indoor Championship na mita 400 na 1984
Na 2004 Kenya championships ọ meriri atọ n'otu n'otu; 100, 200 na 400 mita
Waithera ka nwere ihe ndekọ 400 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị Kenya, 5156, nke e debere na 1984
N'afọ 2008, Elizabeth Muthuka mebiri ihe ndekọ ahụ, mana a nwalere ya maka ọgwụ doping
N'ihi ya, ihe ndekọ Waithera ka dị
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2008, Waithera ka bụ nwanyị Kenya kachasị ọhụrụ na-asọ mpi mita 400 na Olimpik
Waithera bụ onye na-edekọ ihe ndekọ Afrịka karịa mita 400
Waithera si n'obodo Shamata
Ọ bụ onye otu Kenya Air Force
O guzobere Avenue Sports Club na 1998 iji nye ụmụaka na-enweghị nne na nna ohere inwe ọrụ na egwuregwu
N'afọ 1990, e nyere ya onye otu Arizona Sports Hall of Fame
E kwesịghị ịgbagwoju ya anya na onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ steeplechase, amụrụ na 1990, onye aha ya bụkwa Ruth Waithera
Ruti Aga (amụrụ na 16 ọnwa Jenụwarị na afọ 1994) bụ onye egwuregwu Ethiopia
Ọ sonyere na asọmupi marathon ụmụ nwanyị na 2019 World Athletics Championships
N'afọ 2019, ọ mechara n'ọnọdụ nke atọ na New York City Marathon
N'afọ 2012, o meriri ihe nrite ọlaọcha na mita 5000 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2012 World Junior Championships in Athletics nke emere na Barcelona, Spain
N'afọ 2013, ọ mechara n'ọnọdụ nke ise na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na 2013 IAAF World Cross Country Championships nke emere na Bydgoszcz, Poland
N'otu afọ ahụ, o meriri ihe nrite ọla edo na mita 5000 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2013 African Junior Athletics Championships nke emere na Bambous, Mauritius

Ruvheneko Elsie Parirenyatwa (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 15 n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1988) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-eme ihe ngosi redio na telivishọn, emcee, onye na-ese okwu olu, onye nnọchi anya na onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi okwu maka Ruvheneko, ihe ngosi okwu nke na-egosi na YouTube yana redio maka Capitalk 1004 FM na Star FM nke Zimbabwe
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke abụọ na ndepụta na afo 2017 nke ndị Zimbabwe kachasị nwee mmetụta n'okpuru afọ 40 nke magazin azụmahịa dị na UK chịkọtara
A mụrụ Ruvheneko Parirenyatwa na 15 Septemba na afo 1988
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na dibịa David Parirenyatwa na Choice Parirenyatwa
Ọ bụkwa nwa nwa Tichafa Samuel Parirenyatwa, dọkịta ojii mbụ na Southern Rhodesia na onye a kpọrọ aha ụlọ ọgwụ Parirenyatwa
Parirenyatwa gara Chisipite Senior School site na na afo 2001 ruo na afo 2006
Na mbụ, ọ chọrọ ịbụ dọkịta ụmụaka n'ihi na nna ya bụ dọkịta, mana o kpebiri megide ya mgbe ọ dara O Levels ya na bayoloji
Ọ banyere na Mahadum nke Cape Town dị ka nwa akwụkwọ iwu, mana ọ gbanwere na mmemme nzere mgbasa ozi mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi n'afọ nke abụọ ya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Arts na mgbasa ozi na edemede na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na na afo 2009
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta diplọma na ahịa n'otu mahadum ahụ
Parirenyatwa malitere ọrụ mgbasa ozi ya mgbe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cape Town (UCT)
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ redio nke mahadum ahụ mgbe ọ nọ n'afọ nke abụọ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi ihe omume ugbu a
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya isonye na Africa Leadership Project nke malitere n'afọ 2014
Ọ gara n'ihu na ụbọchị ọmụmụ afọ iri ise nke nwanyị mbụ Grace Mugabe yana agbamakwụkwọ nke mbụ Bona na Simba Chikore

Parirenyatwa bụ onye na-egosi The Zimbabwe Election Debates Series na Election Resource Centre Zimbabwe na-agbasa na Star FM na Capitalk1004FM ma gbaa ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ajụjụ ọnụ kemgbe ahụ na ihe ngosi okwu ya
Ọzọkwa, Ruvheneko bụ onye njikwa ọrụ Radio Division na Zimpapers ma na-agụkwa Master of Science in International Relations na Mahadum Zimbabwe
Parirenyatwa bụ onye na-egosi redio na onye na-emepụta ihe maka ihe ndị dị ugbu a na ụlọ ọrụ redio dị na Harare nke a na-akpọ ZiFM Stereo site na na afo 2012 ruo na afo 2016
N'afọ 2015 ruo n'afọ 2016, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa mmemme
Parirenyatwa kọwara na ọ chọrọ ohere n'efu n'ihi ya ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na ụlọ ọrụ redio
N'elu ikpo okwu telivishọn n'ịntanetị, o kwuru na ọ na-anụ ọkụ n'obi maka mkparịta ụka na-enweghị nkwekọrịta
Ọ kọwara otú iwu n'ihi iwu nchịkọta akụkọ si gbochie mkparịta ụka na-emeghe nke nye ya bụ mbibi n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ịga n'ihu na mkparịta ụka ọ mepụtara n'enweghị egwu ma ọ bụ n'okpuru
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ malitere ihe ngosi TV ya n'ịntanetị nke na-egosi na Facebook Live tinyere ihe ngosi okwu ya na Capitalk 1004 FM na Star FM Zimbabwe
Parirenyatwa bụ osote onye isi oche nke Harare Youth Council, otu nzukọ na-akwalite ohere maka ndị ntorobịa na Zimbabwe
Ya na otu ndị enyi ya, malitere ZimboLove Foundation na 2013; ọrụ ebere nke na-enyere ndị na-enweghị ike ịkwụ ụgwọ ọbara aka site n'inye ha
Ebumnuche Ruvheneko Mentorship Program bụ maka ndị Zimbabwe na-eto eto nwere oké ọchịchọ
Ha na ndị ntorobịa na-arụ ọrụ na njem ha na-aga nke ọma site n'ịchọta ebe nzube ha na agụụ ha jikọtara
Usoro ihe omume a na-emepe nkà, atụmatụ na ikike ma n'aka nke ya na-ewepụta ịdị ukwuu na ịdị iche site n'aka onye ọ bụla
Ọ na-akpụzi àgwà na àgwà onye nkuzi iji nweta ihu ọma na mbọ niile
E nyela Parirenyatwa ọtụtụ ihe nrite gụnyere ma ọ bụghị naanị
N'afọ 2014, Parirenyatwa lụrụ Tendai Mafara
N'afọ 2021, di na nwunye ahụ gbara alụkwaghịm ma kwupụta na ha kewara n'ezie n'afọ 2016
Na Machị 2022, Parirenyatwa kwupụtara na ọ dị ime nwa mbụ ya
Rwanda-Rundi bụ otu asụsụ nke ndị Bantu, ọkachasị asụsụ na-aga n'ihu, nke a na-asụ na Central Afrịka
Asụsụ ndị agbata obi na-aghọta ibe ha, mana ndị dị anya nwere ike ọ gaghị adị
Asụsụ abụọ, Kirundi na Kinyarwanda, emeela ka ọ bụrụ asụsụ gọọmentị nke Burundi nakwa Rwanda

A na-asụkwa asụsụ ndị ọzọ na DR Congo (Kinyabwisha na North Kivu, Kinyamulenge na South Kivu), Uganda (Rufumbira nke Bafumbira na Kisoro District na-as), na Tanzania; Ha, nke nwere otu nde ndị na-asụrụ ya, bụ nke a na-asụgharịkarị
Kinyarwanda nakwa Kirundi yiri nnọọ n'ọtụtụ akụkụ, mana ha dịkwa iche n'ọtụtụ ụzọ
Asụsụ abụọ ahụ bụ asụsụ ụda olu

Ụda dị elu na nke dị ala (ma ọ bụ H na L) bụ ụda dị mkpa ma, na-enwe ọdịiche dị iche na ogologo ụdaume, mgbe ụdaume dị ogologo gbanwere site na ụda dị ala gaa na ụda dị elu, a na-akara ya dị ka ụda na-arị elu ma mgbe ụdaume ogologo gbanwere si na ụda dị larịị gaa na ụda na-ada, a na ya dị ka olu na-ada
A na-egosikarị nke a na Kirundi n'ime Meeussen's Rule
E mekwara atụmatụ na ụda nwere ike ịgbanwe site na usoro metrical ma ọ bụ rhythmic
E nwere ọtụtụ ọnọdụ ebe ụdị okwu abụọ nke dị na asụsụ abụọ ahụ nwere okwu ndị dịtụkwa iche
N'sgbanyeghị nke a
ọdịiche ndị a anaghị adịgide

Otu onye ga-eburu ọdịiche dị ka '-anga' na Kinyarwanda n'uche ma e jiri ya tụnyere '-anka' na Kirundi (nke pụtara enweghị mmasị ma ọ bụ ịkpọ asị), n'ihi na mgbanwe site na 'g' gaa na 'k' bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe, na ihe akaebe bụ okwu dịka 'inka' (ụmụ ehi), 'inkono' ( ite) na ọtụtụ okwu ndị ọzọ ebe 'nk' bụ ihe niile n'asụsụ abụọ ahụ
Obere ọdịiche dị otú ahụ na-agụnye ụdaume dị iche iche, ụdaume ma ọ bụ ogologo ụdaume, ụda ma ọ bụ affixes
Rwanda bu otu obodo no na Afrịka

The Ryal Staundart nke Scotland, (Scots Gaelic Bratach rìoghail na h-Alba, Inglis Royal Standard of Scotland), forby kent dị ka ọkọlọtọ o the King o Scots, ma ọ bụ nke na-abụkarị ọdụm Rampant o Scotland, bụ Scots Ryal Banner o Airms
Ryan de Villiers (a mụrụ na 30 Nọvemba 1992) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya dịka Dylan Stassen na ihe nkiri Moffie (2019)
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'elu nkwago, na-enweta Naledi na Fleur du Cap Theatre Awards
De Villiers si n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ London ma too n'etiti Eastern Cape na KwaZulu-Natal
Ọ bụ nwa nwoke nke onye na-ahụ maka nchekwa Div na onye nkuzi Annette ma nwee nwanne nwanyị
Ọ gara Rivermead Preparatory School na Stirling High School
Ọ ga-agbaso Accounting na Economics, mana ọ gbanwere na Drama na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na International Studies, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Arts na ọdịiche na Mahadum Rhodes n'afọ 2015
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na mba ofesi na United States na Mahadum Willamette na Oregon
Rym Airlines bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu a tụrụ aro ya na Oran, Algeria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya bụ Oran Es Senia Airport
Groupe BCIA tọrọ ntọala ụgbọ elu ahụ ka ọ malite ọrụ na 2003
O nwere ụgbọ elu Boeing 737-200 atọ n'usoro, mana a kagburu azụmahịa ahụ
Ụgbọ elu ahụ kwụsịrị ọrụ na 2005 n'ihi ikpe BCIA, nke malitere n'afọ 2003
Rym Saidi Breidy (née Saidi) (Arabic) (a mụrụ na 21 June 1986 na Tunis) bụ onye Tunisia International topmodel na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Rym Breidy (née Saidi) malitere ọrụ ya dịka ihe nlereanya n'afọ 2003 mgbe ọ meriri Elite Model Look Tunisia
N'afọ 2006, ọ meriri mbipụta mbụ nke ihe ngosi Arabic reality show MISSION FASHION na LBC TV n'okpuru nlekọta nke onye na-emepụta ejiji nke Lebanon Elie Saab
N'afọ 2007, ọ bịanyere aka na njikwa ihe nlereanya dị na Paris ma taa MP Models na-anọchite anya ya
Ọ na-anọchitekwa anya ihe nlereanya Profile na London, njikwa ihe atụ ụmụ nwanyị na Milan, MP Management na Paris, njikwa One1 na New York City, Munich models na Germany, MP Mega na Miami
N'Ịtali, a matara ya mgbe ọ gbasịrị mkpọsa maka WIND (Ịtali) ya na onye na-eme ihe ọchị n'Ịtali Giorgio Panariello na mgbe ahụ ọ pụtara dịka Nne Nature (Madre Natura) na Italian TV Show Ciao Darwin
Na Tunisia, Breidy esonyewo na mkpọsa iji nyere aka kwalite ụlọ ọrụ njem nleta nke mba ahụ
Ọ bụkwa ihu maka ụlọ ọrụ njem nke Tunisia Traveltodo kemgbe afọ 2013

Otú ọ dị, n'afọ 2015, a na-enyocha mmekọrịta ya na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na mkpọsa njem ndị ọzọ n'ọdịnihu, maka ihe o kwuru na ụlọ ọrụ redio ebe ọ kwetara na ọ gbochiri ndị enyi ya ileta Tunisia n'oge gara aga n'ihi ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke mba ahụ na egwu nchekwa
Na-ekwu ihe ndị a;
'Ha enweghị ihe ha ga-eme na Tunisia
Anyị enweghị ike ịkpọ ndị mmadụ n'ọnọdụ ndị dị otú ahụ na-adịghị mma
Anyị enweghị ike itinye ndụ ndị ọzọ n'ihe ize ndụ[Ihe e dere n'ala ala peeji]
Ndị isi nchịkwa nke Traveltodo zaghachiri site n'ikwu na okwu ya ezughi oke, n'ihi na ha mebiri aha ndị njem nleta nke Tunisia na onyinyo ya na mba ụwa
N'ihi ya, a ga-ajụ njikọ nke onyinyo ya na Traveltodo ugbu a
Kemgbe afọ 2008, Breidy anọwo na-ebi na Milan
Ọ nọkwa na-amụ akụ na ụba na mgbakọ na mwepụ na oge ezumike
Na Julaị 16, 2017, ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri telivishọn Lebanọn bụ Wissam Breidy na Milan
Di na nwunye ahụ zutere na oge nke anọ nke Arabic version nke usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn Dancing With The Stars n'afọ 2016
N'ọnwa Machị 22, 2018, ọ kwupụtara na ọ dị ime nwa mbụ ya
A mụrụ nwa agbọghọ aha ya bụ Bella Maria Breidy n'ọnwa Septemba 8, 2018
Ọ mụrụ nwa nwanyị nke abụọ, Aya Sophia, na 14 Jenụwarị 2020
Rym Ghezali (Arabic; 29 June 1982 17 March 2021) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu
A maara ya maka ịmepụta usoro telivishọn El Wa3ra
Ghezali sonyere na Star Academy 3 n'afọ 2005
O mepụtara ma mepụta El Wa3ra n'afọ 2017, wee rụọ ọrụ na Boqron n'afọ 2018
Ọ nwụrụ na Paris, France, n'abalị 17 ọnwa Machị afọ 2021, mgbe ọ dị afọ 38, na-arịa ọrịa kansa kemgbe 2019
Ryma Mebarki (amụrụ 28, Jenụwarị 1994) bụ nwa agbọghọ Algeria na egwu volleyball
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu volleyball ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Algeria
O sonyere na 2015 FIVB Volleyball Ukwu ụwa Prix
N'ọkwa klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ maka MBB n'afọ 2015

Doble (Nkọwapụta Portuguese ) bụ ego nke São Tomé na Príncipe
A na-eme ka ọ dị mkpirikpi Db ma kewaa ya na 100 cêntimos
E webatara dobla mbụ (STD) na 1977, na-anọchi escudo na par
N'ihi ịrị elu nke ọnụ ahịa gara aga, na 1 Jenụwarị 2018 a gbanwere doble ahụ na ọnụego nke 1000 ruo 1, ma nye ya koodu ego ọhụrụ ISO 4217 STN
São Tomé na Príncipe bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta na Portugal na 2009, na-ejikọta dobra na euro
E debere ọnụego mgbanwe ahụ na 1 EUR = 24,500 STD na 1 Jenụwarị 2010, nke pụtara na a na-ejikọta dobere ọhụrụ na euro na € 1 = 245 STN / nDb
Aha ahụ sitere na Portuguese dobra, nke pụtara 'doubloon'
N'afọ 1977, e webatara mkpụrụ ego maka 50 cêntimos, 1, 2, 5, 10 na 20 dobras
Ewezuga ọla 50 cêntimos na 1 dobra, a na-eji cupro-nickel emepụta mkpụrụ ego ndị a, dị ka 50 dobras e webatara na 1990
Mkpụrụ ego ndị a gosipụtara ngwakọta nke ihe oriri na osisi na anụmanụ
Mkpụrụ ego ndị a, ọ bụ ezie na a naghị ahụkarị ha n'ebe a na-ekesa ha taa n'ihi ịrị elu nke ọnụ ahịa, emebeghị ka ha ghara ịdị na ya ma ka nwere ike iji ya mee ihe dị ka ihe dị nro
N'afọ 1997, ewepụtara usoro mkpụrụ ego ọhụrụ nwere ụka ka ukwuu nke nwere 100, 250, 500, 1000 na 2000 dobras
N'ime ndị a, 100 na 250 dobras bụ gburugburu, nke ka ukwuu n'ime atọ ahụ bụ heptagonal curved equilaterally
A na-eji ígwè nickel na-egbuke egbuke emepụta mkpụrụ ego ndị a niile ma gosipụta isiokwu metụtara anụ ọhịa
Mkpụrụ ego niile na-ekesa na-ebu uwe agha nke mba ahụ n'akụkụ nke ọzọ, ya na ederede 'Aumentemos a Produção' na ọnụ ahịa dị na azụ
Site na redenomination nke dobra na 2018, ewebata mkpụrụ ego n'okpukpe 10, 20, na 50 cêntimos na otu na abụọ dobras
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1977, Banco Nacional de São Tomé e Príncipe wepụtara akwụkwọ ego maka 50, 100, 500 na 1000 dobras
N'afọ 1996, ewepụtara mkpụrụ ego dobras 5,000, 10,000, 20,000 na 50,000, ebe a na-eji mkpụrụ ego dochie mkpụrụ ego kachasị ala site na usoro gara aga na 1997
E wepụtara mbipụta ọhụrụ na 2006 nwere atụmatụ nchekwa emelitere
Na Disemba 2008, ewebata ndetu dobras 100,000 dị ka onu oriri na-aga n'ihu nke e chere na ọgbakọ ọhụrụ ahụ dị mkpa
Ọhaneze anabatala ndetu ahụ nke ọma ma nabata ya
Ihe ndetu niile na-ese foto nke Rei Amador n'akụkụ nke ọzọ, agbanyeghị, na ndetu dobras 100,000 bụ ihe osise e biri ebi nke Francisco José Tenreiro
E wepụtara akwụkwọ ego nke 5, 10, 20, 50, 100, na 200 dobras na 2018 na redomination nke dobra
A na-ebipụta mkpụrụedemede okpukpu ise na 10 na polymer, na akwụkwọ ego niile nwere ụdị urukurubụba dị iche iche n'ihu ya na anụ ọhịa dị n'ógbè ahụ gosipụtara na azụ ya

N'afọ 2020, Central Bank nke São Tomé na Príncipe wepụtara mbipụta ọhụrụ nke 200 dobras banknote, iji dochie mbipụta gara aga nke akwụkwọ eji ebipụta akwụkwọ ahụ, na 5 na 10 dobras bank notes, na-alaghachi na akwụkwọ, dịka nsụgharị polymer nke okpukpu abụọ ahụ adịghị mma n'ihi gburugburu ebe obibi nke São Tomó na Príncipe
Àtụ Exchange RateÀtụ Exchange Rate
N'ọnwa Julai afọ 2009, gọọmentị São Tomé na Príncipe bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ego na Portugal, mba nne ya na-achịkwa otu oge
Ebumnuche nkwekọrịta ahụ bụ ijikọta dobra na euro
Portugal ga-enye ihe ruru nde euro iri abụọ na ise n'ime ihe European Commission kwadoro
São Tomé na Príncipe kwuru na ijikọ dobra na euro ga-eme ka ọ kwụsie ike na mba ahụ
A na-atụkwa anya na ọ ga-adọta itinye ego mba ọzọ
Ndị ọrụ gọọmentị nọrọ otu afọ na-ekwurịta okwu banyere nkwekọrịta ahụ, nke malitere na Jenụwarị 2010
Nkwekọrịta ahụ na-agbaso nke yiri nke Portugal bịanyere aka na Cape Verde afọ iri gara aga

N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2017, Central Bank of São Tomé and Príncipe (Banco Central de São Tomé e Príncipe) kwupụtara mgbanwe nke dobla, iji cheta ncheta afọ iri abụọ na abụọ nke Central Bank, na 1 dobla ọhụrụ nke hà 1,000 nke dobla gara aga

E wepụtara akwụkwọ ego isii (n'ụdị nke 5, 10, 20, 50, 100 na 200 dobras ọhụrụ, na okpukpu abụọ dị ala e bipụtara na polymer) na mkpụrụ ego ise (n'ime ụdị nke 10, 20 na 50 cêntimos na 1 na 2 dobras ọhụrụ) na Jenụwarị 1, 2018

Usoro ndetu ochie na nke ọhụrụ ekesara n'otu oge ruo 30 June 2018, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a na-agbanwe ha ma ọ bụ na-echekwa ego na ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa ruo 31 Disemba 2018 yana na Central Bank ruo 31 Disemba 2019
Sébastien Aymar Bassong Nguena (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 9 n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1986) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ na-agbachitere
A mụrụ ya na France, ọ gbara bọọlụ maka otu mba Cameroon
Oge 2006–07 hụrụ Bassong ka ọ bụrụ onye otu mbụ na-ahụ maka FC Metz, na-eme onwe ya n'ọnọdụ nchebe
O kwuru na ọ gara n'ihu na ndị otu mbụ, ka oge ahụ na-aga n'ihu
Kemgbe mmalite nke oge 2006-07, Bassong malitere na egwuregwu ọ bụla ruo mgbe ọ tụfuru otu egwuregwu, n'ihi nkwa mba ụwa
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na mbido, o nyeere ndị otu aka idebe akwụkwọ ọcha ise n'etiti 30 Machị 2007 na 27 Eprel 2007
N'oge nzute ahụ, Bassong nyeere ndị otu ahụ aka imeri Amiens 2–0 na 20 Eprel 2007 iji nweta ọnọdụ ha na Ligue 1 n'oge ọzọ mgbe a chụpụrụ ha n'oge gara aga
Na 18 Mee 2007, Bassong nyere goolu mbụ ya maka ndị otu ahụ, na mmeri 2–1 megide Strasbourg
Ná ngwụsị nke oge 2006–07, ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ngosi iri atọ na asatọ ma na-agba otu ugboro n'asọmpi niile

N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2008, e nyere Bassong otu izu ikpe na Newcastle United ma mee nke mbụ ya na egwuregwu enyi na enyi tupu oge egwuregwu megide Doncaster Rovers N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Julaị, a kwadoro na Newcastle kwekọrịtara ego nke £ 500,000 na Metz maka Bassong
N'ụbọchị nke isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2009, a kwadoro na ọ gafere ahụike na Spurs na-etinye aka na nkwekọrịta afọ ise ma mezue njem nde £ 8 na klọb North London n'otu ụbọchị ahụ
Newcastle United jụrụ na mbụ nde £ 10 site na Tottenham Hotspur maka ya
Tupu oge 2011-12, Bassong gosipụtara ọchịchọ ya ịhapụ Tottenham Hotspur, na-ekwu na enweghị ohere ndị otu mbụ na klọb ahụ
N'oge okpomọkụ, e jikọtara ya na Newcastle United na Queens Park Rangers, mana o mechara nọrọ na Tottenham Hotspur
Otú ọ dị, ọ gara n'ihu ịnọgide n'azụ usoro pecking na etiti azụ
N'agbanyeghị nke a, Bassong bụ onye isi ndị otu ahụ na nke mbụ ya na UEFA Europa League megide Rubin Kazan na 21 Ọktoba 2011; ma nyere ndị otu ahụ aka imeri 1–0
Na nzute ọzọ megide Rubin Kazan na 3 Nọvemba 2011, Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ ya kpatara ya maka inye free kick, na-eduga na goolu site n'aka ndị otu mmegide, ka Tottenham Hotspur meriri 1–0
Ka ọ na-erule oge ọ gara Wolverhampton Wanderers maka oge 2011-12, Bassong pụtara ugboro iri na atọ maka Tottenham Hotspur n'oge a
Na 31 Jenụwarị 2012, Bassong sonyeere ndị otu Premier League Wolverhampton Wanderers na mgbazinye ego ruo na njedebe nke oge 2011-12
Mgbe ọ banyere Wolverhampton Wanderers, o kwuru na ọ sonyeere klọb ahụ n'ihi egwuregwu bọọlụ mbụ
Na 21 August 2012, Bassong bịanyere aka na Norwich City maka ego a na-akọwaghị
Nkwekọrịta a jikọtara ya na Chris Hughton onye ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Newcastle
Mgbe ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ abụọ na-anọghị ya, a kpọrọ Bassong n'akụkụ mba ahụ, na-apụta dị ka onye nnọchi anya na-ejighị ya megide Togo na 23 Machị 2013
Ọ bụghị ruo na 6 Septemba 2015 mgbe ọ pụtara nke mbụ ya na Cameroon n'ime afọ anọ, na-abịa dị ka onye nnọchi anya, na mmeri 1–0 megide Gambia
Otu ọnwa ka e mesịrị, Bassong malitekwara nke mbụ ya n'ime afọ anọ, ebe ndị otu mba ahụ meriri Naịjirịa 3–0 na 11 Ọktoba 2015
Nne na nna Bassong si Cameroon, na-eme ka ọ na-agbara Cameroon bọọlụ
Bassong kpughere na ọ malitere ịgba bọọlụ, na-ehota 'N'ụzọ nkịtị, dị ka ụmụaka niile nọ na mpaghara Paris
Mgbe ị bi n'ebe ahụ, ị na-egwu bọọlụ ka ị na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ
Nke a bụ egwuregwu a pụrụ ime site na ịpụ n'okporo ámá
Ya mere amalitere m n'ụzọ dị otú a, ọ bịara n'ajụghị m ajụjụ ahụ
Mgbe ahụ, ka m na-aga, enwere m obi ụtọ karịa
' Bassong nwere ụmụnne nwoke anọ na otu nwanne nwanyị
Otú ọ dị, nne na nna ya akwadoghị ihe nwa ya nwoke mere na bọọlụ, ebe ha chọrọ ka ọ gụọ akwụkwọ
N'ihi ya, ọ kwadoro bọọlụ ya na ọmụmụ ya ma mesịa nweta baccalaureate Es ya ma mụọ usoro ahịa
Ka Bassong na-etolite, ọ nọgidere na-enwe mmasị na bọọlụ ma nna ya mechara kweta ma kwe ka ọ kpọọ egwuregwu ahụ
Mgbe ọ na-etolite, ọ kwadoro Paris Saint-Germain N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na The Guardian, Bassong kwuru na ya nwere ụmụ abụọ
