Onye ọ bụla
Sadiq Abubakar Daba, onye a maara dị ka Sadiq Daba (1951/52 ruo 3 Maachị 2021) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye mgbasa ozi
N'afọ 2015, o ritere ihe nrite Africa Movie Academy Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma maka ọrụ ya dị ka 'Inspector Waziri' n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na St
Edward's Secondary School
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta dị elu n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere Mahadum Ahmadu Bello na Zaria
Daba rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye mgbasa ozi maka Nigerian Television Authority
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya bịara bụrụ ihe a ma ama na ngwụcha afọ 1970, na-eme ihe nkiri na Cockcrow na Dawn
N'afọ 2018, e nyere ya utu aha ahụ bụ ŌGarkuwan Nollywood (mgbe a sụgharịrị ya site n'asụsụ Hausa ọ pụtara 'Ọta nke Nollywood' site n'aka ndị ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

Daba kwupụtara nchọpụta ya nke leukemia na ọrịa kansa prostate n'afọ 2017 ma ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria kwadoro ya site na ịnakọta ego gụnyere Josephine Obiajulu Odumakin, Mabeloboh Center For Save Our Stars(MOCSOS)
Na 3 Febụwarị afọ 2018, Daba sonyeere Project Pink Blue iji gaa ije megide ọrịa kansa iji cheta Ụbọchị Cancer Ụwa
Ọ nwụrụ na 3 Maachị afọ 2021 na ụlọ ọgwụ Ayinke General dị na Ikeja, Lagos
Sadiq Sani Sadiq (amụrụ na 2 Febụwarị 1981) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2012 o sonyere na Blood and Henna, ihe nkiri Naijiria nke Kenneth Gyang duziri ya na Nafisat Abdullahi na Ali Nuhu
Ọ natala ihe nrite na nhọpụta nke gụnyere 2015 Kannywood Awards na ndị ọka ikpe nke MTN Nigeria haziri, City People Entertainment nyere ya ihe nrite na 2014 na 2017
Ọ lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
Sadiq emeela ihe nkiri kannywood karịrị narị abụọ
Sadiya Umar Farouq (amụrụ 5 Nọvemba 1974), bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria na onye minista na-ahụ maka ọdịmma mmadụ , njikwa ọdachi na mmepe ọha ugbu a
Onye isi ọchịchị Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara n'ọnwa Julaị 2019, Farouq bụ onye minista kacha nta na ọkwa etiti gọọmentị ugbu a
Ọ jere ozi dị ka Kọmishọna nke Gọọmenti etiti n'ime Mba na Kọmishọn nke Ndị Gbara Ọsọ Ndụ , Ndị Mbata na Ndị Achụpụrụ N'ime Obodo (NCFRMI) site na Ọktoba 2016 ruo Ọgọst 2019

Ọrụ ya na onye isi ọchịchị Buhari malitere n'oge Buhari bu onye isi ahoputara ga-azọ ọkwa onye ịsị ọchịchị na Nzukọ nke Mgbanwe na Ọganihu mgbe Farouq bụ onye na-echekwa ego nke CPC ma mesịa bụrụ onye na-echekwa ego nke Nzukọ Ọganihu Niile

N’ọnwa Disemba afọ 2019, ọkwa onye isi ochichi jụrụ Farouq ajụjụ maka itinye ikike karịrị nkenke akwụkwọ gọọmentị ya site n’iweta ndị enyemaka karịa nke akwadoro n’ihu ọha na igbu oge ịkwụ ụgwọ ọnwa nke ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo N-Power, mmemme enyemaka ọha nke gọọmentị etiti
Saducismus triumphatus bụ akwụkwọ gbasara amoosu nke Joseph Glanvill dere, nke e bipụtara mgbe ọ nwụsịrị n'obodo England na afọ 1681
Akwụkwọ ahụ kwupụtara ịdị adị nke ndị amoosu nwere ike karịrị nke mmadụ nke anwansi, ma wakpo obi abụọ banyere ikike ha
Glanvill jiri ndị na-enwe obi abụọ a tụnyere ndị Sadusii, ndị otu òtù ndị Juu site n'oge Jizọs bụ ndị a sịrị na ha gọnahụrụ anwụghị anwụ nke mkpụrụ obi
A makwaara akwụkwọ ahụ maka akụkọ nke Drummer nke Tedworth, akụkọ poltergeist mbụ, na maka otu n'ime nkọwa mbụ nke iji karama amoosu, mgbochi megide amoogo
Akwụkwọ ahụ nwere mmetụta siri ike na Cotton Mather na Discourse Na amoosu (1689) na ikpe ndị amoosu Salem nke e mere na afọ 1692 na Salem, Massachusetts
Ihe ebube Mather nke ụwa a na-adịghị ahụ anya (1693) bụ nke e ji mee ihe n'ụzọ dị ukwuu dịka akwụkwọ a na akụkọ ya, ọkachasị ihe metụtara ikpe ndị amoosu Mora nke afọ 1669
Lovecraft kwuru banyere akwụkwọ ahụ na akụkọ mkpirikpi ya 'The Festival'
Shirley Jackson hotara akụkụ dị iche iche sitere n'akwụkwọ ahụ na nchịkọta akụkọ ya dị mkpirikpi The Lottery na akụkọ ndị ọzọ
Enwere ike ịgụ aha e sere na mgbidi nke ụzọ nzuzo na ihe nkiri Dario Argento nke afọ 1977 ihe nkiri Suspiria na 01 29 19
Saeed Jones (amụrụ ya na Nọvemba 26, 1985) bụ onye edemede na onye na-ede uri nke America
A kpọrọ nchịkọta izizi ya Prelude to Bruise onye ikpeazụ nke afọ 2014 maka National Book Critics Circle Award maka uri
Akwụkwọ ya nke abụọ, ihe ncheta, How We Fight for Our Lives meriri Kirkus Prize for Nonfiction n'af ọ 2019
A mụrụ Jones na Memphis, Tennessee ma tolite na Lewisville, Texas
Ọ gara kọleji na Mahadum Western Kentucky, wee nweta MFA na Mahadum Rutgers-Newark

NPR kpọrọ Prelude to Bruise, nchịkọta uri izizi nke Jones, 'ọmarịcha, na-enweghị atụ,' 'visceral and affecting' The Kenyon Review kwuru na ọrụ ahụ 'na-akpali ihe ize ndụ, nke na-abụkarị akụkọ ifo, agụụ mmekọahụ n'ime ọnọdụ obi ọjọọ nke ime ihe ike
' TIME Magazine tụrụ aro ya dị ka 'agụ na-adọrọ adọrọ nke kachasị mma na nnọkọ ole na ole o kwere mee' Ọ bụ onye ikpeazụ n'afọ 2014 maka National Book Critics Circle Award maka uri

Jones abụrụla onye mmeri nke Ihe nrite Pushcart, Joyce Osterwell Award for Poetry site na PEN Literary Awards, na Stonewall Book Award-Barbara Gittings Award for Literature, na onye a họpụtara maka 2014 Lambda Literary Award for Gay Poetry
E gosipụtara Jones na usoro Abụ nke PBS NewsHour na So Popular! na Janet Mock na MSNBC
E gosipụtara ya na mkpuchi nke Hello Mr
n'afọ 2015
Jones rụrụ ọrụ na BuzzFeed dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ LGBT na onye nchịkọta akụkọ Culture
Mgbe ọ nọ na BuzzFeed, Jones kwadoro BuzzFeed New's morning show AM to DM site na ọdịda 2017 ruo etiti afọ 2019
Jones dekwara kọlụm ndụmọdụ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ BuzzFeed's READER nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Dear Ferocity'
Simon & Schuster bipụtara akwụkwọ ncheta ya How We Fight for Our Lives n'afọ 2019
The New Yorker kpọrọ ụda akwụkwọ ahụ na ọdịnaya ya 'ngwa ngwa, ozugbo, eziokwu'
NPR kpọrọ ya 'ihe ncheta pụtara ìhè' nke nwere 'ihe ndị jikọtara ya na uri' na 'ọtụtụ n'ime anyị ndị tolitere na-arọ nrọ nke ohere na-aga n'ihu na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya'
Akwụkwọ a ritere Kirkus Prize for Nonfiction na 2019 na Lambda Literary Award na 2020
N'afọ 2022, ajụjụ ọnụ Jones na Debbie Millman gosipụtara na Storybound (podcast) oge mmalite nke ise
Jones bi na Columbus, Ohio
Na Anthology
Saeed Saleh nke a makwaara dịka Sa'eed Saleh Ibrahim; (Arabic) (July 31, 1940 -August 1, 2014) bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe ọchị kacha mma n'Egypt
Saleh nwetara nzere bachelọ nke nka na Mahadum Cairo n'afọ 1960

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ihe nkiri ya na Al Ayal Kibrit na Madrast Al-Mushaghebeen yana ime ihe nkiri na nke atọ n'ime ihe nkiri ndị Egypt na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị eme ihe nkiri n'ụwa
A tụrụ ya mkpọrọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1995 ruo otu afọ, n'ihi na o nwere ọgwụ ọjọọ
N'afọ 2010, ya na Adel Emam mere ihe nkiri Alzheimer, mgbe ọ na-arịa ọrịa Alzheimer
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2014 ma e lie ya n'obodo ya, Majiria, Monufia Governorate
Safaa Abdallah Mohammed El Tokhi (amụrụ na 22 Ọgọst 1964), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Safaa El-Toukhi, bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri The Hunter, Gunshot na Kafr Delhab
A mụrụ ya na 22 Ọgọstụ 1964 na Cairo, Egypt
Nna ya Abdallah Al-Toukhi bụ onye na-ede egwuregwu nke amụrụ na 18 Ọgọst 1926 wee nwụọ na 26 Febụwarị 2001 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na anọ
Nne ya Fathia al-Assal bụ onye edemede egwuregwu Egypt a ma ama na onye na-eme ihe ike
A mụrụ Fathia na 20 Febụwarị 1933, o wee nwụọ na 15 June 2014 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na otu na-esote nsogbu ahụike a na-akọwaghị akọwa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere bachelọ na Higher Institute of Dramatic Arts na 1985
Na mbido, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye edemede, nke nne ya metụtara
N'afọ 1995, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Institute of National Culture
Safaa malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na 1979 na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn El Bahitha
Ọ pụtara dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri naanị n'otu egwuregwu El Ayyam El Makhmoura mere na 1999
Mgbe ahụ ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, dị ka El Zaman El Saaʹb, El Mohagir, na Bekhit we Adila
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ na-achịkwa ihe nkiri telivishọn, ebe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri Leyali El Hulmiyya, Lan Ayesh Fi Galbab Abi, Mahmoud El Masry
Ihe ngosi telivishọn ya kachasị ama ama sitere na usoro Qadhiya Raizá ŌAm na ọrụ 'Yousra'
Safaa (ma ọ bụ Safâa) Erruas, onye amụrụ na 1976 na Tétouan, bụ onye Morocco na-ese ihe
A mụrụ Safaa Erruas na 1976 na Tétouan, Morocco
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ otu afọ na ngalaba nke sayensị nke Tétouan, ọ gbanwere usoro ọmụmụ ya wee họrọ ọzụzụ nka
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Institut National des Beaux-Arts de Tétouan na 1998

Ọrụ ya, nke a na-adịghị ahụkebe na nke na-adịghị ahụ anya, na-abụkarị otu agba, ọcha, nke na-anọchi anya ya, enweghị ihe ọ bụla, ịgbachi nkịtị, adịghị ike na eserese ndị gụnyekwara sutures, cuts na seams, dị ka ọnyá a na-agwọghị
Ọ gụnyekwara ihe ndị dị nkọ ma ọ bụ dị nkọ, dị ka agịga, agụba, mma, na eriri
Erruas bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Tétouan, ma na-egosipụta ihe ngosi ya na Morocco, nakwa mba ụwa
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nka ya ma nweta diplọma ya, o sonyere na 'Morocco time', ihe ngosi nke Jean-Louis Froment, onye guzobere CAPC musée d'art contemporain de Bordeaux haziri
O biri dị ka onye na-ese ihe na ebe obibi ruo ọnwa isii na Cité internationale des arts na Paris
N'afọ 2002, o sonyere na Dakar Biennale nke ise, na ọzọ na Dakar Biennale nke asaa (2006), mgbe ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe iji nweta ihe nrite

N'afọ 2009, a họpụtakwara ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ise dị ịrịba ama na-ese ihe nke ọgbọ ọhụrụ nke ụmụ nwanyị na-ese ihe na ụwa ndị Alakụba maka ihe ngosi New York nke MoCADA (Museum of Contemporary African Diasporan Arts) haziri

N'afọ 2016, e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Paris dị ka akụkụ nke Contemporary Art and Design Fair lekwasịrị anya na Africa, Also Known As Africa (AKAA), na Carreau du Temple, mgbe ahụ ọzọ na 2018 n'otu ngosi ahụ
O gosikwara na 2017 na London na ihe ngosi kwa afọ nke a na-etinye aka na nka nke oge a site na kọntinent Afrịka

A na-arụ ọrụ Erruas na nchịkọta dị ka Obí Eze Morocco, Société Générale (Morocco), Caisse de dépôt et de gestion (Morocco), ONA Foundation na Morocco, Jean Paul Blachère Foundation na Apt, na Center for contemporary art na Lagos, Nigeria
Site na Febụwarị 24 ruo Mee 1, 2022, o sonyere na ihe ngosi, 'African Voices,' ya na Mounir Fatmi, Maimouna Gerresi, na Kyle Weeks, na Milan
Safaa Fathy bụ onye Egypt na-ede uri, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede egwuregwu, na onye edemede
A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe nkiri ya bụ Derrida's Elsewhere, ihe ngosi nke na-elekwasị anya na ndụ na echiche nke onye ọkà ihe ọmụma na-eweta esemokwu bụ Jacques Derrida
A mụrụ Fathy na Minya, Upper Egypt na July 17, 1958
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ Bekee na Cairo
Fathy sonyere n'òtù ụmụ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ nọ n'Ijipt mana o mechara hapụ mba ahụ wee biri na Paris n'afọ 1981
N'afọ 1987, ọ bụ osote onye nduzi na Deutsches Theater dị na East Berlin
Fathy so Heiner Muller rụkọọ ọrụ na 1990
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ doctoral ya na Sorbonne na 1993; akwụkwọ edemede ya bụ na Bertolt Brecht Tupu ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Fathy rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Ugbu a ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye nduzi mmemme na International College of Philosophy na Paris
Ordalie ; Terreur (2004, ISBN 9782872823796)
Safaliba bụ asụsụ Gur nke Ghana
Ọrụ a rụpụtara n'oge na-adịbeghị anya amalitela usoro ederede maka asụsụ iji mee ka o jiri ya na agụmakwụkwọ okenye na nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ mbụ

Usoro ederede Safaliba dabere na ọrụ (1996) nke Edmund Kuŋi Yaku, onye nkuzi Safaliba na onye na-eme ihe nchebe; Paul na Jennifer mere ka Spaefer rụọ ọrụ ahụ, dabere na ọrụ ịkpọ oku ha, mana usoro ederede maka ihe ka ukwuu na-adịkarị
Edekọwo teepu Ntanetị Safalaba, edegharị, ma kwurịtara na Sherris, Schaefer, na AVORO (2018)
Enwere ike ịchọta ibe mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta na Safaliba literacy activism na Mandari, Ghana na njikọ a https //wwwfacebookcom/SafalibaLiteracy/
Àtụ Languages of Ghana
SaferVPN bụ ọrụ VPN nke Safer Social, Ltd mepụtara
Netwọk ahụ na-echebe data onye ọrụ site na ihe ize ndụ nchebe Wi-Fi site na nzuzo nke njikọ onye ọrụ site n'ọgwụgwụ ruo n'ọkwa
SaferVPN wepụtara na 2013 site na ndị mmepe ngwanrọ cybersecurity, gụnyere ndị guzobere Amit Bareket na Sagi Gidali
Ụlọ ọrụ nne na nna SaferVPN malitere ịkwalite isi ego mgbe ịmepụtara na patenting usoro emepụtara iji nyere ndị mmanye iwu aka n'ịchọpụta na ijide ndị ohi ụgbọ ala
N'asọmpi Microsoft Imagine Cup, ndị rụpụtara ngwa mbụ Amit Bareket na Sagi Gidali gbakọtara ọnụ mere ọkwa nke abụọ
Akụrụngwa netwọkụ SaferVPN jere ozi dị ka ntọala nke Bareket na ụlọ ọrụ Gidali na-esote, Perimeta 81 mmepe ngwaahịa mbụ
Safia Abukar Hussein (amụrụ na 1 Jenụwarị na afọ 1981) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ nke gbara ọsọ mba ụwa maka Somalia
Hussein bụ nwanyị Somalia mbụ na-asọmpi n'egwuregwu Olimpik maka mba ya mgbe ọ na-asọ mpi na mita 400 na afọ 2000 Summer Olympics na Sydney
Ọ bụghị mgbe niile ka a na-akwado ya na Somalia, ebe ụmụ nwanyị na-eme egwuregwu bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe na ndị okenye ga-akatọ ya maka ịghara ịnọ n'ụlọ
Nna Hussein enweghị mmasị n'echiche ahụ, n'ihi na ọ na-echegbu onwe ya na ọ ga-egbochi ya ịchọta di
Ka o sina dị, o mechara kwe ka ọ sọọ mpi na Sydney maka Somalia
Ọ gwụchara okpomọkụ ya n'ọnọdụ nke isii ma ọ gaghị n'agba nke ọzọ
Safia Boukhima (Arabic; amụrụ na Jenụwarị 10, 1991, n'imeBéjaïa) bụ onye Algeria na egwu volleyball
Ọ na egwuri egwu dị ka onye na agba ọsọ
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu egwuregwu volleyball nke Algeria ugboro abụọ, n'ime 2008 na 2012
Klọb dị ugbu a GSPex MCA) (Algeria)
Klọb izizi ASW Bejaia (Algeria)

Cherifa Chamia, nke a maara nke ọma site na aha onye na-ese ihe ya Safia Chamia (Arabic), (a mụrụ na Jenụwarị 3, 1932 Lebanon nwụrụ na Disemba 17, 2004), bụ onye na-agụ egwu na mba Tunisia, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Nna ya bụ onye Algeria ma nne ya bụ onye Turkey
N'oge ọ nọ na Paris, Safia zutere onye na-ese ihe Mohamed Jamoussi onye dere ma kpụọ egwu maka ya
Mahla kadek, ya Kalbi ma zelt sghir, ache fi omrek ma yétlaoueh, na operetta a na-akpọ Fatma ma ọ bụ Hamada
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe bụ Abderrahman El Khatib chọpụtara ya bụ onye nụrụ ka ọ na-abụ abụ n'oge ụbọchị ọmụmụ nke nwanne ya nwanyị tọrọ ya na Lebanọn, o dere abụ mbụ ya akpọrọ Haouel ya ghanem haouel

Ọ bịarutere Tunis n'afọ 1946 ma onye agbata obi ya, onye na-anụkarị ka ọ na-abụ abụ, kọwaara ya Mustapha Bouchoucha, onye isi ọrụ egwu nke Redio Tunis, onye nyere ohere iwere aha Safia, site na aha onye na-agụ egwu Turkey a ma ama
Ọ mụtara ụdị egwu Tunisian ngwa ngwa ma nweta nkwado na mba ahụ dum na ọkachasị na ozi ọdịbendị
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị 17 ọnwa Disemba , afọ 2004 mgbe ọ dị afọ 73, e liri ya na Disemba 18 na ili ozu Sidi Yahia nke El Omrane na Tunis
Safia El Emari, (amụrụ Safia Mustafa Mohamed Omari, October 20, 1949 na El-Mahalla El-Kubra) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya obiọma maka United Nations na 1997, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na 2006 iji mee mkpesa maka agha nke dị na Lebanọn
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nta akụkọ, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Faculty of Commerce, Mahadum Cairo
Ọ mụrụ asụsụ Russian ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ntụgharị na nzukọ mba ụwa
O sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Egypt na usoro TV
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe bụ Jalal Issa chọpụtara ya
Ha lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Safia Elmi Djibril (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1963) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke obodo Djibouti na onye na-ahụ maka ikikere ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bụ onye otu National Assembly site na People's Rally for Progress party, nke bụ akụkụ nke Union na-achị maka njikọ aka nke Presidental Majority
Safia Elmi Djibril bu ụzọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site na ọrụ ya na mmemme ahụike nke obodo Djibouti
Ọ bụ onye na-emegide igbu ọkpụkpụ nwanyị na omume ọdịnaala ndị ọzọ na-emerụ ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka ahụ
Djibril bụ onye otu National Assembly site na People's Rally for Progress party, nke nwere njikọ na Union for the Presidential Majority coalition
Ọ na-anọchite anya Quartier 7, mpaghara nke isi obodo nke obodo ahu
A họpụtara ya na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Djiboutian nke afọ 2008, na-esonyere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ n'ime ụlọ ahụ gụnyere Aïcha Mohamed Robleh ya na Hasna Barkat Daoud
Djibril bụ akụkụ nke ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị batara na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Djibouti n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya

Enweghị ụmụ nwanyị na ndị omeiwu Djibouti na afo 2000, mana ugbu a iwu chọrọ ka ọ dịkarịa ala pacenti iri abuo na ise nke ndị omeiwu bụrụ ụmụ nwanyị, ọnụ ụzọ nke fọrọ nke nta ka ọ zute na ntuli aka nke afo 2018
N'afọ 2019, Djibril nyere aka guzobe otu ụmụ nwanyị n'ime ndị otu omebeiwu
Ọ na-eje ozi dịka osote onye isi ala nke abụọ na kọmitii onye isi ala Ismaïl Omar Guelleh ma bụrụ onye otu Ụlọikpe Kachasị Elu

Ihe Djibril na-elekwasị anya na-aga n'ihu na ahụike ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka, ọ bụkwa osote onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Inter-African na Omenala Na-emetụta Ahụike nke Ụmụ nwanyị na Ụmụaka, na-anọchite anya nwanyị mbụ nke obodo Djibouti Kadra Mahamoud Haid
Ọ bụkwazi onye otu Pan-Afrikan Parliament, na-eje ozi dịka osote onye isi oche nke ahụ ruo afo 2018
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka akụkụ nke Pan-Afrikan Parliament's Women's Caucus
Safia Farhat (صفية فرحات) (née, Foudhaili; 1924 - 7 February 2004) bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ nke nka ihe nkiri na Tunisia, yana onye agụmakwụkwọ na onye na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị
A na-echeta ya maka iguzobe tapestry nke oge a na mba ya, yana maka onyinye ya n'ọrụ imewe, eserese, ceramics, na nka ịchọ mma, na-eji ihe dị iche iche dị ka stampụ, ceramics، iko, na tapestry
Farhat guzobekwara magazin ndị Arab-Africa mbụ, Faiza
A mụrụ ya na Radès na 1924, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na France na Tunisia, nke gụnyere na Tunis Institute of Fine Arts
A na-echeta Farhat maka iguzobe tapestry nke oge a na Tunisia
Ọ bụ akụkụ dị mkpa n'ịmepụta mmekorita n'etiti ndị na-ese ihe na ndị omenkà sitere na ụlọ ọrụ nke ọrụ aka nke gọọmentị n'oge ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke Tunisia

Ọrụ ya dị ka nwanyị mbụ na onye nduzi Tunisian mbụ nke postcolonial School of Fine Arts na Tunis nyere aka gbanwee ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọchịchị, omenala ndị nwoke na-achịkwa ka ọ bụrụ nke nabatara ma mepụta ọgbọ nke ụmụ nwanyị na-ese ihe na ndị nkuzi
N'afọ 1949, o sonyere n'ihe nkiri nka nke École de Tunis (Tunis School), naanị nwanyị nọ na otu ahụ
N'afọ 1959, o guzobere magazin Faiza, magazin ụmụ nwanyị Tunisia mbụ mgbe nnwere onwe mba ahụ gasịrị
O nyere aka na mgbanwe na mmezigharị nke nkuzi nka, ọ bụkwa onye nduzi Tunisia mbụ nke School of Fine Arts nke Tunis ebe ọ kụziri na ngwụcha afọ 1950
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nke Tunis Institute of Fine Arts malite na 1966, na-eduzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ ya nke Architecture
Farhat mepụtara stampụ nke Tunisia
N'afọ 1980, ha wepụtara abụọ - nke gosipụtara Chebka Lace na metalwork, ọ bụkwa ya na-ahụ maka otu n'ime ha
Farhat nyere aka n'ịmepụta Tunisian Association of Democratic Women ma bụrụ onye na-agbachitere ikike ụmụ nwanyị

E jikọtakwara ya na Association des peintres et amateurs de'art en Tunisie (onye isi oche); Zin (onye guzobere, ụlọ ọrụ ịchọ mma; na Centre des Arts Vivants in Rades (onye guzobere; 1981) ya na di ya Ammar Farhat, nke ha nyere steeti Tunisia
Farhat mepụtara ọrụ nka n'ụdị nka dị iche iche, gụnyere iko, eserese, ihe osise, ihe osisa, frescoes na ọkachasị tapestries ịchọ mma
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2004
Safia Imadali (amụrụ (1997-06-15) ) bụ nwa agbọghọ Algeria na egwu volleyball
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu volleyball ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Algeria
O sonyere na 2015 FIVB Volleyball Ukwu ụwaPrix
N'ọkwa klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Oefly n'afọ 2015

Safia Juuko Nalule (amụrụ na 15 Machị 1966) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ikike ndị nwere nkwarụ na Uganda, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye omeiwu nke jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị a họpụtara maka ndị nwere nkụda mmụọ, Central Region, Uganda na ndị omeiwu nke iri nke Uganda
N'ọnwa Eprel 2021, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Uganda Equal Opportunities Commission (EOC)
Na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ nwere njikọ na National Resistance Movement n'okpuru tiketi ya ọ gbara ọsọ na ntuli aka nke afọ 2016
Dị ka ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Equal Opportunities Commission si kwuo, a mụrụ Nalule na Mawokota, Mpigi District na Maazị Lule Moses na Oriakụ
Nanyonga Jane Lule
Nalule nwetara nzere bachelọ na Mahadum Makerere na 1990 ma mesịa nweta asambodo na ọzụzụ nchịkwa azụmaahịa site na International Labour Organisation / Federation of Uganda Employers na 1991
N'afọ 1996, o nwetara asambodo abụọ na Leadership for Women site na ESAMI na asambodo na Leadership and Microfinance Management site na Mobility International USA (MIUSA)
Ọ sochiri nke ahụ na Diploma na Law site na Law Development Centre na 2006 ma mesịa Master of Arts na Human Rights site na Mahadum Makerere na 2016
Nalule abụwo onye omeiwu kemgbe afọ 2006, na-anọdụ ala na nke asatọ na nke itoolu nke Uganda
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2020, a kpọrọ ya onye kọmishọna na Kọmitii Ndị omeiwu
Tupu nke ahụ, n'etiti afọ 2005 na 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Kọmishọna na Kọmitii Nnyocha Iwu n'okpuru Ministri Ikpe Ziri Ezi na Iwu Iwu nke Uganda
Ọ bụkwa onye ndụmọdụ na Kampala City Council n'oge ahụ n'etiti afọ 1997 na 2006
Site na 1996 ruo 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Disabled Women Network and Resource Organisation na Uganda (DWNRO)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu na National Union of Disabled Persons of Uganda (NUDIPU) site na 2015 ruo ugbu a, na maka Uganda Women's Network (UWONET) n'etiti 1990 na 1997
N'afọ 2017, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ
Dị ka onye omeiwu nwanyị na ndị omeiwu nke iri nke Uganda, ọ bụ onye otu Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA) yana osote onyeisi oche na Kọmitii Ntinye aha
E depụtara ya dị ka onye otu Kọmitii na East African Community Affairs

Safiatou Thiam bụ dọkịta na-ahụ maka ahụike ọha na eze na Senegal, ọkachamara na HIV / AIDS na onye bụbu Minista na-ahụ Maka ahụike na mgbochi ọrịa na gọọmentị Cheikh Hadjibou SoumaréO mechara bụrụ onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke CNLS National Council against AIDS

O nwetara nzere doctorate ya na Public Health 1995 na Mahadum Cheikh Anta Diop na Dakar, na thesis akpọrọ Le SIDA en milieu chirurical Connaissances, attitudes et pratiques (n'asụsụ Bekee AIDS in the surgical arena Knowledge, attitudes and practises)
Ọ gụsịrị nzere Master of Science na Institute of Tropical Medicine na Antwerp n'afọ 1997

Ọ gụsịrị ọtụtụ diplọma ọkachamara na Dakar na France, yana DEA na Santé publique et pays en développement (English Public Health and Developing Countries) na l'Université Pierre et Marie Curie (Paris VI) n'afọ 2001
Na Conseil national de la lutte contre le Sida (CNLS) (n'asụsụ Bekee National Council for the Fight Against AIDS), ọ na-eduzi mmemme nke Fonds mondial de lutte contre cette pandémie
N'afọ 2007, a nabatara ya dị ka onye nhazi nke Joint United Nations Programme on HIV / AIDS program na Senegal
N'afọ 2014 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na GMS / OASYS Grant Management Solutions
Mali Institute of Health and Development
Na Mahadum Paris VI ọ nwetara Diploma of Thorough (DEA) na 'Health Public and Developing Countries' (2001)
Na Mahadum Cheikh Anta Diop nke Dakar, ọ nwetara asambodo nke ọmụmụ pụrụ iche (CES) na ọrịa na-efe efe na nke na-ekpo ọkụ (2001)
Na Institute of Tropical Medicine Antwerp na Belgium ọ nwetara Master of Science Degree in Tropical Biomedical Sciences (epidemiology and disease control option) (n'afọ 1997)
Na Paul Correa Institute of Dakar Diploma ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Planning and Organization of control of STDs and AIDS in developing countries (1998)
Na Fournier Institute Paris International, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Diploma Course on Sexually Transmitted Diseases (STDs)
Na AIDS Institute Fournier na Paris (n'afọ 1998), Mahadum Cheikh Anta Diop nke Dakar State ọ nwetara Doctorate Medicine (1995)

Safinatu Buhari (née Yusuf) (11 December 1952 – 14 January 2006) bụ Nigerian ma bụrụkwa onye nkuzi na nwunye onye isi obodo Naijiria a na akpọ First Lady of Nigeria n'asụsụ oyibo, site na 1983 ruo 1985
Ọ bụ nwunye Muhammadu Buhari
Safirio Madzikatire, onye a makwaara dịka Mukadota, bụ onye na-ese ihe na-ahụ maka ọtụtụ ihe na-eme ihe ọchị na egwu
Aha njirimara ya sitere na ọrụ ya dịka Mukadota Baba VaRwizi na The Mukadota Family, ihe nkiri Shona TV nke na-agba na Zimbabwe Broadcasting Television (ZTV) n'afọ ndi 1980 na mmalite afọ ndi 1990
Safiya Hassan Sheikh Ali Jimale bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Somalia
Ọ bụ onye isi obodo Beledweyne, ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi ala nke mba ahụ
Ọ gụsịrị BA na Mahadum New York, sochiri nzere Master nka mma na itinye uche na edemede okike na City College
Henderson-Holmes mechara gụọ akwụkwọ na Ụlọ akwụkwọ nkuzi nke Mahadum Columbia
Ruo oge ụfọdụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-agwọ ọrịa na Harlem Hospital, ma nyekwa ụmụ nwanyị dị ime aka na omume ịmụ nwa
Henderson-Holmes mechara nwee ọtụtụ ọkwa nkuzi, gụnyere ọkwa na Marymount College, Touro College, Eugene Lang College, College of New Rochelle, na Sarah Lawrence College
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-ede abụ na Ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị University Heights, a họpụtara ya dịka osote prọfesọ na Mahadum Syracuse site n'afọ 1990 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2001
Henderson-Holmes tinyere aka na atụmatụ ndị dị ka Ndị na-ede uri na ode akwụkwọ, Art Against Apartheid, na National Council of American-Soviet Friendship
N'agbata afọ 1982 n'afọ 1992, ọ natara ihe nrite nke kọleji ọbọdọ abụọ na MacDowell Fellowship
N'afọ 1983, ọ natara Northstar Grant na New York CAPS Poetry Fellowship

N'afọ 1990, Henderson-Holmes natara onyinye William Carlos Williams maka nchịkọta abụ mbụ ya, nke akpọrọ Madness and a Bit of Hope Nchịkọta ahụ, dị ka ọtụtụ ọrụ Henderson-Holmes, lekwasịrị anya n'inyocha 'eziokwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndụ ụmụ nwanyị'
O bipụtara akwụkwọ abụ nke abụọ ya n'afọ 1994, nke a kpọrọ Achịcha kwa ụbọchị
N'afọ 1999, Henderson-Holmes natara nkwado site na New York Foundation of the Arts, mana onyinye a sochiri n'oge na-adịghị anya site na nchọpụta nke ọrịa kansa
O mepụtara usoro akụkọ abụ banyere nchọpụta ya na ọgwụgwọ ya, na-akpọ usoro uri a 'C-ing Colors'
Henderson-Holmes kwuru na ọrịa kansa mere ka ọ dị ya ka ọ 'na-ebelata', nakwa na 'iji dịrị ndụ karịa ọrịa a, ọ dị m mkpa karịa m - ọ bụghị obere - ibu, ọchịchọ ka ukwuu,' nke kpaliri ya ide ọtụtụ uri
Henderson-Holmes nwụrụ na Eprel 8, 2001, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ịse
N'agbanyeghị na ọ na-adọta nyocha ole na ole dị oke mkpa, Henderson-Holmes bụ onye ama ama na abụ nke obodo nke New York, e bipụtala ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ anthologies na mbipụta
Otu onye nkatọ si Amsterdam News kọwara Henderson-Holmes dị ka 'onye dị mma, ọkụ ọkụ, onye na-eme mgbanwe', na-ekwu na 'okwu uri ya dị egwu, ma na-egbu mgbu, na-egbu mkpụrụ obi'
Onye edemede na onye na-ede uri June Jordan dere na Henderson-Holmes nyere ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ 'ọkpụkpụ na ọṅụ na amara nke ọchị - na nkwenye nke ọrụ aka nke na-enweghị ike ịda'
Henderson-Holmes lụrụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri Preston Holmes, di na nwunye ahụ nwere otu nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Naimah
Safiya Hussaini Tungar Tudu onye amụrụ n'afọ 1967 bụ nwaanyị Nigerian a màrà ikpe ọnwụ n'ihi akwam iko Onye lụrụ di na 2002
Ọ mụrụ otu nwa na-alụghị di na Sokoto, steeti Naijiria nọ́ n'okpuru iwu Sharia
A mara ya ikpe ịtụ ya nkume, mana ewepụrụ ya na ebubo ya niile na Maachị 2002 ka emechara ya
Hussaini
A mara Hussaini ikpe ọnwụ itugbu ya na Ọktoba 2001 maka ebubo na ya na onye agbata obi ya lụrụ nwanyị dinara
Ọ mụrụ nwa ahụ mgbe ọ gbachara alụkwaghịm
Hussaini kwuru na nwoke ahụ bụ onye dakwasịrị ya n'ike ugboro ugboro, ndị ụlọ ikpe Sharia achọpụtaghị na ọ dara ikpe n'ihi enweghị akaebe
N'oge ikpe ahụ, Hussaini enweghị onye nnọchite iwu ọ bụla ma agwaghị ya ikike onwere ụlọ ikpe Sokoto kpochapụrụ akaebe ya wee maa ya ikpe na 12 Ọktoba 2001

Amamíkpé a bụ nke mba ụwa katọrọ ma dee akwụkwọ maka mgbapụta yaHalima Abdullahi, onye ntụziaka nke otu abụghị nke gọọmenti hiwere bụ Help Eliminate Loneliness and Poverty(HELP) kwutọkwara amam ikpe aN'okwu ya ọ sịrị na nke a bụ ihe ihere nyere otu Muslim nke Naịjirịa
Otú a kwuru na ikpe a ezighị ezi n'ihi amara Safiya ikpe onye nọ na di ma ọ gbala alukwaghịm

Nke ọzọkwa mmadụ anọ kwesịrị ịbụ ndị aka ebe dịka iwu Islam si dị bụ ndị ahughịHalima kwuru na nke a bụ n'ihi enweghị ọnụ,ma kpọkwa nke a nkewa n'ógó dị elu enwere ebe nwoke na nwanyị nọOtua gara n'ihu ịkpọku Gọvanọ Attahiru Bafarawa ka ọ tiyee ọnụ n'izọpụta ndụ Safiya￼
Hussaini rịọrọ, ndị ọka iwu ya na-arụ ụka na di mbụ nke Hussaini bụ nna nwa ya nwanyị dị otu afọ bụ Adama na nwanyị ahụ kwuru okwu mbụ ya n'okpuru nrụgide
N'ịga n'ihu, ha rụrụ ụka na ịkwa iko a na-ebo ebubo ewerela ọnọdụ tupu etinye iwu Sharia na steeti ahụ
E guzobere iwu sharia zuru oke na Sokoto na Jun 2000, otu ọnwa ka amụchara Adama
Onye gbachitere ya bụ onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na Naịjirịa bụ Hauwa Ibrahim
Hussaini meriri arịrịọ ya n'onwa Maachị 25, 2002 ma akagbuo ikpe ahụ
Ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị dị na Sokoto chọpụtara na ikpe ọnwụ nke ụlọ ikpe Alakụba kpere na Oktoba, enweghị isi
Ụlọ ikpe ahụ kpebiri na enweghị ike iji ihe ịkwa iko nke iwu Sharia nke Sokoto mee ihe ḿmegide nyere Safiya, ebe ọ bụ na ịkwa ikoa ana-ebo ebubo bụ tupu ewebata iwu Sharia na Sokoto
Mkpesa Hussaini mèchàrà bụrụ ihe edekọrọ n'akwụkwọ akpọrọ, Safiya Hussaini Tungar Tudu I, Safiya (2004)

Sagal Salad Osman, onye a makwaara dị ka Sagal Osman, (ihe dị ka n' afo 1992 ruo ubochi nke use n'afo 2016), onye Somalia na-emepụta ihe onyonyo na onye nta akụkọ maka Redio Mogadishu na Mogadishu, Somalia, bụ nwaanyị nta akụkọ nke abụọ e gburu n'ime ọnwa isii na Somalia, otu n'ime mba kacha dirii ndị nta akụkọ njo
Ekwenyere na Al-Shabaab, otu ndị agha nke jikọtara ya na Al-Qaeda, bụ ihe kpatara ọnwụ ya
Sagal Salad Osman, nwa nwanayị nke onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Somali Youth Organization Salad Osman، bụ onye nta akụkọ dị afọ iri abụọ na anọ
Osman bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Plasma, ebe ọ na-agu komputa sayensị Mgbe nne ya nwụsịrị, ọ lekọtara ụmụnne ya isii
Osman rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi na onye na-emepụta ihe na Redio Mogadishu nke gọọmentị
Ọ bụkwa onye nta akukomaka Somali National Television Tupu e gbuo ya, Osman bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na ihe onyonyo na onye na-akọ akụkọ

Na Sọnde, ka ones jun bars ubochi nke use n'2016, Osman ka gachara nzukọ iji kwadebe maka ule ikpeazụ ya wee soro ndị enyi ya gaa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị anya na Mahadum Plasma, mgbe e gburu ya n'ihe dị ka mgbe ojiri okala gafee elekere ato nke ehihie
umu nwoke atọ a na-amaghị aha ha ji égbè gbagbuo ya n' ihu mahadum ya na mpaghara Hodan dị n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Mogadishu
A kpọgara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ, mana ọ nwụrụ n'ụzọ
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ọrụ ibe ya gara ịmata ozu ya
Dị ka Ali Abdulkadir si kwuo, 'ha amaghị ihe mere e ji gbuo Osman'
Ndị ọrụ nchekwa Somalia wepụtara ozu ya n'ebe ahụ
Ndị uwe ojii nụrụ ụda égbè site n'ebe a gbagburu Osman wee gbaga ebe ahụ
[citation needed] Ka ha rutere ebe ahụ, ndị na-agba égbè agbapụlarị
Ọ dịghị onye e jidere maka mpụ ahụ ma ọ bụ kwuo na ọ bụ ya kpatara ogbugbu ahụ
Agbara Sagal Salad Osman egbe ọtụtụ ugboro n'isi na obi na June site n'aka ndị ikom atọ na mpaghara Hodan dị n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Mogadishu
[citation needed] Umu nwoke gburu Osman bụ ndị a na-enyo enyo na ha bụ ndị otu ndị agha jikọtara na Al-Qaeda a na-akpọ Shabaab
Ndị uwe ojii kwenyere na Al-Shabaab bụ onye kwadoro ogbugbu ahụ
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe na onye na-egosi ihe ngosi maka ụlọ ọrụ Redio Mogadishu nke gọọmentị na-achịkwa ma kwado ọrụ ya maka inye ndị ntorobịa ike site n'ịrụ ọrụ na telivishọn
Ndị nta akụkọ na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi, dị ka ebe Osman na-arụ, bụ ndị Shabaab na-elekwasị anya ugboro ugboro
Osman bụ nwaanyị nta akụkọ mbụ e gburu n'afo 2016, mana ọ bụ nwanayị nke abụọ e gburu n'ime ọnwa isii
Kemgbe afọ 1992, e gbuola ihe karịrị ndị nta akụkọ mmadu iri isii na Somalia, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime mba kachasị ize ndụ n'ụwa maka ndị ọrụ mgbasa ozi
Afọ kachasị njọ maka ndị nta akụkọ na Somalia bụ n'afọ 2012 mgbe ndị ọrụ mgbasa ozi iri na asato nwụrụ
N'agbata afọ 2007 na afọ 2015, e gburu ihe dị ka ndị nta akụkọ Somalia iri ano na ise
Anyị na-arịọ ndị ọchịchị ka ha mee nyocha ngwa ngwa na nke zuru oke iji mee ka ogbugbu a dị egwu doo anya ma mee ka ndị kpatara ya gaa n'ihu ikpe

Mohamed Ibrahim Moalimuu, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke National Union of Somali Journalists kwuru, sị, 'Anyị na-akatọ n'ụzọ siri ike o kwere mee, anyị na-akpọkwa gọọmentị ka o nyochaa ma mee ka ndị na-akwado ogbugbu ahụ gaa n'ihu ikpe
' France katọrọ ogbugbu Osman ma kwuo na a ga-ekpe ndị kpatara ọnwụ ya ikpe nakwa na a ga na-enyocha mpụ a n'ụzọ zuru ezu
Sahar Nasr (Arabic, amụrụ n'afọ 1964) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ijipt nke jere ozi dị ka Minista nke itinye ego na imekọ ihe ọnụ mba ụwa nke Arab Republic of Egypt (afo 2015-2019)
A mụrụ ya na afọ 1964, Nasr gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum America na afọ 1985 na nzere na akụ na ụba na mgbakọ na mwepụ, na afọ 1990 natara nzere masta
N'afọ 1993-1995, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na American Chamber of Commerce nke obodo Ijipt
N'afọ 1995-1996, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na Arthur Andersen audit company privatization project
Ọ nwetara PhD ya na ngalaba nke Economics na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Mahadum Cairo na ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2002, ka ọ bụrụ prọfesọ na Mahadum America kemgbe ahụ
N'afọ 2002-2011, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Associate Professor, Department of Economics, American and British University in Egypt
N'afọ 1996-2014, ọ ghọrọ onye ọkachamara, onye isi akụ na ụba, onye nhazi, onye nduzi mpaghara nke World Bank Fund
N'afọ 2015-2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka itinye ego na imekọ ihe ọnụ mba ụwa nke Arab Republic nke Ijipt
N'afọ 2021, ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ na Mahadum Al-Yamamah, Saudi Arabia
Ọ ghọkwara onye otu na '
Saheed Aderinto (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 22, 1979) bụ prọfesọ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naijiria na Amerịka na Mahadum Western Carolina na onye edemede mmeri
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Lagos Studies Association
Aderinto ebipụtala akwụkwọ asatọ, akwụkwọ akụkọ iri atọ na isii na isi akwụkwọ, akwụkwọ nkà ihe ọmụma iri anọ, na nyocha akwụkwọ iri abụọ
A mụrụ Aderinto na Ibadan (Nigeria) na Jenụwarị 22, 1979
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ elementrị ya na Adeen International School na 1990 na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Ibadan City Academy na 1996
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta BA na History na Mahadum nke Ibadan n'afọ 2004
Aderinto kwagara United States na 2005 iji gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Texas na Austin, ebe ọ natara MA na PhD ya na 2007 na 2010, n'otu n'otu
Na ọdịda nke afọ 2010, ọ malitere ọrụ nkuzi ya na Mahadum Western Carolina, Cullowhee NC
Aderinto na-emetụta usoro 'n'ozuzu' maka nchọpụta akụkọ ihe mere eme

Kama ịchọta echiche akụkọ ihe mere eme ma ọ bụ ihe omume naanị n'ime otu ngalaba nke akụkọ ihe mere eme (dịka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma ọ bụ akụ na ụba), Aderinto na-anakwere usoro zuru oke nke na-agbaziri okwu, usoro, na ngwá ọrụ mkparịta ụka site na ọtụtụ ọzụzụ na obere ọzụzụ
Ọ bụ echiche ndị na-adịghị 'n'elu-compartmentalize' akụkọ ihe mere eme kama ha na-ejikọta ihe ọmụma dị iche iche n'ịghọta oge gara aga
Site na ọrụ gbasara ụmụaka na mmekọahụ na égbè na anụmanụ, ọ gbasaa ókèala nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naijiria, na-akpaghasị ókè ịdọ aka ná ntị n'ụzọ bara uru
Mbipụta Aderinto kwekọrọ na usoro nyocha nke 'Third Wave of Historical Scholarship on Nigeria'

Ndị ọkà mmụta nke oge a nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naijiria, dị ka o gosipụtara n'otu n'ime akwụkwọ ya nwere aha yiri nke ahụ, na-akpali echiche site na mkpa ọ dị igosi mkpa akụkọ ihe mere eme na Naịjirịa nke oge a
A na-adọta Aderinto na isiokwu dị ka mmekọahụ, nke ndị bu ya ụzọ na-ala azụ ide banyere ya na ndị a na-enyocha n'okpuru dị ka ụmụaka, na-etinye ahụmịhe ha n'etiti okwu ọchịchị nke oge a

Ọzọkwa, ọ na-agbagha ọnụọgụ abụọ siri ike n'etiti echiche colonial na postcolonial site n'igosi na e kwesịghị iji oge akụkọ ihe mere eme ihe n'ụzọ siri ike na-ekwesịghị ekwesị; kama ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme kwesịrị ịghọta ọganihu na mgbanwe na isi usoro na usoro ndị mepụtara ha
Aderinto abụghị onye ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme mbụ kwupụtara mkpa ọ dị ijikọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naijiria tupu ọchịchị, ọchịchị, na mgbe ọchịchị biri iji mepụta echiche zuru oke

Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọkà mmụta ole na ole na-etinye nke a n'ọrụ site n'itinye epilogues e ji nlezianya dee na-elekwasị anya na oge postcolonial na akwụkwọ na oge colonial - ebe ọ na-enyekwa isi dị iche na oge precolonial
Mmụta Aderinto banyere ịhụnanya, agụụ ịhụnanya, na mmetụta uche, na-eguzo n'okporo ụzọ nke nwoke na nwanyị, agbụrụ, ọkwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na nhazi ike n'ofe oge na ohere

Aderinto bụ onye edemede nke When Sex Threatened the State Illicit Sexuality, Nationalism, and Politics in Colonial Nigeria, 1900–1958 (University of Illinois Press, 2015) onye mmeri nke 2016 Nigerian Studies Association's Book Award Prize for themost important scholarly book/work on Nigeria published in English language” Akwụkwọ a na-enyocha 'njikọ nke ọrụ mmekọahụ na ọrụ alaeze ukwu na British Nigeria'

A kọwara ya dị ka 'akụkọ ihe mere eme mbụ zuru oke nke mmekọahụ nke ọchịchị Naịjirịa' Ọ 'na-ejikọta ọmụmụ nke demimonde nke ndị ọchịchị na akụkọ obodo ukwu nke Lagos na ileba anya na iwu gọọmentị iji tụleghachi akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndụ ọha na eze Naịjirịa

' Onye nkatọ ọzọ chere na 'Saheed Aderinto ewepụtala onyinye dị oke mkpa na akụkọ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'Afrịka na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naijiria 'Mgbe Mmekọahụ Na-eyi Steeti egwu ka e nyochala ya na ihe karịrị akwụkwọ akụkọ iri na abụọ, gụnyere Canadian Journal of African Studies, American Historical Review, International Journal of African Historical Studies, Africa Journal of the International African Institute, Canadian Journal of History, Journal of the History of Sexuality, Journal of West African History, the Historian, na Journal of Colonialism and Colonial History, tinyere ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụkwa onye edemede nke Guns and Society in Colonial Nigeria Firearms, Culture, and Public Order (Indiana University Press, 2018) [citation needed]
Akwụkwọ a na-enyocha mgbanwe nke Naịjirịa n'ime ọha mmadụ na-agba égbè n'oge ọkara mbụ nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ
N'akwụkwọ a, Aderinto kọwara mmekọrịta dị mgbagwoju anya dị n'etiti ndị Naịjirịa na égbè dị ka ihe dị mkpa nke nzute ndị ọchịchị Afrịka
Ndị sonyere na ogbako ahụ kwuru ihe dị mkpa inwe nzukọ iji mee ka ọrụ nke ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ na ndị na-abụghị ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ na Lagos kwekọọ
Ha tụrụ aro ka e hiwe LSA

N'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 2017, Aderinto duziri nguzobe nke LSA dị ka 'òtù mba ụwa, nke dị iche iche nke ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ na ndị na-abụghị ndị agụmakwụkwọ, ndị mmasị ha na-elekwasị anya na Lagos na ndị ya

' LSA na-ahazi Nzukọ Lagos kwa afọ nke a na-eme na Lagos (Nigeria) ma na-enwe panel na nzukọ mba ụwa nke African Studies Association nke United States na African Studies Association nke United Kingdom

Saheed Balogun (mgbe ụfọdụ a na-ede ya 'Saidi') (amụrụ na Febụwarị 5, 1967) bụ onye amaara na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Saheed Balogun na 5th nke Febụwarị, 1967, na Enugu State, South-east Nigeria mana o si Oyo State, Nigeria ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị, sekọndrị na nke elu n'otu n'otu
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Kwara State Polytechnic
Ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 1978, ebe ọ gosipụtara ihe omume telivishọn mbụ ya nke akpọrọ 'Youth Today' na NTA
O mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya nke akpọrọ City Girl n'afọ 1989 mana egosipụtala, mepụta ma duzie ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa tupu mgbe ahụ
Saheed Balogun lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri onyonyo nollywood, Fathia Balogun mana ọ dị nwute na ha kewara ma gbaa alụkwaghịm
O nwere naanị ụmụ abụọ Khalid na Aliyah Balogun

Akorede Babatunde Okunola (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke 7 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1969) nke a makwaara aha ya bụ Saheed Osupa ma ọ bụ King Saheed Osupa (KSO) bụ onye egwu Fuji nke Naijiria, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye mmepụta Hip Fuji
A mụrụ Saheed Osupa na mpaghara Mosafejo nke Ajegunle, Lagos Steeti mana o tolitere dị ka nwata na Ibadan, isi obodo Oyo Steeti
Nna ya, Moshood Ajiwere Layeye bụ onye na-agu egwu Wéré ma bụrụkwa nwa nwanne nna nke onye egwu Fuji Ayinde Barrister
Saheed Osupa gara Amuwo Odofin High School nke dị na na Lagos, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1987
N'afọ 1992, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ Diploma Mba na Ụlọ akwụkwọ pọliteknik Ibadan mgbe ọ gụsịrị Business Administration
Ọ bụ onye gụrụ akwụkwọ na American International College ebe ọ gụrụ Ọrụ netwọk
Saheed Osupa malitere egwu mgbe ọ dịna ntorobịa na ụma n'afọ 1983 dị ka onye na-ese fuji
Abọm mbụ ya akpọrọ Fuji Fa Disco, Followed by Fuji Blues
O weputara ihe karịrị abọm studio iri anọ gụnyere abọm studio anọ n'ime otu nke akpọrọ Mr
Music N'afọ 2008, Ayinde Barrister kwupụtara Saheed Osupa dịka 'Eze Fuji Music'
Saheed Osupa bụ HIP FUJI Creator, Na 12 nke June 2018 ọ wepụtara hip Fuji Album mbụ ya nke akpọrọ Enweghị nkwụsị
Na 20 Disemba 2014 Saheed Osupa wepụtara egwu hip hop akpọrọ 'Vanakula' nke K-Solo mepụtara
Na 13 Eprel 2015, o wepụtara egwu K-Solo ọzọ akpọrọ 'African Beauty' na olu sitere na Yetunde Omobadan
Na 8 Ọgọstụ 2015, o gosipụtara Seriki na egwu ọzọ akpọrọ 'Womi'
Na Nọvemba 7, 2015, e depụtara Saheed Osupa na The NET's 'Most Successful Nigerian musicians'
Saheed Osupa apụtawo na ihe nkiri Yoruba karịrị iri atọ
Saheed Osupa na Wasiu Alabi Pasuma enweela ọtụtụ asọmpi
Ihe kachasị ama bụ ọgụ ha maka ihe ịga nke ọma na 1998/1999 na maka ịdị elu gburugburu 2007
Osupa onye kwenyere na ezigbo enyi ya, Pasuma ga-akwado ya na esemokwu ya na ndị egwu Fuji ndị ọzọ ọkachasị Alhaji Wasiu Ayinde
Pasuma n'agbanyeghị nke ahụ weere akụkụ nke K1 D ikpeazụ ma bụrụ onye osote K1
Saheed Osupa wepụtara ihe dị ka ihe ndekọ iri na-ekwu maka mmanụ ụgbọala ndị a ma ha niile nwere ihe ịga nke ọma
Ọ kpọọrọ ndị niile ya na ha dịkọrọ ndụ ka ha na-ehicha ma nye ya onye mmeri na Eze nke Music (Fuji)
O mechara wepụta abọm mbụ 4-in-1 n'afọ 2007/2008 aha ya bụ nkwado
Abọm a rere ihe karịrị nde iri abụọ n'ụwa niile
A na-akpọ ya dị ka otu n'ime abọm ya kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na abọm Fuji kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na narị afọ nke iri abụọ
ọ gara n'ihu nweta ihe nrite na nsọpụrụ
Esemokwu a na-aga n'ihu n'afọ 2012 gasịrị
Saheed Osupa kwuru na ọtụtụ nzukọ udo na-enweghị isi mere n'afọ 2010 na 2011
Onye agha agha na ọrụ mba ofesi Etiopia, Sahle-Work jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchianya na Senegal, na ikike na Mali, Cape Verde, Guinea-Bissau, Gambia na Guinea, site na 1989 ruo 1993
Site na 1993 ruo 2002, ọ bụ onye nnọchiteanya na Djibouti na nke na-adịgide adịgide
Onye nnochite anya otu Intergovernmental Authority on Development (IGAD)

O mechara bụrụ onye nnọchi anya France, onye nnọchi anya na-adịgide adịgide na United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organisation (UNESCO) wee nweta ikike na Tunisia na Morocco site na 2002 ruo 2006

Sahndra Fon Dufe (amụrụ 28 Ọktoba 1989) bụ onye omere Cameroon, onye ode akwụkwọ, onye na-ese ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, na onye isi oche nke ụlọ mmepụta Indie African Pictures International
Ọ pụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri mba ụwa, gụnyere Otu abalị na Vegas na Black November
Onye na-abụ abụ Cameroon Said Barah akpọwo ya 'Young Oprah ' n'otu n'ime egwu ya a na-akpọ Sahndra Fon Dufe, na-enwe mmasị na nkà okike ya na mmetụta mkpali maka ụmụ agbọghọ na Africa dum

Ọrụ ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ ọ gosiputara gụnyere Yurika in Frank Rajah 's Refugees (2013) egosiputara Yvonne Nelson, Kwuni in Unconditional Love (2013) na John Dumelo, na Patience na obere ihe nkiri The Successor of Katunga(2013)

N'afọ 2012, ya na Ụlọ Ọrụ Embassy United States dị na Yaoundé, Cameroon na-arụkọ ọrụ iji hazie ọzụzụ maka ndị na-eto eto na-eme ihe nkiri site na Ụlọ Nzukọ Mba Nile nke jikọrọ aka nke a na-akpọ Know Your Craft International
Sahndra na-akwadokwa ndị na-eto eto na-eme ihe nkiri site na mmemme mmụta kwa afọ na Lourdes College, Cameroon
Ọ bụkwa olu maka Project New Bamenda, ọrụ ewepụtara iji kwado ndị na-eto eto Cameroon ndị ọchụnta ego si North West Region nke Cameroon
Fon Dufe malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ọkachamara na ihe nkiri Cameroon mgbe ọ na-agụ iwu na Mahadum Buea na Cameroon
N'amaghị nne na nna ya, ọ gbara n'ime ihe nkiri obodo abụọ dịka onye na-akwado
Enah Johnscott duziri ihe nkiri a wee kesaa ya na 2009
Fon Dufe meriri ọtụtụ ihe nrite gụnyere nkwanye ugwu sitere na Commonwealth of Nations maka uri ya 'Ezigbo mama'
Asụsụ Saho–Afar (a makwaara dị ka Afar–Saho) bụ otu olumba-ụyọkọ nke ngalaba Cushitic nke ezinụlọ Afro-Asia
Ha gụnyere asụsụ Afar na Saho, nke a na-asụ na Djibouti, Eritrea na Etiopia
Njirimara Saho-Afar gụnyere ihe ndị a
Asụsụ Saho (Tigrinya ሳሆኛ/ቋንቋ ሳሆ) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na Eritrea, Sudan na Ethiopia
Ọ bụ nke alaka Cushitic nke ezinụlọ ahụ
Saho bụ ndị Saho na-asụ ya

Na omenala, ha na-ebi n'ókèala Eritrea nke dị n'akụkụ mmiri Erafayle nke dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ, ndagwurugwu Laasi Ghedé na ndịda, na ugwu ndị Eritrea dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ (ógbè Shimejana dị n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke South- ma ọ bụ Debub mpaghara na ihe dị na ya
nke a na-akpọbu Akele Guzai region)
Mpaghara okwu a dị n'akụkụ obodo ndị ọzọ na-asụ Afro-Asiatic, ndị na-asụ Tigre n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ yana ndị na-asụ Afar n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ
Na Etiopia, Saho ma ọ bụ Assawort bụ isi na-asụ na mpaghara Tigray
O nwere ihe dị ka ndị na-ekwu okwu 200,000 na mkpokọta yana isi olumba anọ Asawurta, Toroa Minifero, Eda, Tabota Hazu Hasabat-ara na Irob
Saho nwere njikọ chiri anya na asụsụ Kushitic Afar nke ndị Afar na-asụ dị ka asụsụ ala nna, nke mere na ụfọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ na-ewere asụsụ abụọ ahụ dị ka olumba nke otu 'asụsụ Saho-Afar'
Agbanyeghị, egosila na opekata mpe na akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu ha abụọ enwere ike kewaa nke ọma
Saho nwere njikọ chiri anya na asụsụ Kushitic Afar nke ndị Afar na-asụ dị ka asụsụ ala nna, nke mere na ụfọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ na-ewere asụsụ abụọ ahụ dị ka olumba nke otu 'asụsụ Saho-Afar'
Agbanyeghị, egosila na opekata mpe na akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu ha abụọ enwere ike kewaa nke ọma
Sahra Mohamed Ali Samatar, nke a makwaara dị ka Sahra Ali Samatar bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Somalia
Ọ bụ onye bụbu Minista nke Ụmụ nwanyị na Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ nke Somalia, ebe onye bụbu Praịm Minista Omar Abdirashid Ali Sharmarke họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 27 Jenụwarị 2015
N'oge ọ nọ n'ọkwa, o webatara mmachibido iwu maka igbupụ akụkụ ahụ nwanyị na mba niile ma rụọ ọrụ maka ikike nhata maka ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị na Somalia
Nwa nwanyị nke Mohammad Ali Samatar, ọ bụ onye ezinụlọ Tumal
A họpụtara Sahra Mohamed Ali Samatar ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Praịm Minista Omar Abdirashid Ali Sharmarke dị ka Minista nke Ụmụ nwanyị na Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ na 27 Jenụwarị 2015
Ọ so na mgbanwe iri abụọ Sharmarke mere na kansụl, nke gụnyere ọtụtụ ndị minista na-amalite na mgbakwunye na Samatar
Samatar kwupụtara ebumnuche gọọmentị machibido igbu akụkụ ahụ nwanyị n'ụwa niile n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2015
O kwuru na 'Oge eruola ka anyị kpochapụ omume ọjọọ a ma chebe ikike ụmụ agbọghọ na ụmụ nwanyị na mba anyị, onye ọ bụla nwere ikike iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe ma enweghị ike imebi ya
Ibi úgwù ụmụ nwanyị bụ omume obi ọjọọ na nke na-emebi ihe ma bụrụ ihe yiri ịta ahụhụ
A machibidoro ibi úgwù ụmụ agbọghọ
' Mgbanwe a sochiri mmachibido iwu mpaghara na mpaghara Puntland na 2014
Ọ gara emume iji mee emume Ụbọchị Ụmụ nwanyị na Mogadishu na Machị 2015

N'ọnwa Julaị, Samatar katọrọ asịrị gbasara iwu okike ọhụrụ nke chọrọ inye ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị ikike hà nhata, mgbe asịrị gbasara na ọ na-eme ka alụmdi na nwunye nwoke na nwanyị bụrụ nke iwu kwadoro n'ụzọ megidere iwu Alakụba, na-akpọ nkwupụta ahụ 'mgbasa ozi na akụkọ na-enweghị isi'
Samatar bụ onye otu ezinụlọ Tumal
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke Mohammad Ali Samatar, onye bụbu praịm minista na osote onye isi ala nke Somalia, onye sonyere na nnupụisi ndị agha nke Siad Barre na 1969

Said Adrus bụ onye na-ese ihe na Ugandan-British amụrụ na afọ 1958 na Uganda
N'ime afọ 1980, a kọwara ihe oyiyi ya dị ka ihe osise kọmputa na ákwà
O mechara tụgharịa na mgbasa ozi gwakọtara na ụzọ mgbasa ozi dị iche iche nke ịrụ ọrụ, na-anwale onyonyo na-agagharị na ngosipụta iheonyonyo

Kemgbe afọ 2015, ọ na-ejikọta ọrụ mgbasa ozi dijitalụ ya na ihe dị iche iche na-ezo aka na njem ya site n'ụsọ oké osimiri Afrịka na Eshia gaa na Western hemisphere, na-akọwa mbata na mbata na ọnọdụ nke oge a
Ọ na-ezo aka na Andy Warhol dị ka mmetụta na ọrụ collage ya, na-eji ihe Warhol na-eme na omenala nka ọdịda anyanwụ tụnyere ịkwanye ókèala nke eserese mgbe ọ na-edebe ihe ya
Adrus bi ma na-eme ihe na UK, Switzerland, na mba ndị ọzọ na Europe
A mụrụ Adrus n'aka nne na nna Gujarati Muslim na afọ 1958 na Kampala, Uganda, n'ihe a maara n'oge ahụ dị ka British East Africa
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara ebe ahụ n'ihi na ha bụ akụkụ nke ọrụ ndị Britain na-achị nke ịkwaga ndị South Asia na East Africa iji wuo ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Ha wee kwaga Switzerland, ebe ha ka bi
Adrus wee kwaga Britain, n'ihi na Idi Amin chụpụrụ ụmụ ndị ọrụ Gujarati, ọtụtụ n'ime ha kwagara UK
Adrus nwere BAHons) na Fine Art nke Nottingham Trent Polytechnic nyere
Ọ bụ onye na-asụ ọtụtụ asụsụ, na-asọpụta German, French, Hindi, Gujarati na Bekee
Said Bey bụ onye mba Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ọchị
Said Naciri (nke a makwaara dịka Saeed El Nasry ma ọ bụ Saïd Naciri) (a mụrụ na Casablanca n'afọ 1960) bụ onye mba Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ọchị na onye na-emepụta ihe
Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ mmemme TV Moroccan na ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2000, e gosipụtara egwuregwu ya 'Onye ohi ma ọ bụ onye aka ike' n'ụlọ ihe nkiri
O mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ Ouled Derb (na French Le Pote) nke Hassan Benjelloun duziri
N'afọ 2003, ọ malitere ọrụ dịka onye nduzi na ihe nkiri ya Les Bandits ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ nwoke
Saïd Naciri duziri ọtụtụ telivishọn na arụmụka TV maka telivisheneng Moroccan
Said Tarabeek (Arabic; April 17, 1941 -November 15, 2015) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, telivishọn na elu nkwago
A kpọgara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ mgbe ọ na-arịa ọrịa obi, nke mechara duga na nkụchi obi na ọnwụ ya
Saida Agrebi (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 22, 1945 na Tunisia) bụ onye otu Economic, Social and Cultural Council nke African Union, na-anọchite anya North Africa
Ọ na-anọdụkwa na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu Pan-African na-anọchite anya Tunisia
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum California, Berkeley na nzere masta na ahụike ọha

Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na ahụike ọmụmụ na ezinụlọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na California na Maryland, onye nkuzi nke ahụike ọha na eze na Native-American reservations na steeti Arizona, na onye nkuzi banyere ahụike ọmụmụ n'Jamaica
Ms Agrebi sonyeere Arab Labour Organisation ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nke Bureau of the Arab Working Woman ruo 1987

A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nke nkwukọrịta na National Office for Family and Population, wee bulie ya n'ọkwa osote onye isi nchịkwa nke ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo n'afọ otu puku narị itoolu, iri itoolu na ise
N'afọ 1995, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi nchịkwa nke Office of Tunisians Abroad, tupu a họpụta ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya na Chamber of Deputies nke Tunisia n'afọ 1999
Dị ka ọkachamara n'isiokwu dị iche iche, gụnyere ọmụmụ na ahụike ọha na eze, ikike ụmụ nwanyị, ọha na eze na ịkwaga mba ọzọ, Ms Agrebi esonyewo na ihe omume UN dị iche iche
O bipụtakwala isiokwu dị iche iche gbasara ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ebe ọrụ, ụmụ nwanyị Arab, ụmụ nwanyị ime obodo, na atụmatụ ezinụlọ n'asụsụ Bekee, French na Arabic
N'afọ puku na ato mgbe AWCPDX gara nke ọma maka ịkpa ókè nwoke na nwanyị na AU, Ms Agrebi bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ise a họpụtara na Kọmitii AU na Nzukọ Ezumezu nke Abụọ na Maputo, Mozambique

E wezụga ịbụ onye otu AWCPD, Ms Agrebi bụ onye otu ọtụtụ òtù ndị ọzọ, gụnyere osote onye isi oche nke FEMNET, osote onye nduzi nke World Organisation of the Family, ndị otu na Femmes Africa Solidarité, na ntọala onye isi oche ya nke International Arab Women, Tunisian Mothers Association na Organisation of Magreb Mothers
O nwetara ọtụtụ otuto maka ọrụ ya Onye isi ala Ben Ali nke Tunisia gosipụtara nke kachasị ọhụrụ
Saidal Group (Arabic, French) bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ọgwụ na Algeria nke e guzobere na 1982
Saidal Group bụ ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ kachasị ukwuu na Algeria na otu n'ime ndị kasị ukwuu n'Africa
Saidal Group na-ebupụ ngwaahịa ya na Ivory Coast, Gabon, Senegal, Cameroon, Mali, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Republic of the Kongo, Niger, Togo, Benin, Guinea-Bissau, Chad na Mauritania
E kere Saidal n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 19gyh82 mgbe e mezigharịrị ụlọ ọgwụ Algeria Central Pharmacy
N'afọ 1985, ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Saidal
Na 1989, Saidal ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze akụ na ụba, otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ mba mbụ nwetara ọkwa nke ụlọ ọrụ ngwaahịa ọnụ na 1993
Na 1997, Saidal gbanwere ghọọ otu ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, nke Biotic, Pharmal na Antibiotical jikọtara ya
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2022, otu ahụ kwupụtara mmalite nke ụlọ ọrụ mbụ ya a na-akpọ 'Equival'
Saïdal bụ ndị isi ya
Saidat Adegoke (amụrụ 24 Septemba 1985 na Ilorin, Kwara State) bu onye n’agba bọọlụ nke ala Naijiria
Adegoke n'afọ 2007 gbaara ndi Remo Queens bọọlụ na Nigeria, na Italian Serie A ọ gbaara ACF Trento
Mgbe ọ gbachara ACF Trento ebe o nyelu goolu atọ, ya gaa ACF Milan na 2008
Na Milan, o nyelu goolu iri na itoolu mecha banye na FCF Como 2000
Kemgbe afọ 2010 ka ọ nọ n'otu ndị ụmụnwaanyị n'agbaara Naịjirịa bọl
Saidat Onanuga (amuru na ọnwa 18 June nke afọ 1974) bụ onye Naijiria bụ onye oso oso egwu na ubi nke puru iche na mita 400
Ọ zọkwara asọmpi n'ọsọ mita narị anọ
Ọ nọchiri anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi egwuregwu mba ụwa n'afọ 1997, na-asọ mpi dị ka onye ọzọ
Onanuga malitere ọrụ ya na mita 800, wee nweta aha mba Naijiria na 1990 na 1991 tupu ọ banye na 400 m sprint na ihe mgbochi
Ngosipụta na 1992 World Junior Championships n'egwuregwu bịara n'oge na-adịghị anya
O hiwere onwe ya dika onye isi na 1996 African Championships in Athletics, ebe ọ bụ onye nyere ihe nrite ọla edo na 400 abụọ ahụ m na 400 m nsogbu
O nwetara ọla edo ya nke atọ n'asọmpi a na mgbagharị mita 4 × 400
Nke a pụtara na ọ bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ kacha elu nke ọrụ ya n'otu n'otu, n'agbanyeghị na ọ meriri ihe nrite ọla na mgbanaka ọla edo na asọmpi egwuregwu 1998 nke Africa na egwuregwu 1999 All-Africa
Onanuga meriri na asọmpi kọleji America maka ndị UTEP Miners
Asọmpi ndị otu egwuregwu mahadum Naịjirịa nyere ohere ka achọpụta nka egwuregwu Onanuga wee bute ya na kọleji America were were ya n'ọrụ - ihe na-eto eto n'oge ahụ
Àtụ Footer African Champions women's 400 metres hurdles

Usagi Tsukino (月野 うさぎ, Tsukino Usagi, renamed 'Serena Tsukino' or 'Bunny Tsukino' in some foreign adaptations), better known as Sailor Moon (セーラームーン, Sērā Mūn), is a Japanese superheroine and the main protagonist and title character of the Sailor Moon manga series written by Naoko Takeuchi
She is introduced in chapter #1, 'Usagi – Sailor Moon' (originally published in Japan's Nakayoshi magazine on December 28, 1991), as a carefree Japanese schoolgirl who can transform into Sailor Moon

Initially believing herself to be an ordinary girl, she is later revealed to be the reincarnated form of the Princess of the Moon Kingdom, and she subsequently discovers her original name, Princess Serenity (プリンセス・セレニティ, Purinsesu Sereniti)
Na Sailor Moon, Usagi zutere Luna, nwamba ojii na-ekwu okwu nke na-achọ Princess Moon
Luna kpughere na Usagi ga-azọpụta ụwa n'aka ike nke ihe ọjọọ ma nye ya brọsh iji gbanwee ghọọ Sailor Moon
Ọ rịọrọ Usagi ka ọ guzobe ndị Sailor Guardians, chọta adaeze ha ma chebe 'Silver Crystal'
Ka Usagi na-etolite, ọ na-aghọ onye agha dị ike ma na-echebe mbara ala nna ya, Ụwa, site na ndị ọjọọ chọrọ imerụ ya ahụ
A na-egosipụta Usagi dị ka onye na-enweghị nchegbu na onye obi ụtọ, mana na-enwe àgwà mkpu ụmụaka nke na-egosi onwe ha mgbe ihe na-agaghị ya

Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Usagi na-apụta na ihe nkiri ọ bụla, ihe nkiri, egwuregwu vidio, na telivishọn pụrụ iche nke mmegharị anime, Sailor Moon na Sailor Moon Crystal; yana mmegharị ihe omume ndụ, Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon
Ọ bịakwara na usoro nwanne nwanyị Codename Sailor V
Ọ bụla isiokwu nke parodies wee pụta na mmemme pụrụ iche
Ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ntị Western ka ewebatara Usagi na-apụta na anime Sailor Moon, nke bụ mmegharị nke usoro manga
Nnabata nke Usagi dị oke egwu abụrụla nke ọma na a matara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị dike nwanyị kachasị mkpa na ewu ewu n'oge niile

Obinna Nwafor (à mụrụ na Nọvemba 16, 1965) nke a ma ama dị ka Saint Obi, bu onye omee ejije , onye na -emeputa ejije na onye nduzi ejije n'ala Naijiria
Saint Obi bụ onye a mara site n'agwa ya n'ejije ndị a, Candle Light, Sakobi, Goodbye Tomorrow, Heart of Gold, Festival of Fire, Executive Crime and Last Party
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara ejije na Mahadum Jos
Saint Obi batara na n'ịme ejije n'afọ 1996, ka o mechara mkpọsa maka Peugeot na NTA

N'afọ 2001, Saint Obi wepụtara ejije mbụ ya a kpọrọ Take Me to Maama, ebe ya na Jerry, tinyere Ebi Sam, Rachel Oniga, Nse Abel na Enebeli Elebuwa so wee mee ya
