Mechouia salad (Arabic , salata mashwiya, 'salad e siri esi') bụ saladị Tunisian

Nri mbụ ama ama sitere na mba Tunisia, mba dị na Ugwu Afrika nke nwere mmasị na ụtọ, a na-eri ya karịsịa n'oge ọkọchị, ọ bụkwa akwụkwọ nri e siri esi, tomato, ose, yabasị na saladị galik, nke nwekwara ike ịnwe ihe okụkụ akwa
A na-esi ha n'ọkụ ma ọ bụ n'elu stove wee gwakọta ha ọnụ, tinye ha ihe na-atọ ụtọ, mgbe ahụ a na-agbakwunye tuna na mmanụ oliv, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-etinye àkwá esiri esi maka ịchọ mma
Slata Mechouia bụ isi ihe oriri nke antioxidant lycopene nke metutara ọtụtụ uru ahụike, gụnyere mbelata ihe ize ndụ nke ọrịa obi na ọrịa kansa
Ha bụkwa nnukwu isi iyi nke vitamin C jupụtara, potassium, folate na vitamin K
Ọ nwere fibar, vitamin E na C
Ndị Ugwu Afrika na-eji ya belata ọzịza na ọgwụgwọ ọrịa
Salah Elmur nke a na-akpọkwa Salah El Mur (amụrụ na 1966, Khartoum, Sudan) bụ onye Sudan na-ese ihe, onye na-ese foto, onye na'akwụkwọ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Khartoom
Enwere ike ịkọwa ụdị ihe osise Elmur dị ka obere enweghị usoro na nke na-adịghị adị, mana ọ bụghị ruo n'ókè nke enweghị nghọta
Ojiji ọ na-eji agba eme ihe na-akwado ụda olu siri ike na ihe osise dị arọ nke na-agbakwunye ụcha ụcha mgbe ụfọdụ
'Ụcha dị n'ihe osise m siri ike n'ihi anyanwụ dị na mba m nakwa n'ihi ndị nọ ebe ahụ, ndị na-enwe mmasị iyi uwe mara mma', ka Salah Elmur kwuru
Ihe ndị ahụ na-egosipụta ikike mmetụta uche a na-echebeghị; ọ bụ ezie na ihe osise ahụ anaghị agụnye ihe omume ma ọ bụ omume dị mkpa, ihu ọ bụla yiri ka ọ nwere akụkọ n'azụ ya
Elmur bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ese foto, onye na na-ese onyinyo na onye dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ụmụaka
Museum of African Contemporary Art Al Maaden (MACAAL), The Sharjah Art Museum na Sharjah Art Foundation (SAF)
E gosipụtara ihe osise ya na Egypt, UAE, Sudan, Syria, Jordan, France, Washington DC, Uganda, na Kenya n'etiti ebe ndị ọzọ
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ngosi otu na British Museum na London, nsọpụrụ a na-adịghị ahụkebe maka onye na-ese ihe n'oge a si Sudan
N'afọ 2013, ihe ngosi Elmur 'Eyes Stream' sitere na mkpali site na aha mgbidi oge ochie na Cairo, 'Wall of Hungarian Eyes'
Ọ tụgharịrị uche na akara ahụ, wee kpebie inyocha anya mmadụ na usoro ihe osise ndị na-adịbeghị anya
Usoro 2011 ya nke akpọrọ 'Circus' gosipụtara agba siri ike, yana ihe ngosi pụrụ iche nke Elmur, ma ọ bụ ụdị nka uche

E nwere ịnyịnya na-acha nchara nchara nke nwere akpụkpọ ụkwụ na-acha oroma na-egbuke egbuke n'okpuru ụkwụ ya ma ọ bụ nwoke ahụ ire ya na-apụta, dị njikere ịta n'ime iberibe mmiri na-eto eto nke na-ezo aka na ndị bịara na circus na picnics ha, mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị na-etolite na Sudan
Mkpụrụ osisi bụ isiokwu kachasị amasị Elmur
Enwere ike ịchọta ha ugboro ugboro na ihe osise ya, dịka ndị mmadụ na ụmụ anụmanụ
Ọrụ ọhụrụ ya site na 2006 gosipụtara ụmụ ahụhụ, mkpụrụ osisi na ndị mmadụ, yana usoro sitere na 2007 nke akpọrọ 'Guards'
Ugboro ugboro, ọ bụ nnụnụ n'ụdị na agba dị iche iche nke ọ na-egosi na ihe osise ndị ahụ -‐ na-anọdụ n'isi mmadụ ma ọ bụ n'ogwe aka, na-ama jijiji na eriri ma ọ bụ na-efe elu n'elu ihe oyiyi ndị ọzọ
Ihe ngosi ahụ na ebe obibi nke European Commission na Cairo, nke Stefania Angarano si Mashrabia Gallery na Cairo haziri ma hazie bụ ihe ngosi nke atọ nke Elmur na isi obodo Ijipt
Mgbe ọ mechiri ọnụ ụzọ ya na ngwụcha Mee, nchịkọta nke ihe osise ahụ gara Washington, DC, ebe egosiri ha na African Cultural Centre ruo otu ọnwa
Iji ihe ọdịnala n'ụzọ nke oge a bụ ihe na-eweta ọdịiche dị n'ụdị Elmur
'Ihe osise ya jupụtara na akara na ememe, mana ọ dịghị mgbe ọ doro anya ihe ha bụ n'ezie nke na-eme ka ha bụrụ ihe omimi na ihe mara mma

N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2018, ihe ngosi nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke nwata na mmalite ndụ Elmur, nke a na-akpọ 'fragrances of the Forest na Photos ngosi ihe karịrị ọrụ nka iri na Sharjah Art Museum, United Arab Emirates
N'ebe a, ihe osise Elmur na-eduga onye na-ekiri ya site na njem nchọpụta onwe onye, na-egosi ụfọdụ ahụmahụ ya nke itolite na Khartoum
Ọrụ ndị ahụ gosipụtara nchọpụta ya n'okporo ámá obodo ahụ na ime obodo ndị gbara ya gburugburu dị ka nwatakịrị
Na Septemba 2018, Elmur sonyere na ihe ngosi otu na Kamala Ishaq na Ibrahim El-Salahi na Saatchi Gallery na London, nke akpọrọ 'Forests and Spirits Figurative art from the Khartoum School'
Ihe ngosi a bu n'uche ịdọrọ uche gaa na nka Africa nke oge a, ọkachasị mmetụta nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Khartoum, ihe ngosi nka sitere na College of Fine and Applied Arts nke obodo ahụ
Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Elmur eduziwo ma mepụta ihe nkiri isii dị mkpirikpi, nke dị n'etiti ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri fantasy
O meriri Jury Prize (nkwado pụrụ iche) maka ihe nkiri ya 'Heaven's Bird' na mmemme International Short Film 'Images that matter' na Ethiopia n'afọ 2010
Elmur anọwokwa na-arụsi ọrụ ike dị ka onye na-ede egwu na onye na-ese nke akwụkwọ ụmụaka, nke Grandir Publishing na Syros bipụtara na Arabic, French, Italian, na Spanish
Karịsịa, o bipụtara utu aha ndị a n'asụsụ French ː Chacodileá (Grandir, 2002), 'Jameil et Jamila Conte Baggara du Soudan' ederede nke Patricia Musa (Grandir

2003), 'Diakhere, la Cadette Contes de Mauritanie' ederede nke Mamadou Sall (Lirabelle, 2006), ːSous Le Soleil, ederede nke Badr Eddine Arodaky (Syros, 2007), Ōne Famille d'Artiste (Grandir et Quian, 2010), Ōn, Pu Pu Pu Pu, Pu Pu, Grand, Pu, Pu, 2010), Patricia

Salaheddin Ahmed Farag Fakroun ( Arabic ; a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke 8 n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1999), nke a maara dị ka Salah Fakroun ( Arabic ), bụ onye mba Libya na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agba bọọlụ na-agba bọọlụ na Libya Premier League Al-Nasr Benghazi na ndị otu mba Libya
Salah Falah ( صلاح فلاح ) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Lebanọn, onye nkuzi, na onye ọka ikpe
Falah gbara bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agbara ndị otu mba Lebanon bọọlụ n'egwuregwu mba ụwa mbụ ha
Falah gbara bọọlụ na Hilmi-Sport, DPHB, na Sagesse n'afọ ndị 1940
N'afọ 1934, onye egwuregwu etiti ahụ bụ onye isi ndị otu mba Lebanon na egwuregwu mbụ ha na-akwadoghị, megide klọb Romania CA Timișoara (TAC)
Falah nọchikwara anya Lebanon na egwuregwu mba ụwa mbụ ha, nakwa n'afọ 1940 megide Mandatory Palestine
Na 1946–47 Falah zụrụ Sagesse mgbe ọ bụ onye egwuregwu
Ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe n'oge 1960-61

Muhammad Salah Eldin Bahgat Ahmad Helmy (محمد صلاح الدين بهجت أحمد حلمي, IPA siaoɑˈlɑːħ el-, edˈdiːn ˈbæhɡæt 'ʔαmad ˈħelmi]), nke a maara dị ka 'Salah Jaheen' ma ọ bụ 'Salah Jahin' (Arabic صلاح جاهين, IPA; Disemba 25, 1930 - 21 Eprel 1986) bụ onye na-ede uri, onye edemede, onye edemedd
A mụrụ Jaheen na mpaghara Shobra, Cairo na 1930 n'ezinụlọ nọ n'ọkwá dị n'etiti
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu na Mahadum Cairo
N'afọ 1955, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka magazin Egypt kwa izu nke a kpọrọ 'Rose al-Yousef' dị ka onye na-ese ihe nkiri
Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, ọ kwagara na magazin ọhụrụ 'Sabah el-Khair' nke ọ ghọrọ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ, mgbe ahụ ọ sonyeere Al-Ahram
Ya na Fuad Haddad, Jaheen nwere nnukwu ọrụ na mmepe nke uri mkparịta ụka ndị Ijipt

N'ezie, okwu ahụ bụ 'shi'r al-ammiya' ma ọ bụ 'abụ uri Arabic' bụ naanị n'afọ 1961 ka otu ìgwè ndị na-eto eto na-ede uri gụnyere Salah Jahin, Abd Al-Rahman Abnudi, Fuad Qaud na Sayyid Higab chepụtara onwe ha 'Jama't Ibn Arus'

Tupu nke ahụ, a na-ewere uri n'asụsụ Arabic nke ndị Ijipt dị ka akụkọ ọdịnala na nka dị ala nke ndị na-amaghị akwụkwọ mepụtara, ebe okwu 'Shi'r' (Arabic maka uri) bụ naanị uri e dere na Modern Standard Arabic (nke a maara dị ka 'Fuṣḥā', nke pụtara ihe kachasị mma)
O dere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri maka ihe nkiri ụmụ bebi
A makwaara ya maka abụ mba ya na nke ịhụ mba n'anya nke gosipụtara oge mgbanwe nke ọrụ Gamal Abdel Nasser, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ nke onye egwu Egypt a ma ama bụ Abdel Halim Hafez
Onye na-ede uri ahụ sitere na mkpali nke 1952 Revolution ma bụrụ onye a maara mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka onye na-ede abụ nke mgbanwe ahụ
Otú ọ dị, mgbe e meriri Ijipt n'agha 1967 na ọnwụ Gamal Abdel Nasser na 1970 ọ tara ahụhụ site na nnukwu ịda mbà n'obi
N'otu ajụjụ ọnụ, o kwuru na site na ọnwụ Nasser na 1970 na mgbanwe mberede na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọ na-eche na ọ na-adịwanye ka Hamlet, na Sadat na-egosipụta onye aghụghọ Claudius

Na mgbakwunye na uri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, uri Jahin na-enwekarị isiokwu metaphysical na nke nkà ihe ọmụma, na-ajụ ebumnuche nke ndụ mmadụ, ọdịdị nke ezi ihe na ihe ọjọọ, uche mmadụ na nke Chineke na njedebe nke ịchụso nnwere onwe na obi ụtọ
N'afọ 1965, e nyere Jaheen Egyptian Order of Science and Arts of the First Class
Ọ nwụrụ na 1986 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ise na ise
N'afọ 1963, Jaheen dere quatrains ma ọ bụ rubaiyat ya ebe o kwupụtara nkwenkwe ya, mmetụta na echiche ya banyere ndụ, ịdị adị, ezi ihe na ihe ọjọọ
Amaokwu ọ bụla ji otu okwu na-emegide onwe ya 'Agabi' ma ọ bụ 'otú ihe dị ịtụnanya si dị!' mechie
A na-arụ ụka mgbe ụfọdụ na Quatrains dị ka ihe kachasị ewu ewu na-ede uri n'Ijipt n'ime afọ iri ise gara aga
N'afọ 1971, Jaheen dere 'Ala Esm Masr' ma ọ bụ 'N'aha Ijipt', abụ na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Ijipt, site n'oge ndị Fero ruo ugbu a
Amaokwu ọ bụla ji otu okwu ahụ 'Ala esm Masr' ma ọ bụ 'N'aha Ijipt' mechie mana oge ọ bụla nwere nkọwa ọhụrụ
N'abụ a, Jaheen kwupụtara ịhụnanya ya maka mba ya ugboro ugboro
N'otu amaokwu, o kwuru, sị
Akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ o dere n'abụ uri gụnyere
Jaheen dere okwu nke ọtụtụ abụ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ abụ ịhụ mba n'anya nke Abdel Halim Hafez kụrụ

Abụ ya gụnyere 'Soura' ma ọ bụ foto, 'ehna elsha'b' ma ọ bụ 'anyị bụ ndị mmadụ', 'Khaly elselah sahy' ma ọ dị 'oh weapon, be ready', 'Ya ahlan belma'arek' ma ọ bụrụ Welcome battles' na 'El-mas'oulia' ma ọ ke 'Responsibility'
O dere maka ihe nkiri ụmụ bebi, gụnyere ihe nkiri a ma ama 'El-leila el-kebira' ma ọ bụ The Grand Night
Jaheen rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, onye na-ede ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri

N'ime abụọ ikpeazụ, onye Egypt a ma ama na-eme ihe nkiri Suad Husni bụrụ ụfọdụ n'ime egwu ya kachasị mma 'Ya wad ya te'eel', 'Khally ballak men Zouzou' ma ọ bụ 'Were Zouzou', 'El-hayah ba'a lonha bamby' ma ọ bụrụ 'Life has turned pink' na 'El-donia rabe ma ọ bụ' oge opupu ihe ubi

O dekwara edemede na okwu maka 'Riddles' - usoro telivishọn nwere ihe mgbagwoju anya na ihe omume ọ bụla gosipụtara n'oge ọnwa Ramadan na telivishons ndị Ijipt na Arab- maka ọtụtụ afọ na-esote na maka usoro telivisọn 'Howa wa heya' ma ọ bụ 'Ya na She' nke Ahmad Zaki na Suad Husni gosipụtara
2010, Onye na-agụ egwú Ijipt Tony Kaldas dere abụ site na okwu ya wee bụrụ ya n'ụdị ọhụrụ dị iche, n'ụzọ ọdịnala ya na Piano
A Google Doodle na 25 Disemba 2013 mere ncheta ọmụmụ nke ịrị asatọ na atọ nke Jahin
Salah Mansour (Febụwarị 03, 1923 - Jenụwarị 19, 1979) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na Lan A'taref na Al-Zagwa Al-Thaneya
Ọ malitere n'ime ihe nkiri ụlọ akwụkwọ, ma gụsịa akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Egypt Acting Institute na 1947
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na nhazi nka wee sonye na ihe nkiri
O mechara bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ na Ministri Mmụta Ijipt
Ọ nwụrụ na Jenụwarị 19, 1979
A mụrụ Salah Mansour na Shibin Al-Qanater, na Al-Qalyubia, Egypt
Salah Taher (1911–2007) bụ onye Ijipt na-ese ihe
Ọ Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo oge ụfọdụ dịka onye nkuzi eserese na nka na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Al-Abaseyya dị na Alexandria
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ onye ama ama na 1960 ka a họpụtara ya onye isi nke Museum of Modern Arts
Na 1962, a họpụtara ya onyeisi nke Opera
Na 1966, ọ sonyeere Al-Ahram
Ọ na-ese ihe karịrị 35 eserese, maka Al-Ahram na mma mgbidi nke ụlọ ya
N'ozuzu, ọ na-ese ihe osise 15000 ma mee ihe ngosi nka ihe karịrị 80 maka ọrụ ya na Egypt, Venice, New York City, San Francisco, Geneva, Beirut, Kuwait na Jeddah
O sonyekwara na ihe ngosi 67 mkpokọta na Egypt
Ọrụ ya bụkwa akụkụ nke mkpokọta White House ma na-atụgharị ma na-egosipụtakarị na White House
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mgbe ụfọdụ na mmekorita ya na ụlọ ọrụ dị ka Institut des cultures arabes et méditerranéennes na Geneva2017
E nyere ya onyinye kachasị elu na Egypt na mba ụwa, n'etiti ha na 1961 bụ Guggenheim Award
N'afọ 2001, a kwanyeere ya ùgwù n'akụkụ onye nrite Nobel Naguib Mahfouz na mmeghe dị nro nke Bibliotheca Alexandrina, nke akpọrọ 'The brush and the pen,' site na ibipụta akwụkwọ banyere ọrụ ya
Ọ nọgidere n'ọkwa nke onye ndụmọdụ nka maka Al-Ahram ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Ọ nwụrụ, mgbe ọ dị afọ 95, na Febụwarị 6, 2007 n'ihi ọrịa kansa akpịrị
O nwere nwa nwoke, Ayman, onye bụkwa onye na-ese ihe, na ụmụ ụmụ abụọ
Ọrụ ya nke Mathaf chịkọtara Arab Museum of Modern Art na Doha, ma tinye ya na ihe ngosi ya na-adịgide adịgide
N'afọ 2018, Barjeel Art Foundation nwetara ọrụ ya akpọrọ 'Metaphysic' na Sharjah ma bụrụzi akụkụ nke ihe ngosi ogologo oge na Sharjah Art Museum
Salah El Din Ahmed Mourad Zulfikar (Àtụ Lang-ar) (18 January 1926 – 22 December 1993) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri i
Salah Zulfikar bụ otu n'ime ndị dike Egypt n'ọgụ ya megide ndị bi na ya mgbe ọ na-eje ozi na ndị uwe ojii
Nwa ya nwoke, onye ọchụnta ego EgyptAhmed Zulfikar, kwuru na nkwupụta mgbasa ozi 1994 na nna ya sonyere n'agha ndị agha na Ismailia megide ndị Britain n'afọ 1944, na ịhụ mba n'anya ya enweghị njedebe
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Zulfikar wepụtara onwe ya n'Agha nke Ismailia nke afọ 1952, na n'Aha Suez nke 1956
E nyere ya ihe nrite nke ọrụ agha nke klas mbụ site n'aka onye isi ala Ijipt Gamal Abdel Nasser iji kelee ya maka mbọ ọ na-agba ijere mba ya ozi
A mụrụ Salah El Din Ahmed Mourad Zulfikar (Arabic) na 18 Jenụwarị 1926 na El Mahalla El Kubra, Egypt
Nna ya bụ Ahmed Mourad Zulfikar, onye jere ozi dị ka onye isi ndị uwe ojii Egypt na Ministry of Interior na nne ya Nabila Zulfikir bụ onye na-elekọta ụlọ n'Egypt
Zulfikar bụ nwa nke asaa n'ime ụmụnne nwoke na ụmụnne nwanyị asatọ
Nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye, Mohamed, bụ onye ọchụnta ego, ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ tọrọ ya bụ Soad na Fekreya
Nwanne nwoke ọzọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi Mahmoud Zulfikar
Nwanne ya nwoke Ezz El-Dine Zulfikar bụkwa onye nduzi ihe nkiri, Kamal Zulfikir bụ onye agha
Nwanne ya nwoke nke obere Mamdouh sonyeere Faculty of Commerce
Ụmụnne Salah Zulfikar bụ Ezz El-Dine Zulfikir na Mahmoud Zulfikara bụ ndị nduzi ihe nkiri
N'oge ezumike ya, ọ na-agakarị ihe nkiri

N'afọ 1955, nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye, Ezz El-Dine, gbalịrị ime ka Zulfikar kwenye ịmalite ime ihe nkiri mana ọ jụrụ n'ihi na o chere na ọ bụ echiche na-agaghị ekwe omume n'ihi ọdịdị ọrụ ya dị ka onye uwe ojii
Ezz El-Dine nyere ya ọrụ ndu na ihe nkiri; Wakeful Eyes (Uyoun Sahrana) nke e wepụtara n'afọ 1956
Zulfikar kwetara ma nata ikike nwa oge site n'aka Minista nke Interior, nke Zakaria Mohieddin duziri n'oge ahụ ịrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri a
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri ya nke abụọ na nke atọ Back Again (Rodda Qalbi) (1957) na Jamila, the Algerian (Gameela) (1958) n'otu n'otu na ikike nwa oge
Salah Zulfikar nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi mberede na Wednesday, 22 December 1993, na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Ndị Uwe Ojii na Cairo, Egypt
Zulfikar lụrụ nwanyị ugboro anọ
Ọ lụrụ nwunye mbụ ya, Mrs
Nafisa Bahgat nwa nwanyị nke Mahmoud Bey Bahgat n'afọ 1947, onye a ma ama, ọ mụkwara ya ụmụ ya nwoke Ahmed Zulfikar na Mona Zulfikir, ọ nọgidekwara bụrụ nwunye ya ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1988

Nwa ya nwoke Ahmed gụsịrị akwụkwọ dịka injinia igwe iji ghọọ onye ọchụnta ego nwere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya na nwa ya nwanyị Mona gụsịrị akwụkwọ dịka onye ọka iwu wee ghọọ onye ọka iwu a ma ama nwere ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọka iwu
Zulfikar nwere ụmụ ụmụ atọ, Karim Zulfikir bụ onye ọchụnta ego, Salah Zulfikur bụ onye nduzi ụlọ ọrụ na Ingy Badawy bụ onye ọka iwu
E wezụga ịkụ ọkpọ, Salah Zulfikar bụ onye na-akwado bọọlụ ma na-eso ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ibe ya na-egwu bọọlụ site n'oge ruo n'oge
Ọ kwadoro Zamalek SC
Alụmdi na nwunye nke abụọ Zulfikar bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Zahrat El-Ola n'afọ 1957, mana ha gbara alụkwaghịm afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị
Zulfikar na Shadia jikọtara aka mepụta ihe osise nke ha gosipụtara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na-aga nke ọma na Cinema Egypt na Zulfikir mepụtara ihe karịrị otu ihe nkiri nke Shadia
Alụmdi na nwunye ha kwụsịrị na ịgba alụkwaghịm mgbe afọ asaa gasịrị
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ lụrụ nwunye ikpeazụ ya, Bahiga, alụmdi na nwunye ha gara n'ihu ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Ọ na-arụpụta ihe na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Egypt ruo afọ 37
Salah Zulfikar bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe
O mepụtara ihe nkiri iri na anọ ma pụta ihe karịrị otu narị ihe nkiri site n'afọ 1956 ruo 1993

Salam Atilola (amụrụ n'ubochi 2 n'ọnwa Febrụwarị n'afọ 1996 na Saki, dị na Naijiria onye ya na Crown , Shooting Stars FC, MFM FC nwere obere oge egwuregwu nke ha niile nọ na Otu Mba Naijiria ma e wezụga Abia Warriors FC nọ na Nkewa nke Mbụ nke Naijiria bụ ndị mechara chuo ya n'ọrụ maka arụmọrụ na adịghị mma
Atilola Abdulsalam Tunde onye banyere Abia Warriors n'oge Premier League Naijiria nke ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2019 na ngafe n'etiti oge debara nani goolu 3 site na egwuregwu 8 na oge 2018/19
A chụrụ ya n'oge 2019/20 site na Abia Warriors FC n'ọnwa Jenụwarị maka arụmọrụ na adịghị mma ka ọ gbara egwuregwur 15 na-enweghị goolu o nyere dị ka Striker
Salam Atilola bụ onye ọkpọ ụkwụ ekpe site n'afọ
Karamone chọpụtara ya
Ọ malitere mpụta mbụ egwuregwu bọọlụ ọkachamara ya na Crown n'oge 2012/13, emechara chụọ ya a chụrụ ya ma o mesịa bịanyere Shooting Stars FC aka n'oge 2013/14 mgbe a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ
Ọ gbakwara bọọlụ na MFM FC na Otu Nkewa nke abụọ nke Naijiria n'oge 2014/15 ma emesịa chụọkwa ya n'ọrụ maka arụmọrụ ya erụchaghi eru
Salamat Ahuoiza Aliu bụ dọkịta na-arụ ọrụ ka Sọjọn na Naịjirịa
Amụrụ Salmat Ahuoiza Aliu na Ilorin n'afọ 1980, mana ọ bụ onye Okene, Kogi State
Ọ guru akwụkwọ na ụlọ ọgwụ Mahadum Ilorinnweta dịgịrị mbụ ya
Azụrụ ya azụ dika onye sọjọn na Mahadum Usmanu Danfodiyon'aka Prof
BB Shehu
Aliu bụ nwanyị mbụ dọkịta na-arụ dika sọjọn na West Afrika
Ọ bụkwa nwaafọ nwanyị izizi azụrụ azụ ka sọjọn na Nigeria
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ nke Mahadum Illorin
A kacha mara ya maka ọrụ ya pụrụ iche dịka dibia bekee na omume ịgba ụmụ nwanyị ume isonye na ọmụmụ ọgwụ
Aha Aliu sonyere na mmadụ 100 kachasị nke afọ site n'aka otu ndị ọha na-eze nke Arewa na 2016
Aliu lụrụ di ma mụọ ụmụ
Salamatu Hussaini Suleiman bụ onye ọkaiwu Nigerian nke na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Kọmishọna ECOWAS n'ihe gbasara ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, Udo na Nchekwa
Tupu okwa a, a họpụtara ya dịka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka Okwu Ndị Nwanyi na mmekọrịta ndị mmadu na ọha na Disemba 2008
Ọ hapụrụ ọfis na Machị 2010 mgbe Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan gbanwere ụlọ ọrụ ya
A mụrụ Salamatu Hussaini Suleiman na Argungu, na-obodo na-azụ azu na Steeti Kebbi
Nna ya bụ onye ọka-ikpe na-ụlọ ikpe mpaghara, nne ya si n'ezinụlọ ọchịchị ama ama bụ Gwandu
A zụlitere ya na Birnin Kebbi na Argungu
Na 1972, o banyere ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Queens College, Lagos
Ọ gaara mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria ebe ọ nwetara nzere na iwu
O mechara gaa Mahadum maka Economics na ọchịchị sayensị na London ebe o nwetara nzere mastas na mmuta iwu
Ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka onye ọkaiwu na Mịnịstrị na-ahụ maka ikpe na steeti Sokoto nke ochie

O mechara rụọ ọrụ afọ asaa na Continental Merchant Bank, Lagos, ma rụọ ọrụ obere oge na NAL Merchant Bank tupu ọ gaa na Aluminium Smelter Companị, ebe ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ụlọ ọrụ / onye na-enye ndụmọdụ iwu
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Securities & Exchange Commission tupu a họpụta ya Minista na Naijiria
Onye isi ala Umaru Yar'Adua họpụtara Suleiman ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ihe metụtara ụmụ nwanyị na 17 Disemba 2008
Na Septemba afọ 2009, Suleiman mere mkpesa na gọọmentị ekweghi ka ụmụnwaanyị sonye na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa
O kwuru na ime ihe ike na nwoke ịkpa-ike juru ebe niile na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, yana enweghị ego, mere ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole nwere ike ịzọ ọchịchị

Na nzukọ a na-enwe na October 2009 nke UNICEF na Mịnịstrị ihe gbasara ụmụ nwaanyị haziri, Suleiman kwuru na ebumnuche ya bụ ije ozi dị ka ụgbọ-ala mba maka ọnọdụ na ọganihu na ahụike nke ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria, na iji hụ na nchekwa na ịzụlite nke ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka bara uru
Ọ gwara ndị steetị gọọmentị ka ha nye ụmụ nwanyị ohere na ihe ịzọ ọchịchị na nhọpụta, opekata mpe 30%
Na onwa disamba, ọ mere mkpesa na gọọmentị ekwebeghi ka emepụta nkwekọrịta nke United Nations maka mkpochapụ ụdị niile nke ịkpa ókè megide ụmụ nwanyị (CEDAW)
Ọ bụkwa Họnọrable Minista nke steetị II n'ahu maka okwu mba ụwa na Naijiria, 2010 ruo 2011
Salawa Abeni Alidu (onye amuru na 5 Mee 1961) bu onye Naijiria na-eti egwu
Nwaanyị Ijebu Yoruba si Ijebu Waterside, na Ogun Steetị, ọ malitere ọrụ aka ya na Waka Music mgbe ọ wepụtara recọrd mbụ ya nke akpọrọ, Late General Murtala Ramat Mohammed, na 1976, na Leader Records
Nke a bụ record mbụ nke nwanyị mere na-asusu Yoruba na-ere ihe karịrị otu nde na Naijiria
Abeni gara n'ihu na-emepụta ọrụ na Leader Records ruo 1986, mgbe ọ hapụ mmekọrịta ya na onye nwe ụlọ egwu ahụ bụ Lateef Adepoju
Ọ lụrụ Kollington Ayinla ma sonye na ụlọ egwu ya ruo 1994
Oba Lamidi Adeyemi, Alaafin kpọọrọ ya aha 'Queen of Waka Music' na 1992
Waka bụ ụdịri egwu ọdịnala ndị Alakụba, nke ọdịnala Yoruba
Batile Alake mere ka ọ na-ewu ewu; ọ bụ ụdị egwu kara nka karịa jùjú na fuji
Mgbe ọ na-agwa News Agency nke Naiiria, Abeni kere ọgbaghara mgbe ọ dụrụ ndị egwu ibe ya ọdụ ka ha 'zere mmekọ nwoke na nwoke', n'ihi na-odi ka addictionụ nke ọgwụ ike

Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kpọrọ ya okwu 'ngosipụta nke amaghị ihe', Agbanyeghị, onye nlere anya na Nigeria bụ Olajumoke Orisaguna gosipụtara okwu ya ọzọ a na vidiyo YouTube ya Olajumoke Sauce 7 Trends and Acceptance nke Febụwarị 2018
N’iwu Naijiriya nke gbadoro ụkwụ na ọchịchị ndị British mgbe ochie, mmekọ nwoke na nwoke ka bụ mpụ, onye ejidere ga aga ntaramahụhụ kachasị sitere na mkpọrọ afọ iri anọ ruo ọnwụ
Saleeby o bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere

Salem Fathi Elmslaty (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke 31 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1992), nke a na-akpọkwa Salem Al-Musallati ma mara ya nke ọma dị ka Salem Roma, bụ onye mba Libya na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara Al-Nasr bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agba bọọlụ
Salif Keïta (IPA ) (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1949) bụ onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-ede egwú na Mali, nke a na-akpọ 'Olu Ọlaedo nke Africa'
Ọ bụ onye otu ezinụlọ eze Keita nke Mali
A mụrụ Salif Keita dị ka nwa eze ọdịnala n'obodo nta Djoliba
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ eze Keita, ndị na-agbaso agbụrụ ha na Sundiata Keita, onye guzobere Alaeze Ukwu Mali
Ezinụlọ ya chụpụrụ ya ma obodo chụpụ ya n'ihi ọrịa albinism ya, ihe ịrịba ama nke enweghị ihu ọma na omenala Mandinka
O kpebiri ịchụso egwu n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, na-eme ka ọ dịkwuo anya n'ezinụlọ ya n'ihi na nke ahụ megidere mmachibido iwu nke ọnọdụ ya dị elu
N'afọ 1967, ọ hapụrụ Djoliba gaa Bamako, ebe ọ sonyeere Super Rail Band de Bamako nke gọọmentị kwadoro
N'afọ 1973, Keita sonyeere otu Les Ambassadeurs (nke Motel de Bamako)
Keita na Les Ambassadeurs gbapụrụ na ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mali n'etiti afọ 1970 wee gbanwee aha otu ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Les Ambassades Internationaux
Aha ọma nke otu a toro na mba ụwa na ngwụcha afọ ndị 1970, na-eduga Keita na-achụso ọrụ n'onwe ya n'afọ ndị sochirinụ
Ọ bụ nna onye na-eme egwuregwu Paralympic Nantenin Keita
N'ihi ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Keita na ndị otu ya gbapụrụ Mali n'etiti afọ ndị 1970
Ha biri na Abidjan, Ivory Coast, ebe ha na-alụ ọgụ ego ma na-akwụkarị ụgwọ ngwá ọrụ iji mee ihe ngosi
Ìgwè ahụ (nke a na-akpọ Les Ambassadeurs Internationaux ugbu a) nọgidere na-ewu ewu n'afọ ndị sochirinụ
Abọm ha nke afọ 1978, Mandjou, ghọrọ ihe ịga nke ọma n'otu ntabi anya na West Africa
N'afọ 1976, Sékou Touré, onye isi ala Guinea, mere Keita onye isi nke Guinea's National Order of Merit
Onye isi ala bụ onye na-akwado Keita na ndị otu ahụ kemgbe ha zutere na nleta gọọmentị na 1974
Touré nọgidere bụrụ onye na-akwado ma na-akwado ọbụna mgbe ha gbapụrụ Mali
N'ịchọ ịkwụghachi ụgwọ nsọpụrụ ahụ, Keita dere egwu 'Mandjou' (nke gosipụtara na abọm aha ya na 1978) dị ka abụ otuto maka Touré
Otú ọ dị, n'oge a tọhapụrụ abụ ahụ, Touré ejirila ọchịchị aka ike mee ihe kpamkpam ma tinye mba ya n'ọbara na ọgba aghara
Keita ka na-eme nsụgharị nke 'Mandjou'
Keita kwagara Paris na 1984 iji nweta ndị na-ege ntị ka ukwuu ma chụsoo ọrụ n'onwe ya
Egwú ya jikọtara ụdị egwu ọdịnala nke West Africa na mmetụta sitere na Europe na Amerịka
N'oge ahụ, Keita bụ onye a ma ama n'Africa ma nwee ndị na-akwado ya n'etiti ndị maara ihe gburugburu ụwa
Soro ghọrọ abọm ya na-eme nke ọma n'ụwa niile n'afọ 1987
Onye mepụtara ọrụ ahụ bụ Ibrahima Sylla, onye ọhụụ nke achọpụtalarị ọtụtụ kpakpando Afrịka (ma mesịa bụrụ ike na-akpali Africando)
Ndokwa ndị ahụ gosipụtara ụda na-agbagharị, ndị inyom na-agba egwú, na ụda ọdịnala nke egwu Mali
Ngwá egwu ndị a na-egosikarị n'ọrụ Keita gụnyere balafons, djembes, guitars, koras, organ, saxophones, na synthesizers
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Nelson Mandela 70th Birthday Tribute concert na 1988 iji kpọọ ka a tọhapụ Nelson Mandela n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
N'afọ 1990, Keita nyere aka 'Begin the Beguine' na Cole Porter tribute/AIDS benefit album Red Hot + Blue, nke Red Hot Organization mepụtara
Keita chọtara ịga nke ọma na Europe dị ka otu n'ime kpakpando Afrịka nke egwu ụwa, mana a na-akatọ ọrụ ya mgbe ụfọdụ maka mmepụta ya na maka àgwà haphazard oge ụfọdụ
[citation needed] Otú ọ dị, obere oge mgbe mmalite nke puku afọ ahụ gasịrị ọ laghachiri Bamako na Mali iji biri ma dekọọ

A na-eto ọrụ mbụ ya mgbe ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ, Moffou nke afọ 2002, dị ka abọm ya kachasị mma n'ime ọtụtụ afọ, a kpaliri Keita iwu ụlọ ndekọ na Bamako, nke o ji mee ihe maka abọm M'Bemba, nke e wepụtara n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2005
E mepụtara abọm Keita bụ La Différence na ngwụcha afọ 2009
A raara ọrụ ahụ nye ọgụ nke ndị albino ụwa (ndị mmadụ chụrụ n'àjà), nke Keita nọ na-agba mbọ ndụ ya niile

N'otu n'ime egwu nke abọm ahụ, onye na-agụ egwu na-akpọ ndị ọzọ ka ha ghọta na 'ọdịiche' apụtaghị 'ajọ' ma gosipụta ịhụnanya na ọmịiko n'ebe ndị albinos nọ dị ka onye ọ bụla ọzọ 'Abụ m onye ojii / akpụkpọ ahụ m na-acha ọcha / yabụ abụ m ọcha na ọbara m bụ oji [albino] /Enwere m mmasị na nke ahụ n'ihi na ọ bụ ọdịiche mara mma', 'ụfọdụ n'ime anyị mara mma ụfọdụ abụghị / ụfọdụ bụ ndị ojii ụfọdụ bụ ndị ọcha / ihe niile dị iche bụ ebumnuche
maka anyị iji mezue ibe anyị / ka onye ọ bụla nweta ịhụnanya na ùgwù ya / ụwa ga-adị mma
E dekọrọ La Différence n'etiti Bamako, Beirut, Paris, na Los Angeles
Mmetụta egwu a pụrụ iche na-esikwu ike site na ụda obi na egwu 'Samigna' nke sitere na opi nke nnukwu onye egwu jazz nke Lebanọn bụ Ibrahim Maalouf
N'afọ 2001, e gosipụtara egwu Keita bụ 'Tomorrow' na ihe nkiri Will Smith, Ali
La Différence meriri Keita otu n'ime nnukwu onyinye egwu nke ọrụ ya Best World Music 2010 na Victoires de la musique
N'afọ 2013, mgbe ihe ọ kọwara dị ka 'ihe iyi egwu' sitere na mkpọsa Boycott, Divestment and Sanctions, ọ kagburu arụmọrụ na Israel

O mechara bipụta akwụkwọ ozi na Facebook ya, na-ekwu na o kpebiri ịkagbu ihe omume ahụ n'ihi na ọ na-atụ egwu 'ịbụ onye a ga-emerụ ahụ n'onwe ya ma ọ bụ n'ọrụ', mana o mere ka o doo anya na ọ ka 'na-ahụ Israel n'anya', na-ekwu maka BDS dị ka 'otu ndị na-emebiga ihe ókè' nke na-eji 'usoro mkparị na mmegbu'
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018, ọ kwupụtara ezumike nká ya site na ndekọ egwu na egwu egwu na Fana, Mali
Abọm Un Autre Blanc, nke a tọhapụrụ na kọntaktị ahụ, ga-abụ nke ikpeazụ ya
E nwekwara ọtụtụ nchịkọta
Àtụ Salif Keita
Salifou Lindou (amụrụ na 1965 na Foumban, Cameroon ) bụ onye na-ese ihe nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Douala
Cheikh Salim Fergani (Arabic الشيخ سليم فرقاني) (amụrụ n'afọ 1953 na Constantine, Algeria) bụ onye Algeria na-akpọ egwu oud na onye na-agụ egwu
Ọ bụ onye ama ama na-eme ihe ngosi egwu ma'luf, ma bụrụ onye dekọrọ CD dị iche iche maka akara Pneuma nke Eduardo Paniagua
Ọ bụ nwa nwoke nke onye egwu Algeria bụ Mohamed Tahar Fergani
Salim Rabahi (amụrụ na 27 Jenụwarị 1996) bụ onye Algeria, nwoke na-egwu egwuregwu Judo, onye gbara bọọlụ na asọmpi mpaghara na nke mba ụwa na Dakar, Yaounde, na South Afrika
Ọ dị kilogram iri isii n'arọ
A ghaghị iburu n'uche na Algeria bụ mba kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma maka Asọmpi Judo nke Afrika na 2022
Salim gbara bọọlụ na Algeria Ụlọ ọgbakọ mba ma nọchite anya mba ya na asọmpi dị iche iche
Na Asọmpi Judo nke Afrika nke mere na Cape Town, South Afrika, mba Mediterenian 28 nọchitere anya ebe Algeria, n'akụkụ Tunisia na Egypt meriri n'ọkwa atọ kachasị elu
Algeria ritere ọla edo anọ, ọlaọcha anọ, na ọla nchara ise
Salim Rabahi bụ otu n'ime ndị otu ahụ ritere ihe nrite
Salim Rabahi ritere ọla nchara n'afọ 2019 na Asọmpi Afrịka na Cape Town
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na Iko mba Europe / Kọntinental mepere emepe, na Asọmpi Kọntinental ebe o ritere ihe nrite
Salima Hamouche (amụrụ n'ime Jenụwarị 17, 1984, na Béjaïa) bụ onye Algeria na egwu volleyball mba ụwa
Salimah Ali (amụrụ n'afọ 1954) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto n'oge a na-arụ ọrụ na portraiture, dọkumentari ise foto, na foto jonalizm
A mụrụ Ali n'afọ 1954 na Harlem, New York City
Ọ nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Manhattan, Brooklyn, na Queens
Ọ bụ nna ya, onye na-ese mmanụ, zụrụ Ali igwefoto mbụ ya, site na nwata
Mgbe ọ malitere ọrụ foto ya site na ise foto nke ụmụ ọhụrụ na ndị lụrụ di ọhụrụ, Ali nwetara ezumike mbụ ya mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na LaGuardia Community College
Ọ hụrụ ihe ngosi na-akpọsa egwu Eddie Kendricks wee kpọtụrụ onye na-akwado ihe ngosi ahụ iji jụọ ma ọ nwere ike ise foto Kendricks
Onye na-akwado ya gwara ya ee, nke ahụ meghere ụzọ maka Ali ka ọ gaa n'ihu na-ese foto ndị egwu ndị ọzọ, gụnyere Stevie Wonder; Patti LaBelle; Earth, Wind, and Fire; Bob Marley; na ndị ọzọ
Ali mechara gaa na Fashion Institute of Technology, ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na foto
Ọrụ Ali apụtala n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, gụnyere Essence, Black Enterprise, USA Today, The New York Times, Los Angeles Times, na The Washington Post
Ali bụ onye otu Kamoinge, otu ndị na-ese foto n'Afrịka na New York
Ìgwè ahụ na-arụ ọrụ iji gosipụta ihe ngosi ziri ezi nke ahụmịhe ndị Afrịka-Amerịka site na foto
N'afọ 2007, ha nwetara onyinye iji see foto mgbe ajọ ifufe Katrina gasịrị
Ali sonyere na ọrụ ahụ, na-ese foto nke ndị bi na New Orleans n'akụkụ mkpọmkpọ ebe nke ụlọ ha mebiri emebi
Kemgbe afọ 2001, Ali arụwokwa ọrụ dịka onye na-ese foto maka Ngalaba Ndị Uwe Ojii New York City
N'afọ 2018, e gosipụtara ntinye nke foto Ali na Queens Library
N'afọ 2019, Ali sonyere na nnukwu ihe ngosi otu na African American Museum na Philadelphia
N'afọ 2020, Ali gosipụtara na 'Visions 1020,' ihe ngosi foto na Wilmer Jennings Kenkeleba Gallery na East Village, Manhattan

Salimata Simporé (amụrụ na 29 Jenụwarị 1987) bụ onye Burkinabé na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere otu egwuregwu Njikọ Njikọ nke Belarus FC Minsk na otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Burkina Faso
Simporé gbara bọọlụ na Burkina Faso maka Princes na 2005 na 2015, maka USFA na 2016 na maka Etincelles na 2019
Nọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2006, e debara aha Simporé dị ka onye egwuregwu maka klọb Equatorial Guinean Las Vegas

N'agbata afọ 2006 na afọ 2010, Simporé a mụrụ na Burkinabé na-egwuri egwu maka Equatorial Guinea dị ka onye ọkpụkpọ, ebe ọ sonyeere ndị otu Equatorial Guine nke meriri 2008 Asọmpi ụmụnwaanyị Afrịka wee ruo ebe nke abụọ na 2010 Asọmpi ụmụnwaanyị Afrịka, nke nyere Equatorial Guinea ohere iru eru maka 2011 Iko mba ụwa nke FIFA

N'ihe dị ka n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011, onye nkuzi Brazil a mụrụ n'Ịtali bụ Marcelo Frigerio wepụrụ Simporé n'òtù mba ahụ, onye chere na nso nso a, naanị ọnwa ole na ole tupu ya esonye na Iko Mbaụwa, na Simporé bụ nwoke
Kemgbe ahụ, Equatorial Guinea akpọtụghị Simporé
Simporé bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Burkina Faso na 2007 (dị ka onyeisi ha), na agba goolu asatọ, na 2018
Ntinye na nsonaazụ depụtara ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke Equatorial Guinea nke mbụ
Ntinye na nsonaazụ depụtara ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke Burkina Faso na mbụ
N'èzí usoro nke Equatorial Guinea mere ka Simporé bụrụ nwa amaala, nnukwu esemokwu bilitere banyere ma Simporé bụ nwoke n'ezie
N'afọ 2015, Frigerio, onye bụbu onye nkuzi otu mba nke Equatorial Guinea, gwara ndị nta akụkọ Brazil Simporé bụ nwoke nezie
Kosgei meriri n'ọsọ mita 10,000 nke ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 2002 Commonwealth Games
Oge ya, 31 2783, bụ ndekọ egwuregwu Commonwealth ọhụrụ (ka na-arụ ọrụ mgbe egwuregwu afọ 2010 gasịrị)
O sonyere na afọ 2003 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships na Vilamoura, Spain, mana ọ gwụbeghị karịa nke 41
Kosgei sonyeere Kenya na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics na marathon, na-emecha nke iri
N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel, ọ meriri na afo 2009 Boston Marathon oge 2 32 16, nke abụọ n'ihu Dire Tune nke Ethiopia
Ọ gbalịrị ịgbachitere aha ya n'asọmpi nke afọ na-esote mana nsọpụrụ ahụ gara Teyba Erkesso ebe Kosgei mechara n'ọnọdụ nke atọ
O nwere agbụrụ marathon abụọ ọzọ na afọ 2009, na-abịa nke atọ na Grottazzolina Marathon na nke iri na ise na afo 2010 New York City Marathon
O nwetakwara mmeri na Florence Half Marathon
N'afọ 2011, ọ nọ n'elu iri na Lisbon Half Marathon, Portugal Half Marathon na Yokohama Women's Marathon
Ihe kacha mma ọ rụzuru n'afọ ahụ bụ ọsọ nke 2 32 06 awa maka nke ise na San Diego Marathon
O sonyeghị na asọmpi na 2012 ma pụta naanị ugboro abụọ na afọ 2013, na-abịa nke anọ na Stockholm Marathon ma merie Marathon des Alpes-Maritimes
Ọ lụrụ onye na-agba ọsọ Barnabas Kinyor
Ha nwere nwa nwoke na nwa nwanyị, Billy na Ruth, amụrụ na 1996 na afọ 2001, n'otu n'otu

A hoputara Salisu Ibrahim Musa Matori dịka Senator n'ahụ maka mpaghara ndịda Bauchi nke Bauchi Steeti, Naijiria na mbido Mba Naijiria nke anọ, Ọ dọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'okpuru People's Democratic Party (PDP)
Ọ batara ụlọ ọrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Mee afọ 1999

Mgbe o wesịrị oche na sineti n'ọnwa Juun afọ 1999, a họpụtara Matori dịka onye isi oche kọmitii na-ahụ maka njem, Omume ụmụ nwanyị, ọrụ ugbo, ego na oruru, mmụta, njem nlegharị anya na omenaala N'ọnwa August afọ 2000, akpọrọ ya na akụkọ sitere n'aka otu kọmitii nke onye isi ya bụ Senator Idris Kuta bụ onye nyochara nrụrụaka ego na nkwekọrịta ndị Senate
E boro Senator Matori ebubo na o tinyere ego karịrị ụgwọ mkpuchi nke ụgbọ ala nke mgbakọ mba, mana emesịrị hapụ mpụ niile mgbe ndị otu nyochara nyocha chọpụta na-aka ya dị ọcha
Ka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchi 2003 n'abịa nso, e mereya onye isi oche nke nzukọ mgbasa ozi Abubakar Rimi
N’ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2003 ọ tụgharịrị banye otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị All Party People's Party (ANPP)

Na-afọ 2010 Matori bụ onye otu Kọmitii na-ahụ maka ịme atụmatụ na atụmatụ nke ndị mgbago ugwu haziri iji hụ na a họpụtara onye ugwu na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchi onye isi ala na-afọ 2011 karịa Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan bụ onye ndịda
Àtụ Infobox writer
Sally-Ann Murray (amụrụ na afo 1961) bụ odee si South Africa
A mụrụ Murray na afo 1961 na Durban, South Afrika, wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Durban Girls
Ọ nwetara MA na PhD na Mahadum Natal
Na afo 1992 Murray bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya nke uri akpọrọ Shifting (Carrefour Press)
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke abụọ, Open Season na afo 2006
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, obere akụkụ na-agagharị agagharị, bipụtara na afo 2009 site na Kwela Books
Abụ nke Murray apụtala n'akwụkwọ akụkọ agụmagụ na akụkọ mgbe ochie gụnyere, Imagination in a Troubted Space
Onye na-agụ uri South Africa (2004) na narị afọ ọhụrụ nke uri South Africa (2002)
Murray rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na English Department of Stellenbosch University na Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal
Na mgbakwunye na akwụkwọ South Africa, mmasị nyocha Murray gụnyere gburugburu, gburugburu ebe obibi, na ọmụmụ omenala
O nyela aka na akwụkwọ akụkọ agụmakwụkwọ gụnyere ibipụta na Critical Arts na Bekee na Africa
Murray abụrụla onye isi oche mmemme abụ abụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Poetry Africa ma bụrụ onye ọka ikpe nke asọmpi ide ihe okike Douglas Livingstone
Nchịkọta uri mbụ nke Murray, Shifting, meriri afo 1991 Sanlam Award na afo 1989 Arthur Nortje/Vita Award
N'afọ 2009, akwụkwọ akụkọ ya bụ Small Moving Parts meriri M-Net Prize for English Fiction
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ nwetakwara afo 2010 Herman Charles Bosman Prize na 2013 University of Kwazulu-Natal General Book Prize
A họpụtara ya dị ka akwụkwọ nke afọ nnwere onwe nke Sọnde na 2009, ahọpụtara maka ihe nrite akụkọ ifo Sunday na afo 2010, wee depụta aha maka Mahadum Johannesburg Prize maka Creative Writing
Sally Barsosio (amụrụ na 21 ọnwa Machị na afọ 1978 na Keiyo District) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ ọsọ
As of 2015[update] n'afọ 2015, Barsosio bụ onye kacha nta nwetara ihe nrite na World Junior Championships in Athletics, mgbe ọ dị afọ 14 na ụbọchị 182

N'afọ 1993, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise na ụbọchị iri na atọ, ọ meriri nrite ọla nchara 10,000 mita na afọ 1993 World Championships in Athletics mgbe a chụpụrụ ya na mbụ maka igbochi ndị na-agba ọsọ ibe ya, ọkachasị Elana Meyer onye si n'ọsọ ahụ pụọ
Nke a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye kachasị nta na-emeri ihe nrite na World Championships in Athletics
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke nzukọ Cross Internacional de Soria na afo 1994
Sally laghachiri na asọmpi ụwa na 1995 na-ewere ọnọdụ nke iri na otu na 1997 mgbe ọ meriri nrite ọla edo 10,000m, na-aghọ nwanyị Kenya mbụ meriri n'ọkwa egwu
Na-agbakwunye n'ọnọdụ ya dị ka onye kacha nta nwetara ihe nrite, mmeri a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye mmeri kachasị nta na 10,000m
Ọ na-azụ na PACE Sports Management ma Ricky Simms na-azụ ya
Ụmụnne ya nwanyị Florence Barsosio na Chepkemoi Barsosio nakwa nwa nwanne ya nwanyị Susan Sirma bụkwa ndị Kenya na-agba ọsọ
Sally El Hosaini bụ onye Welsh-Egyptian na-eduzi ihe nkiri na onye edemede ihe nkiri
Ọ na-egosi Fady Elsayed, onye mmeri BIFA Award James Floyd na onye na-eme ihe nkiri a họpụtara maka César Award Saïd Taghmaoui
E mere ya na Hackney, London
A mụrụ El Hosaini na Swansea, Wales, nye nne na nna Welsh nke Ijipt, ma zụlite ya na Cairo, Egypt
E bipụtara akụkọ mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa
El Hosaini gara Atlantic College, otu n'ime United World Colleges
Ọ gara n'ihu gụọ Arabic na Middle Eastern Studies na Mahadum Durham
Tupu ọ malite ime ihe kiri ọ kụziri akwụkwọ Bekee na ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị na Sana'a, Yemen ma rụọ ọrụ maka Amnesty International
Ọ bụ onye biri ogologo oge na Hackney, London
El Hosaini bụ onye a na-enye ọzụzụ site n'aka onye nduzi ihe nkiri nke onye nnupụisi, John Sichel
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na-arụ ọrụ na Middle East documentaries wee kwaga na ihe nkiri onwe ya, ebe ọ bụ onye nhazi mmepụta ruo ọtụtụ afọ
O kwuru na ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi telivishọn Britain dị ka 'usoro', nakwa na ọ chọpụtara na ọ nwere ike ịbụ eziokwu karịa na akụkọ ifo
Ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ na ọnwa isii na nnyocha maka usoro ahụ, nke meriri Grierson Award maka ihe nkiri kachasị mma
Ọ natara mpaghara (Welsh) BAFTA maka ihe nkiri mkpirikpi ya nke afọ 2008, The Fifth Bowl
N'afọ 2009, a họpụtara ihe nkiri ya dị mkpirikpi Henna Night maka London Lesbian and Gay Film Festival
Ọ nọ na asọmpi na International Film Festival Rotterdam na Raindance Film Festival
El Hosaini sonyere na 2009 Sundance Directors and Screenwriters Labs, na-emepụta My Brother the Devil
A kpọrọ ya otu n'ime Screen International's UK Stars of Tomorrow maka afọ 2009
A tọhapụrụ My Brother the Devil n'ụzọ ihe nkiri na obodo iri na abụọ na US, May 2013 ma wepụta ya n'ụzọ sara mbara na UK sinima, November 2012
A tọhapụrụ ya ọzọ na Canada, Australia, New Zealand na Germany

Dị ka onye edemede / onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri ahụ, El Hosaini meriri ihe nrite kachasị mma na 2013 Evening Standard Film Awards, Best Screenplay na 2013 Writer's Guild of Great Britain Awards, Best Newcomer Award na 2012 BFI London Film Festival na UK New Talent Award na British Women in Film and Television Awards na 2012
A họpụtakwara ya maka onyinye BIFA Douglas Hickox maka Best Debut Film na British Independent Film Awards na Sutherland Trophy (Best First Film) na BFI London Film Festival
N'afọ 2014 ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị nduzi abụọ Danny Boyle họọrọ iduzi Babylon, usoro telivishọn ọ kwadoro ma mepụta maka Channel 4 na SundanceTV

Sally Colette Hunt OBE (amụrụ n'afọ 1964) bụ onye isi otu ọrụ na Britain, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Association of University Teachers ruo mgbe ọ jikọtara ya na University and College Union (UCU) ọhụrụ, nke Hunt bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu ya ruo n'afọ 2019
A mụrụ ya na 1964 na Germany, ebe nna ya na-akụzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị agha Britain, Hunt gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Chippenham, Wiltshire
Ọ gụrụ mmekọrịta mba ụwa na Mahadum Sussex site na 1983 ruo 1987, na-eje ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche nke otu ụmụ akwụkwọ
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị mahadum, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ na klọb abalị, onye na-enyere ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ aka, na maka òtù ndị ọrụ ụlọ abụọ tupu ọ banye na Association of University Teachers
Hunt bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu ikpeazụ nke Association of University Teachers (AUT), ebe ọ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ kemgbe afọ 2002
Na 1 June 2006, AUT jikọtara ya na National Association of Teachers in Further and Higher Education (NATFHE) iji guzobe UCU
Dị ka onye isi nke AUT, ya na Paul Mackney (Onye isi nke NATFHE), duziri ọrụ mmepụta ihe, ihe karịrị afọ atọ ruo 2006, iji kwado ịrị elu ụgwọ maka ndị ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ka elu karịrị 20%
Omume ahụ mebiri ule mahadum na inye akara na UK
N'ikpeazụ, ndị otu vootu dị ukwuu maka ịnakwere ịrị elu nke 131% site n'ime afọ atọ, na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke afọ ikpeazụ ga-abawanye na-agbaso ịrị elu
Ọnụ ọgụgụ nke afọ ikpeazụ ga-abụ '25% ma ọ bụ RPI, nke ọ bụla ka ukwuu'
N'ikpeazụ, RPI nọ n'elu ya ma bụrụ 5%, na-eme ka nke ahụ bụrụ ọkwa nke ịrị elu ụgwọ ọnwa nke afọ ikpeazụ
Hunt lekọtara ihe yiri ka ọ bụ nnukwu ọgbaghara n'akụkọ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu nke UK, ọgbaghara agụmakwụkwọ kachasị elu nke UK na 2018

A họpụtara Hunt dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu mbụ nke UCU na 9 Machị 2007, na-emeri onye isi na-ama aka Roger Kline (onye bụbu NATFHE, na UCU Head of Equalities) site na votu 1346 mgbe e kenyere vootu nke abụọ nke onye nke atọ Peter Jones mgbe e wepụrụ Jones na agba nke mbụ na-enweghị nkwubi okwu
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị sonyere na ntuli aka ahụ bụ 139% n'ime ndị na-eme ntụli aka nke ihe karịrị 116,000 UCU Members

A họpụtara ya ọzọ na 2 Machị 2012, na-emeri naanị onye mmegide ya, Mark Campbell (onye bụbu NATFHE, onyeisi oche nke UCU Co-ordinating Committee na London Metropolitan University na onye otu National Executive Council nke UCU kemgbe 2008) site na 73% ruo 27% (ma ọ bụ 6835 vootu); UCU Left kwadoro Campbell
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị sonyere bụ 125% n'ime ndị na-eme ntụli aka 117,918
Hunt bụ onye nnọchi anya UCU na TUC na onye otu TUC General Council
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ dị ka onye isi nchọpụta na otu ahụ mechara mara dị ka ACCORD
A họpụtara Hunt ọzọ na 2 Machị 2017 137% nke ndị otu pụtara, na-atụ vootu 13,724, na 8,138 maka Hunt na 5,586 maka onye na-asọmpi ya Jo McNeill
Ọ lụrụ di, nwere nwa nwanyị, ma biri na Brighton
N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2019, UCU kwupụtara na Hunt agbaala arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa odeakwụkwọ ukwu n'ihi ihe gbasara ahụike mgbe enyere ya £ 400,000 'ụgwọ ọrụ'
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke Order of the British Empire (OBE) na 2022 New Year Honours maka ọrụ na mmekọrịta ụlọ ọrụ

Sally Jepkosgei Kipyego (amụrụ na 19 Disemba, na afọ 1985) bụ onye America na-agba ọsọ ogologo na nke etiti
Ọ bụ onye nwetara ọlaọcha na mita 10,000 na afọ 2011 World Championships in Athletics na onye nwetara ọla ọcha n'otu asọmpi ahụ na afọ 2012 Summer Olympics na London
O nwere ihe ndekọ nke onwe ya nke 30 3835 nkeji maka ihe omume ahụ na mita 5000 kachasị mma nke 14 3042 nkeji na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị Kenya nke abụọ kachasị ọsọ maka anya
O meriri dị ka akụkụ nke Texas Tech Red Raiders cross country na track and field teams n'okpuru onye nkuzi Wes Kittley
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị Kenya mbụ meriri n'asọmpi NCAA cross country, nwanyị mbụ meriri atọ NCAA Division I Cross Country titles, na onye mbụ na-agba ọsọ meriri atọ Big 12 Conference cross country titles
O nwetakwara mmeri atọ na-aga n'ihu NCAA Indoor n'elu 5000 m ma bụrụ onye mmeri NCAA Outdoor ugboro abụọ
Ya na Suzy Favor-Hamilton jikọtara maka ọtụtụ asọmpi n'otu n'otu na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke NCAA
Kipyego meriri ọtụtụ asọmpi NCAA n'otu n'otu na afọ 2 karịa onye ọ bụla ọzọ na-agba ọsọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme NCAA
N'ihe gbasara agụmakwụkwọ, Kipyego nwetara akara ugo mmụta nọọsụ
Ọ na-agba ọsọ ọkachamara na International Association of Athletics Federations ' ('IAAF') World Athletics Tour
Nike, Inc
na-akwado ya
A mụrụ ya na Kapsowar, Marakwet District, Kipyego gara Kaptiony Primary School
A kwaturu ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, na Jenụwarị na afọ 2013, ụlọ akwụkwọ Shoe4Africa Sally Kipyego nke e wuru ọhụrụ dochie ya
Ọrụ ịgba ọsọ Kipyego malitere n'afọ 2000 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ nọchitere anya Kenya dị ka onye na-eto eto na IAAF World Cross Country Championships, na-emecha nke asatọ
Otú ọ dị, ọkpụkpụ nchekasị gbochiri ya na 2002 na 2003 tupu ọ banye kọleji na United States
Sally Kipyego bụ onye mbụ Texas Tech Big 12 XC Champ na naanị nwanyị meriri 3 Big 12 Conference cross country titles (06, 07, 08)

Mgbe ọ bịarutere na United States, Kipyego gara n'ihu n'ọrụ ịgba ọsọ ya dị ka akụkụ nke South Plains College Texans track and cross country team ruo ọnwa atọ tupu ọ banye na Texas Tech Red Raiders cross country na track and field teams, na-aghọ nwanyị Kenya mbụ meriri NCAA cross country individual championship
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu na kọleji kachasị elu na United States
Nsọpụrụ a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye natara 2007 Honda Sports Award ma nye ya nhọpụta na-akpaghị aka maka onyinye Collegiate Woman Athlete of the Year
Kipyego bụkwa otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị asaa n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke NCAA iji merie utu aha egwu anọ n'otu oge
N'ọnwa Nọvemba, Kipyego meriri asọmpi mba nke abụọ ya n'usoro
N'ime nke a, o setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ, na-emeri nke gara aga site na sekọnd 18
Dị ka nwanyị kachasị elu na-agba ọsọ na mba ahụ, a họpụtara Kipyego ka ọ nata onyinye egwuregwu Honda nke afọ 2008
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2008, Kipyego meriri n'asọmpi nke isii ya na afọ 2008 NCAA Division I Indoor Track & Field Championships na 5000 m, ọzọ na oge kachasị n'ụwa
US Track & Field and Cross Country Coaches Association kpọrọ Kipyego USTFCCCA Division I Indoor Track & Field Women's Track Athlete of the Year maka afọ 2008
Ka oge na-aga, njikọ ahụ nyekwara Kipyego ihe nrite nke Women's Athlete of the Year maka oge mpụga nke afọ 2008
Na 5 Mee, na afọ 2008, Kipyego setịpụrụ ndekọ NCAA 10,000-meter n'oge 31 2545 na Stanford invitational (Palo Alto, CA), na-emeri ndekọ gara aga nke Lisa Koll nwere ihe karịrị 45 sekọnd
Ihe ndekọ ahụ guzo ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ abụọ, mgbe Koll weghachiri ya n'otu egwu ahụ na afọ 2010
Na 13 June 2008, Kipyego meriri n'asọmpi nke asaa ya na 2008 NCAA Division I Outdoor Track & Field Championships na 5000 m, yana oge ndekọ NCAA
Ọ sochiri arụmọrụ ahụ site na njedebe nke abụọ na 1500m na 14 na onwa nke isii, na afọ 2008
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2008, Kipyego meriri Big 12 Cross Country Championship na oge nke 19 45, ihe karịrị sekọnd 50 karịa onye otu nke abụọ Lillian Badaru
Mmeri ya nyeere ụmụ nwanyị Texas Tech aka imeri asọmpi asọmpi mbụ ha
Kipyego ghọrọ onye mbụ na-agba ọsọ kemgbe e guzobere nzukọ ahụ iji merie aha nzukọ atọ n'usoro
N'afọ 2009, e nyere Kipyego onyinye Honda Sports nke atọ n'usoro
Ọ bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu mbụ a na-asọpụrụ ugboro atọ na ihe nrite mba nke mmemme ahụ
Kipyego mechiri ọrụ kọleji ya na 2009 Division I Indoor Track & Field Championships
O nwetara aha nke itoolu ya site na mmeri nke mita 5000
Nke a jikọtara ya na Suzy Favor-Hamilton nke Wisconsin maka ọtụtụ asọmpi NCAA
O were Kipyego naanị afọ abụọ na ọkara iji mezuo ihe Favor-Hamilton mere na anọ
Na asọmpi kọleji ikpeazụ ya, mile, ụzọ atọ n'ụzọ iri nke abụọ kewara Kipyego site na onye mmeri Sarah Bowman nke Mahadum Tennessee
Kipyego malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya na oge 2010
Ọ debanyere aha dị ka onye otu Oregon Track Club
N'afọ ahụ, ọ bịara nke atọ na Millrose Games mile na nke abụọ na Boston Indoor Games na nkeji kacha mma nke 14 5267
O meriri 5000m mbụ ya n'èzí n'oge ahụ na Mt
SAC Relays ma nọrọ n'elu anọ nke ihe omume ahụ na New York, Eugene na London nke 2010 IAAF Diamond League, tupu ọ bịa nke ise na ngwụcha na Memorial Van Damme na nkeji ọhụrụ kachasị mma nke 14 3864
Na mbido afọ 2011 ọ meriri 3000 m na Boston Indoor meet, wee setịpụ 1500 mita kacha mma n'èzí nke 4 0623 nkeji na Oregon Relays n'ọnwa Eprel
O ji oge 10,000m karịa ya na Payton Jordan Invitational site na mmeri na 30 3835
Ọ nwetara nhọpụta maka ndị otu Kenya na ihe omume ahụ site n'ịbịa nke abụọ na ule Kenya

Na 2011 IAAF Diamond League ọ gbara ọsọ karịa 5000 m ọ bụ onye nke anọ na Prefontaine Classic, mana ọ nwetara ọnọdụ nke abụọ na nzukọ DN Galan na Weltklasse Zürich (na-emeziwanye ihe kachasị mma ya ruo 14 3042 nkeji na nke ikpeazụ)
O guzobere onwe ya na mba ụwa na 2011 World Championships in Athletics, ebe ọ bụ onye nwetara ọlaọcha na 10,000 m, na-emecha nke abụọ na onye obodo ya Vivian Cheruiyot
Kipyego mechiri afọ ya site na ịsọ mpi na asọmpi okporo ụzọ America, na-ewere nke abụọ na Fifth Avenue Mile ma merie Manchester Road Race maka afọ nke abụọ na-aga n'ihu
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2012, Kipyego meriri 5000m na Payton Jordan Invitational na oge nke 14 43 11
3000m kacha mma nke 8 3589 nkeji bịara na Prefontaine Classic, ebe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ
O kwere nkwa isonye n'egwuregwu Olympic site n'ịbịa nke atọ na ihe omume nnwale 10,000m nke Kenya na Nairobi
O meriri na 5000 m na 10000 m, merie ọlaọcha na 10000 m ma jiri ihe nrite na 5000 m, na-agwụ ihe na-erughị nke abụọ n'azụ onye nrite ọla nchara Tirunesh Dibaba

Na onwa Septemba, na afọ 2012, MRI na CT-Scans ga-ekpughe ọkpụkpụ Calcaneus gbajiri agbaji na nkwonkwo ụkwụ aka ekpe ya; Mana n'ọnwa Eprel, na afo 2013, dịka oge egwu na-apụta ìhè, ọkpụkpụ Kipyego Calcaneus mebiri ọzọ
Na ọnwa Machị, na afọ 2014, Sally Kipyego meriri ma setịpụ ihe ndekọ ụmụ nwanyị nke ọkara marathon nke New York City na 1 08 31
Na Mee, na afọ 2014, Kipyego meriri 10,000m ụmụ nwanyị na 30 4226 na afọ 2014 Payton Jordan Invitational
Asọmpi Kipyego bụ ọsọ 10,000 mita kachasị ọsọ n'ụwa ka ọ na-erule 10 Julaị 2014

Sally Kipyego meriri na Millrose Games nke ụmụ nwanyị 3000m na 8 4172, na-etinye ihe ndekọ, ma na-emecha 147 sekọnd n'ihu onye obodo ya Betsy Saina

Na-asọmpi na mita 5,000 na Payton Jordan Invitational na 2 Mee, na afọ 2015, ọ gbara ọsọ IAAF World Championships na Athletics ụwa na Athletic na afọ 2016 Summer Olympics 'A' ọkọlọtọ oge iru eru nke 14 5744 ma bụrụ onye mmeri n'ihu onye obodo ya Betsy Saina
Sally Kipyego nọ n'ọnọdụ nke ise na 31 4442 na afọ 2015 World Championships in Athletics nke ụmụ nwanyị 10,000 mita
Na ọnwa Nọvemba 1, Kipyego gbara ọsọ na marathon mbụ ya TCS New York City Marathon Ọnọdụ ihu igwe NYC Marathon buru amụma nke 65 n'ụbọchị asọmpi, yana ohere pasent 50 nke mmiri ozuzo na ifufe 9 mph
Kipyego sooro ndị ọzọ nọ n'ọkwá dị elu gbaa ọsọ ruo kilomita 23, ebe ọ kwụsịrị
Sally Kipyego gbara ọsọ 14 4398 na 2016 Prefontaine Classic 5000 mita na Eugene, Oregon (USA) na onwa Mee 27, na afọ 2016

Kipyego meriri Rock 'n' Roll San Jose Half Marathon na 1 09 53 na San Jose, California

A na-ewere Kipyego dị ka onye kachasị asọmpi na-abanye na Olympic Marathon na Sapporo, Japan, Ọgọst 7, 2021
Ọ gbara ọsọ na ndị na-agba ọsọ n'ihu n'akụkụ onye otu Molly Seidel na ndị Kenya kachasị elu (Peres Jepchirchir na Brigid Kosgei) site na ọkara mbụ nke ọsọ ahụ
N'ọnọdụ okpomọkụ na mmiri, ọsọ Kipyego adịghị ike iji soro ìgwè ahụ
Ọ laghachiri azụ wee mechie nke iri na asaa na 2 32 53, nkeji ise na ọkara site na onye mmeri Jepchirchir
Kipyego gara Moi Kapcherop Girls High School na Kapcherop, Marakwet District, ya na ụmụ agbọghọ ndị ọzọ ghọrọ ndị na-agba ọsọ ọkachamara, dị ka Pasca Myers
Ụmụnne ya ndị okenye, Mike Kipyego na Christopher Kipyego, bụkwa ndị na-agba ọsọ
Mgbe Kipyego dị afọ anọ, nna ya nwụrụ, na-ahapụ nne ya ịzụlite ụmụ asaa

Mgbe Kipyego dị afọ iri na otu, enyi nwanne ya nwoke merụrụ ahụ n'ihe mberede ịnyịnya ígwè

Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Foundation for Research on Women's Health, Productivity and the Environment (BAFROW), o bipụtara ọtụtụ isiokwu na The Voice of Young People Magazine, nke BAFROW bipụtara ma lekwasị anya na ndị ntorobịa
