Salma Mumin bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri

Onyinye ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Ghana emeela ka ọ nweta ọtụtụ otuto, gụnyere Best International New Actress n'afọ 2014 Papyrus Magazine Screen Actors Awards na Best Actress in a Leading Role n'afọ 2019 Ghana Movie Awards
A mụrụ Mumin na Wa, na Upper West Region nke Ghana (Northern Region of Ghana) ma nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na mpaghara ahụ
Ọ gara Odorkor 1 Primary School maka agụmakwụkwọ ya wee kwaga Insaaniyya Senior Secondary School
O mechara kwaga Accra ịchụso ọrụ ihe nkiri ya
O sonyekwara na ihe nkiri You May Kill the Bride n'afọ 2016
Ọ nọkwa na ihe nkiri mba ụwa
N'afọ 2015, o mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya akpọrọ No Man's Land
A pụrụ ịhụ ihu Mumin na mbadaozi na mgbasa ozi TV na Ghana, gụnyere mgbasa ozi maka UniBank, Jumbo, Electromart na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Azụmahịa TV mbụ ya bụ maka UniBank
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya nke Hollywood Nutritions Slim Smart
Salma Okonkwo bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ghana na onye isi azụmaahịa na ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Blue Power Energy, ụlọ ọrụ ike ọzọ na-emepe emepe ugbo maka ọkụ si n'anyanwụ na Ghana
Salma Okonkwo (Iddrissu) bu onye a mụrụ na Accra, Ghana na 1970
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Loyola Marymount dị na Los Angeles, California, ma laghachi Africa, Sahara Energy were ya n'ọrụ
O hiwere UBI Energy, azụmaahịa pụrụiche na ịzụ ahịa na nkesa ngwaahịa mmanụ ala na West Africa, na 1997
Na 2013, Puma Energy nwetara oke pasent iri anọ na itoolu nke ụlọọrụ UBI Group
Ịmata ihe ndị a na-emegharị ọhụrụ dị ka ụzọ dị ogologo oge ka mma maka Africa dugara ya ịmalite ọrụ ọhụrụ site na Blue Power Energy nke lekwasịrị anya n'anyanwụ
Salma Okonkwo na-aga n'ihu na-agba mbọ maka mmụba itinye ego na mpaghara ike Africa, na-ekwupụta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị oke mkpa maka mgbake akụ na ụba kọntinent post-COVID
Na 2021 n'ememe nke Women's History Month, Cherie Blair Foundation kpọpụtara Salma Okonkwo na ndepụta ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọchụnta ego, ndị guzobere, ndị isi na ndị na-eweta mgbanwe
Salma Phillips bụ onye ọrụ TV, Odee na onye ngosi ihe omume tivi si ugwu nke Nigeria
Aha ya bụ Ummu Salma Nabila Phillips
A maara ya nke ọma dịka ihu ngosi nke telivishọn dị n'ebe ugwu
O nwetara diplọma iwu na Mahadum Jos, Naịjirịa ya na BSc iwu site na Rivers State University of Science and Technology,Port Harcourt
Olile anya ya bụ ịbụ onye nta akụkọ nke CNN
Salma bụ ọkara Fulani na ọkara Calabari si n'akụkụ ugwu nke Nigeria na onye hụrụ egwu hip hop n'anya
Salma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Jos, Naịjirịa, ma nata BSc iwu na Mahadum Science na Teknụzụ, Port Harcourt
Salma na Asa onye ama ama n'egwu na Naịjirịa, gara otu koleg
Na 7 February 2016, ọ malitere ihe ngosi Salma na-elekwasị anya na isi okwu akpụ n'ọnụ
Site na BellaNaija ọ sịrị 'Nrom bịara na mmezu bụ ịbụ onye na-egosi mkparita Uka
Achọrọ m ịnwe ikpo okwu ebe m nwere ike ikwupụta echiche m na isiokwu m nwere mmasị na ya
Njem a malitere afọ atọ gara aga mgbe m gosipụtara ihe ngosi, agbanyeghị nsogbu na nkụda mmụọ
Ekpebisiri m ike inye ihe ọ bụla m ga-eme iji nwee ihe ịga nke ọma
Obi dị m ụtọ na m mechara hụ ka ọ na-emezu
' Ndị nlereanya ya gụnyere Oprah Winfrey, Christian Amanpour, Funmi Iyanda na Femi Oke

Salma Rachid (Arabic Moroccan pronunciation ; a mụrụ n'abalị 13 ọnwa June afọ 1994) bụ onye na-agụ egwú pop nke Morocco nke nwetara aha ọma mgbe ọ dị afọ 18 mgbe ọ sonyere na oge nke abụọ nke Arab Idol, nke a na-agbasa na MBC
Onye kachasị nta na-asọmpi, ọ nwetara ọnọdụ nke ise ma too ya maka ike olu ya, ikike ya ịmara ụdị dị iche iche, na ikike ya
Ndị na-akwado ya kpọrọ ya El Sultana ma were Umm Kulthum dịka otu n'ime isi ihe na-akpali ya
Ezinụlọ ya sitere na oasis nke Tafilalt, mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Morocco, a mụrụ Salma ma zụlite ya na agbata obi Hay Mohammedi, na mpaghara Ain Sebaa-Hay Mohammedi nke Casablanca, Morocco
Salma nwere mmasị na egwu, eserese na ejiji site na nwata
Ọ gwara MBC n'oge a na-agba ya ajụjụ ọnụ na ọ na-ezuru uwe n'aka ezinụlọ ya, na-ekewa ha ma na-akwa ha akwa iji mepụta uwe ọhụrụ
O kwukwara n'otu ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ na ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ụgbọala kụọ ya mgbe ọ dị obere, mana ezigbo enyi ya zọpụtara ya, na-efunahụ ndụ ya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'ọnwa June afọ 2012, nweta baccalauréat ya wee banye na mahadum ebe ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na akụ na ụba
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, Salma kpebiri iji ohere mee ihe ma nyochaa maka oge nke abụọ nke Arab Idol

A na-eme nnwale Moroccan na Casablanca, Salma wee bụrụ 'Ya Moniyati', abụ Yemen nke na-ewu ewu n'ógbè Gulf Persian niile, n'ihu ndị ọka ikpe nke ndị Arab superstars Ragheb Alama, Ahlam, Nancy Ajram na onye na-emepụta ihe n'Ijipt Hassan El Shafei
Ha niile nabatara Salma wee gbaa ụgbọelu gaa Beirut, Lebanon, iji chụsoo usoro nhazi ahụ
Ọ rụrụ 'El Ward Gamil' site na Umm Kulthum ya na ndị asọmpi ise ndị ọzọ, karịa ka ọ rụrụ 'Awal Marra' nke Abdelhalim Hafez ma jisie ike họrọ ya n'etiti ndị ikpeazụ 27 ga-asọ mpi ịbanye n'ọkwa ikpeazụ
N'oge mbụ, ọ rụrụ 'Zaman El Samt' nke Talal Maddah, mana ọbụlagodi na ndị ọka ikpe kwenyesiri ike na olu ya mara mma ma dị ike, a na-ekpe ntụgharị ya ikpe dị oke egwu
Ahlam ka kwuru na ọ bụrụ na ọ lekwasị anya karịa ma ghara iwere onwe ya n'egwuregwu ya, ọ ga-emebi ụwa ndị Arab (dịka ọ bụ mmetụta egwu ọhụrụ nke Arabic)
N'ụzọ dị mwute, Salma enwetaghị votu zuru ezu, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị asọmpi asatọ ndị ọka ikpe họọrọ iji rụọ ọrụ iji nweta otu n'etiti 4 wildcards
Ragheb Alama họọrọ ya ma mee 'Ya Msaharni' nke Umm Kulthum maka ndụ
E mechara zọpụta ya na onye na-asọmpi Bahraini bụ Hanane Reda, nke mere ka o nwee ike ịbụ otu n'ime ndị ikpeazụ iri na atọ

Salma kụrụ egwu dị iche iche n'oge asọmpi ahụ, site na ndị na-agụ egwú dịka Sabah, Umm Kulthum, Mayada El Henawi, na ndị na'agụ egwú ọdịnala dịka Fouad Ghazi ma ọ bụ ndị na-abụ abụ pop Arabic dịka Samira Said ma ọ bụ Sherine
Ihe dị ịrịba ama banyere ụzọ Salma bụ na ọbụlagodi na ọ nwetaghị vootu zuru ezu na mbido, o jisiri ike nọrọ na mpaghara nchekwa ọtụtụ oge, n'ihi ndị na-akwado ya na-eto eto
Ndị ọka ikpe na ndị na-ege ya ntị toro ya na Fraịdee ọ bụla, ọbụnakwa onye Egypt superstar Mohammed Mounir gwara ya 'Ị nwere ihe dị ụkọ n'ụwa ndị Arab nnukwu olu nwere nnukwu ikike'

Ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ si n'egwuregwu egwu Arabic bịakwutere ya bụ ndị toro ya maka olu ya, dịka onye na-agụ egwu Siria Rouwaida Attieh na onye na-ede egwu Lebanọn Salim Assaf (onye dere egwu maka ndị na-agụ egwú dị ka Carole Samaha, Najwa Karam, Ramy Ayach na onye gwara ya na ọ ga-edetara ya abụ) yana ndị dị iche iche si n'ebe Moroccan
Salome Joseph Mbatia bụ onye omeiwu nwere oche pụrụ iche na Nzukọ Mba Tanzania
Ọ bụ onye otu Chama Cha Mapinduzi revolutionary party
Ọ mụrụ ụmụ anọ ma lụọ Dr
Joseph Mbatia
Na ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2001, mgbe ọ bụ onye ome iwu, Mbatia gwara ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi okwu banyere omume na-aga n'ihu nke igbu akụkụ ahụ nwanyị na Tanzania
Dị ka o si kwuo, ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ omume ọdịnala anaghịzi arụ ọrụ, a ka na-ebibi akụkụ ahụ nwanyị n'ụlọ ọgwụ, a ga-emekwa mgbalị gọọmentị iji kwụsị ya
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, na Septemba, Mbatia sonyere na 2001 Global Summit of Women na Hong Kong, China
Ọ bụ otu n'ime mmadụ iri atọ sonyere na ngagharị nke ndị isi nwanyị si gburugburu ụwa nke gosipụtara ụdị ndị isi nwanyị
N'afọ 2005, Jakaya Kikwete meriri ntuli aka ma ghọọ onye isi ala Tanzania
N'ọchịchị ya, a họpụtara Mbatia ka ọ bụrụ osote minista na-ahụ maka atụmatụ, akụ na ụba, na ike n'akụkụ Minista Juma Ngasongwa
O mechara bụrụ osote minista na-ahụ maka mmepe obodo, okike, na ụmụaka
Mbatia nwụrụ na 24 Ọktoba 2007 n'ihe mberede ụgbọ ala mgbe ọ nọ na Iringa, Njombe District, mgbe otu ụgbọala Fuso kụrụ ụgbọ ala ọ nọ na-agba n'ihu
Ihe omume ahụ bụ ihe mberede ụgbọ ala nke atọ nke metụtara ndị omeiwu ma ọ bụ ndị minista n'ime ọnwa abụọ gara aga

E bugara ozu ya n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu Julius Nyerere International n'ụbọchị na-esote maka nnabata sitere n'aka ndị minista ndị ọzọ na ndị ọrụ gọọmentị, gụnyere osote onye isi ala Ali Shein, praịm minista Edward Lowassa, na onye isi oche Samuel Sitta
Site n'ebe ahụ, a kpọgara ya Kirua dị nso na Kilimanjaro maka olili ozu na olili oolu
Sam Abbas (Arabic; a mụrụ na 11 Nọvemba 1993) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt, onye edemede, na onye na-emepụta ihe
A maara ya maka ụdị ihe nkiri tableaus nke o dere nke ọma, nke e dere uri, na nke yiri ihe omume
Abbas' Alia's Birth, ihe ngosi nke abụọ, nwetara nlebara anya mgbe a mara ọkwa nke asọmpi ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke nwanyị na-eduzi nke onye mmeri ga-etinye ihe nkiri ha n'ime akụkọ ahụ
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Nikohl Boosheri, Poorna Jagannathan, Samuel H
Levine na Maya Kazan

N'ọnwa Julaị 13, 2020, Abbas wepụtara ihe ngosi dị mkpirikpi nke nkeji 25, Rusted Caravaggios, banyere ọkpụkpọ òkù mbụ ọha na eze na Louvre Museum (Monday July 6, 2020) na-esochi mmechi ọnwa anọ a na-ahụtụbeghị mbụ
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe Variety Magazine kpughere na Abbas esorowo ndị na-ese ihe nkiri si gburugburu ụwa mepụta ihe ngosi Erēmīta (Anthologies)
Ọ bụ Abbas mepụtara ma dezie akwụkwọ mkpirikpi ndị e dere n'oge ọrịa na-efe efe nke afọ 2020
N'afọ 2018, onye isi Abbas mepụtara Lavender nke Matthew Puccini gosipụtara na 2019 Sundance Film Festival sochiri 2019 SXSW
Fox Searchlight Pictures weghaara ihe nkiri ahụ ozugbo, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ihe nkiri mbụ zụrụ na Sundance n'afọ ahụ
Abbas malitere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri nke Arab, ArabQ, na-elekwasị anya na ihe nkiri nwere isiokwu LGBTQ, n'oge 68th Berlin International Film Festival
ArabQ malitere na ihe nkiri mbụ nke Abbas, The Wedding, nke o dere, duzie ma mee ihe nkiri ya na Nikohl Boosheri
Abbas debere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'Ijipt iji gbaa ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri na Middle East
Ozugbo nke ahụ gasịrị, a kpọrọ ihe nkiri ahụ, 'The Queer Movie That Could Make Waves In The Middle East' na 'A film that will make a riuss in theaters'
Tupu ihe ngosi mbụ ya, ihe nkiri mkpirikpi nke Abbas bụ Time to Come ka LogoTV kpọrọ 'ọrụ dị ike n'ezie'
A mụrụ Samuel Aluko na ọnwa (Ọgọst 18, n'afọ 1929 mana Ọ nwụrụ na ọnwa Febụwarị 7, n'afọ 2012) Ọ bụ onye Naịjiria nke ámá ama na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba ọha na eze
Ọ bụkwa onye ọkà mmụta, onye nke dere edemede na akwụkwọ ndị na'enyocha ụkpụrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na akụ n'ụba nke gọọmentị
Aluko rụkwara ọrụ ndụmọdụ nye ụfọdụ ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dịka Obafemi Awolowo na Sani Abacha
A na-ahụ ohere nke ikpeazụ a dị ka ihe a na'adịghị ahụkebe n'ihi nguzo siri ike nke Aluko na mbụ megide oke ihe ọjọọ dị ichè ichè nke ndị ọchịchị
Ebumnuche Aluko n'ihe gbasara ndọrọ ọchịchị na akụ na ụba juputara na nkatọ nke akụnụba n'etiti ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ya na iweli elu nke ego gọọmentị na-enweta dị ka ụzọ isi kwalite mmepe akụnaụba

Ọ bụ onye a ma ama na-ịkọwa ihe gbasara ego ọha na eze ma bụrụ kwa onye na - akatọ ihe banyere mmepe na ịlụ ụlọ akụ mba ụwa na iwu dị ichè ichè gbasara ọnọdụ akụ na ụba Naịjirịa na atụmatụ e nyere aga eji gwọta ma dozie nsogbu akụ na ụba

A mụrụ ya na Ode-Ekiti n'ezinụlọ Aluko Fagbohun, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Emmanuel School na Christ's School Ado Ekiti, ebe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ n'okpuru ndị nkuzi Ekini a ma ama dị ka Nathaniel Adamolekun onye mechara bụrụ onye na-edebanye aha na Mahadum Ibadan na JE
Babatola, onye bụbu Minista mpaghara
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi, wee bụrụ onye isi na Zik's College of Commerce, Sapele na osote onye nduzi na Lagos City College
Mgbe ọ na-akụzi ihe, ọ gara ọmụmụ akwụkwọ ozi nke Mahadum London na akụ na ụba na inweta akara ugo mmụta na isiokwu ahụ
Aluko tinyere aka na ihe gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Ado-Ekiti n'oge mmalite nke nnwere onwe nke ala anyị
Ọ bụkwaonye nso ụzọ nke ndị kwenyere na ogịga n'ihu Zikist bụ ndị na akwadoghị ọchịchị nke ndị ọcha

N'afọ 1953, ya na mmadụ ọzọ guzobere otu òtù kwụụrụ onwe ya, nke ana-kpọ Ekiti People's Party nke na-ahọpụta ndị ga-asọmpi ntuli aka n' ime obodo Ado-Ekiti, otu afọ gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ onyeisi oche nke Ado Ekiti District Council
Ụdị ụzọ iwu akụ na ụba nke Aluko na akatọ mmefu ego gọọmentị
Mgbe o si obodo London lọta, ọ ghọrọ onye ndụmọdụ nke ana ahọpụtaghị nke Action Group
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi kọmitii nke otu ahụ bụ nke e guzobere iji chọta ụzọ aga esi chekwaa ego
Kọmitii ahụ tụrụ aro ka e bebilata ego enyemaka ana enye ndị minista na ndị nọ nọkwa dị ichè ichè nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, echiche nke ụfọdụ ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị n'ime òtù ahụ na-akwado nke ọma
N'afọ 1962, ha bịakwutere Aluko ka ọ bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ akụ na ụba nke mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ
Ụgwọ ọnwa ya ga-abụ £ 2,942
N'oge ahụ, ọ bụ onye nkuzi na Mahadum Ife, nke ana akpọzi Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo na-eri ụgwọ ọnwa kwa afọ nke £ 1,000
Ọ nabatara onyinye ahụ na ọnọdụ na a ga-ebelata ụgwọ ọnwa ọhụrụ ya ruo n'ókè a kwụrụ ya na Ife na-ekwu na ọ gaghị arụpụta ihe na ọrụ ọhụrụ ahụ karịa ihe ọ na eme n' Ife
Mana gọọmentị jụrụ ọnọdụ ahụ o nyereMgbe Aluko nọ na Ile-Ife, ọ bụ onye ana ahọpụtaghị nke otu kọmitii ndụmọdụ nke AG, ya na Wole Soyinka, Victor Oyenuga, Dr Odumosu na ndị nkuzi mba ọzọ

Otu ahụ kwadoro otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, bụ ndị na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke kwenyere na igbochi ọtụtụ ihe na ekwesighị ndị isi na eme , otú ndị ndụmọdụ ahụ kewara ha na ụfọdụ ndị otu ọchịchị n'ihe gbasara otu esi etinye aka na gọọmentị obodo nile na ikewa pụọ na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ
Awolowo nabatara ụfọdụ aro nke otu a nke ọma mana ọtụtụ n'ime aro ndị ahụ amasịghị osote ya onye bụzị onye isi ala nke mpaghara ahụ n'oge ahụ

Mgbe Saburi Biobaku, osote onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ nke UNIFE dụrụ ndị nkuzi niile ọdụ ka ha kwado otu nke ụbọchị ahụ nke bụ NNDP n'afọ 1965, otu ana-kpọ Action Group bụ nke onye ndu ha bú Samuel Akinola kewara onwe ha ma kwụrụ ichè Aluko kwunyeru otu nke Action Group nke Awolowo bụ ndị nabatara aro na ndụmọdụ ndị otu Ife nyere
Aluko tinyere akwụkwọ iji gbaa arụkwaghịm n'ọrụ ma nye kwa oge ọnwa atọ
Ha nabatara akwụkwọ arụkwaghịm ahụ ozugbo ha gwakwara ya ka ọ pụọ n'ụlọ ebe obibi gọọmentị ozugbo o kwere mee na egbughị oge, ọ hapụrụ mahadum ahụ wee sonye na ngalaba akụ na ụba nke Mahadum Naịjirịa

Tupu ndị unwe kakị,(soja) enwegharụ ọchịchị na Jenụwarị n'afọ 1966, Mgbe Aluko na-agwa ụmụ okwu na nzukọ ndị ntorobịa, Ọ nyere ndị ntorobịa ahụ ọrụ ka ha ghara ịdị na-ele anya na agbụrụ ma ọ bụ ebe onye si na kama ha na emekorita ka ụmụ nne iji jikọta mpaghara ndị ahụ
Samuel Dedetoku nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Sam Dede (a mụrụ na 17 Nọvemba 1965) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nkuzi
A na-ahụta ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị baa ọgaranya na ndị kachasị nwee mmetụta na Naịjirịa
Ọ pụtara na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri 350 ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ nkwado na ọrụ karịrị afọ iri abụọ
Sam Dede si Rivers State, Nigeria
A na-akpọ ya 'Ebube' maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Issakaba
A mụrụ Sam Dede n'abalị 17 ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1965 na Lagos wee kwaga Sapele
Ọ banyere ụlọ ọrụ Nollywood n'afọ 1995 wee bụrụ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Ijele

N'afọ 2005, Dede meriri Africa Movie Academy Award for Best Actor in a Supporting Role maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri 2004 The Mayors A kwanyeere ya ugwu na SVAFF 2014 Special Recognition Award maka ihe ọ rụzuru na ndụ ya na onyinye ya na sinima Naịjirịa
A họpụtara ya maka Africa Movie Academy Award for Best Actor in a Leading Role n'afọ 2018 maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri 2017 In My Country
A họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Rivers State Tourism Development Agency n'afọ 2012 ma jee ozi n'ọkwa ahụ obere oge
Ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi na Mahadum Port Harcourt na-akụziri ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-amalite amalite
Otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ ya, Yul Edochie gara n'ihu bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Nollywood
Otú ọ dị, o kwuru n'afọ 2012 na ọ gaghị akwụsị ime ihe nkiri maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Thomas 'Sam' Doyle (1906-1985), bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe si Saint Helena Island, South Carolina
Ihe osise ya márá mmá na mpempe ígwè na osisi dekọrọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na ndị ọbọdọ St
Helenaş Gullah
A mụrụ Sam Doyle na 1906 na nso Frogmore, na St
Helena Island
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na Penn School, ụlọ akwụkwọ màkà ndị Africa America a tọhapụrụ nke ndị Unitarians na Quakers si Pennsylvania guzobere
Ọ bụ na Penn School ka ndị nkụzi Doyle matara na mbụ nkà nka ya ma ha gbàrà yá ume ka ọ gaa n'ihu n'ọrụ ya
Doyle hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ Penn na klas nke itoolu wee chọta ọrụ n'ụzọ dị íchè íchè dị ka ónyé na-ere ahịa, ónyé na-ebugharị ụgbọ mmiri, ónyé na'ala na n'ikpeazụ dị ka ónyé ọrụ ịsa ákwà
Ọ lụrụ Maude Brown na 1931 ma ọ bụ 1932; ha abụọ gbara alụkwaghịm na 1949
Doyle nwụrụ na 1985 na Beaufort, South Carolina
Doyle gàrà n'ihu na nka ya n'afọ 1940, na-egosi ihe osise ya na mpempe ígwè na mbụ n'ogige ya nkè ọ kpọrọ 'Outdoor World-Wide-International Gallery'
Doyle ga-eji ihe ndị a tụfuru atụfu dị ka elu ụlọ ígwè, plywood, na ágbá ụlọ màkà nka ya, na-egosipụta ụdị nka pụrụ iche, mana ọ bụ ihe pụrụ iche
Mgbè ọ lara ezumike nká, ọ malitere ọrụ nka ya n'ụzọ zuru okè na 1968
Doyle nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu site na ọdịbendị Gullah nké St
Helena Island, nke a maara màkà ọkwa dị elu nke njigide Africa
Doyle dere ike, adịghị ike, ule, na mmejọ nke ndị bi na St
Helena ibe ya site na ise foto ha
Doyle dekwara ndị ama ama nke ọbọdọ ndị Africa America
E gosipụtara akụkọ ifo dị ka Ray Charles, Martin Luther King Jr, na Jackie Robinson na nchịkọta Doyle
E tinyere ọrụ Doyle na ihe ngosi Black Folk Art na America na 1982 na Corcoran Gallery of Art

A na-edebe ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ Doyle na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke American Folk Art Museum, High Museum of Art, Smithsonian American Art Museum, Gibbes Museum of Art na Los Angeles County Museum of Art
na Penn Center (Penn School na St
Helena Island)
Sam Egwu (amuru 20 Juun 1954) bula onye governor Ebonyi State na Naigeria, 29 Mee 1999 ru 29 Mee, 2007
Obu onye People's Democratic Party (PDP), nke nwetere vote hiri nne na election nke 2007
Mkpúrù èdè íke
Sam Fan Thomas (onye amụrụ Samuel Thomas Ndonfeng, Eprel 1952, Bafoussam, Cameroon) bụ onye egwu Cameroon nke a na-ejikọta ya na Makossa
Ọ malitere na ngwụcha afọ 1960 wee nwee egwu mbụ ya na 'Rikiatou'
'African Typic Collection' ya bụ ihe na-ewu ewu na mba ụwa na 1984 ma bụrụ ma eleghị anya ọrụ ya a kacha mara
Thomas malitere ọrụ ya na mbido afọ 1970 dị ka onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara n'òtù Cameroon Tigres Noires
Ọ nọrọ n'òtù ahụ ruo 1976, mgbe ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'onwe ya
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya na 1968 mgbe ọ sonyeere The Black Tigers, nke onye egwu kpuru ìsì, Andre Marie Tala na-eduzi
Ọ nọrọ na Tala ruo afọ asatọ, na-edekọ ọtụtụ egwu
Ìgwè ahụ gukwara egwu na Paris ma gaa Senegal na mba ndị ọzọ dị n'Afrịka
N'oge a, Tala mepụtara ụda nke ya, ụdị egwu nke oge a dabere na akụkọ ọdịnala Bamilike
N'afọ 1976, LP mbụ ya bụ Funky New Bell, nke edere na Benin na akara Satel
LP nke abụọ, n'otu akara ahụ, sochiri na 1977
Na abọm ahụ, Black Santiagos si Benin kwadoro ya
E wepụtara egwu ya nke atọ na 1982 na Naijiria, na egwu a ma ama 'Rikiatou', nke mere ka aha ya bụrụ onye a ma ama na Cameroon
N'afọ 1983, Thomas gara Paris idekọ Makassi
Makassi bụ aha ụdị egwu nke Thomas, ụdị makossa uptempo jikọtara ya na mmetụta nke tchamassi nke Andre Marie Tala na mmetụta ndị ọzọ dị ka bami
Abọm ahụ nwere egwu egwu, 'African Typic Collection'
Egwú a bu nke a wuru gburugburu abụ Franco, 'Boma l'heure', wee ghọọ egwu mba ụwa, na ahịa gafee Africa, France na West Indies, ebe a tọhapụrụ ya dị ka otu 12 inch
Makassi wetara Thomas ihe nrite diski ọla edo na 1984 ma soro ya na abọm nke ise ya, Neng Makassi na 1985
Abọm ahụ nọgidere na-emepụta ihe dị mgbagwoju anya nke Makassi, na-enweghị ihe jikọrọ ya na ya kachasị mma
N'afọ 1986, o wepụtara abọm abụọ, Funk Makassi na Makassi Plus
Tinyere 'African Typic Collection', a tọhapụrụ egwu abụọ sitere na Makassi Plus na 1987 na album nchịkọta nke British Earthworks record label
Makassi Plus sochiri na 1988 site na Makassi Again, nke Celluloid ndekọ ndekọ kesara na mba ụwa
Thomas sokwa ndị otu ya MBC (Makassi Band Corporation) gaa njem na West na East Africa, Europe na Amerịka
Site na mbido afọ 1990, Thomas gbanwere uche ya site na idekọ ihe nke ya, iji kwalite ma duzie ndị na-agụ egwú na ndị na-eti egwu ọhụrụ na Cameroon
Ọ kpọkọtara ndị egwu nwere nkà, nke gụnyere onye nwụrụ anwụ Kotto Bass, Ebelle Jeannot, K
Godefroy, Fabo Claude, Guy Bilong na Tala Jeannot
O weputara otutu ihe ndekọ sitere n'aka ndị omenkà dị iche iche n'ime afọ 1990
Thomas wepụtara ihe ọhụrụ na 1993's Emotion na 1999's No Satisfaction
Ọ dịghị nke ọ bụla n'ime CD ndị a wetara ya ihe ịga nke ọma nke ọrụ mbụ ya
O mere ihe ngosi na-aga nke ọma na Nairobi (2007), US (2009) na Abidjan (2010)
Sam Gilliam (/ˈɡɪliəm/ GHIL-ee-əm; amụrụ na úbọchị irí atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba, 1933) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na onye na-ese egwu
Gilliam na Washington Color School nwèrè njikọ, otu ndị na-ese ihe na mpaghara Washington, DC nke mepụtara ụdị nka na-enweghị atụ site na eserese na 1950s na 1960s
A kọwakwara ọrụ ya dị ka nke abstract expressionism na lyrical abstraction
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ákwà a gbatịrị agbatị, nkè a na-ekpuchi ma na-ekpu, ma na-agbakwunye ihe 3D
A maara ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe mbụ na-ewebata echiche nke ákwà a na-ese n'elu ákwà na-enweghị ihe ndina n'ihe dị ka 1965
Nke a bụ nnukwu onyinye nye ụlọ akwụkwọ Color Field
N'ọrụ ya na nso nso a, Gilliam arụwo ọrụ na polypropylene, ihe oyiyi kọmputa, metallic na iridescent acrylics, akwụkwọ aka, aluminum, ígwè, plywood, na plastik
A mụrụ Sam Gilliam na Tupelo, Mississippi, nwá nke asaá n'ime ụmụ asatọ Sam na Estery Gilliam mụrụ
Gilliams kwagara Louisville, Kentucky obere oge amụrụ ya
Nnà ya na-arụ ọrụ n'ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè; nne ya na-elekọta nnukwu ezinụlọ ahụ
Mgbè ọ dị obere, Gilliam chọrọ ịbụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri ma jiri ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ya na-ese foto
N'afọ 1951, Gilliam gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Central High School na Louisville
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Gilliam gàrà Mahadum Louisville wee nweta nzèrè BA
ya na Fine Arts na 1955 dị ka ónyé otu nke abụọ nabatara klas nke ụmụ akwụkwọ ojii
N'otu afọ ahụ, o mèrè ihe ngosi nka nke mbụ ya na Mahadum ahụ
Site na 1956 ruo 1958 Gilliam jere ozi na ndị agha United States
Ọ laghachiri na Mahadum Louisville na 1961 ma, dị ka nwa akwụkwọ nke Charles Crodel, nwéta nzèrè MA ya na eserese
Mgbè ọ na-aga kọleji, ọ ghọrọ enyi ónyé na-ese ihe Kenneth Victor Young
Gilliam gere ntị na ndụmọdụ prọfesọ kọleji ya ka ọ bụrụ ónyé nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma nwee ike ịkụzi nka na McKinley High School nke Washington
Gilliam tinyere onwé ya n'ịmepụta ihe osise ya n'oge ụbọchị izu ụka ya màkà klas
N'afọ 1962, Gilliam kwagara Washington, DC
mgbè ọ lụsịrị ónyé nta akụkọ Washington Post Dorothy Butler Ónyé bụkwa nwanyị nta akụkọ Africa America mbụ na Washington Post Gilliam bi na Washington, D-C
ugbu a na ónyé mmekọ ya ogologo ógè Annie Gawlak
Gilliam enweela ọtụtụ ọrụ, onyinye, onyinye, ihe ngosi na nzèrè doctorate
E mèrè nnukwu ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya na Corcoran Gallery of Art na 2005
A kpọrọ ya 2006 University of Louisville Alumnus of the Year
Nsọpụrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere nzèrè doctorate asatọ, na onyinye Gọvanọ Kentucky na nka
Ọ natala ọtụtụ onyinye National Endowment for the Arts, Longview Foundation Award, na Guggenheim Fellowship
Ọ natakwara onyinye Norman W
Harris nke Chicago Art Institute, na ónyé na-ese ihe site na Washington Gallery of Modern Art
N'afọ 1962, Gilliam lụrụ Dorothy Butler, onye Louisville na nwanyị Africa America mbụ na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ na The Washington Post
Ha gbàrà alụkwaghịm na 1980s mana ha nwèrè ụmụ nwanyị atọ (Stephanie, Melissa, na Leah) ma nwee ụmụ ụmụ atọ
Mgbè ịgba alụkwaghịm ahụ gasịrị, ọ zutere Annie Gawlak, ónyé nwe ụlọ ngosi G Fine Art na Washington DC, ónyé bụzi ónyé mmekọ Gilliam ogologo oge
N'afọ 1960, a chọpụtara na Gilliam nwere nsogbu uche ma nye ya lithium, nke mebiri akụrụ ya nke ukwuu
Ọ kwụsịrị ịṅụ ọgwụ ahụ ma gbanwee nri ya site n'ịkpụ anụ uhie ma rie mkpụrụ osisi na mkpụrụ osisi
Gilliam bi na Washington DC
mana na 2010 rere ụlọ ọrụ ya na 14th Street, NW, n'ebe ugwu nke Colorado Avenue màkà $ 385 nde
Gilliam esonyewo n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onwé ónyé na United States na mba ụwa

Ihe ngosi ya n'onwe ya gụnyere ihe osise nke Sam Gilliam (1967), Phillips Collection, Washington, DC; Ọrụ Sam Gilliam (71), Museum of Modern Art, New York; Red & Black to 意 Ihe osise nke sam Gilliam (1982-1983), Studio Museum na Harlem, New York Sam G William A Retrospective (2005-2007), sitere na Corcoran Gallery of Art, Washington, DC; na Sam Gilliam (2017), Seattle Art Museum

E mere ndokwa imeghe nnukwu ihe ngosi mbụ nke ọrụ Gilliam n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri abụọ na 2020 na Hirshhorn Museum na Sculpture Garden na Washington, DC, mana e dezigharịrị ya na 2022 n'ihi mkpọchi COVID-19

Ihe ngosi ahụ, Sam Gilliam Full Circle, meghere na Mee 2022 dị ka ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ónyé omenkà ahụ mepụtara ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ naanị n'oge ọrịa COVID-19, kama ịkọwa ihe n'ụzọ sara mbara dị ka atụmatụ mbụ
O sonyekwara n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu, gụnyere 36th Venice Biennale (1972), Marrakech Biennale (2016), na 57th Venice Biennal (2017)
Sam Hopkins (amụrụ n'afọ 1979 na Rome) bụ onye na-ese ihe nke ọrụ ya gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ na Kenya
A na-eji ụzọ ndị na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ mara ọrụ ya, dị ka imekọ ihe ọnụ, itinye aka na mmepụta
Enwere ike ịkọwa ọrụ nka Hopkins, nke na-adabere na ọrụ ma na-emetụta ndị mmadụ dị ka ihe na ihe onwunwe nke ọrụ ahụ, dị ka Social Practice
N'afọ 2014, Foreign Policy Magazine kpọrọ ya otu n'ime ndị 100 Global Thinkers
A zụlitere Hopkins na Britain na Kenya
O nwere nzere na Mahadum Edinburgh (MA), Mahadum Oxford Brookes (MA) na Mahadim nke Arts London (PhD)
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye nyocha nka na Academy of Media Arts na Cologne
Sam Loco Efe (ubọchị iri abụọ n'ise n'ọnwa Desemba afọ 1945 - ruo ụbọchị asaa n'ọnwa Ọgụstụ afọ 2011) , amụrụ Sam Loco Efeeimwonkiyeke na Enugu, Ọ bụ onye ome ihe nkiri Naijiria na onye nduzi
A mụrụ Efe na Enugwu, Nna ya bụ Arase Efeimwonkiyeke, onye nlekọta ụlọ mkpọrọ
Nna ya bụ onye agbụrụ Benin nke rụrụ ọrụ na ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria, nne ya bụ onye na-azụ ahịa na-ere akara
O biri ezigbo ndụ nwata ya n'obodo Abakaliki dị na steeti Ebonyi ugbu a
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ nọ n’ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị; Mgbe ahụ Efe nọrọ ihe karịrị afọ nkịtị iji nweta agụmakwụkwọ elementrị n'ihi na ọ na-enyere nne ya aka n'ịzụ ahịa ya iji nweta ego maka ezinụlọ

Ahụmịhe mbụ ya na ịme ihe nkiri bụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ya mgbe otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri bịara ikpo ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Dọkịta N'agbanyeghị nke Onwe Ya, emesịa, ya na ndị otu ahụ kparịta ụka gbasara ihe nkiri na ihe ngosi nka

N’ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị, ọ bụ onye otu dị iche iche gụnyere ọha ejije ihe nkiri nke mere nsụgharị Julius Caesar nke Shakespeare mere na emume omenaala nke mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ na Abakaliki, egwuregwu ahụ bịara nke ikpeazụ na asọmpi ejije ahụ mana a mara Efe dị ka onye kachasị mma n’egwuregwu
nke mere ka ọ nweta ohere agụmakwụkwọ ka ọ gụchaa ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị n'efu

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị iche iche ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na nzukọ na-eme ihe nkiri, na-ahazi arụmọrụ nke Dọkịta n'agbanyeghị onwe ya na egwuregwu a na-akpọ Vendetta
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ bụ onye otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-eme njem na-agba bọl ma nweta aha otutu locomotive e gburu nkenke dị ka loco
N'oge a na-alụ agha obodo, Efe lụrụ agha n'akụkụ Biafra ruo mgbe ọ laghachiri na Benin na-afọ 1968
Mgbe ọ nọ na Benin, ọ malitere otu ihe nkiri Ovonranwen site na mbupute izizi ha bụ Ogierhiakhi's Obaiwape
N'agbanyeghị, ego ọ na-enweta site na ịme ihe nkiri pere mpe mgbe emesiri, ọ gara Lagos iji chọọ ohere ọrụ ka mma yana ịtinye uche ya n'ịgba na bọọlụ
Ọ nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya na-afọ 1972 ịrụrụ Michelin Tires ọrụ
O tinyere akwụkwọ maka ọkwa ahụ n’amaghị ka e si anya ụgbọala nke bụ ihe achọrọ maka ọrụ ahụ
Ọ mụrụ otú e si anya ụgbọala otu ụbọchị tupu ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ
Mgbe a na-agba ya ajụjụ ọnụ, ọ gafere ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ wee daa ule ịnya ụgbọ ala mana ịkwụwa aka ọtọ banyere njehie ya na ikpe mere ka onye na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ hụ ya n'anya
Ọ rụrụ Michelin ọrụ ire taya na Lagos, Ijebu Ode na Abeokuta
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ hapụrụ Michelin ga rụọ ọrụ na Dunlop Tires dịka Onye Nnọchiteanya Ọkachamara na ngalaba nke taya na ngwaahịa gbasara ya
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Dunlop dị na Benin, ọ bụ onye otu NTA Benin telivishọn n'usoro, Hotel de Jordan ma rụọkwa na nsụgharị nkeOla Rotimi 'The Gods are not to Blame
Na-afo 1977, ọ hapụrụ ahịa maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri
O mere nyocha ma nweta akụkụ nke Langbodo, egwuregwu nke Dapo Adelugba gosipụtara n'oge Festac
Ka Festac gachara, Adelugba kpọrọ ya gosi otu enyi ya na Mahadum nke Ibadan banyere ohere dị n'ihe nkiri
Enyi Adelugba nwere ikike nwetara Efe ọrụdị ka onye nka agadi ihe nkiri n'ụlọ ọrụ
A hụrụ Sam Loco Efe mgbe ọ nwụrụ na ime ụlọ nkwari akụ n'ụtụtụ Sọnde
Emeghere ọnụ ụzọ ime ụlọ n'ikike mgbe ọ ịrịdataghi mgbe ọ dinara ụra n'abalị gara aga
Amabeghị ihe kpatara ọnwụ ya ruo ugbu a
Ọ nọ n'elu oche nwụọ n’ime ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ ebe ihe ana eku n'imi Ventolin nọ n’akụkụ ya

Onye bụ osote onye isi oche nke ndị omekome Nzukọ ndị n'eme nka (AGN), Mr Steve Eboh, bụ ezigbo enyi Sam Loco kwadoro kwuru na Sam Loco nwere atụmatụ ịga n'ụlọ ọrụ ugbo ya na Ebonyi steeti wee zuo ike ebe ahụ obere oge mana ochicho obi ya ahu abịghị na mmezu
Mkpurụ okwu sélénsé
Sam Mangwana (amụrụ na 21 ọnwa Febụwarị 1945), bụ onye Angola Congolese amụrụ onye egwu Angola, amụrụ nna Zimbabwe na nne Angola
Ọ bụ onye isi nke ndị otu ya Festival des Maquisards na African All Stars
Mangwana bụ onye otu egwu nke François Luambo Makiadi bụ TPOK Jazz, na Tabu Ley Rochereau bụ African Fiesta, African Fiesta National na Afrisa International
A mụrụ ya na 21 Febụwarị 1945 na Leopoldville, ugbu a Kinshasa, isi obodo Democratic Republic of the Congo, na obodo kachasị ukwuu na mba ahụ
Nna ya bụ nwa afọ Zimbabwe na nne Sam bụ nwa afọ Angola dị nso
Mangwana mere nke mbụ ya na 1963 na otu egwu rumba nke Congo-Kinshasa, African Fiesta, nke Tabu Ley Rochereau nwere ma duzie
Mangwana gafere Osimiri Congo gaa Brazzaville ebe o guzobere otu obere oge a na-akpọ Los Batchichas
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Negro Band na Orchestre Tembo
Ọ laghachiri Kinshasa ebe ọ sonyeere Tabu Ley, onye a maara ugbu a dị ka African Fiesta National
Na afọ 1967, Mangwana hapụrụ ọzọ iji guzobe Festival des Maquisards
Ìgwè ahụ gụnyere ndị na-edekọ egwu ama ama; ndị na-agụ egwú Dalienst na Madilu System, onye na-agụ egwu Dizzy Mandjeku na onye na-eduzi egwu Michelino
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, Sam Mangwana nọ na njem ọzọ
Ya na onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara aha ya bụ Jean Paul 'Guvano' Vangu dekọrọ egwu abụọ ruo na afọ 1972
Na afọ 1972 ọ sonyeere TPOK Jazz, nke Franco duziri
Mangwana na-abụkarị onye na-agụ egwú na egwu nke onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara OK Jazz bụ Simaro Lutumba
Ịbụ onye a ma ama mụbara n'oge a
Njikọ ya na Simaro wepụtara egwu atọ 'Ebale ya Zaire', 'Cedou' na 'Mabele'
Ọ hapụrụ OK Jazz ma sonyeghachi n'òtù Tabu Ley, nke a na-akpọ Afrisa ugbu a
Ọ hapụrụ ọzọ, n'oge a ọ kwagara Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire, na West Africa
N'afọ 1978, ya na ndị ọzọ guzobere otu African All Stars
Mgbe All Stars kewara na 1979, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya
O dekọrọ ma gaa njem na ngwakọta dịgasị iche iche nke ndị egwu

Maria Tebbo (1980) na ihe fọdụrụ na All Stars, Coopération (1982) na Franco, Canta Moçambique (1983) na Mandjeku, na abọm ya na onye saxophonist Empompo Loway n'okpuru aha Tiers Monde Coopération na Tiers Monde Révolution bụ ihe ndị dị mkpa nke ọrụ ya na 1980s
Na ihi na ọ na-aga ugboro ugboro, ọ nwetara aha njirimara 'pigeon voyageur' (pigeon na-eme njem)
Na afọ 2000, Mangwana nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ya na Angola, na-apụta site na oge ruo na oge iji mee kọntaktị na Europe

Samuel “Sam” Onunaka Mbakwe (1929 { - Ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 2004) onye amaara dị ka Dee Sam bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Igbo na-onye gọvanọ ochichi onye kwuo uche ya nke mbụ n'Imo Steeti, ebe ndịda Nigeria site 1 October 1979 ruo mgbe 31 December 1983
Ụgbọ elu ụgbọ elu Sam Mbakwe International Cargo, nke dị na Owerri, isi obodo steeti ahụ, ka gbanwegharịrị aha ya
N'afọ 1981, Sam Mbakwe hiwere mahadum Imo steeti
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ dị na mpaghara e nyere Abia State n'afọ 1991 ma meekwa ya baptizim ọzọ nke Abia State University
Agbanyeghị, Mahadum Imo steeti nwetara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ na Owerri ma ka dị
Mbakwe malitere akwukwo n'afo 1937 na St Peter's primary school, Umulogho
Ndị ha na ya dịkọrọ ndụ gụnyere The Reverend Canon Jerimiah Anyanwu, onye ụkọchukwu Anglịkan mbụ na mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo Etiti nke Imo steeti, onye a mụrụ n'ihe dịka otu oge ya na Avutu
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na kọleji Ọzụzụ Nkuzi, Oleh, Isoko, site na 1946 ruo 1947, yana na Fourah Bay College dị na Sierra Leone na 1952
Ọ gara na Mahadum Manchester (1953-56), Mahadum Hull (1956-58), na n'ikpeazụ ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Inns of Court (1958-59) na-elekọta, niile na England, tupu ọ laghachi Nigeria ka ọ rụọ ọrụ
iwu na Port Harcourt, Eastern Region
Mbakwe jere ozi dị ka onye Administrator nke Okigwe Province na Republic of Biafra, ihe Igbo secessionist ala na n'ebe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria, n'oge 1967-70 Civil War
Mbakwe sonyeere ọgbakọ omebe iwu na 1978 wee bụrụ gọvanọ na 1 October nke afọ na-esote
Otu n’ime ihe ndị ọchịchị ya na-ebute ụzọ bụ imeziwanye okporo ụzọ Imo steeti
A họpụtara ya ọzọ, mana ọchịchị ndị agha General Muhammadu Buhari kwụsịrị n'ọchịchị ya nke abụọ na 31 Disemba 1983, bụ nke wetara njedebe nke mba nke abụọ
A kọwara dị ka “esemokwu,” o kwuru ihe ndị a banyere ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Septemba 1995 “Ọ bụrụ na ịnọbeghị n'ụlọ mkpọrọ mbụ, nke ahụ ga-abụ baptizim na iru eru gị
Ị ga-amụta site n'ogige ụlọ mkpọrọ na ọ bụghị ndị niile ejidere bụ ndị omempụ'

Mbakwe nwetara aha ya bụ 'gọvanọ na-akwa ákwá' maka ịkwa ákwá mgbe ọ na-agbalị ime ka gọọmenti etiti kwenye ka ha lebakwuo anya na steeti ya; oge izizi anya mmiri ya ama ama bụ idei mmiri Ndiegoro dị n’Aba, nke bụ akụkụ nke Imo steeti mgbe ahụ
Ọ kpọrọ onyeisiala Shehu Shagari ka ọ hụ mbibi nke ide mmiri ahụ mere, ma ekwuru na anya mmiri gbawara ya mgbe ọ na-edu onye isi ala gburugburu ebe ọdachi ahụ mere
Ọnwụ ya na Jenụwarị 6, 2004 n'Avutu, mpaghara ọchịchị Obowo, bịara ka ọrịa malitere na February 2002 wee mee obere oge ka steeti kwadoro njem na Germany maka ọgwụgwọ
Àtụ ImoStateGovernorsÀtụ State governors in the Nigerian Second Republic
Sam Nhlengethwa South Africa Creative collage artist na ónyé guzobere Bag Factory Artists' Studio
A mụrụ ya n'ọbọdọ Payneville nkè Springs na Gauteng, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Kwa-Themba n'oge ọ bụ nwata mà soro nne nne ya nọrọ na Ratanda
N'ịbụ onye amụrụ n'ezinụlọ ndị hụrụ jazz n'anya, ọrụ Sam sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ jazz na obodo ndị ọ tolitere na ya
Ọ bịdọrọ ịnakọta egwu jazz site na afọ iri na asaa wee bido ịnakọta ihe osise ya na 1977 mgbè ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ma gbanwee ọrụ nke ya màkà nke ụmụ akwụkwọ ibe ya
N'ihe osise nke ya, o si n'obodo ndị o tolitere nweta mkpali
Ọ gara Rorke's Drift ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Johannesburg Art Foundation na Mofolo Art Centre na Soweto
Nhlengethwa bịdọrọ ọrụ ya n'afọ 1976 ma mesịa kụzie nwa oge na Federative Union of Black Artists (FUBA) nké dị na Johannesburg
Mgbè ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mofolo Art Centre na Soweto, o sonyere na Thupelo na Triangle workshops
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Bag Factory Artistsī Studio na Johannesburg n'afọ 1991 iji nye ndị na-ese ihe ojii ohere studio na ihe osise
O meriri ihe nrite Standard Bank Young Artist n'afọ 1994, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ màkà telivishọn màkà South African Broadcasting Corporation ruo afọ irí na àtó
A na-egosipụta ọrụ ya n'ụwa niile na nchịkọta na Johannesburg Art Gallery, Iziko South African National Gallery, Durban Art Gallery nà ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-anọchite ányá Goodman Gallery na South Africa
Sam Nhlengethwa mepụtara ihe osise narị abụọ na iri asaa na asaa nke gụnyere
E gosipụtara ya nà ihe ngosi iri abụọ na atọ n'ụwa niile gụnyere
E gosipụtara ya na ihe ngosi isii nkè onwe ya gụnyere
Ọrụ Sam Nhlengethwa emeela ka ọnụahịa dị site na dollar iri asatọ na otu rụọ dollar puku iri isii na isii na narị abụọ na abụọ na ire ere (màkà Glimpses nke iri ise na iri isii na 2019)
O nwere ọrụ narị abụọ na iri asaa na isii na ire ere gụnyere
N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ, Nhlengethwa esorola ụlọ ọrụ na-ebi akwụkwọ dị iche iche na South Africa rụọ ọrụ dịka
Sam Omatseye bụ ónyé Naijiria na-ede uri, ónyé na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, ónyé na'ede egwuregwu na ónyé nta akụkọ
A mụrụ ya na June 15, 1961, Sam Omatseye si Delta State, Nigeria
Ọ bụ ónyé natara 2019 nke National Productivity Order of Merit (NPOM)
Sam Omatseye gàrà Government College, Ughelli, (nke bụbu Bendel State), Delta State site na 1973 ruo 1979 màkà agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya wee nweta asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ West African
Ọ gàrà Federal School Of Arts And Science, Victoria Island, Lagos màkà agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu
Ọ gụrụ akụkọ ihe méré eme na Mahadum Ife - ugbu a Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo) site n'afo 1980 ruo 1985 wee nweta nzere Bachelor Of Arts
Ọ kụziri Bekee na édémédé na Aminu Kano Commercial College, Kano n'oge National Youth Service site n'afo 1985 ruo 1986
Site n'afọ 1987 ruo 1988 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nta akụkọ-onye nyocha na Newswatch Magazine, ma kpuchie ọtụtụ ihe site na Foreign Affairs ruo Culture
N'afọ 1988, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé édémédé na African Concord Magazine, ma kwado akụkọ gbasara ọchịchị aka ike na ọgba aghara nke gosipụtara afọ Babangida

Ọ ghọrọ osote ónyé nchịkọta akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Concord Newspapers n'afọ 1989 na ọrụ a kapịrị ọnụ iji nyéré aka iduzi mkpuchi nke rigmarole nke mmemme mgbanwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya nke Babangida Years
N'afọ 1990, United States Information Service họpụtara ya ka ọ kpuchie ntuli aka na-abụghị afọ, ma rụọ ọrụ izu isii na mba ahụ gụnyere njikọ ya na Kansas City Star na Missouri
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ónyé nchịkọta akụkọ, Abuja Bureau nke Concord Newspapers na 1993
Ọ kọrọ banyéré nsogbu ntuli aka nke ụbọchị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Juun
Ọ hapụrụ obodo ahụ n'ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ mgbè ndị agha nyochara ya site n'isi ụtụtụ ruo n'anyasị
N'afọ 1995, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Editorial Page Editor, Thisday Newspaper
Ọ ghọrọ osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ, Sunday Concord n'afọ 1996 mgbè a machibidoro The Concord Newspaper Group iwu
Site n'afọ 1998 ruo afọ 2006 ọ kụziri Media na Journalism na Metropolitan State College nke Denver
Ọ kụzikwaara klas ma kwuo okwu na Mahadum Colorado na Mahadụ Denver
Ọ ghọkwara ónyé nta akụkọ teknụzụ na-ekpuchi ụwa wireless na mmalite ya na RCR Wireless News
Site n'afọ 2006 ruo ugbu a, ọ bụ ónyé isi oche, Editorial Board nke The Nation Newspapers
Ọ na-elekọta ngalaba echiche nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ma na-ede kọlụm kwa izu, In Touch
O nyela okwu ọtụtụ ugboro na mahadum Naijiria, gụnyere Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo, Mahadum Ibadan, Mahadim Lagos, Etc
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ónyé otu Kansụl Na-achị Isi nke Mahadum Lagos State
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ekwu okwu ugboro ugboro na ihe ngosi telivishọn na redio na nsogbu Naijiria nke ógè a
Ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi telivishọn, Standpoint, na TVC ma ugbu a na-akwado The Platform, mmemme ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-agbasa kwa Satọdee na TVC
Ndị agha kụrụ ya ihe màkà obi ike ịgafe n'ogige ndị agha iji jide egwu na ihe nkiri nke ọdachi ahụ
N'afọ 1992, ọ bụ ónyé mmeri mbụ nke Gordon N
Fisher Fellowship for Journalists in The Commonwealth, ọ nọkwa n'afọ agụmakwụkwọ zuru ezu na Mahadum Toronto
N'afọ 1997, ọ meriri Alfred Friendly Press Fellowship
N'okpuru okwu, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nta akụkọ na Rocky Mountain News
O nweghị ike ịlaghachi Naịjirịa n'ihi egwu ndị a na-eyi n'oge Abacha Years
O meriri Association of Black Journalists Award for Feature Writing
Ọ bụ ónyé ikpeazụ màkà The Denver Press Club Prize
O meriri Nigerian Media Merit Award (NMMA) màkà ónyé na-ede akwụkwọ nke Afọ ugboro atọ ma bụrụkwa ónyé ikpeazụ ugboro atọ
O nwetakwara mmeri na NMMA màkà ónyé nta akụkọ kacha mma
O meriri Diamond Award for Media Excellence (DAME) ugboro anọ màkà Informed Commentary
N'afọ 2011, ọ ghọrọ ónyé mbụ meriri ma NMMA na DAME n'otu afọ ahụ
E mèrè ya ónyé Honorary Fellow nke Nigerian Academy Of Letters n'afọ 2015
N'ọnwa Julaị 2019, Rotary Club International kpọrọ Omatseye Paul Harris Fellow
Gọvanọ District, nke Rotary Club, Gbagada, Lagos, Kola Sodipo nyèrè ya ònyìnyé ahụ
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2019, ọ natara ònyìnyé mba, National Productivity Order of Merit (NPOM)
Dị ka akwụkwọ ozi na-agwa Omatseye banyéré onyinye nke Minista na-ahụ màkà ọrụ na ọrụ Dr

Chris Ngige bịanyere aka, Ónyé isi ala nke Federal Republic of Nigeria, Muhammadu Buhari GCFR kwadoro inye gị onyinye National Productivity Order of Merit Award n'ihi nnukwu mmepụta ihe, ịrụsi ọrụ ike na ịdị mmá gị
Ogidi
Akwụkwọ akụkọ
Abụ

O mèrè nkatọ mba niile site na kọlụm ya, In Touch, mgbè o dere banyéré okwu ndị dị nro dị ka ihe nketa nke Chief Obafemi Awolowo nwụrụ anwụ, ónyé bụbu ónyé isi ala nke Western Nigeria; ọrụ Agha Obodo Naịjirịa nke ónyé ndu Biafran nwụrụ anwụ, Chief Emeka Odumegwu Ojukwu; ihe ndị Chinua Achebe rụzuru n'akwụkwọ, na-agbagha nkwupụta Orji Uzor Kalu, Onye isi óche nke The Sun na New Telegraph na nsogbu Southern Kaduna na-adịghị akwụsị akwụsị akwụ na Nigeria
Samuel Onyemelukwe bụ onye ọchụnta ego mgbasa ozi na ntụrụndụ nke Naijiria
Ọ bụ osote onye isi nchịkwa, mpaghara West Africa maka Trace, ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ lekwasịrị anya na omenala Afro-urban na Africa
Ụlọ ọrụ ya, Venator Partners nwere nnukwu ikike nke Trace Africa
Onyemelukwe nwetara nzere bachelọ nka na Fine Arts na Mahadum nke Southern California na MBA na nzere Masta na teknụzụ ozi na Mahadum Boston
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Walt Disney na Burbank, California
N'afọ 2009, ọ laghachiri Africa wee sonye na Viacom Media dị ka MTV Network, Business Development Manager, Nigeria
Onyemelukwe nwetara nnukwu ikikere Trace TV na West Africa n'afọ 2011 ma bụrụ onye a ma ama maka ịtụgharị Trace TV otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ a ma ama n'Africa
Ọ malitere ọtụtụ ọwa TV na-ewu ewu dịka Trace Naija na Trace Gospel na DSTV na STV Music na Startimes
Ọ bụ ugbu a osote onye isi oche nke Global Business Development for Trace
Samuel Osei Sarpong Jr
(19 Disemba 1974 - 26 Ọktoba 2015) bụ onye Britain na-eme ihe nkiri, supermodel, na onye egwu

O mere ihe nkiri karịrị iri isii na ihe ngosi telivishọn iri ise na ise, gụnyere ihe nkiri ndị dị ka Carmen The Hip Hopera, Love Don't Cost a Thing, Keeping Up with the Steins, Anchor Baby na No Weapons, nke o meriri onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na San Diego Black Film Festival
Ọ bụkwa onye nhazi na MTV's Yo Momma maka oge atọ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwoke ojii mbụ maka onye na-emepụta Tommy Hilfiger ma bụrụ ihu nke akara ahụ ruo ihe karịrị afọ isii
A mụrụ Sam Sarpong na London ma ọ kwaga Los Angeles ya na nna ya, Sam Sarpong Sr, onye bụ onye Ghana, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu
Ọ gara El Camino Real High School na Woodland Hills, California, ebe ọ bụ onye egwuregwu basketball
Mgbe nna ya kwagara Pasadena, Sarpong biri na ezinụlọ enyi ya ka o wee nwee ike ịga n'ihu na El Camino Real
Mgbe ọchịchọ ya maka kọleji na ọrụ basketball ọkachamara enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma, ọ tụgharịrị ime ihe nkiri na ịme ihe ngosi
Sarpong nwụrụ n'abalị 26 ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2015 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri anọ mgbe o si na Colorado Street Bridge na Pasadena, California wụpụ
Ọnwụ ya bụ nke Los Angeles County Department of Medical Examiner-Coroner kpebiri igbu onwe ya, na-echere nyocha
Sarpong bụ onye na-akwado ihe ngosi MTV bụ Yo Momma, ma kemgbe ahụ ọ gara n'ihu na-eje ozi dịka onye na-akwado ihe ngosi BET Awards tupu ihe ngosi All Access, ruo afọ asaa
Na 2013 BET Awards, o gosipụtara 'Best International Artist' category
Sarpong pụtara dịka Paul Unanga na ihe nkiri Anchor Baby ma merie Best Lead Actor maka ọrụ a n'afọ 2012 New York Film Festival
Ọ bụkwa onye ọbịa na 'Lord of the Bling', ihe omume nke Veronica Mars

Sarpong bụ mkpọsa nchịkọta akụkọ ejiji maka akara Louis Vuitton, onye natara MAA Fashion Award for Male Model of the Year, ma a kpọọ ya aha ugboro abụọ site na magazin Today's Black Woman na ndepụta 'Fifty Most Beautiful People'
A gbakwunyere ya na ndepụta 'Hot 100 Young Hollywood with Style' nke Us Weekly n'afọ 2007
E gosipụtara Sarpong na mgbasa ozi ngosi maka akara Boy London, ma n'oge gara aga ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka ihu mba ụwa nke akara uwe Nelson Mandela Foundation
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, ọ pụtara na ihe omume nke asaa nke American Crime Story na-egwu Byron / Neighborhood Man No
Sam Shendi bụ onye Egypt, onye Britain na-ese ihe
Ọ na-eji ihe mmepụta ihe nke oge a, ígwè, ígwè na-enweghị nchara, aluminum na fibreglass iji mepụta ọrụ ihe atụ ya
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na North Yorkshire
A mụrụ Sam Shendi na 1975 na Delta Naịl na obere obodo a na-akpọ Dekernes
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Helwan nke Fine Arts na Cairo na 1997 ebe o nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ na Sculpture na Architecture
N'afọ 1996 ọ meriri Mahmoud Mokhtar Sculpture Award
Shendi kwagara Britain n'afọ 2000 wee bụrụ onye otu Royal British Society of Sculptors n'afọ 2014
Ọrụ mbụ Shendi na ọla nchara na ígwè anaghị agba nchara na-enyocha echiche nke nguzozi, ọṅụ na afọ ojuju
A na-eme ihe osise Shendi na-adịbeghị anya na-enweghị atụ na-acha uhie uhie na-enwe mmetụta na-atọ ọchị

Ọ bụ ezie na ha nwere ezi uche nke mmepụta igwe, nke ọ bụla bu ihe ejiri aka mee site na iji ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, ihe ndị dị n'oge a dị ka ihe na-etinye ụgbọ ala na ihe na-ese ihe, na awa nke ịsacha aka
Ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ bụ mmadụ, ndị ọzọ bụ anụmanụ ma ọ bụ nnụnụ, na-adabere na nka na ihe owuwu nke nzụlite Ijipt ya
A na-anọchite anya Shendi na Graham's Fine Art Gallery, Johannesburg
Ndị na-anakọta ihe osise na òtù dị iche iche na South Africa, Panama, Taiwan, Germany, United Kingdom na United States anakọtala ọrụ Shendi
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta K-Solo na Hit Squad
N'afọ 1993, ọ bịanyere aka na Death Row Records, wepụtara naanị otu egwu, 'U Better Recognize' nke gosipụtara Dr
Dre, n'afọ 1994

Otu ahụ pụtara na Murder Was the Case soundtrack, wee ruo na # 16 na chaatị Billboard Hot Dance Music / Maxi-Singles Sales, # 18 na chaatụ Hot Rap Tracks na # 48 na chaatọ Hot R&B / Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama màkà okwu mkparịta ụka, 'Aha m bụ Sam Sneed, ị ka mma ịmata!' nké pụtara na mbụ na Snoop Dogg debut album, Doggystyle
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkírí Death Row, Murder Was the Case
Sam Sneed sokwa Dr
Dre mepụta egwu egwu 'Keep Their Heads Ringin na 'Natural Born Killaz'
'Natural Born Killaz' bu ụzọ chee na ọ bụ abụ Sam Sneed na J-Flexx a na-akpọ 'The Heist'
E wepụtara ụdị ọzọ nke 'Natural Born Killaz' na Sam Sneed na-eti egwu na Ultimate Death Row Collection na Nọvemba 24, 2009

O dekọrọ otu abọm na Death Row Records na otu ya Street Scholars na 1996 nke gụnyere J-Flexx, Sharief (nkè a maara ugbu a dị ka Killer Ben) & Drauma (nkè a mara ugbu a dị Ka Stocks McGuire) nk| a na-ebipụtabeghị
Samuel Songo (1929 - c
1977) bụ onye Rhodesian na-ese ihe, nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na-egosi ihe osise Afrịka na ndụ ọdịnala Afrịka
Songo nwere nkwarụ ma bụrụ onye na-eji oche nkwagharị

Ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ndụ ya na-arụ ọrụ site na Cyrene Mission School, na-emepụta nka site n'iwu nke Frank McEwen, onye mba Briten nke nyere aka guzobe ma mesịa chikwaa Rhodesian National Gallery of Art (nke bụzi National Gallery of Zimbabwe)
Ọrụ mbụ nke Songo gụnyere eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ mgbe ụfọdụ, Otú ọ dị, n'afọ ndị sochirinụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ naanị na ọdịnala oge ochie nke ihe ọkpụkpụ nkume Shona
N'afọ 1946, Songo bụ isi isiokwu nke ihe nkiri British Documentary nke akpọrọ 'Pitaniko, ihe nkiri nke Cyrene'
N'afọ 1954, e gosipụtara Songo na magazin Time nke akpọrọ 'Wonderstone Wonders'
E gosipụtara ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Songo na National Gallery of Rhodesia, Museum of Modern Art na 1968, Musée Rodin na 1971, na London's Institute of Contemporary Arts na 1972
E rekwara ọtụtụ n'ime ha na nchịkọta onwe ha na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na England
Samia Ahmed Attia Abdel Rahman, nke a maara dị ka Sama Elmasry, bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-agba egwu afọ
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Mehwar TV Channel mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Faculty of Arts ma gosikwa na ihe nkiri sinima atọ kemgbe afọ 2008
Al-Azhar kpọrọ ndị na-ekiri ihe nkiri ahụ ka ha kwụsị ihe nkiri ahụ maka ihe a na-ekwu na ọ bụ ihe rụrụ arụ na ndị otu ndị nta akụkọ kwuru na ihe nkiri ahụ na-emebi ọrụ ahụ
Sayed Khatab, onye isi nke Censorship Board of Artistic Works, mere ihe na oku nke ndị nta akụkọ na mbipụta 'ezigharịrị' nwere ike ịhapụ na 14 Machị 2012

Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2013, Sama malitere imepụta vidiyo YouTube na-atọ ọchị nke na-akatọ gọọmentị FJP, Muslim Brotherhood, na ndị ọzọ Islamist na vidiyo ya nke anọ, na-egosi ya na-eyi okpu isi na niqab, ọ natara egwu ọnwụ, n'ihi na ọ bụ, 'dị ka onye akwụna, na-achị hijab ọchị'
Sama nwetara aha ọjọọ n'ụwa niile mgbe vidiyo ya na-akatọ iwu Barack Obama megide Ijipt ma kwupụta nkwado maka nguzo Abdel Fattah el-Sisi gbasara na Ịntanetị na mbido Ọgọst 2013
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014, e jidere ya 'na-echere nyocha maka ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn na-enweghị ikikere nke a na-ekwu na ọ bụ ya nwe'

Nke a bụ n'ihi na o mere vidiyo na-akwa Mortada Mansour, onye isi nke klọb egwuregwu Zamalak, emo, ma ọ bụ n'agbanyeghị na ọ masịghị ya, ma ọbụ n'ihi n'ihi obere oge ọ na-eme atụmatụ ịzọ ọkwa onye isi ala megide al-Sisi

Ọ na-abụ abụ 'Ya Mortada, Ya Mortada' na ụda nke abụ Arabo-Turkish, 'Ya Mustafa' na ụfọdụ okwu na-enye echiche, nke mbụ na uwe ogologo wee banye na teepu bọọlụ Zamalak ma jiri bọọlụ bọọlụ na-egwuri egwu
Ọ mekwara onye na-eme ihe ọchị bụ Bassem Youssef
A kwụrụ ya ụgwọ, mana ọ laghachiri na sekit ndị ama ama na vidiyo ndị ọzọ na-awụ akpata oyi n'ahụ
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2020, onye na-eme ihe ngosi TV nke Ijipt bụ Reham Saeed gbara ya akwụkwọ maka nkwutọ
N'echi ya, e jidere ya
Na Juun 27 afọ 2020, a mara ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ atọ, na ibu ọrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ puku pound atọ

Jean-Michel Sama Lukonde Kyenge (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ nʼafọ 1977) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba Congo si n 'ógbè Katanga' nke bụbu praịm minista nke Democratic Republic of the Congo kemgbe ụbọchị iri na ise nke onwa Febrụwarị n'afọ 2021
A kpọrọ ya ụbọchị ọdachi Osimiri Congo nke afọ 2021
Ọ mara ọkwa kansụl ya n'abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 2021
Ọ bụ onye otu Future of Congo

A mụrụ Lukonde n'abalị anọ nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1977, na Paris, ọ bụkwa onye nwetara ọzụzụ dị ka injinia Ọ bụ nwa Stéphane Lukonde Kyenge, onye dị mkpa na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke obodo ya Katanga bụ onye e gburu n'afọ 2001
N'ọnwa June nke afọ 2019, Lukonde ghọrọ onye ndidi ọha nke Gécamines otu n'ime nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta ihe n'Afrika, na nke kachasị na Democratic Republic of Congo
Onye isi ala Félix Tshisekedi họpụtara ya n'ọkwa a n'onwa June afọ 2019
Tupu ọ bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Congo National Railway Company, SNCC
Tshisekedi họpụtara ya dịka praịm minista n'ọnwa Febụwarị nke afọ 2021
O mechara gụọ ụlọ ọrụ ya aha

Àtụ S-off

Àtụ S-ttl
