Àtụ S-end
Samah Anwar, bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri nke amụrụ na Eprel 22, 1965 na Cairo, Egypt
Samah Barigou bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Nabil Ayouch nke afọ 2021 Casablanca Beats (French Haut et Fort), nke a họọrọ iji sọọ mpi maka Palme d'Or na 2021 Cannes Film Festival

Samantha Reed Smith (N'ọnwa June 29, 1972 ruo afọ August 25, 1985) bụ onye America na-eme udo na onye na-eme ihe nkiri ụmụaka si Manchester, Maine, onye ghọrọ onye a ma ama maka mgbasa ozi ya na-emegide agha n'oge Agha Nzuzo n'etiti United States na Soviet Union
N'afọ 1982, Smith degaara odeakwụkwọ ukwu a họpụtara ọhụrụ nke Communist Party nke Soviet Union, Yuri Andropov, akwụkwọ ozi ma nata nzaghachi onwe onye na oku ka ọ gaa Soviet Union, nke ọ nabatara
Smith dọtara uche mgbasa ozi dị ukwuu na mba abụọ ahụ dị ka 'Goodwill Ambassador', bụrụ onye a maara dị ka America's Youngest Ambassador ma mesịa sonye na ọrụ udo na Japan
Site n'enyemaka nke nna ya, Arthur, (onye agụmakwụkwọ), o dere akwụkwọ akpọrọ Journey to the Soviet Union, nke kọrọ banyere nleta ya na mba ahụ

O mechara bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nwatakịrị, na-akwado ihe nkiri pụrụ iche gbasara ụmụaka na ntuli aka onye isi ala United States nke 1984 maka The Disney Channel ma na-arụ ọrụ na usoro telivishọn Lime Street

Smith nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ n'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1985, n'ụgbọelu Bar Harbor Airlines Flight n'afọ 1808, nke dara n'ụzọ na-adịghị n'okporo ụzọ ụgbọ elu na nso ikpeazụ nke Auburn / Lewisiston Municipal Airport na Maine
Samar Matoussi (a mụrụ na Febụwarị 4, 1993) bụ onye mba Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ngosi, na onye na-ese ihe nlereanya nke malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 2016

Samba Mapangala bụ onye na-agụ egwú na onye ndu egwu nke Congo nke bi na Kenya maka ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ egwu ya nke afọ iri ise ya, a kachasị mara ya ebe ahụ n'ihi mmepụta na nduga Virunga, nke bụ otu n'ime ndị egwu kachasị ewu ewu n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka, ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ na ise (35)
A mụrụ ya na Matadi nke dị ugbu a na Democratic Republic of Congo
Ọ kwagara Kinshasa, ebe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, na mmalite afọ 1970 (ma ọ bụ n'afọ 1977 dị ka otu isi iyi si kwuo, mana afọ ahụ nwetara mgbaghari site n'otu isi mmalite na ndị ọzọ)

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ bụ onye otu egwu ọtụtụ ndị otu Kinshasa n'afọ 1970 ya na Super Tukina bụrụ abụ bụ onye dekọrọ egwu mbụ ya, 'Satonge', mgbe ahụ, ọ sonyeere Super Bella Bella n'akụkụ Jean Bosco na Mongoley, onye na-akpọ ụbọ egwu nke Orchestre Lipua Lipua, ya na Bariza na Saka Saka na-akpọrịta egwu
Mapangala kwagara Uganda n'afọ 1975 ebe ya na ụfọdụ ndị egwu Congo ndị ọzọ guzobere otu egwu Les Kinois
Ha kwagara Nairobi n'afọ 1977
O guzobere otu egwu ọhụrụ, Orchestra Virunga, n'afọ 1981
A na-akpọ otú egwu ahụ aha ugwu mgbawa Virunga nke dị na Congo
Orchestra Virunga wepụtara abọm mbụ ha, It's Disco Time na Samba Mapangala n'afọ 1982
Ná mmalite afọ ndị 1990 ndị otu ahụ nwetara ụfọdụ iwu ewu na mba ụwa site na ntọhapụ abọm dị ka 'Virunga Volcano' na 'Feet on Fire'
Ọ gara n'ihu na-edekọ, ọ ka bụkwa otu n'ime ndị na-agụ egwú na East Africa
Ọ bi na United States ugbu a
Mapangala malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Occidental Brothers Dance Band International n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 2009
A na-ewere Mapangala dị ka otu n'ime oge ọlaedo nke egwu Lingala nke Kenya n'akụkụ Les Mangelepa, Baba Gaston na Super Mazembe
N'afọ 2004 Tanzania Music Awards a họpụtara abọm ya Ujumbe na ụdị kacha mma nke African Album
Sambasa Nzeribe listen (onye a mụrụ Chiedozie Nzeribe Siztus) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn, nlereanya na onye na-eme ntụrụndụlisten (help·info)
Ọ si Anambra Steeti nke Naịjirịa

O gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naijiria na-aga nke ọma, gụnyere A Mile from Home (2013) Out of Luck (2015), Just Not Married (2015), A Soldier's Story (2015), Hotel Choco (2015), The Wedding Party (2016), The Island (2018), Slow Country (2018), Elevator Baby (2019), Kasala (2018) na The Ghost and the Tout (2018)
N'afọ 2016, ọ meriri AMVCA nke abụọ ya n'usoro maka 'Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Drama'
Sambasa tolitere n'ọnọdụ siri ike, ebe nna ya nwụnahụrụ ya n'oge
Ọ tolitere na Isolo, Lagos State
Ọ zụlitere mmasị maka ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ na-etolite, ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ nke ukwuu na ndị ukwe chọọchị na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Sambe bụ asụsụ a na-eche na ọ dịghịzi adị nke Plateau nke ala Naịjirịa nke a na-asụ n'obodo nta nke otu aha ahụ
Ndị Sambe atughariala na asuzi Ninzo
Sambe bụ asusu na-adịghị enwekebe odiche //k͡p// na //k͡pʷ//, ọdịiche a na-ahụkarị n'asụsụ ụwa
Dịka ọmụmaatụ,
Sameh Alaa bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Ijipt
A mụrụ ya na Cairo, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cairo, mgbe e mesịrị, ọ kwagara Europe
N'afọ 2020, ọ ghọrọ onye nduzi Ijipt mbụ gosipụtara ihe nkiri na ngalaba asọmpi Short Film na Cannes Film Festival
Na June 2021, a kpọrọ aha ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị otu ndị ọka ikpe isii maka Cinéfondation na ngalaba ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na 2021 Cannes Film Festival
Samera Paz bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé nhazi si Washington DC
amụrụ na Mee 19, 1994 na nwá akwụkwọ ugbu a na Mahadum nke Arts na Philadelphia
A maara ya maka iduzi Girl Power Meetups na DC Paz na-ejikarị foto eme ihe mana o meela ụfọdụ nka ma na-arụ ọrụ na isiokwu dịka okike, agbụrụ, na ahụike uche
Paz malitere iji ọbara ịhụ nsọ mee ihe osise ya mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na isii ma mepụta ihe ndị na-abụkarị ihe na-enweghị atụ, dabere na akara, ọdịdị, na ụkpụrụ
Paz na-ahụ ọbara ya na nka ya 'nke okike na nke mara mma,' ma kwenyere na ọ na-ebelata ihere n'oge dị ichè ichè, mana ọ nwetara mmeghachi omume dị ukwuu mgbè o biputara ọrụ ya na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta
E gosipụtara ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu na gallery dị ka Transformer na DC ma na-achọ ịbụ onye na-ese foto agha

Mgbè ọ nọ na DC na 2015, Paz guzobere otu a na-akpọ Girl Power Meetups nke dị na DC, 'nke ụmụ nwanyị na-acha uhie uhie na-agba ọsọ nke na-achọ ime ka ụmụ agbọghọ jikọọ aka iji kwado, kụziere, jikọọ ma rụkọọ ọrụ ọnụ n'ụzọ okike
' Ọ malitere ya n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ememe nke ụmụ nwanyị na-ese ihe iji lekwasị anya na ndị na-eto eto ma mee ọtụtụ mgbè
'Ihe omume ndị ahụ sitere na ntụrụndụ dị ọcha, dị ka mgbanwe uwe na klas yoga, na mmepe ọrụ na ọbụna nleta na White House iji zute ụmụ nwaanyị na-arụ ọrụ n'ọkwá dị elu
Samia Hamouda Abbou (Arabic عبودة, amụrụ na 3 Nọvemba 1965) bụ onye ọka iwu na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2011, ọ nọchiri Moncef Marzouki na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu mgbe ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye isi ala nke Tunisia
Tupu mgbanwe nke Tunisia, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere ma sonye na Congress for the Republic (CPR) na 2006
Ọ lụrụ Mohamed Abbou, onye jere ozi dị ka osote praịm minista maka mgbanwe nchịkwa na Jebali Cabinet ruo June 2012
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na atọ , ha abụọ hapụrụ CPR wee guzobe Democratic Current na Mee
Na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2014 ọ bụ onye isi nke ndepụta pati ya na mpaghara Tunis I ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịhọpụta ya ọzọ na Nzukọ nke ndị nnọchi anya ndị mmadụ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na Tebourba, wee sonye na Faculty of Law and Political Science na Tunis ruo mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2010
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere National Council for Freedoms na Tunisia wee sonye na Congress for the Republic na 2006
Onye otu Constituent Assembly, na-anọchi Moncef Marzouki, site na 27 Disemba 2011
Ọ hapụrụ Congress maka Republic na 2013 wee sonye n'ụlọ ikpe Democratic, n'okpuru agba nke a họpụtara ya na Assembly of People's Representatives na ntuli aka nke 26 Ọktoba 2014 na votu 5,404
N'afọ 2014, e ji akara nke knight nke Tunisian Order of Merit chọọ ya mma
Samia Akario (Arabic) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe na onye nduzi a mụrụ (28 Mee 1972) na Chefchaouen, Morocco
A mụrụ Samia Akariou n'afọ 1972 n'obodo Chefchaouen, Morocco
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ma gụsịa akwụkwọ na Higher Institute of Dramatic Arts and Cultural Activities (ISADAC) na Higher National Drama Paris Conservatoire
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri site n'igosi ọtụtụ ihe, mgbe ahụ ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri (Lalla Hobbi) Mohamed Abderrahman Tazi nke onye mere ka ọha mara ya n'ezie
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri Tricks women Farida Belyazid, Friends yesterday nke Hassan Benjelloun na Ali, Rabiaa na ndị ọzọ
Ahmed Boulane

Samia Fikri (Arabic; amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1999) bụ onye Morocco a mụrụ na France nke na agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na agba ọsọ n'etiti maka otu egwuregwu nke abụọ nke ụmụ nwanyị Montauban FCTG na otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco
Fikri bụ ngwaahịa nke En Avant Guingamp Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka US Saint-Malo, ESOF Vendée La Roche-sur-Yon na Montauban na France
Fikri mere mpụta mbụ ya maka Morocco na 30 Nọvemba 2021 dị ka onye mmalite na 2–0 enyi na enyi meriri n'ụlọ
Senegal
Samia Rhaiem (Arabic) bụ onye obodo Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Samia Suluhu Hassan (amụrụ 27 Jenụwarị 1960) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nke isii na ugbu a onye isi ala Tanzania
Ọ bụ onye otu pati social-democrat Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM) na-achị
Suluhu bụ nwanyị nke atọ onye isi ọchịchị nke obodo East African Community (EAC), na-esote Sylvie Kinigi na Burundi na Agathe Uwilingiyimana na Rwanda, ma bụrụkwa onye isi ala nwanyị mbụ nke Tanzania
Ọ malitere ọrụ na 19 Maachị 2021 ka Onye isi ala John Magufuli nwụsịrị na 17 Maachị 2021
Onye obodo Zanzibar, Suluhu ruru oru dịka minista na okara-onwe ogbe na oge ọchịchị onye isi ala Amani Karume
Oruru oru dịka onye otu nzuko omeiwu na mkpaghara Makunduchi site na afo 2010 ruo 2015 ma burukwa Minista nke Steeti na ulo oru osote onye isi oche nke ihe gbasara otu site na afo 2010 ruo na 2015
Na afo 2014, a horo ya ka oburu osote onye isi oche nke Constituent Assembly e nyere oru idebe iwu ọhụrụ nke obodo
Samia Yusuf Omar nke ana akpọkwa Samiyo Omar (Ọmụmụ March 1991 – Ọnwụ April 2012) tupu ọnwụ ya bụ onye na agba ọsọ nke si na obodo Somalia
Samiha Ayoub bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri na telivishọn

N'afọ 2015, ọ natara onyinye Naịl na nka, n'otu afọ ahụ, a gụrụ nnukwu ụlọ nzukọ dị na National Theater aha ya, iji kwanyere ọrụ ya dị ịrịba ama na sinima na ihe nkiri, yana onyinye ya na nka ihe nkiri na Ijipt
A mụrụ Samiha Ayoub na Shubra, Cairo na 1932
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọakwụkwọ ndị nọn di ebe ahụ, wee mechaa sonye na Acting Institute na 1952
Ọganihu ya bịara mgbe ọrụ ya na Samara na Rabaa ElAdawya (usoro redio)
Ọ lụrụ di ugboro atọ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Mohsen Sarhan, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Mahmoud Morsy, na onye na-ede egwuregwu Saʹed Eddine Wihbe (Saad Eddin Wehbe)
Site na 1972-1975 Ayoub duziri The Modern Theatre, site na 1975-1985, ọ bụ onye nduzi nke Al-Qawmy Theatre
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na usoro telivishọn a ma ama El Miraya n'akụkụ Salah Zulfikar na 1984
Samir Elmissiri bụ onye Omenkà Ijipt
A mụrụ ya na Cairo, Ijipt, na 1941, ma ugbu a ọ bi na Alexandria
Ọ bụ onye otu Syndicate of Plastic Arts
O nweela ihe ngosi iri na asaa na Mee 2010
O nwetara ọkwa nke abụọ maka nka plastik maka ọdịbendị ọha na eze na 1974, ma nweta ebe mbụ maka ememme mbụ nke Alexandrias na 1976
N'afọ 1962, mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na ngalaba azụmahịa, ọ mụrụ ise ihe na ise ihe n'otu oge ahụ na Adham Wanly
Samir malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe dị ka onye nwanne Adham Wanly bụ Seif Wanly
N'afọ 1967, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Kemgbe ahụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị iche iche ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 1998
Samir Yousef Ghanem (Arabic; 15 Jenụwarị 1937 - 20 Mee 2021) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe ọchị, na-agụ egwu, na onye na-eme ntụrụndụ
A mụrụ Ghanem na al-ʿAtawlah, Asyut Governorate
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Agriculture na Mahadum Alexandria
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị na-eme ihe ọchị atọ Tholathy Adwa'a El Masrah n'akụkụ George Sidhom na El Deif Ahmed
Mbido mbụ ha bụ Doctor Save Me, arụmọrụ dị mkpirikpi nke mere ka ha banye n'ụwa ntụrụndụ
Ha gosipụtara ihe ngosi TV mbụ Ramadan Riddles
Mgbe El Deif Ahmed nwụsịrị n'afọ 1970, Ghanem na Sidhom gara n'ihu n'okpuru otu aha (Tholathy Adwa'a El Masrah) ruo n'afọ 1980
Ha abụọ rụzuru ihe nkiri, na-arụkọ ọrụ na Salah Zulfikar na Fondo 'El Talat Wara'at n'afọ 1974 & Al-Mutazawwigun n'afọ 1978 na ndị ọzọ
Samir Ghanem kwadoro ihe ngosi na OTV nke akpọrọ An Hour With Samir Gjanem
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Dalal Abdel Aziz, ma bụrụ
a nna nke ndị na-eme egwuregwu Donia na Amy

Ghanem, onye na-agbake n'ụlọ ọgwụ site na ọnọdụ siri ike mgbe ọ butere COVID-19, nwụrụ site na nsogbu nke ọrụ akụrụ na mucormycosis metụtara ọrịa ahụ na El Safa Hospital na Mohandiseen, Giza n'abalị 20 ọnwa Mee afọ 2021, mgbe ọ dị afọ 84
Nwunye ya, Dalal Abdel Aziz, nwụrụ na 7 Ọgọst 2021, n'ihi nsogbu COVID-19
Ghanem sonyere n'ihe karịrị ọrụ 300 gụnyere ihe nkiri, usoro TV na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri, nke ikpeazụ n'ime ha bụ na usoro Badal Al Hadduta Talata na nwa ya nwanyị Donia Samir Ghanem
Mgbe George Sidhom lara ezumike nká n'ihi ọrịa mkpọnwụ ahụ, Samir Ghanem gara n'ihu na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Samira Magroun (a mụrụ na 24 Jenụwarị 1987) bụ onye mba Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Magroun nwere ọtụtụ ụmụnne nwanyị
Dị ka nwatakịrị, ọ nwere mmasị ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma kpọtụrụ ya maka ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi, mana ọ chọghị ya
Magroun gụrụ Bekee mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị
O mechara gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ na-ahụ maka ụgbọ elu ma Nouvel Air were ya n'ọrụ tupu ọ malite ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya
Magroun malitere na azụmahịa ngosi na Dlilek Mlak, nsụgharị Tunisian nke Deal or No Deal, n'afọ 2007
Mgbe ihe ngosi ahụ kwụsịrị, Sami Fehri kpọtụrụ ya maka ihe nkiri ncha ọhụrụ ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ya, mana o nyeghị ya ọrụ dị mkpa na mbụ
Ọ tụrụ Fehri n'anya nke ọma maka arụmọrụ Magroun, a họpụtakwara ya maka ọrụ Syrine na Maktoub, nke malitere n'afọ 2008
Omume ya bụ nwanyị na-amaghị nke onye ọlụlụ ya, Elyes, na-achịkwa, Magroun kwuru na ụmụ agbọghọ dịka ya jupụtara na ọha mmadụ
N'afọ 2010, Magroun pụtara na sitcom Garage Lekrik dịka Lobna, nwa agbọghọ hụrụ ihe onwunwe n'anya nke ya na Boulouna nwere mmekọrịta mgbagwoju anya, nke Lotfi Abdelli gosipụtara
Mgbe a na-enye ya ọrụ ahụ, ọ nabatara ya ozugbo n'ihi na ọ bụ ezigbo ohere na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nwere ezigbo ndị na-ese ihe nkiri
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2010, Magroun pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri TV nke Siria Takht Charki nke Yam Mach'hadi dere ma Racha Chabartji duziri
Magroun kwere onye na-agba bọọlụ Adel Chedli nkwa ọlụlụ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2012
Ọ mụrụ nwa nwoke site na Chedli, Koussay
Ha abụọ lụrụ di na nwunye afọ abụọ tupu ha agba alụkwaghịm
Na Mee afọ 2020, Magroun mụrụ nwa ya nke abụọ, nwa nwanyị Zayna
A mụrụ Merai na 10 Jenụwarị 1963 na Zarzis
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị teknụzụ na Medenine wee nweta nzere na mgbakọ na mwepụ na sayensị n'afọ 1981
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Faculty of Medicine na Tunis na 1986, na-ahụ maka ọrịa akpa ume
Merai malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Abderrahmen-Mami Hospital na Aryanah na 1993
N'afọ 2003, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote prọfesọ nke Respirology na Faculty of Medicine na Tunis
Ọ bụ onye otu European Respiratory Society na American Thoracic Society
Merai bụ onye otu Afek Tounes ma sonye na kọmitii etiti ya na Mee 2011
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu maka mpaghara Medenine na 23 Ọktoba 2011
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2012, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke NCA
Mgbe agbasachara Afek Tounes, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Republican Party, mana ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na 10 Julaị 2013
A họpụtaghi ya ọzọ na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2014
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2015, a họpụtara Merai ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Ụmụ nwanyị, Ezinụlọ na Ụmụaka n'ọchịchị Praịm Minista Habib Essid
N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na isii , a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ahụike ọha na eze na ụlọ ọrụ Youssef Chahed
Merai lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ atọ
Samira Abdul Razzaq Bensaïd (Arabic , romanized ; a mụrụ na 10 Jenụwarị 1958), nke a maara dịka Samira Said (Arabic, Samīra Saʿīd), bụ onye na-agụ egwu Moroccan-Egyptian
A mụrụ Samira Said n'afọ 1958 na Rabat, na Morocco, nna ya si Rabat na nne ya si Fez
Ọ bụrụ abụ mbụ ya 'M hụrụ noodles n'anya' mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu, a chọpụtakwara ya na mmemme egwu, Mawaheb, nke a na-agbasa na Moroccan TV
Mgbe ahụ ọ kwagara Ijipt ebe aha ya gburugburu ụwa ndị Arab malitere
O nwere mba abụọ na Morocco na Egypt, ebe obibi ya, ka ọ kwagara Cairo n'afọ 1977

Abọm ya niile dị n'asụsụ Arabic nke Ijipt, mana o dekwara ụfọdụ egwu n'asụsụ Moroccan Arabic, dịka 'Kifash Tlakina' ('Olee otu anyị zutere'), 'Fayetli sheftek shi marra' ('Ahụla m gị otu ugboro'), 'Sarkouh' ('Ha zuru ya'), na 'Al Behhara' ('Ndị ụgbọ mmiri')
Otu egwu ya gụnyere 'Maghlouba' ('Beaten') na 'Wa'ady' ('My Love')
N'afọ 1980, ọ nọchitere anya obodo ya bụ Morocco na Eurovision Song Contest na-abụ abụ a ma ama n'ime Ijipt n'oge ahụ a na-akpọ Bitaqat Hub, na-etinye 18th n'ime ndị asọmpi 19

Said edekọla ọtụtụ egwu Arabic nke a họọrọ nke ọma n'Ijipt, dịka 'Ben Lef' ('The Circle of Life'), 'Sayidati Sadati' (Ladies and Gentlemen'), 'Malich 3inwan' ('Ready When You Are') na 'Akher Hawa' ('Last Love')

Ya na onye Egypt na-ede egwu Mohamed El Mougi rụkọtara ọrụ, ma bụrụ abụ ma mee ihe nkiri Saaktob Ismak Ala Arrimal ('M ga-ede aha gị n'ime ájá'), nke gụnyere abụ ya 'Yadamiiti Haddi' ('Tears, Fall from My Eyes')
N'afọ 2000, ọ wepụtara egwu egwu Egypt 'Lilah Habeebee', ('Otu N'abalị, Ịhụnanya m'), egwu aha abọm, nke gara n'ihu merie maka vidiyo kachasị mma n'ụwa Arab n'afọ 2001 na Cairo Arabic Music Festival
Na 15th kwa afọ World Music Awards n'afọ 2003, Said meriri World Music Award dabere na ọnụ ọgụgụ ahịa zuru ụwa ọnụ maka afọ ahụ
Said na-abụkarị abụ n'asụsụ Arabic nke Ijipt, na-arụkọ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ndị na-agụ egwú na ndị na-ede egwú na Cairo
Hopkins kwuru na 'Otu n'ime isi ihe mere egwu Saidī ji ewu ewu n'Ijipt na Middle East bụ n'ihi ịma mma ụda olu ya na ngwá egwu ndabere
Mmetụta nke olu ya na-anọchite anya mmetụta onwe ya n'ọrụ ya
Said lụrụ onye egwu Ijipt bụ Hany Mehanna site n'afọ 1988 ruo afọ 1994
Ọ lụrụ onye ọchụnta ego Mustafa Naboulsy, onye ya na ya nwere naanị nwa ya nwoke, Shady
N'ọtụtụ ajụjụ ọnụ, Said ekwupụtala ọchịchọ ya ịlaghachi Morocco ma biri nso ezinụlọ ya na ndị ọ hụrụ n'anya
Samkange o bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Sammi Rotibi bụ onye Naijiria na America na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn
Ọrụ ya a ma ama bụ Rodney na Django Unchained na General Amajagh na Batman v Superman Dawn of Justice
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ya bụ Sidney Poitier na Peter O'Toole
A mụrụ Rotibi na Lagos
O tokwara na Lagos, Nigeria
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Nigeria; Miami, Florida; na Los Angeles, Califorinia
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ezinụlọ buru ibu
O kpebiri ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ na Miami mgbe onye ahịa nwere ụlọ ọrụ talent tụrụ aro ya dị ka ọrụ
O nwetara akara isii na African Championship n’etiti 2006 na 2012
Ọ ritekwara ọla ọcha abụọ na Commonwealth Wrestling Championship n'afọ 2005 na 2013
Sammy Oziti bidoro ịgba mgba n'afọ 1998
Oge nke mbụ o sonyere na egwuregwu Africa bụ n'afọ 2003 na Abuja
Na emume a, o meriri ma nwee ihe nrite ọla edo mgbe o meriri onye ya na ya gbara mgba, onye obodo Tunisia nke aha ya bụ Bejaoui, Nour El Houda
N'afọ sochirinụ, o sonyere n'egwuregwu asọmpi maka ntozu ịga Olympics mana ọ gbatara onye nke itoolu
Na afọ 2005, Sammy gbara asọmpi mbụ ya na Commonwealth Wrestling Championship na Stellenbosch, South Africa
Ọ gbatara onye nke abụọ wee nweta ihe nrite ọla ọcha, onye ya na ya sọrọmpi ahụ bụ Meena onye si India
N'egwuregwu ịgba mgba nke Afrịka n'afọ 2006, o meriri ma nweta ihe nrite ọla edo mgbe o meriri Feten, Ghanmi na mmemme nke 48kg n'arọ nke emere na Pretoria, South Afrịka
N'afọ sochirinụ, o sonyekwara ọzọ n'otu asọmpi ahụ wee bata dịka onye nke abụọ mgbe Sambou, Isabella si Senegal gbara onye nke mbu
N'afọ 2008, Sammy sonyere n'asọmpi ịgba mgba nke Afrịka ọzọ ebe o mechara nweta nrite ọla ọcha ọzọ site na mmemme nke 48kg n'arọ
Na afọ 2010, ọ bara asọmpi ọzọ wee merie ma rite ọla ọcha
Na asọmpi Afrịka nke afọ 2011 na 2012, Sammy nwetara nzere ọla kọpa abụọ
Mmeri ya na afọ 2012 dugara ya isonye na Asọmpi Olimpik ebe ọ nwetara ọkwa nke atọ na asọmpi nke 48kg n'arọ
Na afọ 2013, ọ sonyere na asọmpi Commonwealth nke emere na Johannesburg, RSA
Ọ gbatara onye nke abụọ mgbe Nirmala Devi si India meriri ya
Ha gbara aka na ihe mmeme nke 48kg n'arọ Sammy weere ihe nrite ọla ọcha
Sammy Sheik (Arabic; a mụrụ na Nọvemba 15, 1981) bụ onye Egypt-American na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara Sheik nke ọma maka ịrụ ọrụ 'Mustafa' na Clint Eastwoodz American Sniper
A họpụtara Sheik ka ọ bụrụ onye isi Al Jazeera, Mukhtar Al-Mujib na ihe nkiri Maazị Brooks, Looking for Comedy in the Muslim World
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na usoro TV
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-egbu egbu, Mohamed El-Razani na usoro FX, Over There, onye ndú mgbanaka, Masheer Abu Marzuq na Fox's 24, nke dugara na ọrụ Jamal Bin Mohamed na 24's spinoff show The Rookie
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye Bedouin nwere ọbara ọkụ, Kamal na ABC's Lost, ma mee ka ndị ọbịa pụta na NCIS, The Unit, My Own Worst Enemy na In the Moment
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugboro ugboro Hany na Showtime's United States of Tara
Sheik na-eke oge ya n'etiti Cairo na Los Angeles
Samosa (/səˈmoʊsə/) ma ọ bụ singara bụ achịcha e siri esi ma ọ bụ nke e siri esi nke nwere ihe na-atọ ụtọ, gụnyere ihe ndị dị ka poteto, yabasị, na agwa
Ọ nwere ike ịnwe ụdị dị iche iche, gụnyere triangular, cone, ma ọ bụ ọkara ọnwa, dabere na mpaghara
A na-ejikarị chutney na-esonyere samosas, ma nwee mmalite n'oge etiti oge ma ọ bụ tupu
Samosas bụ ihe oriri a ma ama, appetizer, ma ọ bụ snack na nri nke South Asia, Central Asia, East Africa na diasporas ha
Okwu Bekee samosa sitere na okwu Hindi 'samosa' (Hindi), nke a na-achọpụta na okwu Middle Persian sanbosag (سنبوسگ) 'achịcha triangular'
A na-akpọ achịcha yiri nke a sambusak na Arabic; akwụkwọ ntụziaka Arabic nke oge ochie na-asụpụta ya sambusaj mgbe ụfọdụ
A na-eji mkpụrụ okwu samoosa eme ihe na South Africa

Amir Khusro (1253 Tian 1325), onye ọkà mmụta na onye na-ede uri nke Delhi Sultanate, dere n'ihe dị ka oge 1300 OA na ndị isi na ndị a ma ama na-anụ ụtọ 'samosa e ji anụ, ghee, yabasị, na ihe ndị ọzọ mee'

Ibn Battuta, onye njem na onye nchọpụta nke narị afọ nke iri na anọ, kọwara nri n'ụlọ ikpe Muhammad bin Tughluq, ebe a na-enye samushak ma ọ bụ sambusak, obere achịcha e ji anụ, almond, pistachios, walnuts na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, tupu nri nke atọ, nke pulao
Nimatnama-i-Nasiruddin-Shahi, akwụkwọ nri India nke oge ochie malitere maka Ghiyath Shah, onye na-achị Malwa Sultanate na etiti India, kwuru banyere nkà nke ime samosa
Ain-i-Akbari, akwụkwọ Mughal nke narị afọ nke iri na isii, kpọtụrụ aha usoro nri maka qottab, nke ọ na-ekwu, 'ndị Hindustan na-akpọ sanbúsah'

A na-eji ntụ ọka maka ebumnuche niile (nke a maara n'ógbè ahụ dị ka maida) akwadebe samosa ma tinye ya ihe, mgbe mgbe ngwakọta nke poteto e siri esi ma ọ bụ nke e siri esi (nke kachasị mma), yabasị, peas na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, lentils, ginger, ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na chili na-acha anụnụ anụnụ
Samosa nwere ike ịbụ onye na-eri akwụkwọ nri ma ọ bụ onye na-abụghị onye na-azụ akwụkwọ nri, dabere na ihe a na-etinye
A na-esi achịcha ahụ dum n'ime mmanụ akwụkwọ nri ma ọ bụ obere ghee ruo na-acha nchara nchara
A na-enye ya ọkụ, na-ejikarị chutney na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, dị ka mint, coriander, ma ọ bụ tamarind
A pụkwara ịkwadebe ya n'ụdị dị ụtọ

A na-ejikarị samosas eme ihe na chaat, tinyere ihe ọdịnala nke chickpea ma ọ bụ nkwadebe pea ọcha, nke a na-ejikọta ya na yogọt, tamarind paste na chutney na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, nke e ji yabasị, coriander, na chaat masala chọọ mma

Na steeti India nke Assam, Odisha, West Bengal, Bihar na Jharkhand, singaras ma ọ bụ singras (চিংৰা) (nke East Indian version of samosas) bụ nri ndị a ma ama a na-ahụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ebe niile
Ha dị ntakịrị obere karịa n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke India, na-ejupụta na poteto, ahụekere, na mgbe ụfọdụ mkpụrụ vaịn
A na-ekpuchi Shingras n'ime mpempe akwụkwọ ntụ ọka dị nro (nke e ji ntụ ọka mee) ma sie ya
Ezigbo shingras na-amata site na ọdịdị flaky yiri nke mkpo achịcha na-atọ ụtọ
A na-ejikarị samosas esi nri ruo na-acha nchara nchara na mmanụ akwụkwọ nri
A na-enye ha ọkụ ma na-eri ha na chutney (mint, coriander, ma ọ bụ tamarind), ma ọ bụ na-enye ya na chaat, nke a na-ejikarị yogọt, chutney, yabasị a pịrị apị, coriander na chaat masala
Enwere ike iri Singaras dị ka nri iri nri oge tii
A pụkwara ịkwadebe ha n'ụdị dị ụtọ

Bengali singaras na-abụkarị triangular, juputara na poteto, peas, onions, diced almonds, ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ nri ndị ọzọ, ma na-esiwanye ike ma na-agbaji karịa ma ọ bụ singaras ma ọ bụ ụmụnne ha Indian samosa
Singara jupụtara na ngwakọta cauliflower bụ ụdị a ma ama
Ụdị ndị na-abụghị akwụkwọ nri nke singaras bụ mutton singaras na fish singarasE nwekwara nsụgharị ndị na-atọ ụtọ, dị ka coconut singara, yana ndị ọzọ jupụtara na khoya ma tinye ya na shuga syrup
Samosas tupu a sie ya, n'ụlọ ahịa na-atọ ụtọ na Kolkata
Samosas na India
Samosa na ofe dị n'ụlọ kọfị India na Kerala
Samosa akwụkwọ nri
Samosa akwụkwọ nri
Ma samosas dị larịị (triangular) na nke zuru oke (tetrahedron / triangular pyramid) bụ nri na-ewu ewu na Bangladesh
A na-akpọ nsụgharị Bengali nke samosa zuru oke a সিঙাড়া (shingara) ma na-adịkarị obere karịa ụdị dị iche iche
A na-ejikarị poteto, akwụkwọ nri, mkpụrụ osisi, wdg jupụta na shingara
Otú ọ dị, shingaras jupụtara na imeju ehi na-ewu ewu n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke mba ahụ
A na-akpọ samosa dị larịị somosa ma ọ bụ yuncha, a na-ejikarị osikapa na azụ jupụta ya
A na-akpọ Samosas singadas na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Nepal; ndị ọzọ na mba ahụ na-akpọ ya samosa
Dị ka ọ dị na India, ọ bụ nri na-ewu ewu na nri Nepalese
Ndị na-ere ahịa na-ere nri ahụ n'ahịa na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị iche iche
Samosas nke ụdị dị iche iche dị na Pakistan dum
N'ozuzu, ọtụtụ ụdị samosa a na-ere n'ógbè ndịda Sindh na n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Punjab, ọkachasị obodo Lahore, na-esi ísì ụtọ ma na-enwekarị akwụkwọ nri ma ọ bụ poteto
Otú ọ dị, samosas ndị a na-ere n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ na n'ebe ugwu nke mba ahụ na-enwekarị ihe ndị e ji anụ mee ma bụrụ ndị na-adịchaghị ụtọ
Anụ samosa nwere anụ e gburu egbu (lamb, anụ ehi, ma ọ bụ ọkụkọ) ma bụrụ nke a ma ama dị ka nri na Pakistan
Na Pakistan, samosas nke Karachi bụ ndị a ma ama maka ụtọ ha na-esi ísì ụtọ, ebe samosas sitere na Faisalabad bụ ndị a mara maka ịdị ukwuu n'ụzọ pụrụ iche
Ụdị samosa ọzọ dị iche iche, nke dị na Karachi, a na-akpọ kaghazi samosa (Urdu; 'akwụkwọ samosa' na Bekee) n'ihi mkpuchi ya dị gịrịgịrị ma dị gịrịgo, nke yiri wonton ma ọ bụ spring roll wrapper
Ụdị ọzọ, nke na-ewu ewu na Punjab, nwere samosas na efere dị n'akụkụ nke chickpeas, yabasị, na salad akwụkwọ coriander, yana chutneys dị iche iche iji kpuchie samosas
Samosas bụ achịcha e siri esi ma ọ bụ nke a na-eme achịcha na ihe na-atọ ụtọ, dị ka poteto, yabasị, peas, lentils, na anụ e siri esi (lamb, anụ ehi ma ọ bụ ọkụkọ)
A na-erekwa samosas na-atọ ụtọ n'obodo ndị dị na Pakistan gụnyere Peshawar; samosas ndị a na-atọ ọchị enweghị ihe ọ bụla ma na-etinye ha na shuga siri ike
Nri nri ọzọ nke Pakistani, nke na-ewu ewu na Punjab, a maara dị ka 'samosa chaat'
Nke a bụ ngwakọta nke samosa a na-emebi emebi, tinyere chickpeas (channa chaat), yogọt, na chutneys
N'aka nke ọzọ, enwere ike iri samosa n'onwe ya na akụkụ chutney
Na Pakistan, samosas bụ nri Iftar maka ọtụtụ ezinụlọ Pakistani, n'oge ọnwa Ramzan
A maara ụdị na ụdị samosa ndị e mere na nri Maldivian dị ka bajiyaa
A na-ejupụta ha na ngwakọta gụnyere azụ ma ọ bụ tuna na yabasị
A mara ụdị samosa dị iche iche a na-eme na nri ndị Etiopia dị ka 'sambusa' ma ọ bụ 'lentil sambusa' (Amharic የምሥር ሳምቡሳ) ma jupụta na lentils
N'ihi na ọ bụ vegan, a na-eri ya mgbe niile n'oge ibu ọnụ Ọtọdọks nke Etiopia
A na-ahụ nri ndị yiri ya na ụdị samosas dị iche iche n'ọtụtụ mba ndị ọzọ
Ha sitere na South Asia somasa ma ọ bụ sitere na onye bu ụzọ nke oge ochie nke malitere na Middle East
Sambusa baraki bụ pastry ha jupụtara anụ, na-emekarị triangle, na nri Tajik
Enwere ike ime njuputa na beef n'ala (ma ọ bụ mutton omenala nke agwakọta ya na abụba ọdụ) wee eyịm, ngwa nri, mkpụrụ cumin na oge ndị ọzọ tupu e sie ya na tandyr
A na-akpọ Samosas samuza n'asụsụ Burmese, ha bụkwa nri a ma ama n'okporo ámá na Burma
A na-ejikwa samosas mee ihe na salad ọdịnala Burmese, nke a na-akpọ samuza thoke (Kn
'samosa salad'), salad nke iberibe samosa e bepụrụ na alịbasa, cabbage, mint ọhụrụ, poteto na chickpea curry broth, masala, chili powder, nnu na lime
N'Indonesia, a maara samosas dị ka samosa, jupụtara na poteto, cheese, curry, rousong ma ọ bụ noodles dị ka ọ dabara na ụtọ obodo
A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe dị ka nri na sambal
Samosa fọrọ nke nta ka ọ dị ka pastel, panada na epok-epok nke Indonesia
Samosas bụkwa akụkụ dị mkpa nke nri Swahili a na-ahụkarị na Tanzania, Kenya, na Uganda
Samosas bụ nri dị mkpa na mba Horn of Africa nke Djibouti, Somalia na Somaliland, ebe a maara ha dị ka sambuus
A na-emekwa ya na obodo Etiopia na Eritrea ebe a na-ejikarị lentils eme 'sambusa' ma gwakọta ya na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ ọdịnala
A na-eji ntụ ọka na-eme ha n'ụzọ ọdịnala, nke yiri mpịakọta àkwá, ma tinye ya anụ ehi
Ọ bụ ezie na enwere ike iri ha n'oge ọ bụla n'afọ, a na-eche ha maka oge pụrụ iche
A na-akpọ ha samoosas na South Africa, ha na-adịkarị obere karịa ụdị ndị India, ma bụrụ akụkụ nke nri ndị India na Cape Malay nke South Africa
Samosas dịkwa na mba ndị dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka dịka obodo Ghana na Naịjirịa ebe ha bụ nri a na-eri n'okporo ámá
Na Naijiria, a na-ejikarị ya na oriri na nkwari tinyere anụ ọkụkọ ma ọ bụ ehi, puff puff, Spring roll na plantain ma a na-akpọ ya obere chops
Samosas, nke a na-akpọ Samoussas n'ógbè ahụ bụkwa nri na-ewu ewu na Réunion na Mauritius ebe mba abụọ ahụ na-eche nnukwu ebili mmiri nke ndị ọrụ si na mpaghara India ihu
Samosas dị n'ebe ahụ na-adịkarị obere ma jupụta na ọkụkọ, cheese, crabs ma ọ bụ poteto
Otú ọ dị, e nwekwara ụdị dị iche iche dị ka chocolate na uñere ma ọ bụ pizza
Sambuseh (Persian) nwere ike ịchọta naanị n'ebe ole na ole na Iran nke oge a - ebe obibi mbụ nke nri a

Otú ọ dị, n'ụdị qottab--- jupụtara na mkpụrụ osisi (na-emekarị, walnuts), shuga, ahịhịa na-esi ísì ụtọ ma ọ bụ ihe na-esi ụtọ, yana a na-esi ya n'ime mmanụ, a na-eji ya eme ihe dị ka ihe na-atọ ụtọ na nke a na-ahụkarị
Mgbe a na-eji anụ eme ihe, a nazi akpọ ya qottab, kama a na-eme ya ka ọ bụrụ ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ (dị iche na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ngwaahịa nri ndị ọzọ niile nke ndị Peshia)
Nke ikpeazụ a bụ ihe niile fọdụrụ na 'sanbusag' ochie n'ala nna ya oge ochie
Na Goa (India) na Portugal, a maara samosas dị ka chamuças
A na-ejikarị ọkụkọ, anụ ehi, anụ ezì, nwa atụrụ ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ nri jupụta ha, ma na-enye ga ọkụ
Samosas bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke nri Goan na Portuguese, ebe ha bụ nri dị mfe

Enwere ike ịkpọ ha samboosa ma ọ bụ sambusac, mana na South Africa, a na-akpọ ha samoosa
A na-enweta samosas friji site na ụlọ ahịa nri dị na Australia, Canada, United States, na United Kingdom, ebe ndị na-ere ahịa n'okporo ámá India na Pakistani na-ere ha ugboro ugboro
A na-ahụ ọdịiche dị iche iche na-eji filo, ma ọ bụ ntụ ọka tortillas mgbe ụfọdụ
Al-Shabaab, otu ndị na-emebiga ihe ókè na-achịkwa akụkụ obodo Somalia, machibidoro samosas na afo 2011
Otu ihe kpatara ya ka a na-ekwu na ọ bụ ọdịdị triangular nke nwere ike ịnọchite anya Atọ n'Ime Otu dị nsọ nke Ndị Kraịst
Ihe ọzọ e kwuru na ọ ga-abụ na o nwere ike iji anụ rere ure mee ihe na-eme ka ọ dị mma
Samp bụ nri ndị Afrịka nke nwere ọka ọka ọka a mịrị amị nke a kụrụ ma bepụ ya ruo mgbe ọ gbajiri, mana ọ bụghị dị ka nri nri ma ọ bụ osikapa mielie
Ihe mkpuchi ahụ gbara kernel gburugburu na-agbada ma wepụ ya n'oge usoro ịkụ ọkpọ na stamping
A na-eri ya na South Africa na ndị Lozi na Tonga nke Zambia na shuga na mmiri ara ehi na-esi ísì ụtọ
A pụkwara iji ofe na ihe mgbakwunye dị iche iche mee ya
A na-esi ya na agwa n'ụdị Xhosa nke umngqusho ma na-eri ya mgbe ụfọdụ na chakalaka
A pụkwara iji anụ ehi, nwa atụrụ, ọkụkọ na ihe ndị ọzọ mee ya
'Samp' sitere na ụmụ amaala America, sitere na okwu Narragansett 'nasàump'
Ndị New England kemgbe oge mbụ nke ndị ọchịchị na-achị achị na-ezo aka na ọka ma ọ bụ ọka dị ka 'samp'
Dị ka hominy, a na-akwadebe samp site na groats (mkpụrụ ọka e wepụrụ) nke ọka, mana usoro dị iche iche na-emepụta ha abụọ
A pụkwara isi ọka (ọka) a na-agbaji agbaji na nke a na-akwaghị agbaji (ọkụ) ruo mgbe ọ dị nro
A na-akpọ nri a 'stampmielies' na Afrikaans
A na-ejikarị mkpụrụ osisi eme ihe, dịka 'samp na mkpụrụ osisi'

Sampson Cosmas (ka amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1953) bụ onye Naijiria na-ebuli ibu
Ọ sọrọ mpi n'ihe omume nke ụmụ nwoke na 1980 Summer Olympics
Samson Akinnire (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 12 n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1986) bụ onye Naijiriaonye na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe, nke bi na Lagos steeti, Naịjirịa
A mụrụ Samson Akinnire ma zụlite ya na Ajegunle, Lagos State
O nwetara diplọma dị elu na Sculpture na design site na Lagos State Polytechnic n'afọ 2011 ma nye ya ihe nrite nke nwa akwụkwọ niile site na ngalaba ya
Samson Idiata (amuru 23 Jenuarị 1988 na Ewu ) bu onye Naijiria na-awụ elu ịwụ elu na onye na ogologo jumper
O nwetara nrite ọla nchara n'asọmpi Africa niile nke 2003 ma mechaa n'ọkwa ise n'asọmpị Afrịka 2006 na nke iri na asọmpi Africa niile nke 2007
O mechara gbanwee gaa ogologo ịwụ elu
N'ime mmemme a ọ gụchara n'ọkwa asatọ na asọmpi Afrịka nke afọ 2010
Ihe kacha mma nke onwe ya bụ 215 mita, nke mbụ ọ nwetara na Ọktoba 2003 na Hyderabad ya emechaa ha nhata otu ugboro
Na ogologo ima elu nke onwe ya kacha mma bụ 800 mita, nke ọ nwetara na May 2013 na Castellon
Ọ nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo n'ịwụ elu ogologo na egwuregwu Afrịka 2015, mana ewepụrụ aha a mgbe ọ dachara ule ọgwụ maka clenbuterol
A machibidoro ya iwu ruo afọ anọ, ruo mgbe Septemba 15, 2019

Samson Kambalu (amụrụ n'afọ 1975) bụ onye na-ese ihe, ọkà mmụta na onye edemede a mụrụ na Malawi nke zụrụ dị ka ezigbo onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ethnomusicologist na Mahadum nke Malawi's Chancellor College Ọ bụ Fellow nke Magdalen College, Oxford
A mụrụ Kambalu na Malawi, ebe ọ gara Kamuzu Academy, 'Eton nke Africa'
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Malawi's Chancellor College, Zomba na afọ 1999

Kambalu gụsịrị MA ya na Fine Art na Mahadum Nottingham Trent na afọ 2003 wee dee PhD ya na Chelsea College of Art and Design, na-ele anya n'otú nsogbu nke onyinye na akụ na ụba n'ozuzu si emegharị akụkụ dị iche iche nke ọrụ nka ya
Ọrụ Kambalu, nke na-ezo aka na Situationism na omenala Chewa Nyau nke obodo ya Malawi, na apụta na mgbasa ozi dị iche iche, site na eserese, eserese, ntinye, vidiyo na akwụkwọ na arụmọrụ
Otu n'ime ihe osise ya a ma ama bụ Holy Ball, bọọlụ a na-etinye na peeji nke Bible
Kambalu mere ihe ngosi nke 24 'Holy Balls' na Chancellor College n'afọ 2000 ebe ọ kpọrọ ndị nleta ka ha mee ihe na ịchụpụ ndị mmụọ ọjọọ
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ gosipụtara ọrụ ya na mba ụwa
N'afọ 2015, a gụnyere ya na Okwui Enwezor's All the World's Futures na 56th Venice Biennale

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2015, otu onye ọka ikpe nọ na Venice jụrụ mkpesa nke onye Itali na-ahụ maka ọnọdụ Gianfranco Sanguinetti tinyere megide Venice Biennale na Kambalu n'ihe gbasara enweghị ikike na oke nke Sanguineti niile maka otu n'ime nrụnye Kambalu, Sanguinett Breakout Area
Kambalu's Nyau Cinema bụ usoro ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke ihe ngosi psychogeographical, nke a na-ekerịta dị ka ntinye aka na saịtị netwọk mmekọrịta na dị ka ntinye na gallery
A kọwawo ihe ndị a dị ka 'iberibe ihe nkiri nke na-agwakọta slapstick na ememe ime mmụọ'

Akwụkwọ mbụ ya, akụkọ ndụ onwe onye nke akpọrọ The Jive Talker or How to Get a British Passport, bụ nke Jonathan Cape (Random House) bipụtara na Julaị, na afọ 2008, na Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2008 site na Free Press (Simon & Schuster)
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke abụọ, Uccello's Vineyard, nke e bipụtara na afọ 2012, dị na The Book Lovers, nchịkọta akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị na-ese ihe na Museum of Contemporary Art na Antwerp
Kambalu na-anọchite anya Kate MacGarry na London na Galerie Nordenhake na Stockholm
Na 5 Julaị 2021, a mara ọkwa na ahọpụtara ihe osise Kambalu dị ka onye na-esote ịnọ n'ọkwa nke anọ na Trafalgar Square na etiti London site na Septemba 2022 ruo 2024
Ihe osise ahụ, nke akpọrọ Antelope, weghachiri foto na afọ 1914 nke onye nkwusa Baptist na onye pan-Africanist John Chilembwe na onye ozi ala ọzọ Europe John Chorley
Chilembwe na-eyi okpu n'omume nnupụisi, n'ihi na nke a bụ iwu na-akwadoghị n'oge ahụ
Samson Oghenewegba Nathaniel (amụrụ 29 Ọgọst 1997) bụ onye egwuregwu Naịjirịa
Ọ gbara ọsọ na mmemme 4 × 400 mita relay agwakọtara na asọmpi Olimpik Summer 2020

msong
Samsong bụ onye omenkà ozioma nke Naijiria, dabere na Abuja, Nigeria

O nweela ọrụ ndekọ na-aga nke ọma na redio dị ka Bianule, yana ọtụtụ nkwanye ugwu dị ka The Psalmist Award na 2000, na nso nso a họpụtara ya dị ka 'Onye Nkà Ozi Ozi Ọma kacha mma' site na Nigerian Entertainment Awards (NEA) na New York na 2008

O meela ọkwa ahụ na ndị omempụ Oziọma dị ka Marvin Winans, Donnie McClurkin na Panam Percy Paul, yana ndị na-ese ihe na-aga nke ọma dị ka Donell Jones, Kenny Latimore, 112, 2Baba, D'Banj, Faze, na Styl Plus
A mụrụ Samsong na November 30 1974, ezigbo aha ya bụ Samson Uche Mogekwu mụrụ na Delta State, Nigeria
Ọ chọpụtara nkà ya n'ịbụ abụ mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ bụkwa n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ka a na-achị Samsong
Ọ gara kọleji, wee mechaa na Accounting wee gụchaa na nnukwu Ambrose Alli University, Ekpoma, Edo steeti
Samsong hiwere otu quartet mara dị ka Otuto Creation
Ebinyere ha aka na Ivory Music Label, wee wepụta album mbụ ha na 1996 akpọrọ 'Kasị Mma nke Ndụ'
Ndị otu ahụ kewapụrụ, Samsong wee ghọọ onye na-ese ihe naanị, wepụta CD mbụ ya na 2002, nke akpọrọ 'Gụọ ngozi gị'
Ndekọ ya bụ ihe ịga nke ọma, na-akwalite egwuregwu ikuku, wee nweta mmeri nke Onye Abụ Ọma n'otu afọ ahụ
(1) A tọhapụrụ cd sophomore ya na 2004, nke akpọrọ 'Still Counting'
Samsong abụrụla onye ama ama na kpakpando ozi ọma n'oge a, na-enwe egwu na vidiyo na redio na TV na-atụgharị, na-anata ụgwọ kacha elu na egwu egwu
Samsong na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na mwepụta okpomọkụ nke cd ọhụrụ ya

Ọ gara n'ihu n'usoro mmeri ya na-enweta ihe nrite, na-enweta onyinye onyinye kacha mma nwoke na-agụ ụda nke afọ na ihe nrite egwu taa na 2004, na onyinye kacha mma nwoke na-agụ ụda nke afọ na 2005 na Amen Awards
Na Vigoma Awards na 2005, ọ nwetara onyinye vidiyo kacha mma nke afọ
Ntọhapụ ya nke atọ akpọrọ 'World of My Dreams' bụ nke ewepụtara na 2007, ma bụrụkwa ntọhapụ ya kacha nwee olile anya
E gọsipụtakwa mmezighari nke nnukwu egwu' One Love ' site na akara ngosi egwu Onyeka Onwenu, ebe ha abụọ só rụkoo ọrụ
cd ahụ gosikwara duet nke nwere nnukwu kpakpando ụwa Styl-Plus akpọrọ Live Right
Achọpụtara ọrụ ya dị oke egwu wee nye ya onyinye nkwanye ugwu Grace maka Ọkachamma, otu afọ ahụ
Na 2008, a họpụtara ya maka nnukwu onye na - ese ozi ọma na Nigerian Entertainment Awards (NEA) emere na New York City
Ọ malitere njem nlegharị anya mba ụwa iji kwalite cd ya, na-akwụsị na South Africa, United Kingdom na Germany

Na Machị 13, 2009 a gbasaara saịtị ahụ ka ọ gụnyekwa Chinese
Emegharịrị mmemme ahụ dị ka Samsung Developers na 2013

Ọ bụ ezie na ngwaọrụ mkpanaaka na-arụ otu sistemụ arụmọrụ ga-akwado ọtụtụ atụmatụ API ndị akọwapụtara na OEM na-adịkarịghị enweta ndị mmepe na-enweghị ụfọdụ injin ngbanwe Samsung emeela ọtụtụ njirimara ekwentị akọwapụtara maka ndị mmepe site na akwụkwọ yana SDK na-enye ndị mmepe ikike ijikwa ma na-emekọrịta LEDs nke ngwaọrụ mkpanaka, flash igwefoto, accelerometer, na njirimara ndị ọzọ akọwapụtara nke ọma na-adịghị ekpughe site na API sistemụ arụmọrụ
Ndị mmepe nwekwara ike ịnwale ngwa ha ozugbo site na ihe Samsung na-akpọ Labdev
Ọ bụ ezie na Labdev a Mmepụta nwere ike idowe oge maka otu Samsung ekwentị na remotely bulite ha ngwa na ekwentị na-emekọ ihe na ekwentị site na ha nchọgharị
Samsung na-anabata atụmatụ azụmaahịa site na mmemme Marketdev ha
Ndị mbipụta sọftụwia ga-enwe ike ikesa ngwa ha site na Ụlọ Ahịa Ngwa Samsung
Samta Benyahia amụrụ na Constantine, Algeria, na 1950, bụ onye Algeria French na-ese ihe, nke a maara maka usoro geometrical nke Arab Berber Andalusian na rosaceae, nke a na-akpọ fatima

Benyahia gụrụ akwụkwọ na École Nationale Supérieure des Arts Décoratifs, Paris site na 1974 ruo 1980, ma mesịa kụzie na École supérieure des Beaux-Arts ma ọ bụ École des beaux-arts d'Alger na Algiers site na 1980 ruo 1988
Ọ kwagara France na 1988 wee nweta nzere Master of Advanced Studies na plastic arts na Mahadum Paris nke asatọ
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ma na-ebi na Paris ugbu a

N'ime afọ iri abụọ gara aga, Benyahia esonyewo n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nka nke otu na nke onwe ya n'ebe dị iche iche n'ụwa niile, gụnyere Dak Art Biennale nke Dakar, Senegal (2004), Venice Biennial (2003), Modern Art Oxford, England (2003), na Kulturhuset, Stockholm, Sweden (2004), Spacex Gallery, Exeter, UK (2001化2002), Residency and Exhibition Art in General, New York City (1996), yana ọtụtụ ụlọ ngosi Europe na ụwa

Samta bụ nwanne nwanyị nke onye na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ aha ya bụ Ahmed Benyahia, nwa akwụkwọ nke César Baldaccini na l'École des Beaux-Arts na Paris, ma mesịa bụrụ onye na-emepụta ihe nrite César Award, ihe nkiri French nke yiri nke American Oscar
Ọ bụ nwanne nne nke onye Algeria na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-ese foto Racim Benyahia
Na Architecture of the Veil, a kọwara ọrụ Benyahia dị ka inweta isiokwu ya
site na Mashrabiya, ákwà mgbochi oghere eji eme ihe na ụlọ ndị Alakụba nke Mediterenian iji kpuchie windo na veranda, na-enye ndị nọ n'ime ụlọ ohere ile ụwa dị n'èzí n'enweghị anya
Ntinye ahụ na-enye nyocha mara mma na nke dị ike nke okike yana dialectic n'etiti ime na mpụga, ìhè na onyinyo, izochi na mkpughe, na nzuzo na oghere ọha
Otú ọ dị, ihe siri ike ịkọwa n'okwu bụ otú ọrụ ya si mara mma ma na-adọrọ mmasị

N'ịbụ onye agba na ụkpụrụ dọtara mmasị ya, a na-akpọ onye na-ekiri ya ka ọ kwurịta ókèala ndị e chepụtara echepụta n'ime oghere nke oge a nke gallery ebe ojiji ọ na-eji atụmatụ ọdịnala nke North Africa na-enyocha echiche nke enweghị njedebe

Site n'iji ugboro ugboro, ndị na-emepụta ihe na-akụzi ihe site na Arabia oge ochie yana ndị na-ese ihe n'oge a dị ka Benyahia na-eji usoro dị mgbagwoju anya ma bụrụ nke a maara nke ọma iji nye echiche nke enweghị njedebe, nke a na-ejikọkarị ya na echiche Alakụba banyere Chineke
Na-egbuke egbuke dị ka ngosipụta nke oké osimiri, ihe ya bụ ọkpụkpọ òkù dị egwu maka 'ịla onwe gị n'iyi' n'ime ihe ịchọ mma n'ozuzu

Samuel[lower-alpha 1] bụ onye, ​​na akụkọ akụkọ nke Akwụkwọ Nsọ Hibru, na-ekere òkè dị mkpa na mgbanwe site na ndị ikpe Akwụkwọ Nsọ gaa United Kingdom nke Israel n'okpuru Sọl, na ọzọ na mgbanwe nke ọchịchị eze site na Sọl gaa na David
A na-asọpụrụ ya dị ka onye amụma na okpukpe ndị Juu, Iso Ụzọ Kraịst, na Islam
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya na akụkụ Akwụkwọ Nsọ Hibru, a kpọtụrụ Samuel aha na akwụkwọ ndị rabaị ndị Juu, na New Testament Christian, na n'isi nke abụọ nke Quran (ọ bụ ezie na ederede ekwughị aha ya)
A na-emesokwa ya ihe n’akwụkwọ Antiquities of the Jewish nke ise ruo nke asaa, nke onye ọkà mmụta Juu bụ́ Josephus dere na narị afọ mbụ
A kpọrọ ya “Onye Ọhụ ụzọ” na 1 Samuel 9 9
Nne Samuel bụ Hannah na nna ya bụ Elkanah
Elkanah biri na Ramathaim na mpaghara Zuph
A na-ahụkwa usoro ọmụmụ ya n'usoro ọmụmụ nke ndị Kohatite (1 Ihe E Mere 6 3-15) na nke Heman onye Ezraịt, o doro anya na ọ bụ nwa nwa ya (1 Ihe E mere 6 18-33)
Dị ka tebụl usoro ọmụmụ dị na Ihe E Mere si kwuo, Elkanah bụ onye Levaị - eziokwu a na-ekwughị na akwụkwọ Samuel
Eziokwu ahụ bụ na a kpọrọ Elkana, onye Levaị, onye Efrayimi, yiri aha onye Levaịa nke Juda (Ndị Ikpe 17 7, dịka ọmụmaatụ)
Dị ka 1 Samuel 1 20, Hannah kpọrọ Samuel iji cheta ekpere ya nye Chineke maka nwa
[Ọ] kpọrọ aha ya Samuel, na-asị, N'ihi na ajụọla ya banyere Onyenwe anyị' (KJV)
Site n'ọdịdị ya, aha Samuel (Hibru שְׁמוּאֵל Šəmūʾēl, Tiberian Šămūʾēl) yiri ka e si na Hibru Śāmū (שָׂמוּ) + ʾĒl, nke pụtara 'Chineke setịpụrụ' ma ọ bụ 'Chineke etinyela'
Nkọwa a metụtara echiche nke Chineke na-etinye / na-etinye nwatakịrị n'afọ, n'akụkụ Hannah na-enye Samuel dị ka onye Nazaret nye Chineke
A na-ejikọkwa śāmū nke Hibru na šâmū nke Akkadian, nke nwere otu ihe ahụ

Site na nkọwa e nyere na 1 Samuel 1 20 Otú ọ dị, o yiri ka ọ sitere na mkpirisi nke Hibru שְׁאִלְתִּיו מֵאֵל (Modern ŠəʾīltīvʾʾĒl, Tiberian Šĭʾīltīw mēʾĒl), nke pụtara 'Ajụla m / gbaziri ya n'aka Chineke'
A na-eme ka ọ dị mkpirikpi ka ọ bụrụ שָׁאוּל מֵאֵל (Šāʾūl mēʾĒl, 'arịọ / gbaziri n'aka Chineke'), wee mechaa mee nkwekọrịta ka ọ bụrụשְׁמוּאֵל ('Šəmūʾēl/Šămūʾēl')
Nkọwa a na-emetụtakwa Hannah na-enyefe Samuel dị ka onye Nazaret nye Chineke
Samuel wee gaa Betlehem ma tee Devid mmanụ na nzuzo dị ka eze
Ọ ga-emecha nye Devid ebe nsọ, mgbe Sọl nke na-ekwo ekworo gbalịrị igbu ya
Oge ụfọdụ mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, Sọl mere ka Onye amoosu nke Endor kpọọ mmụọ Samuel site na Sheol iji buo amụma ihe ga-esi n'agha na-abịa (1 Samuel 28 3-24)
Samuel were iwe maka ncheta ya, ma gwa Sọl na Onyenwe anyị ahapụla ya
N'ihi ya, Samuel kwuru na ọ bụ ezigbo onye amụma nke ụlọ Izrel, ya na Ezikiel
Àtụ Catholic saints
Samuel A
Countee (ubochí mbú n'ọnwa Eprel, 1909 rụo ụbọchị irí na otu n'ọnwa Septemba, 1959) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-akpụ ihe
A na-akpọ SSG Samuel A
Countee Hall na Fort Leonard Wood iji sọpụrụ ya
A mụrụ Countee na Marshall, Texas na Thomas Countee Na Nannie Salina Yates Countee
Ọ gàrà Booker T
Washington High School site na 1924 rụo 1928
Countee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1934 na nzèrè na nka na Bishop College
Mgbè ọ nọ na kọleji, o sere foto nke ngalaba na ndị nchịkwa iji nweta ego màkà agụmakwụkwọ
Countee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji na 1934 mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị ọ nwetara agụmakwụkwọ na Boston Museum of Arts ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe
Ọrụ Countee gosipụtara ndụ ndị Africa America
Site na 1933-1935, Countee gosipụtara nka ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi
N'afọ 1933, William E
Harmon Foundation gosipụtara ihe osise ya, Little Brown Boy
O gosikwara na Mahadum Howard, Mahadum Atlanta, Smith College, Institute of Modern Art na Boston, nà 1936 Texas Centennial's Hall of Negro Life
E debara áhà Countee na ndị agha United States na 1942 ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na 436th Engineer General Service Dump Truck Company
Mgbè ọ nọ n'usuu ndị agha, e nyèrè y'à ọrụ ịmepụta mural màkà African-American Officers Club na Fort Leonard Wood na Missouri
Ọ na-ese ihe màkà ihe ngosi USO
Countee kwagara New York ka ahapụchara ya na ndị agha
Ọ bịara màrà n'etiti ndị na-ese ihe na New York wee gaa n'ihu na-ese fotoLucille Armstrong, Harry Belafonte, nà Marian Anderson
Countee biri na Long Island, New York
Ọ lụrụ Mary Miner na 1955
Countee nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa n'ubochí irí na otu n'ọnwa Septemba,1959
N'afọ 2019, a gbanwere aha Fort Leonard Wood African-American Officersī Club nke nwere mgbidi Countee SSG Samuel A
Countee Hall
Nwa nwanne Countee, Sammie Witing-Ellis, nyere aka ịkọwa ihe osise ahụ site n'aka nwanne nna ya mgbe ọ chọtara ọrụ kwekọrọ na ya na sketchbook
Mural, SSG Samuel A
Countee Hall, Fort Leanord Wood
Samuel Achilefu bụ onye ọkà mmụta sayensị amụrụ na Naijiria na onye nyocha ahụike nke sụrụ ụzọ nyocha ma tinye n'ọrụ na sayensị, injinia na ọgwụ
Samuel Achilefu bụ Michel M
Ter-Pogossian Prọfesọ nke Radiology na osote onye isi oche maka Innovation na entrepreneurship na Mallinckrodt Institute of Radiology, Washington University School of Medicine
Ọ na-ejide nhọpụta nkwonkwo dị ka prọfesọ nke Medicine, Biochemistry

Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Molecular Imaging Center nke Mahadum Washington na mmemme Theranostic Innovation nke a na-enweta na nzuzo Ọ bụ onye nduzi nke Center for Multiple Myeloma Nanotherapy na onye ndu nke Oncologic Imaging Programme nke Alvin J
Siteman Cancer Center na Mahadum Washington

Dọkịta Achilefu bụ onye otu National Academy of Inventors yana ọtụtụ ọha ọkachamara, gụnyere Royal Society of Chemistry, [akwụkwọ akụkọ chọrọ] American Association for the Advancement of Science, Optical Society of America, International Society for Optics na Photonics Engineers (SPIE), American Institute for Medical and Biological Engineering, na St

Louis Academy of Science Onye so na National Advisory Council for Biomedical Imaging and Bioengineering (NACBIB) na Sayensị Advisory Board nke National Cancer Institute's intramural Molecular Imaging Programme, ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka Editor-in-Chief of Current Analytical Chemistry na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke ọtụtụ ndị akwụkwọ sayensị Dọkịta Achilefu bụbu onye nlekọta na mahadum Loma Linda dị na California Ọ bụ onye so na College of Reviewers for the National Institutes of Health (NIH) wee jee ozi dị ka onye òtù na oche nke onyinye nyocha panel maka NIH, Department of Defense (DoD), na Susan G
Komen Foundation
AAchilefu nwetara PhD na mahadum Nancy dị na France dịka onye ọka mmụta gọọmentị France na ọzụzụ postdoctoral ya na Mahadum Oxford dị na England
Akpọrọ ya na Oxford na St

Louis ka ọ rụọ ọrụ maka Mallinckrodt Medical na 1993 wee sonye na Mallinckrodt Institute of Radiology na Mahadum Washington na 2001, ebe o guzobere ihe karịrị ndị otu 80 a ma ama Optical Radiology program na School of Medicine

Dọkịnta Achilefu bụ ọkachamara ama ama n'ụwa n'ịkwalite na iji ọgwụ na-enye ọkụ maka ịchọpụta ọrịa kansa, onyonyo, na ọgwụgwọ N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ tụụrụ ime wee duru mmepe nke akwụkwọ akụkọ wearable cancer na-ekiri enyo maka iwepụ mkpụrụ ndụ kansa nke ọma n'oge ịwa ahụ Igwe enyo ọrịa kansa na-arụ ọrụ na ụkpụrụ nke onyonyo anya Onyonyo anya na-enyere aka nhụta oge dị adị nke ọdịiche dị n'ime na mpụ dị n'ime anụ ahụ dị ndụ Emebere enyo enyo ọrịa iji mee ka ọ dịrị ndị dọkịta na-awa ahụ mfe ịmata ọdịiche dị n'etiti mkpụrụ ndụ ọjọọ na mkpụrụ ndụ ahụike, na-enyere aka hụ na ọ dịghị mkpụrụ ndụ tumor nke kpafuru akpafu a hapụrụ n'oge ịwa ahụ iji wepụ ọrịa kansa Ọ chọpụtakwara usoro ọgwụgwọ ọhụrụ maka ọrịa cancer na-eji ụdị ọkụ pụrụ iche na ọgwụ na-abụghị ọgwụ ọgwụ iji kpalite ọnwụ mkpụrụ ndụ kansa na-emebighị anụ ahụ dị mma Ihe ọhụrụ ndị a na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ arụpụtala ikike ikike 59 nyere US yana akwụkwọ sayensị 300

Achilefu anatala ihe karịrị 30 mpaghara, mba, na nkwanye ugwu na mba ụwa, gụnyere ihe nrite Britton Chance Biomedical Optics Award na 2019 na SPIE, Distinguished Investigator Award in 2018 (Academy for Radiology)
Louis Innovator Award 2015, Medical Innovation Award na 2014 (St
Louis Business Journal), St
Louis Award na 2014 (St

Louis Award Committee), Featured Innovator 2014 (Bloomberg BusinessWeek), Achiever Award 2008 (Blacks in Science) ), Award Performance pụrụ iche 1998 (Mallinckrodt, Inc), na Nka na ụzụ Innovation Award 1995 (Mallinckrodt Medical, Inc)
A na-egosi Dr
Achilefu n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi ọha Ọmụmaatụ ndị nnọchi anya gụnyere
Samuel Adesina (1958 ruo Febụwarị 24, 2014) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke ụlọ omebe iwu nke Ondo Steeti
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011, ọ gbara ọsọ maka oche nke mpaghara ya, Odigbo Constituency II ma merie na ikpo okwu nke Labour Party
Na Mee 29, 2011, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke nzukọ ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ a afọ atọ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na Febụwarị 24, 2014, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ise na isii site na ọrịa kansa afọ
Samuel Ajayi Crowther (ihe dị ka n'afọ na 31 Disemba 1891), bụ ọkà mmụta asụsụ Yoruba, ụkọchukwu, na bishọp Anglican Africa mbụ nke West Africa
A mụrụ ya na Osogun (n'ihe bụ Ado-Awaye, Oyo State, Nigeria ugbua), ndị na-awakpo ohu jidere ya na ezinaụlọ ya mgbe ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ iri na abụọ
Nke a mere n'oge agha obodo Yoruba, nke e ji agha Owu nke 1821 – 1829 wee mara, ebe a chụpụrụ obodo ya Osogun
E mechara regharịa Ajayi nye ndị na-ere ahịa ohu Portuguese, ebe etinyere ya n'ụgbọ ka e buru ya gaa New World site na Atlantic
A tọhapụrụ Crowther n'ohu n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri site n'aka Royal Navy's West Africa Squadron, nke na-eme ka mmachibido iwu Britain megide ahịa ohu Atlantic
A kpọghachiri ndị a tọhapụrụ na Sierra Leone
Samuel Amo Tobbin bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ghana na onye ọrụ ebere

Ọ bụ Chief Executive Officer (CEO) nke Tobinco Group of Companies, ụlọ ọrụ nche anwụ nke na-elekọta ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ asaa dị iche iche gụnyere, Tobinco Pharmaceuticals, Entrance Pharmaceuticels and Research Centre, Atinka Media Village, Abii National Savings and Loans, Priority Insurance, DOR Events na Toblues Properties
A mụrụ Samuel na Accra Newtown, nke dịpụrụ adịpụ na Accra, isi obodo Ghana n'ime ezinụlọ nke mmadụ 8

Ọ malitere ịgba n'okporo ámá mgbe ọ dị obere iji kwado ezinụlọ ya dara ogbenye Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ elementrị, wee gaa Royal Academy of Accountancy na Newtown mana n'ihi nsogbu ego ọ kwụsịrị Ọ malitere ahia ya na ngwaahịa ọgwụ site n'ịkwasa ahịa kemịkalụ na ụlọ ahịa ọgwụ n'ime obodo
Na 1997, o mepere ụlọ ahịa azụmaahịa ya nke abụọ na Kotobabi ka nke mbụ gachara na Dansoman Ọ na-achọ ịgbasa ụlọ ọrụ ya ọ malitere ibubata ọgwụ ya na India Na Jenụwarị 2003, Mr
Tobbin debara aha Tobinco Pharmaceutical Limited aha Ọ gbatịpụrụ ngalaba ụlọ ọrụ ya n'ime ụlọ akụ, ahụike, agụmakwụkwọ, ihe owuwu, ebe mmemme, mkpuchi na mgbasa ozi
Ọ lụrụ Mrs
Mercy Tobbin na ha nwere ụmụ atọ
Ọ bụ Onye Kraịst na Onye Ochie nke Chọọchị Pentikọst
Samuel Udo Bassey bụ onye otu ndị ọrụ aka nke Naijiria, ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Naijeria ma ugbu a ọ bụzi nke na-adịghịzi
Tinyere, Michael Imoudu, Gogo Chu Nzeribe na Wahab Goodluck ha mejupụtara akụkụ na-eme ihe ike nke ọrụ aka na Naịjirịa n'oge Naịjirịa mbụ
Ọ bụbu odeakwụkwọ nke Nigeria Produce Marketing Company na Amalgamated Associated Company

N'afọ 1950, dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke Municipal and Local Authority Workers Union (National Union of Local Government Employees), ọ bụ onye otu ndị ọrụ etiti, All-Nigeria Trade Union Federation nke Imoudu duziri
Nkewa n'ime ahụ dugara n'ịpụpụ ụfọdụ ndị na-eme ihe n'ụzọ dị nro na Bassey mechara bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nke njikọ ahụ

N'afọ 1959, ngalaba ahụ jikọtara ya na National Council of Trade Unions na Naịjirịa iji guzobe Nigerian Trade Union Congress, nke Imoudu duziri, e mechara sonye na Pan Africanist All-African Trade Union Federation, nke Kwame Nkrumah guzobere
Nkewa n'ime ndị na-eme ihe ike dugara na Goodluck dị ka onye isi oche NTUC na Bassey dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu
Òtù ọhụrụ ahụ wee soro Tunji Otegbeye jikọọ aka iji guzobe Socialist Workers and Farmers Party na afọ 1963
Òtù ọhụrụ ahụ na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya ma tụkwasa òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke First Republic obi iji chebe ọdịmma nke ndị ọrụ
O kwenyere na enweghị ike izere ezere nke ọgbaghara, na-ekwu na ndị were mmadụ n'ọrụ nwere anyaukwu nke ukwuu iji mee ka ụfọdụ uru ha gaa na ndị ọrụ ọdịmma ebe gọmentị na-adịghị ahụ anya
Na Febụwarị 19, 1971, ọchịchị Yakubu Gowon jidere ya ọnwa iri na ise

N'afọ 1974, Bassey na ndị isi ọrụ ole na ole na-aga olili ozu onye ọrụ ibe ya kpebiri ịkwaga n'ihu dị n'otu, ha bịanyere aka na mkpebi ịlụ ọgụ n'ihu otu ma guzobe kọmitii na-arụ ọrụ nke ga-akpọkọta nzukọ nke ndị ọrụ niile
Mkpebi a a makwara dị ka Apena Declaration of Trade Union Unity tọrọ ntọala maka Congress Labour nke Nigeria ugbu a

Samuel Chimerenka Chukwueze (onye amụrụ n'ubochi 22 ọnwa Mee afọ 1999) bụ onye Naijiria bụ okachamara n'egwuregwu bọọlụ nke na-agba n'otu egwu bọọlụ Villarreal na Spain nakwa otu egwu bọọlụ nke mba Nigeria dịka onye ọkpọ
A mụrụ Chukwueze na Umuahia Abia steeti
Ọ bụ onye Igbo, a zụlitere n'ezinụlọ Ndị na-eso ụzọ Kraịst, ya na nwanne ya nwoke ọ tọrọ nakwa nwanne nwaanyị ọ tọrọ
Ọ gara Government College Umuahia na Evangel Secondary School
Ọ malitere ịgba bọọlụ mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ ma nwee mmasị na Jay-Jay Okocha dika arụsị ya n'egwuregwu bọọlụ mgbe ọ na-etolite
Ọ natara ndụmọdụ n'aka Hon
Victor Apugo onye ọ hụtara dịka nna, dịka ekwuru na ajụjụ ọnụ nke emeburu ya
Amuru na Amaokwe Ugba Ibeku, Umuahia, Abia State, Chukwueze sonyeere Villarreal CF 's prolific youth setup in 2017, from local side Diamond Football Academy

Mgbe e kenyere ya na mbụ na otu egwuregwu Juvenil A, o mere mpụta mbụ ya na ihe nchekwa na 15 Eprel 2018, na-abịa dị ka onye nnọchi nke ọkara nke abụọ maka Sergio Lozano na 1 – 1 Segunda División B pụọ megide CE Sabadell FC
Chukwueze gbara ọkpụ goolu mbụ ya na May 20, 2018, na-etinye goolu nke abụọ nke otu ya na mmeri ha meriri Bilbao Athletic 3–1
O nyere goolu abụọ n'ime ihe ngosi iri na otu n'ime oge izizi ya, ebe ndị otu ya tụfuru nkwalite n'asọmpị a
Chukwueze mere egwuregwu izizi ya na 20 Septemba 2018, nọchiri Nicola Sansone na eserese ụlọ 2–2 megide Rangers, maka 2018–19 UEFA Europa League
Ọ mekwara egwuregwu mpụta mbụ ya na 5 Nọvemba 2018, na-egwu egwuregwu nkeji 90 zuru oke na egwuregwu ụlọ 1–1 megide Levante, maka 2018–19 La Liga
N'April 2019, ọ meriri ihe nrite 2018 na-eto eto nke Nigeria Football Federation
Mgbe ọ gbasịrị Nigeria egwu na ọkwa 17, ọ natara oku mbụ ya na ndị otu agadi na October 2018
O mere mpụta mbụ ya maka ndị otu ndị isi Naijiria na 20 Nọvemba 2018 dị ka onye mbido na egwuregwu enyi 0–0 megide Uganda
N'ọnwa Mee 2019, a kpọrọ Chukwueze ka ọ nọchite anya otu ndị isi Naijiria na iko mba Afrịka na ndị otu Under-20 na iko mba ụwa n'okpuru-20
Agbanyeghị, Villarreal kwuru na ọ ga-egwu naanị otu n'ime asọmpi a
N'ikpeazụ o kpebiri isonye na ndị otu ndị isi Naịjirịa maka asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke a na-anabata na Egypt wee rie goolu mbụ ya na mmeri Nigeria 2–1 meriri South Africa na nkeji iri na ise
E jirila ya tụnyere Arjen Robben n'ihi nkà ya

Samuel Esson Jonah (amụrụ na 19 Nọvemba 1949) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ghana na onye isi oche nke Mahadum Cape Coast ugbu a

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Jona Capital, ego nha nhata dabere na Johannesburg, South Africa Jona bụbu onye isi oche nke AngloGold Ashanti wee soro onye isi ya Bobby Godsell kerịta usoro ndu nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

Sam Jonah bụ Fante Royal mana amuru na Obuasi wee nweta akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Adisadel College wee nweta mmekorita na Mining Engineering na Camborne School of Mines wee mechaa MSc na njikwa m na Imperial College of Science and Technology
Ọ sonyeere Ashanti Goldfields Corporation na 1979, na-arụ ọrụ n'ụdị dị iche iche, gụnyere ọrụ n'okpuru ala

Mgbe ọ dị afọ 36 ọ ghọrọ onye isi nchịkwa, wee lekọta mgbanwe nke Ashanti Goldfields ka ọ bụrụ mba dị iche iche na-egwupụta akụ, mụbara mmepụta ọla edo site na ounce 240,000 kwa afọ ruo ihe karịrị nde 16 ounce n'ime afọ iri, wee lekọta ya ndepụta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka ụlọ ọrụ Africa mbụ na-arụ ọrụ na New York Stock Exchange
N'afọ 2009, ọ ghọrọ onye na-abụghị onye isi nchịkwa nke Vodafone
A họpụtara Jona ka ọ bụrụ onye otu National Academy of Engineering na 2019 maka onye ndu na ntinye aka na teknụzụ n'ịkwalite ụlọ ọrụ ịnweta na Africa
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, onye isi nke Mahadum Cape Coast, Jonah na-eduzi bọọdụ nke Equator Exploration Limited, Scharrig Mining, Equinox Minerals, Uramin, Moto Goldmines Ltd na Range Resources Limited

Ọ na-ejekwa ozi ma ọ bụ na-eje ozi na bọọdụ dị iche iche, gụnyere Transnet, Mittal Steel SA, Mahadum Ashesi, Standard Bank of South Africa, Lonmin, Commonwealth African Investment Fund (Comafin), kansụl ndụmọdụ nke Global Compact nke odeakwụkwọ ukwu UN, Onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo's International Investment Advisory Council on Nigeria, Onye isi oche Thabo Mbeki's International Investors Council of South Africa
N'ịbụkwa ndị nduzi ya, Jona bụ onye otu ndụmọdụ ndụmọdụ nke Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Azụmahịa London Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche otumfuo Osei Tutu II Foundation
Ihe nrite Jona gụnyere nzere Dọkịta Sayensị Sayensị (DSc) nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Camborne School of Mines na Mahadum Exeter (UK) nyere aka na 1996

Na June 2003, Jonah ghọrọ onye Ghana mbụ e mere knight na narị afọ nke 21 mgbe Prince of Wales nyere ya knighthood nsọpụrụ (KBE), iji kwado ihe ọ rụzuru dị ka onye ọchụnta ego Afrịka, onye isi azụmaahịa si Commonwealth, na onye isi ala
Jona edepụtara n'etiti ndị kasị baa ọgaranya na Ghana
N'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2019, ndị otu ndị ọrụ na-egwupụta akụ̀ na ụba na Ghana nwere ekele maka onyinye platinum maka enyemaka ya n'ịzụlite ụlọ ọrụ na-egwu akụ̀ n'ime ala na Ghana
Na Jenụwarị 2023, edepụtara ya n'etiti ndị Afrịka 100 a ma ama n'ọhịa azụmahịa

Samuel Eto'o Fils (Etu ndi France si akpọ ya [sam·ɛl eto fis]; amụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke iri (10) n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1981) bụ onye nchịkwa bọọlụ Cameroon na onye bụbu onye egwuregwu bụ onye isi oche nke Cameroon Football Federation site na abalị iri na otu na onwa Disemba, na afọ 2021

N'oge ọ na-eto eto, ndị ọkachamara na-ele Eto'o anya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eti egwu kachasị mma n'ụwa, a na-ewerekwa ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu Afrịka kachasị ukwuu n'oge niile, na-emeri African Player of the Year ugboro anọ na 2003, 2004, 2005, na 2010
Eto'o bụ onye nwere nkà na-eto eto, ọ kwagara Real Madrid mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
Eto'o kwupụtara ezumike nká ya na bọọlụ mba ụwa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2014
Samuel Fosso (amụrụ na Julaị 17, 1962) bụ onye Kamerun amụrụ na Naijiria na-ese foto nke rụrụ ọrụ maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ya na Central African Republic
Ọrụ ya gụnyere iji ihe osise onwe ya na-anakwere usoro mmadụ, na-ekwukarị banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Afrịka
Otu n'ime ọrụ nka ya a ma ama, na ihe a maara ya nke ọma, bụ 'autoportraits' ya ebe ọ na-ewere onwe ya ma ọ bụ ndị ọzọ a ma ama ma na-adọta ha n'ụdị ọdịbendị ma ọ bụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A maara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị Omenkà n'oge a na Central Afrịka
O ritere Prince Claus Award site na Netherlands n'afọ 2001
A mụrụ Fosso na Kumba, Cameroon, nne na nna ya bụ ndị Naijiria
O tolitere na Afikpo, ụlọ nna nna ya, ruo mgbe ọ gbagara Bangui na Central African Republic mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ n'afọ 1972 n'oge agha obodo Naịjirịa
Na Bangui, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye na-ese foto mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, na otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị dị ka onye na-ese foto na ụlọ ọrụ nke ya na Bangui, 'Studio Photo Nationale'
Na mbụ, o mere ihe osise onwe ya iji mejupụta akụkụ ndị a na-ejighị mee ihe na ihe nkiri foto ya
Foto ndị a bụ maka nne ya, onye nọrọ na Naịjirịa
Ime ihe osise onwe ya ghọrọ ebumnuche n'onwe ya nye ya
Dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na-arụ ọrụ na studio Fosso na-ese foto onwe onye mara mma n'etiti foto ndị ahịa
Nchịkọta ndị ọgụgụ isi na ndị edemede Africa gụnyere, Okwui Enwezor na Iké Udé chọpụtara ọrụ ya, na-eme ka Fosso banye n'ọrụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na obodo nka maka ọrụ okenye ya
Fosso na-enyocha echiche nke ngosi onwe onye na nnọchi anya nwoke na nwanyị, na-anwale ihe eji eme ihe, uwe, na ọnọdụ na ejiji 1970s
Maka ihe osise onwe ya, o jiri ntọhapụ mmechi na-egbu oge na-enye Fosso ohere ruo sekọnd iri iji gosipụta maka foto ọ bụla
Ọ na-ejikarị ákwà ejiji, n'ihu ya, ọ na-eyi uwe dịgasị iche iche ezigbo uwe ndị Europe, uwe ọdịnala Afrịka, uwe ndị agha mmiri, karate keikogis, mkpụmkpụ ọkpọ, na ihe ndị ọzọ
Na Febụwarị 5, 2014, n'etiti izu ohi mgbe ime ihe ike nke òtù, ụlọ ọrụ Fosso dị na Bangui, nke nwere ihe ndekọ ya zuru ezu, kpochapụrụ

Onye na-ese foto Jerome Delay, onye, ya na onye na-ese foto ibe ya bụ Marcus Bleasdale, na Peter Bouckaert (Onye isi na Human Rights Watch), napụtara ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ndị dị na ya, nke e mere atụmatụ na puku iri abụọ na-adịghị mma na Otu narị na iri ise ruo narị abụọ ebipụta, ọ bụ ezie na ezuru igwefoto Fosso
Fosso nọ na Paris n'oge ahụ
N'afọ 1997, Fosso wepụtara ọrụ ya The Chief He Who Sold Africa To The Colonists, nke ga-abụ ngwa ngwa otu n'ime ọrụ ya kachasị mma

N'ime ya, ọ na-egosi onwe ya dị ka onye isi a chọrọ mma, nke e ji akpụkpọ agụ owuru kpuchie, ọtụtụ olu ọla edo na akwa coral gbara ya n'olu ya, ọla edo siri ike na mgbaaka ọla edo dị arọ gburugburu aka ya na mkpịsị aka ya
N'aka nri ya, ọ na-ejide nnukwu okooko anyanwụ
Ụkwụ ya na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla n'elu ute e biri ebi nke nwere akpụkpọ anụ na-acha uhie uhie n'akụkụ ha

N'ihe osise nke onwe ya Fosso na-eche echiche nke Africa ka e rere site na iji ihe osise akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị a nwere ikike bụ ndị mere ihe ike nke ire ndị nke ha na ihe onwunwe ha maka uru onwe onye
Fosso n'onwe ya kwadoro nke a n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na onye nta akụkọ Guardian Newspaper, Jon Henley
Ọ na-akọrọ na foto ahụ ọ na-egosi onwe ya dị ka ndị isi Afrịka niile rere Afrịka ha nye ndị ọcha
Ozi ya bụ na Afrịka nwere usoro nke ya na ndị ọchịchị ya tupu onye ọcha abịa, ihe osise ahụ gbasara akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị ọcha na ndị ojii na Afrịka
Ọ bụ ezie na ha nwere ike ịnwa ikpuchi ya, n'okpuru ya ka dị otu ihe ahụ
N'afọ 2008, o kpughere otu n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama, “African Spirits”
Fosso's theatrical self portraits pay tribute to fourteen political, intellectual, and cultural figures from Pan-African historical movements and the US
Civil Rights Movement
A na-eji akwụkwọ ọlaọcha gelatin na-ese foto ndị ahụ na dibond na nha 1628 site na sentimita otu narị na iri abụọ na abụọ
Fosso kpughere African Spirits n'oge ntuli aka nke onye isi ojii mbụ, Barack Obama
Nke a bụ ihe ịrịba ama dị mkpa na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke United States, na-agbasawanye ozi Fosso nke ike ndị isi ojii na ememe akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị isi ojii
N'isiokwu sitere n'aka onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ nke oge a n'Afrịka bụ Revue Noire, onye nchịkọta akụkọ bụ Simon Njami na-atụgharị uche na African Spirits, “Fosso apụtala kpamkpam

Ahụ ndị anyị na-ahụ na-anọchite anya ha abụghịzi nke ya kama ọ na-eme ka ọ na-eme ka ọ bụrụ” Dịka ọmụmaatụ, na foto ya nke Angela Davis, Fosso na-eyi uwe Davis' iconic afro hairstyle na ejiji na-agbanwe onwe ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke afọ 1970
Echiche a nke iṅomi ihe nkiri na-enye ndị ọ na-egosipụta ike na echiche ha na-anọchite anya ya
Fosso sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ site na foto nke Even Arnold na Malcolm X, na-eṅomi ihe osise ha n'ụzọ zuru ezu ma na-agbanwe n'ime ihe oyiyi nke akụkọ ihe mere eme ojii
N'ime foto ya bụ isiokwu a na-akọ akụkọ ugboro ugboro, njirimara nke onye ọzọ ma ọ bụ echiche
Site n'ịkọ akụkọ, Fosso na-enye ike ma na-eweghachite njirimara nke onwe ya, isiokwu ya, na ndị na-ege ya ntị
Ụdị Fosso dịtụ ka nke Diane Arbus, n'ihi na ihe osise onwe ya na-egosi ọhụụ nke mmadụ nke anyị
E kwuru na foto Arbus na-egosi na onye ọ bụla nwere njirimara nke ya, ya bụ ikwu ihe fọdụrụ mgbe anyị napụrụ ndị ọzọ
N'ụzọ dị iche, a na-ekwu na uwe Fosso dị iche iche na-egosi na njirimara na-ekpebisi ike site na ihe ndị mmadụ na-enweghị ike ịchịkwa
Ya mere, e gosipụtala ọrụ ya dị ka nke nwere nkwupụta nke otú ụmụ mmadụ nwere ike isi mepụta njirimara ha n'ezie

Samuel Kwado Yamoah (amụrụ Mee 1956) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana bụrụkwa onye otu nzuko omeiwu mbụ nke Republic nke anọ na-anọchite anya mpaghara Ahafo Ano North na mpaghara AshantiỌ nọchitere anya National Democratic Congress
A mụrụ Yamoah na 16 Mee 1956 na Tepa na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Osei Kyeretwie ebe ọ nwetara GCE Ordinary Level
A họpụtara Yamoah ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na tiketi nke National Democratic Congress maka Ahafo Ano North Constituency na Ashanti Region nke Ghana n'oge ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Ghana na Disemba 1992
Baffour Annor nọchiri ya mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ otu oge

N'oge ntuli aka Ghana nke afọ 1996, Baffour Annor nwetara vootu 12,536 n'ime ngụkọta vootu ziri ezi nke na-anọchite anya 4570% karịa James Brownford Donkor nke New Patriotic Party onye nwetara vootu 9,628 na-anọchi anya 3510% na Kwabena Nketia nke People's National Congress onye nwetara voolu 355 na-anọchitere 130% nke ngụkọta nke vootu ziri ike
Ewezuga ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Yamoah bụ onye ọchụnta ego
O nweela ahụmịhe ọrụ na ụlọ akụ, na iwu ụlọ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ njem, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi bọọlụ
Yamoah bụ Onye Kraịst ma ọ lụọla nwaanyị
Samuel Levi Jones (amụrụ n'afọ 1978) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, a maara ya màkà ihe osise ya na nka ya
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya bụ ihe na-enweghị atụ, ma na-elekwasị ányà na akụkọ ihe méré eme nke ndị Africa America, na njirimara; na-ejikarị ihe ndị sitere na akụkọ ihe ochie
A mụrụ Samuel Levi Jones na 1978 na Marion, Indiana, n'ime ezinụlọ ndị Africa America
Jones nwèrè njikọ (nwa nwanne, site n'alụmdi na nwunye) na Abraham S
Smith, otu n'ime ndị ikom abụọ e gbùrù n'ihu ọha na 1930 na Marion, Indiana
Ọ gàrà Mahadum Taylor (BA
degree na ọmụmụ nkwukọrịta); Herron School of Art and Design (BFA
degrees 2009 na foto); na Mills College (MFА
degree 2012 na studio art)
Ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya, Samuel Levi Jones Left of Center (2019) na Indianapolis Museum of Art na Newfields

A na-etinye ọrụ Jones na nchịkọta ihe ngosi ǹkà ọha na eze gụnyere San Francisco Museum of Modern Art, Whitney Museum of American Art, Rubell Museum, Studio Museum na Harlem, Fine Arts Museums nké San Francisco, na Los Angeles County Museum of Art (LACMA)
A mụrụ Dr
Samuel Maduka Onyishi na Nsukka, Enugu State, na Nọvemba n'afọ otu puku na nari iteghite na iri isii na atọ ma a na-ewere ya dị ka onye ọchụnta ego na-aga nke ọma nke mwepụta ugwu nke Enugwu
N'ihi ọnwụ nna ya n'afọ mbụ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ihe mere ka ọ bụrụ onye na-akwado ezinụlọ ya nke ndị nọ na ya bụ nne ya na ụmụnne ya
Sam Onyishi, dị ka a na-akpọkarị ya, gara akwụkwọ na Enugwu Road Primari Skulu, Nsukka site n'afọ 1971 ruo n'afọ 1976 wee banye na Bubendorf Grammar Skulu, Adazi, ebe ama n'oge a dika Anambra steeti
O chepụtara ịdọwa asambodo ya, ebe ọ bụ na agụmakwụkwọ dị ka ọ nweghị ihe pụtara ihe ọ ga emere ya

Mana izute onye ikwu ya nke dị afọ abụọ n'okpuru ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị afọ ole na ole na-abịa n'ihu ka e mesịrị ga-eme ka ọ gbanwee echiche ya banyere agụmakwụkwọ, e mesịrị Ọ laghachi azụ n'ụlọ Akwụkwọ
A nabatara ya ka ọ gụọ mmemme diplọma na Mahadum Naịjirịa, Nsukka, n'etiti afọ 1993 n'afọ 1996
O mechara nweta mmemme nzere site na n'afọ 1996 rue n'afọ 1999
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na klaasị nke abụọ dị elu na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na mmepe obodo

O mechara nweta nzere Mastas na Nchịkwa Azụmahịa (MBA) na Ndị Ọrụ Ịtụ mgbere Ahịa site na Institute for Transformative Thought and Learning na Doctoral Research Centre nke Mahadum Arizona, Phoenix, na United States
Ọ bụ n'ime oge agụmakwụkwọ mahadum ya ka, n'afọ 1994, onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ nke Peace Group, ji bọs abụọ wee malitere azụmahịa njem ya nke etoola ugbu a ruo ihe dị ka ụgbọ ala puku anọ
N'afọ 2019 May & Baker Nigeria Plc họpụtara Dokịnta Samuel Maduka Onyishi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa ọhụrụ ya ihi maka ndị abughị ndị ịsị oche
A họpụtara ya n'oge nzukọ arọ nke mmadụ niile na-arụ n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ (AGM) nke e mere n'afọ 2019
N'ihi nhọpụta ahụ, May & Baker's board tụkwara aro ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

N'ubochi nke anọ n'ime onwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2020, Gọvanọ Ifeanyi Ugwuanyi tọrọ ntọala maka mahadum ọchụnta ego, Mahadum Samuel Maduka, Agu-Ekwegbe na Igbo Etiti Gọọmentị Ọchịchị Ịme Obodo nke Enugwu Steeti nke onye isi ọrụ Peace Mass Transit (PMT) Company, bụ Dọkịnta Samuel Onyishi guzobere

N'ubochi nke asaa n'ime onwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2021, O weghaara òkè Actis na C&I Leasing site na ụlọ ọrụ ya Peace Mass Transit iji nwee ọtụtụ ngwaahịa ruru ihe dị ka pasentị iri ise na ise na iri asatọ na abụọ nke òkè ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Dị ka otu n'ime ihe bụ mkpebi ya maka mmepe obodo ma ọ bụ ihe ụfọdụ kwuru na ọ bụ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze ya (CSR) na obodo a mụrụ ya
N'afọ 2018, ọ kwadoro iwu okporo ụzọ 16 kilomita n'obodo ya, Amaukwa, Nsukka, nke na-adịghị anya na Mahadum Naịjirịa, Nsukka
Onye isi nchịkwa nke steeti ahụ bụ Onye isi oche, Ifeanyi Ugwuanyi, na onye isi oche nke Mahadum Naịjirịa, Nsukka, Prọfesọ Benjamin Chukwuma Ozumba biara nmemme iji gbape ụzọ ahụ ọ rụrụ

Ọ bụ onye guzobere Samuel Maduka Onyishi African Entrepreneurship Foundation (SAMOAEF), ntọala nke n'etiti ndị ọzọ, bụ nke na-enye ihe karịrị ụmụ akwụkwọ otu nari na iri ise bụ ndị n'agụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche na Naịjirịa nkwado agumakụkwọ n'efu
N'afọ 2019, ọ natara onyinye site n'aka Chinese Alumni Association of Naịjirịa, dị ka 'Onye kachasị kwụpụta iche na onye na-ekwuchite onu Naịjirịa na mmekọrịta China na Naịjirịa'
Nkwado Alumni bụ otu n'ime ihe nrite nke ubochi nke mbụ n'ime onwa Octoba, maka ncheta afọ iri asaa nke People's Republic of China, na ncheta afọ iri ise na iteghite nke Naịjirịa
N'ubochi nke iri n'ime onwa Nọvemba, n'afọ 2019, Dokinta Sam Onyishi natara 2019 Ihe Nrite Prestigious Business Integrity Award nke Business Hallmark nyere ya
O nwetara Doctor of Business Administration na Mee n'afọ 2013, site na Enugwu Steeti University of Science and Technology
bu ebe ọ noro guo akwụkwọ (Alma Mata), Mahadum nke Naijiria, Nsukka nyekwara ya ihe nrite nke bụ Dokinta nke Nchịkwa Azụmahịa
[citation needed]

N'ubochi nke iri na asaa n'ime onwa Septemba n;afọ 2012, Onye isi ala Naijiria bu Goodluck Jonathan duziri gọọmentị sọpụrụ ya na ndị ọzọ ruru otu nari na iri ise na anọ n'ọnụ ọgụgụ onyinye nke Member of the Order of the Niger (MON)
Ahmadu Bello University
IBI Group Team member, LEED Gold Award for South East Division Police Station Project in Edmonton
2018 Distinguished Fellow of the American Institute of Architects (FAIA)

and Innovation Visionaries - commemorating
Canada’s 150th anniversary
