Samuel Óghalé Oboh (amụrụ na Machị 27, 1971) bụ onye Canada na-ewu ụlọ, onye njikwa, onye ndu, onye bụbu osote onye isi ala - Architecture na AECOM Canada Architects Ltd - ụlọ ọrụ Fortune 500 na onye isi oche 2015 nke Royal Architectural Institute of Canada (RAIC)

Sam Oboh (dị ka a maara ya nke ọma) bụ onye Canada mbụ sitere n'agbụrụ Afrịka nke a họpụtara dị ka onye isi oche nke Canadian Royal Institute - ihe omume nke onye nduzi oge ochie nke Institute of African Studies na Mahadum Carleton - Ottawa, prọfesọ Pius Adesanmi nwụrụ anwụ kọwara dị ka 'ihe omume na-emeputa ihe dị egwu n'ọtụtụ akụkụ'

N'afọ 2021, na Rio General Assembly, a họpụtara Oboh dị ka osote onye isi ala maka mpaghara nke atọ nke otu dị na Paris a kpọrọ International Union of Architects (UIA) - otu United Nations nabatara nke na-arụ ọrụ iji mee ka ndị na-ewu ụlọ dị n'otu, na-emetụta iwu ọha na eze, ma na-akwalite ụlọ iji gboo mkpa ọha mmadụ
E buliri Oboh na College of Fellows nke American Institute of Architects na mmemme itinye ego nke emere na New York na June 22, 2018

Ihe odide a gụrụ na mmemme itinye ego ahụ kwuru na 'Oboh na-egosipụta echiche nke nlekọta dị mma site n'ịkwalite nkwado ọha na eze - na-akpali ọdịiche dị iche iche, na-akwalite ezi atụmatụ na ịkwado atụmatụ mgbanwe maka ọdịmma ọha na eze
' Site na ntinye ego ya, Oboh ruru eru iji aha FAIA
Naanị ihe dị ka pasent atọ nke ndị na-ewu ụlọ na United States of America (na karịa) nwere ọdịiche a pụrụ iche
Oboh bụ onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye na nkwanye ugwu nke gụnyere NCBN Professional Excellence of the Year Award na 2018, na 2016 Excellence Magazine Award for Leadership

A kpọrọ ya aha dị ka otu n'ime ndị Canada otú narị na iri ise pụrụ iche na-akpali ndị Canada ọgbọ ọzọ (na ncheta nke sesquicentennial nke Canadian Confederation); ma kpọọkwa ya otu n'ime ndị mmadụ iri ise kachasị nwee mmetụta na Alberta site n'aka Alberta Venture Kemgbe ngwụsị afọ 2015, Oboh malitere ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị - na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya kachasị elu na Consul maka Republic of Botswana na qCanada
A mụrụ Oboh na Lagos, Nigeria, n'afọ 1971, ọ bụ nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụ isii
Nna ya, Johnson Oboh, bụ onye na-ahụ maka injinia n'ụlọ ọrụ Switzerland - UTC nke ọrụ ya mere ka ha biri n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke mba ahụ - Lagos, Maiduguri, na Yola, n'etiti ebe ndị ọzọ

Oboh gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'isi klas ya nke afọ 1987 na nsonaazụ kacha mma nke set ya na Government Day Secondary School, Army Barracks, Yola na mpaghara ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa
A nabatara ya ozugbo na Mahadum Bendel State (nke bụzi Ambrose Alli University) na ndịda mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii iji mụọ ihe gbasara owuwu
Oboh mechara wee nweta nzere bachelọ ya (BSc) na-enweta akara kachasị elu nke ụmụ akwụkwọ niile na-ewu ụlọ na klas ya na-agụsị akwụkwọ na 1992 na Upper Second-Class Honours
Ọ gara Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria iji nweta nzere Master of Science na Architecture na 1996

Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Sam Oboh gara Africa 2000 Conference on Architecture na 1995 na Mahadum nke Cape Town, nke onye isi nke School of Architecture, Planning & Geomatics, Prọfesọ Ivor Prinsloo onye bụkwa otu n'ime ndị cheputara Cape Town's V&A Waterfront
Obere oge na Mahadum nke Cape Town ga-emesị gosipụta ọrụ Oboh - na-egosi mmeghe ya na mpaghara ndịda Afrịka

Cape Town stint na-anọchite anya mmalite maka ọrụ Oboh na-ewu ụlọ - nke a na-akpọsa site na nzute ohere n'etiti Oboh na Wouter Gildenhuys - onye na-ewu ụlọ ibe ya na onye isi ngalaba nke Architecture na ML Sultan Technikon (nke bụzi Durban University of Technology) na Durban, Kwazulu Natal - na-eduga n'ọrụ mbụ Oboh na South Africa

Oboh ga-emecha nweta nzere masta nke abụọ - Master of Arts in Communication & Technology (na-elekwasị anya na Architectural Communication) na 2010 site na Mahadum Alberta - ebe ọ bụ onye natara Herbert Marshall McLuhan Graduate Student Award na Faculty of Extension

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello dị na Zaria ebe ọ nwetara nzere Master of Science na Architecture n'afọ 1996 ma mechaa mmemme ọrụ ndị ntorobịa ya na Katsina (n'akụkụ ókèala Niger Republic), Oboh sonyeere F&A Services - ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe na-ewu ụlọ - dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe, ebe ọ bụ akụkụ nke ndị otu na-ahụ maka nrụzigharị ụlọ nkwari akụ Federal Palace nke dị na Victoria Island, ebe a bịanyere aka na Nkwupụta nnwere onwe nke Naịjirịa
N'oge na-adịghị anya n'afọ 1998, a họpụtara Oboh dị ka onye nkuzi na ML Sultan Technikon (nke bụzi Durban University of Technology) na-akụzi African Architecture
Ọ ga-emesị sonye na FMA Architects Southern Africa na ngwụcha afọ 1998 dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe na ụlọ ọrụ Gaborone Botswana ha na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche

Oboh ghọrọ FMA's Resident Architect na Botswana Police College project na Otse na International Law Enforcement Academy - nke o duziri ma hazie (n'ịgbaso iwu nke ọrụ ahụ site na nkwekọrịta mba abụọ bịanyere aka na July 24, 2000 n'etiti Festus Mogae - duziri Gọọmenti Botswana na Gọọmenti nke United States of America - n'okpuru ọchịchị Bill Clinton
Site na Otse, Oboh gara n'ebe ugwu ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ewu ụlọ na ụlọ ọgwụ dị na mpaghara Maun, 'ọnụ ụzọ' na Okavango Delta
Nke a ga-ewe nde dọla otu narị na iri ịse

Ezubere ụlọ ọgwụ Maun District iji jeere mpaghara North-West District nke Botswana (Ngamiland) dum ozi nke gụnyere Okavango Delta - mpaghara nwere oke mma ma nwee anụ ọhịa nke na June 2014, ọ ghọrọ ebe nke otu puku edere na UNESCO World Heritage List ebe ọtụtụ ndị na-ewere mpaghara ahụ dị ka ezigbo paradaịs

Oboh kwagara Canada na Disemba 2003 wee sonye ozugbo na IBI Group Architects - ebe ọ nwetara aha LEED Accredited Professional ma malite ịrụ ọrụ dịka Edmonton Police Service - Southeast Division Station na Peter Bull na Peter Semchuk
Kpọmkwem, Oboh rụrụ ọrụ na akụkụ nkwado nke ọrụ ndị uwe ojii nke ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ ma duzie akwụkwọ LEED / ntinye akwụkwọ nke mere ka ọrụ ndị uwe ojii dị 4,300 m² nweta ọnọdụ LEED Gold
Ụlọ ọrụ South East Division Station ghọrọ ọrụ mbụ na Obodo Edmonton iji nweta ọnọdụ LEED Gold ma bụrụkwa ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii mbụ na North America iji nweta ụkpụrụ LEED Gold

Na-arụkọ ọrụ nke ọma na Peter Bull, Oboh bụkwa IBI Group's Project Architect maka $ 118-million City of Red Deer Civic Yard (nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ, ụdị ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe), nke e wuru na 281 ha (695 acres) ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe
Oboh na IBI Group Team bịakwutere Civic Yards Project na nkwado n'uche - na ụlọ atọ dị na saịtị ahụ (Ogige Nchịkwa, Ụlọ nkwakọba ihe / ụlọ ahịa / ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala na-asacha ụg
ụgbọash ka e mereọ dị n' ka ụkpụrụ LEED
Oboh sonyeere Kasian Architecture dị ka onye mmekọ na 2007 wee bụrụ onye isi nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 2016
Site n'ọrụ ya, Oboh kwenyere na enwere ike imepụta ihe kachasị mma site na njikọta nke ụkpụrụ ụlọ na nyocha na agụmakwụkwọ

O gosipụtara nkwenkwe ya na ọrụ ndị dị ka Alberta Legislature Centre Redevelopment Master Plan ebe dị ka Onye Ndú Architect, o duuru ndị otu ya ijide mmụọ nke ebe nketa kachasị mkpa nke Alberta n'ụdị dịgasị iche iche nke okike na nke ọhụrụ - si otú a na-akpali echiche nke ebe, nganga, inwe na obodo ndị Albertan niile

Oboh duziri mgbalị mmepe azụmahịa - na-akwado, na-enweta ma na-arụ ọrụ na ọrụ ndị dị ka mmepe nke Alberta Legislature Grounds, Royal Alberta Museum of History, na LEED Gold Edmonton Federal Building project (chebere iji gosipụta nkwa Gọọmenti nke Alberta maka ụlọ na-adịgide adịgide

Site na 2010 ruo 2016, Oboh sonyeere Ngalaba Ọrụ Ọha na Ọrụ Gọọmenti Canada (nke bụzi Ọrụ Ọha na Azụmaahịa Canada) dị ka onye isi na-ewu ụlọ na onye njikwa mpaghara nke Architecture na Engineering Centre of Expertise na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ - nke Manitoba, Saskatchewan, Alberta, Nunavut na Northwest Territories mejupụtara
O duziri nguzobe nke ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ nke Architecture and Engineering Centre of Expertise, nke gụnyere ihe karịrị ndị ọkachamara iri ise, ndị ọrụ nchịkwa na ndị ọkachamara na nkà na ụzụ
Oboh mepụtara atụmatụ dị ka Stewardship Excellence Protocol, nke ebumnuche ya bụ ịkwalite ọdịbendị nke ịdị mma na ọrụ gọọmentị etiti na ụlọ ọrụ gọọmenti Canada

Ọ nwetara ikikere dị ka onye na-ewu ụlọ n'ọtụtụ ikike nke gụnyere steeti Texas, United States, na mpaghara Canada nke Alberta, Ontario, Manitoba na British Columbia, Oboh bụ onye nnọchi anya mpaghara mba ụwa na American Institute of Architects 'College of Fellows na onye otu Royal Architectural Institute of Canada (RAIC)
O nwere ikikere na Botswana na South Africa ma bụrụ onye otu Chartered Architect nke Royal Institute of British Architects (RIBA) site na 2000-2007

Na Mee 16, 2015, Oboh nwetara ihe nrite onye isi ala site n'aka American Institute of Architects na Atlanta Georgia na nsọpụrụ onye isi ala site na Australian Institute of Architects (RAIA) dị ka onye otu nsọpụrụ
Oboh bụ onye ndu echiche na onye na-ekwu okwu mgbe niile na ọtụtụ nzukọ mba ụwa na nnọkọ gburugburu ụwa
O nweela onye nkuzi / onye na-eleta ọrụ nkatọ studio na mahadum dị iche iche gụnyere Mahadum Calgary, Mahadum Toronto, Mahadum Carleton, na Mahadum South Africa nke Pretoria na Mahadum Teknụzụ Durban
N'afọ 2006, o duziri nguzobe nke isi obodo mbụ nke RAIC na Alberta, ebe ọ jere ozi dị ka Onye isi ala na 2007/2008

N'oge ọchịchị ya, Oboh duziri ma kwado ọtụtụ atụmatụ nkwado ụlọ nke gụnyere nhazi nke Alberta Architecture dị ka akụkụ nke ngosi Gọọmenti Alberta na 2006 Smithsonian Folklife Festival na Washington, DC
N'afọ 2017, Oboh na onye na-atụpụta ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Berlin bụ Francis Kéré rụkọrọ ọrụ iji duzie atụmatụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ọdịbendị Afrịka nke ọtụtụ nde dollar na Alberta - Canada
Samuel Ofosu-Mensah bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana na onye otu nzuko omeiwu nke mbụ nke mba nke anọ na-anọchite anya Asante -Akim South Constituency na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana
Ọ nọchitere anya mpaghara na tiketi National Democratic Congress
A mụrụ Ofosu-Mensah na 1935 na Asante-Akim Wenchi na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana

Ọ gara Presbyterian College of Education, Akropong (n'oge ahụ Presbyterien Training College, Akropung) ebe ọ nwetara asambodo ọzụzụ ndị nkuzi (Certificate A), na Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology n'ihi ya ebe ọ natara GCE Ordinary Level na Advanced Level Certificates na 1953 na 1955 n'otu n'otu

O mechara gaa na mahadum Massachusetts Amherst ka ọ mụọ mmemme Diploma na ọrụ ugbo ebe okpomọkụ, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, enyeghị ya asambodo Diploma ya na 1962Ọ gara mahadum Aberystwyth mgbe ahụ ọ bụ kọleji mejupụtara mahadum Wales nke a maara dị ka mahadum Wales Aberystwyth) ebe e nyere ya nna ukwu nke sayensị na Agricultural Economics na 1982

Emebere Ofosu-Mensah banye n'ụlọ omeiwu na tiketi National Democratic Congress n'oge ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Ghana na Disemba 1992 iji nọchite anya Asante Akim South Constituency na Ashanti Region nke Ghana
O meriri onye mmegide ya bụ Alex Kwaku Korankye nke New Patriotic Party bụ onye nwetara vootu 18,646 n'ime vootu zuru oke nke na-anọchite anya 4300% n'oge ntuli aka Ghana nke afọ 1996
Ofosu-Mensah bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye bụbu onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Asante Akim South na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ otu oge dị ka onye omeiwu maka mpaghara ahụ
Ọ bụ Onye Kraịst
Samuel Okpodu (a mụrụ na 7 Ọktoba 1962) bụ onye njikwa bọọlụ Naịjirịa
Okpodu bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke otu egwuregwu ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na 2003 FIFA Women's World Cup
Na Machị 2021, a kpọrọ Okpodu onye isi nchịkwa nke Maryland Bobcats FC na National Independent Soccer Association

Samuel Sochukwuma Okwaraji (19 Mee 1964 - 12 Ọgụstụ 1989) bụ ọkachamara n'egwuregwu bọọlụ gbaara mba Naịjirịa na mba ofesi
Ọ bụkwa ọkaiwu ruru eru nke nwere masịtasị na iwu mba ụwa na Mahadum Pontifical Lateran nke Rome
Ọ dara ma nwụọ n'ihi obi mgbawa na nkeji 77 nke asọmpi egwuregwu nke Iko mba ụwa ha na Angola na ama egwuregwu Legọọsụ na Surulere, Legọọsụ Steeti na 12 Ọgụstụ 1989
A mụrụ Ọkwaraji na 19 Mee 1964 na Orlu, Imo Steeti, Naịjirịa

Okwaraji nwere ọrụ na Iroopu nke gụnyere ị gbara AS Roma (1984-1985), NK Dinamo Zagreb (1985-1986), Austria Klagenfurt (1986-1987), VfB Stuttgart (1987-1989) na SSV Ulm 1846 (mbite) 1987-1988) ka ọ gụchara akwụkwọ na iwu
Na obere oge ya na Dinamo Zagreb, Samuel nyere goolu atọ n'egwuregwu enyi na enyi na NK Budućnost Hodošan
A gbara bọọlụ a na 30 Epurel 1986, Dinamo Zagreb meriri 12-0
naanị bọọlụ Samuel gbaara ndị Dinamo na Yugoslav bụ mmadụ ka ọnọchi na 18 Mee 1986 ha na FK Priština
A gbara ya n'ama egwuregwu Maksimir na Zagreb, agba nke iri abụọ na iteghete nke afọ 1985/86
Dinamo Zagreb meriri 4 3
O so na ndị otu egwuregwu nke 'Green Eagles' na 1988 na asọmpi nke iko mba Afrịka nke afọ ahụ, o nyere otu goolu kachasị ọsọ na akụkọ ntolite nke mmeri ha na 'Indomitable Lions' nke Cameroon
O sonyere were gbaa bọọlụ ikpeazụ, ebe Cameroon meriri 'Eagles' meriri site na otu goolu
Okwaraji dara nkeji iri site na njedebe nke asọmpi iko mba ụwa 1990 ha na Angola na Legọọsụ
Ọ nwụrụ site na nsogbu nke ọrịa obi mmapụ dịka ọtọpsịị gosipụtara na nwa amadị a nwere ọrịa obi na ọbara mgbali elu
Na Mee 19, 2019, ụbọchị nwesịrị ị bụ afọ iri ise na ise ncheta ọmụmụ ya
E nyere ya nsọpụrụ site na-ịgbanwe njimara gọgụlụ ụbọchị ncheta ọmụmụ, tinye ya Ọkwaraji
Samuel Prophask Asamoah (amụrụ n'afọ 1981) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Ghana
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ obodo na mba ụwa na ọtụtụ n'ime nchịkọta nka
Ọ na-anọdụ ala n'ụzọ dị mma n'ọrụ nke eserese na mkpali ya maka isiokwu ya site na ilu, ihe omume kwa ụbọchị, na nrọ
Ihe na-akpali ya bụ ịchọta ọṅụ mgbe ọ na-ese ihe na inwe ihe mgbu mgbe ọ na'eseghị ihe
Aha brush ya bụ Prophask ma ọ na-ewere ụwa dị ka ala nke agba
A mụrụ Samuel Prophask Asamoah na 14 Febụwarị 1981 na Apenimadi nke dị nso Hwediem na mpaghara Brong Ahafo nke Ghana
Ọ si n'ezinụlọ Bretuo ma bụrụ onye ezinụlọ Bosompra
Nna ya, Akwasi Appiah, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ onye ọrụ ugbo, bụ onye ọrụ aka nwere ahụmahụ
Asamoah malitere agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Asuoyeboa M / A Primary na Junior High School ebe a chọpụtara nkà ya site na ọrụ pensụl ya na ọrụ agba
N'afọ 1999, ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Kumasi Secondary Technical School ebe ọ gụrụ maka Visual Arts
Ọ malitere iziga ọrụ ya na ụlọ ngosi nke Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah (KNUST) wee malite ikere òkè na ihe ngosi nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'ememe ncheta nke iri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, e nyere Asamoah nwa akwụkwọ kachasị mma na General Knowledge in Art n'ihi ngosipụta ya nke mgbanwe n'ịmepụta ọrụ nka na usoro dị iche iche
N'afọ 2003, ọ gara Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah iji mụọ Integrated Rural Art and Industry
Na KNUST, o sonyere na ngosi Tratech na 2004 na 2005 yana ngosi nkwa udo na 2006

A na-achikọta ọrụ ya na Ministry of Culture, Tourism and Creative Art, Regimanuel Hotel Gray Estate Limited, Ghana, Stanbic Bank, Ghana, Vodafone Ghana, Nestle Ghana Limited na ọtụtụ nchịkọta ndị ọzọ na nke ọha
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe oge niile na onye isi ọrụ nke Prophask Ghana Limited
Asamoah na-arụ ọrụ n'ụdị dị iche iche Ọ na-emepụta ihe osise abstract, semi-abstract, realistic, na surrealistic
Na mgbakwunye, ọ na-eji ụdị cubism, expressionism, impressionism, na fauvism na njikọta pụrụ iche iji wee sụọ asụsụ nka ya, nke ọ kọwara dị ka otu ihe na egwu
Ihe kachasị amasị ya maka eserese bụ ákwà na ihe ọ na-ewu ewu bụ ákwụ acrylic
Ọ na-eji agba eme ihe n'ụzọ zuru oke na ihe osise ya
Ọ na-etinye agba dị ọkụ na nke dị jụụ iji mee ka echiche ya dị ndụ na eserese

Isiokwu maka ihe osise ya na-elekwasị anya na ndụ ime obodo na nke oge a nke Ghana, ọdịbendị Ghana, epistemologies nke nkà ihe ọmụma na ilu ndị Afrịka, isiokwu okpukpe, nrọ, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nsogbu okike, yana inye ụmụ nwanyị ike na mmepe
Ihe kachasị amasị ya bụ ọdịdị nwanyị, nke ọ na-ekwu na ọ na-egosi amara na izu oke na okike
Samuli Aaltonen bụ onye Finland na-egwu egwuregwu ice hockey nke na-egwuri egwu maka otu Porin Ässät na Liiga
N'afọ 2020-21, Aaltonen gbara egwuregwu itoolu ma tinye akara anọ
Na 2021 Aaltonen bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta 2+1 na Ässät

Samwel Mukira Mohochi (amụrụ n'ọnwa June n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na isii, afọ 1972 na Nairobi, Kenya) bụ onye Kenya na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ na onye ọka iwu, nwere ahụmịhe iwu dị ukwuu na ikpe ikike mmadụ n'ụlọ ikpe mba
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado ikike mmadụ na mba ụwa n'ihu ndị na-ahụ maka nkwekọrịta na United Nations Human Rights Council
Samwel Mohochi gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze na Kenya
Ọ gara Kimathi Estate Primary School n'agbata afọ 1980 rụọ afo 1985, Ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị nke Rabai Road n'agbata afọ 1985 rụọ afọ 1987, ebe o ruru eru maka Asambodo ule izizi nke Kenya (KCPE)

O mechara gaa St Paul's High School Amukura na Teso District n'agbata afọ 1988–1990 na Kisii High School n'agbata afọ 1990–1991, ebe o ruru eru maka asambodo Kenya Certificate of Secondary Education (KCSE)
Samwel Mohochi gụrụ akwụkwọ maka Bachelor of Laws Degree LLB na Babasaheb Dr
Ambedkar Law College, Nagpur University na India, n'agbata afọ 1992 rụọ afọ 1997; ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na klas nke abụọ
O debara aha ya maka ule ọka iwu ya na Ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu Kenya n'afọ 1998, emesịa gụsịrị akwụkwọ na diplọma ya na iwu n'afọ 2000

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Masters na Law LLM na Transitional Justice Institute University of Ulster n'afọ 2009 rụọ afọ 2010 na edemede akpọrọ 'Jurisdiction of the ICC Realpolitik sitere na ndị otu steeti na Rome Statute na United Nations Security Council na arụmọrụ ya
Front line Human Rights Defender Award Nominee n'afọ 2009
Samya Hassani (Arabic حسني, amụrụ na 3 Jenụwarị 2000) bụ onye Morocco a mụrụ na Netherlands nke na agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na aga n'ihu maka SC Telstar na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco
Hassani agbaala bọọlụ maka Alkmaar na Netherlands
Mgbe otu afọ na egwuri egwu maka klọb Gent nke Belgian Super League ụmụ nwanyị, a mara ọkwa na Hassani ga egwuri ọrụ maka otu Telstar a kpọlitere na Dutch Eredivisie maka oge 2022/23
Hassani mere nke mbụ ya na Morocco na 14 Junnu 2021 na mmeri enyi na enyi n'ụlọ 3-2 na Mali
Sanâa Alaoui, nke a makwaara dịka Sanaa Alaoui (Arabic ), bụ onye France Moroccan na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Alaoui n'abalị 29, ọnwa Eprel, afọ 1987 na Casablanca
Ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Lycée Lyautey na Casablanca
Dịka onye na-asụ ọtụtụ asụsụ, ya na ndị nduzi si mba dị iche iche, dịka Gustavo Loza, Adil El Arbi na Abdelkader Lagtaâ rụkọtara ọrụ
Ọ na-egwu egwu n'asụsụ ise Arabic, French, Spanish, English na German
N'afọ 2012, ọ duziri ndị ọka ikpe nke Festival AMAL na Spain
Alaoui bi na Casablanca ugbu a, ka ọ nọchara ọtụtụ afọ gachara na Paris
San Marino (asụsụ sammarinese San Marèin), nke ana-kpo kwa, Serenissima Repubblica di San Marino bụ otu obodo no na Obodo Békè

Sanaâ Mssoudy (Arabic; amụrụ na 30 Disemba 1999) bụ onye Morocco na agba bọọlụ nke na agba ọsọ maka ASFAR na otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco
Mssoudy agbaala bọọlụ maka ASFAR na Morocco, na-apụta na asọmpi ikpeazụ nke 2021 CAF Njikọ nke ụmụ nwanyị
Sana Mersni (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1984) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia bụ onye nnọchi anya na Assembly of the Representatives of the People
A mụrụ Mersni na 1 Disemba 1984 na Jendouba
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ tupu ọ gụchaa nzere masta na sayensị mpụ na Tunis El Manar University Law School
Ọ na-ede edemede PhD na mgbanwe ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Tunisia
Mersni rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu mana enweghị ahụmịhe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị tupu ọ sonye na Ennahda Movement ma họpụta ya na National Constituent Assembly na 2011 iji nọchite anya mpaghara Jendouba
O tinyere aka n'ide Iwu Iwu 2014
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ndị mmadụ n'afọ 2014
Ọ bụ onye na-ekwuchitere General Legislation Commission
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na anọ Mersni na Latifa Habachi tụrụ aro ka e dezigharịa iwu ahụ iji nye gọọmentị ikike ịhọpụta ndị otu ikpe
Ndị otu Popular Front na ndị otu Democratic Bloc na-emegide ya n'ụzọ siri ike ma mee ka ndị otu ndị ọka ikpe nke Tunisia kpọọ oku maka ọgbaghara, mana vootu 109 nabatara ya
N'afọ 2015, mgbe ndị omeiwu Tunisia weghachiri ntaramahụhụ ọnwụ maka mpụ ndị na-eyi ọha egwu, Mersni kwuru na ọ gaghị egbochi 'ndị na-eyi egwu na-achọ ọnwụ iji gaa paradaịs'
Sana Mouziane (a mụrụ n'afọ 1980) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu
A mụrụ Mouziane na Casablanca
Mgbe nne na nna ya gbara alụkwaghịm, ọ kwagara Marrakech
Mouziane kwagara London mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu
Ọ gara nkuzi egwu wee kpebie isonyere otu egwu iji banye na asọmpi
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, Mouziane kwupụtara abụ ihu ọha mbụ ya n'asụsụ Arabic na Darlington International Festival
O kwuru na ndụ ya n'England enyewo ya nguzozi n'etiti ọdịbendị ọdịda anyanwụ na agụmakwụkwọ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke na-enye ya ohere ibi ndụ ya n'ụzọ zuru ezu
Mouziane wepụtara egwu izizi ya 'Inta Lhoub' n'afọ 2004
Mouziane mere ihe nkiri izizi ya n'afọ 2005, na Women in Search of Freedom nke onye nduzi Egypt bụ Ines Al Dégheidi duziri
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ pụtara na Ashra Haramy N'afọ 2007, Mouziane gosipụtara nwanyị na nwa nwanne di ya na-akwa iko na Samira's Garden
O meriri onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma maka ọrụ a na Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou n'afọ 2009
N'afọ 2012, Mouziane mere Zahra, nwunye Sheikh, na ihe nkiri akụkọ ihe mere eme L'enfant cheikh nke Hamid Bennani duziri
Ọ kpọrọ ya ahụmịhe ọhụrụ, na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri e debere n'oge ọchịchị ndị France
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ Martha, onye chọpụtara Jesu bilitere, n'afọ 2013 miniseries The Bible N'afọ 2017, Mouziane pụtara na La Nuit Ardente, nke Bennani duziri
O kwuru na ọ na-amasị ya ịrụ ọrụ obi ike
Mouziane lụrụ onye injinia Britain bụ Alan Dearsley n'ụbọchị 14 ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2013
Dịka o si kwuo, ọ bụ ịhụnanya na anya mbụ, ebe ọ nwere mmasị na ọdịbendị ya
Di na nwunye ahụ gara njem ezumike ha na Maldives
Ọ mụrụ nwa nwoke, Kenzi, n'afọ 2014 wee kwụsị ime ihe nkiri
Sana Musasama bụ ónyé Africa-America na-emepụta ụrọ na ónyé na-ese ihe na mgbasa ozi na New York City
Ọrụ nka ya na ọrụ ya yiri ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé nkụzi na ntinye aka na ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ karịsịa ịzụ ahịa ụmụ nwanyị

A matala ọrụ ya na ọtụtụ onyinye gụnyere Anonymous Was a Woman Award na 2002, Joan Mitchell Painters and Sculptors Grant na 2013, ọ bụkwa ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbè ochie na Harlem Artist-in-Residence na 1983 Xi84
Musasama bụ osote prọfesọ na Hunter College
A mụrụ Musasama na Saint Albans, New York
O nwèrè BA na Ceramics na Education site na City College (1974) na MFA site na Alfred State College of Ceramics (1987)

Ọ gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ihe ya na Archie Bray Foundation na Helena, Montana; Gakium Designer College na Tokyo, Japan; Tuscarora International School of Ceramics na Tuscarora, Nevada; na Mende Pottery na Mendeland, Sierra Leone

Ọrụ nka na ọrụ Musasama dị ka onye nkụzi sitere na njem ya dị ukwuu na Africa, Eshia, na Latin America gụnyere mba ndị dị ka Sierra Leone, Cambodia, Vietnam, na Japan iji mụta banyéré ọdịbendị ndị na-abụghị nke ọdịda anyanwụ, ọkachasị dịka ọ metụtara ụmụ nwanyị na nsogbu mmekọrịta na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emetụta ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ ndị 1970 ọ gara West Africa ebe ọ biri ma rụọ ọrụ na Mendeland, Sierra Leone, ọ bụ ebe ahụ ka ọ hụrụ mmetụta nke ibi úgwù ụmụ agbọghọ
Ahụmahụ a mere ka o nwee mmasị n'ihe gbásárá ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ gụnyere ijide ụkwụ, ịgba ụtụ isi ọkụ, ndina n'ike na ịgba akwụna
Ruo ihe karịrị afọ 20, Musasama emeela nchọpụta banyéré nsogbụ ndị a ma mepụta ihe osise na nzaghachi
Sanaa Benhama (born 9 June 1982) bụ onye Paralympic athlete si mba Morocco na eso na category ndị na asọmpi T13 na ihe omume sprint

Omechara ihie omume sprint abụọ na Summer Paralympics, nke mere echijiri mara ya amara na afọ 2008 Summer Paralympics in Beijing, China omeriri wee rite ihe nrite ọlaedo atọ mbe ọ meriri na ihe omume sprint na ụlọ akwụkwọ ya
A mụrụ Benhama na Khemisset, Morocco na afọ 1982
Benhama, onye na-azụ onwe ya na Association Handisport Ennasser na Salé, mere nke mbụ ya dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu nke T13 na nzukọ na Rabat na afo 2008
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, o mere nke mbụ ya zuru oke na mba ụwa mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka akụkụ nke otu Morocco iji sọọ mpi na afọ 2008 Summer Paralympics na Beijing
O meriri n'ihe omume anọ, sprints atọ na long jump

Na ogologo ịwụli elu, o mere asatọ ikpeazụ na-enye ya ohere ịsọ mpi na mgbalị atọ ọzọ, mana na nke kachasị mma ya n'ebe dị anya site na ndị na-eduga Benhama wepụrụ na ịwụli abụọ fọdụrụ, na-agwụ na nke isii
Ọ bụ na ihe omume sprint ka Benhama nwere mmetụta na egwuregwu ahụ
Ọ malitere na ọsọ ọsọ mita 400, ruo eruo n'oge kachasị ọsọ wee setịpụ ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ nke 5556 sekọnd na ngwụcha iji nweta ihe nrite ọla edo mbụ ya nke egwuregwu ahụ
O sochiri nke a ụbọchị abụọ ka e mesịrị na ọla edo ọzọ, n'oge a na mita 200, ebe ọ meriri onye iro ya kacha nso, Nantenin Keïta nke France site na ihe karịrị ọkara nke abụọ
Ihe omume ikpeazụ ya nke 2008 Paralympics bụ 100 mita (T13), ebe o setịpụrụ ndekọ Paralympic na okpomọkụ, na-eru eru na oge nke 1238 sekọnd
Na ngwụcha, ihe omume nke nnukwu mmiri ozuzo gbara gburugburu, Benhama dekọrọ oge nke 1228 iji nweta ọla edo nke atọ ya ma setịpụ ihe ndekọ ụwa ọhụrụ
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, Benhama nọchitere anya Morocco na 2011 IPC Athletics World Championships na Christchurch

O nwetara ihe nrite atọ gafee sprints, mana o nwetaghị ọla edo na nke ọ bụla n'ime ha, onye South Africa bụ Ilse Hayes meriri ya na mita 100 na onye Cuba bụ Omara Durand na mita 200 iji nweta ọlaọcha abụọ; na ọla nchara na ihe omume mita 400
Ọmụmụ nwa ya nwoke n'afọ 2012, pụtara na Benhama wepụrụ onwe ya n'ịgba ọsọ n'afọ ahụ, ọ nweghịkwa ike ịgbachitere aha Paralympic ya na London
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ laghachiri na asọmpi mba ụwa wee merie ihe nrite atọ na afọ 2013 IPC Athletics World Championships na Lyon
ọla edo na mita 100, ọla nchara na mita 200, na naanị nnukwu ihe nrite mba ụwa ya na ogologo ịwụli elu, ọlaọcha
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ banyere na 2015 World Championships na Doha ọ meriri ọla nchara abụọ, na 200 na 400 mita
Benhama nọchitekwara anya mba ya na 2016 Summer Paralympics na Rio de Janeiro, mana ọ bụghị n'elu ikpo okwu na nke ọ bụla n'ime ihe omume abụọ ya, 100 mita na 400 mita agbụrụ
Sanaa Gamil, a mụrụ Thoraya Youssef Atallah (April 27, 1930), bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ ndị Ọtọdọks Coptic na Minya Governorate, ọ kwagara Cairo iji chụsoo ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya ma mechaa gbanwee aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Sanaa Gamil
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama bụ Nefisah n'ihu Omar Sharif na ihe nkiri Bidaya wa nihaya (A Beginning and an End) nke Salah Abouseif duziri na 1960
Sanaa Gamil meriri ihe nrite kachasị mma na-akwado onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Moscow Film Festival na 1961 maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri a
O nwere anọ n'ime ihe nkiri ya ndị nkatọ họpụtara ma gosipụta ya n'etiti 'ihe nkiri otu narị kachasị mma e mere na senchiri nke iri abụọ' na 1996
Ọ bụghị naanị onye na-eme ihe nkiri, kamakwa nke kachasị mkpa bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme egwuregwu ihe nkiri kacha mma n'Ijipt
Ọ rụkwara ọtụtụ ọrụ na French Stage maka Comédie-Française
Ọ lụrụ onye nta akụkọ Egypt a ma ama bụ Louis Greiss ma ọ nweghị ụmụ
O mekwara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri TV dịka Ta'er EL Bahr (Sea Bird) na Salah Zulfikar na 1972 na Oyoun (Eyes) na Fouad el-Mohandes, na 1980 na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dịka The Visit (El-Zeyara) na Gamil Ratib
N'afọ 2016, onye nduzi Ijipt bụ Rogina Bassaly روجينا بسالي, mere ihe nkiri banyere ya, Ọ bụ 'Sana's Tale' 'modاية سناء'
aka The Woman from Cairo (International English title informal literal title)
aka Nwunye nke Abụọ
aka Dawn of a New Day
aka Dead Among the Living
aka The Beginning and the End
aka Slaves of Money (International aha Bekee)
aka Onye bụ nwa nwanyị m? (International aha Bekee)

Sanaa Mazhar (Ọgọst 17, 1932 - Ọgọst 6, 2018) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, otu n'ime ụmụ agbọghọ atọ na ihe nkiri 'Biyaa Al Jarid' ya na Magda al-Sabahi na Naima Akef, gosipụtara ọtụtụ dị ka otu n'etiti ọrụ ihe nkiri kachasị mma
A mụrụ Mazhar na 17 Ọgọst 1932
Ọ lụrụ nwoke nwụrụ n'agha Yom Kippur na 1973, ọ lụbeghị di ọzọ kamgbe ahụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ agbọghọ atọ na 'Bayaat Al Jarid' ya na Magda na Naima Akef
Ọrụ iri na atọ zuru ezu iji bụrụ onye a maara n'Ijipt site n'aka ọha mmadụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Dearer than My Life na 1965
Sanaa sooro ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na-ese ihe nkiri dịka Hind Rostom, Nadia Lutfi, Najat Al Saghira, Shadia yana ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri dịka Salah Zulfikar na Rushdy Abaza
O sonyere n'ọtụtụ ọrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka 'Queen of Saba'
Ọ na-emetụta ụfọdụ n'ime ndị gwara ya ka ọ gbanwee ụcha ntutu isi ya
Ọ na-ejikwa emepụta nkọwa niile nke àgwà nka ya site na ntutu isi ya, eriri ntutu ya na ihe ndị ọzọ
Sanaa họọrọ ibi ndụ n'ụzọ dị jụụ n'ebe dị anya site n'ọmarịcha nke ịbụ onye ama ama na ịbụ onye ama ma họrọ ibi ndụ ya dị ka nwanyị ọ bụla ọzọ nke Ijipt
Ọ na-eyi hijab ma laa ezumike nká kpamkpam n'afọ 1985
Ọ dịghị mgbe ọ bụla n'ime ọrụ ya gara aga mere ya ihe ihere
A kọrọ na Yusuf Sibai nyere ya ọrụ na ihe nkiri ya mana ọ jụrụ n'ihi na o nwere ihe nkiri na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụtụtụ nke 6 Ọgọstụ 2018 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na isii
Na ọnwa nke isii, na afọ 2021, ọ sonyere na World Olympic Qualification Tournament nke emere na Paris, France na-enwe olileanya iru eru maka afọ 2020 Summer Olympics na Tokyo, Japan
N'ọnwa Ọktoba, na afọ 2021, o ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na ihe omume ya na afọ 2021 Mediterranean Karate Championships nke emere na Limassol, Saịprọs

Sanah Mollo (amuru 30 Jenụwarị 1987) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ South Africa nke na-egwu egwu dị ka onye na-agbachitere Mamelodi Sundowns ma nọchite anya otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị South Africa, gụnyere na asọmpi egwuregwu bọọlụ Summer
A mụrụ Sanah Mollo na Villiers, Free State na 30 Jenụwarị 1987, ma malite ịgba bọọlụ mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu maka The Birds FC, otu ndị na-eme egwuregwu
Nne na nna ya na mbụ megidere ya ịga na klọb ahụ mana ha mechara bụrụ ndị na-akwado ya
Ọ gara n'ihu na-egwu egwu mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, a na-enyekwa ya ego egwuregwu iji gaa Mahadum nke Free State mgbe ọ gbasịrị ha
Na klọb, ọ na-egwuri egwu ugbu a maka Mamelodi Sundowns
EdMollo nwere akara ugo mmụta ahịa na Mahadum nke Free State
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ oge niile na njikwa ndị ahịa, na-arụkọ ọrụ na ọzụzụ na ịhapụ oge n'oge asọmpi iji nye ya ohere igwu egwu maka South Africa
Klọb ya anaghị akwụ ya ụgwọ, mana a na-enye ya ụgwọ njem, ma na-enweta ego ụfọdụ site na ndị otu mba

Natasha Sanaipei Tande (amụrụ na ụbọchị 22 n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1985), nke a maara dị ka Sana, bụ onye Kenya na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme karaoke, onye redio na onye na-eme ihe egwuregwu
N'afọ 2004, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, Sanaipei sonyeere Coca-Cola Popstars (East Africa) Talent Search mgbe ọ gbasịrị ezinụlọ ya
Mgbe ọ gara nke ọma maka ihe ngosi ahụ, ọ kwụsịrị ọmụmụ kọleji ya
O meriri asọmpi ahụ ya na ndị asọmpi ibe ya abụọ, Kevin Waweru na Pam Waithaka
Ha jikọtara ọnụ, ha guzobere otu egwu Sema ma merie nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Homeboyz Records
N'afọ 2005, mmadụ atọ ahụ wepụtara abọm izizi iri na asaa bụ Mwewe, ya na egwu wuru ewu dika Leta Wimbo, Sakalakata, na Mwewe, na-eme ka ha pụta ìhè
Mgbe e mesịrị n'otu afọ ahụ, ndị otu ahụ kewara, na-ezo aka na 'ọdịiche na-enweghị nkwekọrịta' na 'ike mpụga'
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ Kiss 100, ọ sonyeere Easy FM (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Nation FM) n'afọ 2013, dị ka onye na-eweta ihe ngosi ụgbọala ya na Edward Kwach
N'afọ 2014, o wepụtara egwu ya bụ Mfalme wa Mapenzi dịka akụkụ nke ọrụ Mahaba nke onye mmepụta Wawesh, ihe ngosi nke egwu ịhụnanya Swahili
Egwu a nwetara otuto dị egwu maka okwu ya nke ọma na ihe ngosi ya dị ụtọ
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ malitere ịme ihe ngosi nke etiti ụtụtụ ya na Obinna Ike Igwe
Mgbe a kpo gara Obinna na ihe ngosi mgbede, Sanaipei ghọrọ naanị onye na-ahụ maka ihe ngosi nke etiti ụtụtụ ma nweta ndị na-ege ntị kachasị na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'onwa Septemba n'afọ 2015, a chụrụ Sanaipei na ndị ngosi ibe ya bụ Ciru Muriuki na Anto Neo Soul n'ọrụ
Nkwụsị ya na nke ndị ọrụ ibe ya zutere ọgba aghara dị ukwuu na Twitter, ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ntị na ndị na-akwado ya na-achọ ka e weghachi ha
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ Easy FM, Sanaipei lekwasịrị anya na ọrụ egwu ya, na-ewepụta egwu dịka Rasta Man, Simama Imara, na Ankula Huu

Otu egwu ya, Amina, mere ka mmasị mpaghara ya gbasaa ma dọta uche onye egwu pop na onye egwu Tanzania bụ Chege Chigunda, bụ onye jiri ụgbọelu gaa Dar es Salaam ma gosipụta ya na egwu Najiuliza ya na onye na-agụ egwu Tanzania bụ Ray C
Sandra Don-Arthur (amụrụ 22 Eprel 1980) makwaara dị ka Alexandrina na ụlọ ọrụ showbiz bụ ọkachamara etemeete na Vlogger si Ghana
Ọ bụ onye tọrọ ntọala ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke Alexiglam Studio, ụlọ ọrụ etemeete na ịma mma Ghana nke na-enye ndị inyom Ghana ọrụ ịma mma
A mụrụ ya nye nna onye Ghana na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, Dr
Eric George Alexander Don-Arthur na nne Russia, Oriakụ Natalia Don-Arthur bụ onye na-ahụ maka biochemist

O tolitere na Ghana na Russia ya na ụmụnne ya anọ ma bụrụ nwanne nwanyị nta nke Eric Don-Arthur, onye zọrọ ọkwa n'ụlọ omebe iwu n'afọ 2016 n'otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke National Democratic Congress inọchite anya Effutu Constituency
Don-Arthur gara Morning Star School na Cantonments wee mechaa kwaga ụlọawụkwọ St
Roses Senior High School nke dị na Akwatia

Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ hapụrụ United Kingdom wee gụọ akwụkwọ na West London College na 2011 wee gaa na Mink College ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ wee nweta asambodo na nka etemeete, idozi ntutu isi na mmetụta pụrụ iche
Ọ bụkwa onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ashesi dị na Ghana
Na 2011, Alexandrina malitere etemeete ọkachamara mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na UK
Ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese etemeete bịara pụta ìhè mgbe onye isi etemeete gwara ya ka o mee etemeete maka onye isi njikwa MNET Africa, Biola Alabi dị ka ọbịa na ihe ngosi TV '@ Home With…' na London

Don-Arthur na ọtụtụ ndị a ma ama arụwo ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ Ghana na Nigeria dịka Omotola Jalade Ekehinde, Efya, Joselyn Dumas, Juliet Ibrahim, Nadia Buari, Jackie Appiah, Jim Iyke, Yvonne Okoro na DJ Cuppy
Maybelline New York, Ghana họpụtara ya ka o soro na ndị na-akwalite ihe nkiri ha iji nyere aka metụta ọrụ Maybelline na Ghana
Maybelline New York nyekwara ya ohere ịme ihe nkiri etemeete mbụ na TV e megoro n'Afrịka, 'Mekeup Diaries,' nke na-agbasa na DSTV na mba iri anọ na isii

Ọ bụkwa onye ọbịa oge niile na onye ndu etemeete na oge mbụ nke ihe ngosi 'Keeping It Real' ihe ngosi nke onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ọbịa, Joselyn Dumas kwadoro ebe ụmụ nwanyị Ghana nke oge a na-ekerịta echiche ha banyere isiokwu dị iche iche na-emetụta ha na 2017
O mepụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ etemeete maka Glitz Africa Magazine, Debonair Afrik Magazine, Magazine Wedding Dream na Haute Canoe Magazine
Ọtụtụ ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana bu ndi aka ọkachamara Alexandrina metuworo

Ha gụnyere Nwunye onye ịsị ala Ghana, Nana Konadu Agyeman-Rawlings, Ursula Owusu, Nana Oye Lithur, nwanyị mbụ rụrụ ọrụ dika onye isi ndị ọrụ na Ghana, Frema Osei Opare na Minista na-ahụ maka mmetụta ndị mba ọzọ, Shirley Ayorkor Botchway

N'afọ 2015, o gosipụtara nsọpụrụ nye Kofi Ansah nwụrụ anwụ na mmekorita ya na Maybelline New York site na nchịkọta Haute Avant Garde ya nke gosipụtara uwe sitere n'aka ụlọọrụ na-emepụta ihe na Ghana nakwa onye na-emepụta ihe dị iche iche iji gosipụta ụdị ngwaahịa dị iche iche nke ụlọọrụ Maybelline New York nwerw

A họpụtara ya dị ka nanị onye na-ete etemete na Ghana na onye nnọchiteanya West Africa iji sonye na New York Fashion Week wee rụọ ọrụ, ya na Victoria Secret, Mayowa Nicholas, Sabah Koj n'oge ngosi nke Fall / Winter
N'afọ 2019, ọ malitere ụlọọrụ na ụlọakwụkwọ ịma mma ya nke a kpọrọ Alexiglam Studios iji nyere aka kwalite akụkọ ịma mma nke Africa ma zụọ ndị na-ete ihe etemeete na-eto eto
O kwuru na uto ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe etemeete bu n'ihi ọdịdị ya na-achọgharị dị ka nwata na ịhụnanya o nwere maka inwale na ịchọpụtagasi ihe ọhụrụ
Pat McGrath na Bimpe Onakoya so n'ime ndị ndụmọdụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ịma mma

N'oge nleta eze nke Charles, Onye isi ala Wales na nwunye ya, Camilla, Duchess nke Cornwall nke ọ bịara na Ghana na Nọvemba 2018, e mere obere oriri na ọṅụṅụ steeti na ihe ngosi ejiji maka nsọpụrụ ha, e wee họpụta Alexandrina ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ndi na-eme etemete maka ihe ngosi ahu
Ọrụ nchịkọta akụkọ ya gbasara onye nlereanya mba ụwa nke Ghana na Naijiria aha ya bu Victoria Michaels bụ nke e gosipụtara na akwụkwọ akụkọ dị na Paris, nke a kpọrọ Magazin Roots

Ọ bụkwa onye so wee tọọ ntọala nke Sickle Strong Warriors Foundation, otu òtù na-adịghị akwụ ụgwọ nke na-achọ ịkwalite mmata banyere ọrịa sickle cell na ịkwalite ịdị n'otu n'etiti ndị ọrịa sickle cell na Ghana
Dịka ihe sonyeere na CSR na ọrụ enyemaka ya, ọ mụtakwara nka ya na oru ngo Fair Justice Initiative, nke a kpọrọ 'Remember Me'
Ọ bụ ọrụ nkwado n'etiti onye na-ese foto Ghana, Francis Kokoroko, Rania Odaymat, The Fair Justice Initiative lekwasịrị anya na ụmụ nwanyị iri na abụọ ndị a tụrụ ikpe ndụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ nke Nsawam
Ejiri uwe ọdịnala dochie anya uwe ụmụ nwanyị ụlọ mkpọrọ wee dee ha foto nke e gosiri na ngosi 'Make Be' na La Maison na Ọktoba 2018
Kemgbe e mepụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ akwụkwọ kọfị iji kwalite nkwado
Ya na ụmụ ya abụọ bi na Accra, Ghana
Sandra Aikaruwa Mushi (a mụrụ n'afọ 1974) bụ onye edemede Tanzania, ọkachasị nke uri na akụkọ mkpirikpi
A mụrụ Mushi na Dar es Salaam, Tanzania, n'afọ 1974
Ọ nọrọ n'etiti United Kingdom, Tanzania, na Botswana mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Ọ gụrụ idozi ime ụlọ na South Africa na Cape Technikon, wee malite ọrụ dịka onye na-emepụta ime ụlọ
Ka ọ na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na imewe, Mushi malitere ọrụ dịka onye edemede
O bipụtara akụkọ na uri na magazin na akwụkwọ akụkọ dị iche iche, gụnyere na JENdA A Journal of Culture and African Women Studies na site na Africa Knowledge Project na nzukọ edemede SOMA
O deela kọlụm na ime ụlọ maka The Citizen na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ nke Tanzania
E tinyere ọrụ ya na anthology Reflections An Anthology of New Work nke African Women Poets n'afọ 2013
Akwụkwọ mbụ ya, nchịkọta uri The Rhythmn of My Rhyme, bụ nke Andika Afrika bipụtara n'afọ 2008
Ọ bụghị ihe doro anya ma ederede na-ezighi ezi nke 'Rhythm' bụ ebumnuche
Akwụkwọ ya nke abụọ, Stains on My Khanga, bụ nchịkọta akụkọ na uri dị mkpirikpi ma bipụta ya n'afọ 2014
A na-ahazi Mushi dịka onye dị mkpa na-enye aka na akwụkwọ Tanzanian nke oge a, ọkachasị n'etiti ndị edemede nwanyị
A na-akọwa ihe odide ya mgbe ụfọdụ dịka satire, na-elekwasị anya na ndụ ụmụ nwanyị kwa ụbọchị

Ọ kọwara onwe ya n'oge gara aga dịka 'ọ bụghị onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị ma ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe ike,' mana o mechara kwuo Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie iji kwuo, 'Anyị niile kwesịrị ịbụ ndị na-ahụkarị ụmụ nwanyị'
Ọ na-ede akwụkwọ n'asụsụ Bekee, na ụfọdụ Swahili n'ọrụ ya
Ọrụ ya mechara bụrụkwa nke siri ike karị, na-emekarị ihe ike n'ụlọ na ọgụ ndị ọzọ ụmụ nwanyị na-eche ihu
Sandra Achums bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka ihe oyinyo, onye na-enye obi ebere, na nke kachasị mkpa, onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Sandra Achums na Imo steeti nke dị na ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ mba ọdịda anyanwụ Africa; Nigeria
Ọ guru ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, sekọndrị na kwa mahadum ya na Isolo,Lagos steeti
Achums bata na ulo oru ihe nkiri Naijiria na afo 1995 were mee ihe nkiri akpọrọ Deadly Affair, ebe e gosiputara ya na ndi ozo ndi nollywood; Dolly Unachukwu, Jide Kosoko, na Emeka Ike
Achums hapuru obodo Nigeria na 2006 gawa Germany ma ma birisie ebi ahu ya na umu ya na di ya nke ana akpo Tony
Co-Founder & CEO, Face2Face Africa
Sandra Appiah (amuru March 30, 1989) bu onye nchoputa ulo oru mgbasa ozi Face2face Africa, ebe o jere ozi dika onye isi ala site na 2016 rue 2020
Na 2019, o bidoro PanaGenius Inc

With Face2face Africa dika yaAkara flagship, PanaGenius na-erute ihe karịrị nde ndị ọrụ 2 kwa ọnwa site na ikpo okwu dị n'ịntanetị ma na-etinye puku kwuru puku ndị ọzọ site na mmemme dịka Mgbakọ izu ụka Pan-Africa na New York Cityna mba 30Black Stars Conference and Awards
A mụrụ Appiah n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Ghana n'otu obere obodo na 1989, ọ kwagara Ịtali mgbe ọ dị afọ 8, ma biri na Milan
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ezinụlọ ya kwagara New York City ọzọ
Appiah gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Bronx, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-ekwu okwu ikpeazụ ma nata agụmakwụkwọ na S
Newhouse School of Public Communications na Mahadum Syracuse

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na telivishọn, redio, na ihe nkiri na obere na ime ihe nkiri, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ magna cum laude, nke New York Times College Scholarship na Jonathan Levin (Time Warner) Scholarship kwadoro
Ọ nwetara ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na nkwenkwe na-ezighi ezi banyere ndị Afrịka nọ n'Ịtali na US, site n'aka ndị Afrịka-Amerịka nakwa site na agbụrụ ndị ọzọ
N'ihi ya, ihere mere ya maka ihe nketa ya, ruo mgbe ọ laghachiri Ghana n'afọ nke abụọ ya na mahadum
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Appiah rụrụ ọrụ na The New York Times, HBO, na MTV
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke ọtụtụ ihe nrite
N'afọ 2011, Appiah na onye mmekọ ya bụ Isaac O
Babu-Boateng malitere Face2Face Africa, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi pan-Africa
Site na ahụmịhe ha na-etolite dị ka ndị Afrịka kwagara na United States, ha abụọ mepụtara ikpo okwu n'ịntanetị na magazin e biri ebi iji nyere aka gbanwee onyinyo Afrịka n'ime obodo ụwa
Appiah na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke magazin Face2face Africa
N'afọ 2020, ha malitere PanaGenius Inc, nke ga-eje ozi dị ka ụlọ ọrụ nne na nna na Face2face Africa na nyiwe dijitalụ ndị ọzọ

Appiah akwadola ihe ngosi okwu ịntanetị, ịgba ajụjụ ọnụ n'etiti ndị ọzọ Jesse, Alex Well, Femi Kuti, Serge Ibaka na Lira O kwuwo okwu na ogbako na ogbako n'Afrika, ikenye ụmụ nwanyị na ihe ndị ọzọ metụtara mmekọrịta ọha na eze
Celia-Sandra Botha (amụrụ na 25 Febụwarị na afọ 1945) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa, onye jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya South Africa na Czech Republic
Ọ bụbu onye ndú nke ndị mmegide na National Assembly, n'aha Democratic Alliance na onye ndú ya, Helen Zille
O kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịpụ n'ọkwa ahụ mgbe ntuli aka South Africa nke afọ 2009 gasịrị, ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchianya
Oge ya na Prague gwụrụ na Juun, na afọ 2013
A kọrọ na ọ gaghị achọ ọkwa onye ndu na South Africa, mana ọ ga-ekere òkè na ndụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ma bụrụ akụkụ nke 'agha nke echiche'

A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ ndị ọrụ ugbo Afrikaner na Viljoenskroon, Orange Free State, n'oge mmalite afọ 1960, Botha mere ka ndị ọrụ ugbe obodo kwenye iwe onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'ọrụ iji gboo mkpa nke ezinụlọ ndị isi ojii nọ n'ime ime obodo
O mekwara mkparịta ụka na Citrus Board maka enyemaka ọzọ n'oge oyi maka ndị ọrụ ugbo
N'ịbụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Parys High School, Botha gara n'ihu mezue otu afọ na New York site n'enyemaka nke agụmakwụkwọ
O mechara nweta nzere BA na akụ na ụba na Mahadum Stellenbosch
Ọ lụrụ onye ọrụ ugbo na onye bụbu onye omeiwu Andries Johannes Botha ma di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ ise na ụmụ ụmụ ise
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe alụmdi na nwunye ahụ gasịrị, Botha malitere nzere Sesotho na asụsụ na UNISA
Botha tinyekwara aka nke ukwuu n'ime ndị na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ya na Helen Zille, Botha bụ akụkụ nke Black Sash movement
O nweghị ihe jikọrọ ya na onye ọ bụla ọzọ (na-akwado ịkpa ókè agbụrụ) ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Bothas nke South Africa, gụnyere PW
Botha ma ọ bụ Pik Botha
A họpụtara Botha ka ọ bụrụ onye otu National Council of the Provinces maka Democratic Party na afọ 1999
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndú nke pati ahụ site na afo 2000 ruo na afọ 2004
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2007, ndị Democratic Alliance họpụtara Sandra Botha dị ka onye nnọchi anya ha na onye isi nke ndị mmegide
Botha nwetara ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bụbu minista NP, Tertius Delport
Tupu ọ pụọ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu na afọ 2009, Botha mara gọọmentị aka n'ọtụtụ okwu
Karịsịa, Botha kwuru okwu banyere enweghị afọ ojuju ya na-esote ihe ihere ebe ndị dọkịta ọcha anọ nọ na Western Cape kwagara mba ofesi
A na-ekwu na iwu ndị South Africa na-ese okwu gbochiri ha ịrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ gọọmentị, n'agbanyeghị ụkọ ndị dọkịta na ọtụtụ oghere na mpaghara ahụ
Onye isi ala n'oge ahụ bụ Thabo Mbeki gọnahụrụ na nke a bụ ikpe ma bara Botha mba maka ebubo siri ike megide ya dabere na otu akụkọ akwụkwọ akụkọ
Botha akpọwokwa maka nnukwu mgbanwe nke usoro agụmakwụkwọ

Sandra Sopụlụchukwu Ezekwesili bụ Nigerian Broadcast Journalist, nakwa Media PersonalityUgbu a ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka ihe nke a kpọrọ drive time ebe ọ na anọ agụpụta akụkọ nakwa ihe nriba ama megasịrị na Nigeria
Nke ọzọ bụkwa 'Hard Facts' n'ụlọ ọrụ Nigeria Info 993FM dị na Lagos, Nigeria
A mụrụ Sandra na Port Harcourt
Sandra bụ otu n'ime ụmụ atọ nne ya bụ Oriakụ Ngozi Ezekwesịlị mụrụ ma bụrụkwa otu nwa nwaanyị
Nna ya bụ Eze Stanley anwụọla
Ọ sitere na Nara-Unateze, Nkanu-East Local Government Area, nke di na Nigeria, Sandra biri mbido afọ asaa ya n'Enugwu ebe ọ nọrọ gụọ praimari na sekọndiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ NAOWA dị na Enugwu Steeti
E mechara ya na Ezinaụlọ ya kwagara Port Harcourt, ebe nna ya nọ n'afọ 1997'

Mgbe ọ nọ na Klasị nke atọ na primary school, Ọ bụ onye nkuzi ya lagoro ezumike ọrụ n'ihe gbasara ichụ nta akụkọ na- ịgụpụta akụkọ aha ya bụ Maazị Promise bụ onye izizi bidoro kuzibere ya ihe gbasara mgbasa ozi na ichụ nta akụkọ
N'ihi mmasi o nwere ebe ọ nọ, o bidiro ikuziri yadiction nakwa ọnọdụ ịgụpụta akụkọ nakwa otu esi ede ederede akwụkwọ akụkọ
N'agbanyeghị ọzuzụ niile a ,Sandra chọrọ ịbụ lawyer,n'ihi na ọ nwere ike bụrụ ihe ezinaụlọ ya chọrọ mana ọ gụrụ Mass Communication mgbe ọ na enwetaghị oghere ịgụ ọka ikpe na Mahadum ọ chọrọ
O mechara nwee mmasi n'ihe gbasara igụ maka achụm nta akụkọ

Oge ọ nọ na Mahadụm ,ndị nkuzi gbara abụba ọrụ,bụ nke notewere aka ọ chọpụtara na nwere oge na oghere, ọ wee gaa mee intern n'ụlọ ọrụ Enugwu State Broadcasting Service(ESBS) , Ọ bụ n'ụlọ ọrụ a ka anọ mata ya nke bụ na emere ya onye nchịkọ nakwa ọnye na-agụpụta ihe akụkọ
Ọ rụrụ nke ọma nke bụ na mgbe ndị nkuzi kwusịrị abụbọ ọrụ, onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gbara ya ka ọ laghachite azụ ma ọ gụchaa nweta digiri ya

Ka ọ gụchara ma nweta digiri ya n'ihe gbasara ịchụ nta na mgbasa akụkọ site n' Enugu State University of Science and Technology ọ gara rụọ n'onyonyo nke di na Katsina State na Northern Nigeria, tupu ọ laghachi na South bia rụọ Redio nke ndị Bayelsa nakwa ụlọ ọrụ Ray PowerFM di na Yenogoa
Ndị Cool FM di na Port Harcourt were ya ọrụ ọzigbo n'afọ 2013 ka ha gechara nyocha iwe ọrụ o ji ekwentị ya wee kwupụta
Ha kpọrọ ya ọrụ ozigbo ahụ
Ozigbo o bidoro ọrụ a, ọ bụrụ onye ama ama, o bidikwara nwetaba ihe onyinye n' afọ nke mbụ ọ rụrụ na CoolFM
A họpụtara ya maka ọnyinye di iche iche di ka ' Female On-Air Personality of the Year nke ndị otu Ohanaeze Ndị Igbo nyere ya n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 2014
Ndị 'Stefano Piotti Foundation nyekwara ya ihe onyinye ọzọ n'afọ 2015
Sandra si n'ụlọ CoolFM di na Port Harcourt pụọ wee ga n'ụlọ ọrụ ọzọ a kọrọ Nigeria Info 993FM n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 2018 mgbe ụlọ ọrụ a bidochara ọhụụ
N'ụlọ ọrụ a Sandra bụ onye nchịkọta ihe a kpọrọ 'Hard Facts' ana-ekwuputa nke a bido n;elekere atọ nke mgbede wee ruo elekere asaa nke abalị
Program a so bụ nke ise n'ime otu si agụpụta ndi kacha mee nke ọma
Sandra bụ otu onye ihazi ihe mmeme doro anya
Ọ haziela ọtụtụ ihe mmeme ma nke ọbere na nke nnukwu na Port Harcourt, ụfọdụ gụnyere 'Praise Jam mmeme egwu uka mgbe Kirismas a na-eme kwa afọ na Port Harcourt
Ọ bụkwa okwuru ọha , nke a pụtara ihe na 'TedxYouth talk n'afọ 2014
Site na mwakpo otu onye n'ime ihe mmeme 'Big Brother Nigeria wakporo otu n'ime mgbe ha na-ehi ụra , Sandra aghọlaa onye nkwado n'ihe gbasara nwoke na nwaanyi inwe nkwekọrịta tupu ha enwee mmekọrịta
Sandra Nashaat (amuru na Febụwarị 2, 1970) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Ijipt
Nashaat bụ Onye Kraịst Coptic
A mụrụ ya nye nne Lebanọn na nna Siria
Nashaat gara Cairo's Higher Film Institute nakwa Mahadum Cairo ebe ọ gụrụ French Literature
O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ogologo oge n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, nke niile bụ ihe ịga nke ọma na ụlọ ọrụ
Sandra Ndebele bụ onye egwu Zimbabwe, onye na-agba egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Sandra na Bulawayo n'abalị 3 nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1982
Ọ biri na mpaghara dị elu nke Tshabalala na Nkulumane
Ọ gakwara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Founders ọ bụ ezie na a zụlitere nkà egwu ya site na Inkululeko Yabatsha School of Arts, IYASA
Sandra malitere isonye na nka mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ma mesịa sonye n'òtù IYASA nke ya na ya gara ụwa
O mechara wepụta egwu 10 nke abọm ya n'onwe ya n'afọ 2003
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe omume dị iche iche ya na ndị omenkà ka Oliver Mtukudzi na Alick Macheso
Afọ 2003 bụkwa afọ ọ meriri 3 Awards na Zimbabwe Music Awards
Egwú ya dị elu mere ka ọtụtụ ndị mara ya ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ nwere nchegbu na ya na-ekwu na ịgba egwú ya na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ ma na-akpasu iwe
Ndị na-agụ egwú ya, Malaika na Mama bụ ndị ọkacha mmasị ya
Ọ gara n'ihu wepụta ọtụtụ egwu na abọm ndị ọzọ
Ọ gbanwere aha ya n'afọ 2019 wee chọọ ndị na-agba egwú ọhụrụ ka ha sonye n'òtù ya ka ọ na-akwadebe maka abọm ọhụrụ

Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ Ndebele esorowo ndị egwu dị iche iche rụkọọ ọrụ gụnyere Jah Prayzah na abụ ịhụnanya a na-akpọ Mushona neMuNdevere Ya na ndị dịka Ammara Brown, Sulumani Chimbetu na Somandla Ndebele rụkọkwara ọrụ
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, a kọrọ na Sandra Ndebele ga-eme ihe nkiri Netflix, The Bad Bishop nke a ga-eme na South Africa
Sandra lụrụ Nkanyiso Mbusi Sibindi onye ọ lụrụ n'afọ 2011 ma ha nwere ụmụ atọ
Sandra Nkaké (a mụrụ na 15 Nọvemba 1973) bụ onye France-Cameroonian na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu
A mụrụ Nkaké na Yaoundé, Cameroon n'afọ 1973
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ọ kwagara France
Nkaké nwere mmasị na egwu site na nwata, ọkachasị Prince onye ọ chọpụtara mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
Otú ọ dị, ọ chọrọ ịghọ onye nkuzi Bekee ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Paris na Sorbonne
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 20, ọ tụgharịrị uche ya n'ihe nkiri, na-anwale maka ọrụ ma ghọọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Nkaké mere nke mbụ ya na The Crucible n'afọ 1994, nke Thomas Ledouarec duziri
N'afọ sochirinụ, o nwere ọrụ na Le Dindon
Nkaké mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na Les Deux Papas et la Maman n'afọ 1996, nke Jean-Marc Longval duziri
Ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri TV sochiri, mana Nkaké nọgidere na-elekwasị anya n'ọrụ egwu ya
N'afọ 1996, o sonyere na ọrụ njem Ollano n'akụkụ Hélène Noguerra
N'ime afọ 2000, Nkaké na ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe, dịka Jacques Higelin, Daniel Yvinec na National Jazz Orchestra, Julien Lourau, na Rodolphe Burger rụkọtara ọrụ na studio na n'elu ikpo okwu
Ya na Gerald Toto na David Walters rụkọtara ọrụ maka ọrụ Urban Kreol
N'afọ 2008, Nkaké wepụtara abọm izizi ya Mansaadi, na-akwado ndekọ ahụ na ihe karịrị 200 concerts gburugburu ụwa, gụnyere njem nleta na Africa na Brazil
O dekọrọ otuto nye Donny Hathaway na Stéphane Belmondo's 2011 album Ever After N'afọ 2012, abọm nke abụọ ya Nothing for Granted pụtara, nke ya na onye mmekọ ya Ji Drû dere
E wepụtara abọm a na akara ndekọ Jazz Village
Olu Nkaké na-ekwupụta ihe mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama na French soul scene
Ọ natara ihe nrite Frank Ténot na mmemme Victoires du Jazz n'ọnwa July afọ 2012
Na Septemba 2017, ọ wepụtara abọm nke atọ ya Tangerine Moon Wishes, nke ọ weere dịka ihe ndekọ onwe ya kachasị
Kemgbe afọ 2007, ọ bi na Saint-Denis, Seine-Saint-Denis

Sandra Owusu-Ansah (amụrụ ya na 29 na onwa Jenụwarị na afọ 2000) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere ndị otu Serbian Women's Super League ZFK Spartak Subotica na ndị otu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Ghana
Ọ nọchitere anya Ghana na ọkwa U17 na iko mba ụwa abụọ na 2014 na 2016, na-eje ozi dị ka onyeisi na nke ikpeazụ mgbe ọ na-anọchite anya ha na ọkwa U20 na iko mba abụọ na afọ 2016 na afọ 2018
A mụrụ Owusu-Ansah na abalị iri abụo na iteolu, na onwa Jenụwarị na afọ 2000 na Kumasi, isi obodo nke Ashanti Region na Kofi Owusu Ansah na Madam Yaa Pokuaa
Ọ gara TI
Ahmadiyya Senior High School, Kumasi maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Owusu-Ansah malitere ọrụ ya na Fabulous Ladies nke Habiba Atta Forson guzobere

Ọ bụkwa onye otu Airtel Rising Stars (Ashanti Zone), a colt (nwatakịrị) football talent ịchụ nta nke Airtel malitere n'Africa nke chọrọ ịchọpụta na ịzụlite talented under 17 afọ nwoke na nwanyị na-agba bọọlụ ndị ga-agaghị aga n'amaghị ama na n'amaghi
Owusu-Ansah kwagara Zouk Mosbeh nke dị na Lebanọn na onwa Septemba na afọ 2017 na nkwekọrịta otu afọ
N'otu oge ya na Lebanọn, ọ meriri League, FA Cup na Super Cup na onye obodo ya bụ onye Ghana bụ Alice Kusi na-apụta dị ka onye kacha gbaa bọọlụ na league
Ọ merụrụ ahụ n'oge egwuregwu ikpeazụ nke league nke mere ka ọ ghara ịga 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations ma nọrọ n'èzí na touchline ruo ihe karịrị otu afọ
N'afọ 2020, ọ gara na klọb mbụ ya Ghana Women's Premier League nke Supreme Ladies na mgbalị iji mee ka ọrụ ya dịghachi ndụ mgbe ọ nwesịrị mmerụ ahụ ogologo oge
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onyeisi klọb n'oge 2020X21
N'ọnwa Eprel, ọ gbara goolu anọ n'egwuregwu league anọ ma họpụta ya maka NASCO GWPL Player of the Month maka Eprel
Na ngwụcha afọ 2020 rue na afọ 21, ọ gbara goolu iri na-emechi oge ahụ dị ka onye kacha gbaa goolu na klọb ahụ na onye nke atọ kacha gbaa gooli na league
A họpụtara ihe mgbaru ọsọ ya megide Kumasi Sports Academy maka ihe mgbaruzu nke oge ahụ na 2021 Ghana Football Awards
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2021, ndị mmeri Super League nke ụmụ nwanyị Serbia bụ ZFK Spartak Subotica kwupụtara na ha abanyela Owusu-Ansah na nkwekọrịta otu afọ tupu oge na afọ 2021
Ọ ga-esonyere onye obodo ya Alice Kusi onye sonyeere klọb ahụ
Owusu Ansah gbara bọọlụ maka Ghana na ọkwa niile malite na ọkwa U-17, Black Princesses
A kpọrọ aha ya na ndị otu maka 2014 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
Ọ gbara goolu abụọ otu megide South Korea na nke ọzọ megide Canada ka Ghana nọ n'elu otu ha iji ruo eru maka nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ
Otú ọ dị, Ịtali wepụrụ ha mgbe a na-emechi penalty

A kwalitere ya ozugbo na otu U-20, Black Maidens, ebe ọ gbara goolu anọ n'oge asọmpi 2015 African U-20 Women's World Cup Qualifying Tournament iji mechie dị ka onye kacha gbaa goolu ma nyere Ghana aka iru eru maka 2016 FIFA U-20 Women 's World Cup

N'afọ 2016, mgbe ọ ka ruru eru igwu egwu maka U17, na ahụmịhe mbụ ya, a kpọrọ aha ya dị ka onyeisi ndị otu ahụ, na-agba goolu abụọ African U-17 Women's World Cup Qualifying Tournament iji nyere Ghana aka inweta ọnọdụ na iko ụwa
O sonyere na 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup na Septemba 2016
Mgbe Japan meriri ya na 510 n'egwuregwu mbụ ha, ọ gbara bọọlụ abụọ sochirinụ megide United States na Paraguay iji nyere Ghana aka ịga n'ihu na nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ
Otú ọ dị, North Korea wepụrụ ha na nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ mgbe ha gbara goolu nkeji iri itoolu, na nkeji anọ nke oge ọzọ
A họpụtara ihe mgbaru ọsọ ya megide Paraguay maka ihe mgbaruaru ọsọ nke asọmpi FIFA
Ọnwa abụọ mgbe ọ ghọsịrị onye isi U17 na World Cup, n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2016, o sonyere na 2016 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
N'oge asọmpi ahụ, ọ gbara goolu megide France ma bụrụ onye a na-ekpe ikpe dịka onye egwuregwu nke egwuregwu ahụ, agbanyeghị, e wepụrụ Ghana na mpaghara otu
N'afọ 2018, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị isi na-eme ihe nkiri nke U20 tinyere Ernestina Abambila na Princella Adubea
Ọ gbara goolu abụọ, ebe Adubea gbara goolu iri n'oge asọmpi iru eru iji nyere Ghana aka mechie ebe ha maka na 2018 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2018, o mere ndị otu maka asọmpi ahụ, mana tupu mmalite nke asọmpi ahụ Adubea merụrụ ahụ
Na-enweghị onye ya na ya na-eme ihe, ya na ndị otu ya lụrụ ọgụ na asọmpi ahụ ma wepụ ha na mpaghara otu
O jisiri ike gbaa naanị otu goolu na asọmpi ahụ na mmeri Ghana na France
Na ngwụcha asọmpi ahụ, o gosipụtara ihe isi ike na egwuregwu ha n'ihi enweghị Adubea

N'ọnwa Machị, na afọ 2017, a kpọrọ oku site n'aka ọha na eze ka a tinye ya na ndị otu okenye, mana onye isi nchịkwa nke otu ahụ bụ Yusif Basigi kwuru na ọ dị mkpa maka ezigbo mgbanwe nke ịkwalite n'ime ndị otu okenye
N'ọnwa Ọktoba, na afọ 2018, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa bụrụ onye otu mba Ghana n'afọ 2018 n'ihu na afọ 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations, na Ghana dị ka mba na-anabata ya
A chụpụrụ ya na asọmpi ahụ mgbe ọ na-agbake site na mmerụ ahụ ọ họọrọ mgbe ọ na'egwuri egwu maka Zouk Mosbeh na egwuregwu ikpeazụ nke Lebanese League
N'agbanyeghị na ọ sonyeere ndị otu ahụ maka egwuregwu abụọ na-akwadebe megide Zambia na Kenya, ọ gbakere ma ghara ịbanye na ndị otu ikpeazụ
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2020, n'egwuregwu ya na Morocco, ọ gbara bọọlụ n'ime nkeji anọ iji nweta mmeri 2 maka Ghana
Spartak Subotica
Onye ọ bụla

Sandra Prinsloo (a mụrụ na 15 Septemba 1947), nke a makwaara dịka Sandra Prinzlow, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa nke a maara nke ọma na mba ụwa maka ọrụ ya dịka Kate Thompson na ihe nkiri afọ 1980 The Gods Must Be Crazy
Prinsloo apụtawokwa n'ọtụtụ telivishọn, ihe nkiri, na ihe nkiri South Africa
Prinsloo ekwuola na ọ tụghị anya ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
'Abụ m onye na-agba egwú ballet site na nwata ma echeta m na m na-eme ihe nkiri Breytenbach na Pretoria mgbe ụfọdụ mgbe m nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Nke ahụ bụ oge mbụ m zutere ndị ọkachamara na-eme ihe nkiri, mana echetụbeghị m na m ga-abụ onye na-eme egwuregwu
Echere m na enwere m ihere n'oge ahụ na m enweghị ike iche na m nwere ike ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ya mere, ọ dịghị ka m nwere nnukwu ọchịchọ ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ bụghị ma ọlị
Ahọrọ m ndụ agụmakwụkwọ, n'otu ụzọ
Mgbe m gara mahadum, echere m na nke ahụ ga-abụ ihe m ga-eme'
Prinsloo gụrụ akwụkwọ na Afrikaanse Hoër Meisieskool wee mechaa nzere BA
ya na ihe nkiri na Mahadum Pretoria
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ ghọrọ onye otu ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ihe nkiri nke Performing Arts Council Transvaal
'Otu abalị anyị na-eme ihe ma ọ dịka a ga-asị na ihe anwansi mere
Ọ dịka a ga-asị na a tụbara ụgbụ ọla edo
Ihe niile bụ anwansi n'uhuruchi ahụ na onye ọ bụla nwere mmetụta ya n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ nke na-eme na mgbanwe nke ike n'etiti ndị na-ege ntị na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Prinsloo kwuru na mgbe abalị ahụ gasịrị, ọ ghọtara na ime ihe nkiri bụ ọrụ ya

Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya a ma ama na The Gods Must Be Crazy, Prinsloo enweela ọrụ dị mkpa na Target of an Assassin (1979), Quest for Love (1988), Die Prins van Pretoria (1992), Soweto Green (1995), 'n Paw Paw Vir My Darling (2015), Twee Grade van Moord (2016)
Prinsloo nọ na ndị mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri nke Egoli Place of Gold, ihe nkiri ncha mbụ nke South Africa
Ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi okwu nke ya, RaakPraat zutere Sandra, na telivishọn South Africa
Ọ na-edekwa usoro ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ndị mmadụ na ndị ama ama maka South African TV, Sandra Op 'n Drafstap

Prinsloo emeela ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn na ihe nkiri South Africa n'oge ọrụ ya, gụnyere Erfsondes (2012); Hartland (2011); Known Gods (2005); Saints, Sinners, and Settlers (1999); na Konings (1991) n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Prinsloo emeela ihe karịrị 100 mmepụta dị iche iche, na-abụkarị onye isi na ọrụ ndị South Africa na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri mba ụwa
N'afọ 1985, Prinsloo na onye na-eme ihe nkiri ibe ya bụ John Kani mere ka ndị na-ege ntị South Africa pụọ mgbe ha na-eme egwuregwu Miss Julie nke August Strindberg
N'ime ọrụ aha, Prinsloo gosipụtara nwanyị ọcha na-eduhie nwoke ojii
Onye na-emepụta egwuregwu ahụ, Bobby Heaney, kwuru na ọpụpụ ahụ bụ 'akụkụ nke mkpọsa a haziri nke ọma site n'aka ndị ọcha na-achọghị mgbanwe'
A ghaghị ịkpọrọ Kani na Prinsloo gaa n'ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala mgbe ọ bụla Miss Julie gosipụtara, ebe egwu na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ga-abụ ndị 'ndị na-ewe iwe' ga-awakpo
A kọrọ na Prinsloo natara ozi ịkpọasị rụrụ arụ ma ha abụọ natara iyi egwu ọnwụ

Mgbe a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ n'afọ 2014 maka 21 Icons Project, usoro ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi banyere ndị South Africa 'ndị kpụrụ ụwa gbara ha gburugburu', Prinsloo kwuru na Echere m na [egwuregwu ahụ] ga-akpata ọgba aghara, mana echeghị m na ọ ga-akpatara obere mgbanwe
Ndị mmadụ nwere obere uche ma echere m na ị bi na obere paradaịs mgbe ị bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2013, Prinsloo natara onyinye ACT Lifetime Achievement Award maka ihe nkiri

A na-enye onyinye ndị a kwa afọ site na Arts and Culture Trust (ACT) nke South Africa iji 'asọpụrụ ndị ọkachamara nka ndị ọrụ ha pụrụ iche nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na nke na-adịgide adịgide na nka, ọdịbendị na ihe nketa, na ihe ndị ha rụzuru na ndụ nyere aka nke ukwuu n'ịbawanye ndụ ọdịbendị nke South Africa'
N'afọ 2014, Prinsloo bụ onye natara iwu mba site n'aka gọọmentị South Africa, Order of Ikhamanga na ọlaọcha, maka ndị ọrụ ha pụtara ìhè baara South Africa uru
A na-enye iwu mba n'ụbọchị nnwere onwe nke South Africa
Iwu ndị ahụ na-eme emume mmeri mmadụ n'akụkụ dị iche iche, na-asọpụrụ ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị ndị hapụrụ akara ụkwụ doro anya na ọgụ maka nnwere onwe na iwulite South Africa ka mma
N'afọ 2018, Prinsloo bụ onye natara Lifetime Achievement Award site na Naledi Theatre Awards
Naledi Theatre Awards Committee na-enye onyinye ndị a kwa afọ
Prinsloo debara aha ya na Afrikaanse Hoër Meisieskool
O nwere nzere BA
(Honours) na Mahadum Pretoria
Sandra Suubi (amụrụ n'afọ 1990) bụ onye na-agụ egwú gospel na onye na-ese ihe nkiri na Uganda
A mụrụ Suubi na Kampala, Uganda na afọ 1990
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Greenhill Academy na agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Gayaza High School, ma na Kampala
Ọ gara Mahadum Makerere ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na Fine Arts site na Margaret Trowell School of Industrial and Fine Art
Na Jenụwarị, na afọ 2018, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'otu Mahadum ahụ na nzere masta na Fine Arts
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Suubi so n'òtù ukwe ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwú na afọ 2011 mgbe ọ sonyeere otu ụmụ agbọghọ a na-akpọ Xabu n'okpuru nduzi nke First Love
Ya na otu ahụ, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ihe omume dị iche iche mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum
N'afọ 2015, otu ahụ kewara, ya mere ọ sonyeere asọmpi Airtel Trace Music wee merie
Ọ gara n'ihu na-anọchite anya Uganda na mpaghara East Africa na ọkwa mba ụwa nke asọmpi ahụ
O weputara abọm izizi ya na afo 2016 nke gosipụtara egwu abụọ, Togwamu Suubi na Nsiimye
Egwú ya, Togwamu Subi gosipụtara dị ka egwu egwu maka ihe nkiri Veronica10 Wish na afọ 2018
O weputara abọm nke abuo ya na afo 2018 na abọm a gosipụtara egwu dika Onjagande nyo, Kingdom come, Heaven na Jangu Tuzine
Ewezuga egwu, Suubi na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe na gburugburu ebe obibi
Ọ na-emegharị ihe mkpofu plastik iji mepụta nrụnye, ihe ndị na-ada n'azụ ihe nkiri, ọla na ihe ịchọ mma ụlọ
Ọrụ nka ya egosila na mmemme nka Kampala dị iche iche dị ka Bayimba na afọ 2013 back drop, laba na afọ 2014 Headphones, Bodaboda Helmet na echiche nke nnụnụ n'oge nka Kampala
Sandra Thomas bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri bụrụ nkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri na laa obodo lndia
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na Amen na Zachariayude Garbhinikal, dịka onye na-emepụta Zachariayudes Garbhinical na Philips na Monkey Pen

Sandra, ya na onye na-emepụta Vijay Babu guzobere ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe nkiri ubochi Friday Film House, mana ya na Vijay Babu nwere esemokwu wee pụọ na Friday Film House wee malite ụlọ ọrụ nke ya mmepụta ihe nke ya aha ya bụ Sandra Thomas Productions
Ọ lụrụ nwoke a na apụ Wilson John Thomas na afo Julaị 2016, di na nwunye ahu ụ tàrà ụmụ ejima na afo 2018
Ọ bụ eze okwu na e guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mgbe a tọhapụrụ Friday, a na-ewere ihe nkiri ahụ dị ka ọrụ mmepụta mbụ nke Friday Film House
Na afo Jenụwarị 3, 2017, ndị guzobere ya nwere esemokwu n'ọfịs ha mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị Sandra gbara Vijay Babu akwụkwọ
Ha abụọ mechara kwuo na ọ bụ nghọtahie nakwa na Sandra ewepụla onwe ya n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya aha ya bụ Sandra Thomas Productions
Sandra le Grange (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1993) bụ nwanyị South Africa na-egwu badminton
N'afọ 2013, o ritere ọla nchara na African Badminton Championship na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ya na onye ọlụlụ ya bụ Elme de Villiers

Adjoua Sandrine Kouadio (amụrụ na 22 Machị 1996), nke a maara dị ka Sandrine Kouadi, bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na Ivorian nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu ma ọ bụ onye na'akụkụ abụọ maka ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Ivory Coast
Kouadio gbara Ivory Coast na ọkwa dị elu n'oge 2019 WAFU Zone B Women's Cup
Sandra “Sandy” Carter bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego America, ọkà okwu na onye ode akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ onye isi njikwa na IBM site na 2013 ruo 2016, osote onye isi oche na Amazon Web Services site na 2017 ruo 2021 ma bụrụkwa onye isi VP nke mmepe azụmaahịa na ngalaba Unstoppable
Carter nwere nzere bachelọ sayensị na sayensị kọmputa na Mahadum Duke yana MBA sitere na Harvard Business School
Ọ maara asụsụ mmemme asatọ nke ọma

Ọ bụ onye dere akwụkwọ ise, gụnyere 'The New Language of Business SOA & Web 20', nke meriri Platinum MarCom Award na 2008, na 'Asụsụ Ọhụrụ nke ire ahịa 20 Social Media', nke meriri Silver oriri ahịa Sherpa award
n'afọ 2009

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke bọọdụ maka nzukọ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ Girls in Tech yana maka òtù na-abụghị nke gọọmentị WITI ( Women in Technology International ) na onye ọkachamara na- akwado Carnegie Mellon Silicon Valley
Carter bụkwa onye nchoputa na onye isi na Silicon-Blitz ma nyere ọtụtụ ndị na-amalite na ụlọ ọrụ aka na nkà na ụzụ, dị iche iche echiche na ihe ọhụrụ
Sandra bụ onye so na bọọdụ ndụmọdụ nke Community Internet of Things Community ugbu a

360Fashion Network kere obere akpa chaja ikuku na-acha odo odo nke Anina Net mere, wee kpọọ ya 'The Sandy' mgbe Carter, otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị na-eduga na teknụzụ, nke a na-egosipụta na Museum of Science and Industry Chicago 's ' Ihe ngosi Wired to Wear' na ọrịre na ụlọ ahịa ihe ngosi nka MSI

Carter edeela akwụkwọ anọ 'Asụsụ Ọhụrụ nke Azụmahịa SOA & Web 20', bụ onye meriri Platinum MarCom Award na 2008, yana “Asụsụ Ọhụrụ nke Marketing 20 Social Media”, nke meriri nturu ugo Sherpa Silver Marketing na 2009
'Nwee obi ike' na 2011, na 'Nnukwu ihe ọhụrụ 3 Superpowers for Purpose and Profit' ewepụtara na 2017

Sanell Aggenbach (amụrụ n'afọ 1975) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Woodstock, Cape Town N'iji ihe osise, obibi akwụkwọ, na ihe ọkpụkpụ, ọrụ ya na-ekwu maka mmekọrịta dị n'etiti akụkọ ihe mere eme na akụkọ onwe ya, na mmetụta nke mgbagwoju anya

Ọrụ ya na-enyocha usoro nke nostalgia na akụkọ ifo akụkọ ihe mere eme, na-ejikarị ihe na-atọ ọchị, nke na-emebi ihe, na nke na-enweghị isi iji dọta onye na-ekiri ya na mkparịta ụka banyere isiokwu ndị gbara ọchịchịrị
O nwere ụdị pụrụ iche nke ijikọta usoro eserese ọdịnala na ihe ọkpụkpụ, yana ọrụ aka ụmụ nwanyị dịka ịkwa akwa na tapestry
Aggenbach gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Stellenbosch na 1997 ma nweta nzere bachelọ na Fine Arts
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe oge niile ugbu a, Aggenbach bụ onye nkuzi site na June 2000 na March 2004 na Cape College na Graphic Processes, Two-Dimensional Design and Drawing
A na-anọchite anya ọrụ ya na Spier Collection, Anglo Gold South Africa, Sasol Art Museum, Sasol Collection, na Hollard Collection
Usoro afọ 2011 nke mbiputa otu udi nke na-ekwu maka ihe oyiyi na abọm ndị sitere na akụkọ egwu rock
Site na mbipụta ndị a, Aggenbach na-enye nkatọ nke njirimara African er, na-elekwasị anya na ọgbọ nke ndị egwu post-punk kpaliri
Ihe ngosi 2009 na Gallery AOP sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ site na njem gaa n'ụlọ Elvis na Memphis, Tennessee, na-enyocha ihe ọ pụtara ịbụ Afrikaans
Otu ọrụ nke afọ 2008 na-arutu aka na ihe nkiri foto a na-emebi emebi, nke na-eme ka ọdịiche dị n'etiti izi ezi nke foto na ọdịdị na-ezighị ezi ma ọ bụ nke na-eduhie eduhie nke eserese
Asụsụ Sanga nwere ike ibu dika
Sangah bụ nri e jikwazi ọka, akwụkwọ cassava, ya na mmiri nkwụ were mee na nri nke ndi Cameroon
A na-agbakọta akwụkwọ ya ma ngwakọta ahụ e siri esi na-aghọ nnukwu nri
A na-ejikarị osikapa maọbụ plantain esi na ya

Ememme Sango bụ mmemme a na-eme kwa afọ n'etiti ndị Yoruba iji kwanyere “Sango”, chi égbè eluigwe na ọkụ bụ dike na eze nke atọ nke alaeze Oyo ka ọ nọchiri Ajaka nwanne ya nwoke
Gọọmenti Oyo steeti ahagharịrị aha ya n'afọ 2013 gaa World Sango Festival, bụ nke a na-emekarị n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'ụlọ eze Alaafin nke Oyo ma bụrụkwa nke a na-eme na mba karịrị iri anọ n'ụwa niile
Sangweni o bụ aha nna Afrịka nke nwere ike ịpụta

Sani Zangon Daura bụ Minista Naijiria nke Ọrụ Ugbo na Mmepe Ime Obodo ma mesịa bụrụ Minista nke Gburugburu Ebe Obibi na kọmitii nke Onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo
A chụpụrụ ya n'ọchịchị Obasanjo n'ọkwa n'ụbọchị iri atọ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2001
Sani Zangon Daura sitere na mpaghara Daura Senatorial nke Katsina Steeti
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na School for Arabic Studies na Kano
E nyere ya agụmakwụkwọ ka ọ gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ maka African and Oriental Studies, London n'afọ 1961, mana ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa tupu ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ ahụ ma nabata ya na Mahadum Lagos
N'oge Republic nke Abụọ nke Naịjirịa n'afọ 1979, ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa na National Party of Nigeria (NPN) iji gbaa ọsọ maka Gọvanọ nke Kaduna Steeti, mana Alhaji Lawal Kaita meriri ya
Kaita n'aka nke ya meriri ntuli aka ahụ n'aka onye otu People's Redemption Party (PRP) Alhaji Abdulkadir Balarabe Musa
N'ịbụ onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta Ọrụ Ugbo na Jụn 1999, Daura wepụtara iwu maka ngalaba ahụ nke na-aza ajụjụ n'oge ahụ maka pasenti iri atọ na asatọ nke GDP
Ihe ndị dị na ya gụnyere ịbawanye mmepụta na mmepụta ihe, mmelite teknụzụ agro, belata ịda ogbenye, mmepe ụlọ ọrụ agro, nkwalite mbupụ na nchedo gburugburu ebe obibi
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2000, ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Naịjirịa na UN Framework Convention on Climate Change nke emere na Netherlands
Daura bụ onye isi oche nke Group of 77 (G77), otu mba one hundred and thirty three na-emepe emepe na China
N'okwu dị mkpa na nzukọ ahụ, ọ dọrọ aka ná ntị na mba ndị dara ogbenye agaghị egbochi ikuku gas ha ma ọ bụrụ na mba ndị bara ọgaranya mezuru nkwa nke ha n'okpuru Kyoto Protocol
Daura kwuru na US kpatara 'ihe otiti nke mgbanwe ihu igwe' dị ka ihe na-emerụ ahụ dị ka ọchịchị nke Afrịka
Nzukọ ahụ enwetaghị nsonaazụ ọ bụla
Daura ghọrọ onye otu ndị nlekọta nke Arewa Consultative Forum (ACF), otu ndị Northern lobby nwere mmetụta
N'ọnwa Maachị afọ 2006, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi ACF na-emegide ikwe ka onye isi ala Obasanjo gbaa ọsọ maka oge nke atọ n'afọ 2007
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2008, Daura natara onyinye Commander of the Order of the Niger (CON)
Sani Haruna Kaita (amụrụ n'ụbọchị abụọ nke ọnwa Mee afọ 1986) bụ onye Naijiria bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ bụ onye gbara egwu dị ka onye mgbachite eititi
A mụrụ Kaita na Kano, Nigeria
Ọ sonyeere Sparta Rotterdam na oge 2005–06 site na Kano Pillars FC
Kaita kwagara AS Monaco FC n'ọnwa Septemba 2008
Kaita hapụrụ Monaco n'ụbọchị iri n'atọ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị 2009 wee sonye FC Kuban Krasnodar na mbinye ruo ụbọchị iri atọ n'otu nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 2009
N'ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2009, Lokomotiv Moscow bịanyere aka na onye egwuregwu etiti Naijiria na mbinye site na Monaco ruo ọnwa Disemba
N'ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2010 Alania Vladikavkaz bịanyere aka na onye egwuregwu etiti na mbinye
Na'ụbọchị iri atọ na otu nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2010 FC Metalist Kharkiv bịanyere aka na Kaita na mbinye
N'ụbọchị ikpeazụ nke windo mbufe oge oyi nke afọ 2011, Kaita kwagara n'akụkụ Greek Superleague Iraklis na nkwekọrịta mbinye ọnwa isii
N'ọnwa April afọ 2014, Kaita laghachiri ọzụzụ na Nigeria na Enyimba FC O mere mpụta mbụ ya megide Sharks FC n'ụbọchị asa nke ọnwa mee wee jiri mbinye ọnwa atọ na akụkụ Aba
Nbinye ego a bụ akụkụ nke ebumnuche ndị otu Njikọ njikwa maka ndị ọkachamara dabere na mba ofesi
Ọ bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ maka Ifeanyi Ubah na Nigeria premier league maka oge 2015, mana ọ gbara naanị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ
Na 2016, o sonyeere otu ụlọ ọrụ Finnish, JS Hercules, bụ nke onye nchịkwa mbụ ya bụ Daniel Amokachi
Maka oge afọ 2017, Kaita bịanyere aka na Veikkausliiga otu RoPS
O mere mpụta mbụ ya maka otu ahụ na ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2017 na mmeri Iko Suomen 3–0 megide HauPa

O nyere ihe mgbaru ọsọ mbụ ya n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Eprel megide Ilves Tampere na nkeji iri asaa na Itoolu, mgbe e butere ya nkeji atọ tupu mgbe ahụ maka mmerụ ahụ nke onye isi otu Antti Okkonen
Na njedebe nke afọ ahụ, a tọhapụrụ ya mgbe ọ gosipụtara kwa mgbe kwa mgbe na ọkara nke abụọ nke oge
Mgbe oge ahụ gasịrị, a na-akpọ nbinye aka ya n'ihu ọha ọnụ ahịa na-adịghị mma site n'aka onyeisi oche klọb Risto Niva
Kaita bara anya Sparta mgbe ọ na-egwu egwuregwu asaa niile n'erubeghi afọ iri abụọ Nigeria na Iko mba ụwa nke FIA kwagidere n'afọ 2005 na Netherlands

Ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị otu egwuregwu mba Nigeria nke mere mpụta mbụ ya na mmeri 3–0 enyi na enyi megide Romania n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2005 A chụpụrụ Kaita n'asọmpi megide Gris n'ụbọchị iri asaa nke ọnwa June nke afọ 2010, na egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ụwa nke abụọ nke 2010 maka Vasilis Torosidis Nke a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye Naịjirịa mbụ agbapụrụ n'ọpụpụ n'asọmpi iko mba ụwa
Gris gara n'ihu nye goolu mbụ ha na iko mba ụwa, wee merie egwuregwu mbụ ha na Iko Mbaụwa
