A mụrụ Sarah Johnson na Cape Town, ma biri ebe ahụ ndụ ya niile
Ọ dechara MA ya na Creative Writing na Mahadum Cape Town, ma bipụta ọrụ mbụ ya, nchịkọta uri, n'afọ 2004
Stephen Watson kọwara Personae dị ka 'otu n'ime mpịakọta mpụta mbụ kacha mma n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya'
Sarah Kachingwe (née Chavunduka; na afọ 1936[[2012) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-eme ihe ike na Zimbabwe
Ọ bụ nwanyị ojii mbụ debanyere aha na Mahadum College of Rhodesia na afọ 1957
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ odeakwụkwọ maka ozi, ozi na nkwukọrịta ma na-eje ozi na bọọdụ Zimpapers na Forestry Commission
A mụrụ Kachingwe na Rusape, Zimbabwe, na 1936
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Goromonzi
N'afọ 1957, ọ debara aha ya na Mahadum College of Rhodesia, wee bụrụ nwanyị ojii mbụ mere ya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ nke nka na Bekee na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Kachingwe nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya na Greendale, Harare, na afọ 2012 site na nsogbu ndị metụtara ọrịa obi
Ndị bịara olili ozu ya, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, osote praịm minista Prọfesọ Arthur Mutambara na onye nnọchi anya Malawi na Zimbabwe Dr Richard Mpoya
E liri ya na Harare's Greendale Cemetery
N'ememe olili ozu ya, osote praịm minista Arthur Mutambara nyere di Kachingwe ọkọlọtọ Zimbabwe iji gosipụta ọnọdụ ya dị ka 'onye dike agha nnwere onwe'
Sarah K crowd bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista Steeti maka ndị agadi na ndị nwere nkwarụ na 24 Julaị 2020
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ bụ osote Lord Mayor nke obodo Kampala, Uganda, isi obodo na mpaghara kachasị ukwuu na mba ahụ
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 16 June 2016
Mgbe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka osote Lord Mayor, ọ nọchitere anya Makindye East na Kampala Capital City Authority Council
K Hansen gara Kibuli Secondary School, tupu ọ banye na Mahadum Makerere, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Education
Ọ bụ onye Alakụba ma na-eyi uwe Alakụba
N'oge oge ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke afọ 2011 ruo 2016, Sarah K Gameu jere ozi dị ka onye na-enyere Lord Mayor Erias Lukwago aka
Ọ nọchitekwara anya Makindye East na Kansụl KCCA site na 2011 ruo 2016
N'oge gara aga, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kansụl maka Makindye East mgbe John Ssebaana Kizito bụ onye isi obodo, n'etiti afọ 1998 na 2006
O nwetala asọmpi na-enweghị isi maka oche ndị omeiwu Makindye East
Na June puku abụọ na iri abụọ , Onye isi ala Yoweri Museveni họpụtara Sarah K Gameu dị ka onye nduzi nke okike na KCCA
Erias Lukwago, Kampala Lord Mayor nyere ya ụbọchị atọ iji mee mkpebi ya; ma ọ bụ were nhọpụta steeti ma ọ bụ nọrọ dị ka Deputy Lord Mayor
K Hansen họọrọ ịhapụ ọrụ dị ka osote Lord Mayor na Lukwago họpụtara Doreen Nyanjura dị ka onye nọchiri ya
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ , onye isi ala ahụ nyere ntụziaka ka a họpụta Khandị n'ọkwa Minista nke Ndị Agadi na Ndị Nwere Nkwarụ, nke tọgbọ chakoo
Ndị a pụrụ ịdabere na ya kpughekwara na maka otu onye ịghọ onye nduzi na Kampala Capital City Authority, mmadụ ga-enwerịrị nzere Master
K Hansen nwere naanị nzere bachelọ
Nzukọ omebe iwu nke Uganda nyochara nhọpụta ya na kansụl
Sarah Kayagi Netalisile bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye otu ndị omeiwu
A họpụtara ya n'ọfịs dị ka nwanyị Member iji nọchite anya mpaghara Namisindwa nke dị n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Uganda n'oge ntuli aka nke 2021 Uganda
Ọ bụ onye otu National Resistance Movement na-achị

Sarah Kiyingi Musoke (amụrụ na Eprel 16, 1960) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, onye bụbu Minista nke Interior Affairs na onye bụbu onye nnọchi anya nwanyị nke Rakai District kemgbe Nzukọ nke Isii nke Uganda n'etiti 1996 na 2016
A mụrụ Sarah na David Livingstone (nna) si Rakai District
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Bwanda tupu ọ banye ụlọ akwụkwọ praemmarị Kalagala
Ọ sonyeere St Catherine Girls School (nke bụ Dr
Obote College ugbu a), Kyebambe Girls na Mahadum Makerere ebe ọ nwetara Bachelors na Sociology & Religious Studies
Ọ sonyeere Mahadum nke Nairobi maka Masters ya na Religious Studies

Mgbe ọ batara n'ụlọ omebe iwu n'afọ 1996, ọ ghọrọ osote onyeisi oche na kọmitii na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ, n'oge Yoweri Museveni họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ minista na-ahụkarị maka ihe gbasara ime obodo n'etiti afọ 1999 ruo afọ 2003
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Ndị omeiwu na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ
Ọ butere ụzọ ma malite usoro iji katọọ Maazị Kirunda Kivejinja onye bụ minista na-ahụ maka njem na nkwukọrịta n'oge ahụ na ebubo nke ijikwaghị ọtụtụ puku lita mmanụ ụgbọala
Nke a bụ n'oge Ms Kiyingio nke mbụ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu

Sarah Kiyingi, Eriya Kategaya, Bidandi Ssali, Miria Matembe na Namusoke ebe Yoweri Museveni chụpụrụ ha n'ọkwa Cabinet / Ministers na otu n'ime ihe kpatara ya ji chụpụ ha bụ na ha megidere ọnọdụ nke National Resistance Movement na oge nke atọ
E kwukwara na ndị a agaala atụmatụ Yoweri Meseveni maka mmezigharị iwu mba maka njedebe oge
N'ọnwa Eprel 2021, a na-ekwu na Musoke malitekwara mkpesa n'ịntanetị nke ebumnuche ya bụ ịma aka maka ịnye ndị omeiwu ijeri Shillings iri, iji lụso mgbasa nke Coronavirus ọgụ
Gọọmentị Obodo Rakai
Sarah Knowles Bolton (September 15, 1841 - February 21, 1916) bụ onye edemede America
A mụrụ ya na Farmington, Connecticut
N'afọ 1866, ọ lụrụ Charles E
Bolton, onye ahịa na onye ọrụ ebere
O dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ maka ndị nta akụkọ, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị odeakwụkwọ mbụ nke Women's National Temperance Union, ọ bụkwa onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Boston Congregationalist (1878-81)
Bolton gara njem afọ abụọ na Europe, na-amụ gbasara ịkekọrịta uru, agụmakwụkwọ dị elu nke ụmụ nwanyị, na ajụjụ ndị ọzọ gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ihe odide ya gbara ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ ume imeziwanye ụwa banyere ha site na okwukwe na ịrụsi ọrụ ike
A mụrụ Sarah Knowles na Farmington, Connecticut, na Septemba 15, 1841, nne na nna ya bụ John Segar Knowles na Mary Elizabeth Miller Knowles
John sitere na Henry Knowles, onye si London, England kwaga Portsmouth, Rhode Island, na 1665
Nne nne ya, Mary Carpenter, sitere na Elizabeth Jenckes, nwanne nwanyị Joseph Jenckes، Gọvanọ nke Rhode Island

Ndị nna nna ya gụnyere Nathaniel Stanley, nke Hartford, Connecticut, Lieutenant Colonel nke First Regiment na 1739; Assistant Treasurer, 1725-49; Treasurer، 1749-55, na site na Colonel William Pynchon, otu n'ime ndị 26 na-etinye Massachusetts Bay Colony, na onye guzobere Springfield, Massachusetts
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, ọ ghọrọ onye otu ezinụlọ nwanne nna ya, Colonel H
Miller, onye ọka iwu nke Hartford, onye ọbá akwụkwọ ya buru ibu bụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ, ụlọ ya bụkwa ebe ndị hụrụ agụmakwụkwọ na mmezi n'anya
Nwanne nne ya bụ onye na-agụ akwụkwọ nke ọma, na-atọ ụtọ ma na-ewu ewu na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
N'ebe ahụ, nwa agbọghọ ahụ zutere Harriet Beecher Stowe, Lydia H
Sigourney, na ndị ọzọ dị ka ha, ndị ndụ ha bụ ihe na-akpali ya mgbe niile
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, o bipụtara obere mpịakọta, Orlean Lamar and Other Poems (New York City, 1863), akwụkwọ akụkọ New England nabatara usoro
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ lụrụ Charles E
Bolton, onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Amherst College, ha wee kwaga Cleveland, Ohio
Ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ mbụ nke Women's Christian Association nke obodo ahụ, na-eji ọtụtụ oge ya na-eleta ndị ogbenye
Mgbe, na 1874, agha nnwere onwe malitere na Hillsborough, Ohio, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ malitere ọrụ ahụ ma nyere ya aka na okwu na edemede

N'oge na-adịghị anya, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote odeakwụkwọ nke National Woman's Christian Temperance Union, n'ihi ya, Frances Willard kwuru, sị, 'Ọ debere isiokwu, paragraf na ihe ndị na-eme ka ọha na eze mara, nke mere ihe iji setịpụ usoro ọhụrụ anyị n'ihu ndị mmadụ karịa ka otu ụlọ ọrụ ọ bụla ruru n'oge ahụ'
Na arịrịọ nke ụmụ nwanyị na-adịghị akwụ ụgwọ nke mba ahụ
Bolton kwadebere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke agha ntụli aka maka Centennial temperance volume, na nke ọrụ Cleveland maka Annie Turner Wittenmyer's History of the Women's Temperance Crusade
N'oge ahụ, o bipụtara akụkọ ya nke akpọrọ 'The Present Problem' (New York, 1874)
A kpọrọ ya na Boston ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị nchịkọta akụkọ nke Congregationalist, ọ gosipụtara onwe ya dị ka onye nta akụkọ nwere ike
Bolton nọrọ afọ abụọ na mba ọzọ, n'akụkụ ụfọdụ na njem na n'akụkụ ọzọ na ọmụmụ ihe, nke ahụ bụ nleta nke abụọ ya na Europe

O mere nnyocha pụrụ iche banyere agụmakwụkwọ dị elu nke ụmụ nwanyị na mahadum Cambridge, Oxford, na ebe ndị ọzọ, na-akwadebe maka magazin ọtụtụ isiokwu na isiokwu ahụ, yana ọrụ ebere na ọgụgụ isi nke ụmụ nwanyị, yana ihe a na-eme maka enyemaka uche na omume nke ndị ọrụ ha, na-agụ akwụkwọ banyere isiokwu ahụ na nzukọ nke American Social Science Association nke e nwere na Saratoga Springs na 1883
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ Bolton bipụtara bụ, How Success is Won (Boston, 1884); Lives of Poor Bon's who Became Famous (New York, iSSsi; Girls who Becamed Famous) (New York
1886); Stories from Life (New York; Social Studies in England (Boston
18861; From Heart and Nature, Poems (New York)
1887); Famous American States (New York City, 1891); Famouses, Women's (New York) (Nework)
E bipụtaghachiri ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ ndị a n'England
N'agbata afọ 1863 na 1902, Bolton dere ọtụtụ uri, akwụkwọ ụmụaka na akụkọ ndụ, gụnyere
Korean Lamar and others poems (new York 1863)
The present problem a novellete (1874)
How success is won (Boston 1884)
Lives of poor boys who became famous (New York 1885)
Lives of girls who became famous (1886)
Social studies in England (Boston 1886)
Stories from life (New York 1886)
Famous European artists (New York 1890)
Famous voyages and explorers (New York 1893)
Famous leaders among men (New York 1894)
The inevitable and other poems (New York 1895)
Sarah Ladipo Manyika (a mụrụ ya na Maachị 7 1968) ọ bụ onye Britain-Nigeria, odee akwụkwọ iduaazị, nkenke akụkọ na edemede
Ọ bụ ya dere akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ ama ama bụ In Dependence Like a Mule Bringing Ice Cream To The Sun (2016), ma nwee ọrụ ya ndị ebipụtara n'akwụkwọ mbipụta gụnyere Granta, Transition, Guernica, na OZY
O jeela ozi dịka onye malitere nnyocha akwụkwọ nke OZY
Ọrụ Manyika gbakwara na 2019 anthology New Daughters of Africa
Sarah Manyika bụ onye a mụrụ ma zụlite na Nigeria
O biekwala na Kenya, France, Zimbabwe, na Britain
Nna ya bụ onye Naijiria ebe nne ya bụ onye Britain
Manyika nwetara aha ọmụmụ ya (Ladipo) n'aka nna ya, onye a mụrụ na Ibadan (South-West Nigeria) na njedebe 1930s
Nna ya matara ma lụọ nne ya na UK na 1960s
Sarah nọrọ ọtụtụ oge na Lagos mgbe ọ bụ nwata tinyere obodo Jos na Plateau State
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, ọ biri afọ abụọ na Nairobi, Kenya, tupu ndị ezinụlọ ya akwaga UK
Manyika gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Birmingham (UK), Bordeaux (France), na California (Berkeley), ma nweta nzere PhD
ọ lụrụ di na Harare, Zimbabwe, na 1994, ma ugbu ọ na-eke oge ya n'etiti San Francisco, California (ebe ọ kụziiri agụmagụ na San Francisco State University), London na Harare
Ihe ndị o dere gụnyere edemede ebipụtara ebipụta, akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ, akwụkwọ ndị o nyochara na obere akụkọ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, In Dependence, bụ nke Legend Press, London, bipụtara na 2008, ọ bụkwa nke ọba akwụkwọ kachanụ na UK họọrọ ma gosipụta na Black History Month

Na 2009, In Dependence bụkwa nke ụlọọrụ Cassava Republic bipụtara, ọ bụ ụlọọrụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ agụmagụ na Abuja, Naị́jiriị́a(nakwa na UK), ya na ndị odee aka siri ike gụnyere Teju Cole na Helon Habila

N’ikwu banyere mkpebi ya isonyere otu African publisher, Manyika kwuru sị, “A chọpụtara m na site n'inye African Publishers ikikere nke mba ụwa, na enyela m aka gboo mkpa nke ikikere ahaghị nhata nha n'ụwa n'ebe ndị nchedo agụmagụ dị, ọbụna maka ihe a na-akpọ akụkọ Africa, gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ' Toni Kan na-ede na Lagos Review 'Sarah Manyika edewo akwụkwọ akụkọ na-adọrọ mmasị nke ga-abụ ịgba na pantheon nke agụmagụ ọdịnala' Na 2014, Weaver Press na Zimbabwe bipụtara In Dependence, ebe ọ bụ akwụkwọ esetịpụrụ maka ule agba elu n'agụmagụ bekee
In Dependence bụkwa nke Joint Admissions and Matriculation Board (JAMB) na Naijiria webatara maka ndị na-ele ule n'afọ 2017 UTME
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Sarah Manyika na-egosi ndị nkịtị ebe ha kacha mma

Nke a na-ewuli elu!' ), NoViolet Bulawayo ('onye adịghị ada mba, Onye nwere echiche, Onye na-akpa ọchị, na-akpali akpali'), Jamal Mahjoub ('Manyika ji ịnụ ọkụ na mmụọ dị jụụ na-eme ka agwa ndị dị n'akwụkwọ ya nke ọma'), Peter Orner (' Akwụkwọ akụkọ ọhụrụ mara mma, dị mkpa, ma na-adịgide ogologo oge n'uche ndị gụrụ ya), EC Osondu (' echefughị echefu
ntụgharị uche miri emi n' ọnwụ, ncheta, nchụpụ na owu ọmụma
Agwa ndị dị n'akwụkwọ akụkọ a ga-adịgide n'uche gị'), na Brian Chikwava (' akwụkwọ akụkọ a haziri nke ọma, na-eju anya mgbe niile') A tụgharịala ya n'ọtụtụ asụsụ

Like A Mule Bringing Ice Cream to the Sun bụ ndị a họpụtara na Septemba 2016 maka ihe nrite Goldsmiths (ya na akwụkwọ nke Rachel Cusk, Deborah Levy, Eimear McBride, Mike McCormack na Anakana Schofield ), 'akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ nke Afịrịka a ga-atụle maka ihe nrite a', nke akwadebere iji kwụọ ụgwọ akụkọ arọrọ arọ d[ ụdị akwụkwọ akụkọ
E wepụtakwara akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ maka nturuugo akwụkwọ California na ngalaba akụkọ arọrọ arọ (ya na ọrụ ndị odee dị ka Andrew Sean Greer, Percival Everett, na Viet Thanh Nguyen )

Na mmalite Like a Mule Bringing Ice Cream to the Sun, Manyika kwuru, sị 'Ahụla m ọtụtụ ndị inyom meworo agadi bụ́ ndị biri ndụ mara mma, ma a bịa n'ihe banyere arọrọ arọ, ahụghị m ọtụtụ akụkọ na-egosipụta nke a, karịsịa na ndu umunwanyi ojii
Mgbe m na-enweghị ike ịhụ akụkọ ndị m ga-achọ ịgụ, m na-agbalị ide ha n'onwe m' Aha akwụkwọ akụkọ a bụ ahịrị m nwetara site n'uri Mary Ruefle nke a kpọrọ 'Donkey On'

Manyika bụ onye tinyere ezi mgbalị na 2019 anthology New Daughters of Africa International Anthology of Writing by Women of African Descent, nke Margaret Busby deziri, na-ekere òkè na ihe omume ndị metụtara ya
Ihe odide na-abụghị arọrọ arọ nke Manyika na-agụnye edemede nke onwe ya na edemede nkqwa miri emi nke ndị ọ na-ezute, gụnyere Evan Mawarire, Toni Morrison na Michelle Obama
Manyika na-eje ozi na bọọdụ Hedgebrook na Museum of the African Diaspora (MoAD) na San Francisco
Ọ meekwala ihe agba onyonyo banyere edemede OZY ma bụrụkwa onye nchịkọta akụkọ akwụkwọ ugbu a
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ọka ikpe maka asọmpi edemede, Etisalat Prize for Literature na 2014 na ihe nrite Goldsmiths na 2020

Manyika na-akwado usoro ajụjụ ọnụ nke ọnwa ọ bụla maka MoAD, nke a na-akpọ 'Mkparịta ụka n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Ụwa', ndị ọbịa ya si gburugburu ụwa gụnyere Senator Cory Booker, Ibrahim Mahama, Jess Cole, Strive Masiyiwa, Tatyana Ali, Anna Deavere Smith, na Henry Louis Gates, Jr
Sarah Mapps Douglass (September 9, 1806 September 8, 1882) bụ ónyé nkụzi America, onye abolitionist, onye edemede, na ónyé nkụzi ọha
Ihe osise ya na akwụkwọ ozi ya nwere ike ịbụ ihe atụ mbụ ma ọ bụ nke mbụ dị ndụ nke ihe osise nke nwanyị Africa America bịanyere aka
Ihe osise ndị a dị n'ime Cassey Dickerson Album
Abọm ahụ bụ nchịkọta a na-adịghị ahụkebe nke akwụkwọ ozi ọbụbụenyi nke narị afọ nke 19 n'etiti otu ụmụ nwanyị

A mụrụ Sarah Douglass na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, n'ezinụlọ a ma ama na-akwado abolitionist, naanị nwa nwanyị nke abolitionists Robert Douglass, onye na-eme achịcha, na Grace Bustill Douglass, Ónyé na-emepụta ihe na onye nkuzi
Nna nna Douglass, Cyrus Bustill, onye Quaker nke nwéré ụlọ achịcha, na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ site n'ụlọ ya, bụ otu n'ime ndị otu mbụ nke Free African Society, otu ọrụ ebere African-American
Douglass tolitere n'etiti ndị isi Philadelphia, ma dị ka C
Peter Ripley si kwuo '[ọ natara nkụzi [onwé] dị ka nwatakịrị
Na mbido afọ 1820, ọ gàrà kọleji, wee kụzie obere ógè na New York City
N'afọ 1825, Douglass malitere izi ihe na Philadelphia n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nke nne ya haziri na James Forten, ónyé ọgaranya na-arụ ụgbọ mmiri n'Afrịka, nke ọ gakwara mgbè ọ bụ nwata
Malite na 1833, ọ kụziri obere oge na Free African School for Girls, tupu o guzobe ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ya maka ụmụ agbọghọ Africa-America
N'oge na-adịghị anya, a matara ya dị ka onye nkuzi nwere nkà nke sayensị na nka, yana maka ijide ụmụ akwụkwọ ya n'ọnọdụ dị elu
N'afọ 1838, Philadelphia Female Anti-Slavery Society weghaara ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, na-ejigide Douglass dị ka onyeisi ụlọ akwụkwọ

N'afọ 1854, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ jikọtara ya na Institute for Colored Youth (nke bụzi Cheyney State University) na Lombard Street, Douglass ghọkwara onye isi nke ngalaba praịmarị, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya ruo Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 1877
Dị ka ónyé nkụzi, o kpebisiri ike inye ụmụ agbọghọ ohere hà nhata iji mụta ihe ndị e debere maka ụmụ nwoke, gụnyere mgbakọ na mwepụ na sayensị
O nwèrè mmasị na sayensị dị iche iche n'onwe ya, ma debe kọbọd akụkọ ihe mere eme nke onwe ya na klas ya, nke gụnyere nchịkọta nke mkpokoro na mineral dị iche iche maka ụmụ akwụkwọ ya ịmụ
Sarah Michael (amụrụ 22 Julaị 1990) bụ onye ọkpọ bọọlụ n'mba Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye ou mba Naijiria, wee soro na asọmpi olimpik nke afpụkụ abụọ na asatọ n na iko mba ụwpụkụ abụọ na iri na otu11
Sarah Gertrude Millin, nwa Liebson (19 Maachị na afo 1889 – 6 Julaị na afo 1968), bụ onye odee South Afrika
A mụrụ Millin na Žagarė, Kovno Governorate na 19 Maachị na afo 1889, bụ otu n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ asaa
Ọnwa ise ka e mesịrị, nne na nna ya, bụ́ Isaiah na Olga, kwagara South Afrika, ezinụlọ ahụ kwa biri na Beaconsfield nke dị nso na Kimberley
Na afo 1894, mgbe ọ dị afọ isii, ha kwagara n'ebe a na-egwupụta diamond n'akụkụ osimiri Vaal nke dị na mpaghara Kimberley bụ ebe nna ya mepere ụlọ ahịa ahịa
Gburugburu ebe a bụ iji nye ọnọdụ maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ya n'ọdịnihu nke jikọtara ịhụnanya maka ọdịdị ala South Afrika na ịkpọasị nke ịda ogbenye na mkparị nke ọtụtụ ndị na-egwu ala bi

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Kimberley High School for Girls na afo 1904 ọ họọrọ ịghara ịnara akwụkwọ ego e nyere ya ka ọ gaa mahadum na South Afrikan kọleji dị na Cape Town mana kama ọ gụrụ egwu na Kimberley
O nwetara asambodo onye nkuzi piano mana ọ naghị arụ ọrụ ahụ
Site na mgbe ọ dị afọ isii, o kwenyesiri ike na ide ihe bụ akara aka ya ma malite ide akụkọ mkpirisi mgbe ọ dị obere
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe odide mbụ ya pụtara n'akwụkwọ akụkọ n'afọ 1910 ruo afo 1912
Na 1 Disemba afo 1912 ọ lụrụ Philip Millin wee biri na Johannesburg
Philip, bụ́ ọkàiwu nke mesịrị ghọọ ọkàikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu, kwadoro ọchịchọ ịgụ akwụkwọ ya
Philip Millin nwụrụ n'ihi nkụchi obi na oche mgbe ọ ka malitere ide akwụkwọ akụkọ ndụ ya bụ Measure of My Days, ihe omume nke metụrụ ya aka nke ukwuu
Ọ nwụrụ na Johannesburg
Ndị Saụt Afrịka bụ Millin mbụ n'ime akụkọ ifo na-abụghị akụkọ ifo
E bipụtara ya na UK na afo 1926 site na Constable & Co
Ltd, na na US na afo 1927 site na Boni & Liveright
Ndị ikom na-eme njem dị iche na ihe ọ bụla Millin mepụtara
Ọ nwere echiche na edemede gbasara isiokwu dị iche iche
Ndị ikom na njem ụgbọ mmiri ka ewepụtara naanị na UK na Commonwealth, Constable & Co
Ltd bipụtara na afo 1930
A ka na-ahụta akụkọ ndụ ya nke Cecil Rhodes ka ọ bụ isi mmalite nke ozi gbasara ndụ Diamond Magnate
Chatto & Windus bipụtara Rhodes na 1933, wee bipụta mbipụta edegharịrị na afo 1952
Harper & Brothers wepụtara ọrụ ahụ na US na 1933 n'okpuru aha Cecil Rhodes
A na-ekwupụta Millin dị ka otu n'ime ndị nyere aka na nseta ihuenyo nke ihe nkiri Rhodes nke Africa, nke ewepụtara na afo 1936 ma mee Walter Huston
Iji kwekọọ na ntọhapụ nke Rhodes nke Africa, Grosset & Dunlap degharịrị akụkọ ndụ a na US n'okpuru aha Cecil Rhodes, Empire Builder
General Smuts bụ akụkọ ndụ Millin nke abụọ
Na afo 1936, e bipụtara ya na mpịakọta abụọ
Faber & Faber jere ozi n'ahịa UK ebe Little, Brown na Company jere ozi n'ahịa America

Collins Sons & Co

Sarah Najjuma, (A mụrụ na October 23, na afo 1978), bụ nwanyị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye nkuzi site na ọrụ
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu maka mpaghara Nakaseke na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda na-anọchite anya otu National Resistance Movement (NRM) na-achị
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa a na Febụwarị na afo 2016
Ọ nọchiri Rose Namayanja, onye bụbu ụmụ nwanyị na-anọchite anya Nakaseke District onye jere ozi site na Mee na afo 2006 na Febụwarị na afo 2016
N'afọ 1995, o mechara ule Primary Leaving Examination na Nalinya Lwantale Primary School
N'afọ 1996, ọ nwetara asambodo agụmakwụkwọ Uganda na Nabisunsa Girls School
N'afọ 1998, ọ nwetara asambodo agụmakwụkwọ nke Uganda Advanced na Nabisunsa Girls School
O nwere Bachelor of Arts na agụmakwụkwọ, site na Mahadum Makerere na Master of Arts na Development Studies site na Machịum Nkumba
N'afọ 2011, ọ nwetara diplọma postgraduate na Public Administration and Management na Mahadum Nkumba
N'agbata afọ 2004 na afo 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmepe obodo, Luweero District Local Government
Site na afo 2005 ruo na afo 2007, ọ bụ onye ọrụ mmepe obodo maka Gọọmentị Obodo Nakaseke
Site na afo 2007 ruo na afo 2015, ọ bụ Onye isi mmepe obodo, Gọọmentị Obodo Nakaseke
Site na afo 2016 ruo taa, ọ bụ onye omeiwu
Najjuma bụ onye lụrụ di ma si n'ezinụlọ Alakụba
Ọ nwere mmasị na netball ma nwee mmasị igwu ya n'oge ezumike ya
Sarah Nnodim (amụrụ na 25 Disemba 1995) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba maka Nasarawa Amazons na Nigerian Women's Championship

Ọ na-egwuri egwu na mba ụwa maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Naịjirịa, ebe ọ bụbu onye otu egwuregwu bọlụ ụmụ nwanyị na-erubeghị afọ 20 nke Naịjirị nke ruru na ngwụcha nke 2014 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
Na klọb, ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Nasarawa Amazons na Naịjirịa Women's Championship
Nnodim nọchitere anya Naijiria na ọkwa niile, ebe ọ gbara FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup na 2010 na 2012 yana 2014 FIFA U-20 Women'sWorld Cup
Na asọmpi ikpeazụ ahụ, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu ruru na ngwụcha mana ha meriri Germany

A kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi squad mgbe asọmpi ahụ gasịrị, mgbe akpọrọ aha ya na ndepụta ụmụ nwanyị 33 maka 2014 African Women's Championship dị ka otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu 'Falconets' anọ gbanwere na 'Super Falcons'
Onye nkuzi Edwin Okon kwuru n'oge anọ ahụ, 'Ha kpọrọ ha ka ha bịa soro ndị egwuregwu ndị ọzọ a kpọrọ òkù na-asọ mpi maka uwe ndị ahụ ma ekwenyere m n'ụzọ siri ike na ha ga-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe ziri ezi'
Na ọkwa dị elu, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup
A chụpụrụ ya na egwuregwu ikpeazụ nke Naịjirịa nke asọmpi ahụ, mgbe ha meriri United States na egwuregwu nke atọ nke otu
Nnodim nwetara kaadị odo abụọ, ma maka tackles site n'azụ, na-ahapụ Naijiria na ụmụ nwanyị 10 maka nkeji 20 ikpeazụ nke egwuregwu ahụ mgbe ọ gbadatara onye America Sydney Leroux
Onye nke abụọ

Sarah Ogoke (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị 25 n'onwa Juun afọ1990) bụ onye Naịjiria a muru na obodo Amerịka na-atụrụ ndi Celta de Vigo basketbọọlụ, mana ọ na-eme ihe egwuregwu na mbibi nye otu bọọlụ Mozambique, Ferrviario De Maputo na 2019 FIBA Africa Champion Cup (Women) nakwa Otu bọọlụ mba Naijirịa
O sonyere na 2017 Women's Afrobasket na 2019 Women's Afrobasket
Ogoke bụkwa onye otu egwuregwu basketbọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa, D'tigress, na iko basketbọọlụ mba ụwa ụmụ nwanyị nke FIBA n'afo 2018 na Tenerife, Canary Islands, Spen

Sarah Mei Li Owen (Chinese 陳美麗; pinyin Chén Měilì; Wade-Giles Chen Mei-li; amụrụ na 11 Jenụwarị 1983) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Britain na onye otu azụmaahịa na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu nzuko omeiwu (MP) maka Luton North kemgbe 2019 Onye otu Labour Party, ọ jerela ozi Shadow Minister for Local Government na Faith kemgbe Ọktoba 2022, ebe ọ bụbu onye ozi Shadow maka enweghị ebe obibi, ụra siri ike na okwukwe n'otu ngalaba ndò n'etiti Disemba 2021 na Ọktọba 2022

Owen bụ ihe nketa agwakọtara yana onye MP mbụ sitere na nna nna ndịda Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia Ọ na-ekwu na 'akụkụ nne ya nke ezinụlọ ya bụ Malaysian na ngwakọta nke Singaporean na Nonya na ndị nna nna China'
Owen mụrụ ma zụlite na Hastings Ezinụlọ nne ya bụ ndị China si Malaysian
Owen rụrụ ọrụ na mpaghara ọha dị ka onye ọrụ nlekọta maka NHS, onye enyemaka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka Brighton na Hove City Council na onye ọrụ London Fire Brigade na ngalaba atụmatụ mberede
Owen abụrụla onye ndụmọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Alan Sugar ma rụọ ọrụ na amụma azụmahịa obere mba nke Labour

Na 2011, a họpụtara Owen ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Labour Party maka Hastings na Rye iji zọọ ntuli aka izugbe na-esote  Na ntuli aka izugbe nke afọ 2015, Owen kwụsịrị n'ọkwa nke abụọ na votu 17,890, bụ votu 4,796 n'azụ onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi Conservative Amber Rudd
Owen bụbu onye ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka otu ndị ọrụ GMB ma bụrụkwa onye otu kọmitii Executive National Labour Ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Chinese for Labour

Na nhoputa ndi ochichi nke 2019, Owen choputara site na otu ndi otu ndi Labour's National Executive Committee weputara dika onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi nke pati Luton North, karia site na ndi otu ime obodo, na-eme mkpesa site n'aka ufodu n'ime ha ndi chere na GMB amanyela onye ochichi na ha A họpụtara Owen site na votu dị 23,496, nke bụ ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime vootu 9,247 karịa onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi Conservative Party

Na ntuli aka ya, a họpụtara Owen ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nzuzo nke onye omebe iwu nke Shadow Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs Lisa Nandy↵Na 15 Ọktoba 2020, Owen gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka ọkwa ya dị ka PPS iji votu megide isi mmalite ọgụgụ isi nke mmadụ (Criminal Conduct) Bill, ekwetaghị na ndị ọrụ ohi ka ọ ghara
Na 14 Eprel 2021, Owen kwupụtara na akpọrọ ya onye odeakwụkwọ onwe onye omeiwu na Rachel Reeves na a họpụtakwara ya ụtarị

Na Disemba 2021, a họpụtara ya onye minista na-enweghị ebe obibi, Shadow Sleeping and Faith Na 28 Ọktoba 2022, a họpụtara ya onye Minista Shadow maka Gọọmenti Mpaghara, nọchiri Mike Amesbury onye gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa ya na mbido afọ Edobere Pọtụfoliyo nke Okwukwe ya gara aga, Paula Barker nọchiri ya dị ka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka enweghị ebe obibi na Rough Sleeping

Sarah Reng Ochekpe bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijirịa nke si Plateau Ȯra Plateau
Ọ bụ onye Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mmiri si 2011 na 2015
A mụrụ Ochekpe n'ụbọchi nke anọ n'ọnwa iri, n'afọ 1961 n'ezi n'ụlọ Ali Reng Madugben na Foron, na gburugburu gọọmenti ime obodo nke Barikin Ladi di na Plateau State
O nwetara nzere mahadum nke mbụ nʻihe ọmụmụ Political Science na Ahmadu Bello University, tinyekwara nzere nke mastas nʻihe ọmụmụ Public Administration na University of Jos
O nwekwara nzere nke ogo postu grajueti nke Aberdeen College of Commerce na Nigerian Institute of Journalism

Ọ bụ prọfesọ nke kemistri nʻahụ maka mmepụta ọgwụ, bụrụkwa onye osote onye isinke University of Jos

Sarah Waiswa bụ onye na-ese foto na ihe osise nke amụrụ na Uganda ma biri na Nairobi, Kenya
O meriri 2016 Rencontres d'Arles Discovery Award maka usoro nke nyochara mkpagbu albino na mpaghara Sahara Africa
2015 Uganda Press Photo Awards nabatakwara ya
A mụrụ Sarah Waiswa na Uganda, o biri na Nairobi, Kenya
Ọ gụrụ sociology na psychology, ma bụrụ onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya
Ọrụ ihe osise ya, 'Stranger in a Familiar Land', na-enyocha mkpagbu nke ndị albinos na mpaghara Sahara Africa, ebe a na-achụ ha maka ike anwansi nke akụkụ ahụ ha
Usoro ahụ na-etinye nwanyị albino na ndabere nke ogige Nairobian nke Kibera, nke na-anọchite anya oké ifufe ahụ n'èzí ụwa
Ọnọdụ nrọ nke onye na-ese foto ahụ na-enwe obi abụọ na ndị albinós mepụtara ọrụ ahụ iji mee ka ha mara banyere ọgwụgwọ Tanzania mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ akụkọ banyere Tanzania
Akụkụ nke foto ha gụnyere ịzaghachi ìgwè ndị na-akwa emo
Aida Muluneh, onye na-ese foto nke nyere onyinye ahụ, kọwara foto Waiswa dị ka ihe na-egosipụta mgbagwoju anya gburugburu ya

Ọ bụ ezie na Sarah Moroz nke i-D toro nghọta nke Waiswa gosipụtara nkewa nke njirimara albino, dịka ihe ndị na-enweghị obi ụtọ nke ihe nlereanya ahụ megidere ikuku a na-apụghị imeri emeri emeri nke ịjụ, Sean O'Hagan nke The Guardian weere mgbalị ahụ dị ka 'obi ike' karịa
'nke a na-enweghị isi
'nke siri ike'
Ọrụ Waiswa na-enyocha ihe ọ na-akpọ 'New African Identity' otu ọgbọ ndị Africa na-eto eto si eche na ha na-ekwupụta ihe na omenala anaghị egbochi ha karịa ndị bu ha ụzọ
Ọ chọkwara igbochi ihe ngosi nke Afrịka, nke na-abụkarị nsonaazụ nke ndị mba ọzọ karịa ndị na-ese foto
Tụkwasị na nke a, ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ọ na-achị bụ ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 2016, Waiswa na onye na-ese foto Joel Lukhovi na-arụkọ ọrụ na 'African Cityzens', nke na-edekọ ndụ kwa ụbọchị n'ọtụtụ obodo Afrịka
Ha sonyere n'akwụkwọ 2017 nke na-egosi ndị Maasai n'eziokwu, ihe a na-eme kwa ụbọchị, kama ịbụ ndị agha
Maka Waiswa, ọrụ ahụ mezuru ọchụchọ maka ozi gbasara chi nwanyị oge ochie na-edeghị nke ọma
Wesker tolitere na Rothschild Buildings, ngọngọ nke ụlọ dị na Spitalfields, nke ezinụlọ ndị Juu na-ebi na ya
Ọ nọ na kọmitii onye isi nke National Union of Tailors and Garment Workers (NUTGW) tupu ọ banye United Ladies Tailors' Trade Union (ULTTU), otu ndị ahịa ndị Juu
Wesker tinyere aka na nhazi nke ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ uwe na East End
N'ụlọ ọrụ akwa akwa Goodman na 1926, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka igwe, o duuru ndị ọrụ nwanyị niile na njem njem na-achọ ụzọ abụọ
Na 1928 ọ haziri ụmụ agbọghọ 600 na Rego Factory na Betnal Green Road
Ọgba aghara a were izu iri na abụọ ruo mgbe ndị ọrụ meriri na ekeresimesi
Ebe ọ bụ na ndị isi mba NUTGW anabataghị ọrụ ya, ndị ọrụ na-enweta ego site n'ịkwe 'egwu egwu' na ịnakọta ego na gburugburu London, ọrụ nke Wesker na-ahazi
N'afọ 1929, o tinyere aka na iku ya na Polikoff's, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na 148-160 Mare Street na Hackney
N'ebe ahụ ka ndị ọkpọ ahụ na-abụkwa abụ
N'afọ 1930, o duuru ogbunigwe na ụlọ ọrụ Simpson, dịkwa na Hackney
N'afọ 1929, Wesker bụ onye guzobere United Clothing Workers' Union (UCWU)
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị so na kọmitii na-achịkwa ya, ma mesịa bụrụ onye na-ahazi ụmụ nwanyị oge niile
UCWU batara na NUTGW na 1935
Wesker nọdụrụ ọzọ na kọmitii NUTGW na nhọpụta ya na 1937 dị ka onye na-ahazi ụmụ nwanyị nke NUTGGW gosipụtara ụzọ ọhụrụ maka ndị ọrụ nwanyị
O nyeere ụmụ nwanyị aka ịhazi onwe ha n'ọtụtụ nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ
A họpụtara Wesker ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Kọmunist nke Great Britain na 12th Congress na 1932
Ya na ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ sonyere n'Agha nke Cable Street na 4 Ọktoba 1936
Sarah Wild bụ onye odeakụkọ sayensị South Africa na onye ode akwụkwọ

Wild bụ onye dere Searching African Skies The Square Kilometre Array and South Africa’s Quest to Hear the Songs of the Stars (2012) na Innovation Shaping South Africa through Science (2015),, nke bụ e bipụtara n'asụsụ Afrikaans dị ka Innovasie Hoe wetenskap Suid-Afrika vorm
Wild dere maka Scientific American, The Guardian, The Atlantic, Undark Magazine, AfricaCheck na Mail & Guardian

Sarah Wildes (née Averell/Averill; e mere ya mmiri chukwu na March 16, 1627 – July 29, 1692 ) bụ onye a mara ikpe n’ụzọ na -ezighị ezi maka ịgba afa n’oge ọnwụnwa ndị amoosu Salem ma gbuo ya site n’ịkpọgide ya
Ọ kwadoro na aka ya dị ọcha n'oge usoro ahụ niile, ma emesịa wepụ ya
Nwunye mbụ di ya bụ onye òtù ezinụlọ Gould, ụmụnne ndị ikwu nke ezinụlọ Putnam, ndị isi ebubo, na akwụkwọ ndekọ ụlọikpe na-edekọ esemokwu ezinụlọ nke butere mkpagbu ya
Sarah bụ otu n'ime ụmụaka asaa amụrụ William Averell [note 1] na Abigail Hynton, ndị si Chipping Norton, England kwabatara na Ipswich, Massachusetts
William bụ onye kotima na Chipping Norton n'afọ 1634, na ndekọ obodo Ipswich buru ụzọ kwuo ya n'afọ 1637, bụ nke na-akwado ịkwaga ha n'oge oge, mgbe Sarah dị ihe dịka 7–10 afọ
Sarah lụrụ onye mbata England John Wildes (a mụrụ c
1615–1618 [note 2] ), onye di ya nwụrụ nke nwere ụmụ asatọ ma mụọ nwa nwoke, Efraim
Ifrem nọ n'ọnọdu onye- nchekwa ego na onye- ọchi -agha n'oge nke izu-ike ahu
Ha bụ ndị bi na Topsfield, obodo Salem gbara agbata obi, na Massachusetts Bay Colony
John nwere ọtụtụ ọkwa na ọchịchị obodo ma jiri ịhụnanya kpọọ ya 'Old Father Wildes'
otu narị na iri na atọ Abụọ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị John, Sarah (Wildes) Bishop na Phoebe (Wildes) Day, na ọgọ nwoke, Edward Bishop Jr, bụkwa ebubo amoosu
Sarah Averill Wildes na Sarah Wildes Bishop, di ya, enweela mgbagwoju anya (dị ka Sarah Wildes Bishop na Bridget Bishop )
Otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Sarah, Jonathan, bụ onye ama ama maka omume dị ịtụnanya, nke ndị ozi obodo chere na ọ nwere ike bụrụ ndọpụ uche, nke ekwensu nwere, ma ọ bụ nke adịgboroja, akụkọ nke Mkpu
John Hale kọrọ n'oge a na-ekpe Sarah ikpe, na-eleghachi anya azụ na ọ ga-abụ ihe akaebe nke amoosu Sarah
Jonathan ama akpa ke ekọn̄ Edidem Philip, ndien idụhe ubiere oro akanamde
otu narị na iri asatọ na isii
Hale kọkwara akụkọ banyere nwa nwa nwoke ọzọ, John, [note 3] bụ onye nwụkwara n'oge ọ bụ nwata (ma ya mere, ọ bụghị gburugburu iji gosi ma ọ bụ gbaghaa akụkọ ahụ)
John, onye e kọwara dị ka “nwa okorobịa na-akwụwa aka ọtọ” gara n’ụlọ nwanne nna ya na nwanne nne ya, bụ́ Reddingtons, ịkọrọ ha nkwenkwe ya na nne di ya bụ, n’ezie, onye amoosu
Nwanne Sarah nke tọrọ, William Averill, Jr, onye nwere ọtụtụ ọkwa dị iche iche na Ipswich na Topsfield, nwụrụ n'afọ tupu e jide Sarah, ya mere enweghị ike ịgbachitere ya
William na John Wildes (Sr) jere ozi ọnụ dị ka ndị a họpụtara ahọpụta
Sarah na John bụkwa ndị akaebe nye uche William, na-egosipụta mmekọrịta ntụkwasị obi
Sarah nwere aha ọma dị ka onye na-abụghị onye na-akwadoghị na Puritan Massachusetts, na mmejọ ndị gara aga nke nwere ike ime ka ọ bụrụ ebumnuche dị mfe maka ebubo amoosu
A na-ewere ya dị ka onye mara mma na n'ihu dịka nwa agbọghọ
A mara ya ikpe ka a pịa ya ụtarị maka ịkwa iko ya na Thomas Wordell na November 1649, ma mesịa, na May 1663, boro ya ebubo iyi akwa silk
N’ihi na ọ laụrụ John n’oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nwunye mbụ ya nwụsịrị (ihe dị ka ọnwa 7 ka e mesịrị), ndị ọgọ John mbụ nwere ihe na- eweso ya iwe
Nke a bụ ihe a ma ama dịka ndị Goulds metụtara ezinụlọ Putnam, bụ ndị bụ ndị isi ebubo na mgbaasị amoosu
John Wildes gbara akaebe megide nwanne nwunye mbụ ya, Lieutenant John Gould, na ikpe aghụghọ, nke kpasuru ezinụlọ ahụ iwe
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, nwunye nwanne John mbụ, Mary Gould Reddington, malitere ịkọ asịrị na Sarah bụ onye amoosu
Mgbe John Wildes yiri egwu na ya ga-ebo ya ebubo nkwutọ, ọ weghaara ihe o kwuru
John gbara ama na William Averill sochiri, nwalee eziokwu Mary site n'inyefe nwanne ya nwanyị n'onwe ya ma ọ bụrụ na o nwere mkpesa megide Sera, Meri kwukwara ọzọ na o nweghị ihe megide ya
N'afọ 1674, ụmụnne John na Joseph Andrews bịara n'ụlọ Wildes ka ha gbazite nsị, dịka nke ha gbajiri
John Wildes, Sr, anọghị ya na Sarah zara na ya enweghị onye ọ ga-agbazinye, ma onye agbata obi tụụrụ ha aka na John Wildes, Jr's, ha weere ya megide mkpesa Sarah, na-ekwe nkwa ịrịọ ikike John nke nta
E kwuru na Efraim, bụ nwa okorobia, e kwuru na a chụrụ ha n’azụ, na-ekwu na ọ ga-abụrụ ha “ụkpa ọnwụ” ma ọ bụrụ na ha eweghachighị ya
Mgbe ha gbuchara ahihia ha, ha nwere ọtụtụ ihe ọjọọ na ụgbọ ala ha na ehi ha, bụ nke ha kwuru na ọ bụ nhịahụ Sera mere
Mgbe e mesịrị, Elizabeth Simmons née Andrews, nwanne ha nwanyị, na nne ha gara ileta Reddingtons wee soro Sarah gafere ụzọ
Nne ha gwara ya akụkọ banyere nsogbu ụmụ ya nwere, Sera kwukwara na o nweghị ihe jikọrọ ya na ya
Mgbe nne ha nọgidere na-ekwesị ntụkwasị obi, Sera siri ọnwụ na ọ ga-egosi na o nwere aka na ya
Elizabeth kwuziri na nkwonkwo ịma jijiji metụrụ ya ozugbo mgbe Sarah lere ya anya, na otu anụ ọhịa dị ka nwamba bịara leta ya n'abalị ahụ, ebe ọ dara ogbi
Ọ gara n'ihu kwuo na ya nwere ihe mgbu azụ mgbe Sarah gafere ya na chọọchị
Ephraim gbara ama na ya na ada Elizabeth Simmons agbaala ndụ, nke ọ kwụsịrị ka o zutechara Oriakụ
Simmons banyere asịrị ọ nụrụ maka mkpesa ya gbasara nne ya (nke ọ gọrọ), na na ọ na-eweso ya iwe kemgbe ahụ
Thomas Dorman kọrọ na Sarah zụtara ụlọ aṅụ n'aka ya, ma, mgbe e mesịrị, ọ tụfuru ọtụtụ anụ ụlọ ya, gụnyere geese na ehi
N'ime ihe omume nke afọ 1692, Ann Putnam, Jr
gwara nwunye ya na Sarah Wildes gburu ehi ha, bụ nke ọ hụrụ dị ịrịba ama dị ka ha jụrụ oyi na January 1686
Ihe ọzọ kpatara esemokwu bụ ọnọdụ John dị ka onye nyocha maka Topsfield
Esemokwu dị n'ókè n'etiti Salem na Topsfield pụtara na ihu ọma Topsfield

Na mgbachitere Sera, John na Ifrem gbara ama maka ebumnobi ezighi ezi nke ezi na ụlọ Hobbs, Gould na Simmons
Ifrem kwuru na ya ahụbeghị nne ya ka o mejọrọ onye ọ bụla n’okwu ma ọ bụ omume, na ọ na-akụziri ya nke ọma mgbe nile n’okpukpe Ndị Kraịst
Ụlọikpe Essex County katọrọ Sarah Wildes maka ime amoosu
William Stoughton bịanyere aka na akwụkwọ ikike maka igbu ya na 12 Julaị 1692
Egburu Wildes na Julaị 19, 1692 site n'ịkogide na Gallows Hill na Salem, Massachusetts, yana Elizabeth Howe, Susannah Martin, Sarah Good, na Nurse Rebecca
Tupu e gbuo ya, Rev
Nicholas Noyes gwara ha ka ha kwupụta, ma okwu ikpeazụ Good bụ, 'Ị bụ onye ụgha! Abụkwaghị m onye amoosu kama ịbụ onye dibịa afa, ma ọ bụrụ na i wepụ ndụ m, Chineke ga-enye gị ọbara ka ị ṅụọ”

Mgbe e mesịrị kwenye na saịtị nke ogbugbu ahụ na January 2016 site na Gallows Hill Project, nke Prọfesọ Emerson Baker nke Salem State University na-edu, ọ dịghị ihe fọdụrụ mmadụ ka a hụrụ na-eji radar na-abanye n'ala, na-akwado nkwenkwe ọdịnala na ezinụlọ nke ndị ahụ metụtara laghachiri na
abalị iji nwetaghachi ahụ ha ma tinyeghachi ha n'ebe ọzọ
E jidere Stepdaughter Phoebe Wildes Day na September 1692, ma ọ dịghị ndekọ ọ bụla na-aga ikpe
Nwa nwa nwanyị Sarah Wildes Bishop na di ya, Edward, ebe e bufere ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Boston, gbapụrụ na October 1692 wee zoo
N'akwụkwọ ya bụ Wonders of the Invisible World, Cotton Mather gbalịrị ịgbachitere òkè ya na ule ndị ahụ, na-ewepụta ihe ọ weere dị ka ikpe kachasị ike maka ezi amoosu
Ọ gụnyeghị nke Sera
Na 26 June 1693, John Wildes lụrụ Mary, nwanyị di ya nwụrụ nke George Jacobs, Sr
(E gburu George maka amoosu, nakwa)
Ọ nwụrụ na 14 Mee 1705, na Topsfield
Ụlọikpe General Massachusetts wepụrụ Sarah n'afọ 1710, yana ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ mara ikpe
Nwa ya nwoke Ifrem, na-aza na 'nhụsianya nke enyi… enweghị ike ịmegharị' [ , e nyere pound ịrị na anọ ka nkwụghachi
Di nke otu n'ime ụmụ Sarah, onye nnọchi anya steeti Paul Tirone, nyere aka na ikpochapụ ndị ikpe ise ikpeazụ site na omume nke ndị omebe iwu na October 31, 2001 ( Halloween )
Ihe ncheta ọnwụnwa nke Salem Witch gụnyere bench nke edere aha ndị niile gburu, gụnyere Sarah Wildes
Arthur Miller, bụ onye dere Crucible, egwuregwu dabeere na ule ndị ahụ, kwuru okwu na nraranye, dị ka onye lanarịrị Mgbukpọ Nobel na Elie Wiesel mere
Obodo Danvers mekwara ihe ncheta nye ndị ahụ metụtara
E mechara chọpụta ebe ogbugbu ahụ na Jenụwarị 2016, site na Mahadum Virginia 's Gallows Hill Project, obodo ahụ na-ezube imepụta ncheta ọhụrụ nye ndị ihe metụtara ebe ahụ
Kpọpụta njehie tag was found
Saran Kaba Jones (amụrụ na 21 June 1982) bụ onye na-akwado mmiri dị ọcha na onye ọchụnta ego si Liberia
Ọ bụ onye guzobere FACE Africa, otu nzukọ na-arụ ọrụ iji wusie mmiri, ịdị ọcha na ịdị ọcha (WASH) akụrụngwa na ọrụ na ime obodo dị iche iche na mpaghara ndịda Sahara Africa
Ọ bụ World Economic Forum Young Global Leader na 2016 TIME Magazine Next Generation Leader E depụtala ọrụ ya na FACE Africa na Boston Globe, na CNN Inside Africa
A mụrụ ya na Monrovia, Liberia ebe ọ biri ruo afọ asatọ ma ya na nne na nna ya na nwanne ya nwoke atọ kwagara Cote de 'Ivoire na 1989 n'ihi agha obodo nke bidoro
Ya na ezinụlọ nne ya biri n'ebe ahụ afọ abụọ ma ha kwagara Ijipt n'afọ 1991 mgbe a họpụtara nna ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya gọọmentị Liberia na etiti ọwụwa anyanwụ

Ọ nọrọ afọ anọ na Egypt na afọ abụọ na Cyprus tupu ọ kwaga United States maka kọleji na kọleji Lesley, Cambridge Massachusetts wee bufee ya na Harvard College ebe ọ gụrụ Government na International Relations
Ọ nọrọ afọ ise na-arụ ọrụ maka ego nke onwe ya maka Kọmitii Mmepe akụ na ụba nke gọọmentị Singapore, ọrụ ọ hapụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2010 iji lekwasị anya na FACE Africa

Saratu Iya Aliyu Saratu Iya Aliyu (onye amụrụ na-ụbọchị iri aboụọ na-anọ n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 1948) bụ onye isi iri abụọ nke Nzukọ Na-ahụ Maka Azụmaahịa,Na-ahụ Maka Azụmaahịa, Nrụpụta, Ngwuputa na Ọrụ Ugbo ime-ụlọ nke Naijiria (NACCIMA) na onye isi ụmụ nwanyị nke abụọ mgbe Alaba Lawson gasịrị
Saratu bụ onye nchịkọ azụmahịa Nigerian na Onye Ijikwa nchịkwa nke otu ụlọ ọrụ Sarat
O nwere Asambodo BEd ya na Mahadum Mahadum Ahmadu Bello (ABU), Zaria,Naijiria
Ọ mere nkuzi na Politeknik dị na Kaduna Steeti na Mahadum ABU

Ọ bụ onye natara aha 'Paragon nke kacha mma na nkwalite maka ọrụ dị ukwu nye ala nna anyị' site n'aka ntọala Abubakar Tafawa na 'nnọchiteanya nke udo' nke oge okpukpe na mmekọrita goọmenti mba ụwa maka udo n'ụwa

Tupu ọkwa a, ọ bụ onye isi ndị isi nwunye nke ndị uwe ojii gara aga, Nzukọ Yola; Onye isi oche nke ndị nwunye ndị uwe ojii, Nzukọ Kaduna; Onye isi oche, Ndị Nwunye Na-ahụ Maka Ọha na Ọha, Yola; Onye isi oche, ndị agha na ndị uwe ojii lara ezumike nká; Ochekwa ego, ọgbakọ ndi Ụmụ nwanyi Mmụta na onye otu gbara ndụ, Nzube ịbụ nne na nna gọọmentị Naijiria
A mụrụ Sarafutn'ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Septemba, afọ 1948 na Lagos Naijiria
onye ọ lụrụ, Nuhu Aliyu Labbo bụ Sinetọ gọọmenti nke Naijiria
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria, Kaduna steeti Naijiria nwere nzere bachelọ na mmụta
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi na politeknik nke Kaduna steeti na ABU
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ ugbo

Ọ bụ onye isi oche gara aga nke jikọrọ ọnụ nke ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa nke steeti ndi ụgwu, osote onye isi nke mbụ na nke abụọ NACCIMMA,Osote onye isi NACCIMA na Mba, onye isi nke ịme ụlọ Kaduna, Osote onye isi nke mbụ na nke abụọ ime ụlọ Kaduna na onye nchekwa ego NACCIMA

O nweela ọkwá dị iche iche na mpaghara nkeonwe na Naịjirịa; Onye isi oche nke okike ọrụ na ndigide ndụ UNDP kwadoro, Osote onye isi azụmahịa nke Naijiria na Amerịka nke azụmahịa ime ụlọ na Kaduna, Osote onye isi oche otu ahia ọrụ-gbo nke ime ụlọ na Kaduna, Onye otu UNDP ndị nwere oke n'okike ọrụ na Nkwado obibi na ndigide ndụ na Kaduna, onye otu na-ahụ maka mmemme ịchụpụ ịda ogbenye na Kaduna, onye otu kansụl na-ahụ maka ụgbọ mmiri na Naijiria, onye otu ndị nwere oke na mbadamba FEAP na onye na-echekwa ego na Naijiria Azụmahịa ime ụlọ Niger
Sargent Claude Johnson (ubochí asaá n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1888 rụo ụbọchị irí n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1967) bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe Africa America mbụ na-arụ ọrụ na California iji nweta aha mba
A maara ya màkà ụdị Abstract Figurative na Early Modern
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, onye na-akpụ ite, ónyé na'ere ite, onye-ebi akwụkwọ, ónyé na na-ese foto, onye na - onye na-egbu ihe, na ónyé na-akwa ihe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi dịgasị iche iche, gụnyere ceramics, ụrọ, mmanụ, nkume, terra-cotta, watercolor, na osisi
Sargent Johnson bụ nwá nké atọ n'ime ụmụ isii, nke nna sitere na Sweden na nne sitere na ndị Africa America na ndị Cherokee
Nnà ya nwụrụ na 1897, nne ya nwụkwara n'ọrịa ụkwara nta naanị afọ ise ka nke ahụ gasịrị, na 1902
Sargent, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ya na ụmụnne ya, gàrà soro nwanne nna ha, Sherman Jackson Williams, na nwunye ya, May Howard Jackson, bírí na Washington
May bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ na-ese ihe n'Afrịka America nke na-ahụ màkà ihe osise ndị nwere isiokwu Negro, o doro anya na ọ nwere mmetụta na Sargent Johnson mgbè ọ dị obere
Ka e mesịrị, e zigara ụmụ nwoke nke ezinụlọ ahụ n'ụlọ ụmụ mgbei na Worcester, Massachusetts na ụmụ agbọghọ gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ Katọlik màkà ụmụ agbọghọ African American na Native American na Pennsylvania
Dị ka ndị okenye, ụfọdụ n'ime ụmụnne Sargent ekwughị na ha bụ ndị Africa America, na-ahọrọ ibi ndụ dị ka ndị American ma ọ bụ ndị Caucasians, ọ bụ ezie na Sargent gosipụtara dị ka ndị Africa America
Sargent Johnson malitere igosi ọrụ ya na Harmon Foundation nke New York na 1926
Site na ntọala ahụ, nke a maara màkà nkwado ya màkà nka ndị Africa America, o gosipụtara ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ya wee bụrụ ónyé a ma ama na mpaghara na mba

E gosipụtara ngụkọta nke ihe 87 na ihe ngosi ahụ na ihe nrite $ 150 maka ọtụtụ ọrụ dị ịrịba ama gara Johnson, 'na-egosi isi porcelain nke nwa Negro, Pearl, na eserese abụọ, otu n'ime ha, Defiant, bụ nke e wuru nke ukwuu ma dị mfe na ụgbọ elu ya dịka ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Mexico nke ógè a'

A naghị etinyekarị ya na ' nka America' n'ihi otu ihe osise ya si eleghara usoro ọdịda anyanwụ ọdịnala anya ma bụrụ nke ọdịbendị mba ọzọ kpaliri, dị ka ndị na-ese ihe na Mexico Diego Rivera, José Clemente Orozco, David Alfaro Siqueiros na ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 1936, Johnson na nwunye ya kewara
E zigara naanị nwa ya nwanyị, Pearl, ka ya na nné ya bírí
Mana, n'afọ 1947, a kpọgara nwunye mbụ Johnson n'ụlọ ọgwụ
N'afọ 1964, ọ nwụrụ na Stockton State Hospital
Na-eduga n'ọnwụ ya, Johnson nọgidere na-enwe mmekọrịta dị mmá na ya ma na-eleta ya mgbè niile
Nwunye ya na ezinụlọ ya nwèrè mmetụta dị ukwuu na ọrụ nka ya, ebe ọ bụ na ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya na-elekwasị anya na ndị ọ hụrụ n'anya
Johnson nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya na California na úbọchị irí n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1967, site na nkụchi obi
Ọ nọwo na-arịa ọrịa angina pectoris siri ike ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri abụọ
Na Febụwarị 23, 2010, Swann Galleries rere Sargent Claude Johnson's Untitled (Standing Woman), ihe a tụrụ atụ, c
1933-35, maka $ 52,800 - ihe ndekọ ire ere n'oge ahụ maka onye na-ese ihe
N'afọ 2009, Mahadum California, Berkeley rere ọrụ Johnson na $ 16463, nke e mesịrị baa uru karịa otu nde dollar
Ọbá akwụkwọ Huntington mechara zụta panel enyemaka redwood nke dị mita iri abụọ na abụọ ma gosipụta ya na nku ọhụrụ ya nke America

Sanni Sari Abacha,bido n'abalị irí abụọ na isii nke (Ọktoba afọ 1978 wee ruo n'abalị atọ nke ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2013) bụ onye Naijiria n'eme ihe egwuregwu bọọlụ nke na-agba nnọchite na bọọlụ nke a gbara maka Kwara United FC
A maghị ihe kpatara ọnwụ ya
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ1996 site na Shooting Stars FC
tupu ọ kwaga na Kwara United FC
na Jenụwarị afọ 2001
Mgbe ọnwa irí na asaa gasịrị na Kwara United FC, a kpọfere ya na Enyimba International FC ma o mesịa kwaga Sharks FC na Julị afọ 2002
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2007, ọ laghachiri na otu mbụ ya bụ Kwara United FC
Michael Owusu Addo (amụrụ na Julaị 10, 1988) nke a maara dị ka Sarkodie bụ onye na-eti egwu, onye na-ede egwu, na onye ọchụnta ego si Tema
Enyemaka ya na ụlọ ọrụ egwu Ghana emeela ka o nweta ọtụtụ otuto, nke gụnyere Vodafone Ghana Music Award maka 'Artiste of the Decade'
A mara ọkwa na ọ bụ onye mmeri mbụ nke BET's Best International Flow artist na 2019 BET Hip Hop Awards
A na-ewerekwa ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi na-akwado ụdị egwu Azonto na ịgba egwu na otu n'etiti ndị rapper Africa kachasị nwee ọganihu n'oge niile
A mụrụ Sarkodie, nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụ ise na July 10, 1988
A zụlitere ya na Koforidua tupu nne na nna ya akwaga Tema ebe ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Tema Methodist Day Senior High School wee gaa IPMC, ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na eserese eserese
Sarkodie malitere ọrụ egwu ya dị ka onye na-eti egwu n'okpuru ala, na-ekere òkè na asọmpi rap Adom FM na-ewu ewu Kasahare Level
Ọ zutere onye bụbu onye njikwa ya Duncan Williams nke Duncwills Entertainment mgbe ọ na-ekere òkè na asọmpi ahụ a kpọtụrụ aha n'elu
Ọ zutekwara ndị egwu Edem na Castro, bụ ndị mere ka ọ mata Hammer of The Last Two, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
N'ịbụ onye rap ya masịrị, Hammer nyere Sarkodie ohere idekọ egwu abụọ maka Edems debut album Volta Regime
N'ịgbaso mmekorita ya na Hammer, Sarkodie dekọrọ abọm izizi ya bụ Makye
Ọ bụ Killbeatz na Jayso mepụtara ya
Abọm ahụ gosipụtara ndị ọbịa si Kwaw Kese, J-Town, Sway na Paedae nke R2Bees
Makye nwetara nyocha dị mma site n'aka ndị nkatọ na ndị na-akwado ya
A kwadoro ya site na egwu egwu e mere na Holy City Gardens na Accra
N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2009, Sarkodie so Busta Rhymes rụọ ọrụ na Busta Rhys Live na Ghana
N'afọ 2010, abụ ya 'Push' na 'Baby' nọ n'ọnọdụ nke itoolu na nke iri na atọ na Joy FM's Top 50 songs of 2009, n'otu n'otu
Otu egwu nke abọm ahụ bụ 'Baby' nke gosipụtara Mugeez nke R2bees ghọrọ ihe na-ewu ewu ozugbo ma nye Sarkodie ihe ngosi
E wepụtara abọm studio nke abụọ nke Sarkodie bụ Rapperholic n'afọ 2012
Ọ na-egosipụta ndị ọbịa si Efya, Chidynma, Mugeez nke R2Bees, Obrafour, Jayso na EL
Abọm ahụ nwetara nkwado ise 'Good Bye', 'One Time For Your Mind', 'You Go Kill Me', 'Living Legend', na 'Onyame N Ruth'
Ọ nwetara nyocha dị mma site n'aka ndị nkatọ egwu
Sarkodie gara njem mba niile iji kwado abọm ahụ
Rapperholic nwetara Sarkodie nhọpụta BET mbụ ya na mmeri sochirinụ
E gosipụtakwara Sarkodie na BET Hip Hop Awards cypher n'akụkụ Talib Kweli, Jean Grae na Ab-Soul
Ọ bụ naanị onye Afrịka gosipụtara na cypher
Na 7 Julaị 2012, Sarkodie malitere njem ya na Canada
Ọ gara United States n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2012, na-eme ihe na obodo na steeti dịka New York City, Ohio, New Jersey, Maryland, Atlanta, Chicago, Texas na Massachusetts
Mgbe ọ tọhapụrụ Rapperholic, Sarkodie malitere njem iji kwalite abọm ahụ
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2012, Sarkodie so R2Bees, Fally Ipupa na Iyanya mee ihe na Africa Unplugged Music Festival
N'afọ 2012, Sarkodie so Ludacris mee 'How Low' na 020 Live concerts
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2013, Sarkodie wepụtara remix nke egwu 'You Go Kill Me'
Abụ ahụ rutere na nọmba 1 na chaatị dị iche iche na Ghana
Remix ya gosipụtara olu sitere na Wizkid, Ice Prince, Navio na EL
Na Jenụwarị afọ 2014, Sarkodie wepụtara abọm studio nke atọ ya bụ Sarkology

N'ịbụ nke edere na Twi, abọm ahụ gosipụtara ndị ọbịa si Fuse ODG, Davido, Tiwa Savage, Banky W, Timaya, 2 Face Idibia, Efya, Mugeez, Obrafour, Burna Boy, Vivian Chidid, Vector, Silvastone, Sk Blinks, Stonebwoy, Joey B, J Town, Lil Shaker, Raquel, Sian, Kofi B, na AKA
Ọ bụ Magnom, Hammer, Killbeatz, Masterkraft na Silvastone, na ndị ọzọ na-emepụta ya
E mere egwu mmalite nke abọm ahụ na Accra Sports Stadium n'ọnwa Disemba
Sarkodie wepụtara remix nke 'Adonai'
Ọ na-egosipụta olu sitere na Castro ma pụta na ndepụta Capital Xtra nke Top 35 Afrobeats Songs
Sarkodie malitere akara ndekọ egwu ya a kpọrọ Sarkcess Music na 2014
Dị ka akụkụ nke mwepụta ahụ, ọ gosipụtara vidiyo maka 'Adonai' (Remix) na 'Special Someone'
Sarkodie weputara egwu 'Megye Wo Girl', 'Love Rocks', 'Chingum', na 'Whine Fi Me' n'okpuru akara ahụ

Na 3 Mee 2014, Sarkodie rụrụ ọrụ na mbipụta nke iri na ise nke Ghana Music Awards Na 7 June 2014, ọ sonyeere Miguel n'elu ikpo okwu iji mee egwu nke ikpeazụ 'How Many Drinks?' na MTV Africa Music Awards
Na June 2014, Sarkodie sonyeere Mi Casa, Lola Rae, Davido, Diamond Platnumz na Tiwa Savage iji dekọọ 'Africa Rising', abụ maka mkpọsa DSTV nke otu aha ahụ
E mere mkpọsa ahụ iji kpalie ndị Afrịka isonye na ọrụ itinye ego na obodo
E wepụtara vidiyo egwu maka 'Africa Rising' na June 24, afọ 2014
Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe South Africa bụ Callback Dream gbara ya ma duzie ya
Na 10 June 2015, Sarkodie wepụtara 'New Guy' nke Ace Hood nyere aka
A tọhapụrụ ya maka oriri dijitalụ na 10 June 2015 site na Sarkcess Music na Ivy League Records

N'ịbụ nke ndị omenkà abụọ ahụ dere ma bụrụ nke CedSolo mepụtara, 'New Guy' bụ abụ hip hop na hip hop nke Afrịka nke nwere amaokwu rap na-agbanwe agbanwe, ebe okwu ya na-ekwu maka ọchịchọ na mkpali Sarkodie maka ihe ịga nke ọma
Mmepe maka 'New Guy' malitere na mbido afọ 2015 mgbe Sarkodie kwụrụ ego rụrụ pụkụ dọla ịrị abụọ na ise iji kpuchie ụgwọ mmepụta metụtara ndekọ ahụ
Ọ chọkwara ka Ace Hood pụta na egwu ahụ n'ihi na o weere ya dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị rapper kachasị ike n'ụwa'
Na 12 Septemba 2015, Sarkodie wepụtara Mary, abọm a na-akpọ aha nne nne ya nwụrụ na 2012
A tọhapụrụ 'Mewu' dị ka onye isi egwu site na abọm ọnwa abụọ tupu mgbe ahụ
E mere nnọkọ nke abọm ahụ na West Hills Mall na Accra
Sarkodie rere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ pụkụ anọ nke abọm ahụ n'ụbọchị mbụ a tọhapụrụ ya
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2016, ọ gwara otu ụmụ akwụkwọ Harvard Business School okwu
N'ịbụ nke isiokwu ya bụ 'The Art of the Hustle', okwu ya bụ isi ihe ịma aka ndị metụtara ịbụ onye egwu Africa
Sarkodie mekwara ihe omume ahụ mgbe okwu ya gasịrị
Sarkodie mere mbipụta nke anọ nke egwu Rapperholic ya n'ụbọchị Krismas
Tiketi maka ihe omume ahụ rere n'ime awa ịrị asaa na abụọ mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2016, Sarkodie so ndị otu egwu The Composers rụọ ọrụ na O2's Indigo venue; DJ Abrantee kwadoro ihe omume ahụ
Sarkodie wepụtara abọm egwu ya nke ise a kpọrọ 'Highest' na 8 Septemba 2017
Ọ nwere egwu iri na itoolu, gụnyere interludes atọ na egwu bonus
N'ịbụ nke a tọhapụrụ site na Sarkcess Music na Dice Recordings, abọm ahụ gosipụtara ndị ọbịa si Jesse Jagz, Moelogo, Flavour, Korede Bello, Victoria Kimani na Big Narstie
Ọ bụ Jayso mepụtara Highest, yana mmepụta ọzọ site na Masterkraft, TSpize, Ced Solo, Nova na Guilty Beatz
Sarkodie wepụtara egwuregwu mbụ ya bụ Alpha na June 2019
EP ahụ nke nwere egwu isii gosipụtara ndị ọbịa si Joey B na Ebony Reigns
Sarkodie mere ihe ọchị maka mmekọrịta ya na Reigns n'oge egwu Ebony Reigns, nke na-echeta onye na-agụ egwu nwụrụ anwụ
O weputara abọm studio ya nke ise Black Love na Disemba 20, 2019
Ọ na-egosipụta ndị ọbịa na-ese ihe dịka Maazị Eazi, Efya, Donae'o, Idris Elba, Stonebwoy, Tekno, Maleek Berry, Herman Suede, King Promise na Kizz Daniel
Abọm ahụ kwadoro site na egwu ndị e wepụtara na mbụ 'Party & Bullshit', 'Saara', 'Do You' na 'Can't Let Go'
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na OkayAfrica na Nọvemba, Sarkodie kwuru na abọm ahụ na-enyocha isiokwu nke ịhụnanya na mmekọrịta ndị isi ojii
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel, 2021, Sarkodie kwupụtara na a ga-ewepụta Abọm egwu ya nke asaa n'oge na-adịghị anya nke akpọrọ 'No Pressure'
E bulitela vidiyo na YouTube, na-atụ anya ihe ndị na-akwado ga-atụ anya site na abọm ahụ
Otú ọ dị, na Julaị 25, 2021, Sarkodie kwupụtara ụbọchị 5 nke abọm ahụ nke a ga-ewepụta na Julayi 30, 2021
Sakodie wepụtara abọm ahụ, No Pressure, na 30th July, 2021
Abọm ahụ gosipụtara Wale, Vic Mensa, Giggs, Cassper Nyovest, Harmonize, Oxlade, Kwesi Arthur, Darko Vibes, Medikal, na MOGmusic
Sarkodie na-abụkarị rap n'asụsụ obodo ya Twi, asụsụ Ghana, a na-ewerekwa ya dị ka 'onye na-eti egwu dị iche iche' n'ihi ụdị egwu dị ichelekana o nwere
A na-akpọkarị Sarkodie otu n'ime ndị na-ese egwu hip hop kachasị n'Afrịka
MTV Base mere ya onye nke isii na ndepụta ya nke ndị MC kachasị mma n'Africa na 2014
N'afọ 2013, Lynx TV họpụtara ya nke mbụ na ndepụta ya nke 'Top 10 Ghanaian Rappers of All Time'
N'afọ 2015, AfricaRankingcom mere ya onye nke atọ na ndepụta ya nke 'Top 10 African Rappers of 2015'
N'afọ 2015, The Guardian depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị ise kachasị egwu hip hop na kọntinent Afrịka
Ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke 8 na Forbes na Channel O's 2013 na 2015 ndepụta nke Top 10 Richest / Bankable African Artistes
N'afọ 2020, ọ meriri 'Artiste of the Year' n'oge Ghana Music Awards USA (GMA USA)
Na Julaị 13, 2013, Sarkodie malitere The Sarkodie Foundation, otu na-enweghị uru nke raara onwe ya nye ịkwado ụmụaka na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla
O nyere onyinye mmesapụ aka na Royal Seed Home Orphanage na Kasoa
Na Disemba 25, 2014, The Foundation malitere mkpọsa ụmụaka na Tema, Ghana, ebe ha nyere ọtụtụ puku ụmụaka akpa osikapa, yogọt na ite ihe ọṅụṅụ
Ha nyekwara akpa ụlọ akwụkwọ, karama mmiri, okpu na ihe ndị ọzọ
Roshi Motman, onye isi oche nke Tigo Telecommunications, bịakwara iji kwado mkpọsa ahụ
Sarkodie nwere akara ejiji Sark site na Yas, nke a malitere na Eprel 27, 2013
Usoro uwe ahụ nwere ihe eji eme ihe maka ụmụ nwoke, ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
N'afọ 2012, a kpughere ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya Brand maka Samsung Electronics na Mahadum Ghana, Legon

Dị ka akụkụ nke ihe omume ahụ, Samsung kpughere Samsung Galaxy Pocket na Chief Hero Phones nke nwere akwụkwọ mgbidi nke Sarkodie na mbinye aka ya; ndị ọrụ nwere ohere ibudata egwu pụrụ iche nke Sarkodia
Ọ malitekwara Obidi Chief headphones ma bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta nkwado na FanMilk Ghana na 2013
Sarkodie na Tigo Telecommunications Ghana na-arụkọ ọrụ ugbu a, akara nke kwadoro njem Rapperholic ya na 2013
Sarkodie nwekwara nkwekọrịta nkwado na Standard Chartered Bank - ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ na-eduga n'Africa yana Guinness Ghana Limited maka ngwaahịa ihe ọṅụṅụ Malt ha
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya maka mkpọsa Afọ nke Nlaghachi; e nyere ya nsọpụrụ ahụ na Creative Arts Industry Forum
N'ọnwa Machị 2021, Sarkodie na obere nwa ya nwanyị gosipụtara na akara ezé ezé nke Ghana - Pepsodent Ghana's #BrushWithMe campaign ad
Emere mkpọsa ahụ iji kpọkọta ndị nne na nna na ndị na-elekọta ha ka ha malite ma gbaa ụmụ ha ume ka ha na-asa ezé ehihie na abalị
Emere nke a iji cheta ụbọchị ahụike ọnụ ụwa
Sarkodie lụrụ Tracy na emume agbamakwụkwọ nke e mere na Tema, Ghana na 17 Julaị 2018
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ
Official website
Onye ọrụ Instagram Profie

Nwa agbọghọ na-eme oriri na ọṅụṅụ sarong (nke a makwaara dị ka SPG) bụ nwanyị nọ na Singapore na (ruo n'ókè dị ala) Peninsular Malaysia nke agbụrụ ndị China bụ ndị na-eso ndị ikom si Europe na-eme mkpapụ ma ọ bụ na-emekọrịta ihe
Okwu a bụ 'Nwa nwanyị Sarong Party' nwere mgbọrọgwụ na-adịghị mma na njedebe 1940s ruo mmalite 1950s mgbe Alaeze Ukwu Britain ka na-achị Singapore
Dị ka omume n'ozuzu, ndị agha Britain na-akpakọrịta nke ukwuu n'etiti onwe ha, dịka ọkwa ndị agha na ọkwa ha si dị (ya bụ ndị isi na-emegide ndị ikom)
Agbanyeghị, enwere oge ụfọdụ mgbe akpọrọ “ndị ọbịa” ndị obodo Singapore kpọmkwem ka ha bịa na mmemme ọha nke ndị Britain na-akwado

A malitere iji okwu ahụ bụ 'Pati Sarong' kọwaa ọrụ mmekọrịta nke gụnyere 'ụmụ nwanyị' obodo a kpọrọ òkù bụ ndị yi sarong, okwu obodo maka uwe mwụda gburugburu nke a ma ama n'etiti ndị nwoke na ndị nwanyị Singapore oge ahụ
Sarra Belhocine (amụrụ na Septemba 18, 1994 na Algiers) bụ onye Algeria na egwu volleyball
Ọ gbara bọọlụ n'otu egwuregwu volleyball ụmụ nwanyị Algeria na 2012 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Sarua (nkè á makwaara dị ka Sarwa, Saroua) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asia nkè á na-asụ ná ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Chad
Saruba Colley (amụrụ na ọnwa Febụwarị 5, na afọ 1989 na Sibanor) bụ onye Gambia na-agba ọsọ

O sonyere na asọmpi mita 100 na 2012 Summer Olympics; ọ gbara ọsọ na 1221 sekọnd, na-eme ka ọ ruo eru maka Round 1, na Round 1 na 1206 sekọnd، nke setịpụrụ ndekọ mba Gambia mana emeghị ka ọ ruo na ọkara ikpeazụ
Osabuohien Osaretin (amụrụ na Machị 17, na afo 1989), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Sarz, bụ onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye egwu na Naijiria
A mụrụ ya na Benin City, Edo State, a maara ya nke ọma maka akara Sarz On The Beat / 'Really', na mmalite ma ọ bụ njedebe nke egwu ya niile
Ọrụ mmepụta kredit mbụ ya bụ maka Lord of Ajasa's 'See Drama' na afo 2007
O mepụtara egwu maka Wizkid, Naeto C, Banky W, Skales, Shank, Reminisce, Goldie Harvey, eLDee, Wande Coal, YQ na Niniola
Ọ bịanyere aka na Trybe Records, mana ọ hapụrụ uwe ahụ mgbe nkwekọrịta ya gwụchara na ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2013
N'afọ 2010, Sarz mepụtara egwu 'Jor Oh' na remix maka Jahbless nke gosipụtara Durella, RuggedMan, Reminisce, Ice Prince na eLDee

Egwu a meriri 'Best Street Hop' ma a họpụtara ya maka 'Best Collaboration' na The Headies N'afọ 2011, ọ mepụtara Shank's 'Salute', eLDee's 'Today Today' & 'Wash Wash', Skales 'Mukulu', Goldie Harvey's 'Don't Touch my Body' na Reminisce's 'Kako Bi Chicken'
A họpụtara 'Kako Bi Chicken' maka 'Best Street Hop' na The Headies, afọ 2012
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ọ mepụtara naanị eLDee's Undeniable album (ma e wezụga 'We Made It')
A họpụtara Sarz maka Nigeria Entertainment Awards afọ 2012 'Producer of the Year' award ya na Don Jazzy
Ọ bụ ezie na Don Jazzy meriri ihe nrite ahụ, o mechara nye Sarz ihe nrite ahụ
Sarz meriri 'Best New Producer' na afo 2012 Dynamix Awards
Ọ gara n'ihu wepụta egwu mbụ ya 'Beat Of Life (Samba) nke gosipụtara Nigerian Artiste, Wizkid site na abọm ya na-abịanụ
N'afọ 2013, o mepụtara egwu abụọ na abọm Wizkid's Ayo, 'Jaiye Jaiye' nke gosipụtara Femi Kuti na 'Kilofe'

A kpọtụrụ ya aha dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta egwu ọhụrụ ise na-enye Don Jazzy ọsọ maka ego ya site na Premium Times Nigeria A kọrọ na Sarz bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwado na Nike mgbe afọ ahụ gasịrị
Sarz bụ onye na-emepụta ihe maka egwu Hennessy Artistry afọ 2014 'Dance Go (Eau de Vie) nke gosipụtara Wizkid na 2Face Idibia
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2020, Sarz na Shizzi kpebiri ịga biri na Instagram maka ihu 'The Battle of Hits' na 30 Machị na afọ 2020 nke dọtara ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu nke ndị na-ekiri ihe nkiri 192k n'ụwa niile

Sasekani Janet Manzini (amụrụ na 13 Mee, na afọ 1979) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka MEC maka ahụike na gọọmentị mpaghara Mpumalanga, nke a họpụtara na Julaị, na afọ 2018 yana ọnụ na-ekwuchitere mpaghara nke African National Congress (ANC) na Mpumalanga
A họpụtara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na kọmitii ntụziaka mpaghara nke ANC (PEC) na Disemba, na afọ 2015 site n'ọkwa odeakwụkwọ nke African National Congress Youth League (ANCYL)
Manzini jere ozi dị ka MEC maka Ngalaba Ọrụ Ọha, Okporo ụzọ na Njem nke mpaghara site n'Ogost, na afọ 2016 ruo Julai, na afọ 2018
Ọ bụ onye otu Mpumalanga Provincial Legislature kemgbe Febrụwarị, na afọ 2016
A mụrụ Manzini na 13 Mee na afọ 1979 na Madras Village na mpụga Bushbuckridge na mpaghara Transvaal, ugbu a Mpumalanga
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Orhovelani
O mechara nweta asambodo post-matric na ahịa na ọchịchị obodo
Manzini sonyeere ANC na ndị ntorobịa ya mgbe ọ na-eto eto
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye kansụl obodo nke Bushbuckridge Local Municipality ma jee ozi dị ka onye otu kọmitii onye isi obodo (MMC)
E mechara họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ mpaghara nke otu ndị ntorobịa ANC na Mpumalanga
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka onye otu Mpumalanga Provincial Legislature na Febụwarị 2016
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2016, onye isi ala David Mabuza họpụtara ya dị ka MEC maka Ọrụ Ọha, Okporo ụzọ na Njem

Onye isi ala Refilwe Mtsweni-Tsipane mere Manzini MEC ahụike ọhụrụ na Julaị na afọ 2018 mgbe ndị mmegide Democratic Alliance (DA) mere mkpesa banyere arụmọrụ nke Health MEC Gillion Mashego, onye e mere MEC ọhụrụ nke Public Works
Manzini laghachiri n'ọkwa nke Health MEC mgbe ntuli aka South Africa nke Mee, na afọ 2019 gasịrị mgbe a họpụtara Mtsweni-Tsipane ka ọ gaa n'ihu dị ka onye isi ala nke Mpumalanga
A họpụtakwara Manzini maka oge mbụ ya zuru oke dị ka MPL
Sasha-Lee Davids amụrụ na Atlantis, Western Cape, South Africa bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye meriri Idols oge 5 nke South Africa n'afọ 2009
Ọ bụkwa onye mmeri nke ihe ngosi TV nke afọ 2008 'Matrix' oge 2
Davids si Atlantis na Western Cape
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ iri, ma nna ya bụkwa pastọ
E bu ụzọ kwupụta Sasha-Lee Davids dịka naanị onye mmeri mgbe ọ bụsịrị abụ onye mmeri ahụ bụ 'True Believer'
Mana o doro anya na e nwere ngwakọta na ntuli aka na-abịarute mgbe oge nkwụsị n'abalị nke njedebe
E zigara ozi SMS ahụ tupu oge nkwụsị mana a natara ya naanị mgbe oge ahụ gasịrị
M-Net mere ka ọha na eze mara banyere okwu ahụ n'ime otu ụbọchị ma mesie onye ọ bụla obi ike na a ga-edegharị vootu ngwa ngwa o kwere mee
Ntughari ahụ gosiri na Jason Hartman, onye na-esote n'oge ahụ bụ onye mmeri n'ezie, na votu otu nde na ụmụ atọ, ma ọ bụ pacenti iri ise na anọ nke ngụkọta
Sasha-Lee bụ onye nke abụọ, nke otu nde vootu, n' otu uma ma ọ bụ pacenti iri anọ na isii
Otú ọ dị, M-Net kpebiri na 'votu narị puku abụọ abụghị ihe dị iche nnukwu, na nsonaazụ ya dị nso, naanị ihe ziri ezi ime n'okpuru ọnọdụ ahụ bụ ikwupụtanjikọ'
