McGill
Schröder malitere inye aka mgbe niile na eserese na ihe osise na-atọ ọchị na akwụkwọ akụkọ dị iche iche
Otu n'ime ọrụ mbụ ya bụ onyinyo James Barry maka The Zingari na 1871
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Zingari ruo mgbe ọ mechiri na 1875
John Schröder, nna ya, nwụrụ n'afọ 1872 mgbe ndụ ya niile na-ezere nkwụ ọkụ na ụtaba
Ibu ọrụ maka ọdịmma ezinụlọ ahụ dakwasịrị nwa nwoke nke okenye
Schröder malitere ugbu a inye nkuzi nka na ise ihe osise
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Cape Town The Lantern, malite mgbe ọ meghere na 1877, tupu ọ kwaga Port Elizabeth maka afọ ole na ole iji rụọ ọrụ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ The Observer na 1878
Cape Argus, Het Volksblad, The Lantern, Excalibur na nke ya kwa izu The Knobkerrie jiri ihe osise ya mee ihe
Ọ kwagara Transvaal na 1889 ebe, mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ, ọ sonyeere The Press na Pretoria
José Carlos Schwarz (Bissau, abalị isii na ọnwa December, 1949 Havana, May 27, 1977) bụ onye Bissau-Guinean na-ede uri na onye na-eti egwu
A na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ndị egwu kachasị mkpa na ndị nwere mmetụta na Guinea-Bissau
A mụrụ José Carlos Schwarz na Bissau (Portuguese Guinea) site n'aka ndị nne na nna bara ọgaranya nke Cape Verdean, Portuguese Guinean na German
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Senegal na Cape Verde na obere oge na Lisbon, ọ laghachiri Guinea-Bissau na 1969
N'afọ 1970, ya na otu ndị enyi (Aliu Bari, Mamadu Bá na Samakê) guzobere otu egwu Cobiana Djazz
Ìgwè ahụ nwere nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma n'ógbè ahụ, n'otu akụkụ n'ihi na ìgwè ahụ malitere ịkpọ ọtụtụ gumbe, ụdị egwu West Africa
Schwarz dere na Portuguese na French, mana ọ bụrụ abụ na Creole
Ọ ghọkwara onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, wee sonye na mmegide megide onye ọchịchị na-achị ala
A tụrụ ya mkpọrọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ nke Ilha das Galinhas (Guinea-Bissau) maka itinye aka na ọgụ maka nnwere onwe nke mba ya
N'ịbụ onye ahụmahụ a kpaliri, o dere abụ 'Djiu Di Galinha'
Mgbe nnwere onwe nke Guinea-Bissau na 1974, Schwarz ghọrọ onye nduzi nke Ngalaba nka na ọdịbendị, nke na-ahụkwa maka iwu ndị ntorobịa Guinea-Bisau
N'afọ 1977, ọ nwetara ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya Guinea-Bissau na Cuba
Na Mee 27 nke otu afọ ahụ, Schwarz nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọelu na nso Havana
Amamihe, utu aha Sayensị (búrú Science na asụsụ bekee) bu ihe éjị ẹ tu ihe ómárí màkà ihe nor nà àlà há gí jí ẹ ké íwú na ihe kààkà maka uwa nke há mùrù
Mgbe ómárí kárùrù, ọ dị ọtu hé shị né mé ihe gi gbanwe kà nke ọtu ė shì nẹ mẹ ihe nke bu nke di nma gị bu nke ndi amamihe gi ji e me ihe na amamihe
Iheȧ bu nlė na nlė, í lé otụ ihe dị, Í mà ihe, ómúmú-ónúọgụgụ, na Í jé ihe
Í bu amamihe bu Í nwéré ómárí zírí na ȯ bụ ézíbóté ihe nà ihü mádụ dí íche íche (ńdíá gà dírí ndi amamihe)
Í ji ihe è tú ézíbóté uzọr é jị nė mė ihe ga bu ihe éjị na kpo mádu onye amamihe

Echiche sayensị na mmepe ( Asụsụ China dị mfe), mgbe ụfọdụ a na-atụgharị ya dịka echiche mmepe sayensị, ma ọ bụ dị ka echiche mmepe sayensị, bụ otu n'ime ụkpụrụ mmekọrịta akụ na ụba na akụ na ụba nke Otu Kọmunist nke China (CPC)
Echiche sayensị na mmepe gụnyere na nkà mmụta sayensị mmekọrịta, nkwado mmepe, ọdịmma mmadụ, ọganihu ọha mmadụ, mmụba ochichi onye kwuo uche ya, na, n'ikpeazụ, okike nkeNdaba mmekọrịta ọha mmadụ
Dị ka nkwupụta nke CCP si kwuo, echiche ahụ na-ejikọ ' Marxism na eziokwu nke China dị ugbu a yana atụmatụ dị n'okpuru oge anyị, ọ na-egosipụtakwa echiche Marxist ụwa na usoro maka mmepe'
Enyere a bụ onye ndu China mbụ Hu Jintao na nchịkwa ya otuto maka ozizi, bụ onye nọ n'ọchịchị site n'afọ 2002 ruo afọ 2012
Edebere echiche ahụ n'ime otu ọchịchị Kọmunist nke akwụkwọ iwu China na Ọgbakọ pati nke iri na asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2007
Gọọmentị China toro ya dị ka onye nọchiri anya ya na echiche mgbatị echiche Marxism-Leninism, Mao Zedong Thought, Deng Xiaoping Theory na atọ na-anọchite anya ya

Ngosipụta sayensị na mmepe gosipụtara ọpụpụ si na nnọchite anya atọ nke Jiang Zemin n'ihi na Ọ tọrọ ntọala imezigharị uto n'ahaghị na nhata nke ka dịrị ndị ọgaranya na ógbè ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri na mma, na -eleghara ime obodo China anya
Ọ na -etinyekwa ike na ọha mmadụ karịa ndị ọkaibe, dị ka David Shambaugh
Usoro echichi tinyere uche na mmadụ karịa ike karịrị nke mmadụ dị n'etiti echiche mmepe sayensị

Echiche nke ndị mmadụ bụ 'iburu ọdịmma ndị mmadụ dị ka mmalite na njedebe nke ọrụ niile, na-aga n'ihu na-egbo mkpa mmadụ nwere n'ọtụtụ akụkụ ma na-akwalite mmepe mmadụ niile' Ọ gụnyere akụkụ anọ akọwapụtara

N'abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 2003, Hu Jintao kwupụtara nke mbụ n'oge nyocha ya na Guangdong 'Anyị ga -asọpụrụ echiche zuru oke maka mmepe' n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa Julai nke otu afọ ahụ, Hu Jintao kwupụtara n'ụzọ zuru oke na ogbako ọrụ mgbochi na ịchịkwa SARS nke mba 'Anyị ga-agbadosi ike n'echiche mmepe nke mmepe a haziri ahazi, mmepe okirikiri, na mmepe ga-adigide' A na -ahụta nke a dị ka atụmatụ sayensị na mmepe
Mpụta mbụ nke okwu ahụ

N'abalị iri na anọ nke ọnwa ọktoba afọ 2003, na nnọkọ oge nke atọ nke Kọmitii etiti nke iri na isii nke otu Kọmunist nke China, Hu Jintao kwupụtara n'ụzọ doro anya 'Na-agbaso ndị bu mmadụ n'obi, guzobe echiche mmepe zuru oke, echiche mmepe a haziri ma na-adigide, ma na-akwalite mmepe akụ na ụba, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na gburugburu nile
'Atụmatụ mkpokọta '
Nzukọ a tinyere mmụọ nke okwu Hu Jintao n'ime mkpebi ikpeazụ, e mekwara ka echiche nke mmepe sayensị wee zuo oke ma guzosie ike dịka otu n'ime echiche na-achị otu Kọmunist nke China
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịri, Kọmitii Etiti nke otu Kọmunist nke China haziri ngwa ngwa “klaasị nyocha pụrụ iche na nguzobe na mmejuputa amụma sayensị na mmepe site n'aka ndị isi mpaghara na ndị minista”

N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2004, na mmemme mmechi nke nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe ahụ, Wen Jiabao rịọrọ ndị otu niile ka ha 'mee ka echiche dịrị n'otu ma mee ka o guzosie ike ma jiri nlezianya tinye echiche sayensị na mmepe' 'ma bulie echiche sayensị mmepe ruo ogo nke 'echiche dị n'otu'
nke ndị otu niile

N'abalị iri nke ọnwa Maachị afọ 2004, Hu Jintao kwuru okwu banyere echiche sayensị banyere mmepe na Nzukọ etiti ma ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ, ihe onwunwe na gburugburu ebe obibi, 'Iji mezuo ebumnuche nke iwulite ọha mmadụ nke ọma n'ụzọ niile wee mepụta ọnọdụ ọhụrụ n'ihe kpatara nhazi mmekọrịta mmadụ nwere njiri mara ndị China, anyị ga-agbadosi ike na mmejuputa Ndị nnọchite anya atọ echiche dị mkpa na mmụọ nke ọgbakọ mba nke iri na isii ', guzosie ike ma jiri akọ na uche mejupụta ndị mmadụ, nke zuru oke, a haziri, na echiche mmepe na-adigide, i jidesi mmepe ike, ihe kacha dị otu a mkpa na nduzi na i weghachite ndụ n'obodo' n'ịtuaka n'echiche mmepe sayensị nke yiri 'nnnọchite anya atọ', E chekwubere na ọ bụ mkpughe kacha zuo oke ma nwee nhọta nke echiche mmepe sayensị ruo ugbu a
N'abalị iri abụọ na otu nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2007, e dere amụma sayensị na mmepe n'ime iwu otu n'ọgbakọ mba nke iri na asaa nke otu Kọmmunist nke China

Malite n'ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 2008, Politburo nke Kọmitii etiti CPC nwere nzukọ n'abalị ise nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 2008, wee kpebie ịmalite n'ọnwa Septemba 2008, n'ihe dị ka otu afọ na ọkara, iji mee nyocha na ọmụmụ miri emi nke ihe omume echiche mmepe sayensị n'ofe ahụ n'otu n'otu
Ogbe izizi bidoro n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2008 wee wuchaa ya na n'afọ Febụwarị nke afọ 2009

Gụnyere akụkụ etiti na nke steeti, mpaghara (mpaghara kwụụrụ onwe, obodo) pati na akụkụ gọọmentị; mba, mpaghara (mpaghara kwụụrụ onwe, obodo) ọgbakọ ndị mmadụ, akụkụ CPPCC, ụlọ ikpe ndị mmadụ, ndị omebe iwu nke ndị mmadụ, na ndị otu ndị mmadụ; Okpu Ihe owuwu na mmepụta Xinjiang ; ụlọ ọrụ etiti na-ejikwa ego nke ọma na ngalaba ya; ụlọ ọrụ ọha no n'okpuru Kọmitii etiti Party na Kansụl Steeti kpọmkwem, ụlọ ọrụ ọha dị n'okpuru Kọmitii etiti, ụlọ ọrụ ọha nke na-elekọta ngalaba dị iche iche nke gọọmentị etiti , na ụlọ ọrụ ọha n'okpuru mpaghara (mpaghara kwụụrụ onwe, obodo) kpọmkwem
Ogbe nke abụọ bidoro n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2009 wee mechaa n'ọnwa Ọgọst nke afọ 2009

Gụnyere obodo (prefecture, Njịkọ, steeti), ogbe (obodo, mpaghara, ọkọlọtọ) pati na akụkụ gọọmentị; obodo (prefecture, steeti, otu), ógbè (obodo, mpaghara, ọkọlọtọ) ọgbakọ ndị mmadụ, akụkụ CPPCC, ụlọ ikpe ndị mmadụ, na iwu ndị mmadụ Na òtù na otu ndị mmadụ; nkewa na usoro nke Okpu Ihe owuwu na mmepụta Xinjiang; ụlọ ọrụ etiti; ụlọ ọrụ dị n'okpuru mpaghara (mpaghara kwụụrụ onwe ya, obodo), ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ dị n'okpuru obodo (mpaghara, steeti na ọgbakọ); kọleji na mahadum, ụlọ akwụkwọ ọkachamara nke abụọ
Ogbe nke atọ bidoro n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2009 e wuchaa ya na n'ọnwa Febụwarị nke afọ 2010

Gụnyere obodo (obodo), agbataobi; obodo nta, obodo; Mpaghara Okpu Ihe owuwu na mmepụta Xinjiang; ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị; ụlọ ọrụ, ndị otu na-elekọta mmadụ, na ndị otu njikọ na-elekọta mmadụ na-esonyeghị n'ihe omume nke abụọ
Ka ọ na-eru afọ 2005, Hu Jintao nọ na-eji echiche sayensị na echiche mmepe dị ka ihe na-ejide ọtụtụ amụma dị iche iche na-enweghị isiokwu ọzọ na-eme ka ha dị n'otu
Ndị a gụnyere imezi ime obodo, ime ka akụ na ụba too ngwa ngwa, iji akụ eme ihe nke ọma, na ndị ọzọ
Scintillometer bụ ngwaọrụ sayensị eji atụle mgbanwe nke ikuku nke mgbanwe nke ikuku na-akpata site na mgbanwe nke okpomọkụ, iru mmiri, na nrụgide
Ọ na-agụnye ihe na-ahụ anya ma ọ bụ redio na ónyé na-anata na nsọtụ dị íchè íchè nke ụzọ mgbasa ikuku
Ónyé nata na-achọpụta ma na-enyocha mgbanwe nkè ike nke mgbaàmà a na-ebute, nke a na-akpọ scintillation

A na-ejikarị ọnụọgụ nkè mgbanwe mgbanwe nké refractive index na usoro nke , nhazi na-adịgide adịgide nkè mgbanwe nke refiractive index, nke bụ oke nke mgbanwe nke mgbanwe nke infractive index n'ime inertial subrange nke turbulence
Ụdị ụfọdụ nké scintillometers, dị ka displaced-beam scintillometer, nwekwara ike ịlele ọnụ ọgụgụ dị n'ime nke refractive index fluctuations, nke bụ obere nha nke eddies na inertial subrange
Scintillometers na-enyekwa ohere ịlele nnyefe okpomọkụ n'etiti elu ụwa na ikuku dị n'elu, nkè a na-akpọ okpomọkụ dị mmá
Inner-scale scintillometers nwekwara iké ịlele ọnụọgụ nke ike na-agbanwe agbanwe na iké na-aga n'ihu
Scipio Moorhead (na-arụ ọrụ c
1773-mgbe 1775) bụ onye na-ese ihe n'ohu Africa-America nké bi na Boston, Massachusetts
A maara Moorhead site na uri nke onye Africa-America na-ede uri nke oge a bụ Phillis Wheatley, nke a raara nye 'Nye S
ónyé na-eto eto African Painter, na ịhụ ọrụ ya', nke e bipụtara na Poems on Various Subjects, Religious and Moral, 1773
A mụtara áhà ya zuru ezu site na ógè marginalia
Moorhead bụ ohu nkè Reverend John Moorhead nke Boston, Massachusetts
Ọ bụ nwunye ónyé ụkọchukwu Sarah Moorhead, onye bụ onye nkụzi nka, kụziiri ya nkà ya maka ise ihe
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ ohu, Scipio Moorhead nwere ọtụtụ ikike nke ndị ọrụ nweere onwe ha
Enweghị ọrụ mbụ nke Scipio ka dị, mana ọ nwere ike ịbụ ónyé a kpọtụrụ aha na mgbasa ozi Boston News-Letter na Jenụwarị 7, 1773, nke kwuru banyere 'onye na-ese ihe ojii
Onye isi ojii nwere ọgụgụ isi pụrụ iche
E rere Scipio na Jenụwarị 1775 dị ka akụkụ nke ire ala
Ebe a na-akpọsa maka ire ahịa ohu, n'akụkụ osisi Liberty, bụ nke ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu mere mkpesa màkà iwepụ ohu

N'afọ 1780, ndị ohu nọ na Massachusetts gbara akwụkwọ maka nnwere onwe nke dugara na mwepụ zuru oke, mana a maghị ma a tọhapụrụ Scipio, ébé ọ bụ na edere ónyé zụrụ ya na enweghị ihe ndekọ nke ebe ọ nọ mgbè afọ 1775 gasịrị
Scott Beale bụ onye ọchụnta ego na-elekọta mmadụ na onye ọrụ gọọmentị etiti nke na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi na-ahụ maka ọrụ zuru ụwa ọnụ na Peace Corps
Tupu ọ rụwa ọrụ gọọmentị, Beale bụ onye guzobere na onye isi ọrụ nke Atlas Corps, usoro mmepe ndu maka ndị ọkachamara na-anaghị achọ uru
Mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya 'reverse Peace Corps', Atlas Corps na-eweta ndị isi si gburugburu ụwa iji jee ozi n'obodo dị iche iche na United States
Beale tolitere na Delaware ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ Tatnall
Ọ gara kọleji na Mahadum Georgetown, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1998
Beale nwere MPA na Mahadum Delaware
Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Georgetown, ọ haziri nzukọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na US
Capitol ma debanye aha ndị ntorobịa na-eme ntuli aka maka Rock the Vote Beale tinyekwara aka maka ịrụ ọrụ Senator Joseph R
Biden Jr
nke Delaware n'oge ahụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, Beale rụrụ ọrụ na Ngalaba Steeti na-alụ ọgụ maka ịzụ ahịa mmadụ na India na Bosnia na-ahazi ntuli aka na ngwụsị afọ 1990
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Ashoka's Youth Venture program na Clinton White House
Beale hiwere Atlas Corps na 2006

Beale bụ onye so Abeer Abdalla dee akwụkwọ nke Millennial Manifesto A Youth Activist Handbook (2003), akwụkwọ banyere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Millennial Generation nke e bipụtara site na mbipụta onwe ya InstantPublisher
Na Jenụwarị 2021, Beale sonyeere Peace Corps dị ka onye isi na-ahụ maka ọrụ zuru ụwa ọnụ n'ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Scott Monroe Sterling (March 2, 1962 , August 27, 1987), nke a maara site na aha egwu DJ Scott La Rock, bụ ónyé America hip-hop disc jockey na ónyé na-emepụta egwu si Bronx, New York
Ọ bụ ónyé guzobere otu hip hop nke East Coast Boogie Down Productions
A na-ekwu na ọnwụ Sterling n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1987 bụ ogbugbu mbụ nke ónyé isi na-eme nkírí hip hop
A mụrụ Scott Sterling na Machị 2, 1962, na Bronx, New York City
Nne na nna ya kewara mgbè ọ dị afọ anọ, ya mere nne ya, Carolyn Morant, ónyé ọrụ ọbọdọ zụlitere ya
Ha si Queens, New York City, kwaga Bronx nke mbụ Morrisania na Morris Heights
Ọ gàrà nkè ọma na agụmakwụkwọ na egwuregwu na Our Saviour Lutheran High School, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1980
Ọ gàrà Castleton State College na Vermont ma nweta akwụkwọ ozi varsity na basketball n'ebe ahụ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1984
Ka ọ ghọtara na ọ gaghị abụ ónyé na-agba bọọlụ bọọlụ, Sterling bịara na-elekwasị anya na egwu
Na Castleton State, ya na Lee Smith na-arụkarị DJ na Doogan's Bar n'abalị Fraịdee
O nyèrè aka mee ka ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ dum màrà egwu sitere na New York City
Scott and White Sleep Center bụ ebe nyocha nke oge a gbasara nsogbu ụra na Temple, Texas
Ọrụ ụlọ nyocha ya na-elekwasị ndị na anya na polysomnography
Ọ nwere ikike site na American Academy of Sleep Medicine
Ọ bụ David Milne-Home guzobere Scottish Meteorological Society n'afọ 1855 na ego onwe ónyé, ọkachasị site n'aka ndị nwe ala bara ọgaranya chọrọ ịchịkọta ihe ndekọ ihu igwe iji melite ọrụ ugbo
Society guzobere ụlọ nyocha ahụ na Ben Nevis, meghere ya n'afọ 1883
N'afọ 1921, Society jikọtara yá nà Royal Meteorological Society
Walter Scott Williams, onye a maara dịka Scotty ATL, bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu, onye na-ede egwu, ónyé mmepụta ndekọ na onye ọchụnta ego
ATL na-ekwu na ọ bụ nne na nna ya abụọ nwere mmasị na hip-hop, na-ekwu maka na nne ya na-akpọkarị 2Pac gburugburu ụlọ
Ka ọ na-etolite, ọ nwèrè mmasị dị ukwuu na egwu, ya na enyi ya, Eze J, ónyé bụ ónyé na-eti egwu
ATL jiri ngwá ọrụ ahụ mepụta ụlọ ndekọ n'okpuru ala ezinụlọ ya, wee malite idekọ CD iji ree n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Scotty ATL guzobere ákàrá nké ya Cool Club
O wepụtara ọrụ dịka In The Meantime, The Jiffy Cornbread Experience, FAITH (Forever Atlanta In The Heart), In The Meantme 2 na SPAGHETTI Junction
N'afọ 2014, ọ sonyeere ónyé na-ese ihe na Grammy BoB's No Genre imprint wee malite njem mba niile nke akpọrọ Cool Club Tour
N'afọ sochirinụ, e gosipụtara ya na remix nke Curren$y's 'Cloud IX' wee soro ya pụta na The Cooligan, ọrụ egwu iri na isii nke DJ Scream na DJ Mike Mars kwadoro
Mixtape ahụ gosipụtara njikọ aka na Curren$y, CyHi The Prynce, 8Ball, Devin The Dude na BOB, yana mmepụta ihe na KE On The Track, DJ Burn One na Drumma Boy
Pannus, ma ọ bụ igwe ojii scud, bụ ụdị igwe ojii fractus dị ala n'elu ala, nké dịpụrụ adịpụ, na nke na-adịghị mmá, nke a na-ahụ n'okpuru nimbostratus, cumulonimbus, altostratus na igwe ojii cumulus
Ígwé ojii ndị a na-adịkarị mmá ma ọ bụ na-acha odo odo
Mgbe e jidere ya na mpụga (downdraft) n'okpuru égbè eluigwe, igwe ojii scud ga-aga ngwa ngwa karịa ígwé ojii oké ifufe n'onwe ha
Ọ bụrụ na igwe ojii nné na nnà nke ígwé ojii scud na-ejikọta na mberede ga-apụ n'anya, a gaghị enwe ike ịgwa ihe mgbakwunye igwe ojii pannus ma e wezụga ọdịdị igwe ojii fractus
Mgbè ọ nọ N'ébé na-abanye (updraft), ígwé ojii scud na-arị elu ma nwee ike igosi mmegharị n'akụkụ site na obere ruo nnukwu
A na-emepụta igwé ojii Pannus ka ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ (ma na-adịkarị mmiri) nke égbè eluigwe na-ebuli ikuku na-okpomọkụ dị nso n'elu
Ígwé ojii ndị a na-agbakọta ka ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ, nke na-ekpuchi mmiri na-agbanye site na ịrịgo ma na-ebupụ ya n'èzí site na oké ifufe ahụ
A na-ahụkarị ígwé ojii Scud n'akụkụ ihu oké ifufe
N'ébé a nke oké ifufe, a na-ejikọkarị scud na igwe ojii shelf
Ígwé ojii Pannus nwekwara ike ịpụta mgbe ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ na-ekpuchi mmiri ozuzo site na downdraft
Scud na-etolite na mpaghara a nke oké ifufe ahụ, ma ọ bụrụ na ọ na-aga n'akụkụ, ga-aga n'ime n'akụkụ elu
Scud na-arị elu nwèrè ike ịbịakọta ma hazie n'ime igwe ojii mgbidi
Isi ihe iji mee ka ọdịiche dị n'etiti ígwé ojii scud, igwe ojii mgbidi, ma ọ bụ igwe ojii funnel bụ ịchọta ihe ịrịba ama nke ntụgharị ma ọ bụ iji chọpụta ma ha na-agbakwunye na ala nke égbè eluigwe
A na-ejikarị igwe ojii Pannus eme ihe na-ezighị ezi màkà ajọ ifufe na-eto eto, landspout, ma ọ bụ mmiri
A na-achọpụta ọdịiche ahụ site n'ịhụ ọnụnọ ma ọ bụ enweghị ntụgharị (ọ bụghị naanị mmegharị) nkè ígwé ojii scud
Ọ bụrụ na ntụgharị dị, mgbè ahụ, tornado, landspout, ma ọ bụ mmiri nwéré ike, na ka ntụgharị ahụ siri ike, o yikarịrị ka ọ ga-ekwe omume
Ikiri igwe ojii scud pụtara na enwere nimbostratus ma ọ bụ ígwé ojii nne na nna cumulonimbus
Mmiri ozuzo, akụ́ mmiri ígwè, ifufe siri ike, na àmụ̀mà nwere ike ịtụ anya site na ígwé ojii nne na nna dabere na ụdị ya
Ewezuga igosi ihu ígwé siri ike, igwe ojii scud enweghị mmerụ ahụ
SE, Se, ma ọ bụ Sé nwere ike ịrụtụ aka na
Sealy (nke bụbu Sealy Corporation) bụ ụdị matarasị America nke Tempur Sealy International na-ere ma na-ere
Ọ na-enweta aha ya site n'obodo ebe ụlọ ọrụ Sealy malitere, Sealy, Texas, United States
N'afọ 1881, onye na-ewu ụlọ mmanya Daniel Haynes biri na Sealy, Texas, nke dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Houston
Ọ malitere ime matarasị jupụtara na ogho maka ndị enyi ya na ndị agbata obi ya
N'afọ 1889, o wepụtara ihe e mepụtara nke na-agbanye ogho maka iji ya mee ihe na matarasị ya

N'ikpeazụ, matarasị ahụ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama nke na o nwere ike ire ikike ikike ndị na-emepụta ndị mmadụ n'ihe dị ka onye isi oche nkeji nkeji nke ụmụaka hụrụ n'anya nwụrụ nke ụwa a na ímé ihe ọ bụla n'ime ihe na ahịa ndị ọzọ
E chepụtara okwu ahụ bụ 'Matarasị from Sealy' iji kọwaa ihe e mepụtara

N'afọ 1906, mgbe ọ nwesịrị ndị mmadụ n'ihe dị ka onye isi dị otú na ekiri ihe nkiri nke ụwa na ngwa ihe ịga nke ọma dị ka onye isi mgbasa ozi, Earl Edwards zụrụ ikike ikike ma nweta ihe ọmụma n'aka Haynes
Edwards weere aha 'Sealy' maka ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ ya wee gbasaa ya n'ahịa mba
N'ihi enweghị ego maka imepụta, Sealy gbasaa site na iji mgbasawanye ikikere yiri nke Coca-Cola
Ka ọ na-erule 1920, Sealy nwere ụlọ ọrụ 28 nwere ikikere ma bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ matarasị mbụ gbasaa site na iji mmemme ikikere
N'oge Oké Ndakpọ Akụ̀ na Ụba, ụlọ ọrụ matarasị ahụ dakwasịrị ya nke ukwuu
Sealy tụfuru ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-enweta ikikere ya ma jiri ihe mgbochi gbanahụ akụnụba n'onwe ya
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ jikọtara ya na ndị nwere ikikere dị ndụ wee mepụta ihe a maara ugbu a dị ka Sealy, Incorporated
Sealy rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere ahịa site na isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Chicago

Ndị na-enye ya ikike, n'okpuru usoro nkwekọrịta na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site n'aka Onye Okike nyere mmadụ n'ihe ndị na ikikere ha, naanị ihe a na-eche na ha ga-ere n'ógbè azụmaahịa a họpụtara nke na-emegideghị ndị nke ndị ọzọ
Onye nwere ikikere kachasị ukwuu, ụlọ ọrụ Ohio Matarasị ụlọ ọrụ nke dị na Cleveland (nke ezinụlọ Wuliger guzobere ma Ernest M
Wuliger na-arụ ọrụ), mebiri ihe mgbochi ndị ọzọ ụra mbụ Nile dị ndụ ebighị dị ndụ na ụra site na afo nwela onwa iri ndị a ma ree ya n'ahịa echekwara maka ndị ọzọ
Esemokwu ahụ mere ka Ohio Mattress tinye akwụkwọ megide Sealy na 1971
E kpebiri okwu ahụ afọ iri na ise ka e mesịrị site na ndi mádu ziri na ishi na obodo bu mkpuru órí ndị mere mmehie aka n'ime ụmụ na mmeri fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ Ohio Mattress

N'enweghị ike ịpụta na onyinye $ 77m, Sealy Incorporated na ndị niile ma e wezụga otu n'ime ndị ọzọ na-ere ahịa ka a manyere ha ree Ohio Matarasị, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ghọkwara onye na-emepụta ihe ndina kachasị n'ụwa site na ahịa
Ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ na-ere ahịa Gibbons Green Van Amerongen weghaara Sealy n'onwe ya n'April 1989, nkwekọrịta nke mere ka ndị na-ere Sealy US $ 965m
Mbụ, Boston gbazinyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ụgwọ dịka Drexel Burnham Lambert na-abanye na nsogbu na ahịa junk bond na-akpọnwụ, ma na-arapara na mgbazinye ahụ
Nkwekọrịta ahụ dara, nke a maara dị ka 'ihe ndina na-ere ọkụ', dugara na mbelata dị egwu na ịzụta
Gibbons Green gbasara ma manye First Boston ịbanye n'aka Credit Suisse
N'afọ 1990, Ohio Mattress weere aha Sealy nke ọ nwetara mgbe ọ zụrụ Sealy Inc
N'afọ 1998, Sealy kwupụtara na ọ na-esi na Cleveland gaa na High Point, North Carolina
Bain Capital na otu ndị isi Sealy nwetara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1997
N'afọ 2004, Kohlberg Kravis Roberts na otu ndị isi Sealy nwetara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Nkwekọrịta ahụ ruru ijeri $ 15 mana gụnyere nnukwu ụgwọ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ụlọ ọrụ onwe onye ruo n'afọ 2005
Na June 30 nke afọ ahụ, ọ mara ọkwa na ọ ga-enye onyinye mbụ n'ihu ọha nke ngwaahịa nkịtị
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwuru na ego sitere na IPO ga-aga ịkwụ ụgwọ, kwado ọrụ zuru ụwa ọnụ na ịkwụ ụgwọ ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo Kohlberg Kravis Roberts iji 'mebie ọrụ anyị n'ọdịnihu n'okpuru nkwekọrịta ọrụ nchịkwa anyị'
Na Septemba 2012, Tempur-Pedic International (TPX) kwupụtara nkwekọrịta ịzụta Sealy (NYSE ZZ) maka ihe dị ka US $ 229 nde
Isi ụlọ ọrụ Sealy dị na Trinity, North Carolina
Ọ bụ ezie na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Sealy na-ekwu na ha bụ ndị na-emepụta matarasị kachasị n'ụwa, Tempur-Pedic nwere ego ka ukwuu karịa Sealy na 2011
Sealy nwere ụlọ ọrụ US 25 na pasent 178 nke ahịa matarasị nke mba ahụ
Sealy na-ere ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime matarasị ya n'okpuru ụdị atọ ya Sealy Posturepedic, Stearns & Foster, na Bassett
E nwere ndị na-enye ikikere na-arụ ọrụ na Australia, Argentina, Bahamas, Colombia, Israel, Jamaica, Japan, New Zealand, South Africa, Thailand na United Kingdom
Àtụ Mattresses
Sean Cameron Michael (a mụrụ na 24 Disemba 1969) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede na onye na-agụ egwu
Onye na-asụ Bekee, ọ na-asukwa Afrikaans nke ọma
A mụrụ Michael na Cape Town, South Africa
Ọ malitere inwe mmasị n'ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, mgbe ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ egwu
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ mụrụ ihe nkiri na Rita Maas-Phillips
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Michael rụrụ ọrụ afọ abụọ ya dịka onye agha na South African Defence Force na Potchefstroom
Mgbe ọtụtụ ọrụ nwa oge (gụnyere ịbụ onye na-ere nri na onye isi nri) o kpebiri ịghọ onye na-eme nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu oge niile
N'ime afọ iri atọ gara aga, Michael emeela ihe karịrị 100 usoro telivishọn mba ụwa, obere ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1993, na-arụ ọrụ Thomas na mgbanwe nke Oziọma Dịka Matiu si kwuo
N'afọ 1996, o nwekwara ọrụ ugboro ugboro na Egoli Place of Gold, ihe nkiri ncha nke South Africa
Ọrụ America mbụ dị mkpa nke Michael bịara n'afọ 2005 mgbe ọ rutere na nkwado nkwado na obere usoro Dean Devlin The Triangle
Ọzọkwa, n'afọ 2008, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri 24 na-eme ka onye ọrụ UN nke France, Charles Solenz, na 24 Redemption
The New York Post wepụtara arụmọrụ Michael na-ekwu na agwa ya 'nwere ike ịbụ onye na-enweghị ọkpụkpụ, onye na-asọ oyi nke e mepụtara maka ihe ngosi a'
N'afọ 2011, Michael gosipụtara ọrụ Thomas Edison na usoro History Channel America The Story of Us, na-enweta ọkwa kachasị elu na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke netwọk
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ bụ onye isi na Animal Planet's TV special Mermaids The Body Found, nke nwetara ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu maka ọwa ahụ kemgbe afọ 2003
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri HBO The Girl and the Strike Back
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'ihu Denzel Washington na Ryan Reynolds na Universal's Safe House
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na oge 1 nke Black Sails
Ihe ngosi ahụ nwetara ọtụtụ Emmy Awards
Oge nke abụọ malitere na Jenụwarị 24, 2015
A tụlere Michael maka onyinye Emmy na SAG maka ọrụ ya na oge nke mbụ na nke abụọ dịka usoro Richard Guthrie
N'afọ 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado nke Lester na ihe nkiri The Salvation, maka onye nduzi Kristian Levring, na Mads Mikkelsen, Eva Green na Jonathan Pryce
Ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Danish malitere na Cannes na nkeji iri na-eguzo ọtọ

N'afọ 2016, onye ọbịa Michael pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi telivishọn US, gụnyere Of Kings and Prophets (ABC), Criminal Minds Beyond Borders (CBS) na Scorpion (CBS)) ebe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri, Shane Copley ma tụgharịa uche ọzọ maka Emmy
N'afọ 2017, ọ laghachiri dịka onye nnọchi anya mba Russia Grigory Krukov na ihe nkiri nkwekọrịta nke USA Shooter na dịka Old Man Heart na Syfy's Blood Drive

Michael na-arụkwa ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke sci-fi 'Tears in the Rain' nke gosipụtara na Boston SciFi Film Festival ma merie ya na Jury na Audience Best Actor Award na SciFi Underground Film Festival na Munich, Germany
A hụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ ọzọ dịka onye isi, Sam na onye nduzi Christopher-Lee Dos Santos 'indie feature 'Last Broken Darkness'
Michael meriri Best Performance by an Actor in a Feature Film maka ọrụ a na Boston SciFi Film Festival (2017)
N'afọ 2018, ọ bụ onye ọbịa gosipụtara dịka The Ghost (Connor) na CBS 'MacGyver (2016 TV series) ma were ya maka nhọpụta Emmy maka ngosipụta ya
Ọrụ ọzọ Michael rụrụ bụ ihe egwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị The Last Victims (ihe nkiri 2019) maka onye nduzi Maynard Kraak

Ihe ngosi Hollywood ya bụ na Pan African Film Festival na Febụwarị 2019, wee mepee Rapid Lion (South African International Film Festival) na 1 Machị 2019, ebe a họpụtara Michael maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ọrụ ndu
Michael wee gaa n'ihu merie Best Lead Actor na Feature Film na South Film and Arts Academy Festival na Chile

N'afọ 2019, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-arụsi ọrụ ike laghachiri na Deep State (usoro ihe nkiri TV) na Fox na Epix dịka Colonel John Russell, yana 'The Devil Speaks' na 'Die Spreeus' maka Kyknet, ebe n'afọ 2020 ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri indie cult 'Fried Barry', 'Triggered' (Samuel Goldwyn Films), The Last Days of American Crime (Netflix), 'A Boere-KrismisTe' (Mnet), yana 'Vagrant Queen' (SyFyory), 'Hist World mere maka Germany na Cars)
N'afọ 2021, a hụrụ Michael na Netflix mbụ 'Angeliena' na onye ọbịa pụtara na 'Die Boekklub' na 'Die Byl' maka Kyknet (South Africa)
O mekwara ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi 'Stay Safe' na 'A Moment'
A na-etinye ya ugbu a dịka onye ndu na 'AST' ihe nkiri franchise nke ọ ga-eme Gideon, onye ndu dị ike nke ọrụ akpa ojii maka CIA
Michael na-ejekwa ozi dịka onye edemede na onye isi mmepụta na Netflix Original feature 'Collision' ugbu a na post-production
Garrett Robin Hamler, ónyé a maara dịka Sean Garrett, bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu, ónyé na-ede egwu, na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ

Ọ bụ ónyé na-ahụ maka usoro ihe osise dị n'elu, ọkachasị Usher's 'Yeah!' nke nọ n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ na Billboard Hot 100 Songs of the Decade maka afọ 2000, na egwu ndị ọzọ o dere nke gụnyere egwu Ciara 'Goodies', egwu izizi nke Teairra Marí 'Make Her Feel Good', egwu Mario 'Break Up', egwu mbụ nke Nicki Minaj 'Massive Attack', egwu egwu egwu mbụ nke The Pussycat Dolls 'Buttons', na Britney Spears' 'Toy Soldier'
Garrett emepụtala irí na asatọ nke ọnụ ọgụgụ otu n'ime afọ asaa nke ịmepụta egwu, na-etinye ya n'ọnọdụ nke ise na ndepụta Billboard nke ndị na-emepụta ihe nwéré ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị
Garrett bụ ónyé mmepụta mbụ iji nweta ihe ịga nke ọma a n'ihe na-erughị afọ iri kemgbe George Martin, ónyé mepụtara 20 ọnụ ọgụgụ-otu maka The Beatles na 1⁄2 afọ site na 1964 ruo 1970
Ọ bụkwa naanị onye na-emepụta hip hop na-arụsi ọrụ ike nke a kpọtụrụ aha na ndepụta Billboard nke ndị na-emepụta nwéré ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị
[citation needed]

Hans Friedrich Hermann Isay (26 June 1920 ̊ 5 October 2015), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Sean Graham, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Ghana a mụrụ na Germany na onye bụbu onye isi agha nke ndị agha Britain
Na ihe gbasara ihe nkiri sinima, a maara ya nke ọma maka iduzi ihe nkiri Ghana The Boy Kenuumas, Jaguar na Two Weeks na Septemba
A mụrụ Graham na 26 June 1920 na Berlin, Germany
N'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ya na ezinụlọ ya gbagara Britain na 1933, o wee gụọ akwụkwọ na Peterhouse, Cambridge
N'oge ndụ ya na Britain, ọ gụrụ Law na Mahadum Cambridge
Mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ malitere, ndụ ya nọ n'ihe ize ndụ, ebe ọ gbanwere aha ya ngwa ngwa ka ọ bụrụ Sean Graham
Mgbe ahụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ntụgharị na ndị agha Britain, ma jiri nwayọọ nwayọọ ghọọ lieutenant-colonel
Ọ nwụrụ na 5 Ọktoba 2015 na London mgbe ọ dị afọ 95
Mgbe agha ahụ biri, Graham ghọrọ onye a na-azụ n'ihe nkiri ya na Paul Rotha na ụlọ ọrụ Elstree
N'afọ 1948, ọ kwagara Ghana ma nye aka n'ibuli ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Ghana n'ime afọ iri
N'afọ 1952, o duziri ihe nkiri izizi ya na The Boy Kumasenu, nke a họpụtara maka BAFTA Best Film Mgbe ahụ ọ kwagara Tunisia maka oge dị mkpirikpi wee laghachi ọrụ na ihe nkiri na London
N'afọ 1957, o duziri ma mepụta ihe ngosi Freedom for Ghana nke nwetara otuto ndị nkatọ
Mgbe ahụ na 1967, e gosipụtara ihe nkiri ya Two Weeks in September n'ọtụtụ mmemme ihe nkiri n'ụwa niile
N'afọ 2015, Gọọmentị Ghana nyere Graham nsọpụrụ steeti n'ihi ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ ya na ihe nkiri Ghana
Sean Slemon (a mụrụ n'afọ 1978 na Cape Town, Republic of South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe n a South Africa nke na-arụ ọrụ na ihe ọkpụkpụ, ntinye na mbipụta
Ọ bi ma na-arụkwa ọrụ na New York City, New York
Slemon gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Michaelis School of Art na Cape Town n'afọ 2001 wee gụchaa nzere Master of Fine Arts na Pratt Institute, na New York City n'ime afọ 2007
Slemon arụla ọrụ na mmepụta na ntinye nke ebe ngosi ihe ógè ochie na ebe nketa na mbà South Africa na ebe ndị ọzọ

Kemgbe afọ 2001, Slemon rụrụ ọrụ na 'The New Northern Cape Legislature Buildings' na Kimberley, Constitutional Hill Museum, Johannesburg, na '46664 A Prisoner Working in the Garden', Nelson Mandela Foundation njem ngosi
Slemon bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe iri na asaa ahọpụtara iji kọwaa echiche nke contour maka ihe banyere Contour The Definitive Line nke Jon Coffelt haziri
Ihe ngosi ahụ gụnyekwara Clayton Colvin na Lee Isaacs
Slemon bụ onye mmeri nke asọmpi Sasol New Signatures nke South Africa n'afọ 2005, e nyekwara ya onyinye ndị ọka ikpe
E nyere ya ọrụ maka ihe banyere Spier Biennial nke izizi n'afọ 2001 ma jee ozi na kọmitii maka Visual Arts Network of South Africa
Seattle bu ama ukwu di ukwu-ukwu di kwa na olile anyanwu nke kárá ama ndi ozor na Amerikạ
O bu kwa ama ka I di ukwu na Washington
Uzor Mmmiri nor na àlà di sere nse ime Puger Souns an Mmiri Washington, di 100 miles na nleda anyanwu nkeji Kánada na Amerikạ, ha kporo amaá shi áhà Ozor Seattle, nke mdo Duwamish na Suquamish
Seattle bu mkpuru ama saraasá nke Seattle-Tacoma-Bellvue, nke iri na ise di ukwu, na nke ukwu di na olile odida anyanwu
O nwere madu rúrú nde anó
Ñ Dr Sebastian Okechukwu Mezu (amuru Eprel 30, 1941) bu onye ode akwukwo na ndi Naijiria, onye oka mmuta, ndi mmadu na eme ihe
Ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Nigeria na ọge 1970
Sebastian Okechukwu Mezu bụ onye amụrụ na Eprel 30, 1941, na Ezeogba, Emekuku, Owerri, Imo State
O nwetara nzere mmuta BA na French (1964) ya na ntakiri na German na Philosophy si Mahadum Georgetown
O nwetara LL
na 1966 site na Mahadum La Salle Extension, Chicago, yana MA (1966), PhD (1967) n'asụsụ Roman sitere na Mahadum Johns Hopkins, Baltimore, Maryland

Mgbe agha Biafra malitere na 1967, n'ihi nnabata nke onyinye ya na aka ya bara uru dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na-eto eto na United States, ebe ọ jiri aka ya sụgharịa akwụkwọ mpịakọta maka obodo ya n'asụsụ French na asụsụ ndị ọzọ, a họpụtara Mezu Gọọmentị Biafran
Onye nnọchite anya pụrụ iche na onye nnọchi anya Abidjan, Ivory Coast, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na asaa site n'aka Colonel C
Odumegwu Ojukwu ma bụrụ onye e nyere ọlụ niile banyere Francophone na Anglophone na West Africa

Mezu bụ ọtụ n'ime ndi na onye nzonazu onye nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ nyocha ihe omimi nke Biafra, Paris, July 1967 - July 1968, mgbe ahụ, nnọchi ndị nnọchi anya gọọmentị ọkara nke Biafra na France na Europe

Ọ bụ onye nnọchite anya Biafran na ọkachamara na French nye ndị nnọchi anya udo dị iche iche gụnyere Ivory Coast (Onye isi ala Félix Houphouët-Boigny ), Senegal, (Onye isi ala Leopold Sedar Senghor ), Gabon (Onye isi ala Albert Bernard Bongo ), na onye nnọchite anya Biafran na ọkachamara French maka udo dị iche iche na ogbako emere na Niamey, Niger Republic (Onye isi ala Hamani Diori, 1968) na Addis-Ababa, Ethiopia (Emperor Haile Selassie, 1968)
Na 1969 Mezu guzobere Black Academy Press, Inc, na Buffalo, New York, otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ izizi ojii nwere ụlọ izizi nke setịpụrụ ụda maka ọmụmụ ndị Africaana na 1960s na US
Black Academy Press ka bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ mbipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ ojii ochie kachasị ogologo taa

N'afọ 1970s, Mezu hiwere ngalaba Imo steeti nke ndị Peoples Democratic Party (NPP) ma bụrụkwa onye odeakwụkwọ nke NPP, Ọ wụnyere ma nyere aka ịhọpụta gọvanọ Samuel Onunaka Sam Mbakwe na aha ndị ọzọ a ma ama

Site na ihe ịga nke ọma nke NPP na ntuli aka ahụ, Mezu ghọrọ Onye isi oche nke Golden Breweries Limited (1979–80), na-edozigharị ma na-atụgharị ebe a na-ere mmanya na-abia na anya n'oge mgbasa Dolla nderi iri na ise; yana onye isi oche nke Imo State Newspapers Ltd ebe o welitere mmegharị ụbọchị nke onye isi ala Nigeria site na puku iri na ise ruo na otu nari puku na iri na ise
Ọ bụ onye isi mkpọsa, onye otu ọdee akwụkwọ na onye isi ụlọ NPP, bụ onye nwetere mmeri mbụ (ihe karịrị 80%) na Imo Steeti, Gubernatorial na Ndị Isi Nchịkwa Naịjirịa na 1979
Otu n'ime asụsụ Gurage, Sebat Bet kewara n'ọtụtụ olumba
A na-ekwu nke ikpeazụ na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ Gurage
Sechaba Brewery Holdings Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide ego na pasenti iri isii na-achịkwa mmasị na Kgalagadi Breweries Limited (KBL) na Botswana Breweries (Pty) Limited
SAB Miller nwere pasenti iri anọ fọdụrụnụ
E depụtara ya na Botswana Stock exchange na 19 Jun 1989
Ndị isi na-ekere òkè na SBHL bụ
Àtụ Anheuser–Busch InBev
Ọnọdụ ikuku nke abụọ bụ ikuku nké mbara ala nkè na-emeghị site na mmụba n'ogè mmepụta nkè kpakpando mbara ala
Ọnọdụ ikuku nké abụọ na-emepụta site na ọrụ mgbawa ugwu dị n'ime, ma ọ bụ site na nchịkọta nke ihe sitere na mmetụ comet
Ọ bụ ihe e ji márá mbara ala ndị dị n'ụwa, nke gụnyere mbárá ala ndị ọzọ dị n'ala na usoro anyanwụ Mercury, Venus, na Mars
Ọnọdụ ikuku nke abụọ dịtụ obere ma e jiri ya tụnyere ikuku nke mbụ dị ka nke Jupiter
Nhazi ọzọ nke ikuku nke abụọ, dịka ọmụmaatụ site na usoro nke ndụ, nwèrè ike ịmepụta ikuku nke atọ, dị ka nke Ụwa [citation needed]

Odeakwụkwọ nke Ngalaba Ahụike na Ọrụ Obodo v JWB na SMB, nke amaala ezie dika Marion's Case, bụ mkpebi na-eduga nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Australia, gbasara ma nwatakịrị nwere ikike ime mkpebi maka onwe ya, na mgbe nke a agaghị ekwe omume, onye nwere ike ime mkpebi maka ha gbasara usoro ahụike dị mkpa
Ọ na-anabata echiche dị na , mkpebi nke House of Lords na England na Wales
'Marion', aha ejiri mara nwa agbọghọ dị afọ iri na anọ nọ n'etiti ikpe a, nwere nkwarụ ọgụgụ isi, ogbi siri ike, epilepsy na nsogbu ndị ọzọ
Nne na nna ya, di na nwunye si Northern Territory chogara iwu site n'aka Ụlọikpe Ezinụlọ nke Australia na-enye ha ikike ka Marion mee hysterectomy na oophrectomy (iwepụ ovaries)
Mmetụta dị irè ga-abụ ịwa ahụ na igbochi Marion inwe ike ịmụ ụmụ na ọtụtụ mmetụta homonụ nke okenye
N'okpuru Iwu Iwu Ezinụlọ, nchegbu bụ isi maka okwu metụtara ụmụaka bụ na ụlọ ikpe ga-eme ihe maka ọdịmma nwatakịrị ahụ

Otụtụ ndị Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu mere ka o doo anya na ọ bụ naanị ikpebi isi ihe gbasara iwu nakwa na mkpebi banyere ihe dị mkpa maka 'mmasị kachasị mma' nke nwatakịrị ahụ ga-ahapụ Ụlọikpe Ezinụlọ Australia mgbe ikpe ahụ gasịrị p
Isi arụmụka iwu nke bilitere bụ onye nwere ikike iwu iji nye ikike maka ọrụ ahụ
Nhọrọ atọ nọkwa yá nne na nna (dị ka ndị nlekọta iwu nke nwa ha nwanyị), Marion ma ọ bụ iwu nke ụlọ ikpe ruru eru, dị ka Ụlọikpe Ezinụlọ nke Australia
A gwara Ụlọikpe zuru ezu nke Ụlọikpe Ezinụlọ ka ha kpebie

Ụlọ ikpe dị elu nabatara ikike nke mmadụ nile iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe n'okpuru iwu mba na nke mba ụwa, ma mee ka ọdịiche dị n'etiti usoro ịwa ahụ na-agwọ ọrịa na-abụghị ọgwụgwọ yana ọrụ nke ndị na-ahụ maka ime ihe maka ọdịmma nke onye ọrịa na-enweghị ike
N'okwu nke ahụ, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu kpebiri na ọ bụ ezie na ndị nne na nna nwere ike ikwenye ọgwụgwọ maka ụmụ ha, ikike ahụ enweghị ka osi gbasa ọgwụgwọ na-abụghị maka ọdịmma nwa ahụ
Ọzọkwa, Ụlọikpe ahụ kwuru na ọ bụrụ na ọgwụgwọ ahụike nwere ịwa ahụ dị ka ebumnuche ya bụ isi, ndị nne na nna enweghị ikike ikwenye n'aha nwa ha
Nkwupụta nke Deane J na ndị nne na nna nwere ike inye nkwenye maka ibi úgwù na-abụghị ọgwụgwọ nke ụmụ nwoke bụ obiter dictum na ọ soghikwa n'ikpe ahụ
Ibi úgwù ụmụ nwoke abụghị ihe iseokwu n'okwu ahụ ma ọ nweghị ihe akaebe ma ọ bụ akaebe e nyere gbasara ibi úgwù ụmụ nwoke p

Sedrick Ervin Huckaby (1975) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke a maara màkà iji nnukwu, impasto paint mepụta murals nke na-eme ka akwa ọdịnala na mmepụta nke nnukwu foto nke na-anọchite anya akụkọ ihe méré eme ya site na ihe oyiyi nke ndị ezinụlọ na ndị agbata obi
Huckaby bụ nwá afọ Fort Worth, Texas
Dị ka nwatakịrị, Huckaby jiri oge na-ese ihe odide site na ihe ngosi TV dị ka Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles na Battlestar Galactica
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gàrà klas na Modern Art Museum, ebe ọ zutere ónyé na-ese ihe Ron Tomlinson, ónyé gbara Huckaby ume ịchụso nka dị ka ọrụ
Ọ gụrụ nka na Mahadum Texas Wesleyan tupu ọ nata Bachelor of Fine Arts na Mahadim Boston na 1997 na Master of Fine Arts site na Mahadam Yale na 1999
Ọ kụziri ihe na Grant Hill Collection of African American Art na Dallas Museum of Art, na site na usoro The Artist's Eye na Kimbell Art Museum na Fort Worth
Ọ bụ osote prọfesọ nke eserese na Ngalaba nke Art na Art History na UT Arlington, ébé ọ na-akụzi kemgbe afọ 2009
Ọ lụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe Letitia Huckaby na nna ụmụ atọ, Rising Sun, Halle Lujah, na Rhema Rain
Huckaby arụwo ọrụ na ihe oyiyi sitere na akwa ruo ọtụtụ afọ, na-ebugharị ha site na ihe ndị dị n'azụ ihe osise n'ime isiokwu nke ọrụ ya
A gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ banyéré ọrụ abstract ya na-emetụta akwa na podcast màkà Painters Table

A na-egosi ọrụ ya na San Francisco Museum of Modern Art, Whitney Museum of American Art, Museum of Fine Arts na Boston, Minneapolis Institute of Art, The Art Institute of Chicago, Nasher Museum of Art na Mahadum Duke, na Blanton Museum of Art
Usoro 2008 ya Big Momma's House gụnyere ihe osise 65, pastel, na eserese e mepụtara n'ime afọ abụọ
Ihe a na-elekwasị anya na nchịkọta a bụ nné nnè ya, Hallie Beatrice Carpenter, ónyé isi ezinụlọ ya na ónyé a maara nke ọma dị ka 'Big Momma'
Ọrụ ya 'A Love Supreme (Spring)' dabeere na egwu jazz nke otu aha ahụ nke John Coltrane, ma gosipụta usoro akwa akwa gafee ákwà ahụ na-ekwusi ike na ịdị arọ na ọdịdị
N'ihe osise a nke nwere mmanụ, ihe osise ndị e sere na ákwà ndị na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na-eṅomi ụda na syncopation nke jazz nke Coltrane mgbe ọ na-asọpụrụ akwa ọdịnala ndị Africa America nke nne nne ya

Usoro ya The 99% - Highand Hills bụ nchịkọta nke foto sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke 2011 Occupy Wall Street movement, na-egosi ọdịiche akụ na ụba nke ndị bi na US site na eserese nke ndị otu obodo na ntinye aka site na onye ọ bụla
A na-egosipụta ihe osise Huckaby na mbipụta February 2020 nke National Geographic, na akụkọ Clotilda, ụgbọ ohu ikpeazụ a maara nke rutere US na 1860
N'afọ 1999, e nyèrè Huckaby Kate Neal Kinley Memorial Fellowship site na Mahadum Illinois, Urbana-Champaign, Illinois
E nyèrè ya Alice Kimball English Traveling Fellowship site na Mahadum Yale na 1999 nke kwadoro njem ya iji mụọ ọrụ Henry Tanner
Ọzọkwa na 1999 e nyere ya Provincetown Fellowship site na Fine Arts Work Center ma mesịa nọrọ ọnwa isii na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ
N'afọ 2001, e nyèrè ya ihe nrite Best of Show ma mesịa mee ihe ngosi onwé ya màkà 20th Carrol Harris Simms National Black Art Competition and Exhibition na African American Museum na Dallas, Texas
Ihe ngosi onwe onye ahọpụtara

See mpempe akwụkwọ bụ obere akwa akwa nke a na-etinye n'etiti etiti ala nke matarasị iji kpuchie ebe dị n'etiti elu azụ na apata ụkwụ onye isi oche nkeji ya ahụ, nke ndị ọkachamara ahụike na-ejikarị eme ihe iji mee ka ndị ọrịa
Enwere ike iji plastik, rọba, ma ọ bụ ogho mee ya, ọ dịkwa ihe dịka ọkara nke nha nke mpempe akwụkwọ nkịtị
Enwere ike iji ya mee ihe n'ọnọdụ matarasị ma ọ na ejiri matarasị rọba mee ihe
Enwere ike itinye mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ n'akụkụ àkwà ma ọ bụ na ọ gaghị etinye ya n'akụkụ ihe ndina ahụ
Mgbe a na-eji mpempe akwụkwọ na-ebugharị ndị ọrịa, a na-akpọ ya mgbe ụfọdụ mpempe akwụkwọ lift
Akwụkwọ ntuziaka ndị nọọsụ na-atụ aro na, mgbe a na-eji plastik ma ọ bụ rọba, a na-etinye akwụkwọ ntuziaka ogho n'elu ya
Ọ bụrụ na a na-eji ntinye maka nsogbụ ndị ọzọ mpempe akwụkwọ a pịrị apị dị ka mpempe akwụkwọ, a na-etinye ọnụ mpempe akwụkwọ bụ onye isi oche nkeji ahụ a pịrị amị n'elu ahụ onye ahụ
A naghị etinye mpempe akwụkwọ ndị a na-eji eme ihe dị ka mpempe akwụkwọ na-ebuli elu, ọ bụ ezie na mgbe ụfọdụ mgbe ịkwaga gasịrị, ha bụ
Sefalana, bụ ụlọ ahịa nri nke abụọ kachasị na Botswana
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ihe karịrị ụlọ ahịa 1200 gafee Africa
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị na Gaborone, Botswana
Sefalana bụ ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze depụtara na Botswana Stock Exchange
E hiwere Sefalana n'afọ 1974 dị ka Sefalana sa Botswana
Seffa (Arabic) bụ okwu Maghrebi maka efere nke semolina cuscus na-atọ ụtọ na bọta, sinamọn, ya na almond
Nri ahụ nwere ike ịgụnye anụ, ma jiri vermicelli maọbụ osikapa were mee ya
A na-eri nri a na ngwụcha nri, tupu e nye ya nri
A na-ejikarị ya eme emume agbamakwụkwọ ọdịnaala na nnọkọ ezinaụlọ
A pụkwara iji ọkụkọ (السفة بالدجاج) maọbụ mkpụrụ vaịn (السفة الحلوة بالزبيب) were mee Seffa

Dịka Emily Gottreich si kwuo, ụdị seffa nke na-agụnye ngwakọta bọta na ọkụkọ, maọbụ anụ ndị ọzọ, bụ 'nri Moroccan pụrụ iche' nke a na-ahụkarị n'ụlọ ndị Alakụba n'ihi mmachibido iwu nri ndị Juu na ngwakọta anụ na mmiri ara ehi n'otu nri

Otú ọ dị, seffa n'ụdị ya dị mfe, nke e ji naanị shuga ya na sinamọn mee ka ọ dị ụtọ, bụ nke ndị Juu Moroccan na-akwadebe na Ndị French makwaara nri a Couscous Sucré et Sec (couscous di uto maobu kpo nku )
E nwezikwara nri cuscus na-atọ ụtọ ma e wezụga seffa, dị ka mesfouf

Sefi Atta onye nke amụrụ n'ọnwa mbụ (Jenụwarị) n'afọ 1964 bụ nwa afọ Naijiria bi n'America
Ọ nwere ihe nrite pụrụ iche site na-ide akwụkwọ, egwuregwu na egwuregwu ndi a na-ekiri n'onyonyo
A tụgharịala ụfọdụ akwụkwọ ya n'ọtụtụ asụsụ di iche iche
Ihe nrite o nwetagoro gụnyere ihe nrite nke odee n'Afịrịka nke si n'aka Wole Soyinka n'afọ 2006 nakwa nke a na-akpọ Noma Award maka mbiputa akwụkwọ n'Afịrịka n'afọ 2009
A mụrụ Sefi Atta mụrụ na Lagos, Nigeria, n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1964, Ha dị ise n' ezinaụlọ a
Nna ya Abdul-Aziz Atta bụ odeakwụkwọ nke gọọmentị Naijiria bụrụkwa Onye Isi ndi ọrụ oyibo wee ganye n'ọnwa ya n'afọ 1972, nne ya bụ Iyabo Atta zụrụ ya
Ọ gara Queen's College, Lagos na Millfield School nke England
N’afọ 1985, ọ nwetara nzere mmụta BA na Mahadum Birmingham
O tozuru etozu dika onye na -ahụ maka ego obodo n'obodo England nakwa mba United States, ebe o kwagara n'afọ 1994
O nwetara nturu ugo mke MFA site na Mahadum Antioch n'afọ 2001
Ọ lụrụ Gboyega Ransome-Kuti, onye dibia oyibo , ọ bụ nwa Olikoye Ransome-Kuti, ha mụrụ otu nwa nwanyị, aha ya bụ Temi
Ụlọ ọrụ ya di na-Lagos bụ nke na-enye nkwado n'ụmụ mwaanyị chọrọ imụta ka esi agụ agụmagụ bụ nke o guzobere iji nweta ego o ji enyere ndi chọrọ imuta ka esi agụ agụmagụ
Ọ na - eke oge ya n’agbata Naịjirịa, England na United States
Atta gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Antiọk dị na Los Angeles ebe a na-akụzi ka esi eji nka ede ederede nke ọma
Mkpirisi akụkọ ụfọdụ o dere pụta ihe n'akwụkwọ Jonal ha bụ 'The Los Angeles Review, Mississippi Review nakwa World Literature Today
Ederede ya apụtala n'akwụkwọ mbipụta dika Time and Libération A tụgharịala akwụkwọ ya n'ọtụtụ asụsụ di iche iche
Akwụkwọ agụmagụ izizi ya a kpọrọ Everything Good Will Come, nwetara ihe oyinye nke Wole Soyinka Prize for Literature in Africa
Akwụkwọ agụmagụ ya

Atta sọ na ndị kara ikpe maka Neustadt International Prize for Literature, n'afọ 2010 ma bia bụrụ nnukwu ọka ikpe n'afọ 2019 maka Caine Prize for African Writing
Nnyocha dị omimi banyere ọrụ ya, Writing Contemporary Nigeria Ka Sefi Atta si kọpụta omenaala na ọdịnaala bụ nke Prọfesọ Walter P

Segun Arinze (amụrụ na 1965 akpọrọ Segun Padonou Aina ) bụ onye n'eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ abụ nke Naijiria
A mụrụ Segun na Onitsha, Anambra State site na nna Yoruba Bamidele Padonu na nne onye Igbo Lydia Padonu
Ọ bụ ọkpara n'ime ụmụaka asaa nke Lydia Padonu bụ onye ọrụ ichọ́ akwa mma
Ọ bụ agbụrụ Badagry, Lagos State
Ọ gara Victory College of Commerce dị na Ilorin, wee gawa Taba Commercial College dị na Kaduna State ka ọ ga gụchaa akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ gụrụ Dramatic Arts na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka Black Arrow nke o nwetara site na ọrụ ọ rụrụ na 1996, ihe nkiri chawapụ̀rụ bụ'Silent Killer' ihe nkiri nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri nwụrụ anwụ bụ Chico Ejiro
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood ibe ya bụ Anne Njemanze, bụ nke mechara bụrụ alụmdi na nwunye na-adịteghi aka
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere otu nwa nwanyị, Renny Morenike, onye a mụrụ n'abalị iri nke ọnwa Mee
Segun malitere ọrụ ọkachamara dị ka onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ ịbụ abụ mere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama na mbụ, nke ahụ bụkwa gachaa mgbe a tọhapụrụ album mbụ ya bụ, Dream, nke na-abachaghị ahịa
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri na Ilorin

Agbanyeghị i ime ihe nkiri, Segun bụkwa onye nkuzi nye ndị n'eme ihe nkiri ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na ụlọ ọrụ mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa , African international Film festival ma ama nke ebe ọ nọ n'ebufe ihe ọmụma ya nye ọgbọ na-esote ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Segun Awolowo Jr
(a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 27 n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1963), bụ onye isi oche nke Nigerian Export Promotion Council, ọkwá ọ malitere kemgbe afọ 2013

Ọ bụ nwa nwa onye bụbu onye mba Naịjirịa, onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na onye ọchịchị, Chief Obafemi Awolowo N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke National Trade Promotion Organizations (TPOs) site na mba ndị otu ECOWAS
Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari na October 12 kwupụtara Dr
Ezra Yakusak dịka onye isi oche ọhụrụ nke NEPC na ọrụ ya na-amalite n'abalị 27 ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2021
A mụrụ Olusegun Awolowo Jr
na 27th nke Septemba afọ 1963 na Segun Awolowo
Nna ya (Segun Awolowo Sr) nwụrụ n'afọ 1963 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na ise site n'ihe mberede ụgbọala n'okporo ụzọ ochie Ibadan-Lagos
A mụrụ ya ọnwa abụọ nna ya nwụsịrị
Segun Jr
gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị n'aka nwanne nne ya, Oriakụ Tola Oyediran (nee Awolowo) na di ya Prof
Kayode Oyediran
Tupu mgbe ahụ, ya na nne ya na ụmụnne ya ndị ọzọ biri
Segun Jr
malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mayhill Convent School n'akụkụ Dolapo Osinbajo, nwunye osote onye isi ala Yemi Osinbajo, niile nọ n'aka Prọfesọ na Oriakụ Oyediran
Site n'ebe ahụ, ọ gara Igbobi College, Yaba, Lagos Steeti maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya ma gụchaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Government College, Ibadan
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara Mahadum Ogun State (nke bụzi Mahadum Olabisi Onabanjo), Ago Iwoye wee nweta nzere LLB
Segun Awolowo rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ iwu nke Abayomi Sogbesan & Co
yana ụlọ ọrụ iwu nke GOK Ajayi & Co
mgbe a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka iwu na Disemba afọ 1989
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ọchịchị onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo dịka onye enyemaka pụrụ iche na ụlọ ọrụ ọdịnala, ịdị uchu iwu na ihe gbasara iwu

Onye isi ala Umaru Musa Yar’Adua họpụtara Maazị Awolowo dịka onye enyemaka pụrụ iche ma soro Federal Capital Territory Administration (FCTA), Abuja rụọ ọrụ dịka odeakwụkwọ maka mmepe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na odeakwụkwọ njem site n'afọ 2007 ruo afọ 2011

Mgbe ntuli aka nke ọchịchị ọhụrụ na 2011, ọ laghachiri n'ọrụ iwu ya ruo na Nọvemba afọ 2013 mgbe Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche / onye isi oche nke Nigerian Export Promotion Council
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke National Trade Promotion Organizations (TPOs) site na mba ndị otu ECOWAS

Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan họpụtara Maazị Segun Awolowo ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Nigerian Export Promotion Council (NEPC) n'afọ 2013 ma ọrụ ya gwụrụ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2017 mana onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara ya ọzọ dịka onye isi oche na onye isi ọrụ na Febụwarị afọ 2018 maka afọ anọ ọzọ
N'ọnwa June 2019, NEPC n'okpuru ndu ya mere atụmatụ mmekorita ya na ụlọ ọrụ na-ere ahịa, Shoprite maka nke ikpeazụ iji bubata ngwaahịa Naịjirịa na mba Afrịka ndị ọzọ
Segun Awolowo na-akwọ ụgbọala Zero Oil Plan, dịka atụmatụ akụ na ụba maka Naịjirịa
E bidoro ya n'afọ 2016
O sonyere ịkwalite atụmatụ ahụ na ngalaba nkeonwe, ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị dị mkpa na ndị mmekọ mmepe mba ụwa na azụmahịa
Zero Oil bụ akụkụ nke Economic Recovery and Growth Plan (ERGP), atụmatụ oge etiti nke Federal Ministry of Budget and National Planning mepụtara

Atụmatụ Zero Oil ya bụ ịbawanye mbupụ mba ahụ site n'ịbawanye mmepụta nke ngwaahịa ndị e mere n'ụlọ, site na mbupụ ihe eji emepụta ihe iji jiri ngwaahịa ndị ọzọ baa uru iji mee ka ego mgbanwe mba ọzọ dịkwuo elu, iji kwalite uru nke ngwaahịa na ọrụ ndị Naijiria mere na mba ọzọ, na ịmepụta ọrụ
Ebumnuche ya bụ ịmepụta $ 30billion na ego mgbanwe mba ọzọ

N'afọ 2018, Segun Awolowo duuru NEPC bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ruru otu ijeri dollar na AFREXIM Bank na Nigerian Export-Import Bank (NEXIM) na mbipụta mbụ nke Intra-African Trade Fair (IATF2018) na Cairo, Egypt; nke ebumnuche ya bụ ịkwalite ahia n'etiti mba Afrịka

lụrụ nwunye ma nwee ụmụ

Patrick Olusegun Odegbami (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Ọgọst afọ1952), nke aha ya na-agbakarị mkpụmkpụ dị ka Segun Odegbami , bụ onye amara dịka ọkachamara n'egwuregwu ịgba bọọlụ n'oge gara aga ọgbara bọọlụ dịka onye nke ihu
A mụrụ Odegbami na 27 August 1952 na Lagos, Nigeria nye Jacob Adebola Odegbami (1911-2003) na Beatrice Bintu Abeke Odegbami (née Olotu) (1921-2018), otu n'ime ụmụ ha asaa
Nna ya bụ nwanne nne nke okenye nke onye edemede Naijiria bụ Amos Tutuola
A zụlitere Odegbami na ugwu obodo Jos, Plateau steeti yana ọtụtụ ndị ezinaụlọ ya ndị ọzọ
Odegbami meriri asọmpị iri anọ na isii ma nyekwa ndị otu mba Naijiria goolu iri abụọ na atọ bụ nke o dugara n'asọmpị iko mba Afrịka nke mbụ n'afọ 1980 n'ala nna ya
Akpọrọ aha mgbakọ na mwepụ, ọ bụ onye a ma ama maka nkà ya na bọl, ọsọ ọsọ na nkenke nke obe ya site na nku aka nri
Ọ gbaara IICC Shooting Stars nke Ibadan ọrụ ya niile, site na 1970 ruo 1984
Aha mbụ akpọrọ 'Mathematical' bụ n'ihi na Segun Odegbami gara wee gụchaa na ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ mbụ nke Naijiria; Polytechnic, Ibadan ebe ọ gụrụ Engineering
Ụmụnne ya abụọ ndị ọzọ sokwa n'egwuregwu ịgba bọọlụ na ọkwa ndị ọzọ

Nwanne ya nwoke nke tọrọ ya bụ Dele Odegbami gbara bọọlụ na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ ruo ochie n'aha ụlọ akwụkwọ ya (Ebenezer Grammar School, Abeokuta), West Academicals, mahadum ya, UNN Nsukka, na nkenke maka ụlọ egwuregwu bọọlụ Lagos
Nwanne ya nwoke nke ọzọ bụ Wole Odegbami, bụkwa onye egwuregwu mba gara aga, gwuru egwu n'otu egwuregwu mba Naijiria afọ iri na otu
Ọ bụ onye odeakụkọ ugbu a na Naịjirịa
Odegbami nwere nwa nwanyị na-abụ abụ n'okpuru aha May7sen
N'afọ 2007 Odegbami pụtara na ihe nkiri Naijiria nke akpọrọ onye chọrọ ịbụ onye nwere nde ego naira nke Frank Edoho kwadoro
Ya na Zebrudaya gbara egwuregwu maka ọrụ ebere wee nye onyinye mmeri ya na The Little Saints' Orphanage na Strong Tower Mission
N'ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 2015, Odegbami kwuru ebumnuche ya ịzọ ọkwa onyeisi oche FIFA
Kpakpando agbapụ
Àtụ NavboxesÀtụ 1978 Africa Cup of Nations Team of the TournamentÀtụ 1980 Africa Cup of Nations Team of the TournamentÀtụ Africa Cup of Nations top scorers
Segun Ogunsanya bụ onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi nchịk nke Airtel Nigeria, enyemaka nke ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta India, nwere enyemaka na mba 14 dị na mpaghara Sahara Africa
N'ọnwa Eprel 2021, a họpụtara Ogunsanya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Airtel Africa, ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka Afrịka nke gụnyere ahịa Afrịka 14 niile dị na mpaghara Sahara
Nhọpụta ya n'ọkwa a ga-amalite na 1 Ọktoba 2021
Ogunsanya nwere nzere bachelọ na Electrical and Electronic Engineering nke ọ nwetara na Mahadum Ife (nke bụzi Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo), n'afọ 1987
Ọ bụkwa Chartered Accountant, nke Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria nabatara
N'afọ 1999, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi njikwa na onye isi nchịkwa nke Coca-Cola Ghana ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi nchịk nke Coca- Cola Sabco, Kenya, n'afọ 2010
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi nke ụlọ akụ ụlọ ahịa nke Ecobank Transnational Inc
site na 2008 ruo 2009
Ogunsanya bụ onye isi nchịkwa na Nigerian Bottling Company Plc site na Septemba 2011, ruo Disemba 2012
A họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke ọrụ Naijiria nke Bharti Airtel, na 26 Nọvemba 2012
N'ọnwa Eprel 2021, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa na-esote na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ nke Airtel Africa Plc, malite na 1 Ọktoba 2021
Surendran ga-anọchi ya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi nchịk nke Airtel Nigeria site na 1 Ọgọst 2021
N'ọnọdụ ọhụrụ ya, Ogunsanya ga-anọchi Raghu Mandava, onye ga-ala ezumike nká
Mandava ga-adị iji nyere ndị isi oche, onye isi oche na onye isi oche nke Airtel Africa Plc, dị ka ọ dị mkpa, maka ọnwa itoolu malite n'October 2021

Segun Moses Toriola (amuru 18 Septemba 1974 na Ilorin, Kwara, Nigeria ) bu onye okachamara n'egwuregwu tebụl tenis nke Naijiria
Ọ bụ ya bụ nwa kacha nta n’ime ụmụnna itoolu ya
Kemgbe 1995, a na-ahọpụta ya dịka onye tebụl tenis Naijiria kacha mma
Ọ so na ndị egwuregwu tebụl tenis kacha elu n'Africa kemgbe etiti 1990s
Enyere ya nọmba 1 n'Afrịka site na 1998 ruo June 2008, mgbe onye Egypt bụ Eli Saleh Ahmed ghọrọ onye na-edu n'egwuregwu Tebụl tenis n'Africa
Agbanyeghị, kemgbe 2009, Toriola abụrụla nọmba 1 n'Africa ọzọ
A ma ya ama maka ụdị egwuregwu a na-adịghị ahụkebe dika n'ihu , nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye mmegide na-adịghị mma maka ndi ọtụtụ
N'agbanyeghị enweghị ezigbo ọrụ ụkwụ, ọ nwere ọmarịcha topspin, nke nyere ya ohere iwepụ ọtụtụ mmeri iwe na ndị egwuregwu ụwa kachasị mma
N'oge ọrụ ya ọ nwetagoro ọtụtụ nrite na asọmpi otu mba ụwa
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị dị mkpa ọ rụzuru bụ
Ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi Summer Olympics nke asaa mpụta mbụ na Barcelona

Nnukwu ihe ọ rụzuru n'egwuregwu Olympik bụ irute n'ikpeazụ n'ọkwa otu ndi nwoke 1/16 n'egwuregwu Olimpik Summer 2008 na Beijing, iti n'etiti ndị ọzọ bụbu onye mba ụwa nke mbu Jean-Michel Saive yana David Zhuang
Ọtụtụ ndị hụrụ asọmpi 1/32 ya na Jean-Michel Saive dị ka otu n'ime ihe pụtara ìhè na asọmpi n'ọkwa otu ndi nwoke
Oh Sang-Eun nke nanwere nnukwu mmasị n'asọmpi meriri ya 4–3 na 1/16 ikpeazụ
Mgbapụta Olimpik nke ise ya mere n'afọ 2008 mere ka ọ bụrụ onye Naijiria mbụ pụtara n'egwuregwu Olympik ise
Ọ mere ihe a n'afọ anọ tupu mgbe ahụ site n'onye ọsọ Mary Onyali nakwa na 2008 site n'aka onye egwuregwu tebụl tenis Bose Kaffo ibe ya
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụsị nke asọmpi Summer Olympik 2008, naanị ndị egwuregwu tenis iri na atọ n'ụwa niile pụtara na asọmpi ise
Site na nsonye ya na 2012 Olympik na London ọ ghọrọ naanị onye na-eme egwuregwu Naijiria pụtara na Olympik isii
Ya mere, o sonyeere João N'Tyamba nke Angola na Maria Mutola nke Mozambique dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu Africa nke atọ na-asọmpi n'ọtụtụ Summer Olympik
2018 ITTF African-Cup
Toriola meriri na 2018 IITF African-Cup, na-etinye nke mbụ na otu 4, na-enye ya ohere iru eru maka Quarter Finals
Na Quarter Finals ahu, Toriola chere ihu wee merie onye na-egwu egwu Congo Saheed Idowu (2-4) nke butere mkpochapụ Toriola
Na agba nke ntinye, Toriola meriri ma Thameur Mamia (3-2) na Sami Kheroff (3-1) iji mechaa asọmpi ahụ na ebe 5th
Ihe nketa
Segun Toriola bụ aha yiri ya na Tebụl Tenis nke Naijiria na nke Africa
N'ịbụ onye meriri ọtụtụ aha Africa ma pụta n'egwuregwu Olympik isii, Toriola enweela mmetụta nke ọma n'ime afọ 40 ya ka etinyere ya mgbe niile n'etiti ndị iri kacha elu n'Africa
Mkpakọrịta ya na ndị otu ya bụ Quadri Aruna n'egwuregwu Men's Doubles na Team maka ịnọchite anya obodo ha bụ Nigeria abụrụla ihe a na-ahụkarị n'ọgbọ ụwa
Sehnaoui (Arabic) bụ aha nna Lebanọn nke nwere ike ịpụta ndia
Sérine Hanaoui (Arabic; amụrụ n'ime Jenụwarị 10, 1988, na Bouïra) bụ onye Algeria na egwu volleyball mba ụwa
Ọ nọchitere anya Algeria na 2008 na 2012 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Nne ya bụbu onye na egwu volleyball nke gbara bọọlụ maka otu mba Algeria n'afọ ndị 1970
Sehwi, nke a makwaara dị ka Sefwi, Esahie, na Asahyue, bụ asụsụ Niger-Congo nke mmadụ 305,000 na-asụ gafee ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Ghana, karịsịa na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ

Ọ bụ asụsụ Kwa nke alaka Central Tano, nke nwere njikọ chiri anya na Anyin, ma nwee ike ịghọta ibe ya na asụsụ Sannvin nke Anyin; asụsụ abụọ ya bụ Wiawso, nke a na-asụ n'ebe ndịda nke mpaghara Sehwi, na Anhwiaso, nke a-asụ na mpaghara ugwu
Ọ bụ asụsụ a na-asụkarị n'etiti ndị Sehwi
IIhe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ndị niile na-ekwu okwu na THWI na TWI, nke a na-eji dị ka asụsụ azụmaahịa na mpaghara

Mohammed Seif al-Din Wanly nke a na-akpọkarị Seif Wanly (سيف وانلي) (March 31, 1906 na February 15, 1979) bụ onye na-ese ihe n'Ijipt
A mụrụ Wanly na Alexandria, Egypt, na 1906 n'ime ezinụlọ nke sitere na Turkey
O webatara nka nke oge a na Ijipt mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ nke onye na-ese ihe n'Ịtali bụ Otorino Becchi
N'afọ 1942, ya na nwanne ya nwoke Adham Wanly guzobere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya ma ha sonyere n'ihe karịrị ihe ngosi iri na asaa, ọkachasị na Biennale nke Venice na São Paulo, Brazil
Na ngwụcha afọ 1950, Wanly gara Nubia iji mepụta usoro ihe osise na eserese na-egosi ndụ na Egypt maka ọrụ gọọmentị iji dekọọ ọdịbendị na ọnọdụ tupu mbata nke mere iji mee ka iwu Aswan High Dam
Taa, a raara ala dum nke Mahmoud Said Museum na Alexandria nye Seif na Adham Wanly
Ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie chịkọtara ọrụ ya
Ndị a gụnyere Mathaf Arab Museum of Modern Art na Doha, Darat AL Funoon na Amman, na Barjeel Art Foundation na Sharjah
Ọ nwụrụ na 1979 na Stockholm mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na abụọ
N'afọ 2015, Google Doodle mere emume ncheta ọmụmụ ya nke afọ otu narị na itoolu
Seita Emori (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1970 na Kanagawa, Japan) bụ onye sayensị gburugburu ebe obibi nke mba Japan nke ọrụ ya a ma ama na-elekwasị anya na mmetụta ụwa nke Global Warming

Ọ gụsịrị nzere Doctorate ya na Mahadum Tokyo n'afọ 1997 ma mesịa sonye na National Institute for Environmental Studies, ebe ọ bụ ugbu a Chief of the Climate Risk Assessment Research Section na Center for Global Environmental Research

N'etiti akwụkwọ Emori bụ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ 'Sensitivity Map of LAI to Precipitation and Surface Air Temperature Variations in a Global Scale' (nke ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya bụ Hiroshi Kanzawa na Jiahua Zhang na Congbin Fu nke START, Institute of Atmospheric Physics na Beijing, China dere)
Sejiro Avoseh (a mụrụ n'afọ 1990) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria nke bi na Canterbury, England
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe a maara nke ọma maka njikọta aka ya nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na akụkụ ụgbọala site na iji eserese na usoro nchịkọta, Sejiro na-eme ihe osise ya site na magazin na akwụkwọ akụkọ
Ọrụ Sejiro bụ akụkọ ndụ ya, na-enye olu dị egwu banyere ọnọdụ ọjọọ nke ndị ogbenye n'okpuru obodo ya, na n'ịdị elu na iji ike eme ihe n'aka ndị ọrụ ọhaneze na ndị isi a họpụtara ahọpụta

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Lagos State Polytechnic na Lagos, Nigeria, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ maka Higher National Diploma na Creative Arts, Sejiro na-agụ akwụkwọ ugbu a maka Masters ya na Fine Art na Mahadum maka Creative Arts, Canterbury, Kent, England

Sekai Holland bụ onye bụbu onye isi ala Zimbabwe maka ọgwụgwọ mba, ime udo na njikọta na kọmitii nke onye isi ala Robert Mugabe na praịm minista Morgan Tsvangirai
Sekai etinyela aka n'ọtụtụ okwu gbasara ikike mmadụ, site na nke ndị Aborigine Australia, na-akwụsị usoro ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa, ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Zimbabwe
Nna ya, onye nkuzi-onye edemede-akwụkwọ akụkọ, Masotsha Mike Hove (1914-2012), a họpụtara ya na afọ 1953 dị ka onye nnọchi anya pụrụ iche na ndị omeiwu nke Central African Federation nke mbụ
O nwere ọdịiche nke ịbụ onye Afrịka mbụ e nyere ikike ka a họpụta ya dịka 'onye ọrụ' n'okpuru iwu ndị metụtara Rhodesian Guild of Journalists na Southern Rhodesia
Sekai Holland gara Australia dị ka nwa akwụkwọ, lụọ onye Australia Jim Holland na afọ 1965, wee gụchaa Bachelor of Arts (Communication) na Mahadum Teknụzụ Sydney na afọ 1979
N'afọ 1980, Sekai na di ya Jim Holland laghachiri Zimbabwe ka ha bụrụ akụkụ nke ọrụ iwu mba mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị
N'afọ ndị afọ 1980 na afọ 1990, Sekai gụsịrị Master of Science (Agricultural Journalism) na Mahadum Wisconsin (Madison), ma rụọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ọrụ afọ ofufo na ọrụ a na-akwụ ụgwọ gụnyere
Sekai bụ onye guzobere njem Anti-Apartheid na Australia na ngwụcha afọ 1960, o nyere aka guzobe Murrawina Child Care Centre na Redfern, ọ rụkwara ọrụ nke ọma na ndị Aboriginal na mkpọsa ikike ala
Sekai nyere aka mee ka Association of Women's Clubs (AWC) dị mkpa ma na-anwụ anwụ, otu nzukọ mmepe ụmụ nwanyị ime obodo nke otu nwanyị Afrika dị afọ 18 guzobere na afọ 1938
Site na Sekai dị ka onye isi oche mba ya, AWC malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike n'ikwu okwu maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị megide gọọmentị Mugabe na-emegbuwanye
Gọọmentị weputara ndị ndu ma machibido ha iwu na AWC

Sekai mere ihe ịma aka n'Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu megide omume gọọmentị wee merie, na-eme akụkọ ihe mere eme na ikpe ikike mmadụ bụ Holland na ndị ọzọ megide Ministrị ndị ọrụ, Ndị na ahụ maka odi mma Mkparita mmadụ na mmadụ dum nọ na obodo

N'afọ 1998, Sekai kwenyesiri ike na mmepe site na ọrụ NGO agaghị ekwe omume n'okpuru ọchịchị Mugabe, ya na Morgan Tsvangirai, ọ malitere Movement for Democratic Change (MDC) dị ka ezigbo ihe ọzọ na-abụghị ọchịchị otu
N'ịbụ nke e guzobere na afọ 1999, MDC bụ naanị ihe ịma aka siri ike nye Onye isi ala Mugabe, onye a na-enwe mmasị na onye dike na-eme mgbanwe, onye chịrị Zimbabwe kemgbe nnwere onwe na afọ 1980
Site na ntuli aka a haziri maka afọ na-esote, a na-eme mkpọsa egwu obi ọjọọ iji menye MDC na-ewu ewu egwu ka ọ ghara isonye na usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Sekai nwetara nsogbu mgbe niile, njide na mgbalị igbu ya
N'afọ ndị 1970 na obodo Zambia, Sekai kwuru okwu megide ime ihe ike na-efe efe megide ndị ZANU na-abanye n'ogige na mmetọ mmekọahụ nke ụmụ nwanyị na-abanye
A kpọrọ ya onye nnupụisi ma maa ya ikpe ọnwụ
N'ịbụ onye a gwara na ndụ ya nọ n'ihe ize ndụ, ọ gbagara Australia (ebe Melbourne Herald bipụtara akụkọ ọnwụ ya!) wee gaa n'ihu na ọrụ ya na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na nnwere onwe Zimbabwe
Ihe kachasị njọ mere n'afọ 2003 mgbe a chụpụrụ ya n'ụlọ ya na Harare na mgbe ahụ, a gbagburu ya na ezinụlọ ya ugboro ugboro mgbe ha na-anwa ịbanye n'ụlọ ha
N'ọnwa Machị, n'afọ 2007, e jidere ya ma mekpọọ ya ọnụ n'ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii nke Harare na ndị isi 39 nke MDC
O nwere ogwe aka gbajiri agbaji, ụkwụ gbajiri agbajiri, ọgịrịga gbajiri agbajọrọ agbaji, na ihe karịrị mmerụ ahụ 80 n'ahụ ya niile n'ihi ụtarị, iti ihe, na ịbụ onye ndị na-ata ahụhụ kụrụ
Sekai nọrọ izu iri na ise n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Zimbabwe, South Afrika na Australia gụnyere ọnwa asatọ na Australia, iji malite ịgbake
N'ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii, azịza nye nyocha nke otu ahụ bụ ngwa ngwa
Ihe karịrị ndị uwe ojii iri na abụọ tiri ha ihe ma gbụ ha ọnụ
Atọ n'ime ọgịrịga Holland gbajiri mgbe otu onye uwe ojii wụbara ya
Mmerụ ahụ iri asatọ Holland merụrụ ahụ gụnyere ogwe aka gbajiri agbaji, ikpere gbajiri agbajiri agbaji na ọkpụkpụ, na ụkwụ nke aka ígwè kụrụ
Ma ọ lanarịrị
'Ọ dị njọ maka Mugabe iti nne nne ihe, ka Peter Murphy nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Zimbabwe nke dị na Sydney kwuru
'A kọrọ ya nke ọma n'Africa niile'
Ọ bụghị na nke mbụ, Holland chere na ọ nwere ike ịnwụ
A chọtara ozu onye na-ese foto, onye sere foto nke Morgan Tsvangirai na-agba ọbara ma na-ebu ibu nke kpatara mmegide zuru ụwa ọnụ, ụbọchị ole na ole ka e mesịrị
N'ịbụ onye a tara ahụhụ ruo ọtụtụ awa, a tụrụ Holland mkpọrọ, ma mechaa tọhapụ ya mgbe ikpe ikpe abụọ gasịrị
Otú ọ dị, n'iwe nke Mugabe, onye nnọchi anya mba Australia duuru ya gaa n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu, ebe a kpọgara ya South Africa maka ọgwụgwọ
Di ya nke Australia, Jim Holland, gwara onye nta akụkọ, sị 'Ọchịchị ahụ gbalịrị ịkụ ya ihe n'okpuru ma daa kpamkpam, ọ makwara na ọ meriri
' Praịm Minista nke Australia n'oge ahụ, John Howard, kpọrọ Mugabe 'ọdachi' na Zimbabwe 'nnukwu nhụsianya'
N'agbanyeghị obi abụọ mbụ banyere iso Mugabe na-arụ ọrụ ọnụ, o kwuru na ọ bụ ihe ziri ezi ime, 'omume siri ike ma dị mkpa n'ihi na ọ chụpụrụ mba anyị na esemokwu zuru oke gaa na mgbanwe'
N'ime Gọọmentị Mgbanwe nke e guzobere na Febụwarị, na afọ 2009, Sekai sooro ndị Minista si n'òtù abụọ ọzọ rụọ ọrụ, dị ka ndị Minista na-ahụ maka ọgwụgwọ mba, nkwekọrịta na njikọta
Ọ kpaliri ụlọ ọrụ a na atụmatụ ọhụrụ nke na-achọ itinye nkwenkwe ọdịbendị na omume ọdịnala Zimbabwe n'ime usoro ọgwụgwọ niile nke nwere omume kachasị mma nke mpaghara, mpaghara na mba ụwa

Ihe owuwu ọhụrụ maka udo dị ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ tụrụ aro na-agba ndị lanarịrị ime ihe ike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ndị merụrụ ahụ na ndị na-eme ya ume ịnakwere akụkọ ihe mere eme na omenala nke ime ihe ike na iji dozie mmebi nke ime ihe nkiri kpatara na usoro iji gbochie ime ihe ike n'ọdịnihu
Kemgbe afọ 2009, Òtù ahụ malitere ọrụ udo na-aga n'ihu nke mmekọrịta dị n'etiti na n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị, ọha na eze na Zimbabwe, mpaghara na mba ụwa dịka

Akpụkpọ ụkwụ maka Udo nke na-agụnye ịnakọta ọtụtụ puku akpụkpọ ụkwụ ọhụrụ site na gburugburu ụwa, iji kesaa ya na ụmụaka ụlọ akwụkwọ na-enweghị akpụkpọ ụkwụ na Zimbabwe si na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị niile

Sekai na United Nations Development Program (UNDP) na-ekwurịta okwu maka Mahadum Midlands steeti iji soro ụlọ ọrụ abụọ dị n'Australia; NSW Service for Treatment and Rehabilitation of Torture and Trauma Survivors (STARTTS) iji guzobe ụlọ ọrụ ahụike uche yiri nke ahụ maka ndị lanarịrị ime ihe ike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Exodus Foundation nke nwere mmemme mmezigharị kwesịrị ekwesị maka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na ndị a chụpụrụ n'ime obodo iji guzo ụlọ ọrụ obodo ndị gbara ọsọ obodo iji nata ma zụọ ndị gbara ọsọ ọsọ ndụ, ndị gbara ọsọ na ndị na ndị na-ala n'ime ime obodo na ndị na ha na ndị na enweghị ala maka njikọta ha n'ime ha
N'ime usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Zimbabwe taa, Sekai na-aga n'ihu na-akwado ụkpụrụ ndị na-adịghị ewu ewu n'ime ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke nnukwu òtù abụọ ahụ
Ọ gara n'ihu na-akwado ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka ma na-ekwukwa okwu megide mmegwa na omenala nke ime ihe ike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Zimbabwe
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2012, a mara ọkwa na Sekai Holland bụ onye nke iri na ise natara Sydney Peace Prize, naanị ihe nrite mba Australia maka udo

Onye Ọkachamara Stuart Rees, Onye isi oche nke Sydney Peace Foundation kwuru, na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya maka agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị ime obodo na ntọala ya nke mmegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke Australia afọ iri ise gara aga, Sekai Holland abụwo onye ndú dị mkpa nke mkpọsa ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na-abụghị nke ime ihe ike, ọ bụkwa onye dị mkpa na mkparịta ụka mba ya banyere otu esi agwọ ọnyá miri emi nke esemokwu ọha na eze

Ihe ndị ọka ikpe nke Sydney Peace Prize kwuru na-agụ, sị 'Sekai Holland maka ndụ obi ike pụrụ iche na mkpọsa maka ikike mmadụ na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, maka ịma ime ihe ike aka n'ụdị ya niile na maka inye ndị ndu dị otú ahụ dị akọ na obi ike maka inye ụmụ nwanyị ike

Mgbe ụfọdụ a na-ele ya anya dị ka esemokwu, ndị natara ya n'oge gara aga gụnyere Onye Ọkachamara Muhammad Yunus, Achịbishọp Desmond Tutu, Mary Robinson (onye bụbu Kọmishọna Ukwu nke Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu, na onye bụbu Onye isi ala nke Ireland), Dr Hanan Ashrawi, onye bụbu Gọvanọ General Sir William Deane, 'Nna nke Mmekọrịta' nke Australia Patrick Dodson, onye edemede India na onye na-eme mkpọsa maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ Arundhati Roy na onye Amerika a ma ama na onye America, Prọ Noam Chomsky
Sekai Holland gara Australia n'ọnwa Nọvemba iji nye City of Sydney Peace Prize Lecture na Sydney Town Hall na Wednesday 7 Nọvemba, na afọ 2012, na-anata afọ 2012 Peace Prize na emume gala n'echi ya

Sekai Machache bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye nlekọta nke bi na Glasgow, Scotland, ma na-arụ ọrụ na mba ụwa
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na foto ma na-achọ ịjụ echiche nke onwe
A mụrụ Sekai Machache n'afọ 1989 na Harare, Zimbabwe N'afọ 2012, Machache gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Duncan nke Jordanstone College of Art & Design (Dundee, Scotland)
N'afọ 2020, ọ natara Morton Award maka onye na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi dabeere na ihe nlereanya, nke Royal Scottish Academy nyere
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọrụ ya gosipụtara na Scottish Black Lives Matter Mural Trail ma ọ ga-esonye n'afọ 2021-2023 Talbot Rice Gallery Residency Programme
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye otu Yon Afro Collective n'afọ 2020, sonyeere Edinburgh Sculpture Workshop dị ka onye nlekọta
Sekinat Adesanya Akinpelu (amụrụ na 25 Julaị 1987) bụ nwaafọ Naijirịa nke n'gbara ha ọsọ n’egwuregwu 400 mita
Oge n'ọsọ egwuregwu kachasị mma ya bụ 5248sekọnd, nke o nwetara n'oge asọmpi mba ụwa 2006
Sekou, nke a kpọkwara Sékou ma ọ bụ Seku, bụ aha enyere site na asụsụ Fula
Ọ dabara na Sheikh Arabic
Ndị nwere aha a gụnyere
Selam Tesfaye (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1992) bụ onye Etiopia na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọrụ ya na-emekarị ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eduzi ihe nkiri dị iche iche
Dị ka onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye, ọkachasị Gumma Awards, ọ bụ otu n'ime ihe ngosi kachasị ewu ewu na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Etiopia
Ọ bụ onye isi omee na ihe nkiri Crumbs, nke Miguel Llansó duziri, ma kwalite ya dị ka ihe nkiri sayensị mbụ nke ndị Etiopia mere
A mụrụ Selam Tesfaye n'ogige ndị agha a na-akpọ 'Tolay', na Harar, n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Etiopia
Ọ kwagara Humera ma mụọ akwụkwọ site na klas nke anọ ruo nke iri n'ebe ahụ
N'oge ọ na-akwaga Addis Ababa, ọ pụghị isu Amharic na mbụ
N'agbanyeghị ihe ọ bụla, ọ gbara mbọ ikwu okwu nke ọma iji mee ihe nkiri
Ọ na-ekwukarị na ọ 'na-ahọrọ ịrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri' karịa ịrụ ọrụ nka ndị ọzọ
Selam batara n'ọkwa na ihe nkiri 2013 Sost Maezen (Bekee Triangle), ihe nkiri natara ihe nrite nke mba ụwa
Ọzọkwa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ndị Etiopia, a makwaara ya maka ọrụ dị mkpa na Hiwot Bedereja (2014), dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na-eche mmegbu nke ụmụ klas ya ihu
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Lik Negn (2013)
Selam mekwara dị ka Sayat na ihe nkiri akụkọ sayensị nke afọ 2015 Crumbs
Mgbe afọ 2016 gachara, o nwetara ọtụtụ ọrụ n'ime ihe nkiri, nke a makwaara site na ngosipụta ya na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri ịhụnanya dị iche iche, Seba Zetegn (2016) na Yimeches Yarada Lij 2 (2017)
A makwaara ya maka ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke afọ 2015 bụ Tilefegn, nke ya na Kassahun Fesseha na-eme
N'afọ 2017, Selam laghachiri na ihe na-esote Sost Maezen, Sost Maecen 2
Na mgbakwunye na nke ahụ, ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị, dị ka Yabedech Yarada Lij 3 na Atse Mandela n'afọ ahụ
Selam na Amanuel Tesfaye nwere mmekọrịta ogologo oge; ha abụọ kwere nkwa ọlụlụ ma lụọ n'afọ 2018
Ha nwere otu nwa
Na agbamakwụkwọ ya, o mere oriri nke kpọtara ụfọdụ ndị ama ama
Ya na nne ya bi ugbu a na Addis Ababa
Na Septemba 2018, Selam meriri ihe nrite Best Actress na 9th Addis Music Awards, maka ihe nkiri Yabedech Yarada Lij

Selassie Ibrahim (amụrụ n'abalị iri na iteghete nke ọnwa Mee ) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, nne, onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka, onye ọchụnta ego na onye isi nke njikwa na mmepụta nke otu Smarttys Selassie Ibrahim emeela ihe nkiri dịka 'Her Mother's Man' nke Desmond Elliott duziri na IROKOtv
O gosipụtala n'otu aka ndị omee bu Freddie Leonard, Uche Jombo, John Dumelo, Shafy Bello na Roselyn Ngissah na ihe nkiri ya '40 looks Good on You'
