Selassie Ibrahim bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Jabneel Impact, otu nzukọ mmepe na-abụghị nke gọọmentị (NGO) nke na-arụ ọrụ na ebumnuche nke iweta ndụ na-adịgide na akụkụ akọwapụtara nke ndị na-adịghị ike na ọha mmadụ anyị na ebumnuche nke ịkwalite ikike ha maka ịrụ ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke ọma site na atụmatụ ndị e ji nlezianya mee
Selassie bụ onye isi oche nke otu mmepụta na njikwa Smarttys ,ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa nke na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi, ihe nkiri, mmepụta ihe nkiri, akwụkwọ akụkọ, mmekọrịta ọha na eze
O nwekwara ihe nkiri akpọrọ CEO
Selassie Ibrahim mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ ndị 90, ihe nkiri 'My sweetie', nke nyere ya ọganihu site n'iso Grace Omaboe na Mc- Jordan Amatefio
N'afọ 2015, o mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya nke gosipụtara Nadia Buari, James Gardner, Desmond Elliot, Roselyn Ngissah
N'afọ 2017, ọ mepụtara usoro telivishọn nke Desmond Elliott duziri nke akpọrọ Entrapped ma gosipụta ya na African Magic showcase, EbonyLifeTV na TV3 Network na Ghana
O meela ihe nkiri dị iche iche nke e mepụtara na Naịjirịa nye IROKOtv
Ndị a ma ama n'etiti ha bụ Baby Palaver, na her Mother's palaver
A họpụtara ya dị ka Best Actress in Supporting Role na 2019 Golden Movie Awards
Selassie wepụtara ihe nkiri ọhụrụ ya nke akpọrọ, '40 Looks Good On You' na 2019'
E bu ụzọ gosipụta ihe nkiri a na sinima Silver Bird na ụlọ ahịa West Hill na Accra
Ndị enyi ise ahụ kpebiri ime ihe ọ bụla o kwere ha mee iji mee ka ọ mee ma ọbụ ọ bụrụ na ha ga-ebi ndụ ụgha
Ha niile debere atụmatụ maka mmekọrịta ha, ọrụ ha, na ndụ ha
Otú ọ dị, ha nọ n'ihe ijuanya ka ndụ tụbara onye ọ bụla n'ime ha n'anya
N'ikpeazụ, ha chọpụtara ihe niile
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri a n'abalị iri abụọ na otu nke ọnwa June 2019 ma Pascal Amanfo duziri ya
Selassie Ibrahim lụrụ Ibrahim Adam onye bụbu onye ozi nke National Democratic Congress ma ha mụtara nwa nwoke na nwa nwanyị
Selby Mvusi (1929-1967) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa
A mụrụ ya na Richmond, KwaZulu-Natal, na 18 June 1929
N'afọ 1961, ọ nwetara ọrụ na Clarke College, Atlanta, Georgia
Ọ nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọala na nso Nairobi, Kenya, na 10 Disemba 1967
N'afọ 2015, Elza Miles dere akụkọ maka ndụ nke Mvusi, nke akpọrọ Selby Mvusi To Fly With the North Bird South
Nne na nna ya bụ Vunina (Nxasane) Mvusi na Jotham Mvusi
Nna ya si n'ezinụlọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbo
Mvusi gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Fort Hare ebe o nwetara nzere nkà mmụta okpukpe na 1935
Mvusi na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Alice na Eastern Cape mgbe a họpụtara nna ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Students Christian Movement na Mahadum Fort Hare
Selby na nwanne ya nwanyị gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Lovedale Presbyterian Church Primary School mgbe ha bi na Eastern Cape
Ezinụlọ Mvusi laghachiri na KwaZulu-Natal mgbe nna ya malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ụkọchukwu na Chọọchị Metọdist di na Durban
Mvusi gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Ndaleni na Natal Midlands
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na 1948 na Adams College dị nso na Amazimtoti na Natal
N'afọ 1949, ọ gbasoro nzọụkwụ nna ya site n'ịga Mahadum Fort Hare, naanị mahadum dị na South Africa nke meghere maka ndị India, ndị na-acha ọcha ndị ojii South Africa
Ọrụ mahadum ya kpughere ya nye African National Congress Youth League (ANCYL), nke ọ sonyeere
A họpụtara ya na kansụl na-anọchite anya Ụmụ akwụkwọ (SRC) nke Fort Hare ma sonye n'ọtụtụ òtù ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ
Mvusi zụlitere mmasị ya na nka mara mma na Fort Hare
Ọ bụ ezie na Fort Hare enweghị ngalaba nke Fine Arts, ọ kwadoro obere ọmụmụ ihe gbasara nka eserese nke onye prọfesọ Bekee na onye na-ese ihe, Prọfesọ Donald Stuart
Mvusi so Harold Strachan rụọ ọrụ n'afọ ndị 1950
Prọfesọ ahụ so Selby na ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ gaa njem na-ese ihe na ngwụsị izu mgbe niile na mpaghara ndị dị ka Alice na Hogsback
Onye na-ese ihe, Peter Clarke, kwuru na oge Selby nọrọ na Stuart bụ ihe enyemaka n'ịkpali mmasị Shelby na nka
Selby gụsịrị akwụkwọ ọzọ na Mahadum Rhodes na Grahamstown
Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, o debara aha ya maka nkuzi na nka na Ndaleni Teachers Training College nke e guzobere ọhụrụ
Nke a bụ naanị kọleji nka emebere maka ndị Black South Africa n'oge ahụ n'okpuru ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ọ na-emekarị ihe ngosi ndị a na-agaghị echefu echefu maka ịgba egwú na akwa ndị dọkara adọka
Selby bụ onye na-anaghị etinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma gosipụta obere mmasị na ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọ bụ ezie na mahadum jupụtara na ọtụtụ nsogbụ
Mvusi nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọala na nso Nairobi, Kenya, na 10 Disemba 1967
Selenium bụ kemịkal nwere akara Se na nọmba atọm iri atọ na anọ
Ọ bụ ihe na-abụghị ọla (nke a na-adịghị ele anya dị ka metalloid) nke nwere njirimara ndị dị n'etiti ihe ndị dị n'elu na n'okpuru na tebụl oge, sulfur na tellurium, ma nwee ihe yiri arsenic
Ọ na-esikarị eme n'ọnọdụ elemental ya ma ọ bụ dị ka ihe dị ọcha na mkpo ụwa
Selenium sitere na Grik selńnē (σελήνη 'Ọnwa') bụ nke Jöns Jacob Berzelius chọpụtara n'afọ 1817, onye kwuru na ihe ọhụrụ ahụ yiri tellurium a chọtara na mbụ (nke aha ya bụ Ụwa)
A na-achọta Selenium na ọla sulfide ore, ebe ọ na-anọchi akụkụ sọlfọ
Azụmahịa, a na-emepụta selenium dị ka ihe na-esi na nchacha nke ọla ndị a, na-abụkarị n'oge mmepụta
A maara mineral ndị dị ọcha selenide ma ọ bụ ogige selenate ma ọ dị ụkọ
Ndị isi azụmahịa maka selenium taa bụ iko na pigmenti
Selenium bụ semiconductor na-eji na photocell
Ngwa dị na ngwa eletrọnịkị, mgbe ọ dị mkpa, ejirila ngwaọrụ semiconductor silicon dochie anya
A ka na-eji Selenium n'ụdị ole na ole nke ihe nchekwa ọkụ ọkụ DC yana otu ụdị ntụpọ fluorescent quantum
Ọ bụ ezie na ọnụọgụ nke selenium dị mkpa maka ọrụ cellular n'ọtụtụ anụmanụ, gụnyere ụmụ mmadụ, ma elemental selenium na (karịsịa) nnu selenium na-egbu egbu na ọbụna obere doses, na-akpata selenosis

A na-edepụta Selenium dị ka ihe dị n'ọtụtụ multivitamins na ihe mgbakwunye nri ndị ọzọ, yana n'usoro nwa ọhụrụ, ọ bụkwa akụkụ nke enzymes antioxidant glutathione peroxidase na thioredoxin reductase (nke na-ebelata ụfọdụ mkpụrụ ndụ oxidized n'ime ụmụ anụmanụ na osisi ụfọdụ) yana na deiodinase enzymes di atọ
Ihe Selenium chọrọ na osisi dị iche iche site na ụdị, na ụfọdụ osisi chọrọ nnukwu ego na ndị ọzọ na-achọghị nke ọ bụla
Selenium na-emepụta ọtụtụ allotropes nke na-agbanwe na mgbanwe okpomọkụ, dabere na ọnụego mgbanwe okpompomọkụ
Mgbe a kwadebere ya na mgbanwe kemịkal, selenium na-abụkarị ntụ na-acha ọbara ọbara
Mgbe ọ gbazere ngwa ngwa, ọ na-emepụta ụdị ojii, vitreous, nke a na-erekarị ahịa dị ka beads
Nhazi nke selenium ojii anaghị adịkarị na mgbagwoju anya yana nwere mgbanaka polymeric nwere ihe ruru 1000 atom kwa mgbanaka
Black Se bụ ihe na-agbaji agbaji, siri ike na-atọ ụtọ nke na-agbaze na CS2
Mgbe ọ na-ekpo ọkụ, ọ na-adị nro na 50 ° C wee gbanwee na selenium isi awọ na 180 ° C; A na-ebelata okpomọkụ mgbanwe site na ọnụnọ halogens na amines
A na-emepụta ụdị α, β, na γ na-acha ọbara ọbara site na ngwọta nke selenium ojii site na ịgbanwe ọnụego evaporation nke solvent (na-abụkarị CS2)
Ha niile nwere obere, monoclinic crystal symmetry (ìgwè oghere 14) ma nwee ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu mgbanaka cyclooctaselenium (Se8) nwere nhazi geometric dị iche iche, dị ka na sulfur
Atọ asatọ nke mgbanaka abụghị otu (ya bụ, a naghị edepụta ha n'otu n'otu site na ọrụ ọ bụla), na n'eziokwu n'ụdị γ-monoclinic, ọkara mgbanaka dị n'otu nhazi (na onyinyo enyo ya) na ọkara na nke ọzọ
Nkwakọ ngwaahịa dị oke n'ụdị α
Na mgbanaka Se8, anya Se-Se na-adịgasị iche dabere na ebe abụọ atọm dị na mgbanaka ahụ, mana nkezi bụ 2335 ehihie, na akụkụ Se-Se-Se bụ nkezi 1057°
Allotropes selenium ndị ọzọ nwere ike ịnwe mgbanaka Se6 ma ọ bụ Se7

Ụdị selenium kachasị kwụsiri ike na nke siri ike bụ isi awọ ma nwee chiral hexagonal crystal lattice (ohere otu 152 ma ọ bụ 154 dabere na chirality) nwere eriri polymeric helical, ebe anya Se-Se dị 2373 pm na Se-Se -Se akụkụ bụ 1031° °
Ogologo dị n'etiti agbụ bụ 3436 pm
A na-emepụta Gray Se site na okpomọkụ dị nro nke allotropes ndị ọzọ, site na iji nwayọ na-ajụ oyi nke Se a gbazere agbaze, ma ọ bụ site na ịdọrọ ikuku Se n'okpuru ebe agbaze
Ọ bụ ezie na ụdị Se ndị ọzọ bụ insulators, Se na-acha ntụ ntụ bụ semiconductor na-egosi fotoconductivity dị mma
N'adịghị ka allotropes ndị ọzọ, ọ pụghị ịgbasa na CS2
Ọ na-eguzogide oxidation site na ikuku ma ọ bụghị nonoxidizing acid na-awakpo ya
Site na ihe na-ebelata ihe siri ike, ọ na-emepụta polyselenides
Selenium anaghị egosipụta mgbanwe na viscosity nke sulfur na-aga mgbe ọ na-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-ekpo ọkụ
Selenium nwere isotopes asaa sitere n'okike
Ise n'ime ndị a, ⁷⁴Se, ⁷⁶Se, ⁷⁷Se, ⁷⁸Se, ⁸⁰Se, kwụsiri ike, ebe 80Se bụ nke kachasị ukwuu (496% ụbara eke)
Ihe na-emekarị bụ radionuclide 82Se nke dị ogologo ndụ, nke nwere ọkara ndụ nke 92 × 1019 afọ
Radioisotope 79Se na-abụghị nke primordial na-emekwa na nkeji ole na ole na uranium ore dị ka ngwaahịa nke fission nuklia
Selenium nwekwara ọtụtụ isotopes na-adịghị akwụsi ike site na 64Se ruo 95Se; ndị kacha kwụsie ike bụ 75Se nwere ọkara ndụ nke ụbọchị 11978 na 72Se nwere ọkpụ ndụ nke ụbọchị 84

Isotopes dị mfe karịa isotopes kwụsiri ike na-aga beta gbakwunyere na isotopes nke arsenic, na isotoples dị arọ karịa isotoples kwụsiri oke na-aga n'ihu na beta gbakwushere na isótopes nke bromine, yana ụfọdụ obere neutron emission na isotops kachasị arọ
Selenium compounds na-adịkarị na steeti oxidation -2, +2, +4, na +6
Selenium na-emepụta oxides abụọ selenium dioxide (SeO2) na selenium trioxide (SeO3)
Selenium dioxide sitere na mmeghachi omume nke selenium elemental na oxygen
Ọ bụ ihe siri ike nke polymeric nke na-etolite mkpụrụ ndụ SeO2 monomeric na oge gas
Ọ na-agbaze n'ime mmiri iji mepụta selenous acid, H2SeO3
A pụkwara ime Selenous acid ozugbo site na oxidizing elemental selenium na nitric acid
N'adịghị ka sọlfọ, nke na-eme trioxide kwụsiri ike, selenium trioxide anaghị eguzosi ike n'ezi ihe ma na-ereka dioxide n'elu 185 °C
A na-emepụta Selenium trioxide n'ime ụlọ nyocha site na mmeghachi omume nke potassium selenate anhydrous (K2SeO4) na sulfur trioxide (SO3)
A na-akpọ nnu nke selenous acid selenites
Ndị a gụnyere selenite ọlaọcha (Ag2SeO3) na sodium selenite (Na2SeO3)
Hydrogen sulfide na mmiri selenous acid na-emeghachi omume iji mepụta selenium disulfide

Selfati (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 1 n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1967), bụ onye na-ese ihe na Morocco nke bi ugbu a na Paris, Tangiers na New York
A mụrụ Ilias Selfati na obodo dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri nke Tangiers
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ wee nweta diplọma na Fine Arts na School of Fine Arts na Tetouan, Morocco
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ya na Paris, ebe o biri otu afọ
Site ebe a, ọ gara Madrid, Spain iji gaa n'ihu na ọmụmụ nka ya na UCM ebe ọ bụ ọkachamara na ibipụta akwụkwọ
Selfati biri na Madrid maka afọ iri abụọ sochirinụ
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a n'etiti Paris, Tangiers na New York
Selfati nwere isiokwu edere banyere ọrụ ya site n'aka ndị edemede dịka Tahar Ben Jelloun (Tahar Ben Jelloun) na Agustin del Valle, na ndị nkatọ nka dịka Jean-Pierre Van Tieghem

A pụrụ ịhụ ọrụ Selfati n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta onwe na nke ọha nke gụnyere National Calcography na Royal Spanish Academy of Fine Arts, Madrid, Spain, Tangiers American Legation Museum na Morocco, African Centre na Madrid, Spain na National Library na Madrid, Spain
Selfati nọ n'oge na mmeghe nke Musée Mohammed VI d'Art Moderne et Contemporain ọhụrụ na Rabat, Morocco (October 7, 2014) ebe otu n'ime ihe osise ya kwụ ugbu a
O bu ụzọ gosipụta ọrụ ya na 1987 na Spanish Library na Tangiers, kemgbe ahụ, o nweela ihe ngosi n'ọtụtụ mba

Talmart Gallery, Paris 2013, Mohamed Drissi Gallery, Tangiers 2013, Atelier 21 Gallery, Casablanca 2011, Tindouf Gallery, Marraquech 2010, Cité des Arts, Paris 2007, Hotel D’Albret, Paris 2003, Delacroix Gallery, Tangiers 2002 O sonyere na Cow Parade na Madrid 2009
O sonyekwara na Nuit Blanche na Paris na 2010 na 2012)
Selfati gosipụtara akwụkwọ uri “Incandescence” nke Mohamed Hmoudane dere (Editor Al Manar (1 May 2004), Asụsụ French, ISBN , )

Ihe osise Selfati enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite dịka nkwanye ugwu na National Print Prize na Madrid, Spain n'afọ 2002, 1st Prize in the Art Competition “Thinking With Your Hands” nke Cervantes Institute na Morocco mere n'afọ 2000, ahọpụtara ọrụ ya maka ngosi na mbipụta isii nke Gregorio Prieto Drawing Prize na Spain ma họrọ ya maka ihe ngosi Generacion 2000 nke Caja de Madrid Foundation (Madrid Savings and Loans) na-eme kwa afọ iji gosipụta ọgbọ na-abịanụ nke ndị na-ese ihe n'oge a na Spain

Ọ bụ onye na-ebi akwụkwọ nke ọma ma họrọla akwụkwọ ya maka ngosi na mbipụta isii nke National Print Prize na Madrid, Spain yana mbipụta abụọ nke Print Prize nke Marbella Museum of Modern Art na ndịda Spain

E nyela Selfati onyinye agụmakwụkwọ n'efu, ọ gaala ọmụmụ ihe na mba dị iche iche; e nyere ya ohere agụmakwụkwọ n'efu site na Ngalaba French nke Ọdịbendị na Cite del Arts na Paris, France na 2001 na 2003
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ gaa Assilah Art Festival ugboro atọ iji see ihe osise ma sonye na ọmụmụ ihe nke Ememe ahụ
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ gaa ọmụmụ ihe nke Chicano Group mere na Los Angeles, USA na 1997
“El País” (21100), Spain
Amongst the Crowd, Fietta Jarque (El País), Madrid, Spain
“Ịdị n’otu” dị mfe dị ka o siri ike, Emilio Sanz de Soto
Spain
Ihe osise site na Fusion, Diego Muñoz (La Vanguardia), Spain
Selfati, onye kere ụwa nke akara na agba na mgbanwe mgbe niile, Fausto Fernández, París
Selim Nurudeen (amuru 1 Febrụwarị 1983 ) bu onye ihe mgbochi si Naijiria
N'afọ 2010, ọ gbara n'asọmpị Afrịka nke afọ 2010 na Nairobi wee nweta ihe nrite ọla ọcha n'ime ihe mgbochi 110 mita na nkeji 1383 sekonds
Ọ nọchitere anya Naijiria ugboro abụọ na asọmpi Olympics, na 2008 ya na 2012
Ugbu a ọ na-ejide ndekọ egwuregwu Nigeria n'ime ihe mgbochi 60 mita na oge nke 764
Àtụ Footer All-Africa Champions 110 m Hurdles Men
Selina Boateng bụ onye si Ghana na-eti egwu ozioma
Selina so onye amụma Albert Asihene-Arjarquah mee njem nlegharị anya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ụfọdụ n'afọ 2014
Ikike ya ịbụ abụ na French na Bekee enyewo ya ohere ije ozi na mba dị iche iche dika France, Belgium, Norway na Germany
N'obodo, Selina anọwo na mmemme ya na ndị na eme ihe nkiri dịka DSP Kofi Sarpong, Nacee, Ceccy Twum, KODA, Joe Mettle, Eugene Zuta, Ohemaa Mercy na Rev Cynthia McCauley
E nyere Selina onyinye nke afọ 2012 VGMA Gospel Song of the Year
O ritekwara ihe nrite anọ na Ghana Gospel Industry Awards (GGIA) (2nd Edition) nke Adom FMAdom FM mere
Ihe nrite ndị ahụ bụ maka Artiste of the Year, Album of the Year, Song of the Year ('Menku Meho') na Popular Video of the Year
Site na egwu ya 'Alpha & Omega' nke gosipụtara Uncle Ato, Selina ritere ihe nrite Gospel Song of the Year n'afọ 2015
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara egwu TKC gosipụtara ya maka Urban Song of the Year ('Ayeyi' - nke pụtara Otuto)
Selina nwere nanị otu nwanne ma l na alụ Isaac Berchie kemgbe ọnwa iri na abụọ n'afọ 2019
Selina Chirchir (amụrụ n'August 28, 1968) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ n'etiti etiti na onye na-agba marath
O sonyere na 1984 Summer Olympics mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Sing'ore Girls' Secondary School na Iten
O meriri mita 800 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 1986 World Junior Championships in Athletics ma mechie nke abụọ na mita 1500
N'afọ sochirinụ, o ritere ihe nrite ọla edo abụọ (800 na 1500 mita) na 1987 All-Africa Games, nke emere na Nairobi, Kenya
Na 1987 World Championships ọ dara na nke ikpeazụ
Na 1996 Summer Olympics ọ nọchitere anya Kenya na marathon, mana ọ gwụbeghị
Ihe ndekọ marathon ya, 2 32 36, gbara ọsọ na Houston Marathon na Jenụwarị, 1996
N'afọ 1998, ọ meriri San Francisco Marathon
Ọ ka na-arụsi ọrụ ike na 2000, mgbe ọ meriri Trinidad na Tobago Marathon
Sello Maake kaNcube (a mụrụ na 12 Machị 1960) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ala nna ya nakwa na United States, United Kingdom, Canada na Europe
A mụrụ Maake kaNcube na Orlando East, Soweto, South Africa
O mechara kwaga Atteridgeville, Pretoria, ebe o tolitere
Ọ gbanwere aha nna ya ka ọ bụrụ Maake kaNcube iji sọpụrụ nna nna ya na nna ya
O nwere nzere masta na edemede ejije na Mahadum Leeds
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Royal Shakespeare Company na West End nke London
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri ndị a
N'obodo ya, a maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na-eduzi na ihe nkiri ncha ogologo oge dịka Archie Moroka na ihe nkiri ETV Scandal! dị ka onye ọjọọ a na-akpọ Lucas 'Daniel' Nyathi
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka Kgosietsile na telenovela nke Mzansi Magic, The Queen na dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị rụrụ arụ na Mzansi Magic's Rockville
Ọ kọrọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke afọ 2008 Africa's Outsiders banyere anụ ọhịa na-enweghị isi (albino), nke Animal Planet gosipụtara

SellyGalley, amuru 25 Septemba 1987 dika Selorm Galley-Fiawoo bu onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ghana na onye na-egosiputa na onyonyo Ọ nọ na Big Brother Africa (oge 8)
Ọ lụrụ Praye Tietia, onye Ghana hip hop
Selma Baccar ma ọ bụ Salma Baccir (amụrụ na Disemba 15, 1945) bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A na-ewere ya dị ka nwanyị mbụ mere ihe nkiri ogologo oge na Tunis
A maara Baccar maka ịmepụta manifestos site na ihe nkiri ya, nke na-elekwasị anya na ikike ụmụ nwanyị na Tunisia
A mụrụ Selma Baccar na Disemba 15, 1945 na Tunis
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara Hammam-Lif mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa
Nne na nna ya zụlitere Baccar dị ka onye Alakụba, o wee soro ezinụlọ ya gaa Mecca ugboro abụọ; Otú ọ dị, Baccar na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka onye agnostic
Ọ malitere ịmụ nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ na 1966 ruo 1968 na Lausanne, Switzerland

Ọ kwagara ebe ọzọ mgbe afọ abụọ gasịrị iji mụọ ihe nkiri na Paris na Institut Francais de Cinema Ọ ghọrọ onye otu Tunisian Federation of Amateur Filmmakers, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka onye nduzi maka usoro telivishọn Tunisian
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu, Baccar malitere imepụta ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na 1966, ya na ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ na klọb ihe nkiri Hammam-Lif
L'Eveil mechara nweta otuto
Baccar duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya zuru oke na 1975 nke akpọrọ Fatma 75, a na-ewere ihe nkiri a dị ka 'ihe nkiri ọsụ ụzọ' na Tunisia
Nke a bụ ihe nkiri mbụ zuru oke nke nwanyị duziri
Fatma 75, 'ihe nkiri edemede ụmụ nwanyị banyere ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị na Tunisia'
A machibidoro ihe nkiri ahụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ, n'ihi nsogbu nnyocha n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, site na Ministri ozi nke Tunisia, ọ nweghịkwa ike ile ya anya na ụlọ ihe nkiri azụmahịa
Flowers of Oblivion kọrọ akụkọ banyere Zakia, onye opium riri ahụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ndị isi mgbaka na Vichy-achị Tunisia na 1940s
Onye nduzi ahụ nwere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya n'okpuru Intermedia Productions n'akụkụ ndị nduzi nwanyị ndị ọzọ a ma ama, iji mee ihe nkiri na mgbasa ozi
Baccar emepụtawokwa ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi
Mgbalị Baccar na-eme maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị Tunisia dugara ya n'ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị; ebe ọ ghọrọ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Al Massar
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2011, a họpụtara Baccar dị ka onye otu na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu
N'afọ 2014, Baccar ghọrọ onye isi oche nke otu ndị omeiwu nke Democrats na Tunisia
Baccar bụ osote onye isi oche nke otu Democratic, ọ ghọrọ 'nwaanyị mbụ na naanị nwanyị na-eduzi otu ndị omeiwu'
Selma Hortense Burke (December 31, 1900 August 29, 1995) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na onye otu Harlem Renaissance movement
A maara Burke nke ọma màkà ihe osise nke President Franklin D
Roosevelt nke nwéré ike ịbụ ihe kpaliri profaịlụ a hụrụ n'ihu mkpụrụ ego ahụ
Ọ kọwara onwe ya dị ka 'onye na-ese ihe nke ndị mmadụ' ma mepụta ọtụtụ ihe osise ọha na eze, mgbe mgbe foto nke ndị ama ama Africa America dị ka Duke Ellington, Mary McLeod Bethune na Booker T
Washington

N'afọ 1979, e nyere ya Women's Caucus for Art Lifetime Achievement Award Ọ chịkọtara ndụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe, 'M na-ebi ma na-agagharị n'ọnọdụ m na-emepụta' (Interview with Selma Burke, 3 September 1990)
A mụrụ Selma Burke na Disemba 31, 1900, na Mooresville, North Carolina, nwa nke asaa n'ime ụmụ 10 nke Reverend Neil na Mary Elizabeth Coalfield Burke
Nna ya bụ ónyé ụkọchukwu AME nke na-arụ ọrụ n'ụgbọ okporo ígwè maka ego ọzọ
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ na n'oge ahụ nne ya dị otu narị afọ
Dị ka nwatakịrị, ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ nke nwere otu ọnụ ụlọ, ma na-ejikarị ụrọ dị n'akụkụ osimiri na-egwuri egwu
Ọ ga-emecha kọwaa mmetụta nke ịpị ụrọ site na mkpịsị aka ya dị ka ihe mbụ ọ hụrụ ihe ọkpụkpụ, na-asị 'Ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ na 1907 ka m chọpụtara m'
Ọ bụ nne nne ya, onye na-ese ihe, kwalitere mmasị Burke na ihe ọkpụkpụ, ọ bụ ezie na nne ya chere na ọ ga-achụso ọrụ ego siri ike
'Ị pụghị ibi ndụ na nke ahụ,' Burke na-echeta nne ya na-ekwu màkà ọchịchọ ya ịmụ nka
Untitled (Nwanyị na Nwatakịrị), 1950
Burke, n'aka ekpe, na-enye onye isi nke Samuel Huntington Junior High School na Jamaica, Queens bust ya nke Samuel Huntton (1938)
Ihe osise nke Mary Charlton Holiday (1945) na Iredell County Library, NC
Bust nke Mary McLeod Bethune
Ihe ncheta Franklin Roosevelt na Recorder of Deeds Building na Washington
Selma Burke nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 94 na August 29, 1995 na New Hope, Pennsylvania, ebe ọ biri kemgbe afọ 1950
Ọ bụkwa onye na-azọ ọkwa onye omeiwu na 2014 na-anọchite anya pati ya ma họpụta onye nnọchi anya na Nzukọ nke ndị nnọchi anya ndị mmadụ na mpaghara mbụ nke Nabeul

N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise, a họpụtara ya maka ọkwa Minista nke Ọzụzụ na Ọrụ, mgbe ahụ, e were ya n'ọrụ maka ọkwa Minisita nke Njem na Ọrụ, na-anọchi Amel Karboul, na gọọmentị Habib Essid
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2017, n'oge ụbọchị ụmụ nwanyị, e ji akara nke Commander of the Order of the Tunisian Republic chọọ ya mma
N'abalị mbụ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya dịka onye nduzi nke ụlọ ọrụ onye isi ala iji dochie Selim Azzabi
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na Mee 14, 2019 n'ihe gbasara esemokwu dị n'ime Nidaa Tounes, nke ọ ghọrọ onye isi ala na Mee 28
Otú ọ dị, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọfịs na June 23, wee hapụ òtù ahụ

Na ngwụcha June, mgbe usoro ikpe mara Hafedh Caid Essebsi dị ka onye nnọchi anya iwu nke pati ahụ, Elloumi weghaara oche nke Amal Tounes, aha ọhụrụ nke Democratic Reform movement guzobere na 2011, mkpebi mana a kagburu na July 20
Elloumi wee bụrụ onye isi nke otu ọzọ, Al Amal, nke a maara dị ka Tunisian National Party
Ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala na ntuli aka onye isi ala Tunisia nke 2019 nke Septemba 15, mana emesịrị wepụ ya na agba nke mbụ
Na Septemba 24, 2019, ọ kpọrọ oku ka a tọhapụ Nabil Karoui
Selom Mawugbe (amụrụ na Julaị 20, 1998) bụ onye America ọkachamara basketball player maka Santa Cruz Warriors nke NBA G League
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji maka Mahadum Azusa Pacific
A mụrụ Mawugbe na Lancaster, California nye nne na nna bụ́ ndị Ghana si mba ọzọ, kwaga Santa Clarita, California mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Canyon, na-egwuri egwu n'okpuru onye nchịkwa Sean Delong
Ọ tolitere n'ịgba bọl wee malite ịkụ basketball mgbe ọ dị afọ 14
Mawugbe guzoro 6'1 dị ka onye ọhụrụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma nwee uto uto, ruo 6'10
Akpọrọ ya aha otu egwuregwu All-Valley, yana aha nkwanye ugwu All-Valley dị ka onye obere
Ọ kwadoro na Azusa Pacific University, bụ nanị ụlọ akwụkwọ nyere ya ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ, nke ha mere mgbe ha na-ewe otu n'ime ndị otu ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Mawugbe gụrụ biochemistry na Mahadum Azusa Pacific wee pụta dị ka onye egwuregwu dị mkpa na otu basketball ha
Ọ duziri otu ahụ na blọk 40 dị ka onye ọhụrụ ma setịpụ ndekọ Cougar otu oge maka blọk na 278 kwa egwuregwu dị ka onye nọ n'afọ nke abụọ
N'afọ ahụ, Mawugbe duziri Nzukọ Pacific West na mgbochi mgbochi, na-emecha nke ise na mba ahụ na blọk na 89
N'afọ nke mbụ ya, ọ duziri PacWest na mgbochi mgbochi ọzọ na 107, na-emecha nke abụọ na mba ahụ na blọk na 345 blocks kwa egwuregwu, na-emebi ndekọ nke ya nke o setịpụrụ n'afọ gara aga
Mawaugbe nwetakwara akara 118 na 80 rebounds kwa egwuregwu
A kpọrọ ya PacWest Defensive Player of the Year
Dị ka onye okenye, Mawugbe duziri Division II na pasentị ịgba égbè (717) ma mechie nke abụọ na blọk ọ bụla (31), na-enyere Cougars aka na asọmpi PacWest tupu oge ha agwụ n'ihi ịkagbu asọmpi NCAA
Ọ na-eme nkezi okpukpu abụọ nke 169 na 104 rebounds kwa egwuregwu, a na-akpọkwa ya PacWest Player of the Year
Iji nyere aka kwụọ ụgwọ ya, Mawugbe chọtara ọrụ na ngalaba ụlọ na ubi na Lowe na Santa Clarita
Na Jenụwarị 11, 2021, Santa Cruz Warriors dere Mawugbe na nke 21st pick na agba nke abụọ nke 2021 NBA G League draft
Ọ bụ onye isi njikwa Ryan Atkinson chọpụtara ya, onye chọpụtara ihe ndị dị mkpa na kọleji ya mgbe ọ na-enyocha ihe nkiri site na ọtụtụ atụmanya
Mawugbe nwetara akara 53 na 44 rebounds kwa egwuregwu mgbe ọ na-agba ọsọ pasent 83 site n'ọhịa
Ọ nọrọ n'èzí na 108-96 playoff na Lakeland Magic na mmerụ ahụ n'ikpere
Selorm Adadevoh bụ onye isi azụmahịa na teknụzụ nke Ghana
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke MTN Ghana ugbu a, nke MTN Group
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka nkwukọrịta, onye isi azụmaahịa na onye ndụmọdụ na Africa, Caribbean, UK na US
Adadevoh gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na St
Peter's Boys Senior High School

O nwere nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Civil Engineering site na Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST), Ghana na Masters na Business Administration (MBA) na Finance and Strategic Management site na The Wharton School of University of Pennsylvania, USA

Adadevoh malitere ọrụ ya ma rụọ ọrụ afọ 10 dị ka onye ndụmọdụ teknụzụ na mbụ maka Hewlett-Packard (HP) na UK, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu maka ụlọ ọrụ dị ka Hutchison 3G, Vodafone, FTSE 100 ma mesịa bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ nchịkwa na LEK
Consulting na USA ebe ọ rụrụ na Mergers, Acquisitions na Private Equity ndụmọdụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị ka United Airlines, Jetblue, Procter & Gamble, Pfizer, Laidlaw na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
O mechara kwaga Ghana ịrụ ọrụ dị ka Chief Commercial Officer (COO) na Head of Mobile Financial Services (MFS) maka Tigo (Millicom) Ghana
N'ọrụ ya dị ka COO na Onye isi nke MFS karịsịa, ọ bụ ọrụ ya n'ịhụ na ụlọ ọrụ ego mkpanaka na Ghana na-akwalite Tigo na netwọk ndị ọzọ
A họpụtara Adadevoh dị ka Global Director for Mobile Financial Services (MFS) na Digicel, Haiti na Disemba 2014

Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ ruo afọ atọ site na ọrụ ya dị ka Global Director nke MFS ruo COO nke Digicel na Mee 2015 ma mesịa bụrụ CEO nke Digicer, Haiti na Machị 2016, nke bụ nke kachasị n'ime ọrụ 32 nke Digices n'ụwa niile
Na June 2018, a họpụtara Adadevoh dị ka onye isi nke MTN Ghana, onye enyemaka nke MTN Group
Ọ nọchiri Ebenezer Asante onye e buliri elu ka ọ bụrụ Ebenezer Asante osote onye isi oche nke MTN Group
E nyere ya Marketing Man of the Year 2020 na 32nd Annual National Marketing Performance Awards nke Chartered Institute of Marketing haziri
Adadevoh bụ onye otu Women's World Banking Ghana (WWBG), Sahel Grains Ltd na Digital Impact Alliance (DIAL) nke UN Foundation na-akwado
Ọ bụ onye TEDx fellow, na onye otu African Leadership Network (ALN)
Seme Border bụ obodo dị na Naijiria n'ókè ya na Benin, nkeji iri atọ site na Badagry n'okporo ụzọ dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri n'etiti Lagos na Cotonou
Seme bụ akụkụ nke Badagry Division nke Lagos State
Site na nkewa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ugbu a na steeti ahụ, ọ dị n'okpuru Badagry -West Local council development area (LCDA)
E meghere ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ dị iche iche maka ogige ókèala na 23 Ọktoba, na afọ 2018
Ọ dịkarịa ala ugboro atọ n'afọ 2005-2009 ime ihe ike amalitela n'obodo dị n'ókè, na-akpata ọdachi
A na-akọ na ọ bụ ihe na-eme mgbe niile maka ndị ọrụ Naijiria ịkpasu ndị njem iwe maka ego n'ókè ma ọ bụ n'ebe ndị a na-enyocha n'okporo ụzọ na-esi n'óké ahụ na-eduga
Oge ịkwọ ụgbọala dị n'etiti Badagry na ókèala Seme emeela okpukpu atọ site na ọnụnọ nke ebe nyocha iwu na-akwadoghị nke e guzobere iji manye ndị njem
Ihe a kpọtụrụ aha karịsịa bụ ndị ọrụ mbata na-etinye aka na izu ohi n'ehihie
A haziri ogige ókèala ahụ nke ọma, na-enweghị ụzọ ụgbọ ala kwesịrị ekwesị na ọdụ nyocha
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọnọdụ ndị Naijiria anọwo n'ime mpaghara Benin kemgbe Eprel 6, na afọ 2001
Ndị na-ebubata ndị mmadụ na-eji mgbagwoju anya a eme ihe
Seme bụ isi ebe maka ndị mbịarambịa na-abanye ma ọ bụ na-apụ na Naijiria n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị, yana maka ndị na-ebubata wii wii na ihe ndị ọzọ iwu na-achịkwa n'ihi oghere ya

SON kpughere ọrụ Seme Border iji chọpụta mbata nke ngwaahịa ndị na-adịghị mma yana Seme border Command nke Nigeria Customs Service, NCS, anakọtara N7015 nde dị ka ego na Ọugust, na afọ 2017 na nso nso a ha mepụtara N11 ijeri na Septemba, na afọ 2017
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ ihe mwute iburu n'uche na ebe obibi a anọwo n'ọchịchịrị ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri
Ọ nweghị ihe niile gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ebe ọ bụ na gọọmentị leghaara ya anya n'akụkụ niile

Taa n'ụbọchị Ọktọba 17, na afọ 2017, Gọmentị etiti ga-ewepụ mmachibido iwu maka mbubata ụgbọ ala eji eme ihe site na ókèala dị ka onye isi oche na onye isi oche nke bọọdụ ahụ, na-ekwu na ọ megidere Association of Registered Freight Forwarders Nigeria, iwu ARFFN itinye mmachi bido maka ụgbọ ala ndị e webatara na akụ na ụba Naijiria

Semi-Bantu ma ọ bụ Semibantu bụ okwu ochie a na-eji eme ihe maka ndị bi na mpaghara akuku ọdịda anyanwụ nke ala Cameroon (akụkụ nke mpaghara Adamawa, West, Northwest, na nke Southwest), ndị na-asụ asụsụ ndị nwere ụfọdụ njirimara na ezinụlọ asụsụ Bantu, mana ewepụrụ ha na ya
A naghị ele ndị mmadụ n'onwe ha anya dị ka agbụrụ nke Bantu (ma ọ bụ ụmụ amaala etiti na ndịda nke Afrịka)

Mgbe agbụrụ ndị a kwagara n'ebe ugwu nke Cameroon, asụsụ nke agbụrụ abụọ India na-asụ Bantu n'oké ọhịa ndị dị n'ebe ndịda na nke ndị na-asu asusu Benue-Congo nke savanna ndị dị n'ebe ugwu nke nwere mmetụta n'asụsụ ha
A maara asụsụ Grassfields n'oge gara-aga dị ka Grassfieldes Bantu na Semi-Bantu
A na-ekewa ha mgbe ụfọdụ na ọkwa abụọ, Obosara Grassfields, nke gụnyere asụsụ niile, na warawara Grassfieldes, nke na-ewepu Menchum, Ambele na mgbe ụfọdụ asụsụ Ndịda Ọdịda anyanwụ Grassfield
Ndị a nwere ike ịmepụta ụyọkọ nke ha, nke Nurse (2003) kpọrọ Peripheral Grassfields mana ọ jụrụ
Viti (Vötö) bụ nchịsa warawara Grassfields
Asụsụ Ọwụwa anyanwụ Grassfields na asụsụ Bantu na-ekekọrịta prefixes aha-nke imi, nke a na-adịghị ahụ na alaka ndị ọzọ nke Grassfield
Otú ọ dị, ha yiri ka ha nwere njikọ chiri anya na Grassfields ndị ọzọ karịa ka ha nwere na Bantu
Semira Adamu (amụrụ na 1978 ma nwụọ 1998) bu bụ onye gbara afọ iri abụọ gbara ọsọ ndụ si Naịjirịa ma nwụọ n'aka mmadu pọlis abụọ na Belgium mgbe ha chọọrọ ime ya nchụpụ
O bu ụzọ gbapụ na Naijiria n'ihi esemokwu mmanye nke alụmdi na nwunye
Na 12 Disemba 2003, ejidere mmadu pọlis anọ maka ihe a merenụ, ozugbo ka ikpe ha sochiri
E nyere gọọmentị Belgium iwu ịkwụ ndị ezinụlọ Semira ụgwọ
Ọnwụ Adamu kpalitere nnukwu esemokwu na Belgium ma katara ka-eke ndekọ nke Etienne Vermeersch banyere omume nke ịchụpụ
Na Septemba 1998 Louis Tobback, onye Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ime obodo nke Belgium, gbara arụkwaghịm mgbe ọtụtụ ngagharị iwe nke ọha na eze malitere maka ọnwụ Adam
Semolina bụ mkpuru ọka wit siri ike, nke a nụchara anụcha (ọkwa dị n'etiti) nke ọka wit durum nke a na-ejikarị eme couscous, pasta, na pudding na-atọ ụtọ
A na-ejikwa okwu semolina eme ihe iji kọwaa middlings siri ike site na ụdị ọka wit ndị ọzọ, na mgbe ụfọdụ ọka ndị ọzọ (dị ka osikapa ma ọ bụ ọka)
Semolina sitere na okwu Italian semolino
17901800; mgbanwe nke Italian semolino, nke ya na semol(a) 'bran' (Latin simila ' ntụ ọka') + -ino diminutive suffix
Ọ bụ ntụ ọka wit durum (ma ọ bụ ọka wit siri ike) nke a na-ejikarị eme pasta
N'asụsụ Lithuanian sumalta pụtara a na-egweri egweri, miltai pụtara ' ntụ ọka' na malti pụtara 'ịkeri egwiri', ebe semolina n'asụsụ Lithuania bụ manai

[ihe odide dị mkpa] Okwu simila, semidalis, groat, na ọka nwere ike ịnwe mmalite proto-Indo-European dị ka okwu Sanskrit abụọ maka ọka wit, samita na godhuma, ma ọ bụ nwere ike ịbụ okwu mgbazinye site na Semitic root smd 'ịkwuo ya ka ọ wee pụta dika groats' (cf
Arabic samīd)
Ịkụcha ọka wit n'oge a n'ime ntụ ọka bụ usoro nke na-eji rollers ígwè
A na-agbanwe rollers ka oghere dị n'etiti ha wee dị ntakịrị karịa obosara nke ọka wit
Ka a na-enye ọka wit n'ime ihe igwe ihe, rollers na-apụ n'osisi ma na-agbawa mgbe starch (ma ọ bụ endosperm) na-agbaji n'ime iberibe siri ike n'ime usoro ahụ
Site na sifting, a na-ekewapụta ụmụ irighiri ihe ndị a, semolina, na bran
A na-agbanyezi semolina n'ime ntụ ọka

Nke a na-eme ka usoro nke ikewapụ endosperm site na bran na njé dị mfe, yana ime ka o kwe omume ikewapụ Endosperm n'ime ọkwa dị iche iche n'ihi na akụkụ dị n'ime endosperme na-agbada n'ime obere karịa akụkụ dị n'èzí
N'ihi ya, enwere ike ịmepụta ụdị ntụ ọka dị iche iche
Semolina e ji ọka wit siri ike durum mee ( subsp
Enwere ike ịkpụ ya ma ọ bụ nke siri ike ma ọ bụ dị mma, a na-ejikwa ha abụọ mee ihe n'ọtụtụ nri dị ụtọ na nke na-atọ ụtọ, gụnyere ọtụtụ ụdị pasta
Aha ndị a na-ahụkarị n'asụsụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere
Semolina e ji ọka wit dị nro () mee bụ beige na-acha odo odo; o nwere gluten karịa ma bụrụ obere ájá na ọdịdị ya karịa durum semolina
Na obodo ala bekee, a na-akpọ ya farina (ekwesighi ịgbagwoju ya anya na farina Italian, nke bụ ntụ ọka wit nkịtị); a na-ejikarị ya eme ihe maka nri ndị e siri esi karịa maka nri ndị nwere nnu
Na kọntinent India, a pụrụ ịpị mkpụrụ ọka wit nkịtị ma ọ bụ nke siri ike ma ọ bụ dị mma, a na-ejikwa ha abụọ mee ihe n'ọtụtụ nri dị ụtọ na nke na-atọ ụtọ
Aha ndị a na-ahụkarị n'asụsụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere
N'ikwu ya n'ozuzu, a pụkwara ịkpọ nri a na-emepụta site na ọka ndị ọzọ na-abụghị ọka wit semolina, dịka, semolina osikapa na semolina ọka
A na-akpọkarị ọka semolina grits na obodo ala bekee

Na Germany, Austria, Hungary, Bosnia, Bulgaria, Serbia, Slovenia, Romania, Slovakia na Croatia, (durum) semolina a maara dị ka (Hartweizen-)Grieß (okwu metụtara 'grits') ma gwakọta ya na àkwá iji mee Grießknödel, nke enwere ike itinye na ofe
Akụkụ ndị ahụ dị nnọọ njọ, n'etiti 025 na 075 milimita n'obosara
A na-esikwa ya na mmiri ara ehi ma wụsa ya chocolate ka a rie ya dị ka nri ụtụtụ
N'Ịtali, a na-eji semolina (durum) eme ụdị ofe site n'isi ezigbo semolina n'ime akwụkwọ nri ma ọ bụ broth ọkụkọ

A pụkwara iji Semolina mee ụdị gnocchi a na-akpọ Gnocchi alla Romana, ebe a na-agwakọta semolina na mmiri ara ehi, cheese na bọta iji mepụta osisi, wee belata na diski ma jiri cheese na bechamel sie ya
Semolina bụ nri a na-ahụkarị na West Africa, ọkachasị n'etiti ndị Nịijiịia
A na-eri ya dị ka nri ehihie ma ọ bụ nri abalị na stew ma ọ bụ ofe
A na-akwadebe ya dịka eba (mkpụrụ ọka cassava) ma ọ bụ fufu na mmiri ma sie ya maka nkeji 5 ruo 10
N'ọtụtụ ebe na North Africa, a na-eme durum semolina ka ọ bụrụ couscous
Na Pakistan na North India a na-akpọ semolina sooji, na South India, rava
A na-eji Semolina eme nri ndị dị ụtọ na South India, dị ka rava dosa, rava idli, rava kitchadi na upma
A na-eji ya eme ihe iji kpuchie iberibe azụ tupu a sie ya na mmanụ
Na US, a na-esi semolina (karịsịa ntụ ọka) iji mepụta porridge; ụdị a ma ama nke a bụ Cream of Wheat
Na UK, a na-eme ya naanị site na ịgwakọta ntụ ọka na mmiri ara ehi ọkụ, shuga na vanilla iji mee ka ọ dị ọkụ
Ọ pụtara n'anya n'ime afọ 30 gara aga n'ihi obere mkpụmkpụ nke ọka ahụ na-ejigide
Tupu afọ 1970 ọ bụ pudding a na-enye n'oge nri ehihie ụlọ akwụkwọ

N'ihe atụ Austria, Germany, Hungary, Bosnia, Bulgaria, Slovenia, Serbia, Romania, Croatia, Slovakia na Czech Republic bụ ọka wit semolina (aha ziri ezi bụ Weichweizengrieß na German, mana a na-akpọkarị ya Grieß) a na-esi ya na mmiri ara ehi na shuga ma ọ bụ sie ya na-etinye shuga wee tinye ya shuga, sinamọn, ovaltine ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ na-atọ ụtọ
A na-agbakwunye obere bọta mgbe niile
A na-akpọ nri a Grießkoch na Austria, Grießbrei na Germany, na semolina pudding na Bekee
A pụkwara ịgwakọta Grießbrei ma ọ bụ Grießkoch na ntụ ntụ na mgbe ụfọdụ mkpụrụ osisi ma ọ bụ mkpụrụ osisi ma sie ya n'ọkụ, a na-akpọkwa ya Grießauflauf

Nri e siri esi nke nwere semolina a na-akpọ Migliaccio dị na ọdịnala Neapolitan na Ịtali; ọ bụ ngwakọta nke ricotta, vanilla na citrus peel, yiri nke jupụtara na sfogliatelle, na ntụ ọka semolina agbakwunyere iji nweta achịcha dị mfe, siri ike

Na Slovakia, Sweden, Estonia, Finland, Lithuania, Latvia, Poland, Romania, Ukraine, Belarus, Israel, na Russia, a na-eri ya dị ka nri ụtụtụ, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-agwakọta ya na mkpụrụ vaịn ma na-enye ya mmiri ara ehi
Na Swedish a maara ya dị ka mannagrynsgröt, ma ọ bụ sie ya na blueberries, dị ka blåbärsgröt

Na Sweden, Estonia, Finland, na Latvia, maka nri a na-eri n'oge okpomọkụ, a na-esi semolina na mmiri sitere na mkpụrụ osisi ma mee ka ọ dị mfe, ikuku iji mepụta klappgröt (aha Swedish), nke a makwaara dị ka vispipuuro (aha Finnish) ma ọ bụ mannavaht (aha Estonia) ma ọ bụrụ debessmanna (aha Latvian)
Na Middle East na North Africa, basbousa (nke a na-akpọkwa harisa na ụdị ụfọdụ nke Arabic, dịka
Asụsụ Aleksandria nke Arabic nke Ijipt) bụ achịcha semolina na-atọ ụtọ nke a na-etinye na syrup na-esi ísì ụtọ ma na-ejikarị mkpụrụ osisi eme ihe
Na North Africa, a na-ejikwa ya eme harcha, ụdị achịcha a na-eri nri ụtụtụ, nke a na-emekarị na jam ma ọ bụ mmanụ aṅụ
Na mpaghara kọntinent India, a na-eji semolina (nke a na-akpọ Rava, suji ma ọ bụ shuji) eme ihe maka ihe ndị dị ka halwa na rava kesari
Nkwadebe dị otú ahụ bụkwa nri na-ewu ewu na Gris (halvas) na Saịprọs (halvas)
Na Gris, a na-eme ihe oriri galaktoboureko site n'ime custard site na semolina wee fụchie ya na mpempe akwụkwọ phyllo
Na Saịprọs, enwere ike ịgwakọta semolina na almond cordial iji mepụta pudding dị mfe, nke mmiri

Na Turkey (helva), Bulgaria (halva), Iran (halva)), Pakistan (halva, Bangladesh (halua), Palestine (khalva), na mba ndị Arab, a na-eji semolina a kpọrọ ọkụ na shuga, bọta, mmiri ara ehi, na mkpụrụ osisi pine eme halawa mgbe ụfọdụ
Na Nepal, a na-akpọ semolina suji ma jiri ya kwadebe nri na-atọ ụtọ dị ka haluwa (Nepali nke India na Pakistani halwa) ma ọ bụ puwa
Na Myanmar (Burma), a na-eji semolina (nke a na-akpọ shwegyi) eme ihe na nri a ma ama a na-eme ka ọ bụrụ sanwin makin
Na Sri Lanka, a na-akpọ semolina rulan ma jiri ya mee achịcha na-atọ ụtọ na ihe na-atọ ọchị a na- woowe 'rulan aluwa'
Na Turkey, a na-eji semolina eme nri na-atọ ụtọ a na-akpọ şekerpare na şambali
Dị ka ihe ọzọ na-abụghị nri ọka, enwere ike iji semolina mee ntụ ọka n'elu ebe a na-eme achịcha iji gbochie ịrapara
N'ime achịcha, a na-ekwu na obere akụkụ nke durum semolina agbakwunyere na ngwakọta ntụ ọka a na-ahụkarị na-emepụta mkpo dị ụtọ

Àtụ Hiero
Senewosret-Ankh (ma ọ bụ Sesostris-Ankh, Senusret-An Kh) bụ Nnukwu Onye Nchụàjà nke Ptah na Memphis, onye na-akpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ eze na Onye Na-ewu Ihe ma eleghị anya n'oge Senusret I nke 12th Dynasty
A chọtara mastaba ya na 1933 na nso pyramid nke Senusret I na Lisht
E bibiri ihe owuwu nke ili ahụ n'ụzọ zuru oke n'ihi na ewepụla nkume ndị ahụ
A kwakọọrọ ili ahụ n'oge ochie, mana ndị na-egwu ala chọtara ụfọdụ ọkpụkpụ mara mma, dị ka ihe oyiyi limestone nke Senewosret-Ankh n'onwe ya, ugbu a na Metropolitan Museum of Art (acc
E ji ihe odide Pyramid chọọ mgbidi nke ụlọ ili ahụ mma
Onye isi oche Nkomesh Mukamambo nke Abụọ (Elizabeth Mulenje) bụ onye isi nke ndị Soli nke Chongwe District na Lusaka Province
Ọ bụ onye isi n'ógbè ahụ kemgbe afọ 1976

Ọ bụ nwanyị nke abụọ Nkomesh kemgbe narị afọ nke 19 Mukamambo I onye a na-akọ akụkọ ifo dị ka onye nwere ike ime mmụọ nke nyere ya ohere ịgbanwe ọdịdị anụ ahụ ya ma kpuchie ndị ya iji chebe ha pụọ n'aka ndị iro
Dị ka Chieftainess, Nkomesh na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi mmiri ozuzo n'oge emume ọdịnala Chakwela Makumba a na-eme kwa afọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba
N'oge Chákwá Makumbi, nke na-asụgharị n'ụzọ nkịtị ka ọ bụrụ 'ịdọrọ igwe ojii', Ọchịchị Makumbi rịọrọ mmụọ ndị nna nna ya ka ha jiri mmiri ozuzo gọzie ndị ya
N'etiti ọtụtụ ọrụ ya n'oge ihe omume ahụ, Chieftainess Nkomesh na-amalite oge ọrụ ugbo site n'ịbụ onye mbụ kụrụ mkpụrụ
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe Chieftainess Nkomesh rịgoro n'ocheeze, ọ malitere ọrụ ndu na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka onye otu United National Independence Party (UNIP)
N'oge ọ nọ na pati ahụ, ọ bụ onye otu Central Committee na UNIP Women's League
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Minista nke State of Home Affairs site na afọ 1979 ruo na afọ 1986
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke House of Chiefs, na-anọchi Chief Madzimawe nke ndị Ngoni nke Chipata District na Eastern Province
Nke a mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche kemgbe e guzobere ọkwa ahụ na afọ 1965
A jara Chieftainess Nkomesh mma maka ọrụ ya n'ọgụ iji kwụsị alụmdi na nwunye ụmụaka n'ógbè ya
Àtụ MedalTableTop
Sentayehu Ejigu Tamerat (amụrụ na 21 na onwa nke isii, na afọ 1985 na Debre Markos, Amhara Region) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge, onye ọkachamara na mita 3000 na 5000
Ọ nọchitere anya Etiopia na 2004 Summer Olympics

Mgbe ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ ghara inweta ihe nrite na afọ 2006 IAAF World Indoor Championships na 2009 World Championships, o mere ọganihu ya na 2010, na-emeri ọla nchara na African Championships in Athletics and World Indoors
Ọ bụ onye nwetara ọlaọcha na afọ 2010 IAAF Continental Cup
Ọ bụ onye nke atọ kachasị ọsọ n'oge niile karịa 3000 m n'ime ụlọ na nkeji 8 2527
Ọ nọkwa n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị asatọ kachasị ọsọ karịa 5000 m ma n'èzí ma n'ime ụlọ
Dị ka nwatakịrị, ụkwụ ya na-agba ọsọ mere ka ọ bụrụ nwa agbọghọ na-eziga ozi maka ọrụ ezinụlọ ma n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ malitere ịgba ọsọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ malitere ịbanye na asọmpi na ihe ịga nke ọma ya ozugbo dugara na ịkwaga Addis Ababa iji zụọ na Banks Running Club
N'agbanyeghị nkà ya, ọ na-abụkarị onye nke abụọ na onye otu ya Meseret Defar Tian onye gara n'ihu merie ọla edo Olympic na mita 5000
Sentayehu mere asọmpi mba ụwa nke mbụ ya na afo 2001 World Youth Championships in Athletics wee nweta ọla nchara na mita 1500

N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ gbanwere uche ya gaa n'ebe dị anya ma sọọ mpi na afọ 2002 IAAF Golden League circuit, na-edekọ 3000 mita kacha mma nke 8 4830 nkeji na Weltklasse Zurich mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa
O nwetara ọnọdụ na 2002 IAAF Grand Prix Final wee bụrụ onye nke asaa na ihe omume ahụ
Ọkwa nke isii na asọmpi ndị na-eto eto na afọ 2003 IAAF World Cross Country Championships nyeere ụmụ nwanyị Etiopia aka inweta aha otu, ebe onye Etiopia ibe ya Tirunesh Dibaba meriri asọmpi ahụ
Ọ meziwanyere ụzọ 3000m ya kachasị mma ruo 8 4651 n'afọ ahụ mana ọ pụtara na 2003 IAAF World Athletics Final mere ka ọ bụrụ onye nke asaa ọzọ
Oge 2004 ya bụ ihe dị mkpa maka ọrụ ya ọ belatara 5000 m kachasị mma ya ruo 14 3518 nkeji wee nweta ebe na ndị otu egwuregwu Olympic nke Etiopia
Na 2004 Athens Olympics onye dị afọ iri na itoolu bịara nke iri na nke iri na asọmpi 5000m nke ụmụ nwanyị
N'agbanyeghị ọganihu ya n'egwuregwu, afọ ahụ mekwara ka ahụ ya dị ka ọ na-enwe nsogbu ogologo oge na nkwonkwo ụkwụ ya na nwa ehi ya nke metụtara ịgba ọsọ ya
Ọ gbara ọsọ 3000 m n'ime ụlọ nke nkeji 8 4667 na 2005 Boston Indoor Games, mana oge ya n'èzí dara n'ihi na ọ rughị eru maka 2005 World Championships in Athletics
Ọ gosipụtara onwe ya ọzọ n'ime ụlọ n'afọ sochirinụ wee bịa nke anọ na 2006 IAAF World Indoor Championships, na-emeziwanye ruo nkeji 8 4338
Mmerụ ahụ gara n'ihu na-emebi nkwụsi ike ya na ọnwụ mberede nke nwanne ya nwanyị n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2007 mere ka ọ kwụsị ọrụ ya
Ọ lụrụ Berhanu Alemu, onye na-agba ọsọ ibe ya, wee malite ịlaghachi na asọmpi ọkachamara oge niile na 2009
O welitere onwe ya n'etiti ndị kachasị ọsọ karịa 5000 m n'ime ụlọ site na ịgba ọsọ na 2009 Boston Indoor Games, na-agafe Shalane Flanagan na akara iji merie na nkeji 14 4762

O ruru eru maka asọmpi zuru oke n'oge ahụ ọ mechara nke iri na anọ na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na 2009 IAAF World Cross Country Championships, ọ tụfuru ihe nrite na ọnọdụ nke anọ karịa 5000 m na 2009 World Championships in Athletics, wee mechie oge egwu ya site na ịpụta na 2009 IA AF World Athletics Final, na-abịa nke isii karịa 5000 m
Sentayehu meziwanyere nke ukwuu na 2010, na-etinye akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mmerụ ahụ n'azụ ya
Ọ meziwanyere 5000m ya kachasị mma n'ime ụlọ ruo 14 4680 nkeji ma setịpụ akara nke 9 1268 maka kilomita abụọ

Na 2010 IAAF World Indoor Championships, ya na Meseret Defar chepụtara atụmatụ iji gbochie ndị Kenya na 3000 m na ndị Etiopia nwere ihe ịga nke ọma, Meseret meriri n'ọkwa ahụ na Sentayehu na-ewere ọla nchara nke mbụ ya na mba ụwa
N'èzí, ọ meriri nzukọ mbụ ya nke 2010 IAAF Diamond League na Shanghai Golden Grand Prix
Ọ meziwanyere oge 5000m ya ruo nkeji 14 2839 na Meeting Areva, na-edekọ oge nke abụọ kachasị ọsọ n'afọ n'azụ onye mmeri Vivian Cheruiyot
O meriri 3000m na nzukọ Herculis na Monaco na oge nke 8 2841 nke kachasị ọsọ site na onye ọ bụla na-eme egwuregwu n'èzí n'oge ahụ

O kwuru na ọ bụ ihe nrite nke abụọ ya n'afọ na 2010 African Championships in Athletics, na-eweta ọla nchara 5000m n'azụ Cheruiyot na Meseret, wee gaa n'ihu iji mechie afọ ahụ na ọlaọcha maka Africa na afọ 2010 IAAF Continental Cup
Ọ meghere oge ime ụlọ ya nke afọ 2011 na Aviva Indoor Grand Prix ma melite 3000 m kachasị mma ya ruo 8 3026 nkeji, na-ebuli onwe ya ruo nke anọ na ndepụta ime ụlọ niile
N'ikpeazụ n'ọnwa ahụ, e mere njem n'okporo ụzọ nke ihe karịrị kilomita iri wee mee ka Dire Tune dị n'ahịrị iji were World's Best 10K na Puerto Rico
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke ọma na 2013 IAAF Diamond League n'afọ ahụ, na-emecha nke abụọ na Shanghai Diamond League, FBK Games, Bislett Games na Meeting Areva
Na 5000m ikpeazụ na 2011 World Championships in Athletics ọ gwụchara n'èzí ihe nrite na njedebe nke anọ
Mmerụ ahụ n'ụkwụ mere ka ọ ghara ịga n'afọ 2012 nakwa n'ọtụtụ afọ 2013
Mmeri na Tufts Health Plan 10K maka ụmụ nwanyị na nkeji 31 33 kachasị mma n'ọnwa Ọktoba, na afọ 2013 yiri ka ọ na-egosi nloghachi n'ụdị
O mere ọkara marathon mbụ ya na Delhi na Disemba ahụ, mana oge ya nke 1 2 02 awa mere ka ọ pụọ n'ime iri kachasị elu na ọsọ dị elu

Senyuiedzorm Awusi Adadevoh (amụrụ na Dzelukope, Volta Region nke Ghana) bụ onye na-ese foto egwuregwu na onye na-ede foto nke Ghana nke bi na Accra, Ghana
Ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese foto malitere na 1999, mechaa gbanwee gaa na foto egwuregwu n'etiti afọ 2000
N'afọ 2008, Adadevoh malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Black Stars, otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Ghana
Adadevoh bụ onye guzobere ụlọ akụ foto Solvers Ghana, ụlọ ọrụ foto na foto akụkọ Sports Unlimited na Society Unlimited
Adadevoh gara ụlọakwụkwọ praịmarị nke Mahadum Ghana nke dị na Legon wee gaa Aburi Girls' Senior High School
Adadevoh gụsịrị akwụkwọ na African Institute of Journalism (nke bụzi African University College of Communications) wee nweta Diploma na Communications Studies
Adadevoh bụ onye na-ese foto nke onwe ya nke chọrọ ịbụ onye na-eme vidio tupu ọ tụgharịa wee sebe foto

Adadevoh eseela foto n'ụfọdụ n'ime ihe omume egwuregwu ndị dị mkpa n'ụwa, nke gụnyere egwuregwu Olimpik abụọ, iko ụwa FIFA abụọ (South Africa 2010 na Brazil 2014 n'otu n'otu) na iko mba Afrịka isii n'etiti afọ 2008-2017
Adadevoh eseela ọtụtụ ndị a ma ama n'egwuregwu, dị ka Floyd Mayweather Jr
na nna ya Floyd Sr, na-ekpuchi ọgụ Mayweather vs
McGregor lụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2017

Senzeni Marasela (ubochí irí na otu n'ọnwa Febụwarị 1977) bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na South Africa nke amụrụ na Thokoza nke na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi dị >ichè íchè, na-ejikọta arụmọrụ, foto, vidiyo, mbipụta, akwa na embroidery na ntinye ngwakọta
O nwetara BA na Fine Arts na Wits School of Arts, Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, Johannesburg na 1998

A na-egosipụta ọrụ ya na South Africa, Europe na United States, ya na akụkụ nke nchịkọta mpaghara na nké mbà ụwa, gụnyere Museum of Modern Art ma ọ bụ Newark Museum ma na-ezo aka na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ, akwụkwọ édémédé na akwụkwọ akwụkwọ
Ọrụ Marasela na-enyocha ahụmịhe nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii South Africa gafee ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi, gụnyere foto, vidiyo, mbipụta, na ntinye ngwakọta nke gụnyere ákwà na embroidery

N'ọrụ ya, ọ na-asụgharị ihe ncheta nke ọgụ na ime ọbọdọ site na iji ọdịbendị na akụkọ ihe onwunwe, dị ka iji ụcha ọbara ọbara nke na-ezo aka na ncheta ọdịbendị gburugburu ógè 'Red Dust' nke na-ekwu màkà ógè ụkọ mmiri ozuzo na mmalite afọ 1930 na South Africa
Ihe ngosi ya na-ejikọta ihe ndị a na ọrụ mgbasa ozi dị ichè íchè, na-eme ka a hụ akụkụ nke ihe a na-eme kwa ụbọchị site na ihe na uwe
A maara ya maka ọrụ afọ isii ya Ijermani Lam nke 'na-eme ka ọnọdụ ichere pụta ìhè' site n'iyiri otu uwe uhie kwa ụbọchị site n'ubochí mbụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2013 ruo úbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Oktọba 2019
Uwe mbụ ahụ bụ akụkụ nke otu ihe ngosi 'Made Visible
Contemporary South African Fashion and Identity' na Museum of Fine Arts na Boston (February China, 2019)
Ọrụ ya na-etinye aka na ncheta ọdịbendị site na iji ihe nchekwa akwụkwọ dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ na foto na ákwà ndị ọchịchị

Ọ na-akọ akụkọ banyéré ụmụ nwanyị ojii na South Africa, dị ka Sarah Baartman ma ọ bụ nne ya Theodorah Mpofukazi Marasela site na usoro dị ka Covering Sarah Baartmann (2011), Sarah, Senzeni na Theodorah na-abịa Joburg (2011), Theodorah, (2005), Waiting for Gebane (2017), Izithombe Zendawo Esiz dedish (2017) ma na-ewu 'ihe ncheta dị nso', na-enye olu màkà ahụmịhe ụmụ nwanyị ojii
Senzeni Marasela gàrà St Dominic's School for Girls na Boksburg ébé ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na 1994
Nchịkọta nke nne ya nke doilies na ọrụ Victorian lace nke e nyéré n'ezinụlọ ya kemgbe ọtụtụ ọgbọ metụtara ọrụ nka ya
N'oge njem otu ụbọchị na 1992 na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, o kpebiri idebanye aha n'ebe ahụ
Ọ zụlitere ọrụ mgbasa ozi na ime ihe nkiri ya na Wits School of Arts ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1998
A na-egosi ọrụ Marasela mgbè niile kemgbe ngosi ihe nrite Martienssen na 1997
Goodman Gallery weghaara ya mgbè ọ bụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi otu Not Quite a Christmas Exhibition
O nwèrè ihe ngosi nke mbụ n'onwe ya na Iziko South African National Gallery's Fresh exhibition series na 2000 nke bụ akụkụ nke mmemme obibi
N'afọ 2003, ọ malitere ihe nkiri ogologo ógé nke akpọrọ Theodorah comes to Johannesburg nke dabeere na akụkọ nne ya kọrọ banyéré njem awa iri na otu ya site na Mvenyane gaa Johannesburg
N'afọ 2011, Marasela kpebiri ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe ógè niile ma bụrụ akụkụ nke Johannesburg Pavilion na 56th Venice Biennale na 2015
Na iguafọr Gregorian, Septemba bu onwa iteghete na afo, nwere ubochi ruru 30 (iri ato)
Na mgbe gara-aga, Septemba bula onwa asaa, site na afo a-di enwela Jenụwarị na Febrụwarị
Mgbe ekere wo, otu afo enweta onwa iri na abuo
1 Septemba bu ubochi nke 1st (nke mbụ) na onwa ana kpo Septemba
Na Gregorian calender, 1 Septemba bu ubochi nke 244th (245th na afo nke ana-kpo leap year) na afo
Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 121 du mgbe afo na agwu

Serah Mwihaki bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ede edemede na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dịka Onye Mmekọ, Onye Okike na Onye Mmepụta na Wordypix Company
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na ọrụ ndu na Kenyan Film Dangerous Affairs n'afọ 2002
O mepụtara TV Series Changes nke M-NET nakweere n'afọ 2009, ma soro dee ihe nkiri Kenya meriri ihe nrite Nairobi Half Life n'afọ 2012 na Kidnapped (2017 Film)

Ahụmahụ ya gara aga gụnyere ịrụ ọrụ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ nkịtị Kwani? dịka onye na-ere ahịa, dịka onye nduzi na-agba ọsọ na ihe nkiri The Constant Gardener n'afọ 2005, dịka onye nhazi mmepụta na Baraka Films mgbe ahụ Urbane Diaspora Productions tupu ọ banye n'ụlọ ọrụ ya ugbu a
Serah bụ onye otu Oscars Selection Committee Kenya (OCSK) na Kenya Writers Guild
A mụrụ Serah na Nairobi ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Madaraka Primary School na Thika tupu ọ banye na Alliance Girls High School
Ọ gara n'ihu mụọ ihe nkiri na TV Production na Media College, Nairobi

Mgbe ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri na Dangerous Affairs, Serah gara n'ihu na-egosi na ihe nkiri Kenya na ihe nkiri soap opera Wingu la Moto n'etiti afọ 2003 na 2006, mgbe ahụ dịka onye ọzọ na Ogige Iden n'afọ 2008, mgbe ahụ na Changes dịka onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ

Mgbe emechara ma dee Mgbanwe nke gbanwere na Mgbanwe II (2010) mgbe ahụ Mgbanwe III (2011), Nairobi Half Life na Kidnapped (2017 Film), Serah so dee na TV Series Kona (usoro TV) (2012), Selina - Telenovela (2018), Crime & Justice (2021)
Ọ bụ onye isi edemede na Singles Kiasi (2021)
Mgbe ọ na-edeghị akwụkwọ, Serah na-atụgharị na mmepụta nke gụnyere Pumzika (2005) na Money or the Cross (2006) na TV Series Tabasamu (2009-2011) mgbe ọ bụ onye nhazi mmepụta na Baraka Films
O mepụtakwara Kidnapped (2017 Film) na Wordypix Company na mmekorita ya na Machawood Films

Serein (/sɪˈriːn/; French ) na-ezo ákà na mmiri ozuzo na-esi n'eluigwe na-enweghị igwe na-ada
A na-ekwu na ụdị mmiri ozuzo a na-ewère ụdị mmiri ozu dị mma, nke na-enwekarị mgbe chi jiri
Aha ahụ sitere na French serein, nke pụtara 'nwèrè obi', ma ọ bụ 'nwèrè' (dị ka na-enweghị ígwé ojii)
Okwu ọzọ sitere na Old French serain, mgbede
Otu nkọwa nwèrè ike ịbụ na mmiri ozuzo na-apụ n'anya n'otu ógè ahụ mmiri ozuzo

Nkọwa ọzọ bụ na mmiri ozuzo ahụ anaghị amalite n'elu ébé ọ na-ada, kama ọ na-esi n'ígwé ojii dị ányá na-ebugharị ya site na ifufe siri ike n'elu (nke nwéré ike ọ gaghị adị n'ahụ n'ala n'ihi oke ikuku kwụ ọtọ)
Serena de la Hey (onye a mụrụ n'afọ 1967) bụ onye Britain amụrụ na Kenya bụ onye na-akpụ ihe nke mere njem n'ọtụtụ ebe mana o biri na Somerset kemgbe mmalite afọ 1990
A maara ya nke ọma maka Willow Man ya dị mita iri anọ n'ịdị elu na nso Bridgwater nke ọ rụchara n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 2001
A mụrụ ya na 1967 na Eldoret, Kenya, de la Hey nọrọ n'oge ntolite nwata ya n'ugbo dị na Australia
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Falmouth Art College, ọ biri na Somerset ebe ọ malitere ọrụ ịkpụ ihe n'oge site na iji willow sitere na Somerset Levels
De la Hey bu ụzọ jiri willow wee kepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ mmadụ n'afọ 1992 mgbe o mepụtara ihe oyiyi wicker na-agba ọsọ na Ọzara Nevada
Kemgbe mmalite afọ ndị 1990, o meela ihe oyiyi wicker nke ndị mmadụ na anụmanụ na ụlọ ọrụ ya na Stoke Gregory dị nso Taunton
Ọ na-ahụta willow dị ka 'mmiri, nke ụzọ dị ngwa nke ịchepụta echiche'
O mepụtala Ihe ọkpụkpụ dị iche iche nyere ndị ahịa ya ọkachasị maka ịchọ ụlọ ma ọ bụ ubi mma
N'afọ 1999, na ntinye aka nrụkọ ọrụ Fernando Martin, o mepụtara ihe ọkpụkpụ nke Glastonbury Festival nke a gbara ọkụ dịka akụkụ nke ihe ngosi pyrotechnic n'abalị ikpeazụ
N'afọ 2000, South West Arts nyere ya ọrụ ịmepụta Willow Man, ihe ọkpụkpụ wicker dị mita iri anọ n'ịdị elu nke dị nso na M5 Motorway dị nso na Bridgwater
O were ya izu anọ iji mezue ọkpúkpú ihe ọkpúkpú ahụ, na-eji osisi willow ụlọ nke ígwè na-akwado
Emechara ya na Septemba 2000
Na Mee 2001, ndị na-emebi ihe gbara ihe ọkpụkpụ ahụ ọkụ, na-ahapụ naanị ígwè ahụ
N'ihi mkpọsa iji weghachite ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ, n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2001, de la Hey mechara ọkpụkpụ nke abụọ ya, mana nke a, a na-ejikọta waya ígwè na willow
Tụkwasị na nke ahụ, a na ji nhata ahịhịa were echekwaba ya
Ọ bụ ezie na e mere ya na mbụ iji nọrọ naanị afọ atọ, de la Hey arụziwo Willow Man ọtụtụ ugboro n'ime afọ ndị gara aga ma ọ ka na-eguzo ma sie ike
Otú ọ dị, ị n'eme nrụzi dị oke ọnụ ma de la Hey na-eche ma a ga-emegharị ihe ọkpụkpụ a iji gbanari mmefu ego ntụgharị
Serge Attukwei Clottey (amụrụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe nke na-arụ ọrụ na metutara ntinye, arụmọrụ, foto na ihe ọkpụkpụ
Ọ bụ onye okike nke Afrogallonism, echiche nka, nke ọ kọwara dị ka 'echiche nka iji nyochaa mmekọrịta dị n'etiti mmụba nke galọn mmanụ odo n'ihe gbasara oriri na mkpa dị na ndụ ndị Afrịka nke oge a'
Dị ka onye guzobere GoLokal nke Ghana, Clottey na-anwa ịgbanwe ọha mmadụ site na nka
Ọ bi na Labadi, mpaghara dịpụrụ adịpụ nke Accra
A mụrụ Clottey na Accra na 1985, o wee malite igosi ọrụ ya n'ihe dị ka afọ 2003
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ghanatta College of Art and Design na Accra
Ọ kwagara Brazil ebe ọ gara Guignard University of Art nke Minas GeraisN'afọ 2019 ọ natara Honorary Doctorate of Art site na Mahadum Brighton
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2019, Clottey natara onyinye nke Doctorate of Arts site na Mahadum Brighton

Serge Beynaud (aha ya bụ Guy Serge Beynaut Gnolou ma a na-akpọkwa ya Beynaud mgbe ụfọdụ; amụrụ na 19 Septemba, na afọ 1987 na Yopougon, Abidjan) bụ onye na-agụ egwu Ivorian, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta egwu, nke metụtara ụdị dị ka Coupé-Décalé na Loko loko
AllAfricacom akọwaala Beynaud dị ka 'ihe na-emetụta ndị Ivory Coast' na 'omume dị arọ'
Na Febụwarị 2015, ọ bụ # 1 na StarAfrica Top 10, na egwu ya bụ Fouinta Fouinte
A mụrụ ya na Yopougon na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Abidjan na mpaghara Lagunes na nna onye agha, ọ na-ede abụ kemgbe ọ bụ nwata
A maara ya maka ejiji ejiji ya na ejiji ya ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị a ma ama na ihe nkiri Coupé-Décalé
A pụrụ ịchọta agbụrụ ya na ndị Bété
Serge Diantantu (4 Mee 1960 - 1 Juun 2022) bụ onye Congo na-ese akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị, onye na-ese ihe osise, na onye edemede
Serge Kanyinda bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri si Democratic Republic of the Congo, nke a maara nke ọma maka arụmọrụ ya dịka Magicien na ihe nkiri 2012 War Witch (Rebelle)
Ọ nwere ọrịa albinism
Kanyinda meriri Canadian Screen Award maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma na 1st Canadian Screen Awards
Àtụ ACCT Best Supporting Actor
Ngoy Lusungu Serge, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Serge Le Griot, bụ onye Congo na-eti egwu, onye na-ede uri, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-ede blọgụ si mpaghara North Kivu
A mụrụ Ngoy Lusungu Serge, nke a maara dị ka 'Serge Le Griot', n'ụbọchị 12 nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1995 n'obodo Goma (North Kivu), na ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Democratic Republic of the Congo
N'ịbụ onye nwere mmasị na uri nke oge a site na nwata, ọ malitere n'ụlọ ihe nkiri
Mgbe afọ ole na ole gasịrị na ìgwè 'Echos des plumes' nke ebe ọdịbendị nke Goma, n'afọ 2014 malitere n'ime slam iji nye olu na ederede ndị a zoro ezo ogologo oge na akwụkwọ edemede
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ hapụrụ obodo ya gaa biri na isi obodo Burundi mbụ, obodo Bujumbura, maka ihe ọmụmụ ihe
Serge Le Griot zutere ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe mgbe ọ na-eme nzere ogo bachelọ ya na injinịa obodo na Mahadum Bujumbura Light

Ọ matara onye Chadian slammer Croque-mort, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi Kader na ndị French slammers Rouda na Lyor gụnyere Rouda bụ ndị kpaliri ya ịmepụta, ya na ndị slammers iri na anọ ndị ọzọ sitere na mpaghara ahụ, nchịkọta Jewe Slam N'afọ 2018, ndị otu a sonyere na nke mbụ ya na iko Afrịka nke slam-poetry ma bụrụ onye nnọchi anya nke asọmpi ahụ na mpaghara Afrịka nke Great Lakes
N'afọ 2018, Serge Le Griot wepụtara abọm Slam mbụ ya nke nwere ụdị egwu isii ọhụrụ a na-akpọ 'Afroslamusic'
O si otú a bụrụ onye mbụ na-ese egwu slam si Central Africa wepụta abọm na isi iyi nke mkpali maka ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ ga-eso
A na-eme atụmatụ maka abọm nke abụọ ya nke akpọrọ 'Shauku' n'afọ 2020

Serkalem Biset Abrha, nke a makwaara dị ka Abrha Serkalem biset, (amụrụ na ụbọchi March 8, 1987) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ si Etiopia nke na-asọ mpi na ọsọ ọsọ ogologo ma merie ọtụtụ nnukwu marathons mba ụwa
Nnukwu agbụrụ mbụ Abrha na-abụghị Etiopia bụ na India's Delhi International Half Marathon na Standard Chartered Lahore 10K site na 2005 ruo 2007
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na ọkara marathon na afọ 2006, merie $ 1,000
Na afọ 2008, Abrha meriri Maas Marathon (Dutch Maasmarathon of the Basse-Meuse) n'ime ime obodo Visé, Belgium
Ka e mesịrị na afọ ahụ, ọ gbara ọsọ Hartford Marathon na Connecticut
Ihe karịrị ndị na-agba ọsọ 5,000 malitere site na Bushnell Park n'elekere asatọ nke ụtụtụ maka asọmpi nke iri na ise kwa afọ
Ndị na-agba ọsọ gafere Osimiri Connecticut, gaa n'ebe ugwu site na East Hartford na South Windsor tupu ha agafee okpukpu abụọ ma gafee Founders Bridge ọzọ
Ka Abrha na-agba ọsọ laghachi na Bushnell Park na n'okpuru Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Arch na njedebe, o doro anya na ọ bụ onye mmeri kachasị
Oge ya bụ 2 38 37
Na afọ 2009, ọ gara Georgia maka Atlanta Marathon
Ihe karịrị mmadụ 15,000 debanyere aha ka ha gbaa ọsọ, mmalite ahụ kwere nkwa oge ngwa ngwa ka okpomọkụ na-efe n'etiti ogo 40
Abrha duziri ụmụ nwanyị niile wee merie ihe nrite ego $ 3,000
Ọ bịara New York n’afọ 2009, ebe ọ chere asọmpi siri ike ihu na New York City Marathon
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ọ gbara ọsọ 2 37 20
Ọ mechara nke asatọ, merie $ 5,000
Ọ nọ n'azụ onye Etiopia Bizunesh Deba, otu n'ime ndị mmekọ ọzụzụ ya
Na afọ 2010, ọ mechara nke atọ na Las Vegas Marathon, na-etinye ya na mmeri na $ 4,000 na ọkwa mba siri ike
Ọ sochiri nke ahụ site na ịmecha nke atọ (2 33 52) na Barcelona Marathon na Spain
Ụmụ nwanyị anọ kachasị elu na-agba ọsọ bụ ndị Etiopia, ha gwụkwara ọtụtụ nkeji tupu onye ọzọ si Kenya
Na afọ 2011, ọ meriri California International Marathon na Sacramento, California
Ọ ga-emegharị mmeri ahụ ọzọ na 2015, na-emeri $ 10,000 maka oge ya nke 2 31 29
Laa azụ n’afọ 2010, ọ tụrụ ndị Canada n'anya site na mmeri nke 20 nke Marathon Oasis de Montreal
Ọ laghachiri na 2011 iji nweta aha ahụ ọzọ, n'oge a na 2 33 21

Na akụkọ agbụrụ nke afọ 2011, Montreal Gazette kwuru na ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, ọ bụ ezie na World Athletics gosipụtara ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya na 1987, ha kọwakwara otu afọ tupu mgbe ahụ na ọ dị iri abụọ na atọ
NYC marathon na 2011 hụrụ ndị na-agba ọsọ Etiopia Firehiwot Dado na Deba na-emecha nke mbụ na nke abụọ na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nke iri na ise na oge nke 2 33 22
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2015, ọ bịara Midwest maka Twin Cities Marathon site na Minneapolis ruo St
Paul
Obodo ndị ahụ anọwo na-eme ngagharị iwe ruo ọtụtụ izu na ngagharị iwe Black Lives Matter n'ihi nnukwu ọdịiche mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'etiti obodo Black na ndị ọzọ niile nọ na mpaghara ahụ
Ndị isi ngagharị iwe yiri egwu ịkpaghasị marathon ahụ n'akụkụ akara njedebe, na-akpali nchegbu maka ndị na-ahazi asọmpi na ndị na-agba ọsọ 15,000
Otú ọ dị, e ruru nkwekọrịta, na otu St
Paul Black Lives Matter kwetara ịhazi 'ọnwụ-in' n'akụkụ akara njedebe kama igbochi ọsọ ọsọ
Abrah butere ụmụ nwanyị ma merie na 2 31 39, naanị sekọnd ole na ole n'ihu onye Kenya Jane Kibii

Na ngwụcha afọ 2010, ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị ọzọ a ma ama ọ rụzuru bụ mmeri mbụ na Staten Island Half Marathon na October 8, 2017, na oge 1 16 26; mmeri nke atọ na ụmụ nwanyị maka France Run 8K na August 20, 2017, na Central Park na oge 32 01; na mmeri nke abụọ na Hope & Possibility 4K Race na June 25, 2017, (nakwa na Central Park) na oge 22 20
Ọ gwụchara n'elu atọ n'ọtụtụ nnukwu marathons, gụnyere njedebe nke abụọ ya na 2016 LA Marathon
Otu n'ime ihe ndị kasị ukwuu ọ rụzuru bụ mmeri mbụ na 2018 Philadelphia Marathon na 2 14 47, nke setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ
Ọ zụrụ na Bizunesh Deba, Genna Tufa, na Atalelech Asfaw na New York na n'ebe dị elu nke Albuquerque, New Mexico
Akụkụ nke ọzụzụ ya gụnyere njem oge n'oge oyi na Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, iji gbaa ọsọ n'ebe dị elu na ndị mmekọ ọzụzụ ya
Serkalem Fasil (Amharic ሰርካለም ፋሲል; amụrụ c
na afọ 1978) bụ onye nta akụkọ obodo Etiopia na onye bụbu onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Asqual, Menilik, na Satenaw
N'afọ 1997, Fasil malitere ọrụ odeakụkọ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ Wenchef
N'afọ sochirinụ, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ, o guzobere akwụkwọ akụkọ nke ya, Menilik, nke ụlọ mbipụta nke ya wepụtara
Ọ malitere ọzọ, Asqual, na afọ 2001, na nke atọ, Satenaw, na afọ 2004
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ Menilik na onye isi oche nke Satenaw
Fasil meriri 'obi ike na nturu ugo oru nta akuko' site na IWMF (International Women's Media Foundation) n'afọ 2007
O nyere onyinye ego ahụ na Amnesty International iji kelee ya maka inyere aka ịtọhapụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
Doraville, Georgia
Serta bụ ụlọ ọrụ America nke dị na Hoffman Estates, Illinois, nke na-ahụ maka mmepe na imepụta matarasị
E hiwere ya na 1931 na Illinois dị kaonye na-arahụ ụra , Inc
site n'aka ndị na-emepụta matarasị 13 bụ ndị nyere ikike aha Serta; n'ikpeazụ, ndị nweere onwe ha asatọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ na-achịkwa ma na-arụ ọrụ dị ka Serta mba ụwa site n'aka onye nwe ikikere ya kachasị ukwuu, National Bedding ụlọ ọrụ (nke mechara nwee 27 n'ime 34 US Serta manufacturing license)
N'afọ 2005, otu ndị otu abụọ jikọtara aka ịzụta National Bedding Co
Ụlọ ọrụ America Serta mba ụwa bụ enyemaka nke ụlọ ọrụ America Serita Simmons Bedding, LLC nke Doraville, Georgia
Ndị ọzọ nwere ikikere gụnyere Serta Dormae na Texas, Serta Restokraft na Michigan, na Salt Lake Mattress na Utah

Serta bụ akara matarasị kachasị ukwuu na United States, ma na-enye ụdị matarasị anọ - oge opupu ihe ubi dị n'ime, ụfụfụ ncheta gel, matarasị ngwakọta nke jikọtara ha abụọ, na ụlọ ọrụ Salt Lake City na-emepụta naanị nchịkọta akụkọ ụra akpa dị ndụ isi dị otú ahụ na ihe nọr na mkpóró ndị mmadụ n'ihe banyere ụkpụrụ nke ụwa họrọ site na iji Tinye Talalay Latex
A na-eji ngwaahịa Serta eme ihe nke ukwuu na ụlọ ọrụ obibi, na Hilton Worldwide na Wyndham Worldwide n'etiti ndị ahịa ya
A na-enyekwa matarasị Serta na ụlọ ahịa ụlọ ShopNBC
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2018, Serta Simmons Bedding, LLC kwupụtara njikọta ya na onye na-ere ahịa n'ịntanetị Tuft & Needle
Na Jenụwarị 23, 2023, Serta Simmons Bedding tinyere akwụkwọ maka isi nke 11 bankruptcy
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ nke a ma ama maka mkpọsa mgbasa ozi ya 'Counting Sheep' nke Aardman Animations mere ka ọ dị mma ma mepụta ya na 2000
A na-egosi na atụrụ na-agụ akwụkwọ na-achọsi ọrụ ike n'ịchọ ka ndị mmadụ na-ehi ụra n'abalị, mana ha na-enwe nkụda mmụọ mgbe ọ bụla ha chọpụtara na ndị mmadụ nwere matarasị Serta

N'ime afọ 2000, a na-eme ka atụrụ niile na-eme ihe nkiri site na iji akara ahịa nke Aardman nke na-eme ngagharị na-akwụsị akwụsị, nke e mere iji yie ụdị ọrụ Nick Park na Wallace na Gromit, Chicken Run, na Creature Comforts

Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2010, ụdị ihe nkiri nke atụrụ gbanwere site na nkwụsịtụ gaa na CGI, n'agbanyeghị na ọ ka na-eji otu ụdị njirimara ahụ site na mbụ, ma ka na-eme ya site na Aardman, ụdị ihe nkiri maka ịgụta atụrụ site na afọ 2010 gaa n'ihu ka e mere ka ọ dị ka ụdị Flushed Away, nke Aardman mepụtara
Àtụ Mattresses
Sesan Ogunro (amuru 11 Jenuarị 1983) bu onye isi ihe onyonyo onyonyo nke Naijiria dabere na United Kingdom, nke a na-ekwukarị maka ọrụ ya dị ka Sesan
Ọ eduzila vidiyo egwu maka ndị na-ese ihe ụdị Afrobeats dị ka D'Banj, Wizkid, Tiwa Savage na Davido
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Film Factory Nigeria, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta vidiyo na Lagos; na Ụlọ ihe nkiri South Africa, na Johannesburg
Sesan nọrọ na nwata ya na Lagos, Nigeria tupu ya na ezinụlọ ya kwaga UK, ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na London
Site na mmepụta egwu ruo DJing, ọ na-enwe mmasị na mmasị siri ike mgbe niile maka ịmepụta ihe
O were mmasị ya na nka gaa n'ihu n'ọmụmụ ihe wee gụchaa nzere na 3D Animation and Visual effects na Mahadum West London

Sesan sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ site n'aka nna ya nwụrụ anwụ na aha ya bụ Sesan Ogunro Sr, bụ onye na-agba ọsọ Eminent Communications, otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi kachasị na Lagos ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 2013
Mgbe mahadum gasịrị, Sesan gbasoro ọrụ ihe nkiri na mpaghara ime obodo UK site na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe ya, Mastermind Promotions nke mebere ya ụzọ ịbanye n'ọgbọ egwuregwu
Na 2005 o weere ọrụ dị ka onye isi nke Post Production na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi zuru ụwa ọnụ, McCann Erickson, London
N'afọ 2007, ọ zutere onye na-ese Afrobeats / Afropop D'Banj na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na Lagos ma kweta ịse ihe oyoyo maka otu ọ na-abịa, 'Na mberede'
Emere ihe nkiri na Lagos, Sesan's Afrobeat directorial mpụta mbụ na-eduga na mmekọrita mmeri na D'Banj n'ọdịnihu
Ndị a ga-agụnye vidiyo egwu maka ' Oliver Twist ', nke ewepụtara na YouTube n'afọ 2012
A họpụtara egwu a maka onyinye nturu ugo egwu ụwa kacha mma vidiyo nke afọ na onyinye ọwa O Music Video Awards Kachasị onyinye vidiyo kacha nwee onyinye n'afọ 2012
Sesan na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na ndị na-ese ihe n'ụdị niile dị ka Grammy nominated duo Riton na Kah-Lo, na a kwadoro ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị nduzi na-asọpụrụ Naịjiria
Sesan bụ nwanne OAP na onye na-emepụta Fade Ogunro na ha na-arụ ọrụ mmepụta ụlọ ọrụ, Film Factory ọnụ

Seswaa (dị ka a na-akpọ nri ahụ n'ebe ugwu Botswana) ma ọ bụ loswao (dị ka akpọrọ nri ahụ n'ebe ndịda mba ahụ na ọdịda anyanwụ South Africa) bụ nri anụ ọdịnnala nke Botswana, nke e ji anụ ehi ma ọ bụ anụ ewu mee
A na-akwado ya site na iji aka ekpe ma ọ bụ aka siri ike dịka ụkwụ, olu na azụ
A na-akwado nri ahụ maka ememe ndị dị ka olili ozu, agbamakwụkwọ na ihe omume mba dị ka ememe nnwere onwe
A na-esi anụ ahụ n'ọkụ ruo mgbe ọ dị nro n'ime ite, na 'mmanụ nnu zuru ezu', ma kụọ ya
A na-ejikarị ya na pap (nri ọka), setampa(Samp/grounded corn) ma ọ bụ mabele (sorghum)
Sethembile Msezane (amụrụ na 1991 na KwaZulu-Natal) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nkiri na South Africa, ọkà okwu ihu ọha na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri nke a maara màkà ọrụ ya n'ime nka màrà mmá
Msezane na-eji ọrụ ya nke na-ejikọta foto, ihe nkiri, ihe ọkpụkpụ, na eserese iji nyochaa okwu ndị lekwasịrị ányá na ímé mmụọ, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na usoro ihe ọmụma Afrịka
Akụkụ nke ọrụ ya lekwasịrị ányá na usoro nke ime akụkọ ifo na mmetụta ya n'ịmepụta akụkọ ihe mere eme yana enweghị ahụ nwanyị ojii na akụkọ na ebe anụ ahụ nke ncheta akụkọ ihe méré méré eme'
A na-arụ ọrụ Msezanes na gallery na South Africa nakwa na mbà ụwa ma merie onyinye na nhọpụta
Msezane bụ onye otu iQhiya Collective, netwọk nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii na-ese ihe sitere na Cape Town, Johannesburg na gafee South Africa
Ọ bụ ezie na a mụrụ ya na Kawazulu-Natal, a zụlitere Msezane na Johannesburg
O mechara kwaga Cape Town, ebe ọ gara Michaelis School of Fine Art iji mụọ màkà BA na Fine Arts na 2012 wee gaa na Masters of Fine Arts na 2017
Ihe ngosi Msezanes na-elekwasị anya na enweghị ụmụ nwanyị azụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na akụkọ ihe méré eme na South Africa

Site na arụmọrụ ya, ọ na-enyocha ụzọ ọha mmadụ si egbochi ụmụ nwanyị na mmegharị ha, uwe na ọnụ ọgụgụ site na iji ahụ nke ya dị ka ihe a tụrụ atụ nke mmadụ, na-eyi uwe symoblic iji kwado mkpa ya, ịdị adị ya na ọrụ ya n'ebe ọha na eze
A matala ọrụ Msezanes n'ụwa niile ma gosipụta ya na gallery gafee South Africa gụnyere Iziko South African National Gallery, Zeitz Mocca na Mahadum South Africa
N'afọ 2016, Msezane bụ ónyé mbụ natara ònyínyé Rising Light n'oge mmemme Mboko màkà ọrụ ya
Ọ nwetakwara ònyínyé TAF na SYLT Emerging Artist Residency (TASA) n'otu afọ ahụ ma bụrụ ónyé ikpeazụ iri nke Barclays L'atelier
A họpụtakwara Msezane màkà ANTI Festival International Prize for Live Art na 2017
A rụrụ ọrụ ya, 'Chapungu-the Day Rhodes Fell' (2015) n'oge ngagharị iwe nke The Rhodes Must Fall Movement, mgbè a na-ewepụ ihe oyiyi John Cecil Rhode na Mahadum Cape Town
Msezane guzoro dị ka ihe oyiyi mmadụ n'oge ihe omume ahụ ruo ọtụtụ awa na arụmọrụ iji weghachite ohere ahụ

Msezane ejirila ezumike ọha na eze ndị ọzọ dị na South Africa mee ma dozie nsogbu ndị na-emetụta ndị ntorobịa taa, dịka akụkụ nke 'Public Holiday series 2014-2015' Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ nke Msezane gụnyere 'Kwasuka Zukela' (2017) Gallery MoMo, Cape Town, South Africa, 'All Thing being Equal' Zeitz Mocca (2017)Cape Town, South Afrika na 'Unframed'(2018) na Cape Town Art Fair
Msezane gosipụtara ihe ngosi mbụ ya na UK 'Speaking through the wall' na Tyburn Gallery, London (2019), yana igosi ihe ngosi ọhụrụ ya 'Signal her return III' na New Art Exchange na Nottingham, UK

Msezane emeela ihe ngosi n'ìgwè ọtụtụ n'ime ha gụnyere 'Ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị na nka nke Disruptions'(2016) nà Iziko South African National Gallery, 'Re[as]sisting narratives(2016) n'ụlọ ọrụ Framer Frame na Amsterdam, 'Dancing on a Volcano'(2018) na mmemme foto Lagos Nigeria, 'Translations' na Emergence Art Space na Reed College Portland (2015), Oregon, 'Made Visible Contemporary South African Fashion and Identity' (2019) na Museum of Fine Art, Boston, USA
Msezane pụtara na TedGobal dị ka ọkà okwu ihu ọha na 2017
