Shamim Malende (amụrụ n'afọ 1980), bụ onye ọka iwu Ugandan, onye kọmishọna maka ịṅụ iyi, onye na-ahụ maka ọha na eze, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-eme ihe gbasara obodo
Ọ bụ onye otu People Power, Our Power Movement na nke National Unity Platform (NUP)
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị nọ n'òtù iwu nke Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2021 a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka mpaghara Kampala maka oge 2021-2026
A mụrụ Malende na Kawempe, Kampala, isi obodo Uganda, na Disemba 1980, nwa Alhajj Jamal Ahmed Sebuta Malende, onye ọka iwu, na Jane Francis Nasunna, onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị nke Busaale Church of Uganda na Kayunga District
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ O-Level ya na Buziga Islamic Theological Institute na Bbunga, agbata obi dị na Makindye Division, Kampala
Ọ gara Aisha Girls High School na obodo Mbarara, na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Uganda
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka nwa akwụkwọ kachasị mma na Western Region na n'etiti ndị kacha elu iri na mba ahụ mgbe ọ nwetasịrị AAAA na ule A-Level ya n'afọ 2000
A nabatara ya na Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ochie na nke kachasị ukwuu na Uganda, na nkwado gọọmentị
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Laws n'afọ 2005
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta diplọma postgraduate na Legal Practice, site na Law Development Centre na Kampala
A nabatara ya na Uganda Bar n'afọ 2008
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ nna ya tupu ọ mepee ụlọ ọrụ iwu nke ya, Malende & Company Advocates
N'ime oge 2018-2020, ọ na-edozi ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ikpe 200 nke ụmụ amaala Uganda a tụrụ mkpọrọ maka mmebi iwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị iche iche
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ahịa ya bụ ndị bi n'obodo ukwu, ndị na-eto eto, ndị ogbenye, ma na-edebanye aha na People Power, Our Power Movement na National Unity Platform
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ sonye na People Power Legal Team, nke Asuman Basalirwa na Benjamin Katana na-edu
N'afọ 2020, o kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịzọ ọkwa onye nnọchi anya nwanyị maka Kampala City na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Uganda nke 2021
Nke a mere ka ọ megide Stella Nyanzi, onye na-agba ọsọ maka otu ọnọdụ ahụ, na tiketi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Forum for Democratic Change
Ọ meriri oche ahụ
Àtụ Kampala District
Shams al-Muluk Gamil al-Baroudi bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri lara ezumike nká nke na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ihe nkiri Ijipt na ihe nkiri Lebanọn n'oge 1960s na 1970s
Lisa Anderson nke Chicago Tribune kọwara ya dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị kasị mara mma na ndị mara mma n'ime ụmụ nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri n'Ijipt'

A mụrụ ya nye nna onye Ijipt na nne onye Siria nke a mụrụ n'Ijipt, al-Baroudi gụrụ akwụkwọ na Higher Institute of Dramatic Arts na Cairo ruo afọ abụọ na ọkara wee mee ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri Ismail Yassin's comedy Hired Husband (Ven) n'afọ 1961

Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ nke ọma n'afọ ndị 1960, ọ bịara n'okpuru ihe ngosi na ọrụ 'na-emebi iwu' na mbido afọ ndị 1970, dị ka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri nke Salah Zulfikar bụ The Other Man (الرجل培) na 1973 na Malatily Bathhouse (حمام الم Leicester) nke Salah Abu Seif na 1973
Mgbe ọ lụsịrị onye na-eme ihe nkiri ibe ya bụ Hassan Youssef na 1972, di na nwunye ahụ malitere ịrụkọ ọrụ ọnụ ruo mgbe al-Baroudi kpebiri mgbe Umrah na 1982 ka ọ hapụ ihe nkiri ma yiri hijab
N'oge ahụ, Youssef ka na-ese ihe nkiri Two on the Road ma mgbe al-Baroudi lara ezumike nká na mberede, a ga-emecha ma wepụta ihe nkiri ahụ na 1984
N'afọ 2001, Nourah Abdul Aziz Al-Khereiji nke Arab News gbara al-Baroudi ajụjụ ọnụ na 2001 Al-Madinah Festival
Al-Baroudi kọwara oge ya dị ka 'oge amaghị ihe,' aha ndị Alakụba na-eji arutu aka n'oge tupu oge Islam
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2004, ọ na-eyi niqab na naanị ihe ngosi telivishọn ya bụ na ihe nkiri satellite okpukpe
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2008, ọ kwụsịrị iyi niqab ma na-eyi naanị ákwà mkpuchi
Lisa Anderson jiri al-Baroudi mee ihe atụ nke mmụba nke mmekọrịta ọha na eze n'etiti ndị Ijipt
Al-Baroudi lụrụ nwa eze Saudi Khalid bin Saud na 1969, ma gbaa alụkwaghịm mgbe ọnwa iri na ato gasịrị
Kemgbe afọ 1972, ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Hassan Youssef
Otu n'ime ụmụ ha nwoke, Omar H
Youssef bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Nwa nwanne ya nwanyị, Ghada Adel bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Shan George bụ onye na- eme ihe nkiri Nollywood, onye na-agụ egwú, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye ntụzi
Tupu ịmalite mpụta mbụ na ihe nkiri Thorns of Rose, ọ na-egosibu na 1997 usoro ihe nkiri akpọrọ Winds of Destiny
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na fim Outkast na Welcome to Nollywood
Amụrụ na Ediba, obodo dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Abi nke steeti Cross River, Nigeria ; A mụrụ Shan nye nne onye Naijiria na nna onye Britain
Na-arụrịta ụka maka inwe nsogbu na 'ndụ ịhụnanya' ya, alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya bụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 16
Ọ gara Edanafa Secondary Commercial School, Ediba, Cross River, Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lagos ebe ọ gụrụ Mass Communication wee gaa n'ihu wepụta ihe nkiri izizi ya akpọrọ All For Winnie n'ime afọ ikpeazụ ya
Na 2010, Shan wepụtara egwu mpụta mbụ akpọrọ Dance nke nwetara nlebanya dị mma site n'aka ndị nkatọ egwu
Ugbu a ọ mụrụ ụmụ abụọ ka o tinyechara aka n'alụmdi na nwunye ọtụtụ ugboro
Ọ bụkwa onye nchoputa/CEO nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri a naghị akwu ugwo, Divine Shield Film Academy na Calabar, Nigeria
AWARDS AND NOMINATIONS
Shana Elizabeth Dowdeswell (1 Eprel 1989 - 12 Disemba 2012), bụbu onye na-eme ihe nkiri Hollywood nke sitere na Zimbabwe
A mụrụ Dowdeswell na abali mbu nke onwa ano n' afo 1989 na Harare, Zimbabwe
Nna ya bụ Roger Dowdeswell bụbu onye gbaputara ihe n' egwuregwu tenis
Nne ya bụ Laurie Smith bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri nke mepụtara ihe nkiri The New Twenty
Shana kwagara New York City, USA wee gaa City and Country School, PS 3, na n'ikpeazụ PPAS High School

Ya na enyi ya nwoke bụ Cameron Moneo nwere mmekọrịta ogologo oge
O nwere otu nwanne nwoke nke nta, Jesse

Na abali asaa nke onwa Disemba 2012, Shana gara ụlọ mmanya Greenwich nke ime obodo New York City, nke a na-akpọ The Basement ma ṅụọ ọtụtụ mmanya oku whiskey
Ka ọ na-alọta, ọnwere ihe mkpohie ukwu ma togboro n' adighi ike
Otu onye na-achigharị nkịta chọpụtara ahu ya na adighi ike ma buru ya gbaga Beth Israel Medical Center
Mgbe ule ahụ gasịrị, a chọpụtara na ọ nwere mmanya na-aba n'anya n'ọbara nke 039 n'oge ahụ, okpukpu ise nke oke iwu steeti maka ịkwọ ụgbọala
Ọ nwụrụ na abali iri n' abuo nke onwa Disemba 2012
N'afọ 2002, Shana pụtara na Frank Higgins' play Miracles ma were onodu nke 'Eve', nwa agbọghọ nwere ọrịa amachagi ekwu n' esighi ike nke uburu
N'afọ 2003, ọ gosiputara agwa Jenna dị ka onye na-eto eto na ihe nkiri 13 Going on 30
Otú ọ dị, e wepụrụ agwa ya na ihe nkiri ahụ mgbe ndị na-ege ntị ule meghachiri omume na-adịghị mma na nke mbụ
O mechara mee ihe nkiri anọ dị iche iche na ihe ngosi atọ mbụ nke Iwu & Order franchise
Mgbe ahụ, o mere ihe nkiri na telivishọn a ma ama dịka Mercy, Family of the Year, na Body of Proof
Ka ọ dịgodị, Shana pụtakwara na ihe nkiri The Stream, The Winning Season, Asylum Seekers, na horo tupu ọnwụ ya

Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị na 2012, ewepụtara ihe nkiri ya ise The Big Wedding (2013), obere ihe nkiri Going South (2013), An Ornament of Faith (2013), obere ihe nkiri Wish You Were Here (2013), na Mistress America (2015)

Xu Shang-Chi (/ u ti/ SHOO shahng-CHEE; Chinese ; pinyin X Shàngq) bụ agwa akụkọ ifo na Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) franchise multimedia, dabere na agwa Marvel Comics nke otu aha ahụ
Shang-Chi bụ nwa Ying Li na Wenwu, onye nchoputa na onye ndu mbụ nke otu Ten Rings na-eyi ọha egwu, na aha aha

Shang-Chi, onye nna ya zụrụ azụ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ese ihe egwu na igbu ọchụ n'akụkụ nwanne ya nwanyị Xialing, hapụrụ mgbanaka iri ahụ maka ndụ nkịtị na San Francisco, na-adọtaghachi azụ na ụwa ọ hapụrụ mgbe Wenwu na-achọ ya
Achọpụtala Shang-Chi ka ọ bụrụ dike Asia mbụ mere ihe nkiri nwere nnukwu ego
O bu ụzọ pụta na Shang-Chi na Legend of the Ten Rings (2021)
Onye edemede Steve Englehart na onye na-ese ihe Jim Starlin kere agwa a na njedebe 1972

Marvel Comics nwara inweta ikike imeghari ihe nkiri telivishọn Kung Fu, mana Warner Communications jụrụ ya, bụ nke nwekwara onye isi mgba Marvel, DC ComicsKama, Marvel nwetara ikike nke Sax Rohmer's pulp villain Dr
Fu Manchu maka akwụkwọ ọchị
Englehart na Starlin kere Shang-Chi, onye nkuzi kung fu nke ewepụtara dị ka nwa Fu Manchu amabeghị na mbụ
N'agbanyeghị ịbụ agwa izizi, Rohmer kere ọtụtụ agwa Shang na-akwado Chi
Ọdịiche Shang-visual Chi bụ onye omenkà Paul Gulacy mere ka ọ dị ka Bruce Lee
Dị ka Englehart si kwuo, aha ya sitere n'ihe ọmụmụ ya banyere I-Ching, nke mebere (shng) nke pụtara 'ịrịgo' na chi pụtara 'ike dị mkpa'
Shang-Chi pụtara na mbụ na Special Marvel Edition #15 dị ka agwa (December 1973)
Ọ pụtaghachiri na mbipụta #16 wee gbanwee aha ya na Aka nke Shang-Chi Master of Kung Fu na mbipụta #17 (April 1974)
N'ime afọ 1970 na-agba egwu ịgba egwu na United States, akwụkwọ ahụ ghọrọ ewu ewu nke ukwuu, na-adịgide ruo mbipụta #125 (June 1983), ọsọ nke gụnyere okwu anọ buru ibu na kwa afọ
Shang-Chi bụ nna ya Dr
Fu Manchu zụlitere ka ọ bụrụ onye na-egbu egbu maka onye ga-emeri ụwa na ihe nkiri
Shang-Chi na-aṅụ iyi mmegide ebighi ebi megide ọchịchọ nna ya ma na-alụso ya ọgụ dị ka ike maka ezi ihe mgbe ọ chọpụtasịrị ọdịdị ọjọọ Fu Manchu
Fu Manchu mechara kpọgharịa Zheng Zu ka Marvel tụfuru ikike nke ụlọ Rohmer
Starlin, onye na-amabughị Fu Manchu ruo mgbe Larry Hama gwara ya banyere ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ya, kwuru na ọpụpụ mbụ ya na usoro ihere bụ ihere maka mkpughe ahụ
Shang-Chi pụtara na mpaghara agha ụwa nke K'un-Lun sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ wuxia na akụkọ akụkọ 'Agha nzuzo' nke 2015

Ọ bụ nwa Emperor Zheng Zu nke achụpụrụ n'agha, onye isi nke mgbanaka iri, agbụrụ ọgụ ọgụ na-enweghị obi ọjọọ nke na-eji ike omimi na usoro dabere na ike nke mgbanaka iri nke Mandarin sitere na isi mmalite
Otu n'ime ihe kpatara iji Mandarin dị ka Shang-nna, Chi dịka Ed Brubaker siri kwuo, bụ okwu nwebisiinka
Na isi na-aga n'ihu, Mandarin nwere nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Temugin bụ onye a zụrụ azụ na ebe obibi ndị mọnk na nkà ịgba egwu na nkà ihe ọmụma; aha ya sitere na ezigbo aha Genghis Khan, nna nna Mandarin

Dị ka Margaret Loesch, onye bụbu onye isi oche na onye isi oche nke Marvel Productions si kwuo, Stan Lee gakwuuru Brandon Lee na 1980 maka ịkpọ Shang-Chi na ihe nkiri ma ọ bụ ihe nkiri telivishọn dabere na agwa
A goro David Maisel ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ọrụ Marvel Studios na 2004 n'ihi na o nwere atụmatụ maka ụlọ ihe nkiri maka ihe nkiri ego onwe ya

Marvel batara na Merrill Lynch n'ime usoro ụgwọ anaghị akwụghachi ụgwọ, nke Marvel nwetara $525 nde ihe karịrị afọ asatọ iji mee ihe nkiri iri kachasị dabere na akụrụngwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, nke ụfọdụ ikike ihe nkiri kwadoro na ngụkọta nke mkpụrụedemede iri, gụnyere Shang- Chi

N'ịgbaso ọganihu nke Black Panther na Crazy Rich Asians (ha abụọ na 2018), Marvel mere ngwa ngwa ịmepụta ihe nkiri Shang-Chi, na-ewe David Callaham ka ọ dee ihe nkiri ahụ na December 2018 na Destin Daniel Cretton na-eduzi na March 2019
Cretton nyekwara aka dee ihe nkiri nke Callaham
Simu Liu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri China nke kwupụtaburu mmasị na ọrụ a, bụ Shang-Chi na Julaị 2019, na aha fim ahụ zuru oke, Shang-Chi na Legend of the Ten Rings, ka ụbọchị ole na ole gachara
Cretton na Kevin Feige
Mgbe emechara ya, Feige kpọrọ Liu, onye gwara ya na ndụ ya 'na-aga ịgbanwe,' n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-arịọ arịrịọ maka ọrụ ahụ kemgbe Disemba 2018

Cretton na Callaham, ndị sitere na Eshia, maara ụfọdụ echiche agbụrụ gbara Shang-Chi gburugburu na ihe nkiri ahụ, Liu na-ekwu na onye ọ bụla metụtara 'nwere mmetụta nke ukwuu ka ọ ghara ịbanye na mpaghara stereotypical' Cretton chere na edemede nke sitere na Shang-Chi na Legend of the Ten Rings bụ 'mmelite mara mma nke ukwuu' na agwa sitere na ihe nkiri, yana akụkọ ziri ezi gbasara njirimara Asia

Callaham gara n'ihu kwuo na ọ nweghị 'otu olu Asia America,' ya na Cretton kwurịtara ka ihe nkiri ahụ nwere ike isi gwa 'ndị mba Eshia sara mbara' okwu ma bụrụ 'ihe na-atọ ụtọ ma na-atọ ụtọ, kamakwa nke onwe maka ndị a niile' Cretton jiri Shang-Chi tụnyere Will Hunting from Good Will Hunting (1997), onye bụ 'ngwakọta nke oke nwoke na adịghị ike,' na-achọpụta na ihe odide abụọ ahụ nwere ihe nzuzo na ike ha na-aghọtaghị, ebe Liu kwenyere na Shang-na-alụ Chi na mgba
njirimara, karia nka nka agha ya, bụ isi n'ime agwa

When he was approached to play the part, Liu expressed a desire for the film to 'allow society to see Asian men as powerful, desirable, and an aspiration of possibility' Liu used his childhood experiences battling stereotypes and'microaggressions' to relate to Shang-character Chi's arc of coming to terms with his heritage

He also sought to dispel stereotypes based on Bruce Lee films from the 1970s that all Asian men are martial artists, stating in an Instagram caption that 'Shang-Chi is an Asian actor who specializes in kung fu

It's one of many aspects that contribute to his personality, but it's by far the most physically demanding' Despite knowing little about the character at first, Liu was reassured early in the production of Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings that 'It was clear from the beginning that [Cretton] was committed to telling the origin story of a hero who was fully three-dimensional and had a fully modernized origin story
In addition to Bruce Lee, he cited Jet Li as an inspiration when creating the character

Shang-Chi hapụrụ nzukọ iri mgbanaka maka ndụ nkịtị na San Francisco, ya na onye isi Destin Daniel Cretton na-akọwa Shang-Chi dị ka azụ dị na mmiri na United States onye na-anwa izo ya na amara ya ma ọ nweghị echiche 'onye ọ bụ
ọ bụ n'ezie' Mgbe ọ bi na San Francisco, Shang-Chi gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ 'Shaun' Liu chọpụtara na Shang-decision Chi's ibi ndụ nkịtị bụ ihe dị mma 'Ihe ọ na-eme bụ ntakịrị ihe na nkịtị
Ma ọ bụkwa n'ihi na a zụlitere ya n'ọnọdụ ndị siri ike
enweghị m ike ịta ya ụta maka ya

na-agbasi mbọ ike ịpụ n'ọnọdụ ahụ' Cretton kọwara Shang-Chi na Legend of the Ten Rings dị ka 'njem nke ịbanye n'ime onye [Shang-Chi] bụ na ihe ọ pụtara ịbụ n'ụwa a' N'ihi na agwa anaghị eyi ihe mkpuchi, Liu kwesịrị ịrụ ọrụ na mgbanwe ya tupu ọ na-ese ihe nkiri iji mee ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nke ya
Liu jikwa kilogram 45 gbalitekwara maka ọrụ ahụ
Maka ihe nkiri ahụ, Liu mụtara ma zụọ ya na taekwondo, mgbatị ahụ, na Wing Chun, yana tai chi, wushu, Muay Thai, silat, Krav Maga, jiu-jitsu, ịkụ ọkpọ, na ọgụ n'okporo ámá
Liu zoro aka na usoro ọzụzụ na ịme egwuregwu dị ka 'Ọ na-agwụ ike
Enwere ọtụtụ awa ogologo oge
ma ọ bụ otu n'ime ahụmahụ kacha akwụghachi ụgwọ nke ndụ m' Jayden Zhang na Arnold Sun gosipụtara Shang-Chi dịka nwata na afọ iri na ụma

Cretton dọtara nke ukwuu na ọrụ Jackie Chan maka usoro mmalite na fim ahụ nke Shang-Chi na-alụ ọgụ megide ndị na-egbu ọchụ sitere na Ten Rings, na-arụkọ ọrụ na ndị na-egwu egwu Brad Allan na Andy Cheng, bụ ndị a zụrụ azụ na otu egwuregwu Chan
Cretton kwuru na oge usoro kachasị amasị ya bụ 'Jaketị ahụ stunt
mgbe ọ nwere ike wepụ jaket ya, gbanye ya gburugburu, ma tinyeghachi ya
Ndị otu egwuregwu Jackie Chan na-enye Jackie Chan ozugbo'
A mụrụ Xu Shang-Chi na mbara ụwa ọzọ nye Xu Wenwu, onye ndu oge ochie nke nzukọ Ten Rings, na Ying Li, onye nlekọta obodo nta nke Ta Lo
Shang-childhood Chi bụ ihe na-adịghị mma, ebe nna ya hapụrụ ụzọ ndị omekome ya ka ya na ezinụlọ ya na-anọkọkwu oge na nne ya na-ekpori ndụ ya na nwanne ya nwanyị Xialing akụkọ sitere n'obodo ya
Mgbe ndị Iron Gang gburu Li, bụ onye ochie na-agba mgba nke mgbanaka iri, Wenwu were mgbanaka iri ihe omimi ya wee buru Shang-Chi gaa ebe nzuzo nke Iron Gang, ebe ọ na-eji obi ọjọọ gbuo ndị otu ahụ
Wenwu na-emegharị ọgbakọ Ten Rings ma zụọ Shang-Chi n'ịlụ ọgụ ka onye ogbu mmadụ n'okpuru nkuzi obi ọjọọ nke Death Dealer
A na-eziga Shang-Chi na ozi mgbe ọ dị afọ 14 igbu onye ndu Iron Gang na ịbọ ọbọ nne ya

N'agbanyeghị ihe ịga nke ọma ya, Shang-Chi nwere nkụda mmụọ site na nhụjuanya ahụ wee gbaga San Francisco iji malite ndụ ọhụrụ n'okpuru utu aha 'Shaun' Shang-Chi mere enyi Katy na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ha abụọ nọgidere na-abụ ezigbo enyi ruo n'oge
A na-awakpo Shang-Chi site na mgbanaka iri, nke Razor Fist na-edu, afọ iri ka e mesịrị
Shang-Chi na-alụso ha ọgụ, mana ọ tụfuru pendant nne ya
N'ịtụ egwu na mgbanaka iri ahụ ga-awakpo Xialing maka pendant ya, Shang-Chi na-eso ya wee gwa Katy banyere oge gara aga, onye kwetara inyere ya aka
Ha na-achọpụta Xialing na ụlọ agha ya dị n'okpuru ala dị na Macau, mana ndị mgbanaka Iri, nke Death Dealer na-edu, na Wenwu bịarutere ijide Shang-Chi, Katy na Xialing
A na-eduga ndị atọ ahụ na ogige Ten Rings, ebe Wenwu gosipụtara na ya kwenyere na Li ka dị ndụ ma na-ejide ya na Ta Lo, na-eji pendants abụọ mee map nke nwere ike ịbanye n'ime obodo
Wenwu na-ezube ibibi obodo ahụ mgbe ọ tọhapụsịrị Li, mgbe Shang-Chi na ndị ọzọ jụrụ, ọ tụrụ ha mkpọrọ
Site n'enyemaka nke Trevor Slattery na onye ya na hundun Morris, ndị atọ ahụ gbanarị ogige ahụ wee gaa Ta Lo iji dọọ obodo nta nke Ten Rings aka na ntị

Shang-Chi zutere nwanne nne ya na nwanne Li, Ying Nan, na Ta Lo, bụ onye na-akọwa akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Ta Lo ma gosi na Wenwu na-aghọgbu site na Dweller-in-Darkness na-ekwere na Li ka dị ndụ, ya mere ọ ga-eji ya
mgbanaka iji mebie akara nke na-atụ ya mkpọrọ
Nan na-enye Shang-Chi uwe e si na akpịrịkpa na-acha uhie uhie nke Onye Nchebe Ukwu, onye nlekọta dragọn Ta Lo, kuziere ya ụdị ọgụ Ta Lo
Mgbe Wenwu na Mgbanaka Iri rutere ibibi akara ahụ, Shang-Chi na ndị enyi ọhụrụ ya na-agbachitere obodo ahụ
Shang-Chi busoro nna ya agha, mana e meriri ya wee tụba ya n'ime ọdọ mmiri
Onye nchekwa ukwu na-akpọlite Shang-Chi n'ọnwụ, onye na-eji ikike ọhụụ ọhụrụ ya wepụrụ Wenwu
Wenwu na-achụ onwe ya iji zọpụta Shang-Chi n'aka onye obibi wee nye Shang-Chi mgbanaka iri ahụ, bụ onye na-eji ha na ụdị ọgụ Ta Lo ebibi onye obibi
Laa azụ na San Francisco, onye mgbaasị Wong kpọrọ Shang-Chi na Katy ka ha soro ya gaa Kamar-Taj, ebe a na-ewebata ha na Bruce Banner na Carol Danvers site na hologram
Wong, Banner, na Danvers chọpụtara na mgbanaka ndị ahụ na-ebunye akara dị egwu, Wong kwere nkwa ịga n'ihu nyocha
Shang-Chi tụkwara aro ka ha gaa n'ụlọ mmanya wee bụrụ otu karaoke, nke ya, Katy na Wong na-eme
Karen Rought nke Hypable toro mkpebi ahụ ka Shang-Chi mara onye ọ bụ na ihe ọ nwere ike site na mmalite, n'adịghị ka ọtụtụ akụkọ mmalite ama ama nke a na-ahụ na fim ndị ọzọ na-atọ ọchị
'Ee, nke a bụ akụkọ sitere na mmalite, mana ọ bụ ihe gbasara nnabata onwe onye karịa nchọpụta onwe onye
nke ahụ bụ ume nke ikuku maka ihe nkiri mbụ banyere àgwà ọhụrụ na MCU,' Rought kwuru
Ihe ngosi Liu nke agwa, ọ na-ekwu, 'na-enye anyị dichotomy zuru oke n'ọrụ ya

a Ọ nwere ihu ọma, goofy, onye nkịtị nke na-ezochi ihe nzuzo' NPR's Justin Chang dọtara site na mmekọrịta dị mgbagwoju anya nke agwa ya na Wenwu, na-ekwu na '[Shang-Chi] nwere mgbagwoju anya, mgbagha Oedipal na nna ya, bụ onye mere ka ọ ghọọ igwe agha ọ bụ ma mee ka ọ bụrụ ụdị obi ọjọọ niile
aghụghọ na mmegbu,' na-egosi àgwà 'ihe omimi nke

trauma' A kọwara Shang-Chi dị ka 'ezigbo mma' nke Deseret's Herb Scribner, onye gbakwụnyere na 'ọ kwesịrị ịnọ nso maka ihe nkiri Marvel maka ọdịnihu a na-ahụ anya' Dị ka Scribner si kwuo, 'dị ka Shang-Chi, Liu na-eje ije n'ahịrị nke nwa okorobịa na-agbalị ịchọta ụzọ ya na nwata nwoke na-adịghị ike na-agbalị ịchọta ezinụlọ ya,' ma jiri àgwà ahụ tụnyere ndị ọzọ na-edu ndú na MCU dị ka Thor
na Bruce Banner

N'ịgbaso mweghachi nke nkwupụta sitere na 2017 nke Liu katọrọ gọọmentị China, o kwuru na ndị mụrụ ya gwara ya na China bụ mba 'ụwa nke atọ' ebe ndị mmadụ 'na-anwụ n'agụụ' N'ihi ya, ntọhapụ China maka Shang-Chi na Legend of the Ten Rings ghọrọ ihe na-agaghị ekwe omume; ọtụtụ ndị na-akwado China gosipụtara ndakpọ olileanya na ha agaghị enwe ike ịhụ ihe nkiri ahụ, na-ekwu maka mkpebi ihe nkiri ahụ iji wepụ ihe ndị na-ese okwu Shang-Chi àgwà dị ka ihe dị mma
Àtụ Infobox ChineseShang Yang ( Chinese ; c
390-338 BC), a makwaara dị ka Wei Yang (Chinese) na onye a na-akpọbu Gongsun, bụ onye ọkà ihe ọmụma China oge ochie, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọkà mmụta ama ama gbasara iwu

Amụrụ na steeti Zhou vassal nke Wei n'oge agha na ịlụ ọgụ, ọ bụ onye isi ala, onye isi na onye na -eme mgbanwe na -eje ozi na steeti Qin, ebe amụma ya tọrọ ntọala nhazi, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na akụ na ụba nke wulitere steeti Qin ike ma mesịa mechaa
nyere Qin aka imeri steeti isii ndị ọzọ na-asọrịta mpi, na-eme ka China bụrụ ọchịchị etiti maka oge mbụ na akụkọ ntolite n'okpuru usoro ndị eze Qin
Ndị ọkà mmụta na-eche na ọ ga -abụ na ya na ndị na -eso ụzọ ya nyere aka na Akwụkwọ nke Lord Shang, ọrụ nkà ihe ọmụma maka ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Ndebe iwu China
A mụrụ Shang Yang dị ka nwa iko nwanyị nye ezinụlọ na-achị nke obere steeti Wey (衞)
Aha nna ya (氏, aha agbụrụ) bụ Gongsun na aha ya bụ Yang
Dị ka onye òtù ezinụlọ Wei, a makwaara ya dị ka Wei Yang
Mgbe ọ dị obere, Yang gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu wee nweta ọkwa n'okpuru onye isi ala Shuzuo nke Wei (魏, ọ bụghị otu ihe dị ka steeti amụrụ ya)
Site na nkwado nke Eze Xiao nke Qin, Yang hapụrụ ọkwá ya dị ala na Wei ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ndụmọdụ na Qin
Ọtụtụ mgbanwe ya gbanwere steeti Qin dị elu ka ọ bụrụ alaeze dị ike na nke etiti
Mgbanwe ndị e mere n'usoro iwu steeti (nke a sịrị na e wuru n'elu Canon of Laws nke Li Kui ) mere ka Qin baa ọgaranya
N'ịkwalite nchịkwa ahụ site na nkwanye ugwu na ịdị mma, amụma ya mere ka ike nke ndị isi obodo daa mba
Na 341 BC, Qin wakporo steeti Wei
Yang n'onwe ya duuru ndị agha Qin merie Wei, n'ikpeazụ Wei nyefere Qin ala ọdịda anyanwụ nke Osimiri Yellow
Maka ọrụ ya na agha ahụ, Yang nwetara obodo iri na ise na Shang dị ka onye chọrọ ịlụ ya wee bụrụ onye amara dị ka onye nwe Shang (Shang Jun) ma ọ bụ Shang Yang
Dabere na Ihe ndekọ ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme ukwuu, ya na ndị ọmara mgbe ọ na-eje ozi n'ụlọ ikpe Wei, Shang Yang kpọrọ Gongzi Ang, onye isi Wei, ka ọ kparịta nkwekọrịta udo
Ozugbo Ang bịarutere, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ, ndị agha Qin wakporo, merie ndị iro ha nke ọma
Mark Edward Lewis kọwara mgbe ọ na-ahazigharị ndị agha dị ka onye na-ahụ maka nhazi nke okporo ụzọ na ubi n'ofe ugwu China
Nke a nwere ike ịbịaru nso, mana Yang bụ onye na-eme mgbanwe agha dịka nke iwu
Yang lekọtara owuwu iwu Xiangyang
Emperor Wu nke Han kwadoro echiche Shang Yang, na John Keay kwukwara na a dọtara Tang ọgụgụ Du You na Shang Yang
Han Fei nyere ya otuto, nke a na -ewerekarị na ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya kacha nke ndebe Iwu China (法家), na imepụta echiche abụọ;
N'ikwere na iwu nke iwu na ịtụle iguzosi ike n'ihe nye steeti karịa nke ezinụlọ, Yang webatara mgbanwe abụọ na steeti Qin
Nke mbụ, na 356 BC, bụ
Yang webatara mgbanwe nke abụọ ya na 350 BC, nke gụnyere usoro nhazi ọhụrụ nke ikesa ala na ime mgbanwe site na ụtụ isi

Imirikiti mgbanwe nke Yang sitere na amụma etinyere ebe ọzọ, dị ka Wu Qi nke Steeti Chu ; agbanyeghị, ndozigharị nke Yang bụ nke zuru oke ma dị oke njọ karịa nke steeti ndị ọzọ, yana iwu nke otu onye ọchịchị
N'okpuru ọchịchị ya, Qin ji ngwa ngwa karịa mmegharị nke steeti ndị ọzọ

Yang webatara mmezigharị ala, ala nkeonwe, nye ndị ọrụ ugbo ụgwọ ọrụ karịa oke owuwe ihe ubi, ndị ọrụ ugbo na-emezughị oke ego, ma jiri isiokwu ndị ohu dị ka ụgwọ ọrụ (nke steeti) maka ndị zutere ụkpụrụ gọọmentị
Ebe ọ bụ na ike mmadụ dị mkpụmkpụ na Qin n'ihe metụtara steeti ndị ọzọ n'oge ahụ, Yang tiri amụma iji bulie ike mmadụ

Ka a na -ewebata ndị ọrụ ugbo Qin n'ime ndị agha, ọ gbara ume ka ndị mbịarambịa sitere na steeti ndị ọzọ banye na Qin ka ha bụrụ ndị na -anọchite ndị ọrụ; amụma a n'otu oge mụbara ndị ọrụ Qin ma mebie ike nke ndị na-emegide Qin
Yang mere iwu na-amanye ụmụ amaala ịlụ di na nwunye mgbe ha dị obere ma nyefee iwu ụtụ isi iji kwalite ịzụlite ọtụtụ ụmụaka
O mekwara iwu iji tọhapụ ndị a mara ikpe na-arụ ọrụ n'imepe ala ahịhịa maka ọrụ ugbo
Yang kagburu iwu nrite oke nke nwa nke mbụ (dabere na arụmọrụ nwa nwoke) wee mepụta ụtụ isi abụọ maka ezinụlọ nwere ihe karịrị otu nwa bi n'ụlọ, iji kewaa nnukwu ezinụlọ n'ime ezinụlọ nuklia
Yang wepụrụ isi obodo ahụ site na obodo Yueyang gaa Xianyang, iji belata mmetụta ndị isi na nchịkwa ahụ
Xianyang bụ isi obodo Qin ruo mgbe ọ dara na 207 BC
Ndị isi Qin ledara ya anya nke ukwuu, Yang enweghị ike ịlanarị ọnwụ Eze Xiao nke Qin
Onye ọchịchị na-esote, Eze Huiwen, nyere iwu ka e bibie ezinụlọ itoolu megide Yang na ezinụlọ ya, na ihe kpatara mkpalite nnupụisi
Yang emechuola onye isi ọhụrụ ahụ ihu 'site n'ime ka a taa ya ahụhụ maka mmejọ dịka a ga-asị na ọ bụ nwa amaala nkịtị' Dabere na Zhan Guo Ce, Yang gara zoo ma n'otu oge Yang nwara ịnọ n'ụlọ ndị ọbịa
Onye nlekọta ụlọ ọbịa jụrụ n'ihi na ọ megidere iwu Qin ịnabata onye ọbịa na-enweghị njirimara kwesịrị ekwesị, iwu Yang n'onwe ya mere
Jūliè gburu Yang (車裂, nkwarụ site na 車裂 ịnyịnya ise, ehi ma ọ bụ ịnyịnya ma dọwaa ya); E gbukwara ezinụlọ ya niile
N'agbanyeghị ọnwụ ya, Eze Huiwen debere mgbanwe ndị Yang tiri
Ọtụtụ ụdị mgbanwe ọnwụ Yang ka dị
Dabere na Sima Qian na Ihe ndekọ ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme ukwuu, Yang buru ụzọ gbaga na Wei
Agbanyeghị, a kpọrọ ya asị ebe ahụ maka nrara ọ raara Gongzi Ang na mbụ wee chụpụ ya
Yang gbalagara n'ọchịchị ya, ebe ọ zụlitere ndị agha nnupụisi mana e gburu ya n'agha
Mgbe agha ahụ gachara, Eze Hui nke Qin mere ka ụgbọ ala dọwaa ozu Yang dị ka ịdọ aka ná ntị nye ndị ọzọ

Mgbe ogbugbu Yang gasịrị, Eze Huiwen tụgharịrị site na ndagwurugwu etiti wee merie Sichuan ( Shu na Ba ) n'ihe Steven Sage kpọrọ ntụgharị echiche nke ọhụụ maka ọdịmma anụ ahụ n'ọchịchọ Qin maka ọchịchị ụwa niile

Ibu n'uche ozi nke oge (1955) na oge ọ na-ekwu okwu, AFP Hulsewé gara n'ihu ịkpọ Shang Yang 'onye guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu', wee were ịdị n'otu nke ntaramahụhụ bụrụ otu n'ime ihe kachasị onyinye dị mkpa, ya bụ, inye ntaramahụhụ ọnwụ maka ọkwa onye ọ bụla na -enupụ isi n'iwu eze

Shanghai Expo Mart (Chinese 上海世博会展中心; zhǎn zhōngxīn; Shanghainese ), nke bụbu Africa Joint Pavilion (Chinese), bụ ụlọ ngosi dị nso na Osimiri Huangpu na Shanghai, China
E wuru ụlọ nzukọ ahụ maka Expo 2010 ma nwee 21,000 square mita (230,000 ft) nke ime ụlọ na 3,600 square mita (39,000 sq ) of outdoor space
A rụzigharịrị ụlọ nzukọ ahụ mgbe ngosi ahụ gasịrị, na mmezigharị na-agwụ na Nọvemba 2011
E wuru Shanghai Expo Mart maka Expo 2010 dị ka Africa Joint Pavilion
E wuru ya dị ka mmekorita ya na ndị China na ndị Africa, ma wuchaa ya na Septemba 2009
Ogige ahụ nwere nnukwu mgbidi osisi ndị e sere n'akụkụ ụlọ ahụ
Ihe osise ahụ na-eru nso na June 11, 2009, ma gosipụta ya n'ụlọ ahụ n'oge ngosi ahụ
E ji saịtị ahụ gosipụta mmepe na ọdịbendị nke obodo ukwu dị n'Africa
Ihe ngosi ahụ were site na Mee 1 ruo Ọktoba 31, 2010
Na Mee 19, ihe ngosi ahụ setịpụrụ ndekọ mgbe ọ natara otu nde ndị ọbịa n'oge ihe ngosi ahụ, na June 22 mebiri nde ndị ọbịa ise, wee gafee nde 10 na July
Ọ bụ ma nnukwu ụlọ ma na-anọchite anya ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu nke mba ọ bụla na World Expo
Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara ihe ngosi sitere na mba 42 nke Afrịka na mba 8 nọchitere anya site na ndị otu ha nke African Union
Mgbe ngwụcha nke Expo 2010 gasịrị, atụmatụ nchịkwa nke ngosi ahụ bụ ịkwatu ụlọ ọrụ mba niile site na ihe omume ahụ ma e wezụga nke China
Ụfọdụ n'ime ụlọ ndị ahụ furu $ 16 nde iji wuo, mgbe ihe omume ahụ gasịrị, e nyere obodo Shanghai isii n'ime ha site na mba ndị ọzọ Saudi Arabia Pavilion, Italy Pavilion

E weghachiri ụfọdụ n'ime ụlọ ndị ahụ nwa oge Italy Pavilion ghọrọ Shanghai Italian Center, Expo Performance Center ghọrọ Mercedes-Benz Arena, China Pavilion ghọkwara China Art Palace, na Africa Joint Pavilion ghọọ Shanghai Expo Mart
Ogige egwuregwu ahụ bụ ebe egwuregwu, kọntaktị, na ihe omume ndị ọzọ na-eme; Ụlọ Ọrụ nka China na-akwado ihe osise

Pudong Expo Site Management Office ka na-eme atụmatụ ịkwatu ọtụtụ n'ime ụlọ ndị ahụ ma ọ bụrụ na atụmatụ mmepe mpaghara dị mkpa maka mpaghara ahụ; Otú ọ dị, a ga-edebe Africa Joint Pavilion ruo mgbe ebighị ebi
Mgbe ngosi ahụ gasịrị, a rụzigharịrị Africa Joint Pavilion, na mmezigharị ahụ gwụchara na Nọvemba 2011
A gụgharịrị ụlọ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Shanghai Expo Mart
Àtụ Expo 2010
Shanghai Free-Trade Zone (Shanghai FTZ or SFTZ, nke ama dika 上海自由贸易区/上海自贸区 na Chinese), nakwa China (Shanghai) Pilot Free-Trade Zone (ChineseÀtụ ZhpinyinÀtụ Zh) bụ free-trade zone in Shanghai, China
Na 22 August 2013, Kọmitii Kansụl kwadoro malitere SFTZ

Ebidoro nkwado a na September n'afọ 2013 na Chinese Premier Li Keqiang, ọ bụ ebe mbụ enwere ike na-azụ ahịa na-ere ahịa makwa na-atụbata Ahia na China Mpaghara ahụ kpuchiri ebe 12072 square kilometres (4661Àtụ Convert ma jikọta mpaghara anọ nwere njikọ dị na district of Pudong — Waigaoqiao Free Trade Zone, Waigaoqiao Free Trade Logistics Park, Yangshan Free Trade Port Area and Pudong Airport Comprehensive Free Trade Zone

Kemgbe 21 April 2015, a na-agbasawanye ebe mpaghara Shanghai FTZ, gụnyere Lujiazui Financial and Trade Zone, Shanghai Jinqiao Economic and Technological Development Zone (former Jinqiao Export Processing Zone) na Zhangjiang Hi-Tech Park
A na-eji mpaghara a dị ka ebe nyocha maka ọtụtụ mgbanwe mgbanwe akụ na ụba na nke ọha na eze
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a ga-ahapụ ire ere egwuregwu vidio, machibido na China kemgbe 2000, na mpaghara
Ọ bụ ezie na Microsoft chọrọ iji nweta Xbox na ahịa site na mbubreyo April 2014, a sụlarị ya ugbu a maka ụbọchị ntọhapụ nke 23 September 2014
Ihe mgbakwunye na egwuregwu nke onye ọ bụla ga-edozi ya site na nkwenye site na Shanghai na-achịkwa Culture, Radio, Film & TV maka imepụta na ahịa na China
Ọ bụ ezie na e bu ụzọ kọọ na mpaghara ahụ ga-enwe ike ịnweta ịntanetị (site n'igosi ebe ndị dịka Facebook welitere), ọrụ akụkọ bụ Xinhua News Agency kwuru na-agaghị ebuli ihe mgbochi Ịntanetị
Ngwaahịa na-abanye na mpaghara ahụ adịghị edozi ọrụ na omenala ka ọ ga - abụ ikpe
Nke a abụrụ ụlọ ọrụ mmanya na China, n'ihi na ọ na-enye ndị na-ebubata ngwaahịa mgbanwe karị n'ime ka mmanya ghọọ mba ahụ
FTZ na-akọwa usoro dị iche iche maka esemokwu karịa karịa n'ebe ndị ọzọ na China
Ikpe ikpe na mpaghara ahụ na-achịkwa usoro iwu ikpebi nke dị iche iche nke Ụlọ Ọrụ Arbitration International nke Shanghai (SHIAC) nyere
Ndị a na-ewebata ọtụtụ mgbanwe ndị na-eme ka ndị mba ọzọ na-etinye ego na FTZ, gụnyere mgbochi mberede, usoro mgbasa ozi / ikpe mkpara, na nkwụsịtụ nchịkọta nke usoro nchịkọta
Tụkwasị na nke a, enwere ike ịhọrọ ndị na-ekpe ikpe site na mpụga akwụkwọ akụkọ nke ụlọ ọrụ SHIAC nọgidere na-elekọta, ma ọ bụrụhaala na ha kwadoro ụfọdụ njirisi iru eru

Mpaghara ahụ kwusiri ọtụtụ ego maka ịmepụta ụlọ ọrụ na China, gụnyere isi obodo ntinye ego nke RMB30,000 maka ụlọ ọrụ na-ejighị ụgwọ, otu RMB100,000 kacha nta maka ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-ere ọrụ naanị, na RMB5 nde kachasị maka ụlọ ọrụ nkwakọba ihe
Ọzọkwa, n'okpuru FTZ ọhụrụ akwụkwọ ndebanye aha, ndị si mba ọzọ na-etinye ego na pasent 15 n'ime ego n'ime ọnwa atọ na isi obodo n'ime afọ abụọ nke ntọala nke mba ọzọ invested ụlọ ọrụ (FIE)
Kama nke ahụ, ndị na-ere ahịa nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị e guzobere na mpaghara ahụ nwere ike ịnwekọrịta na ego, ụdị, na oge inye onyinye na nghọta ha
Otú ọ dị, ndị na-eketa òkè ka na-adabere maka eziokwu na iwu iwu nke onyinye ego ma bụrụ ndị a ga-aza ajụjụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'ime ókèala ma ọ bụ òkè ha
Na mgbakwunye na mmezi ego ndị a, FTZ na-ebute usoro dị mfe maka ndị na-emepụta ego na mba ọzọ iji guzobe ụlọ ọrụ na China
'Nhazi usoro ntinye nkwụsị' nke pụrụ iche na mpaghara ahụ chọrọ ka ndị ọrụ ikikere na ọrụ ahia (AIC) nyefee ma tinye ya n'ọrụ

A na-emezi nkwado na usoro ntinye akwụkwọ site na mgbasa ozi mpaghara, mgbe nke a gasịrị, akwụkwọ ikikere dị iche iche na nke asambodo (tinyere ikike azụmahịa, akwụkwọ ikike nke ụlọ ọrụ, na akwụkwọ ndebanye aha ụtụ) ka ndị AIC na-enye

Nke a pụtara na ndị na-enyocha nwere ike ịnweta akwụkwọ niile dị mkpa maka ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ n'otu ebe, ma ọ bụghị n'èzí mpaghara ebe ndị na-ede akwụkwọ ga-agbagharị n'etiti ndị ọchịchị dị iche iche maka ịnye akwụkwọ dị iche iche
Dị ka ụlọ ọrụ Shanghai Statistics Bureau si kwuo, ihe dị ka ụlọ ahịa 10,000 edebanyela n'ime FTZ dị ka nke June 2014-661, bụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ si n'aka ndị mba ọzọ

Dika State Administration of Foreign Exchange (SAFE) nke Shanghai branch na 28 February 2014, Mpaghara Free Trade ahụ ga-enye ohere mgbanwe mgbanwe yuan na ego mgbanwe ala ọzọ, na afọ nke ụtụ isi nke afọ 10 maka azụmahịa dị n'ógbè ahụ ka ọ bụrụ ụzọ isi mee ka usoro ego nke ego ndị ọzọ na-emepụta (FDI) dị mfe ma kwado ọrụ nlekọta isi obodo

N'okpuru iwu ọhụrụ ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ ndị mba ọzọ nwere ego (FIEs) nke e debanyere aha na FTZ nwere ike ugbu a na-eme ka ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa ego dị iche iche na-eme ka ha nwee ezi uche, ma ọ bụghị n'okpuru iwu ndị gara aga, bụ ebe a na-egbochi obodo ndị a weere na ha bụ 'mkpa n'ezie' MGBE
NDỊ nọ na FTZ nwere ike ịmeghekwa akaụntụ ego ntinye ego RMB iji jide ego RMB enweta site na nnọchibido mgbanwe nke mba ọzọ, nke a ga-ejizi mee ụgwọ maka ezigbo azụmahịa
Otú ọ dị, ihe mgbochi ka na-etinye maka iji ego RMB maka ụfọdụ ụdị azụmahịa
Nyenụ na FTZ ejikọtara ebe abụọ nwere njikọ-Waigaoqiao na Yangshan-nnukwu pasent nke ógbè ya nile ka enyere maka ọrụ eji eme ihe
Ọzọkwa, ndị na-ekwu banyere ịzụ ahịa ngwa ngwa gbaghaara ahịa ngwa ngwa maka ọdịnihu dị mkpa maka atumatu ọrụ nke mpaghara ahụ
Nke a tinyere ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ na FTZ ma kee otu afụ na mpaghara
Na nzaghachi, Gọọmenti Gọọmentị mere atụmatụ iji gbanye mpaghara distrikti maka azụmahịa na R & D
N'ụzọ doro anya, a na-enye ụlọ ọrụ ikike ịdebanye aha ụlọ ọrụ dị ọcha na FTZ, site na nke ha nwere ike ịnweta ụkpụrụ ndị dị iche iche mpaghara ahụ
Ngalaba a na-ewebata ọtụtụ mgbanwe ndị e mere iji mepụta ebe a na-achọ mma maka ego ndị mba ọzọ

Na 18 September 2013, Kọmitii Kansụl nke China bipụtara ndepụta nke ụlọ ọrụ iri na ise maka ịnweta ndokwa ndị ọzọ dị jụụ na mpaghara ahụ, gụnyere ọrụ ahụike, nkwukọrịta ụtụ ahịa bara uru, ụgbọ njem ụgbọ mmiri & nlekọta ụgbọ mmiri na mba ụwa

Akụkụ ọzọ dị mkpa nke mpaghara ahụ dị na 'njedebe na-ezighị ezi' nke na-abịakwute ego ndị mba ọzọ, nke a na-enyefe na mpaghara niile ma ọ bụrụ na amachibidoro site na itinye aka na akụrụngwa nyere na Negative List nke Gọọmenti Gọọmenti Shanghai
A na-ahazi ndị 16 ahụ a na-akpọ aha machibidoro ma ọ bụ machibidoro ha maka itinye ego na mba ọzọ dị ka ndị a
E megharịrị Ndepụta Negative na July 2014, ihe mgbochi ndị ọzọ maka ntụrụndụ na ego ndị ọzọ na ụlọ akụ na ụba, ọrụ, na ọrụ njem
Na otu n'ime ihe ndị mbụ e mere ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke Shanghai FTZ, Ụlọ Ọrụ Gọọmentị Gọọmenti (GAC) gụpụtara cross-border E-commerce platform, buyeasicom ChineseÀtụ ZhpinyinÀtụ Zh)
Ebumnuche a bu ime ka ndi mmadu na ndi ahia dika ndi bi na Taobao na-eme ka ndi mmadu na-achota ahia n'oru ahia ahia

Ngwaahịa na saịtị ọhụrụ, nke GAC ga-enyocha, ndị na-ere ahịa na-ere akwụkwọ-ịdebanye aha na ndị ọrụ iwu ahụ, si otú ahụ zere ihe ize ndụ nke ngwaahịa na-adịghị na ya na iweda ngwaahịa ahịa site na iji ụlọ nkwakọba ihe

FTZ na-ewebata mgbanwe abụọ dị iche iche na ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ iwu iwu ndị China nke mbụ, ebe a machibidoro ndị ọkàiwu mba ọzọ amabughị ike itinye aka na iwu iwu nke China na ụlọ ọrụ iwu obodo mba ọzọ ka ha guzobe alaka ụlọ ọrụ ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya (RO) na China, n'okpuru FTZ pilot program, ụlọ ọrụ iwu nke mba ọzọ nke guzobere RO na Shanghai FTZ ga-ekwe ka ya na nkwekọrịta na ụlọ ọrụ iwu nke China na-eziga ndị ọkàiwu na ụlọ ọrụ ọzọ

Nke abụọ bụ na ndị isi mba iwu ndị na-amalite ROs na China nwere ike ịhazi ọrụ ndị a na Shanghai FTZ na ndị ọrụ iwu iwu China, nke na ha nwere ike inye ndị ahịa China na ndị si mba ọzọ iwu ndị iwu kwadobere na ikike na arụ ọrụ ha kwadoro na nkwekọrịta ha

Ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ ọnụ na FTZ na-enweta uru site na ọnụnọ nke Waigaoqiao Port, Yangshan Deepwater Port, na Pudong International Airport, tinyere usoro iwu kwadoro omenala n'ógbè ahụ, nke na-ewepụ oge achọrọ iji weta ngwaahịa na China
N'ihi ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-agba ọsọ ka ha tinye aka na mpaghara ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe (ụlọ nkwakọba ihe) agbawo ụgwọ ọnụahịa mgbagwoju anya na atụle na ebe ọzọ na Shanghai
Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ịnshọransị na FTZ nwere ike itinye akwụkwọ na Shanghai Institute of Insurance Marine maka nkwado maka inye ngwaahịa mkpuchi mmiri ọhụrụ
Nke a bụ ihe mbụ nke ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ na-enye ikike dị otú ahụ na China, ma a na-ebute ịkwalite asọmpi nke ụlọ ọrụ mkpuchi ụgbọ mmiri Shanghai

N'okpuru usoro iwu nke Gọọmenti Gọọmenti nke Shanghai, ndị na-ahụ maka ego si mba ọzọ nwere ike ịmepụta ụlọ ọrụ ndị nwe obodo niile (WFOE) n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ike na FTZ A na - ekwekwa ka ndị nwe obodo ọzọ (nke ruru pasent 70) kwekwara maka mmezi ego ma ọ bụ nkwado nkwonkwo na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ike
Ụdị nhazi abụọ ahụ dị n'okpuru ọnọdụ ụfọdụ, dị ka ego kachasị elu nke RMB20 nde na oge kachasị arụ ọrụ afọ iri abụọ

Ala oru telivishọn nke China na-anọgide na-egbochi ya na FTZ dị ka ndị ọzọ na China, ebe ụlọ ọrụ na-achịkwa ndị nwe obodo China Mobile, China Unicom na China Telecom Otú ọ dị, mpaghara ahụ na-enye ohere itinye ego na mba ọzọ na 'ọrụ telifon kwadoro bara uru' (VATS), akọwapụtara dị ka ọrụ ndị telecom na-abụghị isi (ya bụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ karịa oku olu, faksị, na ozi nzuzo)
Ụlọ ọrụ VATS na mpaghara ahụ na-eritekwa uru site na usoro nkwekọrịta dị mkpirikpi
Shannon Esra (amụrụ n'abali mbụ nke ọnwa Febrụwarị 1984 dị ka Shannon Esrechowitz ) bụ onye ome ihe nkiri na onye ọbụ abụ nke South Africa
Esra nwere “mmasi mbụ ya nke ime ihe mgbe ọ dị afọ Anọ, na-akọ akụkọ egwu ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara Purim
O mechara mee ihe ngosi Elvis Presley na asọmpi ngosipụta ọ natara na chi mpaghara
Esra nwere ọkachamara mbụ ya na-eme ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii mgbe ọ pụtara na fim bụ I Dreamed of Africa (nke bụ Kim Basinger ), na-egosiputa agwa aha ya bụ Siri
O mechara mụọ Dramatic Arts na Mahadum Witwatersrand na- enweta nzere BA (Hons) ya na 2003

O meriri ihe nrite Naledi Theater Award maka ome ihe omume kacha mma site na onye ohuru ma ọ bụ onye ihe na agara nke ọma nwanyị), na mmepụta ihe nkiri Dorothy Ann Gould Japes maka ihe ngosi ya nke Neets
Ọ nwetakwara nhọpụta Fleur du Cap maka ọrụ a
Ihe mmepụta nkwago ndị ọzọ gụnyere ihe nkiri nwanyị atọ ndị ntọ ọchị Six Inches (2018) nke Kristy Suttner dere ma duzie ya, yana cabaret Homebound na 2004
Esra nwetara akụkọ ihe mere eme na Bollywood site na ngosipụta ya nke Stephanie na ihe nkiri Salaam-e-Ishq A Tribute to Love site n'ịbụ otu n'ime ndị na- eme ihe nkiri caucasian mbụ na-edu ndú
ma wụọ ntutu isi agba ocha n'asụ asụsụ na-olu okwu Amerika bụ American Accent Esra gosipụtara ka onye si Canada gara njem na India ịkwụsị enyi ya nwoke (nke Kushal Punjabi gosipụtara) ịlụ nwanyị
Mgbe ọ rutere India, ọ zutere Raju, onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala taxi ( nke Govinda gosipụtara) bụ onye na-abịa enyere ya aka ma emesịa ọhụ Raju n'anya
Na 2005,o mere ngosipụta obia tinyere Eric Stoltz, n'egosi dị ka nwunye mbụ ya, na Sci Fi Channel miniseries The Triangle
Ọ gbakwara onye ndu ihunanya dị ka Katie na ihe nkiri Darrell Roodt gbasara rugby, Nọmba 10
Na 2005 Esra rụrụ ọrụ ndu nke Caz O'Donough, onye uwe ojii zoro ezo, na ihe nkiri South Africa nke mkpali mmụọ ọnọdụ echiche / ihe nkiri aghụghọ ndị uwe ojii
Caz bụ nne nanị ya dị afọ iri abụọ, chọpụtara na nna nke nwa ya nwanyị, Lawrence Carter, bụ onye òtù ezinụlọ mpụ ụdị mafia nke nna ya 'siri ike' bụ Chisel, na-agbalị ịkwatu
Ọ na-egosipụta ugbu a na Tim Greene's n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri South Africa na Televishon ahọpụtara maka ihe nrite nke ihe omume ebiputara, dị ka onye nta akụkọ nyocha Kim Smollen
Kim bụ nwa agbọghọ Juu dị n'etiti afọ iri abụọ nke malitere dị ka onye na-ede akụkọ ntụrụndụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ siri ike bụ Bulletin
N'ime oge nke atọ, a na-enye Kim ohere maka ịkọ akụkọ 'dị njọ', na ugbu a emegharịrị sleazy tabloid The Bullet
Esra bi na Sandton ya na nne na nna ya na nwanne ya nwoke nke obere
Ọ bụ 'onye nkwado ime ụlọ' nke asompi ịma aka nke ping-pong
Shannon Kook (a mụrụ Shannon Xiao Lóng Kook-Chun; 9 Febụwarị 1987) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro telivishọn Degrassi The Next Generation (2010[[2011), Carmilla (2015[[2016), Shadowhunters (2017), na The 100 (2018), yana ọrụ ya dị ka Drew Thomas na ihe nkiri The Conjuring (2013[[2021)
A mụrụ Kook-Chun na Johannesburg, South Africa nye nna Mauritian nke sitere na China na nne South Africa nke sitere na Cape Coloured
Mgbe ahụ ọ kwagara Montreal iji gaa National Theatre School of Canada
Ọrụ mbụ Kook na ihe nkiri bụ na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn nke Canada Being Erica n'afọ 2009
A maara ya nke ọma na mba ụwa maka ọrụ ya dịka Zane Park na Degrassi The Next Generation (2010X2011) na dịka Duncan na Shadowhunters (2017)

N'afọ 2014, a họọrọ Kook, Alexandre Landry, Sophie Desmarais, na Julia Sarah Stone, maka Rising Stars nke Toronto International Film Festival, ọdịiche kwa afọ nke na-eme ka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri anọ na-abịanụ na ndị na-emepụta nkà na ndị na'eme ihe nkiri na mmemme ahụ
N'agbata afọ 2015 na 2016, Kook gosipụtara na usoro weebụ a ma ama
N'afọ 2017, e gosipụtara ya na usoro weebụ Running With Violet
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2018, a mara ọkwa na a họpụtara Kook dịka onye ọbịa ọhụrụ dị omimi, Lucas, na oge nke ise nke CW's The 100
Nke a kpughere na ọ bụ red herring site n'aka onye na-egosi ihe nkiri Jason Rothenberg
E mechara kpughee ọrụ Kook dịka Jordan Jasper Green, nwa Monty Green na Harper McIntyre
Kook na mbụ nyochara maka ọrụ Finn Collins na Monty Green
Kook laghachiri dịka usoro na-aga n'ihu na oge nke isii na nke asaa
Ụzọ mmekọrịta mmekọrịta ọha na eze na-ekekọrịta (SSPs) bụ ihe atụ nke mgbanwe mgbanwe mmekọrịta ọha na eze zuru ụwa ọnụ ruo 2100
A na-eji ha wepụta ọnọdụ ikuku ikuku griin haus nwere amụma ihu igwe dị iche iche
Ihe atụ ndị a bụ
Ejila ha nyere aka wepụta akụkọ nyocha IPCC nke isii gbasara mgbanwe ihu igwe, nke ebipụtara na 9 Ọgọst 2021
Ndị SSP na-enye akụkọ na-akọwa mmepe obodo na akụ na ụba ọzọ
N'ihe gbasara ọnụọgụ ọnụọgụgụ, ha na-enye data ga-eso ọnọdụ ahụ gbasara ọnụọgụ obodo, ime obodo na GDP (otu onye isi)
Enwere ike ijikọ ndị SSP na ụdị Ntụle Integrated Assessment (IAM) dị iche iche, iji chọpụta ụzọ enwere ike ime n'ọdịnihu ma n'ihe gbasara ụzọ akụ na ụba na ihu igwe
Ụwa na-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-agbanwe, ma n'ebe nile, gaa n'ụzọ na-adigide karị, na-emesi ike mmepe na-agụnyewanye nke na-akwanyere oke gburugburu ebe obibi anya

Ijikwa ọnụ ọgụgụ mba ụwa ji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-akawanye mma, itinye ego mmụta na ahụike na-eme ka mgbanwe ọnọdụ igwe mmadụ dịkwuo elu, na ntinye aka na uto akụ na ụba na-aga n'ihu na-elekwasị anya na ọdịmma mmadụ
N'ịkwalite site na ntinye aka na-abawanye ụba iji nweta ebumnuche mmepe, ahaghị nhata na-ebelata ma n'ofe ma n'ime mba
Nri na-adabere na uto ihe onwunwe dị ala yana obere akụrụngwa na ike ike￼
Ụwa na-eso ụzọ nke usoro mmekọrịta ọha na eze, akụ na ụba, na nkà na ụzụ na-adịghị agbanwe nke ọma site n'ụdị akụkọ ihe mere eme
Mmepe na mmụba ego na-aga n'ihu n'ụzọ na-ezighi ezi, ebe ụfọdụ mba na-enwe ọganihu dịtụ mma ebe ndị ọzọ na-adaghị atụmanya
Ụlọ ọrụ zuru ụwa ọnụ na nke mba na-arụ ọrụ ma na-enwe ọganihu ngwa ngwa n'inweta ebumnuche mmepe na-adigide
Sistemu gburugburu ebe obibi na-enweta mbelata, n'agbanyeghị na enwere mmelite ụfọdụ yana n'ozuzu ike nke akụrụngwa na iji ike na-agbada
Mmụba ndị mmadụ n'ụwa niile dị obere ma gbagoro na ọkara nke abụọ nke narị afọ
Enweghị ahaghị nhata ego na-aga n'ihu ma ọ bụ na-akawanye nwayọ nwayọ yana ihe ịma aka iji belata adịghị ike na mgbanwe ọha na eze na gburugburu ebe obibi ka dị
Ịhụ mba n'anya na-eweghachite, nchegbu gbasara asọmpi na nchekwa, na esemokwu mpaghara na-akpali mba ka ha na-elekwasịwanye anya n'ụlọ ma ọ bụ, na kacha, ihe gbasara mpaghara
Atumatu na-aga n'ihu ka oge na-aga iji gbado anya n'ihe gbasara nchekwa obodo na mpaghara
Mba dị iche iche na-elekwasị anya n'inweta ebumnobi ike na nchekwa nri n'ime mpaghara nke ha na-akwụ ụgwọ maka mmepe gbadoro ụkwụ
Ntinye ego na agụmakwụkwọ na mmepe teknụzụ dara ada
Mmepe akụ na ụba na-adị ngwa ngwa, oriri na-achọsi ike ihe onwunwe, na ahaghị nhata na-adịgide ma ọ bụ na-akawanye njọ ka oge na-aga
Mmụba ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ dị obere na mepere emepe yana nnukwu na mba ndị ka na-emepe emepe
Mkpa dị ala nke mba ụwa maka ilebara nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi na-eduga na mmebi gburugburu ebe obibi siri ike na mpaghara ụfọdụ
Ntinye ego na-enweghị oke n'isi obodo mmadụ, yana ọnụ ọgụgụ na-abawanye ụba na ohere akụ na ụba na ikike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na-eduga n'ịba ụba nha nha na nha anya ma n'ofe na n'ime mba

Ka oge na-aga, ọdịiche na-agbasawanye n'etiti ọha mmadụ jikọtara mba ụwa nke na-enye aka na ihe ọmụma- na nnukwu ego nke akụ na ụba ụwa, na nchịkọta nke ndị na-akpata obere ego, ndị gụrụ akwụkwọ na-agụghị akwụkwọ na-arụ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike, na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma
Mmekọrịta ọha na eze na-emebi emebi na esemokwu na ọgbaghara na-aghọwanye ihe a na-ahụkarị
Mmepe teknụzụ dị elu na akụ na ụba teknụzụ dị elu na ngalaba
Ngalaba ike ejikọtara ọnụ n'ụwa niile na-agbasawanye, yana itinye ego na mmanụ ọkụ na-akpa ike carbon dị ka coal na mmanụ na-adịghị ahụkebe, kamakwa isi mmalite ike carbon dị ala
Atumatu gburugburu ebe obibi na-elekwasị anya n'okwu gbasara mpaghara gburugburu ebe etiti na nnukwu ego

Ụwa a na-etinye okwukwe na-arịwanye elu na ahịa asọmpi, mmepụta ihe ọhụrụ na ọha mmadụ na-ekere òkè iji mepụta ọganihu nkà na ụzụ ngwa ngwa na mmepe nke isi obodo mmadụ dị ka ụzọ maka mmepe na-adịgide adịgide
A na-ejikọta ahịa ahịa zuru ụwa ọnụ
Enwekwara itinye ego siri ike na ahụike, agụmakwụkwọ, na ụlọ ọrụ iji kwalite ego mmadụ na ọha mmadụ
N'otu oge ahụ, mkpali maka mmepe akụ na ụba na mmekọrịta ọha na eze jikọtara ya na nrigbu nke nnukwu mmanụ ọkụ na nnabata nke akụrụngwa na ume ike ndụ gburugburu ụwa
Ihe ndị a niile na-ebute uto ngwa ngwa nke akụ na ụba ụwa, ebe ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi n'ụwa na-arị elu ma na-agbada na narị afọ nke 21st
A na-edozi nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi dị ka mmetọ ikuku nke ọma
Enwere okwukwe na ikike ijikwa usoro mmekọrịta ọha na eze na gburugburu ebe obibi nke ọma, gụnyere site na geo-engineering ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị mkpa

Mmemme ọmụmụ 2020 nke mpaghara ndị otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke ndị mmadụ bi nwere ike ịdị ọkụ dị ka akụkụ kacha ekpo ọkụ na Sahara n'ime afọ 50 na-enweghị mgbanwe n'ụdị mmụba nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na enweghị mba ọzọ, ọ gwụla ma ebelatara ikuku ikuku ikuku
Nkezi okpomọkụ a na-atụ anya ka ọ dị elu karịa 29 Celsius C maka mpaghara ndị a, na-eche na ọnọdụ RCP85 maka ihu igwe na mmụba ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ dị ka SSP3, ga-anọ na mpụga 'niche okpomọkụ mmadụ'

A na-ewere oke a tụrụ aro maka ihu igwe dị ka ihe dị mma maka ụmụ mmadụ dabere na data akụkọ ihe mere eme nke okpomọkụ kwa afọ (MAT) nke ndị mmadụ nwere njupụta dị iche iche kwa MAT kemgbe ~ 6,000 n'ụwa niile
Ọtụtụ n'ime mpaghara emetụtara nwere obere ikike ime mgbanwe dịka nke 2020

Matriks na-esonụ na-egosi amụma ha maka ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-abụghị 'niche okpomọkụ mmadụ' - nke ya mere nwere ike ịchọ ịkwaga na mpaghara ha - na ọnọdụ mgbanwe ihu igwe dị iche iche na amụma nke oge a nke mmụba ndị mmadụ maka 2070 21
Ụzọ ụzọ akụ na ụba nke mmekọrịta ọha na eze x jikọtara ya na radiative mmanye a na-atụ anya ya n'afọ 2100 gaa na ID SSPx-yz dị ka e depụtara n'okpuru

Ebe obibi ekere eke, ebe obibi abiko tara ọnụ, ma ọ bụ nne na nna nwekotara ezinụlọ na-ezo aka n'ọnọdụ ebe nwa nke nne na nna gbara alụkwaghịm ma ọ bụ kewaa na nne ma ọ bụ nna ọ bụla bi n'oge dị iche iche, dịka izu ọ bụla ọzọ
Site na ebe obibi, nne na nna nwere ọrụ nne na nna
Ebe obibi nkekọrịta apụtaghị na oge nwatakịrị na nne ma ọ bụ nna ọ bụla na-anọ ga-adị nhata

Ebe obibi ebikotara ọnụ bụ nhọrọ mgbe nne na nna abụọ chọrọ itinye aka n'ụzọ zuru ezu na nkuzi ụmụ ha, mgbe nne na nna ma ọ bụ nna ha abụọ kwenyere na iwu ahụ, na mgbe Ụlọikpe kwadoro na Iwu ahụ dị ka ọdịmma nke nwa ahụ

E jiri ya tụnyere ụmụaka nọ naanị ebe obibi nke ha na naanị otu n'ime nne na nna ha bi, nnyocha sayensị egosila na ụmụaka nwere ndokwa obibi jikoro ọnụ nwere ahụike anụ ahụ ike ka mma (dịka ụra, mmega ahụ, ise siga, ịṅụ mmanya na-aba n'anya), ahụike uche dị elu (dịka nghọta onwe onye, afọ ojuju ndụ, nchekasị, ịda mbà n'obi), nsogbu omume ole na ole (dịka mmebi iwu, omume ọjọọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, mmegbu) na mmekọrịta mmekọrịta siri ike (ya na ndị enyi, ndị nne na nna, nne na nna ochie)
Ebe obibi a na-ekekọrịta ọnụ bụ ihe amachaghi ámá na United Kingdom
N'etiti ụmụaka na-ebighị n'ime ezinụlọ zuru oke na nne ha ma nna ha, nyocha nke afọ 2005/06 chọpụtara na ọ bụ naanị 7% nwere ndokwa obibi ebe 83% bi naanị na nne ha na 10% bi naanị na nna ha
Iwu Ụmụaka nke 1989 na-akọwa iwu obibi dị ka otu “
na-edozi ndokwa a ga-eme maka onye ya na nwatakịrị ga-ebi” Nanị ezigbo iwu obibi na-emezi nwa (ren) n'ụlọ otu nne ma ọ bụ nna
A ga-enyekarị nne ma ọ bụ nna nke ọzọ ohere ịkpọtụrụ ya
Usoro obibi nkwonkwo ma ọ bụ nkekọrịta na-enye nwa (ren) ohere ịgbanwe oge obibi n'etiti ụlọ nke nne na nna
Sharif Bey (amụrụ n'afọ 1974, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, US) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ese ite na prọfesọ
Ọ na-emepụta ma ite na-arụ ọrụ na ceramic na ihe ọkpụkpụ mgbasa ozi agwakọta, na-eji ụdị na ọdịdị dịgasị iche iche
Ọrụ ya na-egosipụta mmasị ya na ihe nketa ányà nke Africa na Oceania, yana ọdịbendị Africa America nkè ógè a
Site na ihe osise ya márá mmá, Bey na-enyocha ọdịbendị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ịchọ mma na ịchọ mma
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Bey gụsịrị akwụkwọ mmụta ite na Manchester Craftsmen's Guild

Manchester Craftsmen's Guild rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa maka Bey n'oge ọ nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, na-enye ya ntọala nke nkà, njikọ dị ukwuu nke ceramics-ụwa, na ikpughe ndị nnà ukwu dị iche iche na-eleta gụnyere Jun Kaneko, Karen Karnes, Judy Moonelis, Paul Soldner, na Akio Takamori
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè ọdịda nke Soviet Union, Bey gụrụ ihe ọkpụkpụ na Academy of Fine Arts and Design, Bratislava (Slovak Republic)
Mgbè e mesịrị, ọ nwetara BFA ya na ceramics na Mahadum Slippery Rock, MFA ya na nka studio na Mahadim nke North Carolina na Greensboro, na PhD na agụmakwụkwọ nka na Mahadam Pennsylvania State
Ahụmahụ nkuzi Bey gụnyere nhọpụta na Mahadum Winston Salem State, Mahadum Virginia Commonwealth, na Mahadum Syracuse
O nweela ebe óbíbí ndị na-ese ihe na McColl Center for Art + Innovation, John Michael Kohler Arts Center, Pittsburgh Glass Center, na Archie Bray Foundation for the Ceramic Arts

Kemgbe egosiri ya na Renwick Gallery Smithsonian American Art Museum na 2018, The Carnegie Museum of Art, Everson Museum of Art na Gardiner Museum of Ceramic Art na Toronto emeela ihe ngosi nkè ọrụ Bey

Enwere ike ịchọta ihe ọkpụkpụ ya, iko na ihe ọkpụ ya na nchịkọta ọha na eze gụnyere Smithsonian American Art Museum's Renwick Gallery, Museum of Fine Arts Houston, Carnegie Museum of Art, Everson Museum of Art، Hickory Museum of Art
