Shark chutney bụ nri a na-eri na Seychelles
Ọ na-ejikarị 2 lbs (9072 gram) nke shark e siri esi, nke a na-eme ka ọ dị mma, ma jiri mmiri bilimbi na lime sie ya
A na-agwakọtara ya na yabasị, ose, nnu na turmeric
A na-esi yabasị ahụ n'ọkụ ma sie ya na mmanụ
Sharlto Copley (a mụrụ na 27 Nọvemba 1973) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri
O meela Wikus van der Merwe na Academy Award-nominated science fiction film District 9, Howling Mad Murdock n'afọ 2010 mgbanwe nke The A-Team, Agent M
O mekwara ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri akụkọ sayensị Chappie, dịka Jimmy na Hardcore Henry, ma gosipụta na oge abụọ dịka Christian Walker nke usoro TV Powers
Copley lụrụ onye South Africa ibe ya na-eme ihe nkiri na eji ejiji Tanit Phoenix
A mụrụ Sharlto Copley na Johannesburg ma ọ gụọ akwụkwọ na St
Andrew's Preparatory School na Grahamstown nakwa Redhill School na Morningside, Johannesburg Nna ya bụ Dr
Bruce Copley, onye bụbu prọfesọ mahadum
Nwanne ya nwoke, Donovan, bụ onye isi na-abụ abụ nke Cape Town band Hot Water
Otu afọ mgbe ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Copley zutere onye nduzi Neill Blomkamp

Blomkamp dị afọ iri na isii na Copley dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ, Copley nyekwara Blomkamp iji kọmputa na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ya iji nyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ aka na ọkwa maka ọrụ dị iche iche ma kwe ka Blomkamp gaa n'ihu ịchụso agụụ ya na talent ya maka ihe nkiri 3D na imewe

Copley pụtara na Peter Jackson na Neill Blomkamp's District 9, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ndu nke Wikus van der Merwe, onye Afrikaner bureaucrat nke e kenyere ịkwaga agbụrụ nke ihe ndị dị na mbara igwe na mberede n'ụwa

N'ime ihe nkiri ahụ, a ghaghị ịkwaga ndị ala ọzọ ahụ, nke a na-akpọkarị 'prawns', site na District 9, ụlọ ndị agha na-eche nche na Johannesburg, South Africa, gaa n'ogige ndị mkpọrọ na mpụga obodo ahụ
Copley mepụtara mkparịta ụka ya niile na ihe nkiri ahụ
N'afọ 2009, Copley ritere ihe nrite Favorite Hero na IGN Summer Movie awards, na Best Performance of 2009 maka ọrụ ya na District 9
N'afọ 2010, Copley mepụtara, dee ma duzie ntinye maka South African Film and Television Awards nke a na-akpọ 'Wikus and Charlize', nke gosipụtara onye South Africa ibe ya bụ Charlize Theron
Copley jiri asụsụ ndịda Amerịka mee ihe ngosi ya nke onye otu A-Team H
Murdock, ma jiri asụsụ ndị ọzọ, gụnyere Scottish, English, Australian na obodo ya bụ South Africa, dịka akụkụ nke ụdị ọkụ ngwa ngwa nke onye ahụ
Dwight Schultz, onye mere Murdock na usoro TV mbụ, toro arụmọrụ Copley ma kwuo na Copley bụ naanị onye na-eme ihe nkiri ọ maara nke bụ 'ezigbo àgwà ya'
Onye ọbịa Copley kwadoro WWE Raw na 7 June afọ 2010, ya na ndị otu A-Team ya bụ Bradley Cooper na Quinton Jackson
N'otu afọ ahụ, Copley gosipụtara onye ọjọọ Agent Kruger na Elysium, ihe nkiri akụkọ sayensị nke Neill Blomkamp dere ma duzie, nke Matt Damon na Jodie Foster gosipụtara
Copley mere onye ọjọọ Adrian Pryce na Spike Lee's Oldboy, mmegharị nke ihe nkiri South Korea nke 2003 nke otu aha ahụ
O sonyekwara Angelina Jolie na ihe nkiri Disney nke afọ 2014 Maleficent ma kpọọ Eze Stefan, nna Princess Aurora
O nyekwara olu, ọrụ ntụaka, na mmekọrịta ya na ndị otu ya dịka Chappie, onye isi ihe nkiri 2015 Chappie, nke Neill Blomkamp duziri
N'afọ 2015, a mara ọkwa Copley ka ọ bụrụ Christian Walker na usoro TV nke ndị dike Powers O mechara nye ụda olu maka vidiyo nkwado echiche e-tron GT nke Audi Sport GmbH
Na Machị 2018, Copley pụtara na ihe nkiri mpụ na-atọ ọchị Gringo dịka Mitch Rusk Copley ga-egosipụtakwa onye isi ihe nkiri akụkọ ndụ banyere Ted Kaczynski nke akpọrọ Ted K
Copley anọwo na mmekọrịta ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ejiji Tanit Phoenix kemgbe Jenụwarị afọ 2012
Ha lụrụ na 15 Febụwarị 2016, na Cape Town, South Africa
Di na nwunye a nwere otu nwa nwanyị
Copley bi na Cape Town na Los Angeles

Sharm El Sheikh (Egyptian Arabic شرم الشيخ, IPA [ˈʃɑɾm eʃˈʃeːx]), nke a na-akpọkarị Sharm, bụ obodo Egypt nke dị na ndịda nsọtụ nke Saịnaị Peninsula, na South Sinai Governorate, n'akụkụ osimiri dị n'akụkụ osimiri
Oké Osimiri Uhie
Onu ogugu ya di ihe dika 73,000 dika nke 2023[mmelite]
Sharm El Sheikh bụ ebe nlekọta nke South Sinai Governorate Egypt, nke gụnyere obere obodo Dahab na Nuweiba yana ime ugwu, St
Catherine na Ugwu Saịnaị
Obodo na ebe ezumike bụ ebe dị mkpa maka njem nlegharị anya na Egypt, ebe ọ na-adọtakwa ọtụtụ nzukọ mba ụwa na nzukọ mba ụwa
Sharm El Sheikh bụ otu n'ime obodo ndị Eshia nke Egypt
A maara Sharm El Sheikh (Bay of the Senior) dị ka 'Obodo Udo'; Egyptian Arabic 'Madinet EL-Salam', na-ezo aka n'ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke Nzukọ Udo Mba Nile e mere n'ebe ahụ
N'etiti ndị Ijipt na ọtụtụ ndị ọbịa, a na-emekarị ka aha obodo ahụ dị mkpirikpi ka ọ bụrụ 'Sharm' (Egyptian Arabic ), nke bụ aha ya na Arabic Ijipt
A na-edekwa aha ahụ mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka 'Sharm el-Cheikh' ma ọ bụ 'SharM el-Sheik' na Bekee
Sharm El Sheikh dị n'elu ugwu na-elepụ anya na Straits nke Tiran n'ọnụ Gulf of Aqaba
Mkpa atụmatụ ya mere ka ọ gbanwee site n'obodo ịkụ azụ gaa n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri maka ndị agha mmiri Ijipt
Israel meriri ya n'oge ọgba aghara Suez nke 1956 wee laghachi Ijipt na 1957
E debere ndị agha na-ahụ maka udo nke United Nations n'ebe ahụ ruo 1967 mgbe onye isi ala Ijipt Gamal Abdel Nasser nyere ya iwu ka ọ pụọ, eziokwu nke mere ka Agha Ụbọchị Isii nke Israel weghachiri ya
Sharm El Sheikh nọgidere n'okpuru nchịkwa Israel ruo mgbe e weghachiri Peninsula Sinai n'Ijipt na 1982 mgbe nkwekọrịta udo Egypt-Israel nke 1979
Onye isi ala Ijipt n'oge ahụ bụ Hosni Mubarak họpụtara Sharm El Sheikh dị ka Obodo Udo na 1982 ma gọọmentị Ijipt malitere iwu nke ịkwalite mmepe nke obodo ahụ
Ndị ọchụnta ego na ndị na-etinye ego n'Ijipt, tinyere ndị na- itinye ego n'ụwa niile nyere aka iwu ọtụtụ nnukwu ọrụ, gụnyere ụlọ alakụba na ụlọ ụka
Obodo a bụzi ebe ndị njem nleta si mba ụwa, iwu gburugburu ebe obibi na-egbochi ịdị elu nke ụlọ iji zere ikpuchi ịma mma okike nke gburugburu ebe obibi
A nakweere usoro nhazi usoro nhazi maka Ọwara Aqaba, ebe e si enyocha ihe ndị dị na mpaghara ahụ wee kesaa ya na mpaghara, obodo na ebe etiti
Dị ka usoro a si dị, e kewara mpaghara Ọwara Aqaba n'ime obodo anọ Taba, Nuweiba, Dahab na Sharm El Sheikh
E kewara obodo Sharm El Sheikh n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ise, ya bụ Nabq, Ras Nusrani, Naama Bay, Umm Sid na Sharm El Maya
Obodo Sharm El Sheikh, na Naama Bay, Hay el Nour, Hadaba, Rowaysat, Montazah na Shark's Bay [d] mejupụtara obodo ukwu
Ebe dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri ebe a na-edebe égbè na Ras Nasrani n'ihu Tiran Island bụzi ebe a na'ime mmiri
N'afọ 2005, mwakpo ndị na-eyi ọha egwu Sharm El Sheikh wakporo ebe ahụ, bụ nke otu òtù Islamist na-eme ihe ike gbadoro ụkwụ na ụlọ ọrụ njem nlegharị anya Egypt

Egburu mmadụ iri asatọ na asatọ, ihe ka ọtụtụ n’ime ha bụ ndị Ijipt, na ihe karịrị narị abụọ merụrụ ahụ n’ihi mwakpo ahụ, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ mwakpo ndị na-eyi ọha egwu nke abụọ kacha egbu egbu n’akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mba ahụ
Obodo a enwetala ọtụtụ nzukọ udo dị mkpa n'Etiti Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Ụwa, gụnyere nkwekọrịta 4 Septemba 1999 iji weghachite ọchịchị onwe onye nke Palestine na Gaza Strip
E mere nzukọ nke abụọ na Sharm na 17 Ọktoba 2000 mgbe mmalite nke intifada nke abụọ nke Palestine gasịrị, mana ọ kwụsịrị ime ihe ike ahụ
E nwere nzukọ na obodo ahụ na 3 Ọgọstụ 2005 maka mmepe na ụwa ndị Arab, dị ka ọnọdụ dị na esemokwu Arab-Israel
Ọzọkwa na 2007, e nwere nzukọ ndị minista dị mkpa na Sharm, ebe ndị isi na-atụle iwughachi Iraq
Ọ bụ Sharm el-Sheikh kwadoro World Economic Forum on the Middle East na 2006 na 2008
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2022, e mere United Nations Climate Change Conference (COP27) na Sharm el-Sheikh
Nzukọ a dugara na mmebi ego mbụ
Sharo bụ okwu Fulani a na-eji egosipụta ule nke nwa okorobịa site n'iwebata ụtarị
Ya mere, mmemme a na-akpọ Sharo Festival bụ mmemme na-emekarị n'etiti ndị Fulani
Ndị Fulani dị na Northern Region nke Nigeria
A na-eme mmemme ugboro abụọ n'afọ n'obodo ndị fulani, nke mbụ na-eme n'oge ọkọchị n'oge nkwadebe ọka ọka Guinea ebe ememme nke abụọ n'ime otu afọ na-eme n'oge emume Muslim Eid-el-Kabir
Isi ihe dị na ememme ahụ bụ iji nwalee obi ike na ntachi obi nke ụmụ nwoke na-agafe n'oge ndu nwoke
A na-eme mmemme Sharo maka otu izu gbatịa, a na-eme ya mgbe niile n'ihu ọha, na-emeghe ma ọ bụ n'ahịa
Ọtụtụ ihe omume na ihe omume na-eme n'oge mmemme otu izu, akụkụ nke mmemme a bụ; ndị aghụghọ, ndị na-agba egwú, na ndị inyom na-agba egwú
Akụkụ bụ́ isi na nke a na-echerekarị na mmemme ahụ na-amalite ka ị na-ahụ ndị ikom gba ọtọ na-alụbeghị di, bụ́ ndị ụmụ agbọghọ mara mma na-eso n'etiti ìgwè mmadụ ahụ
Ndị otu ndị ahụ na-atọ ìgwè mmadụ ụtọ site n'iwebata ụda na ụda ka ndị na-asọ mpi na-ele anya n'anya ndị na-ama ha ka ha mara na ha anaghị atụ egwu ihe ọ bụla
Ezinụlọ nke ndị na-ese okwu na-eche nche, na-ekpekwa ekpere ka ụmụ ha ghara imechu ha ihere n'ihi na nwa nke na-enweghị ike idi ihe mgbu nke na-abịa site na ịpịa ihe na-eweda ezinụlọ ya ihere
Iji zere ihere, ọtụtụ ndị na-asọ mpi tupu ụbọchị mmemme Sharo ga-agarịrị iwusi onwe ha ike site n'ụzọ ime mmụọ ka ha ghara ibelata ma ọ bụ belata ihe mgbu a na-enwe n'oge a na-eti ihe
Ipia iya nke a ga-ahapụ ọnyà n'ahụ ndị na-asọ ndi bụ ndị kwenyere na ọnyà ahụ bụ akara obi ike na mgbanwe na-aga nke ọma n'ịbụ nwoke
Mgbe a pịachara ha ihe, ụmụ nwoke nwere obi ike na-aghọ nwoke ma na-enye ikike ịlụ nwa agbọghọ ha họọrọ

N'oge ụfọdụ, mgbe esemokwu ma ọ bụ esemokwu dị n'etiti nwanyị ma ọ bụ ụmụ nwoke abụọ na-achọ ịlụ nwanyị, iji zere esemokwu okwu na ọgụ ha na-ama onwe ha aka na Sharo na onye ọ bụla n'ime ha nwere ike ịtachi obi ma ọ bụ pụta dị ka onye mmeri nke ụtarị na-ewere nwa agbọghọ ahụ dị ka onye ọzọ e meriri aka

N'oge mmemme ahụ enwere onye ọka ikpe na-ahụ na a na-agbaso iwu egwuregwu ahụ nke ọma, o nwere ikike ịkwụsị ịta ụta ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị egwuregwu ọ bụla na-adịghị mma nke otu ọ bụla na-egwu, onye ọ bụla na-asọ mpi na-enyefe, mmerụ ahụ nke onye ọ bụla na-asọmpi dekọrọ dị njọ ma ọ bụ
ihe ọ bụla ọ na-ahụ adịghị mma

Ọzọkwa, ka ịpịa ihe na-amalite, a na-atụ anya na ndị na-asọ mpi ga na-abụ abụ na ịgba egwu nke bụ ihe ịrịba ama nke obi ike na ike nakwa na ha anaghị enwe mgbu na onye ọ bụla nwere ike ịtachi obi ma ọ bụ merie ụtarị a na-ekwupụta na ọ gaferela nwoke
Sharome Renay van Schalkwyk bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye omeiwu maka African National Congress
Van Schalkwyk nọ n'ọnọdụ nke anọ na ndepụta mpaghara Northern Cape nke African National Congress maka ntuli aka n'ozuzu na 8 Mee 2014
Mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke South Africa
A ṅụrụ Van Schalkwyk iyi dị ka onye omeiwu na 21 Mee 2014
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2014, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Portfolio Committee on Labour
Van Schalkwyk ghọrọ onye otu Portfolio Committee on Communications na 28 Mee 2015
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na kọmitii ahụ ruo 20 Ọktoba 2016, mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye otu Kọmitii Portfolio na Azụmaahịa na Ụlọ Ọrụ
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka otu ANC Study Group on Public Service and Administration na 2018
Van Schalkwyk guzoro n'enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma maka nhọpụta ọzọ na ntuli aka nke Mee 2019 n'ihi eziokwu ahụ bụ na aha ya dị ala na ndepụta mba ANC
Otú ọ dị, Collen Maine gbara arụkwaghịm na nzuko omeiwu na 5 Julaị 2019 ma ANC họọrọ Van Schalkwyk iji mejupụta oche ya
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka onye omeiwu n'otu ụbọchị ahụ
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị, Van Schalkwyk ghọrọ onye otu Kọmitii Portfolio na Ọrụ Ọha na Infrastructure
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu Standing Committee on Auditor General na 20 August 2019
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Sharon Winona Davids bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa onye jere ozi dị ka onye otu Western Cape Provincial Parliament maka African National Congress site na Mee na afọ 2014 ruo Mee 2019
Davids bụbu onye kansụl nke Drakenstein Local Municipality
Davids bụ onye otu African National Congress
N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye kansụl na Drakenstein Local Municipality, ọ bụ onye otu na-ahụ maka akụrụngwa
A họpụtara Davids ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke Western Cape Provincial mgbe ntuli aka nke emere na 7 Mee, na afọ 2014, ebe a na-etinye ya na nke ise na ndepụta ANC ma pati ahụ meriri oche iri na anọ
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka MPP na 21 Mee, na afọ 2014
E tinyeghị Davids na ndepụta mpaghara nke ANC maka ntuli aka mpaghara na afọ 2019 wee hapụ ndị omeiwu mpaghara na 7 Mee na afọ 2019
Sharon Camille Farmer (amụrụ n'ọnwa Juun 10, afọ 1951) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto
Ọ bụ nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ e were n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto White House na nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka nke mbụ na nwanyị mbụ ịbụ onye nduzi nke ụlọ ọrụ foto White House
A mụrụ Farmer ma zụlite ya na Washington, DC
ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ohio State n'afo 1974 na nzere na foto
Mgbe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ ọ ghọrọ onye otu Delta Sigma Theta sorority, osote onye isi oche nke gọọmentị ụmụ akwụkwọ, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ụlọ akwụkwọ, Our Choking Times
Farmer malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1974 na-agbapụ mkpuchi albọm
Foto onwe ya toro na foto akụkọ ma rụọ ọrụ maka Smithsonian Institution, The Washington Post na American Association for the Advancement of Science
N'afọ 1993, e goro Sharon Farmer ka ọ see foto maka White House na-ekpuchi Onye isi ala Bill Clinton na nwanyị mbụ Hillary Rodham Clinton
Mgbe e mesịrị, e buliri Farmer ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nke White House Photography wee bụrụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ na nwanyị mbụ nwere ọnọdụ a

A gụnyere ọrụ Farmer n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi, gụnyere 'Songs of My People,' 'Art against AIDS,' 'Gospel in the Projects,' 'Twenty Years on the Mall,' 'Washington, DC-Beijing Exchange,' na 'Our View of Struggle'
Sharon Farmer gụrụ akwụkwọ na foto ma mechaa na egwu na Mahadum Ohio State dị na Columbus, Ohio, ebe ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts
Sharon G
Flake (amụrụ na Disemba 24, 1955) bụ onye edemede America nke ụmụaka na akwụkwọ ndị ntorobịa
Ya na nwa ya nwanyị ebiela na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania ọtụtụ afọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Pittsburgh na BA na Bekee
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ nke Flake bụ The Skin I'm In nke e bipụtara na 1998 na-agbaso Maleeka Madison dị afọ iri na atọ bụ onye a na-akwa emo maka ụcha akpụkpọ ahụ ya na uwe ya
Iji kwụsị mmegbu ahụ, Maleeka na-anwa ime ndị na-emekpa ya ahụ enyi
Ọ na-amụta na ịnwa ịbanye abụghị ụzọ kachasị mma iji mee ka ndị mmadụ dị ka gị
Ọrụ Flake enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye, gụnyere John Steptoe Award for New Talent na 1999 maka ndị edemede ọhụrụ ma nwetakwara nzaghachi dị mma site na Booklist na School Library Journal
O nwetakwala ihe nrite Coretta Scott King Awards abụọ
A mụrụ Flake na Philadelphia
Ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ kachasị nta, ya na ụmụnne nwoke atọ na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ, ma too n'ime obodo
Nna ya rụrụ ọrụ na Philadelphia Gas Co, ebe nne ya na-arụ ọrụ ụbọchị ma zụlite ụmụ ya
Site na nduzi ha, a gbara Flake na ụmụnne ya ume ka ha bụrụ onwe ha, na-amụta banyere ọdịbendị site na egwu, TV, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na akwụkwọ
Dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, ọ gara Simon Gratz High School, ebe ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu tennis na ndị otu nsọpụrụ
Flake nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Mahadum Pittsburgh n'afọ 1978, na-agụ akwụkwọ edemede Bekee na obere na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'oge a, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke Mahadum, ma dee maka The Pitt News
Ozugbo ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ nwetara ọrụ dị ka nne na nna n'ụlọ n'ụlọ ndị ntorobịa dị na Pittsburgh
O mechara soro ndị na-eto eto na-arụ ọrụ na nlekọta nkuzi
Site na 1987 ruo 2005, Flake laghachiri na ngalaba mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke Mahadum Pittsburgh ebe o mechara bụrụ onye nlekọta, wee gaa n'ihu bụrụ onye nduzi nke mmekọrịta ọha na Mahadum Joseph M
Katz Graduate School of Business
Flake gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Pitt, ebe ọ na-edekwa akwụkwọ akụkọ na-abụghị akụkọ maka magazin mpaghara na nke mba
Site n'oge ruo n'oge, ọ na-edekwa akwụkwọ maka mbipụta ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Pitt
Mgbe amụrụ nwa ya nwanyị Brittney, mmasị Flake n'ide akwụkwọ siri ike
Ọ na-ekwukarị na ọmụmụ nwa ya nwanyị bụ mmalite nke ọrụ edemede akụkọ ifo ya
'Ọ bụrụ na amụghị ya', ka Flake na-ekwu, 'Amaghị m na m gaara abụ onye edemede na-agbanwe agbanwe iji mee njem a
Ọmụmụ ya nyere m mkpali na nraranye m chọrọ iji nọgide na-aga
' Flake dere akụkọ mkpirikpi maka nwa ya nwanyị, ma gụọ ha n'ụlọ nlekọta nwa ya nwanyị
Ọ gara n'ihu dee 'The Luckiest Sister', akụkọ banyere ejima abụọ na-ebi ndụ dị iche iche n'ihi ụcha akpụkpọ ahụ ha dị iche iche
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke asọmpi akụkọ mkpirikpi nke August Wilson, nke e bipụtara na magazin
Flake mechara nweta agụmakwụkwọ na, ma gaa, nzukọ edemede Highlights for Children na Chautauqua

E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, The Skin I'm In, na 1998 n'okpuru akara ọhụrụ Jump at the Sun nke Disney, nke a malitere na Septemba 1998 iji mepụta 'akwụkwọ ụmụaka na-ekwusi ike na African-American'
N'ime afọ iri, o dere akwụkwọ akụkọ isii ma ọ bụ nchịkọta akụkọ nke Jump at the Sun bipụtara
N'oge ezumike ya, Flake na-enwe mmasị n'ịkọ ubi na ịgụ akwụkwọ
Sharon Ikeazor ( bụ onye amụrụ n' ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ ọnwa n'ime ọnwa nke asatọ afọ 1961) bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ndụmọdụ nchịkwa
Ọ bụ onye bụbu onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke Pension Transitional Arrangement Directorate
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2019, a họpụtara Sharon ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi na-elekọta Gburugburu Ebe Obibi
Ikeazor malitere agụmakwụkwọ ụlọakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na St
Mary's Convent School na Lagos
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara Queen of The Rosary College, Onitsha wee gaa Godolphin School, Salisbury, England ebe ọ nwetara ọkwa GCE ya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria na 1981 wee gụkwuo akwụkwọ n' Mahadum Benin na nzere Bachelor of Law (LLB Hons), na 1984
N'afọ 1985, ọ nwetara asambodo ya n'ụlọakwụkwọ iwu Naịjirịa
Ikeazor n'oge mbụ ahụ na-agụnye ọkwa ndị ndụmọdụ na ụlọakụ mba na nke mba ụwa; Nigerian Merchant Bank, Nerderlansce Middenstandbank na Midas Merchant Bank
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Shell Petroleum dịka onye ọka iwu ụlọọrụ tupu o guzobe ọrụ iwu nke ya na 1994
Ka ọ na-eru afọ 1999, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ iwu na onye nhazi ọrụ maka Fluor Daniel Nigeria Ltd, onye enyemaka nke ụlọ ọrụ US Engineering Firm

O sonyere na mmezu nke Atlas Cove Tank Farm Project nke bụ mmekọrịta teknụzụ n'etiti Fluor Daniel na National Engineering and Technical Company (NETCO), dịka ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) si kwuo
N'ikpeazụ, Ikeazor ghọrọ osote onyeisi oche maka mmepe azụmahịa na mmekọrịta gọọmentị maka ụlọọrụ ndụmọdụ United States, Good Works International (GWI) Consulting, site na 2003 ruo 2008
Ka ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, o nyere ndụmọdụ na ndụmọdụ maka ndị ọrụ mmanụ na gas / ike na Naịjirịa
Karịsịa, ọ bụ onye isi ndụmọdụ maka General Electric (GE) na National Integrated Power Project (NIPP) na Gọọmentị Federal nke Naịjirịa
Ọ lekọtara mmepe nke ohere azụmaahịa ndị ọzọ na-apụta n'Africa n'oge ya na GWI
Ikeazor mechara bụrụ onye nnọchi anya iwu maka Aso Energy Resources, Ltd, Abuja ruo afọ abụọ, 2008-2010, tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'afọ 2011, ọ gbara ọsọ ma merie ọkwa onye ndu National Women nke Congress for Progressive Change (CPC) Party

O jiri ikpo okwu ya mee ihe iji kwado ikike maka ụmụnwanyị site na imekọ ihe ọnụ na International Republican Institute (IRI) na United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) iji zụọ ụmụ nwanyị maka idu ndú na ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Naịjirịa

Site na njikọta nke òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị atọ na Naijiria na 2013, Sharon pụtara dị ka onye ndú Interim National Women nke All Progressives Congress (APC) ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya na APC Board of Trustees na 2014, ọkwá ọ na-ejide ruo taa
N'oge ọ bụ onye ndú ụmụ nwanyị, o guzobere APC Young Women's Forum iji duzie ma kwado ụmụ agbọghọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'afọ 2016, ọ pụtara na APC Senatorial Candidate maka Anambra Central Zone
Na Wednesday, August 21, 2019, Onye isi ala Buhari họpụtara ya dị ka Minista nke Gburugburu Ebe Obibi
Ikeazor anọgidewo na-ahazi ma na-ekere òkè na idu ndú, ọzụzụ na ntụziaka nke ụmụ agbọghọ na ndị ọzọ nwere nsogbu
Ọ gara n'ihu n'ọrụ ebere nke nna ya nwụrụ anwụ, Chimezie Ikeazor (SAN), onye guzobere Non-Governmental Organization (NGO), Free Legal Aid for the Poor in Nigeria
Nzukọ nke ọ na-elekọta ugbu a na-enye nkwụghachi ụgwọ maka ọrụ iwu enyere ụmụ amaala na-enweghị ọrụ na-ebi n'okpuru akara ịda ogbenye
N'otu aka ahụ, ọ na-arụ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ụlọ mkpọrọ nke na-akwụ ụgwọ nke ndị na-echere ikpe yana inye ụfọdụ ndị mkpọrọ nnọchiteanya iwu n'efu
O guzobere The Wakiliyan Mata Empowerment Initiative, otu NGO maka ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ụlọ, nke na-enye ha ego na-enweghị ọmụrụ nwa iji malite obere azụmaahịa
Sharon bụ osote onye isi oche nke Women in Politics Forum (WIPF) nke o guzobere iji wulite ikike nke ụmụ nwanyị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gafee usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ikeazor jere ozi dịka onyeisi odeakwụkwọ nke PTAD site na 2016 ruo 2019 n'oge a na-enye ya ọrụ iduzi nzukọ ahụ gaa n'iwu ya nke mmezu ọdịmma na-adịgide adịgide maka ndị ezumike nká
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ya maka onyinye LEADERSHIP Persons of the Year
O nwetakwara onyinye Public Service Excellence Award site na BusinessDay na 2017Na 21st nke August 2019, Barr
A ṅụrụ Ikeazor iyi dị ka Minista nke Steeti maka gburugburu ebe obibi nke ọchịchị Muhammadu Buhari, na-esote nyocha nke ọma nke National Assembly duziri
Sharon Ooja (amuru Eprel 6, 1991) bu onye n'ime Naijiria
Ọ bịara pụta ìhè mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ nke 'Shalewa' na usoro webụ Skinny Girl in Transit
Sharon Ooja bu onye Benue steeti a mụrụ na Kaduna steeti a zụrọ ya na Plateau steeti
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ kwagara Lagos na 2013
Sharon bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzikọrịta ozi na Mahadum Houdegbe North American Benin
Ọ kwadoro kapeeti uhie n'izu Ejiji nke GT Bank n'akụkụ Timini Egbuson na 2017
Edepụtara ya dị ka nwanyị ama ama na 2020 na onye na- eme ihe nkiri Nollywood na-atụ anya na 2021
Sharqi ma ọ bụ sharki /ˈʃɑːrki/ bụ ifufe dị na Middle East nke na-abịa site na ndịda na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ
Ọ bụ ógè, na-adị site n'ọnwa Eprel ruo mbido Juun, ma na-abịa ọzọ n'etiti ngwụcha afọ Septemba na Nọvemba

Ifufe na-akpọnwụ ma na-eme uzuzu, na-enwe ụfụfụ ógé ụfọdụ ruo kilomita irí asatọ kwà elekere (50 ) ma na-emekarị ka e nwee ike iburu ájá puku mita ole na ole, ma nwee ike imechi ọdụ ụgbọ elu màkà obere ógè
Ifufe ndị a nwèrè ike ịdịru otu ụbọchị zuru ezu na mmalite na njedebe nke ógè, na ọtụtụ ụbọchị n'etiti ógè
Sharqiyin bu obodo di na United Arab Emirates (UAE)
Sharqiyin bụ agbụrụ kachasị n'akụkụ ụsọ oké osimiri ọwụwa anyanwụ nke di na Trucial States (na nke abụọ kachasị n'ógbè ahụ na mmalite nke narị afọ nke 19), mpaghara a maara dị ka Shamailiyah
Ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nke afọ 1968 gosiri na 90% nke ndị agbụrụ Fujairah bụ Sharqiyin

Ha na-adabere na Sharjah ma, n'ime ọtụtụ narị afọ, mee ọtụtụ mgbalị ịpụ iche ma kwupụta nnwere onwe, n'ikpeazụ na-achịkwa nke a site na afo 1901 gaa n'ihu ma mechaa nweta nkwado Britain dị ka Trucial State, Fujairah, na afo 1952
Ha biri n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Trucial States, site na Kalba ruo Dibba, yana na mbara ala Wadi Ham na Jiri ma site na mmalite nke narị afọ nke 20 ha dị ihe dị ka 7,000
Akụkụ atọ nke agbụrụ ahụ bụ ndị a ma ama, Hafaitat (nke ezinụlọ na-achị Fujairah sitere na ya), Yammahi na Hamudiyin
Mgbe Bani Yas gasịrị, Sharqiyin bụ agbụrụ nke abụọ kachasị n'ọtụtụ na Trucial States

Subsisting in the main on agriculture, pearling and fishing, the Sharqiyin lived a relatively harsh life, a fact underlined by a survey of the late 1960s, which showed the majority of households in the emirate of Fujairah still lived in barasti (palm frond) houses
Ndị Sharqiyin na ndị agbata obi ha na-alụkarị ọgụ, ọkachasị Shihuh, Khawatir na Naqbiyin, mana ha ga-ejikọ aka megide Sharjah mgbe ọ bụla ohere dapụtara
Ogologo akụkọ ihe mere eme nke esemokwu na esemokwu n'etiti Sharqiyn na agbụrụ ndị agbata obi bịara pụta ìhè ọzọ na-esote omume nke Union, mgbe esemokwu ala na Kalba malitere ịlụ ọgụ n'ihu ọha
Na mbido afọ 1972, a kpọrọ ndị Union Defence Force e guzobere ọhụrụ ka ha chịkwaa ọgụ ahụ nke, n'oge UDF batara, gburu mmadụ iri abụọ na abụọ ma merụọ mmadụ iri na abụọ ọzọ ahụ
E mechara dozie esemokwu ahụ mgbe Sheikh Rashid nke Dubai na ndị ọchịchị ndị ọzọ nwekọrọ ọnụ ma zipụ nkwupụta na-ekwupụta nkwekọrịta ahụ na 17 Julaị 1972
Sharwa (nke a makwaara dị ka Tchevi, Sherwin, Sarwaye) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na Cameroon na Far North Province
Enwere akara mgbanwe asụsụ na Fulfulde
A na-akpọkwa ndị na-asụ Sharwa (5,100) Tchévi, nke bụ obodo kachasị ukwuu, na mpaghara ndịda Bourrha commune (Mayo-Tsanaga district, Far North Region)
A na-asụkwa Sharwa na mpaghara ugwu, na ngalaba Mayo-Louti (Commune Mayo-Oulo)
Ha na ndị Gude na-emekọkarị ọnụ

Shatha Amjad Al-Hassoun (Arabic ; a mụrụ na 3 Machị 1981 na Casablanca, Morocco), nke a maara nke ọma dịka Shatha Hassoun (Arabian شذی حسون), bụ onye na-agụ egwu Moroccan-Iraqi nke ghọrọ onye a ma ama dịka onye mmeri nke oge nke anọ nke ihe ngosi nka telivishọn pan-Arab Star Academy Arab World
Ọ bụ nwanyị Arab mbụ meriri asọmpi ahụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-agụ egwú kachasị ewu ewu na Middle East na mpaghara Maghreb, a na-akpọkwa ya 'nwa nwanyị Mesopotemia'
A mụrụ Hassoun n'aka nna Iraqi bụ onye nta akụkọ a ma ama si Hillah, na nne Moroccan bụ onye nkuzi akụkọ ihe mere eme si Safi
Ka ọ na-etolite, Hassoun kewara oge ya n'etiti Morocco na France
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ Bekee na Casablanca wee gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ mahadum ya na Tangier ebe ọ sonyeere mmemme nke Hotel and Tourism Management
Mgbe ahụ ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na France ebe ọ nwetara nzere masta ya
Hassoun abụwo abụ n'ọtụtụ asụsụ gụnyere Arabic, English, French, Spanish, Italian nakwa German
Ezinụlọ ya, nke gụnyere nne na nna ya na naanị nwanne ya nwoke, bi na Morocco ebe o bi na Dubai ugbu a
N'afọ 2007, Hassoun meriri Star Academy 4, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ meriri
Ya na ndị ikpeazụ anọ, Hassoun meriri asọmpi ahụ site n'inweta pasent 40 nke votu
N'oge na-adịghị anya ka o meririsịrị asọmpi ahụ, Hassoun wepụtara egwu mbụ ya akpọrọ 'Rooh', nke onye na-ede egwu Lebanọn bụ Nikola Saada Nikhla dere ma dee
Ọ bụ abụ mbụ na-amalite na nọmba otu na chaatị PEPSI Top 20 nke Rotana, ebe ọ nọgidere na nọmba ruo izu abụọ wee ruo n'ọkwa ọzọ na nọmba otu

Abụ nke abụọ, 'Asmallah Asmallah' ma ọ bụ 'Ebin Bladi', bụ onye Iraqi na-ede uri, Karim Al Iraqi dere ma dee ya dịka onyinye nye ndị Iraqi na ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Iraqi nke meriri Asia Cup 2007
'Oushaq' bụ onye na-agụ egwu Lebanọn bụ Marwan Khoury dere ma dee ya
Hassoun mekwara ka ọtụtụ abụ ọdịnala Iraqi dịghachi ndụ; 'Allela 7elowa' na 'Aleik As'al' dịka duo na Ilham al-Madfai
O weputara egwu Iraqi, 'Mza'elni', nke Amar Almarhon dere ma Mohand Mehsen dere, na 'Lo alf mara' nke bụ abụ mbụ nke Melhem Barakat dere maka onye na-abụghị onye Lebanon
Hassoun na-arụkwa ọrụ na onye na-ede uri Iraq Karim Al Iraqi iji mepụta egwu ọhụrụ nke Iraq, onye ya na ndị dịka Kazem al Saher rụkọrọ ọrụ
Hassoun esorowo Salah Al-Sharnoby, Ramy Ayach, Assi El Helani, Abadi Aljawher na George Wassouf rụọ ọrụ maka ọrụ nka

N'ebe dị anya site n'ịbụ abụ, Hassoun esonyewo na usoro telivishọn Iraqi-Syria-Egyptian a na-akpọ Rasael Men Ragol Mayet (akwụkwọ ozi sitere n'aka onye nwụrụ anwụ), n'akụkụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Siria Ghassan Masoud na ọtụtụ ndị na-eme egwuregwu Iraq
Usoro ihe omume ahụ na-ekwu maka nsogbu nke ndị Iraq n'etiti afọ 1979 na 2005
N'ịbụ nke Hassan Hosny duziri, e mere ihe nkiri ahụ na Syria ma gosipụta ya na Al-Baghdadia TV n'ọnwa Ramadan nke afọ 2008

Na ngwụcha ọnwa Julaị afọ 2009, Shatha mezuru nrọ ndụ ya na nrọ nke ndị na-akwado ya mgbe ọ gara isi obodo ya bụ Baghdad ma bụrụ abụ n'ebe ahụ na nnukwu egwu ọrụ ebere abụọ maka ụmụaka Iraq, nke mbụ na klọb Al-elowea na nke abụọ na Hunting Club, mgbe ahụ o nwere nzukọ ndị nta akụkọ na Baghdad ebe ọ kwuru banyere ọṅụ ya ịbụ onye na-agụ egwu Iraq na Arab mbụ gara Baghdad mgbe agha afọ 2003 gasịrị n'agbanyeghị nchebe na-adịghị akwụsi ike na Baghdad na igbu ọchụ n'afọ 2009 site n'aka otu onye Astrologer
Hassoun na-arụ ọrụ na abọm ya nke ga-agụnye egwu na asụsụ Iraqi, Lebanese, Gulf, Moroccan, na Egyptian
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ ya bụ na o kwuru n'ajụjụ ọnụ na ọ ga-anọchite anya mba ọ hụrụ n'anya Iraq n'ụzọ kachasị mma
Hassoun mere vidio egwu ya maka egwu 'O'd 3rgoub' ya na onye nduzi Lebanọn nwụrụ anwụ Yehia Saade na Beirut ma gaa North America, Syria, Lebanon, Jordan, Kuwait, Sweden na Egypt
N'afọ 2010 o mere egwu na Dubai n'akụkụ Fares Karam
Àtụ Star Academy Arab World
Shatsi Namatovu Musherure Kutesa nke a maara dị ka Shatsi Kuteesa bụ onye ọka iwu Uganda, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye omeiwu
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu Mawogola County North Sambabule district na omeiwu nke Uganda
Shatsi bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye bụbu minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ Sam Kuteesa na ejima Charlotte Kainerugaba nwunye nwa nwoke nke onye isi ala Museveni Muhoozi Kainerugagaba
Ọ nọchiri nna ya dị ka onye omeiwu Mawogola county mgbe ntuli aka a na-asọ mpi gasịrị

Na mbido na ntuli aka nke National Resistance Movement (NRM) nke dugara na ntuliaka nke afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri abụọ na otu , nwanne nwoke nke onye isi ala Museveni, Godfrey Aine Kaguta nke a makwaara dị ka 'Sodo' meriri Shatsi
Shartsi mara mmeri Sodo aka nke mere ka kọmitii ntuli aka NRM mee ka ndị abụọ ahụ na-azọ ọkwa na-agba ọsọ dị ka ndị nweere onwe ha
Otu ụbọchị na ntuli aka nke 2021 Uganda, ezinụlọ ya na Yoweri Museveni dụrụ Sodo ọdụ ka ọ pụọ na asọmpi ahụ maka Shatsi
Shatsi mechara merie na ntuli aka n'ozuzu
Shatsi bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu (MP) ugbu a na-anọchite anya mpaghara Mawogola n'ebe ugwu na ndị omeiwu nke Uganda
Na nzuko omeiwu, ọ na-eje ozi na kọmitii nke iwu na nke ndị omeiwu
Charles Nii Armah Mensah Jr, (amụrụ na 17 Ọktoba ń afọ 1984) bụ onye mba Ghana na-ese reggae-dancehall

A maara ya site na aha ya bụ Shatta Wale, bụbu Bandana Egwu ya a maara nke ọma bụ 'Dancehall King', 'My level' na 'We taking over'A makwaara ya maka Already from Beyoncé's Black is King Album nke gosipụtara Major Lazer
Egwu ya 'Dancehall King' mere ka ọ bụrụ Onye omenkà nke afọ na mbipụta afọ 2014 nke Vodafone Ghana Music Awards
Wale bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke pụtara na ihe nkiri Never Say Never, The trial of Shatta Wale na Shattered Lives A họpụtara ndekọ Wale nke afọ 2004 'Moko Hoo' maka Ghana Music Award
N'afọ 2014, ọ ruru ogo iri atọ na asatọ na Etv's 'Top 100 Most Influential Ghanaian' Awards chart
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ na-apụta na chaatị kwa afọ
A họpụtara ya dịka 'Onye egwu kachasị emetụta' na soshal midia n'afọ 2017
O mere ihe ndekọ dị ka onye na-ese egwu na-agba egwu iji merie ihe nrite iri na otu na mmemme afọ 2019 3 Music Awards
A mụrụ Charles Nii Armah Mensah Jr
na Accra, Ghana na ụlọ ọgwụ ndị uwe ojii na 17 Ọktoba na afo 1984 nye Charles Nii Armah Mensah Snr na Elsie Evelyn Avemegah
Nna ya bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye ọchụnta ego na onye ọrụ iwu
Shatta Wale gara Seven Great Princes Academy na Dansoman, nke dị na Accra, ebe o gosipụtara mmekọrịta maka nka ma mee ihe nkiri a ma ama, By the Fireside, na National Theatre of Ghana

Ọ gara n'ihu na Winneba Secondary School ebe ọ nwetara agụmakwụkwọ nke abụọ yaỌ malitere ọrụ egwu ya na-eto eto site na aha a gbazinyere na njirimara-Doggy- aha ọ na-asọpụrụ onye egwu DanceHall kachasị amasị ya n'oge ahụ- Yoggy Doggy
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gbanwere na Bandana - aha nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ama ama mgbe otu egwu egwu gasịrị
Ọ nwụrụ na egwu, e liri ya ruo ọtụtụ afọ, naanị iji kpọlite ya na aha ọhụrụ, Shatta Wale, njirimara ọhụrụ na egwu siri ike nke egwu mgbe egwu gasịrị
N'afọ 2019, ya na Beyonce nwekwara mmekorita akpọrọ “Already” na abọm ya The Lion King The Gift nke a họpụtara na Grammy Awards
N'afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya maka onyinye abụọ ma merie 'Best Virtual Entertainer of the Year' Award na International Reggae and World Music Awards (IRAWMA)
Ọ bụ onye Ghana mbụ haziri egwu dijitalụ na YouTube nke a kpọrọ Faith Concert
A haziri egwu ahụ iji wetara ndị Ghana na ndị na-ege ya ntị n'ụwa niile olileanya n'oge ọgụ megide ọrịa COVID-19
The Ministry of Communications, Ghana, họpụtara ya na onye egwu Highlife bụ Kuami Eugene dị ka ndị isi egwu maka mmemme mmeghe ngwa COVID-19 nke emere na Mọnde Eprel 13, afọ 2020
Na Satọdee 17 Ọktoba afọ 2020, o mere nnukwu oriri ụbọchị ọmụmụ, nke ndị ezinụlọ ya na ndị enyi ya bịara n'ụlọ obibi ya dị na East Legon iji mee ncheta ọmụmụ ya nke iri atọ na isii
Onye isi obodo Worcester, Joseph Petty, nyere Shatta Wale Key to the City na 8 Julaị afọ 2017
Na 18 Machị afọ 2018, e nyere Wale ihe nrite maka onyinye ya na reggae na Ghana na 37th Annual Chicago Music Awards (CMA), ya na 36th International Reggae & World Music Awards (IRAWMA)
N'afọ 2014, Wale ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Guinness Ghana Breweries
na dịka onye nnọchi anya Rush Energy Drink

Na ọnwa Septemba afọ 2017, Kasapreko Company, ndị na-emepụta ọtụtụ ihe ọṅụṅụ na-aba n'anya na nke na-abụghị mmanya na-aba n'anya na Ghana, kpughere Wale dị ka onye nnọchi anya ọhụrụ ha maka Storm Energy Drink
Na 17 Nọvemba afọ 2017, Shatta Wale bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta na Boss Baker Beef Roll dị ka onye nnọchi anya akara
Infinix Ghana, ụlọ ọrụ smartphone, na Wednesday, Septemba 11, na afọ 2019, kwupụtara Shatta Wale dị ka onye nnọchi anya Brand ya
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2021, Shatta Wale kwuru na ọ bụ ụgha na a gbagburu ya ma na-anata ọgwụgwọ
O mechara nyefee onwe ya n'ihi na ndị uwe ojii kwupụtara na a chọrọ ya
Ndị uwe ojii Ghana jidere ya maka ebubo na ọ na-etinye aka na ịmepụta na mgbasa ozi iji mepụta egwu na ụjọ
A kpọgara ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ otu izu
Na Tuesday, 26 Ọktoba na afo 2021, e nyere Shatta Wale mgbapụta GH ·100,000 nke nkwenye onwe ya na ntị taa
A kwụsịla ikpe ahụ ruo Nọvemba 9, afọ 2021
Otu izu abụọ ka a tọhapụrụ onye na-ese ihe na mgbapụta, e jidere ya na esemokwu ọzọ ya na ndị uwe ojii ka ọ na-apụ na nzukọ ya na ndị ama ama a kpọrọ n'iwu nke onye isi ndị uwe ojii Ghana
Shatta Wale mere mkpesa maka mmeso na-ezighị ezi na nzukọ ahụ mgbe e kwuru na ndị ọrụ ibe ya niile kwere ka ha jiri ekwentị ha ma ọ bụghị
O mechara kọọrọ nzukọ ahụ ma gbuo ikpere n'ala n'ihu IGP George Akuffo Dampare ịrịọ mgbaghara
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara Shatta Wale maka Maiden GN Bank Awards dị ka People's Choice Male Musician of the year
Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ na Chelsea, ọ nọrọ oge na mgbazinye na Milton Keynes Dons na West Bromwich Albion, tupu e ree ya na Reading na Septemba 2009
Ọ nọrọ afọ isii na klọb ahụ, na-enyere ha aka inweta aha Asọmpi na oge 201112 ma gosipụta na egwuregwu itoolu nke Premier League na mkpọsa na-esonụ
E rere ya na Millwall na Jenụwarị 2015 ma ọ bụ ezie na ọ dị naanị egwuregwu 55 n'ime oge abụọ na ọkara, o gosipụtara n'ụzọ pụtara ìhè na 2016 Iko FA nke hụrụ Millwall wepụrụ ndị otu atọ kachasị elu
Ọ nọrọ na Rotherham United n'afọ 2017 na ọnwa abụọ n'afọ 2018 na Doncaster Rovers

A mụrụ ya na Hammersmith, London, Cummings sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ Chelsea dị ka onye dị afọ iri na abụọ n'afọ 2002 ma bụrụkwa onye na-eme ihe ngosi nke Blues na ọkwa ndị otu na 2007-08, na-egwu egwuregwu iri na asatọ ma gbaa otu ugboro
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2008, ọ sonyeere otu egwuregwu Njikọ otu Milton Keynes Dons na mgbazinye ọnwa mbụ
O mere nke mbụ ya maka Dons na 16 Ọgọstụ, na mmeri 1 na Northampton Obodo na Stadium MK
E mechara gbatịkwuo ego ahụ ruo na ngwụcha oge 2008 na 1909
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, a chụpụrụ ya maka mmejọ Sean Thornton nke Leyton Orient
Ọ gara n'ihu na-apụta na egwuregwu 35 Njikọ na iko maka Dons

Ọ sonyeere ndị otu Asọmpi West Bromwich Albion na mgbazinye otu ọnwa na 17 Ọgọstụ 2009, ya na onye njikwa 'Baggies' ugbu a na onye njirimara Dons mbụ Roberto Di Matteo chọrọ mkpuchi maka onye merụrụ ahụ n'aka nri Gianni Zuiverloon
Otú ọ dị, ọ nọgidere na Hawthorns naanị izu abụọ tupu ọ bịanye aka na Ọgụgụ na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ maka ego a na-akọwaghị, ya na onye njikwa Ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ ya na Chelsea, Brendan Rodgers
Cummings mere nke mbụ ya maka 'Royals' na 12 Septemba 2009, na 0 draw na Doncaster Rovers na Madejski Ama egwuregwu
Otú ọ dị, ọ nweghị ike ijide ebe mbido mgbe niile, na-apụta naanị ugboro asaa ọzọ n'okpuru Rodgers
Saịtị na Ọgụgụ na-alụ ọgụ na league, a chụrụ Rodgers n'ọrụ na Disemba na n'okpuru onye nọchiri ya, Brian McDermott, Cummings apụtaghị ọzọ maka oge fọdụrụ na 2009 na 10
Oge 201011 gbasoro usoro yiri nke ahụ maka Cummings na Andy Griffin họọrọ na azụ aka nri
Ọ pụtara naanị ugboro iri na abụọ n'oge oge ahụ, mana ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na mmeri nke abụọ nke Reading na Cardiff City, na-ejupụta n'akụkụ aka nri ma na-enweta otuto maka arụmọrụ ya
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya a na-ejighị mee ihe na Wembley na mmeri ikpeazụ nke Swansea City, nke onye bụbu onye isi Reading bụ Brendan Rodgers duziri
Cummings bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta otu afọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2011, na-edebe ya na klọb ahụ ruo n'ọnwarị n'afọ 2013
N'agbanyeghị ịmaliteghachi oge ahụ dị ka nkwado maka Griffin, mmerụ ahụ onye na-agbachitere ya nwere ahụmahụ mere ka Cummings banye n'òtù ahụ na usoro arụmọrụ dị egwu mere ka ọ kwado ọnọdụ ya n'akụkụ
O mere ngụkọta nke 36 na 201112 mkpọsa n'oge Reading na-emeri n'asọmpi ka ha laghachiri na Premier League na nchebe kachasị sie ike na Championship
Site na mbinye aka nke Chris Gunter na July 2012, Cummings chọtara onwe ya ọzọ n'akụkụ maka mmalite nke oge Premier League
Ọ laghachiri n'òtù ahụ maka mmeri 3X2 League Cup megide Queens Park Rangers wee gbaa egwuregwu anọ sochirinụ tupu Gunter weghachite ọnọdụ ya n'akụkụ ahụ
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ afọ abụọ na ọkara na Disemba 2012, na egwuregwu ọzọ na Disemba na Jenụwarị sochiri, tupu ọ pụọ ọzọ n'akụkụ mgbe Stephen Kelly sonyeere n'oge windo mbufe Jenụwarụ
Ọ pụtaghị ọzọ n'oge afọ 2012 n'okpuru McDermott ma ọ bụ onye nọchiri ya Nigel Adkins, na nke ikpeazụ n'ime egwuregwu iri na otu na-abịa na Jenụwarị 5 na mmeri FA Cup nke 3 na Crawley Town
O bidoro nke ọma n'afọ 2014 na-egwu egwuregwu isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ ma gbaa goolu mbụ ya n'egwuregwu nke 118 nke ọrụ ọkachamara ya iji nyere aka nweta akara 2 na Wigan Athletic
Otú ọ dị, ọ gbara naanị nkeji iri atọ na otu maka Reading mgbe Steve Clarke weghaara ọrụ na Disemba

Na 12 Jenụwarị 2015, Cummings hapụrụ Reading maka ndị na-asọmpi Championship Millwall na nkwekọrịta a na-akọwaghị, na-etinye aka na nkwekọ afọ abụọ na ọkara; onye njikwa Ian Holloway kwuru na 'dị ka onye ọkpụkpọ ọ nwere ike inye aka na nchekwa na mwakpo' ma nwee olileanya na ọ ga-egosi na ọ ga'abụ 'ezi akụ maka anyị n'oge dị mkpirikpi na ogologo'
Ọ gbara egwuregwu iri na abụọ maka 'Lions' ka klọb ahụ merụrụ ahụ na ngwụcha oge 2014 na 15
Ọ gbara goolu nke abụọ n'ọrụ ya mgbe onye na-edebe goolu Daniel Bentley meriri ya na mmeri 4 na Southend United na 28 Disemba

Ọ gbara egwuregwu iri abụọ n'oge afọ 2015 na afọ iri na isii, mana ọ nọghị n'òtù egwuregwu maka mmeri ikpeazụ nke Barnsley n'ihi na a chụpụrụ ya kemgbe ọnwa Febụwarị mgbe a wasịrị ya iji dozie mmerụ ahụ cartilage na ikpere ya
N'abalị asaa n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2017, ọ gbara goolu nke atọ ya n'asọmpi ya na mmeri 3 na AFC Bournemouth nke Premier League na agba nke atọ nke FA Cup

Ọ gbakwara bọọlụ na mmeri 1 na Watford na agba na-esote, tupu ọ gbaa naanị goolu nke egwuregwu ahụ na agba nke ise ka Millwall kụrụ klọb Premier League nke atọ n'usoro na The Den, na-emeri Leicester City na otu n'ime agba ikpeazụ nke egwuregwu ahụ

Cummins gbara egwuregwu iri abụọ na atọ n'oge afọ 2016 na afọ iri na asaa, ọ bụ ezie na ọ hapụrụ mmeri ikpeazụ nke Bradford City mgbe a gbanwere ya na akụkụ mbụ nke egwuregwu ikpeazụ ya na Scunthorpe United
Onye njikwa Neil Harris nyere ya nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ na Mee 2017
Cummings sonyeere Rotherham United na nkwekọrịta otu afọ na 9 Ọgọst 2017, mgbe ọ masịrị onye njikwa Paul Warne na ikpe, onye nwere olileanya na ọ ga-enye asọmpi maka onye azụ aka nri Josh Emmanuel
Ọ gbalịrị ịbanye n'ime ndị otu mbụ nke 'Millers', na-egosi ugboro iri na ise n'oge oge 2017 na afọ 18, na naanị otu ugboro mgbe Krismas gasịrị
Ọ hapụrụ New York Stadium mgbe Rotherham tọhapụrụ ya na ngwụcha oge ahụ
Cummings sonyeere Scunthorpe United na ikpe na July 2018
Na 14 Nọvemba 2018, Cummings sonyeere Doncaster Rovers na nkwekọrịta ọnwa abụọ mgbe ọ masịrị onye njikwa Grant McCann n'oge nnwale na Keepmoat Stadium
Onye na-enyere onye njikwa Cliff Byrne aka kwuru na ịbịanye aka ya ga-ekpuchi Joe Wright merụrụ ahụ
Ọ gbara naanị egwuregwu ise n'oge afọ 2018 na 19
Cummings sonyeere Port Vale na ikpe na July 2019
N'agbanyeghị na a mụrụ ya n'England, a kpọrọ Cummings ka ọ gaa na ndị otu Jamaica na Mee 2013 maka egwuregwu atọ nke 2014 World Cup
O mere nke mbụ ya ọnwa anọ ka e mesịrị na 6 Septemba, na 0 0 0 draw away na Panama
O meriri n'asọmpi nke abụọ ya na Costa Rica na 10 Septemba
Ọ bụ onye ọzọ na-agba bọọlụ na ndepụta ndị otu nwa oge maka 2015 CONCACAF Gold Cup, mana ọ banyeghị na 23 ikpeazụ

Shauwn Mkhize, onye amara aha ya dị ka Mam'Mkhize, bụ nwanyị South Africa na-azu ahịa, onye ọchụnta ego, onye enyemaka, onye na-eme ihe ngosi na telivishọn na onye na-elekọta mmadụ
A bịara mara ya site na alụmdi mbụ ya na Sbu Mpisane, onye ọ lụrụ na 1991 wee gbaa alụkwaghịm mgbe afọ iri abụọ na asaa nke alụmdi na nwunye ha gasịrị, na 2018
A mara Mkhize ugbu a site na usoro onyonyo onyonyo nke Mzansi Magic a kpọrọ, Kwa Mam'Mkhize
A mụrụ Shauwn Mkhize ma zụlite ya n'ime obodo Umbumbulu dị na KwaZulu-Natal n'okpuru nlekọta nne ya, Florence Mkhize onye bụ onye agha ANC na onye na -emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere diploma na Accounting na ML Sultan Technikon nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Durban University of Technology
Ọrụ ya malitere na 1996 ka ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere diploma na Accounting na Mahadum Teknụzụ Durban
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na ngalaba ego maka ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ, mana ya onwe ya banyeziri n'azụmahịa
Ọ malitere site na obere ọrụ sitere na ime obodo nke gụnyere atụmatụ inye nri, eserese na ọrụ owuwu

Ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ihe nke a na-akpọ Zikhulise Group, bụ nke ndị ojii nwekwakwara ọtụtụ ụlọ azụmaahịa nke gụnyere Zikhulise Maintenance and Transport, Zikhulise Auto Recoveries na Inyanga Trading
O nwekwara ụlọ egwuregwu bọọlụ South Africa a kpọrọ Royal Eagles FC
A na-ele ya anya dị ka otu n'ime ndị kacha nwee mmetụta na South Africa na ihe mkpali nye ụmụ nwanyị dịka o nyere aka n'ịkwụsị ihe mgbochi maka ụmụ nwanyị na gburugburu ụlọ ọrụ na South Africa
N'October 2019, ekwuputara ya dị ka onye isi nke Royal AM Football Club nke a na-akpọbu Real Kings
A na-ahụta Shauwn Mkhize dị ka onye na-enye ike n'ịzụ ahịa ojii ma na-enyeghachi ndị obodo ya na na gburugburu KwaZulu-Natal site na ọrụ ebere na atụmatụ ego
O nyere akpụkpọ ụkwụ na pad ụmụ agbọghọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Umlazi ComTech
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ahụ maka nwanyị na onye na-akwado mgbanwe mmekọrịta ọha na eze maka ọgụ megide ime ihe ike metụtara ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka yana HIV na AIDS
Ruo ugbu a, mbọ ọrụ ebere ya bụ nke ezubere n'ụzọ dị iche maka inyere ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka nọ na na gburugburu KwaZulu-Natal aka

Enyere ihe ngosi a kacha mma ihe ngosi TV nke na 2020 Hollywood American Prestigious Awards
Na Maachị 2021, o mere mpụta mbụ ya n'ihe ngosi nke SABC 1, a kpọrọ Uzalo ebe e gosipụtara ya dika nwanyị dị omimi, ọgaranya nke zụtara ụlọ ụka Kwa Mashu
Na 2020 ọ malitere iji soshal midia na n'ime ọnwa asatọ ọ nwetara ihe karịrị otu nde mmadụ ndi1 dị na-eso ya na Instagram

Shawn Faqua ( ; amuru 6 June) bu onye omere, ihe nlere na onye ihe ngosi nke nwere otutu nhọpụta onyinye
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịkpọ Vincent na Lagos Cougars, dị ka Rambo na Ojukokoro nke Dare Olaitan na Chuks na Code of Silence Emem Isong
Ọrụ ya na Lagos Cougars mere ka ọ họpụta onyinye anọ n'ofe Africa gụnyere Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha eto eto/na-ekwe nkwa na 10th Africa Movie Academy Awards
Faqua apụtala na ihe nkiri Africa Magic Out of the ghetto (2015), Mgbe atụmatụ (2015), Oasis (usoro onyonyo), Kaadị Red (2015), Mma agha ejima (2014), ịhụnanya dị ka nke anyị (2011), anọ
Crooks and a Rookie (2011), Ebony Life's A New You (2013) na ndị ọzọ
Faqua bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma mara na ọ na-eme nke ọma n'ọtụtụ ụda dị ka agwa ọ na-egosi chọrọ
Na Charles Novia's, Tinye mgbanaka na ya, Faqua na-arụ ọrụ nke otu nwanyị na-alụbeghị di aha ya bụ Cleopatra ma meekwa okpukpu abụọ dị ka agwa Peter
E wezụga ime ihe ngosi ihuenyo, Faqua emeela n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu ogbo
Ọ mere ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa Lagos, Guaranty Trust Bank, First City Monument Bank, ihe ngosi ejiji na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ
] Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya, o dekọtara egwu maka obere ihe nkiri, 'The Good Life', na-eme ụda ụda mbụ nke abụ 'Achọrọ m ịfụ'
Faqua gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Port-harcourt ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na injinia eletrik
Ọ malitere ime ihe ngosi maka bọọdụ mgbasa ozi yana ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na-eme ihe nkiri, iduzi, ime ihe ngosi, ime ihe nkiri na ịbụ abụ
N'afọ 2012, Faqua nwetara asambodo na ime ihe nkiri saịtị na Ọzụzụ nkwalite Nollywood na njikọ ya na Ebe etiti maka nka onyonyo dijitalụ na Mahadum Boston
N'afọ 2014, ọ gbanwere site n'ọrụ injinia ya gaa n'ọrụ ime ihe nkiri oge niile
Faqua na-arụ ọrụ ndị dị egwu, ihe ịma aka, ihe na-atọ ọchị, siri ike na ihe na-eme ọchị

Ọtụtụ n'ime mmepụta ndị e gosipụtara ya na-ekwu maka okwu ndị dị mkpa gbasara ịhụnanya, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọdịbendị, ikike mmadụ, esemokwu, ndina n'ike, aghụghọ, ọrụ na-enweghị ọdịmma onwe onye na ịchụ àjà

A maara ya ka ọ na-enyocha onye ọ bụla ọ na-eme ugboro ugboro ma na-elebara nkọwa anya (asụsụ, ịkpọpụta, ụdị na ihe ndị ọzọ metụtara onye ọ na-ese), dịka ọ chọrọ ịkọ akụkọ na-akpali akpali na nke a pụrụ ikwere
Shawn na-enwe mmasị ịgụ, ịgba egwú, igwu tenis, ime njem na ikiri ihe nkiri
Ọ bi ugbu a n'obodo Lagos, Naịjirịa

Ọ malitere ọrụ ebere n'afọ 2004 ma bụrụ akụkụ nke Excos nke ndị ntorobịa megide nje HIV na AIDS na mmekorita ya na Nwanyị mbụ nke gọọmenti etiti Naijiria Stella Obasanjo na egwuregwu NUGA nke isi ihe lekwasịrị anya bụ ime ka ndị ntorobịa mara na nyocha ndụmọdụ afọ ofufo (VCT) maka enyemaka HIV
Shawn bụkwa onye isi oche nke Ndị ntorobịa megidere iji ọgwụ ọjọọ eme ihe na ịzụ ahịa ụmụaka (YAWAT) na Abuja, Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2016, ya na ndị agha Naịjirịa jikọrọ aka maka ọrụ ndị dike dara ada ka ọ na-eduzi ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi 'Kewapụrụ' iji kwado ndị dike niile dara ada na ndị ha hụrụ n'anya

O meela ihe ngosi dị ka Urban Royale's Magazine Mwepụta na Retro 52 ihe omume nnwere onwe ebe ọ bụ onye na-akwado ma na-egosi

Shawnae Nicole Jebbia (amụrụ na Septemba 13, n'afọ 1971) bụ onye America na-eme egwuregwu na onye na-ahụ maka ịma mma nke meriri Miss USA n'afọ 1998
Jebbia meriri Miss Massachusetts USA n'afọ 1997, na mbọ mbụ ya na asọmupi
Ọ gara n'ihu na-anọchite anya Massachusetts na asọmupi Miss USA 1998, bụrụ onye mmeri Miss USA mbụ nke steeti ahụ
Ọ bụ ezie na Jebbia enwechaghị ahụmahụ tupu oge ahụ, onye mbụ ya bụ Shauna Gambill nweburu aha Miss Teen USA 1994
Jebbia's 'sister' titleholder, Miss Massachusetts Teen USA 1998 Susie Castillo, gara n'ihu jide Miss Massachusetts USA title wee bụrụ Massachusetts's second Miss USA titleholder na 2003
Jebbia sonyere na asọmupi Miss Universe 1998 mgbe afọ ahụ gasịrị
Akara dị elu na uwe mgbede na asọmupi uwe igwu mmiri mere ka ọ gaa na 5 ikpeazụ mana mgbe ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ gasịrị, o meghị nke ikpeazụ 3 ikpeazụ
Onye meriri bụ Wendy Fitzwilliam nke Trinidad na Tobago, onye Jebbia biri ma pụta n'oge ọchịchị ya
Jebbia tolitere na Sonoma County, California ma biri na Sebastopol, California ruo afọ isii
O nwetara nzere na nkwukọrịta na Mahadum Jacksonville ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ cum laude na agụmakwụkwọ egwuregwu
Ọ pụtara na telivishọn na ihe nkiri, gụnyere ịbụ 'Barker Beauty' na The Price Is Right site na afo 2002 wee ruo n'afọ 2003 na oge na mmemme mmega ahụ ESPN2 Co-ed Training tupu o merie Miss USA
Mgbe ọrịa Ménière kpatara nsogbu ntị, Jebbia si na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ pụọ ma na-agụ akwụkwọ ugbu a maka nzere masta na nọọsụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuru Siemens Pure 700 hearing aid

N'afọ 2014, Shayma nwetara ihe nrite nke egwu kachasị mma maka egwu ya ' Emta nsitek' site na General Union for the Arab Producers na ihe nrite maka onye na-agụ egwu kachasị mma na Middle East Music Awards (MIMA awards)

Sheba Tavarwisa (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1946) bụ onye agha si Zimbabwe
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi nwanyị mbụ nke ngalaba agha nke Zimbabwe African National Union (ZANLA), nke butere ụzọ mgbanwe nke mba ahụ megide ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị
Tavarwisa rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ iji sonye na Zimbabwe African National Liberation Army (ZANLA) iji lụọ ọgụ maka nnwere onwe mba ahụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi mbụ na ndị isi nwanyị mbụ nke òtù ahụ
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ ịburu ma nye ngwá agha site na Zambia gaa Mozambique n'ihu agha na Zimbabwe (nke bụbu Rhodesia)
Ọ bụkwa ya na-ahụ maka ịgbasa òtù ahụ
Ọ kwadoro karịsịa n'etiti ndị ọrụ ugbo iji nweta nkwado ha
Tavarwisa mekwara ka o doo anya na a naghị emenye ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ogige ahụ nsogbu mmekọahụ ma ọ bụ na-erigbu ha
Tavarwisa zụrụ ndị otu, rụọ ọrụ ma duzie nnupụisi dị ka ọchịagha ka ọ na-elekọta ụmụ ya
N'afọ 1978, Tavarwisa ghọrọ osote odeakwụkwọ ZANU maka agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ rịgoro n'ọkwá ma ghọọ onye otu ZANU kachasị elu na-eme mkpebi, iwu dị elu
O sonyere na atụmatụ atụmatụ ma bụrụ naanị nwanyị n'etiti ndị ọzọ 27
Ewezuga ịbụ onye otu ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị nke ZANU, a họpụtara ya ka ọ nọrọ na kọmitii etiti nke nzukọ ahụ
Onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Fay Chung, onye bụkwa onye otu ZANU, kwuru banyere Tavarwasa na
Tavarwisa nwụrụ na 3 Junn, na afọ 1994
E liri ya n'obodo ya dị na Gutu
A nabataghị ya dị ka dike, nke mere ka onye ọrụ mpaghara ZANU-PF bụ Mapiye Wekwete jụọ osote onye isi ala Simon Muzenda ajụjụ banyere ụkpụrụ maka ịnakwere ndị agha agha
Ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ibe nwoke mechara sonye n'ọgụ ahụ na ọbụna ndị ndị ndị agha nwanyị mbụ zụrụ dịka Tavarwisa nyere ọnọdụ dike ma lie ha na National Heroes Acre
Shehu Usman Abdullahi ( bu onye a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 12 n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1993) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa nke na-agbara Omonia nke Cypriot First Division bọọlụ ugbu a
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2014, Abdullahi si Kano Pillars, Nigeria kwaga Kuwait Premier League n'akụkụ Qadsia SC na nkwekọrịta ruru $ 480,000, nke Abdullahi natara $ 330,000 na Kano Pillars $ 150,000
Na 6 June 2015, Shehu sonyeere Primeira Liga ọhụrụ CF
União na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ
Na 2 Septemba 2016, Shehu sonyeere Anorthosis Famagusta nke Saịprọs na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ ruru 20% nke ego a na-ere onye ọkpụkpọ na klọb ndị ọzọ na Europe
Na 24 Jenụwarị 2018, Shehu bịanyere aka maka afọ abụọ na ọkara n'akụkụ Bursaspor nke Turkey maka ego a na-akọwaghị
Na 19 Septemba 2020, Shehu bịanyere aka na Cyprus First Division n'akụkụ Omonia
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2014, onye isi ndị otu egwuregwu Stephen Keshi, kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa maka asọmpi mba Afrịka nke afọ 2014
O nyeere ndị otu ahụ aka n'ọkwa nke atọ mgbe Naịjirịa ji ọkpụ goolu merie Zimbabwe
Naịjirịa họpụtara ya maka ndị otu ha dị mmadụ iri atọ na ise maka 2016 Summer Olympics
N'ọnwa nke ise na afọ 2018, a kpọrọ ya aha na ndị otu egwuregwu iri atọ nke Naịjirịa maka 2018 FIFA World Cup na Russia

Shehu Sani (amụrụ na 29 n'onwa Ọktoba nke afọ 1967) bụ onye omeiwu Naijiria, onye edemede, onye na-ede egwuregwu na onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Civil Rights Congress nke Nigeria - (CRCN)
na onye isi otu aha ya bụ Hand-in-Hand, Africa
Ọ bụ onye isi na ọgụ maka iweghachi ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ ọchịchị ndị agha gara aga jidere ya ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ na Naịjirịa
A tọhapụrụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ndụ ya niile mgbe e weghachiri ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Naịjirịa n'afọ 1999
A mụrụ Sani na 29 Ọktoba n'afọ 1967 na Tudun Wada, Kaduna nke dị na Naijiria
Ọ gụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Local Government Education Authority (LGEA), Badarawa Kaduna n'etiti afọ 1975 na 1980
Ọ debara aha ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke Government Day, Kagara, Niger State, site na 1980 wee guchs na 1984, wee gaa na Government Science College School, Kagara
Ọ gakwara Kaduna Polytechnic site na 1984 ruo 1993 ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Injinia Ọrụ Ugbo
N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na Kaduna Polytechnic nke dị na Kaduna Steeti, ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ onye isi, Central Mobilization Committee nke PAN-African Student Organization na onye isi African Democratic Youth Congress
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi mmekọrịta ọha na eze Kaduna State Students Union
Sani si n'ezinụlọ Naijiria nọ n'ọkwá dị n'etiti
Nna ya bụ onye njikwa mmepụta
Ọ zụrụ onwe ya na UK na Germany, ma rụọ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ a maara dika New Nigerian pro-Northern New Newspaper ruo afọ iri na atọ
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ebi akwụkwọ na Daily Mail nke dị na Steeti Kano
N'oge ọgba aghara okpukpe na Steeti Kaduna n'afọ 2000, ọ bụ naanị onye na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ na Kaduna nke pụtara n'oké ihe ike iji katọọ ogbugbu ahụ
N'afọ 2005, a họpụtara ya ka ọ gbanwee ndị obodo na nzukọ mba
Ndị ọchịchị ọdịnala na nnọkọ ahụ rịọrọ ka a machibido Shehu Sani maka ikwu okwu mgbe ọ rịọrọ ka ha gbasaa n'ihi nkwado ha na-akwado onye ọchịchị aka ike n'oge gara aga
Onye isi oche nke kọmitii ahụ, aha ya bụ Justice Niki Tobi jụrụ oku ahụ
Sani haziri ma duzie ngagharị iwe
Sani nwere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ edemede ya, gụnyere
Akwụkwọ
Abụ uri
Ọ bụ onye isi oche Kọmitii Senate na hụ màkà ụgwọ obodo na nke mba ọzọ ma bụrụkwa osote onye isi oche na Kọmitii Senator na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ
Sheikh Hamada (amụrụ 1889, Blad Touahria nso Mostaganem; nwụrụ na Eprel 9, 1968) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere egwu gasba
N'oge ndụ ya, ọ gbanwere ọdịnala egwu Bedouin na North Africa na egwu nke oge a taa
O jiri uri obodo mee na egwu Hadri, Haouz, na Aroub ya
O mere ndekọ mbụ ya na 1920, wee gaa n'ihu na-edekọ egwu na Algeria, Paris, na Berlin, ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Ọ dezigharịrị egwu gasba, nke metụtara mpaghara Dahra, ya mere o nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na egwu chaâbi, nke bụ otu n'ime ụdị egwu kachasị ewu ewu na North Africa taa
A ka na-eji ya eme ememe ọdịnala, na egwu sitere na ọdịbendị Arabo-Andalusian
Ụdị egwu a bụ modal, ọ bụghị tonal
Onye na-ese ihe metụrụ Béla Bartók n'ahụ nke ukwuu na njem afọ abụọ ọ gara Algeria (1913-1915), nke kpaliri ọtụtụ ihe
Hamada bụ nna nke ụmụ nwoke abụọ e gburu n'oge agha nke ndị Algeria National Liberation Front site na 1954 ruo 1962
Ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi nye enyi ya Hadj El Anka, onye Algeria na-ese ihe
Ha zutere ndị na-ede uri na ndị na-agụ egwú na njem, ebe ha rụkọtara ọrụ na Pyllahayds (abụ)
Hamada bụkwa onye nkuzi nye ọgbọ na-eto eto ọ nabatara ọtụtụ ndị na-agu egwu dị ka Maâzouz Bouadjadj n'ụlọ ya, na-akụzi, mgbe ụfọdụ ọtụtụ awa, ụda, ahịrịokwu, ihe zoro ezo nke okwu, amaokwu, qasida
Cherfilus-McCormick mụrụ na Brooklyn, nke dị na New York City, nye nne na nna si Haiti ma zụlite ya na mpaghara Queens
Ọ kwagara Florida mgbe ọ dị afọ 13 ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Arts na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na gọọmentị na Mahadum Howard yana Dọkịta Juris sitere na St
Thomas University School of Law
Sheila Cussons (9 Ọgọst 1922 - 25 Nọvemba 2004) bụ onye na- ede uri Afrikaans
A mụrụ ya n'ọdụ ndị ozi ala ọzọ nke Moravia dị nso na Piketberg, South Africa, ma, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Afrikaanse Hoër Meisieskool, ọ mụtara nkà nka na Mahadum Natal dị na Pietermaritzburg
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ede uri kacha mkpa na Afrikaans, ewezuga onye na-ese ihe na nka
Onye na-ede uri DJ Opperman nwere mmetụta na mkpebi ya ide na Afrikaans, ebe NP van Wyk Louw nọgidere na-edegara ya akwụkwọ ozi ogologo oge, nke ha abụọ weere dị ka uru na ọrụ ha
Ka o sina dị, ọ na-ewere onwe ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe na nke mbụ, na onye na-ede uri nke abụọ
N'ibipụta mpịakọta iri otu na otu nke uri n'oge ndụ ya, ọ natara Ingrid Jonker Prize (1970), Eugène Marais Prize (1971), ihe nrite WA Hofmeyr ugboro atọ (1972, 1982 na 1991), Nrite CNA (1981), Louis
Luyt Prize (1982), na ihe nrite Hertzog a ma ama na 1983
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2004 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na abụọ, na Nazareth House, ụlọ ọrụ Katọlik na Vredehoek
Sheila Gordon (January 22, 1927, na Johannesburg, South Africa-2013) bụ onye ode akwụkwọ America amuru na South Afriika
O dere, n'etiti akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche, Na-echere mmiri ozuzo, Middle of Somewhere, na Azụmahịa Na-adịghị agwụ agwụ
Ichere mmiri ozuzo na-akọ akụkọ banyere ụmụ nwoke abụọ tolitere n'ugbo dị na South Africa n'oge Apartheid

Ọbụbụenyi dị n'etiti ụmụ nwoke abụọ a na-agbasa ka ha na-etolite n'ihi na otu onye n'ime ha bụ onye isi ojii na-achọ nha anya ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ebe nwa nwoke nke ọzọ bụ onye ọcha chọrọ ka ihe niile dịrị n'otu
Sheila biri na Cobble Hill, obere agbata obi na Brooklyn ihe karịrị afọ iri ise Mee 10, 2013, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na isii
Di ya nke karịrị afọ iri isii, Harley Gordon, nwụrụ ọnwa atọ ka e mesịrị na August 8, 2013
Ụmụ ha atọ na ụmụ ụmụ ise nwụnahụrụ ha
Sheila Jackson Lee (amuru January 12, 1950) bụ onye ọka iwu na onye agha America bụ onye anya US maka mpaghara azụ 18th Texas, na-eje ozi ozi 1995
onye ọkpụkpọ egwu Central Houston
Ọ bụ onye otu Democratic Party

Sheila Kohler (amụrụ ya na 13 Nọvemba 1941) bụ onye odee South Africa bi ugbu a na United States na onye dere akwụkwọ akụkọ iri (gụnyere Cracks nke emegharịrị n'ime ihe nkiri 2009 nke otu aha ), yana nchịkọta akụkọ mkpụmkpụ atọ
O nwetala ihe nrite O'Henry ugboro abụọ
A mụrụ Sheila Kohler na 13 Nọvemba 1941 na Johannesburg wee gụchaa akwụkwọ na St
Andrew's School maka ụmụ agbọghọ ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'afọ 1958 site n'iche na History

Ọ kwagara Europe wee nọrọ afọ iri na ise na Paris ebe ọ lụrụ ma gụchaa akara ugo mmụta mahadum na akwụkwọ na The Sorbonne (1973) na nzere gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Psychology site na Institut Catholique (1976)
Ọ kwagara United States na 1981 wee nweta MFA na Mahadum Columbia (1984)
Site n'afọ 1995 ruo 2000 ọ kuziri na New School, na n'etiti 2000 na 2006 na Bennington College

Ọ na-akụzi ugbu a na Mahadum Princeton na Columbia, na-ede blọgụ maka Psychology Today ma bi na New York City, na Amagansett O nwere ụmụ nwanyị atọ, Sasha Troyen, Cybele na Brett Sasha akụkọ abụọ n'onwe ya
Ọ lụrụ Dr
William Tucker, dibia bekee

Dị ka e gosipụtara na webụsaịtị ndị odee, ọnwụ ike nke nwanne ya nwanyị afọ iri atọ gara aga na apartheid South Africa mere ka ọ nyochaa n'ime akụkọ ifo ya isiokwu nke 'ime ihe ike n'ime mmekọrịta chiri anya, karịsịa, iji ike na ihe ùgwù eme ihe' Ọ kọwara na 'Kemgbe ahụ, ebipụtala m akwụkwọ akụkọ itoolu, nchịkọta akụkọ mkpirisi atọ, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ anakọtabeghị, ha niile na-elekwasị anya n'ụzọ ụfọdụ na isiokwu a'

Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya Open Secrets (2020) pụtara na ndepụta nke akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha mma nke afọ 2020, na Ian Malone na-ede, 'Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ na-eduhie ma na-ama jijiji [] ka ihe na-enyo enyo na-ebuli, ekpughere akụkụ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ Russian njikọ, akwụkwọ ndekọ zoro ezo, igbu onwe onye na-adaba adaba, na ụmụaka nwere mgbagwoju anya na-eme ka ọdịdị ala dị egwu na-akpali akpali
Sheila Meiring Fugard (amụrụ ya na 1932) mụrụ na England
Ọ bụ onye edemede nke obere akụkọ na egwuregwu na nwunye ochie nke onye na-ede egwuregwu South Africa Athol Fugard
Amụrụ na Birmingham, England n'afọ 1932, Sheila Meiring na nne na nna ya kwagara South Africa, na 1940, mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
Ọ gara na Mahadum Cape Town, ebe ọ na-ede akụkọ dị mkpirikpi ma mụọ ihe nkiri
Ọ zutere onye na-ede egwuregwu Athol Fugard mgbe ọ mere n'otu n'ime egwuregwu ya
Na Septemba 1956, ọ lụrụ Fugard ma nakweere aha nna ya
N'afọ 1972, mgbe ọ dị afọ 40, Sheila Fugard bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, The Castaways, nke meriri Olive Schreiner Prize
N'ikpeazụ, o bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọzọ, gụnyere Rite of Passage, n'afọ 1976, na A Revolutionary Woman, na 1983

Nwanyị na-agbanwe agbanwe, akwụkwọ akụkọ ya a kacha mara amara, na-ewere ọnọdụ n'afọ 1920 na mpaghara Karoo nke South Africa wee kọọ akụkọ banyere otu nwanyị na-eso ụzọ Mahatma Gandhi bụ onye abanyela n'okwu ikpe idina n'etiti nwa nwoke nwere agba na otu nwa okoro azụ azụ Boer
nwa agbọghọ
Rite of Passage metụtara otu dọkịta na otu nwa nwoke nke emume ibi úgwù agbụrụ kpasuru iwe
Fugard ebipụtakwala abụ anakọtara, gụnyere ọnụ ụzọ, na 1975, na Mystic Things, n'afọ 1981
Nwa ha nwanyị, Lisa Fugard, onye mere ihe n'ụfọdụ egwuregwu nna ya, dị ka ụmụ m! Africa m!, edewokwa akwụkwọ akụkọ
A mụrụ Munyiva n'afọ 1993 na Nairobi O tolitere na-ekiri Hannah Montana ma kwenye na akpụkpọ ahụ ya kwesịrị ịdị mma na ntutu isi ya
Ọ na-eleta UK ugboro ugboro n'ihi na nne ya bi ebe ahụ
Munyiva gụrụ akwụkwọ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka akụkọ na kọleji tupu ọ gbanwee isi ya na Film Production
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na edemede edemede ya site na isonye na klas nke onye edemede
N'afọ 2018, Munyiva mere Ziki, mmụọ nweere onwe ya nke na-enwe esemokwu na nkewa n'etiti ịhụnanya na nchekwa, na Rafiki
N'agbanyeghi na ọ masịrị onye nduzi Wanuri Kahiu na nyocha ahụ site n'ịhụnanya ya maka ndụ, Munyiva na-ala azụ ịrụ ọrụ ahụ ruo mgbe enyi ya na-amaghị nwoke mere ka o kwenye na ọ dị mkpa
A machibidoro ihe nkiri a iwu na Kenya, ebe nwoke idina nwoke megidere iwu
Rafiki ghọrọ ihe nkiri Kenya mbụ e gosiri na Cannes Film Festival
E gosipụtara Munyiva na mbipụta Vogue UK maka ọdịdị mara mma kachasị mma na ime ihe na Cannes
Ann Hornaday nke The Washington Post toro 'mmekọrịta kemịkal na-enweghị mmanye' nke Munyiva na onye otu ya bụ Samantha Mugatsia
A họpụtara Munyiva maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Africa Movie Academy Awards
N'afọ 2019, Munyiva mere dịka onye ọrụ ahụike Anna na usoro TV Country Queen N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2019, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya dịka Sarafina na egwu Sarafina!
Munyiva wepụtara onwe ya dịka onye ndụmọdụ maka ụmụ agbọghọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ na-abaghị uru na ime obodo Kibera
Ọ duziri ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi na Kenya ma na-arụ ọrụ na obere ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Ngao, dabere na ahụmịhe nwata ya

Sheila Pree Bright bụ onye na-ese foto nke America nke dị na Atlanta, nke nwetara ihe nrite nke a maara nkè ọma màkà ọrụ ya Plastic Bodies, Suburbia, Young Americans na usoro ya kachasị ọhụrụ # 1960Now
Sheila bụ ónyé dere # 1960Now Photographs of Civil Rights Activist and Black Lives Matter Protest nke Chronicle Books bipụtara
A mụrụ Sheila Pree Bright na Waycross, GA
Dị ka ónyé so n'ezinụlọ ndị agha, ọ nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Germany ma mesịa laghachi na United States, na-agagharị n'etiti ọtụtụ steeti gụnyere Colorado na Kansas
Ọ dịghị nke ọ bụla n'ime ebe ndị a nwèrè ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị isi ojii, eziokwu nke mesịrị metụta ọrụ ya
O nwetara nzèrè bachelọ nke sayensị na Mahadum Missouri na 1998
Mmasị mbụ ya na foto malitere mgbè ọ na-ewere klas foto n'oge afọ ikpeazụ ya na kọleji
Ọ kwagara Atlanta n'afọ 1998 wee nweta nzèrè masta nke nka márá mma na Mahadum Georgia State n'afọ 2003
A na-akọwakarị Bright dị ka 'ónyé na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị'
Ahụmahụ mbụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese foto malitere mgbe ọ nọrọ oge na Houston ebe ọ malitere ise foto nke ebe egwu rap na-eme na ịnagide ike dị n'etiti hip hop na omenala égbè
N'afọ 2003, o mepụtara usoro foto thesis MFA ya, Plastic Bodies, nke gosipụtara na ihe nkírí Through the Lens Darkly ma gbasaa na Huffington Post n'afọ 2013

N'ime foto ndị a, ọ na-eji ihe oyiyi nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii na ụmụ bebi Barbie na mgbalị ịma echiche ọdịda anyanwụ nke ịdị ọcha na ịma mma aka ma nyochaa mmetụta echiche ndị a nwere na ụmụ agbọghọ na ụmụ nwanyị na-acha
Bright mechara nweta otuto mba mgbe ọ meriri Center Prize na Santa Fe Center of Photography na 2006 maka usoro Suburbia ya, nke gosipụtara foto nke ndụ ndị Africa America
N'afọ 2008, o nwere ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na High Museum of Art, na-egosi usoro ya Young Americans
Ndị na-ese foto ndị a bụ nzaghachi nye ihe ngosi na-adịghị mma nke Millennials
O kwere ka ndị ọ na-achị jiri ihe ndị ha, uwe, na ọnọdụ ha na-anwa 'inye ha ikpo okwu iji kwuo màkà onwe ha'
Shekhinah Thandi Donnell (amụrụ n'abalị abụọ nke ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1994), nke a maara dịka Shekhinah, bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu si Durban, South Africa
Shekhinah so na mmadụ iri atọ na abụọ mbụ ahọtaea n'elu nhọpụta nke M-Net agba nke asaa nke SA Idols na 2011 ma soro na mmadụ Isii nke nọ n'isi nhọpụta n'agba nke asatọ nke na 2012
Shekhinah Thandi Donnell (amụrụ n'abalị abụọ nke ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1994), nke a maara dịka Shekhinah, bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu si Durban, South Africa

Sheko bụ asụsụ Omotic nke ezinụlọ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na mpaghara dị n'etiti Tepi na Mizan Teferi na ọdịda anyanwụ Etiopia, na mpaghara Sheko na mpaghara Bench Maji
Ọnụọgụ 2007 depụtara ndị na-ekwu okwu 38,911; Ngụkọ 1998 depụtara ndị na-ekwu okwu 23,785, yana 13,611 kọwara dị ka ndị na-asụ otu asụsụ
Sheko, tinyere asụsụ Dizi na Nayi, bụ akụkụ nke ụyọkọ asụsụ a na-akpọ 'Maji' ma ọ bụ 'Dizoid'
Asụsụ a ama ama maka consonants retroflex ya (Aklilu Yilma 1988), njiri mara mma nke ya na Dizi nwere njikọ chiri anya na nso (mana enweghị njikọ chiri anya) Bench (Breeze 1988)
Ewezuga ụdaume retroflex ndị a kpọtụrụ aha n'elu, ụdaume nke Sheko nwere ngụkọta ụdaume 28, ụdaume ise dị ogologo na ụdaume isii dị mkpirikpi, gbakwunyere ọkwa ụdaume anọ
Hellenthal (2010, p
45) depụtara ụdaume ndị a nke Sheko
N'adịghị ka asụsụ Dizoid ndị ọzọ, Sheko enweghị ọdịiche dị n'etiti //r// na //l//
A naghị ejikarị mkpụrụedemede eme ihe, ma enwere syllabic nasal //n̩//
H/e/llenth/a/l (2010, p
56) depụtara ụda/u/me /o/gologo na mkp/i/rikpi nke Sheko /i/, //ii//, /e/, //ee// //ə//, /a/, //aa//, /u/, //uu//, /o/, //oo//
Sheko bụ otu n'ime asụsụ ole na ole n'Africa nke nwere ọkwa ụda ụda anọ dị iche iche
Ụda na-eme ka ọdịiche dị n'ihe ọ pụtara ma na lexicon ma na ụtọ asụsụ, ọkachasị iji mee ka ndị mmadụ dị iche na usoro nnọchiaha

Ethnologue depụtara ihe ndị na-esonụ 'SOV; postpositions; genitives, articles, adjectives, numerals, ndị ikwu mgbe isi aha gasịrị; ajụjụ okwu mbido; 1 prefix, 5 suffixes; usoro okwu na-eme ka ndị mmadụ, ihe, ihe ndị na'apụtaghị ìhè; affixes na-egosi okwu nke ahịrịokwu aha; ngwaa affixes akara onye, ọnụ ọgụgụ, okike nke isiokwu; passive, causatives, comparatives'
Shelleng bụ ọchịchị ime obodo nke Adamawa Steeti, North-east Naijiria
Ọchịchị ime obodo nwere oke na Guyuk na Girei LGA yana obodo na obodo nta dịka Kiri, Bodwai, Gundo, Jumbul, Shelleng, Timbu, Ketembere, Dunge, Boburo na Tallum
Ọchịchị ime obodo Shelleng nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 190,671 bi na mpaghara ahụ mejupụtara ndị otu agbụrụ dị iche iche dịka fulani, Lala, kana kuri, kiri, na Bura
Asụsụ Bura bụ otu n'ime asụsụ ndị a na-asụ na Shelleng LGA ebe okpukperechi nke uka na ndi na akpo isi ala na-emekarị na mpaghara ahụ
Mmeme ndị a ma ama na Shelleng LGA gụnyere mmemme Mendamo ebe ihe ama ama na mpaghara ahụ gụnyere Kiri Dam na ụlọ ọgwụ Shelleng koteji
Ọchịchị ime obodo Shelleng na-ekpuchi mkpokọta 1,359 square kilomita ma nwee nkezi okpomọkụ nke 32 degrees centigrade
Ọ dị n'akụkụ ọdọ mmiri Chad ma nwee osimiri Kiri na Gongola na-asọfe na mpaghara ya
Ịkụ azụ na ịzụ anụmanụ bụ ọrụ akụ na ụba dị mkpa na Shelleng LGA na anụ ụlọ dịka ehi, ewu, ebule, na ịnyịnya na-azụ ma na-ere ya n'ọtụtụ ebe
LGA bụkwa ebe obibi nke ngalaba azụmaahịa na-amasi ike yana LGA na-anabata ọtụtụ ahịa ebe a na-azụ ma na-ere ngwa ahịa dị iche iche
Ọrụ akụ na ụba ndị ọzọ nke ndị Shelleng LGA na-eme gụnyere ịchụ nta, ite na ịrụ ọrụ aka
Ọchịchị ime obodo Shelleng na-anabata Kiri Dam nke a na-enye mmiri maka ọrụ ugbo na mpaghara ahụ
Charles Shemu Joyah (b
1959), bụ onye mmepụta na onye nduzi si Malawi
A mụrụ ya na Zimbabwe
A họọrọ ihe nkiri ya nke atọ, The Road to Sunrise, dị ka ntinye Malawi maka Best Foreign Language Film na 91st Academy Awards
A mụrụ Shame Joyah na Zimbabwe na nne na nna si na obodo Malawi
O mechara laghachi Malawi wee gụọ maka BSc na ọnụ ọgụgụ na mgbako na Physics na Mahadum Malawi, Onye na elekota Colegi
Ọ gara mba United Kingdom maka ọmụmụ ihe ọzọ wee nweta nzere BSc Honours na nyocha na eserese sayensị site na Mahadum nke East London
Joyah na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye ọkà mmụta sayensị ala na Malawi ma na-enye ọrụ ndụmọdụ
Joyah bụ onye ndụmọdụ ala na ụlọ na Malawi
O jiri ego ahụ mee ihe na ọrụ ndụmọdụ ya iji kwado ọtụtụ ọrụ nka ya
Joyah bụ onye edemede na onye na-emepụta ihe nwere nkà
O bipụtara ọtụtụ akụkọ mkpirikpi n'akwụkwọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ e bipụtara
Ọ bụ onye edemede e bipụtara ma na-edekwa edemede maka ihe nkiri ọ na-emepụta
O dere ihe odide maka 'Seasons of Life' na 'The Last Fishing Boat'
E dere Season of a Life, gbaa ya, dezie ya ma duzie ya Shemu Joyah
A na-eto ihe nkiri ahụ n'ụwa niile ma gosipụta ya na mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa ma merie ihe nrite asaa
A họpụtakwala ihe nkiri ahụ maka onyinye na mmemme ihe nkiri Kenya, Cairo, na Zanzibar
Ọ bụ ihe nkiri ikpe ụlọ ikpe Malawi nke e mere na Malawi
Ọ bụ maka onye ọrụ ụlọ nke onye were ya n'ọrụ metọrọ n'ụzọ mmekọahụ nke na-agba mbọ inye onwe ya ike ma melite ndụ ya
A họpụtara ya na ụdị 8 na 6th Africa Movie Academy Awards, gụnyere nhọpụta maka Best Screenplay na Best Original Soundtrack
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Tapiwa Gwaza meriri ihe nrite Nollywood maka arụmọrụ kachasị mma site n'aka onye na-akwado ya
Ọ na-egosi ihe dị n'etiti ụzọ ndụ ọdịnala na ndụ nke oge a

Ziriya (Jiriya) na Sheni (Shaini) mejupụtara asụsụ Kainji nke Naijiria
Ha dị na mpaghara ma eleghị anya ọ bụghị asụsụ no dị iche
Ebe mbụ a kpọtụrụ asụsụ Sheni aha bụ na Temple (1922), nke jikọtara Sheni na Srubu ma kwuo ọnụnọ ha na Dan Galadima District nke Zaria Emirate
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2004, e nwere mmadụ isii fọdụrụnụ na-asụ asụsụ Sheni nke ọma na ikekwe ndị na-asụrụ asụsụ 10 na 15 nke ọma
Ndị na-enye ihe ọmụma Sheni na-ekwu na asụsụ ha na bụ otu ihe ahụ dị ka Ziriya
Shimizu (1982), onye nyere ndepụta okwu dị mkpirikpi, kwuru okwu Ziriya na mbụ
Okwu nke ndị na-enye Shimizu ihe ọmụma nyere dị iche na ibe ha, ikekwe n'ihi ncheta na-ezighị ezi
Onye na-enye Shimizu ihe ọmụma Sarkin Abubakar Yakubu bụ ma eleghị anya onye fọdụrụ na-asụ asụsụ Ziriya
Ọ na-asụ ya naanị mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị, mbe dị ka afọ iri isii tupu mgbe ahụ
Ọ nwere ike icheta ọtụtụ ekele na nọmba ụfọdụ, nke niile kwekọrọ na Sheni, na-akwado nkwupụta na Sheni na Ziriya bụ otu asụsụ
Ndị Sheni akwagala na Hausa
Ha na-akpọ onwe ha Shenawa ugbu a ma na-ezo aka n'asụsụ ha dị ka Shenanci
A na-ewere ọnwụ nke asụsụ ha dị ka ihe a na-eme ma ọ nweghị mmasị n'ime ka ọ dịghachi ndụ ozo
Ịnọgide na-adị adịgide bụ naanị ihe na-adọrọ mmasị nye ọtụtụ ndị Sheno, dị ka Blench si kwuo
Blench (2012) na-akọ na si e nwere naanị ndị ọkà okwu Sheni isii
Sheni nwere ọdịdị dị iche iche nke na-egosi mmetụta sitere na asụsụ a na-amaghị oma mana ọ dị iche iche
A na-emegharị ihe mbụ nke ogwe osisi ahụ dịka usoro dịgasị iche iche si dị

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Philadelphia School of Art na 1926; Art Students League of New York na 1950; Mahadum Fordham na 1960; École des Beaux-Arts, Fontainelbleau site na 1962 ruo 1964; na Mahadum Arizona State site na 1979 ruo 1980

Shepheard's Hotel bụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ kachasị na Cairo na otu n'ime ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ kachasị ewu ewu na ụwa site na etiti narị afọ nke 19 ruo mgbe mbibi ya na 1952 n'oge ọkụ Cairo
Afọ ise ka e bibichara ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ mbụ, e wuru nke ọhụrụ dị nso ma kpọọ ya Shepheard Hotel
Samuel Shepheard hibere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na 1841 n'okpuru aha 'Hotel des Anglais' (Bekee Hotel), ma emesịa degharịa aha ya 'Shepheard's Hotel'
Shepheard, onye Bekee a kọwara n'otu oge dị ka 'onye nkuzi achịcha achịcha na-enweghị isi', sitere na Preston Capes, Northamptonshire
Ya na Mr
Hill, onye isi nchịkwa Mohammed Ali Pasha, nwere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ahụ, ma gosi na ọ bụ onye ọchụnta ego na-eme nke ọma na onye ọchụnta ego
N'otu oge, mgbe ndị agha nọ n'ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ kwagara na Crimea na mberede, na-ahapụ ụgwọ ndị a na-akwụghị ụgwọ, Shepheard gara n'onwe ya na Sevastopol iji nweta ụgwọ
N'afọ 1845, Hill hapụrụ mmasị ya na họtel ahụ, Shepheard ghọkwara naanị onye nwe ya
Shepheard rere họtel ahụ na 1861 maka £ 10,000 nye onye na-elekọta họtel Bavaria Philip Zech (ma ọ bụ Zeck) wee laa ezumike nká na Eathorpe Hall, Eathorbe, Warwickshire, England

Richard Burton, ezigbo enyi Shepheard, hapụrụ nkọwa zuru ezu banyere àgwà mmesapụ aka ya na ọrụ na-aga nke ọma, na-akọwa ya dị ka 'nwoke dị ịrịba ama n'ọtụtụ ihe, na ihe niile ihe nlereanya John Bull'
A rụzigharịrị họtel ahụ na 1869 mgbe ọkụ gbara n'akụkụ ndịda nke ụlọ ahụ
Ka ọ na-erule afọ iri ikpeazụ nke narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, o doro anya na ụlọ mbụ ahụ bụ nke e dere; ka ọ bụrụ nke na-asọmpi, a ga-ewu ihe owuwu ọhụrụ ex novo
Zech were ọrụ nke onye na-eto eto na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Nuremberg, Johann Adam Rennebaum, iji chepụta họtel n'otu ogige ahụ nke ga-akarị ndị bu ya ụzọ n'ibu na okomoko
Ihe owuwu ikpeazụ a, nke e wuchara na 1891, bụ ihe a ma ama na nke edere nke ọma nke họtel ahụ
N'afọ 1898, a gbakwunyere Arab Hall (nke Rennebaum mekwara) n'ogige etiti nke ụlọ ahụ, na mmụba ndị ọzọ mere na 1904, 1909 na 1927

Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ aha Rennebaum na akwụkwọ nke họtel ahụ nwere ike imetụta mgbalị ndị ọchịchị Britain na-eme mgbe Agha Ụwa Mbụ gasịrị iji kpochapụ ihe ọ bụla metụtara mmetụta Germany na Ijipt
Onye nwe họtel ahụ gafere n'aka nwa nwanyị Zech na di ya, Maazị na Oriakụ
Kemmerich N'afọ 1896, ndị Kemmerichs rere họtel ahụ na Egyptian Hotels Ltd, ụlọ ọrụ Britain nke mechara nye ya Compagnie Internationaldes Grands Hôtels
Onye isi ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke Switzerland bụ Karl (Charles) Baehler zụrụ ụlọ ọrụ a
Shepheard's Hotel bụ nke a ma ama maka ịdị ukwuu ya, maka ndị ọbịa ya, na dị ka isi ụlọ ọrụ maka ndị agha
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọgaranya ya, ya na ugegbe na-acha odo odo, kapet ndị Peshia, ogige, ala, na nnukwu ogidi granite yiri nke ụlọ nsọ ndị Ijipt oge ochie
Ọ bụghị naanị ndị America na ndị isi French na ndị Britain na-agakarị American Bar ya
E nwere ịgba egwú abalị ebe ndị ikom na-eyi uwe agha na ndị inyom na-eyi akwa mgbede

'Okporo ogologo' ahụ na-ewu ewu n'etiti ndị kansụl nke gọọmentị Gris na-agba ọsọ, Harold Macmillan dere n'akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na 21 Ọgọst 1944 na gọọmentị Greece na-agbapụ kwesịrị ịkwaga Ịtali iji gbanahụ 'ọnọdụ na-egbu egbu nke aghụghọ nke na-achị na Cairo
Gọọmentị niile gara aga na-agba ọsọ agbaala n'ụlọ mmanya nke Shepheard
N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1952, e bibiri họtel ahụ n'oge ọkụ ọkụ nke Cairo, oge ọgba aghara megide ndị Britain na ọgba agha obodo dị egwu nke dugara na Mgbanwe Ijipt nke afọ 1952
Họtel ahụ enweela ọtụtụ ndị ọbịa a ma ama

E gosipụtara ya na ihe nkiri Britain nke 1934 The Camels are Coming Ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ bụ ebe ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị na ihe nkiri 1996 The English Patient mana ihe nkiri nke ihe nkiri ahụ mere na The Grand Hotel des Bains na Venice Lido, Ịtali

A na-eji họtel ahụ eme ihe dị ka isi ọrụ na usoro The Race Colonization nke Harry Turtledove, dị ka ebe dị na Agatha Christie's Crooked House, a kpọtụrụ ya aha na Death on the Nile na akụkọ mkpirikpi nke Anthony Trollope, An Unprotected Female at the Pyramids (1861)
Ọ na-egosipụtakwa mgbe niile na akwụkwọ akụkọ Amelia Peabody nke Elizabeth Peters
'Shepheard Hotel' nke oge a bụ nke Egyptian Hotels Ltd
wuru na 1957 na Garden City, Cairo, ihe dị ka 08 kilomita (050 mi) site na saịtị họtel mbụ
Ụlọ nkwari akụ ọhụrụ ahụ, na ala ọ guzo, bụ nke EGOTH
(Egyptian General Company for Tourism & Hotels)
Ọ bụ Helnan International Hotels na-elekọta họtel ahụ ma mara ya dị ka Helnan Shepheard Hotel
Na Septemba 29, 2009, a mara ọkwa na Rocco Forte Hotels ga-emezigharị ihe onwunwe ahụ kpamkpam ma meghee ya ọzọ n'okpuru njikwa nke ha na 2012
Mgbanwe ahụ emeghị, ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ mechikwara n'afọ 2014
Na Machị 2020, EGOTH
bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ya na AlSharif Group Holding nke Saudi Arabia iji kwado mmepe na inye mmezigharị ahụ ruru nde $ 90
N'afọ 2021, a mara ọkwa na ahọpụtara Mandarin Oriental Hotel Group ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na họtel ahụ a rụzigharịrị
N'afọ 2022, e setịpụrụ ụbọchị mmeghe ọzọ maka afọ 2024
