A mụrụ Shereen Usdin na Durban ( South Africa ), na 8 Eprel 1962
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka dọkịta ahụike na Mahadum Witwatersrand ( Johannesburg ) n'afọ 1985
N'afọ 1995 ọ nwetara Masters of Public Health na Mahadum Harvard
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Ụlọ ọrụ Soul City maka nkwukọrịta nke South Afriika ahụike na mmepe ugbu a Soul City Institute of Social Justice
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ngalaba nke Mmekọahụ na Ahụike ịmụ nwa na ikike, ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị na ahụike na ikike mmadụ
O nyere aka n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ma deekwa ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ
O dere akwụkwọ enweghị Nsense Guide to HIV/AIDS, na 'Ọ dịghị Nsense Guide to World Health (Verso Press/New Internationalist)'
Sherif Arafa (amụrụ na Disemba 25, 1960) bụ onye nduzi Egypt, odee na onye na-emepụta ihe
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Higher Institute of Cinema na 1982
Sharif Arafa sonyere n'ime ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụlọọrụ ihe nkiri Egypt, dị ka Birds of Darkness , Mafia, Halim na Welad El Am
O mepụtara ọtụtụ ọrụ telivishọn dị ka Tamer we shawkeya na 'Lahazat Harega' 'Oge ndị dị oke egwu'
Ọ bụ onye a ma ama maka ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na onye edemede 'Wahid Hamed'
Ọ natara ọtụtụ ihe nrite n'oge ọrụ ya dịka
Ma nna ya, Saad Arafa, na nwanne ya nwoke nke obere, Amr Arafa, bụ ndị nduzi

Sherif Desouky (Arabic; a mụrụ na 26 Nọvemba 1967 na Alexandria) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, onye edemede, na onye na-akọ akụkọ, Ọ bụ onye natara onyinye maka onye na-eme egwuregwu kacha mma na Cairo International Film Festival afọ 2018

A mụrụ Sherif Desouky na Alexandria Governorate, Egypt na ọchịchọ ya kwagara na ihe nkiri site na nwata, ebe nna ya bụ onye nduzi nke Ismail Yassin Theater kemgbe afọ 1952, Ya na nna ya biri n'ụlọ ezinụlọ n'azụ ihe nkiri, n'agbanyeghị ọrụ nna ya na ihe nkiri, ọ jụrụ ịbanye n'ụwa nka ma kụọ ya na mbụ ya n'elu ihe nkiri
Sharif rụrụ ọrụ n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọrụ ihe nkiri niile dịka onye na-ahụ maka ụda na onye na-arụ ọrụ n'elu ikpo okwu

Mana mgbe a kwatuchara ụlọ ihe nkiri Ismail Yassine na ọtụtụ n'ime ụlọ ihe nkiri oge okpomọkụ nke Alexandria ma wuo ụlọ n'ọnọdụ ya, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ihe nkiri wee gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na obí ọdịbendị na ndị otu onwe ha kemgbe afọ 1990

N'ihi ihe ọmụma Desouky banyere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke ndị prọfesọ na-eme ọrụ na Academy of Arts na Mahadum Alexandria nabatara, ha tinyekwara ya n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na asọmpi ime ihe nkiri, Sharif banyere asọmpi na General Authority of Cultural Palaces
Ọ na-enweta ahụmịhe site n'aka nna ya na ụmụ akwụkwọ ya n'aka onye nduzi Ijipt Youssef Chahine ma na-aga ọmụmụ ihe na ọmụmụ nnọchiteanya na Egypt, Qatar, Germany na Austria

Desouky malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 2003 na obere ahụmịhe ihe nkiri, malite na ihe nkiri (Violence and Irony) nke Asma El Bakry duziri, ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi (Hawi) na (Hot Dry in Summer), ọ sonyekwara na usoro (As roses), nke Youssef El Sherif duziri n'afọ 2012

Ọ matara onye nduzi Ahmed Abdullah Al-Sayed mgbe ọ na-ese ihe nkiri 'Microphone' n'afọ 2010, wee kirie ihe nkiri ya dị mkpirikpi 'Hawi' iji chọpụta nhọpụta Abdullah maka ọrụ 'Mustafa' na ihe nkiri 'Night/Ext'

Onye nduzi Kamla Abu Zekry dọtara uche ya mgbe ọ kiriri ihe nkiri mpụga Night/Ext, ya mere ọ chọrọ ka ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ọrụ, Al-Adl Group, bụrụ akụkụ nke usoro ọrụ nke usoro 'With 100 Faces', nke a tọhapụrụ na Ramadan afọ 2020, na ọrụ nke 'Seba'i' dịka nnukwu ihe ngosi mbụ ya mgbe ọ sonyere na usoro 'As roses' n'afọ 2012, na usoro 'Kas roses' n'afọ 2019

Desouky duziri ọtụtụ egwuregwu, gụnyere egwuregwu 'ọ dịghị ihe ọ bụla ma', nke o gosipụtara na 'Barah' otu ihe nkiri, ka ọ dị iche na nka nke ịkọ, ruo mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye na-akpa akwa, nke dugara n'ịdị mma ya na improvisation
Sherif El Bendary (amụrụ na 29 Septemba 1978) bụ onye nduzi ihe Egypt, onye edemede na onye na-emepụta ihe
Sherif gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Faculty of Applied Arts n'afọ 2001 wee rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta akwa
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ sonyeere Egyptian Film Institute na 2002 wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2007, ebe ọ na-akụzi ntụziaka ihe nkiri ugbu a
N'afọ 2008, El Bendary dere ma duzie At Day's End nke dabeere na akụkọ dị mkpirikpi nke onye edemede Egypt a ma ama bụ Ibrahim Aslan
N'afọ 2011, o duziri ihe nkiri ogologo oge On the Road to Downtown na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi Curfew nke bụ akụkụ nke ihe nkiri anthology 18 Days ̆ ̆ Ōn Cannes Film Festival

N'afọ 2014, ihe nkiri ya dị mkpirikpi Dry Hot Summers meriri ihe nrite ihe nkiri Robert Bosch Stiftung site na ogige Berlinale Talents, ọ malitere na Clermont-Ferrand International Short Film Festival na Dubai International Film Festival

N'afọ 2017, ọ wepụtara ihe nkiri akụkọ mbụ ya Ali, the Goat and Ibrahim nke Egypt / Emirates / French co-production, nke meriri ihe nrite Best Actor na Dubai International Film Festival ma wepụta ya na Egypt na France na ọtụtụ mba ndị ọzọ
Ọ duziri usoro ihe nkiri TV Al Gamaa Part 2, nke onye edemede ochie bụ Wahid Hamed dere ma gbasaa ya na 2017
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu ndị ọka ikpe n'ọtụtụ ememme nke gụnyere Cairo International Film Festival, El Gouna Film Festival na Egyptian National Film Festival

N'afọ 2019, El Bendary guzobere Africa Films, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke na-elekwasị anya na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na ihe ngosi site n'ịkwado ndị nduzi na-etolite, nke ga-emepụta Spray, ihe nkiri nke abụọ ya
Sherif Salama Hasan (a mụrụ na 12 Julaị 1979 na Cairo) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1998
Ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na usoro TV
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ a ma ama na-etinye aka na nka
Nna ya Salama Hasan bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri, nwanne ya nwanyị nke okenye Manal Salama bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya na Higher institute of theatrical arts ma mesịa malite ọrụ dịka onye na-ese foto
Ọrụ mbụ ya n'ime ihe nkiri bụ na A woman from time of love TV series n'afọ 1998

Ọrụ ya a kachasị mara bụ na Morgan ahmed morgan n'afọ 2007 ya na Adel Emam na Basma, Spies war n'afọ 2009 ya na Menna Shalabi na Bassem Yakhour, Thieves trap n'afọ 2009, The door in the door n'afọ 2011, Napoleon na mahroosa n'afọ 2012 ya na Laila Elwi, mmehie na 2014 ya na Shery Adel, Misunderstanding n'afọ 2015 ya na Cyrine Abdelnour, The black box na 2020 ya na Mona Zaki, Light Shefa Hai, ha lụrụ ụmụ abụọ, Shefa na 2020 ha nwere ụmụ
Sherif Sonbol (amụrụ na Disemba 6, 1956) bụ onye Egypt na-ese foto
Ọ bu ọkachamara n'ihe owuwu, nka mara mma na foto
A mụrụ Sonbol na Giza, Cairo, Egypt
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ mkpuchi ihe onwunwe na Mahadum Cairo wee gaa Chartered Insurance Institute na London
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ Egypt Reinsurance dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ n'ụgbọ mmiri
N'ihe dị ka n'afọ 1988, Sonbol kpebiri ịchụso otu n'ime ihe ndị na-atọ ya ụtọ - foto- ma nwalee ihu ọma ya na Al-Ahram, ebe ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ n'oge na-adịghị anya dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya
O were naanị ọnwa ole na ole ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ese foto oge niile na Al-Ahram n'okpuru nkwado nke Antoun Albert
N'agbanyeghị na ọ na-enweta ihe mgbaru ọsọ ọkachamara na ewu ewu na Al-Ahram, otu oge Sonbol hụrụ mkpa ọ dị ịhapụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ka American Embassy wee were ya dịka onye na-ese foto
Ọnọdụ a emesịghị pụta ìhè mana American Embassy tinyere ya na ngalaba kọmputa ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe na onye na-enye ọzụzụ kọmputa maka ndị ọhụrụ
O jisiri ike jikọta ọrụ ndị a na ọrụ ya na New Cairo Opera House, ebe ọ nọ na-ese foto kemgbe o meghere ọnụ ụzọ ya na 1988
N'ikpeazụ, Sonbol gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa ya na American Embassy wee laghachi Al-Ahram; n'oge ọ gara na Al-Ahrama Weekly
Ọ nọrọ afọ isii dị ka onye isi na-ese foto nke Kalam-El-Nass
N'afọ ikpeazụ ya n'ebe ahụ, ọrụ magazin Maraya-El-Nass hụrụ ìhè
Nke a bụ magazin ime ụlọ nke otu ahụ dị ka Kalam-El-Nass
Ọrụ nka dị mkpa nke ọrụ ahụ bụ ịbụ onye edemede Moguib Rushdi na onwe ya, n'ihi ya, a kpọfere ya na magazin ọhụrụ ahụ
N'ebe a kwa, o jisiri ike 'na-eme ka ntọala nke foto ime ụlọ Ijipt site na iji ìhè okike'
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Sonbol na-ejikọta ọrụ ya dị ka onye isi na-ese foto na Al-Ahram Weekly na Cairo Opera House na ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ nọrọ ọnwe ya, ọ na-enye aka mgbe ụfọdụ na mbipụta ndị ọzọ - gụnyere Kalam-El-Nass-
Ọ na-ekere òkè na mkpọsa foto na ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Ọ rụkọkwara ọrụ na ebe ọdịnala dị mkpa dị ka Bibliotheca Alexandrina
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ihe ngosi dị iche iche n'ụwa niile ma bụrụ isiokwu nke thesis doctorate
O nyela nzukọ ọmụmụ na AFCA (Académie Francophone Cairote des Arts) ma na-akụzi foto na Mahadum Ahram Canadian kemgbe afọ 2008
Site n'otu n'ime ọrụ onwe ya kachasị ọhụrụ, Sonbol na-anwa ime ka ọdịbendị ọdịda anyanwụ na nke Arab dị nso iji kwalite nghọta na nkwurịta okwu ka mma
'Ọ dịghị ihe mara mma karịa igosipụta nka site na nka' -Naguib Mahfouz, Nobel Laureate
'Ọ dị ụkọ bụ onye na-ese foto nke na-ele ụdị nka a ma ama ma gosipụta ya n'ìhè ọhụrụ
Mana foto egwu Sherif Sonbolī na-adọrọ mmasị ma na-ekpughe anya [na-egosi] anya dị nkọ
nke nwere ike isi n'okporo ámá dị n'elu ikpo okwu ma ọ bụ site na nku, na-ewepụkarị ọdịdị n'ime ụcha na-agbawa agbawa
' -Anna Kisselgoff, New York Times
'Onye na-ese ihe eruola n'elu ọrụ ya mgbe enwere ike ịmata ọrụ ya n'edeghị mbinye aka ya' -Mounir Kenaan, onye na-ese foto Ijipt
Sherihan (amụrụ na 6 Disemba 1964) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe , onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-agba egwú
Sherihan malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ
A maara ya nke ọma maka Fawazir Ramadan
Ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 2002 wee pụọ n'ọrụ n'afọ 2016
N'afọ 2021, ọ laghachiri n'ọkwa ya mgbe afọ 20 nke ime ihe nkiri site na ime ihe nkiri na Coco Chanel
Sherihan bụ nwanne nwanyị Omar Khorshid
Ọ lụrụ onye ọchụnta ego Jọdan Alaa Khawaja, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
N'afọ 1990, o nwere nnukwu ihe mberede, ebe ọ gbajiri azụ ya nakwa ọkpụkpụ azụ
N'afọ 2002, ọ rịara ọrịa akpịrị akpịrị akpị, nke mere ka ọ kwụsị ọrụ ime ihe nkiri
Sherihan bụkwa onye mba Ijipt a ma ama ma bụrụkwa onye isi na-ekere òkè na mgbanwe nke ala nna ya na 2011 na-achọ iwepụ onye isi ala Hosni Mubarak
مسرحية كوكو شنل 20 21
N'afọ 2022
Sherin Guirguis (amụrụ n'afọ 1974 na Luxor, Egypt) bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri nke bi na Los Angeles, California
Guirguis enweela ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya na 18th Street Art Center (Santa Monica, California), The Third Line Gallery (Dubai), Shulamit Nazarian Gallery (Venice, California), na LAXART (Los Angeles)
N'afọ 2012, Guirguis natara California Community Foundation Fellowship for Visual Artists nakwa 2014 Xi 15 City of Los Angeles Individual Artist Fellowsship

A na-enweta ma ọ bụ na-edebe ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Los Angeles County Museum of Art, Museum of Fine Arts, Houston, Orange County Museum of Arts, Las Vegas Art Museum, US Department of State, na Metropolitan Authority Los Angeles
Guirguis bụ onye osote prọfesọ na Practice of Fine Art na Roski School of Art and Design na Mahadum nke Southern California
Guirguis sitere na mmetụta nke mpaghara Western na Middle East dị ka a na-ahụ na usoro Mashrabiya ya nke nwere akara neon siri ike
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ngosi Desert X na Ndagwurugwu Coachella site na Febụwarị 25 na Eprel 30, 2017
Ụlọ ọrụ Aviation/Century maka usoro Metro Rail nke Los Angeles County gụnyere ihe osise ya

Sherine Sayed Mohamed Abdel-Wahab (amụrụ n'October 8, 1980), nke a maara site na aha Sherine, bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-eme ihe , onye na TV na onye ama ama, na onye bụbu onye ọka ikpe na MBC's The Voice Ahla Sawt
A mụrụ ya na October 8, 1980, na Cairo, Egypt
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ nọ n'ọkwá dị n'etiti, nna ya bụ onye na-achọ ụlọ mma, nne ya, onye na-elekọta ụlọ, o nwekwara nwanne nwoke na nwanne nwanyị
Dị ka nwatakịrị, onye nkuzi egwu ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ chọpụtara nkà olu Sherine
Mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu, onye nkuzi ya mere ka nne ya kwenye ịkpọrọ ya gaa na Cairo Opera House izute Selim Sahab, onye nduzi egwu oge ochie nke Ijipt
Ọ bụrụ abụ n'ihu ya, ọ masịkwara olu ya nke ukwuu

Site n'oge ọ dị afọ itoolu ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ọ bụrụ abụ dị ka onye otu ukwe na Cairo Opera House, mgbe ahụ e nyere ya ohere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-agụ egwu n'onwe ya ma nwee nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma
Ọ nọgidere na-abụ abụ na Cairo Opera House mgbe ọ na-achọ onye na-emepụta egwu iji malite ọrụ dịka ọgụ egwu

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, a kpọọrọ ya ga izute Nasr Mahrous, onye ama ama na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta egwu, ọ nwere mmasị n'olu ya wee kpebie iso ya rụkọọ ọrụ site na ụlọ ọrụ, Free Music, ebe ọ zutere Tamer Hosny, mgbe ahụ talent ọhụrụ na-achọkwa ohere
Nasr Mahrous kpebiri ime nke mbụ ya dị ka abọm jikọrọ aka maka Tamer Hosni na Sherine gụnyere abụ abụọ na-egosi ha ọnụ
A tọhapụrụ abọm ahụ na Septemba 2002, site na aha Free Mix3 - Tamer & Sherine ma bụrụ nnukwu ihe na Middle East na North Africa dum
Abọm ahụ rere ihe karịrị nde iri abụọ na Middle East na North Africa dum
Sherine gosipụtara n'ihu onye na-eme ihe ọchị nke Egypt bụ Ahmed Helmy na Mido Mashakel
Mohamed El-Naggar duziri ihe nkiri nke afọ 2003

N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2015 ọ pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri Ramadan Egyptian Taree'i (English My Road), ebe ọ na-eme ka nwa agbọghọ nke na-agba mbọ imezu nrọ ndụ ya niile nke ịghọ onye na-agụ egwú a ma ama, megide mgbochi mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, iwu na mmegide sitere n'ezinụlọ ya
Ọ bụ Tamer Habib dere ihe nkiri ahụ ma bụrụ nke Mohamed Shaker duziri
Sherine bụ onye ọka ikpe na ihe ngosi The Voice Ahla Sawt ruo mgbe ọ nọchiri ya na 2017
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2017, ọ kwadoro ngosi nke ya, Sherry's Studio (Arabic), na netwọk Ijipt, DMC
Na June 19, 2018, a hụrụ ya na ọtụtụ ndị ama ama na ndị na-ese si gburugburu ụwa na ihe ngosi mbụ na Saudi Arabia na King Abdullah Sports City na Jeddah, mgbe iwu ntụrụndụ ọhụrụ nke alaeze ahụ gasịrị
Sherine lụrụ di nke ugboro abụọ na Eprel 7, 2018 na Cairo, Egypt na Hossam Habib, onye na-agụ egwu pop nke Egypt
Ndị ezinụlọ ya, ndị njikwa na ndị na-ahazi di na nwunye ahụ, gụnyere ụmụ nwanyị Sherine site na alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya na onye na-ede egwu Ijipt, Mohamed Moustafa, bịara agbamakwụkwọ ahụ
Sherine na Hossam Habib gbara alụkwaghịm na 2021

N'afọ 2017, vidiyo e dekọrọ n'otu egwu gosipụtara na ọ na-azaghachi arịrịọ abụ site n'ịkpa ọchị na ịṅụ mmanya si na Naịl ga-enye ya schistosomiasis mgbe a gwara ya ka ọ bụrụ abụ Mashrebtesh Men Nilha (Egyptian Arabic ماشرب من نيلها; English You Didn't Drink From Its Nile) n'otu egwuregwu egwu
Ndị Egyptian Musicians Syndicate kpebiri ịkwụsị ikike ya ịrụ ọrụ na Egypt n'ihi 'ịkwa emo na-enweghị isi nke Ijipt anyị hụrụ n'anya' mgbe ọ kiriri vidiyo ahụ
Sherine mechara rịọ mgbaghara maka 'ihe ọchị nzuzu' ya n'ihe ngosi ahụ
Sheroo Dara Keeka (11 Septemba 1921 14 Septemba 2006) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a mụrụ na India na Tanganyika
N'afọ 1955, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ mbụ a họpụtara na Kansụl Iwu
A mụrụ ya na India n'afọ 1921, Keeka gara St
Xavier's College na Bombay
Ọ kwagara Tanganyika, wee bụrụ onyeisi ụlọ akwụkwọ Aga Khan Girls School na Dodoma n'afọ 1940, ọrụ ọ rụrụ ruo afọ 1944
N'afọ 1953, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke alaka Dodoma nke Tanganyika Society for Prevention of Cruelty to Animals
Di ya Dara Framroze Keeka, onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na St
Xavier's College, bụ onye ọka iwu a ma ama na onyeisi oche nke Dodoma Town Council
N'afọ 1955, a họpụtara ya na Kansụl Iwu na-anọchite anya Central Province dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ mbụ, na-eje ozi ruo n'afọ 1958
O mechara mee mkpọsa maka 'Votes for Married Women', ma jee ozi dị ka onyeisi oche nke alaka Dodoma nke Tanganyika Council of Women site n'afọ 1958 ruo afọ 1962
Ọ bụkwa onye kọmishọna Girl Guides site n'afọ 1960 na onye otu kọmitii nke alaka Dodoma nke Tanganyika Red Cross
Sherry Chen (Chinese; ; amụrụ na Disemba 15, na afọ 1955) bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego South Africa na onye bụbu onye omeiwu
Chen kwagara South Africa na afọ 1981, nke mbụ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ akwa, mgbe ahụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ Bekee maka ụlọ ọrụ Taiwan nke mechara daa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị iche iche ruo oge ụfọdụ tupu ọ nweta ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ njem
Chen mechara chọta ụlọ ọrụ anọ na-aga nke ọma na-etinye aka n'ọtụtụ ọrụ azụmahịa dị iche iche
Chen banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na afọ 1994 site na ọrụ ya na ndị China nọ na South Africa
N'ihi ọrụ azụmahịa, ọ gbaghị ọsọ maka ọfịs ruo mgbe ọ gara nke ọma maka oche na kansụl obodo Johannesburg, were oche ya na afọ 2000
N'afọ 2004, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu
Na Septemba, na afọ 2010 Chen gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa ya na ndị omeiwu iji lekwasị anya na ọdịmma azụmahịa ya na ọrụ ọdịmma ọha na eze
Shervone Neckles (amụrụ n'afọ 1979) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, onye nkụzi, na ónyé ọrụ obodo
Ọrụ ya na-esite na duality na ọdịdị mgbanwe nke njirimara Afro-Grenadian-American ya

Omume Necklesń jikọtara usoro mgbasa ozi ngwakọta nke obibi akwụkwọ, akwa, nka akwụkwọ, ihe ọkpụkpụ, ntinye, na nyocha mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya iji nyochaa echiche nke ọchịchị ndị gárá aga na nke ugbu a, echiche nke ebe o si dị ka ọ metụtara mmalite, ónyé édémédé na onye nwe ya
A mụrụ Neckles na 1979 na Huntington, New York na nné na nnà sitere na Grenadian ma zụlite ya na East Flatbush, Brooklyn, New York
O nwetara MA na Teacher's College, Columbia University, MFA na Queens College na BFA na The College of New Rochelle
Omume nke akpịrị na-ewere usoro interdisciplinary

Site n'iji usoro mgbasa ozi ngwakọta nke obibi akwụkwọ, nchịkọta, collage, akwa na embroidery nke gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ na omume na omenala Afro-Caribbean ya, ọ na-emepụta njikọ, na-aga n'ihu omenala, na-echekwa ihe ncheta, ma tinye onwé ya na ndị nna ya n'akụkọ ihe méré eme
Sherine Adel (amụrụ na 19 Eprel 1988), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Shery Adel (Arabic شيري عادل), bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị na mgbasa ozi TV
Ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ na Friends or Business na 2001
O mechara mee ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dịka Outlaw na 2007, Hassan na Marcus na 2008, Amer Al-Behar na 2009 na A Bewildered Lovebird na 2010
O mekwara ọtụtụ usoro dịka Eze Farouk na 2007 dị ka Narriman Sadek, Unknown Number na 2012, Temporary Name na 2013, na The Sin na 2014
A na-akpọ ya chocolate ihe nkiri Egypt
A mụrụ ya na Cairo, ezigbo aha ya bụ Sherine Adel, Ọ gụrụ Trade na Mahadum Ain Shams
Ọ malitere ime ihe mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị na mgbasa ozi TV, tupu ọ hapụ TV ma laghachi na ọrụ mbụ ya na sinima
Ọ pụtara na Friends or business na 2001 na Mostafa Qamar na Amr Waked
Ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ dị ka Eze Farouk na 2007 nke ọ rụrụ Queen Narriman Sadek na Taim Hasan

Ụmụ nwanyị ndị maara nchegharị na 2009, Queen in exile na 2010 dị ka Princess Fathia Ghali na Nadia Al-Gindi, The Citizen x na 2011, Unknown number na 2012, Temporary name na 2013, The sin na 2014 na Sherif Mounir na Reham Abdel Ghafour, Time difference na 2014 na Tamer Hosny na Nicole Saba, The House secrets na 2015 na Hana Shiha, Iblis horse game na 2015, Superman's Girls na 2016 na Yosebyra El Lozy na Riham Hajaj, Nase We Esmetak na 2016-2017 na Hanyma na Nicole Black Saba, na Ahmed Sakka na Black Saba

Na ihe nkiri ọ nwekwara ọtụtụ ọrụ dị ka Hassan na Marcus na 2008 na Adel Emam na Omar Sharif, Ameer Elbehar na 2009 na Mohamed Henedi, A Bewildered Lovebird na 2010 na Ahmed Helmy, Dawlat security na 2011 na Hamada Helal, My woman and wife na 2014 na Ramez Galal, Sukkar mur na 2015 na Ahmed El-Fishawy na Haytham Ahamed Zaki, Where s my heart na 2017 na Mostafa Qamar na Yosra El Lozy
N'afọ 2009, o ritere ihe nrite Best coming actress na Alexandria International Film Festival
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2018 o mere emume agbamakwụkwọ ya na onye na-emepụta Moez Masoud, Ọ mara ọkwa ịgba alụkwaghịm n'afọ 2019
Shettima Ali Monguno, CFR (1926 ruo 8 Julaị 2016) bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, amụrụ na 1926 na steeti Monguno-Borno
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Monguno, Teacherīs College Bauchi na Katsina, kọleji nka, sayensị na teknụzụ Zaria, kọlejin agụmakwụkwọ Moray House na Mahadum Edinburgh
Ọ bụ MP
na 1959, odeakwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ na onye ndụmọdụ maka agụmakwụkwọ, ọrụ na ọdịmma ọha na eze Borno, Gọọmentị ime obodo 1959 ruo 65
Minista gọọmentị etiti maka Air Force na ihe ndị dị n'ime ụlọ 1965 ruo 66, kọmishọna gọọmentị gọọmentị maka azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ 1967 ruo 71 minista na-egwupụta ihe na ike, mmanụ na ike 1972 ruo 75
Shettima Ali Monguno bụkwa onye isi ala, OPEC, 1972/1973
Ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala n'oge ntuli aka A4 na mbido afọ 1990 na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye ndú nke ndị nnọchi anya Naijiria na UNCAD II New Delhi na 1968 na onye otu ndị nnọchianya Naijiria gara United Nations ihe karịrị afọ iri
Ọ natara mkpịsị ugodi nke obodo New York City, Louisville, Kentucky, USA; Quito, Ecuador; na Lima, Peru
Ọ nwụrụ na Maiduguri na 8 Julaị 2016

Shettima Mustafa' OFR (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ n'isi nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1939 - Novemba 2022) bụ Nwa-afọ Naịjirịa gụrụ akwụkwọ na onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo (1990–1992), n'afo 2007 ka a họpụtara Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka nchekwa n'ime Kabịnetị nke Onye isi ala Umaru Yar'Adua
O mechara bụrụ Mịnịsta nke ime obodo
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ n'ọnwa Maachị nke afọ 2010 mgbe Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan gbasoro ụlọ ọrụ ya
A mụrụ Shettima Mustafa n'ụbọchị iri abụọ n'isii nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1939 na Nguru, nke dị na Yobe Steeti ugbua
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke Borno na Maiduguri (1946–1952)
Ọ zụrụ onwe ya dịka onye enyemaka ngalaba ahụike na Kano (1955–1956)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Nwa-afọ nchịkwa Borno (1954–1964) ma mesịa soro igwe redio na igwe onyonyo telivishọn nke Kaduna (1965–1967)
N’afọ 1967, mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri abụọ na asatọ, a nabatara ya na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, gụchaa akwụkwọ n’afọ 1972 ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ dịka onye nyocha na ụlọ mmụta nke nyocha ọrụ ugbo na mahadum ahụ
Site n'afọ 1973 rue 1974, ọ gara Mahadum Cambridge, ebe o nwetara nzere diplọma nke ngụcha akwụkwọ na Bayọlọji etinyere
Ọ gara n'ihu ịgba mbọ nweta nzere PhD, na-ịgaMahadum Purdue, Indiana na United States n'afọ 1978, wee nweta nzere PhD n'afọ 1979
O mechakwara ihe omumu na oru nlekọta na nyocha oru ugbo na Mahadum East Anglia n'afọ 1990
A họpụtara Shettima Mustafa dịka kọmishọna na ọchịchị gọọmenti Borno Steeti n’okpuru gọvanọ Mohammed Goni
O biliri nwayọ n'ọkwa ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ma bụrụ onye na-azọ osote onyeisiala nke pati ndị Naịjirịa na ntuli aka nke afọ 1983
Agbanyeghị, onye ọchịchị bụ Shehu Shagari nke National Party of Nigeria (NPN) meriri ntuli aka ahụ
Mgbe nkwatu ọchịchị nke ndị agha nke ọnwa Desemba afo 1983 mgbe Major General Muhammadu Buhari banyere n'ọchịchị, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ruo 1985
Mgbe a hapụrụ ya ọ laghachiri nkuzi oge nwa oge na Mahadum Maiduguri
Ọ mechara bụrụ onye isi mpaghara na Jos nke Ụlọ ozi ọrụ ugbo Gọọmenti etiti
Ka ọnwa nke asatọ dị n’afọ 1990, a họpụtara Shettima Mustafa dịka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka Ọrụ Ugbo na Akụrụngwa efu, ojidere ọkwa ahụ ruo mgbe ndị omebe iwu kewara na 1992

Site na nke a, ọ buru onye ndụmọdụ nye òtù dị iche iche nke obodo na mba dị iche iche, wee bụrụ onye nlekọta ego nke mba nke otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị People's Democratic Party (PDP), ọkwá ọ nọrọ n'agbata afọ 1998 na 2001

Ọ bụrụ onye otu nke Otu Genetic nke Naịjirịa, onye otu Otu ịkọ ọrụ ugbo nke Amerịka na onye otu Ọrụ ugbo nke Naịjiria, N'afọ 2002, a họpụtara Shettima Mustafa na kọmitii nke Ụlọ akụ Savannah, n'agbanyeghị na O soghi nwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Onye isi ala Umaru Yar'Adua họpụtara Shettima Mustafa dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka Nchekwa Naịjirịa
N'ụbọchị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 2008, ya na Godwin Abbe gbanwere ọnọdụ, O wee bụrụ Mịnịsta nke ime obodo
Shiare bụ obodo nta dị n'ugwu Breast Mountains na mpaghara Oti nke Ghana
Ógbè Oti dị n'akụkụ ugwu nke Ógbè Volta
Shiare bụ akụkụ nke Nkwanta South Municipal District
A na-ekwu na obodo ahụ dị narị afọ itoolu
Ọ dị n'ebe ugwu nke mpaghara Oti na Ghana
A maara obodo ahụ dị ka 'The Hanging Village'
[citation needed]
Obodo Shiare dị na gburugburu Ugwu Breast na Ghana
Ha na-ekpe okpukpe ọdịnala ha
E kwenyere na obodo ahụ dị afọ 900
Shiare dị ihe dị ka nkeji iri atọ site na Nkwanta, Ghana
Ndị obodo Shiare bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo
Ha na-akụ cassava, yam, na akwụkwọ nri ụfọdụ
Ndị Shiare bụ ndị Guans
Asụsụ ha bụ akyode
Obodo a karịrị narị afọ itoolu
Ebe kacha mkpa bụ nkume na ụrọ a rụrụ n'ụlọ ha n'elu mbara ala gburugburu ugwu Kwahu
Ndị obodo ahụ bụ ndị Kyode
Asụsụ ha bụ ndị Guang ma ọ bụ Guans
Onye isi Shiare ka a na-akpọ Shiare Wura ma ọ bụ Osulewura
Ọ pụtara eze Kyode
Isi oche nke Kyode dị na Shiare
Okpukpe ha bụ ndị omenala
Holy Family Catholic Church bụ naanị ụka dị n'ime obodo
Nke malitere afọ iri asaa na ise gara aga
Shibiri ma ọ bụ Shibiri Ekunpa bụ obodo dị na mpaghara gọọmentị Ojo nke Lagos Steeti, Naijiria N'ịbụ nke onye ọchịchị ọdịnala na-achị, koodu ZIP ya bụ 102111

Shina Abiola Peller (a mụrụ ya na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1976) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye na-emepụta ihe, na onye otu nke itenanị nke National Assembly
Ọ bụ onye isi oche na onye nduzi nke Aquila Group of Companies na Club Quilox
Shina Peller chịrị echichi nke Ayedero nke ala Yoruba na Akinrogun nke Ala Epe, Lagos Nigeria
Shina Abiola Peller bụ nwa Alhaja Silifat na Prọfesọ Moshood Abiela Peler
Ọ tolitere n'ụlọ ndị Alakụba
Ọ malitere na Iseyin, Oyo State na South-Western Naịjiria
Ọ gụrụ injinia kemịkal na Ladoke Akintola University nke Teknuzu, Ogbomosho, Nigeria, ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya n'afọ 2002
N'ikpeazụ, ọ nwetara nzere masta na Business Management site na Ladoke Akintola University of Technology n'afo 2013
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Abia State n'afo 2003 iji mezuo ọrụ otu afọ nke National Youth Service Corps (NYSC) ana-eme maka ndị niile gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Naijiria

Peller bụ onye otu All Progressive Congress (APC), ma kwupụta ebumnuche ya ịsọ mpi n'okpuru ikpo okwu nke All progressives Congress dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụlọ maka mpaghara Iseyin / Itesiwaju / Iwajowa / Kajola Federal Constituency na Oyo Steeti

N'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2018, Shina Peller meriri na ntuli aka nke onye nnọchi anya ụlọ maka mpaghara lseyin /ltesiwaju / Kajola /lwajowa Federal na ikpo okwu nke All Progressive Congress (APC) maka ntuziaka 2019 Nigeria General wee merie oche ahụ
Ọ meriri oche maka House of Representatives na mpaghara ya na ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na atọ nke onwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2019 mana a tụfuru ya ka ọ laghachi dị ka onye omeiwu
Ọnọ ugbu a maka Senate nke Naijiria n'okpuru nchebe nke Accord Party
Shinasha, makwaara dị ka Boro (Borna, Bworo) bụ asụsụ North Omotic nke ndị Shinasha na-asụ na ọdịda anyanwụ Etiopia
Ndị na-asụ ya bi na mpaghara gbasasịrị n'ebe ugwu nke osimiri Abay na mpaghara Dangur, Bullen, Dibate na Wenbera, nke bụ akụkụ nke mpaghara Benishangul-Gumuz
Àtụ Languages of Ethiopia

Shine Begho Usanga (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 15 n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1985) bụ onye redio Naijiria, onye na-ahụ maka telivishọn, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye nkwado, onye nnọchi anya akara na nwanyị ọchụnta ego
Begho na-akwado ihe omume gụnyere The Twists With Shine na Shine with The Stars, yana ịbụ onye na-akwado ihe ngosi nri ụtụtụ na 969 Cool FM Lagos ruo afọ 5
Begho bụbu onye na-ahụ maka redio nke The Sunday Chilloutzone Show, The Twist With Shine Radio Show, ihe ngosi redio na ngwụcha izu na COOL-FM Lagos
N'afọ 2017, Shine kwagara na 1023 Max FM Lagos na-akwado ihe ngosi oge ịkwọ ụgbọala mgbede ma n'afọ 2019 ghọrọ onye na-eme ihe ngosi ehihie 'The Maxhits'
A mụrụ Begho na Delta Steeti, Naịjirịa, ma gụọ akwụkwọ elementrị ya na Sapele Delta Steeti High School na Benin City, Edo Steeti na College na Anambra Steeti
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke Chief Justice Begho, onye isi ikpe nke Bendel Steeti n'oge ahụ, na Ester Begho, nwanyị na-azụ ahịa
Begho gụrụ Mass communication (journalism) na Madonna University, Okija na afo 2002
Mgbe ọ nọ na kọleji, ọ bụ onye na-agba egwu na ihe nlereanya
Begho gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afo 2007 wee laghachi n'ụlọ ya na Lagos na-adịgide adịgide iji rụọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ya
N'afọ 2007, Begho nwetara ọrụ dị ka onye na-egosi telivishọn na Galaxy Television
O mekwara ihe ngosi TV ụmụaka, ma gosipụta ya na mmemme telivishọn dị iche iche na ihe ngosi
Na Jenụwarị afo 2008, Begho ghọrọ onye na-akwado ihe omume redio Eko FM Thank God It's Friday
Ihe ngosi a na-egosi n'ehihie Fraịdee ọ bụla; Shine Begho ga-emecha TV ya ma gbaga n'ụlọ ọrụ redio iji sonyere ndị ọzọ
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2008, ọ gara maka ọrụ ndị ntorobịa mba ya ma bụrụ nnukwu onye na-egosi redio n'ogige
N'afọ 2009, Begho ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị na-egosi redio ọhụrụ na HOT FM Abuja, na-akwado ihe ngosi oge ịkwọ ụgbọala mgbede
Na Disemba 2009, Begho laghachiri Lagos ma nwee obere oge na redio Classic FM
N'afọ 2010, ọ kwagara ịmalite ụlọ ọrụ redio ọhụrụ 1051 CITY FM dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ na-egosi ya na ndị ọzọ na-egosi; ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi nri ụtụtụ ma kwado ihe ngosi ngwụsị izu
Na Jenụwarị afo 2011, Begho kwagara Rainbow FM, na-akwado ihe ngosi nri ụtụtụ ma mesịa kwaga belt oge ya na ihe ngosi oge ịkwọ ụgbọala mgbede na mgbe e mesịrị na belt oge ịkwọ ụgbọala n'ehihie

Ka ọ dị na afo 2011, Begho sonyeere redio ịntanetị nke a na-akpọ Zoodrums Radio ruo ọnwa abụọ wee kwaga na 969 COOL FM Lagos, ebe ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi nri ụtụtụ ma na-akwado ihe ngosi nke ya na ngwụsị izu, The Sunday Chilloutzone Show na The Twist na Shine Radio Show

N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2017, Shine Begho sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ redio ọhụrụ 1023 Maxfm lagos, nke mbụ ọ bụ naanị ngwụsị izu wee, na Jenụwarị afo 2018, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ahụ maka ihe ngosi oge ịkwọ ụgbọala mgbede (Max Drive) kwa izu, na Jenụwarị afo 2019, ọ ghọrọ onye nhazi ọhụrụ maka Maxhits
Shinkafi bụ ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Zamfara Steeti, Naịjịrịa
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Shinkafi, mpaghara ihe dịka 674mk 2 ya na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ dị puku narị iri atọ na ise,narị isii na iri anọ na iteghete na (ọnụọgụ nke afọ 2006)

Ọ na-ekekọrịta oke n'okpuru ọchịchị Isa (Sokoto Steeti) na Niger Republic site na ugwu, ọchịchị obodo Zurmi ruo ndịda na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ, ọchịchị ime obodo Maradun na ọchịchị ime Obodo Raba (Sokoto Steeti) n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ
Ebe dị anya site na isi obodo Gusau dị ihe dịka 116 km

N'oge mmalite nke afọ 1802 tupu Jihad nke Usman Danfodio, onye ọkà mmụta Islam aha ya bụ Mallan Muhammadu Zabo, otu n'ime ndị nna ochie nke Alaeze Ukwu Borno kwagara n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke mpaghara ahụ
O duru ndi-agha nāchọ ebe-ita-nri nke ìgwè ewu na aturu-ha
Mallan Zabo bụ ọgaranya wee chiri ọtụtụ atụrụ, nnụnụ, ịnyịnya, ndị nwunye ya na ụmụ ya ya na ụfọdụ ndị ohu
O doro anya na ndị niile soro ya bụ ndị Barebari buru ụzọ biri n'ime obodo dị nso a na-akpọ 'Badarawa'
Ndị njem ahụ mechara kwụsị n'otu ndagwurugwu dị nso n'osimiri ha kpọrọ aha 'Tafkin Kaiwa' nke ha mere ka ọ bụrụ ebe obibi mbụ ha
Ndị ahịa Katsinawa hụkwara ebe ahụ na ọ bụ ebe dị mma maka ebe obibi ya bụ Gidan Dankwara ugbu a
Otu ndi ọzọ si kwa obodo Kwazare nke Niger Republic tinyere onye ndu ha a na-akpọ Adagwargo, ndi sitere na agbụrụ Rahazawa, Gidan Sarkin Ruwa ugbu a na mpaghara Barhazawa
Ndị njem a bịakwara na ìgwè ehi ha wee gbaba n'otu alaka ndagwurugwu ahụ ebe ha chọtara ebe obibi na mmiri iji zụọ ìgwè ehi ha
Ka ha na ndị Barebari na ndị mbụ biri ndụ na-emekọrịta ihe, na-ebute ọnụ ọgụgụ na-arị elu na mpaghara ahụ na-adabara ọtụtụ ndị na-azụ ahịa na-akwụsị, bụ ndị na-eji abalị eme ihe maka azụmahịa ha
Ma otu ndị dinta ọzọ bịarutere na ndagwurugwu ahụ na-achọ kpakpando ka ha biri n'ebe ahụ
Mpaghara ahụ tolitere wee buru nnukwu ibu, ebe Mamman bụ onye isi ha, onye ọchịchị Badarawa, Magaji Bello, kpebiri ịbịa birighachi na Gonar Mai Saje, ('Yan Kukoki) bụ ebe mmiri juru
Ndị mmadụ biri wee malite ịkụ osikapa n'akụkụ ndagwurugwu ahụ n'ọtụtụ ebe o buru ibu, n'ihi ikike ha nwere n'imepụta osikapa; Aha obodo a bụ 'Shinkafi' sitere na aha osikapa - shinkafa
N'ihi enweghị nchebe nke oge ahụ, Magaji Bello wulitere mgbidi (a na-akpọ Ganuwa) gburugburu ebe obibi ahụ bụ nke ọwaghere ha okirikiri
Ndị agbụrụ Magaji Bello bụ Gidan Doka dị ugbu a

Ọrụ mmekọrịta akụ na ụba nke obodo ahụ na-akọwapụta ọnọdụ ahịa mba ụwa na-adọta ndị ahịa na ndị ahịa si n'akụkụ niile nke gọọmentị etiti na ndị ọzọ sitere na mba agbata obi dịka Niger Republic, Cameroon, Togo, Mali, Benin Republics, Chad ya na Ghana
Enwekwara ebe a na-azụta akwụkwọ ụtaba, ya bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụtaba Naijiria (NTC) na ụlọ ọrụ Philp Morris ụtaba ndị ọzọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ

'Ọkpụ m'Usoro ọzụzụ, okpukperechi na akụ na ụba nke obodo ahụ na-adọta ma dọta obodo ndị ọzọ site na Kamarawa, Shanawa, Badarawa, Isa na Sabon-Birnin Gobir, ndị dị otú ahụ mekwara Eze Gobir nke Isa n'oge ahụ iji tinye mmasị dị ukwuu n'ebe obibi ahụ - Shinkafi

Obodo a tolitere nke ukwuu wee bụrụ isi ụlọ ọrụ nke ndị ọchịchị Isa n'oge ahụ na ọdịda-ugwu Steeti ọchịchị ime Obodo Isa na Sokoto Steeti mgbe ahụ na okpúrù ọchịchị ime obodo Shinkafi nke Zamfara Steeti, Naịjịrịa ugbu a
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bi na ya bụ ndị Hausa na ndị Fulani ya na ọtụtụ ebo ndị ọzọ dị ka Igbo, Yoruba, Tiv na Zabarmawa
Obodo a ugbu a nwere ihe dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị iri na ise, ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị anọ, ụlọ ọgwụ General na ụlọ ọgwụ na-aga n'ihu, ụlọ ọgwụ anọ na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọgwụ nkeonwe
O nwekwara usoro mmiri na-agbagba, ya na nke e jikọrọ na grid mba, na ezigbo netwọkụ okporo ụzọ, Ọrụ ụlọ akụ wdg
Ndị isi obodo bụbu onye isi mpaghara site n'afọ 1835 ruo ṅ'afọ |2000, mgbe Gọvanọ mbụ nke Zamfara, Sen
Ahmed Sani (Yariman Bakura) kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ Emirate – Sarkin Gabas nke Shinkafi (Emir Class nke abụọ)
Ndị ọchịchị site na mgbe ahụ ruo taa bụ ndị a -
Shirley Frimpong-Manso (amụrụ 16 Maachị 1977) bụ onye isi ihe nkiri Ghana, onye ode akwụkwọ na onye na-emeputa ihe
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na CEO nke Sparrow Productions, ihe nkiri, telivishọn na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta mgbasa ozi
O meriri onye isi kacha mma na 6th Africa Movie Academy Awards
Frimpong-Manso bụkwa onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Sparrow Station, ọrụ nkwanye vidiyo maka ntụrụndụ Africa sitere na Sparrow na ndị ọzọ na-emepụta ihe nkiri Africa
N'afọ 2013, ọ bụ onye nke iri anọ na asatọ kacha nwee mmetụta na Ghana dịka Etv Ghana siri kwuo

A kọwara Frimpong-Manso dị ka onye 'na-achọ ịkwalite ụkpụrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri na Ghana na Africa site n'ịkọ akụkọ Africa na-aga n'ihu dị ka a na-ahụ site n'anya ndị Africa' Ịgbanwe otú e si gosi Ghana kpalikwara nhọrọ ọrụ ya
A makwaara ihe nkiri ya maka 'ndị isi ụmụ nwanyị dị egwu,' ka ha na-egosi ụmụ nwanyị Africa nwere ụlọ ọrụ nwere ike ịbụ ndị na-eri nri ma na-ebi ndụ mgbagwoju anya
Na Disemba afọ 2019, ihe nkiri ya bụ ' Potato Potahto ' malitere ịgbasa na Netflix
Frimpong-Manso sitere na Kwahu Pepease na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana

Mgbe ọ bụ nwata ọ na-ahazi egwuregwu, nke 'nwere mmetụta na-atọ ụtọ karịa iji ájá na nwa bebi na-egwuri egwu' Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2000 na National Film and Television Institute nke a ma ama dị ka NAFTI na Ghana wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ngosi na Radio Gold, ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo na Accra, wee malite ịmalite Sparrow Productions na 2003
Di ya na onye nrukooru azụmahịa ya bụ Ken Attoh, ha nwekwara otu nwa
Site na onye na-emepụta ihe na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Juliet Asante, Frimpong-Manso nyeere aka ịmepụta ihe ngosi TV Heart to Heart maka afọ abụọ obere oge ka ụlọ akwụkwọ gasịrị

Madam Shirley Yema Gbujama (amụrụ n'afọ 1936, dị ka Shirley Macaulay) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Sierra Leone nke jere ozi n'ọtụtụ ọkwa kansụl, gụnyere minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ, minista na ọdịmma ọha na eze, minista nke njem nleta na ọdịbendị, na minista na ihe gbasara okike na ụmụaka
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị minista a na-akwanyere ùgwù na ndị jere ozi ogologo oge na ọchịchị onye isi ala Ahmad Tejan Kabbah
Gbujama bụ onye agbụrụ Mende
A mụrụ Gbujama na afọ 1936 dị ka Shirley Macaulay, na Kent, obodo ịkụ azụ dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri gburugburu peninsular na Western Area Rural District nke British Sierra Leone
Nna ya bụ Fredrick Sherman Macaulay (ihe dị ka 1904), onye nkuzi, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị obodo, ma mesịa bụrụ onye ikpe nke udo
Nne ya bụ Violet Keitel, onye nkuzi Methodist Mission School si na Bonthe District
Nne na nna ya gụrụ ya aha, nwa ha nwanyị nke okenye, n'aha onye America na-eme ihe nkiri Shirley Temple, nwa amaala nke ụbọchị ahụ
Gbujama malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ na mgbakọ na mwepụ, na afọ 1959
Ọ kwagara New York City, na United States, iji nweta nzere Master of Arts na mgbakọ napụ, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 1964
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nkwusa Ndị Kraịst
A họpụtara Gbujama dị ka onye nnọchi anya Sierra Leone na Ethiopia, Tanzania na Zambia, na-enye Haile Selassie asambodo ya na Addis Ababa, ma na-eje ozi n'ọkwa ahụ site na afo 1972 ruo n'afọ 1976
Ọ laghachiri na New York City, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya mba ahụ na United Nations ruo na afọ 1978
N'afọ 1996, Gbujama nwere obere oge dị ka Minista nke Njem, tupu ọ kwaga n'ọkwa dị elu nke Minista nke Mmekọrịta Mba Ọzọ na Mmekọrịta mba ụwa na gọọmentị Ahmad Tejan Kabbah, na-anọchi Maigore Kallon
Shirley Itumeleng Tiny Segokgo bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị si Botswana
Ọ bụ onye otu Nzukọ Omeiwu mba Botswana ma bụrụkwa onye otu ụmụ nwanyị ama ama
Segokgo bụkwa onye otu Omeiwu Pan-Africa
Shirley L
Bolton (1945-1984) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé nkụzi
A mụrụ Bolton na Jenụwarị 9, 1945 na Lexington, Georgia
Ọ gàrà Mahadum Georgia dị na Athens wee nweta PhD ya
O gosipụtara nka ya na High Museum of Art na Atlanta
Ọrụ ya dị na Museum of Contemporary Art of Georgia
Ihe osise ya nke 1971 The World Outside dị na Georgia's State Art Collection
Bolton nwụrụ n'August 10, 1984 na Pensacola, Florida
Ụfọdụ n'ime akwụkwọ ya dị na faịlụ Art & Artist na Smithsonian American Art Museum
Shirley Machaba bụ onye otu ngụkọ na mgbakọ nke a kpọrọ Chartered Accountant n'asụsụ Bekee nke mba South Africa
Ọ bụ nwanyị ojii mbụ a họpụtara dịka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ PwC Southern Africa, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ego na South Africa
A mụrụ Machaba na Jabavu na Soweto, ebe ya na nne nne ya na ụmụnne ya bi
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na Jabavu Primary School na Vhulaudzi Secondary School dị na Tshitavha na Venda n'otu n'otu
O mechara gaa n'ihu na Mahadum Venda, ebe ọ gụchara nzere bachelọ nke azụmahịa na ngụkọ na mgbakọ
O nwere diplọma postgraduate na auditing & accounting na Mahadum South Africa
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị akara ugo mmụta ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge dị ka onye nyocha ime nke obere na ụlọ ọrụ Auditor-General na onye nkuzi na Mahadum Venda
N'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi ndị isi maka PwC Southern Africa, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị isi ojii mbụ nke Afrịka nọ n'ọnọdụ dị otú ahụ

Tupu nke ahụ, ọ nọrọ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ Auditor-General na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche, gụnyere Assistant Auditor, Senior Auditor, Accountant and Performance Audit Manager
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Ngalaba Ikpe Ziri Ezi na South Africa ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọkara afọ iri
N'ebe ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nke Internal Auditing unit site na mgbe ọ hapụrụ ngalaba ahụ n'afọ 2004
N'afọ 2005 o sonyeere PwC
Machaba bụ onye isi oche nke Institute of Internal Auditors nke South Africa maka 2011 - 2014, na emesia onye isi oche nke Institute Relations Committee nke Institute of Internal Auditors
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nrite ndị o nwetara na ndị a họpụtara maka ha gụnyere

Shirley Woodson (amụrụ n'afọ 1936) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nkírí, ónyé nkuzi, ónyé nduzi, na ónyé na-anakọta ihe osise nke a maara nke ọma màkà ihe osise ya dị egwu na-egosi akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Africa America
Enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ ya nke na-arụ ọrụ afọ irí isii ma na-agụ ya na nchịkọta nke Detroit Institute of Arts, Charles H
Wright Museum of African American History, na Studio Museum na Harlem, n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ
A kpọrọ Woodson onye Kresge Eminent Artist nke 2021

The Detroit Institute of Arts gosipụtara irí na otu n'ime ihe osise ya na 'Shirley Woodson Shield of the Nile' úbọchị irí nà asatọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 2021 ruo úbọchị irí nà abụọ n'ọnwa Juun, 2022, ihe ngosi nka mbụ nke ọrụ Ms
Woodson
A na-egosi ihe osise nke Ms
Woodson na Museum of Contemporary Art Detroit ngosi 'Ground Up Reflections on Black Abstraction' Eprel 8-August 16, 2022
A mụrụ ya na 1936 na Pulaski, Tennessee, Woodson ebiela na Detroit kemgbe ọ dị ọnwa atọ, mgbè nne na nnà ya kwagara ezinụlọ ha nke mmadụ anọ
Na klas nke asaa, a họpụtara ya isonye na ọzụzụ nka pụrụ iche kwa izu na Detroit Institute of Arts, ebe ọ ga-aga n'ihu na-agụ akwụkwọ na Satọdee ọ bụla, site na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
'Ọ bụ ụdị ebe kachasị amasị m ịbụ
Mgbè ọ bụla m hapụrụ ụlọ, achọrọ m ịga ébé ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, 'Woodson chetara na 2021 Kresge Foundation Eminent Artist monograph
O nwetara nzèrè BFA
ya na Mahadum Wayne State na 1958 na MA
site n'ebe ahụ na 1966
N'etiti inweta BFA
na MA, Woodson rụrụ ọrụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na School of the Art Institute of Chicago (1960) wee gaa n'ihu na-amụ onwé ya na Rome, Paris, na Stockholm (1962)
Woodson gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi nkè ndị na-ese ihe na Michigan na Detroit Institute of Arts na 1960, n'otu afọ ahụ ọ malitere ịkụzi na Detroit Public Schools

O sonyere n'ihe ngosi na ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere Academy of Arts and Letters na New York, Oakland Museum na California, na ebe ndị ọzọ dị ányá dị ka Dakar, Senegal, na Lagos, Nigeria, na-egosi ihe karịrị ihe ngosi 30 nke onwe

Na ihe ngosi Detroit Institute of Arts 'Detroit Collects' (2019), nké gosipụtara ọrụ irí isii nke ndị na-ahụ màkà ihe osise niile sitere na ndị nchịkọta ihe osise irí na itoolu nke mpaghara Detroit, Woodson na di ya Edsel Reid, ónyé na-anakọta ihe osise na onye nchịkwa nka, gbazitere site na nchịkọta ha 'After Manet, site na May Days Long Forgotten,' 2002, Carrie Mae Weems, American, digital chromogenic print
A maara di Woodson bụ Edsel na Detroit niile màkà nkwalite ya na-anụ ọkụ n'obi nke nka ndị Africa America gụnyere jazz
Woodson natara MacDowell Fellowship na 1966
A kpọrọ ya Kresge Eminent Artist nke 2021
N'ịbụ nke College for Creative Studies na-achịkwa, onyinye a na-asọpụrụ otu ónyé na-ese ihe Detroit kwa afọ maka ihe ndị ọkachamara rụzuru, onyinye ọdịbendị, na ntinye aka na ndị ọrụ nka mpaghara

Woodson bụkwa ónyé natara Detroit Council ma ọ bụ Arts na New Initiatives for the Arts Exhibition Grant, NCA Award for Artistic Excellence (1977), DIA Alain Locke Award, (1998), na Delta Sigma Theta sorority Lillian Benbow Award, n'etiti onyinye ndị ọzọ
Shiro, Shirō, Shirow ma ọ bụ Shirou Mkpúrù èdè íkenwere ike ịbụ
Shiroro bụ ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Niger Steeti, Naijiria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Kuta, nke nwere ngalaba iri na ise dị ka ndị a
O nwere mpaghara square kilometres puku narị ise na iri na ise(1,936 sq mi) na onu ogugu nke dị puku narị abụọ na irí atọ na ise, narị anọ na anọ na ngụkọ nke 2006
Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ narị iteghete na iri abụọ na otu
